1.intro: Umlandvo waLehi nemkakhe Sariya, kanye nemadvodzana akhe lamane, labebitwa ngekutsi (kusukela kulendzala) Lamani, Lemuweli, Semu, kanye naNefi. INkhosi icwayisa Lehi kutsi esuke eveni laseJerusalema, ngoba bekaphrofethe kubantfu ngalokuphatselene nebubi babo futsi bafuna kuyibhubhisa imphilo yakhe. Utsatsa luhambo lwetinsuku letintsatfu uya ehlane nemndeni wakhe. Nefi utsatsa bomnakabo ubuyela eveni laseJerusalema kute ayolandza umbhalo wemaJuda. Umlandvo ngetinhlupheko tabo. Batsatsa emadvodzakati a-Ishmayeli aba bafati babo. Batsatsa imindeni yabo baphindze bayesuka baya ehlane. Buhlungu babo kanye netinhlupheko tabo ehlane. Indlela labahamba ngayo. Bafika emantini lamaningi. Bomnakabo Nefi bayamvukela. Uyabancoba, futsi wakha umkhumbi. Indzawo bayibita ngeligama kutsi yiNala. Bawela emanti lamaningi baya eveni lesetsembiso, njalonjalo. Lomlandvo ungekwekubhala kwaNefi; noma ngalamanye emagama, mine, Nefi, ngiwubhalile lombhalo.
1.1: Mine, Nefi, ngoba ngitelwe batali labebalungile, ngako-ke ngafundziswa ngandlelatsite ngayo yonkhe imfundziso yababe; futsi sengibone tinhlupheko letiningi etinsukwini tekuphila kwami, noko, ngitsandziwe kakhulu yiNkhosi etinsukwini tami; yebo, ngitfole lwati lolukhulu lebuhle kanye netimfihlakalo taNkulunkulu, ngako-ke ngenta umbhalo wetento tami etinsukwini tekuphila kwami.
1.2: Yebo, ngenta umbhalo ngelulwimi lwababe, lolucuketse timfundziso temaJuda kanye nelulwimi lwemaGibhithe.
1.3: Futsi ngiyati kutsi umbhalo lengiwentako uliciniso; ngiphindze ngiwenta ngesami sandla lucobo; futsi ngiwenta ngekwelwati lwami.
1.4: Ngoba kwenteka ngekucala kwemnyaka wekucala wekubusa kwaSedekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda, (babe, Lehi, asahlale eJerusalema tinsuku tonkhe tekuphila kwakhe); futsi ngawo wona lowo mnyaka kwafika baphrofethi labaningi, baphrofetha kubantfu kutsi kufanele baphendvuke, noma lidolobha lelikhulu iJerusalema kufanele ibhujiswe.
1.5: Ngaloko-ke kwenteka kutsi babe, Lehi, asahamba wathandaza eNkhosini, yebo, nangenhlitiyo yakhe yonkhe, athandazela bantfu bakubo.
1.6: Futsi kwenteka asathandaza eNkhosini, kwachamuka insika yemlilo yahlala etikwelidvwala phambi kwakhe; wabona waphindze weva lokuningi; futsi ngenca yetintfo latibona nalativa wachachatela waphindze watfutfumela kakhulu.
1.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabuyela endlini yakhe eJerusalema; waphindze watijika etulu embhedzeni wakhe, anganywe nguMoya kanye netintfo labetibonile.
1.8: Asanganywe nguMoya kanjalo, watsatfwa ngumbono, kangangekutsi wabona emazulu avuleka, waphindze wabona Nkulunkulu ahleti esihlalweni sakhe, atungeletwe ticuku tetingilosi letingabaleki tisesimeni sekuhlabela nekudvumisa Nkulunkulu wato.
1.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabona loYedvwa ehla aphuma ekhatsi nekhatsi nelizulu, waphindze wabona kutsi kukhatimula kwakhe kwakungetulu kwelilanga ekhatsi nemini.
1.10: Waphindze, wabona labanye labalishumi nakubili bamlandzela, futsi kwabo kukhanya kwakwendlula kwetinkhanyeti esibhakabhakeni.
1.11: Behlela phansi bahamba etikwebuso bemhlaba; wekucala weta wema ngembili kwababe, wamnika incwadzi, futsi wamyala kutsi ayoyifundza.
1.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi asafundza, wagcwaliswa nguMoya weNkhosi.
1.13: Wafundza, watsi: Maye, maye, kuwe Jerusalema, ngoba ngitibonile tinengiso takho! Yebo, futsi tiningi tintfo babe latifundza mayelana neJerusalema—kutsi kumele ibhujiswe kanye nalabahlala kuyo; labaningi kuyomele babhujiswe ngenkemba, futsi labaningi bayomukiswa batfunjelwe eBhabhulona.
1.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babe asatifundzile aphindze atibonile tintfo letinkhulu naletimangalisako, wababata tintfo letiningi eNkhosini; njengekutsi: Mikhulu iphindze iyamangalisa imisebenti yakho, Awu Nkhosi Nkulunkulu Somandla! Sihlalo sakho sisetulu emazulwini, futsi emandla, kanye nebuhle, kanye nemusa wakho kusetulu kwabo bonkhe labahlala emhlabeni; futsi, ngoba unemusa, ngeke uvumele labo labeta kuwe kutsi babhujiswe.
1.15: Futsi kwakungalendlela lakhuluma ngayo babe ngelulwimi lwakhe advumisa Nkulunkulu; ngoba umphefumulo wakhe wajabula, nenhlitiyo yakhe yonkhe yagcwaliswa, ngenca yetintfo labetibonile, yebo, leto iNkhosi leyayimtjengise tona.
1.16: Manje mine, Nefi, angenti umlandvo lophelele ngetintfo babe latibhalile, ngoba ubhale tintfo letiningi latibona ngemibono kanye nasemaphusheni; futsi ngetulu kwaloko ubhale tintfo letiningi latiphrofetha nalatikhuluma kubantfwana bakhe, lengingayukwenta umlandvo lophelele ngato.
1.17: Kodvwa ngiyawukwenta umlandvo ngetento tami etinsukwini tekuphila kwami. Buka, ngifinyeta umbhalo wababe kubongcwengcwe lengibentile ngetami tandla lucobo; ngaloko-ke, emvakwekutsi sengiwufinyetile umbhalo wababe, ngitawubese sengenta umlandvo ngemphilo yami.
1.18: Ngaloko-ke, ngifuna kutsi nati, kutsi emvakwekutsi iNkhosi seyimtjengise tintfo letiningi letimangalisako babe, Lehi, yebo, mayelana nekubhujiswa kweJerusalema, buka wahamba waya emkhatsini webantfu, futsi wacala kuphrofetha nekumemetela kubo tintfo labetibonile futsi nalebekativile.
1.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaJuda ahlekisa ngaye ngenca yetintfo latifakaza ngawo; ngoba wafakaza ngebubi kanye netinengiso tawo; waphindze wafakaza ngekutsi tintfo labetibonile nalebekativile, kanjalo netintfo latifundza encwadzini tatibonakalisa ngalokusobala kuta kwaMesiya, kanjalo nangekuhlengwa kwemhlaba.
1.20: Futsi ngesikhatsi emaJuda ativa leti tintfo amtfukutselela; yebo, nanjengebaphrofethi basendvulo, lababacosha, nalababagcoba ngematje, nalabababulala; futsi ngetulu kwaloko afuna imphilo yakhe, kutsi ayitsatse. Kodvwa buka, mine, Nefi, ngitawunikhombisa kutsi bumnene besihawu seNkhosi bungetulu kwabo bonkhe labo leyibakhetsile, ngenca yelukholo lwabo, kubenta babe nemandla lamakhulu nangemandla ekukhululwa.

2.1: Ngoba buka, kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yakhuluma kubabe, yebo, nasephusheni, yatsi kuye: Ubusisiwe wena Lehi, ngenca yetintfo lotentile; futsi ngenca yekutsi bewetsembekile wamemetela kulaba bantfu tintfo mine lengikuyale ngato, buka, bafuna kutsatsa imphilo yakho.
2.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yamyaleta babe, nasephusheni, kutsi kuyofanele atsatse umndeni wakhe esuke aye ehlane.
2.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi walilalela livi leNkhosi, ngaloko-ke wenta njengoba iNkhosi imyalile.
2.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wasuka waya ehlane. Washiya umuti wakhe, kanjalo nelive lelalilifa lakhe, kanye neligolide lakhe, nesiliva yakhe, netintfo letiligugu takhe, futsi wangatsatsi lutfo kutsi ahambe nako, ngaphandle kwemndeni wakhe, kanye netintfo lebekatidzinga, kanye nemathende, wesuka waya ehlane.
2.5: Wehlela entansi ngaseminceleni edvute nesisekelo seLwandle loluBovu; futsi wahamba ehlane eminceleni lesedvute neLwandle loluBovu; wahamba ehlane nemndeni wakhe, lowo lowawufaka ekhatsi make, Sariya, kanye nabomnaketfu labadzala, lokwakunguLamani, naLemuweli, kanye naSemu.
2.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekahambe tinsuku letitsatfu ehlane, wamisa lithende lakhe esigodzini ngaseceleni kwemfula wemanti.
2.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakha lilati ngematje, wabese wenta umnikelo eNkhosini, waphindze wabonga eNkhosini Nkulunkulu.
2.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wawubita lomfula, ngelibito laLamani, wawutfululela eLwandle loluBovu; futsi sigodzi besiseminceleni edvute kwemlomo wawo.
2.9: Futsi ngesikhatsi babe abona kutsi emanti emfula atfululeka emtfonjeni weLwandle loluBovu, wakhuluma kuLamani watsi: Awushengatsi bewungaba njengalomfula, ugobhotele njalo emtfonjeni wako konkhe kulunga!
2.10: Waphindze kanjalo wakhuluma kuLemuweli: Awu shengatsi bewungaba njengalesi sigodzi, ugcile usime, futsi unganyakatiseki ekugcineni imiyaleto yeNkhosi!
2.11: Manje loku yena wakukhuluma ngenca yekuba bonhlokolukhuni kwaLamani banaLemuweli; ngoba buka bavungama ngetintfo letiningi kubabe, ngoba bekayindvodza yemibono, futsi bekabaholile wabakhipha eveni laseJerusalema, kute bashiye live lebekulifa labo, kanye neligolide labo, nesiliva yabo, kanye netintfo letingemagugu tabo, kute babhubhele ehlane. Futsi batsi bekakwente loku ngenca yebuwula bemicabango yenhlitiyo yakhe.
2.12: Futsi kungalendlela Lamani naLemuweli labavungamela ngayo babe, kungibo labadzala. Futsi bavungama ngoba bebangatati tento taloyo Nkulunkulu lobekabadalile.
2.13: Bebangakholwa kutsi iJerusalema, lelo dolobha lelikhulu, lalingabhujiswa njengekusho kwemavi ebaphrofethi. Futsi bona bebanjengemaJuda labekaseJerusalema, labekafuna kutsatsa imphilo yababe.
2.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babe wakhuluma kubo esigodzini saLemuweli, ngemandla, agcwaliswe ngaMoya, kwate kwatsi luhlaka lwemitimba yabo lwadlukutela ngaphambi kwakhe. Futsi yena wabatfobisa, kangangekutsi abatange basalokotsa bakhulume ngekuphikisana naye; ngaloko-ke, benta njengoba abebayalile.
2.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngimncane kakhulu, noko ngimkhulu ngimudze, ngiphindze nginetifiso letinkhulu ngekwati ngetimfihlakalo takaNkulunkulu, ngaloko-ke, ngakhala eNkhosini; futsi buka yona yangivakashela, yayitsambisa inhlitiyo yami kangangoba ngakhohlwa ngiwo onkhe emavi lawo lebekadze akhulunywe ngubabe; ngaloko-ke, mine angitange ngimvukele njengabomnaketfu.
2.17: Ngakhuluma kuSemu, ngimatisa ngetintfo iNkhosi leyayitivetile kimi ngaMoya wayo loNgcwele. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakholelwa emavini ami.
2.18: Kodvwa, buka, Lamani naLemuweli abatange bawalalele emavi ami; futsi ngidzabukile ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo ngakhala eNkhosini.
2.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Ubusisiwe wena, Nefi, ngenca yelukholo lwakho, ngoba ungifunile ngekukhutsala, nangenhlitiyo letfobekile.
2.20: Futsi kangangoba uyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami, uyawuphumelela, futsi uyawuholelwa eveni lesetsembiso; yebo, live lengikulungisele lona; yebo, live lelikhetsiwe ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave.
2.21: Futsi kangangoba bomnakenu bayawukuvukela, bona bayawususwa embikweNkhosi.
2.22: Futsi kangangoba uyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami, uyawentiwa umbusi nemfundzisi ngetulu kwabomnakenu.
2.23: Ngoba buka, ngalolosuku labayawungivukela ngalo, ngiyawubacalekisa ngesicalekiso lesibuhlungu, futsi abayukuba nemandla ngetulu kwentalelwane yakho ngaphandle uma nayo iyawungivukela futsi.
2.24: Futsi uma kungenteka kutsi bangivukele, batawuba luhlupho entalelwaneni yakho, kutsi ibaphehlele etindleleni tekukhunjutwa.

3.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabuya ekukhulumeni neNkhosi, ngaya ethendeni lababe.
3.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakhuluma kimi, watsi: Buka ngiphuphe liphupho, lapho kulo iNkhosi ingiyalete kutsi wena kanye nabomnakenu niyawubuyela eJerusalema.
3.3: Ngoba buka, Labani unembhalo wemaJuda kanye nemlandvo wesitukulwane sabokhokho bami, futsi loko kucoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi.
3.4: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi ingiyalete kutsi wena nabomnakenu kufanele niye endlini yaLabani, niyofuna lemibhalo, futsi nehle nayo niyiletse lapha ehlane.
3.5: Manje, buka bomnakenu bayavungama, batsi kuyintfo lelukhuni lena mine lengiyifuna kubo; kodvwa buka angiyifunanga mine kubo, kodvwa kungumyaleto weNkhosi.
3.6: Ngako-ke hamba, ndvodzana yami, futsi uyawutsandvwa yiNkhosi, ngoba wena awukate uvungame.
3.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngatsi kubabe: Ngitawuhamba ngitente tintfo iNkhosi leyalete ngato, ngoba ngiyati kutsi iNkhosi ayiyiniki imiyaleto kubantfwana bebantfu, ngaphandle kwekutsi iyawubalungiselela indlela kute bakwati kufeza leyontfo leyibayalete ngayo.
3.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babe aseve lamavi wajabula kakhulu, ngoba wati kutsi ngase ngibusiswe yinkhosi.
3.9: Mine, Nefi, kanye nabomnaketfu satsatsa luhambo lwetfu lwasehlane, nemathende etfu, sakhuphukela eveni laseJerusalema.
3.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sesihambile sakhuphukela eveni laseJerusalema, mine kanye nabomnaketfu sabonisana lomunye nalomunye.
3.11: Senta inkatho—kutsi ngubani emkhatsini wetfu lobekayongena emtini waLabani. Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkatho yawela kuLamani; futsi Lamani wahamba wangena emtini waLabani wakhuluma naye ngesikhatsi ahleti endlini yakhe.
3.12: Wacela kuLabani imibhalo leyo lebeyicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi lebeyicuketse umlandvo wesitukulwane sababe.
3.13: Buka, kwenteka kutsi Labani watfukutsela, waphindze wamcosha phambi kwakhe; futsi akafunanga kumniketa imibhalo. Ngaloko-ke, watsi kuye: Buka usigebengu, futsi ngitawukubulala.
3.14: Kodvwa Lamani wabaleka phambi kwakhe, watositjela tintfo Labani labekatentile. Sacala kudzabuka kakhulu, futsi bomnaketfu bese batobuyela kubabe ehlane.
3.15: Kodvwa buka mine ngatsi kubo: Njengoba iNkhosi iphila, futsi natsi siphila, asitukuya entansi kubabe ehlane ngaphambi kwekutsi siyifeze leyontfo iNkhosi lesiyalete ngayo.
3.16: Ngaloko-ke, asetsembekeni ekugcineni imiyaleto yeNkhosi; ngako-ke asehleleni eveni lelifa lababe, ngoba buka washiya ligolide kanye nesiliva, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yengcebo. Futsi konkhe loku ukwente ngenca yemiyaleto yeNkhosi.
3.17: Ngoba bekati kutsi iJerusalema kwakufanele ibhujiswe, ngenca yebubi bebantfu.
3.18: Ngoba buka, bawalahlile emavi ebaphrofethi. Ngaloko-ke, uma babe bekayohlala kulelive emvakwekutsi asayaletiwe kutsi abaleke aphume aphele kulo, buka, naye kanjalo bekayawubhubha. Ngaloko-ke, kufanele kutsi abaleke aphume aphele kulelive.
3.19: Buka, kukuhlakanipha kuNkulunkulu kutsi tsine siyotfola lemibhalo, kute sigcinele bantfwana betfu lulwimi lwabobabe betfu;
3.20: Futsi kanjalo kute sibagcinele emavi lakhulunywa ngemilomo yabo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele, latfunyelwa kubo ngaMoya kanye nangemandla aNkulunkulu, kusukela umhlaba wacala, kwehle kute kufike esikhatsini sanyalo.
3.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabavumisa bomnaketfu ngalendlela yekukhuluma, kute batsembeke ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
3.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sehlela entansi eveni lelilifa letfu, saphindze sagcogca ndzawonye ligolide letfu, kanye nesiliva yetfu, kanye netintfo tetfu letiligugu.
3.23: Emvakwekutsi sesigcogce ndzawonye leti tintfo, sahamba sakhuphukela emtini waLabani.
3.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sangena saya kuLabani, samcela kutsi asinikete imibhalo leyo lebeyicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi, ngayo tsine besiyawumnika ligolide letfu, kanye nesiliva yetfu, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo tetfu lebetiligugu.
3.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Labani abona imphahla yetfu, nekutsi yayiyiningi kakhulu, wayihawukela, kangangekutsi wasicosha, waphindze watfumela tinceku takhe kutsi tisibulale, kute atfole imphahla yetfu.
3.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sabaleka ngaphambi kwetinceku taLabani, saphoceleleka kutsi siyishiye ngemuva imphahla yetfu, futsi yawela etandleni taLabani.
3.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sabalekela ehlane, futsi tinceku taLabani atizange tisikhandza, sabhaca emgedzeni welidvwala.
3.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lamani wangitfukutselela, waphindze watfukutselela nababe; kanjalo naLemuweli, ngoba yena bekalalela emavi aLamani, Ngaloko-ke Lamani naLemuweli bakhuluma emavi lamaningi lamatima kitsi, bomnakabo labancane, b phindze basishaya nangendvuku.
3.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi basasishaya ngendvuku, buka, ingilosi yeNkhosi yeta yaphindze yema phambi kwabo, yakhuluma kubo itsi: Nimshayelani umnakenu lomncane ngendvuku na? Anati yini kutsi iNkhosi imkhetsile kutsi abe ngumbusi ngetulu kwenu, futsi loku kungenca yebubi benu na? Bukani niyawukhuphukela niye eJerusalema futsi, iNkhosi itawumnikela etandleni tenu Labani.
3.31: Emvakwekutsi ingilosi seyihambile, Lamani naLemuweli bacala futsi bavungama, batsi: Kungenteka kanjani kutsi iNkhosi itawunikela Labani etandleni tetfu na? Buka, uyindvodza lenemandla futsi angakhuta emashumi lasihlanu, yebo, angabulala nemashumi lasihlanu; pho angakwenti ngani loko kitsi na?

4.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakhuluma nabomnaketfu, ngitsi: Asikhuphukeni siye eJerusalema, futsi asetsembeke ekugcineni imiyaleto yeNkhosi; ngoba bukani yona inemandla ngetulu kwemhlaba wonkhe, pho kuyangani ingabi nemandla kunaLabani kanye nalabangemashumi lasihlanu bakhe, yebo, noma nalabangemashumi latinkhulungwane bakhe na?
4.2: Ngako-ke asikhuphukeni; asicineni njengaMosi; ngoba wakhuluma emantini eLwandle loluBovu futsi ahlukana ngalana nangalana, futsi bobabe betfu badzabula ekhatsi, baphuma ekutfunjweni, baphumela emhlabatsini lowomile, kanjalo emabutfo aFaro alandzela futsi amita emantini eLwandle loluBovu.
4.3: Manje bukani nine niyati kutsi loku kuliciniso; kanjalo niyati kutsi ingilosi ikhulumile kini; ngaloko-ke kuyangani ningabate na? Asikhuphukeni; iNkhosi iyakwati kusikhulula, njengabobabe betfu, futsi ibhubhise Labani, njengemaGibhithe.
4.4: Manje ngesikhatsi sengikhulume lamavi, besebatfukutsele, futsi bebasachubeka nekuvungama; noko-ke bangilandzela sakhuphuka sate safika ngaphandle kwetindvonga teJerusalema.
4.5: Futsi kwakusebusuku; futsi ngenta kutsi bayobhaca ngaphandle kwetindvonga. Emvakwekutsi sebabhacile, mine, Nefi, nganyonyoba ngangena edolobheni ngahamba ngaya ngasendlini yaLabani.
4.6: Mine ngangiholwa nguMoya, ngingati ngaphambili ngetintfo lebekuyofanele ngitente.
4.7: Noko ngaya phambili, futsi ngesikhatsi ngisondzela edvutane nendlu yaLabani ngabona indvodza, yayiwele phansi phambi kwami, ngoba yayidzakwe liwayini.
4.8: Ngesikhatsi ngifika kuyo ngatfola kutsi kwakunguLabani.
4.9: Ngabona inkemba yakhe, ngayikhokha emgodleni wayo; futsi umphini wayo kwakunguweligolide lelimsulwa, kwakhiwa kwayo kwakungulokusezingeni lelisetulu kakhulu, futsi ngabona kutsi lokusikako kwayo kwakukwensimbi yeligugu lelikhulu.
4.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaphocelelwa nguMoya kutsi ngiyombulala Labani; kodvwa ngatsi enhlitiyweni yami: Angikase nanoma ngusiphi sikhatsi ngicitse ingati yemuntfu. Ngashwaphana ngingafuni kumbulala.
4.11: Moya waphindza watsi kimi: Buka iNkhosi imnikele etandleni takho. Yebo, futsi kanjalo ngangati kutsi bekakadze afuna kutsatsa imphilo yami; yebo, futsi bekangafuni kulalela imiyaleto yeNkhosi; futsi kanjalo bekatsatse imphahla yetfu.
4.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moya waphindza watsi kimi: Mbulale, ngoba iNkhosi imnikele etandleni takho;
4.13: Buka iNkhosi ibulala lababi kute ivete tinhloso tekulunga kwayo. Kuncono kutsi umuntfu loyedvwa abhubhe kunekutsi sive sinciphe siphindze sibhubhe ngekungakholwa.
4.14: Manje, ngesikhatsi mine, Nefi, sengiwavile lamavi, ngawakhumbula emavi eNkhosi leyayiwakhulume kimi ehlane, isho loku: Kangangoba intalelwane yakho iyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami, iyawuphumelela eveni lesetsembiso.
4.15: Yebo, futsi kanjalo mine ngacabanga kutsi yona yayingenukwati kugcina imiyaleto yeNkhosi ngekwemtsetfo waMosi, ngaphandle kwekutsi iyoba nemtsetfo.
4.16: Futsi kanjalo ngati kutsi umtsetfo wawucoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi.
4.17: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngati kutsi iNkhosi yayimnikele Labani etandleni tami ngenca yalesi sizatfu—kute ngiyitfole imibhalo njengekwemiyaleto yayo.
4.18: Ngako-ke ngalilalela livi laMoya, ngamtsatsa Labani ngetinwele tenhloko, ngamcuma inhloko yakhe ngenkemba yakhe.
4.19: Emvakwekutsi sengimncume inhloko yakhe ngenkemba yakhe, ngatsatsa tembatfo taLabani ngatigcoka; yebo, tonkhe; futsi mine ngasibopha sikhali sakhe elukhalo lwami.
4.20: Emvakwekutsi sengikwentile loku, ngachubekela phambili endzaweni yekugcina ingcebo yaLabani. Ngesikhatsi ngichubeka ngiya ngasendzaweni yekugcina ingcebo yaLabani, buka, ngabona inceku yaLabani leyayiphetse tikhiya tendzawo yekugcina ingcebo. Ngayitfuma ngelivi laLabani, kutsi ihambe nami siye endlini yekugcina ingcebo.
4.21: Futsi yayicabanga kutsi ngiyinkhosi yayo, Labani, ngoba yayibona tembatfo kanjalo nenkemba ilenga elukhalo lwami.
4.22: Yakhuluma nami mayelana nalabadzala bemaJuda, ngekwati kutsi inkhosi yayo, Labani, yayiphumile ebusuku isemkhatsini wawo.
4.23: Nami ngakhuluma nayo shengatsi nginguye Labani.
4.24: Kanjalo ngakhuluma kuyo kutsi kufanele ngiyotsatsa imifanekiso leyayicoshiwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi, ngiyiyise kubomnaketfu labadzala, labebangaphandle kwetindvonga.
4.26: Yona, ngekucabanga kutsi mine ngangikhuluma ngabomnaketfu belibandla, nekutsi mine nganginguye ngempela Labani loyo lengase ngimbulele, ngaloko-ke yangilandzela.
4.27: Yakhuluma kimi tikhatsi letiningi mayelana nalabadzala bemaJuda, ngesikhatsi mine ngichubeka ngiya kubomnaketfu, labo labebangephandle kwetindvonga.
4.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Lamani angibona wetfuka kakhulu, kanjalo naLemuweli kanye naSemu. Babaleka phambi kwami; ngoba bebacabanga kutsi kwakunguLabani, nekutsi besekangibulele sekatofuna kutsatsa netabo timphilo futsi.
4.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabamemeta, bangiva; ngaloko-ke bayekela kungibalekela.
4.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inceku yaLabani ibona bomnaketfu yacala kutfutfumela, futsi yaseyitongibalekela ibuyele edolobheni laseJerusalema.
4.31: Manje mine, Nefi, ngiyindvodza lendze lenkhulu, ngetulu kwaloko ngitfole emandla lamakhulu eNkhosini, ngako-ke ngayibhozomela inceku yaLabani, futsi ngayibamba, kute ingabaleki.
4.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakhuluma nayo, kutsi uma ingalalela emavi ami, njengoba iNkhosi iphila, futsi njengoba nami ngiphila, kanjalo uma yona ingalalela emavi etfu, sasiyoyisindzisa imphilo yayo.
4.33: Ngakhuluma nayo, nangekufunga imbala, kutsi yona akudzingeki yesabe; nekutsi yayitoba yindvodza lekhululekile njengatsi uma nje yayingehla iye ehlane kanye natsi.
4.34: Ngetulu kwaloko ngakhuluma nayo, ngitsi: Ngempela iNkhosi isiyaletile kutsi sente lentfo; futsi singayukhutsala yini kugcina imiyaleto yeNkhosi na? Ngako-ke, uma ungehla natsi uye ehlane kubabe uyokuba nendzawo kanye natsi.
4.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Zoramu wema sibindzi emavini lengawakhuluma. Manje Zoramu bekulibito lenceku; watsembisa kutsi uyawukwehla aye ehlane kubabe. Yebo, waphindze wenta sifungo kitsi kutsi besekayawuhlala natsi kusukela kuleso sikhatsi kuya phambili.
4.36: Manje tsine sasinesifiso sekutsi ahlale natsi ngalesizatfu, sekutsi emaJuda angaze ati mayelana nekubaleka kwetfu kuya ehlane, hleze asilandzele futsi asibhubhise.
4.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Zoramu sekente sifungo kitsi, kwesaba kwetfu ngaye kwaphela.
4.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tsine satsatsa bongcwengcwe belitfusi kanye nenceku yaLabani, futsi sesuka saya ehlane, satsatsa luhambo loluya ethendeni lababe.

5.1: Futsi kwenteka emvakwekutsi sesibuyele entansi ehlane kubabe, buka, wagcwala injabulo, kanjalo namake, Sariya, watfokota kakhulu, ngoba ngempela besekakhale kakhulu ngenca yetfu.
5.2: Ngoba bekacabange kutsi besesabhubha ehlane; ngetulu kwaloko bekakhononile kubabe, amtjela kutsi bekayindvodza yemibono; watsi: Buka usiholile usisusa eveni lelilifa letfu, futsi emadvodzana ami akasekho, natsi siyabhubha ehlane.
5.3: Futsi make bekamsole ngalendlela yekukhuluma babe.
5.4: Futsi kwakwentekile kutsi babe bekakhulume naye, watsi: Ngiyati kutsi ngiyindvodza yemibono; ngoba uma ngabe angitibonanga letintfo taNkulunkulu embonweni bengingayubati buhle baNkulunkulu, kodvwa bengitohlala eJerusalema, futsi ngibhubhe kanye nabomnaketfu.
5.5: Kodvwa buka, sengitfole live lesetsembiso, lokutintfo lengitfokotako ngato, yebo, futsi ngiyati kutsi iNkhosi itawukhulula emadvodzana ami etandleni taLabani, iphindze iwabuyise lapha entansi kitsi ehlane.
5.6: Futsi babe, Lehi, wamdvudvuta ngalendlela yekukhuluma make, Sariya, mayelana natsi, ngesikhatsi sisahamba ehlane sikhuphukela eveni laseJerusalema, kuyolandza umbhalo wemaJuda.
5.7: Ngesikhatsi sesibuyele ethendeni lababe, buka injabulo yabo yagcwala, futsi make wadvudvuteka.
5.8: Wakhuluma, watsi, manje sengiyati ngekweliciniso kutsi iNkhosi imyaletile umyeni wami kutsi abalekele ehlane; yebo, ngetulu kwaloko ngiyati ngekweliciniso kutsi iNkhosi iwavikele emadvodzana ami, futsi yawakhulula etandleni taLabani, waphindze yawanika emandla ekutsi akwati kufeza leyontfo iNkhosi lewayalete ngayo. Wakhuluma ngalendlela.
5.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batfokota kakhulu, banikela ngemihlatjelo nangeminikelo yekushiswa eNkhosini; baphindze babonga kuNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli.
5.10: Emvakwekutsi sebabongile kuNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, babe, Lehi, watsatsa imibhalo lebeyicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi, wayicwaninga kusukela ekucaleni.
5.11: Wabona kutsi yayicuketse tincwadzi letisihlanu taMosi, letatikhuluma ngemlandvo wekudalwa kwemhlaba, kanjalo nanga-Adamu naEva, labebabatali betfu bekucala.
5.12: Futsi kanjalo nembhalo wemaJuda kusukela ekucaleni, kwehle njalo kute kufike ekucaleni kwekubusa kwaSedekiya, inkhosi yemaJuda;
5.13: Futsi kanjalo netiphrofetho tebaphrofethi labangcwele, kusukela ekucaleni, kwehle njalo kute kufike ekucaleni kwekubusa kwaSedekiya; kanjalo netiphrofetho letiningi letatikhulunywe ngemlomo waJeremiya.
5.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babe, Lehi, ngetulu kwaloko watfola kubongcwengcwe belitfusi umlandvo wesitukulwane saboyise; ngaloko-ke wabese sowuyati kutsi yena bekawesitukulwane saJosefa; yebo, loyo Josefa lobekayindvodzana yaJakobe, lowatsengiswa eGibhithe, futsi lowagcinwa ngesandla seNkhosi, kute akwati kugcina uyise, Jakobe, kanye nabo bonkhe bendlu yakhe ekubhujisweni yindlala.
5.15: Ngetulu kwaloko baholwa baphuma ebugcilini kanye naseveni laseGibhithe, nguye loyo Nkulunkulu lobekabagcinile.
5.16: Futsi kungalendlela babe, Lehi, atfola ngayo umlandvo wesitukulwane saboyise wakhe. Futsi Labani naye bekawesitukulwane saJosefa, ngaloko-ke yena kanye naboyise bebayigcinile imibhalo.
5.17: Manje ngesikhatsi babe abona tonkhe leti tintfo, wagcwaliswa ngaMoya, waphindze wacala kuphrofetha mayelana nentalelwane yakhe—
5.18: Kutsi laba bongcwengcwe belitfusi kufanele bayochubekela phambili kuto tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nakubantfu labebabentalelwane yakhe.
5.19: Ngaloko-ke, watsi laba bongcwengcwe belitfusi abayushabalala; noma bafiphaliswe futsi ngesikhatsi. Waphindze waphrofetha tintfo letiningi letiphatselene nentalelwane yakhe.
5.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kute kube ngunyalo mine nababe sasiyigcinile imiyaleto leyo iNkhosi lebeyisiyalete ngayo.
5.21: Futsi sasiyitfolile imibhalo leyo iNkhosi lebeyisiyalete ngayo, sayicwaninga satfola kutsi yayinguletsandzekako kukhulu; yebo, beyiligugu kitsi, kangangekutsi sasingakwati kugcinela bantfwana betfu imiyaleto yeNkhosi.
5.22: Ngaloko-ke, kwakukuhlakanipha eNkhosini kutsi siyoyitfwala kanye natsi, ngesikhatsi sihamba ehlane siya eveni lesetsembiso.

6.1: Manje mine, Nefi, anginiketi umlandvo wabobabe kulencenye yembhalo wami; futsi angiyuwunika nanoma ngusiphi lesinye sikhatsi kulaba bongcwengcwe lengibhala kubo; ngoba uniketiwe embhalweni logcinwe ngubabe; ngako-ke angituwubhala kulomsebenti.
6.2: Ngoba kuyangenelisa kusho kutsi tsine sibentalelwane yaJosefa.
6.3: Futsi akukabaluleki kutsi ngicophelele kuniketa umlandvo lophelele ngato tonkhe tintfo tababe; ngoba angeke tibhalwe kulabongcwengcwe, ngoba ngifuna sikhala kute ngibhale ngetintfo taNkulunkulu.
6.4: Ngoba inhloso yami lephelele kutsi ngivumise bantfu kutsi bete kuNkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka, kanye naNkulunkulu waJakobe, futsi basindziswe.
6.5: Ngaloko-ke, tintfo letitfokotisa umhlaba angitibhali, kodvwa tintfo leto letitfokotisako kuNkulunkulu kanye nakulabo labangasibo belive.
6.6: Ngaloko-ke, mine ngiyawuniketa umyaleto kuyo intalelwane yami, wekutsi ayiyusebentisa labo bongcwengcwe ngetintfo letingakabaluleki kubantfwana bebantfu.

7.1: Manje ngifuna kutsi nati, emvakwekutsi babe, Lehi, asacedzile kuphrofetha mayelana nentalelwane yakhe, kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yakhuluma naye futsi, itsi kwakungakafaneli yena, Lehi, atsatse umndeni wakhe wodvwa kuya ehlane, kodvwa kutsi emadvodzana akhe atsatse emadvodzakati abe bomkabo, kute akhulise intalelwane eNkhosini eveni lesetsembiso.
7.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yamyaleta kutsi mine, Nefi, kanye nabomnaketfu, kufanele sibuyele futsi eveni laseJerusalema, sehle na-Ishmayeli nemndeni wakhe sibuyele nabo ehlane.
7.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngaphindze, kanye nabomnaketfu, ngaya ehlane kute sikhuphukele eJerusalema.
7.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sakhuphuka saya endlini ya-Ishmayeli, futsi sazuza umusa emehlweni a-Ishmayeli, kangangekutsi sate sakhuluma kuye emavi eNkhosi.
7.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yayitsambisa inhlitiyo ya-Ishmayeli, kanjalo nebendlu yakhe, kangangekutsi batsatsa luhambo lwabo kanye natsi sehlela entansi ehlane ethendeni lababe.
7.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sisahamba ehlane, buka Lamani naLemuweli, kanye nemadvodzakati lamabili a-Ishmayeli, kanye nemadvodzana lamabili a-Ishmayeli kanye nemindeni yawo, basivukela; yebo, mine, Nefi, naSemu, kanye neyise wabo Ishmayeli, nemkakhe, kanye nemadvodzakati akhe lamanye lamatsatfu.
7.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekusivukeleni kwabo, bona bebafuna kutsi babuyele eveni laseJerusalema.
7.8: Manje mine, Nefi, ngikhatsatekile ngebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo, ngako-ke ngakhuluma nabo, ngitsi, yebo, nakuLamani kanye nakuLemuweli: Bukani nine nibomnaketfu labadzala, futsi kungani tinhlitiyo tenu tilukhuni kangaka, niphindze nitimphumphutse nasemicodvweni yenu kangaka, kutsi nite nidzinge mine, umnakenu lomncane, ngite ngikhulume nani, yebo, futsi ngibe sibonelo kini na?
7.10: Kungani senikhohliwe kutsi nayibona ingilosi yeNkhosi na?
7.11: Yebo, kungani senikhohliwe tintfo letinkhulu kangaka iNkhosi lesentele tona, ekusikhululeni etandleni taLabani, futsi kanjalo nekutfola umbhalo na?
7.12: Yebo, futsi kungani senikhohliwe kutsi iNkhosi iyakwati kwentela bantfwana bebantfu tonkhe tintfo ngekwentsandvo yayo, uma nje kungukutsi benta ngekukholwa kuyo na? Ngaloko-ke asetsembeke kuyo.
7.13: Futsi uma kungukutsi siyatsembeka kuyo, siyawulitfola live lesetsembiso; futsi niyawukwati esikhatsini lesitako kutsi livi leNkhosi liyawugcwaliseka mayelana nekubhujiswa kweJerusalema; ngoba tonkhe tintfo iNkhosi letikhulumile mayelana nekubhujiswa kweJerusalema kufanele tigcwaliseke.
7.14: Ngoba bukani, Moya weNkhosi utoyekela masinyane kutsi uhlale kubo; ngoba bukani, babalahlile baphrofethi, futsi naJeremiya bamphonse ejele. Futsi bafune nekutsatsa imphilo yababe, kangangekutsi babangele kutsi abaleke eveni.
7.15: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini uma nitawubuyela eJerusalema nani kanjalo niyawubhubha kanye nabo. Manje, uma nikhona kukhetsa, khuphukelani eveni, futsi niwakhumbule emavi lengiwakhuluma kini, kutsi uma nihamba nani kanjalo nitawubhubha; ngoba Moya weNkhosi ungiphocelele kutsi kufanele ngikhulume ngalendlela.
7.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi mine, Nefi, sengikhulume lamavi kubomnaketfu, bangitfukutselela. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bangibamba, ngoba buka, bebatfukutsele kakhulu, bangibopha ngetintsambo, ngoba bebafuna kutsatsa imphilo yami, nekutsi bebafuna kutsi bangishiye ehlane ngidliwe tilwane tasendle.
7.17: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngathandaza eNkhosini, ngitsi: Awu Nkhosi, ngelukholo lwami lolukuwe, ungangikhulula yini etandleni tabomnaketfu; yebo, unginike nemandla ekutsi ngitigcuphule leti tibopho lengiboshwe ngato.
7.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengiwashito lamavi, buka, tibopho tacegiswa etandleni tami kanye nasetinyaweni, ngema ngaphambi kwabomnaketfu, ngaphindze ngakhuluma nabo.
7.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphindze bangitfukutselela, bafuna nekungibamba; kodvwa buka, yinye yemadvodzakati a-Ishmayeli, yebo, kanjalo nenina, kanye nayinye yemadvodzana a-Ishimayeli, babancenga bomnaketfu, kangangekutsi batitsambisa tinhlitiyo tabo; futsi bayekela kutama kutsatsa imphilo yami.
7.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi badzabuka, ngenca yebubi babo, kangangekutsi bakhotsama phambi kwami, bangincenga kutsi ngibatsetselele ngentfo lebebangente yona.
7.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabatsetselela ngekungabeki mbandzela ngako konkhe labebakwentile, ngabancusa kutsi bathandaze eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo kute batsetselelwe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi benta njalo. Emvakwekutsi sebacedzile kuthandaza eNkhosini saphindze sachubeka neluhambo lwetfu lwekuya ethendeni lababe wetfu.
7.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sehlela entansi ethendeni lababe wetfu. Emvakwekutsi mine nabomnaketfu kanye nendlu yonkhe ya-Ishmayeli sesehlele entansi ethendeni lababe, babonga eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo; futsi banikela ngemihlatjelo kanye neminikelo yekushiswa kuyo.

8.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sasesibutsise ndzawonye tonkhe tinhlobonhlobo tetinhlanyelo, tinhlavu tayoyonkhe inhlobo, kanye netetinhlanyelo tetitselo tayo yonkhe inhlobo.
8.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babe ahleti ehlane wakhuluma kitsi watsi: Bukani, ngiphuphe liphupho; noma, ngalamanye emavi, ngibone umbono.
8.3: Bukani, ngenca yentfo lengiyibonile, nginesizatfu sekutfokota eNkhosini ngenca yaNefi ngalokunjalo naSemu; ngoba nginesizatfu sekucabanga kutsi bona, ngalokunjalo nalabaningi bentalelwane yabo, batawusindziswa.
8.4: Kodvwa bukani, Lamani nawe Lemuweli, ngiyesaba kakhulu ngenca yenu; ngoba bukani, shengatsi ngibone ephusheni lami, lihlane lelimnyama nalelithulile.
8.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona indvodza, yayembetse ingubo lemhlophe; yeta kimi yema phambi kwami.
8.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yakhuluma kimi, yangiyala kutsi ngiyilandzele.
8.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngisayilandzela ngatibona kutsi ngisendzaweni lemnyama nalethulile lapho kungekho lutfo loluphilako.
8.8: Emvakwekutsi sengihambe sikhatsi lesidze ebumnyameni, ngacala kuthandaza eNkhosini kutsi ibe nemusa kimi, ngebukhulu besihawu sayo lesimnene.
8.9: Futsi kwenteka emvakwekutsi sengithandazile eNkhosini ngabona insimu lenkhulu nalevulekile.
8.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona sihlahla, sitselo saso lesasitsandzeka kakhulu ekwenteni umuntfu ajabule.
8.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngachubekela phambili ngasidla sitselo saso; ngabona kutsi sasimnandzi kakhulu, ngetulu kwato tonkhe lengake ngatinambitsa ngaphambilini. Yebo, futsi ngabona kutsi sitselo saso sasimhlophe, kwendlula bonkhe bumhlophe lengake ngabubona.
8.12: Ngesikhatsi ngisidla lesisitselo saso sawugcwalisa umphefumulo wami ngentfokoto lenkhulu kakhulu; ngaloko-ke, ngacala kufisa kutsi shengatsi umndeni wami ungasidla nawo futsi; ngoba bengati kutsi besitsandzeka ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye titselo.
8.13: Ngesikhatsi ngiphonsa emehlo ami ngicalata ngala nangala, kute mhlawumbe ngibone umndeni wami futsi, ngabona umfula wemanti; ugobhota, usedvutane neleso sihlahla lengangidla sitselo kuso.
8.14: Ngabuka kute ngitfole kutsi uchamuka kuphi; ngayibona inhloko yawo bucadlwana; khona lapho enhloko yawo ngabona make wenu Sariya, naSemu, kanye naNefi; bebeme shengatsi abati kutsi kufanele baye ngakuphi.
8.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabachweba; ngaphindza ngasho kubo ngelivi lelikhulu kutsi bete kimi, batodla lesositselo, lesasitsandzeka ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye titselo.
8.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi beta kimi nabo basidla sitselo.
8.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaba nesifiso sekutsi Lamani naLemuweli bete nabo batodla sitselo leso; ngaloko-ke, ngaphosa emehlo ami ngasenhloko yemfula, ngicabanga kutsi mhlawumbe ngitobabona nabo.
8.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngababona, kodvwa bona abavumanga kuta kimi batodla sitselo.
8.19: Ngabona indvuku yensimbi, yayichubeka ngalokulinganisene nelusentse lwemfula, iholela esihlahleni leso lengangime ngakuso.
8.20: Ngaphindze ngabona indlela lengumntjuntju nalencane kakhulu, leyayita ngekulinganisana nendvuku yensimbi nasesihlahleni leso lengangime ngakuso; futsi ngetulu kwaloko yaholela yate yafika ngasenhloko yemtfombo, nakuleyo nsimu lenkhulu levulekile, lekungatsi ngumhlaba.
8.21: Ngabona ticuku letingabaleki tebantfu, labaningi babo baphikelele phambili, kute batfole indlela leyo leholela kuleso esihlahleni lengangime ngakuso.
8.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bachubekela phambili, bacala bangena endleleni leyo leyayiholela esihlahleni.
8.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwabese kuvuka inkhungu yebumnyama; yebo, lenkhulu kakhulu inkhungu yebumnyama, kangangekutsi labo lebesebayicalile indlela yabalahlekela indlela yabo, kangangekutsi badvwanguta futsi balahleka.
8.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona labanye baphikelela phambili, beta ngembili bate basibamba siphetfo sendvuku yensimbi; baphikelela phambili kuyo inkhungu yebumnyama, babambelele kuyo indvuku yensimbi, bate beta ngembili batodla sitselo saleso sihlahla.
8.25: Emvakwekutsi sebasidlile sitselo saleso sihlahla bacalata ngala nangala kungatsi banemahloni.
8.26: Futsi nami ngaphindze ngacalata ngala nangala, ngabona, ngesheya kwemfula wemanti, sakhiwo lesikhulu lesivulekile, sime shengatsi sisemoyeni, siphakeme ngetulu kwemhlaba.
8.27: Sasigcwele bantfu, labadzala kanye nalabancane, labadvuna kanye nalabasikati, futsi indlela yabo yekugcoka yayisezingeni lelisetulu; bebasesimeni sekuhhalatisa bakhomba ngeminwe yabo kulabo labesebetile esihlahleni futsi sebasidla sitselo.
8.28: Emvakwekutsi sebasinambitsile lesitselo baba nemahloni, ngenca yalabo labebabahhalatisa, base bawela etindleleni letingavunyelwa futsi balahleka.
8.29: Manje mine, Nefi, angiwakhulumi onkhe emavi ababe.
8.30: Kodvwa, kuba mfisha ekubhaleni, buka, wabona letinye ticuku tiphikelela phambili; tafika tawubamba umphetfo wendvuku yensimbi; futsi taphikelela ngendlela yato yekuya phambili, njalo-njalo tibambe ticinisile endvukwini yensimbi, tate tefika tawa phansi tasidla sitselo sesihlahla.
8.31: Futsi waphindze wabona letinye ticuku tiphutsata indlela yato leya lapho kuleso sakhiwo lesikhulu futsi lesivulekile.
8.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labaningi bamita ekujuleni kwemfula wemanti; futsi labaningi balahleka emehlweni akhe, badvwanguta emigwacweni lengakajwayeleki.
8.33: Futsi sasisiningi sicuku lesangena kuleso sakhiwo lesingakajwayeleki. Emvakwekutsi sesingenile kuleso sakhiwo sangikhomba ngemunwe wekuhhalatisa kanye nalabo labebadla sitselo futsi; kodvwa tsine asibanakanga.
8.34: Lawa ngemavi ababe: Ngoba ngebuningi balabo lababanaka, bawa.
8.35: Futsi Lamani naLemuweli abasidlanga lesitselo, kwasho babe.
8.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi babe sekawakhulumile onkhe lamavi eliphupho lakhe noma umbono, labekamaningi, watsi kitsi, ngenca yaleti tintfo latibona embonweni, bekesaba kakhulu ngenca yaLamani naLemuweli, yebo wesaba hleze bakhishwe ebukhoneni beNkhosi.
8.37: Wabancusa ngaleso sikhatsi ngemizwa yonkhe yemtali lomnene, kutsi baweve emavi akhe, nekutsi mhlawumbe iNkhosi yayiyawuba nemusa kubo, ingete yabakhipha; yebo, babe wabashumayela.
8.38: Emvakwekutsi sekabashumayele, ngetulu kwaloko sekaphrofethile kubo ngetintfo letiningi, wabayala kutsi bagcine imiyaleto yeNkhosi; wabese uyayekela kukhuluma nabo.

9.1: Futsi tonkhe leti tintfo babe watibona, wativa, waphindze watikhuluma, ngesikhatsi ahleti ethendeni, esigodzini saLemuweli, ngalokunjalo naletinye tintfo letiningi kakhulu, letingenawubhalwa kulaba bongcwengcwe.
9.2: Manje, njengoba sengikhulumile mayelana nalaba bongcwengcwe, buka akusibo bongcwengcwe lengibhala kubo umlandvo lophelele ngemlandvo webantfu bami; ngoba bongcwengcwe lengibhala kubo ngemlandvo lophelele webantfu bami bona ngibanike libito laNefi; ngaloko-ke, babitwa ngekutsi bongcwengcwe baNefi, ngelibito lami; futsi laba bongcwengcwe nabo babitwa ngekutsi bongcwengcwe baNefi.
9.3: Noko, ngitfole umyaleto eNkhosini wekutsi kufanele ngibente laba bongcwengcwe, ngibentele sizatfu lesibalulekile kute kube khona umlandvo locoshiwe ngebufundisi bebantfu bami.
9.4: Kulabanye bongcwengcwe kufanele kucoshwe umlandvo ngekubusa kwemakhosi, kanye netimphi nemibango yebantfu bami; ngaloko-ke laba bongcwengcwe baphatselene nencenye lenkhulu yebufundisi, futsi labanye bongcwengcwe baphatselene nencenye lenkhulu yekubusa kwemakhosi kanye netimphi kanye nemibango yebantfu bami.
9.5: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi ingiyaletile kutsi ngente laba bongcwengcwe ngekwenhloso yayo lenekuhlakanipha, inhloso leyo lengingayati.
9.6: Kodvwa iNkhosi yati tonkhe tintfo kusukela ekucaleni; ngaloko-ke, ilungisa indlela kute kufezeke yonkhe imisebenti yayo emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu; ngoba buka, inawo onkhe emandla ngalokwanele kutsi igcwalise onkhe emavi ayo. Futsi kunjalo nje. Amen.

10.1: Manje mine, Nefi, ngiyachubeka nekuniketa umlandvo kulaba bongcwengcwe ngetento tami, kanye nekubusa nebufundisi bami; ngaloko-ke, kuchubeka nemlandvo wami, kufanele ngikhulume lokutsite ngetintfo tababe, ngalokunjalo nangetabomnaketfu.
10.2: Ngoba buka, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi babe sekacedzile kukhuluma emavi eliphupho lakhe, ngalokunjalo nekubancusa kutsi bakhutsale kakhulu, wakhuluma nabo ngalokuphatselene nemaJuda—
10.3: Kutsi emvakwekutsi asabhujisiwe, nalelo dolobha lelikhulu iJerusalema, futsi lamaningi atsetfwe atfunjelwa eBhabhulona, ngekwesikhatsi seNkhosi lesifanele, ayophindze abuye futsi, yebo, abuyiselwe emuva aphume ekutfunjweni; emvakwekutsi sekabuyiselwe emuva aphuma ekutfunjweni ayophindze futsi atfole live lelilifa lawo.
10.4: Yebo, naseminyakeni lengemakhulu lasitfupha kusukela ngesikhatsi babe ashiya eJerusalema, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawuvusa umphrofethi emkhatsini wemaJuda—Mesiya, noma, ngalamanye emavi, uMsindzisi wemhlaba.
10.5: Futsi waphindze wakhuluma ngalokuphatselene nebaphrofethi, nekutsi bebabaningi kangakanani labebafakaza ngato leti tintfo, ngalokuphatselene naloMesiya, labekhuluma ngaye noma loMhlengi wemhlaba.
10.6: Ngaloko-ke, bonkhe bantfu bebasesimeni sekulahleka kanye nesekuwa, futsi bayawukuba kuso njalo ngaphandle kwekutsi batsembele kuye loMhlengi.
10.7: Futsi waphindze wakhuluma ngalokuphatselene nemphrofethi lobekatofika ngaphambi kwaMesiya, kutolungisa indlela yeNkhosi—
10.8: Yebo, nekutsi utohamba aphindze amemete ehlane atsi: Lungisani indlela yeNkhosi, futsi nente tindlela tayo ticondze; ngoba kukhona lomile emkhatsini wenu leningamati; yena unemandla kunami, umchilo wesicatfulo sakhe lengingakafaneli kuwutfukulula. Futsi kuningi lokwakhulunywa ngubabe ngalokuphatselene nalentfo.
10.9: Futsi babe watsi yena uyobhabhatisa eBhetani, ngesheya kweJordane; waphindze watsi uyobhabhatisa ngemanti; nekutsi uyobhabhatisa Mesiya ngemanti.
10.10: Futsi emvakwekutsi sekambhabhatisile Mesiya ngemanti, uyobona aphindze afakaze kutsi ubhabhatise iMvana yaNkulunkulu, letosusa tono temhlaba.
10.11: Futsi kwenteka emvakwekutsi babe sekawashito lamavi wakhuluma kubomnaketfu ngalokuphatselene nelivangeli leliyoshunyayelwa emkhatsini wemaJuda, ngalokunjalo nalokuphatselene nekuncishelwa kukholwa kwemaJuda. Emvakwekutsi sekambulele Mesiya, loyo loyokuta, futsi emvakwekutsi sekabulewe uyovuka kulabafile, uyotibonakalisa, ngaMoya loNgcwele, kubeTive.
10.12: Yebo, nababe wakhuluma kakhulu mayelana nebeTive, futsi ngalokunjalo nangendlu yaka-Israyeli, kutsi kufanele icatsaniswe nesihlahla semncumo, emagala aso lekufanele ancunywe bese ahlakatwa ebusweni bemhlaba wonkhe.
10.13: Ngaloko-ke, watsi kufanele kutsi tsine siholwe ngenhlitiyo yinye kuya eveni lesetsembiso, kugcwalisa livi leNkhosi, lekutsi kufanele sihlakateke ebusweni bemhlaba wonkhe.
10.14: Emvakwekutsi indlu yaka-Israyeli seyihlakatiwe iyophindza ibutselwe ndzawonye futsi; noma-ke, kwephetsa, Emvakwekutsi beTive sebalitfolile liVangeli leliphelele, emagala emvelo aleso sihlahla semncumo, noma insali yendlu yaka-Israyeli, iyochunyelelwa, noma yati ngaMesiya weliciniso, iNkhosi yabo kanye neMhlengi wabo.
10.15: Futsi babe waphrofetha waphindze wakhuluma kubomnaketfu ngalendlela yekukhuluma, ngalokunjalo nangaletinye letiningi tintfo lengingatibhali kulencwadzi; ngoba ngitibhalile letiningi tato njengoba kwakudzingeka kimi kulenye incwadzi yami.
10.16: Futsi tonkhe leti tintfo, lese ngikhulume ngato, tenteka ngesikhatsi babe ahleti ethendeni, esigodzini saLemuweli.
10.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Nefi, sengiwevile onkhe emavi ababe, mayelana netintfo latibona embonweni, ngalokunjalo netintfo latikhuluma ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, emandla lawo lawatfola ngelukholo kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu—futsi iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu kwakunguMesiya loyo lobekayofika—Mine, Nefi, nganginesifiso nami sekutsi ngibone, ngive, ngiphindze ngati, ngaleti tintfo, ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, losipho saNkulunkulu kubo bonkhe labo labamfuna ngekukhutsala, etikhatsini tasemandvulo njengasetikhatsini lapho ayotiveta ngaso kubantfwana bebantfu.
10.18: Ngoba uyafana itolo, namuhla, naphakadze; futsi indlela ilungiselelwe bonkhe bantfu seloku kwasekelwa umhlaba, uma nje kungukutsi bayaphendvuka futsi beta kuye.
10.19: Ngoba loyo lofuna ngekukhutsala uyawutfola; futsi timfihlakalo taNkulunkulu tiyawukwembulwa kubo, ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, etikhatsini tamanje njengasetikhatsini tasemandvulo, etikhatsini tasemandvulo njengasetikhatsini letitako; ngaloko-ke, indlela yeNkhosi yinye naphakadze.
10.20: Ngako-ke khumbula, Awu muntfu, ngoba ngato tonkhe tento takho uyawuletfwa ekwahlulelweni.
10.21: Ngaloko-ke, uma ufune kwenta bubi etinsukwini tekuvivinywa kwakho, nakunjalo utfolakala ungakahlanteki phambi kwesihlalo sekwehlulela saNkulunkulu; futsi kute intfo lengcolile lengahlala naNkulunkulu; ngaloko-ke, kufanele ulahlwe ingunaphakadze.
10.22: Futsi Moya loNgcwele unginika ligunya lekutsi ngikhulume leti tintfo futsi ngingatigodli.

11.1: Ngoba kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengibe nesifiso sekwati ngetintfo babe labekatibonile, futsi ngikholwa kutsi iNkhosi yayikwati kutsi itembule kimi, ngesikhatsi ngisahleti ngizindla enhlitiyweni yami ngahlwitfwa nguMoya weNkhosi, yebo, wangiyisa kulephakeme kakhulu intsaba, lebengingakate ngiyibone ngaphambilini, futsi kulebengingakate nangaphambilini ngilubeke lunyawo lwami kuyo.
11.2: Futsi Moya watsi kimi: Buka, ngabe ufisani na?
11.3: Ngatsi: Ngifisa kubona tintfo babe latibona.
11.4: Futsi Moya watsi kimi: Uyakholwa yini kutsi uyihlo wabona sihlahla leso lakhulume ngaso?
11.5: Ngatsi: Yebo, uyati kutsi ngiyawakholelwa onkhe emavi ababe.
11.6: Ngesikhatsi sengiwakhulumile lamavi, Moya wamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, utsi: Hosana eNkhosini, Nkulunkulu lophakeme kakhulu; ngoba nguNkulunkulu longetulu kwemhlaba wonkhe, yebo, nangetulu kwako konkhe. Futsi ubusisiwe wena, Nefi, ngoba ukholwa kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu lophakeme kakhuku; ngaloko-ke, utotibona leto tintfo lotifisako.
11.7: Futsi buka lentfo iyawuniketwa kuwe njengesibonakaliso, kutsi emvakwekutsi sewusibonile sihlahla leso lesasinesitselo uyihlo lasinambitsa, utobona indvodza yehla iphuma ezulwini, uyawuyibona; emvakwekutsi sewuyibonile uyawuniketa bufakazi bekutsi iyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
11.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moya watsi kimi: Buka! Ngabuka ngabona sihlahla; sasifana nesihlahla leso babe labekasibonile, buhle baso babendlulele kakhulu, yebo, babendlula bonkhe buhle, nebumhlophe baso babendlula bumhlophe belichwa lelikhitsikile.
11.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengisibonile lesihlahla, ngatsi kuye Moya: Ngiyabona ungikhombisile sihlahla lesiligugu ngetulu kwato tonkhe.
11.11: Ngatsi kuwo: Kwati inchazelo ngaso—ngoba ngakhuluma nawo njengemuntfu akhuluma; ngoba ngabona kutsi bekasesimeni semuntfu; kodvwa noko, ngangati kutsi kwakunguMoya weNkhosi; futsi wakhuluma kimi njengemuntfu akhuluma nalomunye.
11.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watsi kimi: Buka! Ngabuka shengatsi ngibuka kuwo, futsi angimbonanga, ngoba besekahambile phambi kwami.
11.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuka ngabona lidolobha lelikhulu laseJerusalema, kanye nalamanye emadolobha. Ngabona lidolobha laseNazaretha; edolobheni laseNazaretha ngabona intfombi, yayibukeka kahle kakhulu futsi imhlophe.
11.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona emazulu avuleka, ingilosi yehla yema phambi kwami; yatsi kimi: ubonani na?
11.15: Ngatsi kuyo: Intfombi, lenhle kakhulu lebukekako ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye tintfombi.
11.16: Yatsi kimi: Uyakwati yini kutehlisa kwaNkulunkulu na?
11.17: Ngatsi kuyo; Ngiyati kutsi uyabatsandza bantfwana bakhe; noko, angiyati inchazelo yato tonkhe tintfo.
11.18: Yatsi kimi: Intfombi leyo loyibonako ingunina weNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, ngekwesimo sasenyameni.
11.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona kutsi yahlwitfwa nguMoya; emvakwekutsi seyihlwitfwe nguMoya kwesikhashana ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka!
11.20: Ngabuka ngayibona intfombi futsi, igone umntfwana etandleni tayo.
11.21: Ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka iMvana yaNkulunkulu, yebo, iNdvodzana yaBabe longunaPhakadze! Uyayati yini inchazelo yesihlahla leso uyihlo lasibona na?
11.22: Ngayiphendvula, ngatsi: Yebo, lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu, lolutisabalalisa ndzawo tonkhe etinhlitiyweni tebantfwana bebantfu; ngaloko-ke, lutsandzeka kakhulu ngetulu kwetintfo tonkhe.
11.23: Yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Yebo, luyintfokoto lenkhulu emphefumulweni.
11.24: Futsi emvakwekutsi seyisho lamavi, yatsi kimi: Buka! Ngabuka, ngabona iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ihamba emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu; ngabona labaningi bawa phansi etinyaweni tayo bayikhonta.
11.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona kutsi indvuku yensimbi leyo babe bekayibonile, bekulivi laNkulunkulu, lelaliholela emtfonjeni wemanti ekuphila, noma esihlahleni sekuphila; lawo manti angumfanekiso welutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu; ngaphindze ngabona kutsi sihlahla sekuphila sasingumfanekiso welutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu.
11.26: Ingilosi yaphindze yatsi kimi: Buka futsi ubone kutehlisa kwaNkululunkulu!
11.27: Ngabuka ngambona uMhlengi wemhlaba, loyo babe bekakhulume ngaye; ngaphindze ngabona umphrofethi lobekayolungisa indlela phambi kwakhe. IMvana yaNkulunkulu yaya phambili yabhajatiswa nguye; emvakwekutsi seyibhajatisiwe, ngabona emazulu avuleka, futsi Moya loNgcwele wehla uvela ezulwini wahla etikwayo unjengesimo selituba.
11.28: Futsi ngabona kutsi yahamba isebentela bantfu, ngemandla nangenkhatimulo lenkhulu; ticuku tabutsana ndzawonye kutoyiva; ngabona kutsi bayicosha emkhatsini wabo.
11.29: Ngaphindze ngabona labanye labalishumi nakubili bayilandzela. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahlwitfwa nguMoya phambi kwebuso bami, angitange ngisababona.
11.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi futsi, itsi: Buka! Ngabuka, ngabona emazula avuleka futsi, ngabona tingilosi tehlela kubantfwana bebantfu; tabasebentela.
11.31: Yaphindze yakhuluma kimi, itsi; Buka! Ngabuka, ngabona iMvana yaNkulunkulu ihamba emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu. Ngabona ticuku tebantfu labebagula, kanye nalabebanato tonkhe tinhlobonhlobo tetifo, kanye nalabebanabodeveli kanye nemimoya lengcolile; ingilosi yakhuluma yangibonisa tonkhe leti tintfo. Futsi baphiliswa ngemandla eMvana yaNkulunkulu; bodeveli kanye nemimoya lengcolile kwakhishwa.
11.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi futsi, itsi: Buka! Ngabuka ngabona iMvana yaNkulunkulu, kutsi yatsatfwa bantfu; yebo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu longunaphakadze yehlulelwa ngumhlaba; ngakubona loko ngakufakazela.
11.33: Mine, Nefi, ngabona kutsi yaphakanyiselwa esiphambanweni yaphindze yabulawa ngenca yetono temhlaba.
11.34: Emvakwekutsi seyibulewe ngabona ticuku temhlaba, kutsi tatibutsene ndzawonye kulwa nebaphostoli beMvana; ngoba bebabitwa kanjalo labalishumi nakubili yingilosi yeNkhosi.
11.35: Sicuku semhlaba sasibutsene ndzawonye; ngabona kutsi sasikuso sakhiwo lesikhulu nalesivulekile, njengaleso sakhiwo babe lasibona. Futsi ingilosi yeNkhosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka live kanye nekuhlakanipha kwalo; yebo, buka indlu yaka-Israyeli ibutsene ndzawonye kulwa nebaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana.
11.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi loko ngakubona ngakufakazela, kutsi sakhiwo lesikhulu nalesivulekile kwakukutigcabha kwelive; sawa, kuwa kwaso kwakukukhulu kakhulu. Ingilosi yeNkhosi yakhuluma kimi futsi, itsi: Kuyawuba njalo-ke nekubhujiswa kwato tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nebantfu, labayawukulwa nebaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana.

12.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka, ubone intalelwane yakho, ngalokunjalo nentalelwane yabomnakenu. Ngabuka ngalibona live lesetsembiso; ngabona ticuku tebantfu, yebo, kwakungatsi linani liningi ngangesihlabatsi saselwandle.
12.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona ticuku tibutsene ndzawonye kute tilwe, lesinye sibhekene nalesinye; ngabona timphi, kanye nemahemuhemu etimphi, kanye nekubulalana lokukhulu ngenkemba emkhatsini webantfu bami.
12.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona letiningi titukulwane tishona, ngendlela yetimphi, kanye nemibango kulelive; ngabona emadolobha lamaningi, yebo, kangangekutsi angikwatanga kuwabala.
12.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona inkhungu yebumnyama ebusweni belive lesetsembiso; ngabona imibani, ngeva kudvuma, kanye nekutamatama kwemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobonhlobo temsindvo wekuphitsitela; ngabona umhlaba kanye nemadvwala, kutsi kwadzabuka; ngabona tintsaba tidzilika tiba tincetu; ngabona ematsafa emhlaba, kutsi bekaklayekile; ngabona lamaningi emadolobha kutsi bekacwilile; ngabona lamaningi kutsi ashiswa ngemlilo; ngaphindze ngabona lamaningi kutsi adzilikela phansi, ngenca yekutamatama kwemhlaba.
12.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengitibonile leti tintfo, ngabona inkhungu yebumnyama, kutsi yandlula ebusweni bemhlaba; buka, ngabona ticuku letatingawanga ngenca yebukhulu kanye nekwesabeka kwetehlulelo teNkhosi.
12.6: Futsi ngabona emazulu avuleka, iMvana yaNkulunkulu yehla ezulwini; futsi yehla yatibonakalisa kuto.
12.7: Ngaphindza ngabona ngaphindze ngakufakazela kutsi Moya loNgcwele wehlela etukwalabanye labalishumi nakubili; bagcotjwa nguNkulunkulu futsi bakhetfwa.
12.8: Futsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka bafundzi labalishumi nakubili beMvana, labakhetsiwe kutsi basebentele intalelwane yakho.
12.9: Yatsi kimi: Uyabakhumbula yini labaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana na? Buka ngibo labo labayawukwehlulela tivana letilishumi nakubili taka-Israyeli; ngaloko-ke, bafundzisi labalishumi nakubili bentalelwane yakho bayawukwehlulelwa ngibo; ngoba nine nibendlu yaka-Israyeli.
12.10: Futsi laba bafundzisi labalishumi nakubili lobabonako bayawukwehlulela intalelwane yakho. Buka, balungile ingunaphakadze; ngoba ngenca yelukholo lwabo labanalo kuyo iMvana yaNkulunkulu tingubo tabo tentiwe taba mhlophe engatini yayo.
12.11: Ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka! Ngabuka, ngabona titukulwane letintsatfu tindlula tisekulungeni; tingubo tato tatimhlophe njengeteMvana yaNkulunkulu. Futsi ingilosi yatsi kimi: Leti tentiwe taba mhlophe engatini yeMvana, ngenca yelukholo lwato kuyo.
12.12: Mine, Nefi, ngaphindze ngabona labaningi besitukulwane sesine labendlula nabo basekulungeni.
12.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona ticuku temhlaba tibutsene ndzawonye.
12.14: Ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka intalelwane yakho, ngalokunjalo nentalelwane yabomnakenu.
12.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuka ngabona bantfu bentalelwane yami babutsene ndzawonye ngeticuku babhekene nebentalelwane yabomnaketfu; bebabutsene ndzawonye kute balwe.
12.16: Ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka umtfombo wemanti langcolile lowo uyihlo lawubona; yebo, nemfula lowo lakhuluma ngawo; futsi kujula kwawo kukujula kwesihogo.
12.17: Inkhungu yebumnyama tilingo tadeveli, letiphumphutsekisa emehlo, tente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu, tibaholele kudze emigwacweni lebanti, kute bashabalale futsi balahleke.
12.18: Sakhiwo lesikhulu nalesivulekile, leso uyihlo lasibona, yimicabango nje lelite kanye nekutigcabha kwebantfwana bebantfu. Umhosha lomkhulu kanye nalowesabekako uyabehlukanisa, yebo, nelivi lekulunga laNkulunkulu loPhakadze, kanye naMesiya loyiMvana yaNkulunkulu, loyo Moya loNgcwele lofakaza ngaye, kusukela ekucaleni kwemhlaba kute kube ngulesikhatsi sanyalo, futsi kusukela kulesi sikhatsi kuchubeka futsi ingunaphakadze.
12.19: Futsi ngesikhatsi ingilosi ikhuluma lamavi, ngabuka ngabona kutsi intalelwane yabomnaketfu yalwa nentalelwane yami, njengelivi lengilosi; futsi ngenca yekutigcabha kwentalelwane yami, kanye netilingo tadeveli, ngabona kutsi intalelwane yabomnaketfu yabehlula bantfu bentalelwane yami.
12.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuka, ngabona bantfu bentalelwane yabomnaketfu kutsi bese babancobile labentalelwane yami; bahamba ngeticuku etukwebuso balelive.
12.21: Futsi ngababona babutsene ndzawonye ngeticuku, ngabona timphi kanye nemahemuhemu etimphi emkhatsini wabo; kuto timphi kanye nemahemuhemu etimphi ngabona titukulwane letiningi tindlula.
12.22: Ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka laba bayawuncishelwa kukholwa.
12.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona, emvakwekube sebancishelwe kukholwa baba mnyama, baphindze benyanyeka, futsi baba bantfu labangcolile, labagcwele buvila kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yetinengiso.

13.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka! Ngabuka ngabona letiningi tive kanye nemibuso.
13.2: Futsi ingilosi yatsi kimi: Ubonani na? Ngase ngitsi: Ngibona letiningi tive kanye nemibuso.
13.3: Yatsi kimi: Leti tive kanye nemibuso yebeTive.
13.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona emkhatsini wetive tebeTive kwakhiwa kwelibandla lelikhulu.
13.5: Ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka kwakhiwa kwelibandla lelinengekile kakhulu ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emabandla, lelibulala labangcwele baNkulunkulu, yebo, futsi lelibahlukubetako libabophele phansi, lelibafaka lijoka lensimbi, leliphindze libabuyisela phansi ekutfunjweni.
13.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalibona leli libandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile; ngabona kutsi develi bekangumcambi walo.
13.7: Ngaphindze ngabona ligolide, kanye nesiliva, kanye nabosilika, kanye nalokubovu, kanye nelineni lelukiwe lecolekile, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetingubo letiligugu; ngabona letiningi tingwadla.
13.8: Ingilosi yakhuluma kimi itsi: Buka ligolide, kanye nesiliva, kanye nabosilika, kanye nalokubovu, kanye nelineni lelukiwe lecolekile, kanye netingubo letiligugu, kanye netingwadla, kutifiso talo leli libandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile.
13.9: Ngetulu kwaloko ngenca yeludvumo lwasemhlabeni babhubhisa labangcwele baNkulunkulu, babayise phansi ekutfunjweni.
13.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuka ngabona emanti lamaningi; bekahlukanisa beTive nentalelwane yabomnaketfu.
13.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka intfukutselo yaNkulunkulu etikwentalelwane yabomnakenu.
13.12: Ngabuka ngabona indvodza emkhatsini webeTive, leyayehlukaniswe nentalelwane yabomnaketfu ngemanti lamaningi, ngabona uMoya waNkulunkulu, kutsi wehlela phansi, wasebenta kuyo indvodza; futsi yahamba kuwo lamanti lamaningi, nakuyo intalelwane yabomnaketfu, lebeyiseveni lesetsembiso.
13.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona Moya waNkulunkulu, kutsi wasebenta nakulabanye beTive, baphindze bahamba etikwemanti lamaningi baphuma ekutfunjweni.
13.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona ticuku letiningi tebeTive kulo live lesetsembiso; ngabona intfukutselo yaNkulunkulu, kutsi yayisetikwentalelwane yabomnaketfu; futsi bebahlakatekile phambi kwebeTive baphindze bashayiwe.
13.15: Ngabona Moya weNkhosi, kutsi wawusetikwebeTive, futsi baphumelela baphindze balitfola lelive njengelifa labo; ngabona kutsi bebamhlophe, babukeka kahle kakhulu futsi babahle, njengebantfu bami ngaphambi kwekutsi babulawe.
13.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabona kutsi beTive labebabaphume ekutfunjweni batitfoba phambi kweNkhosi, nemandla eNkhosi aba nabo.
13.17: Ngabona kutsi bonina bebeTive bebabutsene ndzawonye etikwemanti, ngalokunjalo nasetikwelive, kute balwe nabo.
13.18: Ngabona kutsi emandla aNkulunkulu bekanabo, futsi nekutsi intfukutselo yaNkulunkulu yayisetikwabo bonkhe labo labebabutsene ndzawonye kute balwe nabo.
13.19: Futsi mine, Nefi, ngabona kutsi beTive labo labebaphume ekutfunjweni bakhululwa ngemandla aNkulunkulu baphuma etandleni tato tonkhe letinye tive.
13.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabona kutsi baphumelela kulelive; ngabona incwadzi, yayindluliswa emkhatsini wabo.
13.21: Ingilosi yatsi kimi: Uyayati yini inchazelo yencwadzi na?
13.23: Yatsi: Buka iphuma emlonyeni weliJuda. Mine, Nefi, ngayibona; yatsi kimi: Incwadzi leyo loyibonako ingumbhalo wemaJuda, locuketse tivumelwano teNkhosi, leyatenta kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli; ngetulu kwaloko icuketse tiphrofetho letiningi tebaphrofethi labangcwele, futsi ingumbhalo lonjengemifanekiso lecoshiwe lokubongcwengcwe belitfusi, ngaphandle nje kwekutsi atitiningi tona kakhulu; noko, nato ticuketse tivumelwano teNkhosi, leyatenta kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli; ngaloko-ke, tinguletibaluleke kakhulu kubeTive.
13.24: Ingilosi yeNkhosi yatsi kimi: Ubonile kutsi incwadzi iphume emlonyeni weliJuda; futsi ngesikhatsi iphuma emlonyeni weliJuda beyicuketse livangeli leliphelele leNkhosi, lelo baphostoli labalishumi nakubili labanika bufakazi ngalo; baphindze banika bufakazi njengekweliciniso lelo lelikuyo iMvana yaNkulunkulu.
13.25: Ngaloko-ke, leti tintfo tiphuma kumaJuda timsulwa tiya kubeTive, njengekweliciniso laNkulunkulu.
13.26: Futsi emvakwekutsi setiphumile tahamba ngesandla sebaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana, tisuka kumaJuda tiya kubeTive, uyakubona kwakhiwa kwalelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, lelinengekile kakhulu ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emabandla; ngoba buka, batisusile evangelini leMvana tincenye letiningi letisobala naletiligugu lelikhulu; futsi ngalokunjalo netivumelwano letiningi teNkhosi batisusile.
13.27: Futsi konkhe loku bakwentile kute baguculele tindlela leticondzile tenkhosi, kute baphumphutsekise emehlo baphindze bente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu.
13.28: Ngaloko-ke, uyabona kutsi emvakwekutsi incwadzi seyindlulile etandleni talelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, kutsi kube khona letiningi futsi letisobala futsi letiligugu tintfo letikhishiwe encwadzini, lokuyincwadzi yeMvana yaNkulunkulu.
13.29: Emvakwekutsi leti tintfo letisobala futsi letiligugu setikhishiwe yendlulela kuto tonkhe tive tebeTive; emvakwekutsi seyendlulele kuto tonkhe tive tebeTive, yebo, nangesheya kwemanti lamaningi lawo lowuwabonile nebeTive labo labaphume ekutfunjweni, uyabona—ngenca yaleto tintfo letisobala letiningi futsi naletiligugu letikhishiwe encwadzini, letatisobala kutsi ticondvwe bantfwana bebantfu, njengaloko lokusobala lokukuyo iMvana yaNkulunkulu—ngenca yaleti tintfo letikhishiwe evangelini leMvana, labaningi kakhulu bayakhubeka, yebo, kangangekutsi Sathane unemandla lamakhulu etikwabo.
13.30: Noko, uyabona kutsi beTive labaphuma ekutfunjweni futsi baphakanyiswa ngemandla aNkulunkulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye tive, ebusweni balelo live lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave, lokulive iNkhosi Nkulunkulu lavumelane ngalo neyihlo kutsi intalelwane yakhe kufanele ilitfole kube live lelilifa labo; ngaloko-ke uyabona kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ayitukuvumela kutsi beTive bayibhubhise nya incubevane yentalelwane yakho, leyo lesemkhatsini kweyabomnakenu.
13.31: Futsi ayitukuvuma kutsi beTive babhubhise intalelwane yabomnakenu.
13.32: Futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ayitukuvuma kutsi beTive bahlale njalonjalo kuleso simo lesibi kakhulu sekuphumphutseka, leso lobabone bakuso, ngenca yetincenye letisobala futsi letiligugu kakhulu telivangeli leMvana letigodlwe ngilo lelo bandla lelinengekile, kwakhiwa kwalo lowukubonile.
13.33: Ngaloko-ke itsi iMvana yaNkulunkulu; Ngitawuba nesihawu kubeTive, kangangoba ngiyovakashela insali yendlu yaka-Israyeli ngekwehlulela lokukhulu.
13.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yeNkhosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka, kusho iMvana yaNkulunkulu, emvakwekutsi sengiyivakashele insali yendlu yaka-Israyeli—lensali lengikhuluma ngayo iyintalelwane yeyihlo—ngaloko-ke, emvakwekutsi sengiyivakashele ngekwahlulelwa, futsi ngayishaya ngesandla sebeTive, emvakwekutsi beTive sebakhubeka kakhulu, ngenca yetincenye letisobala kakhulu futsi letiligugu telivangeli leMvana letigodlwe ngulelobandla lelinengekile, lelingunina wetingwadla, kusho iMvana—Ngitawuba nesihawu kubo beTive ngalolosuku, kangangekutsi, ngitawuletsa kubo, ngemandla ami, lokuningi kwelivangeli lami, lokuyawuba sobala futsi kube ligugu, kusho iMvana.
13.35: Ngoba, buka, kusho iMvana: Ngitawutiveta lucobo lwami kuyo intalelwane yakho, kute ibhale tintfo letiningi lengiyawubafundzisa tona, letiyawube tisobala futsi tiligugu; emvakwekutsi intalelwane yakho seyibhujisiwe, yancishelwa kukholwa, futsi ngalokunjalo nentalelwane yabomnakenu, buka, leti tintfo tiyawutfukuswa, kute tivetwe kubeTive, ngesipho kanye nangemandla eMvana.
13.36: Futsi kuto kuyawubhalwa livangeli lami, kusho iMvana, nelidvwala lami kanye nensindziso yami.
13.37: Futsi babusisiwe labo labayawufuna kusungula iSiyoni yami ngalolosuku, ngoba bayawuba nesipho kanye nemandla aMoya loNgcwele, futsi uma babeketela kute kube sekugcineni bayawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina, futsi bayawusindziswa embusweni waphakadze weMvana; futsi nalabo labayawumemetela kuthula, yebo, tindzaba tekutfokota lokukhulu, bayawuba bahle kangakanani etintsabeni.
13.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona insali yentalelwane yabomnaketfu, ngalokunjalo nencwadzi yeMvana yaNkulunkulu, leyayiphume emlonyeni weliJuda, kutsi yavela kubeTive yaya kuyo insali yentalelwane yabomnaketfu.
13.39: Futsi emvakwekutsi seyivelile yaya kubo ngabona letinye tincwadzi, letavela ngemandla eMvana, tivela kubeTive tiya kubo, ekukholwiseni beTive kanye nensali yentalelwane yabomnaketfu, futsi ngalokunjalo nemaJuda labekahlakateke etikwebuso bemhlaba wonkhe, kutsi imibhalo yebaphrofethi neyebaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana iliciniso.
13.40: Futsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Lemibhalo yekugcina, loyibonile emkhatsini webeTive, iyawumisa liciniso laleyo yekucala, lokungeyebaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana, futsi iyawukwatisa ngaloko lokusobala kanye nangetintfo letiligugu letikhishwe kuyo; futsi iyawukwatiswa kuyo yonkhe imindeni, tilimi, kanye nakubantfu, kutsi iMvana yaNkulunkulu iyiNdvodzana yaBabe longunaPhakadze, futsi inguMsindzisi wemhlaba, nekutsi bonkhe bantfu kufanele bete kuyo, noma angeke basindziswe.
13.41: Futsi kufanele bete njengekwemavi lawo layawumiswa ngemlomo weMvana; futsi emavi eMvana ayawukwatiswa emibhalweni yentalelwane yakho, ngalokunjalo nasemibhalweni yebaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana; ngaloko-ke yomibili iyawuhlanganiswa ibe yinye; ngoba Nkulunkulu munye futsi neMelusi munye ngetulu kwemhlaba wonkhe.
13.42: Futsi sikhatsi siyeta lapho ayawutiveta etiveni tonkhe, kumaJuda ngalokunjalo nakubo beTive; futsi emvakwekutsi asativetile kuwo emaJuda ngalokunjalo nakubo beTive, uyawubese sewuyativeta kubeTive ngalokunjalo nakumaJuda, futsi bekugcina bayawuba bekucala, nebekucala bayawuba bekugcina.

14.1: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, kutsi uma beTive bayawuyilalela iMvana yaNkulunkulu ngalolosuku leyiyawutiveta ngalo kubo ngelivi, futsi ngalokunjalo nangemandla, nangetento lucobo, kute kususwe tikhubekiso tabo.
14.2: Futsi bangatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene neMvana yaNkulunkulu, bayawubalwa kanye nentalelwane yeyihlo; yebo bayawubalwa kanye nendlu yaka-Israyeli; futsi bayawuba bantfu lababusisekile eveni lesetsembiso ingunaphakadze; abasayuphindze nanini babuyiselwe phansi ekutfunjweni; futsi indlu yaka-Israyeli ayisayuphindze nanini ihlazeke.
14.3: Futsi lowo mgodzi lomkhulu, lobewumbelwe bona ngulelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, lelasungulwa ngudeveli kanye nebantfwana bakhe, kute aholele imiphefumulo yebantfu phansi esihogweni—yebo, lowo mgodzi lomkhulu lombelwe kubhubhisa bantfu uyawugcwaliswa ngulabo labawumbako, kute babhujiswe baphele nya, kusho iMvana yaNkulunkulu; hhayi kubhujiswa kwemphefumulo, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube kuphonswa kwawo esihogweni lesingenasiphetfo.
14.4: Ngoba buka, loku kuyindlela develi latfumba ngayo, futsi ngalokunjalo nendlela yekulunga kwaNkulunkulu, kubo bonkhe labo labatawukwenta imisebenti yebubi kanye netinengiso phambikwakhe.
14.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, Nefi, itsi: Ubonile kutsi uma beTive baphendvuka kuyawuba kuhle kubo; futsi ngetulu kwaloko uyati mayelana netivumelwano teNkhosi kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli; futsi ngetulu kwaloko uvile kutsi loyo longaphendvuki kufanele abhubhe.
14.6: Ngako-ke, maye kubo beTive uma kungukutsi batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene neMvana yaNkulunkulu.
14.7: Ngoba sikhatsi siyeta, kusho iMvana yaNkulunkulu, lapho ngitawukwenta umsebenti lomkhulu kanye nalomangalisako emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu; umsebenti loyawuba waphakadze, kube simo lesitsite kulolunye luhlangotsi noma lesinye ngakulolunye—bakholiswe kutsi babe nekuthula kanye nekuphila lokuphakadze, noma bayekelwe ebulukhunini betinhlitiyo tabo kanye nasekumphumphutsekeni kwetingcondvo tabo bate badvonseleke ekutfunjweni, futsi ngalokunjalo nasekubhujisweni, kwesikhashana kanye nekwakamoya, ngekwendlela develi latfumba ngayo, lesengikhulume ngako.
14.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi ingilosi seyiwakhulumile lamavi, yatsi kimi: Uyatikhumbula yini tivumelwano taBabe kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli na? Ngatsi kuyo, Yebo.
14.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yatsi kimi: Buka, futsi ubone lelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, lelingunina wetinengiso, umcambi walo lokungudeveli.
14.10: Futsi yatsi kimi: Buka mabili kuphela emabandla; linye libandla leMvana yaNkulunkulu, kantsi lelinye libandla ladeveli; ngaloko-ke, loyo longasuye welibandla leMvana yaNkulunkulu walelo bandla lelikhulu, lelingunina wetinengiso; futsi uyingwadla yemhlaba wonkhe.
14.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuka futsi ngayibona ingwadla yemhlaba wonkhe, futsi yayihleti etikwemanti lamaningi; futsi beyibusa ngetulu kwemhlaba wonkhe, emkhatsini wetive tonkhe, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nakubantfu.
14.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalibona libandla leMvana yaNkulunkulu, futsi linani lalo lalimbalwa, ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tengwadla leyo leyayihleti etikwemanti lamaningi; noko, ngabona kutsi libandla leMvana, lokwakungulabangcwele baNkulunkulu, bebakhona nabo ngalokunjalo etikwebuso bemhlaba wonkhe; futsi tindzawo letingaphansi kwabo ebusweni bemhlaba tatitincane, ngenca yebubi bengwadla lenkhulu lengayibona.
14.13: Futsi kwenteka ngabona kutsi unina lomkhulu wetinengiso watibutsisa ndzawonye ticuku etikwebuso bemhlaba wonkhe, emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive tebeTive, kutsi tilwe neMvana yaNkulunkulu.
14.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabona emandla eMvana yaNkulunkulu, kutsi ehlela ngetulu kwalabangcwele belibandla leMvana, kanye nasetikwebantfu besivumelwano beNkhosi, labo labebahlakateke etikwebuso bemhlaba wonkhe; futsi bebahlonyiswe ngekulunga kanye nangemandla aNkulunkulu enkhatimulweni lenkhulu.
14.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona kutsi intfukutselo yaNkulunkulu yatfululelwa etikwalelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, kangangekutsi kwabakhona timphi kanye nemahemuhemu etimphi emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive kanye nemindeni yemhlaba.
14.16: Futsi ngesikhatsi kucala kuba khona timphi kanye nemahemuhemu etimphi emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive lokwakukwenina wetinengiso, ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka, intfukutselo yaNkulunkulu isetikwenina wetingwadla; futsi buka, uyatibona tonkhe leti tintfo—
14.17: Futsi uma lusuku selufika kutsi intfukutselo yaNkulunkulu itfululelwe etikwenina wetingwadla, lekulibandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile lemhlaba wonkhe, umcambi walo lokungudeveli, ngalolosuku, umsebenti waBabe uyawucala, wekulungisa indlela yekugcwalisa tivumelwano takhe, latenta kubantfu bakhe lababendlu yaka-Israyeli.
14.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ingilosi yakhuluma kimi, itsi: Buka!
14.19: Ngabuka futsi ngabona indvodza, leyayigcoke ingubo lemhlophe.
14.20: Futsi ingilosi yatsi kimi: Buka lomunye webaphostoli labalishumi nakubili beMvana.
14.21: Buka, uyawubona futsi abhale ngalokusele kwaleti tintfo; yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo netintfo letiningi letike taba khona.
14.22: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko uyawubhala mayelana nekuphela kwemhlaba.
14.23: Ngaloko-ke, leto tintfo layawutibhala tilungile futsi tiliciniso; futsi buka tibhaliwe encwadzini leyo loyibone iphuma emlonyeni weliJuda; futsi ngesikhatsi tiphuma emlonyeni weliJuda, noma, ngesikhatsi incwadzi iphuma emlonyeni weliJuda, leto tintfo letatibhaliwe tatisobala futsi timsulwa, futsi tiligugu lelikhulu futsi tilula kucondvwa bantfu bonkhe.
14.24: Futsi buka, letintfo lomphostoli weMvana layawutibhala titintfo letiningi wena lose utibonile; futsi buka, lokusele utokubona.
14.25: Kodvwa leto tintfo utotibona emvakwaloku awunotibhala; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu igcobe umphostoli weMvana yaNkulunkulu kutsi atibhale.
14.26: Futsi ngalokunjalo nalabanye labebakhona, kubo utikhombisile tonkhe tintfo; futsi batibhalile; futsi tivalelwe tabekwa kute tiphume timsulwa; ngekweliciniso lelo lelikuyo iMvana, ngesikhatsi lesifanele seNkhosi, tiye kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli.
14.27: Futsi mine, Nefi, ngeva futsi ngiyafakaza, kutsi libito lalomphostoli weMvana bekunguJohane, ngekwelivi lengilosi.
14.28: Futsi buka, mine, Nefi, angikavunyelwa kutsi ngibhale lokusele kwetintfo lengatibona futsi ngativa; ngaloko-ke tintfo lengitibhalile tiyangenelisa; futsi ngibhale kuphela incenye lencane yetintfo lengatibona.
14.29: Futsi ngiyafakaza kutsi ngatibona leto tintfo babe latibona; futsi ingilosi yeNkhosi yatembula kimi.
14.30: Futsi manje sengenta siphetfo senkhulumo yami mayelana naleto tintfo lengatibona ngesikhatsi ngihlwitfwe nguMoya; futsi uma ngabe tonkhe tintfo lengatibona tingakabhalwa, tintfo lengitibhalile tiliciniso. Futsi kunjalo nje. Amen.

15.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Nefi, sengihlwitfwe nguMoya, futsi sengitibonile tonkhe leti tintfo, ngabuyela ethendeni lababe.
15.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabona bomnaketfu, baphikisana nguloyo naloyo mayelana netintfo leto babe labekatikhulumile kubo.
15.3: Ngoba ngempela wakhuluma tintfo letiningi naletinkhulu kubo, letatimatima kutsi ticondzakale, ngaphandle kwekutsi umuntfu abute eNkhosini; futsi ngenca yekutsi bebanetinhlitiyo letilukhuni, ngako-ke abatange babuke eNkhosini njengoba bekufanele bente.
15.4: Manje mine, Nefi, ngangidzabukile ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo, futsi kanjalo, nangenca yetintfo lengangitibonile, futsi ngativa kutsi kwakufanele tenteke ngaphandle kwekuvinjelwa ngenca yebubi lobukhulu bebantfwana bebantfu.
15.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaphela emandla ngenca yetinhlupheko tami, ngoba ngabona kutsi tinhlupheko tami tatitinkhulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe, ngenca yekubhujiswa kwebantfu bami, ngoba ngangikubonile kuwa kwabo.
15.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengitfole emandla ngakhuluma nabomnaketfu, nginesifiso sekwati kubo sizatfu sekuphikisana kwabo.
15.7: Futsi batsi: Buka, asikwati kuwacondza emavi ababe lawakhulumile mayelana nemagala emvelo esihlahla semncumo, futsi kanjalo mayelana nebeTive.
15.8: Futsi ngatsi kubo: Senike nabuta yini eNkhosini na?
15.9: Bona batsi kimi: Asikate; ngoba iNkhosi ayiyembuli intfo lenje kitsi.
15.10: Buka, ngatsi kubo: Kungani ningayigcini imiyaleto yeNkhosi na? Kungani nitawulahleka, ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tenu na?
15.11: Anitikhumbuli yini tintfo iNkhosi letishito na?—Uma ningatutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu, futsi ningibuta ngelukholo, nikholwa kutsi nitonikwa, nikhutsale ekugcineni imiyaleto yami, ngempela leti tintfo tiyawukwembulwa kini.
15.12: Bukani, ngitsi kini, indlu yaka-Israyeli yafananiswa nesihlahla semncumo, ngaMoya weNkhosi lowawukuye babe; futsi bukani tsine asihleshulwanga yini kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi asisilo yini ligala lendlu yaka-Israyeli na?
15.13: Manje, intfo babe layicondzile mayelana nekuchunyelelwa kwemagala emvelo ngekuphelela kwebeTive, kungukutsi ngetinsuku tekugcina, lapho intalelwane yetfu seyincishelwe kukholwa, yebo, sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi, futsi titukulwane letiningi emvakwekutsi Mesiya ayawubonakaliswa enyameni kubo bantfwana bebantfu, ngaleso sikhatsi livangeli leliphelele laMesiya liyawuta kubeTive, futsi liyosuka kubo beTive liye kuyo insali yentalelwane yetfu—
15.14: Futsi ngalolosuku insali yentalelwane yetfu iyawukwati kutsi bona bangibo bendlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi nekutsi bangibo bantfu besivumelwano beNkhosi; futsi ngaleso sikhatsi bayawukwati futsi bafinyelele elwatini lwabokhokho babo, futsi ngalokunjalo naselwatini lwelivangeli leMhlengi wabo, lelafundziswa kubobabe babo nguye; ngaloko-ke, bayawufinyelela ekumatini uMhlengi wabo futsi nangato tihloko temfundziso yakhe ngatinye, kute bati kutsi bangeta kanjani kuye futsi basindziswe.
15.15: Futsi ngalolosuku abatujabula yini futsi banikete ludvumo kuye Nkulunkulu wabo longunaphakadze, lidvwala labo, kanye nensindziso yabo na? Yebo, ngalolosuku, abatuwatfola yini emandla kanye nekondleka kuwo umvini weliciniso na? Yebo, abatukuta yini emhlambini weliciniso laNkulunkulu na?
15.16: Bukani, ngitsi kini, Yebo; bayawukhunjulwa futsi emkhatsini wendlu yaka-Israyeli; bayawuchunyelelwa, bangilo ligala lemvelo lesihlahla semncumo, kuso sihlahla seliciniso semncumo.
15.17: Futsi ngiko loku babe abekusho, futsi abecondze kutsi loku akutukwenteka kute kube semvakwekutsi sebahlakatwe beTive; futsi abecondze kutsi kuyawufika ngendlela yebeTive, kute iNkhosi ikhombise emandla ayo kubeTive ngaso leso sizatfu sekutsi iyawulahlwa ngemaJuda, noma bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
15.18: Ngaloko-ke babe akakhulumanga ngentalelwane yetfu kuphela, kodvwa futsi nangayo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli, lekhombisa sivumelwano lekufanele sigcwaliseke ngetinsuku tekugcina; leso sivumelwano iNkhosi leyasenta kubabe Abrahama, itsi: Entalelwaneni yakho yonkhe imindeni yemhlaba iyawubusiswa.
15.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngakhuluma kabanti nabo mayelana naleti tintfo; yebo, ngakhuluma kubo mayelana nekubuyiselwa kwemaJuda ngetinsuku tekugcina.
15.20: Futsi ngabalandzisa emavi a-Isaya, lawakhuluma mayelana nekubuyiselwa kwemaJuda, noma kwendlu yaka-Israyeli; futsi emvakwekutsi asabuyiselwe angeke asaphindze nanini atfotjiswe noma ahlakatwe futsi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakhuluma emavi lamaningi kubo bomnaketfu, kangangekutsi batfotjiswa futsi batitfoba phambi kweNkhosi.
15.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphindza bakhuluma kimi, batsi: Isho kutsini lentfo babe layibona ephusheni na? Sisho kutsini sihlahla lasibona na?
15.23: Futsi batsi kimi: Isho kutsini indvuku yensimbi babe layibona, leyo leyayiholela esihlahleni na?
15.24: Ngatsi kubo kwakulivi laNkulunkulu; futsi labo labebayawuliva livi laNkulunkulu; futsi babambelele bacine kulo, bebangeke balahleke nanini; futsi tilingo kanye nemicibisholo levutsako yesitsa ngeke kubancobele ekungatini, kute sibaholele ekubhujisweni.
15.25: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Nefi, ngabancusa kutsi balinake livi leNkhosi; yebo, ngabancusa ngawo onkhe emandla emphefumulo wami, kanye nangalo lonkhe lwati lwami lenganginalo, kutsi balinake livi laNkulunkulu futsi bakhumbule kugcina imiyaleto yakhe njalo kuto tonkhe tintfo.
15.26: Futsi batsi kimi: Usho kutsini umfula wemanti babe lawubona na?
15.27: Ngatsi kubo emanti lawo babe lawabona kwakukungcola; futsi umcondvo wakhe wawutsatsekile kakhulu ngaletinye tintfo kangangekutsi akakubonanga kungcola kwemanti.
15.28: Ngatsi kubo kwakungumhosha losabekako, lohlukanisa lababi esihlahleni sekuphila, futsi ngalokunjalo nakubo labangcwele baNkulunkulu.
15.29: Ngatsi kubo kwakungumfanekiso waleso sihogo lesesabekako, leso ingilosi leyatsi kimi sasilungiselwe lababi.
15.30: Ngatsi kubo babe waphindze wabona kutsi kulunga kwaNkulunkulu kwabehlukanisa lababi kulabalungile; futsi nekukhanya kwako kwakufana nekukhanya kwelilangabi lemlilo, lelalenyukela kuNkulunkulu ingunaphakadze, futsi lingenamkhawulo.
15.31: Futsi batsi kimi: Ngabe lentfo isho kuhlushwa kwemtimba etinsukwini tekuvivinywa, noma isho simo sekugcina semphefumulo emvakwekufa kwemtimba wenyama, noma ngabe ikhuluma ngetintfo letingetesikhashana na?
15.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngatsi kubo kwakungumfanekiso wetintfo tesikhashana kanye netakamoya; ngoba lusuku luyeta lapho kufanele bahlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo, yebo, nangemisebenti leyo leyentiwa ngumtimba wenyama ngetinsuku tekuvivinywa kwabo.
15.33: Ngaloko-ke, uma bangafela ebubini babo kufanele balahlwe futsi, ngalokuphatselene netintfo takamoya, leto letiphatselene nekulunga; ngaloko-ke, kufanele baletfwe batoma phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kute bahlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo; futsi uma imisebenti yabo beyiyekungcola kufanele kutsi bangcolile; futsi uma bangcolile kufanele kutsi bangakwati kuhlala embusweni waNkulunkulu; uma kunjalo, umbuso waNkulunkulu kufanele ungcole nawo futsi.
15.34: Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi kini, umbuso waNkulunkulu awukangcoli, futsi kute intfo lengcolile lengangena embusweni waNkulunkulu; ngaloko-ke kufanele kutsi kube khona indzawo yekungcola lelungiselwe loko lokungcolile.
15.35: Futsi kukhona indzawo lelungisiwe, yebo, naleso sihogo lesesabekako lengikhulume ngaso, futsi develi ungumlungisi waso; ngaloko-ke simo sekugcina semiphefumulo yebantfu kuhlala embusweni waNkulunkulu, noma-ke kube kulahlwa ngenca yaloko kulunga lengikhulume ngako.
15.36: Ngaloko-ke, labakhohlakele bayalahlwa kulabalungile, futsi ngalokunjalo nakuleso sihlahla sekuphila, sitselo saso lesiligugu lelikhulu futsi lesitsandzeka kakhulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye titselo; yebo; futsi kusipho lesikhulu kunato tonkhe tipho taNkulunkulu. Futsi ngakhuluma ngalendlela kubomnaketfu. Amen.

16.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Nefi, sengicedzile kukhuluma nabomnaketfu, buka batsi kimi: Usitjele tintfo letimatima, ngetulu kwaloko lesingakwati kukubeketelela.
