16.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngatsi kubo ngangati kutsi ngangikhulume tintfo letimatima ngalokumelene nalababi, ngekweliciniso; futsi labalungile angibabekanga licala, futsi ngafakaza ngekutsi bayophakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina; ngaloko-ke, labanelicala batsatsa liciniso ngekutsi limatima, ngoba lidzabula ekhatsi etibilinini tabo.
16.3: Manje bomnaketfu, kube benilungile futsi nitimisele kulalela liciniso, futsi nilinake, kute nihambe ngebucotfo phambi kwaNkulunkulu, uma kunjalo beningayuvungama ngenca yeliciniso, nitsi: Ukhuluma tintfo letilukhuni ngalokumelene natsi.
16.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabancusa bomnaketfu, ngako konkhe kukhutsala, kutsi bagcine imiyaleto yeNkhosi.
16.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batitfoba phambi kweNkhosi; kangangekutsi ngaba nekujabula kanye nelitsemba lelikhulu ngabo, kutsi batohamba etindleleni tekulunga.
16.6: Manje, tonkhe leti tintfo tashiwo futsi tenteka ngesikhatsi babe ahlala ethendeni esigodzini lasibita ngekutsi yiLemuweli.
16.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngatsatsa lenye yemadvodzakati a-Ishmayeli ngayenta umkami; futsi ngalokunjalo, nabomnaketfu batsatsa emadvodzakati a-Ishmayeli bawenta bafati babo; ngalokunjalo naZoramu watsatsa indvodzakati lendzala ya-Ishmayeli wayenta umkakhe.
16.8: Futsi ngaleyondlela babe besekayigcwalisile yonkhe imiyaleto yeNkhosi lebekaniketwe yona. Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, mine, Nefi, bese ngibusisiwe kakhulu yiNkhosi.
16.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi leNkhosi lakhuluma kubabe ebusuku, futsi lamyaleta kutsi ngakusasa kwakufanele achubeke neluhambo lwakhe loluya ehlane.
16.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babe avuka ekuseni, aya emnyango welithende, wamangala kakhulu kubona phansi ibhola leyindingilizi leyakhiwe ngebuciko; futsi leyakhiwe ngelitfusi lelicolekile. Ngekhatsi kuyo ibhola bekukhona tintsi letimbili; lolunye lwalukhomba indlela lapho kwakufanele tsine siye ngakhona ehlane.
16.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sagcogcela ndzawonye tonkhe tintfo lebekufanele sititfwale siye ehlane, kanye nayo yonkhe insalela yemphako wetfu iNkhosi leyayisinike wona; futsi satsatsa inhlanyelo letinhlobonhlobo kute siyitfwale siye ehlane.
16.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi satsatsa emathende etfu futsi sesuka saya ehlane, ngesheya kwemfula iLamani.
16.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba libanga letinsuku letine, sacondza ngaseningizimu lengasemphumalanga, saphindza samisa emathende etfu futsi; sayibita lendzawo ngeligama lelitsi kuseShazeri.
16.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi satsatsa butjoki kanye nemicibisholo yetfu, sahamba sachubekela ehlane kuyotingelela imindeni yetfu kudla; futsi emvakwekutsi sesiyitingelele imindeni yetfu kudla saphindza sabuyela kuyo imindeni yetfu ehlane, endzaweni yaseShazeri. Saphindza sahamba sachubeka ehlane, silandzela yona leyo ndlela, sitigcina kuleto tincenye lebetivundzile kakhulu tasehlane, lebetisemnceleni dvutane neLwandle loluBovu.
16.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba libanga letinsuku letiningi, sitingela kudla endleleni, ngebutjoki nangemicibisholo yetfu nangematje etfu kanye netilingi tetfu.
16.16: Salandzela indlela ngekuyalelwa yibhola, leyasiholela kuleyoncenye yasehlane lebeyivundze kakhulu.
16.17: Futsi emvakwekutsi sesihambe libanga letinsuku letiningi, samisa emathende etfu kwesikhashana, kute sitfole kuphumula futsi siphindze sitfole kudla kwemindeni yetfu.
16.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi mine, Nefi, ngichubekela phambili ngiyotingela kudla, buka ngabephula butjoki bami, lebebakhiwe ngensimbi lecolekile; futsi emvakwekutsi sengibephulile butjoki bami, buka, bomnaketfu bangitfukutselela ngenca yekulahlekelwa butjoki bami, ngoba asitfolanga kudla.
16.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sabuyela emuva emindenini yetfu ngaphandle kwekudla, futsi bakhatsele kakhulu, ngenca yeluhambo lwabo, bahlupheka kakhulu ngekweswela kudla.
16.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lamani naLemuweli kanye nemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli bacala kuvungama kakhulu, ngenca yebuhlungu babo kanye netinhlupheko ehlane; futsi ngalokunjalo nababe wacala kuyivungamela iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakhe; yebo, futsi bonkhe bebadzabukile kakhulu, kangangekutsi bayivungamela iNkhosi.
16.21: Manje kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, sengihlushwe bomnaketfu ngenca yekulahlekelwa butjoki bami, lobu babo butjoki bulahlekelwe kunwebeka kwabo, kwacala kutsi kube matima kakhulu, yebo, kangangekutsi asikwatanga kutfola kudla.
16.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngakhuluma kakhulu nabomnaketfu, ngoba bese batente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo futsi, bate bakhonona kuyo iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
16.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngenta butjoki ngelugodvo, kanye nemcibisholo ngendvuku lecondzile; ngaloko-ke, ngahloma ngebutjoki kanye nangemcibisholo, ngesilingi kanye nangematje. Ngabese ngitsi kubabe: Ngingaya ngakuphi kute ngitfole kudla na?
16.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabuta eNkhosini, ngoba bese batitfobile ngenca yemavi ami; ngoba ngakhuluma letiningi tintfo kubo ngemandla ami onkhe.
16.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi leNkhosi lafika kubabe; futsi ngempela watfotjiswa ngenca yekuyivungamela iNkhosi, kangangekutsi wehliswa ekujuleni kwelusizi.
16.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi leNkhosi latsi kuye: Buka kuyo ibhola, bese ubuka tintfo letibhaliwe.
16.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babe abona tintfo lebetibhalwe kuyo ibhola, waba nekwesaba kanye nekutfutfumela lokukhulu, ngalokunjalo nabomnaketfu kanye nemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli kanye nebafati betfu.
16.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabona tinkhomba leto lebetisebholeni, kutsi betisebenta ngelukholo nekukhutsala kanye nangekutinaka lebesikuniketa kuto.
16.29: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kwakubhalwe kuto umbhalo lomusha, lebekulula kuwufundza, lebewusinika kucondza mayelana netindlela teNkhosi; futsi wawubhalwa uphindze ushintjwe tikhatsi ngetikhatsi, ngekwenkholo kanye nekukhutsala lebesiyiniketa kona. Futsi ngalendlela siyabona kutsi ngetintfo letincane iNkhosi ingaletsa tintfo letinkhulu.
16.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngahamba ngaya etulu esicongweni sentsaba, njengekuyaletwa lebekuniketwe kuyo ibhola.
16.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabulala tilwane tasendle, kangangekutsi ngakutfola kudla kwemindeni yetfu.
16.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuyela emathendeni etfu, ngitfwele tilwane leto lebengitibulele; manje ngesikhatsi babona kutsi besengikutfolile kudla, yaba yinkhulu kangakanani injabulo yabo! Futsi kwenteka kutsi batitfoba phambi kweNkhosi, futsi bayibonga.
16.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi saphindza futsi satsatsa luhambo lwetfu, sihamba cishe ngayo leyondlela lefanako njengasekucaleni; futsi emvakwekutsi sesihambe libanga letinsuku letiningi samisa emathende etfu futsi, kute sitsi kuhlala sikhashana.
16.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Ishmayeli wafa, futsi wangcwatja endzaweni lebeyibitwa ngekutsi iNahomu.
16.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emadvodzakati a-Ishmayeli akhala kakhulu, ngenca yekulahlekelwa nguyise, nangenca yetinhlupheko tabo ehlane; bamvungamela babe, ngoba bekabakhiphe eveni laseJerusalema, batsi: Babe sewufile; yebo, futsi sesizulazule kakhulu ehlane, futsi sesihlushwe tinhlupheko letiningi, yindlala, koma, kanye nekukhatsala; futsi emvakwakokonkhe loku kuhlupheka kufanele sibhubhe lapha ehlane yindlala.
16.36: Futsi bavungama ngalendlela kubabe, ngalokunjalo nakimi; futsi bebafuna kuphindze babuyele eJerusalema.
16.37: Futsi Lamani watsi kuLemuweli ngalokunjalo nakuwo emadvodzana a-Ishmayeli: bukani asimbulale babe, futsi ngalokunjalo nemnaketfu Nefi, lesekatitsatsele kutsi abe ngumbusi kanye nemfundzisi wetfu, lesibomnakabo labadzala.
16.38: Manje, utsi iNkhosi ikhulume naye, futsi ngetulu kwaloko utsi tingilosi timfundzisile. Kodvwa bukani, siyati kutsi ucamba emanga kitsi; futsi usitjela leti tintfo, futsi wenta letiningi tintfo ngebucili bakhe lobunemacebo, kute akhohlise emehlo etfu, ucabanga, mhlawumbe, kutsi angasiholela kudze ehlane lelitsite lelingakajwayeleki; futsi emvakwekutsi asasiholele kudze, sewucabange kutsi atente inkhosi kanye nembusi ngetulu kwetfu, kute ente kitsi ngekwentsandvo nangekwesifiso sakhe. Futsi umnaketfu Lamani watiphehla ngalendlela tinhlitiyo tabo kute batfukutsele.
16.39: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yayinatsi, yebo, nelivi leNkhosi lefika futsi lakhuluma lamaningi emavi kubo, futsi labajezisa kakhulu; futsi emvakwekutfotjiswa ngelivi leNkhosi bakuyekela kutfukutsela kwabo, futsi baphendvuka etonweni tabo, kangangekutsi iNkhosi yasibusisa futsi ngekudla, kute singabhubhi.

17.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi saphindze satsatsa luhambo lwetfu ehlane; sahamba saya ngasemphumalanga kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili. Sahamba sendlula kuletiningi tinhlupheko ehlane; nebesifazane betfu batala bantfwana khona ehlane.
17.2: Futsi tatitinkhulu tibusiso teNkhosi kitsi, njengekutsi ngesikhatsi siphila ngenyama lengakavutfwa ehlane, besifazane betfu bamunyisa kakhulu bantfwana babo, futsi bebacinile, yebo, bebanjengalamadvodza imbala; futsi bacala kumelana neluhambo lwabo ngaphandle kwekuvungama.
17.3: Ngako-ke siyabona kutsi imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu kufanele igcwaliseke. Futsi uma kungukutsi bantfwana bebantfu bayayigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu yena uyabondla, aphindze abacinise, futsi abanike emasu ekutsi bakwati kufeza leyontfo labayalete ngayo; ngaloko-ke, wasinika emasu ngesikhatsi sisahleti sikhashana ehlane.
17.4: Sahlala sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi, yebo, iminyaka lesiphohlongo ehlane.
17.5: Futsi safika eveni lesalibita ngekutsi yiNala, ngenca yebuningi betitselo talo ngalokunjalo naneluju lwasendle; futsi tonkhe leti tintfo tatilungiswe yiNkhosi kute singabhubhi. Saphindze sabona lwandle, lesalubita ngekutsi yi-Ireyantumu, lokusho kutsi, uma kuhunyushwa, ngemanti lamaningi.
17.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi samisa emathende etfu dvute nelugu lwelwandle; nanoma sasesihlushwe tinhlupheko letiningi kanye nebumatima lobuningi, yebo, kangangekutsi singeke sikubhale konkhe, satfokota kakhulu ngesikhatsi sesifika elugwini lwelwandle; sayibita lendzawo ngekutsi yiNala; ngenca yebuningi betitselo tayo.
17.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Nefi, sengihleli eveni leNala sikhatsi lesitinsuku letiningi, livi leNkhosi lafika kimi, litsi: Vuka, uye entsabeni. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngavuka ngahamba ngakhuphukela entsabeni, futsi ngakhala eNkhosini.
17.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yakhuluma kimi, yatsi: Yakha umkhumbi, ngendlela lengitawukukhombisa ngayo, kute ngitfwale bantfu bakho bawele lamanti.
17.9: Futsi ngatsi: Nkhosi, ngukuphi lapho ngingaya ngakhona kute ngitfole litje lensimbi ngilincibilikise, kute ngente emathulusi ekwakha umkhumbi ngendlela lewungikhombise ngayo na?
17.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yangitjela kutsi ngukuphi lapho ngingaya khona kute ngitfole litje lensimbi, kute ngakhe emathulusi.
17.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngakha tifutfo tekuvutsela umlilo, ngetikhumba tetilwane; futsi emvakwekutsi sengitakhile tifutfo, kute ngivutsele umlilo ngato, ngabese sengishayanisa ematje lamabili kute ngente umlilo.
17.12: Ngoba iNkhosi kute kube ngumanje yayingakate isivumele kutsi sibase umlilo lomkhulu, ngesikhatsi sisahamba ehlane; ngoba yatsi: Ngitawukwenta kudla kwenu kunongotele, kute ningakupheki.
17.13: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngitawuba kukhanya kwenu ehlane; futsi ngitawuyilungisa indlela phambi kwenu, uma kungukutsi niyawugcina imiyaleto yami; ngaloko-ke, kangangoba niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuholelwa eveni lesetsembiso; futsi niyawukwati kutsi kungenca yami kutsi niyaholwa.
17.14: Yebo, futsi iNkhosi yaphindze yasho kutsi: Emvakwekutsi senifikile eveni lesetsembiso, niyawukwati kutsi mine, iNkhosi, nginguNkulunkulu; futsi nekutsi mine, iNkhosi, nganikhulula ekubhujisweni; yebo, nekutsi mine nganikhipha eveni laseJerusalema.
17.15: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Nefi, ngetama kugcina imiyaleto yeNkhosi, futsi ngabancusa bomnaketfu ekwetsembekeni kanye nasekukhutsaleni.
17.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawenta emathulusi ngelitje lensimbi lengalincibilikisa edvwaleni.
17.17: Futsi ngesikhatsi bomnaketfu babona kutsi ngasengitokwakha umkhumbi, bacala kungivungamela, batsi: Umnaketfu usiwula, ngoba ucabanga kutsi angakha umkhumbi; yebo, futsi ucabanga kutsi angawela lamanti lawa lamaningi.
17.18: Futsi bomnaketfu bangigceka ngalendlela, banesifiso sekutsi bangasebenti, ngoba bebangakholwa kutsi ngingawakha umkhumbi; futsi bebangakholwa kutsi ngangitfunywe yiNkhosi.
17.19: Manje kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngadzabuka kakhulu ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo; futsi manje ngesikhatsi babona kutsi ngasengicala kudzabuka bajabula etinhlitiyweni tabo, kangangekutsi batfokota ngaloko, batsi: Besati kutsi awunokwati kwakha umkhumbi, ngoba besati kutsi awunawo umcondvo lokhaliphile; ngaloko-ke awunokwati kufeza umsebenti lomkhulu kangaka.
17.20: Futsi ufana nababe, uholwa yimibono yebuwula benhlitiyo yakhe; yebo, usiholile wasikhipha eveni laseJerusalema, futsi sizulazule ehlane yonkhe leminyaka leminingi; nebafati betfu basebente matima, bakhulelwe, baphindze batala bantfwana ehlane bahlupheka kuto tonkhe tintfo, ngaphandle kwekufa; futsi bekuyawuba ncono kutsi bebafile ngaphambi kwekutsi baphume eJerusalema kunekutsi bahlupheke ngaleti tinhlupheko.
17.21: Buka, leminyaka leminingi sihluphekile ehlane, lokusikhatsi lengabe sitfokotele loko lesinako kanye nelive lelilifa letfu; yebo, futsi ngabe besijabulile.
17.22: Futsi siyati kutsi bantfu labebaseveni laseJerusalema kwakubantfu labalungile; ngoba bayigcina imitsetfo kanye netehlulelo teNkhosi, kanye nayo yonkhe imiyaleto yayo, ngekwemtsetfo waMosi; ngaloko-ke, siyati kutsi babantfu labalungile; futsi babe ubahlulele, waphindze wasiholela kudze ngenca yekutsi salalela emavi akhe; yebo, futsi nemnaketfu ufana naye. Futsi kungalendlela yekukhuluma bomnaketfu labasivungamela baphindze basigceka ngayo.
17.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngakhuluma nabo, ngatsi: Niyakholwa yini kutsi bobabe betfu, labebabantfwana baka-Israyeli, bebangaholwa bakhishwe etandleni temaGibhithe kube bebangawalalelanga emavi eNkhosi na?
17.24: Yebo, nicabanga kutsi bebayawukhishwa yini ebugcilini kube iNkhosi yayingatfumelanga Mosi kutsi abakhiphe ebugcilini na?
17.25: Manje niyati kutsi bantfwana baka-Israyeli bebasebugcilini; futsi niyati kutsi bebatfweswe imisebenti, lokwakumatima kutsi bayitfwale; ngaloko-ke, niyati kutsi kufanele kutsi kwaba yintfo lenhle kubo, kutsi bakhishwe ebugcilini.
17.26: Manje niyati kutsi Mosi bekayaletwe yiNkhosi kwenta lowo msebenti lomkhulu; futsi niyati kutsi ngelivi lakhe emanti eLwandle loluBovu ahlukana ekhatsi aya lena nalena, futsi bawela emhlabatsini lowomile.
17.27: Kodvwa niyati kutsi emaGibhithe amita eLwandle loluBovu, lawo labekangemabutfo aFaro.
17.28: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko niyati kutsi bondliwa ngemana ehlane.
17.29: Yebo, ngetulu kwaloko niyati kutsi Mosi, ngelivi lakhe ngekwemandla aNkulunkulu labekakuye, walishaya lidvwala, kwaphuma emanti, kute bantfwana baka-Israyeli bacime koma kwabo.
17.30: Futsi nanoma bebaholwa, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, uMhlengi wabo, ahamba phambi kwabo, abahola emini futsi abaniketa kukhanya ebusuku, abentela tonkhe tintfo letatidzingeka kutsi umuntfu atitfole, batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo futsi baphumphutsekisa tingcondvo tabo, baphindze bametfuka Mosi kanye naNkulunkulu weliciniso lophilako.
17.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngekwelivi lakhe wababhubhisa; nangekwelivi lakhe wabahola; nangekwelivi lakhe wabentela tonkhe tintfo, futsi kwakute intfo lengentiwa ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngekwelivi lakhe.
17.32: Futsi emvakwekutsi sebewele umfula i-Jordane wabenta baba nemandla ngalokwanele ekucosheni bantfwana bakulelo live, yebo, kubahlakatela ekubhujisweni.
17.33: Manje, nicabanga kutsi bantfwana bakuleli live labo labebaseveni lesetsembiso, labakhishwa bobabe betfu, nicabanga kutsi bebalungile na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha.
17.34: Ngabe nicabanga kutsi bobabe betfu bebayawukhetfwa ngetulu kwabo kube bebalungile na? Ngitsi kini, Cha.
17.35: Bukani, iNkhosi yatisa wonkhe umuntfu ngalokufanako; loyo lolungile uyatsandvwa nguNkulunkulu. Kodvwa bukani, labantfu bawalahla onkhe emavi aNkulunkulu, futsi bavutfwa ekoneni; nelulaka loluphelele lwaNkulunkulu beselusetikwabo; futsi iNkhosi yalicalekisa lelive ngalokumelene nabo, yalibusisela bobabe betfu; yebo, yalicalekisa ngalokumelene nabo kute babhujiswe, yalibusisela bobabe betfu kute batfole emandla ngetulu kwalo.
17.36: Bukani, iNkhosi iwudalile umhlaba kute kuhlalwe kuwo; futsi ibadalile bantfwana bayo kute ube ngewabo.
17.37: Ivusa sive lesilungile, ibhubhise tive talababi.
17.38: Ihola labalungile ibayise emaveni laligugu, lababi ibabhubhise, iphindze icalekise live ngenca yabo.
17.39: Ibusa ngetulu emazulwini, ngoba sihlalo sayo sebukhosi, futsi lomhlaba usenabelo setinyawo tayo.
17.40: Iyabatsandza labo labatawuyenta ibe nguNkulunkulu wabo. Bukani, yabatsandza bobabe betfu, yaphindze yenta sivumelwano nabo, yebo, na-Abrahama, na-Isaka, kanye naJakobe; futsi yatikhumbula tivumelwano leyantenta; ngaloko-ke, yabakhipha eveni laseGibhithe.
17.41: Futsi yabajezisa ehlane ngendvuku yayo, ngoba batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, njengoba nani nentile; futsi iNkhosi yaletsa kukhatsateka ngenca yebubi babo. Yatfumela tinyoka letinemlilo letindizako emkhatsini wabo; emvakwekutsi sebalunyiwe yalungisa indlela kutsi baphiliswe; futsi umsebenti lokwakufanele bawente kwakungukutsi babuke; futsi ngenca yekuba sobala kwaleyo ndlela, noma yekuba lula kwayo, baba baningi lababhubha.
17.42: Futsi batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo tikhatsi ngetikhatsi, bametfuka Mosi, futsi ngalokunjalo naNkulunkulu; noko, niyati kutsi baholelwa phambili ngemandla akhe langenakulinganiswa baya eveni lesetsembiso.
17.43: Manje, emvakwato tonkhe leti tintfo, sikhatsi sesifikile sekutsi babe ngulababi, yebo, sebayavunwa; angati kodvwa sebadvute nelusuku lwekubhujiswa; ngoba ngiyati kutsi lusuku kufanele lufike kutsi babhujiswe, ngaphandle kwalabambalwa kuphela, labayawuholelwa ekutfunjweni.
17.44: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi yayaleta babe kutsi esuke aye ehlane; emaJuda ngetulu kwaloko abefuna kutsatsa imphilo yakhe; yebo, futsi nani ngalokunjalo nifuna kutsatsa imphilo yakhe; ngaloko-ke, nibabulali etinhlitiyweni tenu futsi nani nifana nawo.
17.45: Niyashesha kwenta lokubi kodvwa niyaphuta kukhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu. Niyibonile ingilosi, futsi yakhuluma kini; yebo, nilivile livi layo tikhatsi ngetikhatsi; futsi ikhulumile kini ngelivi lelincane lelipholile, kodvwa nanibutfuntfu, kangangoba anikwatanga kuweva emavi ayo; ngaloko-ke, ikhulume kini ngelivi lekudvuma, lelenta kutamatame phansi shengatsi kutohlukana ekhatsi.
17.46: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko niyati kutsi ngemandla elivi layo lelikhulu ingenta kutsi umhlaba ubhubhe; yebo, futsi niyati kutsi ngelivi layo ingenta tindzawo letimahhedle tibe busheleleti, futsi tindzawo letibusheleleti tiyawugedvuka. Awu, pho, kungani, nitente lukhuni kangaka tinhlitiyo tenu na?
17.47: Bukani, umphefumulo wami udzabukile ngelusizi ngenca yenu, futsi inhlitiyo yami ibuhlungu; ngiyesaba hleze nicoshwe ingunaphakadze. Bukani, ngigcwele Moya waNkulunkulu, kangangekutsi sicu semtimba wami asisenamandla.
17.48: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sengiwakhulumile lamavi bangitfukutselela, futsi bebafuna kungiphonsa ekujuleni kwelwandle; ngesikhatsi beta kutongibamba ngakhuluma nabo, ngatsi: Egameni laNkulunkulu Somandla, ngiyaniyala kutsi ningangitsintsi, ngoba ngigcwele emandla aNkulunkulu, kangangekutsi angacotfula inyama yami, futsi loyo loyawungibamba uyawubuna njengemhlanga lowomile; futsi uyawuba lite lelite phambi kwemandla aNkulunkulu, ngoba Nkulunkulu uyawumshaya.
17.49: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngatsi kubo bangaphindzi nanini bamvungamele uyise; noma bangigodlele emandla abo, ngoba Nkulunkulu ungiyaletile kutsi ngakhe umkhumbi.
17.50: Ngatsi kubo: Uma Nkulunkulu angiyaletile kutsi ngente tonkhe tintfo ngingakwati kutenta. Uma angangiyaleta kutsi ngitsi kulamanti, bani ngumhlaba, ayoba ngumhlaba; futsi uma ngingasho, kuyawukwenteka.
17.51: Manje, uma iNkhosi inemandla lamakhulu kangaka, futsi seyente timangaliso letiningi kangaka emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, kungani ingenakungiyala, kutsi ngakhe umkhumbi na?
17.52: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngakhuluma tintfo letiningi kubomnaketfu, kangangekutsi batfotjiswa futsi abatange basakwati kuphikisana nami; futsi abatange basalokotsa kungibamba noma kungitsintsa ngeminwe yabo, sikhatsi lesitinsuku letiningi. Manje abalokotsanga bakwenta loku hleze babune phambi kwami, bekamakhulu emandla aMoya waNkulunkulu; futsi wasebenta kanjalo-ke etikwabo.
17.53: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Yelulela sandla sakho futsi kubomnakenu, futsi abayubuna phambi kwakho, kodvwa ngitawubatfutfumelisa, kusho iNkhosi, futsi loku ngitawukwenta, kute bati kutsi ngiyiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
17.54: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaselulela kubomnaketfu sandla sami, futsi abatange babuna phambi kwami; kodvwa iNkhosi yabavevetelisa, ngekwelivi leyilikhulumile.
17.55: Manje, batsi: Sesiyati ngekweliciniso kutsi iNkhosi inawe, ngoba siyati kutsi ngemandla eNkhosi lawa lasivevetelisako. Futsi bawa phansi phambi kwami, futsi besebatongikhonta, kodvwa angibavumelanga, ngatsi: Ngingumnakenu, yebo, umnakenu lomncane; ngaloko-ke khontani iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu, nihloniphe uyihlo nenyoko, kute tinsuku tenu tandze eveni iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu layawuninika lona.

18.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bayikhonta iNkhosi, bahamba nami; saphindze sakha emapulango ngebuciko. Futsi iNkhosi yangibonisa tikhatsi ngetikhatsi kutsi kufanele ngiwasebente kanjani emapulango emkhumbi.
18.2: Manje mine, Nefi, angitange ngiwasebente emapulango ngendlela leyayifundvwe bantfu, noma ngakhe umkhumbi ngendlela yebantfu; kodvwa ngawakha ngendlela iNkhosi leyayingibonise ngayo, ngaloko-ke, kwakungasiyo indlela yebantfu.
18.3: Mine, Nefi, bengikhuphukela entsabeni njalo nje, futsi bengithandaza njalo nje eNkhosini; ngaloko-ke iNkhosi yangibonisa tintfo letinkhulu.
18.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengiwucedzile umkhumbi, ngekwelivi leNkhosi, bomnaketfu babona kutsi wawumuhle, futsi nekutsi kwentiwa kwawo kwakukuhle kakhulu; ngaloko-ke, batitfoba futsi phambi kweNkhosi.
18.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi leNkhosi lafika kubabe, kutsi kufanele siphindze sisukume sehlele entansi emkhunjini.
18.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa, emvakwekutsi sesitilungisile tonkhe tintfo, titselo letiningi kanye nenyama yasehlane kanye neluju loluningi, kanye nako konkhe lokudzingekako ngaloku iNkhosi yayisiyaletile, sehlela entansi emkhunjini, nato tonkhe timphahla tetfu nenhlanyelo yetfu, kanye nako konkhe lesasifike nako, wonkhe umuntfu ngekweminyaka yakhe; ngaloko-ke, sonkhe sehla saya entansi emkhunjini, nebafati betfu kanye nebantfwana betfu.
18.7: Manje, babe besekatele emadvodzana lamabili ehlane; lendzala yayibitwa ngekutsi nguJakobe kantsi lencane kwakunguJosefa.
18.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sonkhe sesehlele entansi emkhunjini, futsi sesitsatse imiphako yetfu kanye naleto tintfo lesasiyaletwe ngato, satsatsa luhambo elwandle futsi sachutjwa ngumoya saya eveni lesetsembiso.
18.9: Emvakwekutsi sesichutjwe ngumoya libanga lelitinsuku letiningi, buka, bomnaketfu kanye nemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli ngalokunjalo nebafati babo bacala kutijabulisa, kangangekutsi bacala kugidza, kanye nekuhlabela, futsi bakhuluma ngalokukhulu kwedzelela, yebo, bate bakhohlwa kutsi ngumaphi emandla labekabaletse lapho; yebo, baphakama ekwedzeleleni lokukhulu.
18.10: Mine, Nefi, ngacala kwesaba kakhulu kutsi hleze iNkhosi isitfukutselele, iphindze isishaye ngenca yebubi betfu, nekutsi funa sigwinywe siye ekujuleni kwelwandle; ngaloko-ke, mine, Nefi, ngacala kukhuluma nabo ngalesikhulu sizotsa; kodvwa buka bangitfukutselela, batsi: ngeke sivume kutsi umnaketfu lomncane abuse ngetulu kwetfu.
18.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lamani naLemuweli bangitsatsa baphindze bangibopha ngetintsambo, futsi bangiphatsa ngalokukhulu kuhlukubeteka; noko, iNkhosi yakuvumela loko kute ikhombise emandla ayo, ekugcwaliseni emavi ayo leyayiwakhulumile mayelana nalababi.
18.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebangibophile kangangekutsi ngangingasakwati nekunyakata, inkhombandlela lesasiyilungiselwe yiNkhosi yema kusebenta.
18.13: Ngaloko-ke, abatanga kutsi kwakufane bawugwedle umkhumbi bawuyise ngakuphi, kangangekutsi kwasuka siphepho lesikhulu, yebo, lesikhulu nalesesabeka kakhulu sivunguvungu, futsi sachutjwa sabuyiselwa emuva etikwemanti libanga lelitinsuku letintsatfu; futsi bacala kwesaba kakhulu hleze bamite elwandle; noko abatange bangichache.
18.14: Futsi kwatsi ngelusuku lwesine, sisachutjwa sibhekiswa emuva, sivunguvungu sacala kuba sibi kakhulu.
18.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sase sitogwinywa siye ekujuleni kwelwandle. Emvakwekutsi sesichutjwe saya emuva etikwemanti libanga lelitinsuku letine, bomnaketfu bacala kubona kutsi tehlulelo taNkulunkulu tasetisetikwabo, futsi nekutsi kwakufanele babhubhe ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ebubini babo; ngaloko-ke, beta kimi, baphindze baticekisa tibopho letatisetihlakaleni tetandla tami, futsi buka tase tivuvukile kakhulu; futsi ngalokunjalo nemacakala ami bekavuvukile kakhulu, baba bukhulu buhlungu lobabulapho.
18.16: Noko, ngabuka kuNkulunkulu wami, futsi ngamdvumisa lusuku lonkhe, futsi angitange ngiyivungamele iNkhosi ngenca yetinhlupheko tami.
18.17: Manje babe, Lehi, bekasho tintfo letiningi kubo, futsi ngalokunjalo nakuwo emadvodzana a-Ishmayeli; kodvwa, buka, bafutselana kakhulu basongela nanoma ngubani lobekangikhulumela; nebatali bami sebakhulile ngeminyaka, futsi sebeve lolukhulu lusizi ngenca yebantfwana babo, behlela phansi, yebo, nasemibhedzeni yabo yekugula.
18.18: Ngenca yekudzabuka kwabo kanye nelusizi lolukhulu, kanye nebubi babomnaketfu, basondzetwa edvute nekufa kute bahlangane naNkulunkulu wabo; yebo, tinwele tabo letimphunga tasetisondzele kutsi tilale phansi elutfulini; yebo, kwasekusedvute nekutsi balahlwe banelusizi ethuneni lemanti.
18.19: Jakobe kanye naJosefa nabo, babancane, basadzinga kondliwa lokukhulu, badzabuka ngenca yetinhlupheko tenina; futsi ngalokunjalo nemkami netinyembeti kanye nemithandazo yakhe, ngalokunjalo nebantfwana bami, abatange batitsambise tinhlitiyo tabomnaketfu kutsi bangikhulule.
18.20: Kwakute lutfo ngaphandle kwemandla aNkulunkulu, lobekabasabisa ngekubhubha, bekangatsambisa tinhlitiyo tabo; ngaloko-ke, ngesikhatsi babona kutsi kwase kusondzele kutsi bagwinywe bayoshona ekujuleni kwelwandle baphendvuka ngaleyontfo labebayentile, kangangekutsi bangikhulula.
18.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebangikhululile, buka, ngatsatsa inkhombandlela, futsi yasebenta njengoba ngangifisa. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngathandaza eNkhosini; emvakwekutsi sengithandazile umoya wancamuka, kanye nesiphepho sancamuka, kwabakhona kuthula lokukhulu.
18.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngawucondzisa umkhumbi, kangangoba sachubekela eveni lesetsembiso.
18.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sesihambe libanga lelitinsuku letiningi safika eveni lesetsembiso; futsi sachubekela phambili eveni, futsi samisa emathende etfu; salibita ngelive lesetsembiso.
18.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sacala salima umhlabatsi, sacala kuhlanyela tinhlanyelo; yebo, satifaka tonkhe tinhlanyelo tetfu emhlabatsini; lesasifike nato sisuka eveni laseJerusalema. Futsi kwenteka kutsi tamila kahle kakhulu; ngaloko-ke sabusiswa ngenala.
18.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi satfola eveni lesetsembiso, ngesikhatsi sihamba ehlane, kutsi kwakukhona tilwane ehlatsini letitinhlobonhlobo, inkhomati kanye nenkhabi, kanye nembongolo kanye nelihhashi, nembuti kanye nembuti yasendle, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetilwane tasendle, lebetilusito kubantfu. Futsi satfola yonkhe inhlobo yelitje lensimbi, yeligolide, neyesiliva, kanye neyelitfusi.

19.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yangiyaleta, ngaloko-ke ngenta bongcwengcwe belitje lensimbi kute ngicophe kubo umbhalo webantfu bami. Futsi kulaba bongcwengcwe lengabenta ngacopha umbhalo wababe, futsi ngalokunjalo neluhambo lwetfu ehlane, kanye netiphrofetho tababe; futsi ngalokunjalo netiphrofetho tami letiningi ngiticophe kubo.
19.2: Angatanga ngesikhatsi ngibenta kutsi ngangitoyaletwa yiNkhosi kutsi ngibente laba bongcwengcwe; ngaloko-ke, umbhalo wababe, kanye nemlandvo wesitukulwane saboyise, kanye nencenye lenkhulu yetento tetfu ehlane ticoshwe kubo labo bongcwengcwe bekucala lengikhulume ngabo; ngaloko-ke, tintfo letenteka ngaphambi kwekutsi ngente laba bongcwengcwe, teliciniso, kuphawulwa kakhulu ngato kulabongcwengcwe bekucala.
19.3: Emvakwekutsi sengibentile labongcwengcwe ngendlela yekuyaletwa, mine, Nefi, ngatfola umyaleto wekutsi bufundisi kanye netiphrofetho, ikakhulukati leyo ncenye yato lesobala kanye naleligugu, kufanele ibhalwe kulaba bongcwengcwe; futsi nekutsi leto tintfo letatibhaliwe kufanele tigcinelwe kufundzisa bantfu bami, labayohlala kulelive, futsi ngetulu kwaloko nangaletinye tizatfu tekuhlakanipha, tizatfu letatiwa yiNkhosi.
19.4: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Nefi, ngenta umbhalo kulabanye bongcwengcwe, lositjela ngemlandvo, noma lositjela ngemininingwane yetimphi kanye nemibango nekubhujiswa kwebantfu bami. Futsi loku ngikwentile, futsi ngabayaleta bantfu bami kutsi kufanele benteni emvakwekutsi mine sengingasekho; nekutsi laba bongcwengcwe kufanele bandluliselwe njani kusuka kusinye situkulwane kuya kulesinye, noma kusuka kumunye umphrofethi kuya kulomunye, kute kufike leminye imiyaleto yeNkhosi.
19.5: Umlandvo wami wekwenta laba bongcwengcwe uyawuniketwa evakwaloku; futsi emvakwaloko, buka, ngiyachubeka njengoba bengikadze ngikhulumile; futsi loku ngikwentela kute tintfo letiningi letingcwele tigcinelwe kutsi bantfu bami batati.
19.6: Noko, angibhali lutfo kulaba bongcwengcwe ngaphandle kwekutsi ngicabanga kutsi kungcwele. Manje, uma ngiphambuka, nabo baphambuka basendvulo; hhayi kutsi ngiyawuticolela ngenca yalabanye bantfu, kepha ngenca yebutsakatsaka lobukimi, ngekwenyama, ngiyawuticolela.
19.7: Ngoba tintfo labanye bantfu labatatisa kakhulu, enyameni kanye nasemphefumulweni, labanye batenta lite futsi batinyatsele ngaphansi kwetinyawo tabo. Yebo, naNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli lucobo bantfu bamnyatsela ngaphansi kwetinyawo tabo. Ngitsi, bamnyatsela ngaphansi kwetinyawo tabo kodvwa ngitokhuluma ngalamanye emavi—bamenta lite, futsi bangalilaleli livi lakhe lekucondzisa.
19.8: Buka uyeta, ngekwemavi engilosi, eminyakeni lengemakhulu lasitfupha kusukela esikhatsini babe esuka eJerusalema.
19.9: Nemhlaba, ngenca yebubi bawo, uyawumehlulela njengentfo lelite; ngaloko-ke bayombhacabula, avume; baphindze bamshaye, avume. Yebo, bayomkhafulela ngematse, avume, ngenca yemusa wakhe lonelutsandvo lolukhulu kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kubantfwana bebantfu.
19.10: Futsi Nkulunkulu wabobabe betfu, labaholwa baphuma eGibhithe, baphuma ebugcilini, futsi ngetulu kwaloko bagcinwa nguye ehlane, yebo, Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, kanye na-Isaka, kanye naNkulunkulu waJakobe, watidzela, ngekwemavi engilosi, njengemuntfu, etandleni tebantfu lababi, kute aphakanyiswe, ngekwemavi aZenokhi, futsi kute abetselwe, ngekwemavi aNewumu, futsi kute angcwatjwe ethuneni, ngekwemavi aZenoshe, lawakhuluma mayelana netinsuku letintsatfu tebumnyama, lokwakufanele tibe sibonakaliso lesasitoniketwa ngekufa kwakhe kulabo labekufanele bahlale etichingini telwandle, ikakhulukati lesanikwa labo lokwakubendlu yaka-Israyeli.
19.11: Ngoba wakhuluma kanje umphrofethi: INkhosi Nkulunkulu ngempela iyawuyivakashela yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli ngalolosuku, labanye ngelivi lakhe, ngenca yekulunga kwabo, kube kujabula lokukhulu kanye nensindziso kubo, futsi labanye ngekudvuma kanye nangemibani yemandla akhe, ngesivunguvungu, ngemlilo, nangentfutfu, kanye nangenkhungu yebumnyama, kanye nangekuvuleka kwemhlaba, kanye nangetintsaba letiyawuphakanyiselwa etulu.
19.12: Futsi tonkhe leti tintfo kufanele ngempela tenteke, kusho umphrofethi Zenoshe. Futsi emadvwala emhlaba kufanele adzabuke; futsi ngenca yekububula kwemhlaba, emakhosi lamaningi etichingini telwandle lwaMoya waNkulunkulu uyawusebenta kuwo, kute amemete atsi: Nkulunkulu wemvelo uva buhlungu.
19.13: Futsi mayelana nalabo labaseJerusalema, kusho umphrofethi, bayawuhlushwa ngibo bonkhe bantfu, ngenca yekutsi bambetsela Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, futsi badukisa tinhlitiyo tabo, batilahla tibonakaliso kanye netimangaliso, kanye nemandla nenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli.
19.14: Futsi ngenca yekudukisa tinhlitiyo tabo, kusho umphrofethi, futsi bamedzelela loNgcwele waka-Israyeli bayawuzulazula basenyameni, futsi babhubhe, babe yinhlekisa nesiga, baphindze batondvwe emkhatsini wetive tonkhe.
19.15: Noko, uma lolosuku lufika, kusho umphrofethi, kutsi bangabe basaphindze futsi badukise tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene naloNgcwele waka-Israyeli, ngaleso sikhatsi utawutikhumbula tivumelwano latenta kuboyise.
19.16: Yebo, ngaleso sikhatsi utawutikhumbula tichingi telwandle; yebo, kanye nabo bonkhe bantfu lokubendlu yaka-Israyeli, ngitawubagcogca, kusho iNkhosi, ngekwemavi emphrofethi Zenoshe, kuwo emagumbi lamane emhlaba.
19.17: Yebo, futsi wonkhe umhlaba uyawuyibona insindziso yeNkhosi, kusho umphrofethi; tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi kanye nebantfu bayawubusiswa.
19.18: Mine, Nefi, ngibabhalele leti tintfo bantfu bami, kute mhlawumbe ngibente bakholwe kute bayikhumbule iNkhosi uMhlengi wabo.
19.19: Ngaloko-ke, ngikhuluma kuyo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli, uma kungukutsi batotitfola leti tintfo.
19.20: Ngoba buka, nginemizwa lecinile emoyeni, lengenta ngibe nekukhatsateka kangangoba onkhe emalunga ami abutsakatsaka, ngalabo labaseJerusalema; ngoba kube iNkhosi ayikabi nesihawu, kungikhombisa mayelana nabo, njengoba yenta kubaphrofethi basendvulo, ngabe nami bengitobhubha futsi.
19.21: Futsi ngempela yababonisa baphrofethi basendvulo tonkhe tintfo mayelana nabo; futsi ngalokunjalo yababonisa labaningi mayelana natsi; ngaloko-ke, kufanele kutsi sati mayelana nabo ngoba tibhaliwe kubo bongcwengcwe belitfusi.
19.22: Manje kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngabafundzisa bomnaketfu leti tintfo; futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabafundzela tintfo letiningi, letaticoshwe kubo bongcwengcwe belitfusi, kute bati mayelana netento teNkhosi kulamanye emave, emkhatsini webantfu basendvulo.
19.23: Futsi ngabafundzela tintfo letiningi letatibhalwe etincwadzini taMosi; kodvwa kute ngibente bakholwe ngalokugcwele kutsi bakholwe kuyo iNkhosi uMhlengi wabo ngabafundzela naloko lokwakubhalwe ngumphrofethi Isaya; ngoba ngayibhekisa kitsi yonkhe imibhalo lengcwele, kute ibe lusito kitsi futsi isifundzise.
19.24: Ngaloko-ke ngakhuluma nabo, ngatsi: Vanini emavi emphrofethi, nine leniyinsali yendlu yaka-Israyeli, leniligala lelihleshuliwe; vanini emavi emphrofethi, lawabhalela yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi niwabhekise kini, kute nibe nelitsemba njengabo bomnakenu lenihleshulwe kubo; ngoba umphrofethi ubhale ngalendlela.

20.1: Lalelani futsi nive loku, Awu yindlu yaJakobe, lenibitwa ngeligama la-Israyeli, futsi leniphuma emantini akaJuda, noma emantini embhabhatiso, lenifunga ngeligama leNkhosi, futsi lenibita Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, kepha abafungi ngeliciniso nangekulunga.
20.2: Noko, batibita ngekutsi batakhamiti tasedolobheni lelingcwele, kodvwa abahlali kuye Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, loyiNkhosi yemaBandla; yebo, iNkhosi yemaBandla libito lakhe.
20.3: Bukani, ngitimemetele tintfo takucala kusukela ekucaleni; futsi taphuma emlonyeni wami, futsi ngatibonakalisa. Ngatibonakalisa masinyane.
20.4: Ngakwenta loku ngoba bengati kutsi unenkhani, futsi nentsamo yakho ingumsipha wensimbi, nelibunti lakho lilitfusi;
20.5: Futsi kusukela ekucaleni ngatimemetela kuwe; ngaphambi kwekutsi tenteke leti tintfo ngatibonakalisa kuwe; futsi ngatibonakalisa ngekwesaba hleze utsi—Sithico sami sitentile letintfo, kanye nesitfombe sami lesibatiwe, futsi nesitfombe sami lesibunjiwe sibayaletile.
20.6: Ukubonile futsi wakuva konkhe loku; futsi ngabe awutukumemetela na? Futsi nekutsi ngikubonisile tintfo letinsha kusukela kulesi sikhatsi, netintfo letifihlekile, futsi bewungatati.
20.7: Tidaliwe manje, hhayi kusukela ekucaleni, nangaphambi kwelusuku lowungativanga ngalo tamenyetelwa kuwe, hleze utsi—Buka bengitati.
20.8: Yebo, futsi awutivanga; yebo, awatanga; yebo, kusukela kuleso sikhatsi indlebe yakho yayingavulwanga; ngoba bengati kutsi utotiphatsa ngenkhohliso, futsi wabitwa ngalophambukako kusukela esibeletfweni.
20.9: Noko, ngenca yeligama lami ngitawuyihocisa intfukutselo yami, futsi ngenca yeludvumo lwami ngitawutibamba kuta kuwe, kute ngingakubulali.
20.10: Ngoba, buka, ngikucwengisisile, ngikukhetsile esitsandvweni setinhlupheko.
20.11: Ngenca yami, yebo, ngenca yami ngitawukwenta loku, ngoba angitukuvuma kutsi ligama lami lingcoliswe, futsi angitukuyinika lomunye inkhatimulo yami.
20.12: Lalela mine, Awu Jakobe, futsi na-Israyeli lababitiwe bami, ngoba nginguye; nginguwekucala, futsi nginguwekugcina.
20.13: Sandla sami ngetulu kwaloko sisibekile sisekelo semhlaba, futsi nesandla sami sangesekudla siwendlalile emazulu. Ngiyawabita futsi eme ndzawonye.
20.14: Nine nonkhe, butsanani, futsi nilalele; ngubani emkhatsini wabo lomemetela leti tintfo kubo na? INkhosi imtsandzile; yebo, futsi itawulifeza livi layo lelimemetele ngabo; futsi itawukwenta intsandvo yayo ngeBhabhulona, futsi umkhono wayo uyawuba etikwemaKhaledi.
20.15: Ngetulu kwaloko, kusho iNkhosi; mine Nkhosi, yebo, ngikhulumile; yebo, ngimbitile kutsi amemetele, ngimletsile, futsi uyawukwenta indlela yakhe iphumelele.
20.16: Sondzelani edvute nami; angikakhulumi ekusitsekeni; kusukela ekucaleni, kusukela ngesikhatsi kwamenyetelwa ngikhulumile; futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, kanye naMoya wayo, ingitfumile.
20.17: Futsi naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, uMhlengi wakho, loNgcwele wa-Israyeli; ngimtfumile, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho lokufundzisa kutsi usitakale, lokuhola endleleni lokumele uhambe ngayo, ngikwentile loko.
20.18: Awu kube wawuyilalele imiyaleto yami—kube bekunjalo kuthula kwakho bekuyokuba njengemfula, futsi nekulunga kwakho njengemagagasi elwandle.
20.19: Nentalelwane yakho ngetulu kwaloko beyiyokuba njengesihlabatsi; nebantfwana betibilini takho njengematjana elwandle; libito lakhe ngabe alicishwanga noma lisuswe phambi kwami.
20.20: Phumani eBhabhulona, balekelani emaKhaledi, ngelivi lekuhlabelela kumemeteleni, shanoni loku, kukhulumeni nasemkhawulweni wemhlaba; shanoni nitsi: INkhosi iyihlengile inceku yayo Jakobe.
20.21: Futsi abatange boma; wabahola elugwadvuleni; wenta emanti kutsi abagobhotele aphume edvwaleni; ngetulu kwaloko wacheketa lidvwala futsi emanti ampompota aphuma kulo.
20.22: Futsi noma asakwentile konkhe loku, kanye nalokukhulu futsi, kute kuthula kulababi, kusho iNkhosi.

21.1: Ngetulu kwaloko futsi: Lalelani, Awu ninendlu yaka-Israyeli, nonkhe nine lenehlukanisiwe futsi nakhishwa ngenca yebubi bebelusi bebantfu bami; yebo, nonkhe nine lenehlukanisiwe nasakatwa ndzawotonkhe, nine lenibantfu bami, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli. Ngilaleleni, Awu tichingi, futsi lalelani nine bantfu labakhashane; iNkhosi ingibite esibeletfweni; etibilinini tamake yenta kutsi libito lami likhunjulwe.
21.2: Futsi yente umlomo wami waba njengenkemba leloliwe; emtfuntini wesandla sayo ingitfukusile, futsi yangenta umcibisholo lololongiwe; emgodleni wayo ingitfukusile;
21.3: Futsi yatsi kimi: Uyinceku yami, Awu Israyeli, ngawe ngitawudvunyiswa.
21.4: Emvakwaloko ngatsi, ngikhandlekele lite, ngicitse emandla ami ngelite nalokungenalutfo; ngempela kwehlulelwa kwami kuseNkhosini, futsi nemsebenti wami ukuNkulunkulu wami.
21.5: Manje, itsi iNkhosi—leyangibumba kusukela esibeletfweni kutsi ngibe yinceku yayo, kute ngibuyisele Jakobe futsi kuyo—noma Israyeli angakagcogcwa, noko ngiyawuba nenkhatimulo lenkhulu emehlweni eNkhosi, futsi Nkulunkulu wami uyawuba ngemandla ami.
21.6: Futsi yatsi: Kuyintfo lelula kutsi ube yinceku yami kute uvuse tivana takaJakobe, futsi ubuyisele labasele baka-Israyeli. Ngetulu kwaloko ngitawukubeka ube kukhanya kubeTive, kute ube yinsindziso yami kute kube semikhawulweni yemhlaba.
21.7: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, uMhlengi waka-Israyeli, loNgcwele wakhe, lodzelelwa ngumuntfu, losinengiso etiveni, kuyo inceku yebabusi: Emakhosi ayawubona futsi aphakame, tikhulu nato tiyawukhotsama, ngenca yeNkhosi leyetsembekile.
21.8: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Ngesikhatsi lesivumelekile nginivile, Awu tichingi telwandle, futsi ngelusuku lwensindziso nginisitile; futsi ngitawunilondvolota, ngininike inceku yami njengesivumelwano sebantfu, kumisa umhlaba, kubenta badle emafa lacitsekile
21.9: Kute utsi kulababoshiwe: Phumani; nakubo labo labahleti ebumnyameni: Tiveteni. Bayawutondla basetindleleni, futsi emadlelo abo ayawukuba kuto tonkhe tindzawo letiphakeme.
21.10: Angeke balambe noma bome, futsi kushisa nelilanga angeke kubashaye; ngoba loyo lonemusa kubo uyawubahola, uyawubacondzisa nasemitfonjeni yemanti.
21.11: Futsi ngitawutenta tonkhe tintsaba tami tibe tindlela, futsi nemigwaco yami lemikhulu iyawuphakanyiswa.
21.12: Futsi emvakwaloko, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli, buka, laba bayawukuta bavela khashane; futsi buka, laba bayawuphuma enyakatfo kanye nasenshonalanga; kutsi laba bayawuphuma eveni laseSinimu.
21.13: Hlabelani, Awu mazulu; futsi nitfokote, Awu mhlaba; ngoba tinyawo talabo labasemphumalanga tiyawumiswa; futsi nihlokome ngekuhlabelela, Awu tintsaba; ngoba abayukushaywa nanini; ngoba iNkhosi ibadvudvutile bantfu bayo, futsi itawuba nemusa kulabahluphekile bayo.
21.14: Kodvwa, buka, iSiyoni yatsi: INkhosi ingishiyile, futsi iNkhosi yami ingikhohliwe—kodvwa itawukhombisa kutsi ayikakhohlwa.
21.15: Ngoba wesifazane angamkhohlwa yini umntfwana wakhe lomunyako, kutsi angabi nebubele kuyo indvodzana yesibeletfo sakhe na? Yebo, bangakhohlwa, kodvwa mine angitukukhohlwa nguwe, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli.
21.16: Buka, ngikucophe entsendzeni yetandla tami; tibondza takho tisembikwami njalo.
21.17: Bantfwana bakho bayawushesha ngalokumelene nalabo labakucitsako, futsi nalabo labakwenta lite bayawuphuma kuwe.
21.18: Phakamisa emehlo akho ucalate ndzawo tonkhe futsi ubuke; bonkhe laba labagcogcene ndzawonye, futsi bayawukuta kuwe. Futsi njengoba ngiphila, kusho iNkhosi, impela uyakubembatsa bonkhe, njengemhlobiso, futsi utibophe ngabo njengamakoti.
21.19: Ngoba tindzawo takho letingenalutfo naletilihlane, kanye nelive lakho lembubhiso, liyawuba lincane kakhulu manje ngenca yesizatfu salabakhile kulo; futsi nalabo labakonako bayawuba khashane.
21.20: Bantfwana loyawukuba nabo, emvakwekutsi sowulahlekelwe bekucala, bayawuphindza batsi etindlebeni takho: Lendzawo ingumntjuntju kakhulu kimi; ngiphe indzawo kute ngihlale.
21.21: Ngaleso sikhatsi uyotsi enhlitiyweni yakho: Ngubani longitalele laba, loku mine ngalahlekelwa bantfwana bami, futsi anginantalo, ngingumtfunjwa, futsi ngingulozulazulako na? Ngubani lokhulise laba na? Buka, mine ngasala ngingedvwa vo; laba, bebakuphi na?
21.22: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Buka, ngitawuphakamisa sandla sami kubo beTive, futsi ngimise sibonakaliso sami kubantfu; futsi bayawuletsa emadvodzana akho etandleni tabo, futsi emadvodzakati akho bayawuwatfwala emahlombe abo.
21.23: Futsi emakhosi ayawuba boyihlo labakondlako, futsi nemakhosikati abo bomake bakho labakondlako; bayawukukhotsamela buso babo bubheke phansi, futsi bakhotse lutfuli lwetinyawo takho; futsi uyawukwati kutsi mine ngiyiNkhosi; ngoba abayukujabha labangilindzako.
21.24: Ngoba iyawususwa yini imphango kubo labanemandla, noma labatfunjwe ngekwemtsetfo bakhululwe na?
21.25: Kodvwa naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, nalabatfunjwa balabo labanemandla bayawususwa, futsi nemphango yalabo labesabekako iyawukhululwa; ngoba ngitawuphikisana naye loyo lophikisana nawe, futsi ngitawubasindzisa bantfwana bakho.
21.26: Futsi ngitawubadlisa ngenyama yabo labo labakucindzetelako; bayawudzakwa yingati yabo lucobo njengeliwayini lelinongotelako; futsi wonkhe muntfu uyawukwati kutsi mine, Nkhosi, nginguMsindzisi wakho kanye neMhlengi wakho, loneMandla waJakobe.

22.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Nefi, sengitifundzile leti tintfo lebeticoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi, bomnaketfu beta kimi futsi batsi: Tisho kutsini leti tintfo lebewutifundza na? Buka, ngabe kufanele ticondvwe njengetintfo takamoya, letiyawukwenteka ngekwakamoya hhayi ngekwasenyameni na?
22.2: Futsi mine, Nefi, ngatsi kubo: Bukani tabonakaliswa kumphrofethi ngelivi laMoya; ngoba ngaMoya tonkhe tintfo tembulwa kubo baphrofethi, letiyawufika kubo bantfwana bebantfu ngekwasenyameni.
22.3: Ngaloko-ke, tintfo lengitifundzile tintfo letiphatselene netintfo tesikhashana kanye netakamoya; ngoba kubukeka shengatsi indlu yaka-Israyeli, kungekudzala, itawuhlakatwa ebusweni bemhlaba wonkhe, futsi ngalokunjalo nasemkhatsini wetive tonkhe.
22.4: Futsi bukani, kukhona labaningi lasebavele balahlekile elwatini lwalabo labaseJerusalema. Yebo, incenye lenkhulu yetivana tonkhe seyiholelwe kudze; futsi tisakatwe lena nalena etichingini telwandle; futsi kutsi tikuphi kute namunye wetfu lowatiko, ngaphandle kwekutsi siyati kutsi baholelwa kudze.
22.5: Futsi njengoba baholelwe kudze, leti tintfo tiphrofethiwe mayelana nabo, futsi ngalokunjalo mayelana nabo bonkhe labo labayawusakatwa futsi bahlaziswe, ngenca yaloNgcwele wa-Israyeli; ngoba batawuticinisa tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene naye; ngaloko-ke, bayawusakatwa emkhatsini wetive tonkhe futsi bayawutondwa ngibo bonkhe bantfu.
22.6: Noko, emvakwekutsi sebondliwe beTive, futsi neNkhosi seyisiphakamisile sandla etikwebeTive futsi yabamisa njengesibonakaliso, nebantfwana babo sebabagonile emikhonweni yabo, kanye nemadvodzakati abo bawetfwala emahlombe abo, bukani leti tintfo lekukhulunywa ngato tesikhashana; ngoba tinjalo tivumelwano teNkhosi nabobabe betfu; futsi kushiwo kitsi etinsukwini letitako, futsi ngalokunjalo nakubo bonkhe bomnaketfu lababendlu yaka-Israyeli.
22.7: Futsi kusho kutsi sikhatsi siyeta lapho emvakwekube yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli seyihlakatiwe futsi yahlaziswa, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawuvusa tive letinemandla emkhatsini webeTive, yebo, nasetikwebuso balo lelive; futsi ngato intalelwane iyawusakatwa.
22.8: Futsi emvakwekutsi intalelwane yetfu seyihlakatiwe iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawuchubeka nekwenta umsebenti lomangalisako emkhatsini webeTive, loyawukuba ligugu lelikhulu kuyo intalelwane yetfu; ngaloko-ke, kufaniswa nekondliwa kwabo beTive kanye nekugonwa emikhonweni yabo kanye nekwetfwalwa emahlombe abo.
22.9: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kuyawuba ligugu kubeTive; futsi hhayi kuphela-nje kubeTive kodvwa kuyo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli, ekwatiseni ngetivumelwano taBabe wasezulwini ku-Abrahama, atsi: Kuyo intalelwane yakho yonkhe imindeni yemhlaba iyawubusiswa.
22.10: Futsi ngifuna, bomnaketfu, kutsi nati kutsi yonkhe imindeni yemhlaba ayinakubusiswa ngaphandle kwekutsi yembule umkhono wakhe emehlweni etive.
22.11: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawuchubeka yembule umkhono wayo emehlweni ato tonkhe tive, ekuletseni tivumelwano tayo kanye nelivangeli layo kulabo lababendlu yaka-Israyeli.
22.12: Ngaloko-ke, itawuphindza ibakhiphe ebugcilini, futsi bayawugcogcana ndzawonye emaveni langemafa abo; futsi bayawukhishwa ekusitsekeni nasebumnyameni; futsi bayawukwati kutsi iNkhosi inguMsindzisi wabo kanye neMhlengi wabo, loneMandla wa-Israyeli.
22.13: Futsi ingati yalelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, leliyingwadla yemhlaba wonkhe, liyawuphendvukela tinhloko tabo; ngoba bayawukulwa bodvwa, futsi inkemba yetandla tabo lucobo iyawuwela etikwetinhloko tabo; futsi bayawudzakwa yingati yabo.
22.14: Futsi tive tonkhe letiyawukulwa nawe, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli, tiyawuphendvukelana todvwa, futsi tiyawuwela kuwo lowo mgodzi letawumbela kutsiya bantfu beNkhosi. Futsi bonkhe labo labalwa neSiyoni bayawubhujiswa, futsi naleyo ngwadla lenkhulu, legucule tindlela leticondzile teNkhosi, yebo, lelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, liyawuwela elutfulini futsi kuyawuba kukhulu kuwa kwalo.
22.15: Ngoba buka, kusho umphrofethi, sikhatsi siyeta masinyane lapho Sathane angasayukuba nemandla ngetulu kwetinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu; ngoba lusuku luyeta masinyane lapho bonkhe labatichenyako kanye nalabo labenta bubi bayawuba njengetinhlanga; futsi lusuku luyeta lwekutsi bashiswe.
22.16: Ngoba sikhatsi siyeta masinyane lapho intfukutselo legcwele yaNkulunkulu iyawutfululwa etikwabo bonkhe bantfwana bebantfu; ngoba akatuvumela kutsi lababi babhubhise labalungile.
22.17: Ngaloko-ke, utawubalondvolota labalungile ngemandla akhe, noma ngabe kungukutsi intfukutselo yakhe legcwele kufanele ifike, futsi labalungile balondvolotwe, kangangoba kubhujiswa titsa tabo ngemlilo. Ngaloko-ke, labalungile akukameli besabe; ngoba usho kanje umphrofethi, bayawusindziswa, noma ngabe kungaba ngemlilo.
22.18: Bukani, bomnaketfu, ngitsi kini, leti tintfo kufanele tenteke masinyane; yebo, ingati, kanye nemlilo, kanye nesimoko sentfutfu kufanele kufike; futsi kufanele kube sebusweni balomhlaba; futsi kuta kubantfu ngekwasenyameni uma kungukutsi batawutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo kuye loNgcwele wa-Israyeli.
22.19: Ngoba bukani, labalungile abayukubhubha; ngoba sikhatsi ngempela kufanele sifike sekutsi bonkhe labo labalwa neSiyoni bahlukaniswa naNkulunkulu.
22.20: Futsi ngempela iNkhosi itawuyilungisa indlela yebantfu bayo, ekugcwaliseni emavi aMosi, lawakhuluma, atsi: Umphrofethi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu iyawumvusa kini, lonjengami; niyawumlalela kuto tonkhe tintfo layawutisho kini. Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi bonkhe labo labangatumuva loyo mphrofethi bayawuhlukaniswa emkhatsini webantfu.
22.21: Manje mine, Nefi, ngiyamemetela kini, kutsi lomphrofethi Mosi lakhuluma ngaye kwakunguye loNgcwele wa-Israyeli; ngaloko-ke, uyawukwehlulela ngekulunga.
22.22: Futsi labalungile akukameli besabe, ngoba ngibo labo labangayukubhujiswa. Kodvwa ngumbuso wadeveli loyawukwakhiwa emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, loyo mbuso loyomiswa emkhatsini wabo labo labasenyameni—
22.23: Ngoba sikhatsi siyawusheshe sifike kutsi onkhe emabandla lakhelwe kutfola inzuzo, kanye nawo onkhe lawo lakhelwe kutfola emandla ngetulu kwenyama, kanye nalawo lakhelwe kutfola ludvumo emehlweni emhlaba, kanye nalabo labafuna inkhanuko yenyama kanye netintfo temhlaba, kanye nekwenta tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi; yebo, kwephetsa, bonkhe labo lababembuso wadeveli ngibo lekumele besabe, futsi bachachatele, futsi batfutfumele; ngibo labo lekufanele behliselwe phansi elutfulini; ngibo labo lekufanele bashiswe njengetinhlanga; futsi loku kungekwemavi emphrofethi.
22.24: Futsi sikhatsi siyawufika masinyane lapho labalungile kufanele baholwe njengemankhonyane esisingeni, futsi longcwele wa-Israyeli kufanele abuse ngekuphatsa, ngebukhulu nangemandla, kanye nangenkhatimulo lenkhulu.
22.25: Futsi ugcogca bantfwana bakhe kumagumbi lamane emhlaba; futsi uyatibala timvu takhe, futsi tiyamati; futsi kuyawuba nemhlambi lowodvwa nemelusi loyedvwa; futsi uyawutondla timvu takhe, futsi kuye tiyawutfola lidlelo.
22.26: Futsi ngenca yekulunga kwebantfu bakhe, Sathane akanamandla; ngaloko-ke, akanakukhululwa sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi; ngoba akanamandla etinhlitiyweni tebantfu, ngoba bahleti ngekulunga, futsi loNgcwele wa-Israyeli uyabusa.
22.27: Manje bukani, mine, Nefi, ngitsi kini tonkhe leti tintfo kufanele tenteke ngekwasenyameni.
22.28: Kodvwa, bukani, tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nebantfu bayawuhlala ngekuphepha kuye loNgcwele wa-Israyeli uma kungukutsi batawuphendvuka.
22.29: Manje mine, Nefi, ngiyaphela lapha; ngoba anginawukulokotsa ngichubeke ngikhulume mayelana naleti tintfo.
22.30: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu, ngifisa kutsi nizindle ngekutsi leti tintfo letibhalwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi tiliciniso; futsi tifakaza ngekutsi umuntfu kufanele ahloniphe imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
22.31: Ngaloko-ke, akukameli nicabange kutsi mine nababe ngitsi kuphela lesifakazile, futsi ngetulu kwaloko lesifundzise ngato. Ngaloko-ke, uma niyawuyihlonipha imiyaleto, futsi nibeketele kute kube sekugcineni, niyawusindziswa ngelusuku lwekugcina. Futsi kunjalo nje. Amen.

1.intro: Umlandvo ngekufa kwaLehi. BomnakaboNefi bayamvukela. INkhosi icwayisa Nefi kutsi esuke aye ehlane. Luhambo lwakhe ehlane, njalonjalo.
1.1: Futsi manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Nefi, sengicedzile kufundzisa bomnaketfu, babe, Lehi, naye wakhuluma tintfo letiningi kubo, futsi wabalandzisa, kutsi tinkhulu kangakanani tintfo iNkhosi leyibentele tona ngekubakhipha eveni laseJerusalema.
1.2: Futsi wakhuluma nabo mayelana nekumvukela kwabo emantini, kanye nangesihawu saNkulunkulu ekusindziseni timphilo tabo, kutsi bangagwinywa lwandle.
1.3: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko wakhuluma nabo mayelana nelive lesetsembiso, labebalitfolile—nekutsi sasingakanani sihawu seNkhosi ekusicwayiseni kutsi sibaleke siphume eveni laseJerusalema.
1.4: Ngoba, watsi, bukani, ngibone umbono, ngawo ngiyati kutsi iJerusalema ibhujisiwe; futsi kube sahlala eJerusalema ngabe natsi ngalokunjalo sibhubhile.
1.5: Kodvwa, watsi, nanoma kungenca yetinhlupheko tetfu, silitfolile live lesetsembiso, live lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave; live iNkhosi Nkulunkulu leyente sivumelwano ngalo nami kutsi kuyawuba live lelilifa lentalelwane yami. Yebo, iNkhosi yente sivumelwano ngalelive kimi, kanye nakubantfwana bami ingunaphakadze, futsi ngalokunjalo nakubo bonkhe labo labayawuholwa baphume kulamanye emave ngesandla seNkhosi.
1.6: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Lehi, ngiphrofetha ngekwemisebenti yaMoya lokimi, kutsi kute namunye loyawukuta kulelive ngaphandle kwekutsi aletfwe ngesandla seNkhosi.
1.7: Ngaloko-ke, lelive lingcweliselwe loyo leyawumletsa. Futsi uma kungukutsi bayawuyisebentela njengekwemiyaleto leyiniketile, kuyawuba live lenkhululeko kubo; ngaloko-ke abayuke nanini babuyiselwe phansi ekutfunjweni; uma kunjalo, kuyawuba kungenca yebubi; ngoba uma bubi bandza liyawucalekiswa live ngenca yabo, kodvwa kulabalungile liyawubusiswa ingunaphakadze.
1.8: Futsi bukani, kukuhlakanipha kutsi lelive kumele lifihlwe kwanyalo kutsi latiwe nguletinye tive; ngoba bukani, letiningi tive tiyoligcwalisa lelive, kangangoba angeke kusaba khona indzawo letoba lifa.
1.9: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Lehi, ngitfole setsembiso, sekutsi kangangoba labo iNkhosi Nkulunkulu leyawubakhipha eveni laseJerusalema bayawuyigcina imiyaleto yayo; bayawuphumelela kulo lonkhe lelive futsi bayawugcinwa kuto tonkhe tive, kute batfole lelive libe ngelabo. Futsi uma kungukutsi bayawuyigcina imiyaleto yayo bayawubusiswa kulo lonkhe lelive, futsi kuyoba bete namunye loyawubahlupha, noma atsatse lelive labo lelilifa; futsi bayawuhlala ngekuphepha ingunaphakadze.
1.10: Kodvwa bukani, uma sikhatsi sifika sekutsi bancishelwe kukholwa, emvakwekutsi sebamukele tibusiso letinkhulu kangaka esandleni seNkhosi—sebanelwati lekudalwa kwemhlaba; nabo bonkhe bantfu, bati imisebenti lemikhulu nalemangalisako yeNkhosi kusukela ekudalweni kwemhlaba; banemandla labaniketwe wona kwenta tonkhe tintfo ngelukholo; banayo yonkhe imiyaleto kusukela ekucaleni, futsi baletfwe ngebuhle bakhe lobungapheli kulelive leliligugu lesetsembiso—bukani, ngitsi, uma lusuku luyawufika lwekutsi bamlahle loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, Mesiya weliciniso, uMhlengi wabo kanye naNkulunkulu wabo, bukani, tehlulelo takhe loyo lolungile tiyawukuba etikwabo.
1.11: Yebo, utawuletsa letinye tive kubo, futsi atawutinika emandla, atsatse tindzawo kubo letingetabo, futsi utawukwenta kutsi bahlakatwe baphindze bashaywe.
1.12: Yebo, ngesikhatsi situkulwane sinye sindlulela kulesinye kuyawuba nekucitseka kwengati, kanye nekuhanjelwa lokukhulu emkhatsini wabo; ngaloko-ke madvodzana ami, ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule; yebo, ngifuna kutsi niwalalele emavi ami.
1.13: Awu shengatsi beningavuka; nivuke ebutfongweni lobukhulu, nasebutfongweni besihogo, futsi nivutfute tinketane letimbi leniboshwe ngato, lokutinketane labopha bantfwana bebantfu, kangangoba bayiswa kudze ekutfunjweni entasi emhosheni waphakadze wetinhlupheko nelusizi.
1.14: Vukani! nisukume ulutfulini, nive emavi emtali lochachatelako, lo emalunga akhe nifanele kuwabeka phansi masinyane kulelibandzako kanye nalelithulile lithuna, lapho sihambi singenokwati kubuya; sekutinsuku nje letimbalwa bese ngihamba ngendlela yawo wonkhe umhlaba.
1.15: Kodvwa bukani, inkhosi iwuhlengile umphefumulo wami esihogweni; ngiyibonile inkhatimulo yayo, futsi ngitungeletwe ingunaphakadze yimikhono yelutsandvo lwayo.
1.16: Futsi ngifisa kutsi nikhumbule kugcina imitsetfo kanye netehlulelo teNkhosi; bukani, loku seloku kwaba kukhatsateka kwemphefumulo wami kusukela ekucaleni.
1.17: Inhlitiyo yami ishone phansi ngenca yekudzabuka tikhatsi netikhatsi, ngoba bengesaba, hleze ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tenu iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu ite ngelulaka lolukhulu etikwenu, kutsi nisuswe futsi nibhujiswe ingunaphakadze.
1.18: Noma, kutsi sicalekiso site etikwenu esikhatsini setitukulwane letiningi, futsi nivakashelwe ngenkemba, kanye nangendlala, nitondvwe, niphindze niholwe ngekwesifiso kanye nekutfunjwa ngudeveli.
1.19: Awu madvodzana ami, kwangatsi leti tintfo betingete teta etikwenu, kodvwa nibe bantfu labakhetsiwe kanye nalabatsandziwe beNkhosi. Kodvwa bukani, intsandvo yayo ayentiwe; ngoba tindlela tayo tilungile ingunaphakadze.
1.20: Futsi itse: Kangangoba niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuphumelela eveni; kodvwa kangangoba ningetuyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuhlukaniswa phambi kwami.
1.21: Manje kute umphefumulo wami ube nekutfokota kini, futsi nekutsi inhlitiyo yami iwushiye lomhlaba ngenjabulo ngenca yenu, nekutsi ningangibeki phansi ngelusizi kanye nekudzabuka ethuneni, sukumani elutfulini, madvodzana ami, nibe ngemadvodza, niphokophele kuba mcondvomunye kanye nekuba nhlitiyoyinye, nihlangane kuto tonkhe tintfo, kute ningehleli phansi ekutfunjweni;
1.22: Kute ningacalekiswa ngesicalekiso lesibuhlungu; futsi ngetulu kwaloko, nekutsi ningatehliseli kungatfokoti kwaNkulunkulu lolungile etikwenu, niye ekubhujisweni, yebo, kubhujiswa kwangunaphakadze kwemphefumulo kanye nekwemtimba.
1.23: Vukani, madvodzana ami; gcokani sikhali sekulunga. Vutfutani tinketane leniboshwe ngato, niphume ekusitsekeni, futsi nisukume elutfulini.
1.24: Ningabe nisamvukela umnakenu nanini, imibono yakhe lebeyimihle kakhulu, futsi loyigcinile imiyaleto yami ngesikhatsi sisasuka eJerusalema; futsi lobe lithulusi etandleni taNkulunkulu, ekusiletseni eveni lesetsembiso; ngoba kube bekungasingaye, bekufanele sibhujiswe yindlala ehlane; noko, netama kutsatsa imphilo yakhe; yebo, futsi weva buhlungu lobukhulu ngenca yenu.
1.25: Futsi ngiyesaba ngiphindze ngiyatfutfumela kakhulu ngenca yenu, hleze eve buhlungu futsi; ngoba bukani, nimbeke licala lekutsi ufuna emandla kanye neligunya ngetulu kwenu; kodvwa ngiyati kutsi akate afune emandla neligunya ngetulu kwenu, kodvwa ufune inkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu, kanye nenhlalakahle yenu lucobo yaphakadze.
1.26: Futsi nivungamile ngenca yekutsi ukhulume ngalokucacile kini. Nitsi usebentise emavi lacinile; nitsi unitfukutselele, kodvwa bukani, kucina kwemavi akhe kwakukucina kwemandla elivi laNkulunkulu, lelalikuye; futsi loko nine lenikubita ngentfukutselo kwakuliciniso, njengalelo lelikuNkulunkulu, lebekanganolivimba, abonakalisa ngesibindzi mayelana nekungalungi kwenu.
1.27: Futsi kufanele kutsi emandla aNkulunkulu abe naye, nasekuniyaleni kutsi nilalele. Kodvwa bukani, kwakungasiye, kodvwa kwakunguMoya weNkhosi lowawukuye, lowavula umlomo wakhe kutsi akhulume kangangoba akakwatanga nekuwuvala.
1.28: Manje ndvodzana yami, Lamani, futsi nawe Lemuweli kanye naSemu, futsi nani madvodzana ami leningemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli, bukani, uma nitawulalela livi laNefi aniyukubhubha. Futsi uma nitawumlalela ngishiya kini sibusiso, yebo, sibusiso sami sekucala.
1.29: Kodvwa uma ningetumlalela ngiyasitsatsa sibusiso sami sekucala, yebo, nesibusiso sami, futsi siyawuba etikwakhe.
1.30: Futsi manje, Zoramu, sengikhuluma kuwe: Buka, uyinceku yaLabani; noko, ukhishwe eveni laseJerusalema, futsi ngiyati kutsi ungumngani weliciniso wendvodzana yami, Nefi, ingunaphakadze.
1.31: Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yekutsi bewetsembekile intalelwane yakho iyawubusiswa kanye nentalelwane yakhe, kutsi bahlale emphumelelweni sikhatsi lesidze kulo lonkhe lelive; futsi kube bete lutfo, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube bubi emkhatsini wabo, lobuyawulimata noma buphatamise kuphumelela kwabo kulo lonkhe lelive ingunaphakadze.
1.32: Ngaloko-ke, uma niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yeNkhosi, iNkhosi ilingcwelisile lelive kute kuvikeleke intalelwane yenu kanye nentalelwane yendvodzana yami.

2.1: Manje, Jakobe, sengikhuluma nawe: Wena ulitubulo lami etinsukwini telusizi lwami ehlane. Futsi buka, ebuntfwaneni bakho utivile tinhlupheko kanye nelusizi lolukhulu, ngenca yeludlame lwabomnakenu.
2.2: Noko, Jakobe, tubulo lami lasehlane, wena uyabati bukhulu baNkulunkulu; futsi uyawutingcwelisa tinhlupheko takho kute kube yinzuzo kuwe.
2.3: Ngaloko-ke, umphefumulo wakho uyawubusiswa, futsi uyawuhlala ngekuphepha nemnakenu, Nefi; futsi tinsuku takho uyawuticitsa ngekwenta umsebenti waNkulunkulu wakho. Ngaloko-ke, ngiyati kutsi uhlengiwe, ngenca yekulunga kweMhlengi wakho; ngoba ubonile kutsi ngekuphelela kwesikhatsi uyofika aletse insindziso kubantfu.
2.4: Futsi uyibonile ebusheni bakho inkhatimulo yakhe; ngaloko-ke, ubusisiwe njengabo labo layawubafundzisa asesenyameni; ngoba Moya uyafana, itolo, namuhla, naphakadze. Futsi indlela ilungisiwe kusukela ekuweni kwemuntfu, futsi insindziso imahhala.
2.5: Futsi bantfu bayafundziswa ngalokwanele kute bati lokuhle nalokubi. Futsi umtsetfo uniketiwe kubantfu. Futsi ngemtsetfo ayikho inyama lengenacala; noma, ngemtsetfo bantfu bayasuswa. Yebo, ngemtsetfo wesikhashana besuswa; futsi ngetulu kwaloko, ngemtsetfo wamoya bayalahleka kuloko lokuhle, futsi bahlupheke ingunaphakadze.
2.6: Ngaloko-ke, kuhlengwa kuta ngaMesiya loNgcwele; ngoba ugcwele umusa neliciniso.
2.7: Buka, utinikele kute abe ngumhlatjelo wesono, kwenelisa tinhloso temtsetfo, kubo bonkhe labo labanenhlitiyo ledzabukile kanye nemoya lophukile; futsi kute namunye lomunye lokungatsi ngaye tinhloso temtsetfo teneliseke.
2.8: Ngaloko-ke, kubaluleke kangakanani kwatisa ngaleti tintfo kubantfu basemhlabeni, kute bati kutsi kute inyama lengahlala ebukhoneni baNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwetento letinhle, nemusa, kanye nesihawu saMesiya loNgcwele, lobeka phansi imphilo yakhe ngekwasenyameni, aphindze ayitsatse ngemandla aMoya, kute afeze kuvuka kwalabafile, abe wekucala loyawuvuka.
2.9: Ngaloko-ke, wekucala kuNkulunkulu, kangangoba ayawuncengela bonkhe bantfwana bebantfu; futsi labo labakholwa kuye bayawusindziswa.
2.10: Futsi ngenca yekubancengela bonkhe, bonkhe bantfu beta kuNkulunkulu; ngaloko-ke, bema embikwakwe, kute bahlulelwe nguye ngekweliciniso kanye nangebungcwele lobukuye. Ngaloko-ke, tinhloso temtsetfo letiniketwe nguloNgcwele, tigcwalisa sijeziso lesibekiwe, sijeziso lesibekiwe lesiphikisana nenjabulo lebekiwe, kute kugcwaliseke tinhloso tenhlawulo—
2.11: Ngoba kufanele, kutsi kube khona kuphikisana etintfweni tonkhe. Uma kungenjalo, tubulo lami ehlane, kulunga akunawugcwaliseka, nebubi, nebungcwele noma lusizi, ngalokunjalo nalokuhle noma lokubi. Ngaloko-ke, tonkhe tintfo kufanele tibe yinhlanganisela leyodvwa; ngaloko-ke, uma tingaba ngumtimba lowodvwa kuyodzingeka tihlale njengaletifile, tingenamphilo nekufa, noma kubola noma kungaboli, kujabula noma lusizi, ngalokunjalo nemizwa noma kungabi nemizwa.
2.12: Ngaloko-ke, kwakutoba kutsi tidalwe ngentfo lelite; ngaloko-ke kwakutoba bete injongo kuyo inhloso yekudalwa kwato. Ngaloko-ke, lentfo beyiyoshabalalisa kuhlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu kanye netinhloso takhe taphakadze, futsi ngalokunjalo nemandla, nemusa, kanye nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu.
2.13: Futsi uma niyawutsi kute umtsetfo, ngalokunjalo niyawutsi kute sono. Uma niyawutsi kute sono, ngalokunjalo niyawutsi kute kulunga. Futsi uma kute kulunga angeke ibe khona injabulo. Uma kute kulunga noma injabulo angeke kube khona kujeziswa noma lusizi. Uma leti tintfo tingekho akekho naNkulunkulu. Futsi uma angekho Nkulunkulu natsi asikho, ngalokunjalo nemhlaba; ngoba bekungeke kube khona kudalwa kwetintfo, noma tintfo lokufanele tente netintfo lokufanele tentiwe; ngaloko-ke, tonkhe tintfo betiyoshabalala tiphele.
2.14: Manje, madvodzana ami, ngikhuluma kini leti tintfo kute kube yinzuzo kini kanye nesifundvo; ngoba ukhona Nkulunkulu, futsi wadala tonkhe tintfo, emazulu kanye nemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letikuwo, tintfo lekufanele tente netintfo lekufanele tentiwe.
2.15: Futsi kute kufezeke tinhloso takhe taphakadze ngenjongo yemuntfu, emvakwekutsi sekadale batali betfu bekucala, netilwane tasendle kanye netinyoni telizulu, kwephetsa, tonkhe tintfo letidaliwe, kwakufanele kutsi kube khona kuphikisana; nesitselo lesingakavumeleki sasiphikisana nesihlahla sekuphila; sinye sinongotela lesinye sibaba.
2.16: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yanika umuntfu kutsi atentele ngekwakhe. Ngaloko-ke, umuntfu akanawukwati kutentela ngekwakhe ngaphandle kwekutsi ayengwe ngalokukodvwa noma ngalokunye.
2.17: Futsi mine, Lehi, ngekwetintfo lengitifundzile, tingenta ngicabange kutsi ingilosi yaNkulunkulu, ngekwaloko lokubhaliwe, yayiwile ezulwini; ngaloko-ke, yaba ngudeveli, ngoba yafuna loko lokwakukubi phambi kwaNkulunkulu.
2.18: Futsi ngenca yekutsi yayiwile ezulwini, futsi yaba lusizi ingunaphakadze, ifuna futsi wonkhe umuntfu abe lusizi. Ngaloko-ke, yatsi ku-Eva, yebo, leyo nyoka lendzala, lengudeveli, lenguyise wawo onkhe emanga, ngaloko-ke yatsi: Dlani lesi sitselo lesingakavumeleki, futsi angeke ufe, kepha uyawuba njengaNkulunkulu, wati lokuhle nalokubi.
2.19: Futsi emvakwekutsi Adamu kanye na-Eva sebasidlile sitselo lesingakavumeleki bakhishwa ensimini yase-Edeni, kute bayolima umhlabatsi.
2.20: Futsi batala bantfwana; yebo, nemndeni wemhlaba wonkhe.
2.21: Futsi tinsuku tebantfwana bebatfu telulwa, ngekwentsandvo yaNkulunkulu, kute baphendvuke ngesikhatsi basesenyameni; ngaloko-ke, simo sabo saba simo sekuvivinywa, futsi sikhatsi sabo selulwa, ngekwemiyaleto iNkhosi Nkulunkulu layinika bantfwana bebantfu. Ngoba wanika umyaleto wekutsi bonkhe bantfu kufanele baphendvuke; ngoba wabakhombisa bonkhe bantfu kutsi bebalahlekile, ngenca yetiphambeko tebatali babo.
2.22: Manje, buka, kube Adamu akatange aphambuke ngabe akatange awe, kodvwa bekayawuhlala ensimini yase-Edeni. Futsi tonkhe tintfo letatidaliwe kwakuyawufanele tihlale kuleso simo lesifanako letatikuso emvakwekutsi setidaliwe; futsi kwakuyawufanele tihlale ingunaphakadze, futsi tingabi nesiphetfo.
2.23: Futsi bebangeke babe nebantfwana; ngaloko-ke bebayawuhlala basesimeni sekuba msulwa, babete injabulo, ngoba bangalwati lusizi; bangenti buhle, ngoba bangasati sono.
2.24: Kodvwa bukani, tonkhe tintfo tentiwa ngekuhlakanipha kwakhe loyo lowati tonkhe tintfo.
2.25: Adamu wawa kute bantfu babekhona; futsi bantfu bakhona, kute babe nekujabula.
2.26: Futsi Mesiya uyawufika esikhatsini lesiphelele, kute ahlenge bantfwana bebantfu ekuweni. Futsi ngenca yekutsi bahlengiwe ekuweni sebanenkhululeko yaphakadze, sebati lokuhle nalokubi; sebatentela bona ngekwabo futsi hhayi kutsi kwentiwe kubo, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube nekujeziswa ngumtsetfo ngelusuku lolukhulu kanye nelwekugcina, njengekwemiyaleto Nkulunkulu layiniketile.
2.27: Ngaloko-ke, bantfu bakhululekile ngekwasenyameni; futsi tonkhe tintfo tiniketiwe kubo letitidzingeko temuntfu. Futsi bakhululekile kukhetsa inkhululeko kanye nekuphila lokuphakadze, ngeMlamuli lomkhulu wabo bonkhe bantfu, noma kukhetsa kutfunjwa kanye nekufa, ngekwekutfunjwa kanye nemandla adeveli; ngoba yena ufuna kutsi bonkhe bantfu babe lusizi njengaye.
2.28: Manje, madvodzana ami, ngifuna kutsi nibuke kuMlamuli lomkhulu, futsi nilalele imiyaleto yakhe lemikhulu; futsi netsembele emavini akhe, futsi nikhetse kuphila lokuphakadze, ngekwentsandvo yaMoya wakhe loNgcwele.
2.29: Futsi ningakhetsi kufa lokuphakadze, ngekwentsandvo yenyama kanye nebubi lobukuyo, lokunika umoya wadeveli emandla ekutfumba, kute anidvonsele phansi esihogweni, kute abuse ngetulu kwenu embusweni wakhe lucobo.
2.30: Ngikhulume lamavi lambalwa kini nonkhe, madvodzana ami, etinsukwini tekugcina tekuvivinywa kwami; futsi ngikhetse indlela lelungile, ngekwemavi emphrofethi. Futsi anginayo lenye inhloso ngaphandle kwekutsi ngizuze imiphefumulo yenu ingunaphakadze. Amen.

3.1: Manje sengikhuluma kuwe, Josefa, tfumbu wami. Wena lowatalelwa ehlane letinhlupheko tami; yebo, etinsukwini telusizi lwami lolukhulu kakhulu make wakho wakutala.
3.2: Futsi shengatsi iNkhosi ingakungcwelisela lona nawe lelive, lokulive leliligugu kakhulu, libe lifa lakho kanye nelifa lentalelwane yakho kanye nabomnakenu, kute nivikeleke ingunaphakadze, uma kungukutsi niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yaloNgcwele waka-Israyeli.
3.3: Futsi manje, Josefa, tfumbu wami, lengamkhipha ehlane letinhlupheko tami, shengatsi iNkhosi ingakubusisa ingunaphakadze, ngoba intalelwane yakho ayiyukubhujiswa iphele nya.
3.4: Ngoba buka, uyintalo yesisu sami; futsi mine ngisitukulwane saJosefa lowatfwalwa watfunjelwa eGibhithe. Futsi tatitinkhulu tivumelwano teNkhosi leyatenta naJosefa.
3.5: Ngaloko-ke, Josefa ngempela walubona lusuku lwetfu. Futsi watfola setsembiso eNkhosini, sekutsi intalo yesisu sakhe iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyovusa ligala lelilungile kuyo yindlu yaka-Israyeli; hhayi Mesiya, kodvwa ligala lelalitohleshulwa, noko, kutsi likhunjulwe etivumelwaneli teNkhosi kangangoba Mesiya uyawubonakaliswa kubo etinsukwini tekugcina, ngemandla amoya, kute baphume ebumnyameni babe sekukhanyeni—yebo, baphume ebumnyameni labakubo bangati futsi baphume ekutfunjweni baye enkhululekweni.
3.6: Ngoba Josefa ngempela wafakaza, watsi: Umboni iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wami iyawumvusa, loyawukuba ngumboni lokhetsiwe kuyo intalo yesisu sami.
3.7: Yebo, Josefa ngempela watsi: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi kimi: Umboni lokhetsiwe ngitawumvusa uyawuphuma kuyo intalo yesisu sakho; futsi uyawukwatiswa kakhulu emkhatsini wentalo yesisu sakho. Futsi ngitawumnika umyaleto wekutsi uyawukwenta umsebenti wentalo yesisu sakho, bomnakabo, loyawukuba ngulobalulekile kakhulu kubo, nasekubabuyiseleni elwatini lwetivumelwano lengatenta kuboyihlo.
3.8: Futsi ngitawumnika umyaleto wekutsi akayukwenta nome ngumuphi lomunye umsebenti, ngaphandle kwemsebenti lowo lengiyawumyaleta wona. Futsi nitawumenta abe mkhulu emehlweni ami; ngoba uyawukwenta umsebenti wami.
3.9: Futsi uyawukuba mkhulu njengaMosi, lengatsi ngiyawunivusela yena, kute akhulule bantfu bami, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli.
3.10: Futsi Mosi ngitawumvusa, kute akhulule bantfu bakho baphume eveni laseGibhithe.
3.11: Kodvwa umboni ngitawumvusa kuyo intalo yesisu sakho; futsi ngitawumnika emandla ekutsi aletse livi lami kuyo intalelwane yesisu sakho—futsi hhayi kuletsa livi lami kuphela, kusho iNkhosi, kodvwa kubakholwisa ngelivi lami, leliyawube selivele latisiwe emkhatsini wabo.
3.12: Ngaloko-ke, intalo yesisu sakho iyawubhala; kanjalo nentalo yesisu saJuda iyawubhala; futsi loko lokuyawubhalwa yintalo yesisu sakho, naloko lokuyawubhalwa yintalo yesisu saJuda, kuyawukhula ndzawonye, kute kuphikise timfundziso temanga futsi kucedze imibango, futsi kuletse kuthula emkhatsini wentalo yesisu sakho, kanye nekuyiletsa elwatini lwaboyise etinsukwini tekugcina, futsi ngalokunjalo naselwatini lwetivumelwano tami, kusho iNkhosi.
3.13: Futsi ebutsakatsakeni uyawukwentiwa abe nemandla, ngalolosuku ngesikhatsi umsebenti wami sewucala emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bami, kute nibuyiselwe, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli, kusho iNkhosi.
3.14: Futsi waphrofetha kanje Josefa, atsi: Buka, loyo mboni iNkhosi itawumbusisa; futsi labo labayofuna kumbulala bayawubhujiswa; ngoba lesi setsembiso, lengisitfole eNkhosini, ngentalo yesisu sami, siyawugcwaliseka. Buka, nginesiciniseko ngekugcwaliseka kwalesi setsembiso
3.15: Libito lakhe liyawubitwa ngami; futsi liyawukuba libito leyise. Uyawuba njengami; ngoba leyontfo, iNkhosi leyawuyiletsa ngesandla sakhe, ngemandla eNkhosi iyawuletsa bantfu bami ensindzisweni.
3.16: Yebo, waphrofetha kanjalo ke Josefa atsi: Nginesiciniseko ngalentfo, njengoba nginesiciniseko ngesetsembiso saMosi; ngoba iNkhosi itsite kimi, ngitawuyigcina intalelwane yakho ingunaphakadze.
3.17: Futsi iNkhosi itse: Ngitawuvusa Mosi; futsi ngitawumniketa emandla endvukwini; futsi ngitawumniketa kwehlulela ngembhalo. Kodvwa angeke ngilukhulule lulwimi lwakhe, kutsi akhulume kakhulu, ngoba angitukumenta abe liciko ekukhulumeni. Kodvwa ngitawumbhalela umtsetfo wami, ngemunwe wesandla sami lucobo; futsi ngitawumentela umkhulumeli wakhe.
3.18: Futsi iNkhosi yaphindza yatsi kimi: Ngitawuvusa kuyo intalo yesisu sakho; futsi ngitawumentela umkhulumeli. Buka, ngitawumniketa kutsi abhale umbhalo wentalo yesisu sakho, abhalele intalo yesisu sakho, futsi umkhulumeli wesisu sakho uyawukumemetela loko.
3.19: Futsi emavi layawuwabhala ayawuba ngemavi ladzingekile ngekuhlakanipha kwami kutsi andluliselwe kuyo intalo yesisu sakho. Futsi kuyawukuba shengatsi intalo yesisu sakho ikhale kubo iselutfulini; ngoba ngiyalwati lukholo lwabo.
3.20: Futsi iyawukhala iselutfulini; yebo, nangekuphendvuka kubomnakabo, nangemvakwetitukulwane letiningi lesetendlula ngabo, Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi kukhala kwabo kuyawukuya kuyo intalo yesisu sakho, njengekuba sobala kwemavi abo.
3.21: Ngenca yelukholo lwabo emavi abo ayawuchubekela phambili aphuma emlonyeni wami aye kubomnakabo labayintalo yesisu sakho; futsi butsakatsaka bemavi abo ngitawubenta bucine elukholweni lwabo, kute ngikhumbule sivumelwano lengasenta kuboyihlo.
3.22: Manje, buka, ndvodzana yami Josefa, babe wakudzala waphrofetha ngalendlela.
3.23: Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yalesi sivumelwano wena ubusisiwe; ngoba intalelwane yakho angeke ibhujiswe, ngoba iyawulalela emavi alencwadzi.
3.24: Futsi kuyawuvuka lomunye lonemandla emkhatsini wabo, loyawukwenta lokuningi lokuhle, ekukhulumeni nasekwenteni, uyawuba lithulusi etandleni taNkulunkulu, abe nelukholo lolukhulu, lwekwenta timangaliso letinkhulu, futsi ente leyontfo lenkhulu emehlweni aNkulunkulu, ekugcwalisekeni kwekubuyiselwa lokuningi kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi nakuyo intalelwane yabomnakenu.
3.25: Manje, ubusisiwe, Josefa. Buka, umncane; ngaloko-ke lalela emavi emnakenu, Nefi, futsi kuyawukwentiwa kuwe ngekwemavi lesengiwakhulumile. Khumbula emavi eyihlo lobhubhako. Amen.

4.1: Manje, mine, Nefi sengikhuluma ngalokuphatselene netiphrofetho babe lakhuluma ngato ngalokuphatselene naJosefa, lowatfwalwa wamikiswa eGibhithe.
4.2: Ngoba bukani, ngempela waphrofetha ngalokuphatselene nayo yonkhe intalelwane yakhe. Futsi tiphrofetho latibhala, atikho letinkhulu ngetulu kwato. Futsi waphrofetha ngalokuphatselene natsi, kanye nangetitukulwane tetfu letitako; futsi tibhalwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi.
4.3: Ngaloko-ke, emvakwekutsi babe asacedzile kukhuluma ngalokuphatselene netiphrofetho taJosefa, wabita bantfwana baLamani, emadvodzana akhe, kanye nemadvodzakati akhe, watsi kubo: Bukani, madvodzana, kanye nani madvodzakati ami, leningemadvodzana nemadvodzakati elitubulo lami, nginesifiso sekutsi shengatsi beningawalalela emavi ami.
4.4: Ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ishilo kutsi: Kangangoba niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuphumelela eveni; futsi kangangoba ningatuyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuhlukaniswa ebukhoneni bami.
4.5: Kodvwa bukani, madvodzana ami kanye nani madvodzakati ami, anginokwati kutsi ngehlele ethuneni lami ngaphandle kwekutsi nginishiye nesibusiso; ngoba bukani, ngiyati kutsi uma nikhuliswa ngendlela lekufanele nihambe ngayo anituphambuka kuyo.
4.6: Ngaloko-ke, uma nicalekiswa, bukani, ngishiya sibusiso sami etikwenu, kutsi sicalekiso sisuswe kini bese batali benu baphendvula ngaso.
4.7: Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yesibusiso sami iNkhosi Nkulunkulu angeke ivume kutsi nibhubhe; itawuba nesihawu kini futsi nakuyo intalelwane yenu ingunaphakadze.
4.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi babe asacedzile kukhuluma nemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati aLamani, wenta kutsi emadvodzana nemadvodzakati aLemuweli aletfwe phambi kwakhe.
4.9: Futsi wakhuluma kubo, watsi: Bukani, madvodzana ami kanye nani madvodzakati ami, leningemadvodzana nemadvodzakati endvodzana yami yesibili; bukani, nginishiya nesibusiso lesifanako naleso lengisishiye kumadvodzana nakumadvodzakati aLamani; ngaloko-ke aniyukubhujiswa nya; kodvwa ekugcineni intalelwane yenu iyawubusiswa.
4.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi babe sekacedzile kukhuluma nabo, bukani, wakhuluma kuwo emadvodzana nemadvodzakati a-Ishmayeli, yebo, futsi nakubo bonkhe bendlu yakhe.
4.11: Futsi emvakwekutsi asacedzile kukhuluma nabo, wakhuluma naSemu, watsi, Ubusisiwe wena, kanye nentalelwane yakho; ngoba uyawukudla lifa lalelive njengemnakenu Nefi. Futsi intalelwane yakho iyawubalwa kanye nentalelwane yakhe; Uyawukuba njengemnakenu, nentalelwane yakho njengentalelwane yakhe; futsi uyawubusiswa kuto tonkhe tinsuku takho.
4.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi babe, Lehi, asakhulumile kubo bonkhe bendlu yakhe, ngekwemizwa yenhlitiyo yakhe kanye naMoya weNkhosi lowawukuye, wakhula waba mdzala. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wafa, wabese uyangcwatjwa.
4.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kungakabi natinsuku letiningi emvakwekufa kwakhe, Lamani naLemuweli kanye nemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli bangitfukutselela ngenca yemiyalo yeNkhosi.
4.14: Ngoba mine, Nefi, ngaphocelelwa kutsi ngikhulume nabo, njengekwelivi layo; ngoba ngangikhulume tintfo letiningi kubo, futsi kanjalo nababe, ngaphambi kwekufa kwakhe; lokuningi kwaloko lakusho kubhaliwe kulabanye bongcwengcwe bami; ngoba incenye leningi yemlandvo ibhalwe kulabanye bongcwengcwe bami.
4.15: Futsi kulaba ngibhala tintfo temphefumulo wami, kanye nalokuningi kwemibhalo lengcwele lecoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi. Ngoba umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ngemibhalo lengcwele, futsi inhlitiyo yami iyazindla ngayo, futsi ngiyayibhala kute ifundvwe futsi ibe yinzuzo kubantfwana bami.
4.16: Bukani, umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ngetintfo teNkhosi; futsi inhlitiyo yami iyazindla njalonjalo ngetintfo lengitibonile futsi ngativa.
4.17: Noko, nanoma kungenca yebuhle lobukhulu beNkhosi, ekungikhombiseni imisebenti yayo lemikhulu nalemangalisako, inhlitiyo yami yakhala yatsi: Awu mine muntfu welusizi! Yebo, inhlitiyo yami idzabukile ngenca yenyama yami; umphefumulo wami ulusizi ngenca yebubi bami.
4.18: Ngitungeletwe ndzawo tonkhe, ngenca yetilingo kanye netono letingihaca kalula.
4.19: Futsi uma ngifisa kujabula, inhlitiyo yami iyabubula ngenca yetono tami; noko, ngiyati kutsi litsemba lami likubani.
4.20: Nkulunkulu wami uludvondvolo lwami; ungiholile etinhluphekweni tami ehlane; futsi wangigcina emantini lajule kakhulu.
4.21: Ungigcwalisele ngelutsandvo lwakhe, nangalokwanele kutsi kushiswe inyama yami.
4.22: Utitfobisile titsa tami, watenta tachachatela phambi kwami.
4.23: Bukani, ukuvile kukhala kwami emini, futsi wanginika lwati ngemibono ebusuku.
4.24: Futsi emini ngikhule ngaba nesibindzi ekuthandazeni lokukhulu phambi kwakhe; yebo, livi lami ngilitfumele etulu; netingelosi tehlela phansi futsi tangifundzisa.
4.25: Futsi ngetimphiko taMoya wakhe umtimba wami utsatsiwe wayiswa etintsabeni letiphakeme kakhulu. Emehlo ami abone tintfo letinkhulu, yebo, letinkhulu kakhulu kumuntfu; ngako-ke ngayalwa kutsi ngingatibhali.
4.26: Awu pho, uma ngibone tintfo letinkhulu kangaka, uma iNkhosi ekutehliseni kwayo kubantfwana bebantfu ibavakashele bantfu ngemusa lomkhulu kangaka, kungani inhlitiyo yami ilila nemphefumulo wami ulibala esigodzini selusizi, futsi inyama yami iphela, nemandla ami ehla, ngenca yetinhlupheko tami na?
4.27: Futsi kungani ngivumela sono, ngenca yenyama yami na? Yebo, kungani ngivumela tilingo, kute lomubi atfole indzawo enhlitiyweni yami kute acedze kuthula kwami futsi ahluphe umphefumulo wami? Kungani ngitfukutsele ngenca yesitsa sami na?
4.28: Vuka, mphefumulo wami! Ungabe usalengela esonweni. Jabula, Awu nhlitiyo yami, futsi ungabe usasinika indzawo sitsa semphefumulo wami.
4.29: Ungabe usatfukutsela futsi ngenca yetitsa tami. Ungabe usawehlisa emandla ami ngenca yetinhlupheko tami.
4.30: Jabula, Awu nhlitiyo yami, futsi ukhale eNkhosini, utsi: Awu Nkhosi, Ngitawukudvumisa ingunaphakadze; yebo, umphefumulo wami utawutfokota ngawe, Nkulunkulu wami, kanye nelidvwala lensindziso yami.
4.31: Awu Nkhosi, ungawuhlenga yini umphefumulo wami na? Ungangikhulula yini etandleni tetitsa tami na? Ungangenta yini kutsi ngitfutfumele ngenca yekubona sono na?
4.32: Kwangatsi emasango esihogo abengavaleka njalonjalo phambi kwami, ngenca yekutsi inhlitiyo yami iphukile futsi nemoya wami udzabukile! Awu Nkhosi, ungawavali emasango ekulunga phambi kwami, kute ngihambe endleleni yesigodzi lesiphansi, kute ngicondze endleleni lelula!
