4.33: Awu Nkhosi, ungangitungeleta ndzawo tonkhe ngesembatfo sekulunga kwakho! Awu Nkhosi ungayenta indlela yami yekubaleka phambi kwetitsa tami! Ungayenta indlela yami icondze phambi kwami! Ngicela ungasibeki sikhubekiso endleleni yami—kepha ucacise indlela yami phambi kwami, futsi ungangivimbeli endleleni yami, kodvwa tindlela tesitsa sami.
4.34: Awu Nkhosi, ngetsembele kuwe, futsi ngitawuwetsembela kuwe ingunaphakadze. Angeke ngibeke litsemba lami emandleni emuntfu; ngoba ngiyati kutsi ucalekisiwe loyo lobeka litsemba lakhe emandleni emuntfu. Yebo, ucalekisiwe loyo lobeka litsemba lakhe kumuntfu noma lowenta umuntfu emandla akhe.
4.35: Yebo, ngiyati kutsi Nkulunkulu utawumnika ngemusa loyo locelako. Yebo, Nkulunkulu wami utawunginika, uma ngingaceli ngalokungakalungi; ngako-ke ngitawuliphakamisela kuye livi lami; yebo, ngitawukhala kuye Nkulunkulu wami, dvwala lekulunga kwami. Bukani, livi lami liyawukhuphukela etulu kuwe ingunaphakadze, dvwala lami kanye naNkulunkulu wami waphakadze. Amen.

5.1: Bukani, kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngakhala kakhulu eNkhosini Nkulunkulu, ngenca yentfukutselo yabomnaketfu.
5.2: Kodvwa bukani, intfukutselo yabo yakhula ngalokumelene nami, kangangekutsi bafuna kuyitsatsa imphilo yami.
5.3: Yebo, bavungama ngalokumelene nami, batsi: Umnaketfu lomncane ucabanga kubusa ngetulu kwetfu; futsi sesibe netilingo letiningi ngenca yakhe; ngaloko-ke manje asimbulale, kute singabe sisaphindza sihlushwe ngenca yemavi akhe. Ngoba bukani, angeke simvumele kutsi abe ngumbusi wetfu, ngoba kungekwetfu, tsine lesibomnakabo labadzala, kutsi sibuse ngetulu kwalaba bantfu.
5.4: Manje mine angibhali kulabongcwengcwe onkhe lamavi labawavungama ngawo ngalokumelene nami. Kepha kuyangenelisa kusho, kutsi bafuna kuyitsatsa imphilo yami.
5.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yangicwayisa, kutsi mine, Nefi, ngisuke kubo ngibalekele ehlane, nabo bonkhe labo bebafuna kuhamba nami.
5.6: Ngaloko-ke, kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngatsatsa umndeni wami, kanjalo naZoramu nemndeni wakhe, naSemu, umnaketfu lomdzala kanye nemndeni wakhe, naJakobe, naJosefa banaketfu labancane, kanjalo nabodzadzewetfu, kanye nabobonkhe labo labebafuna kuhamba nami. Futsi bonkhe labo labebafuna kuhamba nami kwakungulabo labebakholelwa etecwayisweni kanye nasetembulweni taNkulunkulu; ngaloko-ke, bawalalela emavi ami.
5.7: Futsi tsine satsatsa emathende etfu kanye nato tonkhe tinfto lebesingakhona kutitsatsa, sahamba ehlane sikhatsi lebesingaba tinsuku letiningi. Futsi emvakwekutsi sesihambe sikhatsi lesingaba tinsuku letiningi samisa emathende etfu.
5.8: Futsi nebantfu bami bafuna silibite ligama lendzawo ngaNefi; ngaloko-ke sayibita ngaNefi.
5.9: Futsi bonkhe labo labebanami bancuma kutsi batibite ngebantfu baNefi.
5.10: Futsi tsine setama kutsi sigcine tehlulelo, nemitsetfo, kanye nemiyaleto yeNkhosi kuto tonkhe tintfo, njengemtsetfo waMosi.
5.11: Futsi iNkhosi yayinatsi, futsi saphumelela kakhulu; ngoba sayihlanyela inhlanyelo, saphindze savuna kwaba yinala. Futsi sacala kukhulisa imihlambi yetimvu, nemihlambi yetinkhomo, kanye netilwane talolonkhe luhlobo.
5.12: Futsi mine, Nefi, ngetulu kwaloko bengiyiletsile nemibhalo leyo lebeyicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi; futsi kanjalo nebhola, noma inkhombandlela, leyo lebeyilungiselwe babe ngesandla seNkhosi, njengaloko lokubhaliwe.
5.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tsine sacala kuphumelela kakhulu, kanye nekwandza eveni.
5.14: Futsi mine, Nefi, ngayitsatsa inkemba yaLabani, ngakha letiningi tinkemba letifana nayo, ngekwesaba kutsi mhlawumbe noma ngayiphi indlela bantfu labo manje labesebabitwa ngemaLamani bate batosihlasela futsi basibhubhise; ngoba bengiyati inzondo yabo kitsi kanye nakubantfwana bami kanye nalabo labebabitwa ngebantfu bami.
5.15: Futsi ngabafundzisa bantfu bami kwakha takhiwo, kanye nekusebenta ngalo lonkhe luhlobo lwelugodvo, nelwensimbi, nelwekhopha, nelwelitfusi, nelwensimbi, nelweligolide, nelwesiliva, nematje laligugu, letatitiningi kakhulu.
5.16: Mine, Nefi, ngalakha lithempeli; futsi ngalakha ngendlela yelithempeli laSolomoni ngaphandle nje kwekutsi lalingakakhiwa ngetintfo letinengi kakhulu letiligugu; ngoba tatingeke titfolakale eveni, ngaloko-ke, lalingeke lakhiwe njengelithempeli laSolomoni. Kodvwa indlela yekwakhiwa yayinjenge lithempeli laSolomoni; futsi kwakhiwa kwalo kwakukuhle kakhulu.
5.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngenta nebantfu bami kutsi bakhutsale, nekutsi basebente ngetandla tabo.
5.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bafuna kutsi ngibe yinkhosi yabo. Kodvwa mine, Nefi, ngangifisa kutsi bangabi nayo inkhosi; noko, ngabentela ngaloko lokwakusemandleni ami.
5.19: Futsi bukani, emavi eNkhosi abesagcwalisekile kubomnaketfu, lawo leyawakhuluma mayelana nabo, ekutsi ngiyawuba ngumbusi wabo kanye nemfundzisi wabo. Ngaloko-ke, ngaba nguye umbusi wabo kanye nemfundzisi wabo, njengemiyaleto yeNkhosi, kwate kwaba sikhatsi bafuna kutsatsa imphilo yami.
5.20: Ngaloko-ke livi leNkhosi lagcwaliseka lelo leyalikhuluma kimi, isho kutsi: Kangangoba bangeke bawalalele emavi akho bayawuhlukaniswa phambi kweNkhosi. Futsi bukani, bahlukaniswa ebukhoneni bayo.
5.21: Futsi yona yenta kutsi sicalekiso sehlele etikwabo, yebo, sicalekiso lesibuhlungu, ngenca yebubi babo. Ngoba bukani, bebatente taba lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene nayo, kangangekutsi bese banjengelitje lelicine kakhulu; ngaloko-ke, njengoba bebamhlophe, futsi babukeka kahle kakhulu baphindze batsandzeka, kute bangabe basakwati kuyenga bantfu bami iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yenta kutsi sikhumba sebumnyama sibe kubo.
5.22: Futsi naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Ngitawukwenta kutsi benyanyeke kubantfu bakho, ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ebubini babo.
5.23: Futsi iyawucalekiswa intalelwane yakhe loyo lohlangana nentalelwane yabo; ngoba yona iyawucalekiswa nangesicalekiso lesifanako. Futsi iNkhosi yakukhuluma loku, futsi kwenteka.
5.24: Futsi ngenca yesicalekiso sabo lebesisetikwabo baba bantfu labangemavila, labagcwele kuganga kanye nebucili, futsi bafuna ehlane tilwane tasendle letidliwako.
5.25: Futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yatsi kimi: bayawuba luhlupho kuyo intalelwane yakho, kuyiphehlela kutsi ingikhumbule; futsi kangangoba yona ingeke ingikhumbule, futsi ilalele emavi ami, bayawuyihlupha kute kube sekubhujisweni.
5.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Nefi, ngamngcwelisa Jakobe, kanye naJosefa, kutsi babe baphristi kanye nebafundzisi eveni lebantfu bami.
5.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi saphila ngendlela yekujabula.
5.28: Futsi iminyaka lengemashumi lamatsatfu bese yendlulile kusukela ngesikhatsi sasuka eJerusalema.
5.29: Futsi mine, Nefi, ngangiyigcinile imibhalo kubongcwengcwe bami, lebengibentile ngebantfu bami kute kube nyalo.
5.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yatsi kimi: Yenta labanye bongcwengcwe, futsi utawucopha letiningi tintfo kubo letinhle emehlweni ami, kute bazuze bantfu bakho.
5.31: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Nefi, kulalela imiyaleto yeNkhosi, ngahamba ngabenta labo bongcwengcwe lengicophe kubo leti tintfo.
5.32: Futsi ngacopha loko lokutsandzekako kuNkulunkulu. Futsi uma bantfu bami batitsandza tintfo taNkulunkulu bona batawuyitsandza imifanekiso lecoshwe kulaba bongcwengcwe.
5.33: Futsi uma bantfu bami banesifiso sekwati kabanti ngencenye letsite yemlandvo webantfu bami kufanele bacwaninge labanye bongcwengcwe bami.
5.34: Futsi kuyangenelisa kusho kutsi iminyaka lengemashumi lamane yase yendlulile, futsi sase sike saba netimphi kanye nemibango nabomnaketfu.

6.1: Emavi aJakobe, umnakaboNefi, lawakhuluma kubantfu baNefi:
6.2: Bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, mine, Jakobe, ngibitwe nguNkulunkulu, futsi ngigcotjwe ngendlela yeluhlelo lwakhe lolungcwele, futsi ngincweliswe ngumnaketfu Nefi, lenimbuka njengenkhosi noma umvikeli, futsi lenincike kuye kutsi aniphephise, bukani niyati kutsi ngikhulume kini tintfo letiningi kakhulu.
6.3: Noko, ngikhuluma kini futsi; ngoba nginesifiso senhlalakahle yemiphefumulo yenu. Yebo, inshisekelo yami yinkhulu ngani; futsi nani lucobo lwenu niyakwati kutsi seloku kwaba njalo. Ngoba nginincusile ngayo yonkhe inkhutsalo; futsi nginifundzisile emavi ababe; futsi ngikhulumile kini mayelana nato tonkhe tintfo letibhaliwe, kusukela ekudalweni kwemhlaba.
6.4: Manje, bukani, ngitokhuluma kini mayelana netintfo letikhona, naleto letitawukwenteka; ngaloko-ke ngitawunifundzela emavi a-Isaya. Futsi lawo ngemavi umnaketfu lafisa kutsi ngiwakhulume kini. Futsi ngiwakhuluma kini ngenca yenu, kute nifundze futsi nidvumise ligama laNkulunkulu wenu.
6.5: Manje, emavi lengitowafundza ngiwo lawo Isaya lawakhuluma mayelana nayo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli; ngaloko-ke, ngiwabhekisa kini, ngoba nibendlu yaka-Israyeli. Futsi tiningi tintfo letakhulunywa ngu-Isaya letibhekiswe kini, ngenca yekutsi nibendlu yaka-Israyeli.
6.6: Manje, ngulawa lamavi: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Bukani, ngitawuphakamisa sandla sami kubo beTive, futsi ngimise sibonakaliso sami kubantfu; futsi bayawuletsa emadvodzana akho etandleni tabo, kanye nemadvodzakati akho bayawuwatjatsa emahlombe abo.
6.7: Futsi emakhosi ayawuba bobabe bakho labakondlako, nemakhosikati abo bomake bakho labakondlako; bayawukhotsamela buso babo bubheke phansi, futsi bakhotse lutfuli lwetinyawo takho; futsi uyawukwati kutsi ngiyiNkhosi; ngoba abanawujabha labo labangilindzako.
6.8: Futsi manje mine, Jakobe, ngitokhuluma mayelana naloko lokuphatselene nalamavi. Ngoba bukani, iNkhosi ingikhombisile kutsi labo labebaseJerusalema, lapho saphuma khona, babulewe futsi batfwalwa batfunjwa.
6.9: Noko, iNkhosi ingikhombisile kutsi bayophindze babuye futsi. Futsi ngetulu kwaloko ingikhombisile kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, itotibonakalisa kubo isenyameni; futsi emvakwekutsi itibonakalisile bayoyibhacabula futsi bayibetsele, njengekwemavi engilosi leyawakhuluma kimi.
6.10: Futsi emvakwekutsi sebatente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo futsi baticinisa tinhloko tabo ngalokumelene naloNgcwele waka-Israyeli, bukani, tehlulelo taloNgcwele waka-Israyeli tiyawuta etikwabo. Futsi lusuku luyeta lapho bayawushaywa baphindze bahlushwe.
6.11: Ngaloko-ke, emvakwekutsi sebabalekisiwe bayiswa emuva naphambili, ngoba naku lokushiwo yingilosi, labaningi bayawuhlushwa enyameni, futsi abayukuyekelwa kutsi babhujiswe, ngenca yemithandazo yalabatsembekile; bayawuhlakatwa, futsi bashaywe, futsi batondvwe; noko iNkhosi itawuba nesihawu kubo, kutsi uma batfola lwati ngeMhlengi wabo, bayawuphindze bagcogcwe ndzawonye emaveni lalifa labo.
6.12: Futsi babusisiwe beTive, labo umphrofethi labhale ngabo; ngoba bukani, uma kungukutsi bayawuphendvuka futsi bangalwi neSiyoni, baphindze bangatihlanganisi nalelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, bayawusindziswa; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawutigcwalisa tivumelwano leyatenta kubantfwana bayo; futsi ngalesi sizatfu umphrofethi utibhalile leti tintfo.
6.13: Ngaloko-ke, labo labalwa neSiyoni kanye nebantfu besivumelwano beNkhosi bayawukhotsa lutfuli lwetinyawo tabo; futsi bantfu beNkhosi abayukuba nemahloni. Ngoba bantfu beNkhosi ngibo labo labayilindzako; ngoba basakulindzile kuta kwaMesiya.
6.14: Futsi bukani, ngekwemavi emphrofethi, Mesiya utawuphindze ativete ngekwakhe kwesibili kute ababuyise; ngaloko-ke, yena utawutiveta ngekwakhe kubo ngemandla kanye nangenkhatimulo lenkhulu, nasekubhujisweni kwetitsa tabo, uma lolosuku lufika lapho bayawukholwa kuye; futsi kute namunye letawumbhubhisa lokholwa kuye.
6.15: Futsi labo labangakholwa kuye bayawubhujiswa, ngemlilo, kanye nesivunguvungu, nangekutamatama kwemhlaba, nangekucitseka kwengati, nangesifo lesingumashayabhuce, kanye nangendlala. Futsi bayawukwati kutsi iNkhosi inguNkulunkulu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli.
6.16: Ngoba kuya ngani imphango isuswe kubo labanemandla, noma labatfunjiwe ngekwemtsetfo bakhululwe?
6.17: Kodvwa naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Nalabatfunjwa balabo labanemandla bayawususwa, futsi imphango yalabo labesabekako iyawukhululwa; ngoba Nkulunkulu loneMandla uyawukhulula bantfu bakhe besivumelwano. Ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Ngitawuphikisana nabo labo labaphikisana nawe—
6.18: Futsi mine ngitawubadlisa labo labakucindzetelako, inyama yabo lucobo; futsi bayawudzakwa yingati yabo lucobo njengeliwayini lelinongotelako; futsi yonkhe inyama iyawukwati kutsi mine iNkhosi nginguMsindzisi wakho kanye neMhlengi wakho, loneMandla waJakobe.

7.1: Yebo, ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Ngabe ngehlukene nawe, noma ngabe ngikulahlile ingunaphakadze na? Ngoba isho kanje iNkhosi: Iphi incwadzi yamake wakho yesahlukaniso na? Ngabe nginike bani, noma ngumuphi kulengibakweletako lenginitsengise kubo na? Yebo, ngabe nginitsengise kubani na? Bukani, ngenca yebubi benu nititsengisile futsi ngenca yetiphambeko tenu make wenu ngehlukene naye.
7.2: Ngaloko-ke, ngesikhatsi ngifika, bekungekho muntfu; ngesikhatsi ngimemeta, yebo, akubanga namunye lophendvulako. Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli, ngabe sandla sami sifinyetiwe yini kutsi asinawukwati kuhlenga, noma ngabe anginamandla ekukhulula na? Bukani, ngekukhuta kwami ngomisa lwandle, ngenta imifula yabo ibe lihlane kanye netinhlanti tabo tinuke ngenca yemanti lashile, futsi tiyafa ngenca yekoma.
7.3: Ngembatsisa emazulu ngebumnyama, futsi ngenta indvwangu yelisaka ibe simbonyo sawo.
7.4: INkhosi Nkulunkulu inginike lulwimi lwalabafundzile, kute ngikwati kukhuluma livi ngesikhatsi kini, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli. Uma senikhatsele ivuka kusa ngekusa. Ivusa indlebe yami kutsi ngive njengalabafundzile.
7.5: INkhosi Nkulunkulu iyivulile indlebe yami, futsi angitange ngihlubuke, noma ngibuke emuva.
7.6: Nganika umhlane wami kumshayi, kanye netihlatsi tami kulabo labebahlutfula tinwele. Angibusitselisanga buso bami ehlazweni kanye nasekukhafulelweni ngematse.
7.7: Ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawungisita, ngako-ke angeke ngitfotjiswe. Ngako-ke ngibumisile buso bami njengelitje lelicine kakhulu, futsi ngiyati kutsi angeke ngijabhe.
7.8: Futsi iNkhosi isedvute, futsi iyawungitfola ngingenacala. Ngubani lotawumelana nami na? Asime ndzawonye. Ngubani lositsa sami na? Akasondzele edvute nami, futsi ngitawumshaya ngemandla emlomo wami.
7.9: Ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawungisita. Nabo bonkhe labo labayawungilahla ngelicala, bukani, bonkhe bayawuguga njengengubo, futsi umvunya uyawubadla.
7.10: Ngubani emkhatsini wenu loyesabako iNkhosi, lolilalelako livi lenceku yayo, lohamba ebumnyameni futsi abete kukhanya na?
7.11: Bukani nine nonkhe leniphemba umlilo, lenitihaca ngetinhlasi, hambani ekukhanyeni kwemlilo wenu kanye nasetinhlasini leto lenitiphembile. Niyawutfola loku ngesandla sami—niyawulala phansi ngelusizi.

8.1: Ngilaleleni, nine lenilandzela kulunga. Bukani kulo lidvwala lapho nicetulwe khona, kanye nakuyo imbobo yemgodzi lenikhishwe kuyo.
8.2: Bukani ku-Abrahama, uyihlo, kanye nakuye Sara, lonitalako; ngoba nguye yedvwa lengambita, ngaphindze ngambusisa.
8.3: Ngoba iNkhosi iyawuyidvudvuta iSiyoni, itawutidvudvuta tonkhe tindzawo leticitsiwe tayo; futsi itawukwenta lihlane layo libe njenge-Edeni, kanye nelugadvule lwayo lube njengensimu yeNkhosi. Injabulo kanye nentfokoto kuyawutfolakala kuyo, kubonga kanye nelivi lekuhlabelela.
8.4: Ngilaleleni, bantfu bami; futsi ningiphe indlebe, Awu sive sami; ngoba umtsetfo uyawuvela kimi, futsi ngitawukwenta kwehlulela kwami kube kukhanya kubantfu.
8.5: Kulunga kwami kusondzele; insindziso yami seyihambe phambili, futsi umkhono wami uyawukwehlulela bantfu. Tichingi titongilindza, futsi tiyawutsembela emkhonweni wami.
8.6: Phakamiselani emehlo enu ezulwini, nibuke emhlabeni ngaphansi, ngoba emazulu ayawushabalala njengentfutfu, nemhlaba uyawuguga njengengubo; futsi labo labahlala kuwo bayawufa njengendlela lefanako. Kodvwa insindziso yami iyawuma ingunaphakadze, nekulunga kwami angeke kucedvwe.
8.7: Ngilaleleni, nine lenati kulunga, nine bantfu tinhlitiyo tabo lengibhale umtsetfo wami kuto, ningakwesabi kusolwa bantfu, noma nesabe tihlamba tabo.
8.8: Ngoba umvunya uyawubadla njengengubo, nemphetfu iyawubadla njengensontfo. Kodvwa kulunga kwami kuyawuma ingunaphakadze, futsi nensindziso yami titukulwane ngetitukulwane.
8.9: Vuka, vuka! Yembatsa emandla, Awu mkhono weNkhosi; vuka njengasetinsukwini tasendvulo. Ngabe akusiwe yini lona lowancuma Rahabi, futsi wagwaza idrago na?
8.10: Ngabe kwakungesiwe yini lona lowomisa lwandle, emanti elwandle lolukhulu; lowenta indlela ekujuleni kwelwandle kute labahlengiwe bewele na?
8.11: Ngako-ke, labahlengiwe beNkhosi bayawubuya, futsi bete ngekuhlabelela eSiyoni; intfokoto lengunaphakadze nebungcwele kuyawuba setinhloko tabo; futsi bayawutfola kujabula nentfokoto; lusizi nekukhala kuyawubaleka.
8.12: Nginguye; yebo, nginguye loyo lonidvudvutako. Bukani, ungubani wena, kutsi ungesaba umuntfu, loyawufa, futsi loyindvodzana yemuntfu, loyawukwentiwa abe njengetjani na?
8.13: Futsi ukhohliwe yini yiNkhosi umenti wakho, leyaneka emazulu, futsi yabeka sisekelo semhlaba, futsi wesabile njalonjalo mihla yonkhe, ngenca yentfukutselo yemcindzeteli, shengatsi sewulindzele kubhubhisa na? Futsi iphi intfukutselo yemcindzeteli na?
8.14: Lotfunjiwe losiboshwa uyashesha, kute akhululwe, futsi kute angafeli emgodzini, noma kute kudla kwakhe angakwesweli.
8.15: Kodvwa ngiyiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho, lomagagasi akhe ayahlokoma; iNkhosi yemaBandla libito lami.
8.16: Futsi ngiwafakile emavi ami emlonyeni wakho, ngakusibekela emtfuntini wesandla sami, kute ngitjale emazulu futsi ngitibeke tisekelo temhlaba, ngitsi kuyo iSiyoni: Bukani, nibantfu bami.
8.17: Vuka, vuka, usukume, Awu Jerusalema, wena lonatse esandleni seNkhosi indzebe yentfukutselo yakhe—wena lonatse tidzidzi endzebeni yekutfutfumela letikhanyiwe—
8.18: Kute namunye longamhola emkhatsini wawo onkhe emadvodzana lawatele; noma kube khona longamtsatsa ngesandla, kuwo onkhe emadvodzana lawakhulisile.
8.19: Lamadvodzana lamabili etile kuwe, ngubani loyawukukhalela—incitsakalo kanye nekubhujiswa kwakho, indlala kanye nenkemba—futsi ngubani lengingakudvudvuta ngaye na?
8.20: Emadvodzana acalekile, ngaphandle kwalawa lamabili; wona alala ekugcineni kwemigwaco yonkhe; njengenkunzi yasendle isenethini, bagcwele intfukutselo yeNkhosi, kukhuta kwaNkulunkulu wakho.
8.21: Ngako-ke vani loku manje, wena lohluphekile, futsi lodzakiwe, kodvwa hhayi ngewayini:
8.22: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi yakho, iNkhosi lenguNkulunkulu wakho icelela bantfu bayo indlela; bukani, ngitsetse esandleni sakho indzebe yekutfutfumela, tidzidzi tendzebe yentfukutselo yami; awuseyukunatsa futsi nanini.
8.23: Kodvwa ngitawuyibeka esandleni sabo labo labakuhluphako; labatse emphefumulweni wakho: Khotsama, kute sindlule—futsi uwendlalile umtimba wakho njengemhlabatsi nanjengemgwaco kubo labendlulako.
8.24: Vuka, vuka wembatse emandla akho, Awu Siyoni; yembatsa tingubo takho letinhle, Awu Jerusalema, dolobha lelingcwele; kusukela nyalo kuya phambili akuseyukungena kuwe nanini longakasoki kanye nalongcolile.
8.25: Titsintsitse elutfulini; sukuma, hlala phansi, Awu Jerusalema; tikhulule kuto tibopho tentsamo yakho, Awu ndvodzakati letfunjiwe yaseSiyoni.

9.1: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, nginifundzele leti tintfo kute nati ngalokuphatselene netivumelwano teNkhosi leyavumelana ngato nayo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli—
9.2: Lekatikhulumile kumaJuda, ngemlomo webaphrofethi bayo labangcwele, kusukela ekucaleni kuya entansi, situkulwane ngesitukulwane, kute kufike sikhatsi lapho bayawubuyiselwa ebandleni leliciniso kanye nakuso sibaya saNkulunkulu; lapho bayawugcogcelwa ekhaya emaveni lalifa labo, futsi bayawumiswa kuwo onkhe emave abo esetsembiso.
9.3: Bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngikhuluma kini leti tintfo kute nitfokote, futsi niphakamise tinhloko tenu ingunaphakadze, ngenca yetibusiso iNkhosi Nkulunkulu leyawutinika bantfwana benu.
9.4: Ngoba ngiyati kutsi nifune kakhulu, liningi lenu, kwati ngetintfo letisatokwenteka; ngaloko-ke ngiyati kutsi niyati kutsi inyama yetfu kufanele iguge futsi ife; noko, emitimbeni yetfu siyawumbona Nkulunkulu.
9.5: Yebo, ngiyati kutsi niyati kutsi ngemtimba uyawutiveta kubo labo labaseJerusalema, lapho saphuma khona; ngoba kudzingekile kutsi kube semkhatsini wabo; ngoba kudzingekile kutsi uMdali lomkhulu avume kuba ngaphansi kwemuntfu losenyameni, futsi afele bonkhe bantfu, kute bonkhe bantfu babe ngaphansi kwakhe.
9.6: Njengoba kufa kufikile kubo bonkhe bantfu, kute kugcwaliseke lisu lemusa weMdali lomkhulu, kufanele kube khona emandla ekuvuka, futsi kuvuka kufanele kutsi kufike kumuntfu ngesizatfu sekuwa; futsi kuwa kwafika ngesizatfu sesiphambeko; futsi ngenca yekutsi umuntfu wawa babese sebahlukaniswa ebukhoneni beNkhosi.
9.7: Ngaloko-ke, kufanele kube khona inhlawulo lengapheli—ngaphandle kwekutsi kube khona inhlawulo lengapheli loku lokonakalako ngeke kwembatse kungonakali. Ngaloko-ke, sehlulelo sekucala lesafika kumuntfu kwakufanele kutsi sihlale sikhatsi lesingapheli. Futsi uma kunjalo lomtimba kufanele ulale phansi kute ubole futsi uvutfukele kunina wemhlaba, ungasavuki nanini.
9.8: Awu kuhlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu, umusa kanye nesihawu sakhe! Ngoba bukani, uma inyama ingeke isavuka nanini imimoya yetfu kufanele ibe ngaphansi kwaleyo ngilosi leyawa phambi kwaNkulunkulu longunaPhakadze, futsi yaba ngudeveli, kutsi ingasavuki nanini.
9.9: Futsi imimoya yetfu bekufanele ifane naye, futsi sibe bodeveli, tingilosi kudeveli, sivalelwe ngaphandle ebukhoneni baNkulunkulu wetfu, futsi sihlale neyise wemanga, elusizini, njengaye lucobo; yebo, kuye loyo muntfu lowakhohlisa batali betfu bekucala, lotigucula acishe afane nengilosi yekukhanya, futsi lophehlela bantfwana bebantfu emacenjini layimfihlo ekubulala kanye nato tonkhe tindlela letiyimfihlo temisebenti yebumnyama.
9.10: Awu bukhulu kangakanani buhle baNkulunkulu wetfu, losilungiselela indlela yetfu yekuphunyuka ekubanjweni ngulesi silwane lesikhulu lesesabekako; yebo, leso silwane lesikhulu, kufa nesihogo, lengisibita ngekufa kwemtimba, futsi ngalokunjalo nekufa kwakamoya.
9.11: Futsi ngenca yendlela yekukhululwa nguNkulunkulu wetfu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, lokufa, loku lesengikhulume ngako, lokungekwesikhashana, kuyawukhulula labafile bakho, loko kufa lokulithuna.
9.12: Futsi lokufa lesengikhulume ngako, lokukufa kwakamoya, kuyawukhulula labafile bakho; loko kufa kwamoya lokusihogo; ngaloko-ke, kufa kanye nesihogo kufanele kukhulule labafile bakho, sihogo kufanele sikhulule imimoya yaso lesekutfunjweni, lithuna kufanele likhulule imitimba yalo lesekutfunjweni, futsi imitimba kanye nemimoya yebantfu itawubuyiselwa lomunye kulomunye; futsi kungemandla ekuvuka kwaloNgcwele waka-Israyeli.
9.13: Awu likhulu kangakanani lisu laNkulunkulu wetfu! Ngoba ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, ipharadesi yaNkulunkulu kufanele ikhulule imimoya yalabalungile, lithuna likhulule umtimba walolungile; umoya kanye nemtimba kubuyiselwe kuko lucobo lwako futsi, futsi bonkhe bantfu babe nekungaboli baphindze bangafi, futsi babe bantfu labaphilako, babe nelwati loluphelele njengatsi lesisenyameni, ngaphandle nje kwekutsi lwati lwetfu luyawupheleliswa.
9.14: Ngaloko-ke, siyawuba nelwati loluphelele ngako konkhe kuba nelicala kwetfu, nekungahlanteki kwetfu, kanye nebungcunu betfu; futsi labalungile bayawuba nelwati loluphelele lwentfokoto yabo, kanye nekulunga kwabo, futsi bambatsiswe ngekucweba, yebo, nangengubo yekulunga.
9.15: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe bantfu sebendlulile kuloku kufa kwekucala baya ekuphileni, kangangekutsi sebangasenawukufa, kufanele bavele phambi kwesihlalo sekwehlulela saloNgcwele waka-Israyeli, emvakwaloko kuta kwehlulelwa, futsi emvakwaloko kufanele bahlulelwe ngekwehlulelwa lokungcwele kwaNkulunkulu.
9.16: Futsi ngeliciniso njengoba iNkhosi iphila, ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ikukhulumile loku, futsi kulivi layo laphakadze, lelingasoze landlula, kutsi labo labalungile bayawulunga njalo, futsi labo labangcolile bayawungcola njalo; ngaloko-ke, labo labangcolile bangudeveli kanye netingilosi takhe; futsi bayawukuya emlilweni waphakadze, lolungiselwe bona; nekuhlupheka kwabo kunjengelichibi lemlilo kanye nesibabule, lilangabi laso lelikhuphukela etulu phakadze naphakadze futsi lingenamkhawulo.
9.17: Awu bukhulu kanye nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu wetfu! Ngoba uyawukwenta onkhe emavi akhe, futsi aphume emlonyeni wakhe, nemtsetfo wakhe kufanele ugcwaliseke.
9.18: Kodvwa, bukani, labalungile, labangcwele baloNgcwele waka-Israyeli, labo labakholwako kuye loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, labo labatibeketelele tinhlupheko temhlaba, futsi bangalinaki lihlazo lawo, bayawudla lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu, lelalungiselwa bona kusukela esisekelweni semhlaba, futsi kutfokota kwabo kuyawugcwala ingunaphakadze.
9.19: Awu bukhulu bemusa waNkulunkulu wetfu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli! Ngoba ukhulula labangcwele bakhe kuso leso silwane lesesabekako develi, nekufa, nesihogo, nakulelo chibi lemlilo kanye nesibabule, lokukuhlupheka lokungapheli.
9.20: Awu bukhulu kangakanani bungcwele baNkulunkulu wetfu! Ngoba yena wati tonkhe tintfo, futsi kute lutfo ngaphandle kwekutsi yena ayati.
9.21: Futsi uta emhlabeni kute asindzise bonkhe bantfu uma batawulilalela livi lakhe; ngoba bukani, uva buhlungu bebantfu bonkhe, yebo, buhlungu bato tonkhe tidalwa letiphilako, besilisa, besifazane, kanye nebantfwana, lababemndeni wa-Adamu.
9.22: Futsi uva loku kuhlupheka kute kuvuka kute kubo bonkhe bantfu, kute bonkhe beme phambi kwakhe elusukwini lolukhulu nelekwehlulelwa.
9.23: Futsi uyaleta bonkhe bantfu kutsi kufanele baphendvuke, baphindze babhajatiswe egameni lakhe, babe nekukholwa lokuphelele kuye loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, noma ngeke basindziswe embusweni waNkulunkulu.
9.24: Futsi uma bangetukuphendvuka bakholwe egameni lakhe, futsi babhajatiswe egameni lakhe, futsi babeketele kute kube sekugcineni, kufanele balahlwe; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, ukukhulumile loku.
9.25: Ngaloko-ke, unikete umtsetfo; futsi lapho kungekho umtsetfo lonikiwe kute sijeziso; futsi lapho kungekho sijeziso kute kubekwa licala; futsi lapho kute kubekwa licala umusa waloNgwele wa-Israyeli ubabitela kuye, ngenca yenhlawulo; ngoba bakhululwa ngemandla akhe.
9.26: Ngoba inhlawulo yenelisa tidzingeko tekulunga kwakhe kubo bonkhe labo labangenawo umtsetfo loniketiwe kubo, kute bakhululwe kuleso silwane lesesabekako, kufa kanye nesihogo, nadeveli, nelichibi lemlilo nesibabule, lelikuhlupheka lokungapheli; futsi babuyiselwa kuloyo Nkulunkulu lowabanika umphefumulo, longulongcwele waka-Israyeli.
9.27: Kodvwa maye kuye loyo lonikiwe umtsetfo, yebo, loyo lonayo yonkhe imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, njengatsi, loyo loyephulako, futsi loyo locitsa tinsuku tekuvivinywa kwakhe, ngoba simo sakhe siyesabeka!
9.28: Awu lelo lisu lebucili lobubi! Awu kubate, kanye nebutsakatsaka, nebuwula bebantfu! Uma sebafundzile bacabanga kutsi bahlakaniphile, futsi abasilaleli seluleko saNkulunkulu, ngoba basibeka eceleni, bacabanga kutsi bayati, ngaloko-ke, kuhlakanipha kwabo kubuwula futsi akunanzuzo kubo. Futsi bayawubhubha.
9.29: Kodvwa kufundza kuhle uma balalela teluleko taNkulunkulu.
9.30: Kodvwa maye kuto ticebi, leticebile ngekwetintfo temhlaba. Ngoba ngenca yekutsi ticebile tidzelela labamphofu, tihluphe labatfobekile, netinhlitiyo tato tikulengcebo yato; ngaloko-ke, ingcebo yato ingunkulunkulu wato. Futsi bukani, ingcebo yato iyawubhubha kanye nato futsi.
9.31: Futsi maye kuto tihhulu letingetukuva; ngoba tiyawubhubha.
9.32: Maye kuto timphumphutse letingetubona; ngoba nato tiyawubhubha futsi.
9.33: Maye kubo labangakasoki enhlitiyweni, ngoba lwati lwebubi babo luyawubashaya ngelusuku lwekugcina.
9.34: Maye kuye umkhohlisi, ngoba uyawuphonswa phansi esihogweni.
9.35: Maye kuye umbulali lobulala mabomu, ngoba uyawufa.
9.36: Maye kubo labo labenta bugwadla, ngoba bayawuphonswa phansi esihogweni.
9.37: Yebo, maye kubo labo labakhonta tithico, ngoba develi wabo bonkhe bodeveli uyatfokota ngabo.
9.38: Futsi, kwephetsa, maye kubo bonkhe labo labafela etonweni tabo; ngoba bayawubuyela kuNkulunkulu, babone buso bakhe, baphindze bahlale etonweni tabo.
9.39: O, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, khumbulani kwesabeka kwekona loyo Nkulunkulu loyingcwele, futsi ngalokunjalo nekwesabeka kwekuvumela kuyengwa nguloyo lolicili. Khumbulani, kunaka kwasemhlabeni kufa, futsi kunaka kwakamoya kuphila lokuphakadze.
9.40: O, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, nikani indlebe emavini ami. Khumbulani bukhulu baloNgcwele waka-Israyeli. Ningasho kutsi ngikhulume tintfo letilukhuni ngalokumelene nani; ngoba uma nisho kanjalo, nitawulitfuka liciniso; ngoba ngikhulume emavi eMenti wenu. Ngiyati kutsi emavi laliciniso amatima kuko konkhe kungcola; kodvwa labalungile abawesabi, ngoba bayalitsandza liciniso futsi abanyakatiseki.
9.41: Awu uma kunjalo, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, wotani eNkhosini, kuloNgcwele. Khumbulani kutsi tindlela takhe tilungile. Bukani, indlela yemuntfu yincane, kodvwa isendleleni lecondzile phambikwakhe, futsi umgcinisango nguye loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, futsi akacashi sisebenti lapho; futsi kute lenye indlela ngaphandle kwaleyo lesesangweni; ngoba yena akanakukhohliswa, ngoba yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu libito lakhe.
9.42: Futsi loyo lonconcotsako, utawumvulela; futsi labahlakaniphile, kanye nalabafundzile, kanye nalabo labacebile, labo labakhukhumele ngenca yekufundza kwabo, kanye nekuhlakanipha kwabo, kanye nengcebo yabo—yebo, ngibo labo langabanaki; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi balahle leti tintfo kudze, baphindze batibone njengetiwula phambi kwaNkulunkulu, behlele phansi ekujuleni kwekutfobeka, akatubavulela.
9.43: Kodvwa tintfo talabahlakaniphile kanye nalabanekucondza tiyawufihlwa kubo ingunaphakadze—yebo, loko kutfokota lokulungiselwe labangcwele.
9.44: O, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, khumbulani emavi ami. Bukani, ngikhumula tembatfo tami, futsi ngiyatitsintsitsa phambi kwenu; ngithandaza Nkulunkulu wensindziso yami kutsi angibuke ngeliso lakhe lelifuna konkhe; ngaloko-ke, niyawukwati ngelusuku lwekugcina, lapho bonkhe bantfu bayawukwehlulelwa ngemisebenti yabo, kutsi Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli wabona kutsi ngabutsintsitsa bubi benu emphefumulweni wami, futsi nekutsi ngima ngimsulwa phambi kwakhe, futsi ngiyisusile ingati yenu.
9.45: O, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, shiyani tono tenu; tsintsitsani tinketane takhe loyo lofuna kunibopha anicinise; wotani kuloyo Nkulunkulu lolidvwala lensindziso yenu.
9.46: Lungiselelani imiphefumulo yenu lolosuku lwenkhatimulo lapho kulunga kuyawunikwa labalungile, nelusuku lekwehlulela, kute ningashwaphaniswa luvalo lolwesabekako; kute ningakhumbuli kuba nelicala kwenu lokwesabekako ngalokuphelele, futsi niphoceleleke kutsi nimemete nitsi: Tingcwele, tingcwele tehlulelo takho, Awu Nkhosi Nkulunkulu Somandla—kodvwa ngiyakwati kona kwami; ngiwuphulile umtsetfo wakho, nekona kwami kungekwami; futsi develi ungitfolile, kute ngibe yinyama elusizini lwakhe lolukhulu.
9.47: Kodvwa bukani, bomnaketfu, kudzingekile yini kutsi nginivuse ngalamaciniso lasabekako aleti tintfo na? Bengingayuvukuta yini imiphefumulo yenu kube imicondvo yenu beyimsulwa na? Bengingaba yini sobala kini njengekuba sobala kweliciniso kube benikhululiwe esonweni na?
9.48: Bukani, kube beningcwele bengiyokhuluma kini ngebungcwele; kodvwa njengoba ningekho ngcwele, futsi ningibuka njengemfundzisi, kudzingekile kutsi nginifundzise imiphumela yesono.
9.49: Bukani, umphefumulo wami uyasenyanya sono, futsi inhlitiyo yami iyatfokota ngekulunga; futsi ngitawulidvumisa ligama lelingcwele laNkulunkulu wami.
9.50: Wotani, bomnaketfu, nonkhe nine lenomile, wotani emantini; futsi longenamali, akete atotsenga futsi adle; yebo, wota utsenge liwayini kanye nelubisi ngaphandle kwemali futsi nangaphandle kwentsengo.
9.51: Ngaloko-ke, musani kucitsa imali ngaloko lokungenamsebenti, noma nisebentele loko lokungeke kunenelise. Ngilaleleni ngekukhutsala, futsi niwakhumbule emavi lengiwakhulumile; futsi nite kuloNgcwele waka-Israyeli, futsi nititike ngaloko lokungayubhubha, noma lokungayukonakala, futsi nivumele imiphefumulo yenu itfokote ngemanoni.
9.52: Bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, khumbulani emavi aNkulunkulu wenu; thandazani kuye njalo njalo emini, futsi nibonge libito lakhe lelingcwele ebusuku. Tinhlitiyo tenu atitfokote.
9.53: Futsi bukani tinkhulu kanganani tivumelwano teNkhosi, futsi kukhulu kanganani kutehlisa kwayo kubantfwana bebantfu; ngenca yebukhulu bayo, nesihawu kanye nemusa wayo, isetsembisile kutsi intalelwane yetfu ngeke ibhujiswe nya, ngekwasenyameni, kepha kutsi iyoyigcina; futsi etitukulwaneni letitako bayawuba ligala lelilungile endlini yaka-Israyeli.
9.54: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngifuna kukhuluma nani kabanti; kodvwa kusasa ngitawunatisa ngemavi ami lasele. Amen.

10.1: Manje mine, Jakobe, ngikhuluma kini futsi, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, mayelana naleligala lelilungile lengikhulume ngalo.
10.2: Ngoba buka, tetsembiso lesititfolile titetsembiso ngekwasenyameni; ngaloko-ke, njengoba kukhonjisiwe kimi kutsi labaningi bantfwana betfu bayawubhubha enyameni ngenca yekungakholwa, noko, Nkulunkulu utawuba nemusa kulabaningi; futsi bantfwana betfu bayawubuyiswa, kute bete kuko loko lokutawubanika lwati lweliciniso ngeMhlengi wabo.
10.3: Ngaloko-ke, njengoba ngishito kini, kudzingekile kutsi Khristu—ngoba itolo ebusuku ingilosi ikhulumile kimi kutsi leli kuyawuba libito lakhe—uyawufika emkhatsini wemaJuda, emkhatsini walabo labayincenye yemhlaba lenebubi lobukhulu; futsi bayawumbetsela—ngoba ngalendlela kudzingekile kuNkulunkulu wetfu, futsi kute nasinye lesinye sive emhlabeni lesiyawumbetsela Nkulunkulu waso.
10.4: Ngoba uma timangaliso letinkhulu tenteka emkhatsini waletinye tive tiyophendvuka, futsi tati kutsi unguNkulunkulu wato.
10.5: Kodvwa ngenca yebuphristi-mbumbulu kanye nebubi lobukhulu, labaseJerusalema batawucinisa tinhloko tabo ngalokumelene naye, kangangoba uyawubetselwa.
10.6: Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yebubi babo, timbhubhiso, indlala, tifo letingumashayabhuce, kanye nekucitseka kwengati kuyawuta kubo; futsi labo labangeyukubhujiswa bayawuhlakatwa emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive.
10.7: Kodvwa buka, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Uma lusuku lufika lapho bayawukholwa kimi, kutsi nginguKhristu, uma kunjalo ngavumelana naboyise kutsi bayawubuyiselwa enyameni, etikwemhlabeni, etikwemave lamafa abo.
10.8: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi bayawugcogcwa kuko kuhlakateka kwabo kwesikhatsi lesidze, kuto tichingi telwandle, kanye nakuwo emagumbi lamane emhlaba; futsi tive tebeTive tiyawuba tinkhulu emehlweni ami, kusho Nkulunkulu, ekubatfwaleni baye emaveni langemafa abo.
10.9: Yebo, emakhosi ebeTive ayawuba boyise lababondlako, futsi nemakhosikati abo ayawuba bomake labondlako; ngaloko-ke tetsembiso teNkhosi tinkhulu kubo beTive, ngoba ikukhulumile loku, futsi ngubani longakuphikisa na?
10.10: Kodvwa buka, lelive, kusho Nkulunkulu, liyawuba live lelilifa lakho, futsi beTive bayawubusiswa kulelive.
10.11: Futsi lelive kuyawuba live lenkhululeko kubo beTive, futsi akuyuba khona emakhosi kulelive, layawubusa kubo beTive.
10.12: Futsi ngitawulicinisa lelive ngalokumelene nato tonkhe letinye tive.
10.13: Futsi loyo lolwa neSiyoni uyawushabalala, kusho Nkulunkulu.
10.14: Ngoba loyo loyawuphakamisa inkhosi ngalokumelene nami uyawushabalala, ngoba mine, Nkhosi, inkhosi yelizulu, ngitawuba yinkhosi yabo, futsi ngitawuba kukhanya kubo ingunaphakadze, labo labeva emavi ami.
10.15: Ngaloko-ke, ngalesi sizatfu, kute tivumelwano tami tigcwaliseke lengatenta kubo bantfwana bebantfu, kutsi ngitawutenta kubo ngesikhatsi basesenyameni, kufanele ngibhubhise imisebenti lefihlakele yebumnyama, kanye neyebabulali, kanye neyetinengiso.
10.16: Ngaloko-ke, loyo lolwa neSiyoni, liJuda kanye neweTive, loboshiwe kanye nalokhululekile, wesilisa kanye newesifazane, uyawushabalala; ngoba ngibo labo labatifebe temhlaba wonkhe; ngoba labo lokungesibo bami bamelene nami, kusho Nkulunkulu wetfu.
10.17: Ngoba ngitawutigcwalisa tetsembiso tami lengatenta kubantfwana bebantfu, tekutsi ngitawutenta kubo ngesikhatsi basesenyameni—
10.18: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, naku lokushiwo nguNkulunkulu wetfu: Ngitawuyihlupha intalelwane yakho ngesandla sebeTive; noko, ngitawutitsambisa tinhlitiyo tebeTive, kute babe njengeyise kuyo; ngaloko-ke, beTive bayawubusiswa futsi babalwe nendlu yaka-Israyeli.
10.19: Ngaloko-ke, ngitawulingcwelisa lelive kuyo intalelwane yakho, kanye nalabo labayawubalwa nentalelwane yakho, ingunaphakadze, kube live lelilifa labo, ngoba lilive lelikhetsiwe, kusho Nkulunkulu kimi, ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave, ngaloko-ke ngitawukwenta bonkhe bantfu labahlala kulo kutsi bangikhonte, kusho Nkulunkulu.
10.20: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngekubona kutsi Nkulunkulu wetfu lonemusa usinikile lwati lolukhulu kakhulu mayelana naleti tintfo, asimkhumbule, futsi sibeke eceleni tono tetfu, singatilengisi tinhloko tetfu, ngoba asikalahlwa; noko, sikhishiwe eveni lelilifa letfu; kodvwa siholelwe eveni lelincono, ngoba iNkhosi yente lwandle lwaba yindlela yetfu, futsi sitikwesichingi selwandle.
10.21: Kodvwa tinkhulu tetsembiso teNkhosi kulabo labasetichingini telwandle; ngaloko-ke njengoba kutsiwa tichingi, kufanele kutsi kukhona letingetulu kwalesi, futsi nato ngalokunjalo tigcwaliswe ngabomnaketfu.
10.22: Ngoba bukani, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iholele kudze tikhatsi ngetikhatsi indlu yaka-Israyeli, ngekwentsandvo nangekwesifiso sayo. Manje bukani, iNkhosi iyabakhumbula bonkhe labo labahleshuliwe, ngaloko-ke iyasikhumbula sonkhe natsi.
10.23: Ngako-ke, tfokotani etinhlitiyweni tenu, futsi nikhumbule kutsi nikhululekile kutentela ngekwenu—kukhetsa indlela yekufa lokuphakadze noma indlela yekuphila lokuphakadze.
10.24: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, buyisanani nentsandvo yaNkulunkulu, hhayi nentsandvo yadeveli kanye neyenyama; nikhumbule, emvakwekutsi senibuyisene naNkulunkulu, kutsi kukuso futsi kungaso sihawu saNkulunkulu kuphela kutsi niyasindziswa.
10.25: Ngaloko-ke, shengatsi Nkulunkulu anganivusa ekufeni ngemandla ekuvuka, futsi ngalokunjalo nakuko kufa lokuphakadze ngemandla enhlawulo, kute nemukelwe embusweni lophakadze waNkulunkulu, kute nimdvumise ngesihawu saNkulunkulu. Amen.

11.1: Manje, Jakobe wakhuluma letiningi kakhulu tintfo kubantfu bami ngaleso sikhatsi: noko nguleti tintfo kuphela lengente kutsi tibhalwe, ngoba tintfo lengitibhalile tiyangenelisa.
11.2: Manje mine, Nefi, ngibhala lokuningi lokungemavi a-Isaya, ngoba umphefumulo wami uyatfokota emavini akhe. Ngoba ngitawubhekisa emavi akhe kubantfu bami, futsi ngitawutfumela kubo bonkhe bantfwana bami, ngoba ngempela wambona uMhlengi wami, njengoba nami ngimbonile.
11.3: Futsi umnaketfu, Jakobe, ngalokunjalo naye umbonile njengoba nami ngimbonile; ngaloko-ke, ngitawuwatfumela emavi abo kubo labantfwana bami kubacinisekisa kutsi emavi ami aliciniso. Ngaloko-ke, ngemavi alabatsatfu, Nkulunkulu utsite, ngitawulimisa livi lami. Noko, Nkulunkulu utfumela bofakazi labaningi, futsi uyawacinisekisa emavi akhe onkhe.
11.4: Bukani, umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ekuboniseni bantfu bami liciniso lekuta kwaKhristu; ngoba, ngalesi sizatfu umtsetfo waMosi uniketiwe; futsi tonkhe tintfo letiniketwe nguNkulunkulu kusukela ekucaleni kwemhlaba, tiya kumuntfu, tiluphawu lwakhe.
11.5: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko umphefumulo wami uyatfokota etivumelwaneni teNkhosi leyitente kubobabe betfu; yebo, umphefumulo wami uyatfokota kuso sihawu sakhe, nasekulungeni kwakhe, nasemandleni, kanye nasemseni lomkhulu nelisu laphakadze lekukhululwa ekufeni.
11.6: Futsi umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ekuboniseni bantfu bami kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi Khristu afike bonkhe bantfu kufanele babhubhe.
11.7: Ngoba uma kute Khristu ngeke abe khona Nkulunkulu; futsi uma kuteNkulunkulu tsine asikho, ngoba beyingeke ibe khona indalo. Kepha ukhona Nkulunkulu, futsi unguKhristu, futsi uyawufika ngekuphelela kwesikhatsi sakhe.
11.8: Manje ngibhala lamanye emavi a-Isaya, kute noma ngubani kubantfu bami labayawuwabona lamavi baphakamise tinhlitiyo tabo futsi bajabule ngebantfu bonkhe. Manje ngulawa lamavi, futsi ngingawafanekisa nani nakubo bonkhe bantfu.

12.1: Livi Isaya, indvodzana ya-Amose, lalibona mayelana naJuda kanye neJerusalema:
12.2: Futsi kuyawukwenteka ngetinsuku tekugcina, ngesikhatsi intsaba yendlu yeNkhosi iyawuwakhiwa esicongweni setintsaba, iyawuphakanyiswa ngetulu kwemagcuma, futsi tonkhe tive tiyawubekelela tiye kuyo.
12.3: Bantfu labaningi bayawuhamba batsi: Wotani, sikhuphukele entsabeni yeNkhosi, kuyo indlu yaNkulunkulu waJakobe; itawusifundzisa ngetindlela tayo, futsi sitawuhamba emikhondvweni yayo; ngoba eSiyoni kuyawuvela umtsetfo, nelivi leNkhosi liyawuvela eJerusalema.
12.4: Futsi uyawukwehlulela emkhatsini wetive, iyawukhuta bantfu labaningi: futsi bayawugandza tinkemba tabo tibe ngemakhuba, netikhali tabo tibe bocelemba—sive asiyuphakamisela lesinye sive inkemba, futsi angeke basaya kuyawufundzela imphi nanini.
12.5: Awu yindlu yaJakobe, wota futsi asihambe ekukhanyeni kweNkhosi; yebo, wotani, ngoba nonkhe nidukile, ngamunye etindleleni takhe tebubi.
12.6: Ngako-ke, Awu Nkhosi, ubalahlile bantfu bakho, indlu yaJakobe, ngenca yekutsi bagcwaliswa basemphumalanga, futsi balalela baphenguli njengemaFilisti, futsi batitfokotisa ebantfwaneni betihambi.
12.7: Live labo ligcwele isiliva kanye neligolide, futsi kute kuphela kuyo ingcebo yabo; live labo ngetulu kwaloko ligcwele emahhashi, futsi kute kuphela kuto tincola temphi.
12.8: Live labo futsi ligcwele tithico; bakhonta umsebenti wetandla tabo lucobo, loko labakwente ngeminwe yabo lucobo.
12.9: Futsi umuntfu nje akakhotsami, nemuntfu lomkhulu akatehlisi, ngako-ke, akangacolelwa.
12.10: Awu nine lababi, ngenani edvwaleni, nibhace elutfulini, ngenca yekwesaba iNkhosi kanye nenkhatimulo yebukhosi bayo lokuyawunishaya.
12.11: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi kubuka kwemuntfu lotigcabhako kuyawutfotjiswa, kanye nekutikhukhumeta kwebantfu kuyawukhotsanyiswa, futsi yiNkhosi kuphela leyawuphakanyiswa ngalolosuku.
12.12: Ngoba lusuku lweNkhosi yemaBandla luyeta masinyane etikwato tonkhe tive, yebo, kubobonkhe; yebo, kulabatichenyako kanye nalabatigcabhako, nasetikwabo bonkhe labo labatiphakamisako, futsi bayawukwehliswa.
12.13: Yebo, lusuku lweNkhosi luyawufika etikwayo yonkhe imisedari yaseLebanoni, ngoba iphakeme futsi iyatigcabha; etikwawo onkhe ema-oki aseBhashani;
12.14: Nasetikwato tonkhe tintsaba, nasetikwawo onkhe emagcuma, nasetikwato tonkhe tive letiphakeme, nasetikwabo bonkhe bantfu;
12.15: Futsi nasetikwayo yonkhe imibhoshongo lemidze, kanye nasetikwato tonkhe tindvonga letibiyelwe;
12.16: Nasetikwayo yonkhe imikhumbi yaselwandle, nasetikwayo yonkhe imikhumbi yaseThashishi, nasetikwato tonkhe titfombe letinhle.
12.17: Futsi kutiphakamisa kwemuntfu kuyawutfotjiswa, kanye nekutikhukhumeta kwebantfu kuyawukwehliswa; futsi yiNkhosi kuphela leyawuphakanyiswa ngalolosuku.
12.19: Futsi bayawungena emihumeni yemadvwala, kanye nasemigedzeni yemhlaba, ngoba kwesaba iNkhosi kuyawufika etikwabo nenkhatimulo yebukhosi bayo iyawubashaya, ngesikhatsi ivukela kutamatamisa kamatima umhlaba.
12.20: Ngalolosuku umuntfu uyawulahla tithico takhe tesiliva, kanye netithico takhe teligolide, latentele tona kutikhonta, kuto timvukunyane kanye nemalulwane;
12.21: Kute bangene emifantfwini yemadvwala, kanye naseticongweni tetihhehle temadvwala, ngoba kwesaba iNkhosi kuyawufika etikwabo kanye nebukhosi benkhatimulo yayo buyawubashaya, ngesikhatsi ivukela kutamatamisa kamatima umhlaba.
12.22: Yekela kwetsembela kumuntfu, umphefumulo wakhe losemakhaleni akhe; ngoba bayini nje

13.1: Ngoba buka, iNkhosi, iNkhosi yemaBandla, isusa eJerusalema, kanye nakuJuda, lokungenako kanye nalokubasekelako, sinkhwa sonkhe lesibasekelako, kanye nemanti onkhe langenako.
13.2: Indvodza lelichawe, kanye nendvodza yemphi, umehluleli, kanye nemphrofethi, kanye nalohlakaniphile, kanye nalomdzala.
13.3: Indvuna yemashumi lasihlanu, kanye nemuntfu lohloniphekile, kanye nemeluleki, kanye nengcweti lehlakaniphile, kanye nesikhulumi lesinelikhono.
13.4: Futsi ngitawubanika bantfwana kutsi babe ngemakhosi abo, nebantfwana bayawubusa ngetulu kwabo.
13.5: Futsi bantfu bayawucindzetelwa, nguloyo naloyo, futsi nguloyo naloyo acindzetele makhelwane wakhe, umntfwana uyawuhamba ngeligcabho phambi kwalabadzala, ngalokunjalo nesisekelo kubo labahloniphekile.
13.6: Lapho umuntfu ayawubamba umnakabo wendlu yeyise, atsi: Wena unesembatfo, bani ngumbusi wetfu, futsi ungawuvumeli lomonakalo ute ngaphansi kwesandla sakho—
13.7: Ngalolosuku uyawufunga, atsi: Angituba ngumelaphi; ngoba endlini yami kute sinkhwa netembatfo; ningangenti umbusi webantfu.
13.8: Ngoba iJerusalema icitsiwe, futsi naJuda uwile, ngenca yekutsi tilimi tabo kanye netento tabo betiphambene neNkhosi, kuchukuluta emehlo enkhatimulo yayo.
13.9: Simo sebuso babo siyafakaza ngalokumelene nabo, futsi simemetela sono sabo kutsi sibe njengeseSodoma, futsi ngeke basifihle. Maye emiphefumulweni yabo, ngoba batiletsele bubi.
13.10: Tjelani labalungile kutsi kutawubahambela kahle; ngoba bayawudla titselo tetento tabo.
13.11: Maye kulababi, ngoba bayawubhujiswa; ngoba umvuzo wetandla tabo uyawuba setikwabo!
13.12: Bantfu bami, bantfwana babacindzeteli babo, futsi besifazane bayabusa ngetulu kwabo. Awu bantfu bami, labo labaniholako benta kutsi niphambuke futsi bashabalalisa indlela lenihamba ngayo.
13.13: INkhosi imele kunincusela, futsi imele kwehlulela bantfu.
13.14: INkhosi itawungena ekwehluleleni nalabadzala bebantfu bayo kanye nemakhosana abo; ngoba nidle sivini kanye nemphango yalabamphofu etindlini tenu.
13.15: Nisho kutsini na? Nishaya bantfu bami babe ticucu, futsi nigaya buso balabamphofu, kusho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wemaBandla.
13.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, iNkhosi itsi: Ngenca yekutsi emadvodzakati aseSiyoni ayatigcabha, ahamba netintsamo leteluliwe kanye nemehlo lacwashatako, ashayela etulu ekuhambeni kwawo, futsi enta kukhehleta ngetinyawo tawo.
13.17: Ngaloko-ke iNkhosi itawushaya ngetilondza umchele wetinhloko temadvodzakati aseSiyoni, futsi iNkhosi itawuveta tincenye letifihlekile tabo.
13.18: Ngalolosuku iNkhosi itawubemuka bucwebecwebe bemijiva yawo lekhehletelako, kanye netigcoko letinemanethi, kanye nemibhodze letindingilizi njengenyanga;
13.20: Tigcoko, nemijiva yemilente, nemichele, nemakha, kanye nemacici etindlebe;
13.22: Tembatfo letingagcokwa naletinye, netembatfo temikhosi, netembatfo tekumbonya buso nentsamo, kanye netipeleti tetinwele;
13.23: Tibuko, kanye nelineni lecolisakele, kanye nemishuculo, kanye nemaveyili.
13.24: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi, esikhundleni semakha kuyawuba khona luboti; esikhundleni selibhande, kudzabuka; esikhundleni setinwele letilungiswe kahle, imphandla; esikhundleni setembatfo letinhle, kwembatsa ingubo yelisaka; sishadza esikhundleni sebuhle.
13.25: Emadvodza akho ayawufa ngenkemba kanye nemachawe akho emphini.
13.26: Futsi emasango ayo ayawulila futsi akhale; iyawubate lutfo, futsi iyawuhlala phansi.

14.1: Futsi ngalolosuku, besifazane labasikhombisa bayawubamba indvodza yinye batsi: Sitawudla sinkhwa setfu, sembatse tingubo tetfu; kuphela nje sivumele sibitwe ngelibito lakho kute ususe lihlazo kitsi.
14.2: Ngalolosuku ligala leNkhosi liyawuba lihle futsi likhatimule; sitselo semhlaba siyoba sihle kakhulu futsi sibukeke kulabo labaphunyuka baka-Israyeli.
14.3: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi, labo labashiywe eSiyoni basala eJerusalema bayawubitwa ngekutsi ngulabangcwele, bonkhe labo lababhalwe emkhatsini walabaphilako eJerusalema—
14.4: Lapho iNkhosi seyikugezile kungcola kwemadvodzakati aseSiyoni, futsi nalapho seyiyesulile ingati yaseJerusalema ekhatsi kwayo ngemoya wekwehlulela kanye nangemoya wekushisa.
14.5: Futsi iNkhosi itawudala etikwayo yonkhe indzawo yekuhlala yentsaba yaseSiyoni, nalabahlanganela kuyo; lifu kanye nentfutfu emini kanye nekukhanya kwelilangabi lemlilo ebusuku; ngoba etikwayo yonkhe inkhatimulo yaseSiyoni kuyawuba khona kuvikelwa.
14.6: Futsi kuyawuba khona lidvokodvo lemtfunti emini ekushiseni, libe yindzawo yekuphephela kanye neyekukhosela kuto tivunguvungu nakuyo imvula.

15.1: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi ngitawumhlabelela lotsandziwe kakhulu wami ingoma yalotsandziwe wami, mayelana nesivini sakhe. Lotsandziwe kakhulu wami unesivini egcumeni lelivundze kakhulu.
15.2: Futsi wasibiyela, wakhipha nematje kuso, wasihlanyela ngemvini welikhetselo kakhulu, wakha umbhoshongo ekhatsi kuso, waphindze wakha sikhamo seliwayini kuso; abheke kutsi kufanele sitsele emagelebisi, kodvwa satsela emagelebisi esiganga.
15.3: Manje, Awu takhamuti taseJerusalema, kanye nani madvodza akaJuda, yehlulelani, ngiyanincusa, emkhatsini wami nesivini sami.
15.4: Ngabe yini lenye lebekufanele ngiyente esivinini sami loko lengingakwentanga kuso na? Ngaloko-ke, ngesikhatsi ngisabukile kutsi kufanele sitsele emagelebisi sona sitsele emagelebisi asendle.
15.5: Manje hambani; ngitawunitjela kutsi ngitawukwentani ngalesivini sami—ngitawususa lutsango lwaso, siyawudliwa siphele; ngitawulubhidlita lubondza lwaso, futsi siyawunyatselwa phansi;
15.6: Futsi ngitawusiyekela simoshakale; asiyukutsenwa noma sivukutwe; kodvwa kuyawuvela tinchachabutane kanye nemanyeva; ngetulu kwaloko ngitawuyala emafu kutsi anganisi imvula etikwaso.
15.7: Ngoba sivini seNkhosi yemaBandla yindlu yaka-Israyeli, bantfu bakaJuda basitfombo sakhe lesitsandzekako; ulindzele kwehlulela, kodvwa bukani, kucindzetelwa; ulindzele kulunga, kodvwa bukani, kukhala.
15.8: Maye kulabo labangeta indlu kulenye indlu, kute kungasabi nendzawo, kutsi bahlaliswe bodvwa ekhatsi nekhatsi kwemhlaba!
15.9: Etindlebeni tami, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, ngekweliciniso letiningi tindlu tiyawubate lutfo, futsi lamakhulu kanye nalamahle emadolobha akayukuba nebantfu.
15.10: Yebo, ema-eka lalishumi esivini ayawutsela ibhathi yinye, kanye nenhlanyelo yelihomere iyawutsela li-efa.
15.11: Maye kulabo labavuka ekuseni ngeluvivi, kute balandzele sinatfo lesinemandla, labo labachubeka kute kuhlwe, futsi badzakwe liwayini!
15.12: Lihabhu, nevayolini, nesigubhu, nemntjingozi, kanye neliwayini emadzilini abo; kodvwa abawatisi umsebenti weNkhosi, noma bacabange ngetento tetandla tayo.
15.13: Ngako-ke, bantfu bami bangene ekutfunjweni, ngenca yekubate lwati; futsi nebantfu labahloniphekile babo bafile yindlala, futsi ticuku tabo tihashulwe koma.
15.14: Ngako-ke, sihogo sitandzisile, futsi savula umlomo waso ngalokwecile; inkhatimulo yabo, nesicuku sabo, nemakhosi abo, kanye naloyo lojabulako, bayawukwehlela kuso.
15.15: Futsi umuntfu lodzelelekile uyawukwehliswa, nemuntfu lomkhulu uyawutfotjiswa, nemehlo alabatiphakamisako ayawutfotjiswa.
15.16: Kodvwa iNkhosi yemaBandla iyawuphakanyiswa ekwehlulelweni, naNkulunkulu longcwele uyawungcweliswa ekulungeni.
15.17: Ngaleso sikhatsi emawundlu ayawudla ngendlela yawo, nasetindzaweni leticitsiwe talabacebile kuyawudla tihambi.
15.18: Maye kulabo labadvonsa bubi ngetintsambo letilite, kanye nesono kungatsi yintsambo yencola;
15.19: Labo labatsi: Akaphutfume, asheshise umsebenti wakhe, kute siwubone: neseluleko saloNgcwele waka-Israyeli asisondzele futsi sifike, kute sisati.
15.20: Maye kulabo lababita bubi ngebuhle, nebuhle ngebubi, labo lababeka bumnyama bube kukhanya, nekukhanya kube bumnyama, labo lababeka lokubabako kube ngulokunongotelako, nalokunongotelako kube ngulokubabako!
15.21: Maye kulabo labahlakaniphile emehlweni abo kanye nalabanekucondza ngekubona kwabo!
15.22: Maye kulabo labangemachawe ekunatseni liwayini, nebantfu labangemachawe ekudidiyeleni sinatfo lesinemandla;
15.23: Labavumela lababi kute batfole umvuzo, labasusa kulunga kulolungile!
15.24: Ngako-ke, njengemlilo ushisa tinhlanga, kanye nelilangabi lidla emabibi, imphandze yabo iyawubola, futsi timbali tabo tiyawuphephuka njengelutfuli; ngenca yekutsi bawulahlile umtsetfo weNkhosi yemaBandla, futsi balidzelela livi laloNgcwele waka-Israyeli.
15.25: Ngako-ke, intfukutselo yeNkhosi yokhelekile kubantfu bayo, futsi iselulile sandla sayo kubo, yabashaya; emagcuma anyakata, tidvumbu tabo tadzabuka ekhatsi etitaladini. Noko kuko konkhe loku intfukutselo yakhe ayikapheli, kodvwa sandla sayo siseluliwe.
15.26: Futsi itawuphakamisa siboniso etiveni letikhashane, iphindze ishaye impembe kusukela emkhawulweni wemhlaba; futsi bukani, tiyawukuta masinyane ngelitubane; kute namunye loyawukhatsala noma akhubatele emkhatsini wato.
15.27: Kute namunye loyawutela noma alale; noma libhande letinkhalo tabo liceke, noma imichilo yeticatfulo tabo idzabuke;
15.28: Imicibisholo yabo leyawukhalipha, kanye nabo bonkhe butjoki babo bugotjwe, futsi tinselo temahhashi abo tiyawubalwa njengelitje lelicine kakhulu, kanye nemasondvo abo njengesivunguvungu, kubhodla kwabo njengekwelibhubesi.
15.29: Bayawubhodla njengemabhubesi lamancane; yebo bayawubhodla, bayibambe inyamatane, bayawukwemuka nayo ngekuphepha, futsi kute namunye longayikhulula.
15.30: Futsi ngalolosuku bayawubhodla ngetulu ngalokumelene nabo njengekuhlokoma kwelwandle; uma babuka eveni, bukani, bumnyama kanye nelusizi, nekukhanya kwentiwe kube mnyama emazulwini ako.

16.1: Ngemnyaka iNkhosi Uziya leyafa ngawo, ngayibona iNkhosi ihleti esihlalweni sayo sebukhosi, lesisetulu futsi lesiphakeme, umsila wesembatfo sayo wawugcwalise lithempeli.
16.2: Ngetulu kwaso kwakume emaserafi; ngulelo nalelo lalinetimphiko letisitfupha; ngetimphiko letimbili atimbonye buso bawo, ngaletimbili atimbonye tinyawo tawo, kwatsi ngaleti letimbili andiza.
16.3: Linye lalimemeta kulelinye, latsi: Ingcwele, ingcwele, ingcwele iNkhosi yemaBandla; umhlaba wonkhe ugcwele inkhatimulo yayo.
16.4: Tinsika temnyango tatfutfumela ngenca yelivi lakhe loyo lobekamemeta, futsi indlu yagcwala intfutfu.
16.5: Emvakwaloko ngatsi: Maye kimi! Ngoba ngiphelile; Ngenca yekutsi ngingumuntfu lotindzebe takhe tingcolile; futsi ngihleti ekhatsi kwebantfu labatindzebe tabo tingcolile; ngoba emehlo ami ayibonile iNkhosi, iNkhosi yemaBandla.
16.6: Emvakwaloko linye lemaserafi landiza leta kimi, liphetse lilahle lelivutsako esandleni salo, lelalilitsatse ngeludlawu elatini;
16.7: Futsi lalibeka emlonyeni wami, latsi: Buka, loku kutsintse tindzebe takho; bubi bakho bususiwe, netono takho tihlantiwe.
16.8: Ngetulu kwaloko ngeva livi leNkhosi, litsi: Ngubani lengiyawumtfuma, futsi ngubani lotawusiyela na? Emvakwaloko ngatsi: Nangu mine; tfuma mine.
16.9: Futsi yatsi: Hamba utjele laba bantfu—Lalelani njalo, kodvwa abatange bacondze; bonani njalo, kodvwa abatange babone.
16.10: Yenta inhlitiyo yalaba bantfu ikhuluphale, wente tindlebe tabo tibe butfuntfu, uvale emehlo abo—hleze babone ngemehlo abo, futsi beve ngetindlebe tabo, baphindze bacondze ngenhlitiyo yabo, baphendvuke bese bayaphiliswa.
16.11: Emvakwaloko ngatsi: Nkhosi, kutawute kube nini na? Yatsi: Kudzimate kubhujiswe emadolobha kubete bantfu labahlala khona, netindlu tingabe tisaba nebantfu, nelive lisale lingenalutfo.
16.12: Futsi iNkhosi ibasakatele kudze bantfu, ngoba kuyawuba khona incitsakalo lenkhulu ngekhatsi kwalelive.
16.13: Kodvwa ngisho namanje kuyawuba khona incenye yelishumi, bayawubuya, futsi bayawudliwa, njengesihlahla semtherebinte, nanjenge-oki lesiphunti sayo sikuwo lapho basusa emacembe ayo; kute intalelwane lengcwele ibe siphunti saso.

17.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi etinsukwini ta-Ahazi indvodzana yaJothamu, indvodzana ya-Uziya, inkhosi yakaJuda, Resini, inkhosi yaseSiriya, kanye naPhekha indvodzana yaRemaliya, inkhosi yaka-Israyeli, bahamba bakhuphukela ngaseJerusalema kuyolwa nayo, kepha abakwatanga kuyincoba.
17.2: Futsi kwatjelwa indlu yaDavide, kutsi: ISiriya itihlanganise na-Efrayimu. Futsi inhlitiyo yakhe yatfutfumela, kanye netinhlitiyo tebantfu bakhe, njengetihlahla telihlatsi tinyakatiswa ngumoya.
17.3: Emvakwaloko iNkhosi yatsi ku-Isaya: Hamba nyalo uhlangabete Ahazi, wena kanye naSherayi Jashubi indvodzana yakho, ekugcineni kwemsele wesitiba lesingenhla kwemgwaco lomkhulu ensimini yemgezi wetingubo;
17.4: Futsi utsi kuye: Caphela, uthule; ungesabi, noma ungaphelelwa ngemandla ngenca yemisila lemibili yaleti tinkhuni letishuncako, ngenca yelulaka lolwesabekako lwaResini neSiriya, kanye nelwendvodzana yaRemaliya.
17.5: Ngenca yekutsi iSiriya, na- Efrayimu, kanye nendvodzana yaRemaliya bakwakhela luzungu, batsi:
17.6: Asikhuphuke siyobukana naJuda futsi simhluphe, asitehlukanisele yena, futsi sibeke inkhosi emkhatsini wakhe, yebo, indvodzana yaThabheyeli.
17.7: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Akuyukwenteka, noma kuphumelele.
17.8: Ngoba inhloko yeSiriya yiDamaseko, nenhloko yeDamaseko, nguResini; futsi ekhatsi kweminyaka lengemashumi lasitfupha nesihlanu Efrayimu iyawuhlakatwa kute angabe asaba nebantfu.
17.9: Inhloko ya-Efrayimu yiSamariya, nenhloko yeSamariya yindvodzana yaRemaliya. Uma ningetukukholwa ngempela aniyukumiswa.
17.10: Ngetulu kwaloko, iNkhosi yaphindze yakhuluma ku-Ahazi, itsi:
17.11: Cela sibonakaliso eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wakho; sicele noma sisekujuleni, noma ekuphakameni kwasezulwini.
17.12: Kodvwa Ahazi watsi: Angeke ngisicele, futsi angeke ngiyilinge iNkhosi.
17.13: Futsi watsi: Lalela nyalo, Awu yindlu yaDavide; ngabe kuyintfo lencane yini kuwe kukhatsata bantfu, kodvwa ungamkhatsata yini naNkulunkulu wami na?
17.14: Ngako-ke, iNkhosi lucobo lwayo iyawunniika sibonakaliso—Bukani, intfombi iyawukhulelwa, iyawutala indvodzana, iyawumetsa libito layo kutsi ngu-Imanyuweli.
17.15: Iyawudla bhotela kanye neluju, kute ikwati kwala lokubi ikhetse lokuhle.
17.16: Ngoba ngaphambi kwekutsi umntfwana akwati kwala lokubi futsi akhetse lokuhle, lelive lewulenyanyako liyawube selishiywe ngiwo omabili emakhosi alo.
17.17: INkhosi iyawuletsa etikwakho, nasetikwebantfu bakho, nasetikwendlu yeyihlo, tinsuku letingakefiki kusukela ngelusuku Efrayimu esuka ngalo kaJuda, inkhosi yase-Asiriya.
17.18: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngalolosuku iNkhosi iyawushayela imphungane inkwela lesencenyeni yekugcina yeGibhithe, kanye nenyosi leseveni lase-Asiriya.
17.19: Futsi tiyawukuta, tiphumule tonkhe etihosheni letehlelako, nasemifantfwini yemadvwala, nasetikwawo onkhe emanyeva, nasetikwato tonkhe tihlahla.
17.20: Ngalolosuku iNkhosi iyawuhhula ngensingo lecashiwe, ngabo labangesheya kwemfula, iNkhosi yase-Asiriya, inhloko, kanye nelunwele lwetinyawo; futsi ngetulu kwaloko iyawusicedza nesilevu.
17.21: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngalolosuku, umuntfu uyawuwondla litfole kanye netimvu letimbili;
17.22: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, ngenca yebuningi belubisi letiyawulukhipha uyawukudla bhotela; ngoba bhotela kanye neluju wonkhe muntfu losele eveni uyawukudla.
17.23: Futsi kuyawukwenteka ngalolosuku, tonkhe tindzawo letiyawuba khona, lapho kwakukhona imivini letinkhulungwane letilingana netinhlavu letitinkhulungwane tesiliva, kuyawuba tenchachabutane nemanyeva.
17.24: Ngemicibisholo kanye nebutjoki bantfu bayawukuta lapho, ngoba lonkhe live liyawuba tinchachabutane nemanyeva.
17.25: Futsi onkhe emagcuma ayawulinywa ngeligeja, lapho kungeke kusaba khona kwesaba tinchachabutane kanye nemanyeva; kodvwa ayawuba ekuchuba tinkhabi, kanye nekugcotjwagcotjwa timvu kanye netimbuti letincane ngelinani.

18.1: Ngetulu kwaloko, livi leNkhosi latsi kimi: Tsatsa incwadzi lenkhulu legocotwako, ubhale kuyo ngelutsi lolwetayelekile, mayelana naMaheri-shalali-hashi-bazi.
18.2: Ngatsatsa bofakazi labatsembekile kutsi babhale, Uriya umphristi, kanye naZakhariya indvodzana yaJeberekhiya.
18.3: Ngaya kumphrofethikati; futsi wakhulelwa watala indvodzana. Emvakwaloko yatsi iNkhosi kimi: Camba libito layo utsi, nguMaheri-shalali-hashi-bazi.
18.4: Ngoba bukani, lomntfwana akanawukwati kutsi, Babe, noma make, ngaphambi kwekutsi ingcebo yaseDamaseko nemphango yaseSamariya kutsatfwe yiNkhosi yase-Asiriya.
18.6: Njengoba labantfu bawalile emanti aseShilowa lehla kamnandzi, bajabulela Resini kanye nendvodzana yaRemaliya;
18.7: Ngako-ke manje, bukani, iNkhosi iletsa etikwabo emanti emfula, lanemandla futsi lamaningi, ngisho inkhosi yase-Asiriya nenkhatimulo yayo yonkhe; futsi uyawuta ugcwale uphuphume kuyo yonkhe imifula yayo, futsi yendlule lonkhe lusentse lwayo.
18.8: Futsi uyawundlula kaJuda; uyawugcwala uphuphume futsi ukhukhule, uyawufinyelela nasentsanyeni; futsi kuvuleka kwemaphiko awo kuyawugcwalisa bubanti belive lakho, Awu Imanyuweli.
18.9: Tihlanganiseni, Awu nine bantfu, niyawuhleshulwa nibe ticucu; futsi phanini indlebe nonkhe nine mave lakhashane; tibopheni, niyawuhleshulwa nibe ticucu; tibopheni, niyawuhleshulwa nibe ticucu.
18.10: Bonisanani, kodvwa kuyawuba lite; khulumani livi, kodvwa aliyukuma; ngoba Nkulunkulu unatsi.
18.11: Ngoba iNkhosi yakhuluma kanje kimi ngesandla lesinemandla, futsi yangiyala kutsi ngingahambi ngendlela yalaba bantfu, yatsi:
18.12: Ningasho kutsi, Luzungu, kubo bonkhe labo bantfu labayawutsi, Luzungu; futsi ningakwesabi labakwesabako, noma nibe neluvalo.
18.13: Yingcweliseni iNkhosi yemaBandla lucobo lwayo, futsi yenteni ibe kwesaba kwenu, futsi yenteni ibe kutfutfumela kwenu.
18.14: Futsi iyawuba siphephelo; kodvwa iyoba litje lelisikhubekiso, futsi ibe lidvwala lelisinengiso kuto totimbili tindlu taka-Israyeli, ngoba iyoba lugibe kanye nasochaka kulabahlala eJerusalema.
18.15: Futsi labaningi emkhatsini wabo bayawukhubatela bawe, bephuke, batsiywe, futsi batsatfwe.
18.16: Bophisisa bufakazi, uvalele umtsetfo emkhatsini webafundzi bami.
18.17: Ngitawuyilindza iNkhosi, lefihla buso bayo kuyo indlu yaJakobe, futsi ngitawuyilindzela.
18.18: Bukani, mine kanye nebantfwana iNkhosi lenginike bona sibe tibonakaliso kanye netimangaliso ka-Israyeli letivela eNkhosini yemaBandla, lehlala eNtsabeni yaseSiyoni.
18.19: Futsi lapho bayawutsi kini: Funani kulababhulako, kanye nakubatsakatsi labanhhinklilako futsi bahlebe batsi—akukafaneli yini bantfu babute Nkulunkulu wabo kunekutsi labaphilako beve ngalabafile na?
18.20: Kuwo umtsetfo kanye nakubo bufakazi; uma bangakhulumi ngekwelivi, kungenca yekutsi kute kukhanya kubo.
18.21: Futsi bayawendlula kuko kuhlupheka bahacwe bulukhuni futsi balambe; futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi uma sebalambile, bayawucansuka, bayicalekise iNkhosi yabo kanye naNkulunkulu wabo, futsi babuke etulu.
18.22: Futsi bayawubuka emhlabeni babone kukhatsateka, nebumnyama, nekufiphala ngenca yelusizi, futsi bayawufucelwa ebumnyameni.

19.1: Noko, kufiphala angeke kusaba njengoba kwakunjalo ngesikhatsi setinhlupheko takhe, lapho ekucaleni yatsi kulihlupha kancane live lakaZebuloni, kanye nelive lakaNaftali, futsi emvakwaloko yahlupha kakhulu endleleni leya eLwandle loluBovu ngensheya kweJordane eGalile letive.
19.2: Bantfu labebahamba ebumnyameni bakubonile kukhanya lokukhulu; labo labahlela eveni lelitfunti lekufa, etikwabo kukhanya kubakhanyisele.
19.3: Usandzisile sive, futsi wandzisa intfokoto—batfokota phambi kwakho njengentfokoto yekuvuna, nanjengentfokoto yebantfu uma babelana imphango.
19.4: Ngoba ulephulile lijoke lemtfwalo wakhe, kanye nesagila semahlombe akhe, nendvuku yebacindzeteli bakhe.
19.5: Ngoba konkhe kulwa kwelibutfo kunesiyaluyalu semsindvo, futsi tingubo tibhucabhucwe engatini; kodvwa loku kuyawuba nekuvutsa kanye nekushisa kwemlilo.
19.6: Ngoba sitalelwe umntfwana, siphiwe indvodzana; umbuso uyawuba semahlombe akhe; libito lakhe kuyawutsiwa, nguLomangalisako, nguMeluleki, nguNkulunkulu loneMandla, nguBabe longunaPhakadze, iNkhosana yekuThula.
19.7: Kukhula kwembuso kanye nekuthula akunasiphetfo, etikwesihlalo sebukhosi saDavide, kanye nakuwo umbuso wakhe kutsi awuhlele, kanye nekuwumisa ngekwehlulela kanye nekulunga kusukela nyalo nasemvakwaloku, nangunaphakadze. Inshisekelo yeNkhosi yemaBandla itawukwenta loku.
19.8: INkhosi itfumele livi layo kuJakobe futsi likhanyisile etikwa-Israyeli.
19.9: Futsi bonkhe bantfu bayawulati, baka-Efrayimu kanye nebantfu baseSamariya, labatsi ngekutigcabha kanye nangekukhukhumala kwenhlitiyo:
19.10: Titini tidzilikele phansi, kodvwa sitawukwakha ngematje labatwe kahle; imikhiwa igawuliwe, kodvwa sitawuyenana ibe yimisedari.
19.11: Ngako-ke, iNkhosi iyawuphakamisa titsa taResini tibhekane naye, ihlanganise titsa takhe ndzawonye;
19.12: EmaSiriya ngaphambili kanye nemaFilisti ngasemuva; futsi bayawumshwabudzela Israyeli ngemlomo lovulekile. Ngoba kuko konkhe loku intfukutselo yakhe ayikapheli, kepha sandla sakhe siseluliwe nanyalo.
19.13: Ngoba bantfu abaphendvukeli kuloyo lobashayako, noma bayifune iNkhosi yemaBandla.
19.14: Ngako-ke iNkhosi itawuncuma ku-Israyeli inhloko kanye nemsila, ligala kanye nelikhwane ngelusuku lunye.
19.15: Lomdzala, nguye loyinhloko; futsi umphrofethi lofundzisa emanga, ungumsila.
19.16: Ngoba baholi balaba bantfu babenta kutsi baduke; futsi labo labaholwa ngibo bayabhujiswa.
19.17: Ngako-ke iNkhosi angeke ibe nayo intfokoto ngemajaha abo, noma ibe nemusa kulabangenaboyise babo kanye nebafelokati; ngoba nguloyo naloyo wabo ungumtentisi kanye nementi webubi, futsi yonkhe imilomo ikhuluma buwula. Ngoba kuko konkhe loku intfukutselo yakhe ayikapheli, kodvwa sandla sakhe siseluliwe nanyalo.
19.18: Ngoba bubi buvutsa njengemlilo; buyawushwabudzela tinchachabutane nemanyeva, futsi bulumeke emahlatsi etihlahla, futsi bayawushunca babheke etulu njengekukhuphuka kwentfutfu.
19.19: Ngelulaka lweNkhosi yemaBandla live lisitsekile, nebantfu bayawuba tinkhuni temlilo; kute umuntfu loyawusindzisa umnakabo.
19.20: Futsi uyawuhlwitsa ngasesandleni sangesekudla alambe; futsi uyawudla ngesandla sangesancele angeke besutse; nguloyo naloyo muntfu uyawudla inyama yesandla sakhe lucobo—
19.21: Manase, ku-Efrayimu, kanye na-Efrayimu kuManase; bayawugucukela bakaJuda. Kuko konkhe loku intfukutselo yakhe ayikapheli, kepha sandla sakhe siseluliwe nanyalo.

20.1: Maye kulabo labamemetela timemetelo letingakalungi, kanye nalabo lababhala bubi lababumisile;
20.2: Labasusa labeswele ekwehlulelweni, kanye nalabamuka labamphofu lilungelo lababantfu bami, kute bafelokati babe yimphango yabo, nekutsi bebele labangenaboyise.
20.3: Nitawukwenta njani ngelusuku lwekuhanjelwa, kanye nasencitsakalweni leyawuvela khashane? nitawubalekela kubani kutsi nisitwe na? futsi nitawuyishiya kuphi inkhatimulo yenu na?
20.4: Ngaphandle kwami bayawukhotsama ngaphansi kwetiboshwa, futsi bayawukuwa ngaphansi kwalababulewe. Ngoba kuko konkhe loku intfukutselo yakhe ayikapheli, kodvwa sandla sakhe siseluliwe nanyalo.
20.5: Awu m-Asiriya, indvuku yentfukutselo yami, kanye nesagila esandleni sabo kuyintfukutselo yabo.
20.6: Ngitawumtfumela esiveni lesibatentisi, nakubantfu lengibatfukutselele ngitawumnika ligunya lekutsi atsatse imphango, aphindze atsatse lokuphangiwe, abagcobagcobe phansi njengeludzaka lwasemigwacweni.
20.7: Noko ayikacondzi loko, futsi inhlitiyo yayo ayicabangi kanjalo; kodvwa enhlitiyweni yakhe kubhubhisa kanye nekuhlukanisa tive hhayi lidlanzana.
20.8: Ngoba itsi: Emakhosana ami lahlangene akasiwo yini emakhosi na?
20.9: IKhalno ayifanani yini neKhakhemishi na? IHamathi ayifanani yini ne-Aphadi na? ISamariya ayifanani yini neDamaseko na?
20.10: Njengoba sandla sami sisungule imibuso yetithico, futsi imifanekiso yayo lecoshiwe yendlula leyo yaseJerusalema kanye neyaseSamariya;
20.11: Ngingeke yini, njengoba ngentile kuyo iSamariya kanye netithico tayo, ngente kanjalo nakuyo iJerusalema kanye nakuto tithico tayo na?
20.12: Ngaloko-ke kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi iNkhosi seyiwentile wonkhe umsebenti wayo eNtsabeni yaseSiyoni kanye naseJerusalema, ngitawusijezisa sitselo senhlitiyo lekhukhumele yeNkhosi yase-Asiriya, kanye nenkhatimulo yekutiphakamisa kwayo.
20.13: Ngoba itsi: Ngemandla esandla sami kanye nangekuhlakanipha kwami ngitentile leti tintfo; ngoba mine nginekucondza; futsi ngiyisusile imincele yebantfu, ngaphanga ingcebo yabo, futsi ngibancobile labahlala khona njengemuntfu lolichawe;
20.14: Futsi sandla sami sitfole njengesidleke ingcebo yebantfu; nanjengemuntfu agcogca emacandza lasele ngiwugcogcile wonkhe umhlaba; kute namunye lowashaya luphiko, noma lovula umlomo, noma lontjilotako.
20.15: Ngabe lizembe lingatikhukhumeta yini ngetulu kwaloyo logawula ngalo na? Ngabe lisaha lingatidvumisa yini ngetulu kwaloyo lolinyakatisako na? Kube shengatsi indvuku ingatinyakatisa yona cobo ngetulu kwalabo labayiphakamisako, noma sagila singatiphakamisa shengatsi besingasilo lugodvo!
20.16: Ngako-ke iNkhosi, iNkhosi yemaBandla, iyawutfumela emkhatsini waletikhuluphele tayo, kondza; futsi ngaphansi kwenkhatimulo yayo iyawukokhela kuvutsa njengekuvutsa kwemlilo.
20.17: Futsi kukhanya kwa-Israyeli kuyawuba njengemlilo, futsi naloNgcwele wakhe abe njengelilangabi, futsi liyawushisa lishwabudzele emanyeva akhe kanye netinchachabutane takhe ngelusuku lunye;
20.18: Futsi uyawubucedza buhle belihlatsi lakhe, kanye nebensimu yakhe levundzile, umphefumulo kanye nemtimba; futsi bayawuba njengesikhatsi umphatsi wesibonakaliso aculeka.
20.19: Futsi tihlahla telihlatsi lakhe letiyosala tiyawuba mbalwa, kangangekutsi umntfwana angatibhala phansi.
20.20: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngalolosuku, insali yaka-Israyeli, kanye nalabo labaphunyula bendlu yaJakobe, bangeke baphindze bahlale nanini kuloyo lowabashaya, kodvwa bayawuhlala kuyo iNkhosi, kuloNgcwele waka-Israyeli, ngekweliciniso.
20.21: Insali iyawubuyela, yebo, nensali yaJakobe, kuye Nkulunkulu lonemandla.
20.22: Ngoba noma bantfu bakho Israyeli banjengesihlabatsi selwandle, kodvwa insali yabo iyawubuyela; kubhujiswa lokumenyetelwe kuyawucicima ngekulunga.
20.23: Ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wemaBandla iyawuletsa imbubhiso, lemisiwe kulo lonkhe live.
20.24: Ngako-ke, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wemaBandla: Awu bantfu bami lenihlala eSiyoni, ningamesabi um-Asiriya; uyawunishaya ngendvuku, futsi uyawuphakamisela etulu sagila sakhe kini, ngendlela yaseGibhithe.
20.25: Ngoba ngesikhashana lesincane kakhulu, intfukutselo iyawuphela, kanye nelulaka lwami ekubhujisweni kwabo.
20.26: Futsi iNkhosi yemaBandla iyawuphehla sijeziso sakhe njengekubulawa kwemaMidiyani edvwaleni lase-Orebi; futsi njengoba indvuku yakhe yayiselwandle kanjalo naye uyawuyiphakamisa njengendlela yeseGibhithe.
20.27: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kulolosuku kutsi umtfwalo wakhe uyawususwa emahlombe akho, kanye nelijoka lakhe entsanyeni yakho, futsi lijoka liyawukwephulwa ngenca yelugcobo.
20.28: Ufikile e-Aya, wendlulela eMigroni; eMikmashi wetfule imphahla yakhe.
20.29: Bendlulile emsahweni; bemisa eGeba; iRama iyatfutfumela; iGibeya yakaSawula iyabaleka.
20.30: Phakamisa livi lakho, Awu ndvodzakati yaseGalimu; yenta kutsi livakale kuyo iLayisha, Awu Anathothi lomphofu.
20.31: IMadmena isusiwe; labakhile baseGebimu babutsene kutsi babaleke.
20.32: Kwanyalo uyawusala eNobi ngalolosuku; uyawujikitisa sandla sakhe entsabeni yendvodzakati yaseSiyoni, ligcuma laseJerusalema.
20.33: Bukani, iNkhosi, iNkhosi yemaBandla iyawujuba ligala ngalokwesabekako, kanye nalabo labaphakeme ngekwelizinga bayawugawulwa bawe phansi; kanye nalabatikhukhumetako bayawutfotjiswa.
20.34: Futsi iyawugawula tihlahla telihlatsi ngensimbi, neLebanoni iyawuwiswa ngulonemandla.

21.1: Futsi kuyawuvela lihlumela esicwini sakaJese, futsi ligala liyawukhula etimphandzeni taso.
21.2: Moya weNkhosi uyawuhlala etikwakhe, moya wekuhlakanipha kanye newekucondza, moya wekweluleka kanye nemandla, moya welwati kanye newekuyesaba iNkhosi.
21.3: Uyawumenta abe ngulonekucondza lokusheshako ekuyesabeni iNkhosi; futsi angeke ehlulele ngalakubona ngemehlo akhe, noma ente sincumo ngalakuva ngetindlebe takhe.
21.4: Kodvwa uyawukwehlulela labamphofu ngekulunga, futsi abekhute ngekungakhetsi labatfobekile bemhlaba; futsi uyawushaya umhlaba ngendvuku yemlomo wakhe, nangekuphefumula kwetindzebe takhe uyawubabulala lababi.
21.5: Futsi kulunga kuyawuba libhande letinkhalo takhe, nekwetsembeka kuyoba libhande letinso.
21.6: Ngetulu kwaloko imphisi iyawuhlala nelizinyane lemvu, nengwe iyawuhlala phansi nelizinyane lembuti, litfole kanye nelizinyane lelibhubesi kanye nalokukhuluphalisiwe ndzawonye; umntfwana lomncane uyawutihola.
21.7: Inkhomati kanye nelibhele kuyawudla ndzawonye; emankhonyane ako ayawucambalala ndzawonye; libhubesi liyawudla tjani njengenkhabi.
21.8: Umntfwana lomunyako uyawudlala emgodzini wemfeti, nemntfwana losandza kususwa ebeleni uyawufaka sandla sakhe emgodzini welibululu.
21.9: Angeke kulimate noma kubhubhise entsabeni yami yonkhe lengcwele, ngoba umhlaba uyawugcwala lwati lweNkhosi, njengemanti ambonya lwandle.
21.10: Futsi ngalolosuku kuyawuba khona imphandze yaJese, leyawukuma njengesiboniso kubantfu, kuso beTive bayawubutsana; futsi kuphumula kwakhe kuyawuba kuhle kakhulu.
21.11: Futsi kuyawukwenteka ngalolosuku kutsi iNkhosi iyawuwelula sandla sayo futsi kwesibili kubuyisa insali yebantfu bayo labayawube basele, e-Asiriya, naseGibhithe, nasePhathirosi, naseKushe, nase-Elamu, naseShineyari, naseHamati, kanye nasetichingini telwandle.
21.12: Futsi uyawuphakamisela tive siboniso, futsi agcogce labacoshwa baka-Israyeli, ahlanganisele ndzawonye labahlakatekile bakaJuda emagumbini lamane emhlaba.
21.13: Umona wa Efrayimu ngetulu kwaloko uyawunyamalala, titsa takaJuda ticedvwe nya; Efrayimu angeke abe nemona ngaJuda, futsi naJuda angeke amhluphe Efrayimu.
21.14: Kodvwa bayawundizela emahlombe emaFilistiya kuya ngasenshonalanga; baphange nebasemphumalanga kanyekanye; bayawulula sandla sabo kuyo i-Edomi kanye neMowabi; nebantfwana bema-Amoni bayawubalalela.
21.15: Futsi iNkhosi iyawulibhubhisa nya lulwimi lwelwandle lwaseGibhithe; Futsi ngemoya wayo lonemandla iyawunyakatisa sandla sayo ngetulu kwemfula, futsi iyakuwushaya ube yimifudlana lesikhombisa, futsi yente bantfu bawele ngeticatfulo letomile.
21.16: Futsi kuyawuba khona umgwaco lomkhulu wensali yebanftu bakhe labayawusala, e-Asiriya, njengoba kwakunjalo ku-Israyeli ngalolosuku laphuma ngalo eveni laseGibhithe.

22.1: Futsi ngalolosuku uyotsi: Awu Nkhosi, ngitawukudvumisa; noma wawungitfukutselele intfukutselo yakho seyisusiwe, futsi uyangidvudvuta.
22.2: Bukani, Nkulunkulu uyinsindziso yami; ngitawukwetsemba, futsi ngingabi nekwesaba; ngoba iNkhosi Jehova ingemandla ami kanye nengoma yami; ngetulu kwaloko sewube yinsindziso yami.
22.3: Ngako-ke, ngenjabulo uyawukha emanti emitfonjeni yensindziso.
22.4: Futsi ngalolosuku niyawutsi: Dvumisani iNkhosi, bitani ligama layo, memetelani tento tayo emkhatsini webantfu, nisho kutsi ligama layo liphakeme.
22.5: Hlabelelani eNkhosini; ngoba yente tintfo letinhle kakhulu; loku kuyatiwa emhlabeni wonkhe.
22.6: Khala futsi umemete, wena lohlala eSiyoni; ngoba mkhulu loNgcwele waka-Israyeli losekhatsi kwakho.

23.1: Sembulo ngeBhabhulona, Isaya indvodzana ya-Amose leyasibona.
23.2: Phakamisani siboniso entsabeni lephakeme, phakamiselani livi kubo, nibakhwebe ngesandla, kute bangene emasangweni alabaphakeme.
23.3: Ngibayaletile labangcwele bami, ngetulu kwaloko ngiwabitile emachawe ami, ngoba intfukutselo yami ayikho kulabo labatfokotako ebukhulwini bami.
23.4: Umsindvo wesicuku etintsabeni njengewebantfu labaningi, umsindvo wekuphitsitela kwemibuso yetive ihlangene ndzawonye, iNkhosi yemaBandla ivivisa emabutfo emphi.
23.5: Baphuma eveni lelikhashane, bavela ekugcineni kwelizulu, yebo, iNkhosi, kanye netikhali telulaka lwayo, kubhubhisa umhlaba wonkhe.
23.6: Lilani, ngoba lusuku lweNkhosi selusondzele; luyawufika njengembubhiso levela kuSomandla.
23.7: Ngako-ke, tandla tonkhe tiyawuphelelwa ngemandla, tinhlitiyo tebantfu bonkhe tiyawushona phansi;
23.8: Futsi bayawukwesaba; tinhlungu kanye netinsizi kuyawubabamba; bayawushaceka lomunye kulomunye; buso babo buyawuba njengemalangabi.
23.9: Bukani, lusuku lweNkhosi luyeta, lunelunya lwelulaka kanye nentfukutselo leyesabekako kutsi lwente live libete lutfo; futsi iyawubhubhisa toni talo letikulo.
23.10: Ngoba tinkhanyeti telizulu nemabutfo ato angeke kunikete kukhanya kwako; lilanga liyawufiphala ekuphumeni kwalo, futsi nenyanga angeke ikhiphe kukhanya kwayo.
23.11: Futsi ngitawujezisa umhlaba ngebubi bawo, kanye nalababi ngebubi babo; ngitawulicedza ligcabho kulabatigcabhako, ngikubeke phansi kutikhukhumeta kwalabasabekako.
23.12: Ngitawukwenta umuntfu abe ligugu lelikhulu kuneligolide lelicengekile; umuntfu abe ligugu lelikhulu kuneligolide lase-Ofiri.
23.13: Ngako-ke, ngitakuwatamatamisa emazulu, futsi umhlaba usuke uphele endzaweni yawo, ngelulaka lweNkhosi yemaBandla, nangelusuku lwentfukutselo yakhe lesabekako.
23.14: Futsi kuyawuba njengenyamatane letingelwako, nanjengetimvu letite umelusi; kuyawutsi loyo naloyo aphendvukele kubantfu bakubo, nguloyo naloyo muntfu abalekele eveni lakubo.
23.15: Bonkhe labo labatichenyako bayawugwazwa; yebo, bonkhe labo labatihlanganisa nalababi bayawudliwa yinkemba.
23.16: Bantfwana babo ngetulu kwaloko bayawuphihlitwa babe ticucu phambi kwemehlo abo; tindlu tabo tiyawuphangwa futsi bafati babo badlwengulwe.
23.17: Buka, ngitawubaphehlela emaMede kutsi abahlasele, wona angeke anake isiliva neligolide, noma atfokote ngalo.
23.18: Butjoki bawo buyawudubula emajaha abe ticucu; futsi bona angeke babe nesihawu ebantfwaneni; emehlo abo angeke abe nemusa kubantfwana.
23.19: Futsi iBhabhulona, ligugu lemibuso, buhle lobukhulu bemaKhaledi, iyawuba njengesikhatsi Nkulunkulu aketula iSodoma kanye neGomora.
23.20: Angeke kuphidze kuhlalwe kuyo nanini, noma kuhlalwe kuyo titukulwane ngetitukulwane: noma um-Arabu amise lithende lapho; noma belusi balale nemihlambi yabo lapho.
23.21: Kodvwa tilwane tasendle tasehlane tiyawulala khona lapho; netindlu tabo tiyawugcwala timphungushe; netikhova tiyawuhlala lapho, netimbuti tesiganga tiyawutjakadvula khona.
23.22: Futsi tilo tasesichingini tiyawushaya umkhulungwane etindlini tabo letingenalutfo, bodrago etigodlweni tabo letinhle, futsi sikhatsi sakhe sesisondzele, lusuku lwakhe angeke lusachutjelwa embili. Ngoba ngitawumbhubhisa ngekushesha; yebo, ngoba ngitawuba nesihawu kubantfu bami, kodvwa lababi bayawushabalaliswa.

24.1: Ngoba iNkhosi itawuba nemusa kuJakobe, futsi isatawumkhetsa Israyeli, ibabeke eveni labo; betive bayawuhlanganiswa nabo, futsi bayawutihlanganisa nendlu yaJakobe.
24.2: Futsi bantfu bayawubatsatsa bababuyisele endzaweni yabo; yebo, kusuka khashane emikhawulweni yemhlaba; futsi bayawubuyela emaveni abo esetsembiso. Bayawuba bendlu yaka-Israyeli, live leNkhosi liyawuba ngeletinceku kanye netincekukati; futsi bayawubatsatsa babatfumbe labo bebakadze babatfumbile; bayawubusa ngetulu kwebacindzeteli babo.
24.3: Futsi kuyawukwenteka ngalolosuku kutsi iNkhosi iyawukunika kuphumula, etinsizini takho, nasekwesabeni kwakho, nasebugcilini lobumatima lowentiwa kutsi usebente kubo.
24.4: Futsi kuyawukwenteka ngalolosuku, kutsi uyawusho lesisiga ngenkhosi yaseBhabhulona, utsi: Uphela kanjani umcindzeteli, umuti weligolide uphela kanjani!
24.5: INkhosi isephulile sagila salababi, lubhoko lwebabusi.
24.6: Loyo loshaya bantfu ngelulaka ngekushaya lokungancamuki, loyo lobusa tive ngentfukutselo, uhlushiwe, futsi kute namunye lokuncandzako.
24.7: Umhlaba wonkhe usekuphumuleni, futsi uthulile; bahlokoma ngekuhlabelela.
24.8: Yebo, tipheshula tiyatfokota ngawe, futsi ngalokunjalo nemisedari yaseLebanoni, itsi: Seloku walaliswa phansi kute umgawuli lotawusijuba.
24.9: Sihogo ngaphansi sinyakatiselwe wena kukuhlangabeta ekuteni kwakho; sikuphehlela labafile, nabo bonkhe labakhulu bemhlaba; siphakamisele etulu etihlalweni tabo tebukhosi onkhe emakhosi etive.
24.10: Bonkhe bayawukhuluma batsi kuwe: Ngabe nawe futsi sewubutsakatsaka njengatsi na? Ngabe nawe sewufana natsi na?
24.11: Bukhatikhati bakho behliselwe phansi ethuneni; umsindvo wemavayolini akho awuvakali; timphetfu tendlaliwe phansi kwakho, futsi timphetfu tiyakumbonya.
24.12: Ngabe uwe kanjani ezulwini, Awu Lusifa, ndvodzana yentsatsakusa! Ngabe ugecelwe phansi yini, wena lowenta tive tibe butsakatsaka!
24.13: Ngoba utse enhlitiyweni yakho: Ngitawunyukela ezulwini, ngitawuphakamisela sihlalo sami sebukhosi ngetulu kwetinkhanyeti taNkulunkulu; ngetulu kwaloko ngitawuhlala entsabeni yemhlangano, ngasemajukujukwini asenyakatfo.
24.14: Ngitawunyukela ngetulu kweticongo temafu; ngitawuba njengaLosetikwako Konkhe.
24.15: Kodvwa uyokwehliselwa phansi esihogweni, emajukujukwini emgodzi.
24.16: Labo labakubonako bayawukugolotela, futsi bayawukucaphela, futsi bayawutsi: Ngabe nguye yini lomuntfu lowenta kutsi umhlaba unyakate, loyo lowatamatamisa imibuso na?
24.17: Futsi lowenta umhlaba waba njengelihlane, wabhubhisa emadolobha awo, futsi wangayivuli indlu yetiboshwa takhe na?
24.18: Onkhe emakhosi etive, yebo, onkhe, angcwatjwe ngeludvumo, nguleyo naleyo endlini yayo.
24.19: Kodvwa wena ulahlwe ngaphandle kwelithuna lakho njengeligala lelinengekile, futsi insali yalabo lababulewe, bagwazwa ngenkemba, labo labehlela entansi ematjeni emgodzi; njengesidvumbu sinyatselwa ngaphansi kwetinyawo.
24.20: Angeke uhlanganiswe nabo ekungcwatjweni, ngenca yekutsi ulibhubhisile live lakho futsi wabulala bantfu bakho; intalelwane yebenti bebubi angeke kukhulunywe ngayo.
