24.21: Tilungiselele kubulala bantfwana bakhe ngenca yebubi baboyise, kute bangavuki, noma bazuze live, noma bagcwalise umhlaba wonkhe ngemadolobha.
24.22: Ngoba ngitawusukuma ngilwe nabo, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, ngibulale eBhabhulona libito, kanye nensali, nendvodzana, kanye nemshana, kusho iNkhosi.
24.23: Ngetulu kwaloko ngitawuyenta ibe lifa letikhova, kanye nemachibi emanti; futsi ngitawuyishanyela ngemshanyelo wembubhiso, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
24.24: INkhosi yemaBandla ifungile, yatsi: Ngempela njengoba ngikucabangile, kuyawukwenteka kanjalo; futsi njengekuhlela kwami, kuyawukuma kanjalo—
24.25: Kutsi ngitawuletsa um-Asiriya eveni lami, futsi etintsabeni tami ngimnyatsele ngaphansi kwetinyawo; ngaleso sikhatsi lijoka lakhe liyawusuka kubo, nemtfwalo wakhe usuke emahlombe abo.
24.26: Lena yinhloso lehloswe etikwemhlaba wonkhe; futsi lesi sandla leselulelwe etikwetive tonkhe.
24.27: Ngoba iNkhosi yemaBandla ikuhlosile, futsi ngubani loyawukuyivimbela na? Futsi sandla sayo seluliwe, ngubani loyawusibuyisela emuva na?
24.28: Ngemnyaka wekufa kwenkhosi Ahazi kwavela lesi sembulo.
24.29: Ungatfokoti wena, Filisti yonkhe, ngenca yekutsi indvuku yaloyo lokushayile yephukile; ngoba emphandzeni yenyoka kuyawuphuma libululu, futsi sitselo salo siyawuba yinyoka lendizako lenemlilo.
24.30: Futsi litubulo lalomphofu liyawukondliwa, futsi labeswele bayawulala phansi bavikeleke; futsi ngitawuyibulala imphandze yakho ngendlala, futsi uyawubulala insali yakho.
24.31: Lila, Awu sango; memeta Awu dolobha; wena, Filisti yonkhe, lengakahleleki; ngoba kuyawuvela enyakatfo intfutfu, futsi kute namunye loyawuba yedvwa ngetikhatsi takhe letibekiwe.
24.32: Uma kunjalo tiyawunika yiphi imphendvulo titfunywa tesive na? Kutsi iNkhosi iyitfolile iSiyoni, futsi labamphofu bebantfu bayo bayawuphephela kuyo.

25.1: Manje mine, Nefi, sengikhuluma ngaloko lokumayelana nemavi lengiwabhalile, lakhulunywa ngemlomo wa-Isaya. Ngoba buka, Isaya wakhuluma tintfo letiningi lebetilukhuni kulabaningi bantfu bami kutsi baticondze; ngoba bebangati mayelana nendlela yekuphrofetha emkhatsini wemaJuda.
25.2: Ngoba mine, Nefi, angibafundzisanga tintfo letiningi mayelana nalenchubo yemaJuda; ngoba imisebenti yawo kwakuyimisebenti yebumnyama, netento tawo kwakutento tetinengiso.
25.3: Ngaloko-ke, ngibhalela bantfu bami, nabo bonkhe labo labayawutemukela emvakwaloku leti tintfo lengitibhalako, kute batati tehlulelo taNkulunkulu, kutsi tita kuto tonkhe tive, ngekwelivi lalikhulumile.
25.4: Ngaloko-ke, lalelani, Awu bantfu bami, lenibendlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi niketani indlebe emavini ami; ngoba ngenca yekutsi emavi a-Isaya akekho sobala kini, noko asobala kubo bonkhe labo labagcwaliswe ngemoya wekuphrofetha. Kodvwa ngininika siphrofetho, ngekwemoya lokimi; ngaloko-ke ngitawuphrofetha ngalokusobala lobesoloku kunami kusukela ngesikhatsi ngiphuma eJerusalema nababe; ngoba buka, umphefumulo wami utfokota ngaloko lokusobala kubantfu bami, kute bafundze.
25.5: Yebo, futsi umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ngemavi a-Isaya, ngoba ngaphuma eJerusalema, nemehlo ami atibonile tintfo temaJuda, futsi ngiyati kutsi emaJuda ayaticondza tintfo tebaphrofethi, kute labanye bantfu labacondza letintfo letakhulunywa kuwo emaJuda njengawo, ngaphandle kwekutsi bafundziswa ngalendlela yetintfo tawo emaJuda.
25.6: Kodvwa bukani, mine, Nefi, angibafundzisanga bantfwana bami ngalendlela yemaJuda, kodvwa, bukani, ngekwami, ngihlalile eJerusalema, ngaloko-ke ngiyati mayelana netifundza letitungeletile; ngikhulumile kubo bantfwana bami mayelana netehlulelo taNkulunkulu, lesetentekile emkhatsini wemaJuda, kubo bantfwana bami, njengako konkhe loko Isaya lakukhulumile, futsi angikubhali loko.
25.7: Kodvwa bukani ngichubeka nesami siphrofetho, njengaloko lokusobala kimi; kuso lengatiko kutsi kute muntfu longaduka; noko, ngetinsuku tiphrofetho ta-Isaya letiyawugcwaliseka ngato bantfu bayawukwati ngekweliciniso, ngetikhatsi leto letiyawukwenteka ngato.
25.8: Ngaloko-ke, tiligugu kubantfwana bebantfu, futsi loyo locabanga kutsi atisilo, ngitawukhuluma kubo kabanti, futsi emavi ngiwacondzise kubantfu bami lucobo; ngoba ngiyati kutsi tiyawuba nguletiligugu lelikhulu kubo ngetinsuku tekugcina; ngoba ngalolosuku bayawuticondza; ngaloko-ke, ngenca yebuhle bato ngitibhalile.
25.9: Futsi njengoba sinye situkulwane sibhujisiwe emkhatsini wemaJuda ngenca yebubi, ngalokunjalo nabo babhujisiwe situkulwane ngesitukulwane ngebubi babo; futsi kute namunye wabo lowabhujiswa ngaphandle kwekutsi bebatjeliwe phambilini baphrofethi beNkhosi.
25.10: Ngaloko-ke, bekushiwo kubo mayelana naloko kubhujiswa lokwakumele kwenteke emkhatsini wabo, masinyane nje emvakwekutsi babe sekahambile eJerusalema; noko, batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo; futsi ngekwesiphrofetho sami babhujiswa, ngaphandle kwalabo labatsatsiwe batfunjelwa eBhabhulona.
25.11: Manje loku ngikukhuluma ngenca yamoya lokimi. Futsi nanoma batsetfwe bayawuphindze babuye, bazuze live laseJerusalema; ngaloko-ke, bayawubuyiselwa futsi eveni lelilifa labo.
25.12: Kodvwa, bukani, bayawuba netimphi, kanye nemahemuhemu etimphi, futsi uma lusuku lufika lwekutsi loTelwe Yedvwa waBabe, yebo, naBabe welizulu kanye nemhlaba, uyawutiveta kubo asenyameni, bukani, batawumlahla, ngenca yebubi babo, kanye nebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo, kanye nekucina kwetinhloko tabo.
25.13: Bukani, batawumbetsela; futsi emvakwekutsi asabekwe ethuneni sikhatsi lesitinsuku letintsatfu uyawuvuka kulabafile, anekuphilisa etimphikweni takhe; bonkhe labo labayawukholwa egameni lakhe bayawusindziswa embusweni waNkulunkulu. Ngaloko-ke, umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ekuphrofetheni mayelana naye, ngoba ngilubonile lusuku lwakhe, nenhlitiyo yami iyalibabata ligama lakhe lelingcwele.
25.14: Futsi buka kuyawukwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Mesiya sekavukile kulabafile, futsi sekativetile ebantfwini bakhe, ngebuningi balabo labatawukholwa egameni lakhe, bukani, iJerusalema iyawuphindze ibhujiswe; ngoba maye kulabo labalwa naNkulunkulu kanye nebantfu belibandla lakhe.
25.15: Ngaloko-ke, emaJuda ayawuhlakatwa emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive, yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo neBhabhulona iyawubhujiswa; ngaloko-ke, emaJuda ayawuhlakatwa nguletinye tive.
25.16: Futsi emvakwekutsi sebahlakatiwe, futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu seyibashayile ngaletinye tive ngesikhatsi lesingangesetitukulwane letiningi, yebo, kwehle kusukela esitukulwaneni kuya esitukulwaneni kute kube ngukutsi bayawukholiswa kutsi bakholwe kuKhristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, kanye nenhlawulo, leyo lengapheli yebantfu bonkhe—futsi uma lolosuku luyawufika lwekutsi bakholwe kuKhristu, futsi bakhonte Babe egameni lakhe, ngetinhlitiyo letimsulwa kanye netandla letihlantekile, futsi bangabe basalindzela futsi lomunye Mesiya, bese, ngaleso sikhatsi, lusuku lutawufika lapho kudzingekile kutsi bakholelwe kuto leti tintfo.
25.17: INkhosi itawusibeka sandla sayo futsi kwesibili kubuyisa bantfu bayo ekulahlekeni kwabo kanye nasesimeni sekuwa. Ngaloko-ke, itawuchubeka nekwenta umsebenti lomuhle nalomangalisako emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu.
25.18: Ngaloko-ke, iyawukwembula emavi ayo kubo, ayawubehlulela ngelusuku lwekugcina, ngoba bayawunikwa wona ngenhloso yekubenta bakholwe ngaMesiya weliciniso, lobekalahlwe ngibo; kanye nekubenta bakholwe kutsi abasafanele kutsi balindzele lomunye Mesiya losetawufika, ngoba angeke kusabakhona lomunye losayofika, ngaphandle kwekutsi loyo kube nguMesiya wemanga loyokhohlisa bantfu; ngoba munye kuphela Mesiya labakhuluma ngaye baphrofethi, futsi loyo Mesiya nguye loyophikwa ngemaJuda.
25.19: Ngoba ngekwemavi ebaphrofethi, Mesiya uta eminyakeni lengemakhulu lasitfupha kusukela ngesikhatsi babe ahamba eJerusalema; futsi ngekwemavi ebaphrofethi, nangelivi lengilosi yaNkulunkulu, libito lakhe kuyawuba nguJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
25.20: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngikhulume ngalokusobala kute ningaphambuki. Futsi njengoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iphila leyakhipha Israyeli eveni laseGibhithe, futsi yaniketa Mosi emandla ekutsi aphilise tive emvakwekutsi setilunywe tinyoka letinebutsi, uma bangabhekisa emehlo abo kuleyo nyoka layiphakamisako phambi kwabo, ngetulu kwaloko wamnika emandla ekutsi ashaye lidvwala emanti ampompote; yebo, bukani ngitsi kini, njengoba leti tintfo tiliciniso, futsi njengoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iphila, kute lelinye libito lelinikwe ngaphansi kwelizulu ngaphandle kwalo leli laJesu Khristu, lengikhulume ngalo, umuntfu langasindziswa ngalo.
25.21: Ngaloko-ke, ngalesi sizatfu iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yetsembisile kimi kutsi leti tintfo lengitibhalako tiyawugcinwa futsi tilondvolotwe, futsi tehliselwe entansi kuyo intalelwane yami, titukulwane ngetitukulwane, kute setsembiso sigcwaliseke kuJosefa, sekutsi intalelwane yakhe angeke ishabalale nanini yingci nje uma umhlaba usemile.
25.22: Ngaloko-ke, leti tintfo tiyawuhamba kusuka etitukulwaneni kuya etitukulwaneni yingci nje uma umhlaba usemile; futsi tiyawuhamba ngekwentsandvo nangekwesifiso saNkulunkulu; futsi tive letiyawuba nato tiyowehlulelwa ngato njengekwalawo mavi labhaliwe.
25.23: Ngoba sisebenta ngekukhutsala kubhala, kutsi sente bantfwana betfu bakholwe, futsi ngalokunjalo nabomnaketfu, kutsi bakholwe kuKhristu, nekutsi babuyisane naNkulunkulu; ngoba siyati kutsi kungemusa kutsi sisindziswe, emvakwakokonkhe lesingakwenta.
25.24: Futsi, nanoma sikholwa kuKhritsu, siyawugcina umtsetfo waMosi, futsi sibuke phambili ngekusima kuKhristu, ute umtsetfo ugcwaliseke.
25.25: Ngoba, ngalesi sizatfu umtsetfo wanikwa; ngaloko-ke umtsetfo sewufile kitsi, futsi sentiwe saphila kuKhristu ngenca yelukholo lwetfu; noko sigcina umtsetfo ngenca yemiyaleto.
25.26: Futsi sikhuluma ngaKhristu, sitfokota kuKhritsu, sishumayela ngaKhristu, siphrofetha ngaKhristu, futsi sibhala ngekwetiphrofetho tetfu, kute bantfwana betfu bati kutsi ngukuphi lapho bangabuka khona kute batfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo.
25.27: Ngaloko-ke, sikhuluma mayelana nemtsetfo kute bantfwana betfu bati ngekufa kwemtsetfo; futsi, ngekwati ngekufa kwemtsetfo, bangalindzela loko kuphila lokukuKhritsu, futsi bati kutsi umtsetfo wawuniketwe ngasizatfu sini. Futsi emvakwekutsi umtsetfo sewugcwalisekile kuKhristu, ngekutsi akusafanele batente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene naye uma umtsetfo sekufanele uphele.
25.28: Manje bukani, bantfu bami, nibantfu labanetinhloko letilukhuni; ngaloko-ke, ngikhulume ngalokusobala kini, kute ningabi nekungacondzi. Futsi emavi lengiwakhulumile ayawukuma njengebufakazi ngalokumelene nani; ngoba enele kufundzisa namuphi umuntfu indlela lecondzile; ngoba indlela lecondzile ikukholwa kuKhristu kanye nekungamphiki; ngoba ngekumphika niphika futsi baphrofethi kanye nemtsetfo.
25.29: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini indlela lecondzile ikukholwa kuKhristu, futsi ningamphiki; Khristu unguloNgcwele wa-Israyeli; ngaloko-ke kufanele nikhotsame phambi kwakhe, futsi nimkhonte ngawo onkhe emandla enu, ngengcondvo, nangekucina, kanye nangemphefumulo wenu wonkhe; futsi uma nikwenta loku aniyukulahlwa nakancane.
25.30: Futsi, kangangoba kuyawudzingeka, kufanele nigcine tento kanye netimiso taNkulunkulu ute umtsetfo ugcwaliseke lowawunikwe Mosi.

26.1: Futsi emvakwekutsi Khristu sekavukile ekufeni uyawutiveta kini, bantfwana bami, kanye nabomnaketfu labatsandzekako; futsi emavi layawuwakhuluma kini ayawuba ngumtsetfo leniyawuwenta.
26.2: Ngoba bukani, ngitsi kini ngibonile kutsi letiningi titukulwane tiyawundlula, futsi kuyawuba khona timphi letinkhulu kanye nemibango emkhatsini webantfu bami.
26.3: Futsi emvakwekutsi Mesiya sekafikile kuyawuba khona tibonakaliso letiyawunikwa bantfu bami ngekutalwa kwakhe, nangekufa kwakhe kanye nekuvuka kwakhe; futsi luyawuba lukhulu futsi lube lubi lolosuku kulababi, ngoba bayawubhubha; futsi bayawubhubha ngoba babacosha baphrofethi, kanye nalabangcwele, futsi babashaya ngematje, futsi bababulala; ngaloko-ke kukhala kwengati yalabangcwele kuyawukhuphukela etulu kuNkulunkulu kuvela emhlabatsini ngalokumelene nabo.
26.4: Ngaloko-ke, bonkhe labo labatichenyako, nalabo labenta lokubi, lusuku lolutako luyawubashisa, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, ngoba bayawuba njengemabibi.
26.5: Futsi labo lababulala baphrofethi, nalabangcwele, kujula kwaphansi kuyawubagwinya, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla; futsi tintsaba tiyawubasibekela, kanye netivunguvungu tiyawubatfwala tibayise khashane, netakhiwo tiyawuwela etikwabo tibaphihlite babe ticucu futsi tibagaye babe yimphuphu.
26.6: Futsi bayawuvakashelwa ngekudvuma, kanye nemibani, kanye nangekutamatama kwemhlaba, kanye nangalo lonkhe luhlobo lwekubhujiswa, ngoba umlilo wentfukutselo yeNkhosi uyawukokheleka ngalokumelene nabo, bayawuba njengemabibi, nalolosuku lolutako luyawubashisa, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
26.7: Awu buhlungu, kanye nekudzabuka kwemphefumulo wami ngekulahleka kwalabo lababulawa babantfu bami! Ngoba mine, Nefi, ngikubonile, futsi kucishe kwangishisa phambi kweNkhosi; kodvwa kufanele ngikhale kuNkulunkulu wami ngitsi: Tindlela takho tilungile.
26.8: Kodvwa buka, labalungile labalalela emavi ebaphrofethi, futsi labangababulalanga, kodvwa babuka phambili kuKhristu ngekusima kuleto tibonakaliso letinikiwe, nanoma kungenca yako konkhe kuhlushwa—buka, ngubo labo labangayukubhubha.
26.9: Kodvwa iNdvodzana yekuLunga iyawuvela kubo; iyawubaphilisa, futsi bayawuba nekuthula kanye nayo, kute kwendlule titukulwane letintsatfu, nalabaningi besitukulwane sesine bayawube sebandlulile ngekulunga.
26.10: Futsi uma leti tintfo setindlulile, kubhujiswa lokusheshako kuta kubantfu bami, ngoba, nanoma kungenca yebuhlungu bemphefumulo wami, ngikubonile loku; ngaloko-ke, ngiyati kutsi kuyawukwenteka; futsi batitsengisela lite; ngalamanye emavi, ngenca yekutigcabha kwabo kanye nebuwula babo bayawuvuna kubhujiswa; ngoba ngenca yekuvumela develi futsi nekukhetsa imisebenti yebumnyama kunekukhanya, ngako-ke kufanele baye phansi esihogweni.
26.11: Ngoba Moya weNkhosi awutukusebenta kanjalo kumuntfu. Futsi uma Moya sewuyekela kusebenta kumuntfu uma sekunjalo kuta kubhujiswa ngekushesha, futsi loku kuyawukhatsata umphefumulo wami.
26.12: Futsi njengoba ngikhulumile mayelana nekwenta emaJuda akholwe, kutsi Jesu nguye kanye Khristu, kufanele kutsi beTive nabo bentiwe bakholwe kutsi Jesu nguKhristu, Nkulunkulu waPhakadze.
26.13: Futsi nekutsi utibonakalisa kubo bonkhe labo labakholwa kuye, ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele; yebo, kuto tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nebantfu, wenta timangaliso letinkhulu, tibonakaliso, kanye netimangaliso, emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu ngekwelukholo lwabo.
26.14: Kodvwa buka, ngiyaphrofetha kini mayelana netinsuku tekugcina; mayelana netinsuku lapho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawutiletsa leti tintfo kubantfwana bebantfu.
26.15: Emvakwekutsi intalelwane yami kanye nentalelwane yabomnaketfu seyincishelwe kukholwa, futsi seyishaywe beTive; yebo, emvakwekutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu seyibatungelete ndzawotonkhe, futsi sebavinjetelwe ngentsaba, baphakanyiselwa tincaba ngalokumelene nabo; futsi emvakwekutsi sebahliselwe phansi elutfulini, kungukutsi bangasekho, noko emavi alabalungile ayawubhalwa, futsi imithandazo yalabatsembekile iyawuvakala, futsi bonkhe labo labayawube sebancishelwe kukholwa abayukhohlwakala.
26.16: Ngoba labo labayawubhujiswa bayawukhuluma kubo basemhlabatsini, kukhuluma kwabo kuyawuba ngulokutfotjiselwe phansi elutfulini, futsi livi labo liyawuba njengelaloyo lonemoya lowejwayelekile; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawumnika emandla, kute ahlebe mayelana nabo, kube shengatsi liphuma emhlabatsini, futsi kukhuluma kwabo kuyawuhleba kuphuma elutfulini.
26.17: Ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Bayawutibhala tintfo letiyawukwentiwa emkhatsini wabo, futsi tiyawubhalwa tiphindze tivalelwe tibe yincwadzi, futsi labo labayawube sebancishelwe kukholwa angeke babe nato, ngoba bafuna kutibhubhisa tintfo taNkulunkulu.
26.18: Ngaloko-ke njengoba labo lababhujiswa sebabhujiswe ngekushesha; nesicuku salabo labasabekako babo siyawuba njengemakhoba landlulako—yebo, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Loku kuyawukwenteka ngekushesha, ngekuphatima kweliso—
26.19: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, kutsi labo lasebancishelwe kukholwa bayawushaywa ngesandla sebeTive.
26.20: Futsi beTive baphakeme ngenca yekutibona kwabo, futsi bakhubatele, ngenca yebukhulu besikhubekiso sabo, kangangoba bakhe emabandla lamaningi; noko, badzelela emabandla kanye netimangaliso taNkulunkulu, futsi batidvumise ngekuhlakanipha kwabo kanye nemfundvo yabo, kute batfole inzuzo futsi bagaye buso balabamphofu.
26.21: Futsi maningi emabandla lakhiwe laletsa umona, nemphikiswano, kanye nenzondo.
26.22: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kukhona emacembu layimfihlo, nalanjengasetikhatsini takudzala, njengekwemacembu adeveli, ngoba yena ungumcambi wato tonkhe leti tintfo; yebo, umcambi wekubulala, kanye nemisebenti yebumnyama; yebo, futsi ubahola ngentsamo ngentsambo lencane, ate ababophe ngetintsambo takhe leticinile ingunaphakadze.
26.23: Ngoba bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngitsi kini iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ayisebenti ebumnyameni.
26.24: Ayenti lutfo lolunye ngaphandle kwekutsi kuyinzuzo emhlabeni, ngoba iyawutsandza umhlaba, kangangoba ibeka phansi imphilo yayo lucobo kute idvonsele wonkhe muntfu kuyo. Ngaloko-ke ayiyaleti namunye kutsi angahlanganyele ensindzisweni yayo.
26.25: Bukani, ngabe iyamemeta yini kunoma ngubani itsi: Sukani kimi? Buka, ngitsi kini, Cha; kodvwa itsi: Wotani kimi nonkhe nine mikhawulo yemhlaba, tsengani lubisi neluju, ngaphandle kwemali nangaphandle kwentsengo.
26.26: Bukani, ngabe kukhona yini lebayaletile kutsi basuke baphume emasinagogeni, noma baphume etindlini tekukhontela na? Buka, ngitsi kini, Cha.
26.27: Ngabe kukhona yini lebayaletile kutsi bangahlanganyeli ensindzisweni yayo na? Bukani ngitsi kini, Cha; kodvwa iyinikete mahhala kuwo wonkhe umuntfu; futsi ibayaletile bantfu bayo kutsi bavumise bonkhe bantfu kutsi baphendvuke.
26.28: Bukani, ngabe kukhona yini iNkhosi lebayaletile kutsi bangahlanganyeli ebuhleni bayo na? Bukani ngitsi kini, Cha; kodvwa bonkhe bantfu banelilungelo lomunye lokufanako nalomunye, futsi kute namunye longakavumeleki.
26.29: Iyaleta kutsi bungabi khona buphristi-mbumbulu; ngoba, buka, buphristi-mbumbulu kungukutsi bantfu bafundzisa baphindze batibeke bona lucobo lwabo njengekukhanya emhlabeni, kute batfole inzuzo yakhe kanye nekudvunyiswa ngumhlaba; kodvwa abayifuni inhlalakahle yaseSiyoni.
26.30: Bukani, iNkhosi ayikayivumeli lentfo; ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu inike umyaleto wekutsi bonkhe bantfu babe nelutsandvo lolujulile, lutsandvo lolujulile lokulutsandvo. Futsi ngephandle kwekutsi babe nelutsandvo lolujulile abanalutfo. Ngaloko-ke, uma bangaba nelutsandvo lolujulile angeke bavumele losebenta eSiyoni abhubhe.
26.31: Kodvwa losebenta eSiyoni uyawusebentela iSiyoni; ngoba uma asebentela imali uyawubhujiswa.
26.32: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyalete kutsi bantfu bangabulali; bangacambi emanga; bangebi; bangaliphatsi ligama leNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo ngelite; bangabi nemona, bangabi nenzondo, bangabangi lomunye nalomunye; bangabenti bugwadla; nekutsi bangenti nakunye kwaleti tintfo, ngoba loyo lowenta loku uyawubhujiswa.
26.33: Ngoba kute nakunye kwalobu bubi lobuvela eNkhosini; ngoba yona yenta loko lokuhle emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu; futsi ayenti lutfo ngaphandle kwekutsi kube sobala kubo bantfwana bebantfu; futsi imema bonkhe kutsi bete kuyo futsi bahlanganyele ebuhleni bayo; futsi ayaleli namunye lota kuyo, lomnyama nalomhlophe, loboshiwe nalokhululekile, wesilisa newesifazane; futsi iyawakhumbula emahedeni; bonkhe bayafana kuNkulunkulu, liJuda kanye neweTive.

27.1: Kodvwa, buka, ngetinsuku tekugcina, noma ngetinsuku tebeTive—yebo, buka tonkhe tive tebeTive futsi ngalokunjalo nemaJuda, labo labayawufika kulelive kanye nalabo labayawube bakulamanye emave, yebo, nakuwo onkhe emave emhlaba, buka, batawube badzakwe bubi kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinengiso—
27.2: Futsi uma lolosuku lufika bayawuvakashelwa yiNkhosi yemaBandla, ngekudvuma nangekutamatama kwemhlaba, nangemsindvo lomkhulu, nangesiphepho, nangesivunguvungu, kanye nangelilangabi lemlilo locedzako.
27.3: Futsi tonkhe tive letilwa neSiyoni, naleto letiyicindzetelako, tiyawuba njengeliphupho lembono wasebusuku; yebo, kuyawuba kubo, njengakumuntfu lolambile lophuphako, bukani uyadla kodvwa uma avuka umphefumulo wakhe awunalutfo; noma njengemuntfu lowomile lophuphako, bukani uyanatsa kodvwa uma avuka bukani ubutsakatsaka, nemphefumulo wakhe ulambile; yebo, siyawuba njalo-ke nesicuku sato tonkhe tive letilwa nentsaba iSiyoni.
27.4: Ngoba buka, nonkhe nine lenenta bubi, yetfukani nimangale, ngoba niyawuklabalala, futsi nikhale; yebo, niyawudzakwa kepha hhayi ngewayini, niyawuyendzetela kepha hhayi ngesinatfo lesinemandla.
27.5: Ngoba buka, iNkhosi itsele etikwenu butfongo lobukhulu. Ngoba buka, nivale emehlo enu, nilahle baphrofethi; kwatsi babusi benu, kanye nebaboni ibasibekele ngenca yebubi benu lobukhulu.
27.6: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawuletsa kini emavi encwadzi, futsi kuyawuba ngemavi abo labo lasebafa.
27.7: Futsi buka incwadzi iyawuvalwa; futsi encwadzini kuyawube kukhona sembulo lesivela kuNkulunkulu, kusukela ekucaleni kwemhlaba kuya ekupheleni kwawo.
27.8: Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yetintfo letivaliwe, leto tintfo letivaliwe atiyukuletfwa ngelusuku lwebubi netinengiso tebantfu. Ngaloko-ke incwadzi iyawugodlwa kubo.
27.9: Kodvwa incwadzi iyawunikwa indvodza, futsi yona iyawuwahambisa emavi alencwadzi, lekungemavi alabo lesebalala elutfulini, futsi iyawuwayisa kulomunye;
27.10: Kodvwa lawo mavi lavalelwe angeke awahambise, futsi angeke ayihambise naleyoncwadzi. Ngoba leyoncwadzi iyawube ivalwe ngemandla aNkulunkulu, futsi sembulo lesavalelwa siyawugcinwa encwadzini kute kufike sikhatsi seNkhosi lucobo lesifanele, kute avetwe; ngoba buka, embula tonkhe tintfo kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba kute kube sekupheleni kwawo.
27.11: Futsi lusuku luyeta lapho emavi encwadzi lavalelwe ayawufundvwa etikweticongo tendlu; futsi ayawufundvwa ngemandla aKhristu; futsi tonkhe tintfo tiyawukwembulelwa bantfwana bebantfu letake taba khona emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, futsi naleto letitawuba khona kute kube sekupheleni kwemhlaba.
27.12: Ngaloko-ke, ngalolosuku ngesikhatsi lencwadzi ihanjiswa kuye lomuntfu lengikhulume ngaye, lencwadzi iyawufihlwa emehlweni emhlaba, kute kungabi khona emehlo anoma ngubani loyawuyibona ngaphandle kwalabafokati labatsatfu labayawuyibona, ngemandla aNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwakhe loyo incwadzi leyawuyiswa kuye; futsi labo bayawufakaza ngeliciniso lalencwadzi kanye netintfo letikuyo.
27.13: Futsi kute namunye loyawuyibona, ngaphandle kwalabo labambalwa ngekwentsandvo yaNkulunkulu, kute banikete bufakazi ngelivi lakhe kubantfwana bebantfu; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ishilo kutsi emavi alabatsembekile ayokhuluma kube shengatsi aphuma kulabafile.
27.14: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi Nkulukulu itawuchubeka nekwembula emavi encwadzi; futsi ngemlomo wabofakazi labaningi njengoba kukuhle kuyo itawulicinisekisa livi layo; futsi maye kuloyo lolahla livi laNkulunkulu!
27.15: Kodvwa buka, kuyawukwenteka kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawutsi kuloyo leyawumletsela lencwadzi: Tsatsa lamavi langakavalwa uwayise kulomunye, kute awabonise lofundzile, atsi: Fundza lapha, ngiyakuncenga. Futsi lofundzile uyawutsi: Letsa lapha lencwadzi, ngitawuwafundza.
27.16: Manje, ngenca yeludvumo lwemhlaba kanye nekutfola inzuzo batawusho loku, hhayi ngekufuna ludvumo lwaNkulunkulu.
27.17: Futsi indvodza iyawutsi: Angikwati kuyiletsa incwadzi, ngoba ivaliwe.
27.18: Emvakwaloko lofundzile uyawutsi: Ngeke ngikwati kuyifundza.
27.19: Ngaloko-ke kuyawukwenteka, kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawuyiyisa futsi incwadzi kanye nemavi ayo kuloyo longakafundzi; indvodza lengakafundzi iyawutsi: Angikafundzi.
27.20: Emvakwaloko iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawutsi kuye: Labafundzile angeke bawafundze, ngoba bawalahlile, futsi ngiyakwati kwenta umsebenti wami; ngaloko-ke uyawuwafundza lawo mavi lengiyawukunika wona.
27.21: Ungatitsintsi leto tintfo letivaliwe, ngoba ngitawutiveta ngesikhatsi sami lesifanele; ngoba ngitawubakhombisa bantfwana bebantfu kutsi ngiyakwati kwenta umsebenti wami.
27.22: Ngaloko-ke, uma sewuwafundzile emavi lengikuyalete ngawo, wabatfola bofakazi lengikutsembise bona, emvakwaloko uyoyivala incwadzi futsi, bese uyifihla kimi, kute ngiwagcine lawo mavi lowungawafundzanga, kute ngibone kutsi kufanele ngekuhlakanipha kwami ngitembule tonkhe tintfo kubantfwana bebantfu.
27.23: Ngoba buka, nginguNkulunkulu; futsi nginguNkulunkulu wetimangaliso; futsi ngitawukhombisa umhlaba kutsi ngiyafana itolo, namuhla, naphakadze; nekutsi angisebenti emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngekwelukholo lwabo.
27.24: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kuyawukwenteka kutsi iNkhosi iyawuwutsi kuloyo loyawufundza lawo mavi layanikwa kuye:
27.25: Ngekubona kutsi labantfu basondzela edvute nami ngemilomo yabo, futsi nangetindzebe tabo bayangidvumisa, kodvwa batichelisele kudze tinhlitiyo tabo kimi, futsi nekungesaba kwabo kufundziswa ngekwemyalo webantfu—
27.26: Ngako-ke, ngitawuchubeka nekwenta umsebenti lomangalisako emkhatsini walaba bantfu, yebo, umsebenti lomangalisako nesimangaliso, ngoba kuhlakanipha kwalabahlakaniphile nalabafundzile babo kuyawushabalala, nekwati kwalabanekucondza babo kuyawufihlwa.
27.27: Futsi maye kulabo labafuna ngekujula kufihla emasu abo eNkhosini! Futsi imisebenti yabo isebumnyameni; futsi batsi: Ngubani losibonako, futsi ngubani losatiko na? Futsi ngetulu kwaloko batsi: Ngempela, kugucula kwakho tintfo tibheke phansi kuyawufaniswa njengelibumba lembumbi. Kodvwa buka, ngitawubakhombisa, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, kutsi ngiyayati yonkhe imisebenti yabo. Ngoba ngabe umsebenti uyawukusho yini kuloyo lowentile kutsi, akangentanga na? Noma loko lokubunjiwe kuyawusho yini kuloyo lokubumbile kutsi bekete kucondza na?
27.28: Kodvwa buka, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla: ngitawubakhombisa labantfwana bebantfu kutsi kusesikhashana nje lesincane kakhulu futsi iLebhanoni iyawuguculwa ibe yinsimu levundzile; futsi insimu levundzile iyawutsatfwa njengelihlatsi.
27.29: Futsi ngalo lolosuku tihhulu tiyawuweva emavi aleyo ncwadzi, nemehlo etimphumphutse ayawubona ekufiphaleni nasebumnyameni.
27.30: Futsi labatfobekile nabo bayawukwandza, intfokoto yabo iyawuba seNkhosini, labamphofu emkhatsini webantfu bayawujabula kuloNgcwele waka-Israyeli.
27.31: Ngoba ngempela njengoba iNkhosi iphila bayawubona kutsi loyo lomubi wentiwe waba lite, sedzeleli sishisiwe, nabonkhe labo lababuke bubi basusiwe;
27.32: Ngalokunjalo nalabo labenta umuntfu abe soni ngelivi, bambekele lugibe loyo lobakhutako esangweni, babuyisele labalungile eceleni njengentfo lengasilutfo.
27.33: Ngako-ke, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, leyahlenga Abrahama, mayelana nendlu yaJakobe: Jakobe manje angeke asaba nemahloni, noma buso bakhe manje buphaphatseke.
27.34: Kodvwa uma abona bantfwana bakhe, umsebenti wetandla tami, emkhatsini wakhe, bayawulingcwelisa ligama lami, futsi bamngcwelise loNgcwele waJakobe, futsi bayawumesaba Nkulunkulu waka-Israyeli.
27.35: Ngalokunjalo nalabo labaduka ngekwemoya bayawuba nekucondza, futsi labo labavungama bayawuyifundza imfundziso.

28.1: Manje, bukani, bomnaketfu, sengikhulumile kini, njengoba Moya ungiphocelele; ngaloko-ke, ngiyati kutsi loku kufanele ngempela kwenteke.
28.2: Futsi tintfo letiyawubhalwa kuleyo ncwadzi tiyawuba nguletiligugu lelikhulu kubantfwana bebantfu, ikakhulukati kuyo intalelwane yendlu yaka-Israyeli.
28.3: Ngoba kuyawukwenteka ngalolosuku kutsi emabandla lakhiwe, kodvwa hhayi eNkhosini, lapho lomunye ayawutsi kulomunye: Buka, mine ngimi lengiwenkhosi; futsi labanye bayawutsi: Mine, ngimi lengiweNkhosi; futsi wonkhe muntfu lowakhe emabandla uyawusho kanjalo, kodvwa hhayi eNkhosini—
28.4: Futsi ayawubanga ngulelo nalelo; nebaphristi bawo bayawubanga nguloyo naloyo, futsi bayawufundzisa ngekwemfundvo yabo, baphike naMoya loNgcwele, lokunguyena loniketa kukhuluma.
28.5: Futsi baphika emandla aNkulunkulu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli; batsi kubantfu: Lalelani tsine, nive umyalo wetfu; ngoba bukani kute Nkulunkulu namuhla, ngoba iNkhosi neMhlengi seyiwentile umsebenti wayo, futsi seyinikete emandla ayo kubantfu.
28.6: Bukani, lalelani umyalo wami; uma bayawutsi kukhona simangaliso lesentekile ngesandla seNkhosi, ningakukholwa loko, ngoba ngalolu lusuku akasuye Nkulunkulu wetimangaliso; uwentile umsebenti wakhe.
28.7: Yebo, futsi kuyawuba khona labaningi labayawutsi: Dlani, natsa, ujabule, ngoba kusasa sitokufa; futsi kuyawuba kuhle kitsi.
28.8: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kuyawuba khona labaningi labayawutsi: Dlani, natsa, ujabule; noko, mesabe Nkulunkulu—angeke akubeke licala ekwenteni sono lesincane; yebo, camba emanga kancane, sitakala ngalomunye ngenca yemavi akhe, gubhela makhelwane wakho umgodzi; kute bungoti kuloku; yenta tonkhe leti tintfo, ngoba kusasa sitofa; futsi uma kungukutsi sinelicala, Nkulunkulu utawusishaya ngemivimba lembalwa, ekugcineni siyawusindziswa embusweni waNkulunkulu.
28.9: Yebo, futsi kuyawuba khona labaningi labayawufundzisa ngalendlela, emanga nangelite kanye netimfundziso letibuwula, bayawukhukhumala etinhlitiyweni tabo, bafune ngekujula kufihla emasu abo eNkhosini; futsi imisebenti yabo iyawuba sebumnyameni.
28.10: Futsi ingati yalabangcwele iyawukhala emhlabatsini ngalokumelene nabo.
28.11: Yebo, bonkhe baphambukile endleleni, bangenwe yinkhohlakalo.
28.12: Ngenca yekutigcabha, nangenca yebafundzisi bemanga, nemfundziso yemanga, emabandla abo angenwe yinkhohlakalo, futsi emabandla abo aphakeme; ngenca yekutigcabha bakhukhumele.
28.13: Baphanga labamphofu ngenca yetindlu tabo letingcwele letinhle; baphanga labamphofu ngenca yetingubo tabo letinhle; futsi bahlupha labamnene nalabamphofu ngenhlitiyo, ngoba ekutichenyeni kwabo bakhukhumele.
28.14: Banetihloko letilukhuni kanye nekutigcabha; yebo, ngenca yekutigcabha, nebubi, netinengiso, nebugwadla, bonkhe badukile ngaphandle kwalabambalwa, lababalandzeli baKhristu labatfobekile; noko, bayaholwa, kute kutsi ngetikhatsi letiningi baphambuke ngenca yekutsi bafundziswa ngemiyalo yebantfu.
28.15: Awu labahlakaniphile, nalabafundzile, kanye nalabacebile, labakhukhumele ekutichenyeni kwetinhlitiyo tabo, kanye nabo bonkhe labo labashumayela timfundziso temanga, nabo bonkhe labo labenta bugwadla, futsi bagucule indlela lecondzile yeNkhosi, maye, maye, maye kubo, kusho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu Somandla, ngoba bayawuphonswa phansi esihogweni!
28.16: Maye kubo labo labakhweshisela eceleni labalungile njengentfo lengenalutfo futsi bahlambalate loko lokuhle, batsi kuyintfo lenganamsebenti! Ngoba lusuku luyeta lapho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu masinyane iyawubahambela bantfu basemhlabeni; futsi ngalolosuku lapho sebavutfwe ngalokungcwele ebubini lobukhulu bayawubhubha.
28.17: Kodvwa buka, uma bantfu basemhlabeni bangaphendvuka ebubini babo nasetinengisweni angeke babhujiswe, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
28.18: Kodvwa buka, lelo bandla lelikhulu nalelinengekile, sifebe semhlaba wonkhe, kufanele liwele emhlabeni, futsi kuyoba kukhulu kuwa kwalo.
28.19: Ngoba umbuso wadeveli kufanele utanyatanyiswe, futsi labo labangebawo kufanele kutsi baphehlelwe ekuphendvukeni, noma develi utawubabamba ngtinketane takhe taphakadze, baphehlelwe entfukutselweni bashabalale.
28.20: Ngoba buka, ngalolosuku uyawudlanga etinhlitiyweni tebantfwana bebantfu, abaphehle kute batfukutselele loko lokuhle.
28.21: Futsi labanye utawubatfobisa, anguloku abakhohlisa kutsi balondzeke ngekwasenyameni, kute batsi; Konkhe kulungile eSiyoni; yebo, iSiyoni iyaphumelela, konkhe kuhle—futsi ngaleyo ndlela develi uyoyilutsa imiphefumulo yabo, futsi abahole ngebucili abayise phansi esihogweni.
28.22: Futsi buka, labanye uyobakhohlisa, abatjele kutsi asikho sihogo; atsi kubo: Mine angisuye develi, ngoba kute—ubahlebela kanje etindlebeni tabo, ate ababambe ngetinketane takhe letesabekako, abayise lapho sekute khona kukhululwa.
28.23: Yebo, babanjwa ngekufa, kanye nangesihogo; futsi kufa kanye nesihogo, kanye nadeveli, bonkhe labo lababanjwe ngato leti tintfo kumele beme phambi kwesihlalo sebukhosi saNkulunkulu, futsi bahlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo, kusuka lapho sekufanele baye endzaweni lelungiselwe bona, lichibi lemlilo kanye nesibabule, lokukuhlupheka lokungenakuphela.
28.25: Maye kuloyo lomemeta atsi: Konkhe kulungile!
28.26: Yebo, maye kuloyo lolalela imiyalo yebantfu, aphike emandla aNkulunkulu, nesipho saMoya loNgcwele!
28.27: Yebo, maye kuloyo lotsi: Sesitfole lokwanele, futsi asisakudzingi lokunye!
28.28: Kwephetsa, maye kubo bonkhe labo labatfutfumelako, futsi labatfukutsele ngenca yeliciniso laNkulunkulu! Ngoba buka, loyo lowakhe etikwelidvwala ulemukela ngekutfokota; futsi loyo lowakhe etikwesisekelo lesisihlabatsi uyatfutfumela hleze awe.
28.29: Maye kuloyo loyawutsi: Sesilitfolile livi laNkulunkulu, futsi asisalidzingi lelinye livi laNkulunkulu, ngoba sesanele!
28.30: Ngoba bukani, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Ngitawubanika bantfwana bebantfu umugca etikwalomunye umugca, umyalo etikwalomunye umyalo, lokuncane lapha nalokuncane lapho; futsi babusisiwe labo labalalela imiyalo yami, futsi baboleke indlebe ekucondziseni kwami, ngoba bayawufundza kuhlakanipha; ngoba kuloyo lomukelako ngitawumnika lokunye; futsi kulabo labayawutsi, Sesanele, kubo kuyawutsatfwa naloko labanako.
28.31: Ucalekisiwe loyo lobeka litsemba lakhe kumuntfu, noma ente umuntfu emandla akhe, noma lolalela imiyalo yebantfu, ngaphandle uma imiyalo yabo inikwa ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele.
28.32: Maye kubo beTive, kusho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yemaBandla! Ngoba nanoma umkhono wami ngiyawuwelulela kubo lusuku nelusuku, batawungiphika; noko, ngitawuba nesihawu kubo, kusho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, uma batawuphendvuka futsi bete kimi; ngoba umkhono wami weluliwe lonkhe lusuku, kusho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wemaBandla.

29.1: Kodvwa buka, kuyawuba khona labaningi—ngalolosuku lapho sengichubeka nekwenta umsebenti lomangalisako emkhatsini wabo, kute ngikhumbule tivumelwano tami lengitentile kubantfwana bebantfu, kute ngelule sandla sami futsi kwesibili kubuyisela bantfu bami, lababendlu yaka-Israyeli;
29.2: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, kute ngikhumbule tetsembiso lengatenta kuwe, Nefi, futsi ngalokunjalo nakuyihlo, kutsi ngiyoyikhumbula intalelwane yenu; nekutsi emavi entalelwane yenu ayovela aphuma emlonyeni wami aya kuyo intalelwane yenu; nemavi ami ayawuhamba ngemandla aye nasemikhawulweni yemhlaba, abe sibonakaliso kubantfu bami, lababendlu yaka-Israyeli;
29.3: Futsi ngenca yekutsi emavi ami ayawuhamba ngemandla—labaningi betive bayawutsi: LiBhayibheli! LiBhayibheli! Sinalo liBhayibheli, futsi angeke kube khona lelinye liBhayibheli.
29.4: Kodvwa naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu: Awu tiwula, bayawuba nalo liBhayibheli; futsi liyawuvela kuwo emaJuda, bantfu bami bakudzala besivumelwano. Futsi ngabe bawabonga ngani emaJuda ngalelo liBhayibheli labalitfola kuwo na? Yebo, ngabe beTive bacondzeni na? Ngabe bayatikhumbula yini tinhlupheko, nemisebenti, nemetamo lemikhulu yemaJuda, kanye nenkhutsalo kimi, ekuletseni insindziso kubeTive na?
29.5: Awu nine beTive, nike nawakhumbula emaJuda, bantfu bami bakudzala besivumelwano na? Cha; kodvwa niwacalekisile, nawutondza, futsi anitange nifune kuwabuyisa. Kodvwa bukani, ngitawutibuyisa tonkhe leti tintfo etikwetinhloko tenu lucobo; ngoba mine iNkhosi angikabakhohlwa bantfu bami.
29.6: Wena siwula, loyawukutsi: LiBhayibheli, tsine sinalo liBhayibheli, asilidzingi lelinye liBhayibheli. Ngabe nalitfola yini liBhayibheli ngaphandle kwekutsi kwaba ngenca yemaJuda na?
29.7: Anati yini kutsi kunetive letiningi kunalesisodvwa na? Anati yini kutsi Mine, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu, ngibadalile bonkhe bantfu, futsi nekutsi ngiyabakhumbula labo labasetichingini telwandle; futsi nekutsi ngibusa emazulwini ngetulu nasemhlabeni ngaphansi; futsi ngiletsa livi lami kubantfwana bebantfu, yebo, nasetikwato tonkhe tive temhlaba na?
29.8: Ngaloko-ke nivungamelani, ngoba niyawutfola lokuningi ngelivi lami? Anati yini kutsi bufakazi betive letimbili bubufakazi kini bekutsi mine nginguNkulunkulu, nekutsi ngikhumbula sive lesisodvwa njengalesinye na? Ngaloko-ke, ngikhuluma emavi lafanako kulesinye sive njengakulesinye. Futsi uma tive letimbili tiyawuba khona ndzawonye nebufakazi betive letimbili buyawuba khona ndzawonye futsi.
29.9: Futsi ngikwenta loku kute ngikhombise kulabaningi kutsi ngiyafana itolo, namuhla, naphakadze; nekutsi ngikhuluma emavi ami njengekutsandza kwami. Futsi ngenca yekutsi ngikhulume livi linye akukafaneli nicabange kutsi ngeke ngisalikhuluma lelinye; ngoba umsebenti wami awukapheli; noma ngeke uphele kute kube sekupheleni kwemuntfu, noma kusukela kuleso sikhatsi kuya phambili ingunaphakadze.
29.10: Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yekutsi ninalo liBhayibheli akukafaneli nicabange kutsi licuketse onkhe emavi ami; noma nicabange kutsi angitange ngente lokunye lokuningi kutsi kubhalwe.
29.11: Ngoba ngiyaleta bonkhe bantfu, emphumalanga nasenshonalanga, enyakatfo, naseningizimu, kanye nasetichingini telwandle, kutsi bawabhale emavi lengiwakhuluma kubo; ngoba etincwadzini letiyawubhalwa ngitawuwehlulela umhlaba, wonkhe umuntfu ngekwemisebenti yakhe, ngekwaloko lokubhaliwe.
29.12: Ngoba buka, ngiyawukhuluma kumaJuda futsi akubhale loko; futsi ngalokunjalo ngiyawukhuluma kumaNefi nawo ayawukubhala loko; futsi ngalokunjalo ngiyawukhuluma kuletinye tivana tendlu yaka-Israyeli, lengitiholele kudze; futsi nato tiyawukubhala loko; kanjalo ngiyawukhuluma kuto tonkhe tive temhlaba futsi nato tiyawukubhala loko.
29.13: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi emaJuda ayawuba nemavi emaNefi, futsi nemaNefi ayawuba nemavi emaJuda; futsi emaNefi kanye nemaJuda ayawuba nemavi etivana letilahlekile taka-Israyeli; futsi tivana letilahlekile taka-Israyeli tiyawuba nemavi emaNefi kanye newemaJuda.
29.14: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi bantfu bami, lababendlu yaka-Israyeli, bayawugcogcelwa ekhaya emaveni langewabo; futsi nelivi lami ngalokunjalo liyawuhlanganiswa libe linye. Ngitawubakhombisa labo labalwa nelivi lami kanye nebantfu bami, lababendlu yaka-Israyeli, kutsi nginguNkulunkulu, futsi nekutsi ngavumelana na-Abrahama kutsi ngiyoyikhumbula intalelwane yakhe ingunaphakadze.

30.1: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngitokhuluma kini; ngoba mine, Nefi, angeke ngivume kutsi nicabange kutsi nilunge kakhulu kunaloko beTive labayawuba ngiko. Ngoba bukani, ngaphandle kwekutsi nigcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu nonkhe ngalokufanako niyawubhubha; futsi ngenca yemavi lakhulunyiwe akudzingi nicabange kutsi beTive babhujisiwe baphela nya.
30.2: Ngoba bukani, ngitsi kini ngangebuningi bebeTive labatawuphendvuka batawuba ngebantfu besivumelwano beNkhosi; futsi ngebuningi bemaJuda labangeke baphendvuke bayawulahlwa; ngoba iNkhosi kute leyenta sivumelwano naye ngaphandle kwalabo labaphendvukako futsi bakholwe kuyo iNdvodzana yayo lenguloNgcwele waka-Israyeli.
30.3: Manje, sengitophrofetha ikakhulukati mayelana nemaJuda kanye nebeTive. Ngoba emvakwekutsi incwadzi lengikhulume ngayo iyawuvela, ibhalelwe beTive, iphindze ivalelwe eNkhosini, kuyawuba khona labaningi labayawukholwa lawo mavi labhaliwe; futsi bayawuwatsatsa bawayise kuyo insali yentalelwane yetfu.
30.4: Futsi emvakwaloko insali yentalelwane yetfu iyokwati mayelana natsi, kutsi saphuma kanjani eJerusalema, nekutsi yona isitukulwane semaJuda.
30.5: Futsi livangeli laJesu Khristu liyawumenyetelwa emkhatsini wabo; ngaloko-ke, bayawubuyiselwa elwatini lwaboyise, futsi ngalokunjalo naselwatini lwaJesu Khristu, lobekakhona emkhatsini waboyise.
30.6: Futsi emvakwaloko bayawutfokota; ngoba bayawukwati kutsi kusibusiso kubo lesivele esandleni saNkulunkulu; futsi tincwencwe tabo tebumnyama tiyawucala kuwa emehlweni abo; futsi titukulwane letiningi angeke tendlule emkhatsini wabo, ngaphandle kwekutsi bayawuba bantfu labamsulwa futsi labatsandzekako.
30.7: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi emaJuda lahlakatekile nawo ayawucala kukholwa kuKhristu; futsi ayawucala kubutsana etikwelive lonkhe; ngangebuningi balabo labayawukholwa kuKhristu nabo bayawukuba bantfu labatsandzekako.
30.8: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawucala umsebenti wayo emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, nakubantfu, kuletsa kubuyiselwa kwebantfu bayo emhlabeni.
30.9: Futsi ngekulunga iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawubehlulela labamphofu, futsi yekhute ngekungakhetsi labatfobekile bemhlaba. Futsi iyawushaya umhlaba ngendvuku yemlomo wayo; nakuphefumula kwetindzebe tayo iyawubabulala lababi.
30.10: Ngoba sikhatsi siyeta masinyane lapho iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawukwenta kwehlukana lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu, lababi itawubabhubhisa; isindzisa bantfu bayo, yebo, noma ngabe kungukutsi kufanele ibhubhise lababi ngemlilo.
30.11: Futsi kulunga kuyawuba libhande letinkhalo tayo, nekwetsembeka libhande letinso tayo.
30.12: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi imphisi iyawuhlala nemvu; nengwe iyawulala phansi nemntfwana, kanye nelinkhonyane, nelibhubesi lelincane, kanye nalokukhuluphalisiwe, ndzawonye; futsi umntfwana lomncane uyawutihola.
30.13: Inkhomati kanye nelibhele kuyawudla ndzawonye; lokuncane kwato kuyawulala phansi ndzawonye; futsi libhubesi liyawudla tjani njengenkhabi.
30.14: Umntfwana lomunyako uyawudlala emgodzini wemfeti, futsi umntfwana lolunyuliwe uyawufaka sandla sakhe emhhumeni welibululu.
30.15: Angeke kulimate noma kubhubhise intsaba yami lengcwele; ngoba umhlaba uyawugcwala lwati lweNkhosi njengemanti ambonya lwandle.
30.16: Ngaloko-ke, tintfo tetive tonkhe tiyawukwembulwa; yebo, tonkhe tintfo tiyawukwembulwa kubantfwana bebantfu.
30.17: Kute lutfo loluyimfihlo ngaphandle kwekuwuvetwa; kute umsebenti webumnyama ngaphandle kwekwentiwa ubonakale ekukhanyeni; futsi kute lutfo loluboshiwe emhlabeni ngaphandle kwekukhululwa.
30.18: Ngaloko-ke, tonkhe tintfo letavetelwa bantfwana bebantfu kuyawutsi ngalolosuku tembulwe; futsi Sathane angeke abe nemandla ngetulu kwetinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu, sikhatsi lesidze. Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, sengenta siphetfo senkhulumo yami.

31.1: Manje mine, Nefi, ngenta siphetfo sekuphrofetha kwami kini, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako. Futsi ngeke ngisabhala ngaphandle kwetintfo letimbalwa nje, lengatiko kutsi kufanele nakanjani tenteke; futsi ngeke ngisabhala ngaphandle kwemagama lambalwa emnaketfu Jakobe.
31.2: Ngaloko-ke, tintfo lengitibhalile tiyangenelisa, ngaphandle nje kwemavi lambalwa lekufanele ngiwakhulume mayelana nemfundziso yaKhristu; ngaloko-ke, ngitawukhuluma kini ngalokusobala, ngalokusobala kwekuphrofetha kwami.
31.3: Ngoba umphefumulo wami uyatfokota ngalokusobala; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu isebenta ngalendlela emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu. Ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu inika kukhanya kwalabanekucondza; ngoba ikhuluma kubantfu ngekwelulwimi lwabo, ngekucondza kwabo.
31.4: Ngaloko-ke, ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule kutsi ngikhulumile kini ngalokuphatselene naloyo mphrofethi loyo iNkhosi leyangikhombisa yena, loyobhabhatisa iMvana yaNkulunkulu, leyosusa tono temhlaba.
31.5: Manje, uma iMvana yaNkulunkulu, yona ingcwele, inesidzingo sekubhajatiswa ngemanti, kugcwalisa konkhe kulunga, Awu pho, sikhulu kangakanani sidzingo setfu, sibe singekho ngcwele, sekutsi sibhajatiswe, yebo, nangemanti!
31.6: Manje, ngitonibuta, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, kutsi kwenteka kanjani kutsi iMvana yaNkulunkulu igcwalise konkhe kulunga ngekubhajatiswa ngemanti na?
31.7: Anati yini kutsi yayingcwele na? Kodvwa nanoma ingcwele, yakhombisa kubantfwana bebantfu kutsi, ngekwasenyameni iyatitfoba phambi kwaBabe, futsi iyafakaza kuBabe kutsi iyomlalela ekugcineni imiyaleto yakhe.
31.8: Ngaloko-ke, emvakwekube seyibhajatisiwe ngemanti Moya loNgcwele wehlela etikwayo unjengesimo selituba.
31.9: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, kukhombisa kubantfwana bebantfu kuba ngumntjuntju kwendlela, kanye nebuncane belisango, lokufanele bangene ngalo, yona seyisentile sibonelo phambi kwabo.
31.10: Futsi yatsi kubantfwana bebantfu: Ngilandzeleni. Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, singamlandzela yini Jesu ngaphandle kwekutsi sitimisele kutsi sigcine imiyaleto yaBabe na?
31.11: Futsi Babe watsi: Phendvukani, phendvukani, futsi nibhajatiswe egameni leNdvodzana yami leTsandzekako.
31.12: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, livi lendvodzana lefika kimi, litsi: Loyo lobhajatiswe egameni lami, Babe utawumnika Moya loNgcwele, njengami; ngaloko-ke, ngilandzeleni, futsi nente tintfo lenibone ngitenta.
31.13: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngiyati kutsi uma niyawulandzela iNdvodzana, ngenhloso legcwele enhlitiyweni, ningabi nekutentisa kanye nenkhohliso phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kodvwa ngenhloso yangempela, niphendvuka etonweni tenu, nifakaza kuBabe kutsi nitimisele kubitwa ngeligama laKhristu, ngembhabhatiso—yebo, ngekulandzela iNkhosi yenu kanye neMsindzisi wenu nehlele phansi emantini, njengekwelivi lakhe, bukani, emvakwaloko niyawuphiwa Moya loNgcwele; yebo, emvakwaloko kuta umbhabhatiso wemlilo kanye newaMoya loNgcwele; futsi ngaleso sikhatsi ningakhuluma ngelulwimi lwetingilosi, futsi nimemete indvumiso kuloNgcwele wa-Israyeli.
31.14: Kodvwa, bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, kweta livi leNdvodzana kimi, litsi: Emvakwekube seniphendvukile etonweni tenu, nafakaza kuBabe kutsi nitimisele kugcina imiyaleto yami, ngembhabhatiso wemanti, futsi senemukele umbhabhatiso wemlilo kanye newaMoya loNgcwele, futsi senikwati kukhuluma ngelulwimi lolusha, yebo, nangelulwimi lwetingilosi, futsi emvakwaloku ningiphike, bekuyoba ncono kini kutsi beningangati.
31.15: Futsi ngeva livi livela kuBabe, litsi: Yebo, emavi aloTsandzekako wami aliciniso futsi atsembekile. Loyo loyobeketela kute kube sekugcineni, nguloyo kanye loyawusindziswa.
31.16: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngiyati ngaloku kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi umuntfu abeketele kute kube sekugcineni, ngekulandzela sibonelo seNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu lophilako, angeke asindziswe.
31.17: Ngaloko-ke, yentani leto tintfo lenginitjele tona ngitibonile kutsi iNkhosi yenu kanye neMhlengi wenu uyotenta; ngoba, ngalesi sizatfu tibonisiwe kimi, kute nilati lisango lekufanele ningene ngalo. Ngoba lisango lekufanele ningene ngalo kuphendvuka kanye nekubhajatiswa ngemanti; bese kuta kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele.
31.18: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi senikulendlela lengumntjuntju nalencane leholela ekuphileni lokuphakadze; yebo, seningene ngelisango; senente njengekwemiyaleto yaBabe kanye neNdvodzana; futsi senemukele Moya loNgcwele, lofakaza ngaBabe kanye neNdvodzana, ekugcwaliseni setsembiso lasentile, sekutsi uma ningena ngendlela niyositfola.
31.19: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, emvakwekutsi seningenile kulendlela lengumntjuntju futsi nalencane, ngitonibuta kutsi ingabe konkhe sekwentiwe na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha; ngoba beningeke nifike kudze kangaka ngaphandle kwekutsi kungelivi laKhristu nekukholwa kuye lokungenakunyakatiswa, netsembela ngalokungcwele kuto tento takhe letinhle loyo lonemandla ekusindzisa.
31.20: Ngaloko-ke, kufanele niphikelele ngekusima kuKhristu, ninelitsemba lelimsulwa leliphelele, kanye nelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu kanye nelwebantfu bonkhe. Ngaloko-ke, uma niyawuphikelela, nititike ngelivi laKhristu, futsi nibeketele kute kube sekugcineni, bukani, naku lokushiwo nguBabe: Niyawuba nekuphila lokuphakadze.
31.21: Manje, bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngiyo lena indlela; futsi kute nayinye lenye indlela noma ligama lelinikwe ngaphansi kwelizulu umuntfu angasindziswa ngalo embusweni waNkulunkulu. Manje, bukani, loku yimfundziso yaKhristu, futsi nguyona mfundziso kuphela leliciniso laBabe, kanye neyeNdvodzana, kanye neyaMoya loNgcwele, lokunguNkulunkulu munye, longenasiphetfo. Amen.

32.1: Manje, bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngicabanga kutsi niyazindla ngandlela tsite etinhlitinyweni tenu mayelana naloko lokufanele nikwente emvakwekutsi seningenile ngalendlela. Kodvwa, bukani, nizindlelani ngaleti tintfo etinhlitiyweni tenu na?
32.2: Anikhumbuli yini kutsi ngishito kini kutsi emvakwekutsi senemukele Moya loNgcwele ningakhuluma ngelulwimi lwetingilosi na? Manje, ningakhuluma kanjani ngelulwimi lwetingilosi ngaphandle kwekutsi kube naMoya loNgcwele na?
32.3: Tingilosi tikhuluma ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele; ngaloko-ke, tikhuluma emavi aKhristu. Ngaloko-ke, ngitse kini, titikeni ngemavi aKhristu; ngoba bukani, emavi aKhristu atawunitjela tonkhe tintfo lekufanele nitente.
32.4: Ngaloko-ke, manje emvakwekutsi sengikhulume lamavi, uma ningawacondzi kutawuba kungenca yekutsi anibuti, noma aninconcotsi; ngaloko-ke, aninakuletfwa ekukhanyeni, kodvwa kufanele nibhubhe nisebumnyameni.
32.5: Ngoba bukani, ngiyaphindza ngiyasho kini kutsi uma nitawungena ngalendlela, futsi nemukele Moya loNgcwele, utawunikhombisa tonkhe tintfo lokufanele nitente.
32.6: Bukani, loku yimfundziso yaKhristu, futsi angeke kube khona lenye imfundziso leyawunikwa kute kube emvakwekube sekatibonakalisile kini asenyameni. Futsi uma sekatibonakalisile kini asenyameni, leto tintfo layawutisho kini nibotama kutsi nitente.
32.7: Manje mine, Nefi, angisenakusho lokuningi; Moya uyakuvimba kukhuluma kwami, futsi ngishiywa kutsi ngilile ngenca yekungakholwa, nebubi, nekungati, kanye nekuba bonhlokolukhuni kwebantfu; ngoba angeke balufune lwati, noma balucondze lwati lolukhulu, uma banikwa lona ngalokusobala, njengekubasobala njengelivi.
32.8: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngiyabona kutsi nisazindla etinhlitiyweni tenu; futsi kuyangidzabukisa kutsi kufanele ngikhulume mayelana nalentfo. Ngoba uma ningalalela Moya lofundzisa umuntfu kuthandaza, niyokwati kutsi kufanele nithandaze; ngoba umoya lomubi awumfundzisi umuntfu kutsi athandaze, kodvwa umfundzisa kutsi kufanele angathandazi.
32.9: Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi kini kufanele nithandaze njalo, ningakhatsali; ningenti nanoma yini lenye eNkhosini ngaphandle kwekutsi nithandaze kucala kuBabe egameni laKhristu, kute atawungcwelisa kwenta kwenu kini, kute kwenta kwenu kube yinzuzo emiphefumulweni yenu.

33.1: Manje mine, Nefi, angeke ngikwati kutibhala tonkhe tintfo letafundziswa emkhatsini webantfu bami; futsi angisilo liciko ekubhaleni, njengasekukhulumeni; ngoba uma umuntfu akhuluma ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele emandla aMoya loNgcwele akutfwala loko akuyise etinhlitiyweni tebantfwana bebantfu.
33.2: Kodvwa bukani, kukhona labaningi labatente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene naMoya loNgcwele, kute ungabi nendzawo kubo; ngaloko-ke balahla tintfo letiningi letibhaliwe futsi batitsatse njengetintfo letilite.
33.3: Kodvwa mine, Nefi, ngikubhalile loku lengikubhalile, futsi ngikutsatsa njengentfo lebaluleke kakhulu, ikakhulukati kubantfu bami. Ngoba ngibathandazela njalo emini, emehlo ami amantisa umcamelo wami ebusuku, ngenca yabo; futsi ngiyakhala kuNkulunkulu wami ngekukholwa, ngiyati kutsi utawukuva kukhala kwami.
33.4: Futsi ngiyati kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawuyingcwelisa imithandazo yami kute kuzuze bantfu bami. Futsi emavi lengiwabhalile ebutsakatsakeni atawukwentiwa acine kubo; ngoba abavumisa kutsi bente lokuhle; abatisa ngaboyise; futsi akhuluma ngaJesu, futsi abavumisa kutsi bakholwe kuye, futsi babeketele kute kube sekugcineni, lokukuphila lokuphakadze.
33.5: Futsi akhuluma kakhulu ngalokumelene nesono, njengekuba sobala kweliciniso; ngaloko-ke, kute umuntfu lotawuwatfukutselela emavi lengiwabhalile ngaphandle kwekutsi anemoya wadeveli.
33.6: Ngiyatfokota ngalokusobala; ngiyatfokota ngeliciniso, ngiyatfokota ngaJesu wami, ngoba uwuhlengile umphefumulo wami esihogweni.
33.7: Nginelutsandvo ngebantfu bami, kanye nelukholo lolukhulu kuKhristu kutsi ngiyawuhlangana naleminingi imiphefumulo lengenasici esihlalweni sakhe sekwehlulela.
33.8: Nginelutsandvo ngemJuda—ngitsi umJuda, ngoba ngicondze wona lapho ngavela khona.
33.9: Ngetulu kwaloko nginelutsandvo ngebeTive. Kodvwa bukani, kute lengikufisako ngalaba ngaphandle kwekutsi babuyisane naKhristu, futsi bangene esangweni lelincane, bahambe endleleni lengumntjuntju lebaholela ekuphileni, futsi bachubeke kuleyo ndlela kute kuphele lusuku lwekuvivinywa.
33.10: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, futsi ngalokunjalo nemJuda, kanye nani nonkhe mikhawulo yemhlaba, walaleleni lamavi futsi nikholwe kuKhristu; futsi uma ningakholwa kulamavi kholwani kuKhristu. Futsi uma niyokholwa kuKhristu nitawukholwa kulamavi, ngoba angemavi aKhristu, futsi unginike wona; futsi afundzisa bonkhe bantfu kutsi bente lokuhle.
33.11: Futsi uma angasiwo emavi aKhristu, yehlulelani—ngoba Khristu utawunikhombisa, ngemandla kanye nangenkhatimulo lenkhulu, kutsi angemavi akhe ngelusuku lwekugcina, futsi wena nami siyawuma buso nebuso phambi kwesihlalo sakhe; niyawukwati kutsi ngiyaletwe nguye kutsi ngitibhale leti tintfo, noma kungebutsakatsaka bami.
33.12: Futsi ngiyathandaza kuBabe egameni laKhristu kutsi labaningi betfu, uma kungesitsi sonkhe, basindziswe embusweni wakhe ngalolosuku lolukhulu nelwekugcina.
33.13: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, bonkhe labo lokungebendlu yaka-Israyeli, kanye nani nonkhe mikhawulo yemhlaba, ngikhuluma kini njengelivi laloyo lokhala elutfulini: Salani kahle kute kube lolosuku lolukhulu luyafika.
33.14: Futsi nine leningeke nihlanganyele ebuhleni baNkulunkulu, futsi nihloniphe emavi emaJuda, futsi ngalokunjalo nemavi ami, kanye nemavi layawuphuma emlonyeni weMvana yaNkulunkulu, bukani, ngivalelisa kuvalelisa kwaphakadze, ngoba lamavi ayawunilahla ngelicala ngelusuku lwekugcina.
33.15: Ngoba loko lengikubopha emhlabeni, kuyawubekwa ebaleni ngalokumelene nani esihlalweni sekwehlulela; ngoba iNkhosi ingiyalete kanjalo futsi kufanele ngilalele. Amen.

1.intro: Emavi enshumayelo yakhe kubomnakabo. Utfobisa indvodza lefuna kucitsa imfundziso yaKhristu. Emavi lambalwa mayelana nemlandvo webantfu baNefi.
1.1: Ngoba buka, kwenteka kutsi kwase kwendlule iminyaka lengemashumi lasihlanu nesihlanu kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi ashiya eJerusalema; ngaloko-ke, Nefi wanika mine, Jakobe, umyaleto mayelana nabongcwengcwe labancane, lapho leti tintfo ticoshwe khona.
1.2: Futsi wanginika mine, Jakobe, umyaleto wekutsi kufanele ngibhale kubo laba bongcwengcwe tintfo letimbalwa lebengicabanga kutsi tiligugu lelikhulu; nekutsi kufanele ngingatsintsi, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube kukancane nje, mayelana nemlandvo walaba bantfu lababitwa ngekutsi bantfu baNefi.
1.3: Ngoba watsi umlandvo webantfu bakhe kufanele ucoshwe kulabanye bongcwengcwe bakhe, nekutsi kufanele ngibalondvolote laba bongcwengcwe futsi ngibendlulise behlele entalelwaneni yami, titukulwane ngetitukulwane.
1.4: Futsi uma kukhona inshumayelo lengcwele, noma sembulo lesikhulu, noma siphrofetho, kufanele ngicophe tihloko taloko kubo labongcwengcwe, futsi ngibhale ngako kakhulu, ngenca yaKhristu, futsi nangenca yebantfu betfu.
1.5: Ngoba ngenca yelukholo kanye nangalokukhulu kukhatsateka, ngempela kwembulwa kitsi mayelana nebanftu betfu, kutsi ngutiphi tintfo letatitokwenteka kubo.
1.6: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko saba netembulo letiningi, kanye namoya wekuphrofetha lokukhulu; ngaloko-ke, sati ngaKhristu kanye nangembuso wakhe, lowawutofika.
1.7: Ngaloko-ke sasebenta ngekukhutsala emkhatsini webantfu betfu, kute sibabonise kutsi bete kuKhristu, nekutsi bahlanganyele ebuhleni baNkulunkulu, kute bangene ekuphumuleni kwakhe, hleze ngandlela tsite ate afunge asentfukutselweni yakhe kutsi bangangeni kuyo, njengoba achukulutwa ngetinsuku tekulingwa ngesikhatsi bantfwana baka-Israyeli basehlane.
1.8: Ngaloko-ke, siyacela kuNkulunkulu kutsi sikwati kubabonisa bonkhe bantfu kutsi bangahlubuki kuNkulunkulu, bamchukulute ate atfukutsele, kodvwa kutsi bonkhe bantfu bakholwe kuKhristu, futsi bakubone kufa kwakhe, basivume siphambano sakhe baphindze babeketelele kuhlazwa ngumhlaba; ngaloko-ke, mine, Jakobe, ngikwenta kube ngumtfwalo wami kutsi ngiwugcwalise umyaleto wemnaketfu Nefi.
1.9: Manje Nefi wacala kuba mdzala, futsi wabona kutsi masinyane bese atokufa; ngaloko-ke, wagcoba indvodza kutsi ibe yinkhosi kanye nembusi ngetulu kwebanftu bakhe, njengekubusa kwemakhosi.
1.10: Bantfu sebamtsandzile Nefi ngalokwendlulele, yena angumvikeli wabo lomkhulu, ayisebentisile inkemba yaLabani ekubavikeleni, futsi ayisebentele inhlalakahle yabo ngato tonkhe tinsuku takhe—
1.11: Ngaloko-ke, bantfu baba nesifiso sekuligcina libito lakhe njengesikhumbuto. Futsi labo labebatobusa esikhundleni sakhe babitwa bantfu, ngaNefi wesibili, Nefi wesitsatfu, njalonjalo, ngekwemibuso yemakhosi; futsi babitwa kanjalo bantfu, noma ngabe emabito abo bekabobani.
1.13: Manje bantfu labebangasiwo emaLamani bebangemaNefi; noko, bebabitwa ngemaNefi, emaJakobe, emaJosefa, emaZoramu, emaLamani, emaLemuweli, kanye nema-Ishmayeli.
1.14: Kodvwa mine, Jakobe, emvakwaloku angiyubahlukanisa ngalamabito, kodvwa ngiyawubabita ngemaLamani labo labafuna kubhubhisa bantfu baNefi, futsi labo labanebungani naNefi ngiyawubabita ngemaNefi, noma bantfu baNefi, ngekubusa kwemakhosi.
1.15: Manje kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNefi, ngaphansi kwekubusa kweNkhosi yesibili, bacala batenta taba lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, futsi batimbandzakanya ngandlela tsite ekwenteni tento tebubi, letinjengaleto taDavide wasendvulo tekufisa bafati labaningi kanye netingani, futsi ngalokunjalo naSolomoni, indvodzana yakhe.
1.16: Yebo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko bacala kufuna ligolide kanye nesiliva leliningi, futsi bacala kutsi ngandlelatsite baphakama ngenca yekutigcabha.
1.17: Ngaloko-ke mine, Jakobe, ngabanika lamavi ngesikhatsi ngibafundzisa ethempelini, sengitfole kucala kutfunywa kwami eNkhosini.
1.18: Ngoba mine, Jakobe, kanye nemnaketfu Josefa sasibekwe saba baphristi nebafundzisi balaba bantfu, ngesandla saNefi.
1.19: Futsi sawudvumisa umsebenti wetfu eNkhosini, sakwenta umtfwalo wetfu, siphendvule tono talaba bantfu etikwetinhloko tetfu lucobo uma singabafundzisanga livi laNkulunkulu ngekukhutsala konkhe; ngaloko-ke, ngekusebenta ngemandla etfu ingati yabo ngeke ite ngetulu kwetembatfo tetfu; ngaphandle kwaloko ingati yabo iyawuba etikwetembatfo tetfu, futsi asiyukutfolakala singenacashati ngelusuku lwekugcina.

2.1: Emavi aJakobe, umnakabo Nefi, lawakhuluma kubantfu baNefi, emvakwekufa kwaNefi.
2.2: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, mine, Jakobe, ngekwesibopho lengiphansi kwaso kuNkulunkulu, kutsi ngidvumise umsebenti wami ngebucotfo, futsi nekutsi ngisuse tono tenu etembatfweni tami, ngikhuphukela ethempelini ngalolusuku kute ngimemetele kini livi laNkulunkulu.
2.3: Futsi nine lucobo lwenu niyati kutsi kute kube manje bengikhutsele emsebentini welubito lwami; kodvwa ngalolusuku ngicindzetelwa kuba nesifiso lesikhulu kakhulu kanye nekukhatsateka ngenca yenhlalakahle yemiphefumulo yenu ngetulu kwaloko lebenginako kute kube manje.
2.4: Ngoba bukani, kute kube manje, nililalele livi leNkhosi, lengininike lona.
2.5: Kodvwa bukani, ngilaleleni, futsi nati kutsi ngelusito lweMdali welizulu nemhlaba lonemandla onkhe nginganitjela mayelana nemicabango yenu, kutsi senicala kanjani kusebenta esonweni, lesibonakala sinengekile kakhulu kimi, yebo, lesinengekile nakuNkulunkulu.
2.6: Yebo, kuyawudzabukisa umphefumulo wami futsi kungenta ngishwaphane ngemahloni phambi kweMenti wami, kutsi kufanele ngifakaze kini mayelana nebubi betinhlitiyo tenu.
2.7: Ngetulu kwaloko kuyangidzabukisa kutsi kufanele ngisebentise sibindzi lesikhulu kangaka sekukhuluma mayelana nani, phambi kwebafati benu kanye nebantfwana benu, labaningi babo labanemizwa letsambe kakhulu nalabamsulwa futsi labaneluvelo phambi kwaNkulunkulu, lekuyintfo letfokotisako kuNkulunkulu;
2.8: Futsi ngicabanga kutsi bakhuphukele lana kutokuva livi lelitfokotisako laNkulunkulu, yebo, livi lelelapha umphefumulo lolimele.
2.9: Ngaloko-ke, kuyawucindzetela umphefumulo wami kutsi ngiphoceleleke, ngenca yemyaleto locinile lengiwutfole kuNkulunkulu, kutsi nginiyale ngekwemacala enu, kutsi ngandzise tilondza talabo lasebavele balimele, esikhundleni sekubadvudvuta nekubapholisa tilondza tabo; futsi labo labangakalimali, esikhundleni sekutsi batitike ngalelitfokotisako livi laNkulunkulu nginetinkemba letibekelwe kuhlaba imiphefumulo yabo tilimate imicondvo yabo lentekenteke.
2.10: Kodvwa, nanoma kungebukhulu balomsebenti, kufanele ngente njengekucina kwemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, nginitjele mayelana nebubi kanye netinengiso tenu, phambi kwalabo labanetinhlitiyo letimsulwa, nalabanetinhlitiyo letidzabukile, kanye nangephansi kwekubuka kweliso lelihlabako laNkulunkulu Somandla.
2.11: Ngaloko-ke, kufanele nginitjele liciniso njengekuba sobala kwelivi laNkulunkulu. Ngoba bukani, ngesikhatsi ngibuta eNkhosini, leta livi kimi, litsi: Jakobe, vuka ukhuphukele ethempelini kusasa, umemetele livi lengiyawukunika lona kulaba bantfu.
2.12: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu, leli livi lengilimemetela kini, kutsi labaningi benu sebacale kufuna ligolide, nesiliva, kanye nalo lonkhe luhlobo lwensimbi leligugu, lokukulelive, lokulive lesetsembiso kini kanye nentalelwane yenu, lokukuningi nalokuyinala lenkhulu.
2.13: Futsi sandla sekupha simamatsekile etikwenu ngekutfokota lokukhulu, kangangoba nitfole umcebo lomningi; futsi ngenca yekutsi labanye benu bayitfole ngebuningi lobukhulu kunaleyo yabomnakenu seniyatigcabha, seninenkhani kanye nekutichenya ngenca yekubita kwetembatfo tenu, futsi nihlupha bomnakenu, ngoba nicabanga kutsi nincono kunabo.
2.14: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngabe nicabanga kutsi Nkulunkulu unitfola ningenacala yini kulentfo na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha. Kodvwa unilahla ngelicala, futsi uma niphikelela kuleti tintfo kwehlulela kwakhe kufanele kufike masinyane kini.
2.15: Awu kwangatsi anganikhombisa kutsi anganihlaba, futsi ngekunitsi nhla nje kanye ngeliso lakhe anganishaya elutfulini!
2.16: Awu kwangatsi anganisusa kulobubi kanye naletinengiso. Awu kwangatsi beningalilalela livi lemiyaleto yakhe, futsi ningakuvumeli loku kutigcabha kwetinhlitiyo tenu kubhubhise imiphefumulo yenu!
2.17: Cabangani ngabomnakenu shengatsi bangini lucobo lwenu, futsi nivane nabo bonkhe niphindze nibe nemusa ngemphahla yenu, kute nabo banotse njengani.
2.18: Kodvwa ngaphambi kwekutsi nifune umcebo, funani umbuso waNkulunkulu.
2.19: Futsi emvakwekutsi senitfole litsemba kuKhristu niyawutfola umcebo, uma niwufuna; futsi niyawufuna ngenhloso yekwenta lokuhle—kwembatsisa labangcunu, nekupha labalambile, nekukhulula labatfunjwa, kanye nekuniketa lusito kulabagulako nalabakhatsatekile.
2.20: Manje, bomnnaketfu, sengikhulumile kini mayelana nekutigcabha; nalabo benu labakhatsate makhelwane wabo, bamhlupha ngenca yekutsi beninekutichenya etinhlitiyweni tenu, ngetintfo Nkulunkulu laninikete tona, nitsini ngaloko na?
2.21: Ngabe anicabangi yini kutsi tintfo letinje tinengekile kuloyo lowadala wonkhe umuntfu na? Futsi nguloyo muntfu uligugu emehlweni akhe njengalomunye. Futsi wonkhe umuntfu welutfuli; futsi ngenhloso lefanako wabadala, kutsi bagcine imiyaleto yakhe baphindze bamdvumise ingunaphakadze.
2.22: Manje sengenta siphetfo sekukhuluma kini mayelana naloku kutigcabha. Futsi kube bekungasiko kutsi kufanele ngikhulume kini mayelana nelicala lelibi kakhulu, inhlitiyo yami beyitotfokota kakhulu ngenca yenu.
2.23: Kodvwa livi laNkulunkulu liyangicindzetela ngenca yemacala enu lamabi kakhulu. Ngoba bukani, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Laba bantfu bacala kukhula ebubini; abayicondzi imibhalo lengcwele, ngoba bafuna kuticolela ekwenteni bugwadla, ngenca yetintfo lebetibhaliwe mayelana naDavide, kanye naSolomoni indvodzana yakhe.
2.24: Bukani, Davide kanye naSolomoni ngempela bebanebafati labaningi kanye netingani, lokuyintfo leyayinengekile phambi kwami, kusho iNkhosi.
2.25: Ngaloko-ke, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, ngibaholile labantfu baphuma eveni laseJerusalema, ngemandla esandla sami, kute ngitikhulisele ligala lelilungile kuyo intalo yesisu saJosefa.
2.26: Ngaloko-ke, mine Nkhosi Nkulunkulu angeke ngivume kutsi labantfu bente njengalabo basendvulo.
2.27: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu, ngiveni, phindze nilalele livi leNkhosi: Ngoba kute indvodza emkhatsini wenu leyawuba khona ngaphandle kwekuba nemfati munye; futsi tingani ayiyukuba ngisho nasinye.
2.28: Ngoba mine, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, ngiyatfokota ngebumsulwa bebesifazane. Futsi bugwadla businengiso phambi kwami; naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi yemaBandla.
2.29: Ngaloko-ke, laba bantfu bayawuyigcina imiyaleto yami, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, noma licalekisiwe live ngenca yabo.
2.30: Ngoba uma ngitsandza, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, kutikhulisela intalelwane, ngitawubayaleta bantfu bami; ngaphandle kwaloko bayawulalela leti tintfo.
2.31: Ngoba bukani, mine, iNkhosi, ngikubonile kuhlupheka, ngakuva nekulila kwemadvodzakati ebantfu bami eveni laseJerusalema, yebo, kanye nakuto tonkhe tive tebantfu bami, ngenca yebubi netinengiso tebayeni babo.
2.32: Futsi angeke ngivume, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, kutsi kukhala kwemadvodzakati lamahle alaba bantfu, lengibahole ngabakhipha eveni laseJerusalema, kukhuphukele kimi ngalokumelene nalamadvodza ebantfu bami, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
2.33: Ngoba angeke baholele ekutfunjweni lamadvodzakati ebantfu bami ngenca yekutsamba kwawo, ngaphandle kwekutsi ngibavakashele ngesicalekiso lesibuhlungu, nangekubhujiswa; ngoba abayukubenta bugwadla, njengalabo basendvulo, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
2.34: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu, niyati kutsi lemiyaleto yayinikwe babe, Lehi; ngaloko-ke, beniyati phambilini; futsi ninikwa sijeziso lesikhulu; ngoba nitentile letintfo lebekungakafaneli kutsi nitente.
2.35: Bukani, nente bubi lobukhulu kunemaLamani, bomnaketfu. Nephule tinhlitiyo tebafati benu labatsambile, naphindze nalahlekelwa kwetsenjwa bantfwana benu, ngenca yetibonelo tenu letimbi phambi kwabo; futsi sililo setinhlitiyo tabo sikhuphukela etulu kuNkulunkulu ngalokumelene nani. Futsi ngenca yekucina kwelivi laNkulunkulu, lelehlela phansi ngalokumelene nani, letiningi tinhlitiyo tafa, tihlatjwe emanceba lajulile.

3.1: Kodvwa bukani, mine, Jakobe, ngitokhuluma kini nine lenimsulwa enhlitiyweni. Bukani kuNkulunkulu ngekugcila kwemcondvo, nithandaze kuye ngelukholo lolukhulu, utawunidvudvuta etinhluphekweni tenu, futsi uyawunikhulumela, aphindze atfumele kulunga etikwalabo labafuna kunibhubhisa.
3.2: Awu nonkhe nine lenimsulwa enhlitiyweni, phakamisani tinhloko tenu nemukele livi lelitfokotisako laNkulunkulu, futsi nititike elutsandvweni lwakhe; ngoba ningakwati, uma imicondvo yenu igcilile njalo.
3.3: Kodvwa, maye, maye, kini leningekho msulwa enhlitiyweni, nine leningcolile ngalolusuku phambi kwaNkulunkulu; ngoba ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke lelive licalekisiwe ngenca yenu; futsi emaLamani, langakangcoli njengani, noko acalekisiwe ngesicalekiso lesibuhlungu, ayawunihlupha nite nibhubhe.
3.4: Futsi sikhatsi siyeta masinyane, sekutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke ayawulitsatsa live lenu lelilifa, neNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawuhola labalungile baphume emkhatsini wenu.
3.5: Bukani, emaLamani bomnakenu, lenibazondako ngenca yekungcola kwabo kanye naleso sicalekiso leseta etikwetikhumba tabo, balunge kakhulu kunani; ngoba abakawukhohlwa umyaleto weNkhosi, lowanikwa babe—wekutsi kumele babe namunye kuphela umfati, tingani bangabi ngisho nasinye, futsi kungabi khona bugwadla lobentekako emkhatsini wabo.
3.6: Manje, lomyaleto bayetama kuwugcina; ngaloko-ke, ngenca yaloku kuwugcina, lomyaleto, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu angeke ibabhubhise, kodvwa itawuba nemusa kubo; futsi ngalolunye lusuku bayawuba bantfu lababusisiwe.
3.7: Bukani, bayeni babo bayabatsandza bafati babo, nebafati babo bayabatsandza bayeni babo; nebayeni babo kanye nebafati babo bayabatsandza bantfwana babo, futsi kungakholwa kwabo kanye nenzondo yabo kini kungenca yebubi lobukhulu baboyise; ngaloko-ke, ngabe nincono kangakanani nine kunabo, emehlweni eMdali wenu lomkhulu na?
3.8: Awu bomnaketfu, ngiyesaba kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke etonweni tenu tikhumba tabo titawuba mhlophe kakhulu kunetenu, uma seniletfwa kanye nabo phambi kwesihlalo saNkulunkulu.
3.9: Ngaloko-ke, ngininika umyaleto, lolivi laNkulunkulu, kutsi ningabe nisabetfuka nanini ngenca yebumnyama betikhumba tabo; noma nibetfuke ngenca yekungcola kwabo; kodvwa nikhumbule kungcola kwenu lucobo, futsi nikhumbule kutsi kungcola kwabo kweta ngenca yaboyise.
3.10: Ngaloko-ke, niyawukhumbula bantfwana benu, kutsi nitidzabukise kanjani tinhlitiyo tabo ngenca yesibonelo lenisente phambi kwabo; ngetulu kwaloko, khumbulani kutsi, ngenca yekungcola kwenu, ningaletsa bantfwana benu ekubhujisweni, netono tabo tiyocwabelana etikwetinhloko tenu ngelusuku lwekugcina.
3.11: Awu bomnaketfu, vanini emavi ami; letsani emandla emiphefumulo yenu; titsintsitseni kute nivuke ebutfongweni bekufa; nitikhulule ebuhlungwini besihogo kute ningabi tingilosi kudeveli, kute niphoswe kulelo chibi lemlilo kanye nesibabule lesikufa kwesibili.
3.12: Manje mine, Jakobe, ngakhuluma tintfo letiningi kakhulu kubantfu baNefi, ngibacwayisa ngekuhlobonga nangenkhanuko, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yesono, ngibatjela ngemphumela lomubi waso.
3.13: Futsi incenye yelikhulu yetento talaba bantfu, manje labesebacale kuba baningi, angeke ibhalwe kulaba bongcwengcwe; kodvwa letiningi tetento tabo tibhaliwe kubongcwengcwe labakhudlwana, netimphi tabo, nemibango yabo kanye nekubusa kwemakhosi abo.
3.14: Laba bongcwengcwe babitwa ngabongcwengcwe baJakobe, futsi bentiwa ngesandla saNefi. Futsi ngenta siphetfo sekukhuluma lamavi.

4.1: Manje buka, kwenteka kutsi mine, Jakobe, sengibafundzise lokuningi bantfu bami ngelivi, (futsi ngeke ngikwati kubhala ngaphandle kwalamancane nje emavi ami, ngenca yebulukhuni bekucopha emavi etfu kubongcwengcwe) futsi siyati kutsi tintfo lesitibhalako kulabongcwengcwe kufanele tihlale;
4.2: Kodvwa noma ngabe ngutiphi tintfo lesitibhalako kunoma nguyini lenye intfo ngaphandle kwakubongcwengcwe kufanele tishabalale futsi tinyamalale; kodvwa singawabhala lamavi lambalwa kubongcwengcwe, labatawuniketa bantfwana betfu, nabomnaketfu labatsandzekako, lwati loluncane mayelana natsi, noma mayelana naboyise—
4.3: Manje kulentfo siyatfokota; futsi sisebenta ngekukhutsala kucopha lamavi kubongcwengcwe, setsemba kutsi bomnaketfu labatsandzekako kanye nebantfwana betfu batawemukela ngetinhlitiyo letibongako, baphindze babuke kuwo kute bafundze ngekujabula hhayi ngekudzabuka, noma ngekwedzelela, mayelana nebatali babo bekucala.
4.4: Ngoba, ngalesi sizatfu sitibhalile letintfo, kute bati kutsi besati ngaKhristu, futsi sasinelitsemba lenkhatimulo yakhe emakhulu lamaningi eminyaka ngaphambi kwekufika kwakhe; futsi hhayi kutsi ngitsi kuphela nje lebesinelitsemba lenkhatimulo yakhe, kodvwa ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele labebangaphambi kwetfu.
4.5: Buka, bebakholwa kuKhristu futsi bamkhonta Babe egameni lakhe, ngalokunjalo natsi sikhonta Babe egameni lakhe. Ngalesi sizatfu sigcina umtsetfo waMosi, ngenca yekutsi ukhombisa imiphefumulo yetfu kuye; futsi ngalesi sizatfu kutsatfwa ngekutsi senta kulunga, njengoba kwancomeka ku-Abrahama ehlane kutsi alalele imiyaleto ya-Nkulunkulu ekunikeleni ngendvodzana yakhe Isaka, loko lokungumfanekiso waNkulunkulu kanye neNdvodzana yakhe leTelwe Yodvwa.
4.6: Ngaloko-ke, siyabaphenya baphrofethi, futsi sinetembulo letiningi kanye namoya wekuphrofetha; futsi ngekuba nabo bonkhe labofakazi sitfola litsemba, nelukholo lwetfu alunyakatiseki, kangangekutsi ngempela singayala ngeligama laJesu phindze tihlahla tona kanye tisilalele, noma tintsaba, noma emagagasi elwandle.
4.7: Noko, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu isikhombisa butsakatsaka betfu kute sati kutsi kungenca yemusa wayo, kanye nekutehlisa kwayo lokukhulu kubantfwana bebantfu, kutsi sibe nemandla ekwenta leti tintfo.
4.8: Buka, mikhulu futsi iyamangalisa imisebenti yeNkhosi. Akuphenyeki kangakanani kujula kwetimfihlakalo tayo; futsi akunakwenteka kutsi umuntfu atfole tonkhe tindlela tayo. Futsi kute umuntfu lowatiko ngetindlela tayo ngaphandle kwekutsi tembulwe kuye; ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu, ningatidzeleli tembulo taNkulunkulu.
4.9: Ngoba buka, ngemandla elivi lakhe umuntfu weta etikwebuso bemhlaba, umhlaba lowo lobewudalwe ngemandla elivi lakhe. Ngaloko-ke, uma Nkulunkulu akwati kukhuluma futsi umhlaba wabakhona, wakhuluma futsi umuntfu wadalwa, Awu pho, kungani anganawukwati kuyaleta umhlaba, noma umsebenti wetandla takhe etikwawo, ngekwetsandvo kanye nekufisa kwakhe na?
4.10: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu, musani kufuna kweluleka iNkhosi, kodvwa kutsatsa kwelulekwa esandleni sayo. Ngoba bukani, nine cobo lwenu niyati kutsi yeluleka ngekuhlakanipha, nangekulunga, kanye nangemusa lomkhulu, ngetulu kwayo yonkhe imisebenti yayo.
4.11: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, buyisanani nayo ngenhlawulo yaKhristu, iNdvodzana yakhe leTelwe Yodvwa, futsi ningatfola kuvuka, ngekwemandla ekuvuka lakuKhristu, futsi niletfwe njengetitselo tekucala taKhristu kuNkulunkulu, ninelukholo, futsi nitfole litsemba lelihle lenkhatimulo kuyo ngaphambi kwekutibonakalisa kwakhe asenyameni.
4.12: Manje, batsandzekako, ningamangali kutsi nginitjela leti tintfo; ngoba kungani kungakhulunywa ngenhlawulo yaKhristu, futsi kufunwe kutfola lwati loluphelele lwakhe, njengekufuna kutfola lwati lwekuvuka kanye nemhlaba lotako na?
4.13: Bukani, bomnaketfu, loyo lophrofethako, akaphrofethe kute bantfu bacondze; ngoba Moya ukhuluma liciniso futsi awucambi manga. Ngaloko-ke, ukhuluma ngetintfo njengoba tinjalo, futsi nangetintfo njengoba titawuba njalo; ngaloko-ke, leti tintfo tibonakaliswa kitsi ngalokusobala, kute kusindziswe imiphefumulo yetfu. Kodvwa bukani, tsine asisibo bofakazi sodvwa kuleti tintfo; ngoba ngetulu kwaloko Nkulunkulu watikhuluma nakubo baphrofethi basendvulo.
4.14: Kodvwa bukani, emaJuda bekabantfu labebanetinhloko letilukhuni; futsi awadzelela emavi lacacile, abulala baphrofethi, afuna tintfo lebekangeke aticondze. Ngaloko-ke, ngenca yebumphumphutse bawo, bumphumphutse lobo lobafika ngekubuka ngale kwemgomo, kufanele awe; ngoba Nkulunkulu ukususile lokusobala kwakhe kuwo, futsi watfumela kuwo tintfo letiningi langatange aticondze, ngenca yekutsi bekatifisa. Futsi ngenca yekutsi bekatifisa Nkulunkulu ukwentile loku, kute akhutjwe.
4.15: Manje mine, Jakobe, ngiholelwa nguMoya ekuphrofetheni; ngoba ngiyabona ngekusebenta kwaMoya lokimi, kutsi ngekukhutjwa kwemaJuda atolilahla lelo litje labekangakhela etikwalo futsi abe nalesiphephile sisekelo.
4.16: Kodvwa bukani, ngekwemibhalo lengcwele, lelitje liyawuba ngulesikhulu, nesekugcina, nesisekelo lesingiso kuphela, emaJuda langakhela etikwaso.
4.17: Manje, batsandzekako bami, kungenteka kanjani kutsi laba, emvakwekutsi sebasalile sisekelo lesingiso, bangakhela etikwaso futsi, kute sibe yinhloko yendlu yabo na?
4.18: Bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngitawuyembula lemfihlakalo kini; uma kungenteki, nangayiphi indlela, ngitfole kunyakatiswa ekucineni kwami kuMoya, futsi ngikhutjwe ngenca yekukhatsateka lokukhulu kwami ngani.

5.1: Bukani, bomnaketfu, anikhumbuli yini nifundza emavi emphrofethi Zenoshe, lawakhuluma kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli, atsi:
5.2: Lalelani, Awu nine yindlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi vanini emavi ami, umphrofethi weNkhosi.
5.3: Ngoba bukani, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, ngitawunifanisa, Awu yindlu yaka-Israyeli, nesihlahla semncumo lesitsanjisiwe, umuntfu lasitsatsa wasondla esivinini sakhe; sakhula, saba sidzala, sacala kubola.
5.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yesivini yahamba, yabona kutsi sihlahla sayo semcumo sasesicala kubola; yatsi: Ngitawusitsena, ngivukutele emaceleni aso, ngiphindze ngisondle, kute mhlawumbe sihlume emacembe lamancane kanye nalatsambile, futsi singafi.
5.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yasitsena, yavukuta emaceleni aso, futsi yasondla njengekwelivi layo.
5.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwetinsuku letiningi sacala kancane kukhipha lambalwa, nalamancane futsi nalatsambile emagala; kodvwa buka, sicu lesisetulu saso sacala kufa.
5.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yesivini yakubona loku, futsi yatsi encekwini yayo: Kuyangidzabukisa kutsi ngitolahlekelwa ngulesi sihlahla; ngaloko-ke hamba uyokha emagala esihlahla semncumo sasendle, uwaletse lapha kimi; futsi sitawukha lawo magala lamakhulu lasacala kubuna, sitawuwaphonsa emlilweni kute ashiswe.
5.8: Buka, kusho iNkhosi yesivini, ngiyawasusa emagala lamaningi alawa lamancane nalatsambile, futsi ngitawachumelela noma ngabe ngukuphi lapho ngitsandza khona; futsi akukabaluleki noma ngabe kusho kutsi imphandze yalesi sihlahla itawufa, ngingatigcinela sitselo saso kimi; ngaloko-ke ngitawutsatsa lawa lamancane nalatsambile emagala, ngitawachumelela noma ngabe kukuphi lapho ngitsandza khona.
5.9: Tsatsa lamagala esihlahla semncumo sasendle, uwachumelele, endzaweni yawo; lawa lengiwakhile ngitawaphonsa emlilweni ngiwashise, kute angoni umhlabatsi wesivini sami.
5.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inceku yeNkhosi yesivini yenta njengekwelivi leNkhosi yesivini, yachumelela emagala esihlahla semncumo sasendle.
5.11: Futsi iNkhosi yesivini yenta kutsi sivukutelwe, sitsenwe, futsi sondliwe, itsi encekwini yayo: Kuyangidzabukisa kutsi kufanele ngilahlekelwe ngulesi sihlahla; ngaloko-ke, kute mhlawumbe ngigcine timphandze taso kute tingafi, kute ngitigcinele tona, ngiyentile lentfo.
5.12: Ngaloko-ke, hamba ngeyakho indlela; usigadze lesihlahla, usondle, njengekwemavi ami.
5.13: Futsi lawa ngitawabeka encenyeni lengaphansi yesivini sami, noma ngabe ngukuphi lapho ngitsandza khona, akukabaluleki kuwe; futsi ngikwenta loku kute ngitigcinele emagala emvelo esihlahla; ngetulu kwaloko, kute ngitibekele sitselo saso kulungiselela sikhatsi; ngoba kuyangidzabukisa kutsi kufanele ngilahlekelwe ngulesihlahla kanye nesitselo saso.
5.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yahamba, yawafihla emagala emvelo esihlahla semncumo lesasitsanjisiwe etincenyeni letingaphansi tesivini, lamanye kulenye incenye nalamanye kulenye, njengekutsandza kanye nekufisa kwayo.
5.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sikhatsi lesidze sendlula, iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini yayo: Wota, asihambe sehlele kuso sivini, kute sisebente esivinini.
5.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini, ngalokunjalo nenceku, bahamba behlela kuso sivini kuyosebenta. Futsi kwenteka kutsi inceku yatsi enkhosini yayo: Buka, buka lapha; buka sihlahla.
5.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yabuka yabona sihlahla leso emagala emncumo wasendle labekachunyelelwe kuso; futsi bekasamilile sekacala kukhipha sitselo. Yabona kutsi sasisihle; nesitselo saso sasinjengaso sitselo semvelo.
5.18: Futsi yatsi encekwini: Buka, emagala esihlahla sasendle asabambe umswakama wemphandze yaso, kangangoba imphandze yaso iletsa emandla lamakhulu; futsi ngenca yemandla lamakhulu emphandze yaso emagala asendle akhipha sitselo lesitsanjisiwe, Manje, kube besingawachumelelanga lamagala, lesi sihlahla besiyokufa, Manje, buka, ngiyawutibekela titselo letiningi, sihlahla lesitikhiphile; futsi netitselo taso ngiyawutibekela lesinye sikhatsi.
5.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini: Wota, asihambe siye encenyeni lengephansi yesivini, sibuke kutsi emagala emvelo esihlahla akatikhiphi yini wona titselo letiningi, kute ngitibekele titselo taso kulungiselela sikhatsi.
5.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba baya lapho inkhosi yayifihle khona emagala emvelo esihlahla, yatsi encekwini: Buka lawa; yabona lekucala kutsi lase likhipha titselo letiningi; ngetulu kwaloko yabona kutsi tatitinhle. Futsi yatsi encekwini: Tsatsa titselo taso, utibekele kulungiselela sikhatsi, kute ngitigcinele tona; ngoba buka, kusho yona, kuso sonkhe lesi sikhatsi lesidze kangaka ngisondlile, futsi sikhiphe titselo letiningi.
5.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inceku yatsi enkhosini yayo: Uteleni lapha kutotjala lesi sihlahla, noma leligala lalesi sihlahla na? Ngoba buka, bekulibala lelingakavundzi kakhulu kuyo yonkhe lendzawo yesivini sakho.
5.22: INkhosi yesivini yatsi kuyo: Ungangeluleki; ngangati kutsi kwakulibala lelingakavundzi lemhlabatsi; ngaloko-ke, ngatsi kuwe, ngilondlile ngaso sonkhe lesi sikhatsi lesidze, futsi ubonile kutsi likhiphe titselo letiningi.
5.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini yayo: Buka lapha; buka ngihlanyele lelinye ligala lesihlahla futsi; futsi uyati kutsi lelibala lemhlabatsi lalingakavundzi kakhulu kunalelakucala. Kodvwa, buka sihlahla. Ngisondlile ngaso sonkhe lesi sikhatsi lesidze, futsi sikhiphe titselo letiningi; ngaloko-ke, tigcogce, utibekele kulungiselela sikhatsi, kute ngitigcinele tona.
5.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yaphindza yatsi encekwini yayo: Buka lapha, ubone lelinye ligala futsi, lengilihlanyele; buka kutsi ngilondlile nalo futsi, likhiphe titselo.
5.25: Yatsi encekwini: Buka lapha futsi ubone lekugcina. Buka, leli ngalihlanyela ebaleni lemhlabatsi lomuhle; futsi ngilondlile ngalesi sikhatsi lesidze, futsi yincenye kuphela yesihlahla lekhiphe titselo letitsanjisiwe, futsi lenye incenye yesihlahla ikhiphe titselo tasendle; buka, ngisondlile lesi sihlahla njengaletinye.
