5.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini: Khani lawo magala langakakhiphi titselo letinhle, uwaphonse emlilweni.
5.27: Kodvwa buka, inceku yatsi kuyo: Asisitsene, sisivukutele emaceleni, futsi sisondle sikhashana lesidzanyana nje kute mhlawumbe sikukhiphele titselo letinhle, kute utibekele sona kulungiselela sikhatsi.
5.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini kanye nenceku yeNkhosi yesivini batondla tonkhe titselo tesivini.
5.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sikhatsi lesidze sasesendlulile, iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini yayo: Wota, asihambe sehlele kuso sivini, kute siphindze sisebente esivinini. Ngoba buka, sikhatsi siyasondzela, nesiphetfo siyeta masinyane; ngaloko-ke, kufanele ngitibekele titselo kulungiselela sikhatsi.
5.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini kanye nenceku bahamba behlela kuso sivini; bafika esihlahleni leso emagala aso emvelo bekaphuliwe, futsi emagala asendle bekachunyeleliswe kuso; buka tinhlobo tetitselo tatisitfwalise kakhulu sihlahla.
5.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yasinambitsa sitselo, tonkhe tinhlobo njengekwesibalo sato. INkhosi yesivini yatsi: Buka, ngalesi sikhatsi lesidze sisondlile lesi sihlahla, futsi ngitibekele kulungiselela sikhatsi titselo letiningi.
5.32: Kodvwa buka, ngalesi sikhatsi sesikhiphe titselo letiningi, futsi kute nasinye sato lesihle. Buka, kukhona tonkhe tinhlobo tetitselo letimbi; futsi atingisiti ngalutfo, nanoma kungekusebenta kwetfu; manje kuyangidzabukisa kutsi ngitolahlekelwa ngulesi sihlahla.
5.33: INkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini: Singentani kulesihlahla, kute ngitigcinele futsi titselo letinhle taso na?
5.34: Inceku yatsi enkhosini yayo: Buka, ngoba uchumelelise emagala esihlahla semncumo sasendle atondlile timphandze, kangangoba tiphilile futsi atikafi; ngaloko-ke uyabona kutsi tisetinhle.
5.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini yayo: Sihlahla asingisiti ngalutfo, kanye netimphandze taso atingisiti ngalutfo uma nje sisakhipha titselo letimbi.
5.36: Noko, ngiyati kutsi timphandze tinhle, futsi ngekwenhloso yami ngitigcinile; futsi ngenca yemandla ato lamakhulu kute kube kumanje tikhiphile, emagaleni asendle, titselo letinhle.
5.37: Kodwa buka, emagala asendle akhulile futsi andlula timphandze taso; ngenca yekutsi emagala asendle andlule timphandze taso akhiphe titselo letiningi letimbi; ngenca yekutsi akhiphe titselo letiningi kakhulu letimbi ubonile kutsi acala kufa; futsi masinyane atawube asalungele, kutsi aphonswe emlilweni, ngaphandle kwekutsi siwentele lokutsite kute siwagcine.
5.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini yayo: Asihambe sehlele etincenyeni letingephansi tesivini, sibuke kutsi ngabe emagala emvelo nawo akhiphe titselo letimbi yini.
5.39: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba behlela etincenyeni letingephansi tesivini. Futsi kwenteka kutsi babona kutsi titselo temagala emvelo nato bese tonakele; yebo, tekucala kanye netesibili ngalokunjalo netekugcina; tonkhe bese tonakele.
5.40: Futsi titselo tasendle tekugcina tase tindlule leyo ncenye yesihlahla leyayikhiphe titselo letinhle, kangangekutsi ligala lase libunile futsi selifile.
5.41: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yakhala, yatsi encekwini: Ngabe bekufanele kutsi ngenteni lokunye esivinini sami na?
5.42: Buka, bengati kutsi tonkhe titselo tesivini, ngaphandle kwaleti, bese tonakele. Manje nato leti letake takhipha titselo letinhle setonakele; manje tonkhe tihlahla tesivini sami atisiti ngalutfo ngaphandle nje kwekutsi tijutjwe bese tiphonswa emlilweni.
5.43: Buka lesi sekugcina, emagala aso lasabunile, ngasitjala ebaleni lelihle lemhlabatsi; yebo, lelo lelalikhetsekile kimi ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye tincenye telive lesivini sami.
5.44: Ubonile kutsi ngetulu kwaloko ngisigawulile leso lesone lelibala lemhlabatsi, kute ngitjale lesi sihlahla endzaweni yaso.
5.45: Ubonile kutsi incenye yaso yakhipha titselo letinhle, kanye nencenye yaso yakhipha titselo tasendle; futsi ngenca yekutsi angiwakhanga emagala aso ngawaphonsa emlilweni, buka, asendlule ligala lelihle kangangekutsi selite labuna.
5.46: Manje, buka, nanoma konkhe kunakekela sikwentile esivinini sami, tihlahla taso tibe nekonakala, kangangekutsi atikhiphanga titselo letinhle; futsi leti benginelitsemba lekutigcina, nekutsi ngitibekele titselo taso kulungiselela sikhatsi. Kodvwa, buka, tibe njengesihlahla semncumo sasendle, futsi atinanzuzo kodvwa kujutjwa tiphonswe emlilweni; futsi kuyangidzabukisa kutsi ngitolahlekelwa ngito.
5.47: Kodvwa ngabe bengingentani lokunye esivinini sami na? Ngabe ngisitsambisile yini sandla sami, kutsi ngisondle na? Cha, ngisondlile, ngasivukuteka emaceleni aso, futsi ngisitsenile, ngasifaka umcuba; ngiselulile sandla sami futsi cishe bonkhe budze belilanga, siphetfo siyasondzela edvute. Futsi kuyangidzabukisa kutsi kufanele ngitijube tonkhe tihlahla tesivini sami, ngitiphonse emlilweni kute tishiswe. Ngabe ngubani lona lowone sivini sami na?
5.48: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inceku yatsi enkhosini yayo: Ngabe akusiko yini kukhula kakhulu kwesivini sakho na—ngabe emagala aso akandlulanga yini timphandze letinhle na? Futsi ngenca yekutsi emagala andlule timphandze taso, buka akhula ngekushesha kunemandla etimphandze, atitfolela emandla. Buka, ngitsi, ngabe loku akusiso yini sizatfu lesente sihlahla sesivini sakho sibe nekonakala na?
5.49: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini: Asihambe futsi siyotijuba tihlahla tesivini sitiphonse emlilweni, kute tingawoni umhlabatsi wesivini sami, ngoba sengikwente konkhe. Ngabe yini lenye lebengingayentela sivini sami na?
5.50: Kodvwa, buka, inceku yatsi eNkhosini yesivini: Tibonelele sikhashana lesidzanyana.
5.51: Futsi iNkhosi yatsi: Yebo, ngitawutibonelela sikhashana lesidzanyana, ngoba kuyangidzabukisa kutsi ngilahlekelwe tihlahla tesivini sami.
5.52: Ngaloko-ke asitsatse lamanye alamagala lengiwahlanyele etincenyeni letingaphansi tesivini sami, siwachumelelise esihlahleni lapho aphume khona; sikhiphe kuso sihlahla lawo magala titselo tawo letibaba kakhulu, futsi sichumelelise emagala emvelo esihlahla esikhundleni sawo.
5.53: Futsi loku ngitawukwenta kute sihlahla singafi, kute, mhlawumbe, ngitigcinele timphandze taso ngenhloso yami.
5.54: Futsi, buka, timphandze temagala emvelo esihlahla lengisihlanyele lapho ngitsandza khona tisaphila; ngaloko-ke, kute nato ngitigcinele inhloso yami, ngitawutsatsa lamanye emagala alesi sihlahla, ngiwachumelelise kuto. Yebo, ngitawuchumelelisa kuto emagala enina wesihlahla sawo, kute ngitigcinele timphandze futsi, kute kutsi uma seticine ngalokwanele mhlawumbe tingangikhiphela titselo letinhle, futsi kumbe ngisengaba nentfokoto esivinini sami.
5.55: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batsatsa kuso sihlahla semvelo lebesesifana nesasendle, bachumelelisa kuto tihlahla temvelo, nato futsi lebesetifana netasendle.
5.56: Ngetulu kwaloko batsatsa lamanye etihlahla temvelo letatifana netasendle, bawachumelelisa kunina wesihlahla sawo.
5.57: Futsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi encekwini: Ungawakhi emagala asendle etihlahleni, ngaphandle kwalawo lababa kakhulu; futsi kuwo uyawuwachumelelisa ngekwaloko lengikushito.
5.58: Futsi sitawuphindze sitondle tihlahla tesivini, sitawuwatsena emagala ato; futsi sitawukukha etihlahleni emagala langatseli, lesekufanele afe, siwaphonse emlilweni.
5.59: Futsi loku ngikwenta kute, mhlawumbe timphandze titfole emandla ngenca yekucina kwato; futsi nangenca yekushintjwa kwemagala kute lokuhle kuncobe lokubi.
5.60: Futsi ngenca yekutsi ngiwagcinile emagala emvelo kanye netimphandze tawo, nekutsi ngichumelelise emagala emvelo futsi kunina wesihlahla, ngagcina timphandze tenina wesihlahla, kute, mhlawumbe, tihlahla tesivini sami tikhiphe futsi titselo letinhle; kute ngibe nekujabula futsi etitselweni tesivini sami, futsi, mhlawumbe, kute ngitfokote kakhulu kutsi ngitigcinile timphandze kanye nemagala esitselo sekucala—
5.61: Ngaloko-ke, hamba, futsi ubite tinceku, kute sisebente ngekukhutsala ngemandla etfu esivinini, kute silungise indlela, kute ngiphindze ngikhiphe sitselo semvelo, leso sitselo semvelo lesihle futsi lesiligugu lelikhulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye titselo.
5.62: Ngaloko-ke, asihambe siyosebenta ngemandla etfu kulesikhatsi sekugcina, ngoba buka siphetfo siyasondzela madvute futsi loku kungekwekugcina kutsi ngitsene sivini sami.
5.63: Chumelelisa emagala; cala ekugcineni kute abe ngewekucala, nekutsi ekucala abe ngewekugcina, utivukutele emaceleni tihlahla, letindzala kanye naletincane, tekucala kanye netekugcina; tekugcina netekucala, kute tonkhe tondliwe futsi kwekugcina.
5.64: Ngaloko-ke, tivukutele emaceleni, utitsene, utifake umcuba futsi, kwekugcina, ngoba siphetfo siyasondzela madvute. Futsi uma kusho kutsi lamahlumela ekugcina ayakhula, akhipha sitselo semvelo, uma kunjalo uyawuyilungiselela indlela, kute akhule.
5.65: Futsi ngesikhatsi asacala kukhula uyawususa lawo magala lakhipha sitselo lesibabako, njengekwemandla emagala lamahle kanye nebukhulu bawo; futsi awuyukutisusa tihlahla letimbi tonkhe kanyekanye, hleze timphandze taso tibe nemandla lamakhulu kunelihlumela, bese kutsi lihlumela lato life, bese ngilahlekelwa tihlahla tesivini sami.
5.66: Ngoba kuyangidzabukisa kutsi ngilahlekelwe tihlahla tesivini sami; ngaloko-ke uyawuwasusa lamabi kangangoba lamahle akhula, kute imphandze kanye nesihloko kulingane ngekwemandla, kute kutsi lokuhle kuncobe lokubi, bese kutsi lokubi kujutjwe kuphonswe emlilweni, kute kungawoni umhlabatsi wesivini sami; futsi ngitawushanyela kanjalo-ke lokubi kuphume esivinini sami.
5.67: Emagala esihlahla semvelo ngitawuphindze ngiwachumelele esihlahleni semvelo;
5.68: Futsi emagala esihlahla semvelo ngitowachumelela kuwo emagala emvelo esihlahla; futsi ngaleyondlela ngitawuphindze ngiwahlanganise ndzawonye, kute akhiphe sitselo semvelo, futsi ayawuba manye.
5.69: Emagala lamabi ayawulahlwa, yebo, ngaphandle kulo lonkhe live lesivini sami; ngoba buka, sekungekwekugcina nje kuphela ngisitsena sivini sami.
5.70: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yesivini yatfumela inceku yayo; inceku yahamba yenta njengoba iNkhosi yayiyaletile, yaletsa letinye tinceku; futsi tatimbalwa.
5.71: Futsi iNkhosi yesivini yatsi kuto: Hambani, nisebente esivinini, ngemandla enu. Ngoba bukani, sesikhatsi sekugcina sekutsi ngondle sivini sami; ngoba siphetfo sesisedvute, nesikhatsi sita ngekushesha; futsi uma nisebenta nami ngemandla enu niyawujabula ngetitselo lengiyawutibekela tona kulungiselela sikhatsi lesitawufika madvute.
5.72: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinceku tahamba tasebenta ngemandla ato; futsi iNkhosi yesivini yasebenta nato; tayilalela imiyaleto yeNkhosi yesivini kuto tonkhe tintfo.
5.73: Futsi kwaphindze kwacala kwaba khona titselo temvelo esivinini; nemagala emvelo acala kukhula futsi kuchakaza ngesivinini lesikhulu; emagala asendle acala kukhishwa alahlwa; futsi bagcina imphandze kanye nesihloko saso ngekulingana, njengekwemandla aso.
5.74: Futsi ngaleyo ndlela tasebenta, ngako konkhe kukhutsala, njengekwemiyaleto yeNkhosi yesivini, kwate kwatsi lamabi alahlwa ngephandle kwesivini, neNkhosi yesivini yayitigcinele kutsi tihlahla besetinetitselo futsi temvelo; futsi taba njengekwemtimba munye; netitselo tatilingana; futsi iNkhosi yesivini yayitigcinele sitselo semvelo, lesasiligugu lelikhulu kuyo kusukela ekucaleni.
5.75: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi iNkhosi yesivini ibona kutsi sitselo sayo sasisihle, nekutsi sivini sayo sasesite konakala, yabita tinceku tayo, yatsi kuto: Bukani, ngoba ngalesi sikhatsi sekugcina sisondlile sivini sami; futsi niyabona kutsi ngente njengekutsandza kwami; futsi ngisigcinile sitselo semvelo, kangangoba sihle, njengoba sasinjalo ekucaleni. Futsi nibusisiwe; ngenca yekutsi nibe nekukhutsala ekusebenteni nami esivinini sami, futsi nayigcina imiyaleto yami, nisiletsile futsi kimi sitselo semvelo, kute sivini sami singabe sisonakala nanini, futsi lokubi kulahliwe, bukani niyawuba nekujabula nami ngenca yesitselo sesivini sami.
5.76: Ngoba bukani, sikhatsi lesidze ngitawutibekela sitselo sesivini sami kulungiselela sikhatsi lesitako ngekushesha; futsi kwekugcina ngisondlile sivini sami, ngasitsena, ngasivukutela, ngaphindze ngasifaka umcuba; ngaloko-ke ngitawutibekela letinye tetitselo, sikhatsi lesidze, njengoba ngikhulumile.
5.77: Futsi uma sikhatsi sesita sekutsi sitselo lesibi siphindze sita esivinini sami, ngaleso sikhatsi ngitawukwenta kutsi letinhle kanye naletimbi tigcogcwe; bese kutsi letinhle ngitigcinela tona, kutsi letimbi ngitilahle endzaweni yato. Futsi emvakwaloko kuta sikhatsi kanye nesiphetfo; futsi sivini sami ngitawukwenta kutsi sishiswe ngemlilo.

6.1: Manje, bukani, bomnaketfu, njengoba ngishito kini kutsi ngiyophrofetha, bukani, lesi siphrofetho sami—kutsi tintfo lomphrofethi Zenoshe latikhuluma, mayelana nendlu yaka-Israyeli, lapho ayifananisa nesihlahla semncumo lesitsanjisiwe, kufanele ngempela senteke.
6.2: Futsi lusuku lapho ayawukwelula khona sandla sakhe futsi kwesibili kubuyisa bantfu bakhe, ngilo lusuku, yebo, sikhatsi sekugcina, lapho tinceku teNkhosi tiyawuhamba ngemandla ayo, kondla kanye nekutsena sivini sayo; emvakwaloko siphetfo siyawuta masinyane.
6.3: Futsi babusiseke kangakanani labo labasebente ngekukhutsala esivinini sayo; bacalekisiwe kangakanani laba labayawulahlwa ngaphandle endzaweni yabo! Futsi umhlaba uyawushiswa ngemlilo.
6.4: Futsi unemusa kangakanani Nkulunkulu wetfu kitsi, ngoba uyayikhumbula indlu yaka-Israyeli, kokubili timphandze kanye nemagala; welula tandla takhe kubo bonkhe lusuku lonkhe; futsi babantfu labanetinhloko letilukhuni nalabanenkhani; kodvwa ngebuningi balabo labangeke batente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo bayawusindziswa embusweni waNkulunkulu.
6.5: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngiyanincenga ngemavi lazotsile kutsi niphendvuke, futsi nite ngenhloso lephelele yenhlitiyo, ninamatsele kuNkulunkulu njengoba naye anamatsele kini. Futsi ngesikhatsi lapho sandla sakhe semusa selulelwe kini ekukhanyeni kwelusuku, ningatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu.
6.6: Yebo, namuhla, uma ningalalela livi lakhe, ningatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu; ngoba kuya ngani nitokufa na?
6.7: Ngoba bukani, emvakwekutsi senondliwe ngelivi lelihle laNkulunkulu lusuku lonkhe, ngabe nitawuveta sitselo lesibi, kute nisuswe futsi nilahlwe emlilweni na?
6.8: Bukani, ngabe nitawalahla yini lamavi na? Nitawalahla yini lamavi ebaphrofethi; futsi nitawaphika onkhe yini lamavi lakhulunywa mayelana naKhristu, emvakwekutsi labaningi kangaka sebakhulumile mayelana naye; niphindze nililahle livi lelihle laKhristu, nemandla aNkulunnkulu, kanye nesipho saMoya loNgcwele, nivimbele Moya loNgcwele, nente inhlekisa ngelisu lelikhulu lekuhlengwa, lelibekelwe nine na?
6.9: Anati yini kutsi uma nitawukwenta leti tintfo, emandla ekuhlengwa kanye newekuvuka, lakuKhristu, atonenta nime ninemahloni nekuba nelicala phambi kwesihlalo saNkulunkulu na?
6.10: Futsi ngekwemandla ekulunga, ngoba kulunga angeke kwaliwe, kufanele nihambe niye kulelo chibi lemlilo nesibabule, lelinemalangabi langacimeki, futsi lelinentfutfu lekhuphukela etulu phakadze naphakadze, lelo chibi lemlilo nesibabule lokubuhlungu lobungapheli.
6.11: Awu uma kunjalo-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, phendvukani, futsi ningene esangweni lelingumntjuntju, futsi nichubeke endleleni lencane, nite nitfole kuphila lokuphakadze.
6.12: Awu hlakaniphani; yini lenye lengingayisho na?
6.13: Kwekugcina, ngiyanivalelisa, ngite ngihlangane nani phambi kwesihlalo lesitfokotisako saNkulunkulu, sihlalo leso lesishaya lababi ngeluvalo lolubi kanye nekwesaba. Amen.

7.1: Manje kwenteka emvakwekutsi sekwendlule iminyaka lemibalwa, kwafika indvodza emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, libito layo kwakunguSheremu.
7.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yacala kushumayela emkhatsini webantfu, nekumemetela kubo kutsi angeke abe khona Khristu. Yashumayela tintfo letiningi letayenga bantfu; futsi yakwenta loku kute icitse imfundziso yaKhristu.
7.3: Yasebenta ngekukhutsala kute iholele kudze tinhlitiyo tebantfu, kangangekutsi yatiholela kudze tinhlitiyo letiningi; futsi yati kutsi mine, Jakobe, nganginelukholo kuKhristu lobekatofika, yalifuna kakhulu litfuba kute ite kimi.
7.4: Yayifundzile, kangangekutsi yayinelwati loluphelele lwelulwimi lwebantfu; ngaloko ke, yayikwati kusebentisa kuyenga lokuningi, kanye nemandla ekukhuluma, ngekwemandla adeveli.
7.5: Yayinelitsemba lekunginyakatisa elukholweni, nanoma ngasengibone tembulo kanye netintfo letiningi mayelana naleti tintfo; ngoba ngempela ngase ngitibonile tingilosi, futsi tasetingisitile. Ngetulu kwaloko, ngasengilivile livi leNkhosi lucobo likhuluma kimi, tikhatsi ngetikhatsi; ngaloko-ke, ngangingeke nginyakatiseke.
7.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yeta kimi, yakhuluma kimi ngalendlela, yatsi: Mnaketfu Jakobe, sengilifune kakhulu litfuba lekutsi ngikhulume nawe; ngoba ngivile futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngiyati kutsi wena uhamba kakhulu, ushumayela loko lokubita ngelivangeli, noma imfundziso yaKhristu.
7.7: Futsi sewuholele kudze labaningi balaba bantfu kute bagucule indlela lecondzile yaNkulunkulu, bangawugcini umtsetfo waMose loyindlela lecondzile; nekutsi bawugucule umtsetfo waMosi kukhontwe umuntfu wena lotsi uyawufika eminyakeni lengemakhulu lamaningi letako. Manje buka, mine, Sheremu, ngimemetela kuwe kutsi loku kuhlambalata; ngoba kute umuntfu lowatiko ngaleti tintfo letinje; ngoba angeke akwati kwatisa ngetintfo letisatofika. Sheremu waphikisana nami ngalendlela.
7.8: Kodvwa buka, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yatsela Moya wayo emphefumulweni wami, kangangekutsi ngamtfobisa kuwo onkhe emavi akhe.
7.9: Ngatsi kuye: uyamphika yini Khristu loyawufika na? Watsi: Uma kuyoba khona Khristu, anginakumphika; kodvwa ngiyati kutsi kute Khristu, nekutsi akate abe khona, futsi akayuze abe khona.
7.10: Ngatsi kuye: Ngabe uyayikholwa yini imibhalo lengcwele na? Watsi, Yebo.
7.11: Ngatsi kuye: Uma kunjalo-ke awuyicondzi; ngoba ifakaza ngekweliciniso ngaKhristu. Buka, ngitsi kuwe kute umphrofethi lobhalile, noma lophrofethile, ngaphandle kwekutsi akhulume mayelana naloKhristu.
7.12: Futsi akusiko loku kuphela—kubonakalisiwe kimi, ngoba ngivile futsi ngabona; ngetulu kwaloko kubonakalisiwe ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele; ngaloko-ke, ngiyati kutsi uma kute inhlawulo lengentiwa bonkhe bantfu kufanele balahleke.
7.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watsi kimi: Ngikhombise sibonakaliso ngalamandla aMoya loNgcwele, lowati kangaka ngawo.
7.14: Ngatsi kuye: Ngingubani mine kutsi ngingalinga Nkulunkulu kutsi akhombise wena sibonakaliso ngentfo loyatiko kutsi iliciniso na? Noma kunjalo uyayiphika, ngenca yekutsi unguwadeveli. Noko, akungentiwa intsandvo yami; kodvwa uma Nkulunkulu atokushaya, loko akube sibonakaliso kuwe kutsi yena unemandla, ezulwini kanye nasemhlabeni; futsi nekutsi Khristu uyawufika. Futsi intsandvo yakho, Awu Nkhosi, ayentiwe, hhayi yami.
7.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi mine, Jakobe, sengiwakhulumile lamavi, emandla eNkhosi ehlela kuye, kangangekutsi wawela phansi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wondliwa sikhatsi lesitinsuku letiningi.
7.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watsi kubantfu: Gcogcanani ndzawonye kusasa, ngoba ngitofa; ngaloko-ke, ngifisa kukhuluma kubantfu ngaphambi kwekutsi ngife.
7.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa sicuku sagcogcana ndzawonye; wakhuluma ngalokusobala kuso futsi watiphika tintfo lebekabafundzise tona, wamvuma Khristu, nemandla aMoya loNgcwele, kanye nekusitwa tingilosi.
7.18: Futsi wakhuluma ngalokusobala kubo, kutsi bekakhohliswe ngemandla adeveli. Wakhuluma ngesihogo, nangeliphakadze, kanye nangesijeziso lesingapheli.
7.19: Watsi: Ngiyesaba hleze sengente sono lesingacoleleki, ngoba ngicambe emanga kuNkulunkulu; Ngoba ngiphike Khristu, ngatsi ngiyayikholwa imibhalo lengcwele, nekutsi ngempela ifakaza ngaye. Ngenca yekutsi ngicambe emanga kuNkulunkulu ngiyesaba kakhulu hleze licala lami libe libi kakhulu; kodvwa ngiyatihlambulula kuNkulunkulu.
7.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekawashito lamavi akatange asakwati kusho lamanye, wabese uyafa.
7.21: Emvakwekutsi sicuku sesibonile kutsi wakhuluma leti tintfo ngesikhatsi sekatawukufa, bamangala kakhulu; kangangekutsi emandla aNkulunkulu ehlela etikwabo, futsi abancoba kangangekutsi bawela phansi.
7.22: Manje, lentfo yayitfokotisa kimi, Jakobe, ngoba ngangiyicelile kuBabe losezulwini; ngoba wakuva kukhala kwami futsi wawuphendvula umthandazo wami.
7.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kuthula kanye nelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu kwaphindze kwabuyiselwa emkhatsini webantfu; futsi bayihlolisisa imibhalo lengcwele, futsi bangaphindzi balalela emavi alendvodza lembi.
7.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tindlela letiningi tatisungulelwe kugucula kanye nekubuyisela emaLamani ekwatini liciniso; kodvwa konkhe loku kwaba lite, ngoba bekatfokoteka timphi kanye nekucitsa ingati, futsi bekanenzondo lengapheli ngalokumelene natsi, bomnakabo. Afuna ngemandla etikhalini tawo kusibhubhisa njalonjalo.
7.25: Ngaloko-ke, bantfu baNefi baticinisa ngalokumelene nawo ngetikhali tabo, kanye nangawo onkhe emandla abo, batsembela kuNkulunkulu lolidvwala nensindziso yabo; ngaloko-ke, bachubeka kwaleso sikhatsi, baba bancobi betitsa tabo.
7.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Jakobe, ngacala kuba mdzala, futsi imibhalo yalaba bantfu njengoba ingcinwe kulabanye bongcwengcwe baNefi, ngaloko-ke, ngiyawephetsa lombhalo, ngatisa kutsi ngibhale njengekwelwati lwami, ngekusho kutsi sikhatsi sendlula natsi, ngetulu kwaloko netimphilo tetfu tendlula kwangatsi kwakunjengeliphupho kitsi, tsine sibantfu labanesitunge futsi labanesizotsa, singulabazulazulako, sicoshwe eJerusalema, sitalelwe ekuhluphekeni, ehlane, futsi sitondvwa bomnaketfu, lokwadala timphi kanye nemibango; ngaloko-ke, sakhala ngetinsuku tetfu tonkhe.
7.27: Futsi mine, Jakobe, ngabona kutsi kwasekufanele masinyane ngehlele phansi ethuneni lami; ngaloko-ke, ngatsi kundvodzana yami Enoshi: Tsatsa laba bongcwengcwe. Ngamtjela leto tintfo umnaketfu Nefi labekangiyalete ngato, futsi watsembisa kuyilalela lemiyaleto. Ngenta siphetfo sekubhala kwami kulaba bongcwengcwe, lobekungumbhalo lomncane; futsi kumfundzi ngiyavalelisa, ngetsemba kutsi labaningi babomnaketfu batawafundza lamavi ami. Bomnaketfu, salani kahle.

1.1: Buka, kwenteka kutsi mine, Enoshi, ngati kutsi babe bekayindvodza lelungile—ngoba wangifundzisa ngelulwimi lwakhe, kanjalo nangekondliwa kanye nangemyalo weNkhosi—malibongwe ligama laNkulunkulu ngaloko—
1.2: Futsi ngitawunitjela ngemshikashika lengaba nawo phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ngaphambi kwekutsi ngitfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tami.
1.3: Buka, ngahamba ngayotingela tinyamatane emahlatsini; nemavi lengangijwayele kuweva babe awakhuluma mayelana nekuphila lokuphakadze, kanye nekujabula kwalabangcwele, angena ajula enhlitiyweni yami.
1.4: Umphefumulo wami walamba; ngaguca phansi phambi kweMenti wami, ngakhala kuye ngemthandazo lomkhulu kanye nekuncusela umphefumulo wami; lusuku lonkhe ngakhala kuye; yebo, futsi nangesikhatsi busuku bufika ngachubeka nekuphakamisela livi lami etulu kangangekutsi lafinyelela emazulwini.
1.5: Kwafika livi kimi, litsi: Enoshi, tono takho titsetselelwe, futsi utobusiswa.
1.6: Futsi mine, Enoshi, ngangati kutsi Nkulunkulu angeke awacambe emanga, ngaloko-ke, kuba nelicala kwami kwaphela nya.
1.7: Futsi ngatsi: Nkhosi, kwenteka kanjani na?
1.8: Yatsi kimi: Ngenca yelukholo lwakho kuKhristu, longakate umuve noma umbone nanini ngaphambilini. Futsi iminyaka leminingi iyawundlula ngaphambi kwekutsi ativete enyameni; ngaloko-ke, hamba, lukholo lwakho lukusindzisile.
1.9: Manje, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengiwevile lamavi ngacala ngaba nesifiso senhlalakahle yabomnaketfu, emaNefi; ngaloko-ke, ngabathandazela ngenshisekelo lenkhulu kuNkulunkulu.
1.10: Ngesikhatsi ngisashikashikela emoyeni, buka, livi leNkhosi laphindze lefika engcodvweni yami, litsi: Ngitawubavakashela bomnakenu njengekukhutsala kwabo ekugcineni imiyaleto yami. Ngibaniketile lelive, lilive lelingcwele; futsi angilicalekisi ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngenca yebubi; ngaloko-ke, ngitawubavakashela bomnakenu njengoba ngishito; netiphambeko tabo ngitawutehlisa kanye nelusizi etikwetinhloko tabo lucobo.
1.11: Emvakwekutsi mine, Enoshi, sengiwevile lamavi, lukholo lwami lwacala lwangasanyakatiseki eNkhosini; futsi ngabathandazela eNkhosini ngemetamo leminingi sikhatsi lesidze bomnaketfu, emaLamani.
1.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sengithandazile futsi ngasebenta ngako konkhe kukhutsala, iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Ngitawukunika njengekwetifiso takho, ngenca yelukholo lwakho.
1.13: Manje buka, lesi kwakusifiso lengangisifisa kuye—kutsi uma kwakungenteka, kutsi bantfu bami, emaNefi, awele esiphambekweni, futsi ngandlela tsite abhujiswe, emaLamani wona angabhujiswa, kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyowugcina umbhalo webantfu bami, emaNefi; noma ngabe kungaba ngemandla esandla sayo lesingcwele, kute wembulelwe emaLamani ngalolunye lusuku lolutako, kute, mhlawumbe, aletfwe ekusindzisweni—
1.14: Ngoba njengamanje imetamo yetfu beyilite ekuwabuyiseleni elukholweni lweliciniso. Futsi afunga ngekutfukutsela kutsi, uma kwakungenteka, bekangayibhubhisa imibhalo yetfu kanye natsi, futsi kanjalo nawo onkhe emasiko aboyise.
1.15: Ngaloko-ke, mine ngati kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yayikwati kulondvolota imibhalo yetfu, ngakhala kuyo njalonjalo, ngoba yayitsite kimi: Noma ngabe yini loyicelako ngelukholo, ukholwa kutsi utoyitfola egameni laKhristu, utoyitfola.
1.16: Futsi nganginalo lukholo, ngakhala kuNkulunkulu kutsi ayigcine lemibhalo; futsi wenta sivumelwano nami sekutsi uyoyembula kumaLamani ngesikhatsi sakhe lesifanele.
1.17: Futsi mine, Enoshi, bengati kutsi kwakuyawuba njengesivumelwano leso lasenta; ngaloko-ke umphefumulo wami waphumula.
1.18: Futsi iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Boyihlo bakho nabo ngalokunjalo bayicela kimi lentfo; futsi kuyawukwentiwa kubo njengekwelukholo lwabo; ngoba lukholo lwabo lwalunjengelwakho.
1.19: Manje kwenteka kutsi mine, Enoshi, ngahamba emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, ngiphrofetha ngetintfo letatitokwenteka, futsi ngifakaza ngetintfo lengangitivile ngiphindze ngitibonile.
1.20: Futsi ngiyafakaza kutsi bantfu baNefi bebafuna ngekukhutsala kutsi babuyisele emaLamani elukholweni lweliciniso kuNkulunkulu. Kodvwa kusebenta kwetfu kwaba lite; inzondo yawo yayigcilile, futsi abeholwa yimvelo yawo lembi kangangekutsi aba tidlwangudlwangu, anelulaka, futsi abantfu labomela ingati, agcwele kukhonta tithico kanye nekungcola; adla tilwane letidla letinye; ahlala emathendeni, azulazula ehlane nesikhumba lesifishane etinkhalweni tawo kanye netinhloko tawo tishefiwe; futsi buciko bawo babusemcibisholweni, nakucelemba, kanye nasezembeni. Futsi lamaningi awo abengadli lutfo ngaphandle kwenyama lengakaphekwa; futsi abefuna kusibhubhisa njalonjalo.
1.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNefi bawulima umhlabatsi, futsi bakhulisa tonkhe tinhlobo talokuyinhlavu, kanye netitselo, kanye nemihlambi yemfuyo, kanye nemihlambi yato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinkhomo letitinhlobonhlobo, netimbuti, kanye netimbuti tasendle, futsi ngalokunjalo nemahhashi lamaningi.
1.22: Futsi kwakukhona labaningi kakhulu baphrofethi emkhatsini wetfu. Futsi labantfu bekubantfu labebanetinhloko letilukhuni, balukhuni kucondza.
1.23: Futsi kwakute lutfo ngaphandle kwekukhuluma kakhulu, kushumayela kanye nekuphrofetha ngetimphi, nemibango, kanye nembubhiso, nekubakhumbuta njalonjalo ngekufa, nesikhatsi sekuphila lokuphakadze, netehlulelo nemandla aNkulunkulu, kanye nato tokhe leti tintfo—babaphehla njalonjalo kubagcina basekwesabeni iNkhosi. Ngitsi kwakute lutfo ngaphandle kwaleti tintfo, futsi nekukhuluma lokuningi kakhulu lokusobala, lokwakungabavimba ekuyeni ngekushesha ekubhujisweni. Futsi ngibhala ngalendlela mayelana nabo.
1.24: Ngatibona timphi emkhatsini wemaNefi kanye nemaLamani etinsukwini tekuphila kwami.
1.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngacala kuba mdzala, futsi iminyaka lelikhulu nemashumi lasikhombisa neminyaka leyimfica yaseyendlulile kusukela ngesikhatsi babe Lehi ashiya eJerusalema.
1.26: Futsi ngabona kutsi kwasekufanele masinyane ngehlele ethuneni lami, ekubeni ngisetjentiswe ngemandla aNkulunkulu kute ngishumayele futsi ngiphrofethe kulaba bantfu, ngimemetele livi njengekweliciniso lelikuKhristu. Ngilimemetele kuto tonkhe tinsuku tami, futsi ngitfokotile ngalo ngetulu kwaloko kwemhlaba.
1.27: Futsi masinyane ngitohamba ngiye endzaweni yekuphumula kwami, leneMhlengi wami; ngoba ngiyati kutsi kuye ngitophumula, Futsi ngitfokotela lusuku lapho lokubhubhako kwami kuyawukwembatsa kungabhubhi, futsi ngime phambi kwakhe; ngalesi sikhatsi ngitobubona buso bakhe nginenjabulo, futsi utawutsi kimi: Wota kimi, wena lobusisiwe, kukhona indzawo lelungiselelwe wena etindlini taBabe. Amen.

1.1: Manje buka, mine, Jaromu, ngibhala emavi lambalwa njengekwemiyaleto yababe, Enoshi, kute umlandvo wesitukulwane setfu ugcinwe.
1.2: Futsi njengoba laba bongcwengcwe babancane, nanjengoba leti tintfo tibhalwe ngenhloso yekutsi kuzuze bomnaketfu emaLamani, ngaloko-ke, kumele kutsi ngibhale kafisha; kodvwa angitutibhala tintfo tekuphrofetha kwami, noma tekwembulelwa kwami. Ngoba yini lengingayibhala ngetulu kwaloko bobabe labakubhalile na? Ngoba abalivetanga yini lisu lensindziso na? Ngitsi kini, Yebo; futsi loku kuyangenelisa.
1.3: Buka, kufanele kube kuningi lokumele kwentiwe emkhatsini walaba bantfu, ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo, nekungeva kwetindlebe tabo, nekuphumphutseka kwetingcodvo tabo, kanye nekuba lukhuni kwetinhloko tabo; noko, Nkulunkulu unesihawu lesikhulu kubo, futsi usengakabasusi eveni lonkhe.
1.4: Futsi kukhona labaningi emkhatsini wetfu labanetembulo letiningi, ngoba akusibo bonkhe labanetinhloko letilukhuni. Futsi njengoba labaningi bete tinhloko letilukhuni futsi banelukholo, banebudlelwane naMoya loNgcwele, lowembulela bantfwana bebantfu, ngekwelukholo lwabo.
1.5: Manje, buka, iminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili bese yendlulile, nebantfu baNefi bese bakhule bacina kulelive. Betama kugcina umtsetfo waMosi kanye nelusuku lwesabatha lungcwele eNkhosini. Futsi abalwephulanga; noma baluhlambalate. Imitsetfo yalelive yayicine kakhulu.
1.6: Futsi bebahlakateke kakhulu eveni lonkhe, ngalokunjalo nemaLamani. Wona bekamaningi kakhulu kunalabo bemaNefi; futsi wona bekakutsandza kubulala phindze anatsa ingati yetilwane.
1.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi eta tikhatsi letiningi kutolwa natsi, emaNefi. Kodvwa emakhosi etfu kanye nebaholi betfu bebangemadvodza lacinile elukholweni lweNkhosi; babafundzisa bantfu tindlela teNkhosi; ngaloko-ke, samelana nemaLamani futsi sawakhipha aphuma eveni letfu, futsi sacala kucinisa emadolobha etfu, noma ngabe nguyiphi indzawo leyayilifa letfu.
1.8: Futsi sandza kakhulu, sagcwala eveni lonkhe, sanotsa kakhulu ngeligolide, nangesiliva, nangetintfo letiligugu, kanye nasekwenteni umsebenti locolekile welugodvo, ngetakhiwo kanye nangemishini, ngalokunjalo nangensimbi lecinile nangekhopha, nangelitfusi kanye nensimbi, senta tonkhe tinhlobo temathulusi latinhlobonhlobo ekulima umhlabatsi, kanye netikhali temphi—yebo, imicibisholo lekhaliphile lecijile, nemigodla, netikhali, nemikhonto lejikwako, kanye nako konkhe kwekulungiselela imphi.
1.9: Ngako-ke njengoba sasitilungiselele kuhlangana nemaLamani, akaphumelelanga ekulweni natsi. Kodvwa livi leNkhosi lacinisekiswa, leyalikhuluma kubobabe betfu, itsi: Kangangoba niyoyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuphumelela kulelive.
1.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphrofethi beNkhosi babesabisa bantfu baNefi, njengekwelivi laNkulunkulu, kutsi uma bangayigcini imiyaleto, kodvwa bawela esiphambekweni, batobhujiswa baphele eveni lonkhe.
1.11: Ngaloko-ke, baphrofethi, nebaphristi, kanye nebafundzisi, basebenta ngekukhutsala, bancusa bantfu ngako konkhe kumela bulukhuni kutsi bakhutsale; bafundzisa umtsetfo waMosi, kanye nenhloso yekunikwa kwawo; babenta kutsi babuke phambili kuMesiya, futsi bakholwe kuye lotako kube shengatsi besekakhona. Futsi babafundzisa ngalendlela.
1.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngekwenta njalo babahlenga ekubhujisweni eveni lonkhe; ngoba batihlaba tinhlitiyo tabo ngelivi, babaphehlela njalonjalo ekuphendvukeni.
1.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emakhulu lamabili nemashumi lamatsatfu nesiphohlongo eminyaka beseyendlulile—seloku kunetimphi, nemibango, kanye nekuphikisana, sikhatsi lesidze kakhulu.
1.14: Futsi mine, Jaromu, angeke ngibhale lokuningi, ngoba laba bongcwengcwe bancane. Kodvwa bukani, bomnaketfu, ningabuka kulabanye bongcwengcwe baNefi; ngoba bukani, kubo imibhalo yetimphi tetfu icoshiwe, njengekwemibhalo yemakhosi, noma leyo labenta kutsi ibhalwe.
1.15: Futsi nginiketa laba bongcwengcwe etandleni tendvodzana yami Omini, kute bagcinwe njengekwemiyaleto yabobabe.

1.1: Buka, kwenteka kutsi mine, Omini, ngiyaletiwe ngubabe, Jaromu, kutsi kumele ngibhale lokutsite kulabongcwengcwe, kugcina umlandvo wesitukulwane setfu—
1.2: Ngaloko-ke, etinsukwini tami, ngifisa kutsi nati kutsi ngalwa kakhulu ngenkemba kuvikela bantfu bami, emaNefi, ekuweleni etandleni tetitsa tabo, emaLamani. Kodvwa buka, mine ngekwami ngiyindvodza lembi, futsi angiyigcinanga imitsetfo kanye nemiyaleto yeNkhosi njengoba bekufanele ngabe ngentile.
1.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emakhulu lamabili nemashumi lasikhombisa nesitfupha yeminyaka beseyendlulile, saba netikhatsi letiningi tekuthula; saba netikhatsi letiningi tetimphi letimatima kanye nekucitseka kwengati. Yebo, kwephetsa, emakhulu lamabili nemashumi lasiphohlongo nakubili yeminyaka beseyendlulile, futsi ngangibagcinile laba bongcwengcwe njengekwemiyaleto yabobabe; ngabendlulisela kundvodzana yami Amaroni. Futsi ngenta siphetfo.
1.4: Manje mine, Amaroni, ngibhala tonkhe tintfo lengitibhalako, letimbalwa, encwadzini yababe.
1.5: Buka kwenteka kutsi emakhulu lamatsatfu kanye nemashumi lamabili eminyaka besekendlulile, futsi incenye lenkhulu lembi yemaNefi yabhujiswa.
1.6: Ngoba iNkhosi yayingeke ivume, emvakwekutsi seyibaholile baphuma eveni laseJerusalema futsi yabagcina bavikelekile ekuweleni etandleni tetitsa tabo, yebo, yayingeke ivume kutsi emavi angafezeki, leyawakhuluma kubobabe betfu, itsi: Kangangoba ningetuyigcina imiyaleto yami angeke niphumelele eveni.
1.7: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi yabavakashela ngekwehlulela lokukhulu; noko, yabasindzisa labalungile kute bangashabalali, kodvwa yabakhulula etandleni tetitsa tabo.
1.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bongcwengcwe ngabaniketa umnaketfu Khemishi.
1.9: Manje mine, Khemishi, ngibhala tintfo letimbalwa lengingatibhala, encwadzini lefanako neyemnaketfu; ngoba buka, ngakubona kwekugcina lakubhala, nekutsi wakubhala ngesakhe sandla lucobo; wakubhala ngelusuku labaletsa ngalo kimi. Futsi ngalendlela sigcina imibhalo, ngoba kungenca yemiyaleto yabobabe betfu. Futsi ngenta siphetfo.
1.10: Buka, mine, Abhinadomu, ngiyindvodzana yaKhemishi. Buka, kwenteka kutsi ngabona timphi letiningi kanye nembango emkhatsini webantfu bami, emaNefi, kanye nemaLamani; futsi mine, ngenkemba yami lucobo, ngititsatsile timphilo letiningi temaLamani ekuvikeleni bomnaketfu.
1.11: Futsi buka, umbhalo walabantfu ucoshwe kubongcwengcwe labaphetfwe ngemakhosi, ngekwetitukulwane; futsi mine angati ngesembulo ngaphandle kwaleso lesibhaliwe, noma siphrofetho; ngaloko-ke, loko lokwanele kubhaliwe. Futsi ngenta siphetfo.
1.12: Buka, mine ngingu-Amaleki, indvodzana ya-Abhinadomu. Buka, ngitokhuluma kini ngalokutsite mayelana naMosiya, lowentiwa inkhosi eveni laseZarahemla; ngoba buka, yena acwayiswe yiNkhosi kutsi kumele abaleke aphume eveni laNefi, futsi nangebuningi balabo labayolilalela livi leNkhosi nabo kumele besuke baphume eveni kanye naye, baye ehlane—
1.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wenta njengoba iNkhosi yayimyaletile. Besuka baphuma eveni baya ehlane, ngebuningi balabo labalilalela livi leNkhosi; futsi baholwa ngetinshumayelo letiningi kanye netiphrofetho. Futsi bebayalwa njalonjalo ngelivi laNkulunkulu; futsi baholwa ngemandla esandla sakhe, badzabula ehlane bate befika entansi eveni lelalibitwa ngelive laseZarahemla.
1.14: Futsi batfola bantfu, lebebabitwa ngekutsi bantfu baZarahemla. Manje, kwaba khona kutfokota lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu baZarahemla; futsi ngalokunjalo naZarahemla watfokota kakhulu, ngenca yekutsi iNkhosi beyitfumele bantfu baMosiya nabongcwengcwe belitfusi lebebacuketse umbhalo wemaJuda.
1.15: Buka, kwenteka kutsi Mosiya watfola kutsi bantfu baZarahemla baphuma eJerusalema ngesikhatsi Sedekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda, yayitfwelwe yayotfunjelwa eBhabhulona.
1.16: Futsi bahamba ehlane, futsi baletfwa ngesandla seNkhosi ngesheya kwemanti lamaningi; baya eveni lapho Mosiya abatfola khona; futsi bebahleli lapho kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili.
1.17: Futsi ngesikhatsi Mosiya abatfola, bese babaningi kakhulu. Noko, bese babe netimphi letiningi kanye nemibango lematima, bese bafe ngenkemba tikhatsi ngetikhatsi; nelulwimi lwabo lwaselonakele; bebangaketi nemibhalo; futsi bebabuphika bukhona beMenti wabo; futsi Mosiya, noma bantfu baMosiya, abakwatanga kubacondza.
1.18: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi Mosiya wenta kutsi bafundziswe ngelulwimi lwakhe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebafundzisiwe ngelulwimi lwaMosiya, Zarahemla wanika umlandvo wesitukulwane saboyise, njengekukhumbula kwakhe; futsi ubhaliwe, kodvwa hhayi kulaba bongcwengcwe.
1.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu baZarahemla, kanye nebaMosiya, bahlangana ndzawonye; futsi Mosiya wabekwa kutsi abe yiNkhosi yabo.
1.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi etinsukwini taMosiya, kwaba khona litje lelikhulu lelaletfwa kuye lelalinemifanekiso lecoshiwe kulo; futsi wayihumusha lemifanekiso lebeyicoshiwe ngesipho kanye nangemandla aNkulunkulu.
1.21: Futsi leyo yayinika umlandvo ngaKhoriyanthuma lotsite, kanye nekubulawa kwebantfu bakhe. Futsi Khoriyanthuma watfolwa bantfu baZarahemla; wahlala nabo sikhatsi lesitinyanga letiyimfica.
1.22: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko yayikhuluma emavi lambalwa mayelana naboyise. Futsi batali bakhe bekucala baphuma embhoshongweni, ngesikhatsi iNkhosi iphambanisa lulwimi lwebantfu; lulaka lweNkhosi lwawela etikwabo njengekwetehlulelo tayo letilungile; futsi ematsambo abo alele asakateke eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
1.23: Buka, mine, Amaleki, ngatalwa etinsukwini taMosiya; futsi ngihlalile ngate ngabona kufa kwakhe; Bhenjamini, indvodzana yakhe, yabusa esikhundleni sakhe.
1.24: Futsi Buka, ngibonile, etinsukwini teNkhosi Bhenjamini, imphi lematima kanye nekucitseka kwengati lokuningi emkhatsini wemaNefi kanye nemaLamani. Kodvwa buka, emaNefi atfola kusitakala lokukhulu ngetulu kwawo; yebo, kangangekutsi inkhosi Bhenjamini yabacosha baphuma eveni laseZarahemla.
1.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngacala kuba mdzala; futsi, ngingenantalelwane, ngati kutsi iNkhosi Bhenjamini bekayindvodza lelungile phambi kweNkhosi, ngaloko-ke, ngitohambisa laba bongcwengcwe kuye, ngincuse bonkhe bantfu kutsi bete kuNkulunkulu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, futsi bakholelwe etiphrofethweni, nasetembulweni, nasekusitweni tingilosi, nakuso sipho sekukhuluma ngetilimi, nakuso sipho sekuhumusha tilimi, kanye nakuto tonkhe tintfo letinhle; ngoba kute lutfo lokuhle ngaphandle kwekutsi kuvela eNkhosini; futsi loko lokubi kuvela kudeveli.
1.26: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngifuna kutsi nite kuKhristu, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli, futsi nihlanganyele ensindzisweni yakhe, kanye nasemandleni ekuhlenga akhe. Yebo, wotani kuye, ninikele imiphefumulo yenu yonkhe njengemnikelo kuye, nichubeke ekuzileni nasekuthandazeni, nibeketele kute kube sekugcineni; futsi njengoba iNkhosi iphila niyawusindziswa.
1.27: Manje ngitawukhuluma lokutsite mayelana nesibalo lesitsite lesahamba sakhuphukela ehlane kute sibuyele eveni laNefi; ngoba bekukhona sibalo lesikhulu salabo labebanesifiso sekutfola live lelilifa labo.
1.28: Ngaloko-ke, bahamba bakhuphukela ehlane. Futsi umholi wabo ayindvodza lecinile nalenemandla, futsi ayindvodza lenenhloko lelukhuni, ngaloko-ke yadala umbango emkhatsini wabo; futsi bonkhe babulawa, ngaphandle kwalabangemashumi lasihlanu, ehlane, baphindze babuyela emuva eveni laseZarahemla.
1.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphindze batsatsa labanye baba sibalo lesikhudlwana, batsatsa luhambo lwabo futsi baya ehlane.
1.30: Futsi mine, Amaleki, nganginemnaketfu, naye lowahamba nabo; futsi kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi angikate ngati mayelana nabo. Futsi sengitolala ethuneni lami; nalaba bongcwengcwe sebagcwele. Ngenta siphetfo senkhulumo yami.

1.1: Manje mine, Mormon, sengitawuniketa umbhalo lobekadze ngiwenta etandleni tendvodzana yami Moroni, buka ngikubonile cishe konkhe kubhujiswa kwebantfu bami, emaNefi.
1.2: Futsi seyiminyaka lengemakhulu lamaningi emvakwekufika kwaKhristu lapho nginiketa lemibhalo etandleni tendvodzana yami; futsi ngicabanga kutsi yona itawubona konkhe kubhujiswa kwebantfu bami. Kodvwa shengatsi Nkulunkulu abengayipha kutsi isindze kuko, kute ibhale lokutsite mayelana nabo, kanye nalokutsite mayelana naKhristu, kute mhlawumbe ngalelinye lilanga kubasite.
1.3: Manje, sengikhuluma lokutsite mayelana naloko lengikubhalile; ngoba emvakwekutsi sengente lokufinyetiwe kubongcwengcwe baNefi, kwehla kuye ekubuseni kwalenkhosi Bhenjamini, Amalekhi lakhulume ngayo, ngacwaninga emkhatsini walemibhalo leyayiletfwe etandleni tami, ngatfola laba bongcwengcwe, labebacuketse umlandvo lomncane webaphrofethi, kusukela kuJakobe kwehla kuya ekubuseni kwalenkhosi Bhenjamini, futsi ngalokunjalo nalamaningi emavi aNefi.
1.4: Futsi tintfo letikulaba bongcwengcwe tiyangitfokotisa, ngenca yetiphrofetho tekuta kwaKhristu; futsi bobabe bati kutsi labaningi babo bese bagcwalisekile; yebo, nami ngiyati kutsi letiningi tintfo lebetiphrofethiwe mayelana natsi kwehle kute kube ngulolusuku setigcwalisekile, futsi letiningi tato kundlulela ngale kwalolusuku kufanele ngempela tenteke—
1.5: Ngaloko-ke, ngikhetse leti tintfo, kucedzela umbhalo wami kuto, umbhalo wami losele lengitawutsatsa kubongcwengcwe baNefi; futsi angeke ngikwati kubhala incenye yalokulikhulu yetintfo tebantfu bami.
1.6: Kodvwa buka, ngitawubatsatsa laba bongcwengcwe, labacuketse letitiphrofetho kanye netembulo, ngibafake kanye nalokusele kwembhalo wami, ngoba bangulabakhetsekile kimi; futsi ngiyati bayawukuba ngulabakhetsekile kubomnaketfu.
1.7: Futsi ngenta loku ngenhloso yekuhlakanipha; ngoba kuyahletjelwa kimi, ngekusebenta kwaMoya weNkhosi lokimi. Manje, angitati tonkhe tintfo; kodvwa iNkhosi itati tonkhe tintfo letitawukwenteka; ngaloko-ke, yona isebenta kimi kutsi ngente ngekwentsandvo yayo.
1.8: Futsi umthandazo wami kuNkulunkulu umayelana nabomnaketfu, kutsi baphindze babe nelwati ngaNkulunkulu, yebo, inkhululeko yaKhristu; kute baphindze futsi babe bantfu labatsandzekako.
1.9: Manje mine, Mormon, ngiyachubeka nekucedzela umbhalo wami, lengiwutsatsa kubongcwengcwe baNefi; futsi ngiwenta njengekwati kanye nekucondza Nkulunkulu langinike kona.
1.10: Ngaloko-ke, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Amaleki sekanikete labongcwengcwe etandleni tenkhosi Bhenjamini, wabatsatsa wababeka kanye nalalabanye bongcwengcwe, lebebacuketse imibhalo lebeyindluliswe ngemakhosi kwehla, titukulwane ngetitukulwane kute kube tinsuku tenkhosi Bhenjamini.
1.11: Futsi yandluliswa yehla kusukela enkhosini Bhenjamini, titukulwane ngetitukulwane yate yawela etandleni tami. Futsi mine, Mormon, ngiyathandaza kuNkulunkulu kutsi ilondvoloteke kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili. Futsi ngiyati kutsi itawulondvolotwa; ngoba kukhona tintfo letinkhulu letibhalwe kuyo, lekuyotsi bantfu bami kanye nabomnakabo bahlulelwe ngato ngelusuku lolukhulu nelekugcina, njengekwelivi laNkulunkulu lelibhaliwe.
1.12: Manje, mayelana naleNkhosi Bhenjamini—yaba nemibango letsite emkhatsini webantfu bayo lucobo.
1.13: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaLamani eta ehla aphuma eveni laNefi, kutawulwa nebantfu bakhe. Kodvwa buka, inkhosi Bhenjamini yabutsela ndzawonye emabutfo ayo, yemelana nawo; futsi yalwa ngemandla emkhono wayo lucobo, ngenkemba yaLabani.
1.14: Futsi ngemandla eNkhosi balwa netitsa tabo, bate babulala letiningi tinkhulungwane temaLamani. Futsi kwenteka kutsi balwa nemaLamani bate bawacosha bawakhipha emaveni onkhe langemafa abo.
1.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekubakhona kwaboKhristu-mbumbulu, imilomo yabo seyivaliwe, futsi sebajeziswe ngekwemacala abo;
1.16: Futsi emvakwekubakhona kwebaphrofethi bemanga, nebashumayeli kanye nebafundzisi bemanga emkhatsini webantfu, futsi bonkhe laba sebajezisiwe ngekwemacala abo; futsi emvakwekubakhona kwembango lomkhulu kanye nalokuningi kuhlubukela kumaLamani, buka, kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Bhenjamini, ngekusitwa baphrofethi labangcwele labebasemkhatsini webantfu bakhe—
1.17: Ngoba buka, inkhosi Bhenjamini bekuyindvodza lengcwele; wabusa ngetulu kwebantfu bakhe ngekulunga; futsi bekukhona labaningi bantfu labangcwele eveni, futsi balikhuluma livi laNkulunkulu ngemandla kanye nangeligunya; futsi basebentisa kucina kwelivi lokukhulu ngenca yekutsi bantfu bebanetinhloko letilukhuni.
1.18: Ngaloko-ke, ngelusito lwalaba, iNkhosi Bhenjamini, ngekusebenta ngawo onkhe emandla emtimba wakhe kanye nemandla emphefumulo wakhe wonkhe, futsi ngalokunjalo nebaphrofethi, baphindze benta kutsi kubekhona kuthula eveni.

1.1: Manje besekute umbango eveni lonkhe laseZarahemla, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu labebabenkhosi Bhenjamini, kangangekutsi inkhosi Bhenjamini yaba nekuthula njalo tonkhe tinsuku tayo lebetisele.
1.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yayinemadvodzana lamatsatfu; yawacamba emabito abo kutsi nguMosiya, Helorumu, kanye naHilamani. Yenta kutsi afundziswe lonkhe lulwimi lwaboyise, kute ngaloko abe ngemadvodzana lanekucondza; kute ati mayelana netiphrofetho letatikhulunywe ngemilomo yaboyise, letatiletfwe kubo ngesandla seNkhosi.
1.3: Ngetulu kwaloko yawafundzisa mayelana nemibhalo leyayicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi, itsi: Madvodzana ami, ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule kutsi kube kwakungasiko ngenca yalaba bongcwengcwe, labacuketse lemibhalo kanye nemiyaleto, ngabe sahlala ekungatini, nangalesi sikhatsi samanje, singatati timfihlakalo taNkulunkulu.
1.4: Ngoba kwakungeke kwenteke kutsi babe, Lehi, akwati kutikhumbula tonkhe leti tintfo, kutsi atifundzise bantfwana bakhe, ngaphandle kwekutsi asitwe ngulaba bongcwengcwe; ngoba yena afundziswe ngelulwimi lwemaGibhithe ngako-ke wakwati kuyifundza lemibhalo, aphindze ayifundzise nebantfwana bakhe, kute ngaloko bona bakwati kuyifundzisa bantfwana babo, kute kugcwaliseke imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kwehle kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi samanje.
1.5: Ngitsi kini, madvodzana ami, kube kwakungasiko ngenca yaleti tintfo, letigciniwe talondvolotwa ngesandla saNkulunkulu, kute sitifundze phindze sicondze ngetimfihlakalo takhe, siphindze sibe nemiyaleto yakhe njalonjalo phambi kwemehlo etfu, nabobabe betfu bebayoncishelwa kukholwa, besiyokuba njengabomnaketfu, emaLamani, wona langati lutfo mayelana naleti tintfo, futsi akatikholwa noma afundziswa ngato, ngenca yemasiko aboyise, langakalungi.
1.6: Awu madvodzana ami, ngifuna kutsi nite nikhumbule kutsi leti tinkhulumo tiliciniso, nekutsi lemibhalo iliciniso. Bukani, nabongcwengcwe baNefi, labacuketse imibhalo kanye netinkhulumo tabobabe betfu kusukela ngesikhatsi bashiya eJerusalema kute kube manje, baliciniso; futsi singati ngekweliciniso kwabo ngenca yekutsi sinabo phambi kwemehlo etfu.
1.7: Manje, madvodzana ami, ngifuna kutsi nite nikhumbule kutsi nibacwaninge ngekukhutsala, kute nizuze ngaloko; ngifuna kutsi nite niyigcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kute niphumelele eveni njengekwetitsembiso iNkhosi leyatenta kubobabe betfu.
1.8: Tiningi kakhulu tintfo inkhosi Bhenjamini leyatifundzisa emadvodzana ayo, letingakabhalwa kulencwadzi.
1.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi Bhenjamini seyicedzile kufundzisa emadvodzana ayo, yabese iba yindzala, futsi yabese iyabona kutsi besekufanele kutsi masinyane nje ihambe ngendlela yawo wonkhe umhlaba; ngako-ke yakubona kufanele kutsi inikete umbuso kuyinye yemadvodzana ayo.
1.10: Ngako-ke yenta kutsi Mosiya aletfwe phambi kwayo; lawa ngemavi leyawakhuluma kuye, itsi: Ndvodzana yami, ngifuna kutsi wente simemetelo kulo lonkhe lelive emkhatsini wabo bonkhe laba bantfu, noma bantfu baZarahemla, kanye nakubantfu baMosiya labahlala kulelive, kute ngaloko bagcogcelwe ndzawonye; ngoba kusasa ngitomemetela kubo laba bantfu bami ngemlomo wami kutsi wena sewuyinkhosi kanye nembusi ngetulu kwabo laba bantfu, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu lesinike bona.
1.11: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitonika laba bantfu libito, kute ngaloko behlukaniswe kubo bonkhe bantfu iNkhosi Nkulunkulu leyabakhipha eveni laseJerusalema; loku ngikwenta ngoba bebabantfu labakhutsele ekugcineni imiyaleto yeNkhosi.
1.12: Ngibaniketa libito lelingeke lesulwe nanini, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngenca yesiphambeko.
1.13: Yebo, ngetulu kwaloko ngitsi kuwe, uma kusho kutsi laba bantfu labatsandvwako kakhulu yiNkhosi bangawela esiphambekweni, futsi babe bantfu lababi kanye nalabaphingako, kute iNkhosi ibanikele etitseni tabo, kute ngaloko babe butsakatsaka njengabomnakabo, ayisenokubalondvolota ngemandla ayo langenakulinganiswa nalamangalisako, njengoba kute kube manje ibalondvolotile bobabe betfu.
1.14: Ngoba ngitsi kuwe, kube ayiselulanga sandla sayo ekulondvoloteni bobabe betfu bebayowela etandleni temaLamani, babe ngulabahlushwako kunzondo yawo.
1.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi inkhosi Bhenjamini seyicedzile kukhuluma ngaleti tintfo kundvodzana yayo, yayinika imiyaleto mayelana nato tonkhe tindzaba tembuso.
1.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, yaphindze yayinika imiyaleto mayelana nemibhalo leyayicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi; kanjalo nangabongcwengcwe baNefi; futsi kanjalo, nangenkemba yaLabani, kanye nebhola noma inkhombandlela, leyahola bobabe betfu ekhatsi ehlane, leyayilungiswe ngesandla seNkhosi kute ngaloko ibahole, wonkhe muntfu ngekulalela kanye nekukhutsala lebebamniketa kona.
1.17: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi bangenalukholo bebangaphumeleli noma bachubeke ngeluhambo lwabo, kodvwa bebabuyiselwa emuva, batehlisele kungajabuli kwaNkulunkulu etikwabo; ngaloko-ke bebashaywa ngendlala kanye netinhlupheko letibuhlungu, kubaphehla kutsi bakhumbule umsebenti wabo.
1.18: Manje, kwenteka kutsi Mosiya wahamba wenta njengoba uyise abemyaletile, wamemetela kubo bonkhe bantfu labebaseveni laseZarahemla kute ngaloko bagcogcane ndzawonye, kutsi bahambe bakhuphukele ethempelini kuyokuva emavi uyise labekatowakhuluma kubo.

2.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Mosiya sekente njengoba uyise amyaletile, sekente simemetelo kulo lonkhe live, bantfu babutsana ndzawonye kulo lonkhe live, kute bahambe bakhuphukele ethempelini kuyova emavi inkhosi Bhenjamini leyayitowakhuluma kubo.
2.2: Bebasibalo lesikhulu, bebabaningi ngendlela yekutsi abatange bababale; ngoba bese baphindzaphindvwe kakhulu futsi sebandze kakhulu eveni.
2.3: Ngetulu kwaloko batsatsa ematibulo etimvu tabo, kute banikele ngemhlatjelo kanye nangemnikelo wekushiswa njengekwemtsetfo waMosi;
2.4: Ngetulu kwaloko kute babonge eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, lowabakhipha eveni laseJerusalema, wabakhipha etandleni tetitsa tabo, wakhetsa bantfu labalungile kutsi babe bafundzisi babo, ngalokunjalo nendvodza lelungile kutsi ibe yinkhosi yabo, leyenta kwaba khona kuthula eveni laseZarahemla, leyabafundzisa kutsi bagcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kute batfokote phindze bagcwale lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu kanye nelwebantfu bonkhe.
2.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bafika ethempelini, bamisa emathende abo atungeleta lapho, yonkhe indvodza ngekwemndeni wayo, lofaka ekhatsi umfati wayo, nemadvodzana ayo, nemadvodzakati ayo, kanye nemadvodzana abo, kanye nemadvodzakati abo, kusukela kulomdzala kwehla kuya kulomncane, yonkhe imindeni yehlukene lomunye kulomunye.
2.6: Bamisa emathende abo atungeleta lithempeli, wonkhe umuntfu anelithende lelinemnyango walo lobheke ethempelini, kute ngaloko bahlale emathendeni abo phindze beve emavi inkhosi Bhenjamini leyayitowakhuluma kubo;
2.7: Ngoba sicuku sasisikhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi inkhosi Bhenjamini ayikwatanga kubafundzisa bonkhe ngekhatsi kwetindvonga telithempeli, ngako-ke yenta kutsi kumiswe umbhoshongo, kute ngaloko bantfu bakhe baweve emavi lebekatowakhuluma kubo.
2.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wacala kukhuluma nebantfu bakhe asembhoshongweni; kodvwa abakwatanga bonkhe kuva emavi akhe ngenca yebukhulu besicuku; ngako-ke wenta kutsi emavi lawakhulumako abhalwe bese atfunyelwa emkhatsini walabo labebangekho ngaphansi kwemsindvo welivi lakhe, kute nabo ngalokunjalo bawatfole emavi akhe.
2.9: Ngulawa lamavi lawakhuluma waphindze wenta kutsi abhalwe, atsi: Bomnaketfu, nonkhe nine lenihlangene ndzawonye, nine leninekuweva emavi ami lengitowakhuluma kini ngalolusuku; ngoba angitange nginiyalete kutsi nikhuphukele lapha nitodlala ngemavi lengitowakhuluma, kodvwa kutsi ningilalele, nivule tindlebe tenu kute nive, netinhlitiyo tenu kute nicondze, netingcondvo tenu kute timfihlakalo taNkulunkulu tembulwe kini.
2.10: Angikaniyaleti kutsi nikhuphukhele lapha kute ningesabe, noma kutsi nicabange kutsi mine ngingetulu kwemuntfu lobhubhako.
2.11: Kodvwa nami nginjengani lucobo lwenu, ngingaphansi kwato tonkhe timo tebutsakatsaka emtimbeni kanye nasengcondvweni; noko ngikhetfwe ngulaba bantfu, ngangcweliswa ngubabe, ngavunyelwa sandla senkhosi kutsi ngibe ngumbusi nenkhosi ngetulu kwalaba bantfu; ngigciniwe ngaphindze ngalondvolotwa ngemandla akhe langenakulinganiswa, kutsi nginisebentele ngako konkhe kucina, ingcondvo kanye nemandla iNkhosi lenginike wona.
2.12: Ngitsi kini njengoba ngivunyelwe kutsi ngicitse tinsuku tami ekunisebenteleni, kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi, angikate ngifune ligolide nesiliva noma nanhloboni yemcebo wenu;
2.13: Angitange ngivume kutsi nibanjwe nifakwe ematilongweni, noma nentane tigcila lomunye kulomunye, noma nibulale, noma niphange, noma nebe, noma niphinge; noma nekutsi ngivume kutsi nente noma hlobo luni lwebubi, nginifundzisile kutsi nigcine imiyaleto yeNkhosi, kuto tonkhe tintfo leniyalete ngato—
2.14: Nanami, lucobo lwami, ngisebentile ngetandla tami kute nginisebentele, nekutsi ningatfwaliswa ngemitselo, nekutsi kungeti lutfo etikwenu lokumatima kutsi nikutfwale—kuto tonkhe leti tintfo lesengitikhulumile, nani lucobo lwenu nibofakazi nalamuhla.
2.15: Noko, bomnaketfu, angikatenti leti tintfo kute ngitigabatise, noma kutsi nginitjela leti tintfo kute ngaloko nginibeke licala; kodvwa nginitjela leti tintfo kute nati kutsi ngingakwati kuphendvula nganembeza lohlantekile phambi kwaNkulunkulu nalamuhla.
2.16: Bukani, ngitsi kini ngenca yekutsi ngitsite ngicitse tinsuku tami ekunisebenteleni, angifuni kutikhukhumeta, ngoba empeleni bengisebentela Nkulunkulu.
2.17: Bukani, nginitjela leti tintfo kute nifundze kuhlakanipha; kute nifundze kutsi uma usebentela bantfu bakini empeleni usebentela Nkulunkulu wakho.
2.18: Bukani, ningibite ngenkhosi yenu; uma mine, leningibita ngenkhosi yenu, ngisebenta kutsi nginisite, pho nine akukafaneli yini kutsi nisebente kute nisitane na?
2.19: Bukani futsi, uma mine, leningibita ngenkhosi yenu, leseyicitse tinsuku tayo inisebentela, noko bengikadze ngisebentela Nkulunkulu, ngifanelwe kubongwa ngini, Awu kufanele kangakanani kutsi nibonge iNkhosi yenu yasezulwini!
2.20: Ngitsi kini, bomnaketfu, uma ninganika konkhe kubonga kanye neludvumo umphefumulo wenu wonkhe lonemandla ekubanalo, kuloyo Nkulunkulu lonidalile, wanigcina wanilondvolota, wenta kutsi nitfokote, waninika kutsi nihlale ngekuthula lomunye nalomunye—
2.21: Ngitsi kini uma beningamsebentela loyo lowanidala kusukela ekucaleni, lonilondvolotako lusuku nelusuku, ngekuniboleka umphefumulo, kute niphile phindze ninyakate nente ngekutsandza kwenu, aphindze anisekela kusukela kulomunye umzuzu kuya kulomunye—ngitsi, uma beningamsebentela ngemiphefumulo yenu yonkhe noko kunjalo beniyawuba tisebenti letingenamvuzo.
2.22: Bukani, kuphela lakudzingako kini kugcina imiyaleto yakhe; unitsembisile kutsi uma niyoyigcina imiyaleto yakhe niyophumelela eveni; akajiki nanini kuloko lakushito; ngaloko-ke, uma nigcina imiyaleto yakhe uyanibusisa phindze aniphumelelise.
2.23: Manje, kwekucala, unidalile, waninika timphilo tenu, leninelicala ngato.
2.24: Kwesibili, udzinga kutsi nente njengoba aniyaletile; lokungukutsi uma nekwenta, uyanibusisa masinyane; ngako-ke sewunikhokhele. Nisenelicala, futsi nisetawuba nalo, phakadze naphakadze; ngaloko-ke, yini leningatikhukhumeta ngayo na?
2.25: Manje ngiyabuta, kukhona yini leningakusho ngani na? Ngiyaniphendvula ngitsi, Cha. Aninakusho kutsi ninjengelutfuli lwemhlaba; noko nadalwa ngelutfuli lwemhlaba; kodvwa bukani, lwakhe loyo lowanidala.
2.26: Nami, ngisho mine, lenimbita ngenkhosi yenu, angisincono kunani; ngoba nami ngalokunjalo ngiwaselutfulini. Futsi niyabona kutsi sengimdzala, sekusedvute ngidzele lomtimba lobhubhako uye kunina wawo umhlaba.
2.27: Ngako-ke, njengoba ngishito kini kutsi nginisebentele, ngihamba nanembeza lohlantekile phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ngalokunjalo nangalesi sikhatsi ngente kutsi nibutsane ndzawonye, kute ngitfolwe ngingenacala, futsi nekutsi ingati yenu ingehleli etikwami, uma sengimele kutsi ngehlulelwe nguNkulunkulu ngetintfo langiyalete ngato mayelana nani.
2.28: Ngitsi kini ngente kutsi nibutsane ndzawonye kute ngisuse etingutjeni tami ingati yenu, kulesi sikhatsi lapho sengitokuya phansi ethuneni lami, kute ngehlele phansi ngekuthula, moya wami longabhubhi uhlangane nemakwaya langetulu ekuhlabeleleni tindvumiso taNkulunkulu lolungile.
2.29: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi kini ngente kutsi nibutsane ndzawonye, kute ngimemetele kini kutsi angeke ngisaba ngumfundzisi wenu, noma yinkhosi yenu;
2.30: Ngoba nangalesi sikhatsi, umtimba wami wonkhe uyachachatela kakhulu njengoba ngetama kukhuluma nani; kodvwa iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyangisekela, ingivumele kutsi ngikhulume nani, phindze ingiyalete kutsi ngimemetele kini ngalolusuku, kutsi indvodzana yami Mosiya uyinkhosi nembusi ngetulu kwenu.
2.31: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngifuna kutsi nente njengoba benikadze nentile kute kube manje. Njengoba niyigcinile imiyaleto yami, ngalokunjalo nemiyaleto yababe, naphumelela, nagcinwa ekuweleni etandleni tetitsa tenu, ngalokunjalo uma niyoyigcina imiyaleto yendvodzana yami, noma imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu leyoletfwa kini ngayo, niyophumelela kulelive, titsa tenu angeke tibe nemandla ngetulu kwenu.
2.32: Kodvwa, Awu bantfu bami, caphelani hleze kuvuke imibango emkhatsini wenu, funa nikhetse kulalela umoya lomubi, lakhuluma ngawo babe Mosiya.
2.33: Ngoba bukani, kukhona inhlawulo lemenyetelwe kuloyo lokhetsa kulalela lowomoya; ngoba uma akhetsa kulalela wona, futsi ahlale ate afele etonweni takhe, yena phindze utinatsela lusizi emphefumulweni wakhe; ngoba utfola njengenkhokhelo yakhe kujeziswa lokungapheli, ece umtsetfo waNkulunkulu ngekuphikisana nelwati lwakhe lucobo.
2.34: Ngitsi kini, kute namunye emkhatsini wenu, ngaphandle kwebantfwana benu labancane labangafundziswanga mayelana naleti tintfo, longati kutsi ninelicala laphakadze kuBabe wenu wasezulwini, kuletsa kuye konkhe leninako kanye naleningiko; ngetulu kwaloko nifundzisiwe mayelana nemibhalo lecuketse tiphrofetho labakhuluma ngato baphrofethi labangcwele, kwehla kute kufike esikhatsini babe, Lehi, lashiya ngaso eJerusalema.
2.35: Ngalokunjalo, nako konkhe lokwakhulunywa bobabe betfu kute kube manje. Bukani, ngetulu kwaloko, bakhuluma loko labebayaletwe ngako yiNkhosi; ngako-ke, leyomibhalo ilungile phindze iliciniso.
2.36: Manje, ngitsi kini, bomnaketfu, emvakwekutsi senatile nafundziswa tonkhe leti tintfo, uma ningaphambuka phindze niphikisane naloko lokukhulunyiwe, kangangekutsi nite nitikhiphe kuMoya weNkhosi, kute angabi nendzawo kini kutsi anicondzise etindleleni tekuhlakanipha kute nibusiswe, niphumelele, phindze nilondvolotwe—
2.37: Ngitsi kini, umuntfu lowenta loku, nguye loyo futsi lophumela ebaleni avukele Nkulunkulu; ngako-ke ukhetsa kulalela umoya lomubi, uba sitsa kuko konkhe kulunga; ngako-ke, iNkhosi ayinandzawo kuye, ngoba ayihlali emathempelini langcolile.
2.38: Ngako-ke uma loyo muntfu angaphendvuki, ahlale phindze afe asitsa kuNkulunkulu, tidzingeko tekulunga taNkulunkulu tivusela umphefumulo wakhe longabhubhi ekwatini licala lakhe, lelimenta kutsi ashwaphane phambi kweNkhosi, ligcwalise sifuba sakhe ngekutisola, nebuhlungu, kanye nelusizi, lolufana nemlilo longacisheki, lo emalangabi awo akhuphukela etulu phakadze naphakadze.
2.39: Manje ngitsi kini, umusa awunakumtfola loyo muntfu; ngako-ke siphetfo sakhe kutsi abeketelele buhlungu lobungapheli.
2.40: Awu, nonkhe nine madvodza lamadzala, nani bafana, kanye nani bantfwana labancane leniwacondzako emavi ami, ngoba ngikhulume ngalokusobala kini kute nicondze, ngiyathandaza kutsi nivukele ekukhumbuleni simo lesesabekako salabo labawele esiphambekweni.
2.41: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngifisa kutsi nicabange ngesimo lesibusisiwe futsi nesekujabula salabo labagcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu. Ngoba bukani, babusisiwe kuto tonkhe tintfo, tesikhashana kanye netakamoya; uma babambelele ekwetsembekeni kute kube sekugcineni bemukelwa ezulwini, kute ngaloko bahlale naNkulunkulu esimeni sekutfokota lokungenakuphela. Awu khumbulani, khumbulani kutsi leti tintfo tiliciniso; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itikhulumile.

3.1: Ngetulu kwaloko bomnaketfu, ngicela nilalele, nginalokutsite lokuningi lengitokukhuluma kini; ngoba bukani, nginetintfo lengitonitjela tona mayelana naloko lokutako.
3.2: Futsi leto tintfo lengitonitjela tona tembulwe kimi yingilosi levela kuNkulunkulu. Yatsi kimi: Vuka; ngavuka, buka beyime phambi kwami.
3.3: Yatsi: Vuka, uve emavi lengitokutjela wona; ngoba buka; ngite kutomemetela kuwe tindzaba letimnandzi tekujabula lokukhulu.
3.4: Ngoba iNkhosi iyivile imithandazo yakho, yakwehlulela ngekulunga kwakho, ingitfume kutsi ngitomemetela kuwe kute utfokote; nekutsi umemetele kubantfu bakho, kute nabo ngalokunjalo bagcwaliswe ngenjabulo.
3.5: Ngoba buka, sikhatsi siyeta, asikho khashane kakhulu, kutsi ngemandla, iNkhosi leneMandla Onkhe lebusako, leyayinguye, futsi lenguye levela kulo lonkhe liphakadze kuya kulo lonkhe liphakadze, itokwehla ivela ezulwini yehlele emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, itohlala edvokodvweni lelubumba, itohamba emkhatsini webantfu, yenta timangaliso letinemandla, njengekuphilisa labagulako, kuvusa labafile, yente tishosha tihambe, timphumphutse titfole kubona kwato, kanye netimungulu kutsi tive, iphindze yelaphe tonkhe tinhlobo tetifo.
3.6: Iyawukhipha bodeveli, noma imimoya lemibi lehlala etinhlitiyweni tebantfwana bebantfu.
3.7: Bukani, iyawuhlushwa tilingo, nebuhlungu bemtimba, yindlala, koma, kanye nekukhatsala, ngetulu kwaloko umuntfu langakuva, ngaphandle kwekutsi kute kube uyafa; ngoba buka, ingati itophuma kuto tonkhe timbobo tesikhumba, luyokuba lukhulu lusizi kuyo ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tebantfu bayo.
3.8: Uyawubitwa ngekutsi nguJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, Babe welizulu nemhlaba, uMdali wato tonkhe tintfo kusukela ekucaleni, unina uyawubitwa ngekutsi nguMariya.
3.9: Buka, uta kubakhe, kute insindziso ite kubantfwana bebantfu nangekukholwa egameni lakhe; nangemvakwakokonkhe loku bayawumtsatsa njengemuntfu, batsi unadeveli, bayawumbhacabula, futsi bayawumbetsela.
3.10: Uyawuvuka ngelusuku lwesitsatfu kulabafile; buka, umele kwehlulela umhlaba, futsi buka, tonkhe leti tintfo tentiwa kute kwehlulela lokulungile kute kubantfwana bebantfu.
3.11: Ngoba buka, ngetulu kwaloko ingati yakhe ihlawulela tono talabo labawa ngesiphambeko sa-Adamu, labo labafa bangayati intsandvo yaNkulunkulu mayelana nabo noma labona ngekungati.
3.12: Kodvwa maye, maye kuloyo lowatiko kutsi uyahlubuka kuNkulunkulu! Ngoba insindziso ayiti kulonjalo ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngekuphendvuka kanye nelukholo eNkhosini Jesu Khristu.
3.13: INkhosi Nkulunkulu itfumele baphrofethi bayo labangcwele emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfwana bebantfu, kumemetela leti tintfo kuyo yonkhe imindeni, tive, kanye netilimi, kute ngaloko noma ngubani lokholwako kutsi Khristu uyokuta, ngibo labo labangatfola kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo, batfokote ngekutfokota lokukhulu, kube shengatsi sewufikile emkhatsini wabo.
3.14: Noko iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yabona kutsi bantfu bayo bebabantfu labanetinhloko letilukhuni, yabamisela umtsetfo, umtsetfo waMosi.
3.15: Tiningi tibonakaliso, netimangaliso, nemifanekiso, kanye nekufana lakuveta kubo, mayelana nekuta kwakhe; ngalokunjalo nebaphrofethi labangcwele bakhuluma kubo mayelana nekuta kwakhe; kodvwa noko batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, bangacondzi kutsi umtsetfo waMosi wawungasiti ngalutfo ngaphandle kwekutsi kwakungenca yenhlawulo yengati yakhe.
3.16: Futsi noma ngabe kwakungenteka kutsi bantfwana labancane bebangona bebangeke basindziswe; kodvwa ngitsi kini babusisiwe; ngoba buka, njenga-Adamu, noma ngekwemvelo, bayawa, ngalokunjalo ingati yaKhristu ihlawulela tono tabo.
3.17: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi kini, akuyuba khona lelinye libito leliyawunikwa nanoma nguyiphi lenye indlela noma lisu lokungafika ngalo insindziso kubantfwana bebantfu, kuphela kulo kanye nangalo libito laKhristu, iNkhosi, leneMandla Onkhe.
3.18: Ngoba buka iyehlulela, nekwehlulela kwayo kulungile; umntfwana lomncane akabhubhi lofa ebuntfwaneni bakhe; kodvwa bantfu batinatsela bona lucobo lusizi ngaphandle kwekutsi batitfobe phindze babe njengebantfwana labancane, bakholwe kutsi insindziso yeta, ita, futsi isetawuta, kuyo phindze nangayo ingati lehlawulako yaKhristu, iNkhosi leneMandla Onkhe.
3.19: Ngoba umuntfu wemvelo usitsa kuNkulunkulu, seloku waba ngiso kusukela ekuweni kwa-Adamu, utawuba ngiso, phakadze naphakadze, ngaphandle kwekutsi avumele kuholwa nguMoya loNgcwele, amkhumule umuntfu wemvelo abe ngulongcwele ngenhlawulo yaKhristu iNkhosi, futsi abe njengemntfwana, atinikele, atehlise, atitfobe, abeketele, agcwale lutsandvo, avume kutinikela kuto tonkhe tintfo iNkhosi lebona kumlungele kutsi itibeke etikwakhe, njengemntfwana atinikela kuyise.
3.20: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi kini, sikhatsi siyawufika lapho lwati lweMsindzisi luyawukwandza lugcwale kuto tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nakubantfu.
3.21: Bukani, uma leso sikhatsi sifika, kute namunye loyawutfolakala angenacala phambi kwaNklunkulu, ngaphandle kwebantfwana labancane, kungekuphendvuka kuphela nelukholo kulo libito leNkhosi Nkulunkulu leneMandla Onkhe.
3.22: Futsi nangaso lesi sikhatsi, uma sewubafundzisile bantfu bakho tintfo iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho lekuyalete ngato, nangaleso sikhatsi abatfolakali bangenacala phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kuphela ngekwemavi lengiwakhulumile kuwe.
3.23: Manje sengiwakhulumile emavi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu lengiyalete ngawo.
3.24: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Ayawukuma njengebufakazi lobugcamile ngalokumelene nalaba bantfu, ngelusuku lwekwehlulelwa; ngaloko-ke bayawukwehlulelwa, wonkhe umuntfu ngekwemisebenti yakhe, noma ngabe mihle, noma ngabe mibi.
3.25: Futsi uma imibi bayoboniswa bubi bemacala abo lucobo kanye netinengiso, lokubenta bashwaphabe phambi kweNkhosi babe sesimeni selusizi kanye nekuhlupheka lokungenakuphela, lapho bangasenakubuya nanini; ngako-ke batinatsele bona lucobo lusizi emiphefumulweni yabo.
3.26: Ngako-ke, banatse enkomishini yelulaka lwaNkulunkulu, kulunga lokungeke kusahociswa nanini kubo kunekutsi kuhocise kutsi Adamu wawa ngenca yekudla kwakhe sitselo lesasingakavunyelwa; ngako-ke, umusa awusenawukwati kubatfola nanini ingunaphakadze.
3.27: Kuhlupheka kwabo kunjengelichibi lemlilo nesibabule, emalangabi alo langacisheki, intfutfu yalo lekhuphukela etulu phakadze naphakadze. Ingiyalete kanjena-ke iNkhosi. Amen.

4.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi inkhosi Bhenjamini seyicedzile kukhuluma emavi lebekadze aletfwe kuyo yingilosi yeNkhosi, yaphonsa emehlo ayo kuso sonkhe sicuku, buka sase siwele phansi, ngoba bese bafikelwe kuyesaba iNkhosi.
4.2: Bese batibonile basesimeni sabo sasemhlabeni, bangaphansi kunelutfuli lwemhlabatsi. Bonkhe bakhala kakhulu ngelivi linye, batsi: Awu bani nemusa, wente ingati lehlawulako yaKhristu isebente kute sitfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tetfu, netinhlitiyo tetfu tihlantwe; ngoba siyakholwa kuJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, lowadala lizulu nemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo; loyokwehlela phansi emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu.
4.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebakhulume lamavi Moya weNkhosi wehlela etikwabo, bagcwala injabulo, sebatfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo, sebanekuthula kwanembeza, ngenca yelukholo lolukhulu labebanalo kuJesu Khristu labekatofika, njengekwemavi inkhosi Bhenjamini lebeyiwakhulume kubo.
4.4: INkhosi Bhenjamini yaphindze yavula umlomo wayo yacala kukhuluma kubo, itsi: Bangani bami kanye nabomnaketfu, tihlobo tami kanye nebantfu bami, ngiyaphindza ngiyanicela kutsi nilalele, kute nive niphindze nicondze emavi ami lasele lengitowakhuluma kini.
4.5: Ngoba bukani, uma lwati lwebuhle baNkulunkulu ngalesi sikhatsi selunivusele ekuboneni kungabi lutfo kwenu, kanye nekungabaluleki kwenu kanye nesimo sekuwa—
4.6: Ngitsi kini, uma senifike elwatini lebuhle baNkulunkulu, nemandla akhe langenakulinganiswa, nekuhlakanipha kwakhe, nesineke sakhe, kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kubantfwana bebantfu; ngetulu kwaloko, nenhlawulo leyalungiswa kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba, kute ngaloko insindziso ite kuloyo loyobeka litsemba lakhe eNkhosini, akhutsale ekugcineni imiyaleto yayo, futsi achubeke elukholweni kute kube sekugcineni kwemphilo yakhe, imphilo yemtimba lobhubhako—
4.7: Ngitsi, ngulomuntfu lotfola insindziso, ngenhlawulo leyalungiselwa bonkhe bantfu kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba, labebaloku bakhona kusukela ekuweni kwa-Adamu, noma labakhona, noma labayoba khona nanini, kute kube sekupheleni kwemhlaba.
4.8: Nguyonandlela lena insindziso leyota ngayo. Kute lenye insindziso ngaphandle kwalena lesekukhulunywe ngayo; noma kute leminye imibandzela umuntfu langase asindziswe ngayo ngaphandle kwalemibandzela lenginitjele ngayo.
4.9: Kholwani kuNkulunkulu; kholwani kutsi nguye, nekutsi wadala tintfo tonkhe, lokusezulwini nalokusemhlabeni; kholwani kutsi unako konkhe kuhlakanipha, kanye nawo onkhe emandla, ezulwini nasemhlabeni; kholwani kutsi umuntfu angeke akwati kucondza tonkhe tintfo iNkhosi lekwati kuticondza.
4.10: Ngetulu kwaloko, kholwani kutsi kufanele niphendvuke etonweni tenu niphindze nitishiye, nititfobe phambi kwaNkulunkulu; nicele ngebucotfo benhlitiyo kutsi anitsetselele; manje, uma nikholwa ngito tonkhe leti tintfo bonani kutsi niyatenta.
4.11: Ngetulu kwaloko ngitsi kini njengoba ngishito ngaphambilini, kutsi njengoba senifike elwatini lwenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu, noma uma seninelwati ngebuhle bakhe seniluvile lutsandvo lwakhe, senitfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu, lokwenta injabulo lenkhulu kakhulu emiphefumulweni yenu, ngalokunjalo ngifuna kutsi nite nikhumbule, njalo nihlale nikhumbula, bukhulu baNkulunkulu, kanye nekungabi lutfo kwenu lucobo, nebuhle bakhe nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kini, tidalwa letingakafaneleki, nititfobe nasekujuleni kwentfobeko, nibite libito leNkhosi tinsuku tonkhe, nime ngekucina elukholweni kuloko lokutako, lokwakhulunywa ngemlomo wengilosi.
4.12: Bukani, ngitsi kini uma nikwenta loku niyohlala nitfokota, nigcwaliswe ngelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu, niyohlala nigcine kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu; niyokhula elwatini lwenkhatimulo yaloyo lowanidala, noma elwatini lwaloko lokulungile phindze lokuliciniso.
4.13: Angeke nibe nawo umcondvo wekulimatana, kodvwa kutsi nihlale ngekuthula, niphindze ninike wonkhe umuntfu loko lokumfanele.
4.14: Angeke nivume kutsi bantfwana benu bahambe balambile, noma bahambe bangcunu; noma nivume kutsi baphule imitsetfo yaNkulunkulu, balwe baphindze bacabane bodvwana, basebentele develi, loyinkhosi yesono, noma longumoya lomubi labakhuluma ngawo bobabe betfu, lositsa sako konkhe kulunga.
4.15: Kodvwa nitawubafundzisa kutsi bahambe etindleleni teliciniso kanye netebucotfo; nitawubafundzisa kutsi batsandzane, nekutsi basitane.
4.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, nani lucobo lwenu nitawubasita labo labeme badzinga lusito lwenu; nitawupha ngaloko leninako kuloyo lodzingile; angeke nivume kutsi siceli siphakamise sicelo saso ngelite, nisicoshe kutsi sibhubhe.
4.17: Mhlawumbe uyotsi: Lomuntfu utiletsele yena etikwakhe lusizi lwakhe: ngako-ke ngitawusigodla sandla sami, angeke ngimnike kudla kwami, noma ngimnike lenginako kute angahlupheki, ngoba tijeziso takhe tilungile—
4.18: Kodvwa mine ngitsi kini, Awu muntfu, loyo lowenta loku nguye kanye lonesidzingo lesikhulu sekuphendvuka; ngaphandle kwekutsi aphendvuke ngaloko lakwentile uyobhubha ingunaphakadze, futsi akanasabelo embusweni waNkulunkulu.
4.19: Ngoba bukani, asisito yini ticeli sonkhe na? Ngabe asikanciki yini sonkhe kuye kanye loyo Muntfu, ngisho Nkulunkulu, ngato tonkhe tintfo lesinato, ngekudla kanye netingubo, kanye nangeligolide, kanye nangesiliva, kanye nangawo wonkhe umcebo lesinawo?
4.20: Bukani, nangalesi sikhatsi, benimemeta libito lakhe, nicela kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu. Ngabe uvumile yini kutsi nicele ngelite na? Cha; uwutfululile Moya wakhe etikwenu, wenta kutsi tinhlitiyo tenu tigcwaliswe ngenjabulo, waphindze wenta kutsi imilomo yenu ivalwe kute ingakwati kukhuluma, futsi ibe yinkhulu kakhulu injabulo yenu.
4.21: Manje, uma Nkulunkulu, lonidalile, lenincike kuye ngetimphilo tenu kanye nangako konkhe leninako phindze leningiko, aninika noma yini leniyicelako lelungile, ngelukholo, nikholwa kutsi niyoyitfola, Awu pho, kufaneleke kangakanani kutsi niphane ngaloko leninako.
4.22: Uma nehlulela umuntfu lowenta sicelo sakhe kini ngetintfo tenu kute angabhubhi, nimjezise, sitawulunga kangakanani senu sijeziso ngekugodla intfo yenu, lengasiyo yenu, kodvwa leyiyaNkulunkulu, lo nemphilo yenu iyakhe; futsi noko nibe ningenti sicelo, noma niphendvuke entfweni leniyentile.
4.23: Ngitsi kini, maye kuloyo muntfu, ngoba imphahla yakhe iyobhubha kanye naye; manje, ngisho leti tintfo kulabo labanotsile ngekwetintfo temhlaba.
4.24: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi kulabamphofu, nine leningenalutfo kodvwa nibe ninako lokwanele, kute niphile lusuku nelusuku; ngisho nine nonkhe lenalela siceli, ngenca yekutsi aninalutfo; ngifuna kutsi nitsi etinhlitiyweni tenu: angiphi ngenca yekutsi anginalutfo, kodvwa kube benginako bengiyokupha.
4.25: Manje, uma nikusho loku etinhlitiyweni tenu niyohlala ningenacala, ngaphandle kwaloko niyajeziswa; sijeziso senu silungile ngoba nifisa loko leningakunikwanga.
4.26: Manje, ngenca yaleti tintfo lengitikhulume kini—lokungukutsi, kute kugcinwe kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu lusuku ngelusuku, kute nihambe ningenacala phambi kwaNkulunkulu—ngifuna kutsi niphane ngaleninako kulabamphofu, wonkhe umuntfu ngaloko lanako, njengekondla labalambile, kwembatsisa labangcunu, kuvakashela labagulako kanye nekubasita kutsi bakhululeke, ngekwakamoya kanye nangekwenyama, njengekwetidzingeko tabo.
4.27: Futsi bonani kutsi tonkhe leti tintfo tentiwa ngekuhlakanipha kanye nangeluhlelo; ngoba akukafaneli kutsi umuntfu agijime ngetulu kwemandla lanawo. Ngetulu kwaloko, kudzingekile kutsi akhutsale, kute ngaloko atfole umvuzo; ngako-ke, tonkhe tintfo kufanele tentiwe ngeluhlelo.
4.28: Ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule, kutsi noma ngubani emkhatsini wenu lobolekile kumakhelwane wakhe akabuyisele intfo leyo layibolekile njengoba kadze avumile, ngaphandle kwaloko uyowenta sono; mhlawumbe uyawukwenta makhelwane wakhe kutsi ente sono naye.
4.29: Kwekugcina anginakunitjela tonkhe tintfo leningenta ngato sono; ngoba kukhona tinhlobonhlobo tetindlela kanye nemasu, letiningi kakhulu kangangekutsi anginakutibala.
4.30: Kodvwa naku lenginganitjela kona, kutsi uma ningaticapheli, kanye nemicabango yenu, kanye nemavi enu, kanye netento tenu, nigcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, nichubeke elukholweni lwaloko lenikuvile mayelana nekuta kweNKhosi, kute kube sekupheleni kwetimphilo tenu, kufanele nibhubhe. Manje, Awu muntfu, khumbula, ungabhubhi.

5.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi Bhenjamini seyikhulume kanjalo kubantfu bayo, yatfumela emkhatsini wabo, ifisa kwati kubantfu bayo kutsi ngabe bebawakholwa yini lamavi leyayiwakhulume kubo.
5.2: Bonkhe bakhala ngelivi linye, batsi: Yebo, siyawakholwa onkhe lamavi lowakhulumile kitsi; futsi ngetulu kwaloko, sati ngekweliciniso kwawo kanye nangebuciniso bawo, ngenca yaMoya weNkhosi leneMandla Onkhe, lowente lushintjo lolukhulu kitsi, noma etinhlitiyweni tetfu, kangangekutsi, sesite umdlandla wekwenta lokubi, kodvwa kwenta lokuhle njalo.
5.3: Futsi tsine, lucobo lwetfu, ngetulu kwaloko, ngekulunga kwaNkulunkulu lokungapheli, kanye netibonakaliso taMoya wakhe sinekucodza lokukhulu ngaloko lokutako; futsi kube bekudzingekile, besingaphrofetha ngato tonkhe tintfo.
5.4: Futsi lukholo lebesinalo etintfweni inkhosi yetfu lekhulume ngato kitsi lolusiletsela lolu lwati lolukhulu, ngaloko-ke siyajabula ngentfokoto lenkhulu kakhulu.
5.5: Sitimisele kungena esivumelwaneni naNkulunkulu wetfu kutsi sente intsandvo yakhe, silalele imiyaleto yakhe etintfweni tonkhe layawusiyaleta ngato, tonkhe tinsuku tetfu letisasisalele, kute singatiletseli etikwetfu kuhlupheka lokungapheli, njengoba kukhulume ingilosi, kute singanatsi enkomishini yelulaka lwaNkulunkulu.
5.6: Manje, lawa ngemavi inkhosi Bhenjamini leyayiwafisa kubo; ngako-ke yatsi kubo: Nikhulume emavi lebengiwafisa; sivumelwano lenisentile sivumelwano lesilungile.
5.7: Manje, ngenca yesivumelwano lenisentile nitobitwa ngekutsi nibantfwana baKhristu, emadvodzana akhe, kanye nemadvodzakati akhe; ngoba buka, ngalolusuku unitele ngekwakamoya; ngoba nitsi tinhlitiyo tenu tishintjile ngekukholwa egameni lakhe; ngako-ke, nitelwe nguye seningemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati akhe.
5.8: Ngaphansi kwalelibito nikhululiwe, kute lelinye libito leningakhululwa ngalo. Kute lelinye libito leliniketiwe lekungeta ngalo insindziso; ngako-ke, ngifuna kutsi nemukele kubitwa ngelibito laKhristu, nonkhe nine leningene esivumelwaneni naNkulunkulu kutsi nilalele kute kube sekupheleni kwetimphilo tenu.
5.9: Kuyawukwenteka kutsi loyo lowenta loku uyawutfolakala esandleni sangesekudla saNkulunkulu, ngoba uyawulati libito layawubitwa ngalo; ngoba uyawubitwa ngelibito laKhristu.
5.10: Manje kuyawukwenteka, kutsi loyo longayukwemukela kubitwa ngelibito laKhristu kufanele abitwe ngalelinye libito; ngaloko-ke, uyawutitfola asesandleni sangesencele saNkulunkulu.
5.11: Ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule, kutsi leli libito lengatsi ngitoninika lona lelingeke lesulwe nanini, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngenca yesiphambeko; ngako-ke, caphelani kutsi ningaphambuki kute lelibito lingesulwa etinhlitiyweni tenu.
5.12: Ngitsi kini, ngifuna kutsi nite nikhumbule kuligcina libhaliwe njalo lelibito etinhlitiyweni tenu, kute ningatfolakali ngasesandleni sangesencele saNkulunkulu, kodvwa kutsi nilive niphindze nilati livi leniyawubitwa ngalo, ngalokunjalo, nelibito layawunibita ngalo.
5.13: Ngoba umuntfu angayati kanjani inkhosi langazange ayisebentele, nalongatiwa kuyo, lokhashane nemicabango kanye netifiso tenhlitiyo yayo na?
5.14: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngabe umuntfu angayitsatsa yini imbongolo lengeyakamakhelwane wakhe ayigcine na? Ngitsi kini, Cha; angeke avume nekutsi idle emkhatsini wemhlambi wakhe, kodvwa utawuyicosha ayikhiphele ngaphandle. Ngitsi kini, kuyawuba njalo nasemkhatsini wenu uma ningalati libito lenibitwa ngalo.
5.15: Ngako-ke ngifuna kutsi nisime ninganyakatiswa, nikhule njalo ekwenteni imisebenti lemihle, kute Khristu, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu loneMandla Onkhe, anente nibe ngebakhe, kute niletfwe ezulwini, kute nizuze insindziso yaphakadze kanye nekuphila lokuphakadze, ngekuhlakanipha nangemandla, nangekulunga, kanye nangemusa waloyo lowadala tintfo tonkhe, ezulwini nasemhlabeni longuNkulunkulu longetulu kwako konkhe. Amen.

6.1: Manje, inkhosi Bhenjamini yacabanga kutsi kwakukuhle, emvakwekutsi seyicedzile kukhuluma kubantfu, kutsi itsatse emabito abo bonkhe labo labebangene esivumelwaneni naNkulunkulu kutsi bagcine imiyaleto yakhe.
6.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwakute namunye umuntfu, ngaphandle kwebantfwana labancane, longangenanga esivumelwaneni wamukela Khristu wabitwa ngelibito lakhe.
6.3: Ngetulu kwaloko, kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi Bhenjamini seyisentile siphetfo sayo tonkhe leti tintfo, seyingcwelisile indvodzana yayo Mosiya kutsi ibe ngumbusi kanye nenkhosi ngetulu kwebantfu bayo, seyiyiniketile imiyaleto mayelana nembuso, ngetulu kwaloko seyibabekile baphristi kutsi bafundzise bantfu, kute ngaloko bayive baphindze bayati imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, nekutsi babaphehlele ekukhumbuleni sifungo labasenta, yasikhulula sicuku, babuyela emuva, wonkhe umuntfu, njengekwemindeni yabo, etindlini tabo.
6.4: Mosiya wacala kubusa esikhundleni seyise. Wacala kubusa ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu eminyaka yakhe yebudzala, loku kwenta sekukonkhe, cishe iminyaka lengemakhulu lamane nemashumi lasikhombisa nesitfupha kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi ashiya eJerusalema.
6.5: Inkhosi Bhenjamini yaphila iminyaka lemitsatfu yase-iyafa.
