6.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Mosiya yahamba etindleleni teNkhosi, yatigcina tehlulelo tayo kanye nemitsetfo yayo, yayigcina imiyaleto yayo kuto tonkhe tintfo noma ngabe yini leyayimyalete ngayo.
6.7: Inkhosi Mosiya yenta bantfu bayo kutsi balime umhlabatsi. Naye ngalokunjalo, lucobo lwakhe, wawulima umhlabatsi, kute ngaloko angabi ngumtfwalo kubantfu bakhe, kute ente njengoba uyise bekentile kuto tonkhe tintfo. Akutange kube khona umbango emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bakhe sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemitsatfu.

7.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi inkhosi Mosiya seyibe nekuthula njalonjalo sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemitsatfu, yaba nesifiso sekwati mayelana nebantfu labahamba bayohlala eveni lemaLehi-Nefi, noma edolobheni lemaLehi-Nefi; ngoba bantfu bakhe bebangakeva lutfo ngabo kusukela ngesikhatsi bahamba eveni laseZarahemla.
7.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Mosiya yavuma kutsi emadvodza lacinile lalishumi nesitfupha akhuphukele eveni lemaLehi-Nefi, kuyobuta mayelana nabomnakabo.
7.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa acala kukhuphuka, kuwo kwakhukhona lomunye longu-Amoni, lobekayindvodza lecinile lenemandla, bekawesitukulwane saZarahemla, ngetulu kwaloko bekangumholi wabo.
7.4: Manje, bebangayati indlela lebekumele bahambe ngayo ehlane kukhuphukela eveni lemaLehi-Nefi; ngako ke bazulazula tinsuku letiningi ehlane, tinsuku letingemashumi lamane bazulazula.
7.5: Ngesikhatsi sebazulazule tinsuku letingemashumi lamane bafika egcumeni, lelisenyakatfo yelive laseShilomu, lapho bamisa emathende abo.
7.6: Amoni watsatsa bomnakabo labatsatfu, emabito abo kwakubo-Amalekhi, Helemi kanye naHemi, behlela entasi eveni laNefi.
7.7: Buka, bahlangana nenkhosi yebantfu labebaseveni laNefi, kanye naseveni laseShilomu, bebatungeletwe bogadzi benkhosi, batsatfwa, baboshwa, baphindze bafakwa ejele.
7.8: Futsi kwenteka emvakwekutsi sebasejele tinsuku letimbili baphindze baletfwa phambi kwenkhosi, tibopho tabo tacegiswa, bamiswa phambi kwenkhosi, bavunyelwa, noma bayaletwa, kutsi baphendvule imibuto leyayitoyibuta kubo.
7.9: Yatsi kubo: Bukani, mine nginguLimhayi, indvodzana yaNowa, lobekayindvodzana yaNefi lowakhuphuka waphuma eveni laseZarahemla kute atfole lelive njengelifa, lokwakulive laboyise, lowentiwa inkhosi ngelivi lebantfu.
7.10: Manje, ngifisa kwati sizatfu sekutsi nibe nesibindzi lesingaka sekusondzela edvute netindvonga talelidolobha, ngesikhatsi mine, lucobo lwami, benginabogadzi bami ngephandle kwelisango.
7.11: Manje, ngalesi sizatfu nginivumele kutsi nisindziswe, kute ngibute ngani, kungenjalo ngabe ngente kutsi bogadzi bami banibulale. Nivumelekile kutsi nikhulume.
7.12: Manje, ngesikhatsi Amoni abona kutsi bekavumelekile kukhuluma, waya ngaphambili wakhotsama phambi kwenkhosi; waphindze waphakama watsi: Awu nkhosi, ngiyabonga kakhulu phambi kwaNkulunkulu ngalolusuku kutsi ngisaphila, futsi ngisavunyelwe kutsi ngikhulume; ngitawutama kukhuluma ngesibindzi;
7.13: Ngoba ngicinisekile kutsi kube bewungati bewungeke uvume kutsi ngifakwe leti tibopho. Ngoba mine ngingu-Amoni, nginguwesitukulwane saZarahemla, futsi ngikhuphukile ngaphuma eveni laseZarahemla kutsi ngitobuta mayelana nabomnaketfu, Zenifi labanyusa baphuma kulelo live.
7.14: Manje, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Limhayi sekawavile lamavi ku-Amoni, wajabula kakhulu, watsi: Manje, sengiyati ngekweliciniso kutsi bomnaketfu labebaseveni laseZarahemla basaphila. Futsi manje, ngitawutfokota; kusasa ngitawukwenta kutsi bantfu bami batfokote nabo.
7.15: Ngoba buka, sisebugcilini kumaLamani, sitseliswe ngemtselo lokumatima kuwutfwala. Manje, buka, bomnaketfu batawusikhulula ebugcilini betfu, noma basikhiphe etandleni temaLamani, sitawuba tigcili tabo; ngoba kuncono kutsi sibe tigcili kumaNefi kunekutsi sikhokhe umtselo enkhosini yemaLamani.
7.16: Manje, inkhosi Limhayi yayaleta bogadzi bayo kutsi bangabe basambopha Amoni noma bomnakabo, kodvwa yenta kutsi bahambe baye egcumeni lelalisenyakatfo yaseShilomu, baletse bomnakabo edolobheni, kute ngaloko badle, banatse, batiphumute emisebentini yeluhambo lwabo; ngoba bebahlushwe tintfo letiningi; bebahlushwe yindlala, koma, kanye nekukhatsala.
7.17: Manje, kwenteka ngakusasa kutsi inkhosi Limhayi yatfumela simemetelo emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bayo, kutsi babutsane ndzawonye ethempelini, kutova emavi labekatowakhuluma.
7.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebabutsene ndzawonye yakhuluma kubo ngalendlela, itsi: Awu nine, bantfu bami, phakamisani tinhloko tenu nidvudvuteke; ngoba bukani, sikhatsi sesifikile, noma asisekho khashane kakhulu, lapho singeke sibe ngaphansi kwetitsa tetfu, nanoma bumatima betfu bubuningi, bube lite; noko ngiyetsemba busesele bumatima lobunemphumela losatawukwentiwa.
7.19: Ngako-ke, phakamisani tinhloko tenu, nitfokote, nibeke litsemba lenu kuNkulunkulu, kuloyo Nkulunkulu lobekanguNkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, na-Isaka, kanye naJakobe; loyo Nkulunkulu lowakhipha bantfwana baka-Israyeli eveni laseGibhithe, wenta kutsi bahambe badzabule Lwandle loluBovu emhlabatsini lowomile, wabondla ngemana kute bangabhubhi ehlane; futsi tiningi letinye tintfo labentela tona.
7.20: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, yena kanye loyoNkulunkulu ukhiphe bobabe betfu eveni laseJerusalema, wabagcina wabalondvolota bantfu bakhe kute kube manje; bukani, kungenca yekungalungi kanye netinengiso tetfu kutsi usiletse ebugcilini.
7.21: Nine nonkhe nibofakazi ngalolusuku, kutsi Zenifi, lowentiwa inkhosi ngetulu kwalaba bantfu, bekanenshisekelo lenkhulu kutsi atfole live laboyise, ngako-ke wakhohliswa ngebucili kanye nangemacebo enkhosi Lamani, lowatsi ekubeni angene esivumelwaneni nenkhosi Zenifi, ekubeni atinikele etandleni takhe kuphatfwa kwencenye yalelive, noma lidolobha lemaLehi-Nefi, nelidolobha laseShilomu kanye nelive lelitungeletiwe—
7.22: Konkhe loku yakwenta, ngenhloso yinye yekuletsa laba bantfu ebugcilini noma ngaphansi kwayo. Bukani, tsine ngalesi sikhatsi sikhokha umtselo enkhosini yemaLamani, lokulinani leliyincenye yinye yemmbila wetfu, kanye nemabele etfu, nako konkhe kwetfu lokuyinhlavu kwalo lonkhe luhlobo, kanye nencenye yinye yekwentalo yemhlambi wetimvu kanye nemhlambi wetinkhomo tetfu; nencenye yinye yako konkhe lesinako noma lesikuphetse inkhosi yemaLamani iyakufuna kitsi, noma timphilo tetfu.
7.23: Manje, ngabe loku akusiko matima yini kukutfwala na? Ngabe loku, akusiyo yini, inhlupheko, lenkhulu kitsi na? Manje, bukani, ngabe sikhulu kanganani sizatfu sekutsi silile na?
7.24: Yebo, ngitsi kini, tinkhulu tizatfu letenta silile; ngoba bukani bangaki bomnaketfu lababulawa, ingati yabo yacitselwa lite, konkhe ngenca yebubi.
7.25: Ngoba kube laba bantfu bebangawelanga esiphambekweni iNkhosi yayingeke ivume kutsi lobu bubi lobukhulu kangaka behlele etikwabo. Kodvwa bukani, abawalalelanga emavi ayo; kodvwa kwavuka imibango emkhatsini wabo, kangangekutsi bacitsa ingati emkhatsini wabo lucobo.
7.26: Umphrofethi weNkhosi bambulele; yebo, indvodza lekhetsiwe yaNkulunkulu, leyabatjela ngebubi babo kanye netinengiso, yaphrofetha ngetintfo letiningi letitokwenteka, yebo, nangekuta kwaKhristu.
7.27: Ngenca yekutsi watsi kubo Khristu bekanguNKulunkulu, Babe wato tonkhe tintfo, watsi uyotsatsa umfanekiso wemuntfu, kuyoba ngumfanekiso umuntfu ladalwe ngawo ekucaleni; noma ngalamanye emavi, watsi umuntfu bekadalwe ngemfanekiso waNkulunkulu, nekutsi Nkulunkulu uyokwehlela emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, atsatse umtimba wenyama nengati, futsi ahambe emhlabeni wonkhe.
7.28: Manje, ngenca yekutsi washo loku, bambulala; tiningi kakhulu tintfo labatenta letehlisela lulaka lwaNkulunkulu etikwabo. Ngako-ke, ngubani lomangalako kutsi basebugcilini, kanye nekutsi bashaywa ngetinhlupheko letibuhlungu na?
7.29: Ngoba bukani, iNkhosi itsite: Angitubasita bantfu bami ngelusuku lwesiphambeko sabo; kodvwa ngitawutibiyela tindlela tabo kute bangaphumeleli; tento tabo tiyawukuba sikhubekiso phambi kwabo.
7.30: Ngetulu kwaloko, itsi: Uma bantfu bami bayawuhlanyela kungcola bayawuvuna emakhoba abo kuso sivunguvungu; futsi umphumela waloko ngushevu.
7.31: Ngetulu kwaloko itsi: Uma bantfu bami bayawuhlanyela kungcola bayawuvuna umoya wasemphumalanga, loletsa imbubhiso ngekushesha.
7.32: Manje, bukani, setsembiso seNkhosi sigcwalisekile, nishayiwe niphindze nisetinhluphekweni.
7.33: Kodvwa uma nitawuphendvukela eNkhosini ngenhloso legcwele yenhlitiyo, nibeke litsemba lenu kuyo, niyisebentele ngako konkhe kukhutsala kwengcondvo, uma nitawukwenta loku, ngekwentsandvo nangekwesifiso sayo, itawunikhipha ebugcilini.

8.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi inkhosi Limhayi seyicedzile kukhuluma kubantfu bayo, ngoba yakhuluma letiningi tintfo kubo kodvwa timbalwa kuphela tato lengitibhalile kulencwadzi, yatjela bantfu bayo tonkhe tintfo mayelana nabomnakabo labebaseveni laseZarahemla.
8.2: Futsi yenta kutsi Amoni eme ngembili kwesicuku, asilandzise konkhe lokwakwentekile kubomnakabo kusukela ngesikhatsi lapho Zenifi ahamba aphuma kulelolive kute kube sikhatsi lapho yena lucobo ahamba aphuma kulelolive.
8.3: Ngetulu kwaloko waphindza wabalandzisa emavi ekugcina inkhosi Bhenjamini leyayibafundzisa wona, wawachaza kubantfu benkhosi Limhayi, kute bawacondze onkhe emavi leyawakhuluma.
8.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekakwentile konkhe loku, inkhosi Limhayi yasikhulula sicuku, yenta kutsi wonkhe umuntfu abuyele endlini yakhe.
8.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yenta kutsi bongcwengcwe labebacuketse umbhalo webantfu bayo kusukela ngesikhatsi besuka eveni laseZarahemla, baletfwe phambi kwa-Amoni, kute abafundze.
8.6: Manje, masinyane nje emvakwekutsi Amoni sekawufundzile lombhalo, inkhosi yafuna kwati kuye kutsi bekangakwati yini kuhumusha tilimi, Amoni wayitjela kutsi bekangeke akwati.
8.7: Inkhosi yatsi kuye: Ngekudzabuka ngenca yetinhlupheko tebantfu bami, ngenta kutsi labangemashumi lamane nakutsatfu bebantfu bami batsatse luhambo baye ehlane, kute ngaloko batfole live laseZarahemla, kute sicele kubomnaketfu kutsi basikhiphe ebugcilini.
8.8: Balahleka ehlane sikhatsi lesitinsuku letiningi, noko bebakhutsele, abalitfolanga live laseZarahemla kodvwa babuyela kulelive, sebahambe eveni lelisemkhatsini wemanti lamaningi, sebatfole live lelaligcwele ematsambo ebantfu, kanye newetilwane, ngetulu kwaloko ligcwele takhiwo letatibhidlikile talo lonkhe luhlobo, sebatfole live lebelikadze ligcwaliswe bantfu labebabaningi njengeticuku taka-Israyeli.
8.9: Futsi kufakaza kutsi tintfo lebebatishito tiliciniso babuya nabongcwengcwe labangemashumi lamabili nakune labagcwele imifanekiso lecoshiwe, futsi bebabeligolide lelimsulwa.
8.10: Buka, ngetulu kwaloko, baletse tivikelo tesifuba, letinkhulu, telitfusi kanye nekhopha, futsi tinhle kakhulu.
8.11: Ngetulu kwaloko, baletse tinkemba, tibambo tato lesetibolile, kukhalipha kwato kwasekudliwe kutfomba; kute namunye kulelive lokwatiko kuhumusha lulwimi noma imifanekiso lecoshiwe lekubongcwengcwe. Kungako-ke ngitsite kuwe: ungakwati yini kuhumusha na?
8.12: Ngiyaphindza ngitsi kuwe: kukhona yini lomatiko lokwati kuhumusha na? Ngoba ngifisa kutsi lemibhalo ihunyushelwe elulwimini lwetfu; ngoba, mhlawumbe, itawusinika lwati ngensali yalaba bantfu lababhujiswa, lapho lemibhalo yavela khona; noma, mhlawumbe, itosinika lwati ngabo labantfu lababhujiswa; nginesifiso sekwati sizatfu sekubhujiswa kwabo.
8.13: Manje Amoni watsi kuyo: Ngingakutjela ngesiciniseko, Awu nkhosi, ngemuntfu longakwati kuhumusha imibhalo; ngoba yena unaloko lakwati kubuka kuko, ahumushe yonkhe imibhalo yasendvulo; kusipho lesivela kuNkulunkulu. Letintfo tibitwa ngekutsi tihumushi, kute umuntfu lokwati kubuka kuto ngaphandle kwekutsi ayaletiwe, hleze abuke loko lokungakafaneli bese uyabhubha. Loyo loyaletwa kutsi abuke kuto, loyo ubitwa ngemboni.
8.14: Buka, inkhosi yebantfu labaseveni laseZarahemla nguye umuntfu loyaletiwe kutsi ente leti tintfo, futsi lonalesi sipho lesikhulu lesivela kuNkulunkulu.
8.16: Futsi Amoni watsi umboni ungumembuli kanye nemphrofethi; leso sipho lesikhulu kute umuntfu longaba naso, ngaphandle kwekutsi abe nemandla aNkulunkulu, lokute muntfu longaba nawo; noko umuntfu longaba nemandla lamakhulu aniketwe wona avela kuNkulunkulu.
8.17: Kodvwa umboni angati ngetintfo letendlulile, ngalokunjalo nangetintfo letisatokwenteka, ngebahumushi tonkhe tintfo tiyawukwembulwa, noma, lokungenani, tintfo letisitsekile tiyawukwentiwa tibonakale, netintfo letifihlakele tiyawukwembulwa, ngetulu kwaloko kuyawukwembulwa tintfo ngato lebetingeyawukwatiwa ngaphandle kwato.
8.18: Ngaleyondlela Nkulunkulu wente tindlela tekutsi umuntfu, ngelukholo, ente timangaliso letinkhulu; ngako-ke uba lusito lolukhulu kubantfu bakubo.
8.19: Manje, ngesikhatsi Amoni sekacedzile kukhuluma lamavi inkhosi yatfokota kakhulu, yabonga Nkulunkulu, itsi: Ngekungangabateki imfihlakalo lenkhulu icuketfwe ngekhatsi kwalaba bongcwengcwe, naleti tihumushi ngalokungangabateki tilungiswa ngenhloso yekusombulula tonkhe timfihlakalo letinje kubantfwana bebantfu.
8.20: Awu imangalisa kangakanani imisebenti yeNkhosi, kuyote kube nini ibeketelela bantfu bayo; yebo, bungakanani bumphumphutse nebumatima bekucondza kwebantfwana bebantfu; ngoba abakufuni kuhlakanipha, noma bafise kutsi kona kubabuse!
8.21: Yebo, banjengemhlambi wasendle wona lobalekela umelusi, usakateke, ubalekiswe, futsi udliwe tilwane tasendle.

9.intro: Umbhalo waZenifi—Umlandvo ngebantfu bakhe, kusukela ngesikhatsi bashiya eveni laseZarahemla kute kube sikhatsi lapho bakhululwa etandleni temaLamani.
9.1: Mine, Zenifi, ekubeni ngifundzisiwe ngalo lonkhe lulwimi lwemaNefi, nginelwati ngelive laNefi, noma live lelilifa lekucala labobabe betfu, futsi ekubeni ngitfunywe njengenhloli emkhatsini wemaLamani kute ngihlole emabutfo awo, kute libutfo letfu litseleke etikwawo phindze liwabhubhise—kodvwa ngesikhatsi ngibona loko lokwakukuhle emkhatsini wabo ngaba nesifiso sekutsi angabhujiswa.
9.2: Ngako-ke ngaphikisana nabomnaketfu ehlane, ngoba ngangifuna kutsi umbusi wetfu ente sivumelwano nawo; kodvwa ngenca yekutsi bekanelulaka futsi angumuntfu lowomela ingati wayaleta kutsi ngibulawe; kodvwa ngasindziswa kucitseka kwengati leningi; ngoba babe walwa nababe, umnakabo nemnakabo, kwate kwatsi sibalo lesikhulu selibutfo letfu labhujiswa ehlane; futsi sabuyela, labo betfu lebesisindzile, eveni laseZarahemla, kutsi siyolandzisa leyo ndzaba kubafati babo kanye nakubantfwana babo.
9.3: Futsi noko, mine nginenshisekelo lenkhulu yekutfola njengelifa live labobabe betfu, ngagcogca labaningi labebafisa kukhuphuka kuyotsatsa lelo live, futsi saphindze sacala luhambo lwetfu ehlane kukhuphukela eveni, kodvwa sabulawa yindlala kanye netinhlupheko letibuhlungu; ngoba sasephuta kukhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu.
9.4: Noko, emvakwetinsuku letiningi sizulazula ehlane samisa emathende etfu endzaweni lapho bomnaketfu bebabulawelwe khona leyayisedvute nelive labo babe betfu.
9.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaphindza ngahamba nalamane emadvodza ami kuya edolobheni, saya enkhosini, kute ngati simo senkhosi, nekutsi ngati kutsi ngangingangena yini nebantfu bami futsi ngilitsatse live ngekuthula.
9.6: Ngangena ngaya enkhosini, futsi yavumelana nami kutsi ngingalitsatsa live lemaLehi-Nefi, kanye nelive laseShilomu.
9.7: Ngetulu kwaloko yayaleta kutsi bantfu bayo besuke kulelo live, kwatsi mine nebantfu bami sahamba saya kulelive kute silitsatse.
9.8: Sacala kwakha takhiwo, kanye nekulungisa tindvonga telidolobha, yebo, tindvonga telidolobha lemaLehi-Nefi, kanye nelidolobha laseShilomu.
9.9: Sacala kulima umhlaba, yebo, ngato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlanyelo, ngetinhlanyelo temmbila, netakolo, netemabele, netinesi, neteshemu, kanye netinhlanyelo tayo yonkhe inhlobo yetitselo; futsi sacala kwandza saphindze saphumelela eveni.
9.10: Manje kwakungemacebo kanye nebucili benkhosi Lamani, kutsi iletse bantfu bami ebugcilini, kutsi iyekele lelive kute silitsatse.
9.11: Ngako-ke kwenteka, kutsi emvakwekutsi sesihleli kulelive sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lelishumi nakubili inkhosi Lamani yacala kukhatsateka, hleze bantfu bami bakhule bacine kulelive, futsi nekutsi bebangeke basakhona kubancoba baphindze babaletse ebugcilini.
9.12: Manje emaLamani bekabantfu labebangemavila futsi bakhonta tithico; ngako-ke bebanesifiso sekutsi basiletse ebugcilini, kute batitike ngemisebenti yetandla tetfu; yebo, kute batondle emihlanjini yemasimu etfu.
9.13: Ngako-ke kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Lamani yacala kuphehla bantfu bayo kutsi balwe nebantfu bami; ngako-ke kwacala kwaba khona timphi kanye nemibango kulelo live.
9.14: Ngoba, ngemnyaka welishumi nakutsatfu wekubusa kwami eveni laNefi, khashane eningizimu yelive laseShilomu, ngesikhatsi bantfu bami banatsisa baphindze badlisa imihlambi yabo, balima imihlaba yabo, libutfo lelikhulu lemaLamani latseleka etikwabo lacala kubabulala, nekubatsatsela imihlambi yabo, kanye nemmbila wemasimu abo.
9.15: Yebo, futsi kwenteka kutsi babaleka, bonkhe labo labangazange batfolwe, babalekela edolobheni laNefi, futsi bangicela kutsi ngitobavikela.
9.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabahlomisa ngebutjoki, nangemicibisholo, nangetinkemba, nangabocelemba, nangetagila, nangetilingi, kanye nangato tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali lesasingatakha, futsi mine nebantfu bami sahamba sayolwa nemaLamani.
9.17: Yebo, ngemandla eNkhosi sahamba sayolwa nemaLamani; ngoba mine nebantfu bami sakhala kakhulu eNkhosini kutsi isikhulule etandleni tetitsa tetfu, ngoba sabese sivuselwa kukhumbula ngekukhululwa kwabobabe betfu.
9.18: Nkulunkulu wakuva kukhala kwetfu futsi wayiphendvula imithandazo yetfu; sahamba ngemandla akhe, yebo, sahamba sayolwa nemaLamani, futsi ngelusuku lunye kanye nebusuku sabulala tinkhulungwane letintsatfu nemashumi lamane nakutsatfu; sawabulala sate sawacosha sawakhiphela ngephandle kwelive letfu.
9.19: Futsi mine, lucobo lwami, ngetami tandla, ngasita kungcwaba labafile bawo. Buka, ngekudzabuka lokukhulu kanye nekulila, emakhulu lamabili nemashumi lasikhombisa nemfica abomnaketfu babulawa.

10.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi saphindza sacala kwakha umbuso saphindze sahlala eveni ngekuthula. Ngenta kutsi kube khona tikhali temphi talo lonkhe luhlobo letentiwako, kute ngaloko ngibe netikhali tebantfu bami ngesikhatsi emaLamani aphindze eta kutolwa nebantfu bami.
10.2: Ngabeka bogadzi batungeleta live, kute emaLamani angaphindzi atselekele etikwetfu singakacapheli bese ayasibhubhisa; ngaleyondlela ngabavikela bantfu bami kanye nemihlambi yami, futsi ngabagcina ekuweleni etandleni tetitsa tetfu.
10.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi salitsatsa live labobabe betfu iminyaka leminingi, yebo, sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nakubili.
10.4: Ngenta kutsi emadvodza alime umhlabatsi, aphindze akhulise tonkhe tinhlobo talokuyinhlavu kanye nato tonkhe titselo letitinhlobonhlobo.
10.5: Ngenta kutsi besifazane batfunge, futsi batikhandle, basebente, bente tonkhe tinhlobo telineni lecolisakele, yebo, kanye nendvwangu leyinhlobonhlobo, kute sembatsise bungcunu betfu; ngaleyondlela saphumelela kulelive—ngaleyondlela saba nekuthula njalo kulelive sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nakubili.
10.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Lamani yafa, kwatsi indvodzana yayo yacala kubusa esikhundleni sayo. Futsi yacala kuphehla bantfu bayo kutsi bavukele bantfu bami; ngako-ke bacala kulungiselela imphi, kanye nekutohlasela bantfu bami.
10.7: Kodvwa bese ngititfumele tinhloli tami tatungeleta live laseShemloni, kute ngitfole ngekutilungiselela kwabo, kute ngibacaphele, kute bangatseleki etikwebantfu bami bababhubhise.
10.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bakhuphukela enyakatfo yelive laseShilomu, kanye nemabutfo abo lamaningi, emadvodza ahlome ngebutjoki, nangemicibisholo, nangetinkemba, nabocelemba, nangematje, kanye nangetilingi; futsi bebahhulile etinhloko tabo tate tangabi nalutfo; futsi bebabophe emabhande etikhumba atungelete tinkhalo tabo.
10.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngenta kutsi besifazane kanye nebantfwana bebantfu bami babhaciswe ehlane; ngetulu kwaloko ngenta kutsi onkhe emadvodza lamadzala ami labekakwati kuphatsa tikhali, futsi ngalokunjalo nawo onkhe emajaha ami labekakwati kuphatsa tikhali, abutsane ndzawonye kute ahambe ayokulwa nemaLamani; ngababeka ngekwetigaba tabo, wonkhe umuntfu ngekweminyaka yakhe.
10.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba sakhuphuka kutsi siyokulwa nemaLamani; futsi nanami, eminyakeni yami yebudzala, ngahamba ngakhuphuka ngayokulwa nemaLamani. Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba sakhuphuka ngemandla eNkhosi sayokulwa.
10.11: Manje, emaLamani bekangati lutfo mayelana neNkhosi, noma ngemandla eNkhosi, ngako-ke bebancike emandleni abo lucobo. Noko bebabantfu labanemandla, ngekwemandla ebantfu.
10.12: Bekatidlova, anelunya, futsi abantfu labomele ingati, akholelwa emasikweni abokhokho bawo, labengukutsi—Akholelwa kutsi wona akhishwa eveni laseJerusalema ngenca yebubi baboyise, futsi nekutsi wona aphatfwa kabi ehlane bomnakabo, ngetulu kwaloko aphatfwa kabi ngesikhatsi adzabula lwandle;
10.13: Ngetulu kwaloko, nekutsi wona aphatfwa kabi ngesikhatsi aseveni lekucala lebelilifa lawo, emvakwekutsi sekadzabule lwandle, futsi konkhe loku kungenca yekutsi Nefi bekatsembekile kakhulu ekugcineni imiyaleto yeNkhosi—ngako-ke bekatsandvwa yiNkhosi, ngoba iNkhosi yayiyiva imithandazo yakhe futsi iyiphendvula, phindze wahamba embili kulo luhambo lwabo ehlane.
10.14: Bomnakabo bamtfukutselela ngenca yekutsi bebangacondzi ngetento teNkhosi; ngetulu kwaloko bamtfukutselela emantini ngenca yekutsi batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene neNkhosi.
10.15: Ngetulu kwaloko, bamtfukutselela ngesikhatsi sebafike eveni lesetsembiso, ngenca yekutsi batsi yena utsatse kuphatfwa kwebantfu etandleni tabo; futsi bebafuna kumbulala.
10.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, bamtfukutselela ngenca yekutsi wesuka waya ehlane njengoba iNkhosi beyimyaletile, futsi watsatsa imibhalo lebeyicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfusi, ngoba batsi wabaphanga.
10.17: Ngaloko afundzise bantfwana bawo kutsi babatondze, nekutsi bababulale, nekutsi babagebenge baphindze babaphange, futsi bente konkhe labebangakwenta kutsi bababhubhise; ngako-ke banentondvo yaphakadze kubantfwana baNefi.
10.18: Ngoba ngaso lesi sizatfu inkhosi Lamani, ngemacebo akhe, kanye nebucili bemanga akhe, kanye netetsembiso takhe letihle, wangikhohlisa, kutsi ngite ngiletse labantfu bami kulelive, kute bababhubhise; yebo, futsi sihluphekile leminyaka leminingi sikulelive.
10.19: Manje mine, Zenifi, emvakwekutsi sengitishito tonkhe leti tintfo kubantfu bami mayelana nemaLamani, ngabavusetela kutsi bahambe bayokulwa ngemandla abo, babeke litsemba labo eNkhosini; ngako-ke, salwa nawo, buso nebuso.
10.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sawacosha aphuma eveni letfu; futsi sawabulala ngekubulala lokukhulu, aba maningi kangangekutsi asiwabalanga.
10.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi saphindze sabuyela eveni letfu, nebantfu bami baphindze bacala kwelusa imihlambi yabo, kanye nekulima umhlabatsi wabo.
10.22: Manje mine, sengimdzala, ngawuniketa umbuso kumunye wemadvodzana ami; ngako-ke, angisasho lutfo. Futsi shengatsi iNkhosi ingababusisa bantfu bami. Amen.

11.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi Zenifi waniketa Nowa umbuso, lomunye wemadvodzana akhe; ngako-ke Nowa wacala kubusa esikhundleni sakhe; futsi akahambanga etindleleni teyise.
11.2: Ngoba buka, akatange ayigcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kodvwa wahamba ngetifiso tenhlitiyo yakhe. Futsi bekanebafati labaningi kanye netintfombi. Wenta kutsi bantfu bakhe bone, baphindze bente loko lokwakunengekile emehlweni eNkhosi. Yebo, futsi benta bugwadla kanye nalo lonkhe luhlobo lwebubi.
11.3: Wabeka umtselo wencenye yinye kulokusihlanu kuko konkhe labebanako, incenye yinye kulokusihlanu yeligolide labo kanye nesiliva yabo, nencenye yinye kulokusihlanu yensimbi yabo leligugu, neyekhopha yabo, neyelitfusi labo kanye neyensimbi yabo; nencenye yinye kulokusihlanu yalokukhuluphalisiwe kwabo; futsi ngalokunjalo nencenye yinye kulokusihlanu yako konkhe lokuyinhlavu kwabo.
11.4: Konkhe loku wakutsatsa kute atondle yena, nebafati bakhe kanye netintfombi takhe; futsi ngalokunjalo nebaphristi bakhe, kanye nebafati babo kanye netintfombi tabo; ngako-ke besekatishintjile tindzaba tembuso.
11.5: Ngoba wabehlisa bonkhe baphristi labebagcotjwe nguyise, wagcoba labasha esikhundleni sabo, njengalabo labebaphakeme etinhlitiyweni tabo.
11.6: Yebo, futsi bondliwa ebuvileni babo, kanye nasekukhonteni kwabo tithico, kanye nasebugwadleni babo, ngemitselo inkhosi Nowa leyayiyibeke etikwebantfu bayo; ngaleyondlela bantfu basebenta kakhulu ekondleni bubi.
11.7: Yebo, futsi nabo baba ngulabakhonta tithico, ngenca yekutsi bebakhohliswe ngemavi lalite kanye nalayengako enkhosi kanye nebaphristi; ngoba bakhuluma tintfo letiyengako kubo.
11.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Nowa yakha takhiwo letiningi naletinhle kakhulu; yatihlobisa ngemsebenti lomuhle welugodvo, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letiligugu, teligolide, netesiliva, netensimbi, netelitfusi, netensimbi leligugu, kanye netekhopha;
11.9: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko watakhela sigodlo lesikhulu, kanye nesihlalo sebukhosi emkhatsini waso, konkhe lokwakungekwesigodvo lesihle kwakuhlotjiswa ngeligolide nangesiliva kanye nangetintfo letiligugu.
11.10: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko wenta kutsi tisebenti takhe tente tonkhe tinhlobo temsebenti lomuhle ngekhatsi kwetindvonga telithempeli, ngesigodvo lesihle, nangekhopha, kanye nangelitfusi.
11.11: Futsi tihlalo letatibekelwe baphristi labakhulu, letatingetulu kunato tonkhe letinye tihlalo, watihlobisa ngeligolide lelimsulwa, futsi wenta kutsi kwakhiwe ludvonga phambi kwato kuphakama kwalo kuma esifubeni kute baphumute imitimba yabo kanye nemikhono yabo kulo ngesikhatsi bakhuluma emanga kanye nemavi lalite kubantfu bakhe.
11.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakha umbhoshongo dvute nelithempeli; yebo, umbhoshongo lomudze kakhulu, lomudze ngendlela yekutsi bekangakwati kuma etulu kwesicongo sawo abuke live laseShilomu, ngalokunjalo nelive laseShemloni, lokwakungelemaLamani; futsi bekangakwati kubuka live ndzawotonkhe.
11.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wenta kutsi kwakhiwe takhiwo letiningi eveni laseShilomu; wenta kutsi kwakhiwe umbhoshongo lomkhulu egcumeni lelalisenyakatfo yelive laseShilomu, lebekuyindzawo yekuphumula yebantfwana baNefi ngesikhatsi babaleka baphuma eveni; futsi loku wakwenta ngemcebo lawutfola ngemtselo webantfu bakhe.
11.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabeka inhlitiyo yakhe emcebeni wakhe, wacitsa sikhatsi sakhe ngekuhlala ngesiphitsiphitsi nebafati bakhe kanye netintfombi takhe; futsi ngalokunjalo nebaphristi bakhe bacitsa sikhatsi sabo netingwadla.
11.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wahlanyela tivini tatungeleta live; wakha tikhamo teliwayini, wenta liwayini leliningi; ngako-ke waba ngumnatsi weliwayini, kanjalo nebantfu bakhe.
11.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani acala kuhlasela bantfu bakhe, afikela labalinani lelincane, ababulalela emasimini abo, nangesikhatsi beluse imihlambi yabo.
11.17: Futsi inkhosi Nowa yatfumela bogadzi batungeleta live kute awagcine akhashane; kodvwa ayitfumelanga linani lelanele, emaLamani atseleka etikwabo ababulala, futsi achuba imihlambi leminingi yabo ayikhipha eveni; ngako-ke emaLamani acala kubabhubhisa, kanye nekusebentisa inzondo yawo kubo.
11.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Nowa yatfumela emabutfo ayo kuyokulwa nawo, futsi bawabuyisela emuva, noma bawabuyisela emuva kwesikhashana; ngako-ke, babuyela emuva batfokotile emphangweni yabo.
11.19: Manje, ngenca yaloku kuncoba lokukhulu baphakama ngekutigcabha kwetinhlitiyo tabo, batigabatisa ngemandla abo, basho nekutsi labangemashumi lasihlanu babo bangamelana netinkhulungwane temaLamani; futsi batikhukhumeta ngalendlela, bajabula ngengati, kanye nangekucitseka kwengati yabomnakabo, loku bakwenta ngenca yebubi benkhosi yabo kanye nebaphristi.
11.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwakukhona indvodza emkhatsini wabo libito layo kwakungu-Abinadi; wahamba emkhatsini wabo, wacala kuphrofetha, atsi: Bukani, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, ingiyalete ngalendlela, itsi, Hamba, utsi kulabantfu, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi—Maye kulaba bantfu, ngoba ngitibonile tinengiso tabo, nebubi babo, kanye nebugwadla babo; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngitawubahambela ngentfukutselo yami.
11.21: Futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke baphindze babuyele eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, buka ngitawubanikela etandleni tetitsa tabo; yebo, futsi bayawuletfwa ebugcilini; futsi bayawuhlushwa ngesandla setitsa tabo.
11.22: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi bayawukwati kutsi mine ngiyiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, futsi nginguNkulunkulu lonesikhwele, ngiyabuhambela bubi bebantfu bami.
11.23: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi labantfu baphendvuke futsi babuyele eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, bayawuletfwa ebugcilini; futsi kute namunye loyawubakhulula, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu Somandla.
11.24: Yebo, futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bakhala kimi ngitawuphuta kukuva kukhala kwabo; yebo, futsi ngitawuvumela kutsi bashaywe titsa tabo.
11.25: Futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngesembatfo selisaka kanye nemlotsa, futsi bakhale kakhulu eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, angeke ngiyive imithandazo yabo, noma ngibakhulule etinhluphekweni tabo; futsi naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, futsi ingiyalete kanje.
11.26: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Abinadi sekawakhulumile lamavi kubo bamtfukutselela, bafuna kutsatsa imphilo yakhe; kodvwa iNkhosi yamkhulula etandleni tabo.
11.27: Manje ngesikhatsi inkhosi Nowa seyivile ngalamavi labekakhulunywe ngu-Abinadi kubantfu, nayo ngalokunjalo yatfukutsela; yatsi: Ngubani Abinadi, kutsi tsine nebantfu bami singahlulelwa nguye, noma ngubani iNkhosi, leyawuletsa etikwebantfu bami inhlupheko lenkhulu kangaka na?
11.28: Nginiyaleta kutsi niletse Abinadi lapha, kute ngimbulale, ngoba usho letintfo kute aphehle bantfu bami kutsi batfukutselelane nguloyo kulomunye, noma avuse imibango emkhatsini webantfu bami; ngako-ke ngitawumbulala.
11.29: Manje emehlo ebantfu bekaphumphutsekisiwe, ngako-ke batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene nemavi a-Abinadi, futsi kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili bafuna kumbamba. Futsi iNkhosi Nowa yayenta lukhuni inhlitiyo yayo ngalokumelene nemavi eNkhosi, futsi ayiphendvukanga etentweni tayo tebubi.

12.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwesikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lemibili Abinadi wafika emkhatsini wabo atifihlile, kangangoba abatange bamati, futsi wacala kuphrofetha emkhatsini wabo, atsi: INkhosi ingiyalete kanje, itsi—Abinadi, hamba uphrofethe kulaba bantfu bami, ngoba batente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene nemavi ami; abaphendvukanga etentweni tabo letimbi; ngako-ke, ngitawubahambela ngentfukutselo yami, yebo, ngentfukutselo yelulaka lwami ngitawubahambela ebubini kanye nasetinengisweni tabo.
12.2: Yebo, maye kulesi situkulwane! Futsi iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Yelula sandla sakho uphrofethe, utsi: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, kuyawukwenteka kutsi lesi situkulwane, ngenca yebubi baso lobukhulu, siyawuletfwa ebugcilini, futsi siyawushaywa esihlatsini; yebo, siyawucoshwa bantfu, siphindze sibulawe; futsi emangce asemoyeni, netinja, yebo, kanye netilwane tasendle, tiyawuyishwabudzela inyama yaso.
12.3: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi imphilo yenkhosi Nowa iyawuba lite njengengubo esitsandvweni lesishisako; ngoba uyawukwati kutsi mine ngiyiNkhosi.
12.4: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngitawubashaya laba bantfu bami ngetinhlupheko letibuhlungu, yebo, ngendlala kanye namashayabhuce wesifo; futsi ngitawukwenta kutsi bahhewule imini yonkhe.
12.5: Yebo, futsi ngitawukwenta kutsi babe nemitfwalo leboshelwe emihlane yabo; futsi bayawuchutjelwa phambili njengembongolo lesimungulu.
12.6: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngitawutfumela sangcotfo emkhatsini wabo, futsi siyawubashaya; ngetulu kwaloko bayawushaywa ngumoya wasemphumalanga; tilokatane tiyawukhatsata live labo futsi, tishwabudzele lokuyinhlavu kwabo.
12.7: Futsi bayawushaywa ngamashayabhuce wesifo lesikhulu—futsi konkhe loku ngitawukwenta ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tabo.
12.8: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngitawubabhubhisa nya emhlabeni; noko bayawushiya umbhalo emvakwabo, ngitawugcinela letinye tive letiyawutfola lelive; yebo, naloku ngitawukwenta kute ngivete tinengiso talaba bantfu kuletinye tive. Futsi tiningi tintfo Abinadi latiphrofetha ngalokumelene nalabantfu.
12.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bamtfukutselela; bamtsatsa bamtfwala bambophile bamyisa phambi kwenkhosi, batsi enkhosini: Buka, siletse indvodza phambi kwakho lephrofethe bubi mayelana nebantfu bakho, itsi Nkulunkulu utawubabhubhisa.
12.10: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko iphrofethe bubi mayelana nemphilo yakho, itsi imphilo yakho iyawuba njengegubo esitsandvweni semlilo.
12.11: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, itsite wena uyawuba njengeluhlanga, ngisho njengeluhlanga lolomile lwensimu, lakugijima tilwane ngetulu kwalo futsi lugcotjwagcotjwe phansi kwetinyawo.
12.12: Ngetulu kwaloko, itsi wena uyawuba njengembali yelugagane, lokutsi, uma seyivutsiwe ngalokuphelele, uma umoya uvunguta, ipheshulelwe etikwelive lonkhe. Futsi yenta shengatsi yiNkhosi lekukhulumile loko. Itsi konkhe loku kuyawuta kuwe ngaphandle kwekutsi uphendvuke, futsi loku kungenca yebubi bakho.
12.13: Manje, Awu nkhosi, bubi buni lobukhulu lobentile, noma tono tini letinkhulu letentiwe bantfu bakho, kutsi tsine sijeziswe nguNkulunkulu noma sehlulelwe ngulendvodza na?
12.14: Manje, Awu nkhosi, buka, tsine asinacala, nawe kanjalo, Awu nkhosi, awutange wone; ngako-ke, lendvodza icambe emanga mayelana nawe, futsi iphrofethe ngelite.
12.15: Buka, tsine sicinile, ngeke siye ebugcilini, noma sitsatfwe sitfunjwe titsa tetfu; yebo, futsi wena uphumelele kulelive, ngetulu kwaloko usatophumelela.
12.16: Buka, nayi lendvodza, siyiletsa kutakho tandla; ungenta noma yini kuyo loko lokubonakala kukuhle kuwe.
12.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Nowa yenta kutsi Abinadi aphoswe ejele; waphindze wayaleta kutsi baphristi babutsane ndzawonye kute ibambe umhlangano nabo kutsi yenteni ngaye.
12.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batsi enkhosini: Mletse lapha kute simbute; inkhosi yayaleta kutsi akaletfwe phambi kwabo.
12.19: Bacala kumbuta, kute bamphice, kute ngaloko babe naloko labangambeka licala ngako; kodvwa wabaphendvula ngesibindzi, wayimela yonkhe imibuto yabo, yebo, bate bamangala nabo; ngoba wamelana nabo kuyo yonkhe imibuto yabo, wabancoba ngenkhulumo kuwo onkhe emavi abo.
12.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lomunye wabo watsi kuye: Asho kutsini lamavi labhaliwe, lafundziswe bobabe betfu, batsi:
12.21: Tinhle kangakanani etikwetintsaba tinyawo taloyo loletsa tindzaba letimnandzi; lomemetela kuthula; loletsa tindzaba letimnandzi tebuhle; lomemetela insindziso; lotsi kuSiyoni, Nkulunkulu wakho uyabusa;
12.22: Balindzi bakho bayawuphakamisa livi; ngelivi linye bayawuhlabela; ngoba bayawutibonela ngewabo emehlo lapho iNkhosi iphindza iletsa iSiyoni;
12.23: Hlokomani ngekujabula; hlabelelani kanyekanye nine tindzawo letitindzala taseJerusalema; ngoba iNkhosi ibadvudvutile bantfu bayo, iyihlengile iJerusalema;
12.24: INkhosi yembule sandla sayo lesingcwele emehlweni ato tokhe tive, futsi yonkhe imikhawulo yemhlaba iyawuyibona insidziso yaNkulunkulu wetfu na?
12.25: Manje Abinadi watsi kubo: Ngabe nibaphristi na, futsi nenta shengatsi nifundzisa laba bantfu, futsi nekutsi niyacondza ngamoya wekuphrofetha, kodvwa nifisa kwati kimi kutsi leti tintfo tisho kutsini?
12.26: Ngitsi kini, maye kini ngoba nigucule tindlela teNkhosi! Ngoba uma niticondza leti tintfo anitange nitifundzise; ngako-ke, nigucule tindlela teNkhosi.
12.27: Anitange nifise etinhlitiyweni tenu kucondza; ngako-ke, anibanga nako kuhlakanipha. Ngako-ke, nibafundzisani laba bantfu na?
12.29: Watsi kubo: Uma nifundzisa umtsetfo waMosi pho kuya ngani ningawugcini na? Kuya ngani nibeke tinhlitiyo tenu etikwemcebo na? Kuya ngani nenta bugwadla futsi nicitsa emandla enu netingwadla, yebo, nenta labantfu kutsi bente sono, kangangekutsi iNkhosi ibe nesizatfu sekungitfumela kutsi ngiphrofethe ngalokumelene nalaba bantfu, yebo, nangebubi lobukhulu ngalokumelene nalaba bantfu na?
12.30: Anati yini kutsi ngikhuluma liciniso na? Yebo, niyati kutsi ngikhuluma liciniso; futsi nifanele kutfutfumela phambi kwaNkulunkulu.
12.31: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi niyawushaywa ngenca yebubi benu, ngoba nitsite nifundzisa umtsetfo waMosi. Futsi natini mayelana nemtsetfo waMosi na? Ngabe insindziso ita ngemtsetfo waMosi? Nitsini?
12.32: Baphendvula batsi insindziso yeta ngemtsetfo waMosi.
12.33: Kodvwa manje Abinadi watsi kubo: Ngiyati kutsi uma nigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu nitawusindziswa; yebo, uma nigcina imiyaleto iNkhosi leyayiletsa kuMosi entsabeni yaseSinayi, letsi:
12.34: NgiyiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho, lokukhiphe eveni laseGibhithe, wakukhipha emtini webugcili.
12.35: Angeke ube nalomunye Nkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami.
12.36: Ungatenteli sitfombe lesibatiwe, noma umfanekiso wanoma yini lesezulwini ngetulu, noma tintfo letisemhlabeni ngaphansi.
12.37: Manje Abinadi watsi kubo, Ngabe nikwentile konkhe loku na? Ngitsi kini, Cha, anikakwenti. Futsi ngabe nibafundzisile yini laba bantfu kutsi kumele bente tonkhe leti tintfo na? Ngitsi kini, Cha, anitange.

13.1: Manje ngesikhatsi inkhosi seyiwavile lamavi, yatsi kubaphristi bayo: Susani lomfokati, nimbulale, ngoba singentani ngaye, ngoba uyahlanya.
13.2: Futsi beta ngaphambili betama kumbamba ngetandla tabo; kodvwa wamelana nabo, watsi kubo:
13.3: Ningangitsintsi, ngoba Nkulunkulu utonishaya uma nibeka tandla tenu kimi, ngoba angikawendlulisi umlayeto iNkhosi lengitfume kutsi ngiwuletse; futsi angikanitjeli ngaloko lenicele kutsi nginitjele kona; ngako-ke, Nkulunkulu angeke avume kutsi ngibhujiswe ngalesi sikhatsi.
13.4: Kodvwa kufanele ngigcwalise imiyaleto Nkulunkulu langiyalete ngayo; futsi ngenca yekutsi nginitjele liciniso ningitfukutselele. Ngetulu kwaloko, ngenca yekutsi ngikhulume livi laNkulunkulu ningehlulele ngekutsi ngiyahlanya.
13.5: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Abinadi sekawakhulumile lamavi bantfu benkhosi Nowa abalokotsanga babeka tandla tabo kuye, ngoba Moya weNkhosi wawusetikwakhe, futsi buso bakhe bakhanya ngenkhatimulo lenkhulu, njengebaMosi ngesikhatsi asentsabeni yaseSinayi, ngesikhatsi akhuluma neNkhosi.
13.6: Futsi wakhuluma ngemandla nangeligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu; wachubeka nemavi akhe, watsi:
13.7: Niyabona kutsi nite emandla ekungibulala, ngako-ke ngiyawucedzela umlayeto wami. Yebo, futsi ngiyacondza kutsi kuyanidzabula etinhlitiyweni tenu ngenca yekutsi nginitjela liciniso mayelana nebubi benu.
13.8: Yebo, futsi emavi ami anigcwalisa ngekumangala nekwetfuka, nangentfukutselo.
13.9: Kodvwa ngiyawucedzela umlayeto wami; futsi emvakwaloko akunandzaba kutsi ngiyakuphi, uma nje kusho kutsi ngiyasindziswa.
13.10: Kodvwa nguloku lenginitjela kona, lenikwentako ngami, emvakwaloku, kuyakuba njengesibonakaliso kanye nemfanekiso wetintfo letitokwenteka.
13.11: Manje nginifundzela imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu lesele, ngoba ngiyacondza kutsi ayikabhalwa etinhlitiyweni tenu; ngiyacondza kutsi nifundzile futsi nafundzisa bubi sikhatsi lesiningi setimphilo tenu.
13.12: Manje, niyakhumbula kutsi ngitse kini: Ungatenteli noma ngusiphi sithico lesibatiwe, noma ngabe ngumuphi umfanekiso walokusezulwini etulu, noma walokusemhlabeni ngaphansi, noma walokusemantini ngaphansi kwemhlaba.
13.13: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko: Ungatikhotsameli, noma utikhonte; ngoba mine iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho nginguNkulunkulu lonesikhwele, ngihambela bubi baboyise kubantfwana, kuso situkulwane sesitsatfu kanye nesesine salabo labangizondako.
13.14: Futsi ngikhombisa umusa kulabatinkhulungwane balabo labangitsandzako nalabagcina imiyaleto yami.
13.15: Ungaliphatsi ngelite libito leNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho; ngoba iNkhosi angeke imtfole angenacala lophatsa ngelite libito lakhe.
13.17: Tinsuku letisitfupha uyawusebenta, wente ngato wonkhe umsebenti wakho;
13.18: Kodvwa lusuku lwesikhombisa, lisabatha leNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho, ungenti noma ngangumuphi umsebenti, wena, noma indvodzana yakho, noma indvodzakati yakho, nesisebenti sakho lesidvuna, noma sisebenti sakho lesisikati, noma tinkhomo takho, noma ngabe ngusiphi sihambi lesingekhatsi kwelisango lakho.
13.19: Ngoba ngetinsuku letisitfupha iNkhosi yenta lizulu nemhlaba, nelwandle, kanye nako konkhe lokukuko; ngaloko-ke iNkhosi yalubusisa lusuku lwesabatha, futsi yalungcwelisa.
13.20: Hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko, kute tinsuku takho tandze eveni iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho lekunike lona.
13.24: Ungayihawukeli indlu yamakhelwane wakho, ungamhawukeli nemfati wamakhelwane wakho, noma sisebenti sakhe lesidvuna, noma sisebenti sakhe lesisikati, noma inkhabi yakhe, noma imbongolo yakhe, noma yini lengeyamakhelwane wakho.
13.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Abinadi sekayicedzile lenkhulumo watsi kubo: Ngabe nibafundzisile yini laba bantfu kutsi betame kwenta tonkhe leti tintfo kute bayigcine lemiyaleto na?
13.26: Ngitsi kini, Cha; ngoba kube nikwentile loko, iNkhosi beyingeke ingente kutsi ngite lapha futsi ngiphrofethe ngebubi mayelana nalaba bantfu.
13.27: Manje nitsi insindziso ita ngemtsetfo waMosi. Ngitsi kini kudzingekile kutsi niwugcine umtsetfo waMosi kwamanje; kodvwa ngitsi kini, sikhatsi siyawufika lapho kungasayudzingeka nanini kugcina umtsetfo waMosi.
13.28: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi kini, insindziso ayiti ngemtsetfo kuphela, futsi kube kwakungasiko ngenca yenhlawulo, leyo Nkulunkulu lucobo lwakhe layawuyenta ngenca yetono kanye nebubi bebantfu bakhe, kute babhubhe ngekungavimbeleki, nanoma kukhona umtsetfo waMosi.
13.29: Manje ngitsi kini kwakudzingekile kutsi kube khona umtsetfo loniketwa bantfwana baka-Israyeli, yebo, umtsetfo locine kakhulu; ngoba bebabantfu labebanetinhloko letilukhuni, bashesha kwenta bubi, futsi baphuta kukhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo;
13.30: Ngako-ke kukhona umtsetfo lebebanikwe wona, yebo, umtsetfo wetento kanye netimiso, umtsetfo lebekumele bawugcine ngebucotfo lusuku nelusuku, kute bagcinwe ekukhumbuleni Nkulunkulu kanye nemsebenti wabo kuye.
13.31: Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi kini, tonkhe leti tintfo tatitibonakaliso tetintfo letatitokuta.
13.32: Manje, ngabe bawucondza yini lomtsetfo na? Ngitsi kini, Cha, abawucondzanga bonkhe lomtsetfo; futsi loku kungenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo; ngoba abacondzanga kutsi akunakuba khona namunye umuntfu losidziswako ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngekuhlengwa nguNkulunkulu.
13.33: Ngoba bukani, ngabe Mosi akaphrofethanga yini kubo mayelana nekuta kwaMesiya, kanye nekutsi Nkulunkulu uyohlenga bantfu bakhe na? Yebo, futsi bonkhe baphrofethi baphrofetha kusukela ekucaleni kwemhlaba—ngabe abakhulumanga yini ngaloko lokutsi akufane naleti tintfo na?
13.34: Ngabe abashongo yini kutsi Nkulunkulu lucobo lwakhe uyowehlela phansi emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, atsatse simo semuntfu, futsi ahambe ngemandla lamakhulu etikwemhlaba wonkhe na?
13.35: Yebo, ngabe abashongo yini kutsi uyokwenta kube khona kuvuka kwalabafile, nekutsi yena, lucobo lwakhe, uyocindzetelwa futsi ahlushwe na?

14.1: Yebo, Isaya akashongo yini kutsi: Ngubani lokholwe ngumbiko wetfu, futsi umkhono weNkhosi wembulelwe bani na?
14.2: Ngoba uyawukhula phambi kwakhe njengelihlumela lelitsambile, futsi nanjengemphandze lephuma emhlabatsini lowomile; akanasimo noma buhle; futsi ngesikhatsi sesimbona kute buhle lesiyobe sesibufuna kute simtsandze.
14.3: Udzelelwe futsi waliwa bantfu; umuntfu wetinsizi, futsi lowatiko ngekuhlupheka; futsi sibufihlile buso betfu kuye; wadzelelwa, futsi asimatisanga.
14.4: Ngempela utetfwele tinsizi tetfu, futsi wakwetjatsa kuhlupheka kwetfu; kodvwa tsine sayitsatsa ngekutsi umukuliwe, ushaywe nguNkulunkulu, futsi uhlushiwe.
14.5: Kodvwa walinyatwa ngenca yetiphambeko tetfu, futsi wafihlitwa ngenca yekona kwetfu, sijeziso saba setikwakhe; futsi ngemanceba emivimbo yakhe siyaphiliswa.
14.6: Sonkhe, njengetimvu, sidukile; nguloyo naloyo utihambela endleleni yakhe; futsi iNkhosi yetfwese yena kona kwetfu sonkhe.
14.7: Wacindzetelwa, futsi wahlushwa, kodvwa akawuvulanga umlomo wakhe; uletfwa njengemvana ekuhlatjweni, nanjengemvu phambi kwebahhuli bayo isimungulu kanjalo akawuvulanga umlomo wakhe.
14.8: Wakhishwa ejele kanye nasekwehlulelweni; futsi ngubani loyomemetela situkulwane sakhe na? Ngoba wancunywa eveni lalabaphilako; ngenca yetono tebantfu bami washaywa.
14.9: Futsi walibeka lithuna lakhe kanye nalababi, futsi kanye nalonjingile ekufeni kwakhe; noma yena angazange ente bubi, noma kwakungekho nemacebo emlonyeni wakhe.
14.10: Noko kwaba yintsandvo yeNkhosi kutsi alinyatwe; yamfaka elusizini, uma ungenta umphefumulo wakhe umnikelo wesono, yena uyoyibona intalelwane yakhe, uyawutelula tinsuku takhe, futsi intsandvo yeNkhosi iyawuphumelela esandleni sakhe.
14.11: Uyawububona buhlungu bemphefumulo wakhe, futsi uyawuneliswa; ngelwati lwayo inceku yami lelungile iyawubatfola bangenacala labaningi; ngoba uyawubutfwala bubi babo.
14.12: Ngako-ke ngitawumabela sabelo kanye nalabakhulu, futsi uyawuhlukanisa imphango nalabanemandla; ngoba uwutfululile umphefumulo wakhe ekufeni; futsi wabalwa kanye netoni; futsi watitfwala tono talabaningi, futsi watincengela toni.

15.1: Manje Abinadi watsi kubo: Ngifuna kutsi nicondze kutsi Nkulunkulu lucobo lwakhe uyawukwehlela phansi emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, futsi uyawubahlenga bantfwana bakhe.
15.2: Futsi ngenca yekutsi asenyameni uyawubitwa ngekutsi uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, futsi asente inyama yaba ngaphansi kwentsandvo yaBabe, unguBabe aphindze abe yiNdvodzana—
15.3: UnguYise, ngenca yekutsi watalwa ngemandla aNkulunkulu; futsi uyiNdvodzana ngenca yenyama; ngaleyondlela uba nguBabe kanye neNdvodzana—
15.4: Futsi banguNkulunkulu munye, yebo, yena kanye Babe waPhakadze wasezulwini kanye nasemhlabeni.
15.5: Ngako-ke inyama iba ngaphansi kwaMoya, noma iNdvodzana iba ngaphansi kwaBabe, banguNkulunkulu munye, lowahlushwa kulingwa, futsi akakuvumelanga kulingwa, kodvwa wavumela kutsi aphukutwe, abhacabulwe, acoshwe, futsi aphikwe bantfu bakhe.
15.6: Futsi emvakwakokonkhe loku, emvakwekwenta timangaliso letiningi letinkhulu emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, uyawuholwa, yebo, njengoba Isaya watsi, njengemvu phambi kwemhhuli isimungulu, njengoba kushiwo akawuvulanga umlomo wakhe.
15.7: Yebo, njengoba kushiwo naye uyawuholwa, abetselwe, futsi abulawe, inyama ibe ngaphansi kwekufa, intsandvo yeNdvodzana igwinywe yintsandvo yaBabe.
15.8: Futsi ngaleyondlela Nkulunkulu uyawutidzabula tibopho tekufa, asatfole kuncoba ngetulu kwekufa; anike iNdvodzana emandla kutsi incengele bantfwana bebantfu—
15.9: Asanyukele ezulwini, anebubele benhlitiyo, agcwaliswe ngemusa kubantfwana bebantfu; eme emkhatsini wabo kanye nekulunga; atidzabulile tibopho tekufa, atfwale bubi babo kanye netiphambeko tabo, abahlengile, futsi wanelisa tidzingeko tekulunga.
15.10: Manje ngitsi kini, ngubani loyawumemetela situkulwane sakhe na? Buka, ngitsi kini, uma umphefumulo wakhe sewentiwe umnikelo wesono uyawuyibona intalelwane yakhe. Manje nitsini na? Futsi ngubani loyawukuba yintalelwane yakhe na?
15.11: Bukani ngitsi kini, loyo lowavile emavi ebaphrofethi, yebo, bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele labaphrofetha mayelana nekuta kweNkhosi—Ngitsi kini, bonkhe labo labawalalela emavi abo, futsi bakholwa kutsi iNkhosi iyawubahlenga bantfu bayo, futsi balindzela lolosuku lwekutsetselelwa kwetono tabo, ngitsi kini, ngulaba labayintalelwane yakhe, noma labatindlalifa tembuso waNkulunkulu.
15.12: Ngoba ngibo laba tono tabo latitfwala; ngibo laba labafela, kubahlenga etiphambekweni tabo. Manje, ngabe abasiyo yini intalelwane yakhe na?
15.13: Yebo, futsi ngabe akusibo yini baphrofethi, wonkhe umphrofethi lovule umlomo wakhe waphrofetha, longawelanga esiphambekweni, ngisho bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele kusukela ekucaleni kwemhlaba na? Ngitsi kini bayintalelwane yakhe.
15.14: Futsi laba ngibo labamemetele kuthula, labaletse tindzaba letimnandzi, labamemetele insindziso; futsi batsi kuyo iSiyoni: Nkulunkulu wakho uyabusa!
15.15: Futsi Awu tatitinhle kanganani etikwetintsaba tinyawo tabo!
15.16: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, tinhle kanganani etikwetintsaba tinyawo talabo namanje labamemetela kuthula!
15.17: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, tinhle kanganani etikwetintsaba tinyawo talabo lokuyawutsi emvakwaloku bamemetele kuthula, yebo, kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuchubeka futsi ingunaphakadze.
15.18: Futsi bukani, ngitsi kini, akusiko loku kuphela. Ngoba Awu tinhle kanganani etikwetintsaba tinyawo taloyo loletsa tindzaba letimnandzi, loyo longumsunguli wekuthula, yebo, neNkhosi, lehlenge bantfu bayo; yebo, leletse insindziso kubantfu bayo;
15.19: Ngoba kube bekungasiko ngenca yekuhlengwa leyakwentela bantfu bayo, lokwalungiswa kusukela esisekelweni semhlaba, ngitsi kini, uma bekungasiko ngenca yaloku, bonkhe bantfu bekufanele babhubhe.
15.20: Kodvwa bukani, tibopho tekufa tiyawudzatjulwa, futsi iNdvodzana iyabusa, futsi inemandla ngetulu kwalabafile; ngako-ke, ifeza kuvuka kwalabafile.
15.21: Futsi kuta kuvuka, kuvuka kwekucala; yebo, kuvuka kwalabo labebakhona, kanye nalabo labakhona, kanye nalabo labayawuba khona, kute kube kuvuka kwaKhristu—ngoba uyawubitwa kanjalo.
15.22: Manje, kuvuka kwabo bonkhe baphrofethi, kanye nabo bonkhe labo labakholelwa emavini abo, noma bonkhe labo labagcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, bayawuphuma ngekuvuka kwekucala; ngako-ke bakuvuka kwekucala.
15.23: Bavuselwa kutsi bahlale naNkulunkulu lobahlengile; ngaleyondlela banekuphila lokuphakadze kuKhristu, lodzabule tibopho tekufa.
15.24: Futsi laba ngibo labanesabelo ekuvukeni kwekucala; futsi ngibo laba labafe ngaphambi kwekufika kwaKhristu, basekungatini, bangatfolanga kutsi insindziso imenyetelwe kubo. Futsi ngaleyondlela iNkhosi ifeza kubuyiselwa kwalaba; futsi banesabelo ekuvukeni kwekucala, noma banekuphila lokuphakadze, bahlengwa yiNkhosi.
15.25: Futsi bantfwana labancane nabo banekuphila lokuphakadze.
15.26: Kodvwa bukani, nesabe, nitfutfumele phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ngoba kumele nitfutfumale; ngoba iNkhosi ayihlengi namunye lonjengalabo labamhlubukako futsi nalabafa basetonweni tabo; yebo, bonkhe labo lababhubha basetonweni tabo kusukela kwadzabuka umhlaba, labahlubuka ngemabomu kuNkulunkulu, labebayati imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kodvwa bangayigcini; ngibo laba labangenasabelo ekuvukeni kwekucala.
15.27: Ngako-ke akukameli yini nitfutfumale na? Ngoba insindziso ayiti nakumunye lonjalo; ngoba iNkhosi ayihlenganga namunye lonjalo; yebo, futsi angeke iNkhosi imhlenge lonjalo; ngoba ayinakutiphikisa; ngoba ayitukwalela kulunga uma sekutsatsa indzawo yako.
15.28: Manje ngitsi kini sikhatsi siyawufika lapho insindziso yeNkhosi iyawumenyetelwa kuto tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi kanye nakubantfu.
15.29: Yebo, Nkhosi, balindzi bakho bayawuphakamisa emavi abo; ngelivi kanyekanye bayawuhlabelela; ngoba bayawubona ngewabo emehlo, ngesikhatsi iNkhosi seyibuyisa iSiyoni futsi.
15.30: Hlokomani ngenjabulo, hlabelelani kanyekanye, nine mave latindzala aseJerusalema; ngoba iNkhosi ibadvudvutile bantfu bayo, iyihlengile iJerusalema.
15.31: INkhosi iwembulile umkhono wayo emehlweni ato tonkhe tive; futsi yonkhe imikhawulo yemhlaba iyawuyibona insindziso yaNkulunkulu wetfu.

16.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Abinadi sekakhulume lamavi welula sandla sakhe watsi: Sikhatsi siyeta lapho bonkhe bayawuyibona insindziso yeNkhosi; lapho tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nebantfu bayawubona ngewabo emehlo futsi bayawuvuma phambi kwaNkulunkulu kutsi tehlulelo takhe tilungile.
16.2: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi lababi bayawucoshwa, futsi bayawukuba nesizatfu sekuhhewula, nesekukhala, nesekulila, kanye nesekugedletela kwematinyo abo; futsi loku kuyawuba ngenca yekutsi abalilalelanga livi leNkhosi; ngako-ke iNkhosi ayibahlengi.
16.3: Ngoba banaka inyama futsi banebudeveli, futsi develi unemandla ngetulu kwabo; yebo, leyo nyoka lendzala leyakhohlisa batali betfu bekucala, leyaba sizatfu sekuwa kwabo; lokwaba sizatfu seluntfu lonkhe kutsi lunake inyama, nemizwa, lube nebudeveli, lwati lokubi kulokuhle, lwatibeka ngaphansi kwekulawulwa ngudeveli.
16.4: Ngaleyondlela lonkhe luntfu lwalahleka; buka, lwaluyawulahleka ngalokungapheli kube bekungasiko kutsi Nkulunkulu wabahlenga bantfu bakhe ekulahlekeni kwabo kanye nasesimeni sabo sekuwa.
16.5: Kodvwa khumbulani kutsi loyo lophikelelako esimeni sakhe semvelo yasemhlabeni, achubeke etindleleni tesono futsi ahlubuke kuNkulunkulu, uhlala asesimeni sakhe sekuwa futsi develi uba nemandla onkhe ngetulu kwakhe. Ngako-ke kuye kuba shengatsi akutange kute kube khona kuhlengwa lokwentiwa, asitsa saNkulunkulu; futsi ngalokunjalo nadeveli usitsa saNkulunkulu.
16.6: Futsi kube Khristu akazange ete emhlabeni, ngikhuluma ngetintfo letisatokwenteka shengatsi setentekile, bekungeke kube khona kuhlengwa.
16.7: Futsi kube Khristu akazange avuke kulabafile, noma adzabule tibopho tekufa kute lithuna lingabi nekuncoba, futsi nekutsi kufa kungabi neludvonsi, bekungeke kube khona kuvuka.
16.8: Kodvwa kukhona kuvuka, ngako-ke lithuna lite kuncoba, futsi ludvonsi lwekufa lugwinywe kuKhristu.
16.9: Ukukhanya kanye nekuphila kwemhlaba; yebo, ukukhanya lokungapheli, lokungeke kufiphaliswe nanini; yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nemphilo lengapheli, kute kungabe kusaba khona kufa nanini.
16.10: Naloko lokubhubhako kuyawugcoka kungabhubhi; naloko lokubolako kuyawugcoka kungaboli, futsi kuyawuletfwa kutsi kume phambi kwesihlalo saNkulunkulu, kute kwehlulelwe nguye njengekwemisebenti yabo noma ngabe mihle noma ngabe mibi—
16.11: Uma imihle, ekuvukeni kwekuphila lokungapheli kanye nenjabulo; futsi uma imibi, ekuvukeni kwebuhlungu lobungapheli, baniketwe develi, lobabeke ngaphansi kwakhe, lokukulahlwa—
16.12: Bahambe ngekwentsandvo yenyama kanye netifiso tabo; bangatange bayibite nanini iNkhosi ngesikhatsi tandla temusa telulelwe kubo, ngoba tandla temusa betelulelwe kubo, futsi abazange bawemukele umusa; bayaliwe ngebubi babo kepha bangasuki kubo, futsi bayalwa kutsi baphendvuke kepha abatange baphendvuke.
16.13: Manje, ngabe akukameli yini nitfutfumele futsi niphendvuke etonweni tenu, futsi nikhumbule kutsi kuye kuphela kanye nangaye Khristu ningasindziswa na?
16.14: Ngako-ke, uma nifundzisa umtsetfo waMosi, ngetulu kwaloko fundzisani kutsi kungumfanekiso waleto tintfo letitako—
16.15: Bafundziseni kutsi kuhlengwa kuta ngaKhristu iNkhosi, longuBabe waPhakadze lucobo. Amen.

17.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Abinadi asacedzile leti tinkhulumo, inkhosi yayaleta kutsi baphristi bamtsatse futsi bente kutsi abulawe.
17.2: Kodvwa bekukhona munye emkhatsini wabo libito lakhe bekungu-Alima, naye futsi awesitukulwane saNefi. Bekalijaha, futsi wawakholwa emavi Abinadi labekawakhulumile, ngoba bekati mayelana nebubi Abinadi labekafakaze ngabo ngalokumelene nabo; ngako-ke wacala kuncenga enkhosini kutsi ingamtfukutseleli Abinadi, kodvwa imvumele kutsi esuke ngekuthula.
17.3: Kodvwa inkhosi yatfukutsela kakhulu, futsi yenta kutsi Alima acoshwe emkhatsini wabo, futsi yatfumela tinceku tayo emvakwakhe kute timbulale.
17.4: Kodvwa wabaleka phambi kwato wabhaca kangangoba atimtfolanga. Futsi ngesikhatsi abhacile tinsuku letiningi wawabhala onkhe emavi Abinadi labekawakhulumile.
17.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yenta kutsi bogadzi bayo bamtungelete Abinadi bambambe; bambopha baphindze bamphonse ejele.
17.6: Futsi emvakwetinsuku letintsatfu, seyibonisene nebaphristi bayo, yenta kutsi aphindze aletfwe phambi kwayo.
17.7: Futsi yatsi kuye: Abinadi, sikutfole unelicala, futsi ufanelwe kufa.
17.8: Ngoba utse Nkulunkulu lucobo lwakhe kufanele ehlele phansi emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu; manje, ngenca yaloku utawubulawa ngaphandle kwekutsi uwahocise onkhe lamavi lowuwakhulumile lamabi mayelana nami kanye nebantfu bami.
17.9: Manje Abinadi watsi kuyo: Ngitsi kuwe, angeke ngiwahocise lamavi lengiwakhulumile kuwe mayelana nalabantfu, ngoba aliciniso; kute nati ngebuciniso bawo ngitivumele kutsi ngiwele etandleni tenu.
17.10: Yebo, futsi ngitawuhlupheka kute kube sekufeni, angeke ngiwahocise lamavi ami, ayawukuma njengebufakazi ngalokumelene nani. Futsi uma ningibulala nitawube nicitsa ingati lemsulwa, futsi loku nako ngalokunjalo kuyawukuma njengebufakazi ngalokumelene nani ngelusuku lwekugcina.
17.11: Futsi manje inkhosi Nowa beseyitomkhulula, ngoba beyesaba livi lakhe; ngoba beyesaba kutsi tehlulelo taNkulunkulu tatitokuta etikwayo.
17.12: Kodvwa baphristi baphakamisa emavi abo ngalokumelene naye, bacala kumbeka licala. Batsi: Uyitfukile inkhosi. Ngako-ke inkhosi bayiphehla kute itfukutsele ngalokumelene naye, futsi yamnikela kutsi abulawe.
17.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bamtsatsa bambopha, basishaya sikhumba sakhe ngenyandza yetinkhuni, yebo, washa wate wafa.
17.14: Manje ngesikhatsi emalangabi acala kumhashula, wamemeta kubo, watsi:
17.15: Bukani, njengoba nentile kimi, ngalokunjalo kuyawukwenteka kutsi intalelwane yenu iyawukwenta kutsi labaningi beve letinhlungu lengitivako, ngisho netinhlungu tekufa ngemlilo; futsi loku ngenca yekutsi ikholelwa ensindzisweni yeNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
17.16: Futsi kutawukwenteka kutsi niyawuhlushwa ngato tonkhe tinhlobo tetifo ngenca yebubi benu.
17.17: Yebo, niyawushaywa kuto tonkhe tindzawo, futsi niyawucoshwa niphindze nihlakatwe niye emuva naphambili, njengemhlambi wasendle ucoshwa tilwane tasendle letesabekako.
17.18: Ngalolosuku niyawutingelwa, futsi niyawutsatfwa ngesandla setitsa tenu, emvakwaloko niyawukuva buhlungu, njengoba nami ngiva, tinhlungu tekufa ngemlilo.
17.19: Ngaleyondlela Nkulunkulu wenta imphindziselo etikwalabo lababulala bantfu bakhe. Awu Nkulunkulu, yemukela umphefumulo wami.
17.20: Manje, ngesikhatsi Abinadi sekawashito lamavi, wawa, eve buhlungu bekufa ngemlilo; yebo, abulewe ngenca yekutsi angeke ayiphike imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, alicinisekisile liciniso lemavi akhe ngekufa kwakhe.

18.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi Alima, loyo lobekabalekele tinceku tenkhosi Nowa, waphendvuka etonweni kanye nasebubini bakhe, wahamba ngansense emkhatsini webantfu, wacala kubafundzisa emavi a-Abinadi—
18.2: Yebo, mayelana naloko lokwakutawukwenteka, futsi ngalokunjalo mayelana nekuvuka kulabafile, nekuhlengwa kwebantfu, lokwakutawukwenteka ngemandla, netinhlupheko, nekufa kwaKhristu, nekuvuka kanye nekwenyukela kwakhe ezulwini.
18.3: Futsi ngebuningi balabo labebaliva livi lakhe wabafundzisa. Wabafundzisa ngansense, kute kungafiki elwatini lwenkhosi. Futsi labaningi bawakholwa emavi akhe.
18.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngebuningi balabo labakholwa bahamba baya endzaweni lebeyibitwa ngekutsi yiMormon, itfole libito layo eNkhosini, iseminceleni yelive lelaligcwala tilwane tasendle, ngaletinye tikhatsi noma ngetigaba temnyaka letitsite.
18.5: Manje kwakukhona eMormon umtfombo wemanti lacwebile, futsi Alima waphumula lapho, lapho edvute nemanti kukhona lihlatsi letihlahla letincane, lapho atifihla khona emini ekutfungatfweni yinkhosi.
18.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngebuningi balabo labebamkholwa baya lapho kuyova emavi akhe.
18.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwetinsuku letiningi kwase kunesibalo lesikhulu lesasesibutsana ndzawonye endzaweni yaMormon, kutova emavi a-Alima. Yebo, bonkhe babutsana ndzawonye labebakholelwa emavini akhe, kute bamuve. Futsi wabafundzisa, futsi washumayela kubo kuphendvuka, nekuhlengwa, kanye nelukholo eNkhosini.
18.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watsi kubo: Bukani, nawa emanti aMormon (ngoba bekabitwa kanjalo) manje, njengoba nifisa kuta emhlambini waNkulunkulu, futsi nibitwe ngebantfu bakhe, futsi nifuna kutfwalisana imitfwalo yaloyo naloyo, kute ibe lula;
18.9: Yebo, futsi nifuna kukhala kanye nalabo labakhalako; yebo, nidvudvute labo labadzinga kudvudvutwa, niphindze nime njengabofakazi baNkulunkulu ngato tonkhe tikhatsi nakuto tonkhe tintfo, nakuto tonkhe tindzawo leningaba kuto, kute kube sekufeni, kute nihlengwe nguNkulunkulu, futsi nibalwe kanye nalabo bekuvuka kucala, kute nibe nekuphila, lokuphakadze—
18.10: Manje ngitsi kini, uma loku kusifiso setinhlitiyo tenu, yini pho leyenta kutsi ningabhajatiswa egameni leNkhosi, kube njengebufakazi phambi kwayo kutsi seningene esivumelwaneni nayo kutsi nitawuyisebentela futsi nigcine imiyaleto yayo, kute itsele Moya wayo ubemningi kakhulu kini na?
18.11: Manje ngesikhatsi labantfu sebawevile lamavi, bashaya tandla tabo ngenca yentfokoto, futsi bamemeta batsi: Loku kusifiso setinhlitiyo tetfu.
18.12: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima watsatsa Hilamu, lobekangulomunye webekucala, wahamba wema phambili ekhatsi emantini, wakhala, watsi: Awu Nkhosi, tsela Moya wakho etikwenceku yakho, kute yente lomsebenti ngebungcwele benhlitiyo.
18.13: Futsi ngesikhatsi sekawashito lamavi, Moya weNkhosi waba etikwakhe, futsi watsi: Hilamu, ngiyakubhabhatisa, ngineligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu Somandla, njengebufakazi bekutsi ungenile esivumelwaneni sekutsi umsebentele ute ubhubhe ngekwemtimba lobhubhako; shengatsi Moya weNkhosi ungatselwa etikwakho; futsi shengatsi angakunika kuphila lokuphakadze, ngekuhlengwa kwaKhristu, lamlungisa kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba.
18.14: Emvakwekutsi Alima sekawashito lamavi, bobabili Alima naHilamu bacwila emantini; bavuka baphindze baphuma emantini batfokotile, bagcwaliswe ngaMoya.
18.15: Futsi, Alima watsatsa lomunye, waya phambili kwesibili ekhatsi emantini, wambhabhatisa njengelowekucala, kuphela yena akacwilanga futsi emantini.
18.16: Futsi ngalendlela wababhabhatisa bonkhe labo labaya endzaweni yaMormon; bebasibalo sebantfu labacishe babe ngemakhulu lamabili nakune; yebo, futsi babhajatiswa emantini aMormon, bagcwaliswa ngemusa waNkulunkulu.
18.17: Futsi babitwa ngelibandla laNkulunkulu, noma libandla laKhristu, kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili. Futsi kwenteka kutsi loyo lobekabhajatiswa ngemandla nangeligunya laNkulunkulu wahlanganiswa nelibandla lakhe.
18.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima, aneligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu, wagcoba baphristi; umphristi munye kulabangemashumi lasihlanu esibalweni sabo wabagcoba kutsi babashumayele, futsi babafundzise mayelana netintfo letiphatselene nembuso waNkulunkulu.
18.19: Wabayaleta kutsi bangafundzisi lutfo ngaphandle kwekutsi kube tintfo leto lebekatifundzisile, naletatikhulunywe ngemlomo webaphrofethi labangcwele.
18.20: Yebo, wabayaleta kutsi bangashumayeli lutfo ngaphandle kwekuphendvuka kanye nelukholo eNkhosini, leyayibahlengile bantfu bayo.
18.21: Wabayaleta kutsi kubebete umbango kuloyo naloyo, kodvwa kutsi babuke phambili bamunye, banelukholo lunye kanye nembhabhatiso munye, banetinhlitiyo tabo letihlanganiswe ndzawonye ebunyeni kanye naselutsandvweni kuloyo nakuloyo.
18.22: Wabayaleta kutsi bashumayele kanjalo. Futsi ngaleyondlela baba bantfwana baNkulunkulu.
18.23: Wabayaleta kutsi bagcine lusuku lwesabatha, balugcine lungcwele, futsi ngetulu kwaloko tinsuku tonkhe babonge eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo.
18.24: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko wabayaleta kutsi baphristi labekabagcobile basebente ngetandla tabo lucobo kute batondle bona.
18.25: Futsi kwakukhona lusuku lunye evikini lolwalubekwe eceleni kutsi bahlangane ndzawonye kute bafundzise bantfu, futsi bakhonte iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, ngetulu kwaloko, njalo-nje ngalokwakusemandleni abo, bahlangane ndzawonye.
18.26: Futsi baphristi kwakungakafaneli batsembele kubantfu kutsi babondle; kodvwa ngekusebenta kwabo bebatotfola umusa waNkulunkulu, kute bakhule babe nemandla eMoyeni, babe nelwati lwaNkulunkulu, kute bafundzise ngemandla kanye nangeligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu.
18.27: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko Alima wabayaleta kutsi bantfu belibandla kufanele baphane ngalabanako, wonkhe umuntfu ngaloko lanako; uma ngabe anako kukuningi kufanele aphe ngebuningi; futsi loyo lonako kodvwa kukuncane, kuncane lokuyodzingeka kuye; futsi loyo longenako kufanele anikwe.
18.28: Futsi ngaleyondlela kufanele baphane ngetintfo labanato ngekwetsandvo yabo lekhululekile kanye netifiso letinhle ngaNkulunkulu, futsi nakulabo baphristi labebadzinga, yebo, futsi nakubo bonkhe bantfu labadzingile nalabangenako kwekwembatsa lokwanele.
18.29: Futsi loku wakusho kubo, ayaletwe nguNkulunkulu; futsi bahamba ngebucotfo phambi kwaNkulunkulu, baphana loyo naloyo ngekwenyama nekwakamoya njengekwetidzingo tabo kanye netimfuno tabo.
18.30: Manje kwenteka kutsi konkhe loku kwentiwa eMormon, yebo, ngasemantini aMormon, ehlatsini lelalisedvutane nemanti aMormon; yebo, indzawo yaMormon; emanti aMormon, lihlatsi laMormon, kwakukuhle kangakanani emehlweni alabo labeta lapho elwatini lweMhlengi wabo; yebo, futsi babusiswe kangakanani, ngoba bayawuhlabelela kumdvumisa naphakadze.
18.31: Futsi leti tintfo tentiwa eminceleni yelive, kute tingafinyeleli elwatini lwenkhosi.
18.32: Kodvwa bukani, kwenteka kutsi inkhosi, seyitfolile ngemnyakato emkhatsini webantfu, yatfumela tinceku tayo kutsi tibabuke. Ngako-ke elangeni lelo bebahlangene ngalo ndzawonye kutowuva livi lenkhosi batfolwa yinkhosi.
18.33: Manje inkhosi yatsi Alima bekaphehla bantfu kutsi bayivukele; ngaloko-ke yatfumela emabutfo ayo kutsi ayobabhubhisa.
18.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima kanye nebantfu beNkhosi bavuswa kuta kwemphi yenkhosi; ngako-ke batsatsa emathende abo kanye nemindeni yabo besuka baya ehlane.
18.35: Futsi bebabalelwa cishe kubantfu labangemakhulu lamane nemashumi lasihlanu.

19.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi libutfo lenkhosi labuya, lingakabatfoli bantfu beNkhosi.
19.2: Manje bukani, emabutfo enkhosi besekamancane, ngoba besekancishisiwe, futsi kwacala kwaba nekuhlukana emkhatsini webantfu labesebasele.
19.3: Futsi lidlanzana lelincane lacala lafutselana kakhulu lisongela ngalokumelene nenkhosi, futsi kwacala kwaba khona umbango lomkhulu emkhatsini wabo.
19.4: Manje kwakukhona indvodza emkhatsini wabo libito layo kwakunguGideyoni, ayindvodza lenemandla futsi leyisitsa senkhosi, ngako-ke wahoshula inkemba yakhe, wafunga ekutfukutseleni kwakhe kutsi utoyibulala inkhosi.
19.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi walwa nenkhosi; futsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi ibona kutsi yaseyitowehlulwa, yabaleka yagijima yayongena embhoshongweni lowawusedvute nelithempeli.
19.6: Gideyoni walandzela emvakwayo futsi besekatongena embhoshongweni kute ayibulale inkhosi, inkhosi yaphonsa emehlo ayo icalata ngaseveni laseShemloni, buka, libutfo lemaLamani laselisekhatsi eminceleni yelive.
19.7: Manje inkhosi yamemeta isebuhlungwini bemphefumulo wayo, itsi: Gideyoni, ngisindzise, ngoba emaLamani sekasetikwetfu, futsi atawusibhubhisa; yebo, atawubhubhisa bantfu bami.
19.8: Manje inkhosi kwakungasiko kutsi yayinendzaba kakhulu nebantfu bayo kangangoba yayinendzaba nemphilo yayo; noko, Gideyoni wayisindzisa imphilo yayo.
19.9: Futsi inkhosi yayaleta bantfu kutsi babalekele emaLamani, nayo lucobo lwayo yahamba phambi kwabo, babalekela ehlane, nebesifazane kanye nebantfwana babo.
19.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani abalandzela, abakhandza, acala kubabulala.
19.11: Manje kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yayaleta kutsi onkhe emadvodza ashiye bafati bawo kanye nebantfwana babo, abalekele emaLamani.
19.12: Manje bekamaningi langavumanga kubashiya, kodvwa akhetsa kutsi ahlale abhubhe kanye nabo. Lamanye ashiya bafati kanye nebantfwana babo abaleka.
19.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lawo lasala kanye nebafati nebantfwana bawo enta kutsi emadvodzakati abo lamahle eme phambili ancenge emaLamani kutsi angababulali.
19.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani aba nebubele kubo, ngoba akhangwa buhle bebesifazane babo.
19.15: Ngako-ke emaLamani atisindzisa timphilo tabo, abatsatsa abatfumba abatfwala ababuyisela emuva eveni laNefi, abavumela kutsi balitsatse live, ngaphansi kwembandzela wekutsi bebatoletsa inkhosi Nowa etandleni temaLamani, futsi baletse imphahla yabo, incenye yinye yako konkhe labebanako, incenye yinye yeligolide labo, nesiliva labo, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letiligugu kubo, futsi ngaleyondlela bebatokhokha umtselo enkhosini yemaLamani umnyaka ngemnyaka.
19.16: Manje kwakukhona munye wemadvodzana enkhosi emkhatsini walaba labebatfunjiwe, libito lakhe kwakungi Limhayi.
19.17: Manje Limhayi bekanesifiso sekutsi uyise angabhujiswa; noko, Limhayi bekungasiko kutsi bekangati ngebubi beyise, yena ngekwakhe bekayindvodza lelungile.
19.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Gideyoni watfumela emadvodza ehlane ngansense, kutsi ayofuna inkhosi kanye nalabo labebanayo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahlangana nebantfu ehlane, bonkhe ngaphandle kwenkhosi nebaphristi bayo.
19.19: Manje bebafungile etinhlitiyweni tabo kutsi bebayawubuyela eveni laNefi, futsi uma bafati kanye nebantfwana babo babulewe, kanye nalabo labebasele nabo, kutsi bayawufuna kutiphindzisela, ngetulu kwaloko babhubhe kanye nabo.
19.20: Futsi inkhosi yabayaleta kutsi bangabuyeli; bayitfukutselela inkhosi, benta kutsi ive buhlungu, ngekufa ngemlilo.
19.21: Futsi besebatobamba nebaphristi bababulale kodvwa bababalekela.
19.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi besebatobuyela eveni laNefi, kodvwa bahlangana nemadvodza aGideyoni. Futsi emadvodza aGideyoni abatjela ngako konkhe lokwakwentekile kubafati kanye nakubantfwana babo; kanye nekutsi emaLamani abavumele kutsi bangalitsatsa live ngekutsi bakhokhe umtselo kumaLamani wencenye yinye yako konkhe labebanako.
19.23: Futsi bantfu batjela emadvodza aGideyoni kutsi bayibulele inkhosi, futsi baphristi bayo babalekele kudze baya ehlane.
19.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebawucendzile umcimbi, babuyela eveni laNefi, batfokotile, ngoba bafati kanye nebantfwana babo bebangakabulawa; futsi bamtjela Gideyoni ngaloko labebakwentile enkhosini.
19.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yemaLamani yenta sifungo kubo, sekutsi bantfu bayo bangababulali.
19.26: NaLimhayi ngalokunjalo, ayindvodzana yenkhosi, umbuso sewunikwetwe yena bantfu, wenta sifungo enkhosini yemaLamani sekutsi bantfu bakhe bakhokhe umtselo kuyo, incenye yinye yako konkhe labebanako.
19.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Limhayi wacala kwakha umbuso kanye nekucinisa kuthula emkhatsini webantfu bakhe.
19.28: Futsi inkhosi yemaLamani yabeka bogadzi batungeleta live, kute ibagcine bantfu baLimhayi baseveni, kute bangesuki baye ehlane; futsi yabondla bogadzi bayo ngemtselo leyayiwutfola kumaNefi.
19.29: Manje inkhosi Limhayi yaba nekuthula njalo embusweni wayo sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lemibili, kangangekutsi emaLamani akabahluphanga noma afune kubabhubhisa.

20.1: Manje kwakukhona indzawo eShemloni lapho emadvodzakati emaLamani bekahlanganela khona ndzawonye kutsi ahlabele, adanse, futsi atijabulise.
20.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalelinye lilanga bekasibalo lesincane nje ahlangene ndzawonye kutsi ahlabelele futsi agidze.
20.3: Manje baphristi benkhosi Nowa, bebanemahloni ekubuyela edolobheni laNefi, yebo, ngetulu kwaloko bebesaba kutsi bantfu bebayawubabulala, ngako-ke abazange balokotse babuyele ebafatini babo kanye nasebantfwaneni babo.
20.4: Futsi sebahleli ehlane, sebawatfolile emadvodzakati emaLamani babhaca bawabuka;
20.5: Futsi ngesikhatsi sekusele labambalwa nje babo labebabutsene ndzawonye kutsi bagidze, baphuma etindzaweni tabo tekubhaca bawatsatsa bawatfwala baya nawo ehlane; yebo, emashumi lamabili nakune emadvodzakati emaLamani bawatfwala baya nawo ehlane.
20.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani sekatfolile kutsi emadvodzakati awo bekalahlekile, atfukutselela bantfu baLimhayi, ngoba acabanga kutsi bekubantfu baLimhayi.
20.7: Ngako-ke atfumela emabutfo awo phambili; yebo nenkhosi lucobo lwayo yahamba phambi kwebantfu bayo baya eveni laNefi kuyobhubhisa bantfu baLimhayi.
20.8: Manje Limhayi wawabona asembhoshongweni, nawo onkhe emalungiselelo emphi wawabona; ngako-ke wagcogcela ndzawonye bantfu bakhe, bahlala bawalindza etinkhundleni kanye nasemahlatsini.
20.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani sekachamukile, bantfu baLimhayi bacala bakhwela etikwawo bavela etindzaweni tabo tekulindza, futsi bacala kuwabulala.
20.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi imphi yaba matima kakhulu, ngoba balwa njengemabhubesi abanga kudla kwawo.
20.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu baLimhayi bacala kuwacosha emaLamani phambi kwabo; noma bona bebangasiyo nencenye leningi njengemaLamani. Kodvwa balwela timphilo tabo, netebafati babo, kanye netebantfwana babo; ngako-ke batikhandla futsi balwa njengabonyokangwenya.
20.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bayitfola inkhosi yemaLamani emkhatsini wesibalo salabafile bawo; noma yona beyingakafi, beyilimele yashiywa phansi, bekushesha kakhulu kubaleka kwebantfu bayo.
20.13: Futsi bayitsatsa bayibopha emanceba, bayiletsa phambi kwaLimhayi, batsi: Buka, nayi inkhosi yemaLamani; ngoba itfole linceba ibese iyawa emkhatsini walabafile bayo, futsi bayishiyile; buka, siyiletse phambi kwakho; manje asiyibulale.
20.14: Kodvwa Limhayi watsi kubo: Angeke ngiyibulale, kodvwa yiletseni lapha kute ngiyibone. Futsi bayiletsa. Limhayi watsi kuyo: Ngusiphi sizatfu lesente nine nite nitokulwa nebantfu bami na? Buka, bantfu bami abazange basephule sifungo lengasenta kini; ngako-ke, kungani nine nisephule sifungo lenasenta ebanftwini bami na?
20.15: Manje inkhosi yatsi: Ngisephulile sifungo ngoba bantfu bakho batsatse emadvodzakati ebantfu bami; ngako-ke, ngentfukutselo yami ngente kutsi bantfu bami bete batokulwa nebantfu bakho.
20.16: Manje Limhayi bekangakeva lutfo mayelana naloludzaba; ngako-ke watsi: Ngitawuphenya emkhatsini webantfu futsi noma ngubani lowente lentfo lena utawubhujiswa. Ngako-ke wenta kutsi kwentiwe luphenyo emkhatsini webantfu bakhe.
20.17: Manje ngesikhatsi Gideyoni sekativile leti tintfo, yena ayindvuna yemasotja enkhosi, wahamba waya phambili watsi enkhosini: Ngiyakucela hocisa, ungabaphenyi laba bantfu, futsi ungalibeki licala kubo ngalentfo.
20.18: Ngoba awubakhumbuli yini baphristi beyihlo wakho, laba bantfu labebafuna kubabhubhisa na? Futsi abekho yini ehlane na? Futsi ngabe akusibo yini labantjontje emadvodzakati emaLamani na?
20.19: Manje, buka, futsi utjele inkhosi ngaleti tintfo, kute yona itjele bantfu bayo kute batfotjiswe ngatsi; ngoba buka vele sebalungiselela kutsi bete batolwa natsi; buka ngetulu kwaloko kukhona kuphela labambalwa betfu.
20.20: Futsi buka, beta nalamaningi emabutfo abo; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi inkhosi ibatfobise ngakitsi sitobhubha.
20.21: Ngoba akagcwaliseki yini emavi a-Abinadi, lawaphrofetha macondzana natsi—futsi konkhe loku kungenca yekutsi asitange siwalalele emavi eNkhosi, futsi siphendvuke ebubini betfu na?
20.22: Manje asiyicolele inkhosi, futsi sigcwalise sifungo lesasenta kuyo; ngoba kuncono kutsi sibe sebugcilini kunekutsi silahlekelwe timphilo tetfu; ngako-ke, asiyekeleni kucitsa ingati lengaka.
20.23: Manje Limhayi wayitjela inkhosi tonkhe tintfo mayelana neyise, kanye nebaphristi labebabalekele ehlane, futsi wabeka sento sekutsatfwa kwemadvodzakati abo kubo.
20.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yatfotjiswa bantfu bayo; yatsi kubo: asambeni siyohlangana nebantfu bami, ngaphandle kwetikhali; futsi ngiyafunga kini ngesifungo kutsi bantfu bami angeke bababulale bantfu bakho.
20.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bayilandzela inkhosi, bahamba ngaphandle kwetikhali kuyohlangana nemaLamani. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahlangana nemaLamani; nenkhosi yemaLamani yakhotsama phambi kwawo, futsi yabancengela bantfu baLimhayi.
20.26: Futsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona bantfu baLimhayi, kutsi bebangenatikhali, aba nebubele kubo futsi atfotjiswa ngubo, futsi abuyela emuva nenkhosi yawo ngekuthula aya eveni lawo.

21.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Limhayi kanye nebantfu bakhe babuyela edolobheni laNefi, bacala kuhlala kulelive ngekuthula futsi.
21.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwetinsuku letiningi emaLamani acala futsi kutsi aphehlelwe entfukutselweni ngalokumelene nemaNefi, acala kuta eminceleni yelive lelibatungeletile.
21.3: Manje bekangeke alokotse ababulale, ngenca yesifungo inkhosi yawo leyayisentile kuLimhayi; kodvwa bekabashaya etihlatsini tabo, asebentise ligunya ngetulu kwabo; futsi acala kubatfwalisa imitfwalo lesindzako emihlane yabo, babachuba njengembongolo lesimungulu—
21.4: Yebo, konkhe loku kwentiwa kute livi leNkhosi ligcwaliseke.
21.5: Manje tinhlupheko temaNefi tatitinkhulu, futsi kwakute indlela yekutsi batikhulule etandleni tawo, ngoba emaLamani abebatungelete ndzawo tonkhe.
21.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bacala kuvungama enkhosini ngenca yetinhlupheko tabo; bacala baba nesifiso sekutsi bahambe bayolwa nawo. Bayihlupha kakhulu inkhosi ngetikhalo tabo; ngako-ke yabavumela kutsi bente njengekwetifiso tabo.
21.7: Futsi baphindze babutsana ndzawonye, bahloma tikhali tabo, bahamba bayolwa nemaLamani kute bawakhiphele ngephandle kwelive labo.
21.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani abashaya, ababuyisela emuva, abulala labaningi babo.
21.9: Manje kwaba khona kukhala lokukhulu kanye nesililo emkhatsini webantfu baLimhayi, umfelokati akhalela indvodza yakhe, indvodzana nendvodzakati bakhalela uyise, bomnakabo bakhalela banakabo.
21.10: Manje besekukhona bafelokati labaningi kakhulu eveni, futsi bakhala kakhulu lusuku ngelusuku, ngoba kwesaba lokukhulu emaLamani kwakusetikwabo.
21.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kukhala kwabo lokungapheli kwabaphehla labebasele bebantfu baLimhayi kutsi batfukutsele ngalokumelene nemaLamani; bahamba futsi bayolwa, kodvwa babajikisa bababuyisela emuva futsi, balahlekelwe kakhulu.
21.12: Yebo, babuyela futsi kwesitsatfu, baphindze balahlekelwa njengasekucaleni; labo labebangakabulawa baphindze babuyela edolobheni laNefi.
21.13: Futsi batitfoba naselutfulini, batiletsa kulo lijoka lebugcili, batinikela kutsi bashaywe, nekutsi babalekiswe behliswe benyuswa, futsi bahlushwe, njengekutsandza kwetitsa tabo.
21.14: Futsi batehlisa nasekujuleni kwekutitfoba; futsi bakhala kakhulu kuNkulunkulu; yebo, nangabo bonkhe budze belusuku bakhala kuNkulunkulu wabo kutsi abakhulule baphume etinhluphekweni tabo.
21.15: Manje iNkhosi yephuta kuva kukhala kwabo ngenca yebubi babo; noko iNkhosi yakuva kukhala kwabo, yacala kutsambisa tinhlitiyo temaLamani kangangekutsi acala kuyenta yaba melula imitfwala yabo; noko iNkhosi ayibonanga kufanele kutsi ibakhulule ebugcilini.
21.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bacala kuphumelela kancane kancane eveni, bacala kukhulisa lokuyinhlavu ngebuningi, kanye nemihlambi yetimvu, kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo, kangangekutsi abahlushwanga yindlala.
21.17: Manje bekukhona sibalo lesiningi sebafati, lesasingetulu kwaleso semadvodza; ngako-ke iNkhosi Limhayi yayaleta kutsi nguleyo ndvodza ayinikele kute kondliwe bafelokati kanye nebantfwana babo, kute nabo bangabhujiswa yindlala; futsi loku akwenta ngenca yesibalo lesikhulu sabo lesasibulewe.
21.18: Manje bantfu baLimhayi batigcina ndzawonye bayimbumba kangangoba kwakungahle kwenteke, futsi bavikela lokuyinhlavu kwabo kanye nemihlambi yabo;
21.19: Futsi nenkhosi lucobo lwayo yayingatetsembi uma ingephandle kwetindvonga telidolobha, ngaphandle kwekutsi itsatse bogadzi bayo nayo, ngekwesaba kutsi ngandlela tsite ingawela etandleni temaLamani.
21.20: Futsi yenta kutsi bantfu bayo bagadze live ndzawotonkhe, kute ngandlela tsite babambe labo baphristi labebabalekele ehlane, labebantjontje emadvodzakati emaLamani, futsi labebente kutsi kube khona imbubhiso lenkhulu kangaka etikwabo.
21.21: Ngoba bebanesifiso sekutsi bababambe kute babajezise; ngoba bebete eveni laNefi ebusuku, futsi batfwala lokuyinhlavu kwabo kanye nalokuningi kwetintfo tabo letiligugu; ngako-ke bahlala babalindza.
21.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi akuzange kusaba khona kuphatamisana emkhatsini wemaLamani nebantfu baLimhayi, kwaze kwaba sikhatsi Amoni kanye nabomnakabo bafika eveni.
21.23: Futsi inkhosi ngesikhatsi ingephandle kwemasango elidolobha kanye nabogadzi bayo, yatfola Amoni kanye nabomnakabo; futsi icabanga kutsi bekubaphristi baNowa ngako-ke yenta kutsi babanjwe, baboshwe, baphonswe ejele. Futsi kube bekubaphristi baNowa yayitokwenta kutsi babulawe.
21.24: Kodvwa ngesikhatsi itfola kutsi kwakungasibo, nekutsi kwakubomnakabo, futsi bebaphuma eveni laseZarahemla, yagcwala injabulo lenkhulu kakhulu.
21.25: Manje inkhosi Limhayi yayitfumele, ngaphambi kwekufika kwa-Amoni, lidlanzana lemadvodza kuyofuna live laseZarahemla; kodvwa akakhonanga kulitfola, futsi lalahleka ehlane.
21.26: Noko, atfola live lelalikadze linebantfu; yebo, live lelalimbonywe ngematsambo lomile; yebo, live lebelikadze linebantfu lelalibhujisiwe; futsi bona, bebacabanga kutsi kwakungilo live laseZarahemla, babuyela eveni laNefi, bafike eminceleni yelive kungasito tinsuku letiningi phambi kwekutsi kufike Amoni.
21.27: Futsi beta nembhalo, umbhalo walabo bantfu ematsambo abo labebawatfolile; futsi wawucoshwe kubongcwengcwe bensimbi.
21.28: Manje Limhayi waphindze wagcwala injabulo nakatfola ngemlomo wa-Amoni kutsi inkhosi Mosiya beyinesiphiwo lesivela kuNkulunkulu, lebekangakhona kuhumusha ngaso imifanekiso lecoshiwe lenjena; yebo, futsi Amoni ngalokunjalo naye watfokota.
21.29: Noko Amoni kanye nabomnakabo bagcwala kudzabuka ngenca yekutsi labaningi kakhulu babomnakabo bebabulewe.
