21.30: Futsi ngalokunjalo nekutsi inkhosi Nowa kanye nebaphristi bayo bebente bantfu kutsi bente tono kanye nebubi lobuningi kangaka ngalokumelene naNkulunkulu; futsi ngetulu kwaloko bakhala ngekufa kwa-Abinadi; ngalokunjalo nangekuhamba kwa-Alima kanye nalabo bantfu labahamba naye, labebasungule libandla laNkulunkulu ngemandla kanye neligunya laNkulunkulu, kanye nelukholo emavini labekakhulunywe ngu-Abinadi.
21.31: Yebo, bakhala ngekuhamba kwabo, ngoba bebangati kutsi bebabalekele kuphi. Manje ngabe bebayawuhlanganyela nabo ngekutfokota, ngoba nabo bese bangene esivumelwaneni naNkulunkulu kutsi bamsebentele futsi bagcine imiyaleto yakhe.
21.32: Manje kusukela ngekufika kwa-Amoni, inkhosi Limhayi nayo ngalokunjalo yangena esivumelwaneni naNkulunkulu, futsi ngalokunjalo nebantfu bayo labaningi; kutsi bamsebentele futsi bagcine imiyaleto yakhe.
21.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Limhayi kanye nebantfu bayo labaningi bebanesifiso sekubhajatiswa; kodvwa kwakute namunye kulelive lobekaneligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu. Amoni wala kukwenta loku, ngoba bekatibona njengenceku lengakafaneli.
21.34: Ngako-ke abazange ngaleso sikhatsi batihlanganise babe libandla, balindze Moya weNkhosi. Manje bebanesifiso sekutsi babe njenga-Alima kanye nabomnakabo, labebabalekele ehlane.
21.35: Bebanesifiso sekutsi babhajatiswe njengesibonakaliso kanye nebufakazi bekutsi bebatimisele kusebentela Nkulunkulu ngato tonkhe tinhlitiyo tabo; noko baselula sikhatsi; futsi indzaba yekubhajatiswa kwabo itoniketwa emvakwaloku.
21.36: Manje yonkhe imetamo ya-Amoni nebantfu bakhe, nenkhosi Limhayi kanye nebantfu bayo, kwakungukutsi batikhulule baphume etandleni temaLamani kanye nasebugcilini.

22.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi Amoni kanye nenkhosi Limhayi bacala kubonisana nebantfu kutsi bebangatikhulula kanjani baphume ebugcilini; futsi benta nekutsi bonkhe bantfu bahlangane ndzawonye; loku bakwenta kute beve livi lebantfu mayelana naloludzaba.
22.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abakwatanga kuyitfola indlela yekutikhulula ebugcilini, ngaphandle kwekutsi batsatse bafati nebantfwana babo, nemihlambi yetimvu tabo, nemihlambi yetinkhomo tabo, kanye nemathende abo, basuke baye ehlane; ngoba emaLamani bekamaningi kakhulu, bekungasiko lula kutsi bantfu baLimhayi babange nawo, bacabanga kutsi bebangatikhulula ebugcilini ngenkemba.
22.3: Manje kwenteka kutsi Gideyoni wahamba futsi wema phambi kwenkhosi, watsi kuyo: Manje Awu nkhosi, kute kube manje uwalalele emavi ami tikhatsi letiningi ngesikhatsi sibanga nabomnaketfu, emaLamani.
22.4: Manje Awu nkhosi, uma ungakangitfoli nginjengenceku lengenalusito lwalutfo; noma uma nje kute kube manje bewungawalalela emavi ami noma kancane kangakanani, futsi uma abe lusito kuwe, namanje ngifisa kutsi shengatsi bewungawalalela emavi ami nangalesi sikhatsi, futsi ngitawukuba yinceku yakho ngibakhulule laba bantfu ebugcilini.
22.5: Futsi inkhosi yamvumela kutsi akhulume. Gideyoni watsi kuyo:
22.6: Buka sikhala lesingemuva, eludvongeni lolungemuva, eceleni lelingemuva kwelidolobha. EmaLamani, noma bogadzi bemaLamani, ebusuku bayadzakwa; ngako-ke asitfumele simemetelo emkhatsini wabo bonkhe laba bantfu kutsi bagcogcele ndzawonye imihlambi yetimvu tabo kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo, kutsi bayichube bayiyise ehlane ebusuku.
22.7: Futsi ngitawuhamba njengekwemyalo wakho ngikhokhe umtselo wekugcina weliwayini kumaLamani, futsi atawudzakwa; tsine sitawundlula ngesikhala lesiyimfihlo ngesencele senkambu yawo ngesikhatsi wona sekadzakiwe futsi sekalele.
22.8: Ngaleyondlela sitawusuka nebafati betfu kanye nebantfwana betfu, imihlambi yetimvu tetfu, kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo tetfu siye ehlane; futsi sitawuhamba situngelete live laseShilomu.
22.9: Kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yawalalela emavi aGideyoni.
22.10: Inkhosi Limhayi yenta kutsi bantfu bayo bagcogcele imihlambi yabo ndzawonye; futsi yatfumela umtselo weliwayini kumaLamani; ngetulu kwaloko yatfumela lelinye liwayini, njengesipho sawo; futsi anatsa ngekukhululeka kulo liwayini inkhosi Limhayi lebeyilitfumele kuwo.
22.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu benkhosi Limhayi besuka ebusuku baya ehlane nemihlambi yetimvu tabo kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo tabo, bahamba batungeleta live laseShilomu ehlane, futsi bayishintja indlela yabo baya ngaseveni laseZarahemla, baholwa ngu-Amoni kanye nabomnakabo.
22.12: Futsi bebatsetse lonkhe ligolide labo, nesiliva, kanye netintfo letiligugu tabo, lebebangatitfwala, futsi ngalokunjalo nemiphako yabo, baya ehlane; bachubeka neluhambo lwabo.
22.13: Emvakwemalanga lamaningi basehlane bafika eveni laseZarahemla, bahlangana nebantfu baMosiya, baba ngephansi kwakhe.
22.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Mosiya wabemukela ngenjabulo; ngalokunjalo wemukela nemibhalo yabo, futsi ngalokunjalo nemibhalo leyayitfolwe bantfu baLimhayi.
22.15: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani sekatfole kutsi bantfu baLimhayi besebesukile baphuma eveni ebusuku, batfumela imphi ehlane kutsi ibalandzele;
22.16: Futsi emvakwekutsi sebabalandzele tinsuku letimbili, abazange basakwati kulandzela imikhondvo yabo; ngako-ke alahleka ehlane.

23.intro: Umlandvo wa-Alima nebantfu beNkhosi, labebabalekisiwe baya ehlane bantfu benkhosi Nowa.
23.1: Manje Alima, asacwayiswe yiNkhosi kutsi emabutfo enkhosi Nowa abeyawutseleka etikwabo, futsi asabatisile bantfu bakhe, ngako-ke bagcogcela ndzawonye imihlambi yabo, futsi batsatsa lokuyinhlavu kwabo, besuka baya ehlane phambi kwemabutfo enkhosi Nowa.
23.2: INkhosi yabacinisa, kute bantfu benkhosi Nowa bangakhoni kubakhandza kute bababulale.
23.3: Babaleka batsatsa luhambo lwetinsuku letisiphohlongo basehlane.
23.4: Befika eveni, yebo, live lelihle kakhulu futsi lelenelisako kakhulu, live lemanti lacwebile.
23.5: Bamisa emathende abo, bacala kulima umhlabatsi, bacala kwakha takhiwo; yebo, bebakhutsele, futsi basebenta kakhulu.
23.6: Futsi labantfu bebanesifiso sekutsi Alima abe yinkhosi yabo, ngoba bekatsandvwa bantfu bakhe.
23.7: Kodvwa watsi kubo: Bukani, akukafaneli kutsi sibe nenkhosi; ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Anitubeka lomunye umuntfu ngetulu kwalomunye, noma indvodza lenye ayinakuticabanga ingetulu kwalenye; ngako-ke ngitsi kini akukafanele kutsi nibe nenkhosi.
23.8: Noko, kube kwakungenteka kutsi nikwati kuba nemadvodza lalungile njalo kutsi abe ngemakhosi enu bekuyawuba kuhle kini kutsi nibe nenkhosi.
23.9: Kodvwa khumbulani bubi benkhosi Nowa kanye nebaphristi bayo; futsi nami lucobo ngangena elugibeni, ngenta tintfo letiningi letatinengekile emehlweni eNkhosi, letangibangela kuphendvuka lokubuhlungu kakhulu;
23.10: Noko, emvakwekuhlupheka kakhulu, iNkhosi yakuva kukhala kwami, yayiphendvula imithandazo yami, futsi seyingente sikhali etandleni tayo ekuletseni labaningi kangaka benu ekulatini liciniso layo.
23.11: Noko, kuloku angitichayisi, ngoba angikafaneli kutichayisa.
23.12: Manje ngitsi kini, benicindzetelwe yinkhosi Nowa, benisebugcilini bakhe kanye nebaphristi bakhe, futsi nangena ebubini ngenca yabo; ngako-ke naniboshwe ngetibopho tebubi.
23.13: Manje njengoba senikhululiwe ngemandla aNkulunkulu naphuma kuleti tinketane; yebo, nasetandleni tenkhosi Nowa kanye nebantfu bayo, futsi ngalokunjalo nakuto tinketane tebubi, kanjalo ngifisa kutsi nime nicine kulenkhululelo lenikhululwe ngayo, futsi nekutsi ningatsembi muntfu kutsi abe yinkhosi ngetulu kwenu.
23.14: Ngetulu kwaloko ningetsembi namunye kutsi abe ngumfundzisi noma sikhonti senu, ngaphandle kwekutsi angumuntfu waNkulunkulu, ahamba etindleleni takhe futsi ayigcina imiyaleto yakhe.
23.15: Alima wabafundzisa ngalendlela bantfu bakhe, kutsi wonkhe muntfu kufanele atsandze makhelwane wakhe njengoba atitsandza yena, kute kungabi khona umbango emkhatsini wabo.
23.16: Manje Alima bekangumphristi wabo lomkhulu, ngoba yena angumsunguli welibandla labo.
23.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kute namunye lowaniketwa ligunya lekushumayela noma kufundzisa ngaphandle kwekutsi alitfole ngaye livela kuNkulunkulu. Ngako-ke wagcoba bonkhe baphristi kanye nabo bonkhe bafundzisi babo; futsi kute labagcotjwa ngaphandle kwekutsi babantfu labalungile.
23.18: Ngako-ke babagadza bantfu babo, futsi babondla ngetintfo letiphatselene nekulunga.
23.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bacala kuphumelela kakhulu eveni; balibita lelive ngekutsi yiHilamu.
23.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bandza baphindze baphumelela kakhulu eveni laseHilamu; futsi bakha lidolobha, lebalibita ngekutsi lidolobha laseHilamu.
23.21: Noko iNkhosi ibona kufanele kutsi ibajezise bantfu bayo; yebo, iyakuvivinya kubeketela kwabo kanye nelukholo lwabo.
23.22: Noko—loyo lobeka litsemba lakhe kuyo nguye kanye loyo loyawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina. Yebo, futsi kwaba njalo nakulaba bantfu.
23.23: Ngoba buka, ngitawunikhombisa kutsi bebaletfwe ebugcilini, futsi kwakute namunye lobekangabakhulula ngaphandle kweNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, yebo, Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama kanye na-Isaka kanye naJakobe.
23.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yabakhulula, futsi yawakhombisa emandla ayo lamakhulu kubo, futsi yaba yinkhulu injabulo yabo.
23.25: Ngoba buka, kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi baseveni laseHilamu, yebo, edolobheni laseHilamu, ngesikhatsi balima eveni lonkhe, buka imphi yemaLamani yayiseminceleni yalelive.
23.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bomnakabo Alima babaleka emasimini abo, babutsana ndzawonye edolobheni laseHilamu; bebanekwesaba lokukhulu ngenca yekuchamuka kwemaLamani.
23.27: Kodvwa Alima wahamba wema emkhatsini wabo, wabancusa kutsi bangesabi, kodvwa bakhumbule iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo futsi iyawubakhulula.
23.28: Ngako-ke bakwehlisa kwesaba kwabo, bacala kukhala eNkhosini kutsi itsambise tinhlitiyo temaLamani, kute angababulali nebafati babo, kanye nebantfwana babo.
23.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yatitsambisa tinhlitiyo temaLamani. Alima kanye nabomnakabo bahamba batinikela etandleni tawo; futsi emaLamani alitsatsa live laseHilamu.
23.30: Manje emabutfo emaLamani, lawo labekalandzele ngemuva bantfu benkhosi Limhayi, abesalahlekile ehlane tinsuku letiningi.
23.31: Futsi buka, abesatfole labo baphristi benkhosi Nowa, endzaweni lebebayibita ngekutsi yi-Amuloni; futsi besebacale kutsatsa live lase-Amuloni sebacale kulima umhlabatsi.
23.32: Manje libito lemholi walabo baphristi kwakungu-Amuloni.
23.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amuloni wawancenga emaLamani; ngetulu kwaloko watfumela bafati babo, labebangemadvodzakati emaLamani, kutsi ancenge bomnakabo, kutsi angawabulali emadvodza abo.
23.34: Futsi emaLamani aba nebubele ku-Amuloni kanye nakubomnakabo, futsi akatange ababulale ngenca yebafati babo.
23.35: Amuloni kanye nabomnakabo bahlangana nemaLamani, futsi bebahamba ehlane bafuna live laNefi ngesikhatsi batfola live laseHilamu, lelalihlala Alima kanye nabomnakabo.
23.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani amtsembisa Alima kanye nabomnakabo, kutsi uma bangabakhombisa indlela leyayitobaholela eveni laNefi bangabanika imphilo kanye nenkhululeko yabo.
23.37: Kodvwa emvakwekutsi Alima sekabakhombisile indlela leyayiya eveni laNefi emaLamani akasigcinanga setsembiso sawo; kodvwa abeka bogadzi batungeleta live laseHilamu, ngetulu kwa-Alima kanye nabomnakabo.
23.38: Futsi insalela yabo yahamba yaya eveni laNefi; kwatsi incenye yabo yabuyela eveni laseHilamu, ngetulu kwaloko baletsa kanye nabo bafati kanye nebantfwana babogadzi labo labebashiywe eveni.
23.39: Futsi inkhosi yemaLamani yayinikete Amuloni kutsi abe yinkhosi kanye nembusi ngetulu kwebantfu bakhe, labebaseveni laseHilamu; noko abengetukuba nemandla ekwenta noma yini leyayingahambisani nentsandvo yenkhosi yemaLamani.

24.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amuloni watfola kutsandzeka emehlweni enkhosi yemaLamani; ngako-ke, inkhosi yemaLamani yamnika yena kanye nabomnakabo kutsi babe bafundzisi labakhetsiwe ngetulu kwebantfu bayo, yebo, nangetulu kwebantfu labebaseveni laseShemloni, nebaseveni laseShilomu, kanye nebaseveni lase-Amuloni.
24.2: Ngoba emaLamani besekawatsatsile onkhe lamave; ngako-ke, inkhosi yemaLamani yabeka emakhosi ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamave.
24.3: Manje libito lenkhosi yemaLamani kwakunguLamani, yetsiwe ngilibito leyise; ngako-ke yabitwa ngekutsi yinkhosi Lamani. Futsi beyiyinkhsosi ngetulu kwebantfu labaningi.
24.4: Futsi yakhetsa bafundzisi kubomnakabo-Amuloni kulo lonkhe live lebelilebantfu bakhe; futsi ngaleyondlela lulwimi lwaNefi lwacala kufundziswa emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bemaLamani.
24.5: Futsi bebabantfu labanebungani loyo naloyo; noko bebangamati Nkulunkulu; futsi bomnakabo Amuloni ababafundzisanga lutfo mayelana neNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, noma ngemtsetfo waMosi; noma babafundzise ngemavi a-Abinadi;
24.6: Kodvwa babafundzisa kutsi bagcine imibhalo yabo, nekutsi babhalelane loyo naloyo.
24.7: Futsi ngaleyondlela emaLamani acala kukhula kuyo ingcebo, acala kutsengiselana loyo naloyo futsi andza kakhulu, acala kuba nebucili aphindze aba bantfu labahlakaniphile, ngekuhlakanipha kwelive, yebo, aba bantfu labanebucili lobukhulu, atfokota ngayo yonkhe indlela yebubi kanye neyekuphanga, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube semkhatsini wabomnakabo.
24.8: Manje kwenteka kutsi Amuloni wacala kusebentisa ligunya ngetulu kwa-Alima kanye nabomnakabo, futsi wacala kumhlupha, wenta kutsi bantfwana bakhe bahluphe bantfwana babo.
24.9: Ngoba Amuloni bekamati Alima, kutsi bekangulomunye webaphristi benkhosi, futsi nekutsi bekunguye lowawakholwa emavi a-Abinadi futsi wakhishwa phambi kweNkhosi, ngako-ke bekamtfukutselele; ngoba bekangephansi kwenkhosi Lamani, noko walisebentisa ligunya ngetulu kwabo, futsi wababekela imisebenti, wabeka tindvuna temsebenti ngetulu kwabo.
24.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi betitinkhulu kakhulu tinhlupheko tabo kangangekutsi bacala kukhala kakhulu kuNkulunkulu.
24.11: Amuloni wabayala kutsi bakuyekele kukhala kwabo; futsi wabeka bogadzi ngetulu kwabo kutsi bababuke, kute kutsi loyo lotfolakala abita Nkulunkulu abulawe.
24.12: Futsi Alima kanye nebantfu bakhe abawaphakamiselanga emavi abo eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, kodvwa batitfulula tinhlitiyo tabo kuyo; futsi yayiyati imicabango yetinhlitiyo tabo.
24.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi leNkhosi lefika kubo basesetinhluphekweni tabo, litsi: Phakamisani tinhloko tenu nidvudvuteke, ngoba ngiyasati sivumelwano lenasenta kimi; ngitawumelana nebantfu bami futsi ngibakhulule baphume ebugcilini.
24.14: Ngetulu kwaloko ngitawuyenta ibe lula imitfwalo lebekwe etikwemahlombe enu, ngendlela yekutsi nani angeke niyive emihlane yenu, noma nisesebugcilini; futsi loku ngitawukwenta kute nime njengabofakazi bami emvakwaloku, futsi nekutsi nati ngekweliciniso kutsi mine, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, ngiyabahambela bantfu bami etinhluphekweni tabo.
24.15: Manje kwenteka kutsi imitfwalo leyayibekwe etikwa-Alima nabomnakabo yentiwa yabalula; yebo, iNkhosi yabacinisa kute bakwati kuyitfwala imitfwalo yabo kalula, futsi batinikela ngekutfokota kanye nangekubeketela kuyo yonkhe intsandvo yeNkhosi.
24.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lwalulukhulu lukholo lwabo kanye nekubeketela kwabo kangangekutsi livi leNkhosi lefika kubo futsi, litsi: Dvudvutekani, ngoba kusasa ngitawunikhulula niphume ebugcilini.
24.17: Futsi yatsi ku-Alima: Utawuhamba phambi kwalabantfu, futsi ngitawuhamba nawe ngikhulule labantfu baphume ebugcilini.
24.18: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima kanye nebantfu bakhe ngesikhatsi sasebusuku bagcogcela imihlambi yabo ndzawonye, futsi ngalokunjalo nalokuyinhlavu kwabo; yebo, sikhatsi sonkhe sasebusuku bebagcogcela ndzawonye imihlambi yabo.
24.19: Ekuseni iNkhosi yenta kutsi kufike butfongo lobukhulu kumaLamani, yebo, futsi nato tonkhe tindvuna tabo temsebenti betisebutfongweni lobukhulu.
24.20: Alima kanye nebantfu bakhe besuka baya ehlane; ngesikhatsi sebahambe lilanga lonkhe bamisa emathende abo esigodzini, basibita ngekutsi sigodzi sa-Alima, ngoba wabahola endleleni yabo leya ehlane.
24.21: Yebo, kuso sigodzi sa-Alima bathandaza ngekubonga kakhulu kuNkulunkulu ngoba bekabe nesihawu kubo, futsi wenta yabalula imitfwalo yabo, futsi wabakhulula baphuma ebugcilini; ngoba bebasebugcilini, futsi kwakute namunye lobekangabakhulula ngaphandle kwekutsi kube yiNkhosi.
24.22: Futsi bambonga Nkulunkulu, yebo, bonkhe besilisa babo nabo bonkhe besifazane babo kanye nabo bonkhe bantfwana babo labebakwati kukhuluma baphakamisa emavi abo badvumisa Nkulunkulu wabo.
24.23: Manje iNkhosi yatsi ku-Alima: Sheshisa uphume kanye nalabantfu kulelive, ngoba emaLamani sekavukile futsi ayakulandzela; ngako-ke phuma kulelive futsi ngitawuwamisa emaLamani kuso lesi sigodzi kute angasondzeli ekucosheni laba bantfu.
24.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi besuka baphuma esigodzini, batsatsa luhambo lwabo baya ehlane.
24.25: Futsi emvakwekutsi sebabe sehlane tinsuku letilishumi nakubili befika eveni laseZarahemla; inkhosi Mosiya nayo yabemukela ngenjabulo.

25.1: Manje iNkhosi Mosiya yenta kutsi bonkhe bantfu babutsane ndzawonye.
25.2: Manje bebangabaningi kakhulu labebabantfwana baNefi, noma bebangabaningi kakhulu labo labebabesitukulwane saNefi, njengoba bekunjalo ngebantfu baZarahemla, labekawesitukulwane saMuleki, kanye nalabo labeta naye ehlane.
25.3: Futsi bebangabaningi kakhulu labebabantfu baNefi kanye nalabebabantfu baZarahemla njengoba bekunjalo kulabebangemaLamani; yebo, bebangasiyo ngisho incenye lenkhulu kakhulu.
25.4: Manje bonkhe bantfu baNefi bebabutsene ndzawonye, futsi ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe bantfu baZarahemla, futsi bebubutsene ndzawonye bangemacembu lamabili.
25.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Mosiya wayifundza, futsi wenta kutsi ifundvwe, imibhalo yaZenifi ifundzelwe bantfu bakhe; yebo, wayifundza imibhalo yebantfu baZenifi, kusukela ngesikhatsi bashiya eveni laseZarahemla bate babuya futsi.
25.6: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko wafundza umlandvo wa-Alima kanye nabomnakabo, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlupheko tabo, kusukela ngesikhatsi bashiya eveni laseZarahemhla kute kube ngesikhatsi babuya futsi.
25.7: Manje, ngesikhatsi Mosiya sekente siphetfo sekufundza imibhalo, bantfu bakhe labebahlala eveni baba nekumangala kanye nekushaceka.
25.8: Ngoba bebangati kutsi bacabange ini; ngoba ngesikhatsi babona labo labebakhululiwe baphuma ebugcilini bagcwala kujabula lokukhulu kakhulu.
25.9: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngesikhatsi bacabanga ngabomnakabo labebabulewe ngemaLamani bagcwala lusizi, bakhala tinyembeti letiningi telusizi.
25.10: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngesikhatsi bacabanga ngebuhle baNkulunkulu lobucondza ngco kubantfu, kanye nemandla akhe ekukhululeni Alima kanye nabomnakabo baphuma etandleni temaLamani kanye nasebugcilini, baphakamisa emavi abo bambonga Nkulunkulu.
25.11: Futsi, ngesikhatsi bacabanga ngemaLamani, labekabomnakabo, ngekona kwawo kanye nangesimo sawo lesingcolile, bagcwala buhlungu nekudzabuka ngalokuphatselene nekuzuza kwemiphefumulo yawo.
25.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo labebabantfwana ba-Amuloni kanye nabomnakabo, labebatsetse emadvodzakati emaLamani kuwashada, abaphatsekanga kahle ngendlela boyise labebatiphetse ngayo, futsi bona abazange basabitwa ngemabito aboyise, ngako-ke batitsatsela libito laNefi, kute babitwe ngebantfwana baNefi futsi babalwe kanye nalabo labebabitwa ngekutsi bangemaNefi.
25.13: Manje bonkhe bantfu baZarahemla babalwa nemaNefi, futsi loku kungenca yekutsi umbuso wawunganiketwanga muntfu kodvwa kulabo labebabesitukulwane saNefi.
25.14: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Mosiya sekente siphetfo senkhulumo kanye nekufundzela bantfu bakhe, waba nesifiso sekutsi Alima naye ngalokunjalo akhulume kubantfu.
25.15: Futsi Alima wakhuluma kubo, ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebabutsene ndzawonye ngemacembu lamakhulu, wahamba wesuka kulinye licembu waya kulelinye, ashumayela kubantfu kuphendvuka nekukholwa eNkhosini.
25.16: Futsi wabancusa bantfu baLimhayi kanye nabomnakabo, bonkhe labo labebakhululiwe baphuma ebugcilini, kutsi bakhumbule kutsi bekuyiNkhosi leyabakhulula.
25.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Alima sekabafundzisile bantfu tintfo letiningi, sekente siphetfo sekukhuluma nabo, inkhosi Limhayi yaba nesifiso sekutsi ibhajatiswe; kanjalo nabo bonkhe bantfu bayo babanesifiso sekutsi nabo babhajatiswe.
25.18: Ngako-ke, Alima wahamba waya emantini futsi wababhabhatisa; yebo, wababhabhatisa ngendlela leyo lekenta ngayo kubomnakabo emantini aMormon; yebo, futsi ngebuningi balabo lababhabhatisa bangena ebandleni laNkulunkulu; futsi loku bekungenca yekukholelwa kwabo emavini a-Alima.
25.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Mosiya yaniketa Alima kutsi akhe emabandla kulo lonkhe live laseZarahemla; futsi yamnika emandla ekutsi abeke baphristi kanye nebafundzisi ngetulu kwawo onkhe emabandla.
25.20: Manje loku kwentiwa ngenca yekutsi bebabanini kakhulu bantfu kangangekutsi bebangenakuphatfwa ngumfundzisi munye; noma bonkhe bakwati kuliva livi laNkulunkulu embutsanweni munye;
25.21: Ngako-ke babutsana ndzawonye emacembu lehlukene, babitwa ngekutsi bangemabandla; libandla ngelibandla linebaphristi balo kanye nebafundzisi balo, futsi wonkhe umphristi ashumayela livi njengoba beliniketwe kuye ngemlomo wa-Alima.
25.22: Futsi ngaleso sizatfu, nanoma bekungemabandla lamaningi bonkhe bebalibandla linye, yebo, libandla laNkulunkulu; ngoba bekute lutfo lolwalushunyayelwa kuwo onkhe emabandla ngaphandle kwekuphendvuka kanye nelukholo kuNkulunkulu.
25.23: Manje besekukhona emabandla lasikhombisa eveni laseZarahemla. Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo labebanesifiso sekubitwa ngelibito laKhristu, noma laNkulunkulu, batihlanganisa nemabandla aNkulunkulu;
25.24: Futsi bebabitwa ngekutsi bantfu baNkulunkulu. Futsi iNkhosi yatsela Moya wayo etikwabo, babusiseka, baphumelela eveni.

26.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi bebabaningi besitukulwane lesikhulako labebangakwati kuwacondza emavi enkhosi Bhenjamini, basebantfwana labancane ngaleso sikhatsi akhuluma kubantfu bakhe; futsi bebangakholelwa kuwo emasiko aboyise.
26.2: Bebangakholwa nguloko kwakushiwo mayelana nekuvuka kwalabafile, noma bakholwe mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu.
26.3: Manje ngenca yekungakholwa kwabo abakwatanga kulicondza livi laNkulunkulu; futsi tinhlitiyo tabo tatilukhuni.
26.4: Futsi abazange babhajatiswe; noma batihlanganise nelibandla. Bebabantfu labehlukile ngekwelukholo lwabo, bahlala banjalo nangemvakwaloko, nasesimeni sabo sekunaka inyama kanye nalesigcwele kona; ngoba abazange bayibite iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
26.5: Manje ekubuseni kwaMosiya bebangasiyo ngisho nencenye lenkhulu njengebantfu baNkulunkulu; kodvwa ngenca yekuphikisana emkhatsini webazalwane bona bandza kakhulu.
26.6: Ngoba kwenteka kutsi babakhohlisa labaningi ngemavi abo lalutsako, labo labebasebandleni, futsi babenta kutsi bente tono letiningi; ngako-ke kwenteka kutsi kwadzingeka kutsi labo labente sono, labebasebandleni, bayalwe libandla.
26.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baletfwa phambi kwebaphristi, betfulwa kubaphristi bafundzisi; futsi baphristi babaletsa phambi kwa-Alima, lobekangumphristi lomkhulu.
26.8: Manje inkhosi Mosiya beyinikete Alima ligunya ngetulu kwelibandla.
26.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima bekangati labekumele akwente mayelana nabo; kodvwa bekukhona bofakazi labaningi ngalokumelene nabo; yebo, bantfu bema bafakaza ngebubi babo lobuningi.
26.10: Manje kwakungakate kube khona intfo lenje leyake yenteka ebandleni ngaphambilini; ngako-ke Alima wakhatsateka emoyeni wakhe, futsi wenta kutsi baletfwe phambi kwenkhosi.
26.11: Watsi enkhosini: Buka, naba labaningi lesibaletse phambi kwakho, lababekwe licala bazalwane babo; yebo, futsi batfolwe benta bubi lobuyinhlobonhlobo. Futsi abaphendvuki ebubini babo; ngako-ke sibaletse phambi kwakho, kute ubehlulele ngekwemacala abo.
26.12: Kodvwa inkhosi Mosiya yatsi ku-Alima: Buka, angeke ngibehlulele; ngako-ke ngibanikela etandleni takho kute behlulelwe.
26.13: Manje moya wa-Alima waphindze wakhatsateka; wahamba wayobuta eNkhosini kutsi kufanele enteni mayelana naloludzaba, ngoba bekesaba kutsi angahle ente lokungakalungi emehlweni aNkulunkulu.
26.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekathandaze ngenshisekelo lenkhulu kuNkulunkulu, livi leNkhosi lafika kuye, litsi:
26.15: Ubusisiwe, Alima, futsi babusisiwe labo lababhajatiswa emantini aMormon. Ubusisiwe ngenca yelukholo lwakho lolukhulu emavini odvwa nje enceku yami Abinadi.
26.16: Futsi babusisiwe labo ngenca yelukholo lwabo lolukhulu emavini odvwa nje lowuwakhulume kubo.
26.17: Futsi ubusisiwe ngoba umise libandla emkhatsini walaba bantfu; bayawumiswa, futsi bayawukuba bantfu bami.
26.18: Yebo, babusisiwe laba bantfu labanesifiso sekutsi babitwe ngelibito lami; ngoba bayawubitwa ngelibito lami; futsi bangebami.
26.19: Futsi ngenca yekutsi ubute kimi mayelana nesoni, ubusisiwe.
26.20: Uyinceku yami; futsi ngenta sivumelwano nawe sekutsi uyawukuba nekuphila lokuphakadze; futsi uyawungisebentela uphindze uhambe egameni lami, ugcogcela dzawonye timvu tami.
26.21: Futsi loyo lotawukuva livi lami uyawuba yimvu yami; futsi uyawumemukela ebandleni, nami ngalokunjalo ngitawumemukela.
26.22: Ngoba buka, leli libandla lami; noma ngubani lobhajatiswako uyawubhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni. Futsi nanoma ngubani lowemukelako uyawukholwa egameni lami; futsi ngitawumtsetselela ngekukhululeka.
26.23: Ngoba ngimi lotfwala tono temhlaba; ngoba ngimi lobadalile; futsi ngimi lomniketako loyo lokholwako kute kube sekugcineni indzawo esandleni sami sangesekudla.
26.24: Ngoba buka, babitwa ngelibito lami; futsi uma bangati bayawukuta ngaphambili, babe nendzawo yaphakadze esandleni sami sangesekudla.
26.25: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi licilongo lesibili likhala ngaleso sikhatsi labo labangazange bangati bayawukuta ngaphambili futsi beme phambi kwami.
26.26: Ngaleso sikhatsi bayawukwati kutsi ngiyiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, nginguMhlengi wabo; kodvwa bona bakhetsa kungahlengwa.
26.27: Ngaleso sikhatsi ngitawuvuma kubo kutsi angizange ngibati; futsi bayawuhamba baye emlilweni longapheli lolungiswe ngudeveli kanye netingilosi takhe.
26.28: Ngako-ke ngitsi kuwe, loyo longeke alive livi lami, nguye kanye loyo longayumemukela ebandleni lami, ngoba loyo angeke ngimemukele ngelusuku lwekugcina.
26.29: Ngako-ke ngitsi kuwe, Hamba; futsi noma ngubani lowonako ngalokumelene nami, loyo uyawumehlulela njengekwetono takhe latentile; futsi uma ativuma tono takhe phambi kwakho nami, futsi aphendvuke ngekweliciniso enhlitiyweni yakhe, uyawumtsetselela, nami ngalokunjalo ngitawumtsetselela.
26.30: Yebo, futsi njalo nje uma bantfu bami baphendvuka ngitawubatsetselela etiphambekweni tabo ngalokumelene nami.
26.31: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko niyawutsetselelana loyo naloyo tiphambeko tenu; ngoba ngicinisile ngitsi kuwe, loyo longamtsetseleli makhelwane wakhe tiphambeko takhe ngesikhatsi atsi uyaphendvuka, loyo utiletsela sijeziso.
26.32: Manje ngitsi kuwe, Hamba; futsi nanoma ngubani longeke aphendvuke etonweni takhe loyo akayukubalwa nebantfu bami; futsi loku kuyawugcinwa kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili.
26.33: Futsi kwenteka ngesikhatsi Alima sekawavile lamavi wawabhala phansi kute abe nawo, kute ehlulele bantfu belibandla njengekwemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
26.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima wahamba wabehlulela labo labebabanjwe benta bubi, njengekwelivi leNkhosi.
26.35: Futsi nanoma bobani labebaphendvuka etonweni tabo futsi bativuma, wababala nebantfu belibandla;
26.36: Futsi labo labangativumanga tono tabo futsi bangaphendvuki ebubini babo, ababalwanga kanye nebantfu belibandla, futsi emabito abo esulwa.
26.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima watilawula tonkhe tindzaba telibandla; bacala kutsi babe nekuthula futsi baphumelela kakhulu etindzabeni telibandla, bahamba ngekucaphela phambi kwaNkulunkulu, bemukela labaningi, futsi babhabhatisa labaningi.
26.38: Manje tonkhe leti tintfo Alima kanye nalabo labekasebenta nabo labebangamele libandla batenta, bahamba ngako kukhutsala, bafundzisa livi laNkulunkulu kuto tonkhe tintfo, bahlupheka ngalo lonkhe luhlobo lwetinhlupheko, bahlushwa ngibo bonkhe labo labebangesibo belibandla laNkulunkulu.
26.39: Futsi bayala bazalwane babo; nabo ngalokunjalo bayalwa, wonkhe umuntfu ngelivi laNkulunkulu, ngekwetono takhe, noma kuleto tono labekatentile, bayaletwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi bathandaze bangayekeli, futsi babonge kuto tonkhe tintfo.

27.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi kuhlushwa lokwatfwaliswa libandla ngulabangakholwa kwaba kukhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi libandla lacala lavungama, lakhonona kubaholi balo mayelana naloludzaba; bakhonona naku-Alima. Futsi Alima walubeka ludzaba phambi kwenkhosi yabo, Mosiya. Mosiya wabonisana nebaphristi bakhe.
27.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Mosiya yatfumela simemetelo kulo lonkhe live jikelele kutsi kube bete muntfu longakholwa lotawuhlupha noma ngubani walabo labebabelibandla laNkulunkulu.
27.3: Futsi kwaba khona umyalo locinile kuwo onkhe emabandla jikelele wekutsi kube bete kuhluphana emkhatsini wabo, nekutsi kufanele kube khona kulingana emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu;
27.4: Nekutsi bangavumeli kutigcabha nekutikhukhumeta kuphatamise kuthula kwabo; nekutsi wonkhe umuntfu akamatise makhelwane wakhe njengoba atatisa yena, basebente ngetandla tabo lucobo kutondla bona.
27.5: Yebo, futsi bonkhe baphristi kanye nebafundzisi babo kufanele basebente ngetandla tabo lucobo kute batondle bona, ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi ngaphandle nangabe bagula, noma badzinga kakhulu; futsi ngekwenta leti tintfo, bagcwaliswa ngemusa waNkulunkulu.
27.6: Kwacala kwaba nekuthula lokukhulu futsi eveni; nebantfu bacala kuba baningi kakhulu, bacala kuhlakateka ndzawotonkhe emhlabeni wonkhe, yebo, enyakatfo kanye naseningizimu, emphumalanga kanye nasenshonalanga, bakha emadolobha lamakhulu kanye nemadolobhana kowo onkhe emagumbi lamane elive.
27.7: Futsi iNkhosi yabavakashela yaphindze yabaphumelelisa, baba baningi futsi baba bantfu labanotsile.
27.8: Manje emadvodzana aMosiya bekabalwa kanye nalabo labebangakholwa; futsi ngalokunjalo namunye wemadvodzana a-Alima bekabalwa nabo, abitwa ngekutsi ngu-Alima, lekulibito leyise; noko waba yindvodza lekhohlakele kakhulu futsi akhonta tithico. Futsi bekayindvodza leyayinebuciko, waphindze wabayenga kakhulu bantfu; ngako-ke wahola labaningi bantfu kutsi bente ngendlela yebubi bakhe.
27.9: Futsi waba ngulesikhulu sivimbelo ekutfutfukeni kwelibandla laNkulunkulu; antjontja tinhlitiyo tebantfu; abanga kuphikisana lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu; aniketa litfuba sitsa saNkulunkulu kutsi sisebentise emandla aso ngetulu kwabo.
27.10: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi ahamba azulazula acitsa libandla laNkulunkulu, ngoba bekahamba ngansense azulazula kanye nemadvodzana aMosiya afuna kucitsa libandla, futsi afuna kudukisa bantfu beNkhosi, ngekuphikisana nemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, noma nenkhosi—
27.11: Futsi njengoba ngitse kini, njengoba bebahamba bazulazula bavukela Nkulunkulu, buka ingilosi yeNkhosi yavela kubo; yehla shengatsi yayiselifini; yakhuluma shengatsi kwakulivi lekudvuma kwelitulu, lelenta kutsi umhlaba labebeme kuwo utamatame.
27.12: Futsi kwaba kukhulu kwetfuka kwabo, kangangekutsi bawela phansi, futsi abazange bawacondze lawo mavi leyawakhuluma nabo.
27.13: Noko yaphindze yamemeta, itsi: Alima, vuka ute ngaphambili, ngoba kungani uhlupha libandla laNkulunkulu na? Ngoba iNkhosi itse: Leli libandla lami, ngitawulimisa; futsi kute intfo leyawulicitsa, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube tiphambeko tebantfu bami.
27.14: Ngetulu kwaloko, ingilosi yatsi: Buka, iNkhosi iyivile imithandazo yebantfu bayo, futsi ngalokunjalo nemithandazo yenceku yayo, Alima, longuyihlo; ngoba uthandaze ngelukholo lolukhulu mayelana nawe kutsi uletfwe elwatini leliciniso; ngako-ke, ngalena nhloso ngite kutokwenelisa ngemandla kanye neligunya laNkulunkulu, kute imithandazo yetinceku takhe iphendvuleke ngekwelukholo lwabo.
27.15: Manje buka, ungawangabata yini emandla aNkulunkulu na? Ngoba buka, ngabe livi lami alitamatamisi umhlaba yini? Futsi ngetulu kwaloko awungiboni yini phambi kwakho na? Futsi ngitfunyiwe ngivela kuNkulunkulu.
27.16: Manje ngitsi kuwe: Hamba, ukhumbule kutfunjwa kwaboyihlo eveni laseHilamu, kanye naseveni laNefi; futsi ukhumbule kutsi tinkhulu kanganani tintfo labentele tona; ngoba bebasekutfunjweni, futsi ubakhululile. Manje ngitsi kuwe, Alima, hamba ngendlela yakho, ungaphindzi ufune kubhubhisa libandla, kute imithandazo yabo iphendvulwe, noma ngabe wena lucobo lwakho utawufuna kulahlwa.
27.17: Manje kwenteka kutsi lawa kwakungemavi ekugcina ingilosi leyawakhuluma ku-Alima, yase iyahamba.
27.18: Manje Alima kanye nalabo bekanabo baphindze bawela phansi, ngoba kwaba kukhulu kwetfuka kwabo, ngoba ngewabo emehlo bebabone ingilosi yeNkhosi; futsi livi layo lalinjengekudvuma kwelitulu, lelatamatamisa umhlaba, futsi bati kutsi kwakute lutfo lolwalungatamatamisa umhlaba ngaphandle kwemandla aNkulunkulu futsi ente kutamatame shengatsi kwakutohlukana ekhatsi.
27.19: Manje kwetfuka kwa-Alima kwaba kukhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi waphendvuka simungulu, kangangekutsi akakwatanga kuvula umlomo wakhe; yebo, futsi waba butsakatsaka, ngendlela yekutsi akakwatanga ngisho nekunyakatisa tandla takhe; ngako-ke watsatfwa ngulabo labekanabo, wetfwalwa angakhoni ngisho kwentani, wate wayawubekwa phambi kweyise.
27.20: Futsi balandzisa kuyise konkhe lokwakwentekile kubo; neyise watfokota, ngoba bekati kutsi kwakungemandla aNkulunkulu.
27.21: Wenta kutsi sicuku sibutsane ndzawonye kute sibone kutsi iNkhosi iyenteleni indvodzana yakhe, kanjalo nalabo labebanayo.
27.22: Wenta kutsi baphristi babutsane ndzawonye; bacala kuzila kudla, kanye nekuthandaza eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo kutsi ivule umlomo wa-Alima, kute akhulume, futsi ngalokunjalo nekutsi emalunga akhe atfole emandla awo—kute emehlo ebantfu avuleke kutsi babone bphindze bati ngebuhle kanye nenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu.
27.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebazile kudla futsi bathandaza sikhatsi lesitinsuku letimbili kanye nebusuku lobubili, emalunga a-Alima atfola emandla awo, wasukuma wacala kukhuluma kubo, wabancenga kutsi badvudvuteke.
27.24: Ngoba, watsi, sengiphendvukile etonweni tami, futsi sengihlengwe yiNkhosi; bukani sengitelwe ngekwakaMoya.
27.25: Futsi iNkhosi itse kimi: Ungamangali kutsi bonkhe bantfu, yebo, besilisa nebesifazane, tive tonkhe, imindeni, tilimi kanye nebantfu, kufanele batalwe kabusha; yebo, batalwe ngekwakaNkulunkulu, bashintje esimeni sabo sekunaka inyama nesekuwa, babe sesimeni sekulunga, bahlengwe nguNkulunkulu, babe ngemadvodzana nemadvodzakati akhe.
27.26: Futsi ngalendlela baba tidalwa letinsha; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi bente loku, kute ngisho nalencane indlela kutsi badle lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu.
27.27: Ngitsi kini, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube njalo, kufanele balahlwe; futsi loku ngiyakwati, ngenca yekutsi ngicishe ngalahlwa.
27.28: Noko, emvakwekwendlula ekuhluphekeni lokukhulu, ngiphendvuka ngisondzele ekufeni, iNkhosi lenemusa ibone kufanele kutsi ingihlwitse ngiphume ekusheni kwaphakadze, futsi sengitelwe ngekwakaNkulunkulu.
27.29: Umphefumulo wami uhlengiwe enyongweni lebabako nasetinketaneni tebubi. Ngangisemhumeni lomnyama bhuce; kodvwa manje sengibona kukhanya lokumangalisako kwaNkulunkulu. Umphefumulo wami wawuhlushwe buhlungu baphakadze; kodvwa ngihlwitsiwe, futsi umphefumulo wami awusenabuhlungu.
27.30: Ngamlahla uMhlengi wami, futsi ngakuphika naloko lokwakukhulunywe bobabe betfu; kodvwa manje kute babone kutsi utawufika, futsi nekutsi uyatikhumbula tonkhe tidalwa latibumbile, utawutiveta kubo bonkhe.
27.31: Yebo, onkhe emadvolo ayawukhotsama, futsi tonkhe tilimi tiyawuvuma phambi kwakhe. Yebo, nangelusuku lwekugcina, ngesikhatsi bonkhe bantfu bayawukuma kutsi behlulelwe nguye, ngaleso sikhatsi bayawuvuma kutsi yena nguNkulunkulu; ngaleso sikhatsi bayawuvuma, labo labangakholwa kuNkulunkulu emhlabeni, kutsi kwehlulela kwesijeziso saphakadze kulungile kubo; futsi bayawutfutfumela, bachachatele, futsi bashwaphane ngaphansi kwekubona kweliso lakhe lelibona konkhe.
27.32: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima wacala kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili kutsi afundzise bantfu, kanye nalabo labebana-Alima ngesikhatsi ingilosi ichamuka kubo, bahamba batungeleta live, bamemetela kubo bonkhe bantfu tintfo labebativile futsi batibonile, futsi bashumayela livi laNkulunkulu ekuhluphekeni lokukhulu, bahlushwa kakhulu ngulabo labebangakholwa, bashaywa ngulabaningi babo.
27.33: Kodvwa nanoma kungenca yako konkhe loku, banika indvudvuto lenkhulu ebandleni, bacinisa lukholo lwabo, futsi babancusa ngekumela bulukhuni kanye nangekuhlupheka lokukhulu kutsi bagcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
27.34: Futsi labane babo kwakungemadvodzana aMosiya; emabito abo kwakungu-Amoni, na-Aroni, na-Omineri kanye naHimini; lawa kwakungemabito emadvodzana aMosiya.
27.35: Futsi bahamba balicedza lonkhe live laseZarahemla, nasemkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu labebangaphansi kwekubuswa yinkhosi Mosiya, ngekutikhandla betama kulungisa konkhe konakala labebakwentile ebandleni, bavuma tonkhe tono tabo, futsi bamemetela tonkhe tintfo labebatibonile, futsi bachaza tiphrofetho kanye nemibhalo lengcwele kubo bonkhe labebanesifiso sekukuva.
27.36: Futsi ngalendlela baba tikhali etandleni taNkulunkulu ekuletseni labaningi elwatini lweliciniso, yebo, elwatini lweMhlengi wabo.
27.37: Futsi babusiswe kangakanani! Ngoba bakumemetela kuthula; batimemetela tindzaba letimnandzi tebuhle; futsi bamemetela ebantfwini kutsi iNkhosi iyabusa.

28.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi emadvodzana aMosiya sekatentile tonkhe leti tintfo, atsatsa sibalo lesincane kanye nawo abuyela kuyise, inkhosi, futsi anesifiso sekutsi iwavumele kutsi, wona kanye nalabo labebabakhetsile, bahambe bakhuphukele eveni laNefi kute bayoshumayela tintfo lebebativile, nekutsi bayokwabelana ngelivi laNkulunkulu nabomnakabo, emaLamani—
28.2: Kute mhlawumbe babaletse elwatini lweNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, futsi babente baneliswe ngebubi baboyise; nekutsi mhlawumbe babalaphe ekutondvweni kwabo kumaNefi, kute nabo bentiwe bajabule eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, kute babe nebungani kuloyo naloyo, kanye nekutsi kungabe kusaba khona imibango nanini kulo lonkhe live iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo lebanike lona.
28.3: Manje bebanesifiso sekutsi insindziso imenyetelwe kuto tonkhe tidalwa, ngoba abakwatanga kukumela kutsi noma ngumuphi umphefumulo wemuntfu ulahleke; yebo, nemicabango nje yekutsi noma ngumuphi umphefumulo kufanele uve buhlungu lobungapheli kwabenta kutsi batfutfumele futsi bachachatele.
28.4: Futsi Moya weNkhosi wasebenta ngaleyondlela kubo, ngoba bebatoni letimbi kakhulu, futsi iNkhosi yabona kufanele ngemusa wayo longapheli kutsi ibasindzise; noko beva lobukhulu buhlungu emphefumulweni ngenca yebubi babo, bahluphekile kakhulu futsi besaba kutsi bebayawulahlwa ingunaphakadze.
28.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bamncenga uyise tinsuku letiningi kutsi bahambe bakhuphukele eveni laNefi.
28.6: Inkhosi Mosiya yahamba futsi yayobuta eNkhosini kutsi iwavumele yini emadvodzana ayo ahambe akhuphukele emkhatsini wemaLamani kutsi ayoshumayela livi.
28.7: INkhosi yatsi kuMosiya: Bavumele bahambe bakhuphuke, ngoba baningi labayawukholelwa emavini abo, futsi bayawuba nekuphila lokuphakadze; futsi ngitawukhulula emadvodzana akho aphume etandleni temaLamani.
28.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Mosiya wabavumela kutsi bahambe futsi bente njengekwesicelo sabo.
28.9: Batsatsa luhambo lwabo baya ehlane bahamba bakhuphuke bayoshumayela livi emkhatsini wemaLamani; futsi ngiyawuniketa umlandvo ngetento tabo emvakwaloku.
28.10: Manje inkhosi Mosiya beyingenamuntfu wekutsi imnike umbuso, ngoba bekute namunye wemadvodzana ayo labekayawuvuma kutsatsa umbuso.
28.11: Ngako-ke watsatsa imibhalo lebeyicoshwe kubongcwengcwe belitfutsi, ngalokunjalo nakubongcwengcwe baNefi, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo lebekatigcinile futsi atilondvolotile njengekwemiyaleto yaNKulunkulu, emvakwekutsi sekayihumushile wenta kutsi imibhalo ibhalwe leyo lebeyikubongcwengcwe beligolide lebeyitfolwe bantfu baLimhayi, lebeyiletfwe kuye ngesandla saLimhayi;
28.12: Futsi loku wakwenta ngenca yenshisekelo lenkhulu yebantfu bakhe; ngoba bebanesifiso lesingenakulinganiswa sekutsi bati mayelana nalabo bantfu labebabhujisiwe.
28.13: Manje watihumusha ngekusebentisa lawo matje lamabili laboshelwe emngcengcemeni weluhlaka.
28.14: Manje leti tintfo betilungiswe kusukela ekucaleni, futsi betindlulisiwe tehla titukulwane ngetitukulwane, ngenhloso yekuhumusha tilimi;
28.15: Futsi betigciniwe futsi talondvolotwa ngesandla seNkhosi, kute ivetele tonkhe tidalwa letiyotsatsa live bubi kanye netinengiso tebantfu bayo;
28.16: Futsi loyo lonaleti tintfo ubitwa ngekutsi ngumboni, ngendlela yesikhatsi sakudzala.
28.17: Manje emvakwekutsi Mosiya sekacedzile kuhumusha lemibhalo, buka, yanika umlandvo webantfu labebabhujisiwe, kusukela ngesikhatsi lababhujiswa ngaso kuya emuva ekwakhiweni kwembhoshongo lomkhulu, ngesikhatsi iNkhosi iphambanisa lulwimi lwebantfu futsi bahlakatwa ndzawotonkhe emhlabeni wonkhe, yebo, futsi kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya emuva kute kube sekudalweni kwa-Adamu.
28.18: Manje lomlandvo wenta bantfu baMosiya kutsi bakhale kakhulu, yebo, bebagcwele lusizi; noko wabanika lwati loluningi, lekwatsi ngalo bajabula.
28.19: Futsi lomlandvo uyawubhalwa emvakwaloku; ngoba buka, kuhle kutsi bonkhe bantfu bayawutati tintfo letibhalwe kulomlandvo.
28.20: Manje, njengoba ngishito kini, kutsi emvakwekutsi inkhosi Mosiya seyitentile leti tintfo, yatsatsa bongcwengcwe belitfusi, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo lebeyitigcinile, yatinika Alima, lobekayindvodzana ya-Alima; yebo, yonkhe imibhalo, futsi ngalokunjalo netihumushi, futsi yatiniketa yena, yamyaleta kutsi atigcine futsi atilondvolote, futsi ngetulu kwaloko agcine nembhalo webantfu, atindlulise tehle kusukela esitukulwaneni kuya kulesinye, nanjengoba tatindlulisiwe kwehla kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi ashiya eJerusalema.

29.1: Manje emvakwekutsi Mosiya sekakwentile loku watfumela kulo lonkhe live, kubo bonkhe bantfu, anesifiso sekwati intsandvo yabo mayelana nekutsi ngubani lobekatoba yinkhosi yabo.
29.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi lebantfu lefika, litsi: Sinesifiso sekutsi Aroni indvodzana yakho ibe yinkhosi yetfu kanye nembusi wetfu.
29.3: Manje Aroni bekahambile wakhuphukela eveni laNefi, ngako-ke inkhosi ayikhonanga kuniketa umbuso kuye; futsi naye Aroni akawemukelanga umbuso; futsi akubanga khona namunye kumadvodzana aMosiya lobekatimisele kutsatsa umbuso.
29.4: Ngako-ke inkhosi Mosiya yaphindza yatfumela kubantfu; yebo, yatfumela nangelivi lelibhaliwe kubantfu. Futsi lawa ngemavi labekabhaliwe, atsi:
29.5: Bukani, Awu nine bantfu bami, noma bomnaketfu, ngoba nginitsatsa kanjalo, ngifisa kutsi nisicabange simo lenibitelwe kutsi nisicabange—ngoba ninesifiso sekutsi nibe nenkhosi.
29.6: Manje ngimemetela kini kutsi loyo lokunguye lonelilungelo lembuso walile, futsi angeke awutsatse umbuso.
29.7: Manje uma kungaba khona lomunye longabekwa esikhundleni sakhe, bukani ngesaba kutsi kuyawuvuka imibango emkhatsini wenu. Futsi ngubani lowatiko kumbe indvodzana yami, umbuso lekufanele ube ngewayo, iyawushintja itfukutsele futsi idvonsele khashane incenye yalaba bantfu bete kuyo, lokuyawudala timphi kanye nemibango emkhatsini wenu, lokuyawuba sizatfu sekucitsa ingati leningi kanye nekugucula indlela yeNkhosi, yebo, futsi kubhubhise imiphefumulo yalabaningi bantfu.
29.8: Manje ngitsi kini asihlakaniphe siphindze sicabange ngaleti tintfo, ngoba asinalo lilungelo lekubulala indvodzana yami, futsi akukafaneli sibe nelilungelo noma liphi lekutsi sibulale lomunye uma angabekwa esikhundleni sayo.
29.9: Futsi uma indvodzana yami ingaphindza ibuyele ekutichenyeni kwayo kanye nasetintfweni letinye iyawutihocisa tintfo leyatisho, futsi bese ifuna lilungelo layo lembuso, loko lokuyawuyenta futsi ngalokunjalo nalaba bantfu kutsi bente tono letiningi.
29.10: Manje asihlakaniphe futsi sibuke embili kuleti tintfo, futsi sente loko lokutawenta kuthula kwalaba bantfu.
29.11: Ngako-ke ngitawuba yinkhosi yenu etinsukwini tami letisele; noko, asibeke behluleli, kutsi behlulele laba bantfu ngekwemtsetfo wetfu; futsi sitawutihlela kabusha tindzaba talabantfu, ngoba sitawubeka bantfu labahlakaniphile kutsi babe behluleli, labatawukwehlulela laba bantfu ngekwemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
29.12: Manje kuncono kutsi umuntfu ehlulelwe ngekwakaNkulunkulu kunekutsi kube ngekwemuntfu, ngoba tehlulelo taNkulunkulu tihlale tilungile njalo, kodvwa tehlulelo temuntfu atihlali tilungile njalo.
29.13: Ngako-ke, uma bekungenteka kutsi nibe nemadvodza lalungile kutsi abe ngemakhosi enu, layawumisa imitsetfo yaNkulunkulu, futsi ehlulele laba bantfu ngekwemiyaleto yakhe, yebo, uma beningakwati kutsi nibe nemadvodza abe ngemakhosi enu langenta njengoba babe Bhenjamini abentela laba bantfu—ngitsi kini, uma loku bekungase kuhlale kunjalo bekuyawuba kuhle kutsi nibe nemakhosi kutsi abuse ngetulu kwenu njalonjalo.
29.14: Futsi nanami lucobo lwami ngisebentile ngawo onkhe emandla kanye netikhwepha lenginato, kutsi nginifundzise imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, futsi ngakhe kuthula kulo lonkhe live, kute kungabi khona timphi nemibango, nekweba, nekuphanga, noma nanoma hlobo luni lwebubi;
29.15: Futsi loyo lowente bubi, ngimjezisile njengekwelicala lelo lalentile, ngekwemtsetfo loyo lesiniketwe wona bobabe betfu.
29.16: Manje ngitsi kini, ngenca yekutsi bonkhe bantfu abakalungi akukafaneli kutsi nibe nenkhosi noma emakhosi kutsi abuse ngetulu kwenu.
29.17: Ngoba bukani, buningi kangakanani bubi inkhosi lembi yinye leyenta kutsi bentiwe, yebo, futsi kukhulu kangakanani kubhujiswa!
29.18: Yebo, khumbulani inkhosi Nowa, bubi bayo kanye netinengiso tayo, futsi ngalokunjalo nebubi kanye netinengiso tebantfu bayo. Bukani kukhulu kangakanani kubhujiswa lokwafika etikwabo; ngetulu kwaloko ngenca yebubi babo baletfwa ebugcilini.
29.19: Futsi kube bekungasiko kutsi bekungenca yekulanyulelwa nguMdali wabo lonekuhlakanipha konkhe, futsi loku ngenca yekuphendvuka kwabo kweliciniso, bekufanele basale ngalokungenakuvinjelwa ebugcilini kute kube manje.
29.20: Kodvwa bukani, wabakhulula ngenca yekutsi batitfoba phambi kwakhe; futsi ngenca yekutsi bakhala kakhulu kuye wabakhulula wabakhipha ebugcilini; futsi iNkhosi isebenta kanjalo ngemandla ayo kuto tonkhe timo emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, yelula sandla semusa kulabo lababeka litsemba labo kuyo.
29.21: Futsi bukani, manje ngitsi kini, aninakuyisusa esihlalweni inkhosi lenebubi ngaphandle kwekutsi kube khona umbango lomkhulu, kanye nekucitseka kwengati leningi.
29.22: Ngoba bukani, inebangani bayo ebubini, futsi igcina labayigadzako edvute nayo; futsi idzabula imitsetfo yalabo lababuse ngekulunga phambi kwayo; futsi inyatsela ngaphansi kwetinyawo tayo imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
29.23: Imisa imitsetfo, iyitfumele kubantfu bayo, yebo, imitsetfo lehambisana nenkhohlakalo yayo lucobo; futsi loyo longayilaleli imitsetfo yayo yenta kutsi abulawe; futsi labo labayivukelako itawutfumela emabutfo ayo kubo kutsi ayokulwa, futsi uma kungenteka itawubabulala; futsi inkhosi lengakalungi itigucukela kanjalo-ke tindlela tako konkhe kulunga.
29.24: Manje bukani ngitsi kini, akukafaneli kutsi tinengiso letinjena tite etikwenu.
29.25: Ngako-ke, khetsani ngelivi lalabantfu, behluleli, kute nehlulelwe ngekwemitsetfo leyo leninikwe yona bobabe betfu, lelungile, futsi labebaniketwe yona ngesandla seNkhosi.
29.26: Manje akukajwayeleki kutsi livi lebantfu lifise nanoma yini lengahambisani naloko lokulungile; kodvwa kujwayelekile kutsi incenye lencane yebantfu ifise loko lokungakalungi; ngako-ke loku kutofanele nikugcine niphindze nikwente umtsetfo wenu—kutsi nente umsebenti wenu ngelivi lebantfu.
29.27: Futsi uma sikhatsi sesifika lapho livi lebantfu likhetsa bubi, ngaleso sikhatsi kutawuba sikhatsi lapho tehlulelo taNkulunkulu titawufika etikwenu; yebo, kutawuba sikhatsi lapho atawunivakashela ngekubhujiswa lokukhulu njengoba alivakashele lelive.
29.28: Manje uma ninebehluleli, futsi banganehluleli ngekwemtsetfo loyo lobekiwe, ningenta kutsi behlulelwe ngumehluleli lomhkulu.
29.29: Uma behluleli benu labakhulu bangahluleli ngetehlulelo letilungile, niyawukwenta kutsi sibalo lesincane sebehluleli benu labancane bahlangane ndzawonye, futsi bayawukwehlulela behluleli benu labakhulu, ngekwelivi lebantfu.
29.30: Futsi ngiyaniyala kutsi nente leti tintfo ngekwesaba iNkhosi; futsi ngiyaniyala kutsi nitente leti tintfo, nekutsi ningabi nenkhosi; kute kutsi uma laba bantfu benta tono kanye nebubi bayawubutwa etikwetinhloko tabo.
29.31: Ngoba bukani ngitsi kini, tono tebantfu labaningi tentiwa bubi bemakhosi abo; ngako-ke bubi babo bubutwa etikwetinhloko temakhosi abo.
29.32: Manje ngifisa kutsi loku kungalingani kungabe kusaba khona kulelive, ikakhulukati emkhatsini walabantfu bami; kodvwa ngifisa kutsi lelive libe live lenkhululeko, futsi wonkhe umuntfu atfokotele emalungelo akhe kanye nematfuba ngalokufanako, kuphela nje uma inkhosi isabona kulungile kutsi siphile futsi silitfole lelive njengelifa, yebo, kuphela nje uma ngabe noma ngubaphi betitukulwane tetfu letitako basesele eveni lonkhe.
29.33: Futsi tiningi kakhulu tintfo inkhosi Mosiya leyababhalela tona, yabambulela konkhe kuhlupheka kanye netinkinga tenkhosi lelungile, yebo, konkhe kushikashikeka kwemphefumulo ngebantfu bayo, futsi ngalokunjalo nako konkhe kuvungama kwebantfu enkhosini yabo; futsi wabachazela ngako konkhe.
29.34: Futsi wabatjela kutsi leti tintfo akukafaneli kutsi tibe khona; kodvwa kutsi umtfwalo kufanele ubewebantfu bonkhe, kute wonkhe umuntfu atitfwalele incenye yakhe.
29.35: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko wabembulela ngato tonkhe timo letimbi labasebenta ngaphansi kwato, ngekuba nenkhosi lengakalungi lebusako ngetulu kwabo;
29.36: Yebo, bonkhe bubi kanye netinengiso tayo, nato tonkhe timphi, nemibango, nekucitseka kwengati, nekweba, nekuphanga, nekwenta bugwadla, kanye nalo lonkhe luhlobo lwebubi lolungenakubalwa—abatjela kutsi leti tintfo akukafaneli tibe khona, nekutsi kwakucacile kutsi tatinengekile emiyaletweni yaNkulunkulu.
29.37: Futsi Manje kwenteka, emvakwekutsi inkhosi Mosiya seyititfume letintfo emkhatsini webantfu beneliswa ngeliciniso lemavi akhe.
29.38: Ngako-ke batiyekela tifiso tabo tekuba neNkhosi, bacala baba nenshisekelo lenkhulu yekutsi wonkhe umuntfu abe nelitfuba lelilinganako kulo lonkhe live; yebo, futsi wonkhe umuntfu wavakalisa kutimisela ngekutiphendvulela ngetono takhe.
29.39: Ngako-ke, kwenteka kutsi babutsana ndzawonye ngemacembu kulo lonkhe live, kutsi batovakalisa emavi abo mayelana nekutsi bobani labangaba behluleli babo, kutsi babehlulele ngekwemtsetfo loyo labebaniketwe wona; futsi bajabula kakhulu ngenca yenkhululeko labebaniketwe yona.
29.40: Futsi bakhula bacina ekumtsandzeni Mosiya; yebo, bamphakamisa kakhulu kunawo wonkhe lomunye umuntfu; ngoba bebangamboni njengemcindzeteli lobekafuna kuzuza, yebo, inzuzo leyo leyonakalisa umphefumulo; ngoba akabitanga ingcebo kubo, noma atfokote ngekucitseka kwengati; kodvwa wenta kutsi kube khona kuthula eveni, futsi wabaniketa bantfu bakhe kutsi bakhululwe kulo lonkhe luhlobo lwebugcili; ngako-ke bamphakamisa, yebo, kakhulu, ngetulu kwekungalinganiswa.
29.41: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bababeka behluleli kutsi babuse ngetulu kwabo, noma kutsi babehlulele ngekwemtsetfo; futsi loku bakwenta kulo lonkhe live.
29.42: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima wabekwa kutsi abe ngumehluleli lomkhulu wekucala, futsi ngetulu kwaloko angumphristi lomkhulu, uyise amnikile leso sikhundla, futsi amnikete ligunya mayelana nato tonkhe tindzaba telibandla.
29.43: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima wahamba etindleleni teNkhosi, futsi wayigcina imiyaleto yayo, futsi wehlulela tehlulelo letilungile; futsi kwaba khona kuthula njalo eveni lonkhe.
29.44: Kwacala kanjalo-ke kubusa kwebehluleli kulo lonkhe live laseZarahemla, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu labo labebabitwa ngemaNefi; Futsi Alima bekangumehluleli wekucala futsi lomkhulu.
29.45: Manje kwenteka kutsi uyise wafa, aneminyaka lengemashumi lasiphohlongo nakubili budzala, ahlalile kuyigcwalisa imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
29.46: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Mosiya wafa naye ngalokunjalo, ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakutsatfu wekubusa kwakhe, aneminyaka lengemashumi lasitfupha nakutsatfu budzala; lokwenta sekuhlangene, iminyaka lengemakhulu lasihlanu nemfica kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi ashiya eJerusalema.
29.47: Futsi kwaphela kanjalo-ke kubusa kwemakhosi ebantfwini baNefi; futsi taphela kanjalo-ke netinsuku ta-Alima, lobekangumsunguli welibandla labo.

1.intro: Umlandvo wa-Alima, lobekayindvodzana ya-Alima, umehluleli lomkhulu newekucala kubantfu baNefi, ngalokunjalo nemphristi lomkhulu eBandleni. Umlandvo ngekubusa kwebehluleli, kanye netimphi kanye nemibango emkhatsini webantfu. Ngetulu kwaloko umlandvo ngemphi emkhatsini wemaNefi nemaLamani, ngekwembhalo wa-Alima, wemehluleli lomkhulu newekucala.
1.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wekucala wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi, kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili, inkhosi Mosiya seyiyihambile indlela yemhlaba wonkhe, seyikulwile kulwa lokuhle, seyihambe ngebucotfo phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ingashiyanga namunye kutsi abuse esikhundleni sayo; noko beyiyimisile imitsetfo, futsi yayemukelekile kubantfu; ngako-ke bebaphocelelekile kutsi bayigcine imitsetfo lebeyiyibekile.
1.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wekucala wekubusa kwa-Alima esihlalweni sekwehlulela, kwaba khona indvodza leyaletfwa phambi kwakhe kutsi yehlulelwe, indvodza lebeyiyinkhulu, futsi lebeyatiwa ngemandla ayo lamakhulu.
1.3: Futsi beseyihambile yatungeleta emkhatsini webantfu, ishumayela kubo ngaloko beyikubita ngekutsi livi laNkulunkulu, ihudvulela phansi libandla; imemetela kubantfu kutsi wonkhe umphristi kanye nemfundzisi kumele atsandvwe; futsi akukameli basebente ngetandla tabo, kodvwa kumele bondliwe bantfu.
1.4: Ngetulu kwaloko yafakaza kubantfu kutsi lonkhe luntfu kumele lusindziswe ngelusuku lwekugcina, nekutsi akukafaneli besabe noma batfutfumele, kodvwa kutsi baphakamise tinhloko tabo batfokote, ngoba inkhosi yabadala bonkhe bantfu, ngetulu kwaloko yahlenga wonkhe umuntfu; futsi, ekugcineni, bonkhe bantfu kumele batfole kuphila lokuphakadze.
1.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yatifundzisa leti tintfo kangangekutsi labaningi bakholelwa emavini ayo, baba baningi ngendlela yekutsi bacala kuyondla futsi bayinika imali.
1.6: Yacala kutiphakamisa ngekutichayisa enhlitiyweni yayo, yagcoka tingubo letibitako, yebo, yacala kumisa libandla ngekweluhlobo lwenshumayelo yayo.
1.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi isahamba, iyoshumayela kulabo labebakholelwa emavini ayo, yahlangana nendvodza lebeyiyelibandla laNkulunkulu, yebo, lomunye webafundzisi babo; yacala kuphikisana nayo kamatima, kute iholele kudze bantfu belibandla; kodvwa lendvodza yamelana nayo, iyiyala ngemavi aNkulunkulu.
1.8: Manje ligama lalendvodza kwakunguGideyoni; futsi kwakunguye loyo lobekasikhali etandleni taNkulunkulu ekukhululeni bantfu baLimhayi kubakhipha ebugcilini.
1.9: Manje, ngoba Gideyoni wamelana nayo ngemavi aNkulunkulu yamtfukutselela Gideyoni, yahoshula inkemba yayo yacala kumshaya. Manje Gideyoni ekubeni sekakhulile ngeminyaka leminingi, ngako-ke akakwatanga kumelelana nemagalelo ayo, ngako-ke wabulawa ngenkemba.
1.10: Lendvodza leyambulala yatsatfwa bantfu belibandla, yaletfwa phambi kwa-Alima, kutsi yehlulelwe ngekwemacala leyayiwentile.
1.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yema phambi kwa-Alima yatincengela ngesibindzi lesikhulu.
1.12: Kodvwa Alima watsi kuyo: Buka, loku kwekucala kutsi buphristi-mbumbulu bucaliswe emkhatsini webantfu. Buka, awunacala lebuphristi-mbumbulu kuphela, kodvwa utame kubuphocelela ngenkemba; futsi kube buphristi-mbumbulu bebuyophocelelwa emkhatsini walabantfu loko bekuyokusho kubhujiswa kwabo nya.
1.13: Ucitse ingati yemuntfu lolungile, yebo, indvodza leyente lokuningi lokuhle emkhatsini walabantfu; futsi uma singakusindzisa ingati yakhe ingeta etikwetfu kutiphindzisela.
1.14: Ngako-ke ugwetjwa ngekutsi ufe, ngekwemtsetfo lesawunikwa nguMosiya, inkhosi yetfu yekugcina; futsi uvunyiwe ngulaba bantfu; ngako-ke labantfu kufanele bawugcine umtsetfo.
1.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bayitsatsa; ligama layo bekunguNehori; bamtfwala bamyisa esicongweni seligcuma iManthi, lapho wentiwa, noma-ke ngalenye indlela wavuma, emkhatsini wemazulu nemhlaba, kutsi loko lobekakufundzisa kubantfu kwakuphikisana nelivi laNkulunkulu; futsi lapho weva kufa lokulihlazo.
1.16: Noko loko akuzange kucedze kwandza kwebuphristi-mbumbulu eveni lonkhe; ngoba bebabaningi labebatsandza tintfo letilite temhlaba, futsi bahamba bashumayela timfundziso letingemanga; loko bakwenta ngesizatfu sekufuna ingcebo kanye nekuhlonishwa.
1.17: Noko, abazange balinge kucamba emanga, uma bekungatiwa, ngenca yekwesaba umtsetfo, ngoba bakhohlisi bebajeziswa; ngako-ke bebatenta shengatsi bashumayela ngekwenkholo yabo; manje umtsetfo wawungenamandla kunoma ngumuphi umuntfu ngekwenkholo yakhe.
1.18: Abazange balinge bebe, ngenca yekwesaba umtsetfo, ngoba labanjalo bebajeziswa; futsi bebangeke balinge baphange, noma babulale, ngoba lobekabulala bekajeziswa ngekufa.
1.19: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi loyo lobekangasiye welibandla laNkulunkulu wacala kuhlupha labo labebabelibandla laNkulunkulu, futsi labebamukele kubitwa ngeligama laKhristu.
1.20: Yebo, babahlupha, babavisa buhlungu ngalo lonkhe luhlobo lwemavi, futsi loku kwenteka ngenca yekutitfoba kwabo; ngenca yekutsi bebangatikhukhumeti emehlweni abo, nangenca yekutsi bebabelana ngelivi laNkulunkulu, loyo naloyo, ngaphandle kwemali nangaphandle kwentsengo.
1.21: Manje kwakukhona umtsetfo locinile emkhatsini webantfu belibandla, wekutsi kube bete namunye umuntfu, longuwelibandla, lotovukela phindze ahluphe labo labebangasibo belibandla, futsi nekutsi kubebete kuhluphana emkhatsini wabo.
1.22: Noko, kwakukhona labaningi emkhatsini wabo labacala kutikhukhumeta, bacala kubanga kamatima netitsa tabo, nangekugadla, yebo, bebashayana ngetibhakela.
1.23: Manje lona bekungumnyaka wesibili wekubusa kwa-Alima, futsi kwabangela kuhlupheka lokukhulu kulo libandla; yebo, kwabayimbangela yekulingwa lokukhulu kulo libandla.
1.24: Ngoba tinhlitiyo talabaningi taba lukhuni, futsi emagama abo esulwa, kangangekutsi abazange basakhunjulwa nanini emkhatsini webantfu baNkulunkulu. Ngetulu kwaloko labaningi batikhipha emkhatsini wabo.
1.25: Manje loku kwakukulingwa lokukhulu kulabo labebeme bacina elukholweni, noko, bebabambelele baphindze banganyakatiseki ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, futsi batitfwala ngekubeketela tinhlupheko letatibutsiswe etikwabo.
1.26: Futsi ngesikhatsi baphristi bashiya imisebenti yabo kutsi bayokwabelana ngelivi laNkulunkulu kubantfu, bantfu nabo ngalokunjalo bashiya imisebenti yabo kutsi bayoliva livi laNkulunkulu. Ngesikhatsi umphristi asabelene nabo ngelivi laNkulunkulu bonkhe bebabuyela futsi ngekukhutsala emisebentini yabo; umphristi, angatiphakamisi ngetulu kwalabo labebalalele, ngoba umshumayeli bekangasiko ncono kunemlaleli, noma umfundzisi bekangasiko ncono kunemfundzi; ngaleyondlela bonkhe bebalingana, futsi bonkhe basebenta, wonkhe umuntfu ngekwemandla akhe.
1.27: Babelana ngalabebanako, wonkhe umuntfu ngaloko abenako, kulabamphofu, nalabeswele, nalabagulako, kanye nalabahluphekile; futsi abazange bagcoke tingubo letibitako, kodvwa bebangemanono baphindze babukeka.
1.28: Batichuba ngaleyondlela tindzaba telibandla; bacala kuba nekuthula njalo futsi, nanoma bebahlushwa.
1.29: Manje, ngenca yekucina kwelibandla bacala kuceba kakhulu, banenala yato tonkhe tintfo labebatidzinga—inala yemihlambi yetimvu, nemihlambi yetinkhomo, nalokukhuluphalisiwe kwalo lonkhe luhlobo, futsi ngalokunjalo nenala yalokuyinhlavu, neligolide, nesiliva, netintfo letiligugu, nenala yesiliki nelineni lelilukiwe lecolisakele, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yendvwangu lenhle leyayijwayelekile.
1.30: Ngaleyondlela, esimeni sabo sekuphumelela, abacoshanga namunye lobekangcunu, noma lobekalambile, noma lobekomile, noma lobekagula, noma loyo lobekangakondleki; futsi abatibekanga tinhlitiyo tabo etikwemcebo, ngako-ke bebanesisa kubo bonkhe, labadzala nalabancane, lababoshiwe nalabakhululiwe, besilisa nebesifazane, noma bangaphandle kwelibandla noma bangekhatsi ebandleni, bangakhetsi bala lamuntfu kulabo bebadzinga.
1.31: Ngaleyondlela baphumelela banotsa kakhulu ngetulu kwalabo labebangasilo belibandla labo.
1.32: Ngoba labo labebangasilo belibandla labo bebatitika ngebutsakatsi, kanye nangekukhonta tithico noma buvila, nekukhuluma lokulite, kanye nemona nekubangisana; bagcoka tingubo letibitako; batiphakamisa ngekutichenya emehlweni abo; bahlupha, bakhuluma emanga, beba, baphanga, benta bugwadla, babulala, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yenkhonhlakalo, noko, umtsetfo wacina kubo bonkhe labo bebawephula, kangangoba bekungenteka.
1.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaloko kusentjentiswa kwemtsetfo kubo, wonkhe umuntfu ajeziswa ngaloko labekakwentile, baba nekuthula lokukhulu, futsi bangalinge bayenta inkhohlakalo uma ngabe bekwatiwa; ngako-ke, kwaba khona kuthula lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu baNefi kwate kwaba ngumnyaka wesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli.

2.1: Futsi kwenteka ekucaleni kwemnyaka wesihlanu wekubusa kwabo kwacala kutsi kube khona umbango emkhatsini webantfu; ngoba indvodza letsite, lebeyibitwa ngekutsi nguAmilisayi, indvodza lenebucili lobukhulu, yebo, indvodza lehlakaniphile ngekuhlakanipha kwaseveni, ingulomunye wenhlangano yaleyondvodza lebeyibulala Gideyoni ngenkemba, leyabulawa ngekwemtsetfo—
2.2: Manje lo-Amilisayi, ngebucili bakhe, wadvonsela khashane bantfu labaningi kutsi bamlandzele; labaningi kangangekutsi bacala kuba nemandla lamakhulu; bacala kutama kutsi bente Amilisayi kutsi abe yinkhosi ngetulu kwebantfu.
2.3: Manje loku bekwetfusa ebantfwini belibandla, futsi ngalokunjalo nakubo bonkhe labo labebangaheheka ngekuboniswa ngu Amilisayi; ngoba bebati kutsi ngekwemtsetfo wabo leyontfo lenjalo kwakufanelwe imiswe ngelivi lebantfu.
2.4: Ngako-ke, uma ngabe bekungenteka kutsi Amilisayi akwati kuzuza livi lebantfu, njengemuntfu lobekagcwele inkhohlakalo, bekangabamuka emalungelo abo kanye netibusiso telibandla; ngoba bekuyinhloso yakhe kulicedza libandla laNkulunkulu.
2.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu babutsana ndzawonye kulo lonkhe live, wonkhe muntfu ngekwemcondvo wakhe, noma ngabe bebavumelana na-Amilisayi noma bebaphikisana naye, ngekwemacembu lahlukene, banemphikiswano lenkhulu kanye nalemangalisako imibango loyo naloyo.
2.6: Futsi ngaleyondlela babutsana ndzawonye batovakalisa emavi abo mayelana naleyondzaba; babekwa phambi kwebehluleli.
2.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi lebantfu laphikisana na-Amilisayi, ngaloko-ke akabekwanga kutsi abe yinkhosi ngetulu kwebantfu.
2.8: Manje loku kwadala injabulo lenkhulu etinhlitiyweni talabo labebaphikisana naye; kodvwa Amilisayi wabaphehla labo labebamtsandza kutsi babatfukutselele labo labebangamtsandzi.
2.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babutsana ndzawonye, bamgcoba Amilisayi kutsi abe yinkhosi yabo.
2.10: Manje ngesikhatsi Amilisayi sekabekwe kutsi abe yinkhosi ngetulu kwabo wabayaleta kutsi batsatsele bomnakabo tikhali; futsi loku wakwenta kute abente babe ngaphansi kwakhe.
2.11: Manje bantfu ba-Amilisayi bebahlukaniswa ngeligama la-Amilisayi, babitwa ngema-Amilisayi; kutsi labasalako bese babitwa ngemaNefi, noma bantfu ba-Nkulunkulu.
2.12: Ngako-ke bantfu bemaNefi bebati ngenhloso yema-Amilisayi, ngako-ke batilungiselela kuhlangabetana nabo; yebo batihlomisa ngetinkemba, nangabocelemba, nangebutjoki, nangemicibisholo, nangematje, nangetilingi, kanye nangato tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali temphi, talo lonkhe luhlobo.
2.13: Ngaleyondlela bebatilungiselele kuhlangabetana nema-Amilisayi ngesikhatsi eta. Bekukhona tindvuna letikhetsiwe, kanye netindvuna letinkhulu, kanye netindvuna letinkhulu kakhulu, ngekwesibalo sabo.
2.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amilisayi wabahlomisa bantfu bakhe ngato tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali temphi talo lonkhe luhlobo; waphindze wabeka babusi kanye nebaholi ngetulu kwebantfu bakhe, kutsi babahole kutsi bayolwa nabomnakabo.
2.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ema-Amilisayi aya etikwentsaba i-Aminihu, lebeyingasemphumalanga yemfula iSidoni, lebewugijima edvute nelive iZarahemla, futsi lapho bacala kulwa nemaNefi.
2.16: Manje Alima, angumehluleli lomkhulu kanye nembusi webantfu baNefi, ngako-ke wahamba wakhuphuka nebantfu bakhe, yebo, kanye netindvuna takhe, kanye netindvuna letinkhulu kakhulu, yebo, ahola emabutfo akhe, kuyobukana nema-Amilisayi emphini.
2.17: Bacala kuwabulala ema-Amilisayi egcumeni lelisemphumalanga yeSidoni. Nema-Amilisayi alwa nemaNefi ngemandla lamakhulu, kangangekutsi labaningi bemaNefi bawa phambi kwema-Amilisayi.
2.18: Noko inkhosi yasicinisa sandla semaNefi, kangangekutsi awabulala ema-Amilisayi ngekubulawa lokukhulu, kangangekutsi acala awabalekela.
2.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi awacosha ema-Amilisayi lilanga lonkhe, awabulala ngekubulawa lokukhulu, kangangekutsi lababulawa bema-Amilisayi bekuyimiphefumulo letinkhulungwane letilishumi nakubili nemakhulu lasihlanu nemashumi lamatsatfu nakubili; futsi kumaNefi bekubulewe imiphefumulo letinkhulungwane letisitfupha nemakhulu lasihlanu nemashumi lasitfupha nakubili.
2.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima angasakwati kuwacosha ema-Amilisayi wenta kutsi bantfu bakhe bamise emathende abo esigodzini saGideyoni, sigodzi lesasibitwa ngaGideyoni lowabulawa ngesandla saNehori ngenkemba; futsi kulesigodzi emaNefi amisa emathende awo ngalobo busuku.
2.21: Futsi Alima watfumela tinhloli kutsi tiyilandzele insali yema-Amilisayi, kute ati ngemasu kanye nangemachinga awo, kute ngaloko akwati kutsi ativikele ngalokumelene nawo, kute aphephise bantfu bakhe ekubhujisweni.
2.22: Manje labo labekabatfumele kutsi bayogadza inkambu yema-Amilisayi bebabitwa ngekutsi boZeramu, na-Aminori, naManthi, naLimheri; laba bekungibo labebahamba nebantfu babo kuyogadza inkambu yema-Amilisayi.
2.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa babuyela enkambu yemaNefi ngekushesha lokukhulu, bamangele kakhulu, futsi banekwesaba lokukhulu, batsi:
2.24: Bukani, siyilandzele inkambu yema-Amilisayi, futsi ngekumangala kwetfu lokukhulu, eveni lakaMinoni, ngetulu kwelive laseZarahemla, endleleni leya eveni laNefi, sibone imphi lenkhulu kakhulu yemaLamani; bukani, ema-Amilisayi sekahlangene nawo.
2.25: Sebasetikwabomnaketfu kulelolive; futsi bayababalekela nemihlambi yabo, nebafati babo, kanye nebantfwana babo, beta ngasedolobheni letfu; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi sente masinyane bayalitsatsa lidolobha letfu, nabobabe betfu, nebafati betfu, kanye nebantfwana betfu batobulawa.
2.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNefi batsatsa emathende abo, besuka baphuma esigodzini sakaGideyoni baya ngasedolobheni labo, lebekulidolobha laseZarahemla.
2.27: Buka, ngesikhatsi bewela umfula iSidoni, emaLamani kanye nema-Amilisayi, bekamaningi kangangekutsi bekacishe abe ngangesihlabatsi saselwandle, atseleka etikwabo kutsi ababulale.
2.28: Noko, emaNefi ngekuciniswa sandla seNkhosi, athandazile kakhulu kuyo kutsi ibakhulule etandleni tetitsa tawo, ngako-ke iNkhosi yakuva kukhala kwawo, yawacinisa, futsi emaLamani kanye nema-Amilisayi awa phambi kwawo.
2.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima walwa na-Amilisayi ngenkemba, buso nebuso; balwa kakhulu, loyo naloyo.
2.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima, angumuntfu waNkulunkulu, anelukholo lolukhulu, wakhala, atsi: Awu Nkhosi, bani nemusa futsi usindzise imphilo yami, kute ngibe sikhali etandleni takho kute ngisindzise futsi ngilondvolote laba bantfu.
2.31: Manje ngesikhatsi Alima sekawashito lamavi waphindza walwa na-Amilisayi; waciniswa, kangangekutsi wambulala Amilisayi ngenkemba.
2.32: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko walwa nenkhosi yemaLamani; kodvwa inkhosi yemaLamani yabaleka yabuyela emuva ngaphambi kwa-Alima yatfumela bogadzi bayo kutsi balwe na-Alima.
2.33: Kodvwa Alima, nabogadzi bakhe, walwa nabogadzi benkhosi yemaLamani wate wababulala wababuyisela emuva.
2.34: Futsi ngaleyondlela walitsanyela libala, noma ngalokungiko lusentse, lebelisenshonalanga yemfula iSidoni, alahla tidvumbu temaLamani labekabulewe emantini aseSidoni, kute ngaloko bantfu bakhe babe nendzawo yekuwela bayolwa nemaLamani kanye nema-Amilisayi enshonalanga yemfula iSidoni.
2.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebawuwelile umfula iSidoni emaLamani kanye nema-Amilisayi acala kubaleka phambi kwabo, nanoma bekamaningi kangangekutsi bekangabaleki.
2.36: Abaleka ngaphambi kwemaNefi aya ngasehlane lebelingasenshonalanga kanye nasenyakatfo, aya khashane ngale kwemncele welive; futsi emaNefi awacosha ngemandla awo onkhe, awabulala.
2.37: Yebo, ahlangabetwa ngakuto tonkhe tinhlangotsi, abulawa ahlehliswa, ate ahlakateka enshonalanga, kanye nasenyakatfo, ate afika ehlane, lebelibitwa ngekutsi yiHemowunthi; futsi bekunguleyo ncenye yelihlane lebeyigcwele tilwane tasendle kanye netilwane letibukhali.
2.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lamaningi afela ehlane ngenca yemanceba awo, futsi ashwabadzelwa ngito leto tilwane kanye nemangce asemoyeni; futsi ematsambo awo atfolakele, futsi angcwatjelwe ndzawonye emhlabatsini.

3.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi labekangakabulawa ngetikhali temphi, emvakwekutsi sekangcwabe labo labebabulewe—manje sibalo salabo labebabulewe sasingakabalwa, ngenca yebukhulu besibalo sabo—emvakwekutsi sebacedze kungcwaba labafile babo bonkhe babuyela emaveni abo, nasemitini yabo, nakubafati babo, kanye nakubantfwana babo.
3.2: Manje labaningi besifazane kanye nebantfwana bebabulewe ngenkemba, futsi ngalokunjalo naleminingi imihlambi yetimvu neyetinkhomo tabo; ngalokunjalo nalamaningi emasimu alokuyinhlavu kwabo abhujiswa, ngoba anyatselwa ticuku tebantfu.
3.3: Manje ngebuningi bemaLamani kanye nema-Amilisayi labekabulewe ngaselusentseni lwemfula iSidoni aphonswa emantini aseSidoni; buka ematsambo abo asekujuleni kwelwandle, futsi maningi.
3.4: Ema-Amilisayi bekahlukanisiwe kumaNefi, ngoba wona abetibeke luphawu lolubovu esimongweni sawo ngendlela yemaLamani; noko wona abengakatihhuli tinhloko tawo njengemaLamani.
3.5: Manje tinhloko temaLamani tatihhuliwe; futsi bekangcunu, ngaphandle nje kwesikhumba lebekasibophe etinkhalo tawo, futsi ngalokunjalo netikhali tawo, lebekatibophile, kanye nebutjoki bawo, nemicibisholo yawo, nematje awo, kanye netilingi tawo, njalonjalo.
3.6: Tikhumba temaLamani tatinsundvu, ngekweluphawu lolo lolwalubekwe kuboyise, lolwalusicalekiso etikwabo ngenca yetimbambeko tabo kanye nekuhlubuka kwabo ngalokumelene nabomnakabo, labafaka ekhatsi Nefi, Jakobe naJosefa, kanye neSemu, labebangemadvodza lalungile futsi angcwele.
3.7: Bomnakabo bebafuna kubabulala, ngako-ke bacalekiswa; futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yabeka luphawu kubo, yebo, kuLamani nakuLemuweli, kanjalo nakuwo emadvodzana a-Ishimayeli, kanye nakubesifazane baka-Ishimayeli.
3.8: Loku kwentiwa kute intalelwane yabo yehlukaniswe nentalelwane yabomnakabo, kute ngaloko iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ilondvolote bantfu bayo, kute bangahlangani baphindze bakholwe emasikweni langakalungi lebekatobangela konakala kwabo.
3.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi loyo lobekahlanganisa intalelwane yakhe naleyo yemaLamani bekatiletsela sicalekiso lesifanako etikwentalelwane yakhe.
3.10: Ngako-ke, loyo lobekavumela kutsi adukiswe ngemaLamani bekabitwa ngaphansi kwalelo gama, futsi kwakuba khona luphawu lolwalubekwa kuye.
3.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi loyo lobekangakholelwa esikweni lemaLamani, kodvwa akholelwa kuleyo mibhalo leyayikhishwe eveni laseJerusalema, futsi ngalokunjalo nasesikweni laboyise, lebelilungile, labo labebakholelwa kumiyaleto yaNkulunkulu futsi bayigcina, bebabitwa ngekutsi maNefi, noma bantfu baNefi, kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili—
3.12: Futsi ngibo labo labagcine imibhalo leliciniso yebantfu babo, futsi ngalokunjalo neyebantfu bemaLamani.
3.13: Manje sitawuphindza futsi sibuyele kuma-Amilisayi, ngoba nawo ngalokunjalo bekaneluphawu lolwalubekwe kuwo; yebo, atibeka wona luphawu, yebo, luphawu lolubovu etimongweni tawo.
3.14: Ngaleyondlela livi laNkulunkulu liyagcwaliseka, ngoba lawa ngemavi lawasho kuNefi: Buka emaLamani ngiwacalekisile, futsi ngitawubeka luphawu kuwo kanye nentalelwane yawo yehlukaniswe kuwe kanye nentalelwane yakho, kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili ingunaphakadze ngaphandle kwekutsi aphendvuke ebubini bawo futsi aphendvukele kimi kute ngibe nemusa kuwo.
3.15: Ngetulu kwaloko: Ngitawubeka luphawu kuloyo lohlanganisa intalelwane yakhe neyabomnakenu, kute nayo icalekiswe.
3.16: Ngetulu kwaloko: Ngitawubeka luphawu kuloyo lolwa nawe kanye nentalelwane yakho.
3.17: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi loyo losukako kuwe angeke abitwe nanini ngentalelwane yakho; futsi ngitawukubusisa, kanye naloyo loyawubitwa ngentalelwane yakho, kuya phambili ingunaphakadze; futsi leti kwakutetsembiso teNkhosi kuNefi kanye nakuyo intalelwane yakhe.
3.18: Manje ema-Amilisayi abengati kutsi agcwalisa emavi aNkulunkulu ngesikhatsi acala kutibeka luphawu etimongweni tawo; noko abephumele ebaleni ahlubuka Nkulunkulu; ngako-ke kwakufanele kutsi sicalekiso siwele kuwo.
3.19: Manje ngifuna kutsi nibone kutsi atiletsela wona sicalekiso; futsi ngaleyondlela wonkhe umuntfu localekisiwe, utiletsela yena kubekwa licala.
3.20: Manje kwenteka kutsi etinsukwini nje letingatiningi emvakwemphi leyayiliwe eveni laseZarahemla, ngemaLamani kanye nema-Amilisayi kwaba khona lelinye libutfo lemaLamani leleta kubantfu bakaNefi, endzaweni lefanako naleyo lapho libutfo lekucala lalihlangene khona nema-Amilisayi.
3.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba khona libutfo lelatfunyelwa kutsi libachube libakhiphe eveni labo.
3.22: Manje Alima aphetfwe linceba akahambanga kuyolwa ngalesi sikhatsi nemaLamani;
3.23: Kodvwa watfumela libutfo lelikhulu kuyolwa nawo; bahamba bakhuphuka babulala labaningi bemaLamani, babachuba labasele bawo babakhiphela ngaphandle kwemincele yelive labo.
3.24: Emvakwaloko baphindze babuya futsi bacala bacinisa kuthula eveni, sebete kukhatsatwa titsa tabo kwesikhashana.
3.25: Manje tonkhe leti tintfo tenteka, yebo, tonkhe leti timphi kanye nemibango kwacala kwaphindze kwaphela ngemnyaka wesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli.
3.26: Futsi ngemnyaka munye kwaba khona tinkhulungwane kanye nemashumi etinkhulungwane temiphefumulo leyatfunyelwa eveni laphakadze, kute ivune imivuzo yayo ngekwemisebenti yayo, noma yayimihle noma yayimibi, kute ivune kujabula kwaphakadze noma lusizi lwaphakadze, ngekwemoya lowo labakhetsa kutsi bawulalele, noma ngabe ngumoya lomuhle noma ngulowo lomubi.
3.27: Ngoba wonkhe umuntfu utfola inkhokhelo kuloyo lakhetse kutsi amlalele, futsi loku kungekwemavi emoya wesiphrofetho; ngako-ke akube ngekweliciniso. Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli.

4.1: Manje kwenteka ngemnyaka wesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi, akutange kube khona imibango netimphi eveni laseZarahemla;
4.2: Kodvwa bantfu bebakhatsatekile, yebo, bakhatsateke kakhulu ngenca yekulahlekelwa bomnakabo, futsi ngalokunjalo nangenca yekulahlekelwa yimihlambi yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo tabo, futsi ngalokunjalo nangenca yekulahlekelwa ngemasimu alokuyinhlavu kwabo, labekanyatselwe ngetinyawo abhujiswa ngemaLamani.
4.3: Futsi betitinkhulu kakhulu tinhlupheko tabo kangangekutsi yonkhe imiphefumulo yayinesizatfu sekukhala; futsi bebakholelwa kutsi bekutehlulelo taNkulunkulu lebetitfunyelwe kubo ngenca yebubi babo kanye netinengiso tabo; ngaloko-ke bavuselwa ekukhumbuleni umsebenti wabo.
4.4: Futsi bacala kumisa libandla ngalokugcwele; yebo, labaningi babhajatiswa emantini aseSidoni phindze bahlanganiswa nelibandla laNkulunkulu; yebo, babhajatiswa ngesandla sa-Alima, lobekagcotjwe kutsi abe ngumphristi lomkhulu kubantfu belibandla, ngesandla seyise Alima.
4.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli kwabakhona cishe bantfu labatinkhulungwane letintsatfu nemakhulu lasihlanu labatihlanganisa nelibandla laNkulunkulu phindze babhajatiswa. Waphela kanjalo umnyaka wesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebatfu baNefi; futsi kwabakhona kuthula njalo ngaso sonkhe leso sikhatsi.
4.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli, bantfu belibandla bacala baba nekutichenya, ngenca yengcebo yabo leningi, kanye nesilika yabo lecolisakele, nelineni yabo lelukiwe lecolisakele, futsi nangenca yemihlambi yabo yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yabo yetinkhomo leminingi, neligolide labo, nesiliva yabo, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letiligugu, lebebatitfole ngekusebenta kwabo; kuto tonkhe leti tintfo batiphakamisa ngekutikhukhumeta emehlweni abo, ngoba bacala kugcoka tingubo letibitako.
4.7: Manje loku bekuyimbangela yekukhatsateka kwa-Alima, yebo, futsi nakulabaningi bantfu Alima labekabagcobe kutsi babe bafundisi, nebaphristi, kanye nemagosa ebandleni; yebo, labaningi babo bebadzabuke kakhulu ngenca yebubi labebabubona kutsi besebucale kuba khona emkhatsini webantfu.
4.8: Ngoba babona futsi babuka ngelusizi lolukhulu kutsi bantfu belibandla bacala kutsi batiphakamise ngekutikhukhumeta emehlweni abo, kanye nekutsi babeke tinhlitiyo tabo kumcebo kanye nasetintfweni letilite telive, nekutsi bacala baba nekwedzelela, lomunye kuloyo naloyo, bacala bahlupha labo labebangakholwa njengekwentsandvo nangekwesifiso sabo.
4.9: Futsi ngenca yaloko, ngakulomnyaka wesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwacala kwabakhona imibango lemikhulu emkhatsini webantfu belibandla; yebo, kwabakhona kuhawukela, nekuphikisana, nentondvo, nekuhluphana, kanye nekutatisa, lokwendlula kutikhukhumeta kwalabo labekungibo belibandla laNkulunkulu.
4.10: Yaphela kanjalo-ke iminyaka lesiphohlongo yekubusa kwebehluleli; futsi bubi belibandla bebusikhubekiso lesikhulu kulabo labebangasibo balo libandla; ngaleyondlela libandla lacala kwehluleka kunchubekela phambili yalo.
4.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemfica, Alima wabubona bubi belibandla, waphindze wabona kutsi sibonelo selibandla sacala kutsi siholele labo labebangakholwa kusuka ebubini lobutsite kuya kulobunye bubi, ngalendlela baletsa kubhujiswa kwebantfu.
4.12: Yebo, wabona kungalingani lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu, labanye batiphakamisa ngekutatisa kwabo, babukela phansi labanye, bafulatsela labadzingako nalabangcunu nalabebalambile, nalabebomile, kanye nalabo labebagula futsi bahluphekile.
4.13: Manje loku bekusizatfu lesikhulu setililo emkhatsini webantfu, labanye batehlisa, basita labo labebadzinga kusitwa ngibo, njengekunika loko labanako kulabamphofu nalabadzingako, bapha labalambile, futsi babeketelela tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlupheko, ngenca yaKhristu, lekufanele ete njengekwemoya wesiphrofetho.
4.14: Babuke phambili kulolosuku, ngaleyondlela bagcina kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo; bagcwaliswa ngenjabulo lenkhulu ngenca yekuvuka kwalabafile, ngekwentsandvo kanye nemandla kanye nekukhululwa kwaJesu Khristu ekuboshweni kwekufa.
4.15: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima, sekatibonile tinhlupheko tebalandzeli baNkulunkulu labatfobekile, kanye nekuhlushwa lebekubekwe etikwabo ngulabasele bebantfu bakhe, futsi babona konkhe kungalingani kwabo, wacala kuba nelusizi lolukhulu; noko Moya weNkhosi awumshiyanga.
4.16: Futsi wakhetsa indvodza lehlakaniphile lebeyisemkhatsini wemagosa elibandla, wayinika emandla njengekwelivi lebantfu, kutsi ibe nemandla ekutsi ishaye imitsetfo ngekwemitsetfo lebeyiniketiwe, futsi nekutsi iyisebentise ngekwebubi kanye nemacala ebantfu.
4.17: Manje libito lalendvodza bekunguNefiha, futsi yakhetfwa kutsi ibe ngumehluleli lomkhulu; yahlala esihlalweni sekwehlulela kutsi ihlulele iphindze iphatse bantfu.
4.18: Manje Alima akayiniketanga sikhundla sekutsi ibe ngumphristi lomkhulu ngetulu kwelibandla, kodvwa wasigcina kuye lesi sikhundla sekuba ngumphristi lomkhulu; kodvwa sihlalo sekwehlulela wasiniketa Nefiha.
4.19: Futsi loku wakwenta kute yena lucobo ahambe emkhatsini webantfu bakhe, noma emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, ashumayele livi laNkulunkulu kubo, kute abaphehle kutsi bakhumbule umsebenti wabo, nekutsi akudvonsele phansi, ngelivi laNkulunkulu, konkhe kutikhukhumeta nebucili kanye nayo yonkhe imibango lebeyisemkhatsini webantfu bakhe, angayiboni lenye indlela yekutsi ababuyise ngaphandle kwekutsi abacindzetele ngekuniketa bufakazi lobumsulwa ngalokumelene nabo.
4.20: Futsi ngenca yaloko ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi, Alima wanika sihlalo sekwehlulela kuNefiha, yena watinikela ngalokuphelele ebuphristini lobukhulu beluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, ngebufakazi belivi, ngekwemoya wekwembulelwa kanye newekuphrofetha.

5.intro: Emavi Alima, uMphristi loMkhulu ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, lawakhuluma kubantfu emadolobheni kanye nasetigodzini tabo kulo lonkhe live.
5.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima wacala kukhuluma livi laNkulunkulu kubantfu, wacala eveni laseZarahemla, wasuka lapho waya eveni lonkhe.
5.2: Lawa ngemavi lawakhuluma kubantfu ebandleni lelalimiswe edolobheni laseZarahemla, ngekwembhalo wakhe lucobo, atsi:
