5.3: Mine, Alima, ngigcotjwe ngubabe, Alima, kutsi ngibe ngumphristi lomkhulu ebandleni laNkulunkulu, yena anemandla neligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu kwenta leti tintfo, bukani, ngitsi kini wacala wamisa libandla eveni lelaliseminceleni yakaNefi; yebo, live lelalibitwa ngekutsi live laMormon; yebo, futsi wababhabhatisa bomnakabo emantini aMormon.
5.4: Futsi bukani, ngitsi kini, bakhululwa etandleni tebantfu benkhosi Nowa, ngemusa kanye nemandla aNkulunkulu.
5.5: Bukani, emvakwaloko, baletfwa ebugcilini ngetandla temaLamani ehlane; yebo, ngitsi kini, bebasekutfunjweni, futsi yaphindze iNkhosi yabakhipha ebugcilini ngemandla elivi layo; saletfwa lapha kulelive, lapha sacala kwakha libandla laNkulunkulu kulo lonkhe lelive futsi.
5.6: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini, bomnaketfu, nine lenibaleli libandla, ngabe nikukhumbule ngalokwanele yini kutfunjwa kwaboyihlo na? Yebo, futsi ngabe niwukhumbule ngalokwanele yini umusa wakhe kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kubo na? Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, ngabe nikukhumbule ngalokwanele yini kutsi uyikhululile imiphefumulo yabo esihogweni na?
5.7: Bukani, watigucula tinhlitiyo tabo; yebo, wabavusa ebutfongweni lobujulile, futsi bavukela kuNkulunkulu. Bukani, bebasekhatsi nekhatsi nebumnyama; noko, imiphefumulo yabo yakhanyiswa ngekukhanya kwelivi laphakadze; yebo, bebatungeletwe tibopho tekufa, kanye netinketane tesihogo futsi kubhujiswa kwaphakadze kwakubalindzile.
5.8: Manje ngibuta kini, bomnaketfu, babhujiswa na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha, abazange.
5.9: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngiyabuta, ngabe tibopho tekufa tagcushulwa, kanye netinketane tesihogo lebetibatungeletile, ngabe tacekiswa na? Ngitsi kini, Yebo, tacekiswa, futsi imiphefumulo yabo yakhula, bahlabela ngelutsadvo lwekuhlengwa. Futsi ngitsi kini basindzisiwe.
5.10: Manje ngibuta kini kutsi nguyiphi imibandzela labasindziswa ngayo na? Yebo, ngutiphi tizatfu lebebatsembele kuto kute basindziswe na? Ngusiphi sizatfu sekukhululwa kwabo etibopheni tekufa, yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nasetinketaneni tesihogo na?
5.11: Bukani, nginganitjela—ngabe babe Alima akakholelwanga yini emavini lebekakhulunywe ngemlomo wa-Abinadi na? Futsi bekangasiye yini umphrofethi longcwele na? Ngabe akakhulumanga yini emavi aNkulunkulu, futsi babe Alima wawakholwa na?
5.12: Futsi ngelukholo lwakhe kwaba khona lushintjo lolukhulu lolwenteka enhlitiyweni yakhe. Bukani ngitsi kini konkhe loku kuliciniso.
5.13: Bukani, washumayela livi kubobabe, nakubo lushintjo lolukhulu lwenteka etinhlitiyweni tabo, futsi batitfoba babeka litsemba labo kuNkulunkulu weliciniso nalophilako. Futsi bukani, betsembeka kwate kwaba sekugcineni; ngaloko-ke basindziswa.
5.14: Manje bukani, ngibuta kini, bomnaketfu belibandla, ngabe senitelwe yini ngekwakamoya waNkulunkulu na? Ngabe seniwemukele yini umfanekiso wakhe ebusweni benu na? Ngabe seniluvile yini lushintjo lolukhulu etinhlitiyweni tenu na?
5.15: Ngabe niyalusebentisa lukholo ekuhlengweni kwakhe loyo lowanidala na? Ngabe nibuka phambili yini ngeliso lelukholo, futsi niwubone lomtimba lobhubhako sewuvuselwe ekungabhubhini futsi naloku lokubolako sekuvuselwa ekungabolini, kutsi kume phambi kwaNkulunkulu kute kwehlulelwe ngekwetento letentiwa emtimbeni lobhubhako na?
5.16: Ngitsi kini, ninako na kuticabanga niva livi leNkhosi, litsi kini, ngalolosuku: Wotani kimi nine lenibusisiwe, ngoba bukani, imisebenti yenu bekuyimisebenti yekulunga etikwebuso bemhlaba?
5.17: Noma ninako na kuticabanga nicamba emanga eNkhosini ngalolosuku, nitsi—Nkhosi, imisebenti yetfu bekuyimisebenti lelungile etikwebusa bemhlaba—nekutsi yena utawunisindzisa na?
5.18: Noma-ke ngalenye indlela, ninako na kuticabanga niletfwa phambi kwesihlalo sekutsetsa emacala saNkulunkulu nemiphefumulo yenu igcwele kulahlwa ngunembeza nekutisola, ninako konkhe kukhumbula emacala enu, yebo, kukhumbula lokuphelele kwabo bonkhe bubi benu, yebo, kukhumbula kutsi niyente lite imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu na?
5.19: Ngitsi kini, ningabuka yini etulu kuNkulunkulu ngalolosuku ngenhlitiyo lemsulwa netandla letihlantekile na? Ngitsi kini, ningabuka yini etulu, ninemfanekiso waNkulunkulu ucoshwe ebusweni benu na?
5.20: Ngitsi kini, ngabe ningacabanga ngekusindziswa nibe nitivumele kutsi nibe ngaphansi kwadeveli na?
5.21: Ngitsi kini, niyawukwati ngalolosuku kutsi aninakusindziswa; ngoba kute umuntfu longasindziswa ngaphandle kwekutsi tingubo takhe tihlantwe tibe mhlophe; yebo, tingubo takhe kufanele tihlanjululwe tite tihlanteke kuwo onkhe emabala, engatini yaloyo lokukhulunywe ngaye bobabe betfu, lokufanele ete kutohlenga bantfu bakhe etonweni tabo.
5.22: Manje ngiyabuta kini, bomnaketfu, ningativa kanjani, uma senime embikwesihlalo saNkulunkulu, ninetingubo tenu letinemabala engati kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yekungcola na? Bukani, ngabe leti tintfo tiyawufakaza ini ngalokumelene nani?
5.23: Bukani ngabe angeke yini tifakaze kutsi nibabulali, yebo, nekutsi ninelicala layo yonkhe inhlobo yebubi na?
5.24: Bukani, bomnaketfu, ngabe ningacabanga yini kutsi lonjalo angaba nayo indzawo yekuhlala embusweni waNkulunkulu, kanye na-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe, ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele, labanetingubo letihlantiwe futsi letingenabala, letimsulwa futsi letimhlophe na?
5.25: Ngitsi kini, Cha; ngaphandle uma nenta uMdali wenu umkhohlisi kusukela ekucaleni, noma nicabanga kutsi ungumkhohlisi kusukela ekucaleni, angeke nicabange kutsi labanjalo bangaba nendzawo embusweni wasezulwini; kodvwa bayawukhishelwa ngaphandle ngoba babantfwana bembuso wadeveli.
5.26: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini, bomnaketfu, uma niluvile lushintjo lwenhlitiyo, futsi uma nive kutsi anihlabele liculo lelutsandvo lekuhlengwa, ngitobuta, ngabe niseva kanjalo yini namanje na?
5.27: Ngabe nihambile, natigcina ningenacala phambi kwaNkulunkulu na? Ningasho yini kutsi, uma banganibita ekufeni ngalesi sikhatsi, ngekhatsi kini, kutsi benititfobe ngalokwanele na? Kutsi tingubo tenu tihlantiwe futsi tentiwe tabamhlophe ngengati yaKhristu, lotawukuta kutawuhlenga bantfu bakhe etonweni tabo na?
5.28: Bukani, ngabe nihlutjuliwe yini kutikhukhumeta na? Ngitsi kini, uma kungenjalo anikakulungeli kuhlangana naNkulunkulu, Bukani kufanele nitilungiselele ngekushesha; ngoba umbuso welizulu sewusondzele, futsi lonjalo ute kuphila lokuphakadze.
5.29: Bukani, ngitsi, ngabe ukhona yini emkhatsini wenu longakahlutjulwa umona na? Ngitsi kini lonjalo akatilungiseleli; futsi ngifisa kwangatsi angatilungiselela masinyane, ngoba lihora selisedvute, futsi akati kutsi sikhatsi siyawufika nini; ngoba lonjalo angeke atfolwe angenacala.
5.30: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngitsi kini, ngabe ukhona yini emkhatsini wenu lohlekisa ngemnakabo na, noma lobeka incwaba yetinhlupheko etikwakhe na?
5.31: Maye kuloyo lonjalo, ngoba akatilungiseleli, futsi sikhatsi sesisondzele sekutsi kufanele aphendvuke kungenjalo angeke asindziswe!
5.32: Yebo, maye nakini nonkhe tisebenti tebubi; phendvukani, phendvukani, ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ikukhulumile loku!
5.33: Bukani, utfumela simemo kubo bonkhe bantfu, ngoba tandla temusa teluliwe ngakubo, utsi: Phendvukani, futsi ngitawunemukela.
5.34: Yebo, utsi: Wotani kimi niyawukudla sitselo sesihlahla sekuphila: yebo, niyawukudla futsi ninatse kuso sinkhwa kanye nakuwo emanti ekuphila ngekukhululeka;
5.35: Yebo, wotani kimi futsi nivete imisebenti yekulunga, aniyukujutjwa phansi futsi niphonswe emlilweni—
5.36: Ngoba bukani, sikhatsi sesisondzele sekutsi loyo longaveti titselo letinhle, loyo longayenti imisebenti yekulunga, labo ngibo labanesizatfu sekukhala nekulila.
5.37: Awu nine tisebenti tebubi; lenikhukhumele etintfweni letilite telive, lenimemetela ngekutati tindlela tekulunga kodvwa nidukile, njengetimvu letite umelusi, nanoma umelusi anibitile futsi usanibita namanje, kodvwa anililaleli livi lakhe!
5.38: Bukani, ngitsi kini, umelusi lolungile uyanibita; yebo, futsi ngelibito lakhe lucobo uyanibita, lokulibito laKhristu; futsi uma ningeke nililalele livi lemelusi lolungile, ligama lenibitwa ngalo, bukani, anisito timvu temelusi lolungile.
5.39: Manje uma ningasito timvu temelusi lolungile, ngabe niwamuphi umhlambi na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, develi ungumelusi wenu, futsi nibemhlambi wakhe; manje, ngubani longakuphika loku na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, loyo lokuphikako loku ungumkhohlisi futsi ungumntfwana wadeveli.
5.40: Ngoba ngitsi kini noma ngabe yini lenhle iphuma kuNkulunkulu, futsi noma ngabe yini lembi iphuma kudeveli.
5.41: Ngako-ke uma umuntfu aveta imisebenti lemihle ulalela livi lemelusi lolungile, futsi uyamlandzela; kodvwa loyo loveta imisebenti lemibi, ngalokufanako loyo uba ngumntfwana wadeveli, ngoba ulalela livi lakhe, futsi uyamlandzela.
5.42: Futsi loyo lowenta loku kufanele atfole inkhokhelo yakhe kuye; ngako-ke, ngekwenkhokhelo yakhe utfola kufa, ngekwetintfo letiphatselene nekulunga, abe ngulofile kuyo yonkhe imisebenti lemihle.
5.43: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngifuna kutsi ningive, ngoba ngikhuluma ngemandla emphefumulo wami; ngoba bukani, ngikhulume nani ngalokusobala kangangekutsi angeke niphambuke, noma ngikhulume ngekwemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
5.44: Ngoba ngibitelwe kutsi ngikhulume ngalendlela, ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, lolukuKhristu Jesu; yebo, ngiyaletwe kutsi ngime futsi ngifakaze kulaba bantfu tintfo letikhulunywe bobabe betfu mayelana netintfo letisatokwenteka.
5.45: Futsi loku akusiko konkhe. Ngabe nicabanga kutsi ngitatela mine leti tintfo na? Bukani, ngiyafakaza kini kutsi ngiyati kutsi letintfo lengikhulume ngato tiliciniso. Futsi nicabanga kutsi ngabe ngati kanjani ngekwesiciniseko sato na?
5.46: Bukani, ngitsi kini tatiswe kimi ngaMoya loNgcwele. Bukani, ngizilile ngaphindze ngathandaza tinsuku letiningi kute ngitati leti tintfo ngekwami. Manje sengiyati ngekwami kutsi tiliciniso; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itibonakalisile kimi ngaMoya wayo loNgcwele; futsi lona ngumoya wekwembulelwa lokimi.
5.47: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngitsi kini ngaleyondlela kwembuliwe kimi, kutsi emavi lakhulunywe bobabe betfu aliciniso, kanjalo ngekwemoya wekuphrofetha lokimi, lotse kanjalo wabonakaliswa ngaMoya waNkulunkulu.
5.48: Ngitsi kini, ngiyati ngekwami kutsi noma ngabe yini lengitawuyisho kini, mayelana naloko lokusatowenteka, kuliciniso; futsi ngitsi kini, ngiyati kutsi Jesu Khristu uyawukuta, yebo iNdvodzana, leTelwe Yodvwa yaBabe, legcwele umusa, nebubele, kanye neliciniso. Futsi bukani, nguye loyo lotako lototsatsa tono temhlaba, yebo, tono tawo wonkhe umuntfu lokholwa ngekunganyakatiseki egameni lakhe.
5.49: Manje ngitsi kini ngilo luhlelo lengibitwe ngalo, yebo, kutsi ngishumayele kubomnaketfu labatsandzekako, yebo, kanye nakubo bonkhe labahlala kulelive; yebo, kutsi ngishumayele kubo bonkhe, labadzala nalabancane, lababoshiwe nalabakhululekile; yebo, ngitsi kini labadzala, futsi ngalokunjalo nalabasekhatsi ngebudzala, kanye nakuso situkulwane lesikhulako; yebo, kutsi ngikhale kubo kutsi kufanele baphendvuke batalwe kabusha.
5.50: Yebo, naku lokushiwo nguMoya: Phendvukani, nonkhe nine mikhawulo yemhlaba, ngoba umbuso welizulu sewusondzele; yebo, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu iyeta ngenkhatimulo yayo, nangemandlakati ayo, nebukhosi, nemandla, kanye nebukhulu bayo. Yebo, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngitsi kini, Moya utsi: Bukani inkhatimulo yeNkhosi yemhlaba wonkhe; futsi ngetulu lwaloko iNkhosi yasezulwini masinyane nje itawukhanya emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfwana bebantfu.
5.51: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko Moya utsi kimi, yebo, ukhala kimi ngelivi lelikhulu, utsi: Hamba utsi kulaba bantfu—Phendvukani, ngoba ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke kute ngisho nalencane indlela yekutsi nidle lifa lembuso welizulu.
5.52: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngitsi kini, Moya utsi; Bukani, lizembe libekiwe emphandzeni yesihlahla; ngako-ke sonkhe sihlahla lesingatseli sitselo lesihle sitawujutjwa siphonswe emlilweni, yebo, umlilo longeke acishwe, umlilo longacimeki. Bukani, futsi nikhumbule, loNgcwele nguye lokukhulumile loku.
5.53: Manje bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngitsi kini, ningaphikisana yini naloku lokushiwoko; yebo, ningatibeka yini eceleni leti tintfo, futsi ninyatsele loNgcwele ngaphansi kwetinyawo tenu; yebo, ningatikhukhumeta yini ekutatiseni kwetinhlitiyo tenu; yebo, nisengaphikelela yini ekugcokeni tingubo letibitako phindze nibeke tinhlitiyo tenu etintfweni letilite telive, nasemcebeni wenu na?
5.54: Yebo, nisengaphikelela yini nekucabanga kutsi nincono kunalomunye; yebo, nisengaphikelela yini nekuhlupha bomnakenu, labatitfobako futsi bahamba ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, labaletfwe ngalo kulelibandla, bangcweliswe ngaMoya loNgcwele, futsi baveta imisebenti lefanele yekuphendvuka—
5.55: Yebo, futsi nisengaphikelela yini nekufulatsela labamphofu, nalabeswele, kanye nekugodla leninako kubo na?
5.56: Kwekugcina, nonkhe nine lenitawuphikelela ebubini benu, ngitsi kini ngibo labo labo labayawujujtwa baphonswe emlilweni ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngekushesha lokukhulu.
5.57: Manje ngitsi kini, nonkhe nine lenifisa kulandzela livi lemelusi lolungile, phumani emkhatsini walababi, nitehlukanise, ningatitsintsi tintfo tabo letingcolile; bukani, emagama abo ayawukwesulwa, kute emagama alababi angabalwa emkhatsini wemagama alabalungile, kute livi laNkulunkulu ligcwaliseke, lelitsi: Emagama alababi akayukuhlanganiswa nemagama ebantfu bami;
5.58: Ngoba emagama alabalungile ayawubhalwa encwadzini yekuphila, futsi ngitawubanika lifa esandleni sami sangesekudla. Manje, bomnaketfu, yini leningayisho kuphikisana naloku na? Ngitsi kini, uma nikhuluma ngalokumelene naloku, akusho lutfo, ngoba livi laNkulunkulu kufanele ligcwaliseke.
5.59: Ngoba ngumuphi umelusi emkhatsini wenu longatsi unetimvu letiningi angatigadzi, kute timphisi tingangeni tishwabadzele umhlambi wakhe na? Bukani, uma imphisi ingenela umhlambi wakhe angeke yini ayikhiphele ngaphandle na? Yebo, futsi ekugcineni, uma angakwati utawuyibulala.
5.60: Manje ngitsi kini umelusi lolungile uyanibita; futsi uma nitawulilalela livi lakhe utawuniletsa esibayeni sakhe, ngoba nitimvu takhe; futsi uyaniyaleta kutsi ningayivumeli imphisi lelambile kutsi ingene emkhatsini wenu, kute ningabhujiswa.
5.61: Manje mine, Alima, ngiyaniyaleta ngelulwimi lwakhe longiyaletile, kutsi nitame niwente lamavi lengiwakhulume kini.
5.62: Ngikhuluma ngendlela yekuniyala nine lenibelibandla; futsi nakubo labo lokungasibo belibandla ngikhuluma ngendlela yekubamema, ngitsi: Wotani nibhajatiselwe ekuphendvukeni, kute nani nibe ngulabadla esitselweni sesihlahla sekuphila.

6.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Alima sekente siphetfo senkhulumo ebantfwini belibandla, lebelimiswe edolobheni laseZarahemla, wagcoba baphristi kanye nemagosa, ngekubabeka tandla takhe ngekweluhlelo lwaNkulunkulu, kutsi bengamele futsi babuke libandla.
6.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi loyo lobekangasuye welibandla kulabo labebaphendvuka etonweni tabo babhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni, bemukelwa ebandleni.
6.3: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko kwenteka kutsi loyo lobekawasebandleni kulabo labebangakaphendvuki ebubini babo futsi batitfobe ngaphambi kwaNkulunkulu—ngisho labo labebatiphakamise ngekutikhukhumeta etinhlitiyweni tabo—bona kanye bebalahlwa, futsi nemagama abo bekesulwa, kute emagama abo angabalwa, emkhatsini walabo labebalungile.
6.4: Futsi ngaleyondlela bacala kumisa luhlelo lwelibandla edolobheni lakaZarahemla.
6.5: Manje ngifuna kutsi nicodze kutsi livi laNkulunkulu belitfolakala kubo bonkhe, kangangekutsi bekute labebangakatjelwa ngelilungelo lekuhlangana ndzawonye kutsi beve livi laNkulunkulu.
6.6: Noko bantfwana baNkulunkulu bayaletwa kutsi babutsane ndzawonye njalo, futsi bahlanganyele ekuzileni kanye nasekuthandazeni lokukhulu kute kuzuze imiphefumulo yalabo labebangamati Nkulunkulu.
6.7: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima sekente lemitsetfo wesuka kubo, yebo, wesuka ebandleni lebelisedolobheni laseZarahemla, wahamba wawelela ngasemphumalanga yemfula iSidoni, esigodzini saGideyoni, lapho bekwakhiwe lidolobha khona, lebelibitwa ngelidolobha laGideyoni, lebelisesigodzini lebesibitwa ngekutsi yiGideyoni, lesabitwa ngendvodza leyabulawa ngesandla saNehori ngenkemba.
6.8: Futsi Alima wahamba wacala kumemetela livi laNkulunkulu ebandleni lebelimiswe esigodzini saGideyoni, njengekwembulwa kweliciniso lelivi lebelikhulunywe nguyise, futsi nanjengekwemoya wesiphrofetho lobewukuye, ngebufakazi baJesu Khristu, indvodzana yaNkulunkulu, loyokuta kutohlenga bantfu bakhe etonweni tabo, kanye nangeluhlelo lolungcwele lobekabitwe ngalo. Futsi kubhalwe kanjalo. Amen.

7.intro: Emavi a-Alima lawakhuluma kubantfu eGideyoni, ngekwembhalo wakhe lucobo.
7.1: Bukani bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngekubona kutsi ngivunyelwe kutsi ngite kini, ngakoke-ke ngitotama kutsi ngikhulume nani ngelulwimi lwami; yebo, ngemlomo wami lucobo, ngekubona kutsi kwekucala kutsi ngikhulume nani ngemavi emlomo wami, ngibekwe esihlalweni sekwehlulela ngalokuphelele, nginemsebenti lomningi kangangekutsi angikhonanga kuta kini.
7.2: Futsi nami bengingeke ngite namanje ngalesi sikhatsi kube bekungasiko kutsi sihlalo sekwehlulela siniketwe lomunye, kutsi abuse esikhundleni sami; futsi iNkhosi ngemusa lomkhulu ingivumele kutsi ngite kini.
7.3: Bukani, ngite nginelitsemba lelikhulu kanye nesifiso lesikhulu sekutsi ngitfole kutsi nititfobile ngaphambi kwaNkulunkulu, nekutsi nichubekile ekuwuncuseni umusa wakhe, kutsi ngitfole kutsi beningenacala ngaphambi kwakhe, kutsi ngitfole kutsi beningekho esimeni lesibucayi lesesabekako lebebakuso bomnaketfu eZarahemla.
7.4: Kodvwa libusisiwe ligama laNkulunkulu, ngoba unginikile kutsi ngati, yebo, unginikile injabulo lenkhulu kakhulu yekwati kutsi baphindze bamiswa ngendlela yekulunga kwakhe.
7.5: Ngiyetsemba, ngekwakaMoya waNkulunkulu lokimi, kutsi ngitotfokota ngani futsi; noko angifisi kutsi injabulo yami ngani ite ngendlela yetinhlupheko letiningi kangaka kanye nelusizi lengiluvile ngabomnaketfu baseZarahemla, ngoba bukani, injabulo yami ita ngabo emvakwekwendlula etinhluphekweni letiningi kanye nelusizi.
7.6: Kodvwa bukani, ngiyetsemba kutsi nine anikho esimeni sekungakholwa lokukhulu njengoba bomnakenu bebakuso; ngiyetsemba kutsi nine anitiphakamisi ngekutikhukhumeta etinhlityweni tenu; yebo ngiyetsemba kutsi anikatibeki tinhlitiyo tenu kumcebo kanye nasetintfweni letilite telive; yebo, ngiyetsemba kutsi anikhonti tithico, kodvwa nikhonta Nkulunkulu weliciniso nalophilako, futsi nibuke embili ekutsetselelweni kwetono tenu lokutokuta, ngelukholo lolungapheli.
7.7: Ngoba bukani, ngitsi kini kukhona tintfo letiningi letitota; futsi bukani, kukhona intfo yinye lebaluleke kakhulu kunato tonkhe letinye—ngoba bukani, sikhatsi asikho khashane kakhulu sekutsi uMhlengi aphile futsi afike emkhatsini webantfu bakhe.
7.8: Bukani, angisho kutsi utawufika emkhatsini wetfu ngesikhatsi sekuphila kwakhe emtimbeni wakhe lobhubhako; ngoba bukani, Moya akatange asho kimi kutsi loku kuyoba njalo. Manje mayelana naloku angati; kodvwa nguloku lengikwatiko, kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu inemandla ekwenta tonkhe tintfo letingekwelivi layo.
7.9: Kodvwa bukani, naku lokushiwo nguMoya, utsi: Khala kulaba bantfu, utsi—Phendvukani, futsi nilungise indlela yeNkhosi, nihambe etindleleni tayo, leticondzile; ngoba bukani, umbuso welizulu sewusondzele, neNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu iyeta etikwebuso bemhlaba.
7.10: Futsi bukani, iyawutalwa nguMariya, eJerusalema lekulive labokhokho betfu, yena ayintfombi, sitja lesiligugu nalesikhetsiwe, loyawusibekelwa futsi akhulelwe ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, futsi avete indvodzana, yebo, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
7.11: Futsi iyawuhamba, ive buhlungu netinhlupheko kanye netilingo talo lonkhe luhlobo; loku kute kugcwaliseke livi lelitsi iyawutfwala buhlungu netifo tebantfu bayo.
7.12: Futsi iyawutfwala kufa, kute icekise tibopho tekufa letibophe bantfu bayo, futsi iyawutfwala butsakatsaka babo, kute tibilini tayo tigcwaliswe ngesihawu, ngekwasenyameni, kute yati ngekwasenyameni kutsi ingabasita kanjani bantfu bayo ngekwebutsakatsaka babo.
7.13: Manje Moya wati tonkhe tintfo; noko indvodzana yaNkulunkulu ihlupheka ngekwasenyameni kute itfwale tono tebantfu bayo, kute isule tiphambeko tabo ngekwemandla ekubakhulula kwayo; manje bukani, loku bufakazi lobukimi.
7.14: Manje ngitsi kini kufanele niphendvuke, futsi nitalwe kabusha; ngoba Moya utsi uma ningakatalwa kabusha ngeke nilidle lifa lembuso wasezulwini; ngako-ke wotani nibhajatiselwe ekuphendvukeni, kute nihlantwe etonweni tenu, kute nibe nelukholo kuyo iMvana yaNkulunkulu, lesusa tono temhlaba, lenemandla ekusindzisa nekuhlanta kuko konkhe kungalungi.
7.15: Yebo, ngitsi kini wotani futsi ningesabi, nibeke eceleni sonkhe sono, lokulula kutsi sinihace, lesinibophela phansi ekubhujisweni, yebo, wotani nite phambili, nimkhombise Nkulunkulu wenu kutsi nitimisele ngekuphendvuka etonweni tenu futsi ningene esivumelwaneni naye sekutsi nitayigcina imiyaleto yakhe, nifakaze ngaloko kuye ngalolusuku ngekutsi nihambe niye emantini embhabhatiso.
7.16: Futsi loyo lowenta loku, futsi agcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu kusukela manje kuya phambili, nguye kanye loyo loyawukhumbula kutsi mine ngitsi kuye, yebo, uyawukhumbula kutsi ngitsite kuye, uyawuba nekuphila lokuphakadze, ngekwebufakazi baMoya loNgcwele, lofakaza kimi.
7.17: Manje bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngabe niyakholwa yini nguleti tintfo na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, yebo, ngiyati kutsi niyatikholwa; futsi indlela lengati ngayo kutsi niyatikholwa kungesibonakaliso saMoya lesikimi. Manje ngenca yekutsi lukholo lwenu lucinile mayelana naloko, yebo mayelana netintfo lengitikhulumile, kukhulu kujabula kwami.
7.18: Ngoba njengoba ngishito kini kusukela ekucaleni, kutsi nginesifiso lesikhulu kutsi nine ningabi sesimeni lesibucayi njengabomnakenu, kanjalo ngitfole kutsi tifiso tami tigcwalisekile.
7.19: Ngoba ngiyabona kutsi nisetindleleni tekulunga; ngiyabona kutsi nisetindleleni letiholela embusweni waNkulunkulu; yebo, ngiyabona kutsi nenta tindlela takhe ticondze.
7.20: Ngiyabona kutsi nembulelwe, ngebufakazi belivi lakhe, kutsi ngeke ahambe etindleleni letigwegwile; noma ashintje kuloko lakushito; noma abe nesitfunti nje sekujika esuke ngesekudla aye ngesencele, noma esuke kuloko lokulungile aye kuloko lokungakalungi; ngako-ke, indlela yakhe yinye nanini nanini.
7.21: Futsi akahlali emathempelini langasingcwele; futsi kungcola noma yini lenye lengakahlantenki ngeke yemukeleke embusweni waNkulunkulu; ngako-ke, ngitsi kini sikhatsi siyawufika, yebo, futsi siyawuba ngelusuku lwekugcina, lapho loyo longcolile ayosala ekungcoleni kwakhe.
7.22: Manje bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngikhulume letintfo kini kute nginivusele emsebentini wenu kuNkulunkulu, kute nihambe ngekungabi nelicala ngaphambi kwakhe, kute nihambe ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, lenemukelwe ngalo.
7.23: Manje ngifisa kutsi nititfobe, futsi nitibeke phansi nibe mnene; nifundziseke kalula; nigcwale kubeketela kanye nekumela bulukhuni; nititsibe kuto tonkhe tintfo; nikhutsale ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu ngato tonkhe tikhatsi; nicele noma ngabe yini leniyidzingako, kwakamoya kanye nekwenyama; ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi nibuyisele kubonga kuNkulunkulu ngato tonkhe tintfo lenititfolako.
7.24: Futsi cinisekisani kutsi ninelukholo, nelitsemba, kanye nelutsandvo, futsi uma kunjalo nitawukhula njalo ekwenteni imisebenti lemihle.
7.25: Futsi shengatsi iNkhosi inganibusisa, igcine tingubo tenu tite libala, kute ekugcineni niletfwe kutsi nihlale phansi na-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe, kanye nebaphrofethi labangcwele labebakhona kusukela ekudzabukeni kwemhlaba, tingubo tenu tingenalibala njengetingubo tabo letingenalibala, embusweni welizulu ningabe nisaphumela ngaphandle nanini.
7.26: Manje bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngikhulume lamavi kini ngekwakaMoya lofakaza kimi; futsi umphefumulo wami uyatfokota kakhulu, ngenca yekukhutsala lokukhulu kanye nekulalela lenikunike emavi ami.
7.27: Manje, shengatsi kuthula kwaNkulunkulu kungaba etikwenu, nasetikwemiti kanye nasemihlabeni yenu, nasetikwemihlambi yetimvu nemihlambi yetinkhomo tenu, kanye nako konkhe leninako, bafati benu kanye nebantfwana benu, ngekwelukholo lwenu kanye nangekwemisebenti lemihle, kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili naphakadze. Ngikhulume kanjena. Amen.

8.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima wabuya eveni laGideyoni, emvakwekutsi sekafundzise bantfu baGideyoni tintfo letiningi letingeke tibhalwe, sekalumisile luhlelo lwelibandla, njengoba bekentile ngaphambili eveni laseZarahemla, yebo, wabuyela emtini wakhe eZarahemla kute ayotiphumuta ekusebenteni labekakwentile.
8.2: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi.
8.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka welishumi wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi, Alima wesuka kuleyondzawo watsatsa luhambo lwakhe wawelela eveni laseMelekhi, enshonalanga yemfula iSidoni, enshonalanga ngaseminceleni yelihlane.
8.4: Wacala kufundzisa bantfu eveni laseMelekhi ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, lebekabitwe ngalo; wacala kufundzisa bantfu kulo lonkhe live laseMelekhi.
8.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu beta kuye baphuma eminceleni yonkhe yelive lebelingasehlane. Babhajatiswa kulo lonkhe lelo live;
8.6: Kwatsi uma sekacedzile umsebenti wakhe eMelekhi wesuka kuleyondzawo, wahamba luhambo lwetinsuku letintsatfu waya ngasenyakatfo yelive laseMelekhi; wafika edolobheni lelalibitwa ngekutsi yi-Amoniha.
8.7: Manje bekulisiko lebantfu baNefi kutsi babite emave abo, nemadolobha abo, kanye netigodzi tabo, yebo, tonkhe tigodzi tabo letincane, ngeligama laloyo wekucala lobekawatsatsile; futsi kwaba kanjalo nangelive lase-Amoniha.
8.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima sekafikile edolobheni lase-Amoniha wacala kushumayela livi laNkulunkulu kubo.
8.9: Manje Sathane besekatilawule kakhulu tinhlitiyo tebantfu basedolobheni lase-Amoniha; ngako-ke abafunanga kuwalalela emavi a-Alima.
8.10: Noko Alima wasebenta kakhulu kumoya, azabalaza naNkulunkulu ngekuthandaza lokukhulu, kute atsele Moya wakhe etikwebantfu labebakulelidolobha; kute amvumele kutsi ababhabhadisele ekuphendvukeni.
8.11: Noko batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, batsi kuye: Buka, siyati kutsi ungu-Alima; futsi siyati kutsi ungumphristi lomkhulu ngetulu kwelibandla lowalisungula etincenyeni letiningi telive, ngekwelisiko lakho; asisibo belibandla lakho, futsi asikholelwa emasikweni labuwula njengalawa.
8.12: Futsi siyati kutsi ngenca yekutsi asisibo belibandla lakho siyati kutsi ute emandla ngetulu kwetfu; futsi unike sihlalo sekwehlulela kuNefiha; ngako-ke awusuye umehluleli lomkhulu ngetulu kwetfu.
8.13: Manje ngesikhatsi bantfu sebakushito loku, bamelana nemavi akhe onkhe, bamtfuka, bamkhafulela ngematse, benta kutsi acoshwe edolobheni labo, wesuka kuleyo ndzawo watsatsa luhambo lwakhe waya ngasedolobheni lelabitwa ngekutsi yi-Aroni.
8.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi asahamba aya kuleyondzawo, umtimba wakhe ushone phansi ngenca yelusizi, ahlupheke kakhulu futsi adzabukile emphefumulweni, ngenca yebubi bebantfu labebasedolobheni lase-Amoniha, kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima umtimba wakhe usashone phansi ngenca yelusizi, buka ingilosi yenkhosi yavela kuye, itsi:
8.15: Ubusisiwe, Alima; ngako-ke, phakamisa inhloko yakho futsi utfokote, ngoba unesizatfu lesikhulu sekutsi utfokote; ngoba utsembekile ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu kusukela ngesikhatsi utfola umlayeto wakho wekucala kuye. Buka, nginguye loyo lowawuletsa kuwe.
8.16: Futsi buka, ngitfunywe kutsi ngitokuyaleta kutsi ubuyele edolobheni lase-Amoniha, uphindze ushumayele bantfu balelo dolobha; yebo, utsi kubo, ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itawubabhubhisa.
8.17: Ngoba buka, benta imetamo ngalesi sikhatsi kute bacedze inkhululeko yebantfu bakho, (ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi) loko lokuphambene nemitsetfo, kanye netehlulelo, kanye nemiyaleto leyiyinike bantfu bayo.
8.18: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Alima sekawutfolile umyaleto wakhe lovela engilosini yeNkhosi wabuyela ngekushesha eveni lase-Amoniha. Wangena edolobheni ngalenye indlela, yebo, ngendlela lebeyingaseningizimu yelidolobha lase-Amoniha.
8.19: Ngesikhatsi angena edolobheni besekalambile, watsi endvodzeni: Ungayipha yini inceku letfobekile yaNkulunkulu lokutsite kute idle na?
8.20: Futsi lendvodza yatsi kuye: NgingumNefi, ngiyati kutsi ungumphrofethi longcwele waNkulunkulu, ngoba uyindvodza ingilosi lengitjele ngayo embonweni yatsi: Uyawumemukela. Ngako-ke, hamba nami siye endlini yami ngitakunika incenye yekudla kwami; futsi ngiyati kutsi utawuba sibusiso kimi kanye nasemtini wami.
8.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lendvodza yamemukela emtini wayo; lendvodza yayibitwa ngekutsi ngu-Amulekhi; yaletsa sinkhwa kanye nenyama yakubeka ngaphambi kwa-Alima.
8.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima wadla sinkhwa wesutsa; futsi wambusisa Amulekhi kanye nemndeni wakhe, wabonga kuNkulunkulu.
8.23: Emvakwekutsi sekadlile futsi sekesutsi watsi ku-Amulekhi: Ngingu-Alima, ngingumphristi lomkhulu ebandleni laNkulunkulu kulo lonkhe live.
8.24: Futsi buka, ngibitwe kutsi ngishumayele livi laNkulunkulu emkhatsini wabo bonkhe labantfu, ngekwemoya wekwembulelwa kanye nekuphrofetha; bengikulelive futsi abangemukelanga, kodvwa bangikhiphele ngaphandle phindze besengitolifulatsela lelive ingunaphakadze.
8.25: Buka, ngiyaletwe kutsi kufanele ngiphindze ngibuyele ngiphrofethe kulaba bantfu, yebo, futsi ngifakaze ngalokumelene nabo mayelana nebubi babo.
8.26: Manje, Amulekhi, ngenca yekutsi ungiphile kudla futsi wangingenisa, ubusisiwe; ngoba bengilambile, ngoba bengizilile tinsuku letiningi.
8.27: Futsi Alima wahlala tinsuku letiningi na-Amulekhi ngaphambi kwekutsi acale kushumayela kubantfu.
8.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bakhula kakhulu ebubini babo.
8.29: Futsi livi lafika ku-Alima, litsi: Hamba; uphindze usho encekwini yami Amulekhi, kutsi akahambe aphrofethe kulaba bantfu, atsi—Phendvukani, ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke ngitawubavakashela laba bantfu ngentfukutselo yami; yebo, futsi anginalubuyisela emuva lulaka lwami lolwesabekako kubo.
8.30: Futsi Alima wahamba, na-Amulekhi ngalokunjalo, emkhatsini webantfu, kuyomemetela emavi aNkulunkulu kubo; futsi bagcwaliswa ngaMoya loNgcwele.
8.31: Futsi baba nemandla labanikwa wona, kangangekutsi bebangeke bavalelwe emgodzini lolijele; noma kube lula kutsi umuntfu ababulale; noko abatange bawasebentise emandla abo kwate kwaba ngesikhatsi baboshwa ngetibopho baphoswa ejele. Manje, loku kwentelwa kutsi iNkhosi ikhombise emandla ayo kubo.
8.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba bacala kushumayela kanye nekuphrofetha kubantfu, ngekwakamoya kanye nemandla iNkhosi lebeyibanike wona.

9.intro: Emavi a-Alima, futsi ngalokunjalo nemavi a-Amulekhi, lamenyetelwa kubantfu labebaseveni lase-Amoniha. Ngetulu kwaloko baphonswa ejele, futsi bakhishwa ngemandla lamangalisako aNkulunkulu labekakubo, ngekwembhalo wa-Alima.
9.1: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, mine, Alima, ngiyaletwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi ngitsatse Amulekhi sihambe siphindze sishumayele kulaba bantfu, noma kubantfu labebasedolobheni lase-Amoniha, kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi ngicala kushumayela kubo, bacala kuphikisana nami, batsi:
9.2: Ungubani wena? Ucabanga kutsi tsine sitawukholwa bufakazi bemuntfu munye, noma angasishumayela kutsi umhlaba kumele wendlule na?
9.3: Manje bebangawacondzi lamavi labebawakhuluma; ngoba bebangati kutsi umhlaba kumele wendlule.
9.4: Futsi baphindze batsi: Angeke siwakholwe lamavi akho uma ungaphrofetha kutsi lelidolobha lelikhulu lingabhujiswa ngelilanga linye.
9.5: Manje bebangati kutsi Nkulunkulu bekangayenta imisebenti lemangalisako lenjalo, ngoba bebabantfu labanetinhlitiyo letilukhuni kanye nalabanenhloko lelukhuni.
9.6: Futsi batsi, Ngubani Nkulunkulu, longasatfumeli ligunya ngaphandle kwemuntfu munye nje emkhatsini walaba bantfu, kutsi amemetele kubo liciniso letintfo letinkhulu kangaka futsi letimangalisako na?
9.7: Futsi beta ngaphambili kute bangibambe; kodvwa buka, abatange. Futsi ngema ngesibindzi kute ngimemetele kubo, yebo, ngafakaza ngesibindzi kubo, ngatsi:
9.8: Bukani, Awu nine situkulwane lesikhohlakele nalesiphambene, seniwakhohlwe kanjani emasiko aboyihlo; yebo, seniyikhohlwe masinyane kanjani imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu na?
9.9: Anikhumbuli yini kutsi babe, Lehi, wakhishwa eJerusalema ngesandla saNkulunkulu na? Anikhumbuli yini kutsi bonkhe bebaholwa nguye ehlane na?
9.10: Futsi ngabe senikhohlwe masinyane kangaka kutsi tingakhi tikhatsi abakhulula bobabe betfu etandleni tetitsa tabo, futsi wabavikela ekubulaweni, nangetandla tabomnakabo lucobo na?
9.11: Yebo, futsi kube kwakungasiko ngenca yemandla akhe langalinganiswa, kanye nemusa wakhe, kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kitsi, ngabe sesasuswa ngalokungenakuvimbeleka ebusweni bemhlaba kudzala ngaphambi kwalesi sikhatsi, futsi mhlawumbe ngabe sesayiswa esimeni sekuhlupheka kanye nelusizi lolungapheli.
9.12: Bukani, manje ngitsi kini uyaniyaleta kutsi niphendvuke; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke, kute ngisho nalencane indlela yekutsi nidle lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu. Kodvwa bukani, akusiko loku kuphela—uniyalete kutsi niphendvuke, noma utawunibhubhisa nya ebusweni bemhlaba; yebo, utawunivakashela ngentfukutselo yakhe, futsi lulaka lwakhe lolwesabekako akanakulubuyisela emuva.
9.13: Bukani, aniwakhumbuli yini emavi lawakhuluma kuLehi, latsi: Kangangoba niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami, niyawuphumelela eveni? Kantsi futsi kuyashiwo kutsi: Kangangoba ningetuyigcina imiyaleto yami niyawuhlukaniswa ebukhoneni beNkhosi.
9.14: Manje ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule, kutsi kangangoba emaLamani angayigcinanga imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, ahlukaniswa phambi kweNkhosi. Manje siyabona kutsi livi leNkhosi licinisekisiwe kulentfo, futsi emaLamani ehlukanisiwe phambi kwakhe, kusukela ekucaleni kwetiphambuko tawo kulelive.
9.15: Noko ngitsi kini, kuyawubeketeleleka kakhulu kwawo ngelusuku lwekwehlulelwa kunaloku kwenu, uma nihlala etonweni tenu, yebo, futsi kuyawubeketeleleka kakhulu kwawo kulemphilo kunaloku kwenu, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke.
9.16: Ngoba kukhona titsembiso letiningi letentelwe emaLamani; ngoba kungenca yemasiko aboyise lenta kutsi ahlale kuleso simo sawo sekungati; ngako-ke iNkhosi itawuba nemusa kuwo futsi yelule kuphila kwawo eveni.
9.17: Futsi ngalesinye sikhatsi lesitsite atawuholelwa ekutseni akholelwe evini layo, futsi ati ngekungalungi kwemasiko aboyise; futsi labaningi bawo batawusindziswa, ngoba iNkhosi itawuba nemusa kubo bonkhe labo lababita ligama layo.
9.18: Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi kini uma niphikelela ebubini benu tinsuku tenu ngeke tiselulwa eveni, ngoba emaLamani ayawutfunyelwa kini; futsi uma ningaphendvuki ayawufika ngesikhatsi leningasati, futsi niyawuvakashelwa ngekubhujiswa lokuphelele; futsi kuyawuba ngekwentfukutselo leyesabekako yeNkhosi.
9.19: Ngoba angeke inivumele kutsi nihlale ebubini benu, kutsi nibhubhise bantfu bayo. Ngitsi kini, Cha; lokungenani iyovumela emaLamani kutsi abhubhise bonkhe bantfu bayo lababitwa ngebantfu baNefi, uma kungenteka kutsi bawele etonweni kanye nasetiphambukweni, emvakwekutsi sebabe nekukhanya kangaka kanye nelwati lolukhulu kangaka lolunikwe bona yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu;
9.20: Yebo, emvakwekutsi babantfu labebatsandvwa kakhulu kangaka yiNkhosi; yebo, emvakwekutsi batsandvwe ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye tive, imindeni, tilimi, noma bantfu; emvakwekutsi sebatiswe tonkhe tintfo, ngekwetifiso tabo, nelukholo lwabo, kanye nemithandazo, loko lokwakukhona, naloko lokukhona, kanye naloko lokusatokuta.
9.21: Bavakashelwe nguMoya waNkulunkulu; bakhulumile netingilosi, futsi kukhulunyiwe nabo ngelivi leNkhosi; futsi banemoya wekuphrofetha, kanye nemoya wekwembulelwa, futsi ngalokunjalo netipho letiningi, sipho sekukhuluma ngetilimi, kanye nesipho sekushumayela, nesipho seMoya loNgcwele, nesipho sekuhumusha;
9.22: Yebo, futsi emvakwekutsi bakhululwe nguNkulunkulu baphuma eveni laseJerusalema, ngesandla seNkhosi, basindziswe endlaleni, nasekuguleni, kanye nakuto tonkhe tinhlobo tetifo letitinhlobonhlobo; futsi bakhulile bacina ekulweni, kute bangabhujiswa; bakhishwe ebugcilini tikhatsi ngetikhatsi, futsi bagciniwe futsi balondvolotwa kute kube manje; futsi baphunyelelisiwe bate banotsa ngato tonkhe tinhlobo tetintfo—
9.23: Manje bukani ngitsi kini, uma laba bantfu, lesebatfole tibusiso letiningi kangaka esandleni seNkhosi, bebangaphambuka baphambane nekukhanya kanye nelwati labanalo, ngitsi kini uma loku kungaba njalo, uma bangawela esiphambukweni, kuyawubeketeleleka kakhulu kwemaLamani kunekwabo.
9.24: Ngoba bukani, titsembiso teNkhosi tentelwe emaLamani, kodvwa atikentelwa nine uma niphambuka; ngoba iNkhosi ayitsembisanga yini ngalokusobala futsi yamemetela ngalokucinile, kutsi uma nitawuyihlamuka niyawubhujiswa ngalokuphelele ebusweni bemhlaba na?
9.25: Manje ngalesi sizatfu, kute ningabhujiswa, iNkhosi itfumele ingilosi yayo kutsi ivakashele bantfu bayo labaningi, imemetele kubo kutsi kufanele bahambe futsi bakhale kakhulu kulaba bantfu, batsi: Phendvukani, ngoba umbuso welizulu sewusondzele.
9.26: Futsi akusetinsuku letiningi kusukela manje kutsi iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ifike ngenkhatimulo yayo; futsi inkhatimulo yayo iyawuba yinkhatimulo yaloTelwe Yedvwa waBabe, logcwele sihawu, kulunga, kanye neliciniso, logcwele kubeketela, umusa kanye nekumela bulukhuni, losheshako kuva kukhala kwebantfu bakhe futsi aphendvule imithandazo yabo.
9.27: Futsi bukani, uta kutawuhlenga labo labatawubhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni, ngekukholwa egameni lakhe.
9.28: Ngako-ke, lungisani indlela yeNkhosi, ngoba sikhatsi sesisondzele kutsi bonkhe bantfu bavune umvuzo wemisebenti yabo, ngaloko labebakadze bangiko—uma bebalungile bayawuvuna kusindziswa kwemiphefumulo yabo, ngekwemandla kanye nenkhululeko yaJesu Khristu; futsi uma beyimibi bayawuvuna kulahlwa kwemiphefumulo yabo, ngekwemandla kanye nekutfunjwa ngudeveli.
9.29: Manje bukani, leli livi lengilosi, likhala ebantfwini.
9.30: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngoba nibomnaketfu, futsi nimele kutsi nitsandzeke, futsi nimele kutsi niletse imisebenti ledzingekako yekuphendvuka, ngekubona kutsi tinhlitiyo tenu tentiwe taba lukhuni kakhulu ngalokumelene nelivi laNkulunkulu, futsi ngekubona kutsi nibantfu labalahlekile nalabawile.
9.31: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi mine, Alima, sengiwakhulumile lamavi, buka bantfu bangitfukutselela ngenca yekutsi ngatsi kubo bebabantfu labanetinhlitiyo letilukhuni kanye nalabanetinhloko letilukhuni.
9.32: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngenca yekutsi ngatsi kubo bebabantfu labalahlekile futsi labawile bangitfukutselela, futsi bafuna kungibamba, kute bangiphonse ejele.
9.33: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi ayibavumelanga kutsi bangitsatse ngaleso sikhatsi bangiphonse ejele.
9.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amulekhi wahamba wema ngaphambili, wacala kushumayela kubo futsi. Manje emavi a-Amulekhi akabhalwa onkhe, noko incenye yemavi akhe abhaliwe kulencwadzi.

10.1: Manje lawa ngemavi a-Amulekhi lawashumayela kubantfu labebaseveni laseAmoniha, watsi:
10.2: Ngingu-Amulekhi; ngiyindvodzana yaGidona, lobekayindvodzana ya-Ishmayeli, lobekawentalelwane ya-Aminadi; futsi bekunguye kanye loyo Aminadi lowahumusha umbhalo lobewuseludvongeni lwelithempeli, lobewubhalwe ngemuno waNkulunkulu.
10.3: Futsi Aminadi bekawentalelwane yaNefi, lobekayindvodzana yaLehi, lowaphuma eveni laseJerusalema, lobekawentalelwane yaManase, lobekayindvodzana yaJosefa lowatsengiswa eGibhithe ngesandla sabomnakabo.
10.4: Bukani, ngetulu kwaloko ngingumuntfu lote ligama lelincane emkhatsini wabo bonkhe labangatiko; yebo, futsi bukani, nginetihlobo letiningi kanye nebangani, futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngizuze ingcebo leningi ngenca yekusebenta kwami.
10.5: Noko, emvakwakokonkhe loku, bengingatange ngati kakhulu ngetindlela teNkhosi, nangetimfihlakalo tayo kanye nangemandla ayo lamangalisako. Ngitsite bengingakate ngati kakhulu ngaleti tintfo; kodvwa bukani, ngenta liphutsa, ngoba ngitibonile letiningi timfihlakalo tayo kanye nemandla ayo lamangalisako; yebo, nasekulondvolotweni kwetimphilo talaba bantfu.
10.6: Noko, ngayenta yaba lukhuni inhlitiyo yami, ngoba ngabitwa tikhatsi letiningi futsi angilalelanga; ngako-ke ngangati mayelana naleti tintfo, kodvwa bengingatsandzi kwati; ngako-ke ngachubeka ngihlamuka Nkulunkulu, ebubini benhlitiyo yami, kwate kwaba lusuku lwesine lwalenyanga yesikhombisa, lesemnyakeni welishumi wekubusa kwebehluleli.
10.7: Ngesikatsi ngihamba ngiyawubona sihlobo lesisedvute kakhulu, buka ingilosi yeNkhosi yavela kimi yatsi: Amulekhi, buyela emtini wakho, ngoba utawukupha umphrofethi weNkhosi kudla; yebo, indvodza lengcwele, lengumuntfu lokhetsiwe waNkulunkulu; ngoba izilile tinsuku letiningi ngenca yetono talaba bantfu, futsi ilambile, utawuyemukela emtini wakho futsi uyiphe kudla, futsi iyawukubusisa wena kanye nendlu yakho; futsi sibusiso seNkhosi siyawuhlala etikwakho kanye nendlu yakho.
10.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalilalela livi lengilosi, ngabuyela emtini wami. Ngesikhatsi ngihamba ngisondzela lapho ngayitfola leyondvodza ingilosi lebeyitsite kimi: Utawuyemukela endlini yakho—futsi bukani bekungiyo kanye lendvodza lebeyikadze ikhuluma kini mayelana netintfo taNkulunkulu.
10.9: Futsi ingilosi yatsi kimi ingumuntfu longcwele; ngaloko-ke ngiyati kutsi ingumuntfu longcwele ngenca yekutsi kwashiwo yingilosi yaNkulunkulu.
10.10: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngiyati kutsi tintfo lefakaze ngato tiliciniso; ngoba bukani ngitsi kini, njengoba iNkhosi iphila, itfumele ingilosi yayo kutsi itembule letintfo kimi; futsi loku ikwente ngesikhatsi lo-Alima ahleti emtini wami.
10.11: Ngoba bukani, iyibusisile indlu yami, ingibusisile nami, kanye nebesifazane labasemtini wami, kanye nebantfwana bami, kanye nababe kanye nemndeni wami; yebo, nato tonkhe tihlobo tami itibusisile, futsi sibusiso seNkhosi sihlale etikwetfu ngekwemavi lewakhulumile.
10.12: Manje Amulekhi sekawakhulumile lamavi bantfu bacala kumangala, babona kutsi bekukhona bofakazi labangetulu kwamunye labebafakaza ngetintfo labebabekwa licala ngato, futsi ngalokunjalo nangetintfo lebetitowenteka, ngekwakamoya wesiphrofetho lobewukubo.
10.13: Noko, bekukhona labanye emkhatsini wabo labebacabanga kubabuta, kute ngemasu ebucili babo bababambe ngemavi abo, kute batfole bufakazi lobuphikisana nabo, kute babayise kubehluleli babo kute behlulelwe ngekwemtsetfo, futsi nekutsi babulawe noma baphonswe ejele, ngekwemacala labebatawuwenta kubukeke shengatsi banawo noma bafakaze kuphikisana nabo.
10.14: Manje bekungulawo madvodza labekafuna kubabulala, labekatatimtsetfo, labekacashiwe noma abekwe bantfu kutsi asebentise umtsetfo esikhatsini sabo sekutsetsa emacala, noma ekutsetfweni kwemacala ebantfu ngaphambi kwebehluleli.
10.15: Manje leti tatimtsetfo betifundze ngabo bonkhe buciko kanye nebucili bebantfu; futsi loku bekutotenta kutsi tibe nelikhono emsebentini wato.
10.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bacala kumbuta Amulekhi, kute ngaloko bamente aphambanise emavi akhe, noma aphikisane nemavi lekufanele awakhulume.
10.17: Manje bebangati kutsi Amulekhi bekasenekulati lisu labo. Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bacala bambuta, wayibona imicabango yabo, watsi kubo: Awu nine lababi kanye nesitukulwane lesonakele, nine tatimtsetfo kanye nani batentisi, nibeka sisekelo sadeveli; ngoba nibeka ticipho kanye netitsiyo kute nibambe labangcwele baNkulunkulu.
10.18: Nibeka tinhlelo kutsi niphambanise tindlela talabalungile, futsi nehlisele intfukutselo yaNkulukhulu etikwetinhloko tenu, nasekubhujisweni lokuphelele kwalaba bantfu.
10.19: Yebo, washo kahle Mosiya, lobekayinkhosi yetfu yekugcina, ngesikhatsi sekatawundlulisa umbuso, angenamuntfu wekumniketa wona, enta kutsi labantfu batiphatse ngekwemavi abo—yebo, washo kahle kutsi uma sikhatsi sifika sekutsi livi lalabantfu likhetse bubi, lokungukutsi, uma sikhatsi sifika sekutsi labantfu bawele esiphambukweni, bayobe sebakulungele kubhujiswa.
10.20: Manje ngitsi kini iNkhosi yehlulela kahle ngebubi benu; ngetizatfu letinhle iyakhala kulabantfu, ngelivi letingilosi tayo itsi: Phendvukani, phendvukani, ngoba umbuso welizulu sewusondzele.
10.21: Yebo, ngetizatfu letinhle iyakhala, ngelivi letingilosi tayo itsi; ngitawukuta ngehlele emkhatsini webantfu bami, ngekulunga kanye nangekwehlulela lokuhle etandleni tami.
10.22: Yebo, futsi ngitsi kini kube bekungasiko ngenca yemithandazo yalabalungile, lekungumanje bakulelive, ngabe manje senavakashelwa ngekubhujiswa lokuphelele; noko bekungayukuba kwetikhukhula, njengoba kwenteka kubantfu ngemalanga aNowa, kodvwa bekuyawuba ngendlala, nangamashayabhuce wesifo, kanye nangenkemba.
10.23: Kodvwa kungenca yemithandazo yalabalungile kutsi niyasidziswa; manje, uma nitawubacosha labalungile emkhatsini wenu iNkhosi ayitukusigodla sandla sayo; kodvwa entfukutselweni yayo leyesabekako itawuta ngalokumelene nani; ngaleso sikhatsi niyawushaywa ngendlala, nangamashayabhuce wesifo, kanye nangenkemba; futsi leso sikhatsi sesisedvute ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke.
10.24: Manje kwenteka kutsi bantfu bamtfukutselela kakhulu Amulekhi, futsi bamemeta kakhulu, batsi: lendvodza itfuka imitsetfo yetfu lelungile, kanye netatimtsetfo tetfu letihlakaniphile lesitikhetsile.
10.25: Kodvwa Amulekhi welula sandla sakhe, futsi wamemeta kakhulu kubo, atsi: Awu nine situkulwane lesibi nalesonakele, kungani Sathane alawula tinhlitiyo tenu na? Kungani nitinikela kuye kute abe nemandla ngetulu kwenu, kutsi aphumphutsekise emehlo enu, kute ningawacondzi emavi lakhulunywako, ngekweliciniso lawo na?
10.26: Ngoba bukani, ngabe ngike ngafakaza yini ngaphikisana nemtsetfo wenu na? Anicondzi; nitsi ngikhulume ngaphikisana nemtsetfo wenu; kodvwa angikate, kodvwa ngikhulume ngawuvuna umtsetfo wenu, kute nilahlwe ngelicala.
10.27: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini, sisekelo sekubhujiswa kwalaba bantfu sesicala kubekwa ngalokungalungi kwetatimtsetfo tenu kanye nebehluleli benu.
10.28: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amulekhi sekawakhulumile lamavi bantfu bamemeta kakhulu baphikisana naye, batsi: Manje sesiyati kutsi lendvodza ingumntfwana wadeveli, ngoba isikhohlisile; ngoba ikhulume yaphikisana nemtsetfo wetfu. Manje itsi ayikate ikhulume iphikisane nawo.
10.29: Ngetulu kwaloko, yedzelele tatimtsetfo tetfu, kanye nebehluleli betfu.
10.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tatimtsetfo takubeka etinhlitiyweni tato kute titikhumbule letintfo ngalokumelene naye.
10.31: Futsi bekukhona munye emkhatsini wabo ligama lakhe bekunguZeziromu. Manje waba wekucala kubeka licala Amulekhi kanye na-Alima, angulomunye wetihlakaniphi emkhatsini wabo, anemabhizinisi lamaningi lekawentako emkhatsini walabantfu.
10.32: Manje injongo yaleti tatimtsetfo bekukutfola inzuzo; futsi tatitfola inzuzo ngekusebenta kwato.

11.1: Manje kwakusemtsetfweni waMosiya kutsi wonkhe umuntfu lobekangumehluleli wemtsetfo, noma labo labebabekwe kutsi babe behluleli, batfole inkhokhelo ngekwesikhatsi leso labebasisebentile kwehlulela labo labebaletfwe phambi kwabo kutsi behlulelwe.
11.2: Manje uma umuntfu akweleta lomunye, futsi ala kubhadala loko lakukweletako, bekamangalelwa kumehluleli; bese umehluleli usebentisa ligunya, atfumele tindvuna kutsi loyo muntfu aletfwe phambi kwakhe; bese yena wehlulela lomuntfu ngekwemtsetfo kanye nangebufakazi lobo lobabuletfwa ngalokumelene naye, futsi ngaleyo ndlela umuntfu bekaphoceleleka kutsi abhadale loko lakukweletako, noma emukwe loko lanako, noma alahlwe ngaphandle aphume emkhatsini webantfu njengelisela nesigebengu.
11.3: Bese umehluleli utfola inkhokhelo yakhe ngekwesikhatsi sakhe—isenine yeligolide ngelusuku, noma isenumu yesiliva, lelingana nesenine yeligolide; futsi loku kwakwentiwa ngekwemtsetfo lobekiwe.
11.4: Manje lawa ngemagama etinhlobo letehlukene tetincetu teligolide labo, kanye nesiliva yabo, ngekwelinani lato. Futsi emagama anikwa ngemaNefi, ngoba wona awatange abale ngendlela yemaJuda labekaseJerusalema; noma alinganise ngendlela yemaJuda; kodvwa wona akugucula kubala kanye nekulinganisa kwawo, ngekwemicondvo kanye netimo tebantfu, kuto tonkhe titukulwane, kwate kwaba kubusa kwebehluleli, bona bamiswe yinkhosi Mosiya.
11.5: Manje kubala kukanje—isenine yeligolide, isiyoni yeligolide, ishumu yeligolide, kanye nelimna yeligolide.
11.6: Isenumu yesiliva, i-aminori yesiliva, i-eziromu yesiliva, kanye ne-onthi yesiliva.
11.7: Isenumu yesiliva yayilingana nesenine yeligolide, futsi kona ngakunye kwakungangesilinganiso sebhali, ngetulu kwaloko kwakungangesilinganiso sayo yonkhe inhlobo yalokuyinhlavu.
11.8: Manje linani lesiyoni yeligolide laliphindvwa kabili kulo linani lesenine.
11.9: Futsi ishumu yeligolide yayiphindvwa kabili kulo linani lesiyoni.
11.10: Futsi iIimna yeligolide yayilinani lako konkhe.
11.11: Futsi i-aminori yesiliva yayiyinkhulu ngangemasenumu lamabili.
11.12: Futsi i-eziromu yesiliva yayiyinkhulu ngangemasenumu lamane.
11.13: Futsi i-onthi yayiyinkhulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe.
11.14: Manje loku linani lesibalo lesincane sekubala kwabo—
11.15: Ishibiloni yincenye yesenumu; ngako-ke, ishibiloni ingangencenye yesilinganiso sebhali.
11.18: Manje sibalo sabo lesi, ngekwekubala kwabo.
11.19: Manje i-anthiyoni yeligolide ilingana nemashibiloni lamatsatfu,
11.20: Manje, loku kwakungenhloso yekutsi bazuze nje kuphela, ngenca yekutsi bebatfola inkhokhelo yabo ngekusebenta kwabo, ngako-ke, babaphehla bantfu kutsi kube khona lutfutfuva, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yekuphatamiseka kanye nenkhohlakalo, kute babe nemsebenti lomningi, batfole imali ngekwemacala labekaletfwa kubo; ngako-ke babaphehla bantfu ngalokumelene na-Alima kanye na-Amulekhi.
11.21: Futsi lo Zeziromu wacala kubuta Amulekhi, watsi: Ungangiphendvula yini imibuto lemibalwa lengitawuyibuta kuwe na? Manje Zeziromu bekayindvodza lenguchwephesha emachingeni adeveli, kute abhubhise loko lokwakukuhle; ngako-ke, watsi ku-Amulekhi: Ungayiphendvula yini imibuto lengitawuyibhekisa kuwe na?
11.22: Futsi Amulekhi watsi kuye: Yebo, uma kungekwakaMoya weNkhosi, lokimi; ngoba angeke ngisho lutfo loluphambene naMoya weNkhosi. Futsi Zeziromu watsi kuye: Buka, nankha ema-onthi lasitfupha esiliva, futsi onkhe lawa ngitawukunika wona uma nje ungaphika bukhona baloNgetulu Kwakokonkhe.
11.23: Manje Amulekhi watsi: Awu mntfwana wesihogo, ungilingelani na? Awati yini kutsi labalungile abatinikeli etilingweni letinjengaleti na?
11.24: Uyakholwa yini kutsi Nkulunkulu kute na? Ngitsi kuwe, Cha, uyati kutsi Nkulunkulu ukhona, kodvwa utsandza leyo mali kakhulu kunaye.
11.25: Manje ucambe emanga kimi phambi kwaNkulunkulu. Utsite kimi—Buka lama-onthi lasitfupha, langelinani lelikhulu, ngitawukunika wona—ube wati kahle enhlitiyweni yakho kutsi utawuwagodla unganginiki; futsi bekusifiso sakho nje kuphela kutsi mine ngiphike Nkulunkulu weliciniso nalophilako, kute ube nesizatfu sekungibulala. Manje buka, ngenca yalobubi lobukhulu utawutfola umvuzo wakho.
11.26: Futsi Zeziromu watsi kuye: Utsi ukhona Nkulunkulu weliciniso nalophilako na?
11.27: Futsi Amulekhi watsi: Yebo, ukhona Nkulunkulu weliciniso futsi lophilako.
11.28: Manje Zeziromu watsi: Ngabe bakhona yini labanye ngaphandle kwaNkulunkulu munye na?
11.30: Manje Zeziromu waphindze watsi kuye: Utati kanjani leti tintfo na?
11.32: Zeziromu waphindze watsi: Ngubani yena lona loyawuta na? Ngabe yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu?
11.34: Zeziromu waphindze watsi: Ngabe uyawubasindzisa yini bantfu bakhe etonweni tabo na? Amulekhi waphendvula futsi watsi kuye: Ngitsi kuwe angeke, ngoba akakwati kutsi aphikise livi lakhe.
11.35: Manje Zeziromu watsi kubantfu: Bonani kutsi niyatikhumbula leti tintfo; ngoba utse munye kuphela Nkulunkulu; kodvwa futsi utse iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu iyawukuta, kodvwa angeke ibasindzise bantfu bayo—usho shengatsi uneligunya lekuyaleta Nkulunkulu.
11.36: Manje Amulekhi waphindze watsi kuye: Buka ucamba emanga, ngoba utsi ngikhulume shengatsi ngineligunya lekuyaleta Nkulunkulu ngoba ngitse angeke abasindzise bantfu bakhe etonweni tabo.
11.37: Futsi ngiyaphindza ngitsi kuwe angeke abasindzise etonweni tabo; ngoba angeke ngiliphikise livi lakhe, futsi utse kute intfo lengcolile lengadla lifa lembuso welizulu; ngako-ke, ningasindziswa kanjani, ngaphandle kwekutsi nidle lifa lembuso welizulu na? Ngako-ke angeke nisindziswe nisetonweni tenu.
11.38: Manje Zeziromu waphindze watsi kuye: Ngabe iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ngiyo cobolwayo yini Babe longunaPhakadze?
11.39: Futsi Amulekhi watsi kuye: Yebo, inguye kanye Babe longunaPhakadze welizulu nemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letikuwo; isicalo kanye nesiphetfo, yekucala neyekugcina.
11.40: Futsi iyawukuta emhlabeni kutawuhlenga bantfu bayo; iyawutfwala tiphambuko talabo labakholwa egameni layo; futsi ngibo labo labayawukuba nekuphila lokuphakadze, futsi insindziso ayiti kulomunye.
11.41: Ngako-ke lababi bayawuhlala shengatsi akutange kube khona kuhlengwa lokwentiwe, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube kucekiswa kwetibopho tekufa; ngoba bukani, lusuku luyeta lapho bonkhe bayawuvuka ekufeni baphindze beme phambi kwaNkulunkulu, behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo.
11.42: Manje, kukhona kufa lokubitwa ngekutsi kufa kwesikhashana; kufa kwaKhristu kuyawucekisa tibopho taloku kufa kwesikhashana, kute bonkhe bavuswe ekufeni kwesikhashana.
11.43: Umoya kanye nemtimba kuyawuhlanganiswa futsi kube sesimeni sako lesiphelele; titfo kanye nemalunga kuyawubuyiselwa esicwini sako lesiphelele, njengoba sinje manje kulesi sikhatsi; futsi siyawuletfwa sime phambi kwaNkulunkulu, sati njengaloku sati manje, futsi siyawuwakhumbula ngalokucacile onkhe emacala etfu.
11.44: Manje, loku kubuyiselwa kuyawukuta kubo bonkhe bantfu, lomdzala kanye nalomncane, loboshiwe nalokhululekile, wesilisa newesifazane, lababi nalabalungile; futsi kute nalunye lunwele lwetinhloko tabo loluyawulahleka; kodvwa tonkhe tintfo tiyawubuyiselwa esicwini sato lesiphelele, njengoba kunjalo manje, noma emtimbeni, futsi tiyawuletfwa tibekwe licala phambi kwesihlalo saKhristu iNdvodzana, kanye naNkulunkulu Babe, kanye neMoya loNgcwele, longuNkulunkulu munye waPhakadze, kute tehlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yato, noma ngabe mihle noma ngabe mibi.
11.45: Manje, bukani, sengikhulumile kini mayelana nekufa kwemtimba lobhubhako, futsi ngalokunjalo nangekuvuka kwemtimba lobhubhako. Ngitsi kini lomtimba lobhubhako uvuselwa emtimbeni longabhubhi, lokungukutsi usuka ekufeni kusukela ekufeni kwekucala kuya ekuphileni, kute ingabe isafa futsi; imimoya yabo ihlangana nemitimba yabo, ingaphindzi yehlukaniswe futsi; ngaleyondlela konkhe kube ngumtimba wemoya kanye nalongabhubhi, kute ingabe isakubona futsi kubola.
11.46: Manje, ngesikhatsi Amulekhi asacedzile kusho lamavi bantfu bacala futsi kumangala, ngalokunjalo naZeziromu wacala kuchachatela. Aphela kanjalo emavi a-Amulekhi, noma nguloku kuphela lengikubhalile.

12.1: Manje Alima, abona kutsi emavi a-Amulekhi besekamthulisile Zeziromu, ngoba wabona kutsi Amulekhi besekambambile emangeni kanye nasekukhohliseni kwakhe kute ambulale, futsi abona kutsi besekacala kuchachatela ngesazela sakhe sekuba nelicala, wavula umlomo wakhe wacala kukhuluma kuye, kanye nekugcizelela emavi a-Amulekhi, nekuchaza tintfo ngetulu, noma kwembula imibhalo lengcwele ngetulu kwaloko Amulekhi bekakwentile.
12.2: Manje emavi Alima lawakhuluma kuZeziromu aviwa bantfu etindzaweni tonkhe; ngoba sicuku besisikhulu, futsi wakhuluma ngalendlela:
12.3: Manje Zeziromu, ngoba sewubonile kutsi sewubanjiwe emangeni kanye nasebucilini bakho, ngoba awukacambi emanga kubantfu kuphela kodvwa uwacambe nakuNkulunkulu; ngoba buka, uyayati yonkhe imicabango yakho, futsi nawe uyabona kutsi imicabango yakho yatisiwe kitsi ngaMoya wakhe;
12.4: Futsi uyabona kutsi siyati kutsi lisu lakho bekulisu lebucili lobukhulu, njengebucili badeveli, kucamba emanga kanye nekukhohlisa laba bantfu kute ubente balwe natsi, kutsi basitfuke futsi basikhiphele ngaphandle.
12.5: Manje leli bekulisu lesitsa sakho, futsi sisebentise emandla aso kuwe. Manje ngifuna kutsi ukhumbule kutsi lengikusho kuwe ngikusho kubo bonkhe.
12.6: Futsi bukani ngitsi kini nonkhe lolu bekulugibe lwesitsa, lesilubekele kutsi lubambe labantfu, kute siniletse ngaphansi kwaso, kute sinitungelete ngetinketane taso, kute sinibophele phansi ekubhujisweni kwaphakadze, ngekwemandla ekutfumba kwaso.
12.7: Manje ngesikhatsi Alima sekawakhulumile lamavi, Zeziromu wacala kuchachatela kakhulu, ngoba wakholwa kakhulu ngemandla aNkulunkulu; ngetulu kwaloko wakholwa kutsi Alima na-Amulekhi bebanelwati ngaye, ngoba wakholwa kutsi bebayati imicabango kanye netinjongo tenhlitiyo yakhe; ngoba bebanikiwe emandla ekutsi batati leti tintfo ngekwemoya wesiphrofetho.
12.8: Futsi Zeziromu wacala kubuta kubo aphindzelela, kute ati kabanti mayelana nembuso waNkulunkulu. Futsi watsi ku-Alima: Kuchaza kutsini loku Amulekhi lakukhulumile mayelana nekuvuka kwalabafile, kutsi bonkhe bayawuvuka ekufeni, labalungile kanye nalabangakalungi, baletfwe kute beme phambi kwaNkulunkulu kutsi behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo?
12.9: Manje Alima wacala kumcacisela leti tintfo, atsi kuniketiwe kulabaningi kutsi batati timfihlakalo taNkulunkulu; noko babekwe ngaphansi kwemtsetfo locinile wekutsi bangalindlulisi kuphela ngekwencenye yelivi lakhe lalinikete bantfwana bebantfu, ngekulalela kanye nekukhutsala labamnika kona.
12.10: Ngako-ke, loyo lotawukwenta lukhuni inhlitiyo yakhe, nguye kanye loyo lotfola incenye lencane yelivi; futsi loyo longeke ente lukhuni inhlitiyo yakhe, kuye kunikwa incenye lenkhulu yelivi, ate anikwe kutsi ati timfihlakalo taNkulunkulu ate atati ngalokugcwele.
12.11: Futsi labo labatawutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, baniketwa incenye lencane yelivi bate bangabe basati lutfo mayelana netimfihlakalo takhe; futsi emvakwaloko batfunjwa ngudeveli, abahole ngekwentsandvo yakhe; abayise phansi ekubhujisweni. Manje nguloku lokuchazwa tinketane tesihogo.
12.12: Futsi Amulekhi ukhulume ngalokusobala mayelana nekufa, kanye nekuvuswa kuloku kubhubha kuya esimeni sekungabhubhi, kanye nekuletfwa ngaphambi kwesihlalo saNkulunkulu, kute sehlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yetfu.
12.13: Kuleso simo uma tinhlitiyo tetfu betilukhuni, yebo, uma sitente taba lukhuni tinhlitiyo ngalokumelene nelivi, kangangekutsi alitfolakalanga kitsi, uma kunjalo simo setfu sitawuba sibi kakhulu, ngoba uma kunjalo siyawubekwa licala.
12.14: Ngoba emavi etfu atawusibeka licala, yebo, yonkhe imisebenti yetfu itawusibeka licala; angeke sitfolakale site licala; futsi imicabango yetfu nayo itawusibeka licala; futsi kulesi simo lesibi kangaka ngeke silinge nakancane simbuke Nkulunkulu wetfu; futsi singakujabulela sikutfokotele uma besingayaleta emadvwala kanye netintsaba kutsi tiwele etikwetfu kute tisifihle phambi kwakhe.
12.15: Kodvwa loku akunakwenteka; kufanele siphumele ebaleni futsi sime phambi kwakhe enkhatimulweni yakhe, nasemandleni akhe, nakubo bukhulu bemandla akhe, nebukhosi, kanye nebukhulu bakhe, futsi sivume ngekutenyeta kwetfu kwaphakadze kutsi tonkhe tehlulelo takhe tilungile; nekutsi ulungile kuyo yonkhe imisebenti yakhe, nekutsi unebubele kubo bantfwana bebantfu, futsi nekutsi unawo onkhe emandla ekusindzisa wonkhe muntfu lokholwa egameni lakhe futsi aletse titselo tekuphendvuka.
12.16: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini ngaleso sikhatsi kuta kufa, kufa kwesibili, lokukufa kwakamoya; kuyakuba nguleso sikhatsi lapho noma ngubani lofela etonweni takhe, ngekufa kwesikhashana, uyawukufa kufa kwakamoya; yebo, uyawukufa etintfweni letiphatselene nekulunga.
12.17: Nguleso sikhatsi lapho tinhlupheko tabo tiyawuba njenge lichibi lemlilo kanye nesibabuli, emalangabi alo akhuphukela ngetulu phakadze naphakadze; futsi nguleso sikhatsi lapho bayawuboshelwa phansi ekubhujisweni kwaphakadze, ngekwemandla kanye nebucili baSathane, ababeke phansi kwakhe ngekwentsandvo yakhe.
12.18: Ngako-ke, ngitsi kini, kubo kuyawuba shengatsi akutange kube khona kuhlengwa lokwentiwe; ngoba abanakuhlengwa ngekuhambisana nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu; futsi abatukufa, ngenca yekutsi kuyawube kungasekho konakala.
12.19: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima sekacedzile kukhuluma lamavi, bantfu bacala kumangala kakhulu.
12.20: Kodvwa bekukhona munye lobekabitwa ngekutsi ngu-Anthiyona, lobekangumbusi lomkhulu emkhatsini wabo, weta ngaphambili watsi kuye: Yini lena loyishito, kutsi umuntfu uyawuvuka ekufeni futsi aguculwe kulesimo sekubhubha abe sesimeni sekungabhubhi, nekutsi umphefumulo ngeke usaphindze ubhubhe na?
12.21: Ucondze kutsini umbhalo longcwele, lona lotsi Nkulunkulu wabeka ikherubhi kanye nenkemba levutsako emphumalanga yensimu yase-Edeni, hleze batali betfu bekucala bangene futsi badle sitselo sesihlahla sekuphila, bese baphila ingunaphakadze na? Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi belingekho litfuba lekutsi baphile ingunaphakadze.
12.22: Manje Alima watsi kuye: Lena yintfo lebesengitoyichaza. Manje siyabona kutsi Adamu ngempela wawa ngekudla sitselo lebesingakavunyelwa, ngekwelivi laNkulunkulu; futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona, kutsi ngekuwa kwakhe, lonkhe luntfu lwaba bantfu labalahlekile kanye nalabawile.
12.23: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini uma bekungenteka kutsi Adamu adle sitselo sesihlahla sekuphila ngaleso sikhatsi, bekungeke kube khona kufa, futsi livi beliyawuba lite, lente Nkulunkulu umkhohlisi, ngoba watsi: Uma usidla uyawukufa nekufa.
12.24: Futsi siyabona kutsi kufa kuta etikweluntfu, yebo, kufa loko lakhulume ngako Amulekhi, lokukufa kwesikhashana; noko kwaba khona sikhatsi lesanikwa umuntfu kutsi ngaso aphendvuke; ngako-ke lemphilo yase iba yesimo sekulingwa; sikhatsi sekulungiselela kuhlangana naNkulunkulu; sikhatsi sekulungiselela leso simo lesingapheli lesikhulume ngaso, lesingemuva kwekuvuka kwalabafile.
12.25: Manje, kube bekungasiko kutsi bekungelisu lekuhlengwa, lebelentiwe kusukela esisekelweni semhlaba, bekungeke kube khona kuvuka kulabafile; kodvwa kwaba khona lisu lekuhlengwa lelentiwa, leliyawuletsa kuvuka kwalabafile, loko lesekukhulunywe ngako.
12.26: Manje bukani, uma bekungenteka kutsi batali betfu bekucala bebangahamba futsi bayawudla esihlahleni sekuphila bebayawuba lusizi ingunaphakadze, bangenasimo sekutilungiselela; futsi ngaleyondlela lisu lekuhlengwa beliyawube selivimbelekile, futsi livi laNkulunkulu beliyawuba lite, lingasafezekanga.
12.27: Kodvwa bukani, akubanga njalo; kodvwa bantfu bamiselwa kutsi kufanele bafe; emvakwekufa, kufanele bete ekwehlulelweni, loko kwehlulelwa lesikhulume ngako, lokukwekugcina.
12.28: Emvakwekutsi Nkulunkulu sekatimisile kutsi leti tintfo kufanele tenteke kumuntfu, bukani, emvakwaloko wabona kutsi bekudzingekile kutsi umuntfu ati mayelana netintfo labekababekele tona;
12.29: Ngako-ke watfumela tingilosi kutsi tikhulume nabo, tibente bantfu kutsi babone inkhatimulo yakhe.
12.30: Bacala kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili kubita libito lakhe; ngako-ke Nkulunkulu wakhuluma nebantfu, wenta kutsi bati ngelisu lekuhlengwa, lebelilungiswe kusukela esisekelweni semhlaba, futsi loku wabatisa ngekwelukholo lwabo kanye nekuphendvuka kanye nangekwemisebenti yabo lengcwele.
12.31: Ngaloko-ke, waniketa imiyaleto kubantfu, bona sebayiphulile imiyaleto yekucala ngekwetintfo tesikhashana, futsi sebanjengabonkulunkulu, bati lokuhle nalokubi, batibeke esimeni sekwenta, noma babekwe esimeni sekwenta ngekwetifiso kanye nangekutsandza kwabo, noma kwenta lokubi noma kwenta lokuhle—
12.32: Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu wabanika imiyaleto, emvakwekutsi asalatisile kubo lisu lekuhlengwa kutsi bangakwenti lokubi, sijeziso saloko kufa kwesibili, lobekukufa kwaphakadze ngekwetintfo letiphatselene nekulunga; ngoba kulabo lisu lekuhlengwa, kutsi bangakwenti lokubi, sijeziso saloko kufa kwesibili, lobekukufa kwaphakadze ngoba imisebenti yekulunga beyingeke ibhujiswe, ngenca yebuhle lobukhulu kakhulu baNkulunkulu.
12.33: Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wababita bantfu, egameni leNdvodzana yakhe, (loku kulisu lekuhlengwa lebelicanjiwe) atsi: Uma nitawuphendvuka, futsi ningatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu, uma kunjalo ngiyawuba nemusa kini, ngayo iNdvodzana yami leTelwe Yodvwa.
12.34: Ngako-ke, loyo lophendvukako, futsi angayenti lukhuni inhlitiyo yakhe, uyawuba nesabelo kuwo umusa ngeNdvodzana yami leTelwe Yodvwa, kute atsetselelwe tono takhe; futsi laba bayawungena ekuphumuleni kwami.
12.35: Futsi loyo lotawuyenta lukhuni inhlitiyo yakhe futsi ente bubi, bukani, ngiyafunga ngisentfukutselweni yami kutsi akayukungena ekuphumuleni kwami.
12.36: Manje, bomnaketfu, bukani ngitsi kini, uma nitawutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu aniyukungena ekuphumuleni kwenkhosi; ngako-ke bubi benu bumbangela lulaka kangangekutsi wehlisela lulaka lwakhe etikwenu njengekuhlubuka kwekucala, yebo, ngekwelivi lakhe ngesikhatsi sekuhlubuka kwekugcina njengaloko kwekucala, kute kubhujiswe imiphefumulo yenu ingunaphakadze; ngako-ke, ngekwelivi lakhe, ngalokwanele kutsi ife kwekugcina, ngalokunjalo nangekwekucala.
12.37: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngekubona kutsi siyatati letintfo, futsi tiliciniso, asiphendvukeni, futsi singatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tetfu, kute singayibangeli iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu kutsi yehlisele lulaka lwayo etikwetfu kulemiyaleto yayo yesibili lesinike yona; kodvwa asingeneni ekuphumuleni kwaNkulunkulu, lokulungisiwe ngekwelivi lakhe.

13.1: Futsi ngalokunjalo, bomnaketfu, ngiyawubhekisa tingcondvo tenu phambili ngesikhatsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu inika lemiyaleto kubantfwana bayo; futsi ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yagcoba baphristi, ngekweluhlelo lwayo lolungcwele, lolwalungekweluhlelo lweNdvodzana yayo, kutsi bafundzise leti tintfo kubantfu.
13.2: Futsi labo baphristi bagcotjwa ngekweluhlelo lweNdvodzana yayo, ngendlela yekutsi bantfu bati kutsi nguyiphi indlela labangabuka ngayo phambili kuyo iNdvodzana yayo kute bahlengwe.
13.3: Futsi lena yindlela labagcotjwa ngayo—babitiwe futsi balungiselelwa kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba ngelwati lwangaphambilini ngaNkulunkulu, ngenca yelukholo lwabo lolukhulu kanye nemisebenti yabo lemihle; kwekucala bashiywe kutsi batikhetsele lokuhle noma lokubi; ngako-ke bona sebakhetse lokuhle, futsi babe nelukholo lolukhulu kakhulu, babitwa ngelubito lolungcwele, yebo, ngalolobito lolungcwele lolwalulungisiwe, kanye nangekuhlengwa lokulungiselelwe labanjalo.
13.4: Futsi ngaleyondlela babitelwe kulolubito lolungcwele ngenca yelukholo lwabo, babe labanye bawulahla Moya waNkulunkulu ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo kanye nebumphumphutse bemicondvo yabo, kantsi, kube bekungesiko kutsi kwakungenca yaloku bebangaba nelilungelo lelikhulu njengabomnakabo.
13.5: Noma-ke kwephetsa, kwekucala babe sesimeni lesifanako nabomnakabo; ngaleyondlela lolubito lolungcwele lulungisiwe kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba lulungiselwe labo labangeke batente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, lukuyo futsi lungayo inhlawulo yeNdvodzana leTelwe Yodvwa, leyayilungisiwe—
13.6: Futsi ngaleyondlela babitwe ngalolubito lolungcwele, bagcotjelwa kubo buphristi lobukhulu beluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, kutsi bafundzise imiyaleto yakhe kubantfwana bebantfu, kute nabo ngalokunjalo bangene ekuphumuleni kwakhe—
13.7: Lobuphristi lobukhulu bungekweluhlelo lweNdvodzana yakhe, luhlelo loluseloku lwabakhona kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba; noma ngalamanye emavi, lolungenasicalo setinsuku nesiphetfo seminyaka, lulungiswe kusukela phakadze kuya kulolonkhe liphakadze, ngekwati kwakhe ngaphambili kwentintfo tonkhe—
13.8: Manje bagcotjwa ngalendlela—babitwe ngelubito lolungcwele, futsi bagcotjwa ngesimiso lesingcwele, batsatsa buphristi lobukhulu beluhlelo lolungcwele, lolo bito, nesimiso, kanye nebuphristi lobukhulu, lokungenasicalo nesiphetfo—
13.9: Ngaleyondlela baba baphristi labakhulu ingunaphakadze, ngekweluhlelo lweNdvodzana, leTelwe Yodvwa yaBabe, lengenasicalo setinsuku nesiphetfo seminyaka, legcwele umusa, kulunga, kanye neliciniso. Futsi kunjalo. Amen.
13.10: Manje, njengoba ngishilo mayelana neluhlelo lolungcwele, noma ngalobu buphristi lobukhulu, bebabaningi labagcotjwa baba baphristi labakhulu baNkulunkulu; futsi kwakungenca yelukholo lwabo lolukhulu kanye nekuphendvuka kwabo, kanye nekulunga kwabo phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ngenca yekutsi bakhetse kuphendvuka nekwenta kulunga kunekutsi balahleke;
13.11: Ngako-ke babitwa ngekwalolu luhlelo lolungcwele, bangcweliswa, netingubo tabo tahlantwa taba mhlophe ngengati yeMvana.
13.12: Manje bona, emvakwekutsi sebangcwelisiwe ngaMoya loNgcwele, tingubo tabo tentiwa taba mhlophe, bamsulwa futsi bangenabala phambi kwaNkulunkulu, abakwatanga kubuka sono ngaphandle kwekusitondza; futsi bebabaningi, babaningi ngalokwendlulele, labebentiwe baba msulwa futsi bangeniswa ekuphumuleni kweNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
13.13: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngifuna kutsi nititfobe phambi kwaNkulunkulu, niletse titselo letinhle tekuphendvuka, kute nani ningene kuloko kuphumula.
13.14: Yebo, titfobeni njengebantfu ngetinsuku taMelkhisedeki, naye lobekangumphristi lomkhulu ngekweluhlelo lengikhulume ngalo, naye lowabutsatsa buphristi lobukhulu ingunaphakadze.
13.15: Futsi bekunguye kanye loMelkhisedeki Abrahama lobekakhokha kuye kwelishumi; yebo, nababe wetfu Abrahama bekakhokha kwelishumi lokuyincenye yinye eshumini kwako konkhe labekanako.
13.16: Manje leti timiso tatiniketwe ngayo lendlela, kute ngaloko bantfu babuke phambili kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, loko lokwakuluphawu lweluhlelo lwayo, noma lokwakuluhlelo lwayo, futsi ngaloku kute babuke phambili kuyo kute batfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo, kute bangene ekuphumuleni kweNkhosi.
13.17: Manje lo Melkhisedeki bekayinkhosi eveni laseSalema; futsi bantfu bakhe besebakhule bacina ebubini kanye nasetinengisweni; yebo, bonkhe bebadukile, bebagcwele lonkhe luhlobo lwebubi;
13.18: Kodvwa Melkhisedeki asebentise lukholo lolukhulu, futsi emukele sikhundla sebuphristi lobukhulu ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, wakushumayela kuphendvuka kubantfu bakhe. Futsi buka, baphendvuka; futsi Melkhisedeki wenta kwaba nekuthula kulelo live etinsukwini takhe; ngako-ke wabitwa ngenkhosi yekuthula, ngoba bekayinkhosi yaseSalema; futsi wabusa ngaphansi kweyise.
13.19: Manje, bebabaningi ngaphambi kwakhe, ngetulu kwaloko bebabaningi nasemuva kwaloko, kodvwa kwakute namunye lobekamendlula ngebukhulu; ngako-ke, babhala lokukhetsekile ngaye.
13.20: Manje akudzingeki ngiyiphindzaphindze lendzaba; loko lesengikushito sekwanele. Bukani, imibhalo lengcwele iphambi kwenu; uma niyihlanekela loko kuyawubangela kubhujiswa kwenu.
13.21: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima sekawashito lamavi kubo, welulela sandla sakhe kubo wamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, watsi: Manje sesikhatsi sekuphendvuka, ngoba lusuku lwekusindziswa selusondzele.
13.22: Yebo, futsi livi leNkhosi, ngemlomo wetingilosi, liyakumemetela loku kuto tonkhe tive; yebo liyakumemetela, kute tive tindzaba letitfokotisako tekujabula lokukhulu; yebo, futsi iyatimemetela leti tindzaba letitfokotisako emkhatsini webantfu bonkhe, yebo, nakubo labo labasakatwe ndzawotonkhe etikwebuso bemhlaba, ngaloko-ke setifikile kitsi.
13.23: Futsi tatiswa kitsi ngalokucacile, kute siticondze, kute singaphambuki; futsi loku kwentiwa ngenca yekutsi singulabazulazulako eveni lelingatiwa; ngako-ke, ngaleyondlela sitsandvwe kakhulu, ngoba sitivile leti tindzaba letitfokotisako timenyetelwa kitsi kuto tonkhe tincenye tesivini setfu.
13.24: Ngoba bukani, tingilosi tiyatimemetela kulabaningi ngalesi sikhatsi eveni letfu; futsi loku kungesizatfu sekulungiselela tinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu kutsi bemukele livi layo ngesikhatsi sekuta kwayo enkhatimulweni yayo.
13.25: Manje sesilindzele kuphela kuva tindzaba letijabulisako timenyetelwa kitsi ngemlomo wetingilosi, ngekuta kwayo; ngoba sikhatsi siyeta, asati kutsi sisedvute kangakanani. Ngiyacela kuNkulunkulu kutsi kube kungelusuku lwami; kodvwa kube madvutane noma emvakwesikhashana, kuko nitawutfokota.
13.26: Futsi kuyawukwatiswa kubantfu labalungile nalabangcwele, ngemlomo wetingilosi, ngesikhatsi sekuta kwayo, kute emavi abobabe betfu agcwaliseke, ngekwaloko labakukhulumile mayelana nayo, lokwakungesiphrofetho semoya lowawukubo.
13.27: Manje, bomnaketfu, nginesifiso ekujuleni kwenthlitiyo yami, yebo, ngenshisekelo lenkhulu nangebuhlungu, kutsi niweve emavi ami, nitilahle tono tenu, futsi ningaluhlehlisi lusuku lwekuphendvuka kwenu.
13.28: Kodvwa nititfobe phambi kweNkhosi, futsi nibite ligama layo lelingcwele, nilindze futsi nithandaze njalonjalo, kute ningalingwa ngetulu kwaloko leningakubeketelela, futsi ngaleyondlela niholwe nguMoya loNgcwele, nititfobe, nitehlise, nivume, nibeketele, nigcwale lutsandvo kanye nako konkhe kumela bulukhuni.
13.29: Ninelukholo eNkhosini; ninelitsemba lekutsi niyawuzuza kuphila lokuphakadze; ninelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu njalo etinhlitiyweni tenu, kute niphakanyiswe ngelusuku lwekugcina futsi ningene ekuphumuleni kwakhe.
13.30: Futsi shengatsi iNkhosi inganinika kuphendvuka, kute ningayehliseli intfukutselo yayo etikwenu, kute ningaboshelwa phansi ngetinketane tesihogo, kute ningakuva kufa kwesibili.
13.31: Futsi Alima wakhuluma emavi lamaningi kakhulu kulabantfu, langakabhalwa kulencwadzi.

14.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekacedzile kukhuluma kubantfu labaningi babo bakholelwa emavini akhe, bacala kuphendvuka, kanye nekuphenya imibhalo lengcwele.
14.2: Kodvwa incenye leningi yabo beyinesifiso sekubabulala bo-Alima na-Amulekhi; ngoba bebamtfukutselele Alima, ngenca yekucondza kwemavi akhe lawakhuluma kuZeziromu; futsi batsi Amulekhi ucambe emanga kubo, wadzelela nemtsetfo wabo futsi ngalokunjalo netatimtsetfo tabo kanye nebehluleli babo.
14.3: Ngetulu kwaloko bebamtfukutselele Alima na-Amulekhi; ngenca yekutsi bebafakaze ngalokusobala kakhulu macondzana nebubi babo, bafuna kubabulala ngansense.
14.4: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi abakwentanga loko; kodvwa babatsatsa bababopha ngetintsambo leticinile, babatsatsa babayisa embikwemehluleli lomkhulu welive.
14.5: Nebantfu beta ngembili bafakaza ngalokumelene nabo—bafakaza kutsi badzelele bamelana nemtsetfo, netatimtsetfo tabo kanye nebehluleli belive, ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe bantfu labebaseveni; ngetulu kwaloko bafakaza ngekutsi kukhona Nkulunkulu loyedvwa kuphela, nekutsi uyawutfumela iNdvodzana yakhe emkhatsini webantfu, kodvwa yena akayukubasindzisa; futsi tiningi tintfo letifana naleti bantfu labafakaza ngato nga-Alima kanye nanga-Amulekhi. Manje loku kwentiwa ngaphambi kwemehluleli lomkhulu welive.
14.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Zeziromu wamangala ngalamavi labekakhulunyiwe; ngetulu kwaloko bekati mayelana nebumphumphutse betingcondvo, lebekabentile emkhatsini webantfu ngemavi akhe enkhohliso; futsi umphefumulo wakhe wacala kukhatsateka ngaphansi kwanembeza welicala lakhe; yebo, wacala kutungeleta buhlungu besihogo.
14.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wacala wamemeta kubantfu, watsi: Bukani, nginelicala, futsi lamadvodza ete sici phambi kwaNkulunkulu. Wacala kubancengela kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili; kodvwa bamtfuka, batsi: Ngabe nawe sewubanjwe ngudeveli na? Bamkhafulela ngematse, bamcosha waphuma emkhatsini wabo, futsi ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe labo labebakholelwa emavini labekakhulunywe ngu-Alima kanye na-Amulekhi; nabo bacoshwa bakhishelwa ngaphandle, futsi batfumela bantfu kutsi babagandze ngematje.
14.8: Baletsa bafati babo kanye nebantfwana babo ndzawonye, kanye nabo bonkhe labebakholelwa noma labebafundziswe kutsi bakholelwe evini laNkulunkulu benta kutsi bafakwe emlilweni; ngetulu kwaloko baletsa imibhalo yabo lebeyicuketse imibhalo lengcwele, nayo bayiphonsa emlilweni futsi, kute nayo ishiswe futsi ishabalaliswe ngemlilo.
14.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batsatsa Alima kanye na-Amulekhi, babatfwala babayisa endzaweni yekubulala labafela lukholo, kute batibonele kubhujiswa kwalabo labebashiswa ngemlilo.
14.10: Futsi ngesikhatsi Amulekhi abona buhlungu bebesifazane kanye nebebantfwana labebasha emlilweni, naye ngalokunjalo waba nebuhlungu; watsi ku-Alima: singasibukela kanjani lesi sento lesibuhlungu kangaka na? Ngako-ke aselule tandla tetfu, sisebentise emandla aNkulunkulu lakitsi, sibasindzise emalangabini.
14.11: Kodvwa Alima watsi kuye: Moya uyangiphocelela kutsi ngingaseluli sandla sami; ngoba buka iNkhosi iyabemukela ngetulu kuyo, enkhatimulweni, futsi ibavumele kutsi bayente lentfo, noma kutsi bantfu bayente lentfo kubo, njengebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo, kute kutsi kwehlulela leyawukwenta etikwabo entfukutselweni yayo kube ngulokulungile; futsi ingati yalabangenacala iyawuma njengebufakazi ngalokumelene nabo, yebo, futsi ikhale kakhulu ngalokumelene nabo ngelusuku lwekugcina.
14.12: Manje Amulekhi watsi ku-Alima: Buka, mhlawumbe batawusishisa natsi futsi.
14.13: Alima watsi: Akube njengentsandvo yeNkhosi. Kodvwa, buka, umsebenti wetfu awukapheli; ngako-ke ngeke basishise.
14.14: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi imitimba yalabo labebaphonswe emlilweni seyishile, ngalokunjalo nemibhalo lebeyiphonswe kanye nabo, umehluleli lomkhulu welive weta wema embikwa-Alima kanye na-Amulekhi, ngesikhatsi basaboshiwe; wabashaya ngemphama etihlatsini tabo, watsi kubo: emvakwaloku lesenikubonile, nisetawuphindze futsi nishumayele kulaba bantfu, kutsi bayawuphoswa echibini lemlilo kanye nesibabuli na?
14.15: Bukani, niyabona kutsi anikabi nemandla ekubasindzisa labo labebaphonswe emlilweni; ngisho naNkulunkulu akabasindzisi ngenca yekutsi bebabelukholo lwenu. Futsi umehluleli waphindza wabashaya etihlatsini tabo, wabuta watsi: Nitsini?
14.16: Manje lomehluleli bekaweluhlelo kanye nenkholo yaNehori, lowabulala Gideyoni.
14.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima na-Amulekhi abatange baphendvule; waphindza wabashaya, wase ubanika tindvuna kutsi baphonswe ejele.
14.18: Ngesikhatsi sebaphonswe ejele tinsuku letintsatfu, kwafika letiningi tatimtsetfo, nebehluleli, nebaphritsi, kanye nebafundzisi, labebabenkholo yaNehori; beta bangena ejele kutobabona, bababuta ngemavi lamaningi; kodvwa abatange babaphendvule.
14.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umehluleli wema ngaphambi kwabo, watsi: kungani ningawaphendvuli emavi alabantfu na? Anati yini kutsi nginemandla ekutsi ngininikele emalangabini? Futsi wabayaleta kutsi bakhulume; kodvwa abaphendvulanga lutfo.
14.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi besuka bahamba ngetindlela tabo, kodvwa baphindza babuya ngakusasa; umehluleli waphindza wabashaya futsi etihlatsini. Labaningi beta ngembili, babashaya, batsi: Nisengaphindza futsi nime nehlulele laba bantfu, niphindze nisole umtsetfo wetfu na? Uma ninemandla lamakhulu kangaka pho kuya ngani ningatikhululi na?
14.21: Futsi tiningi tintfo letinjengaleti labatisho kubo, bagedletelisa ematinyo abo kubo, babakhafulela nangematse, batsi: Siyawubukeka kanjani uma sesilahliwe na?
14.22: Tiningi tintfo letinjena labatisho, yebo, tonkhe tinhlobo tetintfo letinjalo batikhuluma kubo; futsi ngaleyondlela bahlekisa ngabo tinsuku letiningi. Babancisha kudla kute balambe, nemanti kute bome; futsi babakhumula tingubo tabo kute babe ngcunu; ngaleyondlela baboshwa ngetintsambo leticinile, bavalelwa ejele.
14.23: Futsi kwenteka emvakwekutsi sebahlushwe ngalendlela tinsuku letiningi, (futsi bekungelusuku lwelishumi nakubili, enyangeni yelishumi, emnyakeni welishumi wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi) kutsi umehluleli lomkhulu eveni la-Amoniha kanye nalabaningi bebafundzisi babo kanye netatimtsetfo tabo bahamba bayongena ejele lapho Alima na-Amulekhi bebaboshwe khona ngetintsambo.
14.24: Umehluleli lomkhulu wema embikwabo, waphindza wabashaya, watsi kubo: Uma ninemandla aNkulunkulu tikhululeni kuleti tibopho, sitawukholwa kutsi iNkhosi itawubabulala labantfu ngekwemavi enu.
14.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe bahamba bayawubashaya, basho emavi lafanako, kwate kwafika kuwekugcina; ngesikhatsi lowekugcina sekakhulumile kubo emandla aNkulunkulu aba etikwa-Alima na-Amulekhi, baphakama bema ngetinyawo tabo.
14.26: Alima wamemeta watsi: Kuyawute kube nini sihlushwa nguleti tinhlupheko letinkhulu kangaka, Awu Nkhosi? Awu Nkhosi, siphe emandla ngekwelukholo lwetfu lolukuKhristu, nangalokwanele kutsi sikhululwe. Batidzabula tintsambo labebaboshwe ngato; ngesikhatsi bantfu bakubona loku, bacala babaleka, ngoba besaba, ngoba kubhujiswa bese kufike etikwabo.
14.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba kukhulu kakhulu kwesaba kwabo kangangekutsi bawela phansi, futsi abawutfolanga umnyango loya ngaphandle kwelijele; kwatamatama kakhulu phansi, tindvonga telijele tachekeka kabili, kangangekutsi tawela phansi; umehluleli lomkhulu, netatimtsetfo, nebaphristi, kanye nebafundzisi, labebashaya Alima na-Amulekhi, babulawa kuwa kwato.
14.28: Alima kanye na-Amulekhi baphuma ejele, futsi bebangakalimali; ngoba iNkhosi beyibanike emandla, ngekwelukholo lwabo lebelukuKhristu. Futsi khona lapho baphuma ejele; bakhululwa etibopheni tabo, lijele bese liwele phansi, kanye nabo bonkhe bantfu labebangekhatsi kwetindvonga talo babulawa, ngaphandle kwa-Alima na Amulekhi; futsi khona lapho baphuma baya edolobheni.
