14.29: Manje bantfu sebeve umsindvo lomkhulu beta bagijima babutsana ndzawonye ngeticuku bafuna kwati sizatfu sawo; ngesikhatsi babona Alima na-Amulekhi beta baphuma ejele, netindvonga talo setiwele phansi, bafikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu, babaleka phambi kwa-Alima ana-Amulekhi njengembuti ibaleka nelizinyane layo emabhubesini lamabili; babaleka kanjalo-ke phambi kwa-Alima na-Amulekhi.

15.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima kanye na-Amulekhi bayaletwa kutsi besuke kulelo dolobha; besuka, bahamba bate befika eveni laseSidomu; buka, lapho batfola bonkhe bantfu labebasukile eveni lase-Amoniha, labebacoshiwe futsi bagcotjwa nangematje ngoba bakholelwa emavini a-Alima.
15.2: Babacocela konkhe lokwakwentekile kubafati babo kanye nakubantfwana babo, ngalokunjalo nangalokuphatselene nabo lucobo, kanye nangemandla ekukhululwa kwabo.
15.3: Ngetulu kwaloko Zeziromu bekalele agula eSidomu, anemkhuhlane loshisako, lowawudalwe tinhlupheko letinkhulu tengcodvo yakhe ngenca yebubi bakhe, ngoba bekacabanga kutsi Alima na-Amulekhi bebangasekho; futsi bekacabanga kutsi bebabulewe ngenca yebubi bakhe. Lesi sono lesikhulu, kanye naletinye tono takhe letiningi, tayikhatsata ingcondvo yakhe yate yaba buhlungu kakhulu, angenakukhululwa, ngako-ke wacala wahlushwa kushisa lokukhulu.
15.4: Manje ngesikhatsi eva kutsi Alima na-Amulekhi bebaseveni laseSidomu, inhlitiyo yakhe yacala kuma sibindzi, watfumela umlayeto ngekushesha kubo, afisa kutsi bete kuye.
15.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba ngekushesha, balalele umlayeto lobekawutfumele kubo; bahamba bangena endlini kuye Zeziromu; bamtfola alele embhedzeni wakhe, agula, aphansi kakhulu ngenca yemkhuhlane loshisako; futsi nengcodvo yakhe nayo yayikhatsatekile kakhulu ngenca yebubi bakhe; ngesikhatsi ababona welula sandla sakhe, wabancenga kutsi bamelaphe.
15.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima watsi kuye, ambambe ngesandla: Uyakholelwa yini emandleni aKhristu kutsi ekusindziseni na?
15.7: Yena waphendvula watsi: Yebo, ngiyawakholwa onkhe emavi lowuwafundzisile.
15.8: Alima watsi: Uma ukholwa ekuhlengeni kwaKhristu ungaphiliswa.
15.9: Yena watsi: Yebo, ngiyakholwa ngekwemavi akho.
15.10: Emvakwaloko Alima wakhala eNkhosini, watsi: Awu Nkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu, yiba nemusa kulendvodza, uyiphilise ngekwelukholo lwayo lolukuKhristu.
15.11: Futsi ngesikhatsi Alima sekawashito lamavi, Zeziromu wagcuma wema ngetinyawo takhe, wacala kuhamba; loku kwenteka kwamangalisa bonkhe bantfu; futsi lwati lwaloku lwahamba lwefika eveni lonkhe laseSidomu.
15.12: Alima wabhabhatisa Zeziromu eNkhosini; futsi wacala kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya embili kutsi ashumayele kubantfu.
15.13: Alima wamisa libandla eveni laseSidomu, waphindze wagcoba baphristi kanye nebafundzisi eveni, kutsi babhabhatise eNkhosini noma ngubani lobekanesifiso sekubhajatiswa.
15.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bebabaningi; ngoba batseleka bavela kuto tonkhe tifundza letitungelete iSidomu, futsi babhajatiswa.
15.15: Kodvwa kulabantfu labebaseveni lase-Amoniha, bekusesele bantfu labanetinhlitiyo letilukhuni kanye nalabanetinhloko letilukhuni; futsi abaphendvukanga etonweni tabo, batsi onkhe emandla a-Alima na-Amulekhi adeveli; ngoba bebabenkholo yaNehori, futsi bangakholelwa ekuphendvukeni kwetono tabo.
15.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima na-Amulekhi, Amulekhi asashiye lonkhe ligolide lakhe, nesiliva, kanye netintfo takhe letiligugu, letatiseveni lese-Amoniha, ngenca yelivi laNkulunkulu, ekubeni alahlwe ngulabo labake baba bangani bakhe futsi nangalokunjalo nanguyise kanye netihlobo takhe;
15.17: Ngako-ke, emvakwekutsi Alima asasungule libandla eSidomu, abona kutilawula lokukhulu, yebo abona kutsi bantfu bayalawulwa ekutichenyeni kwabo, futsi bacala kutehlisa phambi kwaNkulunkulu, bacala kugcogcana ndzawonye etindzaweni tabo letingcwele kute badvumise Nkulunkulu phambi kwelilati, bacaphele baphindze bathandaze ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi kutsi bakhululwe kuSathane, nasekufeni, kanye nasekubhujisweni—
15.18: Manje njengoba ngishito, Alima asatibonile tonkhe leti tintfo, ngako-ke watsatsa Amulekhi waya naye eveni laseZarahemla, wamtsatsa wamyisa endlini yakhe, wamsita ekuhluphekeni kwakhe, wamcinisa eNkhosini.
15.19: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka welishumi wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi.

16.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka welishumi nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, ngelusuku lwesihlanu lwenyanga yesibili, bekukhona kuthula lokukhulu eveni laseZarahemla, kwakute timphi nemibango sikhatsi seminyaka letsite, kute kube lusuku lwesihlanu lwenyanga yesibili emnyakeni welishumi nakunye, kwaba khona inhlokomo yemphi leyevakala kulo lonkhe live.
16.2: Ngoba buka, emabutfo emaLamani besekatfumbelete eceleni kwelihlane, angena eminceleni yelive, nasedolobheni lase-Amoniha, acala kubulala bantfu abhubhisa nelidolobha.
16.3: Manje kwenteka kutsi, ngaphambi kwekutsi emaNefi ahlanganise libutfo lelanele libacoshe libakhiphe eveni, bese bababulele labantfu labebasedolobheni lase-Amoniha, futsi ngalokunjalo nalabanye labebatungelete imincele yakaNowa, batsatsa labanye babatfumbela ehlane.
16.4: Manje kwenteka kutsi emaNefi bekanesifiso sekulandza labo labebakadze betfwelwe bayotfunjelwa ehlane.
16.5: Ngako-ke, loyo lobekabekwe kutsi abe yindvuna lenkhulu emabutfweni emaNefi, (ligama lakhe bekunguZoramu, bekanemadvodzana lamabili, Lehi kanye na-Aha)—manje Zoramu kanye nemadvodzana akhe lamabili, bati kutsi Alima bekangumphristi lomkhulu ebandleni, futsi sebevile kutsi bekanemoya wekuphrofetha, ngako-ke baya kuye banesifiso sekwati kuye kutsi iNkhosi beyifuna kutsi baye ngakuphi ehlane kuyawufuna bomnakabo, labebatsatfwe batfunjwa ngemaLamani.
16.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima wabuta eNkhosini mayelana naloludzaba. emvakwaloko Alima wabuya watsi kubo: Bukani, emaLamani atoncamula umfula iSidoni eningizimu nelihlane, khashane etulu ngaphandle kwemincele yelive iManthi. Bukani lapho niyawuhlangana nabo, emphumalanga yemfula iSidoni, Futsi lapho iNkhosi iyawubaletsa kini bomnakenu labatsetfwe batfunjwa ngemaLamani.
16.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Zoramu kanye nemadvodzana akhe bawelela ngesheya kwemfula iSidoni, nemabutfo abo, bahamba ngaphandle kwemincele yase-Manthi baya eningizimu yelihlane, lelalisemphumalanga yemfula iSidoni.
16.8: Batseleka etikwemabutfo emaLamani, emaLamani ahlakatwa acoshwa ayiswa ehlane; batsatsa bomnakabo labebatsetfwe batfunjwa ngemaLamani, futsi bekute namunye wabo lobekalahlekile kulabo labebatfunjiwe. Futsi babuyiswa bomnakabo kute batsatse emave abo.
16.9: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka welishumi nakunye webehluleli, emaLamani acoshiwe akhishwa eveni, nebantfu base-Amoniha babulawa; yebo, bonkhe bantfu labebaphila bema-Aminoha, ngalokunjalo nelidolobha lawo lelikhulu, lebekatsite Nkulunkulu ngeke akwati kulibhubhisa, ngenca yebukhulu balo.
16.10: Kodvwa buka, ngelilanga linye lashiywa lingenamuntfu; futsi tidvumbu tadzaphunwa tinja netilwane tasendle tasehlane.
16.11: Noko, emvakwetinsuku letiningi tidvumbu talabafile babo tacwabelana phansi, futsi betimbonywe ngemhlabatsi lomncane. Manje belilikhulu liphunga lato kangangekutsi bantfu abayanga kuyawutsatsa lelive lase-Amoniha iminyaka leminingi. Labitwa ngeNcitsakalo yemaNehori; ngoba labo bebabenkholo yaNehori, lababulawa; futsi emave abo asala ete muntfu.
16.12: Futsi emaLamani akabanga asabuya futsi kutolwa nemaNefi kwate kwaba ngumnyaka welishumi nakune wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwaNefi. Futsi ngaleyondlela iminyaka lemitsatfu bantfu baNefi baba nekuthula njalo eveni lonkhe.
16.13: Alima na-Amulekhi bahamba bashumayela kuphendvuka ebantfwini emathempelini abo, kanye nasetindlini tabo letingcwele, futsi ngalokunjalo nasemasinagogeni abo, lebekakhiwe ngendlela yemaJuda.
16.14: Futsi ngebuningi balabo labebatsandza kuva emavi abo, babahlephulela ngelivi laNkulunkulu, bangakhetsi bala lemuntfu, njalonjalo.
16.15: Ngaleyondlela Alima na-Amulekhi bachubekela phambili, ngalokunjalo nalabanye labaningi labebakhetselwe lomsebenti, kutsi bashumayele livi kulo lonkhe live. Kwakhiwa kwelibandla kwaba yintfo levamile kulo lonkhe live, kuto tonkhe tifundza letitungeletile, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNefi.
16.16: Futsi bekute kungalingani emkhatsini wabo; iNkhosi ngempela yatfululela Moya wayo kulo lonkhe live kulungiselela tingcondvo tebantfwana bebantfu, noma kulungiselela tinhlitiyo tabo kutsi temukele livi lokwakuyofanele lifundziswe emkhatsini wabo ngesikhatsi sekufika kwayo—
16.17: Kute bangabi lukhuni ngalokumelene nelivi, kute bangabi ngulabangakholwa, bese baya ekubhujisweni kodvwa balemukele livi ngenjabulo, futsi njengeligala bachunyelelwe emvinini lokunguwonawona, kute bangene ekuphumuleni kweNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
16.18: Manje labo baphristi labahamba emkhatsini webantfu bashumayela ngalokumelene nako konkhe kucamba emanga, nekukhohlisana, nemona, nemphikiswano, nenzondo, nekutfukana, kanye nekweba, kugebenga, kuphanga, kubulala, kuphinga, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tenkhanuko, bamemetela kutsi leti tintfo akukafaneli tibe khona—
16.19: Bashumayela tintfo lekufanele kutsi tenteke masinyane; yebo, baphakamisa kuta kweNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, kuhlupheka kanye nekufa kwayo, futsi ngalokunjalo nekuvuka kwalabafile.
16.20: Futsi liningi lebantfu lababuta mayelana nendzawo lapho iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu beyiyawufikela khona; bafundziswa kutsi iyawuvela kubo emvakwekuvuka kwayo; futsi loku bantfu bakwemukela ngenjabulo lenkhulu kanye nentfokoto.
16.21: Manje emvakwekutsi libandla selimisiwe kulo lonkhe live—selitfole kuncoba ngetulu kwadeveli, livi laNkulunkulu selishunyayelwe ngebumsulwa balo eveni lonkhe, iNkhosi seyitsele tibusiso tayo etikwebantfu—kwabese kuba kuphela kwemnyaka welishumi nakune wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.

17.intro: Umlandvo wemadvodzana aMosiya, lalahla emalungelo awo embuso ngenca yelivi laNkulunkulu, ahamba akhuphukela eveni laNefi kuyawushumayela kumaLamani; tinhlupheko tawo kanye nekukhululwa kwawo—ngekwembhalo wa-Alima.
17.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima ahamba esuka eveni laGideyoni aya ngaseningizimu, aya eveni laseManthi, buka, wamangala, asahlangana nemadvodzana aMosiya ahamba aya ngaseveni laseZarahemla.
17.2: Manje lamadvodzana aMosiya bekana-Alima ngesikhatsi ingilosi ifika kuye kwekucala; ngako-ke Alima watfokota kakhulu kubona bomnakabo; futsi lokwangeta kakhulu ekujabuleni kwakhe, bebasengibo bomnakabo eNkhosini; yebo, futsi bekasakhule acina elwatini lweliciniso; ngoba bekangemadvodza lanekucondza lokuphelele phindze besekayiphenyisisile imibhalo lengcwele ngekukhutsala, kute alati livi laNkulunkulu.
17.3: Kodvwa akusiko loku kuphela; besekatinikele ekuthandazeni lokukhulu, kanye nasekuzileni kudla; ngako-ke besekanamoya wekuphrofetha, kanye namoya wekwembulelwa, futsi kwakutsi uma afundzisa, abefundzisa ngemandla kanye nangeligunya laNkulunkulu.
17.4: Futsi bekafundzisa livi laNkulunkulu sikhatsi lesilishumi nakune seminyaka emkhatsini wemaLamani, asabe nemphumelelo lenkhulu ekuletseni labaningi ekulatini liciniso; yebo, ngemandla emavi awo labaningi baletfwa phambi kwelilati laNkulunkulu, kutsi babite ligama lakhe futsi bavume tono tabo phambi kwakhe.
17.5: Manje leti timo lahlangabetana nato ekuhambeni kwabo, ngoba aba netinhlupheko letiningi; ahlupheka kakhulu, emtimbeni kanye nasengcondvweni, njengendlala, koma kanye nekukhatsala, kanjalo nekuvivinywa ngekwakamoya.
17.6: Manje loku kuhamba kwawo: Sekamshiyile uyise, Mosiya, emnyakeni wekucala wekubusa kwebehluleli; awalile umbuso uyise bekanesifiso sekuwuniketa wona, ngetulu kwaloko loku kwakusifiso sebantfu;
17.7: Noko ahamba aphuma eveni laseZarahemla, atsatsa tinkemba tawo, netikhali tawo, butjoki bawo, nemicibisholo yawo, kanye netilingi tawo; loko akwenta kute atitfolele kudla ngesikhatsi asesehlane.
17.8: Ahamba kanjalo-ke aya ehlane kanye nesibalo lebekasikhetsile, kutsi bahambe bakhuphukele eveni laNefi, kute bayawushumayela livi laNkulunkulu kumaLamani.
17.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba tinsuku letiningi ehlane, bazila kakhulu kudla bathandaza kakhulu kutsi iNkhosi ibaphe incenye yaMoya wayo kutsi uhambe nabo, futsi ahlale nabo, kute babe sikhali etandleni taNkulunkulu kutsi baletse, kube bekungenteka, bomnakabo, emaLamani, elwatini lweliciniso, elwatini lwebubi bemasiko aboyise, labekangakalungi.
17.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yabavakashela ngaMoya wayo, futsi yatsi kubo: Dvudvutekani. Badvudvuteka.
17.11: INkhosi yaphindze yatsi kubo: Hambani niye emkhatsini wemaLamani, bomnakenu, nimise livi lami; kodvwa nibe nekubeketela ekumeleni bulukhuni kanye netinhlupheko, kute nibonakalise tibonelo letinhle kubo ngami, futsi ngitawunenta sikhali etandleni tami kute kusindziswe bantfu labaningi.
17.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinhlitiyo temadvodzana aMosiya, kanjalo nalabo labebanawo, tema sibindzi kutsi bachubekele phambili kuwo emaLamani kutsi bamemetele kuwo livi laNkulunkulu.
17.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebafike eminceleni yelive lemaLamani, batehlukanisa bahamba ngamunye ngamunye, betsembele eNkhosini kutsi bebatophindze bahlangane futsi ekupheleni kwesivuno sabo; ngoba bebacabanga kutsi wawumkhulu lomsebenti labebatetfwese wona.
17.14: Futsi ecinisweni wawumkhulu, ngoba bebatetfwese kushumayela livi laNkulunkulu kubantfu labebayimidlwembe balukhuni futsi banesihluku; bantfu labebatfokotiswa kubulala emaNefi, kuwagebenga kanye nekuwaphanga; futsi tinhlitiyo tabo bebatibeke emcebeni, noma kulo ligolide, nesiliva, kanye nakumatje laligugu; kodvwa bebafuna kutitfola leti tintfo ngekubulala kanye nangekuphanga, kute bangatisebenteli ngetandla tabo lucobo.
17.15: Ngaleyondlela bebabantfu labavilaphako kakhulu, labaningi babo bebakhonta tithico, futsi sicalekiso saNkulunkulu sasiwele etikwabo ngenca yemasiko aboyise, nanoma tetsembiso teNkhosi tatelulelwe kubo uma baphendvuka.
17.16: Ngako-ke, loku kwakusizatfu lesenta kutsi emadvodzana aMosiya atetfwese lomsebenti, kute mhlawumbe abaletse ekuphendvukeni; kute mhlawumbe abaletse kutsi bati ngelisu lekuhlengwa.
17.17: Ngako-ke batehlukanisa lomunye kulomunye, bahamba baya emkhatsini wabo, wonkhe umuntfu ngamunye, ngekwelivi kanye nemandla aNkulunkulu lebekaniketwe kuye.
17.18: Manje Amoni angumholi emkhatsini wabo, noma-ke lokukanye wabasita, futsi wase uyesuka kubo, emvakwekutsi sekababusisile ngekwetikhundla tabo letehlukene, asabelene nabo ngelivi laNkulunkulu, asabasitile ngaphambi kwekuhamba kwakhe; futsi ngaleyondlela batsatsa tindlela tabo letehlekene kulo lonkhe live.
17.19: Futsi Amoni wahamba waya eveni la-Ishmayeli, live lelacanjwa ngemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli, nawo laba ngemaLamani.
17.20: Futsi ngesikhatsi Amoni angena eveni la-Ishmayeli, emaLamani amtsatsa futsi ambopha, njengoba kwakulisiko labo kutsi babophe onkhe emaNefi labekawele etandleni tawo, bese bayawatfwala bawayisa phambi kwenkhosi; futsi ngalokunjalo kwakuba yintsandvo yenkhosi kutsi ibabulale, noma ibagcine ekutfunjweni, noma ibaphonse ejele, noma ibacoshe baphume eveni layo, ngekwesifiso nangekwentsandvo yayo.
17.21: Ngalokunjalo Amoni wetfwalwa wayiswa phambi kwenkhosi leyayibusa eveni la-Ishmayeli; libito layo kwakunguLamonayi; futsi beyiyesitukulwane sa-Ishmayeli.
17.22: Futsi inkhosi yabuta Amoni kutsi ngabe bekusifiso sakhe yini kutsi ahlale eveni emkhatsini wemaLamani, noma emkhatsini webantfu bakhe.
17.23: Amoni watsi kuyo: Yebo, ngifisa kutsi ngihlale emkhatsini walaba bantfu kwesikhashana; yebo, mhlawumbe kute kube lusuku lwekufa kwami.
17.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Lamonayi yatfokota kakhulu nga-Amoni, yenta kutsi tibopho takhe ticegiswe; futsi yayifuna nekutsi Amoni atsatse yinye yemadvodzakati ayo abe ngumkakhe.
17.25: Kodvwa Amoni watsi kuyo: Cha, kodvwa ngitawuba yinceku yakho. Ngako-ke Amoni waba yinceku yenkhosi Lamonayi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabekwa emkhatsini waletinye tinceku kutsi agadze imfuyo yaLamonayi, ngekwelisiko lemaLamani.
17.26: Emvakwekutsi sekasebentele inkhosi tinsuku letintsatfu, ngesikhatsi anetinceku letingemaLamani basahamba nemihlambi yabo baya endzaweni yemanti, leyayibitwa ngekutsi ngemanti aseSebhas, futsi onkhe emaLamani bekachuba imihlambi yawo lapho, kute itfole emanti—
17.27: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi Amoni kanye netinceku tenkhosi basachuba imihlambi yabo baya kuleyo ndzawo yemanti, buka, sibalo lesitsite semaLamani, labekadze anemihlambi yawo emantini, ema aphindze ahlakata imihlambi ya-Amoni netinceku tenkhosi, futsi ayihlakata kangangekutsi yabaleka ngetindlela letiningi.
17.28: Manje tinceku tenkhosi tacala kuvungama, titsi: Manje inkhosi itawusibulala, njengoba yenta kubomnaketfu ngenca yekutsi imihlambi yabo yayihlakatiwe ngebubi balamadvodza. Futsi tacala takhihla sililo lesikhulu, titsi: Bukani, imihlambi yetfu vele seyihlakatiwe.
17.29: Manje bakhihla sililo ngenca yekwesaba kubulawa. Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni akubona loku inhlitiyo yakhe yagcwala injabulo; ngoba, watsi, ngitawubakhombisa emandla ami laba balingani bami, noma emandla lakimi, ngekubuyisela lemihlambi enkhosini, kute ngizuze tinhlitiyo talaba balingani bami, kute ngibaholele ekukholweni emavini ami.
17.30: Manje, loku kwakuyimicabango ya-Amoni, ngesikhatsi abona tinhlupheko talabo labekababita ngekutsi bomnakabo.
17.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabancenga ngemavi akhe, watsi: Bomnaketfu, manini sibindzi asihambeni siyawufuna imihlambi, futsi sitawuyigcogca ndzawonye siyibuyisele endzaweni yemanti; ngaleyondlela sitawuyigcinela inkhosi imihlambi yayo futsi ngeke isibulale.
17.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba bayoyifuna imihlambi, bamlandzela Amoni, baphutfuma baya embili ngekushesha lokukhulu bayijikisa imihlambi yenkhosi, bayigcogca ndzawonye futsi endzaweni yemanti.
17.33: Futsi lawo madvodza aphindze ema kute ayihlakate imihlambi yabo; kodvwa Amoni watsi kubomnakabo: Tungeletani lemihlambi ndzawotonkhe kute ingabaleki; mine ngitawuhamba ngiyolwa nalamadvodza lahlakata imihlambi yetfu.
17.34: Ngako-ke, benta njengoba Amoni abebayaletile, yena wahamba waya ngembili wayawukulwa nalabo labebeme ngasemantini aseSebhas; futsi ngesibalo bebangasibo labancane.
17.35: Ngako-ke abamesabanga Amoni, ngoba bebacabanga kutsi munye wabo bekangambulala ngekwentsandvo yabo, ngoba bebangati kutsi iNkhosi yayimtsembisile Mosiya kutsi iyawuwakhulula emadvodzana akhe etandleni tawo; futsi bebangati lutfo mayelana neNkhosi; ngako-ke bebatfokota ekubhujisweni kwabomnakabo; futsi ngalesi sizatfu bema kute bahlakate imihlambi yenkhosi.
17.36: Kodvwa Amoni wema ngembili wacala kubashaya ngematje ngesilingi sakhe; yebo, ngemandla akhe lamakhulu wabajikijela ngematje; futsi ngaleyondlela wabulala linani lelitsite lawo kangangekutsi acala kwetfuswa ngemandla akhe; noko atfukutsela ngenca yekubulawa kwabomnakabo, futsi aphikelela afuna kutsi awe; ngako-ke, abona kutsi abengakhoni kumshaya ngematje awo, eta kuye netagila atombulala.
17.37: Kodvwa buka, wonkhe umuntfu lobekaphakamisa sagila sakhe kutsi ashaye Amoni, wamshaya wamsusa umkhono wakhe ngenkemba yakhe; ngoba wawamela emagalelo awo ngekuwashaya imikhono yawo ngeluhlangotsi lolukhaliphile lwenkemba yakhe, kangangekutsi acala kwetfuka, aphindze acala kumbalekela; yebo, futsi abengasiko lamancane ngekwesibalo; futsi wenta kutsi abaleke ngemandla emkhono wakhe.
17.38: Manje labasitfuba babo bese bawile ngesilingi, kodvwa akabulalanga namunye ngaphandle kwemholi wabo ngenkemba yakhe; futsi wabashaya wabancuma imikhono yabo labaningi labayiphakamisela kuye, futsi bebangasibo labambalwa.
17.39: Ngesikhasti asawachubile wawayisa khashane, wabuya futsi banatsisa imihlambi yabo bayibuyisela emadlelweni enkhosi, emvakwaloko bahamba baya enkhosini, betfwele imikhono leyayincunywe ngenkemba ya-Amoni, yalabo labebafuna kumbulala; yatfwalwa yayiswa enkhosini kutsi ibe bufakazi betintfo lebebatentile.

18.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Lamonayi yenta kutsi tinceku takhe time ngembili tifakaze ngato tonkhe tintfo lebetitibonile mayelana naloludzaba.
18.2: Emvakwekutsi setifakazile tonkhe ngetintfo lebetitibonile, futsi seyitfole lwati ngekwetsembeka kwa-Amoni ekugcineni imihlambi yakhe, ngalokunjalo nangemandla akhe lamakhulu ekulweni nalabo labebafuna kumbulala, yamangala kakhulu, yatsi: Ngempela, lona ungetulu kwemuntfu. Bukani, ngabe lona akasiye yini Moya loMkhulu lotfumela tijeziso letinkhulu kangaka etikwalaba bantfu, ngenca yekubulala kwabo na?
18.3: Futsi tayiphendvula inkhosi, tatsi: Noma ngabe unguMoya loMkhulu noma ungumuntfu, asati; kodvwa nguloku lesikwatiko, kutsi akanakubulawa titsa tenkhosi; futsi ngeke tihlakate imihlambi yenkhosi uma anatsi, ngenca yebungcweti bakhe kanye nemandla lamakhulu; ngako-ke, siyati kutsi ungumngani enkhosini. Manje, Awu nkhosi, asikholwa kutsi indvodza ingaba nemandla lamakhulu kangaka, ngoba siyati kutsi akanakubulawa.
18.4: Manje, ngesikhatsi inkhosi iva lamavi, yatsi kuto: Manje sengiyati kutsi unguMoya loMkhulu; futsi ute lana ngalesi sikhatsi kute avikele timphilo tenu, kute nginganibulali njengoba ngenta kubomnakenu. Manje lona nguMoya loMkhulu bobabe betfu labakhuluma ngawo.
18.5: Manje loku bekulisiko laLamonayi, lebekalitfole kuyise, kutsi bekukhona Moya loMkhulu. Nanome bebakholelwa kuye Moya loMkhulu, bebacabanga kutsi noma ngabe yini labebayenta beyilungile; Noko Lamonayi wacala kwesaba kakhulu, esaba kutsi hleze bekente lokungakalungi ngekubulala tinceku takhe;
18.6: Ngoba besekabulele letiningi tato ngenca yekutsi bomnakabo bebahlakate imihlambi yabo endzaweni yemanti; futsi, ngenca yekutsi imihlambi yabo yahlakatwa babulawa.
18.7: Manje bekuyinjwayelo yemaLamani kutsi eme ngasemantini aseSebhas kute ahlakate imihlambi yebantfu, kute ngaloko achube leminingi lebeyihlakatekele eveni labo, loku bekungumkhuba wekuphanga emkhatsini wabo.
18.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Lamonayi yabuta etincekwini tayo, yatsi: Iphi yona lendvodza lenemandla lamakhulu kangaka na?
18.9: Tatsi kuyo: Buka, ipha emahhashi akho. Manje inkhosi beyikadze iyalete tinceku tayo, ngaphambi kwesikhatsi sekuyonatsisa imihlambi yato, kutsi kufanele tilungise emahhashi kanye netincola tayo, kute tiyimikise eveni laNefi; ngoba bekukhona lidzili lelikhulu lebelentiwe eveni laNefi, nguyise waLamonayi, lobekayinkhosi ngetulu kwalo lonkhe lelolive.
18.10: Manje ngesikhatsi inkhosi Lamonayi iva kutsi Amoni bekalungisa emahhashi kanye netincola tayo yamangala kakhulu, ngenca yekwetsembeka kwa-Amoni, itsi: Ngempela akukate kube khona nayinye inceku emkhatsini wetinceku tami tonkhe leyake yetsembeka kangaka njengalendvodza; ngoba ikhumbula yonkhe imiyaleto yami kutsi iyente.
18.11: Manje ngempela sengiyati kutsi lona nguMoya loMkhulu, futsi ngiyafisa kutsi ete kimi, kodvwa ngeke ngilinge.
18.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni sekawalungisile emahhashi kanye netincola tenkhosi kanye netinceku tayo, wahamba waya enkhosini, wabona kutsi buso benkhosi bebushintjile; ngako-ke besekatawubuyela emuva aphume aphele phambi kwayo.
18.13: Lenye yetinceku tenkhosi yatsi kuye, Rabhana, lokusho kutsi, ngekuhunyushwa, lonemandla noma inkhosi lenkhulu, ngekubona kutsi emakhosi abo bekanemandla; futsi ngalamagama yatsi kuye: Rabhana, inkhosi inesifiso sekutsi uhlale.
18.14: Ngako-ke Amoni waphendvukela enkhosini, watsi kuyo: Ngabe ufuna kutsi ngikwentele ini, Awu nkhosi? Inkhosi ayimphendvulanga sikhatsi lesingangeli-awa, ngekwesikhatsi sabo, ngoba beyingati kutsi itawutsini kuye.
18.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni waphindza watsi kuyo: Ngabe ufisani kimi? Kodvwa inkhosi ayimphendvulanga.
18.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni, agcwaliswe ngaMoya waNkulunkulu, ngako-ke wayibona imicabango yenkhosi. Watsi kuyo: Ngabe kungenca yekutsi uve kutsi ngivikele tinceku takho kanye nemihlambi yakho, futsi ngabulala labasikhombisa babomnakabo ngesilingi kanye nangenkemba, ngancuma imikhono yalabanye, kute ngivikele imihlambi yakho kanye netinceku takho; buka, ngabe ngiko yini loku lokwenta umangale na?
18.17: Ngitsi kuwe, kwentiwa yini, kutsi kumangala kwakho kube kukhulu kangaka na? Buka, ngingumuntfu, futsi ngiyinceku yakho; ngako-ke, noma ngabe yini loyifisako lelungile, ngitawuyenta.
18.18: Manje ngesikhatsi inkhosi seyive lamavi, yamangala futsi, ngoba yabona kutsi Amoni bekakwati kubona imicabango yayo; kodvwa nanome kunjalo, inkhosi Lamonayi yawuvula umlomo wayo, yatsi kuye: Ungubani? Ngabe unguloyo Moya loMkhulu, lowati tintfo tonkhe?
18.20: Futsi inkhosi yatsi: Uyati kanjani imicabango yenhlitiyo yami na? Ungakhuluma ngesibindzi futsi ungitjele mayelana naleti tintfo; uphindze ungitjele kutsi ngumaphi emandla lobulele ngawo futsi wancuma imikhono yabomnakenu labahlakata imihlambi yami—
18.21: Manje, uma ungangitjela mayelana naleti tintfo, noma ngabe yini loyifisako ngitawukunika; futsi uma kunesidzingo, ngiyawukugadza nemabutfo ami; kodvwa ngiyati kutsi wena unemandla ngetulu kwabo bonkhe; nanoma kunjalo, noma ngabe yini loyifuna kimi ngitawukuniketa yona.
18.22: Manje Amoni ahlakaniphile, noko anganabungoti, watsi kuLamonayi: Utawuwalalela yini lamavi ami, uma ngikutjela kutsi leti tintfo ngitenta ngamaphi emandla na? Nguloku lengikufuna kuwe.
18.23: Inkhosi yamphendvula, yatsi: Yebo, ngitawuwakholwa onkhe lamavi akho. Futsi ngalendlela wayibamba ngekuhlakanipha.
18.24: Amoni wacala kukhuluma kuyo ngesibindzi, watsi kuyo: Uyakholelwa yini kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu na?
18.25: Yaphendvula, yatsi kuye: Angati kutsi loko kusho kutsini.
18.26: Emvakwaloko Amoni watsi: Uyakholelwa yini kutsi ukhona Moya loMkhulu na?
18.28: Futsi Amoni watsi: Lona nguNkulunkulu. Amoni waphindza watsi kuyo: Uyakholelwa yini kutsi lo Moya loMkhulu, longuNkulunkulu, wadala tonkhe tintfo letisezulwini kanye naletisemhlabeni na?
18.29: Yatsi: Yebo, ngiyakholelwa kutsi wadala tonkhe tintfo letisemhlabeni, kodvwa angiwati emazulu.
18.30: Amoni watsi kuyo: Emazulu yindzawo lapho Nkulunkulu ahlala khona kanye nato tonkhe tingilosi takhe letingcwele.
18.31: Inkhosi Lamonayi yatsi: Ngabe angetulu kwemhlaba?
18.32: Amoni watsi: Yebo, futsi ubuka phansi kubo bonkhe bantfwana bebantfu; futsi uyati yonkhe imicabango kanye netinjongo tenhlitiyo; ngoba ngesandla sakhe bonkhe badalwa kusukela ekucaleni.
18.33: Inkhosi Lamonayi yatsi: Ngiyatikholelwa tonkhe leti tintfo lose utikhulumile. Ngabe wena utfunywe nguNkulunkulu na?
18.34: Amoni watsi kuyo: Mine ngingumuntfu; futsi umuntfu ekucaleni wadalwa ngemfanekiso waNkulunkulu, futsi ngibitwe ngaMoya wakhe loNgcwele kutsi ngifundzise ngaleti tintfo kulaba bantfu, kute baletfwe elwatini lwaloko lokulungile futsi nalokuliciniso;
18.35: Incenye yalowo Moya ihleli kimi, lenginika lwati, futsi ngalokunjalo nemandla ngekwelukholo kanye netifiso tami letikuNkulunkulu.
18.36: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni sekawashito lamavi, wacala ekudalweni kwemhlaba, ngalokunjalo nekudalwa kwa-Adamu, wayitjela ngato tonkhe tintfo mayelana nekuwa kwemuntfu, wayilandzisa phindze wabeka phambi kwayo imibhalo kanye nemibhalo lengcwele yebantfu, lokwakukhulunywe ngayo baphrofethi, kwehla kuya phansi esikhatsini leso uyise, Lehi, ashiya eJerusalema.
18.37: Ngetulu kwaloko wabalandzisa (ngoba bekuyinkhosi kanye netinceku tayo) lonkhe luhambo lweyise ehlane, kanye nako konkhe kuhlupheka kwabo ngendlala nekoma, kanye nekukhandleka kwabo, njalonjalo.
18.38: Futsi waphindze wabalandzisa mayelana nekuhlubuka kwaLamani banaLemuweli, kanye nemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli, yebo, konkhe kuhlubuka kwabo wabacocela ngako; futsi wabachazela ngayo yonkhe imibhalo kanye nemibhalo lengcwele kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi asuka eJerusalema kwehla kute kube sesikhatsini sanyalo.
18.39: Kodvwa loku akusiko konkhe; ngoba wabachazela nangelisu lekuhlengwa, lelalungiswa kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba; futsi waphindze wabatisa mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu, kanye nayo yonkhe imisebenti yeNkhosi wabatisa ngayo.
18.40: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekatishito tonkhe letintfo, futsi sekatichazile enkhosini, inkhosi yakholelwa kuwo onkhe lamavi akhe.
18.41: Yacala kukhala eNkhosini itsi: Awu Nkhosi, bani nemusa; ngebuningi bemusa wakho lobe nawo ebantfwini baNefi, bani nawo kimi, kanye nakubantfu bami.
18.42: Manje, ngesikhatsi seyikushito loku, yawela phansi, kwaba shengatsi ifile.
18.43: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinceku tayo tayitsatsa tayitfwala tayiyisa kumkayo, tayilalisa embhedzeni wayo; yalala shengatsi ifile sikhatsi lesingangetinsuku letimbili kanye nebusuku lobubili; futsi umkayo, nemadvodzana ayo, nemadvodzakati ayo bayikhalela, ngendlela yemaLamani, balila kakhulu ngenca yekulahleka kwayo.

19.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwetinsuku letimbili kanye nebusuku lobubili besebatowutsatsa umtimba wayo bawubeke ethuneni, lebebalentile ngenhloso yekungcwaba labafile babo.
19.2: Manje indlovukazi seyivile ngeludvumo lwa-Amoni, ngako-ke yatfumela inesifiso sekutsi ete kuyo.
19.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni wenta njengoba ayaletiwe, futsi wahamba waya kuyo indlovukazi, anesifiso sekwati kutsi beyifuna kutsi ayenteleni.
19.4: Yatsi kuye: Tinceku temyeni wami tingatisile kutsi wena ungumphrofethi waNkulunkulu longcwele, nekutsi wena unemandla ekwenta imisebenti leminingi nalemikhulu ngeligama lakhe;
19.5: Ngako-ke, uma loku kunjalo, ngifuna kutsi uhambe ungene endlini ubone umyeni wami, ngoba seloku alele embhedzeni wakhe sikhatsi lesingangetinsuku letimbili kanye nebusuku lobubili; labanye batsi akafi, kodvwa labanye batsi sewufile nekutsi sewuyanuka, nekutsi sekufanele abekwe ethuneni; kodvwa ngekwami, kimi akanuki.
19.6: Manje, loku ngiko Amoni labekakufisa, ngoba bekati kutsi inkhosi Lamonayi yayingephansi kwemandla a-Nkulunkulu; bekati kutsi sihenco lesimnyama sekungakholwa sasisuswa engcondvweni yakhe, kukhanya lokwakhanyisa ingcondvo yakhe, lebekukukukhanya kwenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu, lebekukukhanya lokumangalisako kwebuhle bakhe—yebo, loku kukhanya bekuletse injabulo lenkhulu emphefumulweni wakhe, lifu lebumnyama selisusiwe, nekutsi kukhanya kwekuphila lokuphakadze kwakukhanyisiwe emphefumulweni wakhe, yebo, bekati kutsi loku kwakusincobile sicu sakhe semvelo, futsi bekahlwitsiwe akuNkulunkulu.
19.7: Ngako-ke, loko indlovukazi leyayikufisa kuye kwakusifiso sakhe naye. Ngako-ke wangena wayawuyibona inkhosi njengoba indlovukazi yayikadze ifisile; wayibona inkhosi, futsi bekati kutsi beyingakafi.
19.8: Watsi kuyo indlovukazi: Ayikafi, kodvwa ilele kuNkulunkulu, itawuphindze ivuke kusasa; ngako-ke ningayingcwabi.
19.9: Amoni watsi kuyo: Uyakukholwa yini loku na? Yatsi kuye: Ngite fakazi ngaphandle kwelivi lakho, kanye nelivi letinceku tetfu; noko ngiyakholwa kutsi kutawuba njengoba ushito.
19.10: Amoni watsi kuyo: Ubusisiwe ngenca yelukholo lwakho lolukhulu; ngitsi kuwe; mfati, akukate kube khona lukholo lolukhulu kangaka emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bemaNefi.
19.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yawugadza umbhedze wemyeni wayo, kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kwate kwaba nguleso sikhatsi sangakusasa Amoni abesishito kutsi itawuvuka ngaso.
19.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yavuka, njengekwemavi a-Amoni; ngesikhasti ivuka, yelula sandla sayo kuwesifazane, yatsi: Libusisiwe libito laNkulunkulu, futsi nawe ubusisiwe.
19.13: Ngoba njengoba ucinisekile ngekuphila kwakho, buka, ngimbonile uMhlengi wami; futsi uyawuta, uyawutalwa nguwesifazane, uyawuhlenga bonkhe bantfu labakholwa egameni lakhe. Manje ngesikhatsi seyiwashito lamavi, inhlitiyo yayo yakhukhumuka ngekhatsi kuyo, yaphindze yawa ngenca yenjabulo; indlovukazi nayo ngalokunjalo yawa phansi, yenganywe nguMoya.
19.14: Manje Amoni ambona Moya weNkhosi utselwa ngekwemithandazo yakhe etikwemaLamani, bomnakabo, labebayimbangela yekukhala lokukhulu kangaka emkhatsini wemaNefi, noma emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNkulunkulu ngenca yebubi babo kanye nemasiko abo, wawa ngemadvolo akhe, wacala kuthandaza ngenshisekelo lenkhulu kanye nekubonga kuNkulunkulu ngaloko labekakwentele bomnakabo; naye ngalokunjalo wenganywa yinjabulo; ngenca yaloko bonkhe bobatsatfu bawela phansi.
19.15: Manje, ngesikhatsi tinceku tenkhosi setibonile kutsi bebawile, nato ngalokunjalo tacala kukhala kuNkulunkulu, ngoba kwesaba iNkhosi kwase kufikile nakuto ngalokunjalo, ngoba kwakungito lebetime phambi kwenkhosi futsi tifakaza kuyo mayelana nemandla lamakhulu a-Amoni.
19.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi talibita libito leNkhosi, ngemandla ato, tate nato ngekwato tawela phansi, ngaphandle kwamunye wesifazane lobekangumLamani, libito lakhe kwakungu-Abhishi, lobekaphendvukele eNkhosini eminyakeni leminingi, ngenca yembono lowawumangalisa kakhulu weyise—
19.17: Ngako-ke, asaphendvukele eNkhosini, futsi angatange akwatise loko, ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi abona kutsi tonkhe tinceku taLamonayi tase tiwele phansi, futsi ngalokunjalo nenkhosikati yakhe, indlovukazi, kanye nenkhosi, kanye na-Amoni balele nja phansi, bekati kutsi kwakungemandla aNkulunkulu; futsi acabanga kutsi leli kwakulitfuba, lekutsi atise bantfu ngaloko lokwakwentekile emkhatsini wabo, kutsi ngekusibona lesi sehlakalo kwakutobenta kutsi bakholwe emandleni aNkulunkulu, ngako-ke wagijima wangena indlu ngendlu, atisa bantfu.
19.18: Bacala kubutsana ndzawonye endlini yenkhosi. Futsi kweta sicuku, ngekumangala bayibona inkhosi, kanye nendlovuazi, kanye netinceku tabo balele batse nja phansi, bonkhe bebalele lapho shengatsi bafile; ngetulu kwaloko bambona Amoni, buka, bekangumNefi.
19.19: Manje bantfu bacala kuvungama emkhatsini wabo; labanye batsi kwakububi lobukhulu lobu lobabufike kubo, noma enkhosini kanye nendlu yayo, ngenca yekutsi yayivume umNefi kutsi ahlale kulelive.
19.20: Kodvwa labanye babekhuta, batsi: Inkhosi itiletsele yona lobubi etikwendlu yayo, ngenca yekutsi yabulala tinceku tayo letatihlakatelwe umhlambi wato emantini aseSebhas.
19.21: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko batsetsiswa ngulawo madvodza labekeme emantini aseSebhas ahlakata imihlambi lokwakuyenkhosi, ngoba abemtfukutselele Amoni ngenca yesibalo sabomnakabo labekasibulele emantini aseSebhas, ngesikhatsi avikela imihlambi yenkhosi.
19.22: Manje, lomunye wabo, lobekanemnakabo lobekabulewe ngenkemba ya-Amoni, amtfukutselele kakhulu Amoni, wahoshula inkemba yakhe waya phambili kute ayiwisele etikwa-Amoni, kute ambulale; ngesikhatsi aphakamisa inkemba yakhe kutsi amshaye, buka, wawa wafa.
19.23: Manje siyabona kutsi Amoni bekangabulaleki, ngoba iNkhosi beyitsite kuMosiya, uyise: ngiyawumsindzisa, futsi kuyawuba ngekwelukholo lwakho—ngako-ke, Mosiya wamnikela eNkhosini.
19.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sicuku sibona kutsi lendvodza yaseyiwile yafa, leyayiphakamise inkemba kutsi ibulale Amoni, bafikelwa kwesaba bonkhe, futsi abatange basalokotsa nakancane kwelula tandla tabo kutsi bamtsintse noma lomunye walabo labebawile; futsi bacala kumangala emkhatsini wabo kutsi ngabe abebangwa yini lamandla lamakhulu kangaka, noma ngabe tonkhe leti tintfo tatisho kutsini.
19.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwakukhona labaningi emkhatsini wabo labebatsi Amoni bekanguMoya loMkhulu, futsi labanye batsi bekatfunyelwe nguMoya loMkhulu;
19.26: Kodvwa labanye babekhuta bonkhe, batsi bekasilwane lesesabekako, lesasitfunyiwe sisuka kumaNefi kutsi sitawubahlupha.
19.27: Futsi kwakukhona labanye labebatsi Amoni bekatfunywe nguMoya loMkhulu kutsi atewubahlupha ngenca yebubi babo; futsi nekutsi bekunguMoya loMkhulu lobewusolo ugadze emaNefi, lobewusolo uwakhulula etandleni tabo; futsi bebatsi kwakungiwo loMoya loMkhulu lobulele labaningi kangaka babomnakabo, emaLamani.
19.28: Ngenca yaloku umbango wacala kutsi ube mkhulu kakhulu emkhatsini wabo. Futsi ngesikhatsi basabanga kanjalo, incekukati leyayente kutsi sicuku sigcogcane ndzawonye yeta futsi ngesikhatsi ibona lombango lowawusemkhatsini wesicuku yaba nekudzabuka lokukhulu, kangangekutsi yakhala tinyembeti.
19.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yahamba yatsatsa indlovukazi ngesandla, kute mhlawumbe iyiphakamise; masinyane emvakwekutsintsa sandla sayo yavuka yatimela ngetinyawo tayo, yakhala ngelivi lelikhulu, yatsi: Awu Jesu lobusisekile, longisindzise esihogweni lesesabekako! Awu Nkulunkulu lobusisekile, bani nemusa kulaba bantfu.
19.30: Ngesikhatsi seyikushito loku, yabamba tandla tayo, igcwaliswe ngenjabulo, ikhuluma emavi lamaningi labengacondzakali; ngesikhatsi seyikwentile loku, yatsatsa inkhosi, Lamonayi, ngesandla, buka nayo yavuka yema ngetinyawo tayo.
19.31: Nayo, ngekushesha, ibona umbango emkhatsini webantfu bayo, yaya kubo yacala kubekhuta, kanye nekubafundzisa emavi leyayiwavile aphuma emlonyeni wa-Amoni; ngebuningi balabo labaweva emavi ayo bakholwa, futsi baphendvukela eNkhosini.
19.32: Kodvwa kwakukhona labaningi emkhatsini wabo labangafunanga kuweva emavi ayo; ngako-ke bahamba indlela yabo.
19.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amoni avuka naye ngalokunjalo wabasita, ngalokunjalo nato tonkhe tinceku taLamonayi; futsi bonkhe bamemetela ebantfwini intfo lefanako—kutsi tinhlitiyo tabo tase tishintjile; nekutsi besebete sifiso sekwenta lokubi.
19.34: Buka, labaningi, bamemetela kubantfu kutsi bebabone tingilosi phindze bacoca nato; ngenca yaloko tabatjela tintfo taNkulunkulu, kanye netekulunga kwakhe.
19.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwabakhona labaningi labakholwa emavini abo; futsi ngebuningi balabo labakholwa babhajatiswa; baba bantfu labalungile, phindze bamisa libandla emkhatsini wabo.
19.36: Ngaleyondlela umsebenti weNkhosi wacala emkhatsini wemaLamani; ngako-ke iNkhosi yacala kutfululela Moya wayo etikwabo; futsi siyabona kutsi sandla sayo selulelwe kubo bonkhe bantfu labatawuphendvuka baphindze bakholwe egameni lakhe.

20.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebalimisile libandla kulelolive, inkhosi Lamonayi yaba nesifiso sekutsi Amoni ahambe nayo aye eveni laNefi, kute imkhombise uyise.
20.2: Livi leNkhosi lafika ku-Amoni, litsi: Ungahambi ukhuphukele eveni laNefi, ngoba buka, inkhosi itawufuna imphilo yakho; kodvwa uyawuya eveni laseMidonayi; ngoba buka, umnakenu Aroni, ngalokunjalo naMulokhayi kanye na-Ama basejele.
20.3: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amoni sekakuvile loku, watsi kuLamonayi: Buka, umnaketfu kanye nabomnaketfu basejele eMidonayi, futsi ngitohamba kute ngiyawubakhulula.
20.4: Manje Lamonayi watsi ku-Amoni: Ngiyati, ngemandla eNkhosi ungakwati kwenta tonkhe tintfo. Kodvwa buka, ngitawuhamba nawe siye eveni laseMidonayi; ngoba inkhosi yelive laseMidonayi, libito layo lengu-Anthiyomino, ingumngani wami; ngako-ke ngitakuya eveni laseMidonayi, kute ngiyincenge inkhosi yelive, futsi itawubakhipha bomnakenu etilongweni. Manje Lamonayi watsi kuye: Ngubani lokutjele kutsi bomnakenu basejele na?
20.5: Amoni watsi kuye: Kute longitjelile, ngaphandle kwaNkulunkulu; futsi utsite kimi—Hamba uyokhulula bomnakenu, ngoba basejele eveni laseMidonayi.
20.6: Manje ngesikhatsi Lamonayi sekakuvile loku wenta kutsi tinceku takhe tilungise emahhashi kanye netincola takhe.
20.7: Watsi ku-Amoni: Wota, ngitawuhamba nawe sehlele eveni lase Midonayi, lapho ngitawuyincenga inkhosi kutsi ibakhiphe bomnakenu ejele.
20.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amoni kanye naLamonayi basahamba baya lapho, bahlangana neyise waLamonayi, lobekayinkhosi eveni lonkhe.
20.9: Buka, uyise waLamonayi watsi kuye: Awutanga ngani edzilini ngalolwasuku lolukhulu ngesikhatsi ngentele emadvodzana ami, kanye nebantfu bami lidzili na?
20.10: Ngetulu kwaloko watsi: Uyaphi nalomNefi, longulomunye webantfwana bemcambimanga na?
20.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lamonayi wamlandzisa kutsi bekayaphi, ngoba bekasaba kumkhuba.
20.12: Futsi waphindze wamtjela sizatfu sekutsi ahlale embusweni wakhe, nekutsi yini angayanga edzilini uyise lebekalilungisile.
20.13: Manje ngesikhatsi Lamonayi sekamlandzisile tonkhe leti tintfo, buka, wamangala, uyise wamtfukutselela, futsi watsi: Lamonayi, uyawukhulula lamaNefi, langemadvodzana emcambimanga. Buka, wagebenga bobabe betfu; manje bantfwana bakhe nabo ngalokunjalo beta emkhatsini wetfu kute, ngebucili babo kanye nangemanga abo, basikhohlise, kute baphindze basigebenge imphahla yetfu.
20.14: Manje uyise waLamonayi wamyaleta kutsi abulale Amoni ngenkemba. Waphindze wamyala kutsi angayi eveni laseMidonayi, kodvwa kutsi abuyele naye eveni la-Ishmayeli.
20.15: Kodvwa Lamonayi watsi kuye: Ngeke ngimbulale Amoni, noma ngibuyele eveni la-Ishmayeli, kodvwa ngiya eveni laseMidonayi kute ngikhulule bomnakabo-Amoni, ngoba ngiyati kutsi bangemadvodza lalungile futsi babaphrofethi labangcwele baNkulunkulu weliciniso.
20.16: Manje ngesikhatsi uyise sekawavile lamavi, wamtfukutselela, wahoshula inkemba yakhe kute amshaye amwisele phansi.
20.17: Kodvwa Amoni wema ngembili watsi kuye: Buka, ungayibulali indvodzana yakho; noko, bekuyawubancono kutsi kufe yona kunawe, ngoba buka, iphendvukile etonweni tayo; kodvwa uma wena ungafa ngalesi sikhatsi, usentfukutselweni yakho, umphefumulo wakho awunakusindziswa.
20.18: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, kudzingekile kutsi ukuyekele loku; ngoba uma ungayibulala indvodzana yakho, ibe yona iyindvodza lengenacala, ingati yayo iyawukhala isuka phansi iye eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wayo, kute imphindziselo ite etikwakho; futsi mhlawumbe ungalahlekelwa nangumphefumulo wakho.
20.19: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni sekawashito lamavi kuye, wamphendvula, watsi: Ngiyati kutsi uma ngingabulala indvodzana yami, ngiyawube ngicitsa ingati lengenacala; ngoba nguwe lona lofune kuyibulala.
20.20: Futsi yelula sandla sayo kutsi ibulale Amoni. Kodvwa Amoni wawamela emagalelo ayo, futsi waphindze washaya sandla sayo kute ingabe isakwati kusisebentisa.
20.21: Manje ngesikhatsi inkhosi ibona kutsi Amoni angayibulala, yacala kuncenga ku-Amoni kutsi aphephise imphilo yayo.
20.22: Kodvwa Amoni waphakamisa inkemba yakhe, watsi kuyo: Buka, ngitawukubulala ngaphandle kwekutsi uvume kutsi bomnaketfu bakhishwe ejele.
20.23: Manje inkhosi, inekwesaba kutsi ingase ilahlekelwe yimphilo yayo, yatsi: Uma nje ungangisindzisa ngitawukunika noma ngabe yini lotawuyicela, noma ngabe yincenye yembuso.
20.24: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni abona kutsi besekayitfolile inkhosi lendzala njengekwesifiso sakhe, watsi kuyo: Uma nje ungavumela bomnaketfu kutsi baphume ejele, nekutsi Lamonayi agcine umbuso wakhe, nekutsi ungabi nekungamtsandzi, kodvwa umvumele kutsi ente njengekwetifiso takhe kunoma nguyiphi intfo layicabangako, uma kunjalo ngitawukuphephisa; kungasinjalo ngitawukushaya ngikulahle phansi.
20.25: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni sekawashito lamavi, inkhosi yacala kutfokota ngenca yemphilo yayo.
20.26: Futsi ngesikhatsi ibona kutsi Amoni bekangenanhloso yekuyibulala, ngesikhatsi ibona lutsandvo lolukhulu lebekanalo ngendvodzana yayo Lamonayi, yamangala kakhulu, yatsi: Ngenca yekutsi nguloku kuphela lokufisako, kutsi ngikhulule bomnakenu, futsi ngivume kutsi indvodzana yami Lamonayi igcine umbuso wayo, buka, ngitawuvuma kutsi indvodzana yami iwugcine umbuso wayo kusukela kulesi sikhatsi naphakadze; angisatukuphindze ngiyibuse nanini.
20.27: Ngetulu kwaloko ngitawuvuma kutsi bomnakenu bakhishwe ejele, futsi wena kanye nabomnakenu ningeta kimi, embusweni wami; ngoba ngiyafisa kakhulu kutsi ngikubone. Ngoba inkhosi beyimangele kakhulu ngemavi labekawakhulumile, futsi ngalokunjalo nangemavi labekakhulunywe yindvodzana yayo Lamonayi, ngako-ke yaba nesifiso sekuwafundza.
20.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni kanye naLamonayi bachubeka neluhambo lwabo lwekuya ngaseveni laseMidonayi. Futsi Lamonayi watfola kutsandvwa emehlweni enkhosi yelive; ngako-ke bomnakabo-Amoni bakhishwa ejele.
20.29: Ngesikhatsi Amoni ahlangana nabo wadzabuka kakhulu, ngoba buka bebangcunu, futsi tikhumba tabo betigatukile kakhulu ngenca yekuboshwa ngetintsambo leticinile. Ngetulu kwaloko bese bafile yindlala, koma, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlupheko; noko bebakubeketelele konkhe kuhlupheka kwabo.
20.30: Futsi njengoba kwenteka, loku bekusabelo sabo kutsi bawele etandleni tebantfu labebalukhuni kanye nalabebanetinhloko letilukhuni; ngako-ke babengafuni ngisho nekuwalalela emavi abo, babacosha, babakhiphela ngaphandle, babashaya, futsi babachuba besuka indlu ngendlu, indzawo ngendzawo, bate babafikisa eveni laseMidonayi; Futsi lapho batsatfwa baphonswa ejele, baboshwa ngetintsambo leticinile, bagcinwa ejele tinsuku letiningi, bate bakhishwa nguLamonayi kanye na-Amoni.

21.intro: Umlandvo wekushumayela kwa-Aroni, kanye naMulokhayi, kanye nabomnakabo, kumaLamani.
21.1: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni kanye nabomnakabo sebatehlukanisile eminceleni yelive lemaLamani, buka Aroni watsatsa luhambo lwakhe loluya eveni lelalibitwa ngemaLamani ngekutsi yiJerusalema, balibita ngelive lekutalwa laboyise; futsi lalikhashane lihlanganisa imincele yaMormon.
21.2: Manje emaLamani nema-Amaleki kanye nebantfu baka-Amuloni bese bakhe lidolobha lelikhulu, lelalibitwa ngekutsi yiJerusalema.
21.3: Manje emaLamani ngekwawo nje abelukhuni ngalokwanele, kodvwa ema-Amaleki kanye nema-Amuloni abelukhuni ngalokwendlulele; ngako-ke bawabangela emaLamani kutsi ente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tawo, kutsi akhule acine ebubini kanye nasetinengisweni tawo.
21.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Aroni weta edolobheni laseJerusalema, wacala kushumayela kuma-Amaleki. Wacala kushumayela kuwo emasinagogeni awo, ngoba besekakhe emasinagoge ngekweluhlelo lwemaNehori; ngoba labaningi bema-Amaleki kanye nema-Amuloni bebabeluhlelo lwemaNehori.
21.5: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi Aroni angena kulenye yemasinagoge abo kutsi ayewushumayela kubantfu, futsi ngesikhatsi akhuluma nabo, buka kwavuka um-Amaleki wacala kuphikisana naye, watsi: Yini lena lofakaza ngayo? Uke wayibona ingilosi na? Kungani tingilosi tingaveli kitsi? Buka ngabe labantfu abakalungi yini njengebantfu bakho na?
21.6: Futsi utsi, ngaphandle kwekutsi siphendvuke siyawubhubha. Uwati kanjani umcabango kanye nenhloso yetinhlitiyo tetfu na? Wati kanjani kutsi sinesidzingo sekutsi siphendvuke na? Wati kanjani kutsi asisibo bantfu labalungile na? Buka, sitakhile tindzawo letingcwele, futsi siyahlangana ndzawonye kute sidvumise Nkulunkulu. Siyakholwa kutsi Nkulunkulu utawubasindzisa bonkhe bantfu.
21.7: Manje Aroni watsi kuye: Uyakholwa yini kutsi iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu iyawuta kutawuhlenga bantfu etonweni tabo na?
21.8: Lendvodza yatsi kuye: Tsine asikholelwa kutsi uyayati intfo lenjalo. Asikholelwa kulamasiko labuwula. Asikholelwa kutsi uyati ngetintfo letisetawukwenteka, noma sikholelwe kutsi boyihlo futsi ngalokunjalo nabobabe betfu bebati mayelana netintfo labatikhuluma, letisetawukwenteka.
21.9: Manje Aroni wacala kubavulela imibhalo lengcwele mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu, ngalokunjalo mayelana nekuvuka kwalabafile, nekutsi angeke kube khona kuhlengwa kweluntfu ngaphandle kwekutsi kube kungekufa kanye nekuhlupheka kwaKhristu, kanye nenhlawulo yengati yakhe.
21.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi acala kubachazela ngaleti tintfo bamtfukutselela, bacala kuhlekisa ngaye; futsi abafunanga kuwalalela emavi labewakhuluma.
21.11: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi abona kutsi bebangafuni kuweva emavi akhe, wesuka esinagogeni labo, weta edolobhaneni lelalibitwa ngekutsi yi-Ani-Anthi, futsi lapho watfola Mulokhayi ashumayela livi kubo; ngalokunjalo na-Ama kanye nabomnakabo. Futsi bebaphikisana nalabaningi ngelivi.
21.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babona kutsi bantfu bebatotenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, ngako-ke besuka beta eveni laseMidonayi. Balishumayela livi kulabaningi, futsi bambalwa labakholelwa emavini labebawafundzisa.
21.13: Noko, Aroni kanye nesibalo lesitsite sabomnakabo batsatfwa baphonswa ejele, kwatsi labasalako babaleka baphuma eveni laseMidonayi baya etifundzeni letitungeletile.
21.14: Futsi labo labaphonswa ejele beva buhlungu ngetintfo letiningi, bate bakhululwa ngesandla saLamonayi kanye na-Amoni, futsi baphiwa kudla baphindze bembatsiswa.
21.15: Bahamba futsi bayawumemetela livi, ngaleyondlela bakhululwa kwekucala baphuma ejele; ngaleyondlela bebeve buhlungu.
21.16: Bahamba bayanoma ngukuphi lapho bebaholwa khona nguMoya weNkhosi, bashumayela livi laNkulunkulu kuwo onkhe emasinagoge ema-Amaleki, noma kuyo yonkhe imibutsano yemaLamani lapho bebamukelwa khona.
21.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yacala kubabusisa, kangangekutsi baletsa labaningi ekwatini liciniso; yebo, benta labaningi bakholwa ngetono tabo, kanye nangemasiko aboyise, labengakalungi.
21.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni kanye naLamonayi babuya eveni laseMidonayi baya eveni la-Ishmayeli, lokwakulive lelalilifa labo.
21.19: Futsi inkhosi Lamonayi ayivumanga kutsi Amoni ayisebentele, noma abe yinceku yayo.
21.20: Kodvwa yenta kutsi kwakhiwe emasinagoge eveni la-Ishmayeli; yenta kutsi bantfu bayo, noma bantfu labebangaphansi kwembuso wayo, babutsane ndzawonye.
21.21: Yatfokota ngabo, yabafundzisa tintfo letiningi. Yaphindze yamemetela kubo kutsi bebabantfu labebangaphansi kwayo, nekutsi bebabantfu labebakhululekile, kutsi bebakhululekile ekucindzetelweni yinkhosi, uyise; ngoba uyise bekasayivumele kutsi ingabusa ngetulu kwebantfu labebaseveni la-Ishmayeli, kanye nakulo lonkhe live lelalitungeletiwe.
21.22: Futsi yaphindze yamemetela kubo kutsi bebanayo inkhululeko yekudvumisa iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo ngekwetifiso tabo, kunoma nguyiphi indzawo labebakuyo, uma nje kuseveni lelalingaphansi kwembuso wenkhosi Lamonayi.
21.23: Amoni washumayela kubantfu benkhosi Lamonayi; futsi kwenteka kutsi wabafundzisa tonkhe tintfo mayelana netintfo letiphatselene nekulunga. Wabancusa tinsuku tonkhe, ngako konkhe kukhutsala; baligcina livi lakhe, futsi bebanenshisekelo yekugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.

22.1: Manje njengoba Amoni bekasachubeka nekufundzisa bantfu baLamonayi, sitawubuyela emlandvweni wa-Aroni kanye nabomnakabo; ngoba emvakwekutsi sekahambile eveni laseMidonayi waholwa nguMoya waya eveni lakaNefi, ngisho nasendlini yeNkhosi lebeyingetulu kwalo lonkhe live ngaphandle kwelive la-Ishmayeli, Futsi beyinguyise waLamonayi.
22.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wahamba waya kuyo esigodlweni senkhosi, kanye nabomnakabo, wakhotsama phambi kwenkhosi, watsi kuyo: Buka, Awu nkhosi, tsine sibomnakabo-Amoni, lomkhululile ejele.
22.3: Manje, Awu nkhosi, uma ungasindzisa timphilo tetfu, sitawuba tinceku takho. Futsi inkhosi yatsi kubo: Phakamani, ngoba ngitawuninika timphilo tenu, angitukunivumela kutsi nibe tinceku tami; kodvwa ngitawufuna kutsi ningisite; ngoba ngandlela tsite bengikhatsatekile emcondvweni wami ngenca yebubele kanye nebukhulu bemavi a-Amoni umnakenu; futsi ngifisa kwati sizatfu sekutsi kungani angetanga lapha kanye nani aphume eveni laseMidonayi.
22.4: Aroni watsi enkhosini: Buka, Moya weNkhosi umbitele kulenye indzawo; uhambe waya eveni la-Ishmayeli, kuyawufundzisa bantfu baLamonayi.
22.5: Manje inkhosi yatsi kubo: Yini lena leniyishito mayelana naMoya weNkhosi na? Bukani, ngulentfo lengikhatsatako.
22.6: Ngetulu kwaloko, yini lena leshiwo ngu-Amoni—kutsi uma utawuphendvuka utawusindziswa, futsi uma ungeke uphendvuke, uyawulahlwa ngelusuku lwekugcina na?
22.7: Aroni waphendvula watsi kuyo: Uyakholwa yini kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu na? Inkhosi yatsi: Ngiyati kutsi ema-Amaleki atsi ukhona Nkulunkulu, ngibavumele kutsi bakhe tindlu letingcwele, kute bahlangane ndzawonye kute bamkhonte. Uma wena manje utsi ukhona Nkulunkulu, buka ngitawukholwa.
22.8: Manje ngesikhatsi Aroni akuva loku, inhlitiyo yakhe yacala kutfokota, watsi: Buka, ngalokucinisekile njengoba uphila, Awu nkhosi, ukhona Nkulunkulu.
22.9: Inkhosi yatsi: Ngabe Nkulunkulu ngulowo Moya loMkhulu lowakhipha bobabe betfu baphuma eveni laseJerusalema na?
22.10: Aroni watsi kuyo: Yebo, unguye loyo Moya loMkhulu, wadala tonkhe tintfo lokusezulwini nalokusemhlabeni. Uyakholwa yini nguloku na?
22.11: Yona yatsi: Yebo, ngiyakholwa kutsi Moya loMkhulu wadala tonkhe tintfo, futsi ngifisa kutsi ungitjele mayelana nato tonkhe leti tintfo, futsi ngitawuwakholwa emavi akho.
22.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Aroni abona kutsi inkhosi yayitawuwakholwa emavi akhe, wacala kusukela ekudalweni kwa-Adamu, afundzela inkhosi imibhalo lengcwele—kutsi Nkulunkulu wamdala kanjani umuntfu ngemfanekiso wakhe lucobo, nekutsi Nkulunkulu wamnika imiyaleto, nangekutsi ngenca yesiphambuko, umuntfu wawa.
22.13: Aroni wayichazela ngemibhalo lengcwele kusukela ekudalweni kwa-Adamu, abeka ngekuwa kwemuntfu phambi kwayo, kanye nesimo sabo sekunaka inyama futsi ngalokunjalo nangelisu lekuhlengwa, lelalungiswa kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba, nguKhristu, lilungiselelwa bonkhe labo labayawukholwa egameni lakhe.
22.14: Futsi njengoba umuntfu awa ngeke akwati kuzuza lutfo ngekwakhe; kodvwa kuva buhlungu kanye nekufa kwaKhristu kwahlawulela tono tabo, ngelukholo kanye nangekuphendvuka, njalonjalo; nekutsi uncamula tibopho tekufa, kute lithuna lingabi nekuncoba, nekutsi ludvonsi lwekufa kumele lwenganywe ematsembeni enkhatimulo; futsi Aroni watichaza tonkhe leti tintfo enkhosini.
22.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Aroni sekatichazile leti tintfo, inkhosi yatsi: Ngingenta njani kute ngibe naloku kuphila lokuphakadze lose ukhulume ngako na? Yebo, ngingenta njani kute ngitalwe ngekwakaNkulunkulu, lomoya lomubi usiphulwe uphume esifubeni sami, futsi ngemukele uMoya wakhe, kute ngigcwaliswe ngenjabulo, kute ngingalahlwa ngelusuku lwekugcina na? Buka, kusho yona, ngitawudzela konkhe lenginako, yebo, ngitawushiya nembuso wami, kute ngemukele lenjabulo lenkhulu.
22.16: Kodvwa Aroni watsi kuyo: Uma uyifisa lentfo, uma ungakhotsama phansi embikwaNkulunkulu, yebo, uma ungaphendvuka etonweni takho tonkhe, futsi ubite ligama lakhe ngelukholo, ukholwa kutsi utawutfola lokucelako, uma kunjalo uyawulitfola lelotsemba lolifisako.
22.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Aroni sekawashito lamavi, inkhosi yakhotsama phansi embikweNkhosi, ngemadvolo ayo; yebo, yate yatsi nja phansi emhlabatsini, futsi yakhala kakhulu, itsi:
22.18: Awu Nkulunkulu, Aroni ungitjele kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu; Futsi uma akhona Nkulunkulu, uma wena unguNkulunkulu, ungatembula yini kimi, ngitawudzela tonkhe tono tami kutsi ngikwati, nekutsi ngivuswe ekufeni, futsi ngisindziswe ngelusuku lwekugcina. Manje ngesikhatsi inkhosi seyiwashito lamavi, yashayeka phansi kwaba shengatsi ifile.
22.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinceku tayo tagijima tayawutjela indlovukazi konkhe lobekwenteke enkhosini. Yeta enkhosini; ngesikhatsi iyibona ilele shengatsi ifile, ngetulu kwaloko Aroni nabomnakabo bemile shengatsi ngibo labebasizatfu sekuwa kwayo, yabatfukutselela, yayaleta kutsi tinceku tayo, noma tinceku tenkhosi, tibabambe tibabulale.
22.20: Manje tinceku tatiyibonile imbangela yekuwa kwenkhosi, ngako-ke atitange tilokotse tibeke tandla tato ku Aroni nabomnakabo; futsi tatikhalela kuyo indlovukazi titsi: Usiyaletelani kutsi sibulale lamadvodza na, ngoba buka lomunye wabo unemandla kunatsi sonkhe. Ngako-ke sitawukuwa embikwabo.
22.21: Manje ngesikhatsi indlovukazi ibona kwesaba kwetinceku nayo ngalokunjalo yacala kwesaba kakhulu, hleze kubekhona bubi lobutsite lobutawuta kuyo. Futsi yayaleta tinceku tayo kutsi tihambe tiyobita bantfu, kute babulale Aroni kanye nabomnakabo.
22.22: Manje ngesikhatsi Aroni akubona kuphikelela kwendlovukazi, futsi ati bulukhuni betinhlitiyo tebantfu, wesaba hleze sicuku sibutsane ndzawonye, bese kuba khona umbango lomkhulu kanye nekuphatamiseka emkhatsini wabo; ngako-ke welula sandla sakhe futsi wayiphakamisa inkhosi phansi, watsi kuyo: Sukuma. Yasukuma yema ngetinyawo tayo, yatfola emandla ayo.
22.23: Manje loku kwenteka embikwendlovukazi kanye naletiningi tinceku. Futsi ngesikhatsi bakubona loku bamangala kakhulu, bacala kwesaba. Inkhosi yema ngembili, yacala kubafundzisa. Yabafundzisa, kangangekutsi bendlu yayo bonkhe baphendvukela eNkhosini.
22.24: Manje bekukhona sicuku lesasibutsene ndzawonye ngenca yekuyaletwa yindlovukazi, futsi kwacala kwabakhona kuvungama lokukhulu emkhatsini waso ngenca ya-Aroni kanye nabomnakabo.
22.25: Kodvwa inkhosi yeta ngembili yema emkhatsini waso futsi yasifundzisa. Futsi batfotjiswa macondzana na-Aroni kanye nalabo labekanabo.
22.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi ibona kutsi bantfu bese batfobile, yenta kutsi Aroni kanye nabomnakabo bete ngembili beme emkhatsini wesicuku, futsi bashumayele livi kuso.
22.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yatfumela simemetelo kulo lonkhe live, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bayo labebakulo lonkhe live layo, labo labebakuto tonkhe tifundza letatitungeletile, letatigudla ngisho naselwandle, emphumalanga kanye nasenshonalanga, kanye nalelo lelalehlukaniswe eveni lase Zarahemla ngendledlana lencane yasehlane, lebeyigijima isuka emphumalanga yelwandle ite iye nasenshonalanga yelwandle, futsi itungelete eminceleni yelugu lwelwandle, kanye naseminceleni yelihlane lebelisenyakatfo ngaseveni laseZarahemla, kuya eminceleni yeManthi, ngasenhloko yemfula iSidoni, lebewugijima usuka emphumalanga uya ngasenshonalanga—bekahlukaniswe kanjalo-ke emaLamani kanye nemaNefi.
22.28: Manje, incenye lenkhulu lengemavila yemaLamani beyihlala ehlane, ihlala emathendeni; futsi beyigcwele kulo lonkhe lihlane enshonalanga, eveni laNefi; yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nasenshonalanga yelive laseZarahemla, eminceleni yelugu lwelwandle, kanye nasenshonalanga eveni laNefi, endzaweni yeyise lelifa labo lekucala, futsi ngaleyondlela bagudla umncele welugu lwelwandle.
22.29: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko bekukhona emaLamani lamaningi emphumalanga ngaselugwini lwelwandle, lapho emaNefi bekawachubele khona. Futsi ngaleyondlela emaNefi bekacishe atungeletwe ngemaLamani; noko emaNefi bekatitsetse tonkhe tincenye letisenyakatfo telive lebetigudla lihlane, enhloko yemfula iSidoni, kusukela emphumalanga kuya enshonalanga, kutungelete kuye eluhlangotsini lwasehlane; enyakatfo, bate bafika eveni lebebalibita ngekutsi yiNala.
22.30: Futsi beligudla eveni lebebalibita ngekutsi yiNcitsakalo, likhashane kakhulu kuya ngasenyakatfo kangangekutsi belifinyelela eveni lebelikadze linebantfu lababulawa, ematsambo abo lesesikhulume ngawo, lelatfolwa bantfu baseZarahemla, lebekuyindzawo yabo yekucala labafikela kuyo.
22.31: Futsi bavela lapho bakhuphukela eningizimu yelihlane. Ngaleyondlela live lelingasenyakatfo labitwa ngekutsi yiNcitsakalo, bese kutsi live lelingaseningizimu labitwa ngekutsi yiNala, lilihlane leligcwele tonkhe tilwane tasendle letinhlobonhlobo, incenye yato lebeyivele eveni lelingasenyakatfo kutofuna kudla.
22.32: Manje, bekulibanga nje lelilanga nencenye yeluhambo lwemNefi, kusukela eveni iNala kuya eveni iNcitsakalo, kusukela emphumalanga kuya enshonalanga yelwandle; futsi ngaleyondlela live laNefi kanye nelive laseZarahemla bekacishe atungeletwe ngemanti, khona lapho kukhona siceshana lesincane selive emkhatsini welive lelingasenyakatfo kanye nelive lelingaseningizimu.
22.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi besekakhile eveni iNala, kusukela emphumalanga kuya elwandle lolusenshonalanga, futsi ngaleyondlela emaNefi ngekuhlakanipha kwawo, kanye nabogadzi bawo kanye nemabutfo awo, bawabiyela ngekhatsi emaLamani eningizimu, kute angabe asaba nesabelo enyakatfo, nekutsi angabe asengcela eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
22.34: Ngaloko-ke emaLamani akatange asakhona kuba nalesinye sabelo ngaphandle kwelive laNefi kuphela, kanye nelihlane lebelitungeletile. Manje loku bekukuhlakanipha kwemaNefi—njengoba emaLamani bekatitsa kubo, bebangeke bavumele tinhlupheko tabo kuto tonkhe tinhlangotsi, futsi ngetulu kwaloko kute babe nelive lapho bebengabalekela khona, ngekutsandza kwabo.
22.35: Manje, emvakwekutsi sengikushito loku, ngiyaphindza ngibuyela endzabeni ya-Amoni kanye na-Aroni, Omneri kanye naHimnayi, kanye nabomnakabo.

23.1: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yemaLamani yatfumela simemetelo emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bayo, kutsi bangatibeki tandla tabo ku-Amoni, Aroni, Omneri, noma Himnayi, noma lomunye wabomnakabo labayohamba bashumayela livi laNkulunkulu, kunoma nguyiphi indzawo labayokuba kuyo, kunoma nguyiphi incenye yelive labo.
23.2: Yebo, yatfumela simemetelo emkhatsini wabo, sekutsi bangatibeki tandla tabo kubo bababophe, noma babaphonse ejele; noma babakhafulele ngematse, noma babashaye, noma babacoshe babakhiphe emasinagogeni abo, noma bababhacabule; noma babajikijele ngematje, kodvwa babe nenkhululeko yekungena etindlini tabo, futsi ngalokunjalo nasemathempelini abo, kanye nasetindzaweni tabo letingcwele.
23.3: Futsi ngaleyondlela kute bahambe bashumayele livi ngekwetifiso tabo, ngoba inkhosi yaseyiphendvukele eNkhosini, kanye nabo bonkhe bendlu yayo; ngako-ke yatfumela simemetelo sayo kulo lonkhe live ebantfwini bayo, kute livi laNkulunkulu lingabi nekuvimbeleka, kodvwa lihambe liye kulo lonkhe live, kute bantfu bayo bentiwe bakholwe mayelana nemasiko lamabi aboyise, futsi bentiwe bakholwe kutsi bonkhe bebabomnakabo, nekutsi akukameli babulale, baphange, bebe, baphinge, noma bente nanoma nguluphi luhlobo lwebubi.
23.4: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi seyisitfumele lesi simemetelo, Aroni kanye nabomnakabo bahamba lidolobha ngelidolobha, bahamba indlu ngendlu yekukhonta, bamisa emabandla, bagcoba baphristi kanye nebafundzisi kulo lonkhe live emkhatsini wemaLamani, kutsi bashumayele baphindze bafundzise livi laNkulunkulu emkhatsini wabo; futsi ngaleyondlela bacala kutsi babe nemphumelelo lenkhulu.
23.5: Futsi tinkhulungwane taletfwa elwatini lweNkhosi, yebo, tinkhulungwane taletfwa kutsi tikholelwe emasikweni emaNefi; tafundziswa imibhalo kanye netiphrofetho letatindluliselwe kutsi tehle kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi sanyalo.
23.6: Futsi njengoba kunesiciniseko kutsi iNkhosi iyaphila, kusiciniseko futsi kutsi njengoba labaningi bakholwa, noma njengoba labaningi baletfwa elwatini leliciniso, ngekushumayela kwa-Amoni kanye nabomnakabo, ngekwemoya wekwembulelwa kanye newekuphrofetha, emandla a-Nkulunkulu asebenta timangaliso kubo—yebo, ngitsi kini, njengoba iNkhosi iphila, njengoba labaningi bemaLamani bakholwa enshumayelweni yabo, futsi baphendvukela eNkhosini, abatange basahlubuka.
23.7: Ngoba baba bantfu labalungile; batibeka phansi tikhali tekuhlubuka, kangangekutsi abatange basalwa ngalokumelene naNkulunkulu nanini, futsi nanoma ngubaphi kubomnakabo.
23.12: Ngalokunjalo nebantfu bemaLamani labebaseveni laseShilomu, futsi nalabo labebaseveni laseShemiloni, kanye nasedolobheni la-Lemuweli, kanye nasedolobheni laseShiminilomu.
23.13: Futsi lawa ngemagama emadolobha emaLamani labekaphendvukele eNkhosini; laba ngibo labo lababeka phansi tikhali tekuhlubuka, yebo, tonkhe tikhali tabo temphi; futsi bonkhe bebangemaLamani.
23.14: Futsi ema-Amaleki akaphendvukanga, ngaphandle kwamunye kuphela; kanjalo ngisho namunye wema-Amuloni; kodvwa batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, ngalokunjalo netinhlitiyo temaLamani kuleyoncenye yelive lapho bebahlala khona, yebo, futsi nato tonkhe tigodzi tabo kanye nemadolobha.
23.15: Ngako-ke, sesiwashito onkhe emadolobha emaLamani lapho aphendvuka khona eta elwatini leliciniso, futsi aphendvuka.
23.16: Manje kwenteka kutsi inkhosi kanye nalabo labebaphendvukile baba nesifiso sekutsi babe nelibito, kute behlukaniswe kubomnakabo; ngako-ke inkhosi yabonisana na-Aroni kanye nebaphristi babo labaningi, mayelana nelibito labebatobitwa ngalo, kute behlukaniswe.
23.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batibita ngelibito lelitsi ngema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi; futsi babitwa ngalelibito bangasabitwa ngekutsi ngemaLamani.
23.18: Bacala kutsi babe bantfu labakhutsele; yebo, futsi baba nebungani nemaNefi; ngako-ke, bacala budlelwane nabo, futsi sicalekiso saNkulunkulu asitange sisabalandzela.

24.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ema-Amaleki nema-Amuloni nemaLamani labekaseveni lase-Amuloni, ngalokunjalo naseveni laseHelamu, kanye nalawo labekaseveni laseJerusalema, kafishane nje, eveni lonkhe lelitungeletile, lawo labekangakaphendvuki futsi angakatibiti ngeligama lema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi, aphehlwa ngema-Amaleki kanye nangema-Amuloni ngentfukutselo ngalokumelene nabomnakabo.
24.2: Futsi inzondo yabo yaba yinkhulu kakhulu ngalokumelene nabo, kangangekutsi bacala kuyivukela inkhosi yabo, kangangekutsi bebangasayifuni kutsi ibe yinkhosi yabo; ngako-ke, batsatsa tikhali kuyobukana nebantfu bema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi.
24.3: Manje inkhosi umbuso yawunika indvodzana yayo, futsi yayibita libito layo ngekutsi-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi.
24.4: Inkhosi yafa ngawo lowo mnyaka lapho emaLamani acala kwenta emalungiselelo emphi kuyawubukana nebantfu baNkulunkulu.
24.5: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni nabomnakabo kanye nabo bonkhe labo labebafike naye babona emalungiselelo emaLamani kutsi abulale bomnakabo, baphuma baya eveni lemaMidiyani, lapho Amoni wahlangana nabo bonkhe bomnakabo; kusuka lapho beta eveni laka-Ishmayeli kute babambe umhlangano naLamonayi futsi ngalokunjalo kanye nemnakabo Anthi-Nefi-Lehi, kutsi kumele benteni kute bativikele kumaLamani.
24.6: Manje bekute namunye emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu labebaphendvukele eNkhosini labebafuna kutsatsa tikhali balwe nabomnakabo; cha, abafunanga ngisho kwenta nanoma ngumaphi emalungiselelo emphi; yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nenkhosi yabo yabayaleta kutsi bangalokotsi.
24.7: Manje, lawa ngemavi leyawakhuluma kubantfu mayelana naloludzaba: Ngiyambonga Nkulunkulu wami, bantfu bami labatsandzekako, kutsi Nkulunkulu wetfu lomkhulu ngebuhle bakhe utfumele labomnaketfu, emaNefi, kitsi kutsi atawushumayela kitsi, nekutsi atawusenta sikholwe ngemasiko abobabe betfu lamabi.
24.8: Futsi bukani, ngiyambonga Nkulunkulu wami lomkhulu kutsi usinike incenye yaMoya wakhe kutsi itsambise tinhlitiyo tetfu, kute sicale kuchumana nalabomnaketfu, emaNefi.
24.9: Futsi bukani, ngetulu kwaloko ngiyambonga Nkulunkulu wami, kutsi ngekuvula loku kuchumana sentiwe sakholwa ngetono tetfu, kanye nangekubulala lokuningi lesikwentile.
24.10: Futsi ngiyaphindza ngiyambonga Nkulunkulu wami, yebo, Nkulunkulu wami lomkhulu, kutsi usinikile kutsi siphendvuke kuleti tintfo, futsi nekutsi usicolele kuleto tono tetfu letiningi kanye nekubulala lesikwentile, futsi walisusa licala etinhlitiyweni tetfu, ngetento letinhle teNdvodzana yakhe.
24.11: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu, njengoba bekunguloko kuphela lebesingakwenta (njengoba besingulabalahleke kakhulu kunalo lonkhe luntfu) kutsi siphendvuke etonweni tetfu tonkhe kanye nasekubulaleni lokuningi lesikwentile, futsi nekutsi sitfole kutsi Nkulunkulu atisuse etinhlitiyweni tetfu, ngoba bekunguloko kuphela lebesingakwenta kutsi siphendvuke ngalokuphelele ngaphambi kwaNkulunkulu kute asuse libala letfu—
24.12: Manje bomnaketfu labatsandzekako kakhulu, njengoba Nkulunkulu sekawasusile emabala etfu, futsi netinkemba tetfu setikhatimula, ngako-ke asingatingcolisi tinkemba tetfu nanini ngengati yabomnaketfu.
24.13: Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha, asitigcine tinkemba tetfu kute tingabe tisangcoliswa ngengati yabomnaketfu; ngoba mhlawumbe, uma singatingcolisa tinkemba tetfu futsi ngeke tisahlantwa nanini tikhatimule engatini yeNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu wetfu lomkhulu, leyawucitsekela inhlawulo yetono tetfu.
24.14: Futsi Nkulunkulu lomkhulu ube nesihawu kitsi, futsi watembula leti tintfo kitsi kute singalahleki; yebo, futsi wembule leti tintfo kitsi ngaphambili, ngenca yekutsi uyayitsandza imiphefumulo yetfu njengoba abatsandza bantfwana betfu; ngaloko-ke, ngesihawu sakhe uyasihambela ngetingilosi takhe, kute lisu lekusindzisa lembulwe kitsi ngalokunjalo nasetitukulwaneni letitako.
24.15: Awu, unemusa kangakanani Nkulunkulu wetfu! Manje bukani, njengoba kube nguloko nje kuphela lebesingakwati kutsi sikwente kutsi kususwe emabala kitsi, futsi tinkemba tetfu tentiwe takhatimula, asitifihle khashane kute tigcinwe tikhatimula, njengebufakazi kuNkulunkulu wetfu ngelusuku lwekugcina, noma ngelusuku lesiyawuletfwa ngalo kutsi sime ngaphambi kwakhe kutsi sehlulelwe, kutsi asitingcolisanga tinkemba tetfu engatini yabomnaketfu seloku asabela livi lakhe futsi wasenta sahlanteka ngaloko.
24.16: Manje, bomnaketfu, uma bomnaketfu bafuna kusibulala, bukani, sitawutifihla khashane tinkemba tetfu, yebo, sitawutingcwaba ngisho ekujuleni kwemhlaba, kute tigcinwe ticwebetela, njengebufakazi bekutsi asitange nanini sitisebentise, ngelusuku lwekugcina; futsi uma bomnaketfu basibulala, bukani, siyawuya kuNkulunkulu wetfu futsi siyawusindziswa.
24.17: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi inkhosi seyente siphetfo salenkhulumo, futsi bonkhe bantfu babutsene ndzawonye, batsatsa tinkemba tabo, kanye nato tonkhe tikhali lebetisetjentiselwa kucitsa ingati yemuntfu, batingcwaba ekujuleni kwemhlaba.
24.18: Futsi loku bakwenta, kutsi kube sibonakaliso sabo sebufakazi kuNkulunkulu, ngalokunjalo nakubantfu, sekutsi abasayuphindza batisebentise tikhali nanini kucitsa ingati yemuntfu; loku bakwenta, bacinisekisa phindze benta tivumelwano naNkulunkulu, kutsi kunekutsi bacitse ingati yabomnakabo bayawunikela ngetimphilo tabo lucobo; futsi kunekutsi batsatse kumnakabo bayawumupha; futsi kunekutsi bacitse tinsuku tabo ngebuvila bayawusebenta kakhulu ngetandla tabo.
24.19: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi, ngesikhatsi lamaLamani aletfwa ekukholweni kanye nasekwatini liciniso, acina, futsi bekangabeketelela buhlungu kute kube sekufeni kunekutsi ente sono; ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi batingcwaba tikhali tabo tekuthula, noma batingcwaba tikhali temphi, kute kube khona kuthula.
24.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bomnakabo, emaLamani, benta emalungiselelo emphi, beta bakhuphukela eveni laNefi ngenhloso yekutawubulala inkhosi, kanye nekutsi abeke lenye esikhundleni sayo, futsi nekutsi abulale bantfu bema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi baphele eveni.
24.21: Manje ngesikhatsi bantfu babona kutsi bekatawulwa nabo bahamba bayawuwahlangabeta, batilahla phambi kwawo phansi, bacala kubita libito leNkhosi; futsi ngaleyondlela bebakulesi simo ngesikhatsi emaLamani acala kutseleka etikwabo, acala kubabulala ngenkemba.
24.22: Futsi ngaphandle kwekuhlangabetana nanoma ngukuphi kuvimbeleka, abulala inkhulungwane nesihlanu yabo; futsi siyati kutsi babusisiwe, ngoba bahamba bayohlala naNkulunkulu wabo.
24.23: Manje ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi bomnakabo abatange bayibalekele inkemba, noma babheke eceleni ngesekudla noma ngesencele, kodvwa kutsi balala phansi phindze bafa, bamdvumisa Nkulunkulu ngisho nakuleso sehlakalo sekubulawa ngenkemba—
24.24: Manje ngesikhatsi emaLamani akubona loku atibamba ekubabulaleni; futsi kwaba khona labaningi laba netinhlitiyo letagcwala kudzabuka ngenca yalabo bomnakabo labebawe ngaphansi kwenkemba, ngoba besebaphendvukile etintfweni lebebatentile.
24.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balahla phansi tikhali tabo temphi, abatange basaphindze batitsatsa, ngoba bahlabeka ngekubulala lebebakwentile; futsi batilahla phansi njengabo bomnakabo, batsembele emseni walabo labebaphakamise imikhono yabo kubabulala.
24.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNkulunkulu ngalolosuku bahlangana nalabangetulu kwesibalo salabo labebabulewe; labo labebabulewe bebabantfu labalungile, ngako-ke site sizatfu sekungabata kutsi basindziswa.
24.27: Futsi bekute namunye umuntfu lomubi lowabulawa emkhatsini wabo; kodvwa kwaba khona labangetulu kwenkhulungwane labaletfwa ekwatini liciniso; ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi iNkhosi isebenta ngetindlela letiningi kute isindzise bantfu bayo.
24.28: Manje sibalo lesikhulu kakhulu salabo bemaLamani lababulala labaningi kangaka babomnakabo bebangema-Amaleki kanye nema-Amuloni, sibalo lesikhulu kakhulu sabo bekubeluhlelo lwemaNehori.
24.29: Manje, emkhatsini walabo labahlangana nebantfu beNkhosi, bekute namunye lobekangum-Amaleki noma ngum-Amuloni, noma lobekaweluhlelo lwaNehori, kodvwa bebabesitukulwane sangempela saLamani kanye naLemuweli.
24.30: Futsi ngaleyondlela singakwati kuhlukanisa ngalokucacile, kutsi emvakwekutsi bantfu sebake bakhanyiselwa ngaMoya waNkulunkulu, baba nelwati lolukhulu lwetintfo letiphatselene nekulunga, emvakwaloko babese bawela esonweni kanye nasesiphambukweni, baba lukhuni kakhulu, futsi ngaleyondlela simo sabo siba sibi kakhulu kunekutsi bangatange bati ngaleti tintfo.

25.1: Futsi buka, manje kwenteka kutsi lawo maLamani atfukutsela kakhulu ngoba bebabulele bomnakabo; ngako-ke afungela kutiphindzisela kumaNefi; futsi akatange asenta imitamo yekutsi ababulale bantfu bema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi ngaleso sikhatsi.
25.2: Kodvwa atsatsa emabutfo awo ahamba awelela eminceleni yelive laseZarahemla, ahlasela bantfu labebaseveni lase-Amoniha futsi bababulala.
25.3: Emvakwaloko, aba netimphi letiningi nemaNefi, kuto achutjwa aphindze abulawa.
25.4: Futsi emkhatsini wemaLamani labekabulewe bekukhona cishe yonkhe intalelwane ya-Amuloni kanye nabomnakabo, labebabaphristi ba-Nowa, futsi babulawa ngetandla temaNefi;
25.5: Futsi labasala, sebabalekele ehlane lelisemphumalanga, sebatitsatsele emandla kanye neligunya ngetulu kwemaLamani, benta kutsi emaLamani lamaningi afe ngemlilo ngenca yenkholo yawo.
25.6: Ngoba labaningi bawo, emvakwekutsi asabe nekulahlekelwa lokukhulu kanye netinhlupheko letiningi kakhulu, acala kuphehlelwa ekukhumbuleni emavi Aroni nabomnakabo labebawashumayele kubo eveni labo; ngako-ke acala kungawakholwa emasiko aboyise, akholwa eNkhosini, nekutsi yaniketa emandla lamakhulu kumaNefi; futsi ngaleyondlela kwaba khona labaningi bawo labaphendvuka ehlane.
25.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo babusi labebayinsali yebantfwana ba-Amuloni benta kutsi babulawe, yebo, bonkhe labo labebakholelwa kuleti tintfo.
25.8: Manje loku kufela lukholo kwenta kutsi labaningi babomnakabo baphehlelwe entfukutselweni; futsi kwacala kwaba khona umbango ehlane; emaLamani acala kutingela intalelwane ya-Amuloni kanye nabomnakabo aphindze acala kuyibulala; futsi babalekela ehlane lelisemphumalanga.
25.9: Futsi buka basatingelwa nangalolusuku ngemaLamani. Ngaleyondlela emavi a-Abinadi agcwaliseka, lawasho mayelana nentalelwane yebaphristi labenta kutsi eve tinhlungu tekufa ngemlilo.
25.10: Ngoba watsi kubo: Loko leniyawukwenta kimi kuyawuba luhlobo lwetintfo letitakwenteka.
25.11: Manje Abinadi waba wekucala loweva tinhlungu tekufa ngemlilo ngenca yenkholo yakhe kuNkulunkulu; manje nguloku labekucondzile, kutsi labaningi bayawuva tinhlungu tekufa ngemlilo, njengoba naye ativa.
25.12: Washo kubaphristi baNowa kutsi intalelwane yabo iyokwenta labaningi kutsi babulawe, ngendlela lefanako njengoba kwentiwa nakuye, nekutsi bayohlakatwa ngaphandle baphindze babulawe, njengetimvu letingenamelusi ticoshwa tiphindze tibulawa tilwane tasendle; manje bukani, lamavi acinisekiswa, ngoba bacoshwa ngemaLamani, batingelwa, baphindze bashaywa.
25.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi bekangeke akhone kuncoba emaNefi abuyela futsi eveni lawo; lamaningi awo eta atohlala eveni la-Ishmayeli kanye naseveni la-Nefi, atihlanganisa nebantfu baNkulunkulu, labebabantfu ba-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi.
25.14: Futsi nawo ngalokunjalo atingcwaba tikhali tawo temphi, njengoba nabomnakabo bebentile, acala kutsi abe bantfu labalungile; ahamba etindleleni teNkhosi, futsi betama kugcina imiyaleto kanye nemitsetfo yayo.
25.15: Yebo, bawugcina umtsetfo waMosi, ngoba kwakudzingekile kutsi bawugcine umtsetfo waMosi kwangaleso sikhatsi, ngoba kwakungakagcwaliseki konkhe. Kodvwa nanoma wawukhona umtsetfo waMosi, babuka embili ekuteni kwaKhristu, babona kutsi umtsetfo waMosi bewuluphawu lwekuta kwakhe, futsi bakholelwa kutsi kufanele bagcine leto tento letibonakalako kute kube sikhatsi ayokwembulwa ngaso kubo.
25.16: Manje bebangacabangi kutsi kusindziswa kwakuta ngemtsetfo waMosi; kodvwa umtsetfo waMosi wenta kutsi lukholo lwabo kuKhristu lucine; futsi ngaleyondlela baligcina litsemba ngelukholo, lelaliholela ekusindzisweni kwaphakadze, batsembele kumoya wekuphrofetha, lowakhuluma ngaleto tintfo letatitakwenteka.
25.17: Manje bukani, Amoni, na-Aroni, na-Omneri, naHimnayi, kanye nabomnakabo bajabula kakhulu, ngemphumelelo lababenayo emkhatsini wemaLamani, babona kutsi iNkhosi yayibaniketile ngekwemithandazo yabo, nekutsi ngetulu kwaloko yalicinisekisa livi layo kubo ngayo yonkhe indlela.

26.1: Manje, lawa ngemavi a-Amoni kubomnakabo, atsi: Banaketfu kanye nabomnaketfu, bukani ngitsi kini, sikhulu kangakanani sizatfu lesinaso kutsi sitfokote; ngoba sake sacabanga nje ngesikhatsi sisuka eveni laseZarahemla kutsi Nkulunkulu bekayawuke asinike tibusiso letinkhulu kanjena na?
26.2: Manje, ngiyabuta, ngutiphi tibusiso letinkhulu lasinike tona na? Ningasho na?
26.3: Bukani, ngitawuniphendvulela; ngoba bomnakenu, emaLamani, bebasebumnyameni, yebo, ngisho nasemhumeni webumnyama, kodvwa bukani, baningi kangakanani labaletfwa kutsi babone kukhanya lokumangalisako kwaNkulunkulu! Loku kusibusiso lesinikwe sona, kutsi sibe ngulabasetjentiswa nguNkulunkulu kutsi sente lomsebenti lomkhulu.
26.4: Bukani, tinkhulungwane tawo tiyatfokota, futsi sebaletfwe esibayeni saNkulunkulu.
26.5: Bukani, insimu beseyivutsiwe, nibusisiwe, ngoba nilifakile lisikela, navuna ngemandla enu, yebo, bonkhe budze belilanga nisebentile; bukani sibalo setitfungo tenu! Futsi tiyawubutselwa etinyangweni, kute tingonakali.
26.6: Yebo, atiyukushaywa sangcotfo ngelusuku lwekugcina, yebo, noma tibhengulwe tihhushuhhushu; kodvwa ngesikhatsi sangcotfo sifika tiyawubutselwa ndzawonye endzaweni yato, kute sangcotfo singakwati kungena kuto; yebo, futsi ngeke tichutjwe yimimoya leyesabekako tiye noma ngukuphi lapho sitsa siyawutitfwala sitiyise khona.
26.7: Kodvwa bukani, tisetandleni teNkhosi yesivuno, futsi tayo; itawutivusa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
26.8: Libusisiwe ligama laNkulunkulu wetfu; asihlabelele kulo ludvumo lwakhe, yebo, asilibonge libito lakhe lelingcwele, ngoba usebenta kulunga ingunaphakadze.
26.9: Ngoba kube besingakaphumi eveni laseZarahemla, laba bomnaketfu labatsandzekako kakhulu, labasitsandze kakhulu kangaka, bebayobe namanje basahlushwa yinzondo ngalokumelene natsi, yebo, ngetulu kwaloko bebayoba bantfu labangatiwa kuNkulunkulu.
26.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amoni sekawashito lamavi, umnakabo Aroni wamekhuta, watsi: Amoni, ngiyesaba kutsi kujabula kwakho kutawukuholela ekutichayiseni.
26.11: Kodvwa Amoni watsi kuye: Angitichayisi ngewami emandla, noma ngekwami kuhlakanipha; kodvwa buka, injabulo yami igcwele, yebo, inhlitiyo yami iyacicima yinjabulo, futsi ngitawutfokota kuNkulunkulu wami.
26.12: Yebo, ngiyati kutsi angisilutfo; ngekwemandla ami ngibutsakatsaka; ngako-ke angitukutichayisa ngekwami, kodvwa ngitawutichayisa ngaNkulunkulu wami, ngoba ngemandla akhe ngingenta tonkhe tintfo; yebo, buka, letiningi timangaliso sitentile kulelive, sitawulidvumisa ligama lakhe ngato ingunaphakadze.
26.13: Bukani, tingakanani tinkhulungwane tabomnaketfu latikhululile ebuhlungwini besihogo; futsi tiletfwe kutsi tihlabelele lutsandvo lwenkhululeko, futsi loku kungenca yemandla elivi lakhe lelikitsi, ngako-ke asinaso yini sizatfu lesikhulu sekujabula na?
26.14: Yebo, sinesizatfu sekumdvumisa ingunaphakadze, ngoba unguNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe, futsi ukhulule bomnaketfu etinketaneni tesihogo.
26.15: Yebo, bebatungeletwe bumnyama lobungapheli kanye nekubhujiswa; kodvwa bukani, ubaletse ekukhanyeni lokungapheli kwakhe, yebo, ensindzisweni lengapheli; batungeletwe ngelutsandvo lwakhe loluningi lolungeke lulinganiswe; yebo, tsine sibe ngulabasetjentiswa nguye ekwenteni lomsebenti lomkhulu futsi lomangalisako.
26.16: Ngako-ke, asitfokote, yebo, sitawutfokota eNkhosini; yebo, sitawutfokota, ngoba injabulo yetfu igcwele; yebo, sitawumdvumisa Nkulunkulu wetfu ingunaphakadze: Bukani, ngubani longatfokota kakhulu eNkhosini na? Yebo, ngubani longakhuluma kakhulu ngemandla akhe lamakhulu, kanye nangesihawu sakhe, kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kubantfwana bebantfu na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, anginawusho ngisho lokuncane lengikuvako.
26.17: Ngubani lobekacabanga kutsi Nkulunkulu wetfu bekangaba nesihawu lesikhulu kangaka sekutsi asihlwitse esimeni setfu lesesabekako, sekona, kanye nalesingcolile?
26.18: Bukani, besihamba ngisho nangentfukutselo, ngekwesabisa lokukhulu kute sibhubhise libandla lakhe.
26.19: Awu pho, kungani angasiyisanga ekubhujisweni lokwesabekako, yebo, kungani angayiyekelanga inkemba yekulunga kwakhe iwele etikwetfu, futsi asilahlele ekuphelelweni litsemba kwaphakadze na?
26.20: Awu, umphefumulo wami, cishe kube shengatsi, uyanyamalala ngaloyo mcabango. Bukani, akakusebentisanga kulunga kwakhe etikwetfu, kodvwa ngesihawu sakhe lesikhulu wasiwelisa kulelogibe lekufa kanye nelusizi lwaphakadze, kwate kwaba sekusindzisweni kwemiphefumulo yetfu.
26.21: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu, ngumuphi umuntfu wemvelo lokhona lowatiko ngaleti tintfo na? Ngitsi kini, kute namunye lotatiko leti tintfo, ngaphandle kwalabadzabukile ngekona.
26.22: Yebo, loyo lophendvukako aphindze asebentise lukholo, avete imisebenti lemihle, athandaze njalo-njalo angayekeli—kulonjalo kunikwa kwati timfihlakalo taNkulunkulu; yebo, kulonjalo kuyawunikwa kutsi embulelwe tintfo letingakaze tembulwa nanini; yebo, kuyawunikwa kulonjalo kutsi aletse tinkhulungwane temiphefumulo ekuphendvukeni, nanjengoba natsi siniketiwe kutsi sibuyise labomnaketfu ekuphendvukeni.
26.23: Manje anikhumbuli yini, bomnaketfu, kutsi satsi uma sitsi kubomnaketfu eveni laseZarahemla, siyahamba sikhuphukela eveni laNefi, kutsi siyawushumayela kubomnaketfu emaLamani, basihleka basihhalatisa.
