26.24: Ngoba batsi kitsi: Nicabanga kutsi ningaletsa emaLamani ekwatini liciniso na? Nicabanga kutsi ningakwati kwenta emaLamani kutsi akholwe ngekungalungi kwemasiko aboyise, njengoba babantfu labanetinhloko letilukhuni labanjena; tinhlitiyo tabo letitfokota ekucitsekeni kwengati; tinsuku tabo labaticitsa ebubini lobukhulu kakhulu; tindlela tabo lekutindlela tesoni kusukela ekucaleni na? Manje bomnaketfu, niyakhumbula kutsi lolu bekululwimi lwabo.
26.25: Ngetulu kwaloko batsi: Asibatsatsele tikhali silwe nabo, kute sibabulale kanye nebubi babo baphele nya eveni, ngaphandle kwaloko batawusehlula baphindze basibulale.
26.26: Kodvwa bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, tsine seta ehlane hhayi ngenhloso yekutawubulala bomnaketfu, kodvwa ngenhloso yekutsi mhlawumbe singasindzisa leminye lemibalwa imiphefumulo yabo.
26.27: Manje ngesikhatsi tinhlitiyo tetfu setishone phansi, cishe besesitobuyela emuva, bukani, inkhosi yasidvudvuta, yatsi: Hambani niye emkhatsini wabomnakenu, emaLamani, niphindze nititfwale ngekubeketela tinhlupheko tenu, ngitawuninika imphumelelo.
26.28: Manje bukani, sifikile, besisetindzaweni tonkhe emkhatsini wabo; futsi sibeketele ekuhluphekeni kwetfu, sihlupheke ngekweswela konkhe; yebo, sihambe umuti ngemuti, setsembele emseni welive—hhayi emseni welive kuphela kodvwa nasemseni waNkulunkulu.
26.29: Singenile etindlini tabo saphindze sabafundzisa, sibafundzisile etitaladini tabo; yebo, sibafundzisile etikwetintsaba tabo; ngalokunjalo singenile nasemathempelini abo kanye nakumasinagoge abo saphindze sabafundzisa; kodvwa sicoshiwe, sahlekwa ngekuhhalatiswa, sakhafulelwa ngematse, sashaywa etihlatsini tetfu; sigandvwe nangematje, satsatfwa saboshwa ngetintsambo leticinile, saphonswa ejele; kodvwa ngemandla kanye nekuhlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu sikhululiwe futsi.
26.30: Sitive tonkhe tinhlobo tekuhlupheka, konkhe loku, kute mhlawumbe sibe lisu lekusindzisa umphefumulo lotsite; futsi besicabanga kutsi injabulo yetfu ingagcwala uma mhlawumbe singaba lisu lekusindzisa labanye.
26.31: Manje bukani, singabuka futsi sitibone titselo temisebenti yetfu; ngabe tincane na? Ngitsi kini, Cha, tiningi; yebo, futsi singafakaza ngebucotfo babo, ngenca yelutsandvo lwabo kubomnakabo phindze ngalokunjalo nakitsi.
26.32: Ngoba bukani, bakhetsa kunikela ngetimphilo tabo kunekutsi batsatse imphilo yesitsa sabo; futsi batingcwabile tikhali tabo temphi ekujuleni kwemhlaba, ngenca yelutsandvo lwabo kubomnakabo.
26.33: Manje bukani ngitsi kini, ngabe lwake lwaba khona lutsandvo lolungaka eveni lonkhe na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha, alukate lube khona, ngisho nasemkhatsini wemaNefi.
26.34: Ngoba bukani, wona bekangabatsatsela bomnakabo tikhali; bebangeke bavume kutsi babulawe. Kodvwa bukani bangakhi balaba lababeke phansi timphilo tabo; futsi siyati kutsi bahambile baya kuNkulunkulu wabo, ngenca yelutsandvo lwabo kanye nekuzonda kwabo sono.
26.35: Manje ngabe site yini sizatfu sekutfokota na? Yebo, ngitsi kini, akukate kube khona bantfu labake baba nesizatfu lesikhulu kangaka sekutfokota njengatsi, seloku kwadzabuka umhlaba; yebo, injabulo yami itsatsekile, ngisho nasekutichayiseni kuNkulunkulu wami; ngoba unemandla onkhe, kuhlakanipha konkhe, kanye nekwati konkhe; ucondza tonkhe tintfo, ungumuntfu lonesihawu, kute kube sekusindzisweni, kulabo labatawuphendvuka phindze bakholwe egameni lakhe.
26.36: Manje uma loku kukutichayisa, nami ngalokunjalo ngitawutichayisa; ngoba loku kuyimphilo yami kanye nekukhanya kwami, injabulo yami kanye nensindziso yami, kanye nekukhululwa kwami elusizini lwaphakadze. Yebo, libusisiwe ligama laNkulunkulu wami, lobeseloku abanakekela laba bantfu, labaligala lesihlahla saka-Israyeli, futsi lebelikadze lilahlekile emtimbeni walo eveni lelingatiwa; yebo, ngitsi, libusisiwe ligama laNkulunkulu wami, lobeseloku asinakekela tsine, labazulazulako eveni lelingatiwa.
26.37: Manje bomnaketfu, siyabona kutsi Nkulunkulu unakekela bonkhe bantfu, noma ngabe bangaba kuliphi live; yebo uyababala bantfu bakhe, futsi tibilini takhe tesihawu tisemhlabeni wonkhe. Manje loku kuyinjabulo yami, kanye nekubonga kwami lokukhulu; yebo, futsi ngitawumbonga Nkulunkulu wami ingunaphakadze. Amen.

27.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi lawo maLamani labekahambe ayawukulwa imphi nemaNefi asatfole, emvakwemizabalazo yawo leminingi kutsi bababulale, kutsi bekulite kufuna kuwabulala, aphindze abuyela eveni laNefi.
27.2: Manje kwenteka kutsi ema-Amaleki, ngenca yekulahlekelwa kwawo, atfukutsela kakhulu. Futsi ngesikhatsi abona kutsi abengeke akhone kutfola kutiphindziselela kumaNefi, acala kutsi aphehle bantfu ekutfukutseleni ngalokumelene nabomnakabo, bantfu bema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi; ngako-ke aphindze acala kubabulala.
27.3: Manje laba bantfu baphindze bala kutsatsa tikhali tabo, futsi batinikela kutsi babulawe ngekwetifiso tetitsa tabo.
27.4: Manje ngesikhatsi Amoni kanye nabomnakabo bawubona lomsebenti wekubhubha emkhatsini walabo labebabatsandza kangaka, kanye nasemkhatsini walabo nabo bebabatsandze kangaka—ngoba bebabaphatsisa kwetingilosi letatitfunyiwe tivela kuNkulunkulu kutawubasindzisa ekubhujisweni kwaphakadze—ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi Amoni nabomnakabo bawubona lomsebenti lomkhulu wekubhujiswa, bagcwala sihawu, futsi batsi enkhosini:
27.5: Asibagcogceleni ndzawonye laba bantfu beNkhosi, asihambe sehlele eveni laseZarahemla kubomnaketfu emaNefi, sibaleke siphume etandleni tetitsa tetfu, kute singabulawa.
27.6: Kodvwa inkhosi yatsi kubo: Bukani, emaNefi atawusibulala, ngenca yekubulala lokuningi kanye netono lesitentile kuwo.
27.7: Amoni watsi: Ngitawuhamba ngiyawubuta eNkhosini, futsi uma itsi kitsi, asihambe sehlele entasi kubomanaketfu, ngabe nitawuhamba na?
27.8: Inkhosi yatsi kuye: Yebo, uma iNkhosi itsi kitsi asihambe, sitawuhamba sehlele entasi kubo bomnaketfu, futsi sitawuba tigcili tabo site silungise kubo kubulala lokuningi kanye netono lesitentile kubo.
27.9: Kodvwa Amoni watsi kuyo: Kuphambene nemtsetfo wabomnaketfu, lowamiswa ngubabe, kutsi kube khona tigcili emkhatsini wabo; ngako-ke asihambe sehlele entasi futsi setsembele kuwo umusa wabomnaketfu.
27.10: Kodvwa inkhosi yatsi kuye: Buta eNkhosini, futsi uma itsi kitsi asihambe, sitawuhamba; ngaphandle kwaloko sitawufela kulelive.
27.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni wahamba wayawubuta eNkhosini, futsi iNkhosi yatsi kuye:
27.12: Bakhiphe laba bantfu kulelive, kute bangafi; ngoba Sathane ubambelele kakhulu etinhlitiyweni tema-Amaleki, laphehla emaLamani kutsi atfukutselele bomnakabo kutsi bababulale; ngako-ke phumani niphele kulelive; futsi babusisiwe laba bantfu kulesi situkulwane, ngoba ngitawubalondvolota.
27.13: Manje kwenteka kutsi Amoni wahamba wayotjela inkhosi onkhe lamavi iNkhosi leyayiwakhulumile kuye.
27.14: Futsi bagcogcela ndzawonye bonkhe bantfu babo, yebo, bonkhe bantfu beNkhosi, bagcogca ndzawonye yonkhe imihlambi yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo yabo, besuka eveni, befika ehlane lelalehlukanisa live laNefi eveni laseZarahemla, futsi beta edvute nemincele yelive.
27.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amoni watsi kubo: Bukani, mine nabomnaketfu sitawuhamba embili siye eveni laseZarahemla, nitawusala lapha site sibuye; futsi sitawutizama tinhlitiyo tabomnaketfu, noma bayafuna yini kutsi nite eveni labo.
27.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amoni ahamba aya eveni, yena kanye nabomnakabo bahlangana na-Alima, kuleyondzawo lesike sakhuluma ngayo, futsi bukani, lona kwaba ngumhlangano wenjabulo.
27.17: Manje injabulo ya-Amoni yayiyinkhulu kangangekutsi wagcwala; yebo, wenganywa yinjabulo yaNkulunkulu wakhe, wate waphelelwa ngemandla akhe; futsi waphindze wawela phansi.
27.18: Manje ngabe loku kwakungasiyo yini injabulo leyendlulele na? Bukani, lena yinjabulo lengatfolwa ngumuntfu ngaphandle kwekutsi kube nguloyo lodzabuke ngekweliciniso ngekona kanye naloyifuna ngekutitfoba injabulo.
27.19: Manje injabulo ya-Alima ekuhlanganeni kwakhe nabomnakabo yaba yinkhulu ngempela, futsi ngalokunjalo nenjabulo ya-Aroni, na-Omneri, kanye naHimnayi; kodvwa buka injabulo yabo ayendlulanga emandla abo.
27.20: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima wabahola bomnakabo babuyela emuva eveni laseZarahemla; bate bayongena nasendlini yakhe lucobo. Futsi bahamba bayotjela umehluleli lomkhulu tonke tintfo lebetentekile kubo eveni laNefi, emkhatsini wabomnakabo, emaLamani.
27.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umehluleli lomkhulu watfumela simemetelo kulo lonkhe live, anesifiso sekuva livi lebantfu mayelana nekwemukela bomnakabo, labebabantfu bema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi.
27.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi lebantfu labuya, litsi: Bukani, sitawunikela ngelive laseJeshoni, lelisemphumalanga ngaselwandle, lelihlanganisa live iNala; leliseningizimu yelive iNala; futsi lelive iJeshoni live lesitawuliniketa bomnaketfu kutsi libe lifa.
27.23: Futsi buka, sitawubeka emabutfo etfu emkhatsini welive iJeshoni kanye nelive iNefi, kute sivikele bomnaketfu eveni iJeshoni; futsi loku sitawukwentela bomnaketfu, ngenca yekwesaba kwabo kuphakamisa tikhali ngalokumelene nabomnakabo hleze bente sono; futsi loku kwesaba kwabo lokukhulu kute ngenca yekuphendvuka kwabo lokulusizi labebanako, ngenca yekubulala kwabo lokuningi kanye nebubi babo lobukhulu.
27.24: Manje buka, loku sitawukwentela bomnaketfu, kute batfole live iJeshoni; futsi sitawubavikela etitseni tabo ngemabutfo etfu, uma nje batawusinika incenye yaloko labanako kusisita kutsi sondle emabutfo etfu.
27.25: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amoni asakuvile loku, wabuyela kubantfu bema-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi, ngalokunjalo na-Alima akanye naye, baya ehlane, lapho bebamise emathende abo khona, babatjela tonkhe leti tintfo. Futsi Alima naye wabacocela ngekuphendvuka kwakhe, bakanye na-Amoni naAroni, kanye nabomnakabo.
27.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi loku kwabanga injabulo lenkhulu emkhatsini wabo. Futsi bahamba behlela eveni laseJeshoni, futsi balitsatsa live laseJeshoni; babitwa ngemaNefi ngekutsi babantfu ba-Amoni; ngako-ke behlukaniswa ngalelogama emva kwaloko.
27.27: Futsi bebasemkhatsini webantfu baNefi, ngetulu kwaloko babalwa emkhatsini webantfu labebabelibandla laNkulunkulu. Ngetulu kwaloko behlukaniswa ngenca yenshisekelo yabo kuNkulunkulu, futsi ngalokunjalo nakubantfu; ngoba bebatsembeke ngalokuphelele futsi bacotfo kuto tonkhe tintfo; bacinile elukholweni lwaKhristu, kwate kwaba sekugcineni.
27.28: Futsi bakubuka kucitseka kwengati yabomnakabo njengesinengiso lesikhulu; bebangeke baphocelelwe kutsi batsatse tikhali ngalokumelene nabomnakabo; futsi abatange babuke kufa ngekwesaba, ngenca yelitsemba kanye nemibono yabo ngaKhristu kanye nekuvuka; ngako-ke, kufa kubo kwenganywa kwaphela ngekuncotjwa kwako nguKhristu.
27.29: Ngako-ke, bebatimisele kufa ngendlela leyayibuhlungu kakhulu futsi lenelusizi lolukhulu leyayingasentjetiswa bomnakabo kubo, ngaphambi kwekutsi batsatse inkemba noma celemba kutsi babashaye.
27.30: Futsi ngalendlela bebabantfu labanenshisekelo futsi labatsandzekako, bantfu beNkhosi labebatsandvwa kakhulu.

28.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi bantfu ba-Amoni sebatintile eveni laseJeshoni, futsi ngalokunjalo nelibandla selimisiwe eveni laseJeshoni, nemabutfo emaNefi sekabekiwe atungeleta lonkhe live laseJeshoni, yebo, kuyo yonkhe imincele letungelete live laseZarahemla, buka emabutfo emaLamani abebalandzele bomnakabo nabaya ehlane.
28.2: Futsi ngaleyondlela kwabakhona imphi lenkhulu; yebo, lebeyingakate ibekhona nanini emkhatsini webantfu bonkhe eveni kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi ashiya eJerusalema; yebo, futsi emashumi etinkhulungwane temaLamani abulawa phindze ahlakatwa etindzaweni tonkhe.
28.3: Yebo, ngetulu kwaloko kwaba khona kubulawa lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu baNefi; noko, emaLamani achutjwa aphindze ahlakatwa, futsi bantfu baNefi baphidze babuyela eveni labo.
28.4: Manje lesi kwakusikhatsi lapho khona kwabakhona kulila lokukhulu kanye nekukhala lokwevakala kulo lonkhe live, emkhatsini webantfu bonkhe baNefi—
28.5: Yebo, kukhala kwebafelokati bakhalela emadvodza abo, kanjalo nekwabobabe bakhalela emadvodzana abo, kanye nendvodzakati ikhalela umnakabo, yebo, nemnakabo akhalela babe; futsi kukhala kwekulila kwevakala emkhatsini wabo bonkhe, bakhalela imindeni yabo leyayibulewe.
28.6: Manje ngempela lolu kwakulusuku lwelusizi; yebo, sikhatsi sekuzotsa, kanye nesikhatsi sekuzila kanye nekuthandaza.
28.7: Futsi waphela ngaleyo ndlela umnyaka welishumi nesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi;
28.8: Lona ngumlandvo wa-Amoni kanye nabomnakabo, luhambo lwabo eveni laNefi, buhlungu babo eveni, tinsizi tabo, kanye netinhlupheko tabo, kanye nekujabula kwabo lokungeke kulinganiswe, kanye nekwemukelwa nekuphephiswa kwabomnakabo eveni laseJeshoni. Manje shengatsi iNkhosi, uMhlengi webantfu bonkhe, angayibusisa imiphefumulo yabo ingunaphakadze.
28.9: Futsi lona ngumlandvo wetimphi kanye nemibango emkhatsini wemaNefi, ngalokunjalo netimphi emkhatsini wemaNefi kanye nemaLamani; futsi umnyaka welishumi nesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli uphelile.
28.10: Kusukela ngemnyaka wekucala kuya kuwelishumi nesihlanu kwaba khona kubhujiswa kwetimphilo letiningi letitinkhulungwane; yebo, kwaletsa simo lesesabekako sekucitseka kwengati.
28.11: Futsi imitimba letinkhulungwane letiningi ilele phansi emhlabeni, ngakulokunye imitimba yetinkhulungwane letiningi iyabola itindvundvuma etikwebuso bemhlaba; yebo, futsi tinkhulungwane letiningi tiyakhala ngenca yekulahlekelwa yimindeni yato, ngoba tinesizatfu sekwesaba, ngekwetetsembiso teNkhosi, tekutsi tiyiswe esimeni selusizi lolungapheli.
28.12: Ngakulokunye tinkhulungwane letiningi talabanye tiyakhala ngekulahlekelwa yimindeni yato, kodvwa tiyatfokota tiyajabula kakhulu kulo litsemba, futsi nekwati, ngekwetetsembiso teNkhosi, kutsi batawuphakanyiswa kutsi bahlale esandleni sangesekudla saNkulunkulu, esimeni senjabulo lengeke iphele nanini.
28.13: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi kukhulu kangakanani kungalingani kwebantfu ngenca yesono kanye nesiphambuko, kanye nemandla adeveli, lafika ngemacebo ebucili lawenta kutsi abambe tinhlitiyo tebantfu.
28.14: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyalubona lubito lolukhulu lwekukhutsala kwebantfu kutsi basebente esivinini seNkhosi; futsi ngaleyondlela siyasibona sizatfu lesikhulu selusizi, futsi ngalokunjalo nesekutfokota—lusizi ngenca yekufa kanye nekubhujiswa emkhatsini webantfu, kanye nenjabulo ngenca yekukhanya kwaKhristu lokuholela ekuphileni.

29.1: Awu kube bengiyingilosi, ngitfole sifiso senhlitiyo yami, sekutsi ngihambe ngikhulume ngelicilongo laNkulunkulu, ngelivi lekunyakatisa umhlaba, futsi ngimemetele kuphendvuka kubo bonkhe bantfu.
29.2: Yebo, bengitomemetela kuwo wonkhe umphefumulo, njengelivi lekudvuma, kuphendvuka kanye nelisu lekuhlengwa, kutsi abaphendvuke futsi bete kuNkulunkulu wetfu, kute kungasabikhona lusizi lolukhulu etikwebuso bonkhe bemhlaba.
29.3: Kodvwa bukani, ngingumuntfu, futsi ngiyona ngekufisa kwami; ngoba kumele ngeneliseke ngetintfo iNkhosi lengabele tona.
29.4: Angikafanele ngishintje etifisweni tami simemetelo lesicinile saNkulunkulu lolungile, ngoba ngiyati kutsi unika bantfu ngekufisa kwabo, noma ngabe kuholela ekufeni noma ngabe kuholela ekuphileni; yebo, ngiyati kutsi uyababela bantfu, yebo, umemetela kubo timemetelo letingeke tiguculwe, ngekwetifiso tabo, noma ngabe tekusindziswa noma tekubhujiswa.
29.5: Yebo, ngiyati kutsi lokuhle nalokubi kute embikwabo bonkhe bantfu; loyo longakwati kwehlukanisa lokuhle kulokubi akanacala; kodvwa loyo lokwatiko lokuhle nalokubi, kuye kunikwa ngekwetifiso takhe, noma ngabe ufisa lokuhle noma ufisa lokubi, kuphila noma kufa, injabulo noma kudliwa ngunembeza.
29.6: Manje, ngekubona kutsi ngiyatati leti tintfo, kungani ngifisa lokungetulu kunekutsi ngente umsebenti lengibitelwe kuwo na?
29.7: Kungani ngifisa kutsi ngibe yingilosi, kute ngikhulume kuyo yonkhe imikhawulo yemhlaba na?
29.8: Ngoba bukani, iNkhosi inika tonkhe tive, ngekwebuve bato kanye nangelulwimi lwato, kutsi tilifundzise livi lakhe, yebo, ngekuhlakanipha, konkhe loko lakubona kufanele kutsi tibe nako; ngako-ke siyabona kutsi iNkhosi iyala ngekuhlakanipha, ngaloko lokulungile futsi lokuliciniso.
29.9: Ngiyakwati loko iNkhosi lengiyalete ngako, futsi ngiyatfokota ngako, Angitikhukhumeti ngekwami, kodvwa ngitfokota kuloko iNkhosi lengiyalete ngako; yebo, loku yinjabulo yami, kute mhlawumbe ngibe sikhali etandleni taNkulunkulu kutsi ngiletse umphefumulo lotsite ekuphendvukeni, futsi loku kuyinjabulo yami.
29.10: Futsi bukani, uma ngibona labaningi babomnaketfu batisola ngekweliciniso, futsi beta eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, nakunjalo umoya wami ugcwala injabulo; bese ngikhumbula loko iNkhosi lengentele kona, yebo, nekutsi iwuvile umthandazo wami; yebo, bese ngikhumbula sandla sayo lesinesihawu lengelulele sona.
29.11: Yebo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngikhumbula kutfunjwa kwabobabe, ngoba ngempela ngiyati kutsi iNkhosi yabakhulula yabakhipha ebugcilini, futsi ngaloku yalimisa libandla layo; yebo, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, Nkulunkulu wa-Isaka, kanye naNkulunkulu waJakobe, yabakhulula baphuma ebugcilini.
29.12: Yebo, seloku ngakukhumbula njalo kutfunjwa kwabobabe; futsi naloyo Nkulunkulu lowabakhulula baphuma etandleni temaGibhithe wabakhulula baphuma ebugcilini.
29.13: Yebo, futsi loyo Nkulunkulu wamisa libandla lakhe emkhatsini wabo; yebo, futsi loyo Nkulunkulu ungibite ngelubito lolungcwele, kutsi ngishumayele livi kulabantfu, futsi unginike imphumelelo lenkhulu, kuyo injabulo yami igcwele.
29.14: Kodvwa angijatjuliswa yimphumelelo yami kuphela, kodvwa injabulo yami igcwele kakhulu ngenca yemphumelelo yabomnaketfu, labebakadze bangenhla eveni laNefi.
29.15: Bukani, basebente kakhulu, baletsa titselo letiningi; futsi uyawuba mkhulu kanganani umvuzo wabo!
29.16: Manje, uma ngicabanga ngemphumelelo yalaba bomnaketfu umphefumulo wami uyatsatseka, kube shengatsi uhlukaniswa nemtimba wawo, njengoba kwakunjalo, injabulo yami yinkhulu kakhulu.
29.17: Futsi kwangatsi Nkulunkulu angavuma laba, bomnaketfu, kutsi bahlale phansi embusweni waNkulunkulu; yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe labo labatitselo temisebenti yabo kute bangabe basaphumela ngaphandle nanini, kodvwa kutsi bamdvumise ingunaphakadze. Futsi shengatsi Nkulunkulu angavuma kutsi kwenteke ngekwemavi ami, nanjengoba ngikhulumile. Amen.

30.1: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi bantfu baka-Amoni sebahlalisiwe eveni laseJeshoni, yebo, ngetulu kwaloko emvakwekutsi emaLamani sekakhishiwe aphuma eveni, nalabafile bawo sebangcwatjiwe bantfu baseveni—
30.2: Manje labafile bawo bebangakabalwa ngenca yebukhulu besibalo sabo; ngalokunjalo nalabo bemaNefi labebafile ababalwanga—kodvwa kwenteka emvakwekutsi sekabangcwabile labafile bawo, futsi ngalokunjalo nasemvakwetinsuku tekuzila, netekulila, kanye netemthandazo, (futsi bekungumnyaka welishumi nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi) kwacala kwabakhona kuthula njalo kulo lonkhe live.
30.3: Yebo, futsi bantfu betama kugcina imiyaleto yeNkhosi; bacinile ekugcineni timiso taNkulunkulu, ngekwemtsetfo waMosi; ngoba bafundziswa kutsi bawugcine umtsetfo waMosi ute ugcwaliseke.
30.4: Ngaleyondlela bantfu abatange babe nekuphatamiseka umnyaka wonkhe welishumi nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi.
30.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka welishumi nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwaba khona kuthula njalo.
30.6: Kodvwa kwenteka ekupheleni kwemnyaka welishumi nesikhombisa, kwefika indvodza eveni laseZarahemla, lebeyingumPhiki-Khristu, ngoba yacala kushumayela kubantfu iphikisana netiphrofetho lebetikhulunywe baphrofethi, mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu.
30.7: Manje bekute umtsetfo lophikisana nenkholelo yemuntfu; ngoba bekuphambene ngalokuphelele nemiyalo yaNkulunkulu kutsi kube khona umtsetfo loyawukwenta bantfu bangalingani.
30.8: Ngoba naku lokushiwo ngumbhalo longcwele: Khetsani namuhla, kutsi ngubani lenitawumkhonta.
30.9: Manje uma umuntfu bekafisa kutsi asebentele Nkulunkulu, bekulilungelo lakhe; noma ngalokungiko, uma akholwa kuNkulunkulu bekulilungelo lakhe kutsi amsebentele; kodvwa uma bekangakholwa kuye bekute umtsetfo wekumjezisa loyo.
30.10: Kodvwa uma abulele bekajeziswa ngekufa; uma agebengile ngalokunjalo bekajeziswa; uma ebile ngalokunjalo bekajeziswa; futsi uma aphingile ngalokunjalo bekajeziswa; yebo, ngabo bonkhe lobubi bebajeziswa.
30.11: Ngoba bekukhona umtsetfo wekutsi bantfu kumele behlulelwe ngekwemacala abo. Noko, bekute umtsetfo lophikisana nenkholelo yemuntfu; ngako-ke, umuntfu bekajeziswa kuphela ngemacala lawo labekawentile; ngako-ke bonkhe bantfu bebalingana.
30.12: Futsi loMphiki-Khristu, libito lakhe bekunguKorihori, (nemtsetfo wawungenawukwati kutsi umbambe) wacala kushumayela kubantfu kutsi ngeke kube khona Khristu. Washumayela ngalendlela watsi:
30.13: Awu nine leniboshelwe phansi ngaphansi kwelitsemba lelibuwula futsi lelilite, kungani nitibophela ngaleti tintfo letibuwula kangaka na? Kungani nigadze Khristu na? Ngoba kute umuntfu longati intfo lesatawukwenteka.
30.14: Bukani, leti tintfo lenitibita ngetiphrofetho, lenitsi tindluliselwa kulabanye ngebaphrofethi labangcwele, bukani, tingemasiko labuwula aboyise.
30.15: Nilati kanjani liciniso lato na? Bukani, ngeke nitati tintfo leningatiboni; ngako-ke ngeke nati kutsi kuyawuba khona Khristu.
30.16: Nilindzile futsi nitsi nibona kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu. Kodvwa bukani, kungumphumela wekulutseka kwengcondvo; futsi loku kuphambana kwetingcondvo tenu kuta ngenca yemasiko aboyihlo, aniholela ekukholweni tintfo letingasilo liciniso.
30.17: Tiningi tintfo letinje latikhuluma kubo, abatjela kutsi kute inhlawulo lengentelwa tono tebantfu, kodvwa wonkhe umuntfu uva lokuhle nalokubi kulemphilo ngekutiphatsa kwakhe; ngako-ke wonkhe umuntfu uphumelela ngekuhlakanipha kwakhe, nekutsi wonkhe umuntfu uncoba ngekwemandla akhe; futsi noma ngabe yini umuntfu layentako ayisilo licala.
30.18: Washumayela ngaleyondlela kubo, aholela khashane tinhlitiyo talabaningi, abenta kutsi batichenye ngebubi babo, yebo, aholela khashane labaningi besifazane, kanjalo nemadvodza, kutsi bente bugwadla—abatjela kutsi uma umuntfu sekafile, loko kukuphela kwakhe.
30.19: Manje lendvodza yaphindze yahamba yawela eveni laseJeshoni, kute iyawushumayela letintfo emkhatsini webantfu ba-Amoni, lebebake baba bantfu bemaLamani.
30.20: Kodvwa buka bona bebahlakaniphe kakhulu kunalabaningi bemaNefi; ngoba bona bamtsatsa; bambopha, bamtfwala bamyisa ngaphambi kwa-Amoni, lobekangumphristi lomkhulu ngetulu kwalabo bantfu.
30.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wenta kutsi atfwalwe akhishelwe ngaphandle kwelive. Futsi wawelela eveni lakaGideyoni, wacala kushumayela kubo; lapha akatange abe nemphumelelo lenkhulu, ngoba watsatfwa waboshwa watfwalwa wayiswa ngaphambi kwemphristi lomkhulu, nakumehluleli lomkhulu eveni.
30.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umphristi lomkhulu watsi kuye: Kungani uhamba uzulazula ugucula tindlela tenkhosi na? Kungani ufundzisa labantfu kutsi angeke abe khona Khristu, kuphatamise intfokoto yabo na? Kungani ukhuluma ngekuphikisana netiphrofetho tonkhe tebaphrofethi labangcwele na?
30.23: Manje libito lalomphristi lomkhulu bekunguGidona. Korihori watsi kuye: Ngoba angifundzisi buwula bemasiko aboyihlo, futsi angifundzisi labantfu kutsi batibophele phansi ngaphansi kwetimiso kanye netento letibuwula letamiswa baphristi basendvulo, kute batfole emandla ngalokungalungi kanye neligunya ngetulu kwabo, kute babagcine bete lwati, kute bangatichenyi, kodvwa behliselwe phansi ngekwemavi enu.
30.24: Nitsi labantfu babantfu labakhululekile. Bukani, ngitsi basebugcilini. Nitsi leto tiphrofetho tasendvulo tiliciniso. Bukani, ngitsi anati kutsi tiliciniso.
30.25: Nitsi labantfu babantfu labanelicala futsi labawile, ngenca yekuphambuka kwemtali. Bukani, ngitsi umntfwana akanacala ngenca yebatali bakhe.
30.26: Futsi niphindza nitsi Khristu uyawukuta. Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi anati kutsi kuyawuba khona Khristu. Futsi niphindze nitsi uyawubulawa ngenca yetono temhlaba—
30.27: Ngaleyondlela nidukisa labantfu ngekulandzela buwula bemasiko aboyihlo, futsi njengekwetifiso tenu lucobo; nibacindzetela phansi, njengoba kwakunjalo basebugcilini, kute nititike ngemisebenti yetandla tabo, kute bangalokotsi nakancane bajabulele lokulungile nalokungemalungelo abo.
30.28: Yebo, abakwati nakancane kusebentisa loko lokungekwabo hleze bone baphristi babo, labebabagcilata ngekwetifiso tabo, lababenta kutsi bakholelwe, emasikweni abo nasemaphusheni abo nasemicabangweni yabo lelite nasemibonweni yabo kanye nasetimfihlakalweni tabo letingekho, kute, uma bangentanga ngekwemavi abo, bone umuntfu lotsite longatiwa, labatsi nguNkulunkulu—umuntfu longakate nanini abonwe noma atiwe, longakate abe khona futsi longasoze abe khona nanini.
30.29: Manje ngesikhatsi umphristi lomkhulu kanye nemehluleli lomkhulu babubona bulukhuni benhlitiyo yakhe, yebo, ngesikhatsi babona kutsi bekatotfuka ngisho naNkulunkulu, abamphendvulanga emavini akhe; kodvwa benta kutsi aboshwe; bamnika labaphetse, baphindze bamtfumela eveni laseZarahemla, kute ayovela ngaphambi kwa-Alima, kanye nemehluleli lomkhulu nalobekangumbusi ngetulu kwelive lonkhe.
30.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekaletfwe phambi kwa-Alima kanye nemehluleli lomkhulu, wachubeka ngayo leyondlela lefanako njengoba enta eveni lakaGideyoni; yebo, wachubeka nekuhlambalata.
30.31: Wasukuma wakhuluma emagama ekutigabatisa phambi kwa-Alima, wabetfuka baphristi kanye nebafundzisi, wababeka licala lekudukisa bantfu ngekubenta balandzele emasiko lalibele aboyise, ngenca nje yekufuna kutitika ngemisebenti yebantfu.
30.32: Manje Alima watsi kuye: Uyati kutsi asititiki ngemisebenti yalabantfu; ngoba buka ngisebente kusukela ekucaleni kwekubusa kwebehluleli kute kube nyalo, ngetandla tami lucobo kute ngitondle, nanoma kungenca yekuhamba kwami lokuningi ngitungeleta eveni ngimemetela livi laNkulunkulu kubantfu bami.
30.33: Futsi nanoma kungekwemisebenti leminingi lengiyenta ebandleni, angikate ngemukele ngisho nje isenine yinye ngekusebenta kwami; futsi ngisho namunye kubomnaketfu, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube sesihlalweni sekwehlulela; nakhona semukela kuphela ngekwemtsetfo ngesikhatsi setfu.
30.34: Manje, uma singemukeli lutfo ngekwemisebenti yetfu ebandleni, kusisita ngani kutsi sisebente ebandleni ngaphandle kwekutsi simemetela liciniso, kute sibe nekutfokota ngekujabula kwabomnaketfu na?
30.35: Uma kunjalo usholani kutsi sishumayele kulaba bantfu kute sitfole inzuzo, ube nawe, ngekwakho, wati kutsi asemukeli nzuzo? Manje, uyakholwa yini kutsi siyabakhohlisa labantfu, lokwenta injabulo lengaka etinhlitiyweni tabo?
30.37: Emvakwaloko Alima watsi kuye: Uyakholwa yini kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu na?
30.39: Manje Alima watsi kuye: Utawuphindze uphike kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu, futsi utawuphindze umphike Khristu? Ngoba buka, ngitsi kuwe, ngiyati ukhona Nkulunkulu, nekutsi Khristu uyeta.
30.40: Manje ngubuphi bufakazi lonabo bekutsi kute Nkulunkulu, noma kutsi Khristu akayukuta na? Ngitsi kuwe awunabo nalobubodvwa, ngaphandle kwelivi lakho kuphela.
30.41: Kodvwa, buka, nginato tonkhe tintfo njengebufakazi bekutsi letintfo tiliciniso; nawe ngalokunjalo unato tonkhe tintfo njengebufakazi kuwe kutsi tiliciniso; ngabe utawutiphika na? Uyakholwa yini kutsi letintfo tiliciniso na?
30.42: Buka, ngiyati kutsi uyakholwa, kodvwa ungenwe ngumoya wenkhohliso, futsi umkhiphile Moya waNkulunkulu kute angabi nendzawo kuwe; kodvwa develi unemandla ngetulu kwakho, futsi uyakuzulazulisa, wenta emacebo kute one bantfwana baNkulunkulu.
30.43: Manje Korihori watsi ku-Alima: Uma ungangikhombisa sibonakaliso, kute ngikholwe kutsi Nkulunkulu ukhona, yebo, ngikhombise kutsi unemadla, uma kunjalo ngitawukholwa liciniso lemavi akho.
30.44: Kodvwa Alima watsi kuye: Sewube netibonakaliso letenele; utawumlinga yini Nkulunkulu wakho na? Ngabe utawutsi, Ngikhombise sibonakaliso, ube unebufakazi babo bonkhe labomnakenu, futsi ngalokunjalo nabo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele na? Imibhalo lengcwele ibekiwe ngaphambi kwakho, yebo, tonkhe tintfo tikhomba kutsi Nkulunkulu ukhona; yebo, ngisho umhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letikuwo, yebo, kanye nekuhamba kwawo, yebo, kanjalo nawo onkhe emaplanethi latungeletako lasesimeni sawo lesijwayelekile ayafakaza kutsi kukhona uMdali loNgetulu Kwakokonkhe.
30.45: Futsi usaphindza uhamba wehla wenyuka, udukisa tinhlitiyo talaba bantfu, ufakaza kubo kutsi kute Nkulunkulu na? Namanje ngabe usetawubaphika yini bonkhe labofakazi na? Watsi: Yebo, ngitawuphika, ngaphandle kwekutsi ungikhombise sibonakaliso.
30.46: Manje kwenteka kutsi Alima watsi kuye: Buka, nginekudzabuka ngenca yebulukhuni benhlitiyo yakho, yebo, kutsi utawuvimbela namanje umoya weliciniso, kute umphefumulo wakho ubhujiswe.
30.47: Kodvwa buka, kuncono kutsi umphefumulo wakho ulahleke kunekutsi ube sikhali sekuholela imiphefumulo leminingi phansi ekubhujisweni, ngemanga akho kanye nangemavi akho lalutsako; ngako-ke uma utawuphika futsi, buka Nkulunkulu utawukushaya, kute ube simungulu, kute ungaphindze uwuvule umlomo wakho nanini, kute ungabe usabakhohlisa laba bantfu nanini.
30.48: Manje Korihori watsi kuye: Angibuphiki bukhona baNkulunkulu; kodvwa angikholwa kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu; futsi ngiyaphindza ngitsi, awati kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwekutsi ungikhombise sibonakaliso, ngeke ngikholwe.
30.49: Manje Alima watsi kuye: Loku ngitawukuniketa kuwe kube sibonakaliso, kutsi utawushaywa ube simungulu, ngekwemavi ami; futsi ngitsi, egameni laNkulunkulu, utawushaywa ube simungulu, kute ungaphindze nanini ukhulume.
30.50: Manje ngesikhatsi Alima sekawashito lamavi, Korihori washaywa waba simungulu, kangangekutsi akatange asakwati kukhuluma, njengekwemavi a-Alima.
30.51: Manje ngesikhatsi umehluleli lomkhulu akubona loku, welula sandla sakhe wabhalela Korihori, watsi: Ngabe sewuyawakholwa yini emandla aNkulunkulu na? Kukubani lapho bowufuna kutsi Alima akhombise sibonakaliso sakhe? Bewufisa kutsi ahluphe labanye yini, kute akukhombise sibonakaliso? Buka, sewukukhombisile sibonakaliso; manje ngabe usetawuphika futsi?
30.52: Korihori welula sandla sakhe wabhala, watsi: Ngiyati kutsi sengisimungulu, ngoba angikwati kukhuluma; futsi ngiyati kutsi kute lutfo ngaphandle kwekutsi kungemandla aNkulunkulu longaletsa loku etikwami; yebo, futsi bengisolo ngati kutsi ukhona Nkulunkulu.
30.53: Kodvwa buka, develi ungikhohlisile; ngoba wavela kimi asesimeni sengilosi, watsi kimi: Hamba uyobuyisa labantfu, ngoba bonkhe badukile balandzela Nkulunkulu longatiwa. Watsi kimi: Kute Nkulunkulu; yebo, wangifundzisa loko lokwakumele ngikusho. Futsi ngifundzise emavi akhe; ngiwafundzise ngoba bekatfokotisa emcondvweni wemuntfu wasemhlabeni; futsi ngiwafundzise, ngate ngaba nemphumelelo lenkhulu, kangangekutsi ngakholwa kutsi bekaliciniso; ngalesi sizatfu ngimelene neliciniso, ngate ngatiletsela lesi sicalekiso lesikhulu etikwami.
30.54: Manje ngesikhatsi sekakushito loku, wancenga Alima kutsi athandaze kuNkulunkulu kutsi sicalekiso sisuswe kuye.
30.55: Kodvwa Alima watsi kuye: Uma lesicalekiso singase sisuswe kuwe uyawuphindza uholele kudze tinhlitiyo talabantfu; ngako-ke, kuyawuba nje kuwe njengoba iNkhosi itsandza.
30.56: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sicalekiso asisuswanga kuKorihori; kodvwa wacoshwa wakhishelwa ngaphandle, wahamba azulazula umuti ngemuti acela kudla.
30.57: Manje lwati ngaloko lokwakwentekile kuKorihori lwasakatwa khona masinyane kulo lonkhe live; yebo, simemetelo satfunyelwa ngumehluleli lomkhulu kubo bonkhe bantfu labaseveni, amemetela kulabo labebakholelwa emavini aKorihori kutsi kufanele baphendvuke ngekushesha, hleze tehlulelo letifanako tehlele kubo.
30.58: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe bakholiseka ngebubi baKorihori; ngako-ke bonkhe baphindze baphendvukela eNkhosini; loku kwabucedza bubi baKorihori. NaKorihori wahamba azulazula umuti ngemuti, acela kudla kute atondle.
30.59: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi ahamba aya emkhatsini webantfu, yebo, emkhatsini walabo bantfu labebatehlukanisile nemaNefi futsi batibita ngekutsi bangemaZoramu, baholwa yindvodza libito layo lokwakunguZoramu—ngesikhatsi ahamba aya emkhatsini wabo, buka, wanyatselwa waphindze wagcotjwa, wate wafa.
30.60: Ngaleyondlela siyasibona siphetfo saloyo logucula tindlela teNkhosi, futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi develi angeke abasekele bantfwana bakhe ngelusuku lwekugcina, kodvwa ubadvonsela ngekushesha phansi esihogweni.

31.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekufa kwaKorihori, Alima asatfole tindzaba kutsi emaZoramu abesagucula tindlela teNkhosi, nekutsi Zoramu, lobekangumholi wabo, abeholela tinhlitiyo tebantfu kutsi tikhotsamele tithico letitimungulu, inhlitiyo yakhe yaba buhlungu ngenca yebubi bebantfu.
31.2: Ngoba bekuyimbangela yelusizi lolukhulu ku-Alima kwati ngebubi emkhatsini webantfu bakhe; ngako-ke inhlitiyo yakhe yababuhlungu kakhulu ngenca yekuhlukana kwemaZoramu nemaNefi.
31.3: Manje emaZoramu besekagcogcene ndzawonye eveni lebekalibita ngekutsi yi-Anthiyonumu, lelalisemphumalanga yelive laseZarahemla, lelalisedvute kwemncele welugu lwelwandle, lelaliseningizimu yelive iJeshoni, futsi lelaligudla lihlane eningizimu, lelo hlane lelaligcwele emaLamani.
31.4: Manje emaNefi abesaba kakhulu kutsi emaZoramu abetawungena esivumelwaneni nemaLamani, nekwekutsi loko kwakutawuba yimbangela yekulahlekelwa lokukhulu kwemaNefi.
31.5: Manje, ngoba kushunyayelwa kwelivi kwakunemkhuba lomkhulu kuholela bantfu ekwenteni loko lokwakulungile—yebo, kwakunemphumela lonemandla lamakhulu emicondvweni yebantfu kunenkemba, noma ngayini lenye, leyayenteke kubo—ngako-ke Alima wacabanga kutsi kwakufanele kutsi bakwetame kulunga kwelivi laNkulunkulu.
31.6: Ngako-ke watsatsa Amoni, na-Aroni, kanye na-Omneri; kwatsi Himnayi yena wamshiya ebandleni eZarahemla; kodvwa laba bekucala labatsatfu wabatsatsa bahamba naye, futsi ngalokunjalo na-Amulekhi kanye naZeziromu, labebaseMelekhi; waphindze watsatsa emadvodzana akhe lamabili.
31.7: Manje lomdzala kumadvodzana akhe akatange amtsatse ahambe naye, libito lakhe kwakunguHilamani; kodvwa emabito alabo labatsatsa wahamba nabo kwakubo Shibiloni naKhoriyanthoni; lawa ngemabito alabo labahamba naye emkhatsini wemaZoramu, kuyawushumayela kuwo livi.
31.8: Manje emaZoramu abengemahlubuka asuka kumaNefi, ngako-ke bekake aba nalo livi laNkulunkulu lashunyayelwa kubo.
31.9: Kodvwa abesawele etiphosisweni letinkhulu, ngoba abengasafuni kwetama kugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kanye nemitsetfo yakhe, ngekwemtsetfo waMosi.
31.10: Angafuni nekugcina tento telibandla, bachubeke ekuthandazeni kanye nasekuncuseni Nkulunkulu nsuku tonkhe, kutsi bangangeni ekulingweni
31.11: Yebo, kwephetsa, atigucula tindlela teNkhosi etikhatsini letiningi kakhulu; ngako-ke, ngalesi sizatfu, Alima kanye nabomnakabo bahamba baya eveni kuyawushumayela livi kubo.
31.12: Manje, ngesikhatsi sebafikile eveni, buka, ngekumangala lokukhulu batfola kutsi emaZoramu abesakhe emasinagoge, nekutsi abebutsana ndzawonye kanye ngelusuku evikini, lokwakulusuku abelubita ngekutsi lusuku lweNkhosi; futsi abekhonta ngendlela Alima nabomnakabo labebangatange nanini bayibone;
31.13: Ngoba abenendzawo lebeyakhiwe ekhatsi nekhatsi nesinagoge labo, indzawo yekuma, leyayiphakeme ngetulu kwenhloko; futsi sicongo sayo sasingema umuntfu munye kuphela.
31.14: Ngako-ke, noma ngubani lobekanesifiso sekudvumisa kwakufanele ahambe aye ngaphambili bese uma etulu esicongweni lapho, bese welula tandla takhe atibhekise ngasezulwini, bese ukhala ngelivi lelikhulu, utsi:
31.15: Nkulunkulu longcwele, longcwele; siyakholwa kutsi wena unguNkulunkulu, futsi siyakholwa kutsi wena ungcwele, nekutsi wena wawungumoya, futsi nekutsi ungumoya, nekutsi utawuhlala ungumoya ingunaphakadze.
31.16: Nkulunkulu loNgcwele, siyakholwa kutsi wena usehlukanisile kubomnaketfu; futsi tsine asikholelwa esikweni labomnaketfu, lelendluliselwa kubo ngenca yebuntfwana baboyise; kodvwa siyakholwa kutsi usikhetsile tsine kutsi sibe bantfwana bakho labangcwele; ngetulu kwaloko usembulele kutsi angeke abekhona Khristu.
31.17: Kodvwa usafana nayitolo, namuhla, naphakadze; futsi usikhetsile kutsi siyawusindziswa, kutsi bonkhe labasitungeletile bakhetselwe kutsi baphonswe ngentfukutselo yakho entasi esihogweni; ngalokuphatselene nalobu bungcwele, Awu Nkulunkulu, siyakubonga; futsi siyaphindza siyakubonga kutsi usikhetsile, kute singaholelwa khashane ngekulandzela buwula bemasiko abomnaketfu, lababophela phansi ekukholweni kuKhristu, lokuholela tinhlitiyo tabo kutsi tizulazule khashane nawe, Nkulunkulu wetfu.
31.18: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko siyakubonga, Awu Nkulunkulu, kutsi sikhetsiwe futsi sibantfu labangcwele. Amen.
31.19: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Alima nabomnakabo kanye nemadvodzana akhe sebayivile lemithandazo, bamangala kakhulu.
31.20: Ngoba buka, wonkhe muntfu waya ngaphambili washo yona leyo mithandazo lefanako.
31.21: Manje lendzawo bebayibita ngekutsi yiRamiyamtom, letsi, uma ihunyushwa, yindzawo yekuma lengcwele.
31.22: Manje, kulendzawo yekuma bebenta, wonkhe muntfu, umthandazo lofanako kuNkulunkulu, bambonga Nkulunkulu wabo kutsi bona bakhetfwa nguye, nekutsi akabaholelanga khashane balandzela lisiko labomnakabo, nekutsi tinhlitiyo tabo atetjiwanga kutsi tikholelwe etintfweni letitawufika, labebangati lutfo ngato.
31.23: Manje, emvakwekutsi bonkhe bantfu sebakwentile kubonga ngalendlela, bebabuyela emakhaya abo, bangaphindzi nanini bakhulume ngaNkulunkulu wabo bate baphindze babutsane ndzawonye kuleyo ndzawo yekuma lengcwele, kutawukwenta kubonga ngendlela yabo.
31.24: Manje ngesikhatsi Alima akubona loku inhlitiyo yakhe yadzabuka; ngoba wabona kutsi bebabantfu labakhohlakele futsi labaphambene; yebo, wabona kutsi tinhlitiyo tabo bebatibeke etikweligolide, etikwesiliva, kanye nasetikwatotonkhe tinhlobo tetimphahla leticolisakele.
31.25: Yebo, futsi waphindze wabona kutsi tinhlitiyo tabo tase tiphakeme ekutikhukhumeteni lokukhulu, ekutichenyeni kwabo.
31.26: Waphakamisela livi lakhe ezulwini, wakhala, watsi: Awu, kuyawute kube nini, Awu Nkhosi, uvumela tinceku takho kutsi tihlale lapha ngaphansi enyameni, kutsi tibone lobubi lobungaka emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu na?
31.27: Buka, Awu Nkulunkulu, bakhala kuwe, kodvwa tibe tinhlitiyo tabo tenganywe kutikhukhumeta kwabo. Buka, Awu Nkulunkulu, bakhala kuwe ngemilomo yabo, babe bakhukhumele, bativa babakhulu, ngetintfo letilite temhlaba.
31.28: Buka, Awu Nkulunkulu wami, tingubo tabo letibitako, kanye netindandatho tabo letincane, kanye nemabhengela abo, kanye netintfo tabo tekuhlobisa teligolide, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo tabo letiligugu labahlotjiswe ngato; buka, tinhlitiyo tabo batibeke kuto, kodvwa babe bakhala kuwe batsi—Siyakubonga, Awu Nkulunkulu, ngoba sibantfu labakhetsiwe kuwe, babe labanye batawushabalala.
31.29: Yebo, batsi ubambulele kutsi engeke abekhona Khristu.
31.30: Awu Nkhosi Nkulunkulu, kutawute kube nini uvumela kutsi bubi lobunjena kanye nekungakholwa kube semkhatsini walabantfu na? Awu Nkhosi, unganginika yini emandla, kute ngikwati kutsi ngibubeketelele butsakatsaka bami. Ngoba ngibutsakatsaka, futsi bubi lobunje emkhatsini walabantfu bungivisa buhlungu emphefumulweni wami.
31.31: Awu Nkhosi, inhlitiyo yami iyadzabuka kakhulu; ungawudvudvuta umphefumulo wami kuKhristu. Awu Nkhosi unganginika kutsi ngibe nemandla, kute ngititfwale ngekubeketela leti tinhlupheko letitawuta kimi, ngenca yebubi balabantfu.
31.32: Awu Nkhosi, ungawudvudvuta umphefumulo wami, futsi ungiphe imphumelelo, futsi ngalokunjalo nalaba lengisebenta nabo labanami—yebo, Amoni, na-Aroni, na-Omneri, kanjalo na-Amulekhi naZeziromu, kanjalo nemadvodzana ami lamabili—yebo, nabo bonkhe laba ungabadvudvuta, Awu Nkhosi. Yebo, ungayidvudvuta imiphefumulo yabo kuKhristu.
31.33: Ungabavumela kutsi babe nemandla, kute batetfwale tinhlupheko tabo letiyawufika kubo ngenca yebubi balabantfu.
31.34: Awu Nkhosi, ungavuma kutsi sibe nemphumelelo ekubaletseni futsi kuwe kuKhristu.
31.35: Buka, Awu Nkhosi, imiphefumulo yabo iligugu, futsi labaningi babo babomnaketfu; ngako-ke, sinike, Awu Nkhosi, emandla kanye nenhlakanipho kute siletse laba, bomnaketfu, kuwe futsi.
31.36: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Alima asawashito lamavi, wabeka tandla takhe etikwabobonkhe labo labebanaye. Buka, ngesikhatsi abeka tandla takhe etikwabo, bagcwaliswa ngaMoya loNgcwele.
31.37: Emvakwaloko batehlukanisa lomunye kulomunye, bangakhatsateki kutsi batodlani, noma batonatsani, noma batogcokani
31.38: Futsi iNkhosi yabaniketa kutsi bangalambi, nekutsi bangomi; yaphindze yabanika emandla, kute bangabi nanoma nguluphi luhlobo lwetinhlupheko, ngaphandle kwekutsi tenganywe enjabulweni yaKhristu. Manje loku kwaba ngekwemthandazo wa-Alima; futsi loku kungenca yekutsi wathandaza ngelukholo.

32.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba, bacala kushumayela livi laNkulunkulu kubantfu, bangena emasinagogeni abo, kanye nasetindlini tabo; yebo, balishumayela livi ngisho nasemigwacweni yabo.
32.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekusebenta kamatima emkhatsini wabo, bacala baba nemphumelelo emkhatsini wesigaba sebantfu labamphofu; ngoba buka, bebakhishelwa ngaphandle kwemasinagoge ngenca yekuguga kwetingubo tabo—
32.3: Ngako-ke bebangakavumeleki kutsi bangene emasinagogeni abo kute bakhonte Nkulunkulu, batsatfwa ngekutsi bangcolile; ngako-ke bebamphofu; yebo, bebatsatfwa bomnakabo ngekutsi batintfo letingasilutfo; ngako-ke bebamphofu ngekwetintfo telive; ngetulu kwaloko bebamphofu etinhlitiyweni.
32.4: Manje, ngesikhatsi Alima afundzisa futsi akhuluma kubantfu etikweligcuma I-Onayida, kwefika sicuku lesikhulu kuye lokwakungibo labo lebesikhuluma ngabo, labebamphofu etinhlitiyweni, ngenca yebumphofu babo ngekwetintfo telive.
32.5: Beta ku-Alima; futsi loyo lobekaphambili kubo watsi kuye: Buka, yini labangayenta labomnaketfu, ngoba badzelelwa bantfu bonkhe ngenca yebumphofu babo, yebo, futsi ikakhulukati baphristi betfu; ngoba basikhiphele ngaphandle kumasinagoge etfu lesasebenta matima kuwakha ngetandla tetfu lucobo; basikhiphele ngephandle ngenca yebumphofu betfu lobukhulu; futsi asinandzawo yekukhontela Nkulunkulu wetfu; buka, kufanele sentenjani na?
32.6: Manje ngesikhatsi Alima akuva loku, wamgucula, buso bakhe ngekushesha babuka kuye ngco, futsi wambuka ngenjabulo lenkhulu; ngoba wabona kutsi tinhlupheko tabo tasetibente kutsi batitfobe ngempela, nekutsi bese balungele kuliva livi.
32.7: Ngako-ke akatange asasho lutfo kulesinye sicuku, kodvwa welulela phambili sandla sakhe, wakhala kulabo labekababona, labebadzabuke ngekweliciniso ngekona, watsi kubo:
32.8: Ngiyabona kutsi nitfobile ngenhlitiyo; futsi uma kunjalo, nibusisiwe.
32.9: Bukani umnakenu utsite, Kufanele sentenjani na?—ngoba sikhishelwe ngaphandle kwemasinagoge etfu, kute singakwati kukhonta Nkulunkulu wetfu.
32.10: Bukani ngitsi kini, nicabanga kutsi aninakumkhonta Nkulunkulu ngaphandle kwekutsi kube semasinagogeni enu kuphela na?
32.11: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, ngitawunibuta kutsi, nicabanga kutsi akukafaneli nikhonte Nkulunkulu kuphela kanye ngelisontfo na?
32.12: Ngitsi kini, kuhle kutsi nikhishelwe ngaphandle kwemasinagoge enu, kute nititfobe, futsi kute nifundze kuhlakanipha; ngoba kudzingekile kutsi nifundze kuhlakanipha; ngoba kungenca yekutsi nikhishelwe ngaphandle, nekutsi nidzelelwe bomnakenu ngenca yebumphofu benu lobukhulu, kutsi niholelwe ekutseni nitfobeke ngetinhlitiyo; ngoba ngenca yesimo niholelwe ekutseni nititfobe.
32.13: Manje, ngenca yekutsi niphocelelekile kutsi nititfobe nibusisiwe; ngoba umuntfu ngalesinye sikhatsi, uma aphocelelekile kutsi atitfobe, uyaye afune kuphendvuka; manje ngalokucinisekile, loyo lophendvukako uyawutfola umusa; futsi loyo lotfola umusa abeketele kute kube sekugcineni nguye loyo loyawusindziswa.
32.14: Manje, njengoba ngishito kini, kutsi ngenca yekutsi niphocelelekile kutsi nititfobe nibusisiwe, ngabe anicabangi yini kutsi babusisiwe kakhulu labo labatitfoba ngeliciniso ngenca yelivi na?
32.15: Yebo, loyo lotitfoba ngeliciniso, aphendvuke etonweni takhe, abeketele kute kube sekugcineni, nguye loyo loyawubusiswa—yebo, ubusiswe kakhulu kunalabo labaphocelelekile kutsi batitfobe ngenca yebumphofu babo lobukhulu.
32.16: Ngako-ke, babusisiwe labo labatitfobako ngaphandle kwekuphocelelwa kutsi batfobe; noma-ke, ngalokungiko, ngalamanye emagama, ubusisiwe loyo lokholelwa evini laNkulunkulu, abhajatiswe ngaphandle kwekuba nenhlitiyo lelukhuni, yebo, ngaphandle kwekuholeleka ekutseni alati livi, noma baphoceleleke kutsi bati, ngaphambi kwekutsi bakholwe.
32.17: Yebo, baningi labatsi: Uma ungasikhombisa sibonakaliso lesivela ezulwini, ngaloko siyawukwati ngeliciniso; ngaloko siyawukholwa.
32.18: Manje ngiyabuta, ngabe loku lukholo na? Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha; ngoba uma umuntfu ayati intfo akanasidzingo sekukholwa, ngoba uyayati.
32.19: Manje, ucalekiswe kanganani loyo loyatiko intsandvo yaNkulunkulu kodvwa angayenti, kunaloyo lokholwako kuphela, noma kuphela abe nesizatfu sekukholwa, bese uwela esiphambukweni?
32.20: Manje kufanele nehlulele mayelana nalentfo. Bukani, ngitsi kini, kunjalo kulesinye simo njengoba kunjalo nakulesinye; futsi kuyawuba njalo kuwo wonkhe umuntfu ngekwemsebenti wakhe.
32.21: Manje njengoba ngishito mayelana nelukholo—lukholo akusiko kutsi ube nelwati loluphelele lwetintfo; ngako-ke uma unelukholo unelitsemba letintfo letingabonakali, letiliciniso.
32.22: Manje, bukani, ngitsi kini, ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule, kutsi Nkulunkulu unemusa kubo bonkhe labo labakholwa egameni lakhe; ngako-ke unesifiso, kwekucala nje, sekutsi nikholwe, yebo, ngisho nakulo livi lakhe.
32.23: Manje, wembula livi lakhe ngetingilosi kubantfu, yebo, hhayi kuphela kubesilisa kodvwa nakubesifazane ngalokunjalo. Manje loku akusiko konkhe; bantfwana labancane banawo emavi lanikwe bona tikhatsi letiningi, atfobisa labahlakaniphile kanye nalabafundzile.
32.24: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, njengoba ninesifiso sekwati kimi kutsi kufanele nentenjani ngoba niyahlushwa futsi nikhishelwa ngaphandle—manje angifuni kutsi nicabange kutsi ngicondze kunehlulela kuphela ngaloko lokuliciniso—
32.25: Ngoba angikacondzi kutsi nonkhe niphocelelekile kutsi nititfobe; ngoba ngempela ngiyakholwa kutsi kukhona labanye emkhatsini wenu labangatitfoba, noma ngabe bangaba kusiphi simo.
32.26: Manje, njengoba ngishito mayelana nelukholo—kutsi bekungasilo lwati loluphelele—kanjalo nangemavi ami. Angeke nikwati ngekweliciniso kwawo kwekucala, ngalokuphelele, njengoba nelukholo kungasilo lwati loluphelele.
32.27: Kodvwa bukani, uma ningavuka futsi nivusetele lwati lwenu, nekuwalinga emavi ami, futsi nisebentise inshwanyana lencane yelukholo, yebo, ngisho noma ungeke wente ngetulu kwekutsi ube nesifiso nje kuphela sekukhohlwa, yenta lesifiso sisebente kuwe, ute ukholwe ngendlela longaniketa ngayo indzawo yencenye nje yemavi ami.
32.28: Manje, sitawucatsanisa livi nenhlanyelo. Manje, uma niniketa indzawo, kutsi inhlanyelo ihlanyelwe etinhlitiyweni tenu, buka, uma kuyinhlanyelo yeliciniso, noma kuyinhlanyelo lenhle, uma ningayilahli ngaphandle ngekungakholwa kwenu, kute nale Moya weNkhosi, buka, iyocala ikhukhumuke ngekhatsi kwetifuba tenu; futsi uma seniyiva lemizwa yekukhukhumuka, niyawucala nitsi ngekhatsi kwenu—Kufanele kutsi lena yinhlanyelo lenhle, noma kutsi lelivi lihle, ngoba selicala kuwukhulisa umphefumulo wami; yebo, selicala kukhanyisa kucondza kwami, yebo, selicala kutsi libe mnandzi kimi.
32.29: Manje buka, ngabe loku angeke yini kulikhulise lukholo lwenu na? Ngitsi kini, Yebo; noma kunjalo alukakhuli kutsi lube lwati loluphelele.
32.30: Kodvwa bukani, ngesikhatsi inhlanyelo seyikhukhumuka, seyichuma, futsi seyicala kukhula, uma kunjalo kufanele nitsi lenhlanyelo yinhle; ngoba buka seyiyakhukhumuka, seyiyachuma, futsi seyicala kukhula. Manje, bukani, ngabe loku akutulicinisa yini lukholo lwenu na? Yebo, kutawulicinisa lukholo lwenu: ngoba nitawutsi ngiyati kutsi lena yinhlanyelo lenhle; ngoba buka iyachuma futsi seyicala kukhula.
32.31: Manje, bukani, ngabe ninaso yini siciniseko sekutsi lena yinhlanyelo lenhle na? Ngitsi kini, Yebo; ngoba yonkhe inhlanyelo ikhipha loko lokufana nayo.
32.32: Ngako-ke, uma inhlanyelo ikhula yinhle, kodvwa uma ingakhuli, buka ayiyinhle, ngako-ke ilahlwa ngaphandle.
32.33: Manje, bukani, ngoba senitamile kulinga, futsi nayihlanyela inhlanyelo, seyiyakhukhumuka seyiyachuma, futsi seyicala kukhula, kufanele nati kutsi lenhlanyelo yinhle.
32.34: Manje, bukani, ngabe lwati lwenu seluphelele na? Yebo, lwati lwenu seluphelele kuleyontfo, futsi lukholo lwenu luselele; loku ngenca yekutsi niyati, ngoba niyati kutsi livi liyikhukhumukisile imiphefumulo yenu, futsi ngetulu kwaloko niyati kutsi lichumile, nekutsi kucondza kwenu kucala kukhanya, futsi nengcondco yenu seyicala kuvuleka.
32.35: Awu uma, kunjalo-ke, ngabe loku akusilo yini liciniso na? Ngitsi kini, Yebo, ngoba kukukhanya; futsi noma ngabe yini lekukhanya, yinhle, ngenca yekutsi iyabonakala, ngako-ke kufanele nati kutsi yinhle; manje bukani, emvakwekutsi senikuvile loku kukhanya ngabe lwati lwenu seluphelele na?
32.36: Bukani ngitsi kini; futsi akukafaneli nilubeke eceleni lukholo lwenu, ngoba nisebentise lukholo lwenu kuphela kuhlanyela lenhlanyelo kute netame kulinga kute nati kutsi lenhlanyelo yinhle yini.
32.37: Futsi bukani, ngesikhatsi sihlahla sesicala sikhula, nitawutsi: asisondle ngekusinakekela lokukhulu, kute sitfole imphandze, kute sikhule siye etulu, futsi sisitselele titselo. Manje bukani, uma nisondla ngekusinakekela lokukhulu sitawutfola imphandze, sikhule siye etulu, sitsele sitselo.
32.38: Kodvwa uma ningasinaki sihlahla, futsi ningacabangi nangekondliwa kwaso, Bukani angeke siyitfole imphandze; uma kushisa kwelilanga sekufika kusishisa, ngenca yekutsi asinamphandze siyabuna, futsi niyasisiphula nisilahle ngaphandle.
32.39: Manje, loku akusiko kutsi kungenca yekutsi inhlanyelo beyingasiyo lenhle, noma ngoba sitselo saso singatukutsandzeka; kodvwa kungenca yekutsi umhlabatsi wenu ulugadvule, futsi anisondli lesi sihlahla, ngako-ke aninakutfola sitselo saso.
32.40: Ngako-ke, uma ningalondli livi, nibuke phambili ngeliso lekukholwa esitselweni salo, aniyukwati nanini kukha sitselo sesihlahla sekuphila.
32.41: Kodvwa uma nitawulondla livi, yebo, nisondle sihlahla ngesikhatsi sesicala kukhula, ngelukholo lwenu ngekukhutsala lokukhulu, kanye nangekubeketela, nibuke phambili esitselweni salo, liyawuba nemphandze; futsi buka liyawuba sihlahla lesiyawukhula siye etulu sibe kuphila lokuphakadze.
32.42: Futsi ngenca yekukhutsala kwenu kanye nelukholo lwenu nekubeketela kwenu kutsi nilondle livi, kute litfole imphandze kini, buka, emvakwesikhashana nje niyawusikha sitselo salo, lesiligugu lelikhulu, lesinongotela ngetulu kwako konkhe kunongotela, nalesimhlophe ngetulu kwako konkhe lokumhlophe, yebo, nalesimsulwa ngetulu kwako konkhe lokumsulwa; futsi niyawutitika ngalesi sitselo nite nineliseke, kute ningabe nisalamba, noma nome.
32.43: Ngaleso sikhatsi, bomnaketfu, niyawuvuna umphumela welukholo lwenu, nekukhutsala kwenu, nekubeketela, kanye nekumela bulukhuni, nilindze sihlahla kutsi sinivetele sitselo.

33.1: Manje emvakwekutsi Alima sekawakhulumile lamavi, batfumela kuye banesifiso sekwati kutsi ngabe kumele bakholwe Nkulunkulu munye yini, kute batfole lesi sitselo labekakhulume ngaso, noma kutsi bangayihlanyela kanjani inhlanyelo, noma livi lelo labekakhulume ngalo, labekatse kumele lihlanyelwe etinhlitiyweni tabo; noma bangacala kanjani kusebentisa lukholo lwabo.
33.2: Alima watsi kubo: Bukani, nitsite anikwati kukhonta Nkulunkulu wenu ngoba niyacoshwa emasinagogeni enu. Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi kini, uma nicabanga kutsi aninakuvunyelwa kukhonta Nkulunkulu, nenta siphosiso lesikhulu, futsi kufanele niphenye imibhalo lengcwele; uma nicabanga kutsi ngiyo lenifundzise loku, aniyicondzi
33.3: Niyakhumbula nifundza loko Zenoshi, umphrofethi wasendvulo, lakusho mayelana nekuthandaza noma kukhonta na?
33.4: Ngoba watsi: Unesihawu, Awu Nkulunkulu, ngoba uwuvile umthandazo wami, noma bengisehlane; yebo, waba nesihawu ngesikhatsi ngithandaza mayelana nalabo labebatitsa tami, futsi wabaguculela kimi.
33.5: Yebo, Awu Nkulunkulu, waba nesihawu kimi ngesikhatsi ngikhala kuwe ngisensimini yami; ngesikhatsi ngikhala kuwe emthandazweni wami, wangiva.
33.6: Ngetulu kwaloko, Awu Nkulunkulu, ngesikhatsi ngiya endlini yami wangiva emthandazweni wami.
33.7: Ngesikhatsi ngiya egumbini lami, Awu Nkhosi, ngithandaza kuwe, wangiva.
33.8: Yebo, unesihawu kubantfwana bakho uma bakhala kuwe, kutsi baviwe nguwe hhayi bantfu, futsi utawubeva.
33.9: Yebo, Awu Nkulunkulu, ube nesihawu kimi, wakuva kukhala kwami emkhatsini wemabandla akho.
33.10: Yebo, ngetulu kwaloko ungivile ngesikhatsi ngikhala ngikhishelwe ngephandle phindze ngihlekwa titsa tami; yebo, wakuva kukhala kwami, watitfukutselisa titsa tami, wativakashela ngentfukutselo yakho ngembubhiso losheshako.
33.11: Wangiva ngenca yetinhlupheko tami kanye nekwetsembeka kwami; futsi kungenca yeNdvodzana yakho kutsi ube nesihawu ngalendlela kimi, ngako-ke ngitawukhala kuwe kuto tonkhe tinhlupheko tami, ngoba kujabula kwami kukuwe; ngoba wena utisusile tehlulelo takho kimi, ngenca yeNdvodzana yakho.
33.12: Manje Alima watsi kubo: Niyayikholwa yini leyo mibhalo lengcwele leyabhalwa ngulabo basendvulo na?
33.13: Bukani, uma niyikholwa, kumele nikukholwe lokwashiwo nguZenoshe; ngoba, bukani watsi: Utisusile tehlulelo takho ngenca yeNdvodzana yakho.
33.14: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu, ngitawunibuta kutsi niyifundzile yini imibhalo lengcwele na? Uma niyifundzile, kungani ningakholelwa kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu na?
33.15: Ngoba akukabhalwa kutsi nguZenoshe kuphela lowakhuluma ngaletintfo, kodvwa naZenokhi ngalokunjalo naye wakhuluma ngaleti tintfo—
33.16: Ngoba bukani, watsi: Ubatfukutselele, Awu Nkhosi, labantfu, ngenca yekutsi abafuni kuwucondza umusa wakho lobanike wona ngenca yeNdvodzana yakho.
33.17: Manje, bomnaketfu, niyabona kutsi umphrofethi wesibili wasendvulo ufakazile ngeNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, futsi ngenca yekutsi bantfu bebangafuni kuwacondza lamavi akhe bamgcoba ngematje wate wafa.
33.18: Kodvwa bukani, loku akusiko konkhe; laba akusibo kuphela labakhulumile mayelana neNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
33.19: Bukani, wakhuluma ngayo naMosi; yebo, futsi bukani luphawu lwaphakanyiswa ehlane, kutsi loyo loyawulubuka angaphila. Labaningi babuka baphila.
33.20: Kodvwa bambalwa labayicondza inchazelo yaleti tintfo, futsi loku kwakungenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo. Kodvwa bebabaningi labebalukhuni kakhulu kangangekutsi abafunanga kubuka, ngako-ke bafa. Manje sizatfu sekutsi bangabuki kungoba bebangakholwa kutsi lwalungabaphilisa.
33.21: Awu bomnaketfu, uma beningaphiliswa kubuka nje ngemehlo enu kute niphile, beningeke yini nibuke ngekushesha na, noma beningamane nitente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu ngekungakholwa na, futsi nivilaphe, kutsi ningabuka ngemehlo enu, kute nife na?
33.22: Uma kunjalo, sicalekiso siyawufika etikwenu; kodvwa uma kungenjalo, phonsani emehlo enu ngala nangala nicale kukholwa kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, kutsi itawufika itawuhlenga bantfu bayo, nekutsi iyawuhlupheka iphindze ife kute ihlawulele tono tabo; nekutsi iyawuphindze ivuke kulabafile, lokuyawufeza kuvuka, kute bonkhe bantfu beme phambi kwayo, kute behlulelwe ngelusuku lwekugcina kanye nelekwehlulela, ngekwemisebenti yabo.
33.23: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngifisa kutsi nilihlanyele lelivi etinhlitiyweni tenu, ngesikhatsi selicala kukhukhumuka londleni ngelukholo lwenu. Bukani, litawuba sihlahla, lesiyawukhula kini sibe kuphila lokuphakadze. Shengatsi ngaleso sikhatsi Nkulunkulu anganinika kutsi imitfwalo yenu ibe melula, ngenjabulo yeNdvodzana yakhe. Futsi konkhe loko ningakwenta uma nje nitsandza. Amen.

34.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Alima sekawakhulumile lamavi kubo wahlala phansi emhlabatsini, Amulekhi wasukuma wacala kubafundzisa, watsi:
34.2: Bomnaketfu, ngicabanga kutsi ngeke kwenteke kutsi ningabi nelwati lwaleti tintfo lokukhulunywe ngato mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu, lesifundzisa ngaye kutsi uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu; yebo, ngiyati kutsi leti tintfo tafundziswa kini kaningi ngaphambi kwekuhlubuka kwenu emkhatsini wetfu.
34.3: Futsi njengoba nibe nesifiso sekutsi umnaketfu lotsandzekako anikhombise kutsi kumele nenteni, ngenca yetinhlupheko tenu; ukhulumile ngandlela tsite kini kulungiselela tingcondvo tenu; yebo, unincusele elukholweni kanye nasekubeketeleni—
34.4: Yebo, nekutsi nibe nelukholo lolukhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi nite nihlanyele livi etinhlitiyweni tenu, kute netame kulinga buhle balo.
34.5: Futsi sibonile kutsi umbuto lomkhulu losetingcodvweni tenu ngewekutsi ngabe livi likuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, noma ngabe akuyuba khona Khristu na.
34.6: Futsi niphindze nabona kutsi umnaketfu unibonisile, kaningi, kutsi livi lensindziso likuKhristu.
34.7: Umnaketfu ucaphune emavini aZenoshe, kutsi kuhlengwa kuta ngeNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, ngalokunjalo nasemavini aZenokhi; uphindze wacaphuna kuMosi, kubonisa kutsi letintfo tiliciniso.
34.8: Manje, bukani, ngitawufakaza kini ngekwami kutsi letintfo tiliciniso. Bukani, ngitsi kini, ngiyati kutsi Khristu uyawufika emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, kutotfwala tiphambuko tebantfu bakhe, nekutsi uyawuhlawulela tono temhlaba; ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ikukhulumile loku.
34.9: Ngoba kufanele kutsi inhlawulo yentiwe; ngoba ngekwelisu lelikhulu laNkulunkulu waPhakadze kufanele kube khona inhlawulo leyentiwako, kungenjalo lonkhe luntfu kufanele ngalokungenakuvimbeleka lushabalale; yebo, bonkhe balukhuni; yebo bonkhe bawile baphindze balahlekile, futsi kufanele bashabalale ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngekwenhlawulo lokufanele kutsi yentiwe.
34.10: Ngoba kufanele kutsi kube khona umhlatjelo lomkhulu newekugcina; yebo, hhayi umhlatjelo wemuntfu, noma wesilwane, noma wanoma nguluphi luhlobo lwenyoni; ngoba akuyuba ngumhlatjelo wemuntfu; kodvwa kufanele kube ngumhlatjelo longenakuphela futsi waphakadze.
34.11: Manje kute namunye umuntfu longanikela ngengati yakhe lucobo lengahlawulela tono talomunye. Manje, uma umuntfu abulala, buka ngabe umtsetfo wetfu, lolungile, ungayitsatsa yini imphilo yemnakabo na? Ngitsi kini, Cha.
34.12: Kodvwa umtsetfo ufuna imphilo yakhe loyo lobulele; ngako-ke angeke kubekhona intfo lengaba ngephansi kwenhlawulo lengapheli leyowenela tono temhlaba.
34.13: Ngako-ke, kufanele kutsi kube khona umhlatjelo lomkhulu newekugcina, futsi uma kunjalo kuyawuba khona, noma kufanele kutsi kube khona, kuphela kwekucitsa ingati; uma kunjalo umtsetfo waMosi uyawube sewuyagcwaliseka; yebo; wonkhe uyawugcwaliseka, onkhe emaganyana nemacashatana, futsi kute nakunye lokuyawube kungakagcwaliseki.
34.14: Buka, loku kuyinchazelo yawo wonkhe umtsetfo, konkhe nalokuncane kanganani kukhomba kulowo mhlatjelo lomkhulu kanye newekugcina; lowo mhlatjelo lomkhulu kanye newekugcina utawuba yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, yebo, longapheli futsi newaphakadze.
34.15: Ngaleyondlela iyawuletsa insindziso kubo bonkhe labayawukholwa egameni layo; loko kuyinjongo yalomhlatjelo wekugcina, kuletsa bubele, lobehlula kulunga, futsi lobuveta indlela kubantfu kute babe nelukholo ngalokwanele kute baphendvuke.
34.16: Ngaleyondlela umusa ungatenelisa tidzingo tekulunga, futsi ubatungelete ngemikhono yekuphepha, kutsi loyo longalusebentisi lukholo kute aphendvuke uba ngaphansi kwawo wonkhe umtsetfo wetidzingo tekulunga; ngako-ke lisu lelikhulu nelaphakadze lekuhlengwa liletfwa kuloyo kuphela lonelukholo kute aphendvuke.
34.17: Ngako-ke shengatsi Nkulunkulu angavuma, bomnaketfu, kutsi nicale kusebentisa lukholo lwenu nite niphendvuke, kutsi nicale kubita ligama lakhe lelingcwele, kute abe nemusa kini;
34.18: Yebo, khalelani umusa kuye, ngoba unemandla ekusindzisa.
34.19: Yebo, titfobeni, futsi nichubeke nekuthandaza kuye.
34.20: Khalani kuye uma nisemasimini enu, yebo, ngetulu kwayo yonkhe imihlambi yenu.
34.21: Khalani kuye etindlini tenu, yebo, ngetulu kwemindeni yenu yonkhe, ekuseni, emini, kanye nantsambama.
34.22: Yebo, khalani kuye ngalokumelene nemandla etitsa tenu.
34.23: Yebo, khalani kuye ngalokumelene nadeveli, lositsa sako konkhe kulunga.
34.24: Khalani kuye ngetulu kwetitjalo temasimu enu, kute niphumelele kuwo.
34.25: Khalani ngetulu kwemihlambi yemasimu enu, kute yandze.
34.26: Kodvwa akusiko loku kuphela; thandazani ngenshisekelo lenkhulu emagumbini enu, nasetindzaweni tenu letifihlekile, kanye nasehlane lenu.
34.27: Yebo, futsi uma ningakhali eNkhosini, tinhlitiyo tenu atigcwale, nichubeke nekuthandazela inhlalakahle yenu kuye, ngalokunjalo nenhlalakahle yalabo labanitungeletile.
34.28: Manje bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngitsi kini, ningacabangi kutsi nguloku kuphela; ngoba emvakwekutsi senitentile tonkhe leti tintfo, uma nicosha labeswele, kanye nalabangcunu, ningabavakasheli labagulako kanye nalabahluphekile, futsi ninikele ngetimphahla tenu, uma ninato, kulabo labadzingako—ngitsi kini, uma ningenti noma ngukuphi kwaleti tintfo, bukani, umthandazo wenu ulite, futsi awunisiti ngalutfo, futsi ninjengebatentisi labaluphikako lukholo.
34.29: Ngako-ke, uma ningakhumbuli kutsi nibe nelutsandvo, nifana nelinyela, lelilahlwa bacwengi (ngoba alisenamsebenti) futsi linyatselwa ngaphansi kwetinyawo tebantfu.
34.30: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngifuna kutsi, emvakwekutsi senitfole bofakazi labaningi kangaka, nibonile kutsi imibhalo lengcwele iyafakaza ngaleti tintfo, wotani ngaphambili niletse titselo kute niphendvuke.
34.31: Yebo, ngifisa shengatsi beningeta ngaphambili ningabe nisatenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu; ngoba bukani, manje sengiso sikhatsi kanye nelusuku lwekusindziswa kwenu, ngako-ke, uma nitawuphendvuka futsi ningatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu, khona madvute nje lisu lelikhulu lekuhlengwa litawutiswa kini.
34.32: Ngoba bukani, lemphilo lena isikhatsi sekutsi bantfu batilungiselele kutsi bahlangane naNkulunkulu; yebo, bukani lusuku lwalemphilo lulusuku lwebantfu kutsi bente imisebenti yabo.
34.33: Manje, njengoba ngishito kini ngaphambilini, njengoba nibe nabofakazi labaningi kangaka, ngako-ke, ngiyanincenga kutsi ningaluhlehlisi lusuku lwekuphendvuka kwenu kute kube sekugcineni; ngoba emvakwalolu lusuku lwalemphilo, lesinikwe lona kutsi silungiselele liphakadze, bukani, uma singasenti ncono sikhatsi setfu sikulemphilo, emvakwaloko kufika busuku bebumnyama lapho kungeke kusaba khona umsebenti lowentiwako.
34.34: Angeke nitsi, uma seniletfwa kuleso simo lesibi, kutsi ngitawuphendvuka, ngitawubuyela kuNkulunkulu wami. Cha, angeke nikusho loku; ngoba lowo moya lophetse imitimba yenu ngesikhatsi seniphuma kulemphilo, lowo moya utawuba nemandla ekuphatsa umtimba wakho kulowo mhlaba waphakadze.
34.35: Ngoba bukani, uma niluhlehlisile lusuku lwenu lwekuphendvuka kute kube sekufeni, bukani, seningaphansi kwemoya wadeveli, uyanibopha nibe ngebakhe; ngako-ke, Moya weNkhosi uyobe sewusukile kini, awusenandzawo kini, develi sewunemandla onkhe ngetulu kwenu; futsi lesi simo sekugcina salababi.
34.36: Futsi loku ngiyakwati, ngoba iNkhosi ishito kutsi ayihlali emathempelini langasingcwele, kodvwa ihlala etinhlitiyweni talabalungile; yebo, iphindze yasho kutsi labalungile bayawuhlala phansi embusweni wayo, bangabe basaphuma; kodvwa tingubo tabo tihlantwe tibe mhlophe ngengati yeMvana.
34.37: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngifisa kutsi nitikhumbule letintfo, futsi kumele nisebentele insindziso yenu ngekwesaba phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ningabe nisakuphika kuta kwaKhristu.
34.38: Nekutsi ningabe nisaphikisana naMoya loNgcwele nanini, kodvwa niwemukele, futsi nitsatse libito laKhristu nibitwe ngaye; nititfobe naselutfulini, nimkhonte Nkulunkulu, noma ngabe ngukuphi lapho ningaba khona, ngemoya kanye nangeliciniso; futsi nihlale ngekubonga tinsuku tonkhe, ngemusa lomningi kanye netibusiso laninika tona.
34.39: Yebo, futsi ngiyaphindza ngiyanincusa, bomnaketfu, kutsi nicaphele kutsi nithandaze njalonjalo, kute ningaholelwa khashane tilingo tadeveli, kute anganehluli, kute ningabi ngulabangephansi kwakhe ngelusuku lwekugcina; ngoba bukani, akaniniki umvuzo walutfo loluhle.
34.40: Manje bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngiyanincusa kutsi nibe nekubeketela, futsi nekutsi nibeketelele lonkhe luhlobo lwetinhlupheko, nekutsi ningabetfuki labo labaniphonsa ngaphandle ngenca yebumphofu benu lobukhulu, hleze nibe toni njengabo.
34.41: Kodvwa kutsi nibe nekubeketela, nibeketelele leto tinhlupheko, ngelitsemba lelicinile lekutsi ngalolunye lusuku niyawuphumula kuto tonkhe tinhlupheko tenu.

35.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Amulekhi sekacedzile kukhuluma lamavi, basishiya sicuku futsi babuyela eveni laseJeshoni
35.2: Yebo, nabo bonkhe labanye bekahamba nabo, emvakwekutsi sebalishumayele livi kumaZoramu, nabo babuyela eveni laseJeshoni.
35.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi liningi lemaZoramu lebelatiwa selike lahlangana ndzawonye mayelana nemavi lebekashunyayelwe kubo, latfukutsela ngenca yelivi, ngoba labucedza bucili babo; ngako-ke abafunanga kuwalalela emavi.
35.4: Futsi batfumela phindze bagcogcela bonkhe bantfu ndzawonye kulo lonkhe live, babonisana nabo mayelana nalawo mavi lebekakhulunyiwe.
35.5: Manje babusi babo kanye nebaphristi babo kanye nebafundzisi babo ababatisanga bantfu mayelana netifiso tabo; ngako-ke batitfolela ngansense imibono yebantfu.
35.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sebayitfolile imibono yabo bonkhe bantfu, labo labebawatsandza lawomavi lebekakhulunywe ngu-Alima kanye nabomnakabo bacoshwa bakhishelwa ngaphandle kwelive; bebabaningi; futsi ngetulu kwaloko bawelela eveni laseJeshoni.
35.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Alima kanye nabomnakabo babafundzisa.
35.8: Manje bantfu bemaZoramu babatfukutselela bantfu baka-Amoni labebaseJeshoni, futsi umbusi lomkhulu wemaZoramu, angumuntfu lomubi kakhulu, watfumela kubantfu baka-Amoni afuna kutsi babacoshe babakhiphele ngaphandle kwelive bonkhe labo labebabalekele eveni labo.
35.9: Futsi wabasabisa ngalokuningi kubasongela ngalokumelene nabo. Manje bantfu baka-Amoni abawesabanga emavi abo; ngako-ke abatange babacoshe, kodvwa babemukela bonkhe labamphofu bemaZoramu labeta kubo; babondla, babembatsisa, baphindze babaniketa imihlaba kutsi ibe ngemafa abo; babasita nangekwetidzingo tabo.
35.10: Manje loku ngempela kwawaphehla emaZoramu kutsi abatfukutselele bantfu baka-Amoni, acala kuhlangana nemaLamani futsi bawaphehla nawo kutsi abatfukutselele.
35.11: Ngaleyondlela emaZoramu kanye nemaLamani acala kwenta emalungiselelo emphi kutsi alwe nebantfu baka-Amoni, ngalokunjalo nemaNefi.
35.12: Waphela ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka welishumi nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi.
35.13: Futsi bantfu baka-Amoni besuka baphuma eveni laseJeshoni, bawelela eveni laseMelekhi, banika emabutfo emaNefi indzawo leseveni laseJeshoni, kute alwe nemabutfo emaLamani kanye nemabutfo emaZoramu; ngaleyondlela yacala imphi emkhatsini wemaLamani kanye nemaNefi, ngemnyaka welishumi nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli; futsi lomlandvo wetimphi tabo utonikwa emvakwaloku.
35.14: Alima na-Amoni, kanye nabomnakabo, ngalokunjalo nemadvodzana lamabili a-Alima babuyela eveni laseZarahemla, emvakwekutsi babe tikhali etandleni taNkulunkulu kuletsa labaningi bemaZoramu ekuphendvukeni; ngebuningi balabo labaletfwa ekuphendvukeni bacoshwa baphuma eveni labo; kodvwa banemave langemafa abo eveni laseJeshoni, batsatse tikhali kutsi bativikele, bavikele nebafati babo, nebantfwana, kanye nemave abo.
35.15: Manje Alima, akhatsatekile ngenca yebubi bebantfu bakhe, yebo nangetimphi, nangekucitseka kwengati, kanye nangencabano lebeyisemkhatsini wabo; sekalimemetele livi, noma sekatfumele kutsi kumenyetelwe livi, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu emadolobheni onkhe; abona kutsi tinhlitiyo tebantfu tabese ticala kutsi tibe lukhuni, nekutsi bese bacala kutsi bacansuke ngenca yekucina kwelivi, inhlitiyo yakhe yaba buhlungu kakhulu.
35.16: Ngako-ke, wenta kutsi emadvodzana akhe agcogcelwe ndzawonye, kute awanike onkhe ngamunye umyaleto wakhe, ngekwehlukana, mayelana netintfo letiphatselene nekulunga. Futsi sinawo umlandvo ngemiyaleto yakhe, labaniketa yona ngekwembhalo wakhe.

36.1: Ndvodzana yami, phani indlebe emavi ami; ngoba ngiyafunga kuwe, kutsi uma uyawuyigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu uyawuphumelela eveni.
36.2: Ngifuna kutsi wente njengoba ngentile, ngekukhumbula kutfunjwa kwabobabe betfu; ngoba bebasebugcilini, futsi bekute namunye lobekangabakhulula ngaphandle kwekutsi kube nguNkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka, kanye naNkulunkulu waJakobe; futsi wabakhulula etinhluphekweni tabo.
36.3: Manje, Awu ndvodzana yami Hilamani, buka, usesebusheni bakho, ngako-ke, ngiyakuncusa kutsi shengatsi ungaweva emavi ami futsi ufundze kimi; ngoba ngiyati kutsi noma bobani labayawubeka litsemba labo kuNkulunkulu bayawusekelwa etilingweni tabo, nasetinkhatsatweni tabo, kanye nasetinhluphekweni tabo, futsi bayawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
36.4: Futsi angifuni kutsi ucabange kutsi ngiyatatela ngekwami—hhayi ngekwenyama kodvwa ngekwakamoya, hhayi ngekwengcondvo yasemhlabeni kodvwa ngeyaNkulunkulu.
36.5: Manje, buka, ngitsi kuwe, kube bengingatalwa nguNkulunkulu bengingeke ngitati letintfo; kodvwa Nkulunkulu, ngemlomo wengilosi yakhe lengcwele ungembulele, hhayi ngenca yekufaneleka kwami;
36.6: Ngoba ngahamba ngizulazula nemadvodzana aMosiya, sifuna kubhubhisa libandla laNkulunkulu, kodvwa buka, Nkulunkulu watfumela ingilosi yakhe lengcwele kutsi isimise endleleni.
36.7: Buka, yakhuluma kitsi, kwangatsi livi lekudvuma, umhlaba wonkhe watamatama ngaphansi kwetinyawo tetfu; sonkhe sawela phansi, ngoba kwesaba inkhosi kwafika kitsi.
36.8: Kodvwa buka, livi latsi kimi: Phakama. Ngaphakama ngasukuma ngema, ngayibona ingilosi.
36.9: Yatsi kimi: Uma wena ufuna ngekwakho kubulawa, ungabe usaphindza ufune kubhubhisa libandla laNkulunkulu.
36.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawela phansi, kwaba sikhatsi lesitinsuku letintsatfu kanye nebusuku lobutsatfu ngingakwati kuvula umlomo wami, noma ngisebentise emalunga ami.
36.11: Futsi ingilosi yakhuluma tintfo letiningi kimi, letaviwa bomnaketfu, kodvwa mine angitivanga ngoba ngesikhatsi ngiva lamavi atsi—Uma wena ufuna ngekwakho kubulawa, ungabe usaphindza ufune kubhubhisa libandla laNkulunkulu—ngashaywa kwesaba lokukhulu kakhulu kanye nekumangala hleze mhlawumbe ngibulawe, kangangekutsi ngawela phansi ngangabe ngiseva lutfo.
36.12: Kodvwa ngahlushwa buhlungu baphakadze, ngoba umphefumulo wami wakhatsateka kakhulu waphindze wahlupheka ngetono tami tonkhe.
36.13: Yebo, ngatikhumbula tonkhe tono tami kanye nebubi bami lengahlushwa ngabo ngebuhlungu besihogo; yebo, ngabona kutsi ngangimhlamukile Nkulunkulu wami, nekutsi ngangingayigcinanga imiyaleto yakhe lengcwele.
36.14: Yebo, futsi ngangibulele labaningi bebantfwana bakhe, noma-ke ngalenye indlela ngangibaholele ekubhujisweni; yebo kwephetsa nje babubukhulu bubi bami, kangangekutsi umcabango nje wekuta phambi kwaNkulunkulu wawuhlupha umphefumulo wami ngekwesaba lokungachazeki.
36.15: Awu, ngacabanga, kutsi ngingacoshwa futsi ngibe ngulongasekho ngekwemphefumulo kanye nangekwemtimba, kute ngingaletfwa kutsi ngime phambi kwaNkulunkulu wami, kutsi ngehlulelwe ngetento tami.
36.16: Futsi manje, tinsuku letintsatfu kanye nebusuku lobutsatfu ngahlushwa, nangebuhlungu bemphefumulo lojezisiwe.
36.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi njengoba ngangihlushwa buhlungu, ngesikhatsi ngisakhatsatwa kukhumbula tono tami letiningi, buka, ngakhumbula futsi kutsi ngamuva babe aphrofetha kubantfu mayelana nekuta kwaJesu Khristu lotsite, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, kutawuhlawulela tono temhlaba.
36.18: Manje, ngesikhatsi ingcondvo yami ibambelela kulomcabango, ngakhala ngekhatsi enhlitiyweni yami ngatsi: Awu Jesu, Ndvodzana yaNkulunkulu, bani nemusa kimi, mine lengisekubabeni kwenyongo, futsi ngitungeletwe ndzawotonkhe tinketane taphakadze tekufa.
36.19: Manje, buka, ngesikhatsi ngikucabanga loku, angitange ngisabuva buhlungu lenganginabo; yebo, angitange ngisakhatsatwa kukhumbula tono tami.
36.20: Awu, yeka bukhulu benjabulo, nekumangalisa kwekukhanya lengakubona; yebo, umphefumulo wami wagcwaliswa ngenjabulo leyabayinkhulu njengebuhlungu bami!
36.21: Yebo, ngitsi kuwe, ndvodzana yami, kute lokwakungaba kukhulu futsi kube buhlungu njengebuhlungu lenganginabo. Yebo, futsi ngiyaphindza ngitsi kuwe, ndvodzana yami, ngakulolunye luhlangotsi kute lokungaba kukhulu futsi kube mnandzi njengenjabulo lengaba nayo.
36.22: Yebo, ngacabanga kutsi ngabona, njengoba babe Lehi abona, Nkulunkulu ahleti esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi, atungeletwe ticuku tetingilosi letingabaleki, tisesimeni sekuhlabela kanye nekudvumisa Nkulunkulu wato; yebo, futsi umphefumulo wami walangatelela kuba lapho.
36.23: Kodvwa buka, emalunga ami aphindze atfola emandla awo futsi, ngema ngetinyawo tami, ngamemeta kubantfu kutsi ngasengitelwe nguNkulunkulu.
36.24: Yebo, kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kute kube ngumanje, ngisebente ngangayekeli, kute ngiletse bantfu ekuphendvukeni; kute ngibaletse kutsi beve leyo njabulo lenkhulu nami lengayiva; kute nabo ngalokunjalo batalwe nguNkulunkulu, futsi bagcwaliswe ngaMoya loNgcwele.
36.25: Yebo, manje buka, Awu ndvodzana yami, iNkhosi inginika injabulo lenkhulu ngalokwendlulele ngenca yetitselo tekusebenta kwami;
36.26: Ngoba ngenca yelivi lenginikete lona, buka, labaningi batelwe nguNkulunkulu, futsi beve njengoba nami ngivile, futsi batibonela ngewabo emehlo njengoba nami ngibonile; ngako-ke bayati ngaletintfo lengikhulume ngato, njengoba nami ngati; futsi lwati lenginalo luvela kuNkulunkulu.
36.27: Futsi bengisekelwe ngisetilingweni kanye nasetinkhatsatweni letitinhlobonhlobo, yebo, nakuto tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlupheko; yebo, Nkulunkulu ungikhululile ejele, nasekuboshweni, kanye nasekufeni; yebo, ngibeka litsemba lami kuye, futsi usetawungikhulula njalo.
36.28: Futsi ngiyati kutsi uyawungivusa ngelusuku lwekugcina, kutsi ngihlale naye enkhatimulweni; yebo, ngitawumdvumisa ingunaphakadze, ngoba ubakhiphile bobabe betfu eGibhithe, uwagwinyile emaGibhithe eLwandle loluBovu; wabahola ngemandla akhe wabayisa eveni lesetsembiso; yebo, futsi ubakhululile ebugcilini kanye nasekutfunjweni tikhatsi ngetikhatsi.
36.29: Yebo, ngetulu kwaloko ubakhiphile bobabe betfu eveni laseJerusalema; futsi, ngemandla akhe langapheli, wabakhulula baphuma ebugcilini kanye nasekutfunjweni, tikhatsi ngetikhatsi kwehle kute kufike kulolusuku lwanamuhla; futsi njalo-nje ngihlala ngikhumbula kutfunjwa kwabo; yebo, nawe ngalokunjalo kumele uhlale ukukhumbula, njengoba nami ngentile, kutfunjwa kwabo.
36.30: Kodvwa buka, ndvodzana yami, akusiko loku kuphela; ngoba nawe kumele wati njengoba nami ngati, kutsi nangabe uyawuyigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu uyawuphumelela eveni; kumele wati futsi, kutsi kangangoba ungayuyigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu uyawususwa phambi kwakhe. Manje loku kungekwelivi lakhe.

37.1: Manje, ndvodzana yami Hilamani, ngiyakuyala kutsi utsatse lemibhalo lebengiphatsiswe yona ngekwetsenjwa.
37.2: Ngetulu kwaloko ngiyakuyala kutsi ugcine lombhalo walabantfu, njengoba nami ngentile, kulabongcwengcwe baNefi, futsi utigcine tonkhe letintfo lengitigcinile tingcwele, njengoba nami ngitigcinile; ngoba kungenhloso yekuhlakanipha kutsi tigcinwe.
37.3: Futsi labongcwengcwe belitfusi, labacuketse lemicopho, labanemibhalo lengcwele kubo, labanemlandvo wetitukulwane tabokhokho betfu, kusukela ekucaleni—
37.4: Buka, kwaphrofethwa bobabe betfu, kutsi kumele bagcinwe futsi bendluliswe behle kusukela etitukulwaneni kuya kulesinye, futsi bagcinwe balondvolotwe ngesandla seNkhosi baze bahambe baye kuto tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nakubantfu, kute bati ngetimfihlakalo leticuketfwe kubo.
37.5: Manje buka, uma bagciniwe kufanele bahlale bakhatimula; yebo, batawuhlala bakhatimula; yebo, kanjalo nabo bonkhe bongcwengcwe labacuketse leyo mibhalo lengcwele.
37.6: Manje ungacabanga kutsi loku lengikwentako kubulima; kodvwa buka ngitsi kuwe, ngetintfo letincane naletisobala kufezeka tintfo letinkhulu; futsi emasu lamancane etikhatsini letiningi ayatitfobisa tihlakaniphi.
37.7: Futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu isebenta ngemasu kute ifeze tinhloso tayo letinkhulu netaphakadze; futsi ngemasu lamancane kakhulu iNkhosi itfobisa tihlakaniphi iphindze isindzise imiphefumulo leminingi.
37.8: Manje, kute kube ngumanje bekusolo kukuhlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu kutsi leti tintfo tilondvolotwe; ngoba buka, tiyivulile imicondvo yalabantfu, yebo, takholisa labaningi ngemaphutsa etindlela tabo, futsi baletfwa ekumatini Nkulunkulu wabo kute kusindziswe imiphefumulo yabo.
37.9: Yebo, ngitsi kuwe, kube bekungasiko ngenca yaleti tintfo leticuketfwe ngulemibhalo, lekulabongcwengcwe, Amoni kanye nabomnakabo bebangeke bakwati kutsi bakholise tinkhulungwane letiningi kangaka temaLamani ngemasiko langakalungi aboyise; yebo, lemibhalo kanye nemavi abo abaletsa ekuphendvukeni; lokusho kutsi, yabaletsa ekuyatini iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, kanye nasekutseni bajabule ngaJesu Khristu uMhlengi wabo.
37.10: Futsi ngubani lowatiko mhlawumbe ingaba yindlela yekuletsa letiningi tinkhulungwane tabo, yebo, futsi kanjalo letiningi tinkhulungwane tabomnaketfu lababonhlokolukhuni, emaNefi, lokungumanje atente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tawo esonweni kanye nasebubini, ekumatini uMhlengi wawo na?
37.11: Manje leti timfihlakalo atikembulwa ngalokugcwele kimi; ngako-ke ngitawugcina lapha.
37.12: Futsi ngabe kwenele uma ngingatsi kuphela nje balondvolotelwe ngenhloso yekuhlakanipha, leyo nhloso leyatiwa nguNkulunkulu; ngoba yena weluleka ngekuhlakanipha kuyo yonkhe imisebenti yakhe, tindlela takhe ticondzile, futsi indlela yakhe yinye naphakadze.
37.13: Awu khumbula, khumbula, ndvodzana yami Hilamani, kutsi icine kanjani imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu. Watsi: Uma utawuyigcina imiyaleto yami uyawuphumelela eveni—kodvwa uma ungayigcini imiyaleto yakhe uyawususwa phambi kwakhe.
37.14: Manje khumbula, ndvodzana yami, kutsi Nkulunkulu utiphatsise wena ngekukwetsemba leti tintfo, letingcwele, latigcine tingcwele, futsi latawutigcina phindze atilondvolotele ngenhloso yakhe yekuhlakanipha, kute akhombise emandla akhe etitukulwaneni letitako.
37.15: Manje buka, ngikutjela ngemoya wekuphrofetha, kutsi uma uphambuka emiyalweni yaNkulunkulu, buka, leti tintfo letingcwele tiyawutsatfwa kuwe ngemandla aNkulunkulu, futsi uyawunikelwa kuSathane, kutsi akuhlunge njengemakhoba emoyeni.
37.16: Kodvwa uma ugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, futsi wente ngaletintfo letingcwele njengoba iNkhosi ikuyaletile, (ngoba kufanele uncuse eNkhosini ngato tonkhe tintfo lekufanele utente ngato) buka, kute emandla asemhlabeni noma esihogo langatitsatsa kuwe, ngoba Nkulunkulu unemandla ekugcwalisa onkhe emavi akhe.
37.17: Ngoba utawutigcwalisa tonkhe tetsembiso takhe layawutenta kuwe, ngoba utigcwalisile tetsembiso takhe latenta kubobabe betfu.
37.18: Ngoba wetsembisa kubo kutsi uyawutilondvolota letintfo atilondvolotele inhloso yakhe yekuhlakanipha, kute akhombise emandla akhe etitukulwaneni letitako.
37.19: Futsi manje buka, inhloso yinye sewuyigcwalisile, nasekubuyiselweni kwetinkhulungwane letiningi temaLamani ekwatini liciniso; uwakhombisile emandla akhe kubo, futsi kanjalo usetawuwakhombisa emandla akhe kubo etitukulwaneni letitako; ngako-ke tiyawulondvolotwa.
37.20: Ngako-ke ngiyakuyala, ndvodzana yami Hilamani, kutsi ukhutsale ekuwagcwaliseni onkhe emavi ami, futsi nekutsi ukhutsale ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu njengoba ibhaliwe.
37.21: Manje, sengitawukhuluma kuwe mayelana nalabongcwengcwe labangemashumi lamabili nakune, kutsi ubagcine, kute timfihlakalo kanye nemisebenti yebumnyama, kanye nemisebenti yabo yangansense, noma imisebenti yangansense yalabo bantfu lababhujisiwe, yembulwe kulabantfu; yebo, konkhe kubulala kwabo, nebugebengu, nekuphanga, nabo bonkhe bubi kanye netinengiso tabo, kungembulwa kulabantfu; yebo, futsi nekutsi ubalondvolote laba bahumushi.
37.22: Ngoba buka, iNkhosi yabona kutsi bantfu bayo bacala kusebenta ebumnyameni, yebo, basebenta kubulala ngansense kanye netinengiso; ngako-ke iNkhosi yatsi, uma bangakaphendvuki bayawubhujiswa baphele ebusweni bemhlaba.
37.23: Futsi iNkhosi yatsi: Ngitawulungiselela inceku yami Gazelema, litje, leliyawukhanya ebumnyameni libe kukhanya, kute ngibonise bantfu bami kutsi ngubani longisebentelako, nekutsi ngibakhombise imisebenti yabomnakabo, yebo, imisebenti yabo lefihlakele, imisebenti yabo yebumnyama, nebubi babo kanye netinengiso.
37.24: Manje, ndvodzana yami, labo bahumushi balungiselelwa kutsi livi laNkulunkulu ligcwaliseke, lalikhuluma, atsi:
