37.25: Ngiyawukwembula ebumnyameni ngivete ekukhanyeni yonkhe imisebenti yabo lefihlakele kanye netinengiso tabo; ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngiyawubabhubhisa baphele nya ebusweni bemhlaba; futsi ngiyawutiveta ekukhanyeni tonkhe timfihlakalo kanye netinengiso tabo, kuto tonkhe tive letiyawuba banikati balelive emvakwaloku.
37.26: Manje, ndvodzana yami, siyabona kutsi abatange baphendvuke; ngako-ke babhujisiwe, futsi kute kube ngumanje livi laNkulunkulu ligcwalisekile; yebo, tinengiso tabo letifihlakele tikhishiwe ebumnyameni tembulelwa tsine.
37.27: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngiyakuyala kutsi utigodle tonkhe tifungo tabo, netivumelwano tabo, kanye nekuvumelana kwabo ngalokuphatselene netinengiso tabo letifihlakele; yebo, kanye nato tonkhe timphawu tabo netimangaliso tabo uyawubafihlela labantfu, kute bangatati, hleze mhlawumbe bawele ebumnyameni nabo bese bayabhujiswa.
37.28: Ngoba buka, kukhona sicalekiso etikwalo lonkhe lelive, sekutsi kubhujiswa kuyawuta etikwato tonkhe leto tisebenti tebumnyama, ngekwemandla aNkulunkulu, uma setivutfwe ngalokuphelele; ngako-ke ngifisa kutsi labantfu bangabhujiswa.
37.29: Ngako-ke uyawuwafihla lamasu layimfihlo etifungo tabo kanye netivumelwano tabo kulabantfu, futsi bubi babo kuphela nekubulala kwabo kanye netinengiso tabo loyawukwembula kubo; uyawubafundzisa kutsi babenyanye bubi lobunjalo netinengiso kanye nekubulala; ngetulu kwaloko uyawubafundzisa kutsi labantfu babhujiswa ngenca yebubi babo netinengiso kanye nekubulala kwabo.
37.30: Ngoba buka, bababulala bonkhe baphrofethi beNkhosi labefika emkhatsini wabo kutawushumayela kubo mayelana nebubi babo; futsi ingati yalabo labababulala yakhala eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo kutiphindziselela kulabo lebebababulali babo; ngaleyondlela tehlulelo taNkulunkulu teta etikwaleti tisebenti tebumnyama kanye nemacembu layimfihlo.
37.31: Yebo, futsi licalekisiwe lelive ingunaphakadze kuleto tisebenti tebumnyama kanye nemacembu layimfihlo, bate babhujiswe, ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngaphambi kwekutsi bavutfwe ngalokuphelele.
37.32: Manje, ndvodzana yami, khumbula emavi lengiwakhulume kuwe; ungabaniki lawo masu layimfihlo labantfu, kodvwa bafundzise kutsi basitondze njalo sono kanye nebubi.
37.33: Shumayela kubo kuphendvuka, kanye nelukholo eNkhosini Jesu Khristu; bafundzise kutsi batitfobe baphindze babe mnene nekutsi batitfobe ngenhlitiyo; bafundzise kutsi bamelane nato tonkhe tilingo tadeveli, ngekukholwa kwabo eNkhosini Jesu Khristu.
37.34: Bafundzise kutsi bangalokotsi bakhatsale kwenta imisebenti lemihle, kodvwa kutsi babe mnene futsi batitfobe ngenhlitiyo; ngoba ngulabanjalo labayawutfola kuphumula emiphefumulweni yabo.
37.35: Awu, khumbula, ndvodzana yami, futsi ufundze kuhlakanipha ebusheni bakho; yebo, fundza ebusheni bakho kugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
37.36: Yebo, khala kuNkulunkulu kute utfole konkhe kuphila kwakho; yebo, konkhe kwenta kwakho akube seNkhosini, futsi noma ngabe uyakuphi akube seNkhosini; yebo, yonkhe imicabango yakho yicondzise eNkhosini; yebo, lutsandvo lwenhlitiyo yakho alube seNkhosini ingunaphakadze.
37.37: Tfola seluleko eNkhosini kuko konkhe kwenta kwakho, futsi itawukucondzisa kute uzuze; yebo, uma ulala phansi ebusuku lala eNkhosini, kute ikuvikele ekulaleni kwakho; futsi uma uvuka ekuseni inhlitiyo yakho ayigcwale kubonga kuNKulunkulu; futsi uma utenta letintfo, uyawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
37.38: Manje, ndvodzana yami, nginalokutsite lengifuna kukusho mayelana naleyontfo bobabe betfu labayibita ngebhola, noma umcondzisi—noma bobabe betfu lebebakubita ngekutsi yiLiyahona, ngekuhunyushwa lokutsiwa, yinkhombandlela; futsi iNkhosi yayilungisa.
37.39: Futsi buka, kute namunye umuntfu longenta loku ngendlela yebuciko lobungaka. Buka, yayilungiselelwe kutsi ikhombise bobabe betfu indlela lebekufanele bahambe ngayo ehlane.
37.40: Futsi yabasebentela ngekwelukholo lwabo kuNkulunkulu; ngako-ke, uma bebanelitsemba lekukholwa kutsi Nkulunkulu bekangakwati kwenta leto tintfo tikhombe indlela lokwakumele bahambe ngayo, buka, bekwenteka; ngako-ke bebanalesi simangaliso, futsi kanjalo naletiningi letinye timangaliso letenteka ngemandla aNkulunkulu, lusuku ngelusuku.
37.41: Noko, ngenca yekutsi leto timangaliso betenteka ngetintfo letincane tabakhombisa imisebenti lemihle kakhulu. Bebavilapha, baphindze bakhohlwa kusebentisa lukholo lwabo kanye nekukhutsala kwase kutsi leyo misebenti lemihle kakhulu yancamuka, futsi abatange basachubeka neluhambo lwabo.
37.42: Ngako-ke, bahlala ehlane, noma abatange basahamba indlela lecondzile, futsi bahlushwa yindlala kanye nekoma, ngenca yetiphambuko tabo.
37.43: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngifuna kutsi ucondze kutsi leti tintfo tite kufana; ngoba njengoba bobabe betfu bavilapha kutsi bayinake lenkhombandlela (manje leti tintfo betitesikhashana) abaphumelelanga; kunjalo-ke nangetintfo letitakamoya.
37.44: Ngoba buka, kulula kutsi ulinake livi laKhristu, leliyawukukhombisa indlela lecondzile leya entfokotweni yaphakadze, njengoba bekunjalo kubobabe betfu kutsi bayinake lenkhombandlela, lebeyibakhombisa indlela lecondzile leya eveni lesetsembiso.
37.45: Manje ngitsi, ngabe kute yini kufana kulentfo na? Ngoba njengoba nakanjani lomcondzisi uletse bobabe betfu, ngekulandzela indlela yakhe, eveni lesetsembiso, kanjalo ngemavi aKhristu, uma silandzela indlela yawo, ayawusetfwala asiyise ngale kwalesigodzi selusizi siye eveni lelincono kakhulu lesetsembiso.
37.46: Awu ndvodzana yami, ungasivumeli kutsi sivilaphe ngenca yekubalula kwendlela; ngoba bekunjalo nakubobabe betfu; ngoba beyilungiselwe bona kanjalo, kutsi uma bebangabuka bebangaphila; kusenjalo nakitsi. Indlela ilungisiwe, futsi uma singabuka singaphila ingunaphakadze.
37.47: Manje, ndvodzana yami, buka kutsi uyatinakekela leti tintfo letingcwele, yebo, caphela kutsi ubuka kuNkulunkulu futsi uphile. Hamba uye kulaba bantfu futsi umemetele livi, futsi ube cotfo. Ndvodzana yami, hamba kahle.

38.1: Ndvodzana yami, phani indlebe emavi ami, ngoba ngitsi kuwe, njengoba ngasho kuHilamani, kutsi kangangoba uyawuyigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu uyawuphumelela eveni; futsi kangangoba ungetuyigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu uyawuhlukaniswa naye.
38.2: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngiyetsemba kutsi ngitawuba nentfokoto lenkhulu ngawe, ngenca yekucina kwakho kanye nekwetsembeka kwakho kuNkulunkulu; njengoba ucale usesebusheni bakho kutsi ubuke eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wakho, nakanjalo ngiyetsemba kutsi utawuchubeka nekugcina imiyaleto yayo; ngoba ubusisiwe loyo lobeketela kute kube sekugcineni.
38.3: Ngitsi kuwe, ndvodzana yami, sengivele nginako kutfokota lokukhulu ngawe, ngenca yekwetsembeka kwakho nekukhutsala kwakho, nekubeketela kwakho kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakho emkhatsini walaba bantfu bemaZoramu.
38.4: Ngoba ngiyati kutsi wawuboshiwe; yebo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngiyati kutsi wagcotjwa ngematje ngenca yelivi; watitfwala tonkhe letintfo ngekubeketela ngenca yekutsi iNkhosi yayinawe; futsi manje sewuyati kutsi iNkhosi yakukhulula.
38.5: Manje ndvodzana yami, Shibiloni, ngifuna kutsi ukhumbule, kutsi kangangoba uyawubeka litsemba lakho kuNkulunkulu nakanjalo uyawukhululwa uphume etilingweni takho, nasetinkhatsatweni takho, kanye nasetinhluphekweni takho, uyawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
38.6: Manje, ndvodzana yami, angifuni kutsi ucabange kutsi ngiyatatela ngekwami leti tintfo, kodvwa nguMoya waNkulunkulu lokimi lowembula leti tintfo kimi; ngoba kube bengingatalwa nguNkulunkulu bengingeke ngitati letintfo.
38.7: Kodvwa buka, iNkhosi ngemusa wayo lomkhulu yatfumela ingilosi yayo kutsi imemetele kimi kutsi kufanele ngiwuyekele umsebenti wekubhubhisa emkhatsini webantfu bayo; yebo, futsi ngibone ingilosi buso nebuso, yakhuluma nami, livi layo belinjengekudvuma, latamatamisa umhlaba wonkhe.
38.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinsuku letintsatfu kanye nebusuku lobutsatfu ngangisebuhlungwini lobukhulu kakhulu kanye naselusizini lolukhulu lwemphefumulo; futsi angitange nanini, ngatfola kutsetselelwa kwetono tami, ngate ngakhalela umusa eNkhosini Jesu Khristu, kodvwa buka, ngakhala kuye ngakutfola kuthula emphefumulweni wami.
38.9: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngikutjele loku kute ufundze kuhlakanipha, kute ufundze kimi kutsi kute lenye indlela noma luhlobo umuntfu langasindziswa ngalo, kuphela nje kuye kanye nangaye Khristu. Buka, ukuphila kanye nekukhanya kwemhlaba. Buka, ulivi leliciniso kanye nekulunga.
38.10: Manje, njengoba sewucalile kulifundzisa livi kanjalo nami ngifuna kutsi uchubeke nekulifundzisa, futsi ngifuna kutsi ukhutsale uphindze utitsibe kuto tonkhe tintfo.
38.11: Caphela kutsi awutiphakamisi ngekutikhukhumeta; yebo, caphela kutsi awutichayisi ngekuhlakanipha kwakho noma ngemandla akho lamakhulu.
38.12: Sebentisa buchawe, kodvwa hhayi kuphocelela; ngalokunjalo caphela kutsi ufaka ematomu kuyo yonkhe imizwa yakho, kute ugcwaliswe ngelutsandvo; caphela kutsi uyehlukana nebuvila.
38.13: Ungathandazi njengoba emaZoramu enta, ngoba ubonile kutsi athandazela kutsi kuve bantfu, nekutsi advunyiswe ngekuhlakanipha kwawo.
38.14: Ungasho kutsi: Awu Nkulunkulu, ngiyabonga kutsi tsine sincono kunabomnaketfu; kodvwa esikhundleni saloko tsani: Awu Nkhosi, tsetselela kungafaneleki kwami, futsi ukhumbule bomnaketfu ngemusa—yebo, vuma kungafaneleki kwakho phambi kwaNkulunkulu ngetikhatsi tonkhe.
38.15: Futsi shengatsi iNkhosi ingawubusisa umphefumulo wakho, ikwemukela ngelusuku lwekugcina embusweni wayo, kutsi uhlale phansi ngekuthula. Manje hamba, ndvodzana yami, ufundzise livi kulabantfu. Uzitse. Ndvodzana yami, hamba kahle.

39.1: Manje, ndvodzana yami, nginalokutsite lokunye lengitawukusho kuwe kunaloko lengikushito kumnakenu; ngoba buka, awukubonanga yini kucina kwemnakenu, kwetsembeka kwakhe, kanye nekukhutsala kwakhe ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu na? Buka akatange yini abe sibonelo lesihle kuwe na?
39.2: Ngoba wena awutange uwanake kangako emavi ami njengoba umnakenu enta, emkhatsini webantfu bemaZoramu. Manje nguloku lenginako ngalokumelene nawe; wena bewuhamba utigabatisa ngemandla akho kanye nangekuhlakanipha kwakho.
39.3: Futsi akusiko loku kuphela, ndvodzana yami. Wena wente loko lokubuhlungu kakhulu kimi; ngoba uyilahlile inkonzo wahamba waya eveni laseSironi emkhatsini wemincele yemaLamani, ulandzela ingwadla Isabhela.
39.4: Yebo, watintjontja tinhlitiyo talabaningi; kodvwa loku kwakungasilo licembe lekubhacisa kuwe, ndvodzana yami. Wena kwakufanele utinikele enkonzweni lebewuphatsiswe yona ngekwetsenjwa.
39.5: Awati yini ndvodzana yami, kutsi leti tintfo tisinengiso emehlweni eNkhosi; yebo, tinengeke kakhulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe tono ngaphandle kwekucitsa ingati lengenacala noma kuphika Moya loNgcwele na?
39.6: Ngoba buka, uma umphika Moya loNgcwele uma wake waba nendzawo kuwe, futsi wati kutsi uyamphika, buka, loku kusono lesingacoleleki; yebo, loyo lobulalako ngalokuphambene nekukhanya kanye nekumati Nkulunkulu, akulula kuye kutsi atfole kutsetselelwa; yebo, ngitsi kuwe, ndvodzana yami, akulula kuye kutsi atfole kutsetselelwa.
39.7: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngifisa shengatsi ngabe awubanga nacala lesono lesikhulu kangaka kuNkulunkulu. Bengingeke ngihlale etikwemacala akho, kutsi ngikhatsate umphefumulo wakho, kube bengingakahlosi kutsi uzuze.
39.8: Kodvwa buka, angeke ukwati kufihla emacala akho kuNkulunkulu, futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi uphendvuke ayawukuma njengebufakazi ngalokumelene nawe ngelusuku lwekugcina.
39.9: Manje ndvodazana yami, ngifisa kutsi uphendvuke uphindze utishiye tono takho, ungabe usatilandzela nanini tinkhanuko temehlo akho, kodvwa tincishe tonkhe leti tintfo; ngoba ngaphandle kwekutsi wente loku awunawukwati nanini kutsi udle lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu. Awu, Khumbula, futsi ukwemukele, utincishe leti tintfo.
39.10: Futsi ngiyakuyala kutsi ukwemukele kutsi utfole teluleko kubomnakenu labadzala etintfweni lotentako; ngoba buka, wena usesebusheni bakho, futsi usadzinga kondliwa bomnakenu. Tinake teluleko tabo.
39.11: Ungativumeli kutsi udukiswe ngunoma yini lelite noma lebuwula; ungamvumeli develi kutsi aphindze adukise inhlitiyo yakho futsi kutsi ulandzele leto tingwadla letikhohlakele. Buka, Awu ndvodzana yami, bukhulu kanganani bubi lowubuletse etikwemaZoramu; ngoba ngesikhatsi abona kutiphatsa kwakho awatange asawakholwa emavi ami.
39.12: Manje Moya weNkhosi utsi kimi: Yala bantfwana bakho kutsi bente lokuhle, hleze badukise tinhlitiyo tebantfu labaningi ekubhujisweni; ngako-ke ngiyakuyala, ndvodzana yami, ngekwesaba Nkulunkulu, kutsi buyekele lobubi bakho.
39.13: Kutsi ugucukele eNkhosini ngayo yonkhe ingcodvo yakho, nemandla, kanye nekucina; kute ungabe usatidukisa tinhlitiyo tabo nanini kutsi bente bubi, kodvwa esikhundleni saloko buyela kubo, uwavume emaphutsa akho kanye naloko lokubi lowukwentile.
39.14: Ungayifuni ingcebo noma tintfo letilite talomhlaba; ngoba buka, angeke utitfwale uhambe nato.
39.15: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngitawusho lokutsite kuwe mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu. Buka, ngitsi kuwe, nguye ngempela loyawukuta kutawususa tono temhlaba; yebo, utawumemetela tindzaba letimnandzi tensindziso kubantfu bakhe.
39.16: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngiyo lena inkonzo lowawubitelwe kuyo, kutsi umemetele letindzaba letimnandzi kulabantfu, kutsi ulungise tingcondvo tabo; noma ngalenye indlela kute insindziso ite kubo, kute balungise tingcondvo tebantfwana babo kutsi balive livi ngesikhatsi sekuta kwakhe.
39.17: Manje sengitawuphumuta ingcodvo yakho ngandlela tsite ngalesi sihloko. Buka, uyamangala kutsi kungani leti tintfo kumele tatiwe kudze kangaka ngaphambilini. Buka, ngitsi kuwe, ngabe umphefumulo ngalesi sikhatsi awusilo yini ligugu kuNkulunkulu njengoba kuyawuba njalo ngesikhatsi sekuta kwakhe na?
39.18: Ingabe akudzingeki yini kutsi lisu lekuhlengwa latiswe labantfu kanjalo nakubantfwana babo na?
39.19: Ingabe akusiko yini lula ngalesi sikhatsi kutsi iNkhosi itfumele tingilosi tayo kutsi timemetele leti tindzaba letimnandzi kitsi kanjalo nakubantfwana betfu, noma emvakwesikhatsi sekuta kwakhe na?

40.1: Manje ndvodzana yami, naku lokunye lokumbalwa lengitawukusho kuwe; ngoba ngiyabona kutsi umcondvo wakho ukhatsatekile mayelana nekuvuka kwalabafile.
40.2: Buka, ngitsi kuwe, kute kuvuka—noma, ngingatsi, ngalamanye emavi, lomtimba lobhubhako awukwembatsi kungabhubhi, loku kubola akukwembatsi kungaboli—kute kube semvakwekuta kwaKhristu.
40.3: Buka, ufeza kuvuka kwalabafile. Kodvwa buka, ndvodzana yami, kuvuka akukafiki. Manje, ngikwembulela imfihlakalo, noko, tiningi timfihlakalo letigciniwe, lekute namunye lotatiko ngaphandle kwaNkulunkulu lucobo. Kodvwa ngitawukukhombisa intfo yinye nje lengiyibute ngekukhutsala kuNkulunkulu kutsi ngiyati—lemayelana nekuvuka.
40.4: Buka, kunesikhatsi lesibekiwe lapho bonkhe bayawuvuka kulabafile. Manje kutsi lesi sikhatsi sifika nini kute lowatiko; kodvwa Nkulunkulu uyati sikhatsi lesibekiwe.
40.5: Manje, noma kuyawuba khona sikhatsi lesisodvwa, noma sikhatsi sesibili, noma sikhatsi sesitsatfu, lapho bantfu bayawuvuka kulabafile, akusho lutfo; ngoba Nkulunkulu uyatati tonkhe letintfo; futsi kuyangenelisa kutsi ngati kutsi nguloku lokutawukwenteka—kutsi kukhona sikhatsi lesibekiwe sekutsi bonkhe bayawuvuka kulabafile.
40.6: Manje kufanele kutsi kubekhona sikhatsi emkhatsini wesikhatsi sekufa kanye nesikhatsi sekuvuka.
40.7: Manje ngitawubuta kutsi kwentekani ngemiphefumulo yebantfu kusukela kulesi sikhatsi sekufa kute kube sikhatsi lesibekiwe sekuvuka na?
40.8: Manje noma ngabe kunesikhatsi lesingetulu kwasinye lesibekelwe bantfu kutsi bavuke loko akusho lutfo; ngoba abafi ngesikhatsi sinye, futsi loku akusho lutfo; konkhe kunjengelusuku lunye kuNkulunkulu, futsi sikhatsi sibalwa bantfu kuphela.
40.9: Ngako-ke, kukhona sikhatsi lesibekelwe bantfu kutsi bayawuvuka kulabafile; futsi kunesikhatsi emkhatsini wesikhatsi sekufa kanye nesekuvuka. Manje, mayelana nalesi sikhatsi, kutsi kwentekani ngemiphefumulo yebanftu yintfo lengiyibutile ngekukhutsala eNkhosini kutsi ngiyati; futsi lena yintfo lengiyatiko.
40.10: Uma sikhatsi sesifika lapho bonkhe bayawuvuka, ngaleso sikhatsi bonkhe bayawukwati kutsi Nkulunkulu uyatati tonkhe tikhatsi latibekele umuntfu.
40.11: Manje, mayelana nesimo semphefumulo emkhatsini wekufa kanye nekuvuka—Buka, kwembuliwe kimi ngengilosi, kutsi imiphefumulo yabo bonkhe bantfu, masinyane ngesikhatsi nje uma isuka kulomtimba lobhubhako, yebo, imiphefumulo yabo bonkhe bantfu, noma ngabe beyimihle noma beyimibi, iyatsatfwa iyiswe ekhaya kuloyo Nkulunkulu lowayinika imphilo.
40.12: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi kuyawukwenteka, kutsi imiphefumulo yalabo labalungile yemukelwa esimeni senjabulo, lesibitwa ngekutsi yipharadisi, simo sekuphumula, simo sekuthula, lapho iyawuphumula kuto tonkhe tinkhatsato tayo kanye nako konkhe lokuhlupheka, kanye nelusizi.
40.13: Ngaleso sikhatsi kuyawukwenteka, kutsi imiphefumulo yalababi, yebo, labo labanebubi—ngoba buka, bete sabelo saMoya weNkhosi; ngoba buka, bona bakhetsa imisebenti yebubi kunemisebenti lemihle; ngako-ke umoya wadeveli wangena kubo, watsatsa indlu yabo yaba ngeyakhe—lena iyawulahlwa ebumnyameni lobungaphandle; lapho kuyawuba khona kukhala, nekulila kanye nekugedla kwematinyo, futsi loku kungenca yebubi babo, baholelwe ekutfunjweni ngentsandvo yadeveli.
40.14: Manje lesi simo semiphefumulo yalababi, yebo, lesebumnyameni, kanye nasesimeni lesibi kakhulu, sekulindzela ngekwesaba kushiswa yintfukutselo yelulaka lwaNkulunkulu; ngako-ke bahlala bakulesi simo, kanjalo nalabalungile epharadisi, kute kube sikhatsi sekuvuka kwabo.
40.15: Manje, kukhona labanye labasicondzako kutsi lesi simo senjabulo kanye nalesi simo sekuhlupheka kwemphefumulo, lesingaphambi kwekuvuka, sikuvuka kwekucala. Yebo, ngiyavuma kutsi singabitwa ngekuvuka, kuvuswa kwemoya noma kwemphefumulo kanye nekuyiswa kwawo ekujabuleni noma elusizini, njengekwemavi lakhulunyiwe.
40.16: Futsi buka, kukhulunyiwe phindze, kwatsiwa kukhona kuvuka kwekucala, kuvuka kwabo bonkhe labo labebakhona, noma labakhona, noma labayawuba khona, kwehle kute kufike ekuvukeni kwaKhristu kulabafile.
40.17: Manje, asikholelwa kutsi lokuvuka kwekucala, lokukhulunywa ngako ngalendlela, kungaba kuvuka kwemiphefumulo kanye nekuyiswa kwayo ekujabuleni noma elusizini. Ungakholelwa kutsi loku kusho loko.
40.18: Buka, ngitsi kuwe, Cha; kodvwa kuchaza kuhlangana kwemphefumulo kanye nemtimba, walabo kusukela etinsukwini ta-Adamu kwehla kuya ekuvukeni kwa-Khristu.
40.19: Manje, noma ngabe imiphefumulo kanye nemitimba yalabo losekukhulunywe ngabo yonkhe iyawuhlanganiswa kanyekanye, lababi ngalokunjalo nalabalungile, angisho; akukwenelise, kutsi ngitsi yonkhe iyawuvuka, noma-ke ngalamanye emavi, kuvuka kwabo kuyawufezeka ngaphambi kwekuvuka kwalabo labafa emvakwekuvuka kwaKhristu.
40.20: Manje, ndvodzana yami, angisho kutsi kuvuka kwabo kuyawufika ngekuvuka kwaKhristu; kodvwa buka, ngikusho nje njengembono wami, kutsi imiphefumulo kanye nemitimba iyawuhlangana futsi, yalabalungile, ekuvukeni kwaKhristu, kanye nasekwenyukeni kwakhe ezulwini.
40.21: Kodvwa noma ngabe kuyawuba sekuvukeni kwakhe noma ngemuva, angisho; kodvwa nguloku lengingakusho, kutsi kukhona sikhatsi emkhatsini wekufa kanye nekuvuka kwemtimba, kanye nesimo semphefumulo lesisekujabuleni noma lesiselusizini kute kube sikhatsi leso lesibekwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi labafile bavuke, baphindze bahlangane, umphefumulo kanye nemtimba, baphindze baletfwe kutsi batokuma ngaphambi kwaNkulunkulu, behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo.
40.22: Yebo, loku kuletsa kubuyisela kwaletintfo lokwakhulunywa ngato ngemilomo yebaphrofethi.
40.23: Umphefumulo uyawubuyiselwa emtimbeni, kanye nemtimba emphefumulweni; yebo, futsi tonkhe titfo kanye nemalunga kuyawubuyiselwa emtimbeni wako; yebo, ngisho nelunwele lwasenhloko aliyikulahleka; kodvwa tonkhe tintfo tiyawubuyiselwa esicwini sato lesingiso nalesiphelele.
40.24: Manje, ndvodzana yami, loku kubuyisela lokukhulunywe ngako ngemilomo yebaphrofethi—
40.25: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi labalungile bayawukhatimula embusweni waNkulunkulu.
40.26: Kodvwa buka, kufa lokubi kakhulu kuyeta kulababi; ngoba bona bayawukufa ngekwetintfo letiphatselene netintfo tekulunga; ngoba bona bangcolile, futsi ayikho intfo lengcolile lengakwati kudla lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu; kodvwa bayokhishelwa ngaphandle, futsi bahanjiswe bayodla titselo tekusebenta kwabo noma temisebenti yabo, leyinkhohlakalo; futsi banatse tidzidzi enkomishi lebabako.

41.1: Manje, ndvodzana yami, nginalokutsite lengitawukusho mayelana nekubuyiselwa lokukhulunywe ngako; ngoba, labanye bayiguculile imibhalo lengcwele, futsi baphambukile ngenca yalentfo. Futsi ngiyabona kutsi nengcondvo yakho beyikadze ikhatsatekile mayelana nalentfo. Kodvwa buka, ngitawuchaza loku kuwe.
41.2: Ngitsi kuwe, ndvodzana yami, lisu lekubuyisela lihambisana nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu; ngoba kusidzingo kutsi tonkhe tintfo tibuyiselwe esimeni sato sangempela. Buka, kusidzingo futsi kulungile, ngekwemandla kanye nekuvuka kwaKhristu, kutsi umphefumulo wemuntfu ubuyiselwe emtimbeni wawo, kanye nekutsi yonkhe incenye yemtimba ibuyiselwe kuwo.
41.3: Futsi kuhambisana nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu kutsi bantfu behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo; futsi uma imisebenti yabo beyikadze imihle kulemphilo, kanye netifiso tetinhlitiyo tabo betitihle, kumele ngalokunjalo, ngelusuku lwekugcina, babuyiselwe kuloko lokuhle.
41.4: Futsi uma imisebenti yabo iyebubi iyawubuyiselwa kubo ibubi. Ngako-ke, tonkhe tintfo tiyawubuyiselwa esimeni sato sangempela, yonkhe intfo esicwini sayo semvelo—lokubhubhako kuvuselwe kuloko lokungabhubhi, lokonakalako ekungonakalini—bavuselwe enjabulweni lengapheli kute badle lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu, noma elusizini lolungapheli kute badle lifa lembuso wadeveli, lomunye ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, nalomunye ngakulolunye—
41.5: Lomunye avuselwe ekujabuleni ngekwetifiso takhe tekujabula, noma lokuhle ngekwetifiso takhe tebuhle; kantsi lomunye ebubini njengekwetifiso takhe tebubi; ngoba njengoba anesifiso sekwenta lokubi ebudzeni bonkhe belusuku kanjalo uyawutfola umvuzo wakhe webubi ngesikhatsi kufika busuku.
41.6: Futsi kunjalo ngakulolunye luhlangotsi. Uma aphendvukile etonweni takhe, wafisa kulunga kwate kwaba sekupheleni kwetinsuku takhe, kanjalo uyawuzuza kulunga.
41.7: Ngibo labo labahlengwa yiNkhosi; yebo, ngibo labo labakhishelwa ngaphandle, labakhululwa kulobo busuku lobumnyama lobungapheli; futsi ngaleyondlela bayema noma bawe; ngoba buka, babehluleli babo lucobo, noma kwenta lokuhle noma kwenta lokubi.
41.8: Manje, timemetelo taNkulunkulu atigucuki; ngako-ke, indlela ilungisiwe kute loyo lotsandzako ahambe ngayo futsi asindziswe.
41.9: Manje buka, ndvodzana yami, ungabe usangena engotini yebucala ngalokumelene naNkulunkulu wakho mayelana nalawo maphuzu, emfundziso, lowuwephulile ngesikhatsi wenta sono.
41.10: Ungacabangi, kutsi ngenca yekutsi sekukhulunyiwe mayelana nekubuyisela, kutsi uyawubuyiselwa ususwe esonweni uyiswe ekujabuleni. Buka, ngitsi kuwe, bubi abutange nanini bube yinjabulo.
41.11: Manje, ndvodzana yami, bonkhe bantfu labasesimeni semvelo, noma ngitawutsi, labasesimeni sekunaka inyama, basekubabeni kwenyongo kanye nasetiphopheni tebubi; bete Nkulunkulu emhlabeni, futsi bahamba ngekuphikisana nemvelo yaNkulunkulu; ngako-ke, basesimeni lesiphikisanako nemvelo yekujabula.
41.12: Manje buka, ngabe inchazelo yeligama lelitsi kubuyisela kutsatsa intfo lesesimeni semvelo bese uyibeka esimeni lesiphikisana nesemvelo, noma kuyibeka esimeni lesiphikisana nesemvelo yayo na?
41.13: Awu, ndvodzana yami, akusiko loko; kodvwa inchazelo yeligama lelitsi kubuyisela kuphindze ubuyisele lokubi ngalokubi, noma kwenyama ngekwenyama, noma budeveli ngebudeveli—lokuhle ngaloko lokuhle; lokulungile ngaloko lokulungile; lokunesihawu ngaloko lokusihawu.
41.14: Ngako-ke, ndvodzana yami, bona kutsi unesihawu kubomnakenu; yenta ngekulunga, hlulela ngekulunga, futsi wente lokuhle njalo-njalo; futsi uma utenta tonkhe leti tintfo uyawutfola umvuzo wakho; yebo, umusa uyawuphindze ubuyiselwe kuwe; nekulunga kuyawuphindze kubuyiselwe kuwe; kwehlulelwa lokulungile kuyawubuyiselwa kuwe futsi; uyawuphindze utfole umvuzo webuhle.
41.15: Ngoba loko lokutfumelako kuyawubuyela kuwe futsi, kuphindze kubuyiselwe; ngako-ke, ligama lekubuyisela ngalokugcwele liyasilahla ngelicala soni, alisitsetseleli nakancane.

42.1: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngiyabona kutsi kukhona lokunye lokutsite lokusakhatsata ingcodvo yakho, longakucondzi—lokumayelana nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu ekujeziseni soni; ngoba utama kucabanga kutsi akusiko kulunga kutsi soni siyiswe esimeni selusizi.
42.2: Manje buka, ndvodzana yami, ngitawuchaza lentfo kuwe. Ngoba buka, emvakwekutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ikhiphe batali betfu bekucala ensimini yase-Edeni, bayolima umhlaba, lapho bebatsetfwe khona—yebo, yamkhipha umuntfu, yabeka emphumalanga yensimu yase-Edeni likherubhi, kanye nenkemba levutsako leyayigucukela etindzaweni tonkhe, kugadza lesihlahla sekuphila—
42.3: Manje, siyabona kutsi umuntfu besekafanana naNkulunkulu, sekati lokuhle nalokubi; futsi hleze elule sandla sakhe, aphindze atsatse esihlahleni sekuphila, adle bese uphila ingunaphakadze, iNkosi Nkulunkulu yabeka likherubhi kanye nenkemba levutsako, kute angasidli leso sitselo—
42.4: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona, kutsi kwabakhona sikhatsi lesabekelwa umuntfu kutsi aphendvuke, yebo, sikhatsi sekuvivinywa, sikhatsi sekuphendvuka kanye nesekusebentela Nkulunkulu.
42.5: Ngoba buka, kube Adamu welula sandla sakhe ngekushesha, wadla esihlahleni sekuphila, bekatophila ingunaphakadze, ngekwelivi laNkulunkulu, angenasikhatsi sekuphendvuka; yebo, ngetulu kwaloko nelivi laNkulunkulu lalitawuba yintfo lengenamsebenti, futsi lisu lelikhulu lensindziso laliyawuvimbeleka.
42.6: Kodvwa buka, kwakumisiwe kutsi umuntfu afe—ngako-ke, njengoba bavinjelwa esihlahleni sekuphila, kumele basuswe emhlabeni—futsi umuntfu wabese uba ngulolahlekile ingunaphakadze, yebo, base baba bantfu labawile.
42.7: Manje, ngaloku uyabona kutsi batali betfu bekucala bavinjelwa ngekwenyama kanye nangekwakamoya kutsi bete eNkhosini, futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi baba ngulabalandzela intsandvo yabo.
42.8: Manje buka, bekungakadzineki kutsi umuntfu asindziswe kulokufa kwenyama, ngoba loko bekuyawumisa lisu lelikhulu lenjabulo.
42.9: Ngako-ke, njengoba umphefumulo wawungeke ufe nanini, futsi nekuwa bekuletse kuwo wonkhe umuntfu kufa ngekwakamoya kanjalo nekwemtimba, lokungukutsi, babese bayehlukaniswa neNkhosi, kwakudzingekile kutsi wonkhe umuntfu abuyiswe kulokufa ngekwakamoya.
42.10: Ngako-ke njengoba bese kungulabanaka kwemhlaba, kwemvelo, nekwebudeveli, ngekwendalo, lesi simo sekuvivinywa kwaba simo sabo sekulungiselela; kwaba simo sekutilungiselela.
42.11: Manje khumbula, ndvodzana yami, kube kwakungasiko kutsi kwakungenca yelisu lekuhlengwa, (uma silibeka eceleni) masinyane nje ngesikhatsi bafa imiphefumulo yabo yayiyawuba selusizini, seyihlukanisiwe neNkhosi.
42.12: Manje, bekute indlela yekusindzisa bantfu kulesimo sekuwa, umuntfu lebekasiletse etikwakhe ngenca yekungalaleli kwakhe lucobo;
42.13: Ngako-ke, ngekulunga, lisu lekuhlengwa lalingenakwenteka, ngaphandle kwemibandzela yekuphendvuka kwebantfu kulesimo sekuvivinywa, yebo, lesimo sikutilungiselela; ngoba ngephandle kwekutsi kube ngenca yalemibandzela, umusa wawungeke ukwati kusebenta ngaphandle kwekutsi umise umsebenti wekulunga. Manje umsebenti wekulunga wawungenakumiswa; uma kunjalo, Nkulunkulu bekatawuyekela kuba nguNkulunkulu.
42.14: Ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi wonkhe umuntfu wawa, futsi bese babanjwe kulunga; yebo, kulunga kwaNkulunkulu, lokwabayisa ekutseni behlukaniswe ingunaphakadze naye.
42.15: Manje, lisu lemusa lalingeke lenteke ngaphandle kwekutsi kwentiwe inhlawulo, ngako-ke Nkulunkulu lucobo lwakhe wahlawulela tono temhlaba; kute aletse lisu lemusa, kwenelisa tidzingo tekulunga, kute Nkulunkulu abe ngulophelele, Nkulunkulu lolungile, futsi ngalokunjalo naNkulunkulu lonemusa.
42.16: Manje, kuphendvuka kwakungeke kute kubantfu ngaphandle kwekutsi kube khona sijeziso, naso futsi lesasisaphakadze njengoba imphilo yemphefumulo kumele ibe njalo, lesasibekiwe saphikisana nelisu lenjabulo, nalo lelalilaphakadze njengemphilo yemphefumulo.
42.17: Manje, umuntfu bekangaphendvuka kanjani ngaphandle kwekutsi one na? Bekangona kanjani uma umtsetfo wawungekho? Bewungaba khona kanjani umtsetfo ngaphandle kwekutsi kube khona sijeziso na?
42.18: Manje, kwakukhona sijeziso lesasibekiwe, kanye nemtsetfo lolungile lowawumisiwe, lowawuletsa kutisola kwanembeza kumuntfu.
42.19: Manje, uma ngabe bekute umtsetfo lomisiwe—kutsi uma umuntfu abulala naye kumele afe—ngabe bekatawusaba yini kutsi utawufa uma angabulala na?
42.20: Futsi ngalokunjalo, uma bekute umtsetfo lobekiwe ngalokumelene nesono bantfu bebangeke bakwesabe kufa.
42.21: Futsi uma bekute umtsetfo lobekiwe, uma bantfu bona kulunga bekungentani, noma nemusa ngalokunjalo, ngoba bekungeke kufune lutfo esidalweni?
42.22: Kodvwa kukhona umtsetfo lobekiwe, nesijeziso lesibekiwe, kanye nekuphendvuka lokuniketiwe; kuphendvuka loko, lokufunwa ngumusa; ngaphandle kwaloko, kulunga kuyasifuna sidalwa bese kusebentisa umtsetfo, bese umtsetfo wehlisa sijeziso; uma kungenjalo, imisebenti yekulunga ingaphela, futsi Nkulunkulu angayekela kuba nguNkulunkulu.
42.23: Kodvwa Nkulunkulu akayekeli kuba nguNkulunkulu, futsi umusa uyamemukela lotisolako, futsi umusa uta ngenca yenhlawulo; inhlawulo yenta kwenteke kuvuka kwalabafile; kuvuka kwalabafile kubuyisela bantfu emuva kuNkulunkulu; futsi ngaleyondlela babuyiselwa ebukhoneni bakhe, kute behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo, ngekwemtsetfo kanye nangekulunga.
42.24: Ngoba buka, kulunga kusebentisa tonkhe tidzingo tako, ngalokunjalo nemusa ufuna konkhe lokungekwawo; ngaleyondlela kute namunye kodvwa labo labatisola ngekweliciniso labasindziswako.
42.25: Ngabe ucabanga kutsi umusa ungakwemuka kulunga na? Ngitsi kuwe, Cha; nakancane nje. Uma kunjalo, Nkulunkulu angayekela kuba nguNkulunkulu.
42.26: Futsi ngaleyondlela Nkulunkulu wenta tinhloso takhe letinkhulu netaphakadze, letatilungiswe kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba. Futsi ngaleyondlela kweta kusindziswa kanye nekuhlengwa kwebantfu, futsi ngalokunjalo nekubhujiswa kwabo kanye nelusizi.
42.27: Ngako-ke, Awu ndvodzana yami, loyo loyawukuta angeta futsi anatse emantini ekuphila ngekukhululeka; futsi loyo longeyukuta akanakuphocelelwa kutsi ete; kodvwa ngelusuku lwekugcina kuyawubuyiselwa kuye ngekwetento takhe.
42.28: Uma bekanesifiso sekwenta lokubi, futsi angaphendvukanga etinsukwini takhe, buka, bubi buyawukwentiwa kuye, njengekubuyisela kwaNkulunkulu.
42.29: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngifisa kutsi ungativumeli letintfo kutsi tikukhatsate nanini, vumela kukhatsatwa tono takho kuphela, kukhatsatwa loko lokuyawukwehlisela phansi ekuphendvukeni.
42.30: Awu Ndvodzana yami, ngifisa kutsi ungaphindzi ukuphike kulunga kwaNkulunkulu nanini. Ungatami kutikhulula nakancane nje ngenca yetono takho, ngekuphika kulunga kwaNkulunkulu; kodvwa vumela kulunga kwaNkulunkulu, nemusa wakhe, kanye nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe kube nemtselela logcwele enhlitiyweni yakho; futsi kuvumele kukuletse phansi elutfulini ngekutitfoba.
42.31: Manje, Awu ndvodzana yami, ubitwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi ushumayele livi kulaba bantfu. Manje, ndvodzana yami, hamba ngendlela yakho, umemetele livi ngeliciniso kanye nangebucotfo, kute uletse imiphefumulo ekuphendvukeni, kute lisu lelikhulu lemusa libazuze. Futsi shengatsi Nkulunkulu angakupha njengekwemavi ami. Amen.

43.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi emadvodzana a-Alima ahamba aya emkhatsini webantfu, kute amemetele livi kubo. Na-Alima ngalokunjalo, bekangakwati kuphumula, naye wahamba.
43.2: Manje asisenokusho lutfo lokunye mayelana nekushumayela kwabo, ngaphandle nje kwekutsi balishumayela livi, kanye neliciniso, ngekwemoya wekuphrofetha kanye newekwembulelwa; futsi bashumayela ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu labebabitwe ngalo.
43.3: Manje sengibuyela emlandvweni wetimphi emkhatsini wemaNefi kanye nemaLamani, ngemnyaka welishumi nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli.
43.4: Ngoba buka, kwenteka kutsi emaZoramu aba ngemaLamani; ngako-ke, ekucaleni kwemnyaka welishumi nesiphohlongo bantfu bemaNefi babona kutsi emaLamani beseketa etikwabo; ngako-ke benta emalungiselelo emphi; yebo, babutsela ndzawonye emabutfo abo eveni laseJeshoni.
43.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani eta netinkhulungwane tawo; eta angena eveni lase-Anthiyonamu, lekulive lemaZoramu; futsi indvodza le libito layo kwakunguZerahemna yayingumholi wawo.
43.6: Manje, njengoba ema-Amaleki ngekwawo bekabantfu labebanebubi kakhulu futsi ababulali kakhulu kunaloko emaLamani labekangiko, ngako-ke, Zerahemna wabeka tindvuna letinkhulu ngetulu kwemaLamani, futsi tonkhe betingema-Amaleki kanye nemaZoramu.
43.7: Manje loku wakwenta kute agcine inzondo yabo kumaNefi, kute abaletse ngaphansi kwakhe kute afeze emacebo akhe.
43.8: Ngoba buka, emacebo akhe beka ekuphehla emaLamani kutsi atfukutselele emaNefi; loku wakwenta kute atfole emandla lamakhulu ngetulu kwawo, futsi ngalokunjalo kute azuze emandla ngetulu kwemaNefi ngekuwaletsa ebugcilini.
43.9: Manje lisu lemaNefi bekukusekela emave abo, netindlu tabo, nebafati babo, kanye nebantfwana babo, kute babavikele etandleni tetitsa tabo; ngetulu kwaloko kute bavikele emalungelo abo kanye nenzuzo yabo, yebo, kanjalo nenkhululeko yabo, kute badvumise Nkulunkulu njengekwetifiso tabo.
43.10: Ngoba bebati kutsi uma bangawela etandleni temaLamani, nekutsi loyo loyawukhonta Nkulunkulu ngekwakamoya kanye nangeliciniso, Nkulunkulu weliciniso futsi lophilako, emaLamani abeyawumbulala.
43.11: Yebo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko bebati ngenzondo lenkhulu yemaLamani kubomnakabo, labebabantfu baka-Anthi-Nefi-Lehi, labebabitwa ngebantfu ba-Amoni—futsi bebangeke bate batitsatse tikhali tabo, yebo, bebangene esivumelwaneni futsi bebangeke bate basephule—ngako-ke, uma bebangawela etandleni temaLamani bebayawubulawa.
43.12: Futsi emaNefi bekangayuvuma kutsi babulawe; ngako-ke babanika emave kutsi abe ngemafa abo.
43.13: Futsi bantfu ba-Amoni bawaniketa emaNefi incenye lenkhulu yemphahla yabo kute basekele emabutfo abo; ngaleyondlela emaNefi aphoceleka, wona odvwa, kutsi amelane nemaLamani, labebayinhlanganisela yaLamani naLemuweli, kanye nemadvodzana a-Ishmayeli, kanye nabo bonkhe labo labebahlubuke kumaNefi, labebangema-Amaleki nemaZoramu, kanye nesitukulwane sebaphristi baNowa.
43.14: Manje leso situkulwane besisiningi kakhulu, cishe, njengemaNefi; futsi ngaleyondlela emaNefi aphoceleleka kutsi alwe nabomnakabo, ngisho nangekucitsa ingati.
43.15: Futsi kwenteka ngesikhatsi emabutfo emaLamani sekabutsene ndzawonye eveni lase-Anthiyonamu, buka, emabutfo emaNefi besekatilungiselele kutsi ahlangane nabo eveni laseJeshoni.
43.16: Manje, umholi wemaNefi, noma indvodza lebeyibekwe kutsi ibe yindvuna lenkhulu ngetulu kwemaNefi—manje indvuna lenkhulu beyikhuta onkhe emabutfo emaNefi—libito lakhe bekunguMoroni.
43.17: Moroni nguye lobekekhuta, futsi aphetse timphi tabo. Bekaneminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nesihlanu nje kuphela budzala ngesikhatsi abekwa kutsi abe yindvuna lenkhulu ngetulu kwemabutfo emaNefi.
43.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wahlangana nemaLamani eminceleni yaseJeshoni, bantfu bakhe bebahlome ngetinkemba, nangabocelemba, kanye nangato tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali temphi.
43.19: Ngesikhatsi emabutfo emaLamani abona kutsi bantfu baNefi, noma kutsi Moroni, besekabalungiselele bantfu bakhe ngetivikelo tetifuba kanye nangetivikelo temkhono, yebo, futsi kanjalo nangetihlangu tekuvikela tinhloko tabo, ngetulu kwaloko bagcoke tingubo leticinile—
43.20: Manje emabutfo aZerahemna bekangakatilungiseleli ngalutfo lolufana naleti tintfo; bona bebaphetse kuphela tinkemba tabo nabocelemba babo, butjoki babo kanye nemicibisholo yabo, ematje abo kanye netilingi tabo; futsi bona bebangcunu, ngaphandle nje kwesikhumba lebesitungelete tinkhalo tabo; yebo, bonkhe bebangcunu, ngaphandle kwemaZoramu kanye nema-Amaleki.
43.21: Kodvwa bona bebangakahlomi ngetivikelo tesifuba, noma tihlangu—ngako-ke, bawesaba kakhulu emabutfo emaNefi ngenca yetikhali tawo, nanoma sibalo sabo sasingetulu kunaleso semaNefi.
43.22: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi abatange balokotse nakancane basondzele kutolwa nemaNefi eminceleni yaseJeshoni; ngako-ke bahamba baphuma eveni lase-Anthiyonamu baya ehlane, batsatsa luhambo lwabo batungeleta lihlane, baya ngasenhloko yemfula iSidoni, kute babuyele eveni laseManthi futsi balitsatse live libe labo; ngoba bebangacabangi kutsi emabutfo aMoroni ayati kutsi baye ngakuphi.
43.23: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi, masinyane nje ngesikhatsi sebahambile baya ehlane Moroni watfumela tinhloli taya ehlane kutsi tiyoyibuka inkambu yabo; Moroni, ngetulu kwaloko, ati ngetiphrofetho ta-Alima, watfumela emadvodza latsite kuye, anesifiso sekutsi abute eNkhosini kutsi emabutfo emaNefi ngabe bekufanele aye ngakuphi kuyawutivikela kumaLamani.
43.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi leNkhosi leta ku-Alima, Alima watitjela titfunywa taMoroni, kutsi emabutfo emaLamani bekahamba atungeleta lihlane, kute afike eveni laseManthi, kute acale kuhlasela ngasencenyeni lebutsakatsaka yebantfu. Titfunywa leto tahamba tayawukwetfula umlayeto kuMoroni.
43.25: Manje Moroni, washiya incenye yelibutfo lakhe eveni laseJeshoni, hleze ngandlela tsite incenye yemaLamani ifike kulelo live ititsatsele lidolobha libe labo, watsatsa incenye lebeyisele yemphi yakhe wahamba nayo waya eveni laseManthi.
43.26: Futsi wenta kutsi bonkhe bantfu kuleyoncenye yelive bahlangane ndzawonye kute balwe nemaLamani, kute bavikele imihlaba yabo kanye nelive labo, emalungelo abo kanye nenkhululeko yabo; ngako-ke bese basilungele sikhatsi sekufika kwemaLamani.
43.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wenta kutsi imphi yakhe ibhace esigodzini lebesisedvute nelusentse lwemfula iSidoni, lebesisenshonalanga yemfula iSidoni ehlane.
43.28: Moroni waphindze wabeka tinhloli tatungeleta, kute ati ngesikhatsi libutfo lemaLamani selita.
43.29: Manje, njengoba Moroni bekayati inhloso yemaLamani, kutsi bekuyinhloso yawo kutsi abulale bomnakabo, noma kutsi babacindzetele futsi babaletse ebugcilini kute batakhele umbuso ngetulu kwalo lonkhe live;
43.30: Ngetulu kwaloko ati kutsi bekungiso kuphela sifiso semaNefi kutsi agcine emave awo, nenkhululeko yawo, kanye nelibandla lawo, ngako-ke wabona kutsi bekungasiso sono kutsi abavikele ngelicebo; ngako-ke, watfola ngetinhloli takhe kutsi nguyiphi indlela emaLamani labekatawuyitsatsa.
43.31: Ngako-ke, walehlukanisa libutfo lakhe waletsa incenye esigodzini, futsi walibhacisa emphumalanga, kanye naseningizimu yeligcuma iRiphila.
43.32: Kwatsi labasalako wababhacisa esigodzini lesisenshonalanga, enshonalanga yemfula iSidoni, kwehla njalo kuya eminceleni yelive iManthi.
43.33: Futsi ngaleyondlela asalibekile libutfo lakhe njengekwesifiso sakhe, besekatilungiselele kutsi ahlangane nawo.
43.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani eta akhuphukela ngasenyakatfo yeligcuma, lapho incenye yelibutfo laMoroni beyibhace khona.
43.35: Ngesikhatsi emaLamani sekandlulile egcumeni iRiphila, sekafike esigodzini, sekacala kuwela umfula iSidoni, libutfo lebelibhace eningizimu yeligcuma, lebeliholwa yindvodza libito layo kunguLehi, yalihola libutfo layo laya phambili lawatungeleta emaLamani emphumalanga emvakwawo.
43.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi emaNefi atseleka etikwawo emvakwawo, agucukela kuwo acala alwa nelibutfo laLehi.
43.37: Kubulala kwacala etinhlangotsini totimbili, kodvwa kwaba kubi kakhulu encenyeni yemaLamani, ngoba bungcunu bebungakavikeleki emagalelweni lamatima emaNefi ngetinkemba tawo kanye nangabocelemba babo, lebekuletsa kufa cishe ngawo onkhe emagalelo.
43.38: Kantsi ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, bekukhona nje lapha nalapha indvodza lebeyiwa emkhatsini wemaNefi, ngetinkemba tawo kanye nangekulahleka kwengati, ngenca yekutsi bona bebavikelekile etindzaweni letibucayi emitimbeni yabo, noma tindzawo letibucayi kakhulu temtimba betivikelekile emagalelweni emaLamani, ngetivikelo tesifuba tawo, nangetivikelo temkhono tawo, kanye netivikelo tenhloko tawo; futsi emaNefi achubeka kanjalo-ke nekubulala emkhatsini wemaLamani.
43.39: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani acala kwesaba, ngenca yekubulawa lokukhulu emkhatsini wawo, ate acala kubalekela ngasemfuleni iSidoni.
43.40: Futsi acoshwa nguLehi kanye nemadvodza akhe; achutjwa nguLehi ate afika emantini aseSidoni, ancamula emantini aseSidoni. Lehi wahlala nelibutfo lakhe elusentseni lwemfula iSidoni kute angaweli.
43.41: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni kanye nelibutfo lakhe bahlangana nemaLamani esigodzini, kulenye incenye yemfula iSidoni, futsi bacala kutseleka etikwawo bawabulala.
43.42: EmaLamani aphindza ababalekela, aya ngaseveni laseManthi; aphindze ahlangabetana nemabutfo aMoroni.
43.43: Manje kuloku emaLamani alwa kakhulu; yebo, bekangakate emaLamani atiwe alwa ngemandla lamakhulu kangaka kanye nangesibindzi lesingaka, cha, ngisho kusukela ekucaleni.
43.44: Futsi bekakhutsatwa ngemaZoramu kanye nema-Amaleki, labekatindvuna letinkhulu kanye nebaholi bawo, kanye nanguZerahemna, lobekayindvuna yawo lenkhulu, noma umholi kanye nemekhuti wawo lomkhulu; yebo, alwa njengabonyokangwenya, futsi labaningi bemaNefi babulawa ngetandla tawo, yebo, ngoba abashaya tate tahlukana kabili letiningi tivikelo tenhloko tawo, ngetulu kwaloko atibhobosa letiningi tivikelo tesifuba tawo, ashaya ajuba lemininngi imikhono yawo; futsi emaLamani alwa kanjalo-ke ngentfukutselo yawo lembi kakhulu.
43.45: Noko, emaNefi bekakhutsatwa sizatfu lesincono, ngoba bekangalweli nje kubusa noma emandla kodvwa bekalwela emakhaya awo nenkhululeko yawo, bafati bawo kanye nebantfwana bawo, kanye nako konkhe kwawo, yebo, netimiso tawo tekukhonta kanye nelibandla lawo.
43.46: Futsi bebenta loko labebacabanga kutsi bekungumsebenti labebadzinga kuwentela Nkulunkulu wabo; ngoba iNkhosi beyishito kubo, futsi kanjalo nakuboyise, kutsi: Kangangoba ningenacala lesono sekucala, kanjalo nesesibili, aniyukuvuma kutsi nibulawe ngetandla tetitsa tenu.
43.47: Ngetulu kwaloko, iNkhosi itsite: Niyawuyivikela imindeni yenu ngisho nangekucitsa ingati. Ngako-ke emaNefi alwa nemaLamani ngenca yalesi sizatfu, kutsi ativikele wona, kanye nemindeni yawo, nemihlaba yawo, nelive lawo, nemalungelo awo, kanye nenkholo yawo.
43.48: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emadvodza aMoroni abona budlova kanye nentfukutselo yemaLamani, besebatohocisa futsi bababalekele. Futsi Moroni, ayibona inhloso yawo, watfumela phambili wabafaka inshisekelo etinhlitiyweni tawo ngalemicabango—yebo, imicabango yetindzawo tawo, inkhululeko yawo, yebo, kukhululeka kwawo ebugcilini.
43.49: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bagucukela kumaLamani, bakhala ngelivi linye eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wawo, ngenkhululeko yawo kanye nekukhululwa kwawo ebugcilini.
43.50: Futsi bacala babukana nemaLamani ngemandla; futsi ngalo lelohora bakhala eNkhosini ngenkhululeko yabo, emaLamani acala ababalekela; abaleka ate ayofika emantini aseSidoni.
43.51: Manje, emaLamani bekamaningi kakhulu, yebo, ngetulu kwalokuphindvwe kabili kwesibalo semaNefi; noko, achutjwa kangangekutsi ate agcogcelwa ndzawonye aba licembu linye esigodzini, elusentseni ngasemfuleni iSidoni.
43.52: Ngako-ke emabutfo aMoroni abatungeleta, yebo, nasetinhlangotsini totimbili temfula. Ngoba buka, emphumalanga bekukhona emadvodza aLehi.
43.53: Ngako-ke ngesikhatsi Zerahemna abona emadvodza aLehi emphumalanga yemfula iSidoni, kanye nemabutfo aMoroni enshonalanga yemfula iSidoni, kutsi bese batungeletwe ngemaNefi, besaba.
43.54: Manje Moroni, ngesikhatsi abona kwesaba kwawo, wayala emadvodza akhe kutsi akuyekele kucitsa ingati yawo.

44.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bema baphindze bahlehla bema bucadlwana nawo. Moroni watsi kuZerahemna: Buka, Zerahemna, asifuni kutsi sibe bantfu bengati. Niyati kutsi nisetandleni tetfu, kepha asifuni kutsi sinibulale.
44.2: Buka, asikaphumeli kutsi sitolwa nani kute sicitse ingati yenu kute sizuze emandla; noma asifuni kuletsa noma ngubani ejokeni lebugcili. Kodvwa lesi ngusona sizatfu nine lenite ngaso kutolwa natsi, yebo, futsi nisitfukutselele ngenca yenkholo yetfu.
44.3: Kodvwa manje, niyabona kutsi iNkhosi inatsi; futsi niyabona kutsi iniletsile etandleni tetfu. Manje ngifuna kutsi nicondze kutsi loku sikwentelwe ngenca yenkholo yetfu kanye nelukholo lwetfu kuKhristu. Manje niyabona kutsi aninokwati kulucedza lolu lukholo lwetfu.
44.4: Manje seniyabona kutsi lolu lukholo lweliciniso lwaNkulunkulu; yebo. Niyabona kutsi Nkulunkulu utawusisekela, asigcine, aphindze asilondvolote, uma nje setsembeka kuye, naselukholweni lwetfu, kanye nasenkholweni yetfu, futsi angeke nanini iNkhosi ivumele kutsi sibhujiswe ngaphandle kwekutsi siwele esiphambukweni futsi siluphike lukholo lwetfu.
44.5: Manje, Zerahemna, ngiyakuyaleta, egameni laloyo Nkulunkulu lonemandla onkhe, locinise imikhono yetfu kute sitfole emandla ngetulu kwenu, ngelukholo lwetfu, ngenkholo yetfu, kanye nangetimiso tetfu tekukhonta, kanye nangelibandla letfu, kanye nangekusekelwa lokungcwele lokufanele sibonge bafati betfu kanye nebantfwana betfu ngako, ngaleyo nkhululeko lesenta sibambelele emihlabeni yetfu kanye naseveni letfu; yebo, futsi kanjalo nangekugcinwa kwelivi lelingcwele laNkulunkulu, lokufanele silibonge ngayo yonkhe injabulo yetfu; nangako konkhe lokutsandzeka kakhulu kitsi—
44.6: Yebo, akusiko loku kuphela; ngiyaniyaleta ngato tonkhe tifiso leninato kute niphile, kutsi niletse lapha tikhali tenu temphi, futsi angeke sifune ingati yenu, kodvwa sitawutisindzisa timphilo tenu, uma nje ningahamba ningaphindzi nibuye kutolwa natsi.
44.7: Manje, uma ningakwenti loku, bukani, nisetandleni tetfu, futsi ngitawuyaleta bantfu bami kutsi banihlasele, banishaye ngemanceba ekufa emitimbeni yenu, kute ningasabi khona; futsi ngaleyondela sitawubona kutsi ngubani lotoba nemandla ngetulu kwalaba bantfu; yebo, sitawubona kutsi ngubani lotawuletfwa ebugcilini.
44.8: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Zerahemna asayivile lenkhulumo weta ngaphambili wabeka inkemba yakhe kanye nacelemba wakhe, kanye nebutjoki bakhe etandleni taMoroni, watsi kuye: Buka nati tikhali tetfu temphi; sitawutiletsa kuwe, kodvwa angeke sivume kwenta sifungo kuwe sibe sati, kutsi sitosiphula, futsi ngalokunjalo nebantfwana betfu; kodvwa titsatse tikhali tetfu temphi, bese uyasivumela kutsi sihambe siye ehlane; kungenjalo sitawutigcina tinkemba tetfu, futsi sitawufa noma sincobe.
44.9: Buka, tsine asisibo belukholo lwenu, asikholwa kutsi nguNkulunkulu lona losiletse etandleni tenu; kodvwa kutsi bucili benu lobunivikele etinkembeni tetfu. Buka, tivikelo tesifuba kanye netihlangu tenu letinivikele.
44.10: Manje ngesikhatsi Zerahemna asacedzile kukhuluma lamavi, Moroni wabuyisela inkemba kanye netikhali temphi, lebekatemukele, kuZerahemna, watsi: Buka, sitawuyicedza lencabano.
44.11: Manje angisakwati kuwabuyisela emuva emavi lengiwakhulumile, njengoba iNkhosi iphila, aninawusuka ngaphandle kwekutsi nisuke nesifungo sekutsi angeke nisaphindze nibuye kutolwa natsi. Manje njengoba nisetandleni tetfu sitawuyicitsa ingati yenu igcwale phansi, noma nivumele lemibandzela lengiyiphakamisile.
44.12: Manje ngesikhatsi Moroni asawashito lamavi, Zerahemna watsatsa inkemba yakhe, wamtfukutselela Moroni, wagijima waya ngaphambili kute abulale Moroni; kodvwa ngesikhatsi aphakamisa inkemba yakhe, buka, linye lemasotja aMoroni wayishaya yawa, futsi yaphuka ngakuso sibambo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko lamshaya Zarahemna ngendlela yekutsi lasusa lukhakhayi lwakhe lwawela phansi. Futsi Zerahemna wesuka kubo wangena emkhatsini wemabutfo akhe.
44.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lisotja lelalime edvute, lelo lelashaya lasusa lukhakhayi lwaZerahemna, lalutsatsa lukhakhayi lolo lwaluphansi ngetinwele, lalubeka ekucijeni kwenkemba, futsi laluphakamisa ngetulu kwabo, litsi kubo ngelivi lelikhulu:
44.14: Njengoba lolu lukhakhayi luwele phansi, lokulukhakhayi lwemholi wenu, nani ngalokunjalo nitowela phansi ngaphandle kwekutsi niletse tikhali tenu temphi bese niyahamba nesivumelwano sekuthula.
44.15: Manje bekamaningi, ngesikhatsi eva lamavi futsi alubona lukhakhayi lolwalusenkembeni, angenwa kwesaba; lamaningi eta ngaphambili atilahla phansi tikhali tawo temphi etinyaweni taMoroni, futsi angena esivumelwaneni sekuthula. Futsi ngebuningi balawo langena esivumelwaneni avunyelwa kutsi ahambe aye ehlane.
44.16: Manje kwenteka kutsi Zerahemna watfukutsela kakhulu, futsi wawaphehla lasele emasotja akhe kutsi atfukutsele, kutsi alwe ngemandla lamakhulu nemaNefi.
44.17: Manje naMoroni watfuketsela, ngenca yenkhani yemaLamani; ngako-ke wayaleta bantfu bakhe kutsi bawahlasele phindze bawabulale. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bacala bawabulala; yebo, nemaLamani alwa ngetinkemba tawo nangemandla awo.
44.18: Kodvwa buka, tikhumba tawo letingcunu kanye netinhloko tawo letisebaleni kwakusebungotini betimkemba letikhaliphako temaNefi; yebo, buka ahlatjwa aphindze ashaywa, yebo, awa ngekushesha lokukhulu phambi kwetinkemba temaNefi; futsi acala esuswa, njengoba lisotja laMoroni laliphrofethile.
44.19: Manje Zerahemna, ngesikhatsi abona kutsi cishe bonkhe bese batobulawa, wakhala kakhulu kuMoroni, atsembisa kutsi bekatosenta sivumelwano nabo futsi ngalokunjalo nebantfu bakhe, uma nje bangasindzisa timphilo talabebasele, nekutsi bebangeke basaphindza nanini bete kutolwa nabo.
44.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wenta kutsi lesento sekubulala asiphele futsi emkhatsini walabantfu. Watitsatsa tikhali temphi kumaLamani; futsi emvakwekutsi sebangene esivumelwaneni sekuthula naye avunyelwa kutsi ahambe aye ehlane.
44.21: Manje sibalo salabafile babo alibalwanga ngenca yebukhulu baleso sibalo; yebo, sibalo salabafile babo sasisikhulu kakhulu, kumaNefi kanye nakumaLamani.
44.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babaphonsa labafile babo emantini aseSidoni, futsi tidvumbu tabo setikhukhulekile taze tayongcwatjwa ekujuleni kwelwandle.
44.23: Futsi emabutfo emaNefi, noma aMoroni, abuyela emakhaya kanye nasemihlabeni yawo.
44.24: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka welishumi nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi. Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umbhalo wa-Alima, lowawubhalwe kubongcwengcwe baNefi.

45.intro: Umlandvo webantfu baNefi, kanye netimphi kanye nekuphikisana kwabo, ngetinsuku taHilamani, ngekwembhalo waHilamani, lawugcina etinsukwini takhe.
45.1: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNefi bebajabule kakhulu, ngoba iNkhosi yayiphindze yabakhipha futsi etandleni tetitsa tabo; ngako-ke bayibonga iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo; yebo, bazila kakhulu baphindze bathandaza kakhulu, futsi bamkhonta Nkulunkulu ngenjabulo lenkhulu kakhulu.
45.2: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka welishumi nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi, kutsi Alima weta kundvodzana yakhe Hilamani watsi kuyo: Uyawakholwa yini emavi lengawakhuluma kuwe mayelana naleyo mibhalo legciniwe na?
45.4: Alima waphindze watsi: Uyakholwa yini kuJesu Khristu, lotawukuta na?
45.5: Yena watsi: Yebo, ngiyawakholwa onkhe emavi lowakhulumile.
45.6: Alima waphindze watsi kuye: Utawuyigcina yini imiyaleto yami na?
45.7: Yena watsi: Yebo, ngitawuyigcina imiyaleto yakho ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yami.
45.8: Emvakwaloko Alima watsi kuye: Ubusisiwe; futsi iNkhosi itawukuphumelelisa kulelive.
45.9: Kodvwa buka, nginalokutsite lengitokuphrofetha kuwe; kodvwa loko lengitokuphrofetha kuwe ungakuveti; yebo, loku lengikuphrofetha kuwe akuyuvetwa, site siphrofetho sigcwaliseke; ngako-ke bhala lamavi lengitawuwakhuluma.
45.10: Nawa lamavi: Buka, ngiyabona kutsi bona kanye laba bantfu, emaNefi, ngekwemoya wekwembulelwa lokimi, eminyakeni lengemakhulu lamane kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi Jesu Khristu ayawutiveta ngaso kubo, bayawuncishelwa kukholwa.
45.11: Yebo, futsi ngaleso sikhatsi bayawubona timphi kanye nabomashayabhuce betifo, yebo, indlala kanye nekucitseka kwengati, bate bantfu baNefi baphele nya—
45.12: Yebo, futsi loku kungenca yekutsi bayawuncishelwa kukholwa bawele emisebentini yebumnyama, kanye nasetinkhanukweni, kanye nakuto tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi; yebo, ngitsi kuwe, ngenca yekutsi bayawukona ngalokumelene nekukhanya lokukhulu kangaka kanye nelwati lolungaka, yebo, ngitsi kuwe, kusukela ngalolo suku, nesitukulwane sesine angeke sendlule sonkhe ngaphambi kwekutsi lobu bubi lobukhulu bufike.
45.13: Futsi ngesikhatsi lolo suku lolukhulu lufika, buka, sikhatsi siyeta masinyane kutsi labo manje, noma intalelwane yalabo manje lababalwa emkhatsini wentalelwane yebantfu baNefi, angeke babalwe emkhatsini webantfu baNefi.
45.14: Kodvwa loyo loyawusala, angabulawa ngalolo suku lolukhulu nalolwesabekako, uyawubalwa emkhatsini wemaLamani, futsi uyawukuba njengawo, bonkhe, ngaphandle nje kwalabambalwa labayawubitwa ngebafundzi beNkhosi; futsi emaLamani ayawubatingela bate baphele nya. Manje, ngenca yebubi, lesiphrofetho siyawugcwaliseka.
45.15: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Alima asatishito leti tintfo kuHilamani, wambusisa, kanjalo nalamanye emadvodzana akhe; futsi ngetulu kwaloko wawubusisa umhlaba ngenca yalabalungile.
45.16: Futsi watsi: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu—Liyawucalekiswa live, yebo, leli live, kuto tonkhe tive, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nebantfu, kuye ekubhujisweni, kwabo labenta bubi, uma sebavutfwe ngalokuphelele; futsi njengoba sengishito kuyawuba njalo; ngoba lesi sicalekiso kanye nesibusiso saNkulunkulu kulelive, ngoba iNkhosi ayinakusibuka sono isivumele ngisho nakancane.
45.17: Manje ngesikhatsi Alima sekawashito lamavi walibusisa libandla, yebo, bonkhe labo labebatokuma bacine elukholweni kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili.
45.18: Futsi ngesikhatsi Alima sekakwentile loku wesuka waphuma eveni laseZarahemla, kwaba shengatsi uya eveni laseMelekhi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi akuphindzanga kwevakala lutfo ngaye; mayelana nekufa kwakhe noma kungcwatjwa kwakhe asati lutfo ngako.
45.19: Buka, nguloku lesikwatiko, kutsi abeyindvodza lelungile; futsi emahemuhemu agcwala live lonkhe ebandleni kutsi watsatfwa nguMoya, noma wangcwatjwa ngesandla seNkhosi, njengaMosi. Kodvwa buka, imibhalo lengcwele itsi iNkhosi yamtsatsa Mosi yamletsa kuyo; futsi siyacabanga kutsi ngalokunjalo seyimukele na-Alima emoyeni, yamletsa kuyo; ngako-ke, ngenca yalesi sizatfu asati lutfo mayelana nekufa kanye nekungcwatjwa kwakhe.
45.20: Manje kwenteka ekucaleni kwenyaka welishumi nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi, kutsi Hilamani wahamba emkhatsini webantfu kute amemetele livi kubo.
45.21: Ngoba buka, ngenca yetimphi tabo nemaLamani kanye nekuphikisana lokuningi lokungasho lutfo kanye nekuphatamiseka lokwakusemkhatsini webantfu, kwabonakala kufanele kutsi livi laNkulunkulu limenyetelwe emkhatsini wabo, yebo, futsi nekutsi kuhlelembiswe libandla lonkhe.
45.22: Ngako-ke Hilamani kanye nabomnakabo bachubeka nekumisa libandla futsi eveni lonkhe, yebo, kuwo onkhe emadolobha eveni lonkhe lokwakulebantfu baNefi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi babeka baphristi kanye nebafundzisi kulo lonkhe live, ngetulu kwawo onkhe emabandla.
45.23: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Hilamani kanye nabomnakabo sebabeke baphristi kanye nebafundzisi ebandleni kwavuka kuphikisana emkhatsini wabo, futsi abafunanga kulalela emavi aHilamani kanye nabomnakabo;
45.24: Kodvwa bakhula ekutikhukhumeteni baphakeme etinhlitiyweni tabo, ngenca yengcebo yabo leningi kakhulu; ngako-ke bakhula banotsa emehlweni abo, futsi abafunanga kulalela emavi abo, kutsi bahambe ngebucotfo phambi kwaNkulunkulu.

46.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngebuningi balabo labebangafuni kuwalalela emavi aHilamani kanye nabomnakabo babutsana ndzawonye ngalokumelene nabomnakabo.
46.2: Manje buka, bebatfukutsele kakhulu, kangangekutsi bebaphokophele kutsi bababulale.
46.3: Manje umholi walabo labebatfukutselele bomnakabo bekamkhulu futsi ayindvodza lecinile; libito lakhe bekungu-Amalikhiya.
46.4: Amalikhiya bekanesifiso sekutsi abe yinkhosi; nalabo bantfu labebatfukutsele nabo ngalokunjalo bebanesifiso sekutsi abe yinkhosi yabo; futsi bebayincenye lenkhulu yalabo labebabehluleli labancane belive, labebafuna emandla.
46.5: Bebaholwe ngu-Amalikhiya ngekubayenga, kutsi uma bangamsekela baphindze bambeke kutsi abe yinkhosi yabo uyawubenta babe babusi ngetulu kwebantfu.
46.6: Ngaleyondlela Amalikhiya wabaholela khashane ekuhlubukeni, nanoma kungenshumayelo yaHilamani nabomnakabo, yebo, nanoma kungekunakekela kwabo lokukhulu ebandleni, ngoba bebabaphristi labakhulu ebandleni.
46.7: Futsi bebabaningi ebandleni labebakholelwa emavini layengako a-Amalikhiya, ngako-ke bahlubuka ngisho nasebandleni; taba kanjalo-ke tindzaba tebantfu baNefi latatiyingoti kanye nebungoti lobukhulu, nanoma kungenca yekuncoba kwabo lokukhulu labebanako kumaLamani, kanye nenjabulo lenkhulu labebabe nayo ngenca yekukhululwa kwabo ngesandla seNkhosi.
46.8: Ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi bashesha kanjani bantfwana bebantfu kukhohlwa iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, yebo, bashesha kanjani kutsi bente bubi, futsi bakhohliswe ngulomubi.
46.9: Yebo, ngetulu kwaloko siyabubona bubi lobukhulu umuntfu lomubi kakhulu langabenta kutsi bube khona emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu.
46.10: Yebo, siyabona kutsi Amalikhiya, ngenca yekutsi bekayindvodza lebeyinemacebo lanebucili futsi ayindvodza lenemavi lanekuyenga lokuningi, wakhohlisa tinhlitiyo tebantfu labaningi kutsi bente bubi; yebo, nekutsi bafune kulicedza libandla laNkulunkulu futsi bacedze sisekelo senkhululeko Nkulunkulu labebanikete sona, noma sibusiso Nkulunkulu lebekasitfumele etikwebuso belive ngenca yalabalungile.
46.11: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni, lobekangumkhuti lomkhulu wemabutfo emaNefi, sekavile ngaloku kuhlubuka, wamtfukutselela Amalikhiya.
46.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wadzabula libhantji lakhe; watsatsa sicephu salo; wabhala kuso kutsi—Sikhumbuto saNkulunkulu wetfu, inkholo yetfu, nenkhululeko, nekuthula kwetfu, bafati betfu, kanye nebantfwana betfu—wasibophela esicongweni sesigodvo.
46.13: Wafasela sivikelo sakhe senhloko, nesivikelo sakhe sesifuba, kanye netikhali takhe, wabopha sivikelo sakhe elukhalo lwakhe; watsatsa sigodvo, lebesinelibhantji lakhe lebelidzatjuliwe labekwa ekugcineni kwaso, (wasibita ngekutsi sibonakaliso senkhululeko) waguca phansi, wathandaza kakhulu kuNkulunkulu wakhe athandazela tibusiso tenkhululeko kutsi tehlele etikwabomnakabo, uma nje kusekhona licembu lemaKhristu lelisasele kutsi litsatse live—
46.14: Ngoba bebabitwa kanje bonkhe labo labebakholwa ngeliciniso kuKhristu, labo labebabasebandleni laNkulunkulu, ngulabo labebangasibo basebandleni.
46.15: Futsi labo labebabasebandleni bebetsembekile; yebo, bonkhe labo labebakholwa ngeliciniso kuKhristu bamukela, ngekutfokota, libito laKhristu, noma emaKhristu njengoba bebabitwa kanjalo, ngenca yekukholwa kwabo kuKhristu lobekufanele ete.
46.16: Ngako-ke, ngalesi sikhatsi, Moroni wathandazela kutsi lokufunwa ngemaKhristu, kanye nenkhululeko yelive shengatsi kungasekelwa nguNkulunkulu.
46.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekathandaze ngenshisekelo kuNkulunkulu, lonkhe live lebeliseningizimu yelive walibita ngeNcitsakalo, yebo, kwephetsa, lonkhe live, lelisenyakatfo kanye naleliseningizimu—Walibita ngalelikhetsekile, kanye nelive lenkhululeko.
46.18: Watsi: Ngempela Nkulunkulu ngeke avume kutsi tsine, lesihlushwako ngenca yekutsi semukele libito laKhristu, sinyatselwe phansi futsi sibulawe, site sikuletse kitsi ngetiphambuko tetfu lucobo.
46.19: Ngesikhatsi Moroni sekawashito lamavi, wahamba waya emkhatsini webantfu, aphephetelisa incenye yengubo yakhe lebeyidzatjuliwe emoyeni, kute bonkhe bawubone umbhalo lobekawubhalile kuleyo ncenye lebeyidzatjuliwe, futsi bekamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu atsi:
46.20: Bukani, labo labatawusigcina lesi sibonakaliso kulelive, abete ngaphambili ngemandla eNkhosi, bangene esivumelwaneni sekutsi batawuwagcina emalungelo abo, kanye nenkholo yabo, kute iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ibabusise.
46.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni sekawamemetele lamavi, buka, bantfu beta bagijima ndzawonye netikhali tabo tiboshelwe etinkhalo tabo, badzabula tingubo tabo njengeluphawu lwekutinikela, noma njengesivumelwano, sekutsi ngeke bayilahle iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo; noma, ngalamanye emagama, uma bangaphula imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, noma bawele esiphambukweni, babe nemahloni ekubitwa ngelibito laKhristu, kuyofanele kutsi iNkhosi ibadzabule njengoba nabo badzabule tingubo tabo.
46.22: Manje lesi bekusivumelwano labasenta, futsi balahla tingubo tabo etinyaweni taMoroni, batsi: Senta sivumelwano naNkulunkulu wetfu, kutsi siyawubulawa, njengabomnaketfu labaseveni lelingasenyakatfo, uma siyawuwela esiphambukweni; yebo, angasilahla etinyaweni tetitsa tetfu, njengoba natsi siphose tingubo tetfu etinyaweni takho kutsi tigcotjwagcotjwe ngaphansi kwetinyawo, uma siyawuwela esiphambukweni.
46.23: Moroni watsi kubo: Bukani, siyinsali yentalelwane yaJakobe; yebo, siyinsali yentalelwane yaJosefa, libhantji lakhe leladzatjulwa bomnakabo labaticuku letiningi; yebo, manje bukani, asikhumbule kutsi siyigcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwaloko tingubo tetfu tiyawudzatjulwa bomnaketfu, siphoswe ejele, sitsengiswe, noma sibulawe.
46.24: Yebo, asiyigcine inkhululeko yetfu njengensali yaJosefa; yebo, asiwakhumbule emavi aJakobe, ngaphambi kwekufa kwakhe, ngoba buka, wabona kutsi incenye yensali yelibhantji laJosefa yalondvolotwa futsi ayitange ibole. Futsi watsi—Ngisho njengoba lensalela yengubo yendvodzana yami yalondvolotwa, kanjalo nensali yentalelwane yendvodzana yami iyawulondvolotwa ngesandla saNkulunkulu, futsi itsatfwe iyiswe kuye, ngesikhatsi insali yentalelwane yaJosefa ishabalala, ngisho njengensalela yengubo yakhe.
46.25: Manje buka, loku kwenta umphefumulo wami ube nelusizi; noko, umphefumulo wami unentfokoto ngendvodzana yami, ngenca yaleyo ncenye yentalelwane yayo leyawutsatfwa iyiswe kuNkulunkulu.
46.27: Manje ngubani lowatiko kutsi mhlawumbe insali yentalelwane yaJosefa, leyo leyawushabalala njengengubo yakhe, ngiyo leyo leyahlubuka kitsi na? Yebo, futsi kuyawuba ngitsi lucobo uma singemi sicine elukholweni lwaKhristu.
46.28: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni sekawashito lamavi wachubekela phambili, waphindze watfumela etincenyeni tonkhe telive lapho bekukhona kuhlubuka, wagcogcela ndzawonye bonkhe bantfu labebanesifiso sekugcina inkhululeko yabo, kutsi bamelane na-Amalikhiya kanye nalabo labebahlubukile, labebabitwa ngekutsi ngema-Amalikhiya.
46.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amalikhiya abona kutsi bantfu baMoroni bebabaningi kakhulu kunema-Amalikhiya—ngetulu kwaloko abona kutsi bantfu bakhe bebangabata mayelana nekulunga kwaleyondlela labebayitsetse—ngako-ke, anekwesaba kutsi hleze angazuzi lutfo, watsatsa labo bantfu bakhe labebafuna bahamba baya eveni laNefi.
46.30: Manje Moroni wacabanga kutsi bekungakafaneli kutsi emaLamani abe nalamanye emandla lengetiwe; ngako-ke wacabanga kutsi abavimbele bantfu ba-Amalikhiya, noma abatsatse ababuyisele emuva, bese ubulala Amalikhiya; yebo, ngoba bekati kutsi bekayawuwaphehla emaLamani kutsi abatfukutselele, futsi awente kutsi ete atolwa nabo; futsi loku bekakwati kutsi Amalikhiya bekangakwenta kute afeze tinhloso takhe.
46.31: Ngako-ke Moroni wacabanga kutsi bekufanele kutsi atsatse emabutfo akhe, labekadze agcogcene ndzawonye, atihlomisile, futsi angene esivumelwaneni sekugcina kuthula—futsi kwenteka kutsi watsatsa libutfo lakhe wahamba waphuma nemathende akhe waya ehlane, kute ayawuvimba indlela ya-Amalikhiya ehlane.
46.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wenta njengekwetifiso takhe, wachubeka phambili ehlane, wawajikisa emabutfo a-Amalikhiya.
46.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya wabaleka nesibalo lesincane sebantfu bakhe, kwatsi labasalako banikwa Moroni batsatfwa babuyiselwa eveni laseZarahemla.
46.34: Manje, Moroni ayindvodza lebeyibekwe behluleli labakhulu kanye nangelivi lebantfu, ngako-ke bekanemandla ngekwentsandvo yakhe ngalokuphatselene nemabutfo emaNefi, kutsi amise futsi asebentise ligunya ngetulu kwabo.
46.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi noma ngabe ngubani wema-Amalikhiya lobekangeke angene esivumelwaneni sekutsi asekele indlela yenkhululeko, kutsi bagcine umbuso lophetse lokhululekile, wenta kutsi abulawe; futsi bebakhona kodvwa bambalwa labala sivumelwano senkhululeko.
46.36: Futsi kwaphindze kwenteka, kutsi wenta sibonakaliso senkhululeko sabekwa kuyo yonkhe imibhoshongo lebeyikhona kulo lonkhe live, lebelilemaNefi; futsi ngaleyondlela Moroni wasihlanyela sibonakaliso senkhululeko emkhatsini wemaNefi.
46.37: Bacala baba nekuthula futsi eveni; ngaleyondlela bakugcina kuthula eveni kwacishe kwaba kungasekupheleni kwemnyaka welishumi nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli.
46.38: Hilamani kanye nebaphristi labakhulu bakugcina kuhleleka ebandleni; yebo kwate kwaba sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lemine banekuthula lokukhulu kanye nekutfokota ebandleni.
46.39: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bebabaningi labafa, bagcilile ekukholweni kutsi imiphefumulo yabo yayihlengiwe yiNkhosi Jesu Khristu; ngako-ke bahamba emhlabeni batfokotile.
46.40: Futsi bekukhona labanye labafa babulawa yimikhuhlane, lokwatsi ngaletinye tikhatsi letitsite temnyaka ivame kakhulu eveni—kodvwa hhayi kakhulu kangako ngemikhuhlane, ngenca yemakhambi lamahle kakhulu etinhlanyelo letiningi kanye netimphandze Nkulunkulu labetilungiselele kutsi tisuse imbangela yetifo, bantfu labebanato ngenca yesimo selitulu—
46.41: Kodvwa bebabaningi labafa ngenca yebudzala; futsi labo labafela elukholweni lwaKhristu batfokotile kuye, njengoba natsi kufanele sicabange kanjalo.

47.1: Manje sitawubuyela endzabeni yetfu ku-Amalikhiya kanye nalabo labebabaleke naye baya ehlane; ngoba, buka, bekatsetse labo labebahambe naye, wakhuphukela eveni laNefi emkhatsini wemaLamani, futsi wawaphehla emaLamani kutsi atfukutselele bantfu baNefi, kangangoba inkhosi yemaLamani yatfumela simemetelo kulo lonkhe live layo, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bayo, kutsi bahlangane ndzawonye bahambe bayolwa nemaNefi.
47.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi simemetelo sesendluliselwe phambili emkhatsini wabo besaba kakhulu; yebo, besaba kungayitfokotisi inkhosi, futsi baphindze besaba kutsi bayolwa nemaNefi hleze balahlekelwe timphilo tabo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bebangafuni, noma incenye lenkhulu yabo yayingafuni, kulalela imiyaleto yenkhosi.
47.3: Manje kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yatfukutsela ngenca yekungalaleli kwabo; ngako-ke yanika Amalikhiya ligunya lekulawula kuleyoncenye yelibutfo lakhe lelaliyilalela imiyalo yayo, futsi yamyala kutsi ahambe ayobaphocelela kutsi bahlome.
47.4: Manje buka, loku bekusifiso sa-Amalikhiya; ngoba bekayindvodza lenebucili lobukhulu ekwenteni bubi ngako-ke walenta lelisu enhlitiyweni yakhe lekuyisusa esihlalweni sebukhosi inkhosi yemaLamani.
47.5: Manje besekalitfolile ligunya lekulawula kuleto ticenye temaLamani lebetisekela inkhosi, futsi wetama kutfola kwemukelwa ngulabo bebangalaleli; ngako-ke wahamba waya endzaweni leyayibitwa ngekutsi yi-Onayida, ngoba ngulapho kwakubalekele khona onkhe emaLamani; ngoba abona imphi ita, futsi acabanga kutsi yayitowabulala, ngako-ke abalekela e-Onayida, endzaweni yetikhali.
47.6: Futsi abebeke umuntfu kutsi abe yinkhosi kanye nemholi wawo, agcilile etingcondvweni tawo ngesincumo lesingagucuki sekutsi abengeke aphocelelwe kutsi alwe nemaNefi.
47.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abebutsene ndzawonye esicongweni sentsaba leyayibitwa ngekutsi yi-Antipasi, kulungiselela imphi.
47.8: Manje bekungasiyo inhloso ya-Amalikhiya kutsi alwe nawo ngekwemiyaleto yenkhosi; kodvwa buka, kwakuyinhloso yakhe kutsi atfole kwemukelwa ngemabutfo emaLamani, kute atibeke enhloko yawo akhiphe inkhosi esihlalweni sebukhosi bese utsatsa umbuso ube ngewakhe.
47.9: Buka, kwenteka kutsi wenta emabutfo akhe kutsi amise emathende awo esigodzini lesasisedvute nentsaba i-Antipasi.
47.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekuhlwile watfumela sitfunywa ngansense kutsi siye entsabeni i-Antipasi, anesifiso sekutsi umholi walabo labebasentsabeni, libito lakhe lokwakunguLehonthi, ehlele entansi phansi entsabeni, ngoba abenesifiso sekukhuluma naye.
47.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Lehonthi atfola umlayeto akatange alokotse ehlele entansi phansi kwentsaba. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya waphindze watfumela kwesibili, anesifiso sekutsi ehle ete entansi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lehonthi akatange avume; waphindze watfumela kwesitsatfu.
47.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amalikhiya atfola kutsi abengakhoni kwenta Lehonthi kutsi ehle entsabeni, wakhuphukela entsabeni, waya edvute nenkambu yaLehonthi; waphindze watfumela kwesine umlayeto wakhe kuLehonthi, anesifiso sekutsi ehlele entansi, ete nabogadzi bakhe.
47.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Lehonthi asehlele entansi kanye nabogadzi bakhe kuya ku-Amalikhiya, Amalikhiya wafisa kutsi ehle nemabutfo akhe ebusuku, bese batungeleta lawo madvodza etinkanjini tawo inkhosi leyayimnike ligunya lekuwalawula, nekutsi yena uyowanikela etandleni ta-Lehonthi, uma angamenta yena (Amalikhiya) abe ngumholi wesibili ngetulu kwemabutfo onkhe.
47.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lehonthi wehlela entansi nemadvodza akhe batungeleta emadvodza a-Amalikhiya, kute ngaphambi kwekube avuke entsatsakusa yelusuku abe sekatungeletwe ngemabutfo aLehonthi.
47.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babona kutsi besebatungeletiwe, bancenga Amalikhiya kutsi abavumele kutsi bahlangane nabomnakabo, kute bangabulawa. Manje loku bekungiyo kanye intfo Amalikhiya abeyifuna.
47.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wawanikela emadvodza akhe, ngalokuphambene nemyalo wenkhosi. Manje loku kwakungiyo intfo Amalikhiya abeyifisa, kute afeze emacebo akhe ekususa inkhosi esihlalweni.
47.17: Manje bekungumhambo emkhatsini wemaLamani, kutsi uma umholi wabo lomkhulu abulewe, kubekwe umholi wesibili abe ngumholi lomkhulu.
47.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya wenta kutsi yinye yetinceku takhe inike butsi kancane kancane kuLehonthi, ate afe.
47.19: Manje, ngesikhatsi Lehonthi asafile, emaLamani abeka Amalikhiya kutsi abe ngumholi wawo kanye nemekhuti wawo lomkhulu.
47.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya wahamba nemabutfo akhe (ngoba abesatifezile tifiso takhe) waya eveni laNefi, edolobheni laNefi, lokwakulidolobha lelikhulu.
47.21: Futsi inkhosi yaphumela ngephandle kuyomhlangabeta kanye nabogadzi bayo, ngoba yayicabanga kutsi Amalikhiya abesayifezile imiyalo yayo, nekutsi Amalikhiya abesalibutsele ndzawonye libutfo lelikhulu kutsi liyawukulwa nemaNefi.
47.22: Kodvwa buka, ngesikhatsi inkhosi iphumela ngaphandle iyomhlangabeta Amalikhiya wenta kutsi tinceku takhe tihambe phambili kuyohlangabeta inkhosi. Tahamba takhotsama phambi kwenkhosi, shengatsi tiyayihlonipha ngenca yebukhulu bayo.
47.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yelula sandla sayo kutsi itiphakamise, njengoba kwakungumhambo wemaLamani, njengeluphawu lwekuthula, lowo mhambo labebawutsetse kumaNefi.
47.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi seyiphakamise yekucala, bukani yayigwaza inkhosi enhlitiyweni; yawela phansi.
47.25: Manje tinceku tenkhosi tabaleka; kwatsi tinceku ta-Amalikhiya tamemeta tikhala, titsi:
47.26: Bukani, tinceku tenkhosi tiyigwaze enhlitiyweni, seyiwile futsi setibalekile; bukani, wotani nitobona.
47.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya wayala emabutfo akhe kutsi ahambe aye ngaphambili kuyobona kutsi kwentekeni enkhosini; ngesikhatsi asafike kuleyondzawo, ayitfola inkhosi ilele emahlwilini engati yayo, Amalikhiya wenta shengatsi utfukutsele, watsi: Noma ngubani lobekatsandza inkhosi, akaphumele ngaphambili, aticoshe tinceku tayo kute tibulawe.
47.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe labo labebayitsandza inkhosi, ngesikhatsi beva lamavi, beta ngaphambili baticosha tinceku tenkhosi.
47.29: Manje ngesikhatsi tinceku tenkhosi tibona libutfo liticosha, taba nekwesaba futsi, tabalekela ehlane, tawelela eveni laseZarahemla tayohlangana nebantfu ba-Amoni.
47.30: Futsi libutfo lelalibacosha labuyela emuva, ekubeni libacoshe lehluleka; ngaleyondlela Amalikhiya, ngenkhohliso yakhe, watizuza tinhlitiyo tebantfu.
47.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa wangena edolobheni laNefi nemabutfo akhe, walitsatsa lidolobha laba ngelakhe.
47.32: Manje kwenteka kutsi indlovukazi, ngesikhatsi seyivile kutsi inkhosi ibulewe—ngoba Amalikhiya bekatfumele sitfunywa kuyo indlovukazi kuyatisa kutsi inkhosi ibulewe tinceku tayo, nekutsi uticoshile ngelibutfo lakhe, kodvwa wehluleka, tibalekile—
47.33: Ngako-ke ngesikhatsi indlovukazi seyiwutfolile lomlayeto yatfumela Amalikhiya, ifisa kutsi asindzise bantfu balelidolobha; ngetulu kwaloko yayifisa kutsi ete kuyo; ngetulu kwaloko yayifisa kutsi afike nabofakazi batofakaza mayelana nekufa kwenkhosi.
47.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya watsatsa yona kanye leyo nceku leyayibulele inkhosi, kanye nalabo bebanayo, bahamba baya kuyo indlovukazi, endzaweni leyayihleti kuyo; futsi bonkhe bafakaza kuyo kutsi inkhosi yayibulewe tinceku tayo lucobo; basho nekutsi: Tibalekile; ngabe loku akufakazeli yini ngalokumelene nato na? Futsi ngaloko bayenelisa indlovukazi mayelana nekufa kwenkhosi.
47.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya wafuna lutsandvo lwendlovukazi, wayitsatsa wayenta umkakhe; ngaleyondlela ngenkhohliso yakhe, nangekusitwa tinceku takhe letinebucili, wawutfola umbuso; yebo, wemukelwa njengenkhosi kulo lonkhe live, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bemaLamani, labebafaka ekhatsi emaLamani, nemaLemuweli nema-Ishmayeli, kanye nawo onkhe emahlubuka emaNefi, kusukela ekubuseni kwaNefi kwehle kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi samanje.
47.36: Manje lawa mahlubuka, anefundziso lefanako futsi banelwati lolufanako nelwemaNefi, yebo, bafundzisiwe ngelwati lolufanako lweNkhosi, nanoma kunjalo, kuyamangalisa kusho, kutsi kungekudzala emvakwekuhlubuka kwabo baba lukhuni kakhulu futsi baba nenkhani yekungaphendvuki, baba ngulabangekhuteki kakhulu, bakhohlakala futsi baba nebudlova kwengca emaLamani—banatsa ngekufana nelisiko lemaLamani; bavumela buvila; kanye nalo lonkhe luhlobo lwenkhanuko; yebo, bakhohlwa ngalokuphelele ngeNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.

48.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi, masinyane nje emvakwekutsi Amalikhiya sekatfole umbuso wacala kufaka umoya etinhlitiyweni temaLamani ngalokumelene nebantfu baNefi; yebo, wabeka emadvodza kutsi akhulume kumaLamani asemibhoshongweni yawo, ngalokumelene nemaNefi.
48.2: Ngaleyondlela wawufaka umoya etinhlitiyweni tabo ngalokumelene nemaNefi, kangangekutsi ngasekupheleni kwemnyaka welishumi nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli, sekawafezile emacebo akhe kute kube ngumanje, yebo, sekentiwe inkhosi ngetulu kwemaLamani, wafuna kutsi abuse kulo lonkhe live, yebo, kanye nakubo bonkhe bantfu labebaseveni, emaNefi ngalokunjalo nemaLamani.
48.3: Ngako-ke besekawafezile emacebo akhe, ngoba besekatente taba lukhuni tinhlitiyo temaLamani futsi watiphumphutsekisa tingcondvo tawo, wawaphehla kutsi atfukutsele, kangangekutsi besekagcogcele ndzawonye libutfo lelikhulu kutsi lihambe liyolwa nemaNefi.
48.4: Ngoba bekaphokophele, ngenca yebukhulu besibalo sebantfu bakhe, kutsi awancobe emaNefi futsi awaletse ebugcilini.
48.5: Ngenca yalesi sizatfu wabeka tindvuna letinkhulu temaZoramu, ngoba tatiwajwayele kakhulu emandla emaNefi, kanye netindzawo tawo tekubhaca, kanye netincenye temadolobha awo lebetibutsakatsaka; ngako-ke watibeka kutsi tibe tindvuna letinkhulu ngetulu kwemabutfo akhe.
48.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batsatsa inkambu yabo, bachubekela phambili baya ngaseveni laseZarahemla ehlane.
48.7: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Amalikhiya asatfola emandla ngebucili kanye nangenkhohliso, Moroni, ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, bekaloku alungisela tingcondvo tebantfu kutsi batsembeke eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo.
48.8: Yebo, bekaloku acinisa emabutfo emaNefi, amisa tincaba letincane, noma tindzawo tekuphumula; akha lusentse ngemhlabatsi atungeleta kute avalele emabutfo akhe, ngetulu kwaloko akha tindvonga tematje kute awatungelete, atungelete emadolobha abo kanye nemincele yemave abo; yebo, kutungeleta lonkhe live.
48.9: Etincabeni tabo letibutsakatsaka wabeka emadvodza lamaningi; futsi ngaleyondlela walicinisa waphindze walenta laba nemandla lelive lemaNefi.
48.10: Ngaleyondlela bekalungiselela kutsi asekele inkhululeko yawo, emave awo, bafati bawo, bantfwana bawo, kanye nekuthula kwawo, nekutsi ahlale eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wawo, kanye nekutsi agcine loko lobekubitwa titsa tabo ngekutsi timiso temaKhristu.
48.11: Futsi Moroni bekayindvodza lecinile nalenemandla; bekayindvodza lenekucondza lokuphelele; yebo, indvodza lebeyingatfokoti ekucitseni ingati; indvodza umphefumulo wayo lobewutfokota ngenkhululeko yelive layo, kanye neyabomnakabo ebugcilini nasekugcilatweni;
48.12: Yebo, indvodza le inhlitiyo yayo beyigcwele kubonga kuNkulunkulu wayo, ngemalungelo lamaningi kanye netibusiso latinika bantfu bakhe; indvodza lebeyisebentela kakhulu inhlalakahle kanye nekuphepha kwebantfu bayo.
48.13: Yebo, futsi bekayindvodza lebeyicinile elukholweni lwaKhristu, futsi bekafunge ngesifungo kuvikela bantfu bakhe, emalungelo akhe, nelive lakhe, kanye nenkholo yakhe, ngisho nangekulahlekelwa yingati yakhe.
48.14: Manje emaNefi bekafundziswe kutivikela etintfweni tawo, ngisho nasekucitseni ingati uma kwakudzingekile; yebo, ngetulu kwaloko bekafundziswe kutsi angoni muntfu nanini, yebo, futsi angayiphakamisi nanini inkemba ngaphandle kwekutsi kungulokumelene nesitsa, ngaphandle kwekutsi bekukwekulondvolota timphilo tawo.
48.15: Futsi loku bekulukholo lwabo, kutsi ngekwenta njalo Nkulunkulu bekatobaphumelelisa eveni, noma ngalamanye emavi, uma bebatsembekile ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu kutsi bekatobaphumelelisa eveni; yebo, abacwayise kutsi babaleke, noma balungiselele imphi, njengekuba sengotini kwabo;
48.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, nekutsi Nkulunkulu uyawubatisa kutsi baye ngakuphi kute bativikele etitseni tabo, ngekwenta njalo, iNkhosi iyawubakhulula; loku bekulukholo lwaMoroni, futsi inhliyito yakhe beyitfokota ngaloku; hhayi ekucitseni ingati kodvwa ekwenteni lokuhle, ekulondvoloteni bantfu bakhe, yebo, ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, yebo, kanye nekwala bubi.
48.17: Yebo ngicinisile, ngicinisile ngitsi kini, kube bonkhe bantfu bebanjengaye, futsi banjengaye, futsi bayahlala banjengaye Moroni, buka, emandla esihogo lucobo bekayawubhujiswa ingunaphakadze; yebo, develi bekangayukuba nemandla ngetulu kwetinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu.
48.18: Buka, bekayindvodza lenjenga-Amoni, indvodzana yaMosiya, yebo, futsi ngisho njengalamanye emadvodzana aMosiya, yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo na-Alima kanye nemadvodzana akhe, ngoba bonkhe bebabantfu baNkulunkulu.
48.19: Manje buka, Hilamani kanye nabomnakabo bekungasiko kutsi bebanelusito loluncane kubantfu kunalolo lwaMoroni; ngoba balishumayela livi laNkulunkulu, futsi babhabhatisela ekuphendvukeni wonkhe umuntfu noma ngubani lobekayawuwalalela emavi abo.
48.20: Bahamba ngaleyondlela, nebantfu batitfoba ngenca yemavi abo, kangangekutsi bebatsandvwa kakhulu yiNkhosi, ngaleyondlela bebakhululekile etimphini kanye nasemibangweni emkhatsini wabo, yebo, kwate kwaba sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemine.
48.21: Kodvwa, njengoba ngishito, ngasekupheleni kwemnyaka welishumi nemfica, yebo, nanoma kwakunekuthula emkhatsini wabo, bebaphocelelekile bangatsandzi kutsi balwe nabomnakabo emaLamani.
48.22: Yebo, kwephetsa, timphi tabo nemaLamani atitange tiphele sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka leminingi, nanoma kwakungasiko kutsandza kwabo lokukhulu.
48.23: Manje, bebadzabukile kutsi batsatsele emaLamani tikhali, ngoba bebangatfokoti ekucitseni ingati; yebo, futsi loku bekungasiko kona kuphela—bebadzabukile kutsi babe yimbangela yekutfumela labaningi kangaka babomnakabo babasuse kulomhlaba baye emhlabeni waphakadze, bangakatilungiseleli kuhlangana naNkulunkulu wabo.
48.24: Noko, bebangenakuvuma kutsi babeke phansi timphilo tabo, kutsi bafati babo kanye nebantfwana babo babulawe ngesihluku ngulabo belunya lwebucaba labake baba bomnakabo, yebo, futsi labebahlubuke ebandleni labo, babashiyile bahamba bayohlangana nemaLamani kute bababulale.
48.25: Yebo, bebangeke bakubeketelele kutsi bomnakabo batfokote ngengati yemaNefi, uma nje bekusekhona labo labebasayigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, ngoba setsembiso seNkhosi besingukutsi, uma nje bangayigcina imiyaleto yayo bayawuphumelela eveni.

49.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngenyanga yelishumi nakunye ngemnyaka welishumi nemfica, ngelusuku lwelishumi enyangeni, emabutfo emaLamani abonakala ahamba aya ngaseveni lase-Amoniha.
49.2: Futsi bukani, lidolobha laselakhiwe kabusha, futsi Moroni besekabeke libutfo ngaseminceleni yelidolobhha, base babeka kungcola kwatungeleta kubavikela emicibisholweni kanye nasematjeni emaLamani; ngoba bukani, abelwa ngematje kanye nemicibisholo
