49.3: Bukani ngitse lidolobha lase-Amoniha laselakhiwe kabusha. Ngitsi kini, yebo, incenye yalo yaseyakhiwe kabusha; futsi ngenca yekutsi emaLamani bekake alibhubhisa kanye ngenca yebubi bebantfu, acabanga kutsi kutfolwa kwalo kwakutobalula kuwo.
49.4: Kodvwa bukani, kwaba kukhulu kangakanani kudvumala kwawo; ngoba buka, emaNefi abegubhe umngcengcema wemhlabatsi ubatungeletile, lowawuphakeme ngendlela yekutsi emaLamani abengakwati kujikijela ematje awo kanye nemicibisholo yawo kubo kute ibalimate, angakhoni nekuta kubo ngaphandle kwekutsi asebentise indzawo yekungena.
49.5: Manje ngalesi sikhatsi tindvuna letinkhulu temaLamani tamangala kakhulu, ngenca yekuhlakanipha kwemaNefi ekulungiseni tindzawo tawo tekutivikela.
49.6: Manje baholi bemaLamani bebacabanga kutsi, ngenca yebukhulu belinani labo, yebo, bebacabanga kutsi bebatoba nenhlanhla yekutsi bete kubo njengoba bebakadze bentile ekucaleni; yebo, ngetulu kwaloko bebatilungiselele ngetihlangu, kanye netivikelo tesifuba; ngetulu kwaloko bebatilungiselele ngetingubo tetikhumba, yebo, tingubo leticinsi kakhulu kute bambonye bungcunu babo.
49.7: Futsi ngalokutilungiselela kanje bebacabanga kutsi bebatobehlula kalula futsi babafake bomnakabo ngaphansi kwelijoka lebugcili, noma bababulale futsi bababulale ngesihluku ngekwentsadvo yawo.
49.8: Kodvwa bukani, ngekumangala kwabo lokukhulu, bebawalungele, ngendlela leyayingatange yatiwe emkhatsini webantfwana baLehi. Manje bebawalungele emaLamani, kutsi balwe ngendlela yemiyalo yaMoroni.
49.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani, noma ema-Amalikhiya, amangala kakhulu ngendlela yawo yekulungiselela imphi.
49.10: Manje, kube inkhosi Amalikhiya beyehlile yaphuma eveni laNefi, ahola libutfo lakhe, mhlawumbe yayiyokwenta emaLamani ahlasele emaNefi edolobheni lase-Amoniha; ngoba bukani, yayingayikhatsaleli nakancane ingati yebantfu bayo.
49.11: Kodvwa bukani, Amalikhiya akatange ehle kutolwa. Futsi buka, tindvuna takhe letinkhulu atitange tilokotse tiwahlasele emaNefi edolobheni lase-Amoniha, ngoba Moroni besekatishintjile tindlela emaNefi labekenta ngato tintfo, kangangekutsi emaLamani abedvumele ngenca yetindzawo tawo tekuphepha futsi akakhonanga kuta etikwawo.
49.12: Ngako-ke abalekela ehlane, atsatsa inkambu yawo ahamba aya ngaseveni laNowa, acabanga kutsi kwakunguyona ndzawo lelandzelako lencono kutsi ahlasele emaNefi.
49.13: Ngoba abengati kutsi Moroni besekacinisile, noma besekakhe tincaba tekutivikela, talo lonkhe lidolobha eveni lonkhe lelalitungeletiwe; ngako-ke, ahamba aya eveni laNowa anemphokophelo lecinile; yebo, tindvuna tawo letinkhulu teta phambili futsi tafunga kutsi tatitobabulala bantfu bakulelo dolobha.
49.14: Kodvwa bukani, ngekumangala kwabo, lidolobha laNowa, ngaphambilini lelaliyindzawo lebutsakatsaka, manje, ngenca yaMoroni, laselinemandla, yebo, kwendlula ngisho nemandla elidolobha lase-Amoniha.
49.15: Manje, bukani, loku bekukuhlakanipha kwaMoroni; ngoba bekacabange kutsi bebatoba nekulesaba lidolobha lase-Amoniha; futsi njengoba lidolobha laNowa kwakunguyona ncenye yelive ngaleso sikhatsi leyayibutsakatsaka kakhulu, ngako-ke bebatohamba baye lapho kuyohlasela; futsi loku kwenteka ngekwetifiso takhe.
49.16: Futsi bukani, Moroni bekabeke Lehi kutsi abe yindvuna lenkhulu ngetulu kwemadvodza alelo dolobha; futsi kwakunguye kanye loyo Lehi lowalwa nemaLamani esigodzini emphumalanga yemfula iSidoni.
49.17: Manje bukani kwenteka, kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani asatfole kutsi Lehi bekalawula lelidolobha aphindze advumala, ngoba abemesaba kakhulu Lehi; noko tindvuna tawo letinkhulu tatifungile ngesifungo kulihlasela lelidolobha; ngako-ke, tawaletsa emabutfo ato.
49.18: Manje bukani, emaLamani akakhonanga kungena etincabeni tawo tekutivikela nganoma nguyiphi lenye indlela ngaphandle kwekutsi kube sekungeneni, ngenca yekuphakama kwemngcengcema lobewakhiwe waya etulu, kanye nekujula kwemsele lowawumbiwe watungeleta, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube sekungeneni.
49.19: Futsi ngaleyondlela emaNefi abekatilungiselele kutsi abulale bonkhe labebatowetama kutsi bagibele etulu kute bangene esivimbelweni nganoma nguyiphi lenye indlela, ngekutsi babajikijele ngematje nangemicibisholo.
49.20: Ngaleyondlela abetilungiselele, yebo, licembu lemadvodza awo lanemandla lamakhulu, ngetinkemba tawo kanye netilingi tawo, kutsi alahle phansi bonkhe labebayowetama kutsi bete endzaweni yabo yekutivikela ngendzawo yekungena; futsi ngaleyondlela atilungiselela kutsi ativikele kumaLamani.
49.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tindvuna temaLamani tawaletsa emabutfo ato phambi kwendzawo yekungena, acala alwa nemaNefi, kute bangene endzaweni yawo yekutivikela; kodvwa bukani, achutjwa abuyiselwa emuva tikhatsi ngetikhatsi, kangangoba abulawa kakhulu.
49.22: Manje ngesikhatsi abona kutsi abengenawukwati kutfola emandla ngetulu kwemaNefi ngendlela yekungena, acala kuyidzilita imingcengcema yemhlaba kute atfole indlela yekungena kuya emabutfweni awo, kute abe nelitfuba lelilinganako lekulwa; kodvwa bukani, kulemetamo besuswa ngematje kanye nemicibisholo leyayijikijelwa kubo; futsi esikhundleni sekugcwalisa imisele yawo ngekutsi badvonse imingcengcema yemhlabatsi, yagcwala yaba sezingeni lelitsite ngalabafile bawo kanye nemitimba lelimele.
49.23: Ngaleyondlela emaNefi aba nemandla onkhe ngetulu kwetitsa tawo; futsi ngalokunjalo emaLamani etama kutsi abulale emaNefi tate tonkhe tindvuna tawo letinkhulu tabulawa; yebo, futsi kwabulawa emaLamani langetulu kwenkhulungwane; lokwatsi, ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, kwababete namunye umphefumulo wemaNefi lowabulawa.
49.24: Bekukhona cishe labangemashumi lasihlanu labalimala, labebasebaleni emicibisholweni yemaLamani ekungeneni, kodvwa bebavikelwe tihlangu tawo, netivivelo tesifuba tawo, kanye nangetivikelo tenhloko tawo, kangangoba emanceba awo abesemilenteni, lamaningi awo abematima kakhulu.
49.25: Futsi kwenteka, kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi tindvuna tawo letinkhulu tonkhe tasetibulewe abalekela ehlane. Futsi kwenteka kutsi abuyela eveni laNefi, kutsi ayobikela inkhosi yawo Amalikhiya, lobekangumNefi ngekutalwa, mayelana nekulahlekelwa kwabo lokukhulu.
49.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabatfukutselela kakhulu bantfu bakhe, ngenca yekutsi bekangakasizuzi sifiso sakhe kumaNefi, abengatange akhone kubayisa ngaphansi kwelijoka lebugcili.
49.27: Yebo, watfukutsela kakhulu, futsi wamcalekisa Nkulunkulu, kanjalo naMoroni, afunga ngesifungo kutsi uyawuyinatsa ingati yakhe; loku ngenca yekutsi Moroni bekagcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu ekulungiseleleni kuphepha kwebantfu bakhe.
49.28: Fusti kwenteka, kutsi ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, bantfu baNefi bayibonga iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, ngenca yemandla ayo langenakulinganiswa ekubakhululeni etandleni tetitsa tabo.
49.29: Futsi ngaleyondlela yaphela kanjalo iminyaka lelishumi nemfica yekubusa kwebehluleli ngetulu kwebantfu baNefi.
49.30: Yebo, futsi kwaba khona kuthula njalo emkhatsini wawo, kanye nemphumelelo lenkhulu kakhulu ebandleni ngenca yekulalela kwawo kanye nekukhutsala lababa nako evini laNkulunkulu lelalishunyayelwe kuwo nguHilamani, naShibiloni, naKhoriyanthoni na-Amoni kanye nabomnakabo, yebo, kanye nabo bonkhe labo labebagcotjwe ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu, babhajatiselwe ekuphendvukeni, futsi batfunyelwa kutsi bayoshumayela emkhatsini webantfu.

50.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi Moroni akatange ayekele kwenta emalungiselelo emphi, noma kuvikela bantfu bakhe kumaLamani; ngoba wenta kutsi emabutfo akhe acale ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili wekubusa kwebehluleli, kutsi kumele bacale kugubha tindvundvuma temhlabatsi batungelete onkhe emadolobha, kulo lonkhe live lebelilemaNefi.
50.2: Etikwaletindvundvuma temhlabatsi wenta kutsi kube khona emapulango, yebo, imisebenti yemapulango leyakhiwe yaba midze ngangemuntfu, itungelete emadolobha.
50.3: Wenta kutsi kuyo leyo misebenti yemapulango kube khona luhlaka lwetikhonkwane lobelwakhiwe etikwemapulango lwatungeleta; beticinile futsi titindze.
50.4: Wenta kutsi kwakhiwe imibhoshongo lebeyibekwe kuyo leyo misebenti yetikhonkwane, futsi wenta kutsi kwakhiwe tindzawo tekutivikela kuyo leyo mibhoshongo, kute ematje kanye nemicibisholo yemaLamani ingabalimati.
50.5: Bekatilungiselele kutsi akwati kujikijela ematje etulu lapho, ngekutsandza kwawo kanye nangekwemandla awo, ambulale lobekatotama kusondzela edvute kwetindvonga telidolobha.
50.6: Ngaleyondlela Moroni watilungisa tincaba kulungiselela kuta kwetitsa tawo, kuwo onkhe emadolobha atungelete eveni lonkhe.
50.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wenta kutsi emabutfo akhe ahambe aye ehlane lelisemphumalanga; yebo, ahamba ayowachuba onkhe emaLamani labekasehlane lelisemphumalanga awayisa emaveni awo, labekaseningizimu yelive laseZarahemla.
50.8: Futsi live laNefi belihamba ngendlela lecondzile kusukela emphumalanga yelwandle kuya enshonalanga.
50.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni sekawachube onkhe emaLamani wawakhipha ehlane lasemphumalanga, lebelisenyakatfo yemave labekawabo, wenta kutsi labahlala eveni laseZarahemla kanye nebaseveni lebelitungeletile bahambe baye ehlane lelisemphumalanga, ngisho naseminceleni lengaselugwini lwelwandle, balitsatse lelo live.
50.10: Waphindza wabeka emabutfo eningizimu, eminceleni yalobekukwabo, wabenta kutsi bamise tincaba kute bavikele emabutfo abo kanye nebantfu babo etandleni tetitsa tabo.
50.11: Ngaleyondlela watincamula tonkhe tincaba temaLamani lebetisehlane lebelisemphumalanga, yebo, futsi kanjalo nasenshonalanga, leticinisa umncele emkhatsini wemaNefi nemaLamani, emkhatsini welive laseZarahemla nelive lemaNefi, kusukela eLwandle lasenshonalanga, kuphikelele ngasekucaleni kwemfula iSidoni—emaNefi atitsatsele lonkhe live lelingasenyakatfo, yebo, ngisho nalo lonkhe live lebelingasenyakatfo yelive iNala, njengekutsandza kwabo.
50.12: Ngaleyondlela-ke Moroni, kanye nemabutfo akhe, labekakhula malanga onkhe ngenca yesiciniseko sekuvikela imisebenti yakhe leyasiletsa kubo, bafuna kuvimbela kucina kanye nemandla emaLamani bawasuse aphele emaveni langewabo, kute bangabi nemandla etikwemave abo.
50.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi acala sisekelo selidolobha, alibita lelidolobha ngeligama lelitsi yiMoroni; belingaselwandle lolungasemphumalanga; futsi laliseningizimu ngasemnceleni waloko lokukwemaLamani.
50.14: Ngetulu kwaloko bacala sisekelo selidolobha emkhatsini welidolobha laMoroni kanye nelidolobha la-Aroni, bahlanganisa imincele ya-Aroni kanye neya-Moroni; futsi balibita lelo dolobha, noma lelo live, ngeligama lelitsi, yiNefiha.
50.15: Ngetulu kwaloko bacala ngawo kanye lowo mnyaka kwakha emadolobha lamaningi enyakatfo, lelinye balakha ngendlela letsite balibita ngekutsi yiLehi, lebelisenyakatfo ngaseminceleni yelugu lwelwandle.
50.16: Futsi waphela ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili.
50.17: Futsi bebakulesi simo sekuphumelela bantfu baNefi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
50.18: Baphumelela kakhulu, banotsa kakhulu; yebo, futsi bandza bate bakhula bacina eveni.
50.19: Ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi tinemusa futsi tilunge kangakanani tento teNkhosi, ekugcwaliseni onkhe emavi ayo kubantfwana bebantfu; yebo, singabona kutsi emavi ayo ayacinisekiswa, ngisho nangalesi sikhatsi, lakhuluma ngaso kuLehi, atsi:
50.20: Ubusisiwe kanye nebantfwana bakho; futsi bayawubusiswa, nangabe bayawuyigcina imiyaleto yami bayawuphumelela kulelive. Kodvwa khumbula, nangabe bangeke bayigcine imiyaleto yami bayawususwa ebukhoneni beNkhosi.
50.21: Futsi siyabona kutsi leti tetsembiso ticinisekiswe ebantfwini baNefi; ngoba bekukucabana kanye nemibango yabo, yebo, kubulalana kwabo, kuphanga kwabo, kukhonta kwabo tithico, bugwadla babo, kanye netinengiso tabo, lokwabakhona emkhatsini wabo, lokwaletsa kubo timphi kanye nekubulawa kwabo.
50.22: Futsi labo labebatsembekile ekugcineni imiyaleto yeNkhosi bakhululwa ngetikhatsi tonkhe, kwatsi tinkhulungwane tabomnakabo lababi batfunyelwe ebugcilini, noma babulewe ngenkemba, noma bancishelwe kukholwa, futsi bahlangana nemaLamani.
50.23: Kodvwa buka akutange nanini kube khona sikhatsi lesimnandzi kanje emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, kusukela etinsukwini taNefi, njengasetinsukwini taMoroni, yebo, ngisho nangalesi sikhatsi, emnyakeni wemashumi lamabili nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli.
50.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakubili wekubusa kwebehluleli nawo ngalokunjalo waphela ngekuthula; yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakutsatfu.
50.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakune wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwakuyawuba khona kuthula emkhatsini webantfu baNefi kube bekungasiko ngenca yembango lowabakhona emkhatsini wabo mayelana nelive laLehi, kanye nelive laMoriyanthoni, labekahlangana eminceleni yaLehi; omabili bekaseminceleni ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
50.26: Ngoba buka, bantfu labekubanikati belive laMoriyanthoni bafuna incenye yelive laLehi; ngako-ke kwacala kwaba khona umbango loshisako emkhatsini wabo, kangangekutsi bantfu baMoriyanthoni batsatsa tikhali ngalokumelene nabomnakabo, futsi bebaphokophele kutsi bababulale ngenkemba.
50.27: Kodvwa buka, bantfu labebabanikati belive laLehi babalekela enkanjini yaMoroni, bayocela kuye lusito; ngoba buka bebangakoni lutfo.
50.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bantfu baMoriyanthoni, labebaholwa yindvodza libito layo lokwakunguMoriyanthoni, batfola kutsi bantfu baLehi bese babalekele enkanjini yaMoroni, baba nekwesaba lokukhulu hleze libutfo laMoroni lite kubo libabulale.
50.29: Ngako-ke, Moriyanthoni wakufaka etinhlitiyweni tabo kutsi babaleke baye eveni lebelisenyakatfo, lebelimbonywe ngemachibi lamakhulu emanti, futsi balitsatse libe labo lelo live lebelingasenyakatfo.
50.30: Buka, bebangalifeza lelisu labo, (lebeliyawuba sizatfu sekulila) kodvwa buka, Moriyanthoni ayindvodza lenelulaka lolukhulu, ngako-ke atfukutselele lomunye wetincekukati takhe kakhulu, wamhlasela wamshaya kakhulu.
50.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabaleka, weta enkanjini yaMoroni, watjela Moroni tonkhe tintfo letiphatselene naloludzaba, kanjalo mayelana netinhloso tabo tekubalekela eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
50.32: Manje buka, bantfu labebaseveni iNala, noma Moroni, wesaba kutsi bebayawulalela emavi aMoriyanthoni bese bahlangana nebantfu bakhe, ngaleyondlela bekatotfola tincenye telive tibe ngetakhe, loko lokwakuyawuba nemiphumela leyingoti lebeyitoba khona emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, yebo, leyomiphumela leyayiyawuholela ekupheleni kwenkhululeko yabo.
50.33: Ngako-ke Moroni watfumela libutfo, kanye nenkambu yalo, kutsi bayojikisa bantfu baMoriyanthoni, kutsi bangabalekeli eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
50.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abatange babajikise bate bafika eminceleni yelive iNcitsakalo; lapho babajikisa, ngendlela lencane lebeyiholela ngaselwandle iya eveni lelingasenyakatfo, yebo, ngaselwandle, enshonalanga kanye nasemphumalanga.
50.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi libutfo lebelitfunywe nguMoroni, lebeliholwa yindvodza libito layo lobekunguThiyankham, lahlangana nebantfu baMoriyanthoni; futsi bebanenkhani kakhulu bantfu baMoriyanthoni, (bagcugcutelwa bubi bakhe kanye nemavi akhe layengako) kangangekutsi imphi yacala emkhatsini wabo, lapho Thiyankham wabulala Moriyanthoni waphindze walehlula libutfo lakhe, wabatsatsa wabenta tiboshwa, wabuyela enkanjini yakaMoroni. Yaphela ngaleyondlela iminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nakune yekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
50.36: Futsi babuyiselwa ngaleyondlela emuva bantfu baMoriyanthoni. Futsi emvakwesivumelwano sabo sekugcina kuthula babuyiselwa eveni laMoriyanthoni, lubumbano lwenteka emkhatsini wabo kanye nebantfu baLehi; baphindze babuyiselwa emaveni abo.
50.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawo lowo mnyaka lokwabuyiselwa ngawo kuthula kubantfu baNefi, Nefiha, umehluleli lomkhulu wesibili, wafa, aphetse sihlalo sekwehlulela ngebucotfo lobukhulu ngaphambi kwaNkulunkulu.
50.38: Noko, bekalile ku-Alima kutsi atsatse imibhalo kanye naleto tintfo lebetatiswa ngu-Alima kanye neyise kutsi tinguletingcwele kakhulu; ngako-ke Alima watiniketa indvodzana yakhe, Hilamani.
50.39: Buka, kwenteka kutsi indvodzana yaNefiha yabekwa kutsi itsatse sihlalo sekwehlulela, esikhundleni seyise; yebo, yabekwa kutsi ibe ngumehluleli lomkhulu kanye nembusi webantfu, ngesifungo kanye nangesimiso lesingcwele sekwehlulela ngekulunga, kanye nekugcina kuthula kanye nenkhululeko yebantfu, kanye nekubaniketa emalungelo abo langcwele ekukhonta iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, yebo, nekutsi isekele futsi igcine indlela yaNkulunkulu tinsuku tonkhe tayo, futsi iletse lababi kutsi behlulelwe ngekwemacala abo.
50.40: Manje buka, libito layo bekunguPhahorani. Phahorani wasitsatsa sihlalo seyise, wacala kubusa kwakhe ekupheleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakune, kubantfu baNefi.

51.1: Futsi manje kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, sebamise kuthula emkhatsini webantfu baLehi kanye nebantfu baMoriyanthoni mayelana nemave abo, futsi sebacale umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesihlanu ngekuthula;
51.2: Noko, abakugcinanga sikhatsi lesidze kuthula lokuphelele eveni, ngoba kwacala kwaba khona umbango emkhatsini webantfu mayelana nemehluleli lomkhulu Phahorani; ngoba buka, bekukhona incenye yebantfu labebanesifiso sekutsi tincenye letitsite letimbalwa temtsetfo kumele tiguculwe.
51.3: Kodvwa buka, Phahorani akatange afune noma avume kutsi umtsetfo uguculwe; ngako-ke akatange abalalele labo labebatfumele emavi abo neticelo mayelana nekuguculwa kwemtsetfo
51.4: Ngako-ke, labo labebanesifiso kutsi umtsetfo uguculwe bamtfukutselela, futsi bafisa kutsi angasabi ngumehluleli lomkhulu eveni; ngako-ke kwacubuka imphikiswano leshisako mayelana naloludzaba, kodvwa akubanga nekucitseka kwengati.
51.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo labebanesifiso sekutsi Phahorani asuswe esihlalweni sekwehlulela bebabitwa ngekutsi bantfu benkhosi, ngoba bebafisa kutsi umtsetfo uguculwe ngendlela yekutsi baketule umbuso lokhululekile bese babeka inkhosi eveni.
51.6: Labo labebanesifiso sekutsi Phahorani ahlale angumehluleli lomkhulu eveni batsatsa libito lelitsi bantfu benkhululeko; ngaleyondlela kwaba nekuhlukana emkhatsini wabo, ngoba bantfu benkhululeko bebafungile noma bebente sivumelwano sekutsi bagcine emalungelo abo kanye nenzuzo yenkholo yabo ngembuso lokhululekile.
51.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi loludzaba lwembango wabo lwacatululwa ngelivi lebantfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi livi lebantfu lavumelana nebantfu benkhululeko, futsi Phahorani wasigcina sihlalo sekwehlulela, lokwaletsa injabulo lenkhulu emkhatsini wabomnakaboPhahorani kanye nakulabaningi bantfu labatsandza inkhululeko, labathulisa bantfu benkhosi, kangangoba abatange basalokotsa nakancane kuyiphikisa kodvwa baphoceleleka kutsi bayigcine indlela yenkhululeko.
51.8: Manje labo labebavumelana nemakhosi kwakungulabo labebatalelwe emndenini lohloniphekile, futsi bebafuna kuba ngemakhosi, bebasekelwa ngulabo labebafuna emandla kanye neligunya ngetulu kwebantfu.
51.9: Kodvwa bukani, lesi bekusikhatsi lesibucayi sekutsi kube khona imibango lenjena emkhatsini webantfu baNefi; ngoba buka, Amalikhiya besekaphindzile waphehla tinhlitiyo tebantfu bemaLamani ngalokumelene nebantfu bemaNefi, futsi besekagcogcela ndzawonye emasotja kuto tonkhe tincenye telive lakhe, awahlomisa, aphindze alungiselela imphi ngako konkhe kukhutsala; ngoba bekafungile kuyinatsa ingati yaMoroni.
51.10: Kodvwa bukani, sitawubona kutsi setsembiso sakhe lasenta bekakhakhamele; noko watilungiselela kanye nemabutfo akhe kutsi bete batawukulwa nemaNefi.
51.11: Manje emabutfo akhe abengasiwo maningi kakhulu njengoba abenjalo ngaphambilini, ngenca yetinkhulungwane letiningi letatibulewe ngetandla temaNefi; kodvwa nanoma kungekulahlekelwa kwabo lokukhulu, Amalikhiya bekagcogcele ndzawonye libutfo lelikhulu ngalokumangalisako, kangangoba akesabanga kwehlela entansi eveni laseZarahemla.
51.12: Yebo, ngisho na-Amalikhiya lucobo wehlela entansi, ahola emaLamani. Kwakusemnyakeni wemashumi lamabili nesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli; futsi kwakungiso kanye sikhatsi lapho besebacale kuticatulula tindzaba tabo temibango mayelana nemehluleli lomkhulu, Phahorani
51.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi labantfu labebabitwa ngekutsi bantfu benkhosi sebavile kutsi emaLamani ayeta ehlela entansi kutawukulwa nabo, bajabula etinhlitiyweni tabo; futsi bala kutsatsa tikhali, ngoba bebamtfukutselele kakhulu umehluleli lomkhulu, ngalokunjalo nebantfu benkhululeko, kangangekutsi abafunanga kutsatsa tikhali kute bavikele live labo.
51.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni akubona loku, ngetulu kwaloko abona kutsi emaLamani beseketa eminceleni yelive, watfukutsela kakhulu ngenca yenkhani yalabo bantfu labekadze asebente ngekukhutsala lokukhulu kubavikela; yebo, watfukutsela kakhulu; umphefumulo wakhe wagcwala intfukutselo ngenca yabo.
51.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watfumela sicelo, ngelivi lebantfu, kumphatsi welive, afisa kutsi asifundze, futsi amnike (Moroni) emandla ekuphocelela lawo mahlubuka kutsi avikele live lawo, noma-ke ababulale.
51.16: Ngoba bekungumsebenti wakhe wekucala kutsi acedze lemibango lenjena kanye nekuphikisana emkhatsini webantfu; ngoba buka, kute kube manje loku bekungiko lokwabangela konkhe kubhujiswa kwabo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi loku kwavunyelwa ngekwelivi lebantfu.
51.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wayaleta libutfo lakhe kutsi lihambe liyokulwa nalabo bantfu benkhosi, kutsi behlise kutikhukhumeta kanye nekuhlonipheka kwabo baphindze babalinganise nemhlabatsi, noma batsatse tikhali futsi basekele indlela yenkhululeko.
51.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo ahamba ayokulwa nabo; futsi bakwehlisa kutikhukhumeta kwabo kanye nekuhlonipheka kwabo, kangangekutsi ngesikhatsi baphakamisa tikhali tabo temphi kutsi balwe nebantfu baMoroni babulawa, balinganiswa nemhlabatsi.
51.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekatinkhulungwane letine lawo mahlubuka labulawa ngenkemba; futsi labo baholi bawo labangabulawanga emphini batsatfwa baphonswa ejele, ngoba sasingekho sikhatsi sekutekwa kwemacala abo ngalesi sikhatsi.
51.20: Futsi insalela yalawo mahlubuka, kunekutsi ishaywe iwe phansi ngenkemba, yatinikela esibonakalisweni senkhululeko, yaphocelelwa kutsi isiphakamise sibonakaliso senkhululeko emibhoshongweni yayo, kanye nasemadolobheni ayo, iphindze itsatse tikhali ivikele live layo.
51.21: Ngaleyondlela Moroni wabacedza bantfu benkhosi, kangangekutsi kwasekute namunye lowatiwa ngalelibito lebantfu benkhosi; futsi ngaleyondlela wayicedza inkhani kanye nekukutikhukhumeta kwalabo bantfu labebatsi bengati lehloniphekile; kodvwa behliswa kutsi batitfobe njengabomnakabo, futsi balwele inkhululeko yabo ngesibindzi ebugcilini.
51.22: Buka, kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni asacedza timphi kanye nemibango emkhatsini webantfu bakhe lucobo, abafaka ngaphansi kwekuthula kanye nemphucuko, futsi enta imitsetfo yekulungiselela imphi nemaLamani, buka, emaLamani abesafikile eveni laMoroni, lelaliseminceleni ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
51.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi labekasedolobheni laMoroni bekete emandla ngalokwanele; ngako-ke Amalikhiya wawakhipha, abulala labaningi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya walitsatsa lidolobha, yebo, watsatsa nato tonkhe tincaba tawo.
51.24: Futsi labo lababaleka baphuma edolobheni laMoroni baya edolobheni laNefiha; ngetulu kwaloko bantfu basedolobheni laLehi bagcogcana ndzawonye, benta emalungiselelo, futsi bebakulungele kutsi bamelane nemaLamani emphini.
51.25: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi Amalikhiya akafunanga kuwavumela emaLamani kutsi ahambe aye edolobheni laNefiha kuyokulwa, kodvwa wawagcina entansi ngaselugwini lwelwandle, ashiya emadvodza kuwo onkhe emadolobha kutsi aligcine futsi alivikele.
51.26: Futsi wachubeka ngaleyondlela, atsatsa lamaningi emadolobha, lidolobha laNefiha, nelidolobha laLehi, nelidolobha laMoriyanthoni, nelidolobha la-Omneri, nelidolobha laGidi, kanye nelidolobha laMulekhi, onkhe labekaseminceleni emphumalanga ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
51.27: Futsi emaLamani awatfola ngaleyondlela, ngebucili ba-Amalikhiya, emadolobha lamaningi kangaka, ngemabutfo awo langabaleki, onkhe labeciniswe kakhulu ngendlela yetincaba taMoroni; tonkhe letatinika emaLamani tincaba leticinile.
51.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ahamba aya eminceleni yelive iNala, achuba emaNefi labekaphambi kwawo futsi abulala lamaningi.
51.29: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ahlangana naThiyankham lobekabulele Moriyanthoni futsi wavimbela bantfu bakhe ekubalekeni kwakhe.
51.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wamvimba na-Amalikhiya, asahamba nelibutfo lakhe lelikhulu kute atsatse live iNala, futsi ngalokunjalo nelive lelingasenyakatfo.
51.31: Kodvwa bukani wahlangabetana nekudvumala ngekudvudvulwa nguThiyankham nebantfu bakhe, ngoba bebangemachawe lamakhulu; ngoba yonkhe indvodza yaThiyankham yayiwendlula emaLamani ngemandla abo kanye nangebuciko bekulwa, kangangekutsi bawehlula emaLamani.
51.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bawahlukubeta, kangangekutsi bawabulala kwate kwaba mnyama. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Thiyankham nemadvodza akhe bamisa emathende abo eminceleni yelive iNala; na-Amalikhiya wamisa emathende akhe eminceleni elusebeni ngaselugwini lwelwandle, futsi abalekiswa ngalendlela.
51.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebufikile busuku, Thiyankham kanye nenceku yakhe banyenya bahamba ebusuku, baya enkanjini ya-Amalikhiya; futsi bukani, butfongo babubengamile ngenca yekukhatsala kwabo lokukhulu, lokwakubangwe yimisebenti kanye nekushisa kwelusuku.
51.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Thiyankham wanyenya ngansense wangena ethendeni lenkhosi, wayihlaba ngentjumentju enhlitiyweni yayo; wakubangela kufa kwenkhosi ngekuphatima kweliso kute angativusi tinceku tayo.
51.35: Futsi waphindze wabuyela futsi ngansense enkanjini yakhe, bukani, emadvodza akhe bekalele, wawavusa wawatjela tonkhe tintfo labetentile.
51.36: Futsi wenta kutsi emabutfo akhe atilungiselele, hleze emaLamani besekavukile futsi besekatawuta kubo.
51.37: Waphela ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi; futsi taphela kanjalo tinsuku ta-Amalikhiya.

52.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, bukani, ngesikhatsi emaLamani avuka ngekusa kwekucala kwenyanga yekucala, bukani, atfola Amalikhiya afile ethendeni lakhe; futsi abona kutsi Thiyankham besekakulungele kutsi alwe nawo ngalolo suku.
52.2: Manje, ngesikhatsi emaLamani akubona loku esaba; aliyekela lisu lawo lekuhamba aye eveni lelingasenyakatfo, ahlehla kanye nalo lonkhe libutfo lawo aya edolobheni laMulekhi, afuna kuvikeleka etincabeni tawo.
52.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakabo-Amalikhiya wabekwa kutsi abe yinkhosi ngetulu kwebantfu; libito lakhe bekungu-Amoroni; ngako-ke inkhosi Amoroni, umnakabonkhosi Amalikhiya, wabekwa kutsi abuse esikhundleni sakhe.
52.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wayaleta kutsi bantfu bakhe bawagcine lawo madolobha, labebawatsetse ngekucitsa ingati, ngoba kute emadolobha labawatsatsa ngaphandle kwekucitsa ingati leningi.
52.5: Manje, Thiyankham wabona kutsi emaLamani abetimisele kugcina lawo madolobha labekawatsetse, kanye naleto tincenye telive lebekatitsetse taba ngetawo; futsi ngetulu kwaloko ngekubona buningi besibalo sawo, Thiyankham wacabanga kutsi kwakungakafaneli etame kutsi awahlasele etincabeni tawo.
52.6: Kodvwa wawagcina emadvodza akhe ndzawo tonkhe, shengatsi wenta emalungiselelo emphi; yebo, futsi ngempela bekalungiselela kutsi ativikele kuwo, ngekukhuphula tindvonga titungelete aphindze alungiselela tindzawo tekubhaca.
52.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wachubeka kanjalo alungiselela imphi wate Moroni watfumela sibalo lesikhulu semadvodza kutsi ayocinisa libutfo lakhe.
52.8: Waphindze Moroni ngetulu kwaloko watfumela imiyaleto kuye kutsi atigcine tonkhe tiboshwa letatiwele etandleni takhe; njengoba emaLamani abebophe tiboshwa letiningi, kute atigcine tonkhe tiboshwa temaLamani njengenhlawulo yalabo emaLamani bekabatsetse.
52.9: Ngetulu kwaloko waphindze watfumela imiyaleto kuye kutsi acinise live iNala, futsi avikele indlela lencane leyayiholela eveni lelingasenyakatfo, hleze emaLamani ayitfole leyo ndzawo bese aba nemandla ekubahlukubeta ndzawo tonkhe.
52.10: Moroni ngetulu kwaloko watfumela kuye, afisa kutsi etsembeke ekugcineni leyo ncenye yelive, nekutsi afune onkhe ematfuba ekuwahlupha emaLamani kuleyo ncenye, ngekwemandla akhe bekanawo, kute mhlawumbe aphindze awatsatse ngelicebo noma ngalenye indlela lawo madolobha labekadze atsetfwe etandleni tabo; nekutsi avimbe aphindze acinise emadolobha ndzawo tonkhe, lawo labengakate awele etandleni temaLamani.
52.11: Futsi waphindze watsi kuye, bengitota kuwe, kodvwa buka, emaLamani ayasihlasela eminceleni yelive ngaselwandle lolungasenshonalanga; futsi buka, ngiyawahlasela, ngako-ke anginawukwati kuta kuwe.
52.12: Manje, inkhosi (Amoroni) beseyihambile yaphuma eveni laseZarahemla, futsi yaseyatise indlovukazi mayelana nekufa kwemnakabo, seyigcogcele ndzawonye sibalo lesikhulu semadvodza, futsi sesihambe sayokulwa nemaNefi eminceleni ngaselwandle lolungasenshonalanga.
52.13: Ngaleyondlela yayetama kuwahlukubeta emaNefi, kanye nekuheha incenye yemabutfo awo kutsi aye kuleyo ncenye yelive, asayalete lawo labekawashiye kutsi atsatse emadolobha lebekadze bawatsatsile, kutsi awahlukubete emaNefi eminceleni ngaselwandle lolungasemphumalanga, futsi awatsatse emave awo kangangoba kwakusemandla awo, ngekwemandla emabutfo awo.
52.14: Ngalesi sizatfu emaNefi aba kuleto timo letiyingoti ekupheleni kwenyaka wemashumi lamabili nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
52.15: Kodvwa bukani, kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli kutsi Thiyankham, ngekuyaletwa nguMoroni—lobekabeke emabutfo kutsi avikele imincele leseningizimu kanye nasenshonalanga yelive, futsi lobekasacale luhambo loluya ngaseveni iNala, kute asite Thiyankham ngemadvodza akhe ekutsatseni futsi emadolobha labekadze abalahlekele—
52.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Thiyankham bekatfole imiyaleto yekutsi ahlasele lidolobha laMulekhi, aphindze futsi alitsatse uma kungase kwenteke.
52.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Thiyankham wenta emalungiselelo kutsi ahlasele lidolobha laMulekhi, futsi ahambe nelibutfo kuyowahlasela emaLamani; kodvwa wabona kutsi kwakungeke kwenteke kutsi awehlule uma asetincabeni tawo; ngako-ke wawayekela emasu akhe wabuyela edolobheni iNala, kutsi alindzele kufika kwaMoroni, kute libutfo lakhe licine.
52.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wafika nelibutfo lakhe eveni iNala, ekupheleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
52.19: Futsi ekucaleni kwenyaka wemashumi lamabili nesiphohlongo, Moroni naThiyankham kanye nalabaningi betindvuna letinkhulu babamba umhlangano wemphi—wekutsi bebatokwenta kanjani kutsi bente emaLamani aphume atawukulwa nabo; noma kutsi ngandlela tsite babakhohlise kutsi baphume etincabeni tawo, kute batfole kubengama baphindze balitsatse lidolobha laMulekhi.
52.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batfumela titfunywa ebutfweni lemaLamani, lelalivikele lidolobha laMulekhi, kumholi walo, libito lakhe lobekunguJakobe, bafisa kutsi aphume nemabutfo akhe kutsi bahlangane nabo ematsafeni emkhatsini wemadolobha lamabili. Kodvwa bukani, Jakobe, lobekangumZoramu, akafunanga kuphuma nelibutfo lakhe kutsi atohlangana nabo ematsafeni.
52.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni, ete ematsemba ekuhlangana nabo endzaweni lengavuni muntfu, ngako-ke, wenta sincumo ngekutsi ente lisu kute awalutse emaLamani kutsi aphume etincabeni tawo.
52.22: Ngako-ke wenta kutsi Thiyankham atsatse sibalo lesincane semadvodza ahambe ehlele entansi edvute nelugu lwelwandle; futsi Moroni kanye nelibutfo lakhe, ngekuhlwa, bahamba baya ehlane, enshonalanga yelidolobha iMulekhi; ngako-ke, ngakusasa, ngesikhatsi bogadzi bemaLamani sebabone Thiyankham, bagijima bayotjela Jakobe, umholi wabo.
52.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaLamani ahamba ayawukulwa naThiyankham, acabanga kutsi ngesibalo sawo angamncoba Thiyankham ngenca yebuncane besibalo sakhe. Ngesikhatsi Thiyankham awabona emabutfo emaLamani eta kutawukulwa naye wacala kuhlehla wehlela ngaselugwini lwelwandle, ngasenyakatfo.
52.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi besekacala kubaleka, aba nesibindzi abacosha ngemfutfo. Futsi ngesikhatsi Thiyankham awaholela khashane emaLamani labekabacosha angabakhandzi, buka, Moroni wayaleta kutsi incenye yelibutfo lakhe lelalinaye lihambe liye edolobheni, futsi lilitsatse.
52.25: Futsi benta kanjalo, baphindze bababulala bonkhe labo labebashiywe kutsi balivikele lidolobha, yebo, bonkhe labo bebangafuni kubeka phansi tikhali tabo temphi.
52.26: Ngalesi sizatfu Moroni walitsatsa lidolobha iMulekhi nencenye yelibutfo lakhe, abe ahamba nalenye incenye kuyohlangana nemaLamani uma abuya ekucosheni Thiyankham.
52.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani amlandzela Thiyankham ate efika dvutane nelidolobha iNala, emvakwaloko ahlangabetwa nguLehi kanye nelibutfo lakhe lelincane, lelalishiywe kutsi livikele lidolobha iNala.
52.28: Manje bukani, ngesikhatsi tindvuna letinkhulu temaLamani setibone Lehi nelibutfo lakhe beta batawukulwa nawo, abaleka adideke kakhulu, hleze mhlawumbe angabe asakhona kulitfola lidolobha iMulekhi ngaphambi kwekutsi Lehi awakhandze; ngoba abesakhatsele ngenca yekuhamba kwawo, futsi emadvodza aLehi abengakakhatsali.
52.29: Manje emaLamani abengati kutsi Moroni bekasemuva kwawo nelibutfo lakhe; konkhe labekwesaba kwakunguLehi kanye nebantfu bakhe.
52.30: Manje Lehi bekete sifiso sekuwakhandza bate bahlangane naMoroni kanye nelibutfo lakhe.
52.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaphambi kwekutsi emaLamani asahlehlele khashane atungeletwa ngemaNefi, ngemadvodza aMoroni kulunye luhlangotsi, kanye nebantfu baLehi ngakulolunye, bonkhe labebangakakhatsali futsi basagcwele emandla; kodvwa emaLamani besekakhatsele ngenca yeluhambo lwawo loludze.
52.32: Futsi Moroni wayaleta emadvodza akhe kutsi awahlasele ate anikele tikhali tawo temphi.
52.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jakobe, angumholi wawo, aphindze angumZoramu, futsi anemoya longancobeki, wawahola emaLamani kutsi ayawukulwa ngentfukutselo lenemandla lamakhulu ngalokumelene naMoroni.
52.34: Ngenca yekutsi Moroni abesendleleni yawo yekuhamba, ngako-ke, Jakobe bekatimisele kubabulala abancume ate aphumele ngale kwelidolobha laMulekhi. Kodvwa bukani, Moroni kanye nemadvodza akhe bebanemandla kakhulu; ngako-ke abatange bawavumele emaLamani kutsi endlule.
52.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinhlangotsi totimbili talwa ngentfukutselo lenemandla lamakhulu; futsi kwaba khona labaningi lababulawa kuto totimbili tinhlangotsi; yebo, naMoroni walimala kwatsi Jakobe wabulawa.
52.36: Lehi wacindzetela emuva kwabo ngentfukutselo lenemandla nemadvodza akhe lanemandla, kangangekutsi emaLamani labekangemuva anikela tikhali tawo temphi; kwatsi labasele bawo, badidekile kakhulu, abatanga noma bahambe noma balwe.
52.37: Manje Moroni abona kudideka kwawo, watsi kuwo: Uma ningaletsa ngaphambili tikhali tenu temphi futsi nitinikele, bukani sitawuyekela kucitsa ingati yenu.
52.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani asawavile lamavi, tindvuna tawo letinkhulu, bonkhe labo labebangatange babulawe, beta ngaphambili futsi batijika phansi tikhali tabo temphi etinyaweni taMoroni, baphindze bayala emadvodza abo kutsi nawo ente njalo.
52.39: Kodvwa bukani, bebabaningi labebangafuni; futsi labo labebangafuni kunikela tinkemba tabo batsatfwa baboshwa, kwatsi tikhali tabo temphi tatsatfwa kubo, baphocelelwa kutsi bahambe nabomnakabo baye eveni iNala.
52.40: Manje sibalo setiboshwa letatitsetfwe sasendlula sibalo salabo labebabulewe, yebo, sasingetulu kwalabo labebabulewe etinhlangotsini totimbili.

53.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babeka bogadzi etikwetiboshwa temaLamani, batiphoca kutsi tihambe tiyongcwaba labafile bato, yebo, futsi ngalokunjalo nalabafile bemaNefi labebabulewe; futsi Moroni wabeka emadvodza etikwato kutsi atigadze ngesikhatsi tenta umsebenti wato.
53.2: Moroni wahamba waya edolobheni laMulekhi anaLehi, watsatsa sikhundla sekuphatfwa kwelidolobha wasinika Lehi. Manje buka, lo Lehi bekayindvodza lebeyikadze inaMoroni esikhatsini lesiningi setimphi takhe tonkhe; futsi bekayindvodza lebeyifana naMoroni, batfokota ngekuphepha kwalomunye nalomunye; yebo, bebatsandzana, futsi batsandvwa bantfu bonkhe baNefi.
53.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi emaLamani sekacedzile kungcwaba labafile babo ngalokunjalo nalabafile bemaNefi, ahanjiswa abuyiselwa emuva eveni iNala; futsi Thiyankham, ngemiyaleto yaMoroni, wenta kutsi acale kusebenta agubhe umsele atungelete live, noma lidolobha, iNala.
53.4: Wenta kutsi akhe ludvonga lwemapulango elusentseni ngekhatsi kwemsele; akhiphe kungcola emseleni akujike ngale kweludvonga lwemapulango; futsi benta kutsi emaLamani asebente ngalendlela ate alitungelete lidolobha iNala atungelete ngelubondza lolucinile lwemapulango kanye nemhlabatsi, lobekufika etulu kakhulu.
53.5: Lelidolobha laba yincaba lecine kakhulu emvakwaloko; futsi kulelidolobha batigadza tiboshwa temaLamani; yebo, ngisho nangekhatsi kweludvonga labebatente kutsi tilwakhe ngetandla tato lucobo. Manje Moroni bekaphocelelekile kutsi ente emaLamani kutsi asebente, ngoba bekulula kutsi agadvwe ngesikhatsi asemsebentini wawo; futsi bekafisa kuba nemabutfo akhe onkhe uma ahlasela emaLamani.
53.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni ngaleyondlela besekatfole kuncoba kwalelinye lemabutfo lamakhulu emaLamani, sekalitsetse lidolobha laMulekhi, lebelingulelinye letincaba temaLamani lebeticinile eveni laNefi; futsi ngaleyondlela besekakhe incaba lecinile kutsi agcine tiboshwa takhe.
53.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi akatange asenta imetamo nanini yekulwa nemaLamani kulowo mnyaka, kodvwa wasebentisa bantfu bakhe kulungiselela imphi, yebo, kanye nekwenta tincaba leticinile tekuvimbela emaLamani, yebo, futsi kanjalo nekukhulula bafati babo kanye nebantfwana babo endlaleni kanye nasenhluphekweni, kanye nekuniketa kudla emabutfo akhe.
53.8: Manje kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaLamani, elwandle lolusenshonalanga, eningizimu, ngesikhatsi Moroni angekho ngenca yesento sangansense sekuhlubuka emkhatsini wemaNefi, lokwadala kungevani emkhatsini wabo, kwenta kutsi awazuze ngendlela letsite emaNefi, yebo, kangangekutsi besekatsetse emadolobha awo lamaningi kuleyo ncenye yelive.
53.9: Ngako-ke ngenca yebubi emkhatsini wabo, yebo, ngenca yekuphikisana kanye nesento sangansense sekuhlubuka emkhatsini wabo batitfola sebasetimeni letiyingoti kakhulu.
53.10: Manje buka, nginentfo letsite lekumele ngiyisho mayelana nebantfu ba-Amoni, labo, ekucaleni, labebangemaLamani; kodvwa nga-Amoni kanye nabomnakabo, noma-ke ngemandla kanye nangelivi laNkulunkulu, base bagucukele eNkhosini; baletfwa entansi eveni laseZarahemla, futsi kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi seloku bavikelwa ngemaNefi.
53.11: Futsi ngenca yesifungo sabo bavinjelwa ngiso kutsi batsatsele bomnakabo tikhali; ngoba bebente sifungo sekutsi abasayuphindze nanini bayicitsa ingati; futsi ngekwesifungo sabo bebayawufa; yebo, bebayawutivumela kutsi bawele etandleni tabomnakabo, kube kungasiko kutsi bekungenca yesihawu kanye nelutsandvo lolukhulu Amoni kanye nemnakabo labebanalo ngabo.
53.12: Futsi ngalesi sizatfu baletfwa eveni laseZarahemla; futsi seloku bavikelwa ngemaNefi njalo.
53.13: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi babona ingoti, netinhlupheko letiningi kanye netinsizi emaNefi labekatitfwalela bona, batsintseka ngesihawu futsi babanesifiso sekutsatsa tikhali kutsi bavikele live labo.
53.14: Kodvwa buka, ngesikhatsi sebatawutsatsa tikhali temphi tabo, behlulwa kuvunyiswa nguHilamani kanye nabomnakabo, ngoba bese batawusephula sifungo lebebasentile.
53.15: Futsi Hilamani bekesaba hleze ngekwenta njalo balahlekelwe yimiphefumulo yabo; ngako-ke bonkhe labo labebangene kulesi sivumelwano baphoceleleka kutsi babuke bomnakabo bendlula kamatima etihluphekweni tabo, etimeni tabo letiyingoti ngalesi sikhatsi.
53.16: Kodvwa buka, kwenteka kutsi bebanemadvodzana lamaningi, labekangangenanga esivumelwaneni sekutsi angeke atsatse tikhali tawo temphi kute ativikele etitseni tawo; ngako-ke abutsana ndzawonye ngalesi sikhatsi, ngebuningi balabo labebangakwati kutitsatsa tikhali, futsi batibita ngekutsi bangemaNefi.
53.17: Futsi bangena esivumelwaneni sekutsi balwele inkhululeko yemaNefi, yebo, kutsi bavikele live ngekunikela ngetimphilo tabo; yebo, ngisho nabo benta sivumelwano sekutsi abayuze balahle inkhululeko yabo, kodvwa bayawukulwa tikhatsi tonkhe kuvikela emaNefi kanye nabo ebugcilini.
53.18: Manje bukani, bekukhona tinkhulungwane letimbili talawo majaha, lebetingene kulesi sivumelwano futsi tatsatsa tikhali tato temphi kuvikela live lato.
53.19: Manje buka, njengoba betingakate nanini timise kabi emaNefi, manje ngalesi sikhatsi taba lusito lolukhulu; ngoba tatsatsa tikhali tato temphi, futsi tafuna kutsi Hilamani abe ngumholi wato.
53.20: Bonkhe bebangemajaha, bangemachawe lamakhulu ngekwesibindzi, futsi ngalokunjalo nangekwemandla kanye nangekusebenta; kodvwa buka, loku bekungasiko kuphela—bebangemadvodza labekaneliciniso ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi kuko konkhe lebebaphatsiswe kona ngekwetsenjwa.
53.21: Yebo, bebangemadvodza laneliciniso nalanebucotfo, ngoba bebafundziswe kutsi bayigcine imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu kanye nekuhamba ngekulunga phambi kwakhe.
53.22: Manje kwenteka kutsi Hilamani wawahola emajaha akhe labekatinkhulungwane letimbili temasotja, wayawusekela bantfu eminceleni yelive eningizimu ngaselwandle lolungasenshonalanga.
53.23: Futsi waphela ngalendlela-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.

54.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nemfica webehluleli, Amoroni watfumela kuMoroni afisa kutsi ashintjise ngetiboshwa.
54.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wativa anekujabula lokukhulu ngalesi sicelo, ngoba bekafuna imiphako leyayiniketwe kutsi yondle tiboshwa temaLamani kutsi yondle bantfu bakhe; futsi aphindze afuna bantfu bakhe kutsi bacinise libutfo lakhe.
54.3: Manje emaLamani bekatsetse besifazane labaningi kanye nebantfwana, kantsi kwakute namunye wesifazane noma umntfwana emkhatsini wato tonkhe tiboshwa taMoroni, noma tiboshwa Moroni bekatitsetse; ngako-ke Moroni wenta sincumo ngekutsi ente licebo lekutsi atfole tiboshwa temaNefi letiningi kunemaLamani kangangoba kwakungenteka.
54.4: Ngako-ke wabhala incwadzi, wayitfumela ngenceku ya-Amoroni, yona kanye leyo leyayiletse incwadzi kuMoroni. Manje lawa ngemavi lawabhalela Amoroni, atsi:
54.5: Buka, Amoroni, ngikubhalele lokutsite mayelana nalemphi leniyichubile ngalokumelene nebantfu bami, noma-ke umnakenu layichubile ngalokumelene nabo, futsi lenisatimisele kuyichuba emvakwekufa kwakhe.
54.6: Buka, ngitawukutjela lokutsite mayelana nekulunga kwaNkulunkulu, kanye nenkemba yentfukutselo yakhe lenemandla onkhe, lelengela kini ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke futsi nihocise emabutfo enu emaveni enu, noma eveni lekungelenu, lokulive lemaNefi.
54.7: Yebo, bengitawukutjela letintfo kube bewungakhona kutilalela; yebo, bengitawukutjela mayelana naleso sihogo lesibi lesilindzele kwemukela babulali labanjengawe kanye nemnakenu, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke futsi nihocise tinhloso tenu tekubulala, nibuyele nemabutfo enu emaveni enu.
54.8: Kodvwa njengoba nake natilahla letintfo, futsi nalwa nebantfu beNkhosi, ngilindzele kutsi nitawukwenta loko futsi.
54.9: Manje buka, sikulungele kuhlangana nani; yebo, futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi nihocise tinhloso tenu, buka, nitawudvonsela phansi intfukutselo yaloyo Nkulunkulu lenimlahlile, kute kube sekubhujisweni kwenu nonkhe.
54.10: Kodvwa, njengoba iNkhosi iphila, emabutfo etfu atawukuta kini ngaphandle kwekutsi nihocise, futsi masinyane nitawuvakashelwa ngekufa, ngoba sitawuwagcina emadolobha etfu kanye nemihlaba yetfu; futsi sitawuyigcina inkholo yetfu kanye netindlela taNkulunkulu
54.11: Kodvwa buka, kubukeka kimi kungatsi leti tintfo lengitikhuluma nawe tilite; noma kubukeka kimi kungatsi ungumntfwana wesihogo; ngako-ke ngitawuyivala incwadzi yami ngekukutjela kutsi anginawutishintjisa tiboshwa, ngaphandle kwembandzela wekutsi nitawukhulula indvodza nemkayo kanye nebantfwana bayo, ngesiboshwa sinye; uma nikwenta loku, ngitawushintjisa.
54.12: Futsi buka, uma ningakwenti loku, ngitawunihlasela nemabutfo ami, yebo, ngitawuhlomisa ngisho nebesifazane kanye nebantfwana bami, futsi ngitawukuta ngilwe nani, ngitawunilandzela ngisho eveni lenu, lokulive lelilifa letfu lekucala; yebo, futsi kuyawuba yingati ngengati, yebo imphilo ngemphilo; ngitawukulwa nani nite nibulawe nisuswe emhlabeni.
54.13: Buka, ngitfukutsele, kanjalo nebantfu bami; nifune kusibulala, tsine sifune kutivikela kuphela. Kodvwa buka, uma nisafuna kusibulala natsi sitawufuna kunibulala; yebo, futsi sitawulifuna live letfu, live lelilifa letfu lekucala.
54.14: Manje ngiyayivala incwadzi yami; NginguMoroni; ngingumholi webantfu bemaNefi.
54.15: Manje kwenteka kutsi Amoroni, ngesikhatsi asayitfolile lencwadzi, watfukutsela; wabhala lenye incwadzi leya kuMoroni, futsi lawa ngemavi lawabhala, atsi:
54.16: Ngingu-Amoroni, inkhosi yemaLamani; ngingumnakabo-Amalikhiya lenambulala. Buka, ngitawuyiphindzisela ingati yakhe kini, yebo, futsi ngitawunihlasela nemabutfo ami ngoba angikwesabi kusonga kwakho.
54.17: Ngoba buka, boyihlo babona bomnakabo, kangangekutsi babancisha lilungelo labo lekubusa ekubeni lalilabo.
54.18: Manje buka, uma ningabeka phansi tikhali tenu, bese nitiletsa ngaphansi kwalabo umbuso lowungewabo ngekwemtsetfo, ngitawukwenta kutsi bantfu bami babeke phansi tikhali tabo futsi bangabe basalwa nanini.
54.19: Buka, usonge kakhulu ngalokumelene nami kanye nebantfu bami; kodvwa buka, asikwesabi kusonga kwakho.
54.20: Noma kunjalo, ngitawuvuma kutsi sishintjiselane tiboshwa njengekwesicelo sakho, ngentfokoto, kute ngigcinele emadvodza ami emphi kudla; futsi sitawuchuba imphi lengeke iphele, kute siletse emaNefi ngaphansi kwetfu noma aphele ingunaphakadze.
54.21: Mayelana naloyo Nkulunkulu lotsi simlahlile, buka, asati lutfo ngaloyo muntfu; ngisho nani imbala; kodvwa uma kungenteka kutsi ukhona umuntfu lonjalo, asati kodvwa kungenteka usidalile njengani.
54.22: Futsi uma kungenteka kutsi ukhona develi kanye nesihogo, buka angeke yini akutfumele lapho kutsi uyawuhlala kanye nemnaketfu lenimbulele, lophawule ngaye kutsi uye endzaweni lenjalo na? Kodvwa buka leti tintfo atinamsebenti.
54.23: Ngingu-Amoroni, futsi ngiwesitukulwane saZoramu, boyihlo labamphocelela futsi bamkhipha eveni laseJerusalema.
54.24: Buka manje, ngingumLamani lonesibindzi; buka, lemphi ichutjelwe kutsi iphindzisele koniwa kwabo, nekugcina iphindze ibuyisele emalungelo abo kutsi babuse; futsi ngiyayivala lencwadzi yami leya kuMoroni.

55.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni sekatfole lencwadzi watfukutsela kakhulu, ngoba bekati kutsi Amoroni bekanelwati loluphelele ngenkhohliso yakhe; yebo, bekati kutsi Amoroni bekanelwati kutsi bekungasiso sizatfu lesilungile lebesimente wachuba imphi ngalokumelene nebantfu baNefi.
55.2: Watsi: Buka, ngeke ngishintjiselane ngetiboshwa na-Amoroni ngaphandle kwekutsi ahocise lenhloso yakhe, njengoba ngichazile encwadzini yami; ngoba ngeke ngivume kutsi abe nalamanye emandla ngetulu kwalawa lanawo.
55.3: Buka, ngiyayati indzawo lapho emaLamani agadza khona bantfu bami lababatsetse babenta tiboshwa; futsi njengoba Amoroni angatukungivumela ngekwencwadzi yami, buka, ngitawukwenta kuye njengekwemavi ami; yebo, ngitawufuna kufa emkhatsini wabo baze bacele lucolo.
55.4: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni sekawashito lamavi, wenta kutsi kwentiwe luphenyo emkhatsini wemadvodza akhe, kute mhlawumbe atfole indvodza lebeyisitukulwane saLamani emkhatsini wabo.
55.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bamtfola munye, libito lakhe lobekunguLamani; futsi bekangulomunye wetinceku tenkhosi lebeyibulewe ngu-Amalikhiya.
55.6: Manje Moroni wenta kutsi Lamani kanye nemadvodza akhe lamancane ngesibalo bahambe baye kubogadzi labebagadze emaNefi.
55.7: Manje emaNefi bekagadvwe edolobheni laseGidi; ngako-ke Moroni wabeka Lamani futsi wenta kutsi emadvodza lamancane ngesibalo ahambe naye.
55.8: Ngesikhatsi sekuhlwile Lamani waya kubogadzi labebagadze emaNefi, buka, bambona eta bambingelela, kodvwa watsi kubo: Ningesabi; bukani, ngingumLamani. Bukani, secile kumaNefi, futsi alele; bukani sitsetse liwayini labo seta nalo.
55.9: Manje ngesikhatsi emaLamani eva lamavi amemukela ngenjabulo; atsi kuye: Sinikeni liwayini lenu, kute sinatse; siyatfokota kutsi niphatse liwayini ngoba sikhatsele.
55.10: Kodvwa Lamani watsi kubo: Asiligcine lelinye liwayini letfu size siyawukulwa nemaNefi. Kodvwa lenkhulumo yabenta kutsi bafise kakhulu kulinatsa liwayini.
55.11: Ngoba, batsi: Sikhatsele, ngako-ke asilinatse leliwayini, futsi sekuyotsi emvakwesikhashana nje bese sesitfola sabelo seliwayini letfu, leselitawusicinisa kute siyawukulwa nemaNefi.
55.12: Lamani watsi kubo: Ningenta njengekwetifiso tenu.
55.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balinatsa liwayini ngekukhululeka; futsi belinambitseka kamnandzi, ngako-ke balinatsa ngekukhululeka lokukhulu; futsi belidzakisa, ngoba belilungiselwe kutsi libe nemandla.
55.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balinatsa batfokota, kwatsi emvakwesikhashana nje bese badzakwe bonkhe.
55.15: Manje ngesikhatsi Lamani kanye nebantfu bakhe babona kutsi bonkhe bese badzakiwe, futsi sebasebutfongweni lobujulile, babuyela kuMoroni bayomtjela tonkhe tintfo lebetentekile.
55.16: Manje loku kwenteka njengelicebo laMoroni. Futsi Moroni besekawalungiselele onkhe emadvodza akhe ngetikhali temphi; wahamba waya edolobheni iGidi, ngesikhatsi emaLamani asebutfongweni lobujulile futsi adzakiwe, wafike waphosa tikhali temphi etiboshweni, kangangekutsi tonkhe tahloma.
55.17: Yebo, ngisho nebesifazane babo, kanye nabo bonkhe bantfwana babo, ngebuningi balabo lebebangakwati kusebentisa tikhali temphi, ngesikhatsi Moroni ahlomisa tonkhe leto tiboshwa; tonkhe leto tintfo tentiwa ngekuthula lokukhulu.
55.18: Kodvwa kube bebawavusile emaLamani, buka bekadzakiwe futsi emaNefi bekangawabulala.
55.19: Kodvwa buka, loku bekungasiso sifiso saMoroni; bekangakujabuleli kubulala noma kucitsa ingati, kodvwa bekajabulela kusindzisa bantfu bakhe ekubhujisweni; futsi ngalesi sizatfu bekangeke aletse kuye kwehlulela ngalokungalungi, bekangeke awele etikwemaLamani awabulale adzakiwe.
55.20: Kodvwa besekatifezile tifiso takhe; ngoba besekatihlomisile leto tiboshwa temaNefi lebetingekhatsi kwetindvonga telidolobha, futsi besekatinike emandla ekutsatsa leto tincenye lebetingekhatsi kwetindvonga.
55.21: Emvakwaloko wenta kutsi lawo madvodza labekanawo ahlehle libangana kusuka kubo, bese atungeleta emabutfo emaLamani.
55.22: Manje buka loku kwenteka ngesikhatsi sasebusuku, kangangekutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani avuka ekuseni abona kutsi besekatungeletwe ngemaNefi ngaphandle, futsi tiboshwa tawo bese tihlomile ngekhatsi.
55.23: Futsi ngaleyondlela abona kutsi emaNefi besekanemandla etikwawo; futsi kuletitimo atfola kutsi bekungasadzingeki kutsi alwe nemaNefi; ngako-ke tindvuna tawo letinkhulu tafuna tikhali tabo temphi, futsi tatiletsa phambili tatiphonsa phansi etinyaweni temaNefi, titicelela umusa.
55.24: Manje buka, loku bekusifiso saMoroni, wawatsatsa wawenta tiboshwa temphi, futsi walitsatsa lidolobha, wenta kutsi tonkhe tiboshwa tikhululwe, lebetingemaNefi; tahlangana nelibutfo laMoroni, futsi tafaka emandla lamakhulu ebutfweni lakhe.
55.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wenta kutsi emaLamani, labekawente tiboshwa, acale umsebenti wekucinisa tincaba etindzaweni tonkhe telidolobha iGidi.
55.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekalicinisile lidolobha iGidi, njengekwetifiso takhe, wenta kutsi tiboshwa takhe titsatfwe tiyiswe edolobheni iNala; ngetulu kwaloko waligadza lelo dolobha ngelibutfo lelinemandla lamakhulu.
55.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi, nanoma kungenca yemacebo onkhe angansense emaLamani, atigcina futsi ativikela tonkhe tiboshwa lebekatitsetse, ngetulu kwaloko awugcina wonkhe umhlaba kanye nekuzuza lebesebaphindze bakutsatsa.
55.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi acala kuncoba futsi, aphindze afuna emalungelo kanye netimfanelo tawo.
55.29: Tikhatsi letiningi emaLamani etama kubatungeleta ebusuku, kodvwa kulemetamo alahlekelwa tiboshwa letiningi.
55.30: Futsi sikhatsi lesiningi etama kuniketa lelinye lemawayini abo kumaNefi, kute bawabulale ngebutsi noma ngekuwadzakisa.
55.31: Kodvwa buka, emaNefi bekangaphuti kuyikhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wawo kulesi sikhatsi sawo senhlupheko. Bebangenawutifaka elugibeni; yebo, akalinatsanga liwayini lawo, ngaphandle kwekutsi balinikete kucala letinye tetiboshwa temaLamani.
55.32: Futsi ngaleyondlela bebacaphele kutsi kubebete butsi lobebungafakelwa bona; ngoba uma liwayini labo belingaba ngushevu kumLamani belingaba ngushevu futsi nakumNefi; futsi babuhlola ngaleyondlela bonkhe tjwala bawo.
55.33: Manje kwenteka kutsi kwaba nesidzingo sekutsi Moroni ente emalungiselelo ekuhlasela lidolobha iMoriyanthoni; ngoba buka, emaLamani, ngekwemisebenti yawo, besekalicinisile lidolobha iMoriyanthoni late laba yincaba lecine kakhulu.
55.34: Futsi bekachubeka nekuletsa emabutfo lamasha kulelo dolobha, futsi kanjalo nemiphako lemisha.
55.35: Waphela kanjalo ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.

56.1: Manje kwenteka ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu wekubusa kwebehluleli, ngelusuku lwesibili enyangeni yekucala, Moroni watfola incwadzi levela kuHilamani, ichaza ngesimo sebantfu kuleyo ncenye yelive.
56.2: Futsi lawa ngemavi lawabhala, atsi: Mnaketfu, lotsandzeka kakhulu, Moroni eNkhosini nasetinhluphekweni temphi yetfu; buka, mnaketfu lotsandzekako, nginalokutsite lengifuna kukutjela kona mayelana nemphi yetfu kulencenye yelive.
56.3: Buka, emadvodzana latinkhulungwane letimbili talabo bantfu Amoni lehla nabo wabakhipha eveni laNefi—manje bowati kutsi laba bebabesitukulwane saLamani, lobekayindvodzana lendzala yababe Lehi;
56.4: Manje kute sidzingo kutsi ngikulandzise mayelana nemasiko abo noma kungakholwa kwabo, ngoba uyati mayelana nato tonkhe leti tintfo—
56.5: Ngako-ke kuyangenetisa kutsi ngikutjele kutsi tinkhulungwane letimbili talawa majaha titsatse tikhali tato temphi, tafuna kutsi ngibe ngumholi wato; futsi siphumele ebaleni kutawuvikela live letfu
56.6: Futsi manje uyati mayelana nesivumelwano boyise labasenta, sekutsi angeke batitsatse tikhali tabo temphi kutsi balwe nabomnakabo kute bacitse ingati.
56.7: Kodvwa emnyakeni wemashumi lamabili nesitfupha, ngesikhatsi babona tinhlupheko tetfu kanye netinsizi tetfu ngabo, besebatosephula sivumelwano labebasentile bese batsatsa tikhali tabo temphi kuyawusivikela.
56.8: Kodvwa angibavumelanga kutsi basephule lesivumelwano lebebasentile ngekucabanga kutsi Nkulunkulu bekatawusicinisa, kangangekutsi besingeke sisahlupheka kakhulu ngenca yekugcwaliseka kwesifungo lebebasentile.
56.9: Kodvwa buka, nayi intfo yinye lesijabula ngayo kakhulu. Ngoba buka, ngemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesitfupha, mine, Hilamani, ngawahola lawa majaha latinkhulungwane letimbili saya edolobheni laseJudiya, kuyawusita Anthiphasi, lowambeka kutsi abe ngumholo webantfu bakuleyo ncenye yelive.
56.10: Futsi ngawahlanganisa emadvodzana ami, (ngoba afanelekile kutsi abitwe ngemadvodzana) nelibutfo la-Anthiphasi, lawo mandla Anthiphasi lawajabulela kakhulu; ngoba buka, libutfo lakhe laselincishiswe ngemaLamani ngoba emabutfo awo besekabulele sibalo lesikhulu semadvodza etfu, lokusizatfu kutsi sikhale.
56.11: Noko, singatidvudvuta ngeliciniso, lekutsi bafele etimisweni telive labo kanye netaNkulunkulu wabo, yebo, futsi bajabulile.
56.12: Futsi emaLamani ngetulu kwaloko asagcine tiboshwa letiningi, tonkhe lekutindvuna letinkhulu, kute namunye lomunye labamshiye aphila. Futsi sicabanga kutsi kungumanje ngalesi sikhatsi setiseveni laNefi; kunjalo uma tingabulawanga.
56.13: Manje lawa ngemadolobha emaLamani labekawatsetse ngekucitsa ingati yalabaningi bemadvodza etfu lanesibindzi:
56.14: Live laseManthi, noma lidolobha laseManthi, nelidolobha laZeziromu, kanye nelidolobha laseKhumeni, kanye nelidolobha lase-Anthiphara.
56.15: Lawa ngemadolobha lawatfola kutsi abe ngewabo ngesikhatsi ngifika edolobheni laseJudiya; futsi ngatfola Anthiphasi kanye nemadvodza akhe basebenta kamatima ngemandla abo onkhe kutsi balicinise lelidolobha.
56.16: Yebo, bebakhatsele ngekwemtimba kanjalo nangekwemoya, ngoba bebalwe ngesibindzi emini baphindze basebenta kamatima ebusuku kute bawagcine emadolobha abo; futsi ngaleyondlela bebamelene netinhlupheko letinkhulu letitinhlobonhlobo.
56.17: Manje bebatimesele kuncoba kulendzawo noma bafe; ngako-ke ngaleso sizatfu ungacabanga kutsi lelibutfo lelincane lengafika nalo, yebo, lawo madvodzana ami, abanika ematsemba lamakhulu nenjabulo lenkhulu.
56.18: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani asabona kutsi Anthiphasi besekatfole emandla lamakhudlwana ebutfweni lakhe, aphocelelwa yimiyalo ya-Amoroni kutsi angalihlaseli lidolobha laseJudiya, noma atawukulwa natsi.
56.19: Futsi ngaleyondlela sabusiswa yiNkhosi; ngoba kube ake eta etikwetfu kulobu butsakatsaka betfu mhlawumbe abengalibulala libutfo letfu lelincane; kodvwa salondvolotwa.
56.20: Ayalwa ngu-Amoroni kutsi awagcine lawo madolobha labesebawatsetse. Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesitfupha. Ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesikhombisa sasesililungiselele lidolobha letfu kanye natsi lucobo kutsi sitivikele.
56.21: Manje besifuna kutsi emaLamani atosihlasela; ngoba besingafuni kutsi siwahlasele etincabeni tawo.
56.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sabeka tinhloli ndzawo tonkhe, kutsi tigadze iminyakato yemaLamani, kute angasendluli ebusuku noma emini ayohlasela lamanye emadolobha etfu labengasenyakatfo.
56.23: Ngoba sasati kutsi kulawo madolobha bebangakacini ngalokwanele kutsi bahlangane nawo; ngako-ke besifuna, kutsi uma nje angendlula ngakitsi, siwahlasele ngemuva, futsi ngaleyondlela silwe nawo ngemuva phindze ngaso leso sikhatsi ahlangabetwe ngembili. Sasicabanga kutsi singawancoba; kodvwa buka, sadvumala kulesifiso setfu.
56.24: Akatange alokotse endlule ngakitsi nelibutfo lawo lonkhe, noma nje endlule nencenye, hleze angabi nemandla ngalokwanele bese ayehlulwa.
56.25: Noma akatange alokotse ahambe ehle ayawukulwa nelidolobha laseZarahemla; noma alokotse ancamule enhloko yeSidoni, kuya edolobheni laNefiha.
56.26: Ngaleyondlela, ngemabutfo awo, abetimisele kutsi awagcine lawo madolobha labekawatsetse.
56.27: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngenyanga yesibili yalowomnyaka, saletselwa imiphako leminingi lebeyivela kuboyise balawo madvodzana ami latinkhulungwane letimbili.
56.28: Ngetulu kwaloko satfunyelelwa emadvodza latinkhulungwane letimbili avela eveni laseZarahemla. Ngaleyondlela satilungiselela ngemadvodza latinkhulungwane letilishumi, nemiphako yawo, kanjalo neyebafati bawo kanye neyebantfwana bawo.
56.29: EmaLamani, nakabona emabutfo etfu akhula malanga onkhe, nemiphako ifika kutawusisekela, acala kwesaba, abese acala kuphuma, kube bekungenteka kuyosivimbela kutfola imiphako kanye nemandla.
56.30: Manje ngesikhatsi sibona kutsi emaLamani abesacala kungakhululeki ngaloku, saba nesifiso sekwenta licebo lelalitofezeka kuwo; ngako-ke Anthiphasi wayala kutsi ngihambe phambili nemadvodzana ami lamancane siye edolobheni lelingumakhelwane, kube shengatsi sihambisa imiphako.
56.31: Kwakufanele sendlule edvute nelidolobha i-Anthiphara, kube shengatsi siya edolobheni lelingaphambili, eminceleni ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
56.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba, shengatsi setfwele imiphako yetfu, siya kulelo dolobha.
56.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Anthiphasi wahamba nencenye yelibutfo lakhe, washiya labasalako kutsi bagcine lidolobha. Kodvwa akahambanga ngate ngahamba ngaphambili nelibutfo lami lelincane, sate sefika dvutane nelidolobha i-Anthiphara.
56.34: Manje, edolobheni i-Anthiphara bekubekwe libutfo lelicine kakhulu lemaLamani; yebo, leliningi kakhulu.
56.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi asatjelwe tinhloli tawo, eta nelibutfo lawo ahamba acondza kitsi.
56.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sawabalekela, saya ngasenyakatfo. Ngaleyondlela saliholela khashane libutfo lelinemandla lamakhulu lemaLamani.
56.37: Yebo, kwate kwaba libanga lelidze, kangangekutsi ngesikhatsi abona libutfo la-Anthiphasi liwalandzela, ngemandla alo onkhe, akatange ajikele ngesekudla noma ngesencele, kodvwa achubeka neluhambo lwawo ngendlela lecondzile emvakwetfu; futsi, njengoba sasicabanga, kwakuyinhloso yawo kutsi asibulale ngaphambi kwekutsi Anthiphasi awakhandze, kute angatungeletwa bantfu betfu.
56.38: Manje Anthiphasi, abubona bungoti betfu, walusheshisa luhambo lwelibutfo lakhe. Kodvwa buka, kwasekungusebusuku; ngako-ke akasikhandzanga, na-Anthiphasi akawakhandzanga; ngako-ke samisa emathende sahlala kwesikhashana ngalobo busuku
56.39: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaphambi kwentsatsakusa, buka, emaLamani abesasilandzela. Manje sasingakacini ngalokwanele kutsi silwe nawo; yebo, ngangingeke ngivume kutsi emadvodzana ami lamancane awele etandleni tawo; ngako-ke sachubeka neluhambo lwetfu saya ehlane.
56.40: Manje akalokotsanga ajikela ngesekudla noma ngesencele hleze atungeletwe; nami ngalokunjalo angilokotsanga ngajikela ngesekudla noma ngesencele hleze angikhandze, bese asisakhoni kumelana nawo, kodvwa sibulawe bese ayaphunyula; ngako-ke sabaleka lilanga lonkhe saya ehlane, kwate kwaba mnyama.
56.41: Futsi kwenteka kutsi, ngesikhatsi kukhanya kwasekuseni kufika sawabona emaLamani asetikwetfu, sawabalekela.
56.42: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi akasilandzelanga kakhulu ngaphambi kwekutsi eme; futsi kwakusekuseni ngelusuku lwesitsatfu enyangeni yesikhombisa.
56.43: Manje, noma akhandvwa ngu-Anthiphasi asatanga, kodvwa ngatsi kumadvodzana ami: Bukani, asati kodvwa sicabanga kutsi beme ngenhloso yekutsi sibahlasele, kute asibambe elugibeni lwawo;
56.44: Ngako-ke nitsini, madvodzana ami, nitawuhamba yini niyawuwahlasela na?
56.45: Manje ngitsi kuwe, mnaketfu lotsandzekako Moroni, angitange nanini ngisibone sibindzi lesikhulu kangaka, cha, hhayi emkhatsini wawo onkhe emaNefi.
56.46: Ngoba njengoba ngangihlale ngibabita ngemadvodzana ami (ngoba bonkhe bebabancane kakhulu) nabo batsi kimi: Babe, buka Nkulunkulu wetfu unatsi, futsi angeke avume kutsi sibulawe; ngako sivumele sihambe; angeke sibabulele bomnaketfu uma nabo bangasiyekela; ngako-ke asambeni, hleze balehlule libutfo la-Anthiphasi
56.47: Manje, bebangatange sebalwe, kodvwa bebangakwesabi kufa; futsi bebacabanga kakhulu ngenkhululeko yaboyise kunekucabanga ngetimphilo tabo; yebo, bebafundziswe bonina, kutsi uma bangangabati, Nkulunkulu bekatawubakhulula.
56.48: Futsi bangilandzisa emavi abonina, batsi: Asingabati kutsi bomake betfu bebakwati loko.
56.49: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngabuyela emuva netinkhulungwane letimbili tami ngayokulwa nemaLamani labekasicoshile. Manje buka, emabutfo a-Anthiphasi besekawakhandzile, yabe imphi leyesabekako seyicalile.
56.50: Libutfo la-Anthiphasi selikhatsele, ngenca yeluhambo lwabo ngesikhatsi lesifishane kangaka, beselitowela etandleni temaLamani; futsi kube angibuyanga netinkhulungwane tami letimbili abetoyifeza inhloso yawo.
56.51: Ngoba Anthiphasi besekafile ngenkemba, kanye nalabaningi bebaholi bakhe, ngenca yekukhatsala kwabo, lokwakubangwa luhambo lwabo lolwalushesha—ngako-ke emadvodza a-Anthiphasi adidekile ngenca yekufa kwebaholi babo, acala kuhlehlela emuva ngaphambi kwemaLamani.
56.52: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani ema sibindzi, acala kubacosha; futsi emaLamani bekabacosha ngemfutfo lomkhulu ngesikhatsi Hilamani atseleka etikwawo netinkhulungwane letimbili takhe, wacala kuwabulala kakhulu, kangangekutsi libutfo lonkhe lemaLamani lema laphindze lagucukela kuHilamani
56.53: Manje ngesikhatsi bantfu ba-Anthiphasi babona kutsi emaLamani abesagucukile, bagcogcela ndzawonye emadvodza abo baphindze beta emvakwemaLamani.
56.54: Manje kwenteka kutsi tsine, bantfu baNefi, bantfu ba-Anthiphasi, nami netinkhulungwane tami letimbili, sawatungeleta emaLamani, sawabulala; yebo, kangangekutsi aphoceleleka kutsi anikele ngetikhali tawo temphi kanjalo nawo njengetiboshwa temphi.
56.55: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi asatinikele kitsi, buka, ngawabala lawo majaha labekalwe kanye nami, nginekwesaba hleze bekamaningi lebekabulelewe.
56.56: Kodvwa buka, ngekujabula kwami lokukhulu, kwakute nalinye kuwo lebelibulewe; yebo, futsi bekalwe shengatsi anemandla aNkulunkulu; yebo, kute emadvodza latiwako lake alwa ngemandla lamangalisa kangaka; futsi nangemandla lamakhulu atseleka etikwemaLamani, kangangekutsi awesabisa; ngalesi sizatfu emaLamani atinikela njengetiboshwa temphi.
56.57: Njengoba sasite indzawo yetiboshwa tetfu, kutsi sitigadze kute tingahlangani nemabutfo emaLamani, ngako-ke satitfumela eveni laseZarahemla, kanye nencenye yalawo madvodza labekangakabulawa a-Anthiphasi, kanye nawo; kwatsi labasalako ngabatsatsa ngabahlanganisa nemajaha ami ema-Amoni, sase sitsatsa luhambo lwetfu sabuyela emuva edolobheni laseJudiya.

57.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngatfola incwadzi ivela ku-Amoroni, inkhosi, itsi uma ngangingaletsa leto tiboshwa temphi lebesititsetse naye bekatawusitiniketa lidolobha lase-Anthiphara.
57.2: Kodvwa ngatfumela incwadzi enkhosini, letsi besinesiciniseko kutsi emabutfo etfu bekenele kutsi alitsatse lidolobha lase-Anthiphara ngemandla etfu, futsi kukhulula tiboshwa ngalelo lidolobha bekungasho kutsi besingakahlakaniphi, nekutsi besiyawutikhulula kuphela tiboshwa tetfu ngekushintjiselana.
57.3: Futsi Amoroni wayala imibandzela yencwadzi yami, ngoba bekangafuni kushintjiselana ngetiboshwa; ngako-ke sacala kwenta emalungiselelo ekutsi siyawuhlasela lidolobha lase-Anthiphara.
57.4: Kodvwa bantfu base-Anthiphara balishiya lidolobha, babalekela kulamanye emadolobha abo, lebekangewabo, kute bawacinise; ngaleyondlela lidolobha lase-Anthiphara lawela etandleni tetfu.
57.5: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli.
57.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nemfica, satfola imiphako, kanjalo nekungetelwa ebutfweni letfu, kusuka eveni laseZarahemla, kanye naseveni lelitungelete lapho, lokwaba sibalo semadvodza latinkhulungwane letisitfupha, ngaphandle kwemashumi lasitfupha emadvodzana a-Amoni lebeketele kutawuhlanganyela nabomnakabo, licembu lami lelincane letinkhulungwane letimbili. Manje buka, besesicinile, yebo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko saba nemiphako leminingi leyaletfwa kitsi.
57.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekusifiso setfu kutsi siyichube imphi nelibutfo lebelibekwe kutsi livikele lidolobha iKhumeni.
57.8: Manje buka, ngitawukukhombisa kutsi sasheshe sasifeza lesifiso setfu; yebo, ngelibutfo letfu lelicinile, noma nencenye yelibutfo letfu lelicinile, salitungeleta, ebusuku, lidolobha iKhumeni, ngaphambi nje kwekutsi batfole imiphako.
57.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sabeka emathende kwesikhashane satungeleta lidolobha busuku lobuningi; salala etikwetinkemba tetfu, futsi sabeka bogadzi, kute emaLamani angeti kitsi ebusuku asibulale, loku lakwetama tikhatsi letiningi; kodvwa etikhatsini letiningi akwetama loku ingati yawo yacitfwa.
57.10: Ekugcineni imiphako yawo yefika, futsi besekatongena edolobheni ebusuku. Tsine, esikhundleni sekuba ngemaLamani, besingemaNefi; ngako-ke, sawatsatsa kanye nemiphako yawo.
57.11: Futsi nanoma emaLamani besekavinjelwe kutsi atfole kusekelwa ngalendlela, bekatimisele kutsi aligcine lelidolobha; ngako-ke kwadzingeka kutsi siyitsatse leyo miphako siyitfumele eJudiya, kutsi tiboshwa tetfu sititfumele eveni laseZarahemla.
57.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kungakendluli tinsuku letiningi ngaphambi kwekutsi emaLamani acale kulahla lonkhe litsemba lekusitakala; ngako-ke alidedela lidolobha etandleni tetfu; futsi ngaleyondlela bese siwafezile emacebo etfu ekutfola lelidolobha iKhumeni.
57.13: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi tiboshwa tetfu betitiningi kakhulu kangangekutsi, nanoma sibalo setfu sasisikhulu, saphoceleleka kutsi sisebentise lonkhe libutfo letfu kutsi sitigcine, noma sitibulale.
57.14: Ngoba buka, betiyawukweca tibaleke setisibalo lesikhulu, futsi tilwe ngematje, kanye nangetagila, nanoma ngayini lenye intfo lebetingayitfola, kangangekutsi abulala letingetulu kwetinkhulungwane letimbili kuyangetulu emvakwekutsi setitinikele kuba tiboshwa temphi.
57.15: Ngako-ke kwadzingeka, kutsi siticedze timphilo tato, noma sitigadze, ngenkemba esandleni, sitehlise tiye eveni laseZarahemla; futsi ngetulu kwaloko nemiphako yetfu yayingabeneli bantfu betfu, singakayibali leyo lebesiyitsetse kumaLamani.
57.16: Manje, kuleto timo letibucayi, kwaba yindzaba lematima kakhulu kutsi kutsatfwe sincumo kutsi kwentiweni ngaleti tiboshwa temphi; noko, sancuma kutsi sititfumele entansi eveni laseZarahemla; ngako-ke sakhetsa incenye yemadvodza etfu, sawaniketa ligunya etiboshweni tetfu kutsi aye entansi eveni laseZarahemla.
57.17: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa abuya. Manje buka, asiwabutanga mayelana netiboshwa; ngoba buka, emaLamani besekasetikwetfu, futsi abuya ngesikhatsi kutsi atawusisindzisa kutsi singaweli etandleni tawo. Ngoba buka, Amoroni besekawatfumelele sabelo lesisha semiphako futsi kanjalo nemabutfo lamaningi emadvodza.
57.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lawo madvodza lebesiwatfumele netiboshwa afika ngesikhatsi kutawuwamisa, njengoba besekatosincoba.
57.19: Kodvwa buka, licembu lami lelincane letinkhulungwane letimbili kanye nemashumi lasitfupha lalwa ngekutinikela lokukhulu; yebo, belicinile phambi kwemaLamani, futsi lababulala bonkhe labebabukene nalo.
57.20: Futsi njengoba labebasele belibutfo letfu lase lifuna kuhlehla phambi kwemaLamani, buka, lawo latinkhulungwane letimbili nemashumi lasitfupha bekacinile futsi aphikelele.
57.21: Yebo, lalalela futsi lacaphela kutsi liwente onkhe emavi ekuyalwa ngalokungiko; yebo, futsi kwenteka kulo ngisho njengekwelukholo lwalo; futsi ngawakhumbula emavi lelawakhuluma kimi ekutsi bonina bebalifundzisile.
57.22: Manje buka, bekungulamadvodzana ami, kanye nalawo madvodzana labekadze akhetsiwe kutsi ahambise tiboshwa, lesiwabonga ngaloku kuncoba lokukhulu; ngoba bekungiwo lawashaya emaLamani; ngako-ke achutjwa abuyiselwa emuva edolobheni laseManthi.
57.23: Saligcina lidolobha letfu iKhumeni, futsi asibulawanga sonkhe ngenkemba; noko, salahlekelwa kakhulu.
57.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi emaLamani sekabalekile, ngekushesha nganiketa imiyalo yekutsi emadvodza ami labekalimele atsatfwe emkhatsini walabafile, futsi ngenta kutsi emanceba awo abhandishwe.
57.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekukhona langemashumi lamabili, kulawo latinkhulungwane letimbili nemashumi lasitfupha ami, labekaculekile ngenca yekulahlekelwa yingati; noko, ngenca yebuhle baNkulunkulu, nangekumangala kwetfu lokukhulu, nangenjabulo yemabutfo etfu onkhe, bekute namunye wawo lowafa; yebo, futsi bekute namunye emkhatsini wawo longawatfolanga emanceba lamaningi.
57.26: Manje, kulondvoloteka kwawo bekumangalisa ebutfweni letfu lonkhe, yebo, kutsi alondvoloteke kube kukhona tinkhulungwane tabomnaketfu labebabulewe. Futsi ngalokufanele sikubona kungenca yemandla lamangalisako aNkulunkulu, ngenca yelukholo lwabo lolukhulu kuloko labebafundziswe kona kutsi bakukholwe—kutsi bekukhona Nkulunkulu lolungile, futsi nekutsi loyo lobekangangabati, bekalondvolotwa ngemandla akhe lamangalisako.
57.27: Manje lolu bekulukholo lwalabo lengikhulume ngabo; bancane, futsi tingcondvo tabo ticinile, futsi babeka litsemba labo kuNkulunkulu njalo nje.
57.28: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sesiwanakekele emadvodza etfu labekalimele, futsi sesibangcwabile betfu labebafile kanjalo nalabafile bemaLamani, labebabaningi, buka, sabuta kuGidi mayelana naleto tiboshwa lebeticale kuhamba tehla taya eveni laseZarahemla naye.
57.29: Manje Gidi bekuyindvuna lenkhulu yelicembu lebeyibekiwe kutsi igadze ngesikhatsi tehla tiya kulelo live.
57.30: Manje, lawa ngemavi Gidi lawakhuluma kimi: Buka, sesicalile kuhamba sehlela entansi eveni laseZarahemla netiboshwa tetfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahlangana netinhloli temabutfo etfu, lebetitfunyelwe kutsi tiyobuka inkambu yemaLamani.
57.31: Futsi tasimemeta, titsi—Bukani, emabutfo emaLamani ahamba acondze ngasedolobheni iKhumeni; futsi bukani, atawubahlasela, yebo, atawubabulala bantfu betfu.
57.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tiboshwa tetfu takuva kumemeta kwato, lokwenta kutsi tibe nesibindzi; futsi tacala kusivukela.
57.33: Futsi kwenteka ngenca yekusivukela kwato senta kutsi tinkemba tetfu tiwele etikwato. Futsi kwenteka kutsi taya tilicembu tagijimela etinkembeni tetfu, lokwenta kutsi, sibalo lesikhulu sato sibulawe; labasala bato beca futsi basibalekela.
57.34: Futsi buka, ngesikhatsi setibalekile asikhonanga kutikhandza, satsatsa luhambo lwetfu ngematubane sacondza ngasedolobheni iKhumeni; buka, safika ngesikhatsi kute sisite bomnaketfu ekugcineni lelidolobha.
57.35: Futsi buka, sesiphindze sakhululwa saphuma etandleni tetitsa tetfu. Futsi libusisiwe libito laNkulunkulu wetfu; ngoba buka, nguye losikhululile; yebo, losentele lentfo lenkhulu kangaka.
57.36: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi mine, Hilamani, sengiwevile lamavi aGidi, ngagcwala injabulo lenkhulu ngenca yebuhle baNkulunkulu ekusilondvoloteni, kute singafi sonkhe; yebo, futsi ngiyetsemba kutsi imiphefumulo yalaba lababulewe seyingene ekuphumuleni kwaNkulunkulu wabo.

58.1: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi inhloso yetfu lelandzelako kwakukutfola lidolobha laseManthi; kodvwa buka, kwakute indlela lesasingawakhipha ngayo edolobheni ngemacembu etfu lamancane. Ngoba buka, abekukhumbula loko lesasikwentile kute kube ngunyalo; ngako-ke asikhonanga kuwakhohlisa kutsi aphume etincabeni tawo.
58.2: Futsi abemaningi kakhulu kwengca libutfo letfu kangangekutsi asitange silokotse siye kuyowahlasela etincabeni tawo.
58.3: Yebo, kwadzingeka kutsi sisebentise emadvodza etfu ekugcineni leto tincenye telive lesasesititfolile kutsi tibe tetfu; ngako-ke kwadzingeka kutsi sime, kute sitfole emandla langetekile lavela eveni laseZarahemla kanye nesabelo lesisha semiphako.
58.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalesi sizatfu ngatfumela sitfunywa kumbusi welive letfu, kutsi ngimatise mayelana nesimo sebantfu betfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi sagadza kutsi sitfole imiphako kanye nemandla lavela eveni laseZarahemla.
58.5: Kodvwa buka, sazuza kancane kuloku; ngoba emaLamani nawo abetfola emandla lamakhulu lusuku ngelusuku, kanye nemiphako leminingi; taba kanjena-ke timo tetfu ngalesi sikhatsi.
58.6: Futsi emaLamani abephuma asihlasela tikhatsi ngetikhatsi, atimisele kusibulala ngelicebo; noko sasingakhoni kutokulwa nawo, ngenca yetindzawo tawo tekuphepha kanye netincaba tawo.
58.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi salindza kuleti timo letimatima sikhatsi lesingangetinyanga letiningi, sate sacishe safa ngenca yekweswela kudla.
58.8: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi sakutfola kudla, lokwaletfwa kitsi kugadvwe libutfo lemadvodza latinkhulungwane letimbili labekatosisita; futsi lolu ngilo lodvwa lusito lesalutfola, kutsi sitivikele siphindze sivikele nelive letfu kutsi lingaweli etandleni tetitsa tetfu, yebo, kutsi silwe netitsa tetfu letingabaleki.
58.9: Manje sizatfu salobu bulukhuni betfu, noma sizatfu sekutsi kungani bangatfumelanga emandla langetekile kitsi, sasingasati; ngako-ke sasikhatsatekile siphindze sigcwele kwesaba, hleze ngandlela tsite tehlulelo taNkulunkulu tite eveni letfu, kutosiketula kanye nekutosibhubhisa.
58.10: Ngako-ke sathandaza ngenshisekelo lenkhulu kuNkulunkulu, kutsi asicinise aphindze asikhulule asikhiphe etandleni tetitsa tetfu, yebo, nekutsi asinike emandla kutsi siwagcine emadolobha etfu, kanye nemave etfu, naloko lesinako, kute sisekele bantfu betfu.
58.11: Yebo, futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu yasivakashela yasicinisekisa kutsi itawusikhulula; yebo, kangangekutsi yasinika kuthula emiphefumulweni yetfu, yasipha nelukholo lolukhulu, yaphindze yasenta kutsi setsembele ekukhululweni ngiyo.
58.12: Sema sibindzi nelibutfo letfu lelincane lesasilitfolile, sagcila ngenshisekelo kuncoba titsa tetfu, nekugcina emave etfu, naloko lesasinako nebafati betfu, kanye nebantfwana betfu, nemgomo wenkhululeko yetfu.
58.13: Ngako-ke sahamba ngemandla etfu onkhe sayawukulwa nemaLamani, labekasedolobheni laseManthi; futsi sawamisa emathende etfu eceleni kwelihlane, lelalisedvute nelidolobha.
58.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa, ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi sasiseminceleni ngasehlane lelalisedvute nelidolobha, atfumela tinhloli tawo tatungeleta kute atfole sibalo kanye nemandla elibutfo letfu.
58.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi abona kutsi sasingakacini, ngekwesibalo setfu, esaba nekutsi sasitowavimbela ekusekelweni kwawo ngaphandle kwekutsi aphume alwe natsi asibulale, acabanga futsi kutsi abengasibulala kalula ngemabutfo awo lamaningi, ngako-ke acala kwenta emalungiselelo ekutsi aphume atawukulwa natsi.
58.16: Ngesikhatsi sibona kutsi abenta emalungiselelo ekutsi aphume atawukulwa natsi, buka, ngenta Gidi, kanye nesibalo lesincane semadvodza, kutsi abhace ehlane, na-Thiyomneri ngalokunjalo nesibalo lesincane semadvodza kutsi nabo babhace ehlane.
58.17: Manje Gidi kanye nemadvodza akhe bebangesekudla bese kutsi labanye bangesencele; ngesikhatsi sebabhacile, buka, mine ngasala, nalabasele belibutfo lami, kuyo kanye leyondzawo lesasimise kuyo kucala emathende etfu kutilungiselela sikhatsi sekutsi emaLamani aphume atawukulwa natsi.
58.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani aphuma nelibutfo lawo leliningi kutawukulwa natsi. Futsi ngesikhatsi asafikile asatokhwela etikwetfu ngenkemba, ngenta emadvodza ami, lawo labekanami, kutsi ahlehlele ehlane.
58.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani asilandzela ngesivivini lesikhulu, ngoba abenesifiso lesikhulu kutsi asikhandze kute asibulale; ngako-ke asilandzela angena ehlane; futsi sendlula emkhatsini waGidi kanye naThiyomneri, kangangekutsi bona ababonwanga ngemaLamani.
58.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani asendlulile, noma ngesikhatsi libutfo selendlulile, Gidi naThiyomneri bavuka etindzaweni tabo tekubhaca, batincamula tinhloli temaLamani kutsi tingasakhoni kubuyela edolobheni.
58.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebatincamulile, bagijima baya edolobheni bakhwela etikwabogadzi labebashiywe kutsi bagadze lidolobha, kangangekutsi bababulala base bayalitsatsa lelidolobha.
58.22: Manje loku kwenteka ngoba emaLamani avumela libutfo lawo lonkhe, ngaphandle kwabogadzi labambalwa nje kuphela, kutsi liholelwe ehlane.
58.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Gidi kanye naThiyomneri ngalendlela bese bakutfolile kulawula tincaba tawo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi satsatsa indlela yetfu, emvakwekutsi sesihambe kakhulu ehlane saya ngaseveni laseZarahemla.
58.24: Futsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi abeya ngaseveni laseZarahemla, esaba kakhulu, hleze bekukhona lisu lelalibekiwe kubaholela ekubhujisweni; ngako-ke acala kuhlehlela emuva ehlane futsi, yebo, abuyela emuva ngayo kanye leyondlela labekachamuke ngayo.
58.25: Buka, besekungusebusuku ase amisa emathende awo, ngoba tindvuna letinkhulu temaLamani taticabanga kutsi emaNefi besekakhatsele ngenca yeluhambo lwawo; futsi ticabanga kutsi abelijikisile lonkhe libutfo lawo ngako-ke akacabanganga lutfo mayelana nelidolobha laseManthi.
58.26: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekuhlwile, ngenta kutsi emadvodza ami angalali, kodvwa ahambe ngalenye indlela aye ngaseveni laseManthi.
58.27: Futsi ngenca yaloku kuhamba kwetfu kwasebusuku, buka, ngakusasa sasesingembili kwemaLamani, kangangekutsi safika kucala kunawo edolobheni laseManthi.
58.28: Ngako-ke kwenteka, kutsi ngalelicebo salitsatsa lidolobha laseManthi laba ngeletfu ngaphandle kwekucitsa ingati
58.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emabutfo emaLamani efika edvute nelidolobha, abona kutsi sasikulungele kulwa nawo, amangala kakhulu futsi aphatfwa kwesaba lokukhulu, kangangekutsi abalekela ehlane.
58.30: Yebo, futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaLamani abaleka aphuma kuyo yonkhe leyoncenye yelive. Kodvwa buka, abetfwele besifazane kanye nebantfwana labaningi baphuma eveni.
58.31: Nalawo madolobha labekatsetfwe ngemaLamani, onkhe ngalesikhatsi asaphetfwe ngitsi; futsi bobabe betfu nebesifazane betfu kanye nebantfwana betfu sebabuyela emakhaya abo, bonkhe ngaphandle kwalabo labatsatfwe baba tiboshwa baphindze batfwalwa ngemaLamani.
58.32: Kodvwa buka, emabutfo etfu mancane kutsi agcine emadolobha lamaningi kangaka kanye nemphahla leningi kangaka.
58.33: Kodvwa buka, setsembe Nkulunkulu wetfu losinike kuncoba ngetulu kwalawo mave, kangangoba siwatfolile lawo madolobha kanye nalawo mave, labekavele angewetfu.
58.34: Manje asisati sizatfu sekutsi umbuso yini ungasiniki emandla langetekile; nalawo madvodza laketa kitsi akati kutsi kuyangani singanikwa emandla langetekile.
