58.35: Buka, asati kodvwa kungenteka kutsi aniphumeleli, futsi nidvonsele emabutfo kuleyoncenye yelive; uma kunjalo, asifuni kuvungama
58.36: Kodvwa uma kungenjalo, buka, siyesaba kutsi kukhona kungevani embusweni, kutsi bangatfumeli emadvodza lamaningi kutsi atawusisita; ngoba siyati kutsi maningi kakhulu kunalawo labawatfumele.
58.37: Kodvwa buka, akunandzaba—siyetsemba Nkulunkulu utawusikhulula, nanoma kungebutsakatsaka bemabutfo etfu, yebo, futsi asikhulule nasetandleni tetitsa tetfu.
58.38: Buka, lona ngumnyaka wemashumi lamabili nemfica, ekupheleni kwawo, futsi lamave sengewetfu; nemaLamni asabalekele eveni laNefi.
58.39: Futsi lawo madvodzana ebantfu ba-Amoni, lengikhulume kahle ngawo, anami eveni laseManthi; neNkhosi iwasekele, yebo, futsi yawagcina ekubulaweni ngenkemba, kangangekutsi kute namunye lobulewe.
58.40: Kodvwa buka, atfole emanceba lamaningi; noko eme acina kuleyo nkhululeko Nkulunkulu lawakhulule ngayo; futsi akukhutsalele kukhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wawo lusuku ngelusuku; yebo, ayakucaphela kugcina imitsetfo yayo, kanye netehlulelo tayo, kanye nemiyaleto yayo njalo nje; futsi lukholo lwawo lucinile kuto tiphrofetho mayelana naloko lokutako.
58.41: Manje, mnaketfu lotsandzekako, Moroni, shengatsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu, losihlengile futsi wasikhulula, angakugcina njalo nje phambi kwakhe; yebo, futsi shengatsi angabatsandza labantfu, kute utfole imphumelelo ekutfoleni konkhe loko emaLamani lakutsatsa kitsi kube ngekwetfu, lobekukwekusisekela. Manje, buka, ngiyayivala lencwadzi. NginguHilamani, indvodzana ya-Alima.

59.1: Manje kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, emvakwekutsi Moroni asayitfolile aphindze ayifundzile incwadzi yaHilamani, wajabula kakhulu ngenca yenhlalakahle, yebo, ngemphumelelo lenkhulu Hilamani laba nayo, ekutfoleni lawo mave labekalahlekile.
59.2: Yebo, waphindze wabatisa bonkhe bantfu bakhe, kulo lonkhe live lelitungeletile kuleyo ncenye lebekakuyo, kute nabo ngalokunjalo bajabule
59.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi masinyane nje watfumela incwadzi kuPhahorani, afuna kutsi abite emadvodza kutsi ahlangane ndzawonye kuyocinisa Hilamani, noma emabutfo aHilamani, kute akwati kugcina leyo nceye yelive kalula labephunyeleliswe ngekumangalisa lokukhulu kutsi aphindze ayitfole
59.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni asatfumele lencwadzi eveni laseZarahemla, wacala futsi wenta lisu kutsi akwati kutfola leto timphahla noma emadolobha labekasele emaLamani labekawatsetse kubo.
59.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni enta emalungiselelo ekuhamba ayawukulwa nemaLamani, buka, bantfu baNefiha, labebabutsene ndzawonye bavela edolobheni laMoroni nasedolobheni laLehi kanye nasedolobheni laMoriyanthoni, bahlaselwa ngemaLamani.
59.6: Yebo, ngisho nalawo labekaphoceleleke kutsi abaleke eveni laseManthi, kanye naseveni lelitungeletile, eta ahlanganyela nemaLamani kulencenye yelive.
59.7: Futsi ngenca yekuba maningi kakhulu, yebo, aphindze atfola emandla lusuku ngelusuku, ngemyalo wa-Amoroni eta alwa nebantfu baNefiha, futsi acala kubabulala kakhulu.
59.8: Futsi emabutfo awo abemaningi kakhulu kangangekutsi bantfu labebasele baNefiha baphoceleleka kutsi bawabalekele; beta bahlangana lelibutfo laMoroni.
59.9: Manje njengoba Moroni bekacabanga kutsi bekufanele kube khona emadvodza labekatotfunyelwa edolobheni laNefiha, kuyawusita bantfu kugcina lelo dolobha, futsi ati kutsi bekulula kuligcina lelidolobha ekuweleni etandleni temaLamani kunekuphindze balitsatse kuwo, wacabanga kutsi bebatoligcina lelo dolobha kalula.
59.10: Ngako-ke waligcina lonkhe libutfo lakhe kute ligcine tonkhe leto tindzawo lebekaphindze watitfola.
59.11: Manje, ngesikhatsi Moroni abona kutsi lidolobha laNefiha laselilahlekile waba nelusizi lolukhulu, futsi wacala kungabata, ngenca yebubi bebantfu, kutsi angeke yini bawele etandleni tabomnakabo.
59.12: Manje kwakunjalo nakuto tonkhe tindvuna takhe letinkhulu. Tangabata futsi ngetulu kwaloko tamangala ngenca yebubi bebantfu, loku kwakungenca yemphumelelo yemaLamani ngetulu kwabo.
59.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wawutfukutselela umbuso, ngenca yekungabi nemdlandla kwawo mayelana nenkhululeko yelive labo.

60.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi waphindze wabhalela umbusi welive, lobekanguPhahorani, lawa ngemavi lawabhala, atsi: Buka, ngicondzisa incwadzi yami kuPhahorani, edolobheni laseZarahemla, longumehluleli lomkhulu kanye nembusi eveni lonkhe, kanjalo nakubo bonkhe labo labakhetfwe ngulabantfu kutsi babuse futsi baphatse tindzaba talemphi.
60.2: Ngoba buka, nginalokutsite lengitawukusho kubo ngendlela yekubasola; ngoba buka, nine lucobo lwenu niyati kutsi nibekwe kutsi nibutsele ndzawonye emadvodza, futsi niwahlomise ngetinkemba, nangabocelemba, kanye nangato tonkhe tikhali temphi letitinhlobonhlobo, futsi niwatfumele ayawukulwa nemaLamani, nanoma ngutiphi tincenye langangena kuto eveni letfu.
60.3: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini mine, nemadvodza ami, kanjalo naHilamani kanye nemadvodza akhe, sive kuhlupheka lokukhulu kakhulu; yebo, kulamba, koma, nekukhatsala, kanye nako konkhe kuhlupheka lokutinhlobonhlobo.
60.4: Kodvwa bukani, kube bekunguloku kodvwa kuhlupheka lesibe nako besingeke sivungame noma sikhonone.
60.5: Kodvwa bukani, kube kukhulu kubulawa emkhatsini webantfu betfu; yebo, tinkhulungwane tife ngenkemba, lobekungeke kube njalo kube emabutfo etfu niwanike emandla kanye nelusito lolwanele. Yebo, kube kukhulu kusibukelela kwenu.
60.6: Manje bukani, sifuna kwati imbangela yaloku kusibukelela lokukhulu kangaka; yebo, sifuna kwati imbangela yekungasicabangeli kwenu.
60.7: Ningafuna kuhlala etihlalweni tenu tebukhosi nisesimeni sekungacabangi, tibe titsa tenu tisakata umsebenti wekufa ndzawo tonkhe na? Yebo, tibe tibulala tinkhulugwane tabomnakenu—
60.8: Yebo, nalabo labebatsembe kuvikelwa ngini, yebo, banibeke esimeni sekutsi ngabe nibanike lusito, yebo, ngabe nitfumele emabutfo kubo, kute abacinise, futsi ngabe nisindzise tinkhulungwane tabo ekufeni ngenkemba.
60.9: Kodvwa bukani, loku akusiko kodvwa—niyigodlile imiphako yenu kubo, kangangekutsi labaningi balwile futsi bopha bate bafa ngenca yetifiso tabo letinkhulu labebanato tekutsi kuzuze laba bantfu; yebo, futsi loku bakwente ngesikhatsi sebatoshabalaliswa yindlala, ngenca yekubabukelela kwenu lokukhulu.
60.10: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako—ngoba kufanele nitsandzeke; yebo, futsi bekufanele ngabe nitikhatsatile kakhulu ngenhlalakahle kanye nangenkhululeko yalabantfu; kodvwa bukani, nibabukelele kangangekutsi ingati yetinkhulungwane iyawukuta etikwetinhloko tenu kutiphindziselela; yebo, ngoba Nkulunkulu uyakwati konkhe kukhala kwabo, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlupheko tabo—
60.11: Bukani, nicabanga kutsi ningahlala etihlalweni tenu tebukhosi, bese ngenca yebuhle lobukhulu baNkulunkulu ningenti lutfo futsi yena bese uyanikhulula na? Bukani, uma nicabanga loku nicabange lite lelite.
60.12: Nicabanga kutsi, njengoba babaningi kangaka labomnakenu labafa kungenca yebubi babo na? Ngitsi kini, uma nicabanga kanjalo nicabanga lite; ngoba ngitsi kini, baningi labafe ngenkemba; futsi bukani nitawubekwa licala ngaloko;
60.13: Ngoba iNkhosi ivumela labalungile kutsi babulawe kute kulunga kwayo nekwehlulela kute kulababi; ngako-ke akukafaneli nicabange kutsi labalungile balahlekile ngoba babulewe; kodvwa bukani, bangena ekuphumuleni kweNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
60.14: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini, ngiyesaba kakhulu kutsi tehlulelo taNkulunkulu titawukuta etikwalabantfu, ngenca yebuvila babo lobukhulu, yebo, nebuvila bembuso wetfu, kanye nekubabukelela kwabo lokukhulu kakhulu bomnakabo, yebo, labo lababulewe.
60.15: Ngoba kube bekungasiko ngenca yebubi lobucale kucala enhloko yetfu, besingamelana netitsa tetfu kangangekutsi betingeke tiwatfole emandla etikwetfu.
60.16: Yebo, kube bekungasiko ngenca yemphi leyaba khona emkhatsini wetfu; yebo, kube bekungasiko ngenca yalabantfu benkhosi, lababanga kucitseka kwengati leningi kangaka emkhatsini wetfu; yebo, ngesikhatsi silwa sodvwa, kube sahlanganisa emandla etfu njengoba besentile phambilini; yebo, kube bekungasiko ngenca yekufuna emandla kanye neligunya kulabo bantfu benkhosi ngetulu kwetfu; kube bekatsembekile emzabalazweni wenkhululeko yetfu, futsi ahlangana natsi, ahamba ayawukulwa netitsa tetfu, esikhundleni sekutsatsela tsine tinkemba tabo, lokwaba yimbangela yekucitseka kwengati leningi kangaka emkhatsini wetfu; yebo, kube sihambe sayawukulwa nato ngemandla eNkhosi, besiyawutihlakata titsa tetfu, ngoba bekuyawukwenteka, njengekugcwaliseka kwelivi layo.
60.17: Kodvwa bukani, manje emaLamani eta kitsi, atitsatsela emave etfu, futsi abulala bantfu betfu ngenkemba, yebo, besifazane betfu kanye nebantfwana betfu, futsi ngetulu kwaloko ayabatfwala ayobatfumba, ababangele kutsi beve tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlupheko, futsi loku kwenteka ngenca yebubi lobukhulu balabo labafuna emandla kanye nemagunya, yebo, ngisho labo bantfu benkhosi.
60.18: Kodvwa kuyangani ngikhulume kangaka mayelana naloludzaba? Ngoba asati kodvwa kungenteka kutsi nani lucobo nifuna emagunya. Asati kodvwa kungenteka kutsi nani futsi nibatsengisi eveni lenu.
60.19: Noma nisibukelele ngoba nisenkhabeni yelive letfu nitungeletwe bavikeli, kutsi ningenti kutsi kudla kuletfwe kitsi, kanjalo nemadvodza kutsi atawucinisa emabutfo etfu na?
60.20: Ngabe seniyikhohliwe yini imiyaleto yeNkhosi yenu Nkulunkulu na? Yebo, ngabe senikukhohliwe yini kutfunjwa kwabobabe betfu na? Ngabe senitikhohliwe yini tikhatsi letiningi sikhululwa etandleni tetitsa tetfu na?
60.21: Noma nicabanga kutsi iNkhosi isetawuphindza isikhulule, sibe tsine sihleti etihlalweni tetfu tebukhosi futsi sibe singawasebentisi emasu iNkhosi lesinikete wona na?
60.22: Yebo ngabe nitawuhlala ebuvileni nibe nitungeletwe tinkhulungwane talabo, yebo, kanye nemashumi etinkhulungwane, nabo futsi ngalokunjalo labahleti ebuvileni, kube kukhona tinkhulungwane etindzaweni tonkhe eminceleni yelive letifa ngenkemba, yebo, letilimele futsi letophako na?
60.23: Ngabe nicabanga kutsi Nkulunkulu angeke anibeke licala yini uma nihleti futsi nitibukela letintfo tenteka na? Bukani ngitsi kini, Cha. Manje ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule kutsi Nkulunkulu utsite lingekhatsi lesitja liyawuhlantwa kucala, bese emvakwaloko nelingephandle lesitja seliyahlantwa.
60.24: Manje ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke kuloko lenikwentile, futsi nicale nisukume futsi nente, nitfumele kitsi kudla kanye nemadvodza, kanjalo nakuHilamani, kute naye asekele leto tincenye telive letfu laphindze watitfola, kute natsi ngalokunjalo sitfole futsi timphahla tetfu letisele kuleti tincenye, bukani kutawudzingeka kutsi singabe sisalwa nemaLamani site sihlante kucala lingekhatsi letfu, yebo, ngisho nebaphatsi labakhulu labaphetse umbuso wetfu.
60.25: Futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi ninginike lelengikucele encwadzini yami, futsi niphumele ebaleni ningikhombise umoya weliciniso wenkhululeko, niphokophele kukhulisa kanye nekucinisa emabutfo etfu, futsi niwanikete kudla kwekuwasekela, bukani ngitawushiya incenye yebantfu bami benkhululeko kutsi bagcine lencenye yelive letfu, futsi ngitawushiya emandla kanye netibusiso taNkulunkulu etikwabo, kute kubebete lamanye emandla langasebenta kulwa nabo—
60.26: Futsi loku ngenca yelukholo lwabo lolukhulu, kanye nekubeketela kwabo etinkhatsatweni tabo—
60.27: Ngitawuta kini, futsi uma kukhona loyo emkhatsini wenu lonesifiso senkhululeko, yebo, uma nje kungaba khona nenhlasi nje yenkhululeko lesele, bukani ngitawuphehla lutfutfuva emkhatsini wenu, kute kutsi labo labanetifiso tekutsatsa emandla kanye neligunya baphele nya.
60.28: Yebo, bukani angiwesabi emandla enu noma emagunya enu, kodvwa nguNkulunkulu wami lengimesabako; futsi kungemiyaleto yakhe kutsi ngitsatse inkemba yami kute ngivikele lokufunwa live lami, futsi kungenca yekungalungi kwenu kutsi sibe nekulahlekelwa lokungaka.
60.29: Bukani sesikhatsi, yebo, sikhatsi manje sesifikile, sekutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi nivuke nivikele live lenu kanye nalabancane benu, inkemba yekulunga ilengela etikweni; yebo, futsi itawuwela etikwenu futsi inivakashele nite nibhujiswe nya.
60.30: Bukani, ngilulindzele lusito lweni, futsi, ngaphandle kwekutsi nisinikete lusito, bukani, ngitawufika kini, ngisho naseveni laseZarahemla, nginishaye ngenkemba, kangangekutsi ningabe nisaba nemandla ekuvimbela inchubekela phambili yalabantfu endleleni yenkhululeko yetfu.
60.31: Ngoba bukani, iNkhosi ngeke ivume kutsi niphile nikhule nicine ebubini benu kutsi nibulale bantfu bayo labalungile.
60.32: Bukani, nicabanga kutsi iNkhosi inganisindzisa nine futsi iwehlulele emaLamani, kube kungemasiko abobabe lenta inzondo yabo, yebo, futsi iphindze yengetetelwa ngulabo labahlubuka kitsi, kube bubi benu busizatfu sekutsandza kwenu inkhatimulo kanye netintfo letilite temhlaba na?
60.33: Niyati kutsi naphambuka emitsetfweni yaNkulunkulu, futsi niyati kutsi niyinyatsela ngaphansi kwetinyawo tenu. Bukani, iNkhosi itsi kimi: Uma ngabe labo lenibabekile kutsi babe babusi benu bangaphendvuki etonweni tabo kanye nasebubini babo lobukhulu, niyawuhamba nikhuphuke niyawukulwa nabo.
60.34: Manje bukani, mine, Moroni, ngiphocelelekile, ngekwesivumelwano lengisentile sekugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu wami; ngako-ke ngifuna kutsi nililalele lelivi laNkulunkulu, futsi nitfumele ngekushesha kimi imiphako kanye nemadvodza enu, futsi ngalokunjalo nakuHilamani.
60.35: Futsi bukani, uma ningakwenti loku ngita kini ngekushesha; ngoba bukani, Nkulunkulu angeke avume kutsi sibulawe yindlala; ngako-ke utawusinika kudla kwenu, ngisho noma ngabe kufanele kutsi kube ngenkemba. Manje bonani kutsi niyaligcwalisa lelivi laNkulunkulu.
60.36: Bukani, nginguMoroni, indvuna yenu lenkhulu. Angifuni emandla, kodvwa kutsi ngiwadvonsele phansi. Angifuni kuhlonishwa ngumhlaba, kodvwa inkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu wami, kanye nenkhululeko nenhlalakahle yelive lami. Futsi ngaloko ngiyayivala incwadzi yami.

61.1: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi masinyane emvakwekutsi Moroni sekatfumele incwadzi yakhe kumbusi lomkhulu, watfola incwadzi levala kuPhahorani, umbusi lomkhulu. Lawa ngemavi lawatfola:
61.2: Mine, Phahorani, lengingumbusi lomkhulu walelive, ngitfumela lamavi kuMoroni, indvuna lenkhulu yelibutfo. Buka, ngitsi kuwe, Moroni, angijabuli ngetinhlupheko tenu letinkhulu, yebo, kuyawudzabukisa umphefumulo wami.
61.3: Kodvwa buka, kukhona labo labajabulako ngenca yetinhlupheko tenu, yebo, kangangekutsi sebasukumile bangivukela, kanjalo nalabo bebantfu bami lababantfu benkhululeko, yebo, futsi labo labangivukele baningi kakhulu.
61.4: Futsi ngulabo labebafuna kutsatsa sihlalo sekwehlulela kimi lababe yimbangela yalobubi lobukhulu kangaka; ngoba basebentise kuyenga lokukhulu, badukise tinhlitiyo tebantfu labaningi, lokutawuba yimbangela yenhlupheko lenkhulu emkhatsini wetfu; bawubambile umphako wetfu, baphindze besabisa bantfu benkhululeko kangangekutsi abaketi kimi.
61.5: Futsi buka, bangicoshile bangikhipha, ngibalekele eveni laGideyoni, nemadvodza lamaningi lebengingakwati kuwatfola.
61.6: Buka, ngitfumele simemetelo kuyoyonkhe lencenye yelive; buka, bayatseleka beta kitsi malanga onkhe, kutawutsatsa tikhali tabo, kutawuvikela live labo kanye nenkhululeko yabo, nekutotiphindziselela ngekoniwa kwabo.
61.7: Futsi bete kitsi, kangangekutsi labo labasukeme basivukela abasitfobeli, yebo, kangangekutsi bayasesaba futsi angeke balokotse batawukulwa natsi.
61.8: Sebatfole live laba ngelabo, noma lidolobha, laseZarahemla; sebabeke inkhosi yabo, futsi seyibhalele inkhosi yemaLamani, kuyo yente sivumelwano sekuhlangana; kuleso sivumelwano ivumile kuligcina live laseZarahemla, ngaloko kuligcina kwayo icabanga kutsi kutawukwenta emaLamani alincobe live lelisesele, bese ibekwa iba yinkhosi etikwalabantfu uma sebancotjwe ngemaLamani.
61.9: Manje, encwadzini yakho ungigcekile, kodvwa akunandzaba; angikatfukutseli, kodvwa ngiyatfokota ngebuhle benhlitiyo yakho. Mine Phahorani, angifuni mandla, ngaphandle nje kuphela kwekugcina sihlalo sami sekwehlulela kute ngilondvolote emalungelo kanye nenkhululeko yebantfu bami, Umphefumulo wami ume ucinile kuleyo nkhululeko Nkulunkulu lasikhulule ngayo.
61.10: Manje, buka, sitawuvimbela bubi ngisho nangekucitsa ingati. Angeke siyicitse ingati yemaLamani uma atawuhlala eveni lawo.
61.11: Angeke siyicitse ingati yabomnaketfu uma bangeke basivukele futsi batsatse inkemba ngalokumelene natsi.
61.12: Sitawutinikela ejokeni lebugcili uma kudzingekile ngekulunga kwaNkulunkulu, noma uma asiyaleta kutsi sente njalo.
61.13: Kodvwa buka akasiyaleti kutsi sitinikele etitseni tetfu, kodvwa kutsi sibeke litsemba letfu kuye, futsi utawusikhulula.
61.14: Ngako-ke, mnaketfu lotsandzekako, Moroni, asingabuvumeli bubi, futsi noma ngabe ngubuphi bubi angeke sikwati kubuvimbela ngemavi etfu, yebo, njengekuvukela kanye nekuhlubuka, asikuvimbele ngetinkemba tetfu, kute sigcine inkhululeko yetfu, kute sijabule ngemusa lomkhulu welibandla letfu, kanye nasendleleni yeMhlengi kanye naNkulunkulu wetfu.
61.15: Ngako-ke, wota kimi ngekushesha nemadvodza akho lambalwa, bese labasalako ubashiya kuLehi kanye naThiyankham; ubanike emandla ekutsi bachubeke nemphi kuleyo ncenye yelive, ngekwaMoya waNkulunkulu, futsi lokungumoya wenkhululeko lokubo.
61.16: Buka ngitfumele umphako lomncane kubo, kute bangafi nite nikwati kufika kimi.
61.17: Gcogcani ndzawonye noma ngabe nguliphi libutfo leningakwati kuligcogca uma nita lapha, futsi sitawuhamba ngekushesha siyawukulwa nalawo mahlubuka, ngemandla aNkulunkulu wetfu ngelukholo lolukitsi.
61.18: Futsi sitawulitsatsa lidolobha laseZarahemla libe ngeletfu, kute sitfole kudla lokuningi sikutfumele kuLehi banaThiyankham; yebo, sitawuhamba siyawukulwa nawo ngemandla eNkhosi, futsi sitawubucedza lobubi lobukhulu.
61.19: Manje, Moroni, ngiyajabula ngekutfola incwadzi yakho, ngoba bengikhatsatekile ngandlela tsite mayelana nalokufanele sikwente, kutsi bekulungile yini kutsi siyawukulwa nabomnaketfu.
61.20: Kodvwa utsite, ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke iNkhosi ikuyaletile kutsi kumele silwe nabo.
61.21: Bona kutsi uyabacinisa boLehi naThiyankham eNkhosini; batjele kutsi bangesabi, ngoba Nkulunkulu utawubakhulula, yebo, kanye nabo bonkhe labo labeme bacina kuleyo nkhululeko Nkulunkulu labakhulule ngayo. Manje ngiyayivala incwadzi yami kumnaketfu lotsandzekako, Moroni.

62.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Moroni sekayitfolile lencwadzi inhlitiyo yakhe yaba nesibindzi, futsi wagcwala injabulo lenkhulu kakhulu ngenca yekwetsembeka kwaPhahorani, kutsi bekangasiye naye umtsengisi kuyo inkhululeko kanye netimiso telive lakhe.
62.2: Kodvwa futsi wakhala kakhulu ngenca yebubi balabo labebasuse Phahorani esihlalweni sekwehlulela, yebo, kafishane nje ngenca yalabo labahlubuka eveni labo kanjalo nakuNkulunkulu wabo.
62.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni watsatsa sibalo lesincane semadvodza, njengekwesifiso saPhahorani, waniketa Lehi kanye naThiyankham kuphatsa kulabo labebasele belibutfo lakhe, wabese uyahamba uya ngaseveni laGideyoni.
62.4: Futsi wasiphakamisa sibonakaliso senkhululeko kunoma nguyiphi indzawo labekangena kuyo, futsi watsatsa noma ngabe nguliphi libutfo lebekangalitfola eluhambeni lwakhe lonkhe loluya ngaseveni laGideyoni.
62.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinkhulungwane tabutsanela esibonakalisweni sakhe, tatitsatsa tinkemba tato kute tivikele inkhululeko yato, kute bangangeni ebugcilini.
62.6: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi Moroni sekawabutsele ndzawonye noma ngumaphi emadvodza labengawatfola ekuhambeni kwakhe konkhe, wafika eveni laGideyoni; ngesikhatsi ahlanganisa emabutfo akhe kanye nalawo akaPhahorani baba nemandla kakhulu, ngisho nangetulu kwemadvodza aPhakhasi, lobekayinkhosi yalawo mahlubuka labekacoshe bantfu benkhululeko babakhipha eveni laseZarahemla futsi batsatsa live laba labo.
62.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni kanye naPhahorani bahamba behlela entansi nemabutfo abo baya eveni laseZarahemla, bachubeka balihlasela lelidolobha, futsi bahlangabetana nebantfu baPhakhasi, kangangekutsi balwa.
62.8: Buka, Phakhasi wabulawa kwatsi bantfu bakhe batsatfwa baboshwa, Phahorani wabese ubuyiselwa esihlalweni sakhe sekwehlulela.
62.9: Futsi bantfu baPhakhasi behlulelwa, ngekwemtsetfo, kanjalo nalabo bantfu benkhosi labebatsetfwe baphonswa etilongweni; babulawa ngekwemtsetfo; yebo, labo bantfu baPhakhasi kanye nalabo bantfu benkhosi, noma ngabe ngumuphi lobekangafuni kutsatsa tikhali kuvikela live labo, kodvwa balwa nalo, babulawa.
62.10: Futsi ngaleyondlela kwadzingeka kutsi lomtsetfo ugcinwe ngekucophelela kwentelwa kuphepha kwelive labo; yebo, futsi loyo lobekatfolakala aphikisana nenkhululeko yabo wabulawa ngekushesha ngekwemtsetfo.
62.11: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi; Moroni kanye naPhahorani sebakubuyisele kuthula eveni laseZarahemla, emkhatsini webantfu babo, sebababulele bonkhe labo labebangakatsembeki etimisweni tenkhululeko.
62.12: Futsi kwenteka ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, Moroni masinyane wenta kutsi imiphako ihanjiswe, kanjalo nelibutfo lemadvodza latinkhulungwane letisitfupha litfunyelwe kuHilamani, kuyawumsita ekugcineni leyo ncenye yelive.
62.13: Ngetulu kwaloko wenta kutsi lelibutfo lemadvodza latinkhulungwane letisitfupha, nekudla lokwanele, kutfunyelwe emabutfweni aLehi anaThiyankham. Futsi kwenteka kutsi loku kwentiwa kute kuciniswe lelive ngekumelana nemaLamani.
62.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni kanye naPhahorani, bashiya licembu lemadvodza lelikhulu eveni laseZarahemla, batsatsa luhambo lwabo nelicembu lelikhulu lemadvodza baya ngaseveni laseNefiha, baphokophele kuyawuketula emaLamani kulelo dolobha.
62.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi basahamba baya ngakulelo live, babamba licembu lelikhulu lemadvodza emaLamani, babulala lamaningi awo, baphindze batsatsa imiphako yawo kanye netikhali tawo.
62.16: Futsi kwenteka emvakwekutsi sebawatsetse, benta kutsi angene esivumelwaneni sekutsi angeke asatitsatsa tikhali tawo temphi alwe nemaNefi nanini.
62.17: Ngesikhatsi sekangene kulesi sivumelwano bawatfumela kutsi ayawuhlala nebantfu baka-Amoni, futsi bekasibalo cishe lesitinkhulungwane letine lawo labekangakabulawa.
62.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebawatfumele bachubeka neluhambo lwabo loluya eveni laseNefiha. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebafike edolobheni laseNefiha, bamisa emathende abo ematsafeni aseNefiha, labekasedvute nelidolobha iNefiha.
62.19: Manje Moroni bekanesifiso sekutsi emaLamani aphume ayawukulwa nabo, ematsafeni; kodvwa emaLamani, ati ngesibindzi sabo lesikhulu kakhulu, aphindze abona sibalo sabo lesikhulu kakhulu, ngako-ke akalokotsanga nhlobo aphuma kuyawukulwa nabo; ngako-ke abatange balwe ngalolo suku.
62.20: Ngesikhatsi busuku bufika, Moroni wahamba ebumnyameni balobobusuku, wate wafinyelela esicongweni seludvonga kuhlola kutsi emaLamani bekangakuyiphi incenye yelidolobha lapho bekamise khona emathende kwesikhashana nelibutfo lawo.
62.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekasemphumalanga, ngasekungeneni; futsi onkhe bekalele. Manje Moroni wabuyela ebutfweni lakhe, wenta kutsi lisheshise lilungise tintsambo leticinile kanye nemaladi, kutsi kwehliselwe phansi kusuka ngetulu eludvongeni kungeniswe ngekhatsi kweludvonga.
62.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni wenta kutsi emadvodza akhe ahambe ete etikweludvongeni, bese ehlela kuleyo ncenye yelidolobha, yebo, ngisho nasenshonalanga, lapho emaLamani bekangakemisi emathende awo kwesikhashana nemabutfo awo.
62.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe behliselwa edolobheni ebusuku, ngetintsambo tabo leticinile kanye nangemaladi abo; ngako-ke ngesikhatsi kufika kusa bonkhe bese bangekhatsi kwetindvonga telidolobha.
62.24: Manje, ngesikhatsi emaLamani avuka abona kutsi emabutfo aMoroni bekangekhatsi kwetindvonga, esaba kakhulu; kangangekutsi abaleka aphuma ngesikhala.
62.25: Manje ngesikhatsi Moroni abona kutsi bekambalekela, wenta kutsi emadvodza akhe ahambe awalandzele, abulale labaningi, aphindze atungelete labaningi labanye, bese uyawatsatsa abe tiboshwa; kwatsi labasalako bawo babalekela eveni laMoroni, lebelisemnceleni ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
62.26: Ngaleyondlela Moroni kanye naPhahorani balitfola lidolobha laseNefiha laba labo ngaphandle kwekulahlekelwa nangumphefumulo munye; futsi baba baningi bemaLamani lababulawa.
62.27: Manje kwenteka kutsi labaningi bemaLamani labebatiboshwa baba nesifiso sekuhlangana nebantfu ba-Amoni bese baba bantfu labakhululekile.
62.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngebuningi balabo labebanaleso sifiso, banikwa njengekwetifiso tabo.
62.29: Ngako-ke, tonkhe tiboshwa temaLamani tahlangana nebantfu ba-Amoni, bacala kusebenta kakhulu, balima umhlabatsi, bakhulisa tonkhe tinhlobo talokuyinhlavu, kanye nemihlambi yetimvu nemihlambi yetinkhomo letitinhlobonhlobo; futsi ngaleyondlela emaNefi aphumula emtfwalweni lomkhulu; yebo, kangangekutsi aphunyutwa kuto tonkhe tiboshwa temaLamani.
62.30: Manje kwenteka kutsi Moroni, emvakwekutsi sekatfole lidolobha laNefiha laba lakhe, sekatsetse tiboshwa letiningi, loko lokwasehlisa kakhulu sibalo semabutfo emaLamani, futsi sekatfole labaningi bemaNefi labebaboshiwe, loko lokwalicinisa kakhulu libutfo laMoroni; ngako-ke Moroni wahamba esuka eveni laNefiha waya eveni laLehi.
62.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani abona kutsi Moroni beketa atawukulwa nawo, aphindze esaba futsi alibalekela libutfo laMoroni.
62.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni kanye nelibutfo lakhe bawacosha lidolobha ngelidolobha, bate bahlangana naLehi banaThiyankham; futsi emaLamani abalekela Lehi anaThiyankham, ehlisa imincele ngaselugwini lwelwandle, ate afika eveni laMoroni.
62.33: Emabutfo emaLamani abutsana onkhe ndzawonye, kangangoba onkhe aba licembu linye eveni laMoroni. Manje Amoroni, inkhosi yemaLamani, nayo ngalokunjalo beyinawo.
62.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni naLehi kanye naThiyankham bakanekisa nemabutfo abo batungeleta eminceleni yelive laMoroni, kangangoba emaLamani atungeletwa eminceleni yelihlane ngaseningizimu, kanye naseminceleni yelihlane lelisempumalanga.
62.35: Futsi ngaleyondlela bamisa emathende kwesikhashana busuku bonkhe. Ngoba buka, emaNefi kanye nemaLamani ngalokunjalo besebakhatsele ngenca yebudze beluhambo; ngako-ke abentanga licebo lekuhlakanipha ebusuku, ngaphandle kwaThiyankham; ngoba yena bekamtfukutselele kakhulu Amoroni, kangangekutsi bekabona kutsi ngu-Amoroni, kanye na-Amalikhiya umnakabo, labebayimbangela yalemphi lenkhulu nalengapheli emkhatsini wabo kanye nemaLamani, lebeyiyimbangela yekulwa kanye nekucitseka kwengati lokukhulu kangaka, yebo, kanye nendlala lengaka.
62.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Thiyankham entfukutselweni yakhe wahamba waya enkanjini yemaLamani, wahla ngeludvonga lwelidolobha. Wahamba ngentsambo, indzawo ngendzawo, kangangoba wate wayitfola inkhosi; wayijikijela ngentjumentju, leyabhobosa edvute nenhlitiyo. Kodvwa buka, inkhosi yativusa tinceku tayo ngaphambi kwekutsi ife, kangangekutsi tamlandzela Thiyankham, futsi tambulala.
62.37: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Lehi kanye naMoroni batfola kutsi Thiyankham besekafile badzabuka kakhulu; ngoba buka, bekayindvodza lebeyililwele ngebuchawe live layo, yebo, umngani weliciniso lenkhululeko; futsi bekeve tinhlupheko letiningi kakhulu. Kodvwa buka, besekafile, futsi sekahambe indlela yemhlaba wonkhe.
62.38: Manje kwenteka kutsi Moroni wahamba ngakusasa, wate wefika kumaLamani, kangangekutsi bawabulala kakhulu; baphindze bawachuba bawakhipha eveni; abaleka, kangangekutsi abatange basabuya ngaleso sikhatsi kutawukulwa nemaNefi.
62.39: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi; ngaleyondlela bese bake baba netimphi, nekucitseka kwengati, nendlala, kanye netinhlupheko, sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi.
62.40: Futsi bekukhona kubulalana, nemibango, nekuhlubuka, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi emkhatsini webantfu baNefi; noko ngenca yalabalungile, yebo, ngenca yemithandazo yalabalungile, basindziswa.
62.41: Kodvwa buka, ngenca yekudvonsa lokukhulu kakhulu kwalemphi emkhatsini wemaNefi kanye nemaLamani labaningi bese balukhuni, ngenca yekudvonsa lokukhulu kakhulu kwemphi; futsi labaningi batsamba ngenca yetinhlupheko tabo, kangangekutsi batitfoba phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ngisho nasekujuleni kwekutitfoba.
62.42: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Moroni sekaticinisile leto tincenye telive lebetisengotini kakhulu kumaLamani, taze tacina ngalokwanele, wabuyela edolobheni laseZarahemla; kanjalo naHilamani wabuyela endzaweni lelifa lakhe; kwaba khona kuthula lokwamiswa emkhatsini webantfu baNefi.
62.43: Moroni wanikela kuphatfwa kwemabutfo akhe etandleni tendvodzana yakhe, libito layo bekunguMoroniha; futsi yena watsatsa umhlalaphansi ekhaya lakhe kute acitse tinsuku takhe letasetisele ngekuthula.
62.44: Futsi Phahorani wabuyela esihlalweni sakhe sekwehlulela; naHilamani watsatsa umsebenti wekushumayela kubantfu livi laNkulunkulu; ngoba ngenca yetimphi letiningi kangaka kanye nemibango kwadzingeka kutsi lihlelwe futsi libandla.
62.45: Ngako-ke, Hilamani kanye nabomnakabo bahamba, balimemetela livi laNkulunkulu ngemandla lamakhulu, kangangoba bakholisa bantfu labaningi ngebubi babo, lokwabenta kutsi baphendvuke etonweni tabo baphindze babhajatiswe eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo.
62.46: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphindze balimisa libandla laNkulunkulu, kulo lonkhe live.
62.47: Yebo, imigomo yentiwa mayelana nemtsetfo. Behluleli babo, kanye nebehluleli babo labakhulu bakhetfwa.
62.48: Futsi bantfu baNefi baphindze bacala baphumelela eveni, bacala bandza bacina kakhulu eveni. Bacala futsi bakhula banotsa kakhulu.
62.49: Kodvwa nanoma kungenca yemcebo wabo, nemandla abo, kanye nemphumelelo yabo, abatange batikhukhumete ngenca yekutibona kwabo; noma baphute kukhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo; kodvwa batitfoba kakhulu ngaphambi kwayo.
62.50: Yebo, bakhumbula kutsi betitinkhulu kangakanani tintfo iNkhosi lebeyibentele tona, kutsi beyibakhululile ekufeni, nasekuboshweni, nasemajele, kanye nakuto tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlupheko, futsi beyibakhululile baphuma etandleni tetitsa tabo.
62.51: Futsi bathandaza eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo njalonjalo, kangangekutsi iNkhosi yababusisa, njengekwelivi layo, kangangoba bakhula bacina baphindze baphumelela eveni.
62.52: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tonkhe leti tintfo tenteka. NaHilamani wafa, ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.

63.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, Shibiloni watsatsa leto tintfo letingcwele letatiletfwe kuHilamani.
63.2: Futsi bekayindvodza lelungile, wahamba ngebucotfo phambi kwaNkulunkulu; wetama kutsi ente lokuhle njalonjalo, ngekutsi ayigcine imiyaleto yeNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakhe; futsi wenta kanjalo nemnakabo.
63.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroni naye wafa. Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli.
63.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwaba khona licembu lelikhulu lemadvodza, lelingabalelwa etinkhulungwaneni letisihlanu nemakhulu lamane, nebafati bawo kanye nebantfwana bawo, esuka aphuma eveni laseZarahemla aya eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
63.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Hagothi, ayindvodza letsandza kwati lokufihlakele, ngako-ke wahamba watakhela umkhumbi lomkhulu kakhulu, eminceleni yelive iNala, ngaseveni iNchitsakalo, wawungenisa elwandle lolusenshonalanga, ngasesihlengeni lesincane lesiholela eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
63.6: Buka, bekukhona labaningi bemaNefi labangena kuwo bahamba nemiphako leminingi kakhulu, nebesifazane labaningi kanye nebantfwana; futsi batsatsa indlela yabo leya ngasenyakatfo. Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesikhombisa
63.7: Ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesiphohlongo, lendvodza yakha leminye imikhumbi. Futsi umkhumbi wekucala waphindze wabuya, bantfu labanye labaningi bangena kuwo; nabo ngalokunjalo batsatsa umphako lomningi, baphindze bahamba baya eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
63.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi akuphindzanga kwevakala lutfo ngabo. Sicabanga kutsi bamita ekujuleni kwelwandle. Futsi kwenteka kutsi lomunye umkhumbi nawo wahamba; kutsi lowo waya kuphi asati.
63.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalowo mnyaka baba baningi bantfu labahamba baya eveni lelingasenyakatfo. Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesiphohlongo.
63.10: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli, Shibiloni naye wafa, Khoriyanthoni besekahambe waya eveni lelingasenyakatfo ngemkhumbi, kuyawumikisa umphako kubantfu labebahambe baya kulelo live.
63.11: Ngako-ke kwadzingeka kutsi Shibiloni endlulise leto tintfo letingcwele, ngaphambi kwekufa kwakhe, kundvodzana yaHilamani, leyayibitwa ngekutsi nguHilamani, leyayicanjwe ngelibito leyise.
63.12: Manje buka, yonkhe leyo micopho leyayiphetfwe nguHilamani yabhalwa futsi yatfunyelwa emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu kulo lonkhe live, ngaphandle kwaleto tincenye Alima labebayale ngato kutsi tingembulwa.
63.13: Noko, leti tintfo kwakufanele tigcinwe tingcwele, futsi tendluliselwe tehle tisuke esitukulwaneni sinye kuya kulesinye; ngako-ke ngalowo mnyaka, tatinikwe Hilamani, ngaphambi kwekufa kwaShibiloni.
63.14: Futsi kwaphindze kwenteka ngawo lowo mnyaka kutsi kwaba khona lamanye emahlubuka labekahambe aya kumaLamani, aphindze aphehlwa kutsi awatfukutselele emaNefi.
63.15: Futsi ngalowo mnyaka ehla nelibutfo leliningi kakhulu kutawukulwa nebantfu baMoroniha, noma nelibutfo laMoroniha, lapho ashaywa aphindze achutjwa abuyiselwa emuva futsi emaveni awo, alahlekelwe kakhulu.
63.16: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
63.17: Waphela kanjalo-ke umlandvo waAlima, kanye naHilamani indvodzana yakhe, kanjalo naShibiloni, lobekayindvodzana yakhe.

1.intro: Umlandvo wemaNefi. Timphi kanye nemibango yawo, kanye nekuphikisana kwawo. Ngetulu kwaloko netiphrofetho tebaphrofethi labaningi labangcwele, ngaphambi kwekuta kwaKhristu, ngekwemibhalo yaHilamani, lobekayindvodzana yaHilamani, futsi kanjalo nangekwemibhalo yemadvodzana akhe, kwehla kute kufike ekuteni kwaKhristu. Ngetulu kwaloko lamaningi emaLamani ayaphendvuka. Umlandvo wekuphendvuka kwawo. Umlandvo wekulunga kwemaLamani, bubi kanye netinengiso temaNefi, ngekwembhalo waHilamani kanye nemadvodzana akhe, kwehla njalo kute kufike ekuteni kwaKhristu, ubitwa ngekutsi yincwadzi yaHilamani, kanye nalokunye.
1.1: Manje bukani, kwenteka ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamane wekubusa kwebehluleli ebantfwini baNefi, kwacala kwaba khona inkinga lenkhulu emkhatsini webantfu baNefi.
1.2: Ngoba bukani, Phahorani besekafile, futsi sekahambe indlela yemhlaba wonkhe; ngako-ke kwacala kwabakhona umbango lomkhulu mayelana nekutsi ngubani lobekufanele atsatse sihlalo sekwehlulela emkhatsini wabomnakabo, labebangemadvodzana aPhahorani.
1.3: Manje lawa ngemabito alabo labebabanga sihlalo sekwehlulela, labenta nekutsi bantfu babange: Phahorani, Phayankhi, kanye naPhakhumeni.
1.4: Manje lawa akusiwo onkhe emadvodzana aPhahorani (ngoba bekanalamaningi), kodvwa lawa ngiwo labekabanga sihlalo sekwehlulela; ngako-ke, enta kutsi kube khona kwehlukana katsatfu emkhatsini webantfu.
1.5: Noko, kwenteka kutsi Phahorani wakhetfwa ngelivi lebantfu kutsi abe ngumehluleli lomkhulu kanye nembusi kubantfu baNefi.
1.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Phakhumeni, ngesikhatsi abona kutsi bekangeke akhone kusitfola sihlalo sekwehlulela, wavumelana nelivi lebantfu.
1.7: Kodvwa bukani, Phayankhi, kanye naleyo ncenye yebantfu lebeyinesifiso sekutsi abe ngumbusi wabo, batfukutsela kakhulu; ngako-ke, besekatawubalutsa labo bantfu kutsi basukume bavukele bomnakabo.
1.8: Futsi kwenteka ngesikhatsi sekatokwenta loku, bukani, watsatfwa, wayogwetjwa licala ngekwelivi lebantfu, wajeziswa ngekufa; ngoba bekahlubukile futsi wafuna kucedza inkhululeko yebantfu.
1.9: Manje ngesikhatsi labo bantfu labebanesifiso sekutsi abe ngumbusi wabo babona kutsi besekajeziswe ngekufa, ngako-ke batfukutsela, bukani, batfumela Khishkhumeni, kutsi aye esihlalweni sekwehlulela saPhahorani, wabulala Phahorani ngesikhatsi ahleli esihlalweni sekwehlulela.
1.10: Wacoshwa tinceku taPhahorani; kodvwa bukani, belisetulu litubane laKhishkhumeni kangangekutsi bekute namunye umuntfu lobekangamkhandza.
1.11: Waya kulabo labebamtfumile, futsi bonkhe bangena esivumelwaneni, yebo, bafunga ngeMenti wabo waphakadze, kutsi bebangeke batjele namunye umuntfu kutsi Khishkhumeni bekabulele Phahorani.
1.12: Ngako-ke, Khishkhumeni akatange atiwe emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, ngoba bekatifihlile ngesikhatsi abulala Phahorani. Futsi Khishkhumeni kanye nelicembu lakhe, lebelente sivumelwano naye, lahlangana nebantfu, ngendlela yekutsi abatange batfolwe bonkhe; kodvwa ngebuningi balabo labatfolakala bajeziswa ngekufa.
1.13: Manje bukani, Phakhumeni wabekwa, ngekwelivi lebantfu, kutsi abe ngumehluleli lomkhulu kanye nembusi kubantfu, kute abuse esikhundleni semnakabo Phahorani; futsi bekunjengekwelilungelo lakhe. Konkhe loku kwenteka emnyakeni wemashumi lamane wekubusa kwebehluleli; kwabese kuba kuphela kwawo.
1.14: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli, kutsi emaLamani besekagcogcele ndzawonye emabutfo emadvodza lamaningi langabaleki, awahlomisa ngetinkemba, ngabocelemba nebutjoki, kanye nangemicibisholo, nangekwekuvikela inhloko, kanye nangetivikelo tesifuba, nangato tonkhe tinhlobo temahawu.
1.15: Aphindze ehlela entansi kute achube imphi nemaNefi. Futsi bekaholwa yindvodza libito layo lobekunguKhoriyanthuma; lebeyiyentalelwane yaZarahemla; iphindze ibe lihlubuka lelivela kumaNefi; bekuyindvodza lenkhulu futsi lenemandla.
1.16: Ngako-ke, inkhosi yemaLamani, libito layo bekunguThubalothi, lobekayindvodzana ya-Amoroni, ngekucabanga kutsi Khoriyanthuma, ngoba bekayindvodza lenemandla, bekangakwati kumelana nemaNefi, ngemandla akhe futsi kanjalo nangekuhlakanipha kwakhe lokukhulu, kangangekutsi ngekumtfumela kwakhe phambili bekatotfola emandla ngetulu kwemaNefi—
1.17: Ngako-ke wawaphehla kutsi atfukutsele, futsi wawagcogcela ndzawonye emabutfo akhe, wabeka Khoriyanthuma kutsi abe ngumholi wabo, waphindze wenta kutsi bahambe behlele eveni laseZarahemla kutsi bayawukulwa nemaNefi.
1.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngenca yembango lomkhulu kakhulu kanye nebumatima lobukhulu embusweni, abatange babeke bogadzi labenele eveni laseZarahemla; ngoba bebacabanga kutsi emaLamani bekangeke alinge ete enkhabeni yemave abo kutsi atawuhlasela lelo lidolobha lelikhulu iZarahemla.
1.19: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wahamba phambili ahola emabutfo akhe lamaningi, wate wefika kubahlali belidolobha, nekuhamba kwabo bekunelitubane lelisetulu kakhulu kangangekutsi asitange sibekhona sikhatsi semaNefi kutsi agcogcele ndzawonye emabutfo awo.
1.20: Ngako-ke Khoriyanthuma wababulala bogadzi labebasekungeneni kwelidolobha, wahamba waya phambili nelibutfo lakhe lonkhe wayawungena edolobheni, futsi bababulala bonkhe labebaphikisana nabo, kangangekutsi balitsatsa lidolobha lonkhe.
1.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Phakhumeni, lobekangumehluleli lomkhulu, wabaleka ngaphambi kwaKhoriyanthuma, wate wefika ngasetindvongeni telidolobha. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wamshaya wamhlanganisa neludvonga, kangangekutsi wafa. Taphela kanjalo-ke tinsuku taPhakhumeni.
1.22: Manje ngesikhatsi Khoriyanthuma abona kutsi besekalitfolile lidolobha laseZarahemla, sekabona kutsi emaNefi besekababalekele, abulawa, aphindze atsatfwa, aphonswa ejele, nekutsi besekatitfolile tincaba leticine kakhulu eveni lonkhe kutsi tibe ngetakhe, inhlitiyo yakhe yema sibindzi kangangekutsi besekatohamba ayawukulwa kulo lonkhe live.
1.23: Manje akahlalanga eveni laseZarahemla, kodvwa wachubeka nelibutfo lelikhulu, wacondza ngasedolobheni iNala; ngoba bekuyinhloso yakhe kutsi ahambe futsi avule indlela yakhe ngenkemba, kute atfole tincenye letisenyakatfo yelive.
1.24: Futsi, acabanga kutsi emandla abo lamakhulu kakhulu bekasekhatsi nekhatsi nelive, ngako-ke wachubeka, angabaniki litfuba lekutsi babutsane ndzawonye ngaphandle nje kwetincumbi letincane; futsi ngaleyondlela bawahlasela bawabulala.
1.25: Kodvwa bukani, loku kuhamba kwaKhoriyanthuma aye ekhatsi nekhatsi nelive kwanika Moroniha litfuba lelikhulu etikwawo, nanoma besisikhulu sibalo semaNefi labekabulewe.
1.26: Ngoba bukani, Moroniha bekacabanga kutsi emaLamani bekangeke alinge ete ekhatsi nekhatsi nelive, kodvwa kutsi bekatohlasela emadolobha labekatungeletwe eminceleni njengoba bekadze nakucala entile; ngako-ke Moroniha bekente kutsi emabutfo abo lacinile agcine leto tincenye lebetingaseminceleni.
1.27: Kodvwa bukani, emaLamani bekangesabi njengekwesifiso sakhe, kodvwa besekangene ekhatsi nelive, besekayitsatsile inhloko dolobha lebekulidolobha laseZarahemla, futsi bekahamba adzabula acondze etincenyeni letibalulekile telive, abulala bantfu labaningi kakhulu, besilisa, nebesifazane, kanye nebantfwana, atsatsa emadolobha lamaningi kanye netincaba letiningi kube ngekwabo.
1.28: Kodvwa ngesikhatsi Moroniha sekakubonile loku, watfumela Lehi ngekushesha kanye nelibutfo kutsi ahambe etindzaweni tonkhe awancandze ngaphambi kwekutsi afike eveni iNala.
1.29: Futsi wenta kanjalo; wawancandza ngaphambi kwekutsi afike eveni iNala, wawahlasela, kangangekutsi acala ahlehlela emuva aya ngaseveni laseZarahemla.
1.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moroniha wawancandza ekuhlehleni kwawo ngemuva, wawahlasela, kangangekutsi kwaba yimphi yengati leningi kakhulu; yebo, labaningi babulawa, futsi emkhatsini wesibalo salabo labebabulewe Khoriyanthuma naye ngalokunjalo watfolakala lapho.
1.31: Manje, buka emaLamani bekangasakwati kuhlehla noma ngukuphi, noma kuya enyakatfo, noma kuya eningizimu, noma emphumalanga, noma enshonalanga, ngoba besekatungeletwe ndzawo tonkhe ngemaNefi.
1.32: Khoriyanthuma wawafaka ngaleyondlela emaLamani ekhatsi nekhatsi nemaNefi, kangangekutsi besebasemandleni emaNefi, futsi naye lucobo lwakhe besekabulewe, futsi emaLamani atinikela etandleni temaNefi.
1.33: Futsi Moroniha waphindze walitsatsa lidolobha laseZarahemla kutsi libe ngelakhe, waphindze wenta kutsi emaLamani labekadze aboshiwe ahambe aphume eveni ngekuthula.
1.34: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamane nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli.

2.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nakubili wekubusa kwebehluleli, emvakwekutsi Moroniha sekacinisekise kuthula futsi emkhatsini wemaNefi nemaLamani, bukani, bekute lobekatawutsatsa sihlalo sekwehlulela; ngako-ke kwacala kwaba nembango futsi emkhatsini webantfu mayelana nekutsi ngubani lobekumele atsatse sihlalo sekwehlulela.
2.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Hilamani, lobekayindvodzana yaHilamani, wabekwa kutsi atsatse sihlalo sekwehlulela, ngelivi lebantfu.
2.3: Kodvwa bukani, Khishkhumeni, lobekabulele Phahorani, abebhacele kubulala naHilamani; futsi bekasekelwe licembu lakhe, lebelingene esivumelwaneni sekutsi kube bete namunye lotawukwati ngebubi bakhe.
2.4: Ngoba bekukhona Gadiyanthoni mumbe, lobekayingcweti kakhulu ekukhulumeni, kanjalo nangebuciko bakhe, kutsi achubeke nekwenta umsebenti lofihlekile wekubulala kanye newekugebenga; ngako-ke waba ngumholi welicembu laKhishkhumeni.
2.5: Ngako-ke wabayenga, kanjalo naKhishkhumeni, kutsi uma bangambeka esihlalweni sekwehlulela bekatawukwenta labo labebabelicembu lakhe kutsi banikwe emandla kanye neligunya emkhatsini webantfu; ngako-ke Khishkhumeni wafuna kumbulala Hilamani.
2.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi ahamba aya ngasesihlalweni sekwehlulela kuyawubulala Hilamani, bukani yinye yetinceku taHilamani, lebeyiphumile ebusuku, itfolile, ngekutifihla, lwati ngalawo macebo labekabekiwe ngulelicembu kubulala Hilamani—
2.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yahlangana naKhishkhumeni, yamnika luphawu; ngako-ke Khishkhumeni wayitjela inhloso yesifiso sakhe, afuna kutsi imhole imyise esihlalweni sekwehlulela kute abulale Hilamani.
2.8: Ngesikhatsi inceku yaHilamani seyikwati konkhe lobekusenhlitiyweni yaKhishkhumeni, nekutsi bekuyinhloso yakhe kubulala, kanjalo nekutsi bekuyinhloso yabo bonkhe labo labebabelicembu lakhe kutsi babulale, baphange, nekuzuza emandla, (futsi loku bekulisu labo lelifihlekile, nelicebo labo) inceku yaHilamani yatsi kuKhishkhumeni: Asihambe siye esihlalweni sekwehlulela.
2.9: Manje loku kwamjabulisa Khishkhumeni, ngoba bekacabanga kutsi bekatawulifeza lisu lakhe; kodvwa bukani, inceku yaHilamani, basahamba baya esihlalweni sekwehlulela, yagwaza Khishkhumeni enhlitiyweni, kangangekutsi wawa wafa ngaphandle kwekububula. Yagijima yayotjela Hilamani tonkhe tintfo leyayitibonile, naleyayitivile kanye naleyayitentile.
2.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Hilamani watfumela kutsi kuyawubanjwa lelicembu letigebengu kanye nebabulali labafihlakele, kute bajeziswe ngekwemtsetfo.
2.11: Kodvwa bukani, ngesikhatsi Gadiyanthoni sekatfolile kutsi Khishkhumeni akabuyanga wesaba kutsi hleze naye abulawe; ngako-ke wenta kutsi licembu lakhe limlandzele. Babaleka baphuma eveni, ngendlela lefihlakele, baya ehlane; ngalesi sizatfu ngesikhatsi Hilamani sekatfumele kutsi bayobanjwa abatange basatfolakala ndzawo.
2.12: Futsi lokunye ngaloGadiyanthoni kutobuye kukhulunywe ngako emvakwaloku. Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamane nakubili wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi
2.13: Futsi bukani, ekugcineni kwalencwadzi nitawubona kutsi loGadiyanthoni waba yimbangela yekubhujiswa, yebo, cishe konkhe kubhujiswa kwebantfu baNefi.
2.14: Bukani angisho ekugcineni kwencwadzi yaHilamani, kodvwa ngisho ekugcineni kwencwadzi yaNefi, lengitsatse kuyo wonkhe umlandvo lengiwubhalile.

3.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nakutsatfu wekubusa kwebehluleli, akutange kube khona umbango emkhatsini webantfu baNefi ngaphandle nje kwekutikhukhumeta lokuncane lobekusebandleni, lokwabanga kuphikisana lokuncane emkhatsini webantfu, futsi loku kuphikisana kwasombululeka ekupheleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamane nakutsatfu.
3.2: Futsi akutange kube khona umbango emkhatsini webantfu ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nakune; kanjalo akutange kube khona mbango longanani ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nesihlanu.
3.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nesitfupha, yebo, kwaba khona umbango lomkhulu kanye nekuhlubuka lokuningi; lokwaba yimbangela yekutsi labaningi kakhulu besuke baphume eveni laseZarahemla, bahambe baye eveni lelingasenyakatfo kute balitsatse lelive libe lifa.
3.4: Bahamba indlela lendze kakhulu, kangangekutsi bate befika emachibini lamakhulu emanti kanye nasemifuleni leminingi.
3.5: Yebo, basabalala kuto tonkhe tincenye telive, kuto tonkhe tincenye telive letatingakentiwa tabatindzala naletatingenamahlatsi, ngenca yebahlali labaningi labebahlala kulo.
3.6: Manje kwakute incenye yelive leyayingenalutfo, ngaphandle nje kwemahlatsi; kodvwa ngenca yekubhujiswa lokukhulu kwebantfu labebahlala kulo ngaphambilini labitwa ngekutsi ayinalutfo.
3.7: Futsi ngenca yekutsi kwakunemahlatsi lamancane kulo lonkhe live, noko bantfu labaya lapho baba tingcweti ekusebentiseni semende; ngako-ke bakha tindlu tasemende, labahlala kuto.
3.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bandza baphindze basabalala, besuka eveni lebelingaseningizimu baya eveni lebelingasenyakatfo, futsi basabalala kangangekutsi bacala kumbonya umhlaba wonkhe, kusukela elwandle loluseningizimu kuya elwandle lolusenyakatfo, kusukela elwandle lolusenshonalanga kuya elwandle lolusemphumalanga.
3.9: Bantfu labebaseveni lelingasenyakatfo bebahlala emathendeni, kanye nasetindlini tasemende, futsi bavumela noma ngusiphi sihlahla lesasimila kulo lonkhe live kutsi sikhule, kute nasekufike sikhatsi babe netingodvo tekwakha tindlu tabo, yebo, nemadolobha abo, nemathempeli abo, nemasinagoge abo, netindlu tabo letingcwele, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetakhiwo tabo.
3.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi njengoba tingodvo tatiyindlala kakhulu eveni lelingasenyakatfo, batfumela letiningi ngemkhumbi.
3.11: Ngaleyondlela basita bantfu labebaseveni lelingasenyakatfo kutsi bakhe emadolobha lamaningi, ngetingodvo kanye nangasemende.
3.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekukhona labaningi bantfu ba-Amoni, labebangemaLamani ngekutalwa, nabo ngalokunjalo bahamba baya kulelive.
3.13: Manje kukhona imibhalo leminingi legciniwe mayelana nenchubo talabantfu, ngebuningi balabantfu, lenemininingwane futsi leminingi kakhulu, mayelana nabo.
3.14: Kodvwa bukani, incenye yinye ekhulwini yencubo yalabantfu, yebo, umlandvo wemaLamani kanye nemaNefi, netimphi tabo, nembango, nekuphikisana, nekushumayela kwabo, netiphrofetho tabo, nekutfumela kwabo tintfo ngemkhumbi nekwakha kwabo imikhumbi, emathempeli, nemasinagoge, netindlu tabo letingcwele, nekulunga kwabo, nebubi babo, nekubulala kwabo, nekuphanga kwabo, nebugebengu babo, nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinengiso tabo, bugwadla babo, angeke kufakwe kulomsebenti.
3.15: Kodvwa bukani, kukhona letiningi tincwadzi kanye naleminingi imibhalo yalo lonkhe luhlobo, futsi seloku yagcinwa ikakhulu ngemaNefi.
3.16: Futsi yendluliswa ngemaNefi kusukela esitukulwaneni kuya kulesinye, ate awela esiphambekweni aphindze abulawa, aphangwa, atingelwa, abuyiselwa emuva, abulawa, futsi asakatwa emhlabeni wonkhe, ahlangana nemaLamani ate angasabitwa ngekutsi ngemaNefi, asakhohlakele, angakhuteki, anebudlova, yebo, asangemaLamani.
3.17: Manje sengibuyela emlandvweni wami, ngako-ke loko lengikukhulumile kwenteke emvakwekutsi sekube nemibango lemikhulu, nekuphatamiseka, netimphi kanye nekuphikisana, emkhatsini webantfu baNefi.
3.18: Umnyaka wemashumi lamane nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli waphela;
3.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wawusekhona umbango lomkhulu eveni, yebo, nangemnyaka wemashumi lamane nesikhombisa, kanjalo nangemnyaka wemashumi lamane nesiphohlongo.
3.20: Noko Hilamani wasitsatsa sihlalo sekwehlulela ngekulunga kanye nangebucotfo; yebo, wetama kugcina imitsetfo, netehlulelo, kanye nemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu; wenta loko lokwakulungille emehlweni aNkulunkulu njalo; wahamba etindleleni teyise, kangangekutsi waphumelela eveni.
3.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekanemadvodzana lamabili. Lomdzala wamnika libito laNefi, kwatsi lomncane, libito laLehi. Futsi acala akhulela eNkhosini.
3.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi timphi kanye nemibango kwacala kwaya ngekuphela, kancane kancane emkhatsini webantfu bemaNefi, ngasekupheleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamane nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
3.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamane nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwachubeka kwabanekuthula lokwacinisekiswa eveni, ngaphandle nje kwemacembu layimfihlo Gadiyanthoni sigebengu labewasungulile etincenyeni letiningi telive lokwakuhlalwa kuto, ngaleso sikhatsi labengatiwa ngulabo labebaphetse embusweni; ngako-ke awatange asuswe eveni.
3.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawo lowo mnyaka kwaba khona imphumelelo lenkhulu kakhulu ebandleni, kangangekutsi kwaba khona tinkhulungwane letaba malunga ebandleni, tabhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni.
3.25: Yaba yinkhulu kakhulu imphumelelo ebandleni, netibusiso taba tiningi kakhulu letatfululwa kubantfu, kangangekutsi nebaphristi labakhulu kanye nebafundzisi bamangala kakhulu.
3.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umsebenti weNkhosi waphumelela kangangoba bantfu labaningi babhajatiswa futsi bahlanganiswa ebandleni laNkulunkulu, yebo, emashumi etinkhulungwane.
3.27: Ngaleyondlela singabona kutsi iNkhosi inemusa kulabo, ngebucotfo betinhlitiyo tabo, lababita libito layo lelingcwele.
3.28: Yebo, ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi lisango lasezulwini livulelwe bonkhe, ngisho nalabo labatawukholwa ebitweni laJesu Khristu, loyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
3.29: Yebo, siyabona kutsi noma ngubani lofunako angabambelela evini laNkulunkulu, leliphilako futsi lelinemandla, leliyawuhlukanisa ekhatsi inkhohliso nabosochaka kanye nebucili badeveli, liholele umlandzeli waKhristu endleleni lengumtjuntju nalencane awele kulowo mhosha waphakadze wekuhlupheka lolungiselwe kutsi ugwinye lababi—
3.30: Libeke imiphefumulo yabo, yebo, imiphefumulo yabo lengabhubhi, esandleni sangesekudla saNkulunkulu embusweni wasezulwini, kutsi ihlale phansi na-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe, nabo bonkhe bobabe betfu labangcwele, ingaphindzi nanini iphumele ngaphandle.
3.31: Futsi ngalowo mnyaka kwachubeka kwaba nekujabula eveni laseZarahemla, kanye nakuto tonkhe tifundza letitungeletile, nakulo lonkhe live lelalingelemaNefi.
3.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba nekuthula kanye nekujabula lokukhulu esikhatsini lesasisele semnyaka wemashumi lamane nemfica; yebo, kanjalo kwachubeka kwaba nekuthula kanye nenjabulo lenkhulu ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu wekubusa kwebehluleli.
3.33: Ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli kwaba nekuthula futsi, ngaphandle kwekutikhukhumeta lokwacala kwangena ebandleni—hhayi ebandleni laNkulunkulu, kodvwa etinhlitiyweni tebantfu labebatibita ngekutsi belibandla laNkulunkulu.
3.34: Bebatikhukhumeta, bahlupha labaningi bebazalwane babo. Manje loku kwakububi lobukhulu, lobenta incenye yebantfu labatfobeke kakhulu kutsi beve kuhlushwa lokukhulu, futsi bendlule enhluphekweni lenkhulu.
3.35: Noko bazila baphindze bathandaza njalo, bakhula baba nemandla ekutitfobeni kwabo, baya ngekucina elukholweni lwaKhristu, yate imiphefumulo yabo yagcwala injabulo kanye nendvudvuto, yebo, tinhlitiyo tabo tahlantwa futsi tangcweliswa, kungcweliswa lokuta ngenca yekunikela tinhlitiyo tabo kuNkulunkulu.
3.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nakubili nawo waphela ngekuthula, ngaphandle kwekutikhukhumeta lokukhulu kakhulu lokwasekungene etinhlitiyweni tebantfu; lokwakungenca yengcebo yabo lenkhulu kakhulu kanye nekuphumelela kwabo eveni; futsi kwakhula kubo lusuku ngelusuku.
3.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nakutsatfu wekubusa kwebehluleli, Hilamani wafa, kwase kutsi indvodzana yakhe lendzala Nefi yacala kubusa esikhundleni sakhe, Futsi kwenteka kutsi yasitsatsa sihlalo sekwehlulela ngekulunga nangebucotfo; yebo, yayigcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, yaphindze yahamba etindleleni teyise.

4.1: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nakune kwabakhona emahlubuka labaningi ebandleni, ngetulu kwaloko kwabakhona umbango emkhatsini webantfu, kangangekutsi kwabakhona kucitseka kwengati leningi.
4.2: Futsi incenye yalabavukelako yabulawa yaphindze yachutjwa yakhishelwa ngephandle kwelive, futsi yaya enkhosini yemaLamani.
4.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yetama kuphehla emaLamani kutsi alwe nemaNefi; kodvwa buka, emaLamani abesaba kakhulu, kangangekutsi akawalalelanga emavi alawo mahlubuka.
4.4: Kodvwa kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwabakhona emahlubuka lakhuphukela kumaLamani esuka kumaNefi; futsi aphumelela ndzawonye nalawo lamanye ekuwaphehleni kutsi atfukutselele emaNefi; futsi kuwo wonkhe lowo mnyaka bebalungiselela imphi.
4.5: Futsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nesikhombisa behla kutawukulwa nemaNefi, futsi bawucala umsebenti wekubulala; yebo, kangangekutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasihlanu nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli baphumelela kutfola live laseZarahemla kutsi libe ngelabo; yebo, kanjalo nawo onkhe emave, nelive lebelisedvutane nelive iNala.
4.6: Futsi emaNefi nemabutfo aMoroniha achutjwa ayiswa eveni leNala;
4.7: Futsi lapho baticinisa tincaba ngalokumelene nemaLamani, kusuka elwandle lolusenshonalanga, kute kuyofika emphumalanga; lobekuluhambo lwelusuku kumNefi, emnceleni lapho bebacinise khona babeka emabutfo abo kutsi avikele live labo lelisenyakatfo.
4.8: Futsi ngaleyondlela lawo mahlubuka emaNefi, ngelusito lwemabutfo lamaningi emaLamani, bese atfole konkhe lokukwemaNefi lobekuseveni lelingaseningizimu. Futsi konkhe loko kwenteka eminyakeni yemashumi lasihlanu nesiphohlongo kanye nemfica yekubusa kwebehluleli.
4.9: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli, Moroniha waphumelela nemabutfo akhe ekutfoleni tincenye letiningi telive; yebo, bawabuyisa emadolobha lamaningi lebesekawele etandleni temaLamani.
4.10: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli baphumelela ekutfoleni nencenye yako konkhe lobekungekwabo.
4.11: Manje loku kulahlekelwa lokukhulu kangaka kwemaNefi, kanye nekubulawa lokukhulu lokwabasemkhatsini wabo, kwakungenawenteka kube bekungasiko ngenca yebubi babo kanye netinengiso tabo lebetisemkhatsini wabo; yebo, futsi etikwaloko bekukhona nasemkhatsini walabo; labebatibita ngekutsi babelibandla laNkulunkulu.
4.12: Futsi bekungenca yekutikhukhumeta kwetinhlitiyo tabo, ngenca yemcebo wabo lomkhulu, yebo, kwakungenca yekucindzetela kwabo labamphofu, bagodla kudla kwalabalambile, bagodla tingubo talabangcunu, futsi bashaya bomnakabo labatitfobile esihlatsini, benta inhlekisa ngaloko lokungcwele, baphika moya wekuphrofetha kanye newekwembulelwa, babulala, baphanga, bacamba emanga, baphinga, bakhula emibangweni lemikhulu, futsi bahlubuka baya eveni laNefi, emkhatsini wemaLamani—
4.13: Futsi ngenca yalobubi babo lobukhulu, kanye nekutichayisa kwabo ngemandla abo, bashiywa emandleni abo; ngako-ke abatange baphumelele, kodvwa bahlushwa baphindze bashaywa, bachutjwa phambi kwemaLamani, bate balahlekelwa cishe ngiwo onkhe emave abo.
4.14: Kodvwa buka, Moroniha washumayela tintfo letiningi kubantfu ngenca yebubi babo, kanjalo naNefi kanye naLehi, labebangemadvodzana aHilamani, bashumayela letiningi tintfo kubantfu, yebo, futsi baphrofetha letiningi tintfo kubo mayelana nebubi babo, kanye naloko lobekutawenteka kubo uma bebangaphendvuki etonweni tabo.
4.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphendvuka, futsi njengoba bebaphendvuka bacala kuphumelela.
4.16: Ngoba ngesikhatsi Moroniha sekabona kutsi bese baphendvuka watinikela ekutseni abahole indzawo ngendzawo, nelidolobha ngelidolobha, bate bayitfole incenye yemphahla yabo kanye nencenye yemave abo onkhe.
4.17: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli.
4.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nakubili wekubusa kwebehluleli, Moroniha bekangeke asakwati kutfola lobekukwabo kumaLamani.
4.19: Ngako-ke baliyekela lisu labo lekutfola emave abo labesekasele, ngoba bekasemaningi kakhulu emaLamani kangangekutsi kwaba lukhuni kumaNefi kutsi atfole lamanye emandla etikwawo; ngako-ke Moroniha wabeka onkhe emabutfo akhe kutsi agcine leto tincenye labekatitsetse.
4.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi, ngenca yebukhulu besibalo semaLamani emaNefi aba nekwesaba lokukhulu, hleze ehlulwe, bese agcotjwagcotjwa phansi, abulawe futsi abhujiswe.
4.21: Yebo, acala atikhumbula tiphrofetho ta-Alima, kanjalo nemavi aMosiya; futsi abona kutsi bekabantfu lababonhlokolukhuni, nekutsi bekayitsatsa njengentfo lelite imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu;
4.22: Futsi nekutsi besekayishintjile aphindze ayinyatsela ngaphansi kwetinyawo tawo imitsetfo yaMosiya, noma loko iNkhosi lebeyimyalete ngako kutsi akunike bantfu; futsi abone kutsi imitsetfo yawo beseyonakele, futsi nekutsi besekabantfu lababi, kangangekutsi besekamabi njengemaLamani.
4.23: Futsi ngenca yebubi bawo libandla beselicale kuncipha; acala kungakholelwa kumoya wekuphrofetha kanye nakumoya wekwembulelwa; futsi tehlulelo taNkulunkulu besetibabuke njo ebusweni.
4.24: Futsi abona kutsi besekanebutsakatsaka, njengabomnakabo, emaLamani, nekutsi Moya weNkhosi awutange usabalondvolota; yebo, besekakhweshile kubo ngoba Moya weNkhosi akahlali emathempelini langcolile—
4.25: Ngako-ke iNkhosi yayekela kubalondvolota ngemandla ayo lamangalisako futsi langenakulinganiswa, ngoba besekawele esimeni sekungakholwa kanye nasebubini lobukhulu; futsi abona kutsi emaLamani besekamaningi kakhulu kunawo, futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi anamatsele eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wawo kufanele afe ngendlela lengenakuvimbeleka.
4.26: Ngoba buka, abona kutsi emandla emaLamani bekamakhulu njengemandla awo, ngisho indvodza ngendvodza. Futsi ngaleyondlela awela kuleso siphambeko lesikhulu; yebo, ngaleyondlela aba butsakatsaka, ngenca yesiphambeko sawo, esikhatsini nje seminyaka lemincane.

5.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kuwo lowo mnyaka, bukani, Nefi wanika sihlalo sekwehlulela endvodzeni libito layo lokwakunguSezoramu.
5.2: Ngoba njengoba imitsetfo yabo kanye nemibuso yabo kwakumiswe ngelivi lebantfu, futsi labo labebakhetsa bubi bebabaningi kakhulu kunalabo labebakhetsa lokuhle, ngako-ke besebalungele kubhujiswa, ngoba imitsetfo bese yonakele.
5.3: Yebo, bekungasiko loku kuphela, besebabantfu lababonhlokolukhuni, kangangekutsi besebangasakwati kuphatfwa ngemtsetfo noma kulunga, ngaphandle kwekutsi kubangele kubhujiswa kwabo.
5.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi besekakhatsele ngenca yebubi babo; wadzela sihlalo sekwehlulela, wakubeka etikwemahlombe akhe kutsi ashumayele livi laNkulunkulu tonkhe tinsuku takhe lebesetisele, kanjalo nemnakabo Lehi, tonkhe tinsuku takhe lebesetisele.
5.5: Ngoba bakhumbula emavi uyise Hilamani lawakhuluma kubo. Lawa ngemavi lawakhuluma:
5.6: Bukani, madvodzana ami, ngifisa kutsi nikhumbule kugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu; futsi ngifuna kutsi niwamemetele kubantfu lamavi. Bukani, ngininikete emabito ebatali betfu bekucala labaphuma eveni laseJerusalema; loku ngikwente ngenhloso yekutsi uma nikhumbula emabito enu nibakhumbule; futsi uma nibakhumbula niyikhumbule nemisebenti yabo; nekutsi uma nikhumbula imisebenti yabo nati kutsi kukhulunyiwe, futsi kubhaliwe, kutsi bebalungile.
5.7: Ngako-ke madvodzana ami, ngifisa kutsi nente loko lokuhle, kute kukhulunywe ngani, kuphindze kubhalwe ngani, njengoba kukhulunyiwe kwaphindze kwabhalwa ngabo.
5.8: Nyalo madvodzana ami, bukani nginalokunye lokutsite lengikufisa kini, lokungukutsi, ningatenti letintfo kute nitikhukhumete, kodvwa nitente kute nitibekele ingcebo ezulwini, yebo, lokungeyaphakadze, futsi lengashabalali; yebo, kute nitfole sipho lesiligugu sekuphila lokuphakadze, lesinesizatfu sekucabanga kutsi siniketwe bobabe betfu
5.9: Awu khumbulani, khumbulani, madvodzana ami, emavi inkhosi Bhenjamini leyawakhuluma kubantfu bayo; yebo, khumbulani kutsi kute lenye indlela noma lisu umuntfu langasindziswa ngalo, ngaphandle kwengati lehlawulako yaJesu Khristu, lotawukuta; yebo, khumbulani kutsi uta kutawuhlenga umhlaba.
5.10: Futsi khumbulani emavi Amulekhi lawakhuluma kuZeziromu, edolobheni lase-Amoniha; ngoba washo kuye kutsi iNkhosi ngempela itawukuta kute itawuhlenga bantfu bayo, kodvwa angeke ite kutawubahlenga basetonweni tabo, kodvwa kubahlenga etonweni tabo
5.11: Futsi inemandla lanikwe yona lavela kuBabe kutsi ibahlenge etonweni tabo ngenca yekuphendvuka; ngako-ke itfumele tingilosi tayo kutsi timemetele tindzaba temibandzela yekuphendvuka, lokuletsa bantfu emandleni eMhlengi, kute kusindziswe imiphefumulo yabo.
5.12: Manje, madvodzana ami, khumbulani, khumbulani kutsi kusetikwelidvwala leMhlengi wetfu, longuKhristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, lapho kufanele nakhele khona sisekelo senu; kute kutsi uma develi atfumela imimoya yakhe lenemandla, yebo, imibane yakhe esivunguvungwini, yebo, uma sonkhe sangcotfo sakhe nesiphepho sakhe lesinemandla siwela kini, singabi nemandla etikwenu kutsi sinihudvulele phansi emhosheni wekuhlupheka kanye naselusizini lolungapheli ngenca yelidvwala lenakhele etikwalo, lelisisekelo lesicinile, sisekelo lapho uma bantfu bakhela kuso angeke bawe.
5.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lawa bekungemavi Hilamani lawafundzisa emadvodzana akhe; yebo, wawafundzisa tintfo letiningi letingakabhalwa, netintfo letiningi letibhaliwe.
5.14: Futsi awakhumbula emavi akhe; ngako-ke ahamba, agcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, yekufundzisa livi laNkulunkulu emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNefi, acala edolobheni iNala.
5.15: Kusuka lapho ahamba aya edolobheni laGidi; kusuka edolobheni laGidi aya edolobheni laMulekhi;
5.16: Ahamba esuka kulelo dolobha aya kulelinye, ate ahamba emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNefi labebaseveni lelingaseningizimu; kusuka lapho aya eveni laseZarahemla, emkhatsini wemaLamani.
5.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ashumayela ngemandla lamakhulu, kangangekutsi atfobisa emahlubuka lamaningi labekahlubuke kumaNefi, kangangekutsi eta ngaphambili ativuma tono tawo aphindze abhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni, masinyane abuyela kumaNefi kuyawukwetama kulungisa lokungakalungi labekakwentile.
5.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi kanye naLehi bashumayela kumaLamani ngemandla kanye nangeligunya lelikhulu, ngoba bebanemandla neligunya lebebaniketwe lona kutsi bakhulume, kanjalo baniketwa naloko lokwakufanele bakukhulume—
5.19: Ngako-ke bakhuluma kumaLamani lokwawamangalisa kakhulu, kutsi akholiswe, kangangekutsi kwabakhona tinkhulungwane letisiphohlongo temaLamani letatiseveni laseZarahemla kanye nasetindzaweni letitungeletile letabhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni, futsi takholiswa ngebubi bemasiko aboyise.
5.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi kanye naLehi bachubeka kusukela lapho baya eveni laNefi.
5.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi batsatfwa libutfo lemaLamani labaphonsa ejele; yebo, kulo kanye lelo jele Amoni nabomnakabo labebaphonswe kulo tinceku taLimhayi.
5.22: Emvakwekutsi sebaphonswe ejele tinsuku letiningi ngaphandle kwekudla, buka, ahamba aya ejele kuyawubatsatsa kute ababulale.
5.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi naLehi batungeletwa ngulokungatsi ngumlilo, kangangekutsi akatange alinge abeke tandla tawo kubo ngekwesaba hleze ashe. Noko, Nefi naLehi abatange bashe, futsi kwakungatsi beme ekhatsi nekhatsi nemlilo kodvwa abatange bashe.
5.24: Ngesikhatsi babona kutsi bebatungeletwe yinsika yemlilo, nekutsi beyingabashisi, tinhlitiyo tabo tema sibindzi.
5.25: Ngoba bebabona kutsi emaLamani abengeke alinge abeke tandla tawo kubo; noma alinge ete edvute nabo, kodvwa ema shengatsi ashaywe aba timungulu ngenca yekumangala.
5.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi naLehi basondzela ngembili bacala kukhuluma nawo, batsi: Ningesabi, ngoba bukani, nguNkulunkulu lonikhombise lentfo lemangalisako, leyo leboniswa kini kutsi angeke nikwati kubeka tandla tenu kitsi nisibulale.
5.27: Futsi bukani, sebawashito lamavi, umhlaba watamatama kamatima, netindvonga telijele tatamatama kwangatsi titowela phansi; kodvwa bukani, atiwanga. Futsi bukani labo labebasejele bekungemaLamani kanye nemaNefi labekangemahlubuka.
5.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bambonywa ngelifu lelimnyama, kwesaba lokubi lokumatima kweta etikwabo.
5.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwefika livi lokwakungatsi lingetulu kwelifu lelimnyama, litsi: Phendvukani, phendvukani, ningabe nisafuna nanini kubulala tinceku tami lengititfumele kini kutsi timemetele tindzaba letimnandzi.
5.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi aliva lelivi, aphindze abona kutsi kwakungasilo livi lekudvuma noma livi lesiphitsiphitsi semsindvo lomkhulu, kodvwa bukani, kwakulivi lelalikhulumela phansi lipholile ngalokuphelele, lokwakungatsi lalihleba, futsi lahlaba kuwo kanye umphefumulo—
5.31: Nanoma lelivi lalipholile, bukani umhlaba watamatama kamatima, netindvonga telijele taphindze tatamatama, shengatsi titawuwela phansi; futsi bukani nelifu lebumnyama, lelalibambonyile alitange lisuke—
5.32: Bukani livi laphindze leta, litsi: Phendvukani, phendvukani, ngoba umbuso welizulu sewusondzele; ningabe nisafuna kubulala tinceku tami nanini. Futsi kwenteka kutsi umhlaba waphindze watamatama, netindvonga tatamatama.
5.33: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko laphindze leta kwesitsatfu livi, lakhuluma kubo emavi lamangalisako langeke akhulunywe ngumuntfu; netindvonga taphindze tatamatama, nemhlaba watamatama shengatsi wawutawuhlukana ekhatsi.
5.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani akakhonanga kubaleka ngenca yelifu lelimnyama lelalibambonyile; yebo, ngetulu kwaloko bebangakhoni kunyakata ngenca yekwesaba lokwafika etikwabo.
5.35: Manje bekukhona munye emkhatsini wabo lobekangumNefi ngekwekutalwa, lobekake waba ngewelibandla laNkulunkulu kodvwa wahlubuka kubo.
5.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wagucuka, bukani, wabona efini lelimnyama buso baNefi banaLehi; futsi bukani, bebukhatimula kakhulu, njengebuso betingilosi. Wabona kutsi bebaphakamisele emehlo abo ezulwini; basesimeni sekungatsi bakhuluma noma baphakamisela emavi abo emuntfwini lotsite labebambona.
5.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lendvodza yamemeta esicukwini, kute naso sigucuke sibuke. Bukani, kwaba nemandla lesaniketwa wona kutsi sigucuke sibuke, nembala sabubona buso baNefi naLehi.
5.38: Futsi satsi kulendvodza: Buka, ngabe tisho kutsini tonkhe letintfo, futsi ngubani lona lawa madvodza lakhuluma naye?
5.39: Manje libito lalendvodza bekungu-Aminadabu. Aminadabu watsi kubo: Bakhuluma netingilosi taNkulunkulu.
5.40: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani atsi kuye: Siyawukwenta njani, kute lelifu lebumnyama lisuswe ekusimbonyeni na?
5.41: Aminadabu watsi kubo: Kumele niphendvuke, niphindze nikhale kulo lelivi, nite nibe nelukholo kuKhristu, lenafundziswa ngaye ngu-Alima, na-Amulekhi, kanye naZeziromu; uma nitawukwenta loku, lelifu lebumnyama litawususwa ekunimbonyeni.
5.42: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe bacala kukhala evini lakhe loyo lobekatamatamise umhlaba; yebo, bakhala late lifu lebumnyama lesuswa.
5.43: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi baphonsa emehlo abo ngala nangala, babona kutsi lifu lebumnyama laselisusiwe ekubambonyeni, bukani, babona kutsi bebatungeletiwe, yebo wonkhe muntfu, yinsika yemlilo.
5.44: Nefi kanye naLehi bebasekhatsi kuwo; yebo, bebatungeletiwe; yebo, bekungatsi basekhatsi nekhatsi elangabini lemlilo, kodvwa alitange libashise, noma lishise tindvonga telijele; futsi bagcwaliswa ngaleyo njabulo lengachazeki nalegcwele inkhatimulo.
5.45: Bukani, Moya loNgcwele waNkulunkulu wehlela phansi uvela ezulwini, wangena etinhlitiyweni tabo, futsi kwakungatsi bagcwaliswe ngemlilo, bakwati kukhuluma emavi lamangalisako.
5.46: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kweta livi kubo, yebo, livi lelitfokotisako, lokwakungatsi kuhleba, litsi:
5.47: Kuthula, kuthula akube kini, ngenca yelukholo lwenu kuloTsandziwe Kakhulu wami, lobekakhona kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba.
5.48: Manje, ngesikhatsi bakuva loku baphonsa emehlo abo shengatsi bafuna kubona kutsi laliphuma kuphi lelivi; bukani, babona emazulu avuleka; netingilosi tehlela phansi tiphuma ezulwini tabasita.
5.49: Futsi bekubantfu cishe labangemakhulu lamatsatfu lababona baphindze beva letintfo; futsi batjelwa kutsi bahambe bangamangali, noma bangabate.
5.50: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba, bafundzisa bantfu, bamemetela etifundzeni tonkhe letitungeletile tonkhe tintfo labebativile nalebebatibonile, kangangekutsi incenye leningi yemaLamani yakholiswa, ngenca yebukhulu bebufakazi labebabutfolile.
5.51: Futsi ngebuningi balabo labakholiswa batibeka phansi tikhali tabo temphi, kanjalo nenzondo yabo kanye nemasiko aboyise.
5.52: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babuyisela kumaNefi emave lokwakungewabo.

6.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nakubili wekubusa kwebehluleli sewuphelile, tonkhe letintfo bese tentekile futsi emaLamani, incenye lenkhulu yawo, babantfu labalungile, kangangekutsi kulunga kwawo bekwendlula loko kwemaNefi, ngenca yekucina kanye nekusima kwawo elukholweni.
6.2: Ngoba buka, bekukhona labaningi bemaNefi labesebalukhuni futsi bangenakuphendvuka baphindze bababi kakhulu, kangangekutsi balilahla livi laNkulunkulu kanye nato tonkhe tinshumayelo kanye netiphrofetho leteta emkhatsini wabo.
6.3: Noko, bantfu belibandla baba nenjabulo lenkhulu ngenca yekuphendvuka kwemaLamani, yebo, ngenca yelibandla laNkulunkulu, lebese lisunguliwe emkhatsini wawo. Futsi bahlanganyela lomunye nalomunye, baba nekutfokota lokukhulu lomunye nalomunye, baphindze baba nenjabulo lenkhulu.
6.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labaningi bemaLamani beta behlela eveni laseZarahemla, bamemetela kubantfu bemaNefi indlela labaphendvuka ngayo, futsi bawancusa kutsi akholwe aphindze aphendvuke.
6.5: Yebo, futsi lamaningi ashumayela ngemandla lamakhulu kakhulu kanye nangeligunya, kangangoba babehlisela ekujuleni kwekutitfoba, kutsi babe balandzeli labatfobekile baNkulunkulu kanye neMvana.
6.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labaningi bemaLamani bahamba baya eveni lelingasenyakatfo; kanjalo Nefi kanye naLehi bahamba baya eveni lelingasenyakatfo, kuyoshumayela kubantfu. Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nakutsatfu.
6.7: Bukani, kwabakhona kuthula kulo lonkhe live, kangangekutsi emaNefi ahamba kunoma nguyiphi incenye yelive labebafuna kuhamba kuyo, noma emkhatsini wemaNefi noma kumaLamani.
6.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani nawo ngalokunjalo ahamba noma ngukuphi lapho bekafuna kuhamba khona, noma bekusemkhatsini wemaLamani noma emkhatsini wemaNefi; futsi ngaleyondlela aba nekuhlangana lokukhululekile lomunye nalomunye, kutsenga kanye nekutsengisa, kanye nekutfola inzuzo, njengekufisa kwabo.
6.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baceba kakhulu, emaLamani kanye nemaNefi; futsi babaneligolide leliningi kakhulu, kanye nesiliva, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yetinsimbi letiligugu, eveni leliseningizimu naseveni lelisenyakatfo.
6.10: Manje live leliseningizimu belibitwa ngaLehi, bese kutsi live lelisenyakatfo belibitwa ngaMulekhi, lebelicanjwe ngendvodzana yaSedekiya; ngoba iNkhosi Mulekhi yamletsa eveni lelisenyakatfo, Lehi eveni leliseningizimu.
6.11: Futsi buka, bekukhona yonkhe inhlobo yeligolide kuwo omabili lamave, kanye nesiliva, nayo yonkhe inhlobo yensimbi leligugu; ngetulu kwaloko bekukhona tingcweti tebabumbi, letatisebenta tonkhe tinhlobo tensimbi futsi tiyicwengisisa; ngaleyondlela taceba.
6.12: Bahlanyela lokuyinhlavu ngebuningi bato, enyakatfo kanye naseningizimu; baphumelela kakhulu, enyakatfo naseningizimu. Batalana bandza futsi bakhula bacina kakhulu eveni. Bakhulisa imihlambi yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo letiningi, yebo, letiningi letikhuluphalisiwe.
6.13: Bukani besifazane babo basebenta beluka, benta yonkhe inhlobo yendvwangu, yelineni lelukiwe lecolisakele kanye nendvwangu yalo lonkhe luhlobo, kwembatsisa bungcunu babo. Wendlula ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nakune kunekuthula.
6.14: Futsi emnyakeni wemashumi lasitfupha nesihlanu baphindza baba nekutfokota lokukhulu kanye nekuthula, yebo, kushumayela lokukhulu kanye netiphrofetho letiningi mayelana naloko lobekutawukuta. Wendlula ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesihlanu.
6.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli, bukani, Sezoramu wabulawa ngesandla lebesingatiwa ngesikhatsi ahleti esihlalweni sekwehlulela. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawo lowo mnyaka, indvodzana yakhe, lebeyibekwe bantfu esikhundleni sakhe, nayo ngalokunjalo yabulawa. Waphela ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesitfupha.
6.16: Ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesikhombisa bantfu baphindze bacala kukhula kakhulu ebubini.
6.17: Ngoba bukani, iNkhosi beyibabusisile kuso sonkhe lesi sikhatsi ngemcebo welive kangangoba abatange baphehlelwe entfukutselweni, etimphini, noma ekucitseni ingati; ngako-ke bacala kubeka litsemba labo emcebeni wabo; yebo, bacala bafuna kutfola inzuzo kute batiphakamise lomunye etikwalomunye; ngako-ke bacala kubulala ngansense, nekweba kanye nekuphanga, kute batfole inzuzo.
6.18: Manje bukani, labo babulali kanye nebaphangi bebalicembu lebelicanjwe nguKhishkhumeni kanye naGadiyanthoni. Manje bese babaningi, nasemkhatsini wemaNefi, belicembu laGadiyanthoni. Kodvwa bukani, bebabaningi kakhulu emkhatsini waleyo ncenye yemaLamani lebeyinebubi kakhulu. Futsi bebabitwa ngekutsi tigebengu nebabulali baGadiyanthoni.
6.19: Futsi bekungibo lababulala umehluleli lomkhulu Sezoramu, kanye nendvodzana yakhe, ngesikhatsi basesihlalweni sekwehlulela; futsi bukani, abatange batfolwe.
6.20: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emaLamani atfola kutsi bekukhona tigebengu emkhatsini wawo adzabuka kakhulu; enta konkhe lokusemandleni awo kutsi atibulale tiphele emhlabeni wonkhe.
6.21: Kodvwa bukani, Sathane watiphehla tinhlitiyo encenyeni lenkhulu yemaNefi, kangangekutsi ahlangana nalawo macembu latigebengu, angena esivumelwaneni nasetifungweni tabo, kutsi batawuvikelana futsi balondvolotane nguloyo naloyo kunoma ngutiphi timo letimatima labebayawuba kuto, kute bangeva buhlungu ngenca yekubulala kwabo, nekuphanga kanye nekweba kwabo.
6.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baba netimphawu tabo, yebo, timphawu tabo letiyimfihlo, kanye nemagama abo layimfihlo; kute ngaloku bakwati kwehlukanisa umnakabo longene esivumelwaneni, kute kutsi noma ngabe ngubuphi bubi umnakabo labentako angalinyatwa ngumnakabo, noma ngulabo labebabelicembu lakhe, labebangene kulesivumelwano.
6.23: Futsi ngaleyondlela bebangabulala, baphange, bebe, futsi bente bugwadla kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yebubi, ngalokuphambene nemtsetfo welive labo futsi kanjalo nemitsetfo yaNkulunkulu wabo.
6.24: Futsi loyo lobekawelicembu labo lobekangavetela umhlaba ngebubi babo kanye nangetinengiso tabo, bekabekwa licala, hhayi ngekwemitsetfo yelive labo, kodvwa ngekwemitsetfo yebubi babo, lebeyiniketwe nguGadiyanthoni kanye naKhishkhumeni.
6.25: Manje buka, nguleti tifungo letiyimfihlo kanye netivumelwano Alima layala ngato indvodzana yakhe kutsi tingaphumeli eveni, hleze tibe yindlela yekwehlisela bantfu phansi ekubhujisweni.
6.26: Manje bukani, leto tifungo letiyimfihlo kanye netivumelwano atiletfwanga kuGadiyanthoni tiphuma emibhalweni lebeyiniketwe Hilamani; kodvwa bukani, betifakwe enhlityweni yaGadiyanthoni nguye kanye loyo muntfu lowaheha batali betfu bekucala kutsi badle sitselo lesingakavunyelwa.
6.27: Yebo, yena kanye loyo muntfu lowenta lisu naKhayini kutsi uma angabulala umnakabo Abela angeke atiwe emhlabeni. Futsi wenta lisu naKhayini kanye nebalandzeli bakhe kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili.
6.28: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko nguye kanye loyo muntfu lowakufaka etinhlitiyweni tebantfu kutsi bakhe umbhoshongo lophakeme ngalokwenele kute bafinyelele ezulwini. Futsi bekunguye kanye loyo muntfu lowahola bantfu labebavela kulombhoshongo beta kulelive; lowandzisa imisebenti yebumnyama kanye netinengiso kulo lonkhe live, wate wabahudvulela phansi bantfu ekubhujisweni nya, kanye nasesihogweni lesingapheli.
6.29: Yebo, nguye kanye loyo muntfu lowakufaka enhlitiyweni yaGadiyanthoni kutsi achubeke njalo ngemsebenti webumnyama, kanye newekubulala ngansense; futsi ukusekelile loko kusukela ekucaleni kwemuntfu kwehle kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi samanje.
6.30: Futsi bukani, nguye loyo longumcambi waso sonkhe sono. Bukani, usachubeka nemsebenti wakhe webumnyama kanye newekubulala ngansense, futsi undlulisa emachinga abo, tifungo, tivumelwano, kanye nemasu abo ebubi lobukhulu, titukulwane ngetitukulwane kangangoba angatfola kubambelela etinhlitiyweni tebantfwana bebantfu.
6.31: Manje bukani, besekatfole kubambelela lokukhulu etinhlitiyweni temaNefi; yebo, kangangekutsi besekamabi kakhulu; yebo, incenye lenkhulu yawo beseyisukile endleleni yekulunga, futsi yanyatsela imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu phansi kwetinyawo tawo, aphendvukela etindleleni tawo, atakhela tithico teligolide kanye nesiliva lawo.
6.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe lobubi beta kubo ngesikhashana lesingasiminyaka mingaki, kangangekutsi incenye lenkhulu yabo yeta kubo ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
6.33: Futsi akhula ebubini bawo ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesiphohlongo, lokwabangela lusizi nesililo lesikhulu kulabalungile.
6.34: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi emaNefi acala alahlekelwa lukholo, akhula ebubini nasetinengisweni, kwatsi emaLamani wona acala kukhula kakhulu ekumatini Nkulunkulu wawo; yebo, acala kuyigcina imitsetfo nemiyaleto yakhe, kanye nekuhamba ecinisweni nangebucotfo ngaphambi kwakhe.
6.35: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi Moya weNkhosi wacala kutsi ukhweshe kumaNefi, ngenca yebubi kanye nebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tawo.
6.36: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi iNkhosi yacala kutfulula Moya wayo kumaLamani, ngenca yekutsandza kwawo kanye nekufuna kutsi akholwe emavini ayo.
6.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani alitingela licembu letigebengu taGadiyanthoni; futsi alishumayela livi laNkulunkulu emkhatsini wencenye yato lebeyinebubi kakhulu, kangangekutsi lelicembu letigebengu lesuswa laphela nya emkhatsini wemaLamani.
6.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakulolunye luhlangotsi, emaNefi abakhulisa aphindze abasekela, acala kuleyo ncenye lebeyinebubi kakhulu, late lasabalala lonkhe live lemaNefi, futsi layenga incenye lekhulu yalabalungile bate babuyela phansi ekukholweni imisebenti yabo futsi bahlanganyela nabo emiphangweni yabo, bahlanganyela nabo ekubulaleni kwabo ngansense kanye nasemacenjini abo angansense.
6.39: Futsi ngaleyondlela batfola kuwuphatsa ngalokuphelele umbuso, kangangekutsi banyatsela ngaphansi kwetinyawo tabo bashaya baphindze bahlupha futsi bafulatsela labamphofu nalabamnene, kanye nebalandzeli labatfobekile baNkulunkulu.
6.40: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi bese basesimeni lesibi kakhulu, futsi sebakulungele kubhujiswa kwaphakadze.
