6.41: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nesiphohlongo waphela ngaleyondlela wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.

7.intro: Siphrofetho saNefi, iNdvodzana yaHilamani—Nkulunkulu wesabisa bantfu baNefi ngekutsi utawubavakashela ngentfukutselo yakhe, lokutobangela kutsi babhujiswe ngaphanndle kwekutsi baphendvuke ebubini babo. Nkulunkulu ushaya bantfu baNefi ngamashayabhuce wesifo; bayaphendvuka baphindze babuyela kuye, Samuweli, umLamani, uphrofetha kumaNefi.
7.1: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasitfupha nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, Nefi, indvodzana yaHilamani, wabuyela edolobheni laseZarahemla asuka eveni lelingasenyakatfo.
7.2: Ngoba bekaphumile emkhatsini webantfu labebaseveni lelingasenyakatfo, walishumayela livi laNkulunkulu kubo, waphindze waphrofetha tintfo letiningi kubo
7.3: Futsi bawalahla onkhe emavi akhe, kangangekutsi akatange avunyelwe kuhlala emkhatsini wabo, kodvwa waphindze wabuyela eveni latalelwa kulo.
7.4: Futsi abona bantfu basesimeni sebubi lobesabeka kanje, kanye naleto tigebengu taGadiyanthoni titsatsa tihlalo tekwehlulela—setitsetse ngebucili emandla kanye neligunya lalelive; tabeka eceleni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, futsi tangenti nalokuncane lokulungile phambi kwakhe; tangehluleli ngekulunga kubantfwana bebantfu;
7.5: Tijezisa labalungile ngenca yekulunga kwabo; tiyekela labanelicala nalababi kutsi bangajeziswa ngenca yemali yabo; ngetulu kwaloko tibekwa etihlalweni letisetulu tembuso, kutsi tibuse tiphindze tente ngekwentsandvo yato, kute titfole inzuzo kanye neludvumo lwemhlaba, futsi, ngetulu kwaloko, kute tiphinge kalula, tebe, tibulale, tiphindze tente ngekwentsadvo yato—
7.6: Manje lobu bubi lobukhulu befika kumaNefi, esikhatsini lesiyiminyaka lemincane; futsi ngesikhatsi Nefi akubona loku, inhlitiyo yakhe yagcwala lusizi ngekhatsi esifubeni sakhe; wamemeta ngebuhlungu bemphefumulo wakhe.
7.7: Awu, kube tinsuku tami taba nguletinsuku ngesikhatsi babe Nefi aphuma kwekucala eveni laseJerusalema, ngabe ngangiyojabula naye eveni lesetsembiso; ngaleso sikhatsi bantfu bakhe bekulula kubancenga, bacinile ekugcineni imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu, kungasilula kutsi baholelwe ekwenteni lokubi; futsi bebashesha kuwalalela emavi eNkhosi—
7.8: Yebo, kube tinsuku tami tatingaleto tinsuku, ngabe umphefumulo wami wawutfokota kuko kulunga kwabomnaketfu.
7.9: Kodvwa buka, nginikwe kutsi leti kube tinsuku tami, nekutsi umphefumulo wami uyawugcwaliswa ngelusizi ngenca yebubi babomnaketfu.
7.10: Buka, manje kwenteka kutsi bekungusetikwembhoshongo, lobewusensimini yaNefi, lebeyingasemgwacweni lomkhulu lobewuya emakethe lenkhulu, lebeyisedolobheni laseZarahemla; ngako-ke, Nefi bekaguce embhoshongweni lobewusensimini yakhe, umbhoshongo lobewusedvute nelisango lensimu lapho umgwaco lomkhulu bewendlula khona.
7.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekukhona emadvodza latsite labekendlula lapho ambona Nefi ngesikhatsi athandaza ngenshisekelo kuNkulunkulu embhoshongweni; agijima ayotjela bantfu ngalabekakubonile, futsi nebantfu babutsana ndzawonye ngeticuku kute bati sizatfu sekulila lokukhulu kangaka ngenca yebubi bebantfu.
7.12: Manje, ngesikhatsi Nefi asukuma watibona ticuku tebantfu labesebabutsene ndzawonye.
7.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakhuluma nabo watsi: Bukani, kungani nibutsene ndzawonye na? Kungoba nifuna nginitjele ngebubi benu na?
7.14: Yebo, ngenca yekutsi ngigibele embhoshongweni wami kute ngithandaze ngenshisekelo kuNkulunkulu wami, ngenca yelusizi lolukhulu lwenhlitiyo yami, ngenca yebubi benu!
7.15: Futsi ngenca yekulila kanye nekukhala kwami senibutsene ndzawonye, niyamangala; yebo, futsi kufanele kutsi nimangale; yebo, nimele kumangala ngoba senitinikele kangangekutsi develi sewunemandla lamakhulu etinhlitiyweni tenu.
7.16: Yebo, nivumelani kutinikela ekuyengweni nguloyo lofuna kuphonsa imiphefumulo yenu phansi ekuhluphekeni kwaphakadze kanye naselusizini lolungapheli na?
7.17: Awu phendvukani, phendvukani! Kungani nitawukufa na? Buyani, buyani eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wenu. Kungani inilahlile na?
7.18: Kungoba nitente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tenu; yebo, anifuni kulalela livi lemelusi lolungile; yebo, nimente wanitfukutselela.
7.19: Bukani, esikhundleni sekutsi anigcogce, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke, bukani, utawunihlakata kute nibe yinyama yetinja kanye netilwane tasendle.
7.20: Awu, ngabe nimkhohlwe kanjani Nkulunkulu wenu ngalo kanye lolusuku lanikhulula ngalo na?
7.21: Kodvwa bukani, kungoba nifuna kutfola inzuzo, kute nidvunyiswe bantfu, yebo, kute nitfole ligolide nesiliva. Futsi senibeke tinhlitiyo tenu emcebeni kanye nasetintfweni letilite talomhlaba, ngenca yato niyabulala, niyaphanga, niyeba, nifakaze emanga ngamakhelwane wenu, niphindze nente tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi.
7.22: Futsi ngalesizatfu lusizi luyeta kini ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke. Ngoba uma ningeke niphendvuke, bukani, lelidolobha lelikhulu, kanye nawo onkhe lawo madolobha lamakhulu lalitungeletile, laseveni lekungeletfu, atawutsatfwa kute ningasabi nendzawo kuwo; ngoba bukani, iNkhosi angeke ininike emandla, njengoba yentile kute kube ngumanje, kutsi nimelane netitsa tenu.
7.23: Ngoba bukani, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Angeke ngikhombise kulabo lababi emandla ami, kulomunye ngetulu kwalomunye, ngaphandle kwalabo labaphendvukako etonweni tabo, futsi balalele emavi ami. Manje ngako-ke, ngifuna kutsi nibuke, bomnaketfu, kutsi kuyawubancono kumaLamani kunani ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke.
7.24: Ngoba bukani, wona alunge kakhulu kunani, ngoba akate one ngalokumelene nalolo lwati lolukhulu lenilutfolile; ngako-ke iNkhosi itawuba nemusa kuwo; yebo, itawandzisa tinsuku tawo iphindze yandzise intalelwane yawo, kantsi nine nitawubhujiswa ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke.
7.25: Yebo, maye kini ngenca yaleso sinengiso lesikhulu lesite kini, futsi nitihlanganise naso, yebo, lelo cembu leliyimfihlo lelasungulwa nguGadiyanthoni!
7.26: Yebo, lusizi luyawuta kini ngenca yaloko kutichenya lenikuvumele kutsi kungene etinhlitiyweni tenu, lokuniphakamise ngetulu kwaloko lokulungile ngenca yemcebo wenu lomkhulu kakhulu!
7.27: Yebo, maye kini ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tenu!
7.28: Futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke nitawukufa; yebo, nemave enu atawutsatfwa kini, niphindze nibhujiswe niphele emhlabeni wonkhe.
7.29: Bukani manje, angisho kutsi letintfo tiyawuba njalo, ngekwami, ngoba akusiko kuhlakanipha kwami kutsi ngitati letintfo; kodvwa bukani, ngiyati kutsi letintfo tiliciniso ngoba iNkhosi Nkulunkulu itembulile kimi, ngako-ke ngiyafakaza kutsi titawukwenteka.

8.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Nefi asawakhulumile lamavi, buka, bekukhona emadvodza labekabehluleli, labephindze abe elicembu leliyimfihlo laGadiyanthoni, bekatfukutsele, futsi amemeta aphikisana naye, atsi kubantfu: Kungani ningayibambi lendvodza niyiletse lapha, kute ijeziswe ngelicala leyilentile.
8.2: Kungani niyibuka lendvodza, futsi niyilalela itfuka labantfu kanye nemtsetfo wetfu na?
8.3: Ngoba buka, Nefi bekakhulume kubo mayelana nenkhohlakalo yemtsetfo wabo; yebo, tiningi tintfo Nefi latisho letingeke tibhalwe; futsi kute lakukhuluma lokuphikisana nemiyaleto yaNkulunkulu.
8.4: Futsi labo behluleli bebatfukutsele ngenca yekutsi wakhuluma ngalokusobala kubo mayelana nemisebenti yabo yebumnyama leyimfihlo; noko, abatange balinge bambambe, ngoba bebesaba bantfu hleze bamemete ngalokumelene nabo.
8.5: Ngako-ke bamemeta ebantfwini, batsi: Kungani nivumele lendvodza kutsi isitfuke na? Ngoba bukani ibagweba bonkhe labantfu, ngisho nasekubhujisweni; yebo, ngetulu kwaloko nekutsi lamadolobha etfu lamakhulu ayawutsatfwa kitsi, singabe sisaba nendzawo kuwo.
8.6: Manje siyati kutsi loku akunawenteka, ngoba bukani, sinemandla, futsi emadolobha etfu makhulu, ngako-ke titsa tetfu angeke tibe nemandla etikwetfu.
8.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babaphehla ngaleyondlela bantfu kutsi bamtfukutselele Nefi, bacala imibango emkhatsini wabo; ngoba kukhona labatsite labamemeta batsi: Yiyekeleni lendvodza, ngoba iyindvodza lelungile, futsi leto tintfo leyitikhulumile titawukwenteka ngempela ngaphandle kwekutsi siphendvuke;
8.8: Yebo, bukani, tonkhe tehlulelo lafakaze ngato titawuta etikwetfu; ngoba siyati kutsi ufakaze lokungiko kitsi mayelana nebubi betfu. Bukani buningi, futsi uyatati tonkhe tintfo letitawusehlela njengoba ati ngebubi betfu.
8.9: Yebo, futsi bukani, kube bekangasiye umphrofethi abengeke afakaze mayelana naleto tintfo.
8.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo labebafuna kumbulala Nefi baphoceleleka ngenca yekwesaba, kutsi bangambambi; ngako-ke waphindze wacala kukhuluma nabo, abona kutsi besekatfole umusa emehlweni alabanye, kangangekutsi labebasele babo baba nekwesaba.
8.11: Ngako-ke waphoceleleka kutsi akhulume lokunye kubo watsi: Bukani, bomnaketfu, anifundzanga yini kutsi Nkulunkulu waniketa emandla kumuntfu munye, ngisho nakuMosi, kutsi ashaye emanti eLwandle loluBovu, futsi ahlukana ekhatsi, kangangekutsi ema-Israyeli labebobabe betfu, ewela emhlabatsini lowomile, futsi emanti ambonya libutfo lemaGibhithe awangwinya onkhe na?
8.12: Manje bukani, uma Nkulunkulu anika lendvodza emandla langaka, pho kungani niphikisana emkhatsini wenu, nitsi akate anginike emandla kutsi ngati mayelana netehlulelo letitawukuta kini ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke na?
8.13: Kodvwa, bukani, aniphiki emavi ami kuphela, kodvwa niphika onkhe emavi lakhulunywe bobabe betfu, nemavi lakhulunywa ngulendvodza, Mosi, lobekanemandla lamakhulu kangaka labekaniketwe wona, yebo, emavi lawakhuluma mayelana nekuta kwaMesiya.
8.14: Yebo, akatange yini afakaze kutsi iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu kufanele ite na? Futsi njengoba aphakamisa inyoka yelitfusi ehlane, kanjalo uyawuphakanyiswa loyo lokufanele ete.
8.15: Futsi ngebuningi babo labo labebayoyibuka leyo nyoka bebayophila, kanjalo ngebuningi balabo labayobuka iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ngelukholo, babe nemoya lotfobekile, bayawuphila, ngisho leyo mphilo lengunaphakadze.
8.16: Manje bukani, Mosi akusuye yena yedvwa lowafakaza ngaletintfo, kodvwa nabo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele, kusukela etinsukwini takhe kuya etinsukwini ta-Abrahama.
8.17: Yebo, bukani, Abrahama wakubona kuta kwayo, wagcwala injabulo futsi watfokota.
8.18: Yebo, futsi bukani ngitsi kini, Abrahama akusuye yena yedvwa lowati ngaletintfo, kodvwa bekukhona labaningi ngaphambi kwetinsuku ta-Abrahama labebabitwe ngekweluhlelo lwaNkulunkulu; yebo, nangekweluhlelo lweNdvodzana yakhe; futsi kute loku kukhonjiswe kubantfu, iminyaka leminingi letinkhulungwane ngaphambi kwekuta kwayo, kutsi kuhlengwa kuyawukuta kubo.
8.19: Manje ngifuna kutsi nati, kutsi kusukela etinsukwini ta-Abrahama bekukhona labaningi baphrofethi labafakazile ngaletintfo; yebo, bukani, umphrofethi Zenoshe wafakaza ngesibindzi; ngaloko wabulawa.
8.20: Futsi bukani, Zenokhi ngalokunjalo, na-Eziyasi, na-Isaya, naJeremiya, (Jeremiya yena kanye loyo mphrofethi lowafakaza ngekubhujiswa kweJerusalema) manje siyati kutsi iJerusalema yabhujiswa ngekwemavi aJeremiya. Pho, kungani iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ingeti, ngekwesiphrofetho sakhe na?
8.21: Manje nitawuphika yini kutsi iJerusalema yabhujiswa na? Ningasho yini kutsi emadvodzana aSedekiya awatange abulawe, onkhe ngaphandle kwaMulekhi na? Yebo, aniboni yini kutsi intalelwane yaSedekiya inatsi na, futsi bakhishwa eveni laseJerusalema na? Kodvwa bukani, akusiko loku kuphela—
8.22: Babe Lehi wakhishwa eJerusalema ngenca yekutsi wafakaza ngaletintfo. Nefi naye wafakaza ngaletintfo, cishe nabo bonkhe bobabe betfu, kwehla kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi; yebo, bafakazile ngekuta kwaKhristu, balangatelele, futsi balutfokotele lusuku lwakhe lolutawufika.
8.23: Futsi bukani, unguNkulunkulu, futsi unabo, waphindze watibonakalisa kubo, kutsi bebahlengwe nguye, futsi bamnika ludvumo, ngenca yaloko lokutawufika.
8.24: Manje, ngekubona kutsi niyatati letintfo futsi angeke nitiphike ngaphandle kwekutsi nicambe emanga, ngako-ke nonile, ngoba nitilahlile tonkhe letintfo, nanoma kunebufakazi lobuningi kangaka lenibutfolile; yebo, nititfolile tonkhe tintfo, tintfo letisezulwini, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letisemhlabeni, njengebufakazi bekutsi tiliciniso.
8.25: Kodvwa bukani, nililahlile liciniso, nahlamuka Nkulunkulu wenu longcwele, nangalesi sikhatsi, esikhundleni sekutsi nitibekele umcebo ezulwini, lapho kute lutfo lokubolako, nalapho kute lutfo lokungcolile lokungangena khona, nitibekela intfukutselo ngelusuku lwekwehlulelwa
8.26: Yebo, nangalesi sikhatsi senilungele, ngenca yekubulala nekuphinga nenkhohlakalo yenu, kutsi nibhujiswe ingunaphakadze; yebo, futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke kutawufika kini masinyane.
8.27: Yebo, bukani manje sekuseminyango yenu; yebo, hambani niye esihlalweni sekwehlulela, nifune; futsi bukani, umehluleli wenu ubulewe, futsi ulele engatini yakhe; ubulewe ngumnakabo, lofuna kuhlala esihlalweni sekwehlulela.
8.28: Bukani, bobabili belicembu lenu leliyimfihlo, umcambi walo lokunguGadiyanthoni kanye nalomubi lofuna kubulala bantfu.

9.1: Bukani, manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Nefi sekawakhulumile lamavi, lamanye emadvodza labekasemkhatsini wabo agijima aya esihlalweni sekwehlulela; yebo, bekasihlanu lahamba, futsi atsi kulomunye nalomunye, ngesikhatsi asahamba;
9.2: Bukani, manje sitawukwati ngekweliciniso kutsi ngabe lendvodza inguye yini umphrofethi futsi nekutsi Nkulunkulu uyiyaletile yini kutsi iphrofethe tintfo letimangalisa kangaka kitsi. Bukani, asikholwa kutsi uyiyaletile; yebo, asikholwa kutsi ingumphrofethi; noko, uma lentfo layishito mayelana nemehluleli lomkhulu iliciniso, kutsi ufile, uma kunjalo sitawukholwa kutsi lamanye emavi lawakhulumile aliciniso.
9.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi agijima ngemandla, ate afika esihlalweni sekwehlulela; futsi buka, umehluleli lomkhulu besekawele phansi, alele engatini yakhe.
9.4: Manje bukani, ngesikhatsi sekakubona loku atfuka kakhulu, kangangekutsi awela phansi; ngoba bekangatange sekawakholwe emavi Nefi labekawakhulumile mayelana nemehluleli lomkhulu.
9.5: Kodvwa manje, ngesikhatsi sekabona akholwa, futsi afikelwa kwesaba hleze tonkhe tehlulelo Nefi labekatikhulumile tenteke kubantfu; ngako-ke atfutfumela, awela phansi.
9.6: Manje, masinyane emvakwekutsi umehluleli sekabulewe—agwazwe ngumnakabo lobekagcoke tingubo tekutifihla, wabaleka, tinceku tagijima tayotjela bantfu, tikhala sikhalo sekubulala emkhatsini wabo;
9.7: Futsi buka bantfu babutsana ndzawonye endzaweni yesihlalo sekwehlulela—buka, ngekumangala bawabona lawo madvodza lasihlanu labesawele phansi.
9.8: Manje buka, labantfu bebangati lutfo mayelana nesicuku lebesibutsene ensimini yaNefi; ngako-ke batsi kulomunye nalomunye: Lamadvodza ngiwo labulele umehluleli, futsi Nkulunkulu sewuwashayile kute angabe asakhona kusibalekela.
9.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bawabamba, bawabopha bawaphonsa etilongweni. Kwase kuba khona simemetelo lesatfunyelwa kuto tonkhe tindzawo kutsi umehluleli besekabulewe, nekutsi babulali bese batsetfwe baphonswa ejele.
9.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa bantfu babutsana ndzawonye kutsi batokhala baphindze bazile, emngcwabeni wemehluleli lomkhulu kakhulu lobekabulewe.
9.11: Futsi ngalesi sizatfu nalabo behluleli labebasensimini yaNefi, sebawevile lamavi akhe, nabo ngalokunjalo babutsana ndzawonye emngcwabeni.
9.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babuta kubantfu batsi: Baphi labo labasihlanu labebatfunywe kuyova mayelana nemehluleli lomkhulu kutsi ngabe ufile na? Baphendvula batsi: Mayelana nalabo labasihlanu lenitsi nibatfumile, tsine asati; kodvwa kukhona labasihlanu labababulali, lesibaphonse ejele.
9.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi behluleli bafuna kutsi labo baletfwe; baletfwa; buka kwakungulabo labasihlanu labebatfunyiwe; futsi buka behluleli bababuta kute bati mayelana nalendzaba, baphindze babatjela konkhe loko labebakwentile, batsi:
9.14: Sigijime seta endzaweni yesihlalo sekwehlulela, futsi ngesikhatsi sesibona tonkhe tintfo tinjengoba Nefi abekadze afakazile, setfuka kangangekutsi sawela phansi; ngesikhatsi siphaphama ekwetfukeni kwetfu, bukani basiphonsa ejele.
9.15: Manje, ngekubulawa kwalendvodza, asati kutsi ngubani lokwentile loku; futsi nguloku kuphela lesikwatiko, sigijime seta lapha njengekufisa kwenu, futsi bukani besekafile, njengekwemavi aNefi.
9.16: Manje kwenteka kutsi behluleli bayichaza indzaba kubantfu, futsi bakhala kakhulu ngalokumelene naNefi, batsi: Bukani, siyati kutsi Nefi kufanele kutsi uvumelane nemuntfu kutsi abulale umehluleli, futsi emvakwaloko kute akumemetele kitsi, kute asente siphendvukele elukholweni lwakhe, kute atiphakamise kutsi abe ngumuntfu lomkhulu, lokhetfwe nguNkulunkulu, kanye nemphrofethi.
9.17: Manje bukani, sitawuyitfola lendvodza, futsi itolivuma licala layo isitjele ngembulali wangempela wemehluleli.
9.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo labasihlanu bakhululwa ngelusuku lwemngcwabo. Noko, babekhuta behluleli ngemavi labebawakhulumile ngalokumelene naNefi, baphikisana nabo ngamunye nangamunye, kangangekutsi babehlula.
9.19: Nanoma kunjalo, benta kutsi Nefi atsatfwe aboshwe aletfwe phambi kwesicuku, bacala kumbuta ngetindlela letehlukene kute bamdide, kute bambeke licala khona atawubulawa—
9.20: Batsi kuye: Wente luzungu nemuntfu; ngubani lendvodza lebulele na? Manje sitjele, ulivume licala lakho; batsi, Buka nayi imali; ngetulu kwaloko sitawukuvumela uphile uma ungasitjela, futsi usivume leso sivumelwano losente naloyo.
9.21: Kodvwa Nefi watsi kubo: Awu tiwula, nine leningakasoki ngekwenhlitiyo, nine timphumphutse, futsi nine bantfu lababonhlokolukhuni, ngabe niyati yini kutsi kuyote kube kunini iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu inivumela kutsi nichubeke nalendlela yenu yekona na?
9.22: Awu kumele nicale nihhewule futsi nikhale, ngenca yekubhujiswa lokukhulu lokunihlalele kulesi sikhatsi, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke.
9.23: Bukani nitsi ngivumelene nemuntfu kutsi abulale Sezoramu, umehluleli wetfu lomkhulu. Kodvwa bukani, ngitsi kini, loku kungenca yekutsi ngifakaze kini kute nati mayelana nalentfo; yebo, kutsi kube njengebufakazi kini, kutsi ngiyati ngenkhohlakalo kanye nangetinengiso letisemkhatsini wenu.
9.24: Futsi ngenca yekutsi ngente loku, senitsi ngivumelene nemuntfu kutsi ente lentfo; yebo, ngenca yekutsi nginikhombise lesibonakaliso seningitfukutselele, futsi senifuna kungibulala.
9.25: Manje bukani, ngitawunikhombisa lesinye sibonakaliso, bese niyabona kutsi nitawufuna kungibulala yini.
9.26: Bukani ngitsi kini: Hambani niye endlini yaSiyantham, longumnakaboSezoram, nifike nitsi kuye—
9.27: Ngabe Nefi, lotenta umphrofethi, lona lophrofetha ngebubi lobungaka mayelana nalabantfu, uvumelene yini nawe, kutsi umbulale Sezoramu, longumnakenu na?
9.29: Futsi niyawutsi kuye: Umbulele yini umnakenu na?
9.30: Futsi uyawukuma anekwesaba, angati kutsi atsini. Bukani, uyawuphika kini; futsi uyawukwenta shengatsi wetfukile; noko, uyawutsi kini akanacala.
9.31: Kodvwa bukani, niyawumhlola, futsi niyawutfola ingati etimbatfweni takhe.
9.32: Senikubonile loku, niyawutsi: Iphumaphi lengati na? Ucabanga kutsi asati kutsi yingati yemnakenu lena na?
9.33: Emvakwaloko uyawutfutfumela, abukeke aphaphatsekile, shengatsi kufa sekufike kuye.
9.34: Emvakwaloko niyawutsi: Ngenca yaloku kwesaba kanye nalokuphaphatseka lokusebusweni bakho, buka, siyati kutsi unelicala.
9.35: Emvakwaloko kwesaba lokukhulu kuyawumfikela; emvakwaloko uyawuvuma kini, futsi angabe asaphika kutsi nguye lobulele.
9.36: Emvakwaloko uyawusho kini, kutsi mine, Nefi, angati lutfo mayelana naloludzaba ngaphandle kwekutsi luniketwe kimi ngemandla aNkulunkulu. Futsi emvakwaloko niyawukwati kutsi ngingumuntfu lotsembekile, nekutsi ngitfunyelwe kini nguNkulunkulu.
9.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba bayawukwenta, njengoba Nefi abatjelile. Futsi bukani, emavi labekawakhulumile bekaliciniso; ngoba njengekwalawo mavi waphika; ngetulu kwaloko njengekwalawo mavi wavuma.
9.38: Waletfwa kutsi atawutivumela kutsi nguye lucobo lwakhe lobekangumbulali, kangangekutsi labo labasihlanu bakhululwa, kanjalo naNefi.
9.39: Kwaba khona labatsite labangemaNefi labakholelwa emavini aNefi; futsi bekukhona labanye, labakholwa ngenca yebufakazi balabo labasihlanu, ngoba baphendvuka ngesikhatsi basejele.
9.40: Manje kwaba khona labanye emkhatsini webantfu, labatsi Nefi bekangumphrofethi.
9.41: Futsi kwaba khona labanye labatsi: Bukani, ungunkulunkulu, ngoba ngaphandle kwekutsi angunkulunkulu bekangeke atati tonkhe letintfo. Ngoba bukani, usitjele imicabango yetinhlitiyo tetfu, ngetulu kwaloko wasitjela tintfo; futsi sewusatise umbulali wangempela wemehluleli wetfu lomkhulu.

10.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba khona kuchekeka emkhatsini webantfu, kangangekutsi behlukana ekhatsi baya ngala nangale bahamba tindlela tabo, bashiya Nefi yedvwa, ngesikhatsi emile emkhatsini wabo.
10.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi naye wahamba ngeyakhe indlela wacondza ngasendlini yakhe, azindla ngaletintfo iNkhosi lebeyimkhombise tona.
10.3: Futsi kwenteka ngesikhatsi asazindla—akhatsatekile kakhulu ngenca yenkhohlakalo yebantfu bemaNefi, imisebenti yabo lefihlakele yebumnyama, nekubulala kwabo, nekuphanga kwabo, kanye nangato tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi—kwenteka ngesikhatsi asazindla enhlitiyweni yakhe, buka, kweta livi kuye litsi:
10.4: Ubusisiwe, Nefi, ngaletintfo lotentile; ngoba ngibonile kutsi ulimemetele kanjani livi lengikunike lona, ngekungakhatsali, kulabantfu. Futsi awubesabanga, awufunanga nekulondvolota imphilo yakho, kodvwa ufune kwenta intsandvo yami, kanye nekugcina imiyaleto yami.
10.5: Manje, ngoba wente loku ngekungakhatsali lokungaka, buka, ngitawukubusisa ingunaphakadze; futsi ngitawukwenta ube nemandla ngemavi kanye nangekwenta, ngelukholo kanye nangekwemisebenti; yebo, nekutsi tonkhe tintfo uyawukwentelwa tona ngekwelivi lakho, ngoba angeke ucele loko lokuphambene nentsandvo yami.
10.6: Buka, wena unguNefi, mine nginguNkulunkulu. Buka, ngikumemetela loku kuwe phambi kwetingilosi tami, kutsi uyawuba nemandla etikwalabantfu, futsi uyawushaya umhlaba ngendlala, nangamashayabhuce wesifo kanye nangekuwubhubhisa, nekuhambisana nenkhohlakalo yalabantfu.
10.7: Buka, ngikunika emandla, kutsi noma ngabe yini loyawuyibopha emhlabeni iyawuboshwa nasezulwini; futsi noma ngabe yini loyawuyikhulula emhlabeni iyawukhululwa nasezulwini; ngenca yaloku uyawuba nemandla emkhatsini walabantfu.
10.8: Futsi ngenca yaloku, uma uyawutsi kulelithempeli alichekeke ekhatsi, kuyawukwenteka.
10.9: Futsi uma uyawutsi kulentsaba, Dzilikela phansi ulingane, kuyawukwenteka.
10.10: Futsi bukani, uma uyawutsi Nkulunkulu akabashaye labantfu, kuyawukwenteka.
10.11: Manje buka, ngiyakuyaleta, kutsi uyawuhamba umemetele kulabantfu, kutsi naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu, longuSomandla: Ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke niyawushaywa, ngisho nangembubhiso.
10.12: Futsi bukani, manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi iNkhosi seyiwakhulumile lamavi kuNefi, wema futsi akatange asaya endlini yakhe, kodvwa wabuyela kuto leto ticuku lebetisakateke yonkhe indzawo ebusweni belive, futsi wacala kumemetela kuto livi leNkhosi lebelikhulunywe kuye, mayelana nekubhujiswa kwabo uma bebangeke baphendvuke.
10.13: Manje buka, nangetulu kwaleso simangaliso lesikhulu Nefi labekasentile sekubatjela mayelana nekufa kwemehluleli lomkhulu, batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo futsi bangawalaleli emavi eNkhosi.
10.14: Ngako-ke Nefi walimemetela kubo livi leNkhosi, watsi: Ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, niyawushaywa ngisho nangembubhiso.
10.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Nefi sekalimemetele kubo livi, buka, bachubeka nekutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo bangafuni nekuwalalela emavi akhe; ngako-ke bametfuka, bafuna kumbamba kute bamphonse ejele.
10.16: Kodvwa buka, emandla aNkulunkulu bekanaye, futsi abakwatanga kumtsatsa bamphonse ejele, ngoba watsatfwa nguMoya wemukiswa waya khashane waphuma emkhatsini wabo.
10.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaleyondlela wahamba akuMoya, asuka esicukwini aya kulesinye sicuku, amemetela livi laNkulukulu, wate walimemetela kubo bonkhe, noma walitfumela kubo bonkhe bantfu.
10.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abafunanga kuwalalela emavi akhe; kwacala kwaba khona imibango, kangangekutsi behlukana ngekuphikisana baphindze bacala nekubulalana lomunye nalomunye ngenkemba.
10.19: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.

11.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nakubili wekubusa kwebehluleli imibango yakhula, kangangekutsi kwaba khona timphi kulo lonkhe live emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNefi.
11.2: Futsi bekungulelicembu leliyimfihlo letigebengu lelachubeka nalomsebenti wembubhiso kanye nenkhohlakalo. Lemphi yachubeka wonkhe lowo mnyaka; yaphindze yachubeka nangemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nakutsatfu.
11.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalomnyaka Nefi wakhala eNkhosini, watsi:
11.4: Awu Nkhosi, ungavumi kutsi labantfu babulawe ngenkemba; kodvwa Awu Nkhosi, esikhundleni saloku yenta kube khona indlala eveni, kute ibaphehlele ekukhumbuleni iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, mhlawumbe batawuphendvuka baphindze babuyele kuwe.
11.5: Futsi loko kwenteka, njengekwemavi aNefi. Kwaba khona indlala lenkhulu eveni, emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNefi. Futsi ngenca yaloko ngemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nakune indlala yachubeka, umsebenti wekubulala ngenkemba waphela kodvwa kwaba kubi kakhulu ngendlala.
11.6: Futsi lomsebenti wekubulala waphindze wachubeka nangemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nesihlanu. Ngoba umhlaba washaywa kangangoba woma, wangakhiphi lokuyinhlavu ngesikhatsi saloko lokuyinhlavu; futsi umhlaba wonkhe washaywa, ngisho nasemkhatsini wemaLamani kanjalo nasemkhatsini wemaNefi, kangangekutsi bashaywa kangangekutsi bafa ngetinkhulungwane kuleto tincenye telive lebetinebubi lobukhulu.
11.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu babona kutsi bese batawufa ngenca yendlala, bacala kukhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo; baphindze bacala bawakhumbula emavi aNefi.
11.8: Futsi bantfu bacala kuncenga behluleli babo labakhulu kanye nebaholi babo, kutsi batsi kuNefi: Buka, siyati kutsi wena ungumuntfu waNkulunkulu, ngako-ke khala eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wetfu kutsi ayisuse kitsi lendlala, hleze onkhe emavi lowawakhuluma mayelana nekubhujiswa kwetfu afezeke.
11.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi behluleli basho kuNefi, njengekwemavi labebanesifiso sawo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Nefi abona kutsi bantfu bese baphendvukile baphindze batitfoba ngetingubo temasaka, waphindze wakhala eNkhosini watsi:
11.10: Awu Nkhosi, buka labantfu baphendvukile; futsi sebalisusile licembu laGadiyanthoni emkhatsini wabo kangangekutsi selite laphela nya, futsi sebawafihlile emasu alo layimfihlo phansi.
11.11: Manje, Awu Nkhosi, ngenca yaloku kutfobeka kwabo ngicela ususe intfukutselo yakho, bese wenta intfukutselo yakho yeneliswe ngekubhujiswa kwalabo bantfu lababi losewuvele ubabulele.
11.12: Awu Nkhosi, ngicela kutsi ususe intfukutselo yakho, yebo, intfukutselo yakho lenkhulu kakhulu, futsi wente kutsi lendlala iphele kulelive.
11.13: Awu Nkhosi, ngicela kutsi ungive, futsi wente kutsi kwenteke njengekwemavi ami, utfumele imvula emhlabeni wonkhe, kute ukhiphe titselo tawo, kanye nalokuyinhlavu kwawo ngesikhatsi salokuyinhlavu.
11.14: Awu Nkhosi, waweva emavi ami ngesikhatsi ngitsi, Akube khona indlala, kute mashayabhuce wenkemba aphele; futsi ngiyati kutsi, ngisho nangalesi sikhatsi, utaweva emavi ami, ngoba watsi: Uma labantfu baphendvuka ngitawubaphephisa.
11.15: Yebo, Awu Nkhosi, futsi uyabona kutsi sebaphendvukile, ngenca yendlala namashayabhuce wesifo kanye nembubhiso lokute kubo.
11.16: Manje, Awu Nkhosi, ungayisusa yini intfukutselo yakho, ubalinge futsi kutsi batawukusebentela na? Uma kunjalo, Awu Nkhosi, ungababusisa ngekwemavi akho lowashito.
11.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nesitfupha iNkhosi yayisusa intfukutselo yayo kubantfu, yenta kutsi imvula ine emhlabeni, kangangekutsi watikhipha titselo tawo ngesikhatsi setitselo tawo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakukhipha lokuyinhlavu kwawo ngesikhatsi salokuyinhlavu kwawo.
11.18: Futsi buka, bantfu batfokota baphindze bamdvumisa Nkulunkulu, live lonkhe lagcwala injabulo; abatange basafuna nanini kumbulala Nefi, kodvwa bamtsatsa njengemphrofethi lomkhulu, kanye nemuntfu waNkulunkulu, lonemandla lamakhulu kanye neligunya laliniketiwe lelivela kuNkulunkulu.
11.19: Futsi bukani, Lehi, umnakabo, bekangekho ngisho nakancane emvakwakhe ngekwetintfo letiphatselene nekulunga.
11.20: Futsi ngaleyondlela kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNefi bacala baphindze baphumelela eveni, bacala kwakha tindzawo tabo lebese titindzala, bacala kutalana bandza, bate bagcwala live lonkhe, ngasenyakatfo kanye nangaseningizimu, kusukela elwandle lolusenshonalanga kuya elwandle lolusemphumalanga.
11.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nesitfupha waphela ngekuthula. Umnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nesikhombisa wacala ngekuthula; nelibandla landza lagcwala live lonkhe; nencenye lenkhulu yebantfu, emaNefi kanye nemaLamani, baba belibandla; futsi baba nekuthula lokukhulu kakhulu eveni; waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nesikhombisa.
11.22: Futsi baphindza baba nekuthula ngemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nesiphohlongo, ngaphandle kwemibango lemincane mayelana nemaphuzu etimfundziso lebetibekwe baphrofethi.
11.23: Futsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nemfica kwacala kwaba khona kungevani lokukhulu. Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi Nefi naLehi, kanye nalabaningi babomnakabo labebati mayelana nemaphuzu laliciniso etimfundziso, batfola netembulo letiningi etinsukwini tonkhe, ngako-ke bashumayela kubantfu, kangangekutsi bakucedza kungevani kwabo kuwo lowo mnyaka.
11.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi, kwabakhona lidlanzana lelitsite lemahlubuka lebelisuka kubantfu baNefi, lokwase kuneminyaka ngaphambilini lahamba laya kumaLamani, futsi latibita ngemaLamani, kanjalo nelidlanzana lelitsite lebelilesitukulwane sangempela semaLamani, liphehlelwe entfukutselweni ngiwo, noma ngulawo mahlubuka, ngako-ke lasusa imphi nabomnakabo.
11.25: Futsi bebabulala baphindze baphanga; emvakwaloko bebabuyela emuva etintsabeni, futsi baya ehlane kanye nasetindzaweni letifihlakele, babhaca kute bangatfolakali, batfola kwengetwa esibalweni sabo emalanga onkhe, kangangoba bekuba khona emahlubuka lahamba aya kubo.
11.26: Futsi ngenca yaloku ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi, yebo, ngisho ngesikhatsi lesingasiyo iminyaka lemingakhi, bese balicembu lelikhulu kakhulu letigebengu; bawacwaninga onkhe lamasu layimfihlo aGadiyanthoni; futsi ngaleyondlela baba tigebengu taGadiyanthoni.
11.27: Manje buka, letigebengu tenta incushuncushu lenkhulu, yebo, ngisho nekubhujiswa lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu baNefi, kanjalo nasemkhatsini webantfu bemaLamani.
11.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwadzingeka kutsi ucedvwe lomsebenti wekubhujiswa; ngako-ke batfumela libutfo lemadvodza lanemandla ehlane kanye nasetintsabeni kuyawufuna lelicembu letigebengu, kutsi libulawe.
11.29: Kodvwa buka, kwenteka kutsi ngawo kanye lowo mnyaka bachutjwa babuyiselwa emuva emaveni abo. Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
11.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nakunye bahamba bayawukulwa nalelicembu letigebengu, babulala letiningi; kanjalo nabo bavakashelwa ngekubhujiswa lokukhulu.
11.31: Futsi baphoceleleka kutsi baphume futsi ehlane nasetintsabeni babuyele emaveni abo, ngenca yesibalo lesikhulu kakhulu saleto tigebengu lebesetigcwele etintsabeni kanye nasehlane.
11.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi waphela kanjalo-ke lomnyaka. Netigebengu tachubeka nekwandza takhula tacina, kangangekutsi tawedzelela emabutfo emaNefi, kanjalo newemaLamani; tadala kwesaba lokukhulu kubantfu eveni lonkhe.
11.33: Yebo, ngoba tavakashela tincenye letiningi telive, tenta imbubhiso lenkhulu kakhulu kubantfu; yebo tabulala labaningi, tatfwala labanye tayobatfumbela ehlane ikakhulukati bafati kanye nebantfwana babo.
11.34: Manje lobubi lobungaka, lobeta ebantfwini ngenca yebubi babo, kwabaphehlela futsi ekukhumbuleni iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
11.35: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nakunye wekubusa kwebehluleli.
11.36: Futsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nakubili bacala futsi bayikhohlwa iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo. Ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nakutsatfu bacala bakhula bacina ebubini. Ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nakune abatange batilungise tindlela tabo.
11.37: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nesihlanu bakhula baya ngekucina ekutikhukhumeteni kwabo, nasebubini babo; futsi ngaleyondlela babese balungela kubhujiswa futsi.
11.38: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nesihlanu.

12.1: Futsi ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi abanamaciniso kangakanani, ngalokunjalo nekungatinti kwetinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu; yebo, siyabona kutsi iNkhosi ngebuhle bayo lobukhulu lobungapheli iyababusisa iphindze ibaphumelelise labo lababeka litsemba labo kuyo.
12.2: Yebo, futsi singabona ngaso kanye leso sikhatsi uma seyiphumelelisa bantfu bayo, yebo, ngekwandza kwemasimu abo, imihlambi yabo yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yabo yetinkhomo, neligolide, nesiliva, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letiligugu letitinhlobonhlobo kanye nebuciko; isindzisa timphilo tabo, ibakhulula ibakhipha etandleni tetitsa tabo; itsambisa tinhlitiyo tetitsa tabo kute tingamemeteli timphi ngalokumelene nabo; yebo, kwephetsa, yenta tintfo yentele inhlalakahle kanye nenjabulo yebantfu bayo; yebo, ngaleso sikhatsi kuba sikhatsi lapho batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, bakhohlwe yiNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, futsi banyatsele ngaphansi kwetinyawo tabo loNgcwele—yebo, futsi loku kungenca yekukhululeka kwabo, kanye nekuphumelela kwabo lokukhulu kakhulu.
12.3: Ngaleyondlela siyabona kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi iNkhosi ibajezise bantfu bayo ngetinhlupheko letiningi, yebo, ngaphandle kwekutsi ibavakashele ngekufa nekwesaba, nangendlala kanye nangayo yonkhe inhlobo yamashayabhuce wesifo, angeke bayikhumbule.
12.4: Awu kubuwula kangakanani, kulite kangakanani, kububi kangakanani, kubudeveli kangakanani, futsi bashesha kangakanani kwenta bubi, baphute kangakanani kwenta lokuhle, bantfwana bebantfu; yebo, bashesha kangakanani kulalela emavi alomubi, babeke litsemba labo etintfweni letilite temhlaba.
12.5: Yebo, bashesha kangakanani kutsi batichenye; yebo, bashesha kangakanani kutikhukhumeta, bente lonkhe luhlobo lwalokubi; futsi baphuta kangakanani kuyikhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, nekutsi balalele imiyalo yayo, yebo, baphuta kangakanani kuhamba etindleleni tekuhlakanipha.
12.6: Buka, abafuni kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, lebadalile, ibaphatse futsi ibuse etikwabo; nanoma kungebuhle bayo lobukhulu kanye nemusa wayo kubo, bayayidzelela imiyalo yayo, futsi abafuni kutsi ibe ngumcondzisi wabo
12.7: Awu kukhulu kanganani kungabi lutfo kwebantfwana bebantfu; yebo, balite ngisho kunelutfuli lwemhlaba.
12.8: Ngoba buka, lutfuli lwemhlaba luya lena nalena, luhlukana ekhatsi nekhatsi, ngekuyaletwa nguNkulunkulu wetfu lomkhulu futsi longunaphakadze
12.9: Yebo, buka ngelivi lakhe emagcuma kanye netintsaba kuyatfutfumela futsi kutamatame.
12.10: Nangemandla elivi lakhe kuyachekeka, kulingane, yebo, njengelitsafa.
12.11: Yebo, ngemandla elivi lakhe umhlaba wonkhe uyatfutfumela;
12.12: Yebo, ngemandla elivi lakhe, tisekelo tiyatamatama, ngisho nasemkhatsini imbala.
12.14: Yebo, uma atsi kuwo umhlaba—Buyela emuva, kute welule lusuku ngemahora lamaningi—kuyenteka;
12.15: Futsi ngenca yaloku, ngekwelivi lakhe umhlaba ubuyela emuva, kubukeke kumuntfu kwangatsi lilanga limile alinyakati; yebo, futsi buka, kunjalo; ngoba ngempela ngumhlaba logucukako hhayi lilanga.
12.16: Buka, futsi, uma atsi kulamanti elwandle lolukhulu—Yoma—kuyenteka.
12.17: Buka, uma atsi kulentsaba—Phakama, ute utawukuwa etikwalelidolobha, kute limbonyeke,—buka kuyenteka.
12.18: Futsi buka, uma umuntfu afihla umcebo ngaphansi kwemhlaba, uma iNkhosi iyawutsi—Awucalekiswe, ngenca yebubi baloyo lowufihlile—buka, uyawucalekiswa.
12.19: Futsi uma iNkhosi iyawutsi—Awucalekiswe, kute kubebete umuntfu loyawutfola kusukela nyalo kute kube phakadze—buka, kute umuntfu lowutfolako kusukela nyalo kute kube phakadze.
12.20: Futsi buka, uma iNkhosi iyawutsi kumuntfu—Ngenca yebubi bakho, uyawucalekiswa ingunaphakadze—kuyawenteka.
12.21: Futsi uma iNkhosi iyawutsi—Ngenca yebubi bakho utawususwa phambi kwami—iyawukwenta kutsi kube njalo.
12.22: Futsi maye kuloyo leyawusho kuye loku, ngoba kuyawuba njalo kuloyo loyawukwenta bubi, futsi akanawusindziswa; ngako-ke, ngalesi sizatfu, kute bantfu basindziswe, kuphendvuka kumenyetelwe.
12.23: Ngako-ke, babusisiwe labo labatawuphendvuka baphindze balilalele livi leNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo; ngoba ngibo labo labayawusindziswa.
12.24: Futsi kwangatsi Nkulunkulu angavuma, ngebungcwele bakhe lobungapheli, kutsi bantfu baholelwe ekuphendvukeni kanye nasemisebentini lemihle, kute kubuyiselwe kubo umusa ngemusa, ngekwemisebenti yabo.
12.25: Futsi ngifisa kutsi bonkhe bantfu basindziswe. Kodvwa siyafundza kutsi ngelusuku lolukhulu nelwekugcina kuyawuba khona labayawuphonswa ngephandle, yebo, labayawukhishelwa ngephandle ebukhoneni beNkhosi;
12.26: Yebo, labayawuyiswa esimeni selusizi lolungapheli, bagcwalise emavi latsi: Labo labente lokuhle bayawuba nekuphila lokuphakadze; bese labo labente lokubi bayawulahlwa ingunaphakadze. Futsi kunjalo. Amen.

13.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nesitfupha, emaNefi abesolo ahleli ebubini, yebo, ebubini lobukhulu, emaLamani ngakulolunye luhlangotsi wona abetama kugcina imiyaleto yaNkulunkulu ngekucophelela, ngekwemtsetfo waMosi.
13.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawo lowo mnyaka bekukhona Samuweli lotsite, umLamani, loweta eveni laseZarahemla, wacala kushumayela kubantfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi washumayela, tinsuku letiningi, kuphendvuka kubantfu, kodvwa bamcosha bamkhiphela ngephandle, futsi besekatobuyela eveni lakhe.
13.3: Kodvwa buka, livi leNkhosi leta kuye, kutsi kumele aphindze abuyele, ayawuphrofetha kubantfu noma ngutiphi tintfo letatitawufika enhlitiyweni yakhe.
13.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abatange bamvumele kutsi angene edolobheni; ngako-ke wahamba wayawugibela eludvongeni lwalo, welula sandla sakhe futsi wamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, waphindze waphrofetha kubantfu letintfo iNkhosi leyatifaka enhlitiyweni yakhe.
13.5: Watsi kubo: Bukani, mine, Samuweli, umLamani, ngikhuluma emavi iNkhosi lewafake enhlitiyweni yami; futsi bukani ikufakile enhlitiyweni yami kutsi ngisho kulabantfu kutsi inkemba yekulunga ilengela etikwalabantfu; futsi iminyaka lengemakhulu lamane angeke yendlule ngaphandle kwekutsi inkemba yekulunga iwele etikwalabantfu.
13.6: Yebo, kubhujiswa lokumatima kubalindzile labantfu, nakanjani kuyeta kulabantfu, futsi kute lokungabasindzisa ngaphandle kwekuphendvuka kanye nelukholo eNkhosini Jesu Khristu, lotawuta nakanjani emhlabeni, aphindze eve buhlungu betintfo letiningi futsi afele bantfu bakhe.
13.7: Futsi bukani, ingilosi yeNkhosi ikumemetele loku kimi, futsi iletse tindzaba letimnandzi emphefumulweni wami. Bukani, ngitfunyelwe kini kutsi ngitawumemetela nakini futsi, kute nani nibe netindzaba letimnandzi; kodvwa bukani anivumanga kungemukela.
13.8: Ngako-ke, itsi iNkhosi: Ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tebantfu bemaNefi, ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ngitawususa livi lami kubo, ngiphindze ngihocise Moya wami kubo, futsi angeke ngisababeketelela nanini, ngitawugucula tinhlitiyo tabomnakabo ngalokumelene nabo.
13.9: Futsi iminyaka lengemakhulu lamane angeke yendlule ngaphambi kwekutsi ngente kutsi bashaywe; yebo, ngitawubavakashela ngenkemba nangendlala kanye nangamashayabhuce wesifo.
13.10: Yebo, ngitawubavakashela ngelulaka lwami lolwesabekako, futsi kuyawuba khona labo besitukulwane sesine labayawuphila, betitsa tenu, kutsi babone kubhujiswa nya kwenu; futsi loku kuyawukwenteka ngempela ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke, kusho iNkhosi; nalabo besitukulwane sesine bayawuletsa kubhujiswa kwenu.
13.11: Kodvwa uma nitawuphendvuka niphindze nibuyele eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wenu ngitawulususa lulaka lwami, kusho iNkhosi; yebo, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi, babusisiwe labo labatawuphendvuka baphindze babuyele kimi, kodvwa maye kuloyo longaphendvuki.
13.12: Yebo, maye kulelidolobha lelikhulu laseZarahemla; ngoba bukani, kungenca yalabo labalungile kutsi lisindziswe; yebo, maye kulelidolobha lelikhulu, ngoba ngiyacondza, kusho iNkhosi, kutsi baningi, yebo, etincenyeni letiningi talelidolobha lelikhulu, labatawutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene nami, kusho iNkhosi.
13.13: Kodvwa babusisiwe labo labatawuphendvuka, ngoba ngitawubaphephisa. Kodvwa bukani, kube bekungasiko ngenca yalabalungile labakulelidolobha lelikhulu, bukani, bengiyawukwenta kutsi umlilo wehle uphume ezulwini ulibhubhise
13.14: Kodvwa bukani, kungenca yalabalungile kutsi liphephiswe. Kodvwa bukani, sikhatsi siyeta, kusho iNkhosi, kutsi uma senicosha labalungile emkhatsini wenu, ngaleso sikhatsi niyawube senilungele kubhujiswa; yebo, maye kulelidolobha lelikhulu, ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso letikulo.
13.15: Yebo, futsi maye kulelidolobha laGideyoni, ngenca yebubi netinengiso letikulo.
13.16: Yebo, maye kuwo onkhe emadolobha laseveni lelitungeletile, lokungewemaNefi, ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso letikuwo
13.17: Futsi bukani, sicalekiso siyawuta etikwalelive, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, ngenca yebantfu labakulelive, yebo, ngenca yebubi babo kanye netinengiso tabo.
13.18: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, yebo, Nkulunkulu wetfu lomkhulu neweliciniso, kutsi loyo lofihla umcebo ngaphansi kwemhlaba angeke aphindze awutfole nanini, ngenca yesicalekiso lesikhulu salelive, ngaphandle nangabe ungumuntfu lolungile futsi ayawufihla eNkhosini.
13.19: Ngoba ngifuna, kusho iNkhosi, kutsi bafihle umcebo wabo kimi; futsi bacalekisiwe labo labangawufihli umcebo wabo kimi; ngoba kute namunye lofihla umcebo wakhe kimi ngaphandle kwalabalungile; futsi loyo longawufihli umcebo wakhe kimi, ucalekisiwe, kanjalo nalowo mcebo wakhe, futsi kute namunye loyawutfola ngenca yesicalekiso salelive.
13.20: Futsi lusuku luyeta lapho bayawufihla umcebo wabo, ngenca yekutsi babeke litsemba labo emcebeni; futsi ngenca yekutsi babeke litsemba labo emcebeni, batawufihla umcebo wabo uma babalekela titsa tabo; ngoba angeke bawufihle kimi, bacalekisiwe kanjalo nawo umcebo wabo; ngalolo suku bayawushaywa, kusho iNkhosi.
13.21: Bukani nine, bantfu balelidolobha lelikhulu, futsi nilalele emavi ami; yebo, lalelani emavi iNkhosi lewashoko; ngoba bukani, itsi nicalekisiwe ngenca yemcebo wenu, kanjalo nemcebo wenu ucalekisiwe ngenca yekutsi nibeka litsemba lenu kuwo, futsi anikawalaleli emavi aloyo lowaninika wona
13.22: Aniyikhumbuli iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu etintfweni lenibusise ngato, kodvwa ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi niyawukhumbula umcebo wenu, hhayi kubonga iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu ngawo; yebo tinhlitiyo tenu atihlali tiseNkhosini, kodvwa tigcwele kutichenya lokukhulu, ngekutikhukhumeta, nangekutatisa lokukhulu, umbango, umona, inzondo, kuhlukubeta, kubulala, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi.
13.23: Ngenca yalesizatfu iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yente kutsi sicalekiso sehlele kulelive, kanjalo nasetikwemcebo wenu, loku kungenca yebubi benu.
13.24: Yebo, maye kulabantfu, ngenca yalesi sikhatsi lesesifikile, kutsi nicoshe baphrofethi, nihlekise ngabo, nibagcobe ngematje, nibabulale, niphindze nente yonkhe inhlobo yebubi kubo, njengoba benta basendvulo.
13.25: Manje uma nikhuluma, nitsi: Kube tinsuku tetfu bekunguletinsuku tabobabe betfu basendvulo, besingeke sibabulale baphrofethi; besingeke sibagcobe ngematje, futsi sibacoshe.
13.26: Bukani nine nibabi kwendlula bona; ngoba njengoba iNkhosi iphila, uma umphrofethi efika emkhatsini wenu amemetela kini livi leNkhosi, lelifakaza ngetono tenu kanye nebubi benu, niyamtfukutselela, niphindze nimcoshe nifune tonkhe tinhlobo tetindlela tekumbulala; yebo, nitsi ungumphrofethi wemanga, nekutsi usoni, wadeveli, ngenca yekutsi ufakaza kutsi tento tenu timbi.
13.27: Kodvwa bukani, uma umuntfu angafika emkhatsini wenu atsi: Yentani loku naloku kute bubi; yentani lokwa nalokwa angeke nive buhlungu; yebo, utawutsi: Philani ngekutichenya lokusetinhlitiyweni tenu; yebo, philani ngekutichenya ngendlela lenibona ngayo, futsi yentani noma ngayini lefiswa yinhlitiyo yenu—uma umuntfu angafika emkhatsini wenu asho loku, nitawumemukela, nitsi ungumphrofethi.
13.28: Yebo, nitawumphakamisa, niphindze nimnike tintfo tenu; nitawumnika ligolide lenu kanye nesiliva yenu, nitawumembatsisa tingubo letibitako; futsi ngenca yekutsi ukhuluma emavi ekuyengana, latsi konkhe kulungile, ngaloko angeke nilitfole liphutsa kuye.
13.29: Awu nine situkulwane lesibi nalesiphambene; nine bantfu labalukhuni nalababonhlokolukhuni, nicabanga kutsi kuyawute kube nini iNkhosi inibeketelela? Yebo, kuyawute kube nini nivumela kuholwa baholi labatiwula nalabatimphumphutse? Yebo, kuyawute kube nini nikhetsa bumnyama esikhundleni sekukhanya na?
13.30: Yebo, bukani, intfukutselo yeNkhosi seyivele yokhelekile ngalokumelene nani; bukani, seyilicalekisile lelive ngenca yebubi benu.
13.31: Futsi bukani, sikhatsi siyeta lapho atawucalekisa umcebo wenu, kangangoba utawuphunyuka, ningakhoni kuwubamba; futsi ngetinsuku tekuhlupheka kwenu angeke nikhone kuwugcina.
13.32: Futsi ngetinsuku tekuhlupheka kwenu niyawukhala eNkhosini; nekukhala kwenu kuyawuba lite, ngoba kubhujiswa kwenu sekuvele kufikile etikwenu, futsi nekubhujiswa kwenu sekucinisekisiwe; ngaleso sikhatsi niyawukhala niphindze nihhewule ngalolo suku, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla. Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi niyawulila, nitsi:
13.33: Awu kube ngaphendvuka, ngangababulali baphrofethi, ngangabagcobi ngematje futsi ngangabacoshi. Yebo, ngalolo suku niyawutsi: Awu kube sayikhumbula iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wetfu ngelilanga isinika umcebo wetfu, ngabe awukaphunyuki ute usilahlekele; ngoba buka, umcebo wetfu awusekho kitsi.
13.34: Bukani, sibeka lithulusi lapha ngakusasa alisekho; futsi bukani, tinkemba tetfu titsetfwe kitsi ngelilanga lapho sitifunela imphi.
13.35: Yebo, sifihle umcebo wetfu futsi seyisiphunyukele ngenca yekucalekiswa kwalelive.
13.36: Awu kube saphendvuka ngelilanga livi leNkhosi lifika kitsi; ngoba buka lelive licalekisiwe, futsi tonkhe tintfo tiyaphunyuka, asikhoni kutibamba.
13.37: Bukani, situngeletwe ngemadimoni, yebo, situngeletwe tingilosi taloyo lofuna kubhubhisa imiphefumulo yetfu. Bukani, bubi betfu bukhulu. Awu Nkhosi, ngabe angeke yini uyisuse intfukutselo yakho kitsi na? Loku kuyawuba lulwimi lwenu ngaleto tinsuku.
13.38: Kodvwa bukani, tinsuku tenu tekuvivinywa setendlulile; niluhlehlisile lusuku lwekusindziswa kwenu kwate kwendlula sikhatsi ingunaphakadze, futsi kubhujiswa kwenu sekucinisekisiwe; yebo, ngoba tonkhe tinsuku tekuphila kwenu nifune loko leningeke nikutfole; futsi nifune injabulo ngekwenta lokubi, lokuyintfo lephikisana nendalo yaloko kulunga lokukuyo iNhloko yetfu lengetulu neyaPhakadze.
13.39: Awu nine bantfu balelive, ngifisa kwangatsi beningaweva emavi ami! Futsi ngiyathandaza kutsi intfukutselo yeNkhosi isuswe kini, nekutsi niphendvuke niphindze nisindziswe.

14.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi Samuweli, umLamani, waphrofetha tintfo letinkhulu naletingi kakhulu letingeke tibhalwe.
14.2: Buka, watsi kubo: Bukani, ngininika sibonakaliso; sekutsi eminyakeni lesihlanu letako, futsi bukani, iyawubese seyiyafika iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu kutawuhlenga bonkhe labo labayawukholwa egameni layo.
14.3: Bukani, ngitawuninika loku kutsi kube sibonakaliso ngesikhatsi sekufika kwayo; ngoba bukani, kuyawuba khona kukhanya lokukhulu ezulwini, kangangekutsi ebusuku ngaphambi kwekutsi ifike angeke bube khona bumnyama, kangangekutsi kubantfu kuyawuba shengatsi kusemini.
14.4: Ngako-ke, kuyawuba khona lusuku lunye nebusuku kanye nelusuku, kube shengatsi lusuku lunye futsi kute busuku; loku kuyawuba sibonakaliso kini; ngoba niyawukwati ngekuphuma kwelilanga futsi kanjalo nangekushona kwalo; ngako-ke bayawukwati ngekweliciniso kutsi kuyawuba netinsuku letimbili nebusuku; noko busuku ngeke bube mnyama; futsi lobo kuyawuba busuku ngaphambi kwekutsi atalwe.
14.5: Bukani, kuyawuba khona inkhanyeti lensha leyawuvela, yeluhlobo leningakate nilubone; futsi naloku kuyawuba sibonakaliso kini.
14.6: Bukani, loko akusiko konkhe, kuyawuba khona letiningi tibonakaliso kanye netimangaliso ezulwini.
14.7: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi nonkhe niyawumangala, niphindze nitibute, kangangekutsi niyawuwela phansi.
14.8: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi loyo loyawukholwa kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, yena kanye loyo uyawuba nekuphila lokuphakadze.
14.9: Bukani, naku lengiyalete ngako iNkhosi, ngengilosi yayo, kutsi kufanele ngite ngitawunitjela lentfo; yebo, iyalete kutsi ngitawutiphrofetha letintfo kini; yebo, itsite kimi: Khala kulabantfu utsi, phendvukani futsi nilungise indlela yeNkhosi.
14.10: Manje, ngenca yekutsi ngingumLamani, ngikhulume kini emavi iNkhosi lengiyalete ngawo, futsi ngenca yekutsi abe lukhuni ngalokumelene nani, niyangitfukutselela nifuna kungibulala, niphindze nangicosha emkhatsini wenu.
14.11: Futi nitawuweva emavi ami, ngoba, ngalenhloso ngite etikwaletindvonga talelidolobha, kute nive futsi nati ngetehlulelo taNkulunkulu letinilindzile ngenca yebubi benu, futsi nekutsi nati ngemibandzela yekuphendvuka;
14.12: Nekutsi nati ngekuta kwaJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, Babe welizulu kanye nemhlaba, uMdali wetintfo tonkhe kusukela ekucaleni; futsi nekutsi nati ngetibonakaliso tekuta kwakhe, ngenhloso yekutsi nikholwe egameni lakhe.
14.13: Uma nikholwa egameni lakhe nitawuphendvuka etonweni tenu tonkhe, kute ngaloko nibe nekutsetselelwa kwato ngetento takhe letinhle.
14.14: Bukani, lesinye sibonakaliso ngininika sona futsi, yebo, sibonakaliso sekufa kwakhe.
14.15: Ngoba bukani, kufanele ngempela afe kute kube khona kusindziswa; yebo, kufanele futsi kumele kutsi afe, kute kube khona kuvuka kwalabafile, kute ngaloko bantfu baletfwe ebukhoneni beNkhosi.
14.16: Yebo, bukani, lokufa kwenta kube khona kuvuka, futsi kuhlenga lonkhe luntfu ekufeni kwekucala—loko kufa kwakamoya; ngoba lonkhe luntfu, ngekuwa kwa-Adamu lususiwe ebukhoneni beNkhosi, lutsatfwa ngekutsi lufile, etintfweni tasemhlabeni kanye nasetintfweni takamoya.
14.17: Kodvwa bukani, kuvuka kwaKhristu kuhlenga luntfu, yebo, ngisho luntfu lonkhe, futsi kulubuyisela ebukhoneni beNkhosi.
14.18: Yebo, kuletsa umbandzela wekuphendvuka, wekutsi loyo lophendvukako yena kanye loyo ngeke ajutjwe aphonswe emlilweni; kodvwa loyo longaphendvuki uyajutjwa aphonswe emlilweni; bese kuta kubo futsi kufa kwakamoya, yebo, kufa kwesibili, ngoba bayasuswa futsi etintfweni letiphatselene nekulunga.
14.19: Ngako-ke phendvukani, phendvukani, hleze ngekwati letintfo kodvwa ningatenti niyawutivumela kutsi nibekwe licala, bese niletfwa kulokufa kwesibili.
14.20: Kodvwa bukani, njengoba ngishito kini mayelana nalesinye sibonakaliso, sibonakaliso sekufa kwayo, bukani, ngalolo suku layawukuva ngalo kufa lilanga liyawushona lale kuveta kukhanya kwalo kini; kanjalo nenyanga kanye netinkhanyeti; futsi angeke kube khona kukhanya eveni lonkhe, kusukela esikhatsini leso layawukuva ngaso kufa, sikhatsi lesitinsuku letintsatfu, kute kube sikhatsi layawuvuka ngaso futsi ekufeni.
14.21: Yebo, ngesikhatsi leso layawukhipha ngaso umoya kuyawuba khona kudvuma kanye nemibane sikhatsi lesingemahora lamaningi, futsi umhlaba uyawutamatama uphindze utfutfumale; nemadvwala lasetikwemhlaba wonkhe, lakhona ngetulu kanye nangephansi kwemhlaba, leniwati manje njengalacinile, noma incenye lenkhulu yawo leyintfo lecinile kakhulu, ayawuhlephuka;
14.22: Yebo, ayawuchekeka kabili, emvakwaloko ayawutfolakala achekekile futsi anetimfa, netincetu letichekekile emhlabeni wonkhe, yebo, ngetulu kanye nangephansi kwemhlaba.
14.23: Bukani, kuyawuba khona tiphepho letinkhulu, kuphindze kube khona tintsaba letiningi letiyawulaliswa phansi, tifane nematsafa, futsi kuyawuba khona tindzawo letiningi manje letibitwa ngematsafa letiyawuba tintsaba, budze bato lobukhulu kakhulu.
14.24: Nemigwaco lemikhulu leminingi iyawuchekeka, nemadolobha lamaningi ayawusala angenamuntfu.
14.25: Nemathuna lamaningi ayawuvuleka, akhiphe labaningi bawo labafa; bese labaningi labangcwele bayawuvela kulabaningi.
14.26: Bukani, naku lokukhulunywe yingilosi kimi; ngoba itsite kimi kuyawuba khona kudvuma kanye nemibane sikhatsi lesingemahora lamaningi.
14.27: Futsi itsite kimi ngesikhatsi kudvuma kanye nemibane kusachubeka, kanye nesiphepho, letintfo kufanele tibekhona, futsi nekutsi bumnyama buyombonya umhlaba wonkhe sikhatsi lesingangetinsuku letintsatfu.
14.28: Ingilosi itsite kimi labaningi bayawubona tintfo letinkhulu kakhulu kunaleti, ngenhloso yekutsi bakholwe kutsi letibonakaliso kanye naletimangaliso tiyawukwenteka kulo lonkhe live, ngenhloso yekutsi kungabikhona sizatfu sekungakholwa emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu—
14.29: Futsi loku kungenhloso yekutsi loyo loyawukholwa asindziswe, futsi nekutsi loyo longeke akholwe, sehlulelo lesilungile site kubo; futsi ngetulu kwaloko uma babekwa licala batiletsela bona kubekwa licala.
14.30: Manje khumbulani, khumbulani, bomnaketfu, kutsi loyo lolahlekako, utilahlekisa yena; futsi loyo lowenta bubi, ubenta kuye lucobo; ngoba bukani, nikhululekile; nivunyelwe kutsi nitentele; ngoba bukani, Nkulunkulu uninike lwati futsi wanenta kutsi nikhululeke.
14.31: Uninike kutsi nati lokuhle kulokubi, waphindze waninika kutsi nikhetse kuphila noma kufa; futsi ningenta lokuhle bese nibuyiselwa kuloko lokuhle, noma kutsi loko lokuhle kubuyiselwe kini; noma ningenta lokubi, futsi loko lokubi kubuyiselwe kini.

15.1: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, bukani, ngimemetela kini kutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke imiti yenu iyawusala ingenamuntfu.
15.2: Yebo, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke, besifazane benu bayawuba nesizatfu lesikhulu sekulila ngelusuku lapho bayawube bamunyisa khona; ngoba niyawetama kubaleka kodvwa kuyawube kute indzawo yekukhosela; yebo, futsi maye kulabo labayawube batetfwele, ngoba bayawube besindvwa bangakwati kubaleka; ngako-ke, bayawugcotjwagcotjwa phansi bashiywe kutsi bafe.
15.3: Yebo, maye kulabantfu lababitwa ngekutsi bantfu baNefi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke, uma babona tonkhe letibonakaliso netimangaliso labayawukhonjiswa tona; ngoba bukani, bebabantfu labakhetsiwe beNkhosi; yebo, bantfu baNefi beyibatsandza, ngetulu kwaloko ibajezisile; yebo, ngetinsuku tebubi babo ibajezisile ngenca yekutsi beyibatsandza.
15.4: Kodvwa bukani bomnaketfu, beyiwazonda emaLamani ngenca yekutsi tento tawo betitimbi njalo, futsi loku kungenca yebubi bemasiko aboyise. Kodvwa bukani, insindziso ite kuwo ngekushumayela kwemaNefi; ngalesi sizatfu iNkhosi itandzisile tinsuku tawo
15.5: Futsi ngifuna kutsi nibone kutsi incenye lenkhulu yawo iphila ngendlela yemiyalo yawo, futsi ahamba ngekucophelela phambi kwaNkulunkulu, ayetama kugcina imiyaleto yakhe nemitsetfo yakhe kanye netehlulelo takhe ngekwemtsetfo waMosi.
15.6: Yebo, ngitsi kini, incenye lenkhulu yawo yenta loku, futsi yetama ngekukhutsala lokungakhatsali kutsi iletse bomnakabo labasele ekwatini liciniso; ngako-ke baningi labangeta sibalo sawo nsuku tonkhe.
15.7: Bukani, niyatatela nine, ngoba nikubonile loku, kutsi ngebuningi balabo labaletfwa ekwatini liciniso, nekwati ngemasiko lamabi nalanengekile aboyise, futsi baholelwa kutsi bakholwe yimibhalo lengcwele, yebo, tiphrofetho tebaphrofethi labangcwele, letibhaliwe, letibaholela ekukholweni eNkhosini, nasekuphendvukeni, kukholwa loko nekuphendvuka lokuletsa kugucuka kwenhlitiyo yabo—
15.8: Ngako-ke, ngebuningi balabo labete kuloku, niyatatela kutsi bacinile futsi basimile elukholweni, nakuyo leyontfo labakhululwe ngayo.
15.9: Ngetulu kwaloko niyati kutsi batingcwabile tikhali tabo temphi, futsi bayesaba kutitsatsa hleze ngandlela tsite bone; yebo, niyabona kutsi bayesaba kona—ngoba bukani batawuvumela kutsi bagcotjwagcotjwe phansi baphindze babulawe titsa tabo, futsi angeke baphakamise tinkemba tabo ngalokumelene nabo, loku kungenca yelukholo lwabo kuKhristu.
15.10: Manje, ngenca yekusima kwabo uma sebakholwa kuleyontfo labakholwa kuyo, ngoba ngenca yekucina kwabo uma sebakhanyiselwe, bukani, iNkhosi iyawubabusisa iphindze yandzise tinsuku tabo, nanoma kungenca yebubi babo—
15.11: Yebo, noma bangancishelwa lukholo iNkhosi iyawubandzisela tinsuku tabo, kute kufike sikhatsi labakhulume ngaso bobabe betfu, kanjalo nemphrofethi Zenoshe, nalabanye baphrofethi labaningi, mayelana nekubuyiselwa kwabomnaketfu, emaLamani, ekwatini liciniso futsi—
15.12: Yebo, ngitsi kini, ngetikhatsi tekugcina tetsembiso teNkhosi telulelwe kubomnaketfu, emaLamani; futsi nanoma kungenca yetinhlupheko letiningi labayawuba nato, futsi nanoma bayawujikiswa bayiswe emuva nasembili emhlabeni wonkhe, batingelwe, bashaywe, basakatwe ngephandle, bete indzawo yekukhosela, iNkhosi iyawuba nemusa kubo.
15.13: Futsi loku kungekwesiphrofetho, kutsi bayawuphindze baletfwe ekwatini liciniso, lokulwati lweMhlengi wabo, kanye nemelusi wabo lomkhulu neweliciniso, babalwe netimvu takhe.
15.14: Ngako-ke ngitsi kini, kuyawuba ncono kubo kunani ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke.
15.15: Ngoba bukani, kube imisebenti lemikhulu bakhonjiswa yona lenikhonjiswe yona, yebo, kubo labo labancishelwa kukholwa ngenca yemasiko aboyise, niyatibonela kutsi bebangeke nanini baphindze bancishelwe lukholo.
15.16: Ngako-ke, iNkhosi itsi: Angeke ngibabhubhise baphele nya, kodvwa ngitawenta kutsi ngelusuku lwekuhlakanipha kwami babuyele kimi futsi, kusho iNkhosi.
15.17: Manje bukani, itsi iNkhosi, mayelana nebantfu bemaNefi: Uma bangeke baphendvuke, baphindze betame kwenta intsandvo yami, ngitawubabhubhisa baphele nya, kusho iNkhosi, ngenca yekungakholwa kwabo nanoma kungemisebenti leminingi lemikhulu lengiyentile emkhatsini wabo, futsi ngempela njengoba iNkhosi iphila letintfo tiyawuba njalo, kusho iNkhosi.

16.1: Manje, kwenteka kutsi baba baningi labaweva emavi aSamuweli, umLamani, lawakhuluma etikwetindvonga telidolobha. Ngebuningi balabo labakholelwa evini lakhe bahamba bayawufuna Nefi; futsi ngesikhatsi sebamtfolile bativuma kuye tono tabo bangatiphiki, banesifiso sekutsi babhajatiselwe eNkhosini.
16.2: Kodvwa ngebuningi balabo labangatange bakholelwe emavini aSamuweli bamtfukutselela; bamjikijela ngematje asetikweludvonga, ngetulu kwaloko labaningi bamdubula ngemicibisholo ngesikhatsi eme etikweludvonga; kodvwa Moya weNkhosi bewunaye, kangangekutsi abakwatanga kumshaya ngematje abo futsi kanjalo nangemicibisholo yabo.
16.3: Manje ngesikhatsi babona kutsi bebangakhoni kumshaya, kwaba khona labaningi kakhulu labakholelwa emavini akhe, kangangekutsi bahamba baya kuNefi kute babhajatiswe.
16.4: Ngoba bukani, Nefi bekabhabhatisa, aphrofetha, ashumayela, amemetela kuphendvuka ebantfwini, abakhombisa timphawu kanye netibonakaliso, futsi enta timangaliso emkhatsini webantfu, kute bati kutsi Khristu bese kufanele ete madvute—
16.5: Abatjela ngetintfo lebekufanele tenteke masinyane, kute bati futsi bakhumbule ngesikhatsi sekuta kwato kutsi tatembuliwe kubo ngaphambili, ngenhloso yekutsi bakholwe; ngako-ke ngebuningi balabo labakholwa emavini aSamuweli baya kuye kute babhajatiswe; ngoba beta baphendvuka futsi bativuma tono tabo.
16.6: Kodvwa liningi labo aliwakholwanga emavi aSamuweli; ngako-ke ngesikhatsi babona kutsi bebangakhoni kumshaya ngematje kanye nangemicibisholo yabo, bakhala etindvuneni tabo, batsi: Tsatsani lomuntfu nimbophe, ngoba bukani unadeveli; futsi ngenca yemandla adeveli lakuye asikhoni kumshaya ngematje etfu kanye nangemicibisholo yetfu; ngako-ke mtsatseni nimbophe, bese niyamsusa lapha.
16.7: Futsi ngesikhatsi sebahamba kute bayombamba, bukani, wagcumela phansi asuka etulu eludvongeni, wabaleka waphuma eveni labo, yebo, wate wefika eveni lakubo, futsi wacala kushumayela kanye nekuphrofetha emkhatsini webantfu bakubo.
16.8: Bukani, emaNefi akaphindzanga eva ngaye; futsi taba kanjalo-ke tindzaba tebantfu.
16.9: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nesitfupha wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
16.10: Waphela kanjalo-ke nemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nesikhombisa wekubusa kwebehluleli, incenye leningi yebantfu ihleli nekutatisa kanye nekwenta bubi, futsi incenye lencane ihamba ngekucaphela ngaphambi kwaNkulunkulu.
16.11: Futsi kwaphindze kwaba ngulesi simo, nangemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nesiphohlongo wekubusa kwebehluleli.
16.12: Kwabakhona lokuncane kugucuka etimeni tebantfu, ngaphandle kwekutsi bantfu bacala kucina kakhulu ekwenteni bubi, futsi benta lokuningi kakhulu kwaloko lokwakuphambene nemiyaleto yaNkulukulu, ngemnyaka wemashumi lasiphohlongo nemfica wekubusa kwebehluleli.
16.13: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi layimfica wekubusa kwebehluleli, kwaba khona tibonakaliso letinkhulu letanikwa bantfu, kanye netimangaliso; nemavi ebaphrofethi acala kugcwaliseka.
16.14: Futsi tingilosi tavela kubantfu, tati, futsi tamemetela kubo tindzaba letimnandzi tekutfokota lokukhulu; ngako-ke ngalomnyaka imibhalo lengcwele yacala kugcwaliseka.
16.15: Noko, bantfu bacala benta tinhlitiyo tabo taba lukhuni, bonkhe ngaphandle kwaleyo ncenye yabo lebeyikholwa kakhulu, yemaNefi futsi kanjalo neyemaLamani, bacala kutsembela emandleni abo kanye nasekuhlakanipheni kwabo, batsi:
16.16: Letinye tetintfo baticagele kahle, emkhatsini waletiningi kangaka; kodvwa buka, siyati kutsi yonkhe lemisebenti lemikhulu kanye nalemangalisako ngeke igcwaliseke, lokwakhulunywa ngayo.
16.17: Futsi bacala kucocisana kanye nekuphikisana, batsi:
16.18: Akunamcondvo kutsi umuntfu lonjengaKhristu uyawuta; uma kunjalo, futsi ayiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, Babe welizulu nemhlaba, njengoba bekukhulunyiwe, kuyangani angeke atibonakalise kitsi kanjalo nakulabo labayawube baseJerusalema na?
16.19: Yebo, kuyangani angeke atibonakalise kulelive kanjalo naseveni laseJerusalema na?
16.20: Kodvwa bukani, siyati kutsi leli lisiko lelibi, lelandluliselwa kitsi bobabe betfu, kusenta kutsi sikholwe entfweni letsite lenkhulu futsi nalemangalisako leyawukwenteka, kodvwa hhayi emkhatsini wetfu, kodvwa eveni lelikhashane kakhulu, live lesingalati; ngaloko-ke bangasigcina singenalwati, ngoba ngeke sikwati kutibonela ngemehlo etfu kutsi tiliciniso.
16.21: Futsi, ngebucili kanye nangebuciko lobungacondzakali balomubi, bente timfihlakalo letitsite letinkhulu lesingeke siticondze, letiyosigcina sisesimeni lesibi singaphansi kwemavi abo, futsi ngetulu kwaloko sibe ngaphansi kwabo, ngoba setsembele kubo kutsi basifundzise livi; futsi ngaleyondlela bayawusigcina site lwati uma sitinikela kubo, tinsuku tonkhe tekuphila kwetfu.
16.22: Futsi tiningi letinye tintfo bantfu labaticabanga etinhlitiyweni tabo, lebetibuwula futsi tilite; bebaphatamisekile kakhulu, ngoba Sathane wabaphehla kutsi bente bubi njalo; yebo, bekahamba azulazula andzisa emahemuhemu kanye nemibango eveni lonkhe, kute atente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tebantfu ngalokumelene naloko lobekukuhle kanye naloko lobekutawenteka.
16.23: Futsi nanoma kungenca yetimphawu kanye netibonakaliso lebetentiwa emkhatsini webantfu beNkhosi, kanye netimangaliso letiningi labebatenta, Sathane watfola kubambelela lokukhulu etinhlitiyweni tebantfu eveni lonkhe.
16.24: Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi layimfica wekubusa kwebehluleli kubantfu baNefi.
16.25: Futsi iphela kanjalo-ke incwadzi yaHilamani, ngekwembhalo waHilamani kanye nemadvodzana akhe.

1.intro: Lo Hilamani bekayindvodzana yaHilamani, lobekayindvodzana ya-Alima, lobekayindvodzana ya-Alima, lobekawesitukulwane saNefi lobekayindvodzana yaLehi, lowaphuma eJerusalema ngemnyaka wekucala wekubusa kwaSedekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda.
1.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi layimfica nakunye wasewendlulile futsi kwasekuyiminyaka lengemakhulu lasitfupha kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi ashiya eJerusalema; Kwakungumnyaka lapho Lakhoniyasi abengumehluleli lomkhulu kanye nembusi welive.
1.2: Futsi Nefi, indvodzana yaHilamani, besekesukile eveni laseZarahemla, anike indvodzana yakhe Nefi umyalo, lobekayindvodzana yakhe lendzala, mayelana nabongcwengcwe belitfusi, kanye nayo yonkhe imibhalo lebeyigciniwe, nato tonkhe leto tintfo letatigcinwe tingcwele kusukela ekusukeni kwaLehi eJerusalema.
1.3: Emvakwaloko wesuka eveni, kutsi waya kuphi, kute umuntfu lowatiko; futsi indvodzana yakhe Nefi yayigcina imibhalo esikhundleni sakhe, yebo, umbhalo walabantfu.
1.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi layimfica nakubili, buka, tiphrofetho tebaphrofethi tacala kugcwaliseka ngalokugcwele; ngoba kwacala kwaba khona tibonakaliso letinkhulu kanye netimangaliso letentekako emkhatsini webantfu.
1.5: Kodvwa bekukhona labanye labacala batsi sikhatsi sesendlulile sekutsi emavi agcwaliseke, labekakhulunywe nguSamuweli, umLamani.
1.6: Bacala kutfokota ngalokuphatselene nabomnakabo, batsi: Bukani sikhatsi sesendlulile, futsi nemavi aSamuweli akagcwaliseki; ngako-ke, kujabula kwenu kanye nelukholo lwenu mayelana nalentfo bekulite.
1.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi benta siphitsiphitsi lesikhulu kulo lonkhe live; nebantfu labebakholwa bacala baba nelusizi lolukhulu, hleze ngandlela tsite leto tintfo letatikhulunyiwe tingenteki.
1.8: Kodvwa buka, balugadzisisa lolo suku nalobo busuku kanye nalolo suku lolwaluyawuba njengelusuku lunye kube shengatsi kute busuku, kute bati kutsi lukholo lwabo belungakabi lite.
1.9: Manje kwenteka kutsi bekunelusuku lolwabekwa eceleni ngulabangakholwa, kutsi bonkhe labo labakholelwa kulawo masiko kumele babulawe ngaphandle kwekutsi lesibonakaliso senteke, lesasinikwe nguSamuweli umphrofethi.
1.10: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Nefi, indvodzana yaNefi, abubona lobubi bebantfu bakhe, inhlitiyo yakhe yaba nelusizi lolukhulu.
1.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wahamba waphumela ngaphandle waguca phansi, wakhala kakhulu kuNkulunkulu wakhe akhalela bantfu bakhe, yebo, labo labesebatawubulawa ngenca yelukholo lwabo emasikweni aboyise.
1.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakhala kakhulu eNkhosini lonkhe lolo suku; futsi buka, livi leNkhosi lefika kuye, latsi;
1.13: Phakamisa inhloko yakho ume sibindzi, ngoba buka, sikhatsi sesifikile, futsi kulobu busuku sibonakaliso sitawuniketwa, kusasa ngiyeta emhlabeni, kutawukhombisa umhlaba kutsi ngitakugcwalisa konkhe loko lengente kutsi kukhulunywe ngemlomo webaphrofethi bami labangcwele.
1.14: Buka, ngita kubami, kutawugcwalisa tonkhe tintfo lengitembule kubantfwana bebantfu kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba, nekutawukwenta intsandvo, yaBabe neyeNdvodzana—yaBabe ngenca yami, neyeNdvodzana ngenca yenyama yami. Futsi buka, sikhatsi sesifikile, futsi ngalobu busuku sibonakaliso sitawuniketwa.
1.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lawo mavi lefika kuNefi agcwaliseka, njengoba bekakhulunyiwe, ngoba buka, ngekushona kwelilanga abutange bube khona bumnyama; nebantfu bacala kumangala ngoba abutange bube khona bumnyama ngesikhatsi kufika busuku.
1.16: Futsi kwabakhona labaningi, labebangatange bawakholwe emavi ebaphrofethi, labawela phansi kwaba shengatsi bafile, ngoba bati kutsi lisu lelikhulu lembubhiso lebebalakhele labo labebakholelwa emavini ebaphrofethi laselivinjelwe; ngoba sibonakaliso lesasimenyetelwe sase sifikile.
1.17: Futsi bacala kwati kutsi iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu besekufanele ivele masinyane; yebo; kwephetsa, bonkhe bantfu emhlabeni wonkhe kusukela enshonalanga kuya emphumalanga, eveni lelisenyakatfo kanye naseveni leliseningizimu, bamangala kakhulu kangangekutsi bawela phansi.
1.18: Ngoba bebati kutsi baphrofethi bebafakazile ngaletintfo iminyaka leminingi, nekutsi lesibonakaliso lesasiniketiwe sasesifikile; bacala kwesaba ngenca yebubi babo kanye nekungakholwa kwabo.
1.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abutange bube khona bumnyama kubo bonkhe lobo busuku, kodvwa kwakukhanya shengatsi kusemini, Futsi kwenteka kutsi lilanga laphindze laphuma ekuseni, njengalokwetayelekile; futsi bati kutsi bekulusuku lolo iNkhosi lebeyitawutalwa ngalo, ngenca yalesibonakaliso lesasiniketiwe.
1.20: Futsi tasetentekile, yebo, tonkhe tintfo, ngako konkhe, njengekwemavi ebaphrofethi.
1.21: Futsi kwaphindze kwenteka kutsi inkhanyeti lensha yavela, njengekwelivi.
1.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili kwacala kwaba khona emanga labekakhulunywa emkhatsini webantfu, nguSathane, kute atente lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, ngemetamo yekutsi bangakholelwa kuleto tibonakaliso kanye netimangaliso labebatibonile; kodvwa nanoma kwakungalawamanga kanye nenkhohliso incenye lenkhulu yebantfu yakholwa, yaphindze yaphendvukela eNkhosini.
1.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi abehamba emkhatsini walabantfu, nalabanye labaningi, babhabhatisela ekuphendvukeni, lokwenta kutsi kube nekutsetselelwa kwetono. Ngalesi sizatfu bantfu bacala futsi baba nekuthula eveni.
1.24: Kwababete imibango, ngaphandle nje kwalabambalwa labacala kushumayela, betama kubonisa ngemibhalo lengcwele kutsi sasingekho sidzingo sekutsi bagcine umtsetfo waMosi. Manje kuloku bebaphambuka, ngoba bebangayicondzi imibhalo lengcwele.
1.25: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngekushesha baphendvuka, futsi banetiseka ngeliphutsa lebebakulo, ngoba batiswa kutsi lomtsetfo wawusengakagcwaliseki, nekutsi bekufanele ugcwaliseke ngako konkhe; yebo, livi lefika kubo kutsi kufanele ugcwaliseke; yebo, kutsi kwakungeke kwendlule ngisho liganyana linye noma lichashatana linye kute konkhe kugcwaliseke; ngako-ke ngawo kanye lowo mnyaka baletfwa ekulatini liphutsa labo futsi bawavuma emaphutsa abo.
1.26: Wendlula kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi layimfica nakubili, uletsa tindzaba letimnandzi kubantfu ngenca yaleto tibonakaliso lebesetentekile, njengekwemavi esiphrofetho sabo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele.
1.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi layimfica nakutsatfu nawo ngalokunjalo wendlula ngekuthula, ngaphandle nje kwetigebengu taGadiyanthoni, letatihlala etintsabeni, letatigcwele live; ngoba taticinile tincaba tato kanye netindzawo tato letifihlekile kangangekutsi bantfu bebangakhoni kutincoba; ngako-ke tabulala kakhulu, tenta kusontsana lokuningi emkhatsini webantfu.
1.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi layimfica nakune tacala tandza kakhulu, ngenca yekutsi bekukhona emahlubuka lamaningi emaNefi labekabalekela kuto, lokwabanga lusizi lolukhulu kulawo maNefi labekasele eveni.
1.29: Ngetulu kwaloko kwaba khona sizatfu selusizi lolukhulu emkhatsini wemaLamani; ngoba buka, bekanebantfwana labaningi labakhula baba nemandla eminyakeni, bacala kutimela, baholelwa ngulabanye labebangemaZoramu, ngemanga abo kanye nangemavi abo ekuyengana, bahlanganyela naleto tigebengu taGadiyanthoni.
1.30: Ngaleyondlela emaLamani nawo ahlushwa, acala kwehla elukholweni lwawo kanye nasekulungeni, ngenca yebubi besitukulwane lesasisakhula.

2.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi layimfica nesihlanu waphela ngaleyondlela nawo, nebantfu bacala kutikhohlwa leto tibonakaliso kanye naleto timangaliso labebativile, bacala kancane kancane kutsi bangabe basamangaliswa sibonakaliso noma simangaliso lebesivela ezulwini, kangangekutsi bacala kutsi babe lukhuni etinhlitiyweni tabo, baba timphumphutse etingcondvweni tabo, futsi bacala kungakukholwa konkhe loko labebakuvile nalabebakubonile—
2.2: Bacabanga etinhlitiyweni tabo tintfo letitsite letilite, kutsi betentiwe bantfu kanye nangemandla adeveli, kute tidukise tiphindze tikhohlise tinhlitiyo tebantfu; ngaleyondlela Sathane waphindze watitfola tinhlitiyo tebantfu, kangangekutsi wawaphumphutsekisa emehlo abo futsi wabedukisa kutsi bakholwe kutsi imfundziso yaKhristu beyiyintfo lebuwula futsi lelite.
2.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bacala kutsi bakhule bacine ebubini kanye nasetinengisweni; abatange bakholwe kutsi bekutawuphindze kube khona letinye tibonakaliso noma timangaliso lebetisatawuniketwa; futsi Sathane bekahamba azulazula, adukisa tinhlitiyo tebantfu, abalinga aphindze abenta kutsi bente bubi lobukhulu eveni.
2.4: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi layimfica nesitfupha; kanjalo nemnyaka wemashumi layimfica nesikhombisa; kanjalo nemnyaka wemashumi layimfica nesiphohlongo; kanjalo nemnyaka wemashumi layimfica nemfica;
2.5: Kanjalo neminyaka lelikhulu bese yendlulile kusukela etinsukwini taMosiya, lobekayiNkhosi kubantfu bemaNefi.
2.6: Iminyaka lengemakhulu lasitfupha nemfica bese yendlulile kusukela Lehi ashiya eJerusalema.
2.7: Futsi iminyaka leyimfica bese yendlulile kusukela esikhatsini lebekuniketwe ngaso sibonakaliso, lebekukhulunywe ngaso baphrofethi, sekutsi Khristu bekayawufika emhlabeni.
2.8: Manje emaNefi acala kubala sikhatsi sawo kusukela ngalesikhatsi lebekuniketwe ngaso sibonakaliso, noma kusukela ngekufika kwaKhristu; ngako-ke, iminyaka leyimfica beseyendlulile.
2.9: Nefi, lobekanguyise waNefi, lobekagcine lemibhalo, akatange asabuyela eveni laseZarahemla, futsi akatange atfolakale ndzawo kulo lonkhe live.
2.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bachubeka nekuhlala ebubini, nanoma kushumayela kanye nekuphrofetha kwakukuningi emkhatsini wabo; ngaleyondlela wendlula kanjalo-ke nemnyaka welishumi, kanjalo nemnyaka welishumi nakunye wendlula ngaleyondlela ebubini.
2.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka welishumi nakutsatfu kwacala kwaba khona timphi kanye nemibango kulo lonkhe live; ngoba tigebengu taGadiyanthoni bese titiningi kakhulu, futsi bese tibulele bantfu labaningi kakhulu, tabhubhisa nemadolobha lamaningi kakhulu, tandzisa nekufa lokuningi kakhulu kanye nekubulawa kwebantfu lokuningi kulo lonkhe live, kangangekutsi kwadzingeka kutsi bonkhe bantfu, emaNefi kanye nemaLamani, batsatse tikhali bayawukulwa nato.
2.12: Ngako-ke, onkhe emaLamani labekaphendvukele eNkhosini ahlangana nabomnakabo, emaNefi, aphoceleleka, kuvikela timphilo tabo kanye nebesifazane babo kanye nebantfwana babo, kutsi atsatse tikhali alwe naleto tigebengu taGadiyanthoni, yebo, futsi kanjalo nekutsi agcine emalungelo abo, netinzuzo telibandla labo nekukhonta kwabo, nemandla abo ekutimela, kanye nenkhululeko yabo.
2.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaphambi kwekutsi lomnyaka welishumi nakutsatfu wendlule emaNefi esatjiswa ngekubhujiswa nya ngenca yalemphi, leyaba yimbi kakhulu.
2.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lawo maLamani labekahlangene nemaNefi abalwa kanye nemaNefi;
2.15: Sicalekiso sawo sasuswa kuwo, futsi sikhumba sawo sabese siba mhlophe njengesemaNefi;
2.16: Emajaha abo kanye nemadvodzakati abo aba mahle kakhulu, abalwa kanye nemaNefi, abitwa ngekutsi ngemaNefi. Futsi waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi nakutsatfu.
2.17: Futsi kwenteka ekucaleni kwemnyaka welishumi nakune, imphi emkhatsini wetigebengu kanye nebantfu baNefi yachubeka futsi yaba yimbi kakhulu; noko, bantfu baNefi bake batfola kutehlula letigebengu, kangangekutsi batiphocelela kutsi tibaleke tibuyele emuva batikhipha emaveni abo batiyisa etintsabeni kanye nasetindzaweni tato letifihlekile.
2.18: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka welishumi nakune. Ngemnyaka welishumi nesihlanu taphuma tatokulwa nebantfu baNefi; futsi ngenca yebubi bebantfu baNefi, kanye nemibango yabo leminingi kanye nekuphikisana, tigebengu taGadiyanthoni takhona kubacinela.
2.19: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka welishumi nesihlanu, ngaleyondlela bantfu bebasesimeni setinhlupheko letiningi; nenkemba yekubhujiswa beseyilengela etikwabo, kangangekutsi besebatawushaywa ngiyo, futsi loku kungenca yebubi babo.

3.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi nesitfupha kusukela ekufikeni kwaKhristu, Lakhoniyasi, umbusi welive, watfola incwadzi levela kumholi kanye nembusi walelicembu letigebengu; lawa ngemavi labebhaliwe, atsi:
3.2: Lakhoniyasi, lohlonipheke kakhulu nalongumbusi lomkhulu walelive, buka, ngikubhalela lencwadzi, ngikunika ludvumo lolukhulu kakhulu ngenca yekucina kwakho, kanjalo nekucina kwebantfu bakho, ekugcineni loko lenicabanga kutsi kulilungelo kanye nenkhululeko yenu; yebo, nime kahle, shengatsi nisekelwe sandla sankulunkulu, ekuvikeleni inkhululeko yenu, nemphahla yenu kanye nelive lenu, noma loko lenikubita ngekwenu.
3.3: Futsi kubonakala kungidzabukisa, Lakhoniyasi lohlonipheke kakhulu, kutsi ungaba siwula kangaka futsi utichayise ngekucabanga kutsi ungamelana nemadvodza lanesibindzi nalamaningi kangaka lalawulwa ngimi, lokungumanje eme ngemumo etikhalini tawo, alindzele ngekulangatelela livi lelitsi—Hambani nehlele kumaNefi niwabulale.
3.4: Mine, ngekwati umoya wabo wekungehluleki, sengike ngabavivinya emphini, ngati ngenzondo yabo lengapheli ngani ngenca yalokungalungi lokuningi lenikwente kubo, ngako-ke uma bangehlela entasi batawukulwa nani bayawunehlela ngembubhiso niphele nya.
3.5: Ngako-ke ngibhale lencwadzi, ngayivala ngesandla sami lucobo, ngoba ngikhatsatekile ngenhlalakahle yenu, ngenca yekucina kwenu kuloko lenikholelwa kutsi kulungile, kanye nebuchawe benu emphini.
3.6: Ngako-ke ngiyakubhalela, ngoba ngifisa kutsi ninikele loku kubantfu bami, emadolobha enu, tindzawo tenu, kanye naloko lokungekwenu, kunekutsi nehlelwe ngenkemba nekutsi kubhujiswa kute etikweni.
3.7: Noma-ke ngalamanye emavi, tinikeleni kitsi, bese nitihlanganisa natsi niphindze nati ngemisebenti yetfu lefihlekile, nibe bomnaketfu kute nani nifane natsi—hhayi tigcila tetfu, kodvwa bomnaketfu nalesibambisene nabo kuko konkhe lesinako.
3.8: Buka, ngiyafunga kuwe, uma ningakwenta loku, ngesifungo, angeke nibulawe; kodvwa uma ningakwenti loku, ngiyafunga kuwe ngesifungo, kutsi ngenyanga letako ngitawuyala emabutfo ami kutsi ehle atawukulwa nani, angeke asibambe sandla sawo futsi angeke aphephise lutfo, kodvwa ayawunibulala, ehlisele inkemba etikwenu nite niphele nya.
3.9: Buka, nginguGidiyani; ngingumbusi walelicembu leliyimfihlo laGadiyanthoni; licembu nemisebenti yalo lengatiko kutsi mihle; futsi kwasendvulo kuphindze kwendluliselwe kitsi.
3.10: Ngikubhalela lencwadzi, Lakhoniyasi, ngiyetsemba kutsi nitawunikela letindzawo tenu naloko lokukwenu, ngaphandle kwekucitsa ingati, kute bantfu bami babuyelwe ngemalungelo abo kanye nekuphatsa kwabo, labahlubuke kini ngenca yebubi benu ekubagodleleni emalungelo abo ekuphatsa, futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi nente loku, ngitawuphindzisela koniwa kwabo. NginguGidiyani.
3.11: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Lakhoniyasi atfola lencwadzi wamangala kakhulu, ngenca yesibindzi saGidiyani sekufuna kutsatsa live lemaNefi libe ngelabo, nekusongela bantfu kanye nekufuna kuphindzisela koniwa kwalabo labebangatange boniwe, ngaphandle kwekutsi bebatone bona ngekuhlubuka baye kuleto tigebengu letimbi naletinengekile.
3.12: Manje buka, lo Lakhoniyasi, umbusi, bekayindvodza lelungile, futsi bekangesatjiswa ngulokufunwa kanye nangetisongo tesigebengu; ngako-ke akatange ayinake lencwadzi yaGidiyani, umbusi wetigebengu, kodvwa wenta kutsi bantfu bakhe bakhale eNkhosini bacele emandla kulungiselela sikhatsi leto tigebengu lebetitawehla ngaso kutawukulwa nabo.
3.13: Yebo, watfumela simemetelo kubo bonkhe bantfu, kutsi bagcogcele ndzawonye besifazane babo, bantfwana babo, imihlambi yabo yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yabo yetinkhomo kanye nako konkhe kwabo, ngaphandle kwelive labo, endzaweni yinye.
3.14: Futsi wenta kutsi kwakhiwe tincaba tibatungelete, nekucina kwato kube kukhulu kakhulu. Waphindze wenta kutsi emabutfo, emaNefi newemaLamani, noma abo bonkhe labo labebabalwa kanye nemaNefi, kutsi abekwe njengabogadzi atungelete kutsi abagadze, nekutsi abavikele etigebengwini emini nasebusuku.
3.15: Yebo, watsi kubo: Njengoba iNkhosi iphila, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke kubo bonkhe bubi benu, futsi nikhale eNkhosini, anisoze nanini nikhululwe etandleni taleto tigebengu taGadiyanthoni.
3.16: Futsi abemakhulu aphindze amangalisa emavi kanye netiphrofetho taLakhoniyasi kangangekutsi tabanga kwesaba kubo bonkhe bantfu; betama ngemandla abo kutsi bente njengekwemavi aLakhoniyasi.
3.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Lakhoniyasi wabeka tindvuna letinkhulu etikwawo onkhe emabutfo emaNefi, kutsi awahole ngesikhatsi tigebengu tehla tiphuma ehlane kutawukulwa nabo.
3.18: Manje indvuna lenkhulu kakhulu ngetulu kwato tonkhe tindvuna letinkhulu kanye nemekhuti lomkhulu wemabutfo onkhe emaNefi wabekwa, libito lakhe bekunguGidigidoni.
3.19: Manje kwakungumhambo emkhatsini wemaNefi kutsi kubekelwe tindvuna tawo letinkhulu, (ngaphandle kwalesikhatsi sabo sebubi) umuntfu lotsite lobekanemoya wekwembulelwa kanye newekuphrofetha; ngako-ke, lo Gidigidoni bekangumphrofethi lomkhulu emkhatsini wabo, aphindze futsi angumehluleli lomkhulu.
3.20: Manje bantfu batsi kuGidigidoni: Thandaza eNkhosini, bese uyasivumela kutsi sihambe sikhuphukele etintsabeni siye ehlane, kute sihlasele letigebengu sitibulale emaveni ato lucobo.
