3.21: Kodvwa Gidigidoni watsi kubo: INkhosi iyala; ngoba uma singakhuphuka siyawukulwa nato iNkhosi iyawusinikela etandleni tato; ngako-ke sitawutilungiselela ekhatsi nekhatsi nemave etfu, futsi sitawugcogcela ndzawonye onkhe emabutfo etfu, angeke siyawukulwa nato, kodvwa sitawutilindza tize tite titawukulwa natsi; ngako-ke njengoba iNkhosi iphila, uma sikwenta loku itawutinikela etandleni tetfu.
3.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka welishumi nesikhombisa, ngasekupheleni kwalowo mnyaka, simemetelo saLakhoniyasi sasesihambe lelive lonkhe, futsi besebatsatse emahhashi abo, netincola tabo, netinkhomo tabo, nemihlambi yabo yonkhe yetimvu kanye nemihlambi yabo yonkhe yetinkhomo, nalokuyinhlavu kwabo, kanye nako konkhe labebanako, bahamba ngetinkhulungwane kanye nangemashumi etinkhulungwane, bate bahamba bonkhe baya kuleyo ndzawo lebeyibekiwe kutsi batawuhlanganela kuyo, kute bativikele etitseni tabo
3.23: Futsi lelive lelalibekiwe bekulive laseZarahemla, live lelalisemkhatsini welive laseZarahemla kanye nelive iNala, yebo, emnceleni lowawusemkhatsini welive iNala kanye nelive iNcitsakalo.
3.24: Futsi kwabakhona tinkhulungwane letiningi kakhulu tebantfu labebabitwa ngekutsi ngemaNefi, labagcogcana ndzawonye kulelive. Manje Lakhoniyasi wenta kutsi bagcogcane ndzawonye eveni lelalingaseningizimu, ngenca yesicalekiso lesikhulu lesasisetikwelive lelingasenyakatfo.
3.25: Futsi baticinisa ngalokumelene netitsa tabo, bahlala eveni linye, balicembu linye, bawesaba emavi labekakhulunywe nguLakhoniyasi, kangangekutsi baphendvuka etonweni tabo tonkhe; baphakamisela imithandazo yabo eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, kutsi abakhulule ngaleso sikhatsi titsa tabo titawehla kutawukulwa nabo.
3.26: Baba nelusizi lolukhulu kakhulu ngenca yetitsa tabo. NaGidigidoni wenta kutsi bente tikhali temphi letitinhlobonhlobo, nekutsi bekumele bacine ngetivikelo, netihlangu, nemahawu, ngendlela labekabalayele ngayo.

4.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngasekupheleni kwemnyaka welishumi nesiphohlongo lawo mabutfo etigebengu besekayilungiselele imphi, acala kwehla futsi aphuma emagcumeni, kanye nasetintsabeni, nasehlane, nasetincabeni tawo leticinile, kanye nasetindzaweni tawo letifihlekile, acala kutitsatsela tindzawo taba ngetawo, lebetiseveni leliseningizimu kanye naleto lebetiseveni lelisenyakatfo, futsi acala kutitsatsela emave onkhe aba ngewabo labekashiywe ngemaNefi, kanye nemadolobha labekashiywe ete bantfu.
4.2: Kodvwa buka, bekute tilwane tasendle netinyamatane kulawo mave labekashiywe ngemaNefi, futsi bekute tinyamatane tetigebengu ngaphandle kwasehlane.
4.3: Tigebengu betingeke tiphile ngaphandle kwekutsi tibe sehlane, ngenca yekweswela kudla; ngoba emaNefi bekashiye tindzawo tawo tite lutfo, agcogca imihlambi yetimvu tawo kanye nemihlambi yetinkhomo tawo kanye nako konkhe labekanako, futsi aba licembu linye.
4.4: Ngako-ke, bekute litfuba lekutsi tigebengu tiphange futsi titfole kudla, ngaphandle kwekutsi tiphumele ebaleni tilwe nemaNefi; futsi ngenca yekutsi emaNefi bekalicembu linye, aphindze asibalo lesikhulu kakhulu, atibekele imiphako, emahhashi netinkhomo, kanye nemihlambi letinhlobonhlobo, kute akwati kuphila sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lesikhombisa, ngaleso sikhatsi bekanelitsemba lekutsi ayawube sekatibulele taphela tigebengu eveni lonkhe; wendlula kanjalo-ke umnyaka welishumi nemfica.
4.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka welishumi nemfica Gidiyani watfola kutsi bekufanele kutsi akhuphuke ayawukulwa nemaNefi, ngoba bekute indlela yekutsi baphile ngaphandle kwekutsi baphange, bebe futsi babulale.
4.6: Bebangeke balokotse bagcwale eveni lonkhe kute bakwati kuhlanyela lokuyinhlavu, hleze emaNefi ete kuto futsi ababulale; ngako-ke Gidiyani waniketa umyaleto emabutfweni akhe wekutsi ngaloyo mnyaka bekufanele bakhuphuke bayawukulwa nemaNefi.
4.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bakhuphuka bayawukulwa; futsi kwakuyinyanga yesitfupha; buka, lwalulukhulu luphindze lwesabeka lolo suku lebeta ngalo kutawukulwa; futsi bebagcoke ngendlela yetigebengu; banesikhumba semvu lebesitungelete tinkhalo tabo, batihuce ngengati, tinhloko tabo tihhuliwe, babeke tivikelo tenhloko kubo; kubukeka kwemabutfo aGidiyani bekwesabeka kakhulu, ngenca yetivikelo tabo, nangenca yekutihuca kwabo ngengati.
4.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaNefi, ngesikhatsi abona kubukeka kwelibutfo la Gidiyani, awela phansi onkhe, akhala eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wawo, kutsi ibaphephise futsi ibakhulule etandleni tetitsa tawo.
4.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi emabutfo aGidiyani akubona loku acala kumemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, ngenca yenjabulo yawo, ngoba bekacabanga kutsi emaNefi bekawiswe kwesaba ngenca yekwesaba emabutfo awo.
4.10: Kodvwa advumala ngaloku, ngoba emaNefi bekangawesabi; kepha bekesaba Nkulunkulu wawo futsi amncusa kutsi awavikele; ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi emabutfo aGidiyani agijima aya kubo bese atilungiselele kuhlangabetana nawo; yebo, ngemandla eNkhosi bawemukela.
4.11: Imphi yacala kulenyanga yesitfupha; kulwa kwaba kukhulu kwaphindze kwaba kubi kakhulu, yebo, kwaba kukhulu futsi kwaba kubi kakhulu kubulawa kwebantfu kwalapho, kangangekutsi bekungakate kwatiwe nanini kubulawa kwebantfu lokukhulu kangaka emkhatsini wabo bonkhe labantfu baLehi seloku ashiya eJerusalema.
4.12: Nanoma Gidiyani bekente kusonga kanye nekufunga, buka, emaNefi abashaya, kangangekutsi bahlehlela emuva phambi kwawo.
4.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Gidigidoni wayala kutsi emabutfo akhe abalandzele ate ayewufika eminceleni yasehlane, futsi nekutsi angaphephisi namunye loyawuwela etandleni tawo kuleyondlela; futsi ngaleyondlela abalandzela ate ababulala, eminceleni yelihlane, ate awugcina nemyalo waGidigidoni.
4.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Gidiyani, lobekeme alwa ngesibindzi, walandzelwa ngesikhatsi abaleka; ngenca yekukhatsala ngekulwa kwakhe lokukhulu wabanjwa wabulawa. Kwaphela kanjalo-ke ngaGidiyani sigebengu.
4.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaNefi aphindze abuyela endzaweni yawo yekuphepha. Futsi kwenteka kutsi lomnyaka welishumi nemfica wendlula, netigebengu atiphindzanga tabuya kutsi titawukulwa; atibuyanga nangemnyaka wemashumi lamabili.
4.16: Nangemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakunye atibuyanga kutawukulwa, kodvwa tavimbetela tinhlangotsi tonkhe kute titungelete bantfu baNefi; ngoba beticabanga kutsi uma tingahle tivimbe bantfu baNefi emaveni abo, tibatungelete tinhlangotsi tonkhe, futsi uma betingabavimba kuyo yonkhe inzunzo yabo yangaphandle, loko bekungabenta kutsi batinikele njengetifiso tabo.
4.17: Manje bese batibekele lomunye umholi, libito lakhe bekunguZemnariha; ngako-ke bekunguZemnariha lowenta kutsi loku kuvinjetelwa kwenteke.
4.18: Kodvwa buka, loku kwaba lusito kumaNefi; ngoba bekulukhuni kutsi tigebengu tibavimbetele sikhatsi lesidze kute tiphumelele kumaNefi, ngenca yemphako lomningi labebawugcinile,
4.19: Futsi ngenca yekweswelakala kwemphako etigebengwini; ngoba buka, betingenalutfo ngaphandle nje kwenyama yekutsi titiphilise, leyo nyama letayitfola ehlane;
4.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinyamatane tasendle tancipha ehlane kangangekutsi tigebengu taphose tabulawa yindlala.
4.21: EmaNefi bekahamba njalo emini kanye nasebusuku, atseleka emabutfweni, ababulala ngetinkhulungwane kanye nangemashumi latinkhulungwane.
4.22: Ngayolendlela kwaba sifiso sebantfu baZemnariha kutsi baliyekele lisu labo, ngenca yekubhujiswa lokukhulu lokwabehlela ebusuku nasemini.
4.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Zemnariha wanika umyalo kubantfu bakhe wekutsi bakuyekele kuvimbetela, bahambe baye etincenyeni letingephandle kakhulu telive lelingasenyakatfo.
4.24: Manje, Gidigidoni alati lisu labo, futsi ati ngebutsakatsaka babo ngenca yekufuna kudla, kanye nekubulawa lokukhulu lebekwentekile emkhatsini wabo, ngako-ke watfumela emabutfo akhe ngesikhatsi sasebusuku, futsi wayivala indlela yabo yekubaleka, wabeka emabutfo akhe endleleni yabo yekubaleka.
4.25: Loku emabutfo akwenta ngesikhatsi sasebusuku, futsi ahamba ayawuvimba ngaphambili kwaletigebengu, kwatsi ngakusasa, ngesikhatsi letigebengu ticala luhambo lwato, tahlangana nemabutfo emaNefi etindzaweni totimbili ngembili nangemuva.
4.26: Naleto tigebengu lebetiseningizimu nato ngalokunjalo tavinjelwa etindzaweni tato tekubaleka. Tonkhe letintfo tentiwa ngekuyalwa nguGidigidoni.
4.27: Kwaba khona tinkhulungwane letininingi letatinikela kutsi tibe tiboshwa temaNefi, kwatsi labasala kuto babulawa.
4.28: Umholi wato, Zemnariha, watsatfwa walengiswa esihlahleni, yebo, etulu kuso wate wafa. Emvakwekutsi sebamlengisile wate wafa basigawulela phansi sihlahla, babese bayakhala ngelivi lelikhulu, batsi:
4.29: Shengatsi iNkhosi ingabalondvolota bantfu bayo ekulungeni kanye nasebungcweleni benhlitiyo, kute bente kutsi babawise phansi bonkhe labo labayawufuna kubabulala ngenca yemandla kanye nemacembu layimfihlo, njengalendvodza lewiselwe phansi.
4.30: Batfokota futsi bakhala ngelivi linye, batsi: Shengatsi Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, Nkulunkulu wa-Isaka, kanye naNkulunkulu waJakobe, angabavikela labantfu bahlale ekulungeni, uma nje bayawubita libito laNkulunkulu wabo kutsi abavikele.
4.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bachumuka, bonkhe kanyekanye, bahlabelela, futsi badvumisa Nkulunkulu wawo ngentfo lenkhulu kangaka labentele yona, ekubalondvoloteni kutsi bangaweli etandleni tetitsa tabo.
4.32: Yebo, bakhala batsi: Hosana Nkulunkulu Longetulu Kwako Konkhe. Futsi bakhala batsi: Libusisiwe libito leNkhosi Nkulunkulu Somandla, Nkulunkulu Longetulu Kwako Konkhe.
4.33: Tinhlitiyo tabo takhukhumuka ngenca yenjabulo, kwate kwaba khona nekuphuma kwetinyembeti lokuningi, ngenca yebuhle lobukhulu baNkulunkulu ekubakhululeni etandleni tetitsa tabo; futsi bebati kutsi bekungenca yekuphendvuka kwabo kanye nekutitfoba kwabo lokwakwente kutsi bakhululwe ekubhujisweni kwaphakadze.

5.1: Manje buka, bekute namunye lophilako emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bemaNefi lebekawangabata ngisho nakancane emavi abo bonkhe baphrofethi labangcwele labebakhulumile; ngoba bebati kutsi bekufanele kutsi agcwaliseke.
5.2: Futsi bebati kutsi bekufanele kutsi Khristu sewufikile, ngenca yetibonakaliso letiningi lebetiniketiwe, ngekwemavi ebaphrofethi; nangenca yetintfo lebesetivele tentekile bebati kutsi bekufanele kutsi tonkhe tigcwaliseke njengoba bekukhulunyiwe
5.3: Ngako-ke atiyekela tonkhe tono tawo, kanye netinengiso tawo, nebugwadla bawo, bamsebentela Nkulunkulu ngako konkhe kukhutsala imini nebusuku.
5.4: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekatsetse tonkhe letigebengu taba tiboshwa, kangangekutsi kute namunye loweca kulebetingakabulawa, atiphonsa ejele tiboshwa tato, enta kutsi livi laNkulunkulu lishunyayelwe kuto; futsi ngebuningi baleto letaphendvuka etonweni tato taphidze tangena esivumelwaneni sekutsi betingeke tisaphindze tibulale betikhululwa.
5.5: Kodvwa liningi laleto lebetingangenanga esivumelwaneni, lebetisachubeka nekuba netimfihlo tekubulala etinhlitiyweni tato, yebo, liningi laleto lebetitfolakala tisongela bomnakabo betibekwa licala futsi tijeziswe ngekwemtsetfo.
5.6: Futsi ngaleyondlela awacedza onkhe lawo macembu ebubi, layimfihlo kanye nalatinengiso, lobekukhona kuwo bubi lobukhulu kakhulu, kanye nekubulala lokuningi kakhulu lobekwentiwa.
5.7: Waphela kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lababili nakubili, nemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakutsatfu, nemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nakune, nemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesihlanu; futsi yendlula kanjalo-ke iminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nesihlanu.
5.8: Futsi besekukhona tintfo letiningi lebesetentekile, emehlweni alabanye, letatingaba nguletinkhulu naletimangalisako; noko, angeke tibhalwe tonkhe kulencwadzi; yebo, lencwadzi angeke ikwati kucukatsa ngisho incenye yalokulikhulu yaloko lokwentiwa emkhatsini walabantfu labaningi kangaka esikhatsini lesingangeminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nesihlanu.
5.9: Kodvwa buka kukhona imibhalo lecuketse tonkhe tento talabantfu; futsi umlandvo lomfisha naloliciniso waniketwa nguNefi.
5.10: Ngako-ke ngente umbhalo wami waletintfo ngekwelombhalo waNefi, lowawucoshwe kubongcwengcwe labebabitwa ngekutsi bongcwengcwe baNefi.
5.11: Futsi buka, ngenta lombhalo kubongcwengcwe lengibente ngetami tandla lucobo.
5.12: Futsi buka, ngibitwa ngekutsi nginguMormon, ngibitwa ngelive laMormon, live Alima lamisa kulo libandla emkhatsini webantfu, yebo, libandla lekucala lelasungulwa emkhatsini wabo emvakwesiphambeko sabo.
5.13: Buka, ngingumfundzi waJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu. Ngibitwe nguye kutsi ngimemetele livi lakhe emkhatsini webantfu bakhe, kute babe nekuphila lokuphakadze.
5.14: Futsi kudzingekile kutsi mine, ngekwentsandvo yaNkulunkulu, kute imithandazo yalabo lasebendlulile, labebangcwele, igcwaliseke ngekwelukholo, kumele ngente umbhalo waletintfo lesetentiwe—
5.15: Yebo, umbhalo lomncane waloko lokwenteka kusukela ngesikhatsi Lehi esuka eJerusalema, kwehle kute kufike kulesikhatsi samanje.
5.16: Ngako-ke ngenta umbhalo wami ngiwususela emilandvweni leyaniketwa ngulabo labebangaphambi kwami, kute kufike ekucaleni kwelusuku lwami.
5.17: Futsi emvakwaloko ngenta nembhalo wetintfo lengitibone ngewami emehlo.
5.18: Futsi ngiyati umbhalo lengiwentako ngumbhalo locondze ngco futsi loliciniso; noko kukhona tintfo letiningi, ngekwelulwimi lwetfu, lesingakhoni kutibhala.
5.19: Manje sengenta siphetfo senkhulumo yami, lokungeyami lucobo, futsi ngichubeka nekuniketa umlandvo wami ngetintfo letenteka ngaphambi kwami.
5.20: NginguMormon, ngisitukulwane lesimsulwa saLehi. Nginesizatfu sekudvumisa Nkulunkulu wami kanye neMsindzisi wami Jesu Khristu, kutsi wakhipha bobabe betfu eveni laseJerusalema, (futsi kute namunye lobekati ngaphandle kwakhe kanye nalabo labakhipha kulelo live) nekutsi unike mine nebantfu bakitsi lwati loluningi kangaka kute kusindziswe imiphefumulo yetfu.
5.21: Ngempela uyibusisile indlu yaJakobe, waba nemusa kuyo intalelwane yaJosefa.
5.22: Futsi nangabe bantfwana baLehi bayigcinile imiyaleto yakhe ubabusisile waphindze wabaphumelelisa njengekwelivi lakhe.
5.23: Yebo, ngempela insali yentalelwane yaJosefa uyawuphindze ayiholele ekuyatini iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
5.24: Futsi ngempela njengoba iNkhosi iphila, itawuyigcogca emagumbini lamane emhlaba yonkhe insali yentalelwane yaJakobe, lehlakatwe yakhishelwa ngaphandle emhlabeni wonkhe.
5.25: Futsi njengoba yente sivumelwano nayo yonkhe indlu yaJakobe, kanjalo nesivumelwano lavumelane ngaso nendlu yaJakobe siyawugcwaliseka ngesikhatsi sayo lesifanele, kute kubuyiselwe yonkhe indlu yaJakobe ekwatini ngesivumelwano lavumelene ngaso nabo.
5.26: Futsi emvakwaloko bayawumati uMhlengi wabo, longuJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu; emvakwaloko bayawugcogcwa kuwo omane emagumbi emhlaba bayiswe emaveni abo, lapho bebahlakatwe kusuka khona; yebo, njengoba iNkhosi iphila kuyawuba njalo. Amen.

6.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi bantfu bemaNefi bonkhe babuyela emaveni abo ngemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesitfupha, wonkhe umuntfu, nemndeni wakhe, umhlambi wetimvu takhe nemhlambi wetinkhomo takhe, emahhashi akhe netinkhomo takhe, kanye nanoma yini lokunye lebekungekwabo.
6.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bebangakayidli yonkhe imiphako yabo; ngako-ke bayitsatsa yonkhe labebangakayidli, konkhe lokuyinhlavu kwabo kwalo lonkhe luhlobo, neligolide labo, nesiliva yabo, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo tabo letiligugu, babuyela emaveni abo nato tonkhe tintfo lebebanato, enyakatfo naseningizimu, eveni lelingasenyakatfo kanye naseveni lelingaseningizimu.
6.3: Banika leto tigebengu lebetingene esivumelwaneni sekutsi tigcine kuthula kwelive, leto lebetitsandza kutsi tisale tingemaLamani, emave, ngekwesibalo sawo, kute tikwati kutsi ngekusebenta kwato, tibe nako lebetingaphila ngako; futsi ngaleyondlela tikwati kutsi ticinisekise kuthula eveni.
6.4: Bacala futsi baphumelela baphindze bakhula kakhulu; iminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nesitfupha kanjalo neyesikhombisa yendlula, kwaba khona kuthula lokukhulu eveni; futsi bate benta imitsetfo yabo yahambisana nekulingana kanye nekulunga.
6.5: Manje besekute lutfo kulo lonkhe live lebekuvimbela bantfu ekutseni baphumelele njalo, ngaphandle kwekutsi bawele esiphambekweni.
6.6: BekunguGidigidoni, kanye nemehluleli, Lakhoniyasi, kanye nalabo labebabaholi labebakhetsiwe, labebacinisekise lokuthula lokukhulu eveni.
6.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba khona emadolobha lamaningi lakhiwa kabusha, futsi kwaba khona lamaningi emadolobha lamadzala lalungiswa.
6.8: Kwaba khona leminingi imigwaco lemikhulu leyakhiwa, kanye naleminingi imigwaco leyakhiwa, lebeyisuka edolobheni iya kulelinye lidolobha, isuka eveni iya kulelinye live, isuka endzaweni iya kulenye indzawo.
6.9: Wendlula kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamabili nesiphohlongo, bantfu bebasolo banekuthula njalo.
6.10: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamabili nemfica kwacala kwaba khona imibango letsite emkhatsini webantfu; futsi labanye bebaphakeme kangangoba baba nekutikhukhumeta kanye nekutichayisa ngenca yemcebo wabo lomkhulu, yebo, kangangoba kwaba khona kuhluphana lokukhulu;
6.11: Ngoba bekukhona batsengisi labaningi eveni, kanjalo nebameli labaningi, kanye nalabebasetikhundleni labaningi.
6.12: Bantfu bacala kutsi behlukaniswe ngekwetigaba tabo, ngekunotsa kwabo kanye nangematfuba abo ekufundza; yebo, labanye bebete lwati ngenca yebuphuya babo, futsi labanye bakwati kufundza kakhulu ngenca yemcebo wabo.
6.13: Labanye bebaphakeme kangangoba bebatikhukhumeta, labanye bebatitfobile kakhulu; labanye babuyisela inhlamba ngenhlamba, ngesikhatsi labanye bakwemukela kwetfukwa nekuhlushwa kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinhlupheko, bangaphindziseli ngekwetfuka, kodvwa batfobile futsi badzabukile phambi kwaNkulunkulu.
6.14: Futsi ngaleyondlela kwaba khona kungalingani lokukhulu kulo lonkhe live, kangangekutsi libandla lacala kwehlukana; yebo, kangangekutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu libandla lehlukana kulo lonkhe live ngephandle kwelidlanzana nje lemaLamani lebeliphendvukele elukholweni lweliciniso; futsi wona akatange akhweshe kulo, ngoba wona bekacinile, asimile, anganyakatiseki, afuna ngekukhutsala kwawo konkhe kugcina imiyaleto yeNkhosi.
6.15: Manje sizatfu salobo bubi bebantfu bekungulesi—Sathane bekanemandla lamakhulu, ekuphehleni bantfu kutsi bente tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi, futsi abakhukhumukisa ngekutichenya, abalinga kutsi bafune emandla, neligunya, nemcebo, kanye netintfo letilite temhlaba.
6.16: Ngaleyondlela Sathane waholela tinhlitiyo tebantfu ekutseni bente tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi; ngako-ke bajabulela kuthula iminyaka lembalwa kuphela.
6.17: Ngaleyondlela, ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu—bantfu sebatinikele sikhatsi lesidze kutsi bazulazuliswe tilingo tadeveli abayise noma ngukuphi lapho labetsandza kutsi abayise khona, nekutsi abentise noma ngabe ngubuphi bubi labekatsandza kutsi babente—futsi ngaleyondlela ekucaleni kwawo, lomnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu, bese basesimeni sebubi lobukhulu.
6.18: Manje bebangoni ngekungati, ngoba bebayati intsandvo yaNkulunkulu mayelana nabo, ngoba beyifundzisiwe kubo; ngako-ke bamhlubuka Nkulunkulu ngekutsandza kwabo.
6.19: Manje besekungusetinsukwini taLakhoniyasi, indvodzana yaLakhoniyasi, ngoba Lakhoniyasi wasitsatsa sihlalo seyise futsi wababusa bantfu ngalowo mnyaka.
6.20: Ngaleso sikhatsi kwacala kutsi kube khona bantfu labaholwa ngumoya lovela ezulwini futsi labebatfunyiwe, bema emkhatsini webantfu kulo lonkhe live, bashumayela futsi bafakaza ngesibindzi ngetono kanye nangebubi bebantfu, bafakaza kubo mayelana nekuhlengwa iNkhosi lebeyiyawukwentela bantfu bayo, noma ngalamanye emavi, kuvuka kwaKhristu; bafakaza ngesibindzi ngekufa kanye nangekuva kwayo buhlungu.
6.21: Manje bekukhona labaningi bantfu labebatfukutsele kakhulu ngenca yalabo labebafakaza ngaletintfo; labo labebatfukutsele imvamisa bekubehluleli labakhulu, nalabo labebabaphristi labakhulu kanye nebameli; yebo, bonkhe labo labebabameli babatfukutselela labo labebafakaza ngaletintfo.
6.22: Manje bekute ummeli nemehluleli nemphristi lomkhulu lobekangaba nemandla ekubeka noma ngubani licala lekutsi abulawe ngaphandle kwekutsi kubekwa kwabo licala kuvunyelwe ngumbusi welive.
6.23: Manje bebabaningi labebafakaza ngetintfo letiphatselene naKhristu bafakaza ngesibindzi, labatsatfwa babulawa behluleli ngansense, kute lwati ngekufa kwabo lungafinyeleli kumbusi welive kute kube semvakwekufa kwabo.
6.24: Manje buka, loku bekuphikisana nemitsetfo yelive, kutsi nanoma ngumuphi umuntfu abulawe ngaphandle kwekutsi kutfolwe imvume kumbusi welive—
6.25: Ngako-ke sikhalo savela eveni laseZarahemla, saletfwa kumbusi welive, ngalokumelene nalabo behluleli labebabeke baphrofethi beNkhosi licala lekutsi bafe, ngalokungekho emtsetfweni.
6.26: Manje kwenteka kutsi batsatfwa baletfwa ngaphambi kwemehluleli, kute behlulelwe ngalawo macala labebawentile, ngekwemtsetfo lobewubekwe bantfu.
6.27: Manje kwenteka kutsi labo behluleli bebanebangani kanye netihlobo letiningi; futsi kwatsi labo labebasele, yebo, cishe bonkhe bameli kanye nebaphristi labakhulu, babutsana ndzawonye, bahlangana netihlobo talabo behluleli labebatogwetjwa emacala ngekwemtsetfo.
6.28: Bangena esivumelwaneni lomunye nalomunye, yebo, ngisho nakuleso sivumelwano lebesiniketwe ngulabo basendvulo, leso sivumelwano lesaniketwa futsi salawulwa ngudeveli, kutsi simelane nako konkhe kulunga.
6.29: Ngako-ke bahlangana ngalokumelene nebantfu beNkhosi, bangena esivumelwaneni sekubabulala, kanye nekukhulula labo labebanelicala lekubulala ekutseni babanjwe sijeziso, lebesitokhishwa ngekwemtsetfo.
6.30: Bawedzelela umtsetfo kanye nemalungelo elive labo; bangena esivumelwaneni lomunye nalomunye sekutsi bambulale umbusi, futsi babeke inkhosi eveni, kute live lingabe lisaba nenkhululeko kodvwa libe ngaphansi kwemakhosi.

7.1: Manje buka, ngitawunikhombisa kutsi abatange bayibeke inkhosi kulelive; kodvwa ngawo lowo mnyaka, yebo, umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu, babulala esihlalweni sekwehlulela, yebo, bambulala umehluleli lomkhulu walelive.
7.2: Bantfu behlukana lomunye kulomunye; betehlukanisa lomunye kulomunye ngetive, wonkhe umuntfu ngekwemndeni wakhe nangekwetihlobo kanye nengekwebangani; futsi ngaleyondlela bawushabalalisa umbuso walelive.
7.3: Tonkhe tive tabeka sikhulu noma umholi wato; ngaleyondlela baba tive kanye nebaholi betive.
7.4: Manje buka, bekute muntfu emkhatsini wabo ngaphandle kwekutsi abe nemndeni lomkhulu netihlobo letiningi kanye nebangani; ngako-ke tive tabo taba tinkhulu kakhulu.
7.5: Manje konkhe loku kwenteka, bekusengakabi netimphi emkhatsini wabo; futsi bonkhe lobubi beta ebantfwini ngenca yekutsi batinikela emandleni aSathane.
7.6: Imitsetfo yembuso yashabalaliswa, ngenca yalelicembu leliyimfihlo lebangani kanye netihlobo talabo lababulala baphrofethi.
7.7: Badala kungevani lokukhulu kulelive, kangangekutsi incenye leningi yebantfu labalungile cishe yonkhe beseyigcwele bubi; yebo, bekukhona labambalwa kuphela bantfu labebalungile emkhatsini wabo.
7.8: Futsi ngaleyondlela iminyaka lesitfupha yayingakendluli kusukela incenye leningi yebantfu ikuyekela kulunga kwabo, njengenja ibuyela emahlanteni ayo, noma njengengulube ibhucuta eludzakeni lwayo.
7.9: Manje lelicembu leliyimfihlo, lelaliletse bubi lobungaka kubantfu, labutsana ndzawonye, labeka indvodza lelayibita ngaJakobe kutsi ibaphatse.
7.10: Futsi bayibita ngenkhosi yabo; ngako-ke yaba yinkhosi yalelicembu lelaligcwele bubi; futsi bekangumunye walabatiwako lowakhuluma ngekuphikisana nebaphrofethi labebafakaza ngaJesu.
7.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bebangakacini kangako ngekwesibalo njengetive tebantfu, labebahlangene ndzawonye ngaphandle nje kwekutsi baholi babo bamisa imitsetfo yabo, wonkhe muntfu ngekwesive sakhe; noko bebatitsa, nanoma bebangasibo bantfu labalungile, kodvwa bebahlangene ekutondzeni labo labebangene esivumelwaneni sekushabalalisa umbuso.
7.12: Ngako-ke, Jakobe sekabona kutsi titsa tabo tatitiningi kakhukhu kunabo, yena ayinkhosi yalelicembu, ngako-ke wayala bantfu bakhe kutsi babaleke baye encenyeni yelive lelikhashane ngasenyakatfo, lapho befike batakhele umbuso wabo khona, bate bahlangana nemahlubuka, (ngoba wabayenga ngekutsi bekutoba khona emahlubuka lamaningi) bate baba nemandla ngalokwanele kutsi bamelane netive tebantfu; futsi benta njalo.
7.13: Futsi luhambo lwabo lwalushesha kakhulu kangangekutsi alutange luvinjwe bate baphuma lapho bantfu bangakhona kufika khona. Waphela ngaleyondlela umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu; futsi kanjalo netindzaba tebantfu baNefi.
7.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakunye behlukana baba tive, wonkhe muntfu ngekwemndeni wakhe, tihlobo kanye nebangani; noko bebente sivumelwano sekutsi bebangeke balwe lomunye nalomunye; kodvwa bebangakahlangani ngekwemitsetfo yabo, kanye nangendlela yekubusa kwabo, ngoba yayimiswe ngekwetingcondvo talabo labebatikhulu kanye nebaholi babo. Kodvwa bamisa imitsetfo lecinile kutsi sivana sinye singeceli kulesinye, kangangekutsi ngelizinga lelitsite babanako kuthula eveni; noko, tinhlitiyo tabo tatigucukile tingekho eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo, futsi babagcoba ngematje baphrofethi baphindze babacosha babakhipha emkhatsini wabo.
7.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi—sekavakashelwe tingilosi kanjalo nelivi leNkhosi, ngako-ke sekatibonile tingilosi, futsi angufakazi lowatibonela, anemandla labekaniketwe yena kutsi ati mayelana nebufundisi baKhristu, kanjalo angufakazi lowatibonela ekusukeni kwabo ngekushesha ekulungeni baye ebubini kanye nasetinengisweni tabo;
7.16: Ngako-ke, adzabukile ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo kanye nebumphumphutse betingcondvo tabo—wahamba waya emkhatsini wabo ngawo lowo mnyaka, wacala kufakaza, ngesibindzi, kuphendvuka kanye nekutsetselelwa kwetono ngelukholo eNkhosini Jesu Khristu.
7.17: Wabafundzisa tintfo letiningi; futsi angeke tibhalwe tonkhe, incenye yato angeke yenele, ngako-ke atikabhalwa kulencwadzi. Futsi Nefi wafundzisa ngemandla nangeligunya lelikhulu.
7.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bamtfukutselela, ngoba bekanemandla lamakhulu kunabo, ngoba bekungenteki kutsi bangawakholwa emavi akhe, ngoba lwalulukhulu lukholo lwakhe eNkhosini Jesu Khristu kangangekutsi tingilosi tatimsita malanga onkhe.
7.19: Futsi egameni laJesu wabakhipha bodeveli kanye nemimoya lemibi; nemnakabo wamvusa ekufeni, emvakwekutsi agcotjwe ngematje weva buhlungu bekubulawa bantfu.
7.20: Futsi bantfu bakubona loku, baphindze bafakaza ngako, ngako bamtfukutselela ngenca yemandla akhe; ngetulu kwaloko wenta timangaliso letiningi, emehlweni ebantfu, egameni laJesu.
7.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakunye wendlula, kwaba khona labambalwa nje kuphela labaphendvukela eNkhosini; kodvwa ngebuningi balabo labaphendvuka bakhombisa ngekweliciniso kubantfu kutsi behlelwe ngemandla kanye naMoya waNkulunkulu, lowawukuJesu Khristu, labebakholelwa kuye.
7.22: Futsi liningi lalabo lokwakhishwa kubo bodeveli, belashwa ekuguleni kanye nasebutsakatsakeni babo, bamemetela kubantfu kutsi bentiwe nguMoya waNkulunkulu, base bayelapheka; ngetulu kwaloko bakhombisa tibonakaliso baphindze benta timangaliso emkhatsini webantfu.
7.23: Wendlula kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakubili. Futsi Nefi wakhala kubantfu ekucaleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakutsatfu; washumayela kubo kuphendvuka kanye nekutsetselelwa kwetono.
7.24: Manje ngifuna kutsi nikhumbule futsi, kutsi akutange kube khona namunye lowaletfwa ekuphendvukeni longatange abhajatiswe ngemanti.
7.25: Ngako-ke, emadvodza agcotjwa nguNefi kulobo bufundisi, kute kutsi bonkhe labo labebeta kuwo babhajatiswe ngemanti, futsi loku kube njengesibonakaliso sebufakazi kanye nebufakazi phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kanye nakubantfu, kutsi sebaphendvukile baphindze batfola kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo.
7.26: Futsi kwaba khona labaningi ekucaleni kwalowo mnyaka lababhajatiselwa ekuphendvukeni; ngaleyondlela incenye lenkhulu yemnyaka yaphela kanjalo-ke.

8.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngekwembhalo wetfu, futsi siyati kutsi umbhalo wetfu uliciniso, ngoba buka, bekuyindvodza lelungile lebeyigcina umbhalo—ngoba ngempela yenta timangaliso letiningi egameni laJesu; futsi bekute namunye umuntfu lobekangenta simangaliso ngelibito laJesu ngaphandle kwekutsi ahlantwe ngisho nalobuncane bubi bakhe—
8.2: Manje kwenteka, uma bekungatange kube khona liphutsa lelentiwa ngulendvodza ekubaleni sikhatsi setfu, umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakutsatfu besewendlulile;
8.3: Bantfu bacala kulindza ngenshisekelo lenkhulu leso sibonakaliso lebesiniketwe ngumphrofethi Samuweli, umLamani, yebo, sikhatsi lapho bekutawuba khona bumnyama sikhatsi lesitinsuku letintsatfu eveni lonkhe.
8.4: Kwacala kwaba khona kungabata lokukhulu kanye netimphikiswano emkhatsini webantfu, nanoma kwakunetibonakaliso letiningi kangaka lebese tiniketiwe.
8.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakune, enyangeni yekucala, ngelusuku lwesine enyangeni, kwabakhona siphepho lesikhulu, lebesingakate satiwe kulo lonkhe live.
8.6: Ngetulu kwaloko kwaba khona siphepho lesikhulu nalesesabekako; kwaphindze kwaba khona nekudvuma lokwesabekako, kangangekutsi kwanyakatisa live lonkhe kwaba ngatsi litawuhlukana kabili.
8.7: Kwaba khona nemibane leneludlame ngalokumangalisako, lebeyingakate yatiwe nanini eveni lonkhe.
8.8: Futsi lidolobha laseZarahemla lacala lavutsa umlilo.
8.9: Lidolobha laseMoroni lacwila ekujuleni kwelwandle, nalabebahlala kulo bamita.
8.10: Umhlabatsi watfwalwa kutamatama kwemhlaba wabekwa etikwelidolobha laseMoroniha, kangangekutsi esikhundleni selidolobha kwaba khona intsaba lenkhulu.
8.11: Kwaba khona kubhujiswa lokukhulu nalokwesabekako eveni lelalingaseningizimu.
8.12: Kodvwa buka, kwaba khona kubhujiswa lokukhulu nalokwesabekako eveni lelingasenyakatfo; ngoba buka, live lonkhe lagucuka, ngenca yesiphepho nesivunguvungu, nekudvuma nemibane, kanye nekutamatama kwelive lonkhe lokukhulu kakhulu;
8.13: Imigwaco lemikhulu yabhidlika, kanye nemigwaco lecondzile yonakala, kwatsi tindzawo letiningi letibusheleleti tagucuka tama magebhugebhu.
8.14: Emadolobha lamaningi lamakhulu nalabalulekile acwila, lamaningi ashiswa, lamanye lamaningi anyakatiswa taze takhiwo tawo tawela phansi, labahlala kuwo babulawa, tindzawo tasala tite banfu.
8.15: Kwaba khona lamanye emadolobha lasala; kodvwa umonakalo wawo bewumkhulu kakhulu, futsi bababaningi kuwo lababulawa.
8.16: Kwaba khona labanye labatsatfwa bahamba nesivunguvungu; futsi kute umuntfu lowatiko kutsi baya ngakuphi, ngaphandle kwekutsi bona bayati kutsi batsatfwa bayiswa khashane.
8.17: Ngaleyondlela umhlaba wonkhe wagucuka, ngenca yetiphepho, nekudvuma, nemibane, kanye nekutamatama kwemhlaba.
8.18: Buka, emadvwala achekeka kabili; acetuka etikwemhlaba wonkhe, kangangekutsi atfolakala atincetu leticetukile, futsi ayimifantu kanye netimfa, etikwelive lonkhe.
8.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi kudvuma, nemibane, nesiphepho, nesihhushuhhushu lesikhulu, kanye nekutamatama kwemhlaba kuphela—ngoba buka, kwatsatsa sikhatsi lesingemahora lamatsatfu; futsi labanye batsi lesikhatsi saba ngetulu kwaloko; noma kunjalo, tonkhe letintfo letinkhulu kanye naletesabekako tenteka cishe ngesikhatsi lesingangemahora lamatsatfu—emvakwaloko buka, kwaba khona bumnyama eveni lonkhe.
8.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba khona bumnyama lobukhulu eveni lonkhe, kangangekutsi labebahlala kulo labebangakafi bebayiva inkhungu yebumnyama.
8.21: Bekungeke kube khona kukhanya, ngenca yebumnyama, noma sibane, noma emathoshi; noma kube khona umlilo lowokhelekako ngetinkhuni tabo letinhle naletome kakhulu, kangangoba akubanga khona sanhlobo kukhanya.
8.22: Akutange kube khona ngisho kukhanya lobekubonakala, noma umlilo, noma kulotita, noma lilanga, noma inyanga, noma inkhanyeti, ngoba betitinkhulu kakhulu tinkhungu tebumnyama lebetiseveni lonkhe.
8.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwatsatsa sikhatsi lesingangetinsuku letintsantfu kutsi kungabi khona kukhanya lokubonwako; kwabakhona kukhala lokukhulu nekuhhewula kanye nekulila emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu njalo, yebo, besisikhulu sililo kubantfu, ngenca yebumnyama kanye nekubhujiswa lokukhulu lobekwehlele etikwabo.
8.24: Kulenye indzawo bebavakala bakhala, batsi: Awu kube saphendvuka ngaphambi kwalolusuku lolukhulu nalolwesabekako, kube bekunjalo bomnaketfu bebayawusindza, bebangeke bashiswe kulelo dolobha lelikhulu laseZarahemla.
8.25: Kulenye indzawo bebavakala bakhala baphindze balila, batsi: Awu kube saphendvuka ngaphambi kwalolusuku lolukhulu nalolwesabekako, sangababulali futsi sangabagcobi ngematje baphrofethi, sangabacoshi; kube bekunjalo bomake betfu kanye nemadvodzakati etfu lamahle, kanye nebantfwana betfu bebayawusindza, futsi ngabe abangcwatjwanga kulelo dolobha lelikhulu laseMoroniha. Kwabakukhulu kanjalo-ke kwaphindze kwesabeka kuhhewula kwebantfu baNkulunkulu.

9.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwabakhona livi lelevakala kubo bonkhe labebahlala kulendzawo, kulo lonkhe live, limemeta litsi:
9.2: Maye, maye, maye kulaba bantfu; maye kulabahlala emhlabeni wonkhe ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke; ngoba develi uyahleka, netingilosi takhe tiyatfokota, ngenca yekubulawa kwemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati lamahle ebantfu bami, futsi kungenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tabo kutsi bafile!
9.3: Buka, lelo dolobha lelikhulu iZarahemla ngilishise ngemlilo, kanye nalabahlala kulo.
9.4: Buka, lelo dolobha lelikhulu iMoroni ngilente kutsi licwile ekujuleni kwelwandle, kanye nalabahlala kulo kutsi bamite.
9.5: Buka, lelo dolobha lelikhulu iMoroniha ngilimbonye ngemhlabatsi, kanye nalabahlala kulo, kute ngifihle bubi kanye netinengiso tabo phambi kwebuso bami, kute ingati yebaphrofethi kanye neyalabangcwele ingabe iseta nanini kimi ngalokumelene nabo.
9.6: Buka, lidolobha laseGilgali ngilente kutsi licwile, kanye nalabahlala kulo kutsi bangcwatjwe ekujuleni kwemhlaba;
9.7: Yebo, nelidolobha lase-Oniha kanye nalabahlala kulo, lidolobha laseMokumu kanye nalabahlala kulo, lidolobha laseJerusalema kanye nalabahlala kulo; futsi ngente kutsi kuvele emanti esikhundleni sawo, kute ngifihle bubi kanye netinengiso tabo ngaphambi kwebuso bami, kute ingati yebaphrofethi kanye nalabangcwele ingabe iseta nanini kimi ngalokumelene nabo.
9.8: Futsi buka, lidolobha laseGadiyandi, nelidolobha laseGadiyomina, nelidolobha laJakobe, kanye nelidolobha laseGimigimino, onkhe lawa ngente kutsi acwile, ngenta emagcuma kanye netigodzi etindzaweni tawo; labahlala kuwo ngibangcwabe ekujuleni kwemhlaba, kute ngifihle bubi kanye netinengiso tabo ngaphambi kwebuso bami, kute ingati yebaphrofethi kanye neyalabangcwele ingabe iseta kimi nanini ngalokumelene nabo.
9.9: Buka, lelo dolobha lelikhulu iJakobugathi, lebelihlala bantfu benkhosi Jakobe, ngente kutsi lishiswe ngemlilo ngenca yetono tabo kanye nebubi babo, lobebungetulu kwabo bonkhe bubi bemhlaba wonkhe, ngenca yekubulala kwabo ngansense kanye nemacembu abo angansense; ngoba bekungibo labo labacedza kuthula kwebantfu bami kanye nembuso walelive; ngako-ke ngente kutsi bashiswe, kute ngibabulale ngaphambi kwebuso bami, kute ingati yebaphrofethi neyalabangcwele ingabe iseta kimi nanini ngalokumelene nabo.
9.10: Buka, lidolobha laLamani, nelidolobha laJoshi, nelidolobha laGadi, kanye nelidolobha laKhishkhumeni, ngente kutsi ashiswe ngemlilo, kanye nalabahlala kuwo, ngenca yebubi babo ekucosheni baphrofethi, kanye nekugcoba ngematje labo lengabatfumela kutsi bamemetele kubo ngalokumelene nebubi kanye netinengiso tabo.
9.11: Ngenca yekutsi babacosha bonkhe baphuma, bekute namunye emkhatsini wabo lobekalungile, ngiwehlisile umlilo futsi ngababulala, kute bubi kanye netinengiso tabo kufihleke phambi kwebuso bami, kute ingati yebaphrofethi kanye nalabangcwele lengabatfumela emkhatsini wabo ingabe isakhala kimi ivela emhlabatsini ngalokumelene nabo.
9.12: Kubhujiswa lokuningi nalokukhulu ngikwente kutsi kwehlele etikwalelive, kanye nasetikwalabantfu, ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tabo.
9.13: Awu nine nonkhe lenisindzisiwe ngenca yekutsi benilungile kakhulu kunabo, ningabuyela yini manje kimi, niphendvuke etonweni tenu, niphindze nigucuke, kute nginiphilise na?
9.14: Yebo, ngicinisile ngitsi kini, uma ningeta kimi niyawuba nekuphila lokuphakadze. Bukani, sandla sami semusa selulelwe kini, loyo loyawukuta, ngiyawumemukela; futsi babusisiwe labo labeta kimi.
9.15: Bukani, nginguJesu Khristu iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu. Ngadala emazulu nemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letikuwo. BenginaBabe kusukela ekucaleni. NgikuBabe, naBabe ukimi; futsi ngami Babe ulidvumisile libito lakhe.
9.16: Ngeta kubami, kodvwa bami abangemukelanga. Futsi imibhalo lengcwele mayelana nekuta kwami igcwalisekile.
9.17: Ngebuningi balabo labangemukele, kubo ngibanikete kutsi babe ngemadvodzana aNkulunkulu; ngitawukwenta kanjalo nakulabo labayawukholwa egameni lami, ngoba buka, ngami kuhlengwa kuyeta, futsi kimi umtsetfo waMose ugcwalisekile.
9.18: Ngikukhanya nekuphila kwemhlaba. Ngingu-Alfa na-Omega, sicalo nesiphetfo.
9.19: Ningabe nisaletsa kimi nanini kucitfwa kwengati; yebo, imihlatjelo yenu kanye neminikelo yekushiswa iyawuyekelwa, ngoba angeke ngemukele lutfo lwemihlatjelo yenu kanye neminikelo yenu yekushiswa.
9.20: Niyawunikela umnikelo kimi wenhlitiyo ledzabukile kanye nemoya lotfobekile. Loyo lota kimi nenhlitiyo ledzabukile kanye nemoya lotfobekile, ngiyawumbhabhatisa ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele, njengemaLamani, ngenca yelukholo lwawo kimi ngesikhatsi sekuphendvuka kwawo, abhajatiswa ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele, kodvwa akakwatanga loko.
9.21: Bukani, ngite emhlabeni kute ngiletse kuhlenga emhlabeni, kute ngisindzise umhlaba esonweni.
9.22: Ngako-ke, loyo lophendvukako futsi ete kimi njengemntfwana lomncane, ngiyawumemukela, ngoba umbuso waNkulunkulu walabanjalo. Bukani, ngoba ngibeke phansi imphilo yami ngenca yalabanjalo, ngaphindze ngayitsatsa; ngako-ke phendvukani, nite kimi nine nonkhe emikhawulweni yemhlaba, futsi nisindziswe.

10.1: Manje buka, kwenteka kutsi bonkhe bantfu baseveni baweva lamavi, baphindze bawafakazela. Futsi emvakwalamavi kwabakhona kuthula eveni sikhatsi lesingemahora lamaningi
10.2: Ngoba kwaba kukhulu kakhulu kumangala kubantfu kangangekutsi bayekela kulila nekuhhewula ngenca yekulahlekelwa tihlobo tabo letatibulewe; ngako-ke kwaba khona kuthula kulo lonkhe live sikhatsi lesingemahora lamaningi
10.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaphindze kwefika livi kubantfu, bonkhe bantfu baliva, baphindze bafakaza ngalo, litsi:
10.4: Awu nine bantfu bakulamadolobha lamakhulu lawile, lenibesitukulwane saJakobe, yebo, lenibendlu yaka-Israyeli, kukangaphi nginigcogca njengesikhukhukati sifukamela emantjwele aso ngaphansi kwetimphiko taso, ngiphindze nginondla na?
10.5: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, bekuyawuba kangaphi nginigcogca njengesikhukhukati sifukamela emantjwele aso ngaphansi kwetimphiko taso, yebo, Awu nine bantfu bendlu yaka-Israyeli, labawile; yebo, Awu nine bantfu bendlu yaka-Israyeli, nine lenihlala eJerusalema, njengoba niwile; yebo, bekuyawuba kangakhi nginigcogca njengesikhukhukati sifukamela emantjwele aso, kodvwa ningavumi.
10.6: Awu wenandlu yaka-Israyeli lenginiphephisile, kuyawuba kangakhi nginigcogca njengesikhukhukati sifukamela emantjwele aso ngaphansi kwetimphiko taso, uma ningaphendvuki nibuyele kimi ngenhloso lephelele yenhlitiyo.
10.7: Kodvwa uma ningeke, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israeli, tindzawo tenu tekuhlala tiyawusala tingenabantfu kute kube sikhatsi sekugcwaliseka kwesivumelwano saboyise.
10.8: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi bantfu sebawevile lamavi, buka, bacala kukhala nekuhhewula futsi ngenca yekulahlekelwa tihlobo tabo kanye nebangani.
10.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinsuku letintsatfu tendlula kanjalo. Bekungusekuseni, bumnyama besuka eveni lonkhe, nemhlaba wema kutamatama, nemadvwala ema kuchekeka, nesililo lesesabekako saphela, nato tonkhe tiphitsiphitsi temsindvo tendlula.
10.10: Futsi umhlaba waphindze wanamatselana ndzawonye, kangangekutsi wema; lusizi, nekukhala, kanye nekulila kwebantfu labebaphephisiwe baphila kwaphela; nelusizi lwabo lwagucuka lwaba yinjabulo, nekulila kwabo kwaba yindvumiso kanye nekubonga eNkhosini Jesu Khristu, uMhlengi wabo.
10.11: Futsi kute kube ngumanje imibhalo lengcwele yabe seyigcwalisekile leyayikhulunywe baphrofethi.
10.12: Bekuyincenye lenkhulu lelungile yebantfu labasindziswa, futsi bekungulabo bebemukele baphrofethi bangabagcobi ngematje; futsi bekungulabo labebangatange bayicitse ingati yalabangcwele, labaphephiswa—
10.13: Futsi baphephiswa bangacwiliswa baphindze bangangcwatjwa ngumhlabatsi. Abatange bamitiswe ekujuleni kwelwandle; abatange bashiswe ngemlilo, noma kuwele lokutsite etikwabo bafihlitwe bate bafe; futsi abatange batfwalwe sivunguvungu; noma benganywe yinkhungu yentfutfu kanye neyebumnyama.
10.14: Manje, loyo lofundzako, akacondze; loyo lonemibhalo lengcwele, akayihlolisise, abone aphindze abuke kutsi ngabe konkhe loku kufa kanye nekubhujiswa ngemlilo, nangentfutfu, nangetiphepho, nangetivunguvungu, nangekuvuleka kwemhlaba kutsi ubamite, kanye nato tonkhe letintfo akugcwalisi yini tiphrofetho letiningi tebaphrofethi labangcwele.
10.15: Bukani, ngitsi kini, Yebo, labaningi bafakazile ngaletintfo ngekuta kwaKhristu, futsi babulawa ngoba bafakaza ngaletintfo.
10.16: Yebo, umphrofethi Zenoshe wafakaza ngaletintfo, kanjalo naZenokhi wakhuluma mayelana naletintfo, ngoba bafakaza ikakhulukati mayelana natsi, lesiyinsali yentalelwane yabo.
10.17: Bukani, babe Jakobe ngalokunjalo naye wafakaza mayelana nensali yentalelwane yaJosefa. Futsi bukani, ngabe asisiyo yini insali yentalelwane yaJosefa na? Futsi letintfo letifakaza ngatsi, ngabe atikabhalwa yini kulabongcwengcwe belitfusi babe Lehi labatsatsa eJerusalema na?
10.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekupheleni kwemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakune, bukani, ngitawunikhombisa kutsi bantfu baNefi labaphephiswa, kanjalo nalabo labebabitwa ngekutsi ngemaLamani, labaphephiswa, kwaba netento temusa lomkhulu letentelwa bona, kanye netibusiso letinkhulu letehliselwa kubo, kangangekutsi masinyane emvakwekwenyuka kwaKhristu aya ezulwini watibonakalisa ngempela kubo—
10.19: Wakhombisa umtimba wakhe kubo, wabafundzisa; nemlandvo webufundisi bakhe utawuniketwa emvakwaloku. Ngako-ke kwanyalo ngenta siphetfo semavi ami.

11.intro: Jesu Khristu wativeta kubantfu baNefi, ngesikhatsi sicuku sibutsene ndzawonye eveni iNala, wabafundzisa; futsi wativeta kubo ngalendlela.
11.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi bekunesicuku lesikhulu lebesibutsene ndzawonye, sebantfu baNefi, batungelete lithempeli lebeliseveni iNala; bamangele baphindze batibuta lomunye nalomunye, bakhombisana lomunye kulomunye ingucuko lenkhulu nalemangalisako lebeseyentekile.
11.2: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko bebakhuluma ngalo Jesu Khristu, lobekuniketwe ngaye sibonakaliso ngekufa kwakhe.
11.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi basakhuluma kanjalo lomunye nalomunye beva livi shengatsi belivela ezulwini; baphonsa emehlo abo yonkhe indzawo, ngoba bebangalicondzi lelolivi lebebaliva; futsi bekungasilo livi lebelikhahlabeta, noma livi lebelisetulu; noko nanoma bekulivi leliphansi lahlaba ekhatsi kulabo labaliva, kangangekutsi akubanga khona incenye yesicu semtimba wabo lesingatange sitfutfumale; yebo, labahlaba emphefumulweni lucobo, futsi lenta tinhlitiyo tabo kutsi titsintseke.
11.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphindze baliva lelolivi, kodvwa abatange balicondze.
11.5: Baphindze baliva kwesitsatfu lelolivi, bavula tindlebe tabo kute balive; emehlo abo bekabheke lapho bekuchamuka ngakhona umsindvo walo; babuka ngekugcila ngasezulwini, lapho umsindvo bewuchamuka ngakhona.
11.6: Buka, kwesitsatfu balicondza lelolivi labebaliva; latsi kubo:
11.7: Bukani iNdvodzana yami leTsandzekako, lengitfokotako ngayo, lengidvumise libito lami ngayo—yiveni.
11.8: Futsi kwenteka, ngesikhatsi sebalicondza lelolivi babhekisa emehlo abo ngasezulwini; buka, babona iNdvodza yehla iphuma ezulwini; beyigcoke ingubo lemhlophe; yehlela phansi yema emkhatsini wabo; emehlo esicuku sonkhe ajika abuka kuyo, abatange balokotse bavule imilomo yabo; ngisho lomunye kulomunye, bebangati kutsi loku bekuchazani, ngoba bebacabanga kutsi bekuyingilosi leyo lebeyivele kubo.
11.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi welulela sandla sakhe embili wakhuluma kubantfu watsi:
11.10: Bukani, NginguJesu Khristu, baphrofethi labafakaza ngaye kutsi uyawuta emhlabeni.
11.11: Bukani, ngikukhanya kanye nekuphila kwemhlaba; futsi nginatse kuleso sitja lesibabako Babe langinike sona, futsi ngimdvumisile Babe ngekutfwala tono temhlaba, ngaloko ngivumele intsandvo yaBabe kuto tonkhe tintfo kusukela ekucaleni.
11.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi sicuku sonkhe sawela phansi; ngoba besikhumbula kutsi bekuphrofethiwe emkhatsini wabo kutsi Khristu uyawutibonakalisa kubo emvakwekwenyukela kwakhe ezulwini.
11.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yakhuluma kubo yatsi:
11.14: Sukumani nite ngaphambili kimi, kute nifake tandla tenu eluhlangotsini lwami, niphindze nive emanceba etipikili etandleni tami kanye nasetinyaweni tami, kute nati kutsi nginguNkulunkulu waka-Israyeli, kanye naNkulunkulu wemhlaba wonkhe, futsi ngibulawelwe tono temhlaba.
11.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sicuku saya ngaphambili, safaka tandla taso eluhlangotsini lwakhe, bativa tibati tetipikili etandleni takhe kanye nasetinyaweni takhe; loku bakwenta, baya ngaphambili ngamunye nangamunye bate baya bonkhe ngaphambili, babona ngemehlo abo baphindze beva nangetandla tabo, bati ngekweliciniso baphindze baba nebufakazi, kutsi bekunguye, lokwabhalwa ngaye baphrofethi, kutsi uyawuta.
11.16: Ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebahambile baya ngaphambili futsi sebatibonele ngekwabo, bakhala ngelivi linye, batsi:
11.17: Hosana! Libusisiwe libito laNkulunkulu Longetulu Kwako Konkhe! Futsi bawela etinyaweni taJesu, bamdvumisa.
11.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakhuluma kuNefi (ngoba Nefi bekasemkhatsini wesicuku) futsi wamyaleta kutsi ete ngaphambili.
11.19: Nefi wasukuma waya ngaphambili, waguca phambikweNkhosi waphindze watanga tinyawo tayo.
11.20: INkhosi yamyaleta kutsi asukume. Wabese uyasukuma wema phambi kwayo.
11.21: INkhosi yatsi kuye: Ngikunika emandla ekutsi uyawubabhabhatisa labantfu emvakwekube sengiphindze ngenyukela ezulwini.
11.22: Yaphindza iNkhosi yabita labanye, yasho nakubo kanjalo; yabanika emandla ekubhabhatisa. Yatsi kubo: Niyawubhabhatisa ngalendlela; akuyikubakhona kuphikisana emkhatsini wenu.
11.23: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, noma ngubani lophendvukako etonweni takhe ngenca yemavi enu, aphindze afise kubhajatiswa egameni lami, niyawubabhabhatisa ngalendlela—Bukani, niyawukwehlela phansi nime emantini, futsi niyawubabhabhatisa egameni lami.
11.24: Manje bukani, lawa ngemavi leniyawuwasho, nibabita ngemagama, nitsi:
11.25: Ngeligunya lengilinikwe nguJesu Khristu, ngiyakubhabhatisa egameni laBabe, neleNdvodzana, kanye nelaMoya loNgcwele. Amen.
11.26: Emvakwaloko niyawubacwilisa emantini, niphindze nibakhiphe emantini.
11.27: Ngalendlela niyawubhabhatisa egameni lami; ngoba bukani, ngicinisile ngitsi kini, Babe, neNdvodzana, kanye naMoya loNgcwele bamunye; ngikuBabe, naBabe ukimi, futsi Babe kanye nami simunye.
11.28: Njengoba nginiyaletile niyawubhabhatisa ngaleyondlela. Akuyuba khona kuphikisana emkhatsini wenu, njengoba bekusolo kubakhona kute kube manje; noma kube khona kuphikisana emkhatsini wenu mayelana nemaphuzu emfundziso yami, njengoba bekusolo kukhona kute kube manje.
11.29: Ngoba ngicinisile, ngicinisile ngitsi kini, lonemoya wembango akusiye wami, kodvwa wadeveli, longubabe wembango, futsi uphehla tinhlitiyo tebantfu kutsi tibange ngelulaka, kulomunye nalomunye.
11.30: Bukani, lena akusiyo imfundziso yami, kuphehla tinhlitiyo tebantfu ngelulaka, lomunye avukele lomunye; kepha ngunayi imfundziso yami, kutsi tintfo letinjena kufanele tiyekelwe.
11.31: Bukani, ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ngitawubeka ngalokusobala imfundziso yami.
11.32: Lena yimfundziso yami, yimfundziso babe langinike yona; ngifakaza ngaBabe, naBabe ufakaza ngami, futsi Moya loNgcwele ufakaza ngaBabe kanye nangami; ngiyafakaza kutsi Babe uyaleta bonkhe bantfu, yonkhe indzawo, kutsi baphendvuke baphindze bakholwe kimi.
11.33: Loyo lokholwa kimi, aphindze abhajatiswe, nguye loyo loyawusindziswa; ngibo labo futsi labayawudla lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu.
11.34: Loyo longakholwa kimi; aphindze angabhajatiswa, uyawulahlwa.
11.35: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, lena yimfundziso yami, futsi ngifakaza ngayo kutsi ivela kuBabe; noma ngubani lokholwa kimi ukholwa nakuBabe; kuye Babe uyawufakaza ngami, ngoba uyawumvakashela ngemlilo kanye naMoya loNgcwele.
11.36: Futsi ngaleyondlela Babe uyawufakaza ngami, naMoya loNgcwele uyawufakaza kuye ngaBabe kanye nangami; ngoba Babe, nami, kanye naMoya loNgcwele simunye.
11.37: Ngiyaphindza ngitsi kini, kufanele niphendvuke, niphindze nibe njengemntfwana lomncane, nibhajatiswe egameni lami, ngoba ngaphandle kwaloko ayikho lenye indlela leningatfola ngayo letintfo.
11.38: Ngiyaphindza ngitsi kini, kufanele niphendvuke, niphindze nibhajatiswe egameni lami, nibe njengemntfwana lomncane, noma ngaphandle kwaloko angeke nikwati kudla lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu.
11.39: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, lena yimfundziso yami, futsi loyo lowakhela etikwaloku wakhela etikwelidvwala lami, futsi emasango esihogo angeke ababulala.
11.40: Loyo loyawumemetela lokucishe kufane naloku, aphindze akumise njengemfundziso yami, loyo uvela ebubini, futsi akakhi etikwelidvwala lami; kodvwa wakhele etikwesisekelo lesisihlabatsi, futsi emasango esihogo avulekile kwemukela labanjalo ngesikhatsi kufika tikhukhula kanye nemimoya seyishaya kubo.
11.41: Ngaloko-ke, hambani niye kulaba bantfu, nimemetele lamavi lengiwakhulumile, kute kube sekugcineni kwemhlaba.

12.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi kumaNefi, kanye nakulabo labebabitiwe, (manje sibalo salabo labebabitiwe, baphindze banikwe emandla neligunya lekubhabhatisa, bebalishumi nakubili) buka, welulela sandla sakhe esicukwini, wamemeta kuso, watsi: Nibusisiwe uma niyawuwalalela emavi alaba labalishumi nakubili lengibakhetsile emkhatsini wenu kutsi banifundzise, nekutsi babe tinceku tenu; futsi ngibanike emandla ekutsi babhabhatise ngemanti; emvakwekutsi senibhajatisiwe ngemanti, bukani, ngitawunibhabhatisa ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele; ngako-ke nibusisiwe uma niyawukholwa kimi niphindze nibhajatiswe, emvakwekutsi seningibonile phindze nati kutsi nginguye.
12.2: Ngetulu kwaloko, babusisiwe kakhulu labo labayawukholwa emavini enu ngoba niyawufakaza kutsi ningibonile, nekutsi niyati kutsi nginguye. Yebo, babusisiwe labo labayawukholwa emavi enu, behlele phansi ekujuleni kwekutitfoba baphindze babhajatiswe, ngoba bayawuvakashelwa ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele, futsi batfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tabo.
12.3: Yebo, babusisiwe labamphofu emoyeni labeta kimi, ngoba umbuso welizulu wabo.
12.4: Ngetuku kwaloko, babusisiwe bonkhe labo labakhalako, ngoba bayawudvudvutwa.
12.5: Babusisiwe labamnene, ngoba bayawudla lifa lemhlaba.
12.6: Babusisiwe bonkhe labo labalambele futsi bomele kulunga, ngoba bayawugcwaliswa ngaMoya loNgcwele.
12.8: Babusisiwe bonkhe labahlantekile enhlitiyweni, ngoba bayawumbona Nkulunkulu.
12.9: Babusisiwe bonkhe labalamulako, ngoba bayawubitwa ngekutsi babantfwana baNkulunkulu.
12.10: Babusisiwe bonkhe labo labahlushwa ngenca yelibito lami, ngoba umbuso welizulu wabo.
12.11: Futsi nibusisiwe uma bantfu bayawunetfuka baphidze banihluphe, basho yonkhe inhlobo yebubi lengemanga ngani, ngenca yami;
12.12: Ngoba niyawuba nenjabulo lenkhulu futsi nitfokote kakhulu, ngoba uyawuba mkhulu umvuzo wenu ezulwini; ngoba babahlupha kanjalo baphrofethi labanendvulela.
12.13: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ngininika kutsi nibe luswayi lwemhlaba; kodvwa uma luswayi luphelelwa bunandzi balo umhlaba uyawutselwa ngaluphi luswayi na? Lolo swayi lusuke ngaleso sikhatsi selungenamsebenti walutfo, kodvwa kutsi lulahlwe ngephandle lunyatselwe ngaphansi kwetinyawo tebantfu.
12.14: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ngininika kutsi nibe kukhanya kwalabantfu. Lidolobha lelakhiwe entsabeni angeke lisitseke.
12.15: Bukani, ngabe bantfu bayasikhanyisa yini sibane bese basibeka ngaphansi kwesitja na? Cha, kodvwa elutsini lwesibane, bese sikhanyisela bonkhe labasendlini;
12.16: Ngako-ke kukhanya kwenu akukhanye phambi kwalabantfu, kute babone imisebenti yenu lemihle futsi badvumise Babe losezulwini.
12.17: Ningacabangi kutsi ngitele kutawucitsa umtsetfo noma baphrofethi. Angiketeli kutawucitsa kodvwa kutawugcwalisa.
12.18: Ngoba ngicinisile ngitsi kini, kute liganyana linye nelichashatana linye lelisusiwe emtsetfweni, kodvwa kimi konkhe kugcwalisekile.
12.19: Bukani, ngininike umtsetfo kanye nemiyaleto yaBabe, kutsi nikholwe kimi, nekutsi niphendvuke etonweni tenu, nite kimi ngenhlitiyo ledzabukile nemoya lotfobekile. Bukani, ninemiyaleto ngaphambi kwenu, futsi nemtsetfo ugcwalisekile.
12.20: Ngako-ke wotani kimi futsi nisindziswe; ngoba ngicinisile ngitsi kini, ngaphandle kwekutsi nigcine imiyaleto yami, lenginiyalete ngayo ngalesi sikhatsi, angeke ningene embusweni welizulu.
12.21: Nivile kutsi kushiwo kubakadzeni, futsi ngetulu kwaloko kubhaliwe phambi kwenu, kutsi ungabulali, ngoba loyo lobulalako uyawuba sengotini yekwehlulelwa nguNkulunkulu;
12.22: Kodvwa ngitsi kini, loyo lotfukutselela umnakabo uyawuba sengotini yekwehlulelwa nguye. Futsi loyo loyawutsi kumnakabo, Silima, uyawuba sengotini emtsetfweni; naloyo loyawutsi, Wena siwula, uyawuba sengotini yemlilo wesihogo.
12.23: Ngako-ke, uma uyawukuta kimi, noma uyawufisa kuta kimi, futsi ukhumbule kutsi umnakenu unalokutsite ngawe—
12.24: Hamba uye kumnakenu, ucale ubuyisane nemnakenu, bese uta kimi ngenhloso lephelele yenhlitiyo, ngitawukwemukela.
12.25: Buyisana nesitsa sakho ngekushesha ngesikhatsi usendleleni naso, hleze nangasiphi sikhatsi sikutfole, bese uphonswa ejele.
12.26: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe, angeke uphume lapho ungakakhiphi isenine yekugcina ngci. Futsi ngesikhatsi usejele ungayikhipha yini isenine leyodvwa na? Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe, Cha.
12.27: Bukani, kubhaliwe ngulabo betikhatsi takadzeni, kutsi ungaphingi;
12.28: Kodvwa mine ngitsi kini, loyo lobuka wesifazane, bese uyamkhanuka, sewuvele uphingile enhlitiyweni yakhe.
12.29: Bukani, ngininika umyaleto, wekutsi ningavumeli nayinye yaleti tintfo kutsi ingene inhlitiyweni yenu;
12.30: Ngoba kuncono kutsi ungativumeli letintfo, ngaloko utawutfwala siphambano sakho, kunekutsi uphonswe esihogweni.
12.31: Kubhaliwe, kutsi loyo loyawulahla umkakhe, akamnike incwadzi yesehlukaniso.
12.32: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, loyo loyawulahla umkakhe, ngaphandle kwebugwadla, umenta kutsi aphinge; naloyo loyawutsatsa loyo lolahliwe uyaphinga.
12.33: Ngetulu kwaloko kubhaliwe kutsi, ungawafungeli emanga, kodvwa yenta tifungo takho eNkhosini;
12.34: Kodvwa ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ningafungi sanhlobo; noma ngelizulu, ngoba lisihlalo sebukhosi saNkulunkulu;
12.35: Noma ngemhlaba, ngoba usenabelo setinyawo takhe;
12.36: Noma ufunge ngenhloko yakho, ngoba angeke ugucule nalunye lunwele lube mnyama noma lube mhlophe;
12.37: Kodvwa ekukhulumisaneni kwenu nibotsi Yebo, yebo; Cha, cha; ngoba noma yini lendlula loku yimbi.
12.38: Bukani, kubhaliwe kutsi, liso ngeliso, litinyo ngelitinyo;
12.39: Kodvwa mine ngitsi, ningamelani nalokubi, kodvwa loyo lokumukula esihlatsini sangesekudla, mnike nalesi lesinye futsi;
12.40: Futsi noma ngabe ngubani lokumangalela emtsetfweni atsatse libhantji lakho, mnike nelijazi lakho futsi;
12.41: Futsi loyo loyawukuphocelela kutsi uhambe likhilomitha, hamba naye abe mabili.
12.42: Mnike loyo locela lutfo kuwe, naloyo loboleka kuwe ungamtsalaliseli.
12.43: Bukani kubhaliwe futsi, kutsi ubotsandza makhelwane wakho utondze sitsa sakho;
12.44: Kodvwa bukani, mine ngitsi kini, tsandzani titsa tenu, nibabusise labo labanicalekisako, nente lokuhle kulabo labanitondzako, nibathandazele labo labanisebentisa ngalokungakalungi kanye nalabo labanihluphako;
12.45: Kute nibe bantfwana baBabe losezulwini, ngoba yena wenta lilanga lakhe kutsi liphume kulababi nalabahle.
12.46: Ngako-ke leto tintfo letatisesikhatsini sakadzeni, letatingephansi kwemtsetfo, kimi tonkhe tigcwalisekile.
12.47: Tintfo takadzeni tiyekeliwe, tonkhe tintfo setinsha.
12.48: Ngako-ke ngifuna kutsi nani niphelele njengami, noma njengoba Babe losezulwini aphelele.

13.1: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile ngitsi ngifisa kutsi nentele labamphofu tento temusa; kodvwa ngicinisile kutsi anitenti tento tenu temusa ngaphambi kwebantfu kute nibukwe ngibo; ngaphandle kwaloko aninamvuzo kuBabe losezulwini.
13.2: Ngako-ke, nawupha lutfo kumuntfu loweswele ungamemeteli, njengoba kwenta batentisi emasinagogeni kanye nasetitaladini, khona batawudvunyiswa bantfu. Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, sebawemukele umvuzo wabo.
13.3: Kodvwa uma wena upha tipho sandla sakho sangesencele asingakwati lesikwentako sangesekudla.
13.4: Kute tipho takho tibe sekusitsekeni; khona uyihlo lobona ekusitsekeni, utakunika umvuzo ngalokusobala.
13.5: Uma uthandaza ungenti njengebatentisi, ngoba bona bayakutsandza kuthandaza, beme emasinagogeni kanye nasemajikeni etitaladi, kute babonwe bantfu, Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, sebavele bawutfolile umvuzo wabo.
13.6: Kodvwa wena, uma uthandaza, ngena endlini yakho, futsi uma sewuwuvalile umnyango, thandaza kuBabe losekusitsekeni; futsi Babe, lobona ekusitsekeni, uyawukunika umvuzo ngalokusobala.
13.7: Kodvwa uma nithandaza, ningalibali kusho emagama lamanyenti langasho lutfo, njengebetive, ngoba bona bacabanga kutsi bayawuvakala ngekukhuluma kwabo lokunyenti.
13.8: Ngako-ke ningafani nabo, ngoba Babe utati kucala tintfo lenitidzingako ngaphambi kwekutsi niticele kuye.
13.9: Ngako-ke kufanele kutsi nithandaze ngalendlela: Babe wetfu losezulwini, alingcweliswe libito lakho.
13.10: Intsandvo yakho ayentiwe emhlabeni njengoba yentiwa ezulwini.
13.11: Usitsetselele tono tetfu, njengoba natsi sibatsetselela labasonako.
13.13: Ngoba umbuso ngewakho, nemandla, nebukhosi, kute kube phakadze. Amen.
13.14: Ngoba, uma nibatsetselela bantfu tono tabo Babe losezulwini naye uyawunitsetselela nani;
13.15: Kodvwa uma ningabatsetseleli bantfu tiphambuko tabo naBabe angeke anitsetselele tono tenu.
13.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, uma nizila kudla ningabi njengebatentisi, lababa nebuso lobulusizi, ngoba bona banyukubalisa buso babo kute babonakale kubantfu kutsi bazile kudla. Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, sebawemukele wabo umvuzo.
13.17: Kodvwa wena, uma uzila kudla, gcobisa inhloko yakho, futsi ugeze nebuso bakho;
13.18: Kute ungabonakali kubantfu kutsi uzile kudla, kodvwa kuBabe losekusitsekeni; futsi Babe, lobona ekusitsekeni, utakunika umvuzo ngalokusobala.
13.19: Ningatibekeli umcebo wenu lapha emhlabeni, lapho umvunya kanye nekutfomba kungawudla, nalapho emasela agcekeza khona futsi awebe;
13.20: Kodvwa tibekeleni umcebo wenu ezulwini, lapho umvunya nekutfomba kungenakona khona, futsi lapho emasela angenakugcekeza khona noma ebe.
13.21: Ngoba lapho kukhona umcebo wakho khona, nenhlitiyo yakho itawuba khona.
13.22: Sibane semtimba liso; ngako-ke uma, liso lakho liphilile, umtimba wakho wonkhe uyawugcwala kukhanya.
13.23: Kodvwa uma liso lakho lilibi, umtimba wakho wonkhe uyawugcwala bumnyama. Ngako-ke, uma, loko kukhanya lokukuwe kubumnyama, bukhulu kanganani lobo bumnyama!
13.24: Kute umuntfu longakhonta emakhosi lamabili; ngoba kusemkhatsini wekutsi uyawuyizonda lenye atsandze lenye, noma uyawubambelela kulenye ayidzelele lenye. Angeke ukhonte Nkulunkulu kanye nemcebo.
13.25: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi wabuka kulabalishumi nakubili labo labekabakhetsile, watsi kubo: Khumbulani emavi lengiwakhulumile. Ngoba bukani, ningulabo lengibakhetsile kutsi bafundzise laba bantfu. Ngako-ke ngitsi kini, ningacabangi ngemphilo yenu, kutsi nitawudlani, nitawunatsani; noma nangemitimba yenu, kutsi nitawukwembatsani. Ngabe imphilo ayikabaluleki yini kunenyama, kanye nemtimba kunetembatfo na?
13.26: Bukani tinyoni temoya, ngoba tona atihlanyeli, futsi ativuni noma atigcogceli etilulwini; kodvwa Babe loseZulwini uyatondla. Ngabe nine anincono yini kakhulu kunato na?
13.27: Ngumuphi kini lokungatsi ngekucabanga nje angete budze bengalo leyodvwa?
13.28: Kungani nikhatsateka ngetimphahla na? Bukani timbali temhlaba kutsi tikhula njani; atikhandleki, futsi atitfungi;
13.29: Kodvwa ngitsi kini, ngisho naSolomoni, kubo bonkhe bukhosi bakhe, bekangakambatsi ngisho njengayinye yato.
13.30: Ngako-ke, uma Nkulunkulu abembatsisa kanjena tjani basendle, lobukhona namuhla, bese kutsi ngakusasa bushe, ngisho nani niyawukwembatsiswa kanje, uma ningasibo belukholo loluncane.
13.31: Ngako-ke ningakhatsateki, nitsi, Sitawudlani? noma, Sitawunatsani? noma, Sitawukwembatsani na?
13.32: Ngoba Babe losezulwini uyati kutsi niyatidzinga tonkhe letintfo.
13.33: Kepha funani kucala umbuso waNkulunkulu kanye nekulunga kwakhe, khona tonkhe letintfo titawukwengetelwa kini.
13.34: Ngako-ke ningakhatsateki ngelikusasa, ngoba likusasa liyawutikhatsalela ngetintfo talo. Tinkhatsato telusuku tenele lona.

14.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi waphindze wagucukela esicukwini, waphindze wavula umlomo wakhe kuso, watsi: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, Ningehluleli, kute nani ningetukwehlulelwa.
14.2: Ngoba ngaloko kwehlulela lenehlulela ngako, nani niyakwehlulelwa ngako; futsi nangeleso silinganiso lenilinganisa ngaso, nani niyakulinganiswa ngaso futsi.
14.3: Futsi ulunakeni lutsi lolusesweni lemnakenu, kodvwa ube ungaluboni lugodvo lolusesweni lakho na?
14.4: Noma ungasho kanjani kumnakenu kutsi: Ngivumele ngikhiphe lutsi lolusesweni lakho—kodvwa buka lugodvo lolusesweni lakho na?
14.5: Wena mtentisi, khipha kucala lugondvo lolusesweni lakho; emvakwaloko utawubona kahle kute ukhiphe lutsi lolusesweni lemnakenu.
14.6: Ningatiniki tinja lokungcwele, noma niphonse ematje enu laligugu etihhontjini, hleze tiwagcobagcobe ngaphansi kwetinselo tato, bese tigucukela kini tiyanidzabudzabula.
14.7: Celani, nitawuphiwa; funani, nitawutfola; nconcotsani, nitawuvulelwa.
14.8: Ngoba nguloyo naloyo locelako, uyaniketwa; naloyo lofunako, uyatfola; futsi naloyo lonconcotsako uyavulelwa.
14.9: Ngumuphi kini, lokungatsi uma indvodzana yakhe icela sinkhwa, ayinike litje na?
14.10: Noma uma icela inhlanti, yena ayinike inyoka na?
14.11: Uma nine, lenibabi, nikwati kupha bantfwana benu tipho letinhle, angabanika kangakanani tintfo letinhle Babe loseZulwini labo labacela kuye na?
14.12: Ngako-ke, konkhe lenifisa kutsi bantfu bakwente kini, kwenteni nani kubo, ngoba ngulowo umtsetfo kanye nalokushiwo baphrofethi.
14.13: Ngenani ngelisango lelincane; ngoba libanti lisango, kantsi nendlela ibanti, leholela ekubhujisweni, futsi labaningi bayawuhamba ngayo;
14.14: Ngoba lincane lisango, nendlela ingumntjuntju, leholela ekuphileni, futsi bambalwa labayitfolako.
14.15: Caphelani baphrofethi bemanga, labeta kini bembetse tingubo tetimvu, kodvwa ngekhatsi batimphisi letibukhali.
14.16: Niyawubati ngemisebenti yabo. Ngabe bantfu bangawakha yini emagelebisi etihlahleni temanyeva, noma emakhiwa elugaganeni na?
14.17: Kanjalo sonkhe sihlahla lesihle sitsela titselo letimnandzi; kodvwa sihlahla lesibi sitsela titselo letimbi.
14.18: Sihlahla lesihle singeke sitsele titselo letimbi, noma sihlahla lesibi sitsele titselo letimnandzi.
14.19: Sonkhe sihlahla lesingatseli titselo letinhle siyajutjwa, silahlwe emlilweni.
14.21: Akusibo bonkhe labayawutsi kimi, Nkhosi, Nkhosi, labayawungena embusweni welizulu; kodvwa ngulabo labenta intsandvo yaBabe losezulwini.
14.22: Ngalolosuku labaningi bayawukutsi kimi: Nkhosi, Nkhosi, asikaphrofethi yini ngelibito lakho, futsi ngelibito lakho sakhipha bodeveli, nangelibito lakho senta imisebenti leminingi lemangalisako na?
14.23: Emvakwaloko ngiyawubaphendvula ngitsi: Angizange nginati; sukani kimi, nine benti balokubi.
14.24: Ngako-ke, noma ngubani lova lamavi ami futsi awente, ngitawumfanisa nendvodza lehlakaniphile, leyakha indlu yayo etikwelidvwala—
14.25: Kwase kuna imvula, kwafika tikhukhula, nemimoya yahhusha, yetama kuphephula lendlu; kodvwa ayiwanga, ngoba yayakhelwe esisekelweni selidvwala.
14.26: Futsi loyo naloyo lova lamavi ami kodvwa angawenti utawufaniswa nendvodza lesiwula, leyakha indlu yayo etikwesihlabatsi—
14.27: Kwase kuna imvula, kwafika tikhukhula, nemimoya yahhusha, yaphephuka lendlu; yawa, kwaba kukhulu kuwa kwayo.

15.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekacedzile kukhuluma lenkhulumo waphonsa emehlo akhe esicukwini, futsi watsi kuso: Bukani, nitivile tintfo lengatifundzisa ngaphambi kwekutsi ngenyukele kuBabe; ngako-ke, loyo lowakhumbulako lamavi ami futsi awente, ngiyawumvusa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
15.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawashito lamavi wabona kutsi bekukhona labanye emkhatsini wabo labamangala, batibuta kutsi bekafuna benteni mayelana nemtsetfo waMosi; ngoba bebangawucondzi umbhalo lotsi tintfo letindzala bese tendlulile, nekutsi tonkhe tintfo bese titinsha.
15.3: Futsi watsi kubo: Ningamangali kutsi ngitsite kini tintfo letindzala setendlulile, nekutsi tonkhe tintfo setinsha.
15.4: Bukani, ngitsi kini umtsetfo sewugcwalisiwe lobewuniketwe Mosi.
15.5: Bukani, nginguye loyo lowaniketa umtsetfo, futsi nginguye loyo lowenta tivumelwano nebantfu bami baka-Israyeli; ngako-ke, umtsetfo kimi ugcwalisekile, ngoba ngite kutawugcwalisa umtsetfo; ngako-ke sewufike esiphetfweni.
15.6: Bukani, angiphikisani nebaphrofethi, ngoba njengoba lokuningi kungakagcwaliseki kimi, ngicinisile ngitsi kini, konkhe kuyawugcwaliseka.
15.7: Futsi ngenca yekutsi ngitsite kini tintfo letindzala setendlulile, angiphikisani naloko lokwakhulunywa mayelana netintfo letisetawukwenteka.
15.8: Ngoba bukani, sivumelwano lengasenta nebantfu bami asikagcwaliseki sonkhe; kodvwa umtsetfo lobewuniketwe Mosi sewunesiphetfo kimi.
15.9: Bukani, ngingumtsetfo, kanye nekukhanya. Bukani kimi, niphindze nibeketele kute kube sekugcineni, futsi niyawuphila; ngoba loyo loyawubeketela kute kube sekugcineni, ngiyomnika kuphila lokuphakadze.
15.10: Bukani, ngininike imiyaleto; ngako-ke gcinani imiyaleto yami. Futsi lona ngumtsetfo kanye nemfundziso yebaphrofethi, ngoba ngempela bafakaza ngami.
15.11: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi, watsi kulabo labalishumi nakubili labekabakhetsile:
15.12: Nibafundzi bami; futsi nikukhanya kulaba bantfu, labayinsali yendlu yaJosefa.
15.13: Bukani, leli live lelilifa lenu; futsi Babe uninike lona.
15.14: Futsi asikho nalesisodvwa sikhatsi lapho Babe anginika umyaleto wekutsi ngibatjele loku labomnakenu labaseJerusalema.
15.15: Futsi asikho nalesisodvwa sikhatsi lapho Babe anginika umyaleto wekutsi ngibatjele mayelana naletinye tive tendlu yaka-Israyeli, Babe latihola watikhipha kulelolive.
15.16: Wangiyaleta ngaloku kuphela Babe, kutsi ngibatjele kutsi;
15.17: Nginaletinye timvu letingasito talesi sibaya; futsi nato ngalokunjalo kufanele ngitihole, nato tiyawuliva livi lami; kuyawuba khona umhlambi munye, kanye nemelusi munye.
15.18: Manje, ngenca yekuba bonhloko lukhuni kanye nekungakholwa abalicondzanga livi lami; ngako-ke ngayaletwa nguBabe kutsi ngingabe ngisasho lutfo mayelana nalentfo kubo.
15.19: Kodvwa ngicinisile, ngitsi kini Babe ungiyaletile, futsi ngiyanitjela, kutsi nine nehlukaniswa nabo ngenca yebubi babo; ngako-ke kungenca yebubi babo kutsi bangati ngani.
15.20: Ngicinisile ngiyaphindza ngitsi kini letinye tive Babe watisusa kubo; futsi kungenca yebubi babo kutsi bangati ngato.
15.21: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, ningibo labo lengatsi ngabo: Nginaletinye timvu letingasito talesi sibaya; nato kufanele ngitihole, nato tiyawuliva livi lami; futsi kuyawuba khona umhlambi munye, kanye nemelusi munye.
15.22: Abatange bangicondze, ngoba bebacabanga kutsi bekubeTive; ngoba bebangacondzi kutsi beTive bebayawuphendvuka ngekushumayela kwabo.
15.23: Abangicondzanga ngesikhatsi ngitsi tiyawuliva livi lami; futsi abacondzanga uma ngitsi beTive ngeke balive livi lami nangasiphi sikhatsi—nekutsi angiyukutibonakalisa kubo ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngaMoya loNgcwele.
15.24: Kodvwa bukani, nine nilivile livi lami, naphindze nangibona; futsi nitimvu tami, nibalwa nalabo Babe langinike bona.

16.1: Futsi ngicinisile, ngicinisile ngitsi kini nginaletinye timvu, letingasito talelive, noma telive laseJerusalema, noma nakuletinye tincenye telive letitungelete lapho sengike ngaya khona ngayawufundzisa.
16.2: Ngoba labo lengikhuluma ngabo ngulabo labasengakaliva livi lami; noma lengingakaze nangasiphi sikhatsi ngitibonakalise kubo.
16.3: Kodvwa ngitfole umyaleto lovela kuBabe wekutsi ngihambe ngiye kubo, nekutsi bayawuliva livi lami, futsi bayawubalwa kanye netimvu tami, kute kube khona umhlambi munye kanye nemelusi munye; ngako-ke ngiyahamba ngiyawutibonakalisa kubo.
16.4: Ngiyaniyaleta kutsi niwabhale lamavi emvakwekube sengihambile, kute kutsi uma kwenteka kutsi bantfu bami eJerusalema, labo labangibonile futsi baba nami ebufundisini bami, bangaceli kuBabe egameni lami, kute batfole lwati ngani ngaMoya loNgcwele, kanjalo nangaletinye tive labangatati, kute kutsi lamavi leniyawuwabhala agcinwe futsi abonakaliswe kubo beTive, kute kutsi ngekuphelela kwebeTive, insali yentalelwane yabo, leyawube ihlakateke mhlaba wonkhe ngenca yekungakholwa kwabo, iletfwe, noma iletfwe ekwatini mine, uMhlengi wabo.
16.5: Ngaleso sikhatsi ngitawuyigcogca emagumbini lamane emhlaba; futsi ngaleso sikhatsi ngitawusigcwalisa sivumelwano Babe lasenta kubo bonkhe bantfu bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
16.6: Futsi babusisiwe beTive, ngenca yekukholwa kwabo kimi, kanye nakuMoya loNgcwele, lofakaza kubo ngami kanye nangaBabe.
16.7: Bukani, ngenca yekukholwa kwabo kimi, kusho Babe, nangenca yekungakholwa kwenu, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, ngetinsuku tekugcina liciniso liyawukuta kubeTive, kutsi kuphelela kwaletintfo kuyawukwembulwa kubo.
16.8: Kodvwa maye, kusho Babe, kulabangakholwa beTive—ngoba nanoma sebete ngaphambili eveni lonkhe, futsi bahlakata bantfu bami lababendlu yaka-Israyeli; futsi bantfu bami lababendlu yaka-Israyeli bakhishelwe ngephandle kubo, bagcotjwagcotjwa ngaphansi kwetinyawo ngibo.
16.9: Futsi ngenca yesihawu saBabe kubeTive, ngetulu kwaloko netehlulelo taBabe kubantfu bami lababendlu yaka-Israyeli, ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, emvakwakokonkhe loku, ngente bantfu bami lababendlu yaka-Israyeli kutsi bashaywe, bahlushwe, babulawe, nekutsi bakhishwelwe ngephandle emkhatsini wabo, nekutsi batondvwe ngibo, futsi babe yinhlekisa kanye nentfo yekwedzelelwa emkhatsini wabo—
16.10: Ngaleyondlela Babe ungiyalete kutsi ngitsi kini: Ngalolosuku lapho beTive bayawukona ngalokumelene nelivangeli lami, balahle livangeli leliphelele lami, batikhukhumete etinhlitiyweni tabo ngetulu kwetive tonkhe, nangetulu kwebantfu bonkhe bemhlaba wonkhe, bagcwale tonkhe tinhlobo temanga, netenkhohliso, nekuganga, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tekutentisa, netekubulala, netebuphristi-mbumbulu, netebugwadla, kanye netinengiso letiyimfihlo; uma bayawukweta tonkhe letintfo, balilahle livangeli leliphelele lami, bukani, kusho Babe, ngiyawulitsatsa livangeli lami leliphelele emkhatsini wabo.
16.11: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi ngiyawusikhumbula sivumelwano sami lengasenta kubantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, ngiyawuliletsa livangeli lami kubo.
16.12: Futsi ngiyawukukhombisa, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, kutsi beTive angeke babe nemandla ngetulu kwakho; kodvwa ngiyawusikhumbula sivumelwano sami kuwe, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi uyakuba nelwati loluphelele ngelivangeli lami.
16.13: Kodvwa uma beTive batawuphendvuka babuyele kimi, kusho Babe, bukani bayawubalwa kanye nebantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
16.14: Futsi angeke ngivumele bantfu bami, lababendlu yaka-Israyeli, kutsi bahambe badzabule emkhatsini wabo, babagcobagcobe phansi, kusho Babe.
16.15: Kodvwa uma bangeke baphendvukele kimi, futsi balalele livi lami, ngitawubavumela, yebo ngitawubavumela bantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, kutsi bahambe badzabule emkhatsini wabo, babagcobagcobe phansi, futsi bayawuba njengeluswayi loselulahlekelwe bunandzi balo, lolutsi kusuka ngaleso sikhatsi lungasasiti ngalutfo kodvwa kutsi lulahlwe ngaphandle, lunyatselwe ngaphansi kwetinyawo tebantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
16.16: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, Babe ungiyalete kanjalo—kutsi nginike labantfu lendzawo kube lifa labo.
16.17: Ngaleso sikhatsi emavi emphrofethi Isaya ayawugcwaliseka, atsi:
16.18: Balindzi bakho bayawumemeta; ngelivi kanyekanye bayawuhlabela, ngoba bayawutibonela ngewabo emehlo ngesikhatsi iNkhosi iphindze ibuyisa iSiyoni.
16.19: Hlokomani ngenjabulo, hlabelani kanyekanye, nine tindzawo letitindzala taseJerusalema; ngoba iNkhosi ibadvudvutile bantfu bayo, iyihlengile iJerusalema.
16.20: INkhosi iwembulile umkhono wayo longcwele emehlweni etive tonkhe; futsi yonkhe imikhawulo yemhlaba iyawubona insindziso yaNkulunkulu.

17.1: Buka kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi waphindze wabuka esicukwini, watsi kubo: Bukani, sikhatsi sami sesifikile.
17.2: Ngiyabona kutsi nibutsakatsaka, nekutsi ngeke niwacondze onkhe lamavi lengiyaletwe nguBabe kutsi ngiwakhulume kini ngalesi sikhatsi.
17.3: Ngako-ke, hambani niye emakhaya enu, futsi nizindle ngetintfo lengitishito, nicele kuBabe, egameni lami, kute nicondze, futsi nilungise tingcondvo tenu tilungele likusasa, futsi ngitawuphindze ngite kini.
17.4: Kodvwa manje sengiya kuBabe, futsi etikwaloko ngiyawutibonakalisa etiveni letilahlekile taka-Israyeli, ngoba atikalahleki kuBabe, ngoba yena uyati kutsi watiyisa ngakuphi.
17.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekakhulumile kanjalo, waphindze waphonsa emehlo akhe esicukwini, buka bese bakhala, babuka kuye ngekugcila shengatsi bebatamcela kutsi ahlale nabo sikhashana lesidze.
17.6: Watsi kubo: Bukani, tibilini tami tigcwele sihawu ngani.
17.7: Ninabo yini labagulako emkhatsini wenu na? Baletseni la. Ninabo yini labatishosha, labatimphumphutse, noma labachutako, labakhubatekile, labanebulephelo, labo labafe tinhlangotsi, labatimungulu, noma labo labeva buhlungu noma ngayiphi indlela na? Baletseni la kute ngitawubelapha, ngoba nginesihawu ngani; tibilini tami tigcwele umusa.
17.8: Ngoba ngiyabona nifisa kutsi nginitjengise kutsi ngentani kubomnakenu eJerusalema, ngoba ngiyabona kutsi lukholo lwenu lwenele kutsi nginelaphe.
17.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekakhulume kanjalo, sonkhe sicuku, kanye kanye, saya ngaphambili, labagulako babo nalabeva buhlungu, labatishosha, timphumphutse, kanye nabo bonkhe labebeva buhlungu noma ngayiphi indlela; futsi wabelapha bonkhe ngamunye ngesikhatsi baletfwa ngaphambili kuye.
17.10: Bonkhe, labo labebalashiwe kanye nalabo labebaphila, baguca phansi etinyaweni takhe, bamkhonta; futsi ngebuningi balabo labebeta esicukwini bamanga tinyawo takhe, kangangekutsi batimantisa tinyawo takhe ngetinyembeti tabo.
17.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabayaleta kutsi baletse bantfwana babo labancane.
17.12: Ngako-ke babaletsa bantfwana babo labancane babahlalisa phansi bamtungeleta, Jesu wema emkhatsini; sicuku savula indlela bate bonkhe baletfwa kuye.
17.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebaletsiwe, naJesu sekeme emkhatsini, wayaleta sicuku kutsi siguce phansi.
17.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebaguce phansi, Jesu wabubula ngekhatsi kwakhe, watsi: Babe ngikhatsatekile ngenca yebubi bebantfu bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
17.15: Futsi ngesikhatsi sekashito lamavi, naye lucobolwakhe waguca phansi; buka wathandaza kuBabe, tintfo latikhuluma ngeke tibhalwe, futsi sicuku sakufakazela loko labo labamuva.
17.16: Futsi bafakaza ngalendlela: Liso alikate likubone loku, noma indlebe ayikate ikuve loku, ngaphambili, tintfo letinkhulu futsi naletimangalisako kangaka ngesikhatsi sibona futsi siva Jesu atikhuluma kuBabe;
17.17: Futsi kute lulwimi lolungatikhuluma, kute umuntfu longatibhala, noma kute tinhlitiyo tebantfu letingaticabanga tintfo letinkhulu futsi naletimangalisa kangaka ngesikhatsi sibona siphindze siva Jesu atikhuluma; futsi kute namunye longayicabanga intfokoto leyagcwala imiphefumulo yetfu ngesikhatsi simuva asikhulekela kuBabe.
17.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekacedzile kuthandaza kuBabe, wasukuma; kodvwa beyiyinkhulu kakhulu intfokoto esicukwini kangangekutsi senganywa.
17.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jesu wakhuluma kubo, wabacela kutsi basukume.
17.20: Basukuma, futsi watsi kubo: Nibusisiwe ngenca yelukholo lwenu. Manje bukani, intfokoto yami igcwele.
17.21: Futsi ngesikhatsi sekawashito lamavi, wakhala, sicuku sakufakazela loko, waphindze watsatsa bantfwana babo labancane, ngamunye nangamunye, wababusisa, futsi wabathandazela kuBabe.
17.22: Futsi ngesikhatsi sekakwentile loku waphindze wakhala;
17.23: Wakhuluma esicukwini, watsi kuso: Bukani bantfwana benu.
17.24: Futsi ngesikhatsi bacalata kutsi babone baphonsa emehlo abo ezulwini, babona emazulu avuleka, babona tingilosi tehla tiphuma ezulwini shengatsi betisekhatsi emlilweni; tehlela phansi taphindze tatungeleta labo bantfwana, batungeletwa ngemlilo; tingilosi tabasita.
17.25: Sicuku sabona saphindze seva futsi sakufakazela loku; futsi bayati kutsi bufakazi babo buliciniso ngoba bonkhe ngamunye batibonela baphindze bativela, wonkhe umuntfu ngekwakhe; bebasibalo lesingangetinkhulungwane letimbili kanye nemakhulu lasihlanu ebantfu; futsi kuso bekukhona emadvodza, besifazane kanye nebantfwana.

18.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jesu wayaleta bafundzi bakhe kutsi baletse kuye sinkhwa kanye neliwayini.
18.2: Ngesikhatsi basahambile kuyawulandza sinkhwa neliwayini, wayaleta sicuku kutsi sihlale phansi.
18.3: Ngesikhatsi bafundzi sebafikile nesinkhwa kanye neliwayini, wasitsatsa sinkhwa wasihlephula waphindze wasibusisa; futsi wanika bafundzi wase ubayaleta kutsi basidle.
18.4: Emvakwekutsi sebasidlile futsi sebesutsi, wabayaleta kutsi banike sicuku.
18.5: Ngesikhatsi sicuku sesidlile futsi sesutsa, watsi kubafundzi: Bukani kuyawubakhona munye emkhatsini wenu loyawugcotjwa, futsi ngitawumnika emandla ekutsi uyawuhlephula sinkhwa asibusise bese usinika bantfu belibandla lami, kubo bonkhe labo labayawukholwa baphindze babhajatiswe egameni lami.
18.6: Futsi loku niyawucaphela ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi kutsi niyakwenta, njengoba nami ngentile, ngisho njengoba ngisihlephulile sinkhwa, ngasibusisa ngaphindze nganinika sona.
18.7: Futsi loku niyawukwenta kute nikhumbule umtimba wami, lenginitjengise wona. Futsi kuyawuba bufakazi kuBabe kutsi nihlale ningikhumbula njalo. Futsi uma ningikhumbula njalo Moya wami uyawuba nani njalo.
18.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekawashito lamavi, wayaleta bafundzi bakhe kutsi batsatse liwayini kuyo indzebe balinatse, nekutsi banike sicuku kute naso ngalokunjalo silinatse.
18.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi benta njalo, balinatsa benela, base banika sicuku, naso salinatsa, senela.
18.10: Ngesikhatsi bafundzi sebakwentile loku, Jesu watsi kubo: Nibusisiwe ngalentfo leniyentile, ngoba loku kugcwalisa imiyaleto yami, futsi loku kufakazela kuBabe kutsi nitimisele kwenta loko lenginiyalete ngako.
18.11: Futsi loku niyawukwenta njalo kulabo labaphendvukako baphindze babhajatiswe egameni lami; futsi niyawukwenta kukhumbula ingati yami, lengayicitsela nine, kute nifakaze kuBabe kutsi niyangikhumbula njalo. Futsi uma ningikhumbula njalo Moya wami uyawukuba nani njalo.
18.12: Futsi ngininika umyaleto wekutsi nitente letintfo. Uma niyawutenta njalo letintfo nibusisiwe, ngoba nakhelwe etikwelidvwala lami.
18.13: Kodvwa noma ngubani na emkhatsini wenu loyawukwenta lokucishe kufane naloku akakhi etikwelidvwala lami, kodvwa wakhele esisekelweni lesisihlabatsi; futsi uma imvula yehla, netikhukhula tifika, nemimoya ihhusha, ishaya etikwabo, bayawukuwa, nemasango esihogo asavele avulekile kubemukela.
18.14: Ngako-ke nibusisiwe uma niyawuyigcina imiyaleto yami, Babe langiyalete kutsi ngininike yona.
18.15: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, kufanele nicaphele niphindze nithandaze njalo, hleze nilingwe ngudeveli, niholelwe ekutfunjweni nguye.
18.16: Futsi njengoba ngithandazile emkhatsini wenu nani ngalokunjalo kumele nithandaze ebandleni lami, emkhatsini webantfu bami labo labaphendvukako baphindze babhajatiswe egameni lami. Bukani ngikukhanya; nginibekele sibonelo.
18.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi kubafundzi bakhe, waphindze wagucukela esicukwini watsi kuso:
18.18: Bukani, ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, kufanele nicaphele niphindze nithandaze njalo hleze ningene ekulingweni; ngoba Sathane ufisa kunibamba, kute anihlunge njengakolo.
18.19: Ngako-ke kufanele nithandaze njalo kuBabe egameni lami;
18.20: Futsi noma ngabe yini leniyawuyicela kuBabe egameni lami, lelungile, nikholwa kutsi niyawuyitfola, bukani niyawuniketwa yona.
