18.21: Thandazani emindenini yenu kuBabe, njalo egameni lami, kute bafati benu kanye nebantfwana benu babusiswe.
18.22: Bukani, niyawuhlangana ndzawonye njalo; futsi ningavimbeli namunye umuntfu kutsi ete kini uma nihlangene ndzawonye, kodvwa bavumeleni kutsi bete kini ningabavimbeli;
18.23: Kodvwa niyawubathandazela, ningabakhipheli ngaphandle; futsi nangabe beta kini njalo niyawubathandazela kuBabe, egameni lami.
18.24: Ngako-ke, phakamisani sibane senu kute sikhanye emhlabeni. Bukani ngikukhanya leniyawukuphakamisa—loko leningibone ngikwenta. Bukani niyabona kutsi ngithandaze kuBabe, futsi nonkhe nikufakazele.
18.25: Futsi niyabona kutsi nginiyalete kutsi kubete namunye wenu lohambako, kodvwa esikhundleni saloko nginiyalete kutsi nite kimi, kute nive niphindze nibone; nani niyawukwenta kanjalo-ke emhlabeni; futsi loyo lophula lomyaleto utivumela kutsi aholelwe ekulingweni.
18.26: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi, waphindze wagucula emehlo akhe wawabhekisa kubafundzi labekabakhetsile, watsi kubo:
18.27: Bukani, ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ngininika lomunye umyaleto, emvakwaloko kumele ngiye kuBabe kute ngigcwalise leminye imiyaleto langinike yona.
18.28: Manje bukani, ngulona umyaleto lengininika wona, wekutsi ningavumeli muntfu nibe nati kutsi adle umtimba kanye nengati yami ngalokungakafaneli, ngesikhatsi niwubusisa;
18.29: Ngoba loyo lodla aphindze anatse umtimba wami kanye nengati yami ngalokungakafaneli udla futsi unatsa kwehlulelwa emphefumulweni wakhe; ngako-ke uma nati kutsi umuntfu akafaneli kutsi adle aphindze anatse umtimba nengati yami nibomvimbela.
18.30: Noko, ningamkhipheli ngephandle emkhatsini wenu, kodvwa niyawumfundzisa niphindze nimthandazele egameni lami; nangabe uyaphendvuka aphindze abhajatiswe egameni lami, niyawumemukela, niphindze nimuphe umtimba wami kanye nengati yami.
18.31: Kodvwa uma angaphendvuki angeke abalwe kanye nebantfu bami, kute angonisi bantfu bami, ngoba bukani ngiyatati timvu tami, futsi tibaliwe.
18.32: Noko, angeke nimkhiphele ngaphandle kwemasinagoge enu, noma etindzaweni tenu tekukhonta, ngoba kulabanjalo niyawuchubeka nekubafundzisa; ngoba anati kutsi bayawubuya nini futsi baphendvuke, bete kimi ngenhloso lephelele yenhlitiyo, futsi ngiyawubelapha, niyawuba yindlela yekuletsa insindziso kubo.
18.33: Ngako-ke, gcinani lamavi lenginiyalete ngawo kute ningangeni ekwehlulelweni; ngoba maye kuloyo Babe lamehlulelako.
18.34: Futsi ngininika lemiyaleto ngenca yetimphikiswano lebetikhona emkhatsini wenu. Futsi nibusisiwe uma nite timphikiswano emkhatsini wenu.
18.35: Manje sengiyahamba ngiya kuBabe, ngoba kufanele kutsi ngihambe ngiye kuBabe ngenca yenu.
18.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekente siphetfo salamavi, watsintsa ngesandla sakhe bafundzi labekabakhetsile, ngamunye nangamunye, wate wabatsintsa bonkhe, akhuluma nabo ngesikhatsi abatsintsa.
18.37: Sicuku asiwevanga emavi labekawakhuluma, ngako-ke asizange sikufakazele loko; kodvwa bafundzi bakufakazela kutsi wabanika emandla ekunika Moya loNgcwele. Futsi ngitawunikhombisa emvakwaloku kutsi lombhalo uliciniso.
18.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekabatsintsile bonkhe, kweta lifu lambonya sicuku kangangekutsi asizange sisambona Jesu.
18.39: Ngesikhatsi sisembonyiwe wesuka kubo, wenyukela ezulwini. Bafundzi bambona baphindze bakufakazela kutsi waphindze wenyukela ezulwini.

19.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekenyukele ezulwini, sicuku sahlakateka, futsi nguleyo naleyo ndvodza yatsatsa umfati wayo kanye nebantfwana bayo yabuyela ekhaya layo.
19.2: Futsi kwabikwa kuto tonkhe tindzawo ngekushesha emkhatsini webantfu, ngaphambi kwekutsi kube mnyama, kutsi sicuku sibone Jesu, nekutsi bekabasebentele, nekutsi bekayawutiveta ngakusasa esicukwini.
19.3: Yebo, ngisho busuku bonkhe kwabikwa kuto tonkhe tindzawo mayelana naJesu; kangangekutsi batfumela kubantfu kutsi babe baningi, yebo, sibalo lesikhulu kakhulu, sasebenta kakhulu bonkhe lobo busuku, kute ngakusasa babe sendzaweni lapho Jesu bekayawutiveta khona esicukwini.
19.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa, ngesikhatsi sicuku sesibutsene ndzawonye, buka, Nefi kanye nemnakabo lobekamvuse ekufeni, libito lakhe lobekunguThimothi, nendvodzana yakhe, libito layo lobekunguJona, kanjalo naMathonayi kanye naMathoniha, umnakabo, naKhumeni, Khumenohayi, kanye naJeremiya, naShemnoni, Jona, Sedekiya, kanye na-Isaya—manje lawa bekungemagama ebafundzi Jesu labekabakhetsile—futsi kwenteka kutsi baya phambili bema ekhatsi kwesicuku.
19.5: Buka, sicuku besisikhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi benta kutsi sehlukaniswe ngetincumbi letilishumi nakubili.
19.6: Labalishumi nakubili basifundzisa sicuku; futsi buka, benta kutsi sicuku siguce phansi, sithandaze kuBabe egameni laJesu.
19.7: Bafundzi nabo bathandaza kuBabe egameni laJesu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi basukuma babasita bantfu.
19.8: Emvakwekutsi sebawafundzisile lawo mavi Jesu labekawakhulumile—bangaphambuki nakancane emavini aJesu labekawakhulumile—buka, baphindze baguca bathandaza kuBabe egameni laJesu.
19.9: Bakuthandazela loko labebakufisa kakhulu; futsi bebafisa kutsi baniketwe Moya loNgcwele.
19.10: Emvakwekutsi sebathandazile ngaleyondlela bahamba behlela entansi elusebeni lwemanti, sicuku sabalandzela.
19.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi wahamba wehlela entansi emantini wabese uyabhajatiswa.
19.12: Waphuma emantini wabese ucala kubabhabhatisa. Wababhabhatisa bonkhe labo Jesu labekabakhetsile.
19.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebabhajatisiwe futsi sebaphumile nasemantini, Moya loNgcwele wehlela etikwabo, bagcwaliswa ngaMoya loNgcwele kanye nangemlilo.
19.14: Buka, batungeletwa ngulokungatsi ngumlilo; wehla uvela ezulwini, sicuku sakubona loku, saphindze sakufakazela; tingilosi tehlela phansi tiphuma ezulwini futsi tabasita.
19.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi tingilosi tisabasita bafundzi, buka, Jesu weta wema emkhatsini wabasebentela.
19.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakhuluma kuso sicuku, wasiyaleta kutsi siphindze siguce phansi, kanjalo nekutsi bafundzi bakhe baguce phansi.
19.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebaguce phansi, wayaleta bafundzi bakhe kutsi bathandaze.
19.18: Buka, bacala kuthandaza; bathandaza kuJesu, bambita ngeNkhosi yabo kanye naNkulunkulu wabo.
19.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wesuka waphuma emkhatsini wabo, wahamba libangana nje wakhwesha kubo waphindze waguca, watsi:
19.20: Babe, ngiyakubonga kutsi ubanikile Moya loNgcwele laba lengibakhetsile; futsi kungenca yelukholo lwabo kimi kutsi ngibakhetsile emhlabeni.
19.21: Babe, ngiyakucela kutsi ubanike Moya loNgcwele bonkhe labo labayawukholwa emavini abo.
19.22: Babe, ubanike Moya loNgcwele ngenca yekutsi bakholwa kimi; futsi uyabona kutsi bayakholwa kimi ngenca yekutsi uyabeva, bathandaza kimi; futsi bathandaza kimi ngoba nginabo.
19.23: Manje Babe ngiyabathandazela kuwe, futsi kanjalo nabo bonkhe labo labayawukholwa emavini abo, kute nabo bakholwe kimi, kute ngibe kubo njengoba nawe, Babe, ukimi, kute sibe munye.
19.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekathandaze kanjalo kuBabe, weta kubafundzi bakhe, buka, bebasachubeka, bangayekeli, kuthandaza kuye; abatange baphindzaphindze emagama lamaningi, ngoba bebaniketiwe kutsi bathandazele ini, futsi bebagcwaliswe ngenshisekelo.
19.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jesu wababusisa ngesikhatsi bathandaza kuye; buso bakhe bamamatseka etikwabo, kukhanya kwebuso bakhe kwakhatimula etikwabo, buka baba mhlophe njengebuso nanjengetingubo taJesu; buka bumhlophe babo bebendlula bonkhe bumhlophe, yebo, bekute lutfo emhlabeni lebeyingaba mhlophe njengebumhlophe babo.
19.26: Jesu watsi kubo: Chubekani nithandaze: futsi abatange bayekele kuthandaza.
19.27: Waphindza wafulatsela kubo, wahamba libangana wabese uyaguca; waphindze wathandaza kuBabe, watsi:
19.28: Babe, ngiyakubonga kutsi sewubahlambululile labo lengibakhetsile, ngenca yelukholo lwabo, ngiyabathandazela, kanjalo nalabo labayawukholwa emavini abo, kutsi nabo bahlanjululwe kimi, ngekukholwa emavini abo, ngisho nanjengoba nabo bahlanjululiwe kimi.
19.29: Babe, angithandazeli umhlaba, kodvwa labo longinike bona labasemhlabeni, ngenca yelukholo lwabo, kute bahlanjululwe kimi, kute ngibe kubo njengoba nawe, Babe, ukimi, kute sibe munye, kute ngidvunyiswe kubo.
19.30: Ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi waphindza futsi weta kubafundzi bakhe; buka bathandaza kuye ngalokujulile, ngaphandle kwekuyekela; waphindza wamamatseka kubo; buka baba mhlophe, ngisho njengaJesu.
19.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi waphindza wahamba libangana lelidze nje wathandaza kuBabe;
19.32: Lulwimi ngeke luwakhulume emavi lawakhuluma, noma abhalwe ngumuntfu emagama lawakhuluma.
19.33: Sicuku samuva saphindze sakufakazela loko; tinhlitiyo tabo tavuleka baphindze bawacondza etinhlitiyweni tabo lamavi lawakhuluma.
19.34: Noko, bekamakhulu kakhulu aphindze amangalisa emavi lawakhuluma kangangekutsi angeke abhalwe, noma ashiwo ngumuntfu.
19.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekacedzile kuthandaza waphindze weta kubafundzi bakhe, watsi kubo: Lukholo lolukhulu kangaka angikate ngilubone emkhatsini wawo onkhe emaJuda; ngaloko-ke angikwatanga kuwakhombisa timangaliso letinkhulu kangaka, ngenca yekungakholwa kwawo.
19.36: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, kute namunye wabo lowake wabona tintfo letinkhulu kangaka njengoba nine nitibonile; noma beve tintfo letinkhulu kanje njengoba nine nitivile.

20.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wayaleta sicuku kutsi siyekele kuthandaza, kanjalo nebafundzi bakhe. Wabayaleta kutsi bangayekeli kuthandaza etinhlitiyweni tabo.
20.2: Waphindze wabayaleta kutsi basukume beme ngetinyawo tabo. Basukuma bema ngetinyawo tabo.
20.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi waphindze wahlephula sinkhwa wasibusisa, wase usiniketa bafundzi bakhe kutsi badle.
20.4: Ngesikhatsi sebadlile wabayaleta kutsi bahlephule sinkhwa, bese basinika sicuku.
20.5: Ngesikhatsi sebasinikile sicuku waphindze wabanika liwayini kutsi banatse, wabayaleta kutsi banike sicuku.
20.6: Manje, bekute sinkhwa, noma liwayini, lebekuletfwe bafundzi, noma sicuku;
20.7: Kodvwa ngempela wabanika sinkhwa kute badle, kanjalo neliwayini kute banatse.
20.8: Watsi kubo: Loyo lodla lesinkhwa udla umtimba wami emphefumulweni wakhe; kanjalo naloyo lonatsa leliwayini unatsa ingati yami emphefumulweni wakhe; futsi umphefumulo wakhe angeke ulambe noma wome, kodvwa uyawugcwaliswa.
20.9: Manje, ngesikhatsi sonkhe sicuku sesidlile saphindze sanatsa, buka, sagcwaliswa ngaMoya; sakhala ngelivi linye, saniketa ludvumo kuJesu, labebambona futsi bamuva.
20.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebalunikile ludvumo kuJesu, watsi kubo: Bukani manje sengiyawucedzela umyaleto Babe langiyalete ngawo mayelana nalabantfu, labayinsali yendlu yaka-Israyeli.
20.11: Niyakhumbula kutsi ngikhulumile kini, ngatsi uma emavi a-Isaya sekagcwaliseka—bukani abhaliwe, ninawo phambi kwenu, ngako-ke wahlolisiseni—
20.12: Futsi ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ngesikhatsi sekagcwaliseka ngaleso sikhatsi kuyawube sekukugcwaliseka kwesivumelwano Babe lasenta kubantfu bakhe, Awu, nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
20.13: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi insali, leyiyawube ihlakatekile ngephandle emhlabeni wonkhe, iyawugcogcwa emphumalanga kanye nasenshonalanga, eningizimu kanye nasenyakatfo; iholelwe ekuyatini iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo, lebahlengile.
20.14: Futsi Babe ungiyalete kutsi ngininike lelive, libe lifa lenu.
20.15: Ngitsi kini, uma beTive bangaphendvuki emvakwesibusiso labayawusitfola, emvakwekutsi sebahlakate bantfu bami—
20.16: Ngaleso sikhatsi nine, leniyinsali yendlu yaka-Jakobe, niyawuhamba niye emkhatsini wabo; niyawuba semkhatsini walabo labayawube babaningi; futsi niyawuba semkhatsini wabo njengelibhubesi emkhatsini wetilwane tasehlatsini, nanjengeliwundlu lelibhubesi emkhatsini wemhlambi wetimvu, lokutsi, uma lidzabula emkhatsini wato litinyatsele phansi liphindze litidzabule tibe ticucu, kube kute namunye longatikhulula.
20.17: Sandla sakho siyawuphakanyiselwa titsa takho, futsi tonkhe titsa takho tiyawubulawa.
20.18: Ngiyawubutsela ndzawonye bantfu bami njengemuntfu abutsisa titfungo takhe phansi.
20.19: Ngoba ngiyawukwenta bantfu bami Babe lente sivumelwano nabo, yebo, ngiyawukwenta luphondvo lwenu lube yinsimbi, ngiphindze ngente tinselo tenu tibe litfusi. Futsi niyawucotfula bantfu labaningi; ngiyawunikela inzuzo yabo eNkhosini, kanye nemcebo eNkhosini yemhlaba wonkhe. Bukani nginguye lokwentako loko.
20.20: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, kusho Babe, kutsi inkemba yekulunga kwami iyawulengela etikwabo ngalolo suku; futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke iyawuwela etikwabo, kusho Babe, yebo, nasetikwato tonkhe tive tebeTive.
20.21: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi ngiyawubabeka bantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
20.22: Bukani, labantfu ngiyawubabeka kulelive, kugcwalisa sivumelwano lengasenta nababe wakho Jakobe; futsi liyawuba yiJerusalema Lensha. Nemandla asezulwini ayawuba emkhatsini walabantfu; yebo, nami ngiyawuba semkhatsini wabo.
20.23: Bukani, nginguye loyo Mosi lakhuluma ngaye, atsi: INkhosi Nkulunkulu wenu iyawunivusela umphrofethi kubomnakenu, lonjengami; yena niyawumlalela kuto tonkhe tintfo layawutisho kini. Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi wonkhe muntfu longeke amlalele loyo mphrofethi uyawususwa emkhatsini webantfu.
20.24: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, yebo, bonkhe baphrofethi kusukela kuSamuweli kanye nalabo labalandzela muva, ngebuningi babo labakhulumile, bafakazile ngami.
20.25: Bukani, nibantfwana bebaphrofethi; futsi nibendlu yaka-Israyeli; nibesivumelwano Babe lasenta neyihlo, atsi ku-Abrahama: Ngentalelwane yakho yonkhe imindeni yemhlaba iyawubusiswa.
20.26: Babe ungivusele kini kucala, waphindze wangitfuma kutsi ngitawunibusisa ngekunikhipha loyo naloyo aphume ebubini bakhe; loku kungenca yekutsi nibantfwana besivumelwano—
20.27: Emvakwekube senibusisiwe Babe uyawusigcwalisa sivumelwano lasenta na-Abrahama, lesitsi: Ngentalelwane yakho yonkhe imindeni yemhlaba iyawubusiswa—ekutfululeleni Moya loNgcwele ngami kubeTive, lokusibusiso kubeTive lesiyawubenta babe nemandla etikwako konkhe, ekuhlakateni bantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
20.28: Futsi bayawuba luhlupho kubantfu balelive. Noko, uma sebalemukele livangeli lami leliphelele, ngaleso sikhatsi uma bayawutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngalokumelene nami ngiyawububuyisela bubi babo etikwabo, kusho Babe.
20.29: Futsi ngiyawusikhumbula sivumelwano lengisente nebantfu bami; ngente sivumelwano nabo kutsi ngiyawubabutsela ndzawonye ngesikhatsi sami lesifanele, nekutsi ngiyawuphindze ngibanike live laboyise libe lifa labo, lokulive laseJerusalema, lokulive lesetsembiso kubo ingunaphakadze, kusho Babe.
20.30: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi sikhatsi siyeta, lapho livangeli lami leliphelele liyawushunyayelwa kubo;
20.31: Futsi bayawukholwa kimi, kutsi nginguJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, bayawuthandaza kuBabe egameni lami.
20.32: Ngaleso sikhatsi balindzi babo bayawuphakamisa emavi abo, ngelivi linye bayawuhlabelela; ngoba bayawutibonela ngewabo emehlo.
20.33: Ngaleso sikhatsi Babe, uyawuphindze ababutsele ndzawonye, abanike iJerusalema kube live lelilifa labo.
20.34: Ngaleso sikhatsi bayawuhlokoma ngentfokoto batsi—Hlabelelani kanyekanye, nine tindzawo letitindzala taseJerusalema; ngoba Babe ubadvudvutile bantfu bakhe, uyihlengile iJerusalema.
20.35: Babe uwembulile umkhono wakhe longcwele emehlweni etive tonkhe; yonkhe imikhawulo yemhlaba iyawuyibona insindziso yaBabe; futsi Babe nami simunye.
20.36: Ngaleso sikhatsi kuyawukwenteka loko lokubhaliwe: Vuka, vuka futsi umbatse emandla, Awu Siyoni; yembatsa tembatfo takho letinhle, Awu Jerusalema, dolobha lelingcwele, ngoba kusukela manje angeke kuphindze kungene kuwe labangakasoki nalabangcolile.
20.37: Titsintsitse elutfulini; sukuma, hlala phansi, Awu Jerusalema; tikhulule etinketaneni letisentsanyeni yakho, Awu ndvondzakati letfunjiwe yaseSiyoni.
20.38: Ngoba naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi: Nititsengise ngelite, futsi niyawuhlengwa ngaphandle kwemali.
20.39: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, bantfu bami bayawulati libito lami; yebo, ngalolo suku bayawukwati kutsi ngimi lowakhuluma.
20.40: Ngaleso sikhatsi bayawutsi: Tinhle kangakanani etintsabeni tinyawo taloyo loletsa tindzaba letimnandzi kubo, lomemetela kuthula; loletsa tindzaba letimnadzi kubo tekulunga, lomemetela insindziso; lotsi kuyo iSiyoni: Nkulunkulu wakho uyabusa!
20.41: Ngaleso sikhatsi simemetelo siyawuvakala sitsi: Sukani, sukani, hambani niphume lapha, ningatsintsi lutfo lolungcolile; phumani emkhatsini wakhe; nitihlambulule nine leniphatsa titja teNkhosi.
20.42: Ngoba angeke niphume ngekushesha noma niphume ngekubaleka; ngoba iNkhosi iyawuhamba embikwenu, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli uyawuba ngumvikeli wenu wangasemuva.
20.43: Bukani, inceku yami iyawuphumelela; iyawuphakanyiswa idvunyiswe futsi ibe setulu kakhulu.
20.44: Njengoba labaningi bamangala ngawe—buso bayo babuhliphikile kakhulu, kwendlula bonkhe bantfu, nesimo sayo sasonakele kwendlula onkhe emadvodzana ebantfu—
20.45: Ngako iyawuchela tive letiningi; emakhosi ayawuvala imilomo yawo ngenca yayo, ngoba loko labangazange batjelwe kona bayawukubona; naloko labangazange bakuve bayawukucondza.
20.46: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, tonkhe letintfo tiyawukwenteka ngempela, nanjengoba Babe angiyaletile. Ngaleso sikhatsi lesivumelwano Babe lavumelene ngaso nebantfu bakhe siyawugcwaliseka; ngaleso sikhatsi iJerusalema iyawuphindze ibe nebantfu bami, futsi iyawuba live lelilifa labo.

21.1: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, ngininika sibonakaliso, kute nisati sikhatsi lapho letintfo setiyawukwenteka—kutsi ngiyawubagcogca, ekuhlakatekeni kwabo kwesikhatsi lesidze, bantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, ngiyawuphindze ngisungule emkhatsini wabo iSiyoni yami;
21.2: Bukani, ngitawuninika loku njengesibonakaliso—ngoba ngicinisile ngitsi kini ngesikhatsi letintfo lengitisho kini, naleto lengitawutisho kini emvakwaloku, nangemandla aMoya loNgcwele loyawuniketwa kini nguBabe, tiyawukwembulelwa beTive kute bati mayelana nalabantfu labayinsali yendlu yaJakobe, mayelana nalabantfu bami labayawuhlakatwa ngibo;
21.3: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, ngesikhatsi letintfo sebembulelwa tona nguBabe, tiyawube tivela kuBabe, tisuka kubo tita kini;
21.4: Ngoba kukuhlakanipha kwaBabe kutsi babekwe kulelive, bamiswe njengebantfu labakhululekile ngemandla aBabe, nekutsi letintfo tiphume kubo tiye kuyo insali yentalelwane yenu, kute sivumelwano saBabe sigcwaliseke lavumelana ngaso nebantfu bakhe, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli;
21.5: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi lemisebenti kanye nemisebenti leyawukwentiwa emkhatsini wenu emvakwaloku iyawuvela kubeTive, iya kuyo intalelwane yenu leyawuncishelwa lukholo ngenca yebubi;
21.6: Ngoba ngaleyondlela kusifiso saBabe kutsi ivele kubeTive, kute avete emandla akhe kubeTive, ngalesi sizatfu kutsi beTive, uma bangayutenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, kutsi baphendvuke bete kimi baphindze babhajatiswe egameni lami futsi bati ngemaphuzu laliciniso emfundziso yami, kute babalwe kanye nebantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli;
21.7: Futsi ngesikhatsi letintfo tetenteka kutsi intalelwane yenu icale kutati letintfo—kuyawuba sibonakaliso kubo, kute bati kutsi umsebenti waBabe sewucalile ekugcwaliseni sivumelwano lasenta kubantfu lababendlu yaka-Israyeli.
21.8: Futsi ngesikhatsi lolo suku selufika, kuyawukwenteka kutsi emakhosi ayawuvala imilomo yawo; ngoba loko labangakate bakutjelwe bayawukubona; naloko labangakate bakuve bayawukucondza.
21.9: Ngoba ngalolo suku, ngenca yami Babe uyawusebenta umsebenti, loyawuba ngumsebenti lomkhulu kanye nalomangalisako emkhatsini wabo; futsi kuyawuba khona emkhatsini wabo labangeke bawakholwe, nanoma indvodza iyawumemetela kubo.
21.10: Kodvwa bukani, imphilo yenceku yami iyawuba sesandleni sami; ngako-ke angeke bayilimate, nanoma simo sayo siyawukonakala ngenca yabo. Noko ngiyawuyelapha, ngoba ngitawubakhombisa kutsi kuhlakanipha kwami kukhulu kunebucili badeveli.
21.11: Ngako-ke kuyawukwenteka kutsi loyo longeke akholwe emavini ami, lenginguJesu Khristu, Babe layawuyenta kutsi iwaletse kubeTive, futsi uyawuyinika emandla ekutsi iwaletse kubeTive, (kuyawukwenteka njengoba Mosi asho) bayawususwa emkhatsini webantfu bami lababesivumelwano.
21.12: Futsi bantfu bami labayinsali yakaJakobe bayawuba semkhatsini webeTive, yebo, emkhatsini wabo njengelibhubesi emkhatsini wetilwane tasehlatsini, nanjengeliwundlu lelibhubesi emkhatsini wemihlambi yetimvu, leli, lekutawutsi uma lidzabula emkhatsini wato litinyatsele phansi liphindze litidzabule tibe ticucu, kubebete namunye longatikhulula.
21.13: Sandla sabo siyawuphakanyiselwa etikwetitsa tabo, futsi tonkhe titsa tabo tiyawubulawa.
21.14: Yebo, maye kubo beTive ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke; ngoba kuyawukwenteka ngalolo suku, kusho Babe, kutsi ngiyawuwasusa emahhashi akho emkhatsini wakho, futsi ngiyawutibhubhisa tincola takho;
21.15: Ngiyawuwasusa emadolobha elive lenu, futsi ngitiwise phansi tonkhe tincaba tenu;
21.16: Futsi ngiyawubucedza butsakatsi eveni lenu, ngeke nisaba netangoma nanini;
21.17: Titfombe tenu letibatiwe nato ngalokunjalo ngiyawutisusa, kanye netitfombe tenu letimile ngiyawutisusa emkhatsini wenu, ngeke nanini nisakhonta imisebenti yetandla tenu;
21.18: Ngiyawutidzephuna tonkhe tinsika tetihlahla tenu emkhatsini wenu; ngiyawubhubhisa kanjalo nemadolobha enu.
21.19: Futsi kuyawukwenteka kutsi onkhe emanga, inkhohliso, umona, imibango, nebuphristi-mbumbulu, kanye nebugwadla kuyawucedvwa.
21.20: Ngoba kuyawukwenteka, kusho Babe, kutsi ngalolo suku loyo longeke aphendvuke ete kuyo iNdvodzana yami leTsandzekako, ngiyawumsusa emkhatsini webantfu bami, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli;
21.21: Ngiyawukwenta kuphindzisela nelulaka kubo, njengasetikwemahedeni, njengaloko labangakate bakuve.
21.22: Kodvwa uma bayawuphendvuka baphindze balalele emavi ami, bangatenti lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, ngiyawusungula libandla lami emkhatsini wabo, bayawungena esivumelwaneni baphindze babalwe emkhatsini walensali yakaJakobe, lengiyinike lelive kutsi kube lifa layo.
21.23: Bayawusita bantfu bami, insali yakaJakobe, kanjalo nalabaningi bendlu yaka-Israyeli njengekuta kwabo, kute bakhe lidolobha, leliyawubitwa ngekutsi yiJerusalema leNsha.
21.24: Ngaleso sikhatsi bayawusita bantfu bami kute bagcogcwe, labahlakateke ebusweni bonkhe bemhlaba, bete eJerusalema LeNsha.
21.25: Ngaleso sikhatsi emandla asezulwini ayawukwehlela emkhatsini wabo; nami ngalokunjalo ngiyawube ngisekhatsi.
21.26: Ngaleso sikhatsi umsebenti waBabe uyawucala ngalolo suku, ngisho nangesikhatsi lapho lelivangeli liyawushunyayelwa emkhatsini wensali yalabantfu. Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, ngalolo suku umsebenti waBabe uyawucala emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bami labahlakatekile, yebo, ngisho netive letilahlekile, Babe latiholela khashane watikhipha eJerusalema.
21.27: Yebo, umsebenti uyawucala emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu bami labahlakatekile, ngaBabe kulungiselela indlela labangeta ngayo kimi, kute bacele kuBabe egameni lami.
21.28: Yebo, ngaleso sikhatsi umsebenti uyawucala, naBabe asemkhatsini wato tonkhe tive alungisa indlela bantfu bakhe labangagcogcelwa ngayo ekhaya eveni lelilifa labo.
21.29: Bayawuphuma kuto tonkhe tive; abayukuhamba ngekushesha, noma bahambe ngekubaleka, ngoba ngiyawuhamba phambi kwabo, kusho Babe, futsi ngiyawuba ngasemvakwabo.

22.1: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi loko lokubhaliwe kuyawukwenteka: Hlabela, Awu nyumba, wena longatalanga; hlokoma uhlabele, memeta kakhulu, wena longazange sewuhelwe; ngoba baningi bantfwana balolahliwe kunebemfati loshadile, kusho iNkhosi
22.2: Yandzisa indzawo yelithende lakho, yendlala tindvwangu telithende lakho; ungatibambi, yelula tintsambo takho, ucinise tikhonkhwane takho;
22.3: Ngoba utawulendlalela esandleni sangesekudla kanye nesangesencele, futsi intalelwane yakho iyawubatfola njengelifa beTive yente emadolobha latindzala abe nalabahlala kuwo.
22.4: Ungesabi, ngoba angeke ube nemahloni; noma wehliswe, ngoba angeke ubekwe ehlazweni; ngoba utawulikhohlwa lihlazo lebusha bakho, futsi angeke usawakhumbula emahloni ebusha bakho, kanjalo angeke usawakhumbula emahloni ebufelokati bakho nanini.
22.5: Ngoba umenti wakho, yindvodza yakho, iNkhosi yemaBandla libito lakhe; uMhlengi wakho, loNgcwele waka-Israyeli—Nkulunkulu wemhlaba wonkhe uyawubitwa kanjalo
22.6: Ngoba iNkhosi ikubite njengewesifazane lolahliwe nalodzabukile emoyeni, kanye nemfati lomncane, ngesikhatsi lapho aliwa, kusho Nkulunkulu wakho.
22.7: Ngoba kwesikhashana nje ngikushiyile, kodvwa ngesihawu lesikhulu ngiyawukubuyisa.
22.8: Ngentfukutselo lencane ngakufihlela buso bami kwesikhashana, kodvwa ngemusa waphakadze ngiyawuba nesihawu kuwe, kusho iNkhosi uMhlengi wakho.
22.9: Ngoba loku, kunjengemanti aNowa kimi, ngoba njengoba ngifungile kutsi emanti a-Nowa angeke aphindze awumbonye umhlaba, ngako-ke sengifungile kutsi angeke ngiphindze ngikutfukutselele.
22.10: Ngoba tintsaba tingesuswa kanye nemagcuma esuswe, kodvwa umusa wami angeke wesuswe kuwe, noma sivumelwano sami sekuthula sisuswe, kusho iNkhosi lenesihawu kuwe.
22.11: Awu wena lohlushiwe, loshaywa tivunguvungu, ungadvudvutwa! Buka, ngiyawukwakha ngematje akho lanemibala lemihle, ngakhe tisekelo takho ngemasafire.
22.12: Ngiyawukwakha emafasitelo akho ngemarubi, kanye nemasango akho ngematje lamanyatelako, kanye nato tonkhe tibondza takho ngematje laligugu.
22.13: Bonkhe bantfwana bakho bayawufundziswa yiNkhosi; kuyawuba kukhulu kuthula kwebantfwana bakho.
22.14: Uyawubekwa ekulungeni, uyawuba khashane nekubuswa ngelunya ngoba angeke wesabe, kanye neluvalo angeke lusondzele edvute nawe.
22.15: Buka, nakanjani bayawuhlangana ndzawonye ngalokumelene nawe, ngekuphikisana nami; loyo loyawuhlangana ndzawonye ngalokumelene nawe uyawuwa ngenca yakho.
22.16: Buka, ngimi lowadala umbumbi wetinsimbi lovutsela emalahle kutsi abe ngemalangabi, ente sikhali silungele umsebenti waso; futsi ngimi lowadala umbhubhisi kutsi abhubhise.
22.17: Kute sikhali lesilolelwe kulwa nawe lesiyawuphumelela; futsi lonkhe lulwimi loluyawukwetfuka likwehlulele uyawulibeka licala. Leli lifa letinceku teNkhosi, futsi kulunga kwabo kuvela kimi, kusho iNkhosi.

23.1: Manje bukani ngitsi kini, kufanele nihlolisise letintfo. Yebo, ngininika umyaleto wekutsi nihlolisise letintfo ngekukhutsala, ngoba makhulu emavi a-Isaya.
23.2: Ngoba ngempela wakhuluma ngalokuphatselene nato tonkhe letintfo mayelana nebantfu bami lokubendlu yaka-Israyeli; ngako-ke kufanele kutsi akhulume futsi kanjalo nakubeTive
23.3: Futsi tonkhe tintfo latikhuluma tenteka futsi tisatawukwenteka, nanjengekwemavi lawakhuluma.
23.4: Ngako-ke lalelani emavi ami; bhalani tintfo lenginitjele tona; futsi ngekwesikhatsi kanye nangekwentsandvo yaBabe tiyawumenyetelwa kubo beTive.
23.5: Futsi noma ngubani loyawuwalalela emavi ami aphendvuke aphindze abhajatiswe, nguye loyo loyawusindziswa. Hlolisisani emavi ebaphrofethi, ngoba baningi labafakaza ngaletintfo.
23.6: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawashito lamavi waphindze watsi kubo, emvakwekutsi sekayichazile yonkhe imibhalo lengcwele lebebayitfolile, watsi kubo: Bukani, ngifuna kutsi nibhale leminye imibhalo lengcwele, leningakayibhali.
23.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watsi kuNefi: Letsa lapha lombhalo lowugcinile.
23.8: Futsi ngesikhatsi Nefi sekayiletsile imibhalo, wayendlala phambi kwakhe, wayibuka wase utsi:
23.9: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, ngayaleta Samuweli, umLamani, inceku yami kutsi afakaze kulabantfu kutsi ngelusuku lapho Babe ayawudvumisa libito lakhe kimi kuyawuba khona labaningi labangcwele labayawuvuka ekufeni, futsi bayawuvela kulabaningi, baphindze babasebentele. Watsi kubo: Bekungenjalo na?
23.10: Bafundzi bakhe bamphendvula batsi: Yebo, Nkhosi, Samuweli waphrofetha njengekwemavi akho, futsi onkhe agcwaliseka.
23.11: Jesu watsi kubo; Pho kungani ningakayibhali lentfo, kutsi labangcwele labaningi ngempela bavuka bavela kulabaningi baphindze babasebentela na?
23.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi wakhumbula kutsi lentfo ayikate ibhalwe.
23.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jesu wayaleta kutsi ibhalwe; ngako-ke yabhalwa njengoba abeyaletile.
23.14: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekayichazile yonkhe imibhalo lengcwele, lebebayibhalile, wabayaleta kutsi batifundzise letintfo lebekatichazile kubo.

24.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabayaleta kutsi bawabhale lawo mavi Babe labekawanike Malakhi, labekatawubatjela wona, Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekabhaliwe wawachaza. Lawa ngemavi labatjela wona, atsi: Naku lokwashiwo nguBabe kuMalakhi—Bukani ngiyawutfumela sitfunywa sami, futsi siyawulungisa indlela embikwami, masinyane leNkhosi leniyifunako iyawukuta ethempelini layo, sitfunywa sesivumelwano lenitfokotako ngaso; bukani, siyawufika, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
24.2: Kodvwa ngubani longamelana nelusuku lwekufika kwayo, futsi ngubani loyawukuma ngesikhatsi ichamuka na? Ngoba ifanana nemlilo wemcengi, nensipho yemgezi.
24.3: Iyawuhlala njengemcengi kanye nanjengemhlanti wesiliva; iyawuhlanta emadvodzana emaLevi, iwacenge njengeligolide nesiliva, kute anikele eNkhosini umnikelo ngekulunga.
24.4: Ngaleso sikhatsi umnikelo wakaJuda kanye newaseJerusalema uyawukwemukeleka eNkhosini, njengasemalangeni akadzeni, nanjengaseminyakeni yasemadvulo.
24.5: Futsi ngiyawusondzela kini kutakwehlulela; ngiyawuba ngufakazi losheshako ngimelane netangoma, netiphingi, nabofakazi bemanga, nalabo labadlela tisebenti emaholo ato, labo labacindzetela bafelokati netintsandzane, kanye nalabo labagcuzula sihambi, bangangesabi mine, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
24.6: Ngoba ngiyiNkhosi, angigucuki; ngako-ke nine madvodzana aJakobe, anikabhujiswa.
24.7: Kusukela etinsukwini tabokhokho benu nisukile etimisweni tami, nangete natigcina. Buyelani kimi nami ngiyawubuyela kini, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla. Kodvwa nitsi: Pho singabuyela kanjani?
24.8: Umuntfu angamebela yini Nkulunkulu? Noko niyangebela. Kodvwa nitsi: Sikwebela njani? Ngekwelishumi kanye nangekweminikelo.
24.9: Nicalekisiwe ngesicalekiso, ngoba ningebele, nonkhe nine sive.
24.10: Letsani konkhe kwelishumi endlini yengcebo, kute kutawubakhona kudla endlini yami; ningilinge manje ngaloku, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, nitawubona kutsi angeke yini nginivulele emafasitelo asezulwini, nginitfululele sibusiso kute kubete indzawo leyenele yekusigcina.
24.11: Ngiyawuvimba silwanyakatane ngenca yenu, futsi angeke sibhubhise titselo temhlabatsi wenu; noma umvini wenu uwise titselo tawo sikhatsi singakefiki emasimini, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
24.12: Tonkhe tive tiyawutsi ningulababusisiwe, ngoba live lenu liyawuba live lelihle, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
24.13: Emavi enu abenelulaka ngalokumelene nami, kusho iNkhosi, Noko nitsi: Sikhulumeni lokumelene nawe?
24.14: Nitsite: Akunamsebenti kukhonta Nkulunkulu, futsi sizuzani kutsi sitigcinile timiso takhe kanye nekutsi sihambe njengebantfu labalilako embikweNkhosi yemaBandla.
24.15: Nyalo sibita labatigabatisako sitsi bangulababusisiwe; yebo, benti balokubi bayaphumelela; yebo, labalinga Nkulunkulu bayaphunyula.
24.16: Nalabo labesaba iNkhosi bakhulumisana lomunye kulomunye, iNkhosi yalalela yeva; incwadzi yesikhumbuto yabhalwa embikwakhe macondzana nalabo labesaba iNkhosi, kanye nalabo bebahlonipha libito layo.
24.17: Futsi bayawuba bami, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, ngalolo suku uma sengigcogca ematje ami laligugu; ngiyawubaphephisa njengendvodza iphephisa indvodzana yayo leyisebentelako.
24.18: Ngaleso sikhatsi niyawubuya niphindze niwubone kahle umehluko emkhatsini walabalungile nalababi, emkhatsini waloyo lokhonta Nkulunkulu naloyo longamkhonti.

25.1: Ngoba buka, lusuku luyeta loluyawuvutsa njengelitiko; bonkhe labatichenyako, yebo, kanye nabo bonkhe labo labenta bubi, bayawuba ngemabibi; lusuku lolutako luyawubashisa, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla, futsi aliyukubashiyela ngisho imphandze noma ligala.
25.2: Kodvwa kini nine lenilesabako libito lami, iNdvodzana yekulunga iyawuvuka nekuphilisa etimphikweni tayo; futsi niyawucala nikhule njengematfole etisingeni.
25.3: Niyawubagcobagcoba phansi lababi; ngoba bayawuba ngumlotsa ngaphansi kwetitsendze tetinyawo tenu ngelusuku lengiyawukwenta ngalo loku, kusho iNkhosi yemaBandla.
25.4: Khumbulani umtsetfo waMosi, inceku yami, lengamyaleta ngawo eHorebe kuwo onkhe ema-Israyeli, ngemitsetfo kanye nangetehlulelo.
25.5: Bukani, ngiyawutfumela kini Elija umphrofethi lungakafiki lusuku lolukhulu nalolwesabekako lweNkhosi;
25.6: Futsi uyawuguculela tinhlitiyo taboyise kubantfwana, kanye netinhlitiyo tebantfwana kuboyise, hleze ngite ngiphindze ngishaye umhlaba ngesicalekiso.

26.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekatishito letintfo watichazela sicuku; wabachazela tonkhe tintfo, letinkhulu naletincane.
26.2: Watsi: Lemibhalo lengcwele, lebenite yona, Babe ungiyaletile kutsi ngininike yona; ngoba bekukuhlakanipha kwakhe kutsi inikwe titukulwane letitako.
26.3: Watichaza tonkhe tintfo, kusukela ekucaleni kute kube sikhatsi lapho ayawuta ngenkhatimulo yakhe—yebo, nato tonkhe tintfo letiyawukwenteka emhlabeni wonkhe, kute kube ngulapho tonkhe tisekelo temkhatsi tiyawuncibilikiswa kushisa lokuvutsako, nemhlaba ugogcwe ndzawonye njengencwadzi, emazulu nemhlaba kwendlule;
26.4: Futsi kute kube kungelilanga lelikhulu kanye nelekugcina, lapho bonkhe bantfu, yonkhe imindeni, kanye nato tonkhe tive kanye netilimi tiyawuma embikwaNkulunkulu, kute tehlulelwe ngemisebenti yato, noma ngabe mihle noma ngabe mibi—
26.5: Uma imihle, bavukele ekuphileni kwaphakadze; kani uma imibi, bavukele ekulahlweni; njengoba kulinganisene, kunye kulunye luhlangotsi nalokunye kulolunye luhlangotsi, ngekwesihawu, nangekulunga kanye nangebungcwele lobukukhristu, lobekakhona ngaphambi kwekutsi umhlaba ubekhona.
26.6: Manje angeke kubhalwe kulencwadzi ngisho nencenye yelikhulu yetintfo Jesu latifundzisa ngekweliciniso kubantfu;
26.7: Kodvwa bukani bongcwengcwe baNefi bacuketse incenye leningi yetintfo latifundzisa kubantfu.
26.8: Futsi letintfo ngitibhalile, letiyincenye lencane yetintfo latifundzisa bantfu; futsi ngitibhale ngenhloso yekutsi tiphindze tiletfwe kulabantfu, tivela kubeTive, ngekwemavi Jesu lawakhuluma.
26.9: Futsi uma sebakutfolile loku, lokudzingekako kutsi babe nako kucala, kuvivinya lukholo lwabo, uma kuyawukwenteka kutsi bayawutikholwa letintfo uma kunjalo tintfo letinkhulu tiyawukwembulwa kubo.
26.10: Uma kwenteka kutsi bangatikholwa letintfo, uma kunjalo tintfo letinkhulu tiyawugodlwa kubo, kangangoba bayawubekwa licala.
26.11: Bukani, besengitawutibhala letintfo, tonkhe letaticoshwe kubongcwengcwe baNefi, kodvwa iNkhosi yakuvimba loko, itsi: Ngitawuluvivinya lukholo lwebantfu bami.
26.12: Ngako-ke, mine, Mormon, sengibhala tintfo lengiyaletwe ngato yiNkhosi. Manje mine, Mormon, sengenta siphetfo senkhulumo yami, sengiyachubeka nekubhala tintfo lengiyaletwe ngato
26.13: Ngako-ke, ngifuna kutsi nibone kutsi iNkhosi yabafundzisa ngempela bantfu, sikhatsi lesitinsuku letintsatfu; emvakwaloko yativeta kubo njalo nje, futsi yahlephula sinkhwa njalo nje, yasibusisa, yabaniketa.
26.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yabafundzisa yaphindze yabasita bantfwana besicuku losekukhulunywe ngaso, yaluchacha lulwini lwabo, bakhuluma kuboyise babo tintfo letinkhulu naletimangalisako, letinkhulu kwendlula loko lebeyikadze ikwembulele bantfu; yaluchacha lulwimi lwabo kute bakhone kukhuluma.
26.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi seyinyukele ezulwini—kwesibili emvakwekutsi itibonakalise kubo, seyihambile yaya kuBabe, seyiphilise bonkhe labagulako babo, kanye nalabatishosha babo, siyivule emehlo alabo labebangaboni babo yavula tindlebe tetihhulu, seyente lonkhe luhlobo lwekwelapha emkhatsini wabo, yavusa nendvodza ekufeni, futsi seyiwatjengisile emandla ayo kubo, seyinyukele kuBabe—
26.16: Bukani, kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa sicuku sabutsana ndzawonye, bonkhe bababona futsi babeva labantfwana; yebo, ngisho netinswane tayivula imilomo yato takhuluma tintfo letimangalisako; futsi letintfo labatikhuluma akuvunyelwanga kutsi kube khona namunye umuntfu lotibhalako.
26.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bafundzi Jesu labekabakhetsile bacala kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya embili kubhabhatisa kanye nekufundzisa ngebuningi balabo labeta kubo; futsi ngebuningi balabo labebabhajatiswa egameni laJesu bagcwaliswa ngaMoya loNgcwele.
26.18: Labaningi babo babona futsi beva tintfo letatingakhulumeki, letingakavunyelwa kutsi tibhalwe.
26.19: Futsi bafundzisa, basitana lomunye kulomunye; baba netintfo tonkhe ngalokufanako emkhatsini wabo, wonkhe umuntfu enta ngekulunga, lomunye nalomunye.
26.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi benta tonkhe tintfo njengoba Jesu bekabayaletile.
26.21: Futsi labo labebabhajatiswa egameni laJesu babitwa ngelibandla laKhristu.

27.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bafundzi baJesu bahamba bashumayela tintfo labebativile nalabebatibonile, bebabhabhatisa egameni laJesu, kwenteka kutsi bafundzi babutsana ndzawonye baphindze bahlanganyela emthandazweni kanye nasekuzileni lokukhulu.
27.2: Jesu waphindze wativeta kubo, ngoba bebathandaza kuBabe egameni lakhe; Jesu weta wema emkhatsini wabo, watsi kubo: Nifuna kutsi ngininikeni na?
27.3: Batsi kuye: Nkhosi, sifuna kutsi usitjele libito lesitawubita ngalo lelibandla; ngoba kunekuphikisana emkhatsini webantfu mayelana naloludzaba.
27.4: INkhosi yatsi kubo: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, kuya ngani kutsi bantfu bavungame baphindze baphikisane ngenca yalentfo na?
27.5: Abayifundzanga yini imibhalo lengcwele, letsi kufanele nibitwe ngelibito laKhristu, lekulibito lami na? Ngoba niyawubitwa ngalelibito ngelusuku lwekugcina;
27.6: Loyo lobitwa ngelibito lami, aphindze abeketele kute kube sekugcineni, nguye loyo loyawusindziswa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
27.7: Ngako-ke, noma ngabe yini leniyawuyenta, niyawuyenta egameni lami; ngako-ke niyawulibita libandla ngelibito lami; futsi niyawubita Babe egameni lami kute alibusise libandla ngenca yami.
27.8: Lingaba libandla lami kanjani ngaphandle kwekutsi libitwe ngelibito lami na? Ngoba uma libandla libitwa ngelibito laMosi uma kunjalo lilibandla laMosi; noma uma libitwa ngelibito lemuntfu uma kunjalo lilibandla lemuntfu; kodvwa uma libitwa ngelibito lami uma kunjalo lilibandla lami, nangabe lakhelwe etikwelivangeli lami.
27.9: Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, nine nakhelwe etikwelivangeli lami; ngako-ke niyawukwetsa noma ngabe yini leniyetsako, ngelibito lami; ngako-ke uma nibita Babe, kute kuzuze libandla, uma kusegameni lami Babe utawuniva.
27.10: Nangabe libandla lakhelwe etikwelivangeli lami kanjalo Babe uyawukhombisa imisebenti yakhe kulo.
27.11: Kodvwa uma lingakakhelwa evangelini lami, lakhelwe emisebentini yebantfu, noma emisebentini yadeveli, ngicinisile ngitsi kini banenjabulo ngemisebenti yabo kwesikhashana, emvakwesikhashana siphetfo siyeta, futsi bagawulelwa phansi baphindze baphonswe emlilweni, lapho sekute kubuya.
27.12: Ngoba imisebenti yabo iyabalandzela, ngoba kungenca yemisebenti yabo kutsi bagawulelwe phansi; ngako-ke khumbulani tintfo lenginitjele tona.
27.13: Bukani ngininikile livangeli lami, futsi leli livangeli lengininike lona—kutsi ngeta emhlabeni kutowenta intsandvo yaBabe, ngoba Babe angitfumile.
27.14: Babe wangitfuma kute ngiphakanyiselwe esiphambanweni; emvakwekutsi sengiphakanyiselwe esiphambanweni, kute ngidvonsele bonkhe bantfu kimi, kutsi njengoba ngaphakanyiselwa etulu bantfu kanjalo nebantfu bayawuphakanyiswa nguBabe, kute beme phambi kwami, kute behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo, noma ngabe mihle noma ngabe mibi—
27.15: Ngalesizatfu ngiphakanyiselwe etulu; ngako-ke, ngekwemandla aBabe ngitawubadvonsela kimi bonkhe bantfu, kute behlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yabo.
27.16: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, kutsi noma ngubani lophendvukako aphindze abhajatiswe egameni lami uyawugcwaliswa; uma abeketela kute kube sekugcineni, buka, ngitawumtfola angenacala phambi kwaBabe ngalolo suku lapho ngiyawukuma kute ngehlulele umhlaba.
27.17: Loyo longabeketeli kute kube sekugcineni, nguye kanye loyo loyawujutjwa aphindze aphonswe emlilweni, lapho angeke asabuya nanini, ngenca yekulunga kwaBabe.
27.18: Ngilo leli livi laliniketa bantfwana bebantfu. Ngenca yalesi sizatfu uyawagcwalisa emavi lawaniketa, futsi akacambi emanga, kodvwa uwagcwalisa onkhe emavi akhe.
27.19: Futsi kute intfo lengcolile lengangena embusweni wakhe; ngako-ke kute intfo lengena ekuphumuleni kwakhe ngaphandle kwalabo labahlante tingubo tabo engatini yami, ngenca yelukholo lwabo, kanye nekuphendvuka etonweni tabo tonkhe, kanye nekwetsembeka kwabo kute kube sekugcineni.
27.20: Manje lona ngumyaleto: Phendvukani, nonkhe mikhawulo yemhlaba, nite kimi niphindze nibhajatiswe egameni lami, kute ningcweliswe ngekwemukelwa nguMoya loNgcwele, kute nime ningenasici ngaphambi kwami ngelusuku lwekugcina.
27.21: Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, livangeli lami leli; futsi niyatati tintfo lekufanele nitente ebandleni lami; ngoba imisebenti lenibone ngiyenta nani ngalokunjalo niyawuyenta; ngoba loko leningibone ngikwenta loko nani niyawukwenta;
27.22: Ngako-ke, uma nenta letintfo nibusisiwe, ngoba niyawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
27.23: Tibhaleni tintfo lenitibonile naphindze nativa, ngaphandle kwaleto letingakavunyelwa.
27.24: Yibhaleni imisebenti yalabantfu, leyawukwenteka, njengoba ibhaliwe, ngaloko lokwentekile.
27.25: Ngoba bukani, kuleto tincwadzi letibhaliwe, kanye naleto letiyawubhalwa, labantfu bayawukwehlulelwa ngato, ngoba imisebenti yabo iyawukwembulwa kubantfu ngato.
27.26: Bukani, tonkhe tintfo tibhaliwe nguBabe; ngako-ke etincwadzini letiyawubhalwa umhlaba uyawukwehlulelwa ngato.
27.27: Yatini kutsi niyawuba behluleli balabantfu, ngekwesehlulelo lengiyawuninika sona, lesiyawube silungile. Ngako-ke, kufanele nibe bantfu labanjani na? Ngicinisile ngitsi kini, njengami.
27.28: Manje sengiyahamba ngiya kuBabe. Futsi ngicinisile ngitsi kini, noma ngabe ngutiphi tintfo leniyawuticela kuBabe egameni lami niyawuniketwa tona.
27.29: Ngako-ke, celani, niyawuphiwa; nconcotsani, niyawuvulelwa; ngoba loyo locelako, uyaphiwa; naloyo lonconcotsako, uyawuvulelwa.
27.30: Manje, bukani, intfokoto yami yinkhulu, kangangoba igcwele, ngenca yenu, kanjalo nalesitukulwane; yebo, ngisho naBabe uyatfokota, kanjalo nato tonkhe tingilosi letingcwele, ngenca yenu kanye nalesi situkulwane; ngoba kute namunye wabo lolahlekile.
27.31: Bukani, ngifuna kutsi nicondze; ngoba ngisho labo labaphilako manje balesi situkulwane; kute namunye wabo lolahlekile; futsi ngenca yabo nginenjabulo legcwele.
27.32: Kodvwa bukani, ngiyadzabuka ngenca yesitukulwane sesine kusukela kulesi situkulwane, ngoba bona baholelwa khashane ekutfunjweni nguye njengayo indvodzana yekulahlwa; ngoba bayawungitsengisa ngesiliva kanye neligolide, nangaloko lokuyoboliswa ngumvunya kanye naloko emasela langafohla akwebe. Futsi ngalolosuku ngiyawubahambela, ngisho nangekuguculela imisebenti yabo etikwetinhloko tabo.
27.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekacedzile kusho letinkhulumo watsi kubafundzi bakhe: Ngenani esangweni lelincane; ngoba lincane lisango, futsi ingumntjuntju nendlela leholela ekuphileni, bancane labayitfolako; kodvwa libanti lisango, iphindze ivulekile indlela leholela ekufeni, futsi baningi labahamba ngayo, kute kufike busuku, lapho kungeke kusasebenta muntfu khona.

28.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawashito lamavi, wakhuluma kubafundzi bakhe, ngamunye nangamunye, watsi kubo: Yini leniyifisa kimi, emvakwekube sengihambile ngaya kuBabe?
28.2: Bonkhe bakhuluma, ngaphandle kwalabatsatfu, batsi: Sifisa kutsi emvakwekutsi sesihleli sate sefika eminyakeni lebhekekile yekukhula kwemuntfu, kutsi bufundisi betfu, losibitele kubo, bufike esiphetfweni, kute site kuwe ngekushesha embusweni wakho.
28.3: Watsi kubo: Nibusisiwe ngoba nifisa lentfo kimi; ngako-ke, emvakwekutsi senineminyaka lengemashumi lasikhombisa nakubili budzala niyawukuta kimi embusweni wami; niphindze nitfole kuphumula kanye nami.
28.4: Emvakwekutsi sekakhulumile kubo, wagucukela kulabo labatsatfu, watsi kubo: Nine nifisa kutsi nginenteleni, uma sengihambile ngaya kuBabe na?
28.5: Badzabuka etinhlitiyweni tabo, ngoba abazange balokotse bayikhulume kuye leyontfo lebebayifisa.
28.6: Watsi kubo: Bukani, ngiyayati imicabango yenu, nifise leyontfo Johane, lotsandziwe wami, lobekanami ebufundisini bami, ngaphambi kwekutsi ngibetselwe ngemaJuda, layifisa kimi.
28.7: Ngako-ke, nibusiswe kakhulu nine, ngoba angeke nikuve kufa; kodvwa niyawuphila nite nibone tonkhe tento taBabe kubantfwana bebantfu, kute kugcwaliseke tonkhe tintfo ngekwentsandvo yababe, lapho ngiyawuta ngenkhatimulo yami nemandla asezulwini
28.8: Futsi angeke nanini nitive tinhlungu tekufa; kodvwa uma sengita ngenkhatimulo yami niyawuguculwa ngekuphatima kweliso nisuke esimeni sekubhubha niye esimeni sekungabhubhi; ngaleso sikhatsi niyawubusiswa embusweni waBabe.
28.9: Ngetulu kwaloko, angeke nibuve buhlungu nisesenyameni, noma lusizi ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngenca yetono temhlaba; futsi konkhe loku ngitawukwenta ngenca yalentfo leniyifise kimi, ngoba nifise kutsi niletse imiphefumulo yebantfu kimi, umhlaba usekhona.
28.10: Ngalesizatfu niyawuba nenjabulo legcwele; niyawuhlala phansi embusweni waBabe; yebo, injabulo yenu iyawugcwala, njengoba nami Babe anginike injabulo legcwele; niyawuba njengami, nami nginjengaBabe; futsi Babe nami simunye.
28.11: Moya loNgcwele ufakaza ngaBabe kanye nangami, futsi Babe unika bantfwana bebantfu Moya loNgcwele, ngenca yami.
28.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Jesu sekawakhulumile lamavi, wabatsintsa bonkhe ngamunye nangamunye ngemunwe wakhe ngaphandle kwalaba labatsatfu labebatawusala, emvakwaloko wase uyahamba.
28.13: Buka, emazulu avuleka, benyuselwa ezulwini, babona baphindze beva tintfo letingakhulumeki.
28.14: Balelwa kutsi bakhulume, abanikwanga nemandla kutsi bakhulume letintfo labebatibonile baphindze bativa;
28.15: Noma bebasemtimbeni noma ngaphandle kwemtimba, abatanga; ngoba kubo bekubonakala kwangatsi kukhona kuguculwa kwesimo sabo, kutsi baguculwe emtimbeni wenyama baya esimeni sekungabhubhi, kute bakwati kubona tintfo takaNkulunkulu.
28.16: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi baphindze bafundzisa emhlabeni; noko abatange bafundzise ngetintfo labebativile baphindze batibona, ngenca yemyaleto lobewunikwetwe bona ezulwini.
28.17: Manje, noma baba ngulababhubhako noma ngulabangabhubhi, kusukela ngelusuku lwekuguculwa kwesimo sabo, angati;
28.18: Kodvwa nguloku lengikwatiko, ngekwembhalo loniketiwe—bahamba eveni lonkhe, bafundzisa bonkhe bantfu, bahlanganisa ngebuningi ebandleni labo bebakholwa enshumayelweni yabo; bababhabhatisa, futsi ngebuningi balabo lababhajatiswa baniketwa Moya loNgcwele.
28.19: Futsi baphonswa ejele ngulabo labebangasilo belibandla. Emajele akakwatanga kubavimba, ngoba adzabuka kabili.
28.20: Baphonswa ngaphansi kwemhlaba; kodvwa bawuhlasela umhlaba ngelivi laNkulunkulu, kangangekutsi ngemandla akhe bakhishelwa ngephandle basuka ekujuleni kwemhlaba; ngako-ke abakhonanga kumba imigodzi leyenele kutsi ibabambe.
28.21: Futsi kukatsatfu baphonswa esitsandvweni semlilo bangalimali.
28.22: Futsi kukabili baphonswa emgodzini wetilwane tasendle; buka badlala netilwane kuhle kwemntfwana nelizinyane lemvu lelimunyako, bangalimali.
28.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaleyo ndlela bahamba emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu baNefi, balishumayela livangeli laKhristu kubo bonkhe bantfu eveni lonkhe; baphendvukela eNkhosini, futsi bahlanganyela ebandleni laKhrisu, ngaleyondlela bantfu baleso situkulwane babusiswa, njengekwemavi aJesu.
28.24: Manje mine, Mormon, ngenta siphetfo sekukhuluma mayelana naletintfo kwesikhashana.
28.25: Buka, besengitawubhala emabito alabo labebangeke bakuve kufa, kodvwa iNkhosi yala; ngako-ke angiwabhali, ngoba afihlelwe bantfu.
28.27: Buka batawubasemkhatsini webeTive, betive angeke babati.
28.28: Ngetulu kwaloko batawubasemkhatsini wemaJuda, nemaJuda angeke abati.
28.29: Futsi kuyawukwenteka, ngesikhatsi iNkhosi ibona kulungile ngekuhlakanipha kwayo kutsi bayawusita kuto tonkhe tive letihlakatekile taka-Israyeli, kanye nasetiveni tonkhe, imindeni, tilimi, kanye nakubantfu, bayawukhipha kuto bantfu labaningi babaletse kuJesu, kute sifiso sabo sifezeke, kanjalo nangenca yemandla lanelisako aNkulunkulu lakubo.
28.30: Banjengetingilosi taNkulunkulu, futsi uma bayawuthandaza kuBabe egameni laJesu bangatibonakalisa kunoma ngumuphi umuntfu ngekutsandza kwabo.
28.31: Ngako-ke, mikhulu futsi iyamangalisa imisebenti leyawukwentiwa ngibo, ngaphambi kwelusuku lolukhulu lolutako lapho bonkhe bantfu kufanele ngempela beme embikwesihlalo sekwehlulela saKhristu;
28.32: Yebo nasemkhatsini webeTive kuyawubakhona lomkhulu nalomangalisako umsebenti loyawukwentiwa ngubo, ngaphambi kwalolosuku lwekwehlulela.
28.33: Futsi kube beninayo yonkhe imibhalo lengcwele lelandzisa ngayo yonkhe indzaba yemisebenti lemangalisako yaKhristu, beniyawukwati, ngekwemavi aKhristu, kutsi letintfo kufanele ngempela tenteke.
28.34: Maye kuloyo longeke awalalele emavi aJesu, kanjalo newalabo labakhetsile wabatfumela emkhatsini wabo; ngoba labo labangeke bawemukele emavi aJesu kanye nemavi alabo labatfumele abamemukeli yena; ngako-ke angeke abemukele ngelusuku lwekugcina.
28.35: Futsi bekuyawubancono kube abatalwanga. Ngoba nicabanga kutsi ningakugwema yini kulunga kwaNkulunkulu lowoniwe, lonyatselwe ngaphansi kwetinyawo tebantfu, kute ngaloko kute insindziso na?
28.36: Manje bukani, njengoba ngikhuluma mayelana nalabo iNkhosi lebakhetsile, yebo, ngisho nalabo labatsatfu labenyuselwa emazulwini, lengingati noma bahlantwa besuswa ekubeni ngulababhubhako bayiswa ekungabhubhini—
28.37: Kodvwa bukani, ngesikhatsi sengibhalile, ngibutile eNkhosini, ingembulele kutsi kudzingekile kutsi kube khona ingucuko leyentekako emitimbeni yabo, kungenjalo kudzingekile kutsi bakuve kufa;
28.38: Ngako-ke, kute bangakuva kufa kwabakhona ingucuko leyenteka emitimbeni yabo, kute bangabuva buhlungu noma lusizi ngaphandle kwekutsi kube ngekwetono temhlaba.
28.39: Manje lengucuko yayingalingani naleyo leyawukwenteka ngelusuku lwekugcina; kodvwa kwaba khona ingucuko leyenteka kubo, kangangekutsi Sathane bekangeke akwati kuba nemandla ngetulu kwabo, bekangeke akwati kubalinga; bangcweliswa basenyameni, kute babengcwele, nekutsi emandla emhlaba bekangeke abavimbe.
28.40: Futsi bekufanele bahlale bakulesi simo kute kube lusuku lwekwehlulela laKhristu; futsi ngalolo suku bebatobe sebatfole kuguculwa lokukhulu, bemukelwe embusweni waBabe bangaphindzi baphume nanini, kodvwa bahlale naNkulunkulu ingunaphakadze emazulwini.

29.1: Manje bukani, ngitsi kini ngesikhatsi iNkhosi seyibona kufanele, ngekuhlakanipha kwayo, kutsi lemibhalo ite kubeTive njengekwelivi layo, ngaleso sikhatsi nitawukwati kutsi sivumelwano Babe lasenta nebantfwana baka-Israyeli, mayelana nekubuyiselwa kwabo emaveni langemafa abo, siyawube sesicalile kugcwaliseka.
29.2: Futsi nitawukwati kutsi emavi eNkhosi, lakhulunywe baphrofethi labangcwele, onkhe ayawufezeka; futsi akukafaneli nitsi iNkhosi ibambelela kuta kwayo kubantfwana baka-Israyeli.
29.3: Futsi akukafaneli nicabange etinhlityweni tenu kutsi emavi lakhulunyiwe alite, ngoba bukani, iNkhosi iyawusikhumbula sivumelwano sayo leyisente kubantfu bayo bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
29.4: Futsi ngesikhatsi senitibona letintfo sententeka emkhatsini wenu, ngaleso sikhatsi ningabe nisatidzelela nani tento teNkhosi, ngoba inkemba yekulunga kwayo isesandleni sayo sangesekudla; bukani, ngalolo suku, uma niyawutedzelela tento tayo iyawukwenta kutsi ite kini ngekushesha.
29.5: Maye kuloyo lodzelela tento teNkhosi; yebo, maye kuloyo loyawumphika Khristu kanye nemisebenti yakhe!
29.6: Yebo, maye kuloyawutiphika tembulo teNkhosi, naloyo loyawutsi iNkhosi ayisasebenti ngetembulo, ngetiphrofetho, ngetipho, ngetilimi, ngekuphilisa, noma ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele!
29.7: Yebo, maye kuloyo loyotsi ngalolo suku, kute atfole inzuzo, ngeke kusaba khona simangaliso lesingentiwa nguJesu Khristu; ngoba loyo lowenta loku uyawuba njengendvodzana yekulahlwa, lengatange yentelwe umusa, ngekwelivi laKhristu!
29.8: Yebo, futsi akusafaneli kutsi nincife, nidzelele, noma nidlale ngemaJuda, nanganoma nguyiphi insali yendlu yaka-Israyeli; ngoba bukani, iNkhosi iyasikhumbula sivumelwano sayo kubo, futsi iyawukwenta kubo ngekwaloko lebeyikufungile.
29.9: Ngako-ke akukafaneli nicabange kutsi ningasigucula sandla sangesekudla seNkhosi nisente sangesencele, kute ingakwati kwenta sehlulelo ekugcwaliseni sivumelwano leyasenta kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli.

30.1: Lalelani, Awu nine beTive, nive emavi aJesu Khristu, indvodzana yaNkulunkulu lophilako, langiyalete ngawo kutsi ngiwakhulume mayelana nani, ngoba, bukani ungiyalete kutsi ngibhale, ngitsi:
30.2: Gucukani, nonkhe nine beTive etindleleni tenu tebubi; niphendvuke etentweni tenu letimbi, tekucamba emanga, tenkhohliso, tebugwadla, netinengiso tenu letiyimfihlo, nasekukhonteni tithico, nasekubulaleni, nakubuphristi-mbumbulu, nakumona, nakuncabano, kanye nakubo bonkhe bubi netinengiso, nite kimi, nibhajatiswe egameni lami, kute nitfole kutsetselelwa kwetono tenu, niphindze nigcwaliswe ngaMoya loNgcwele, kute nibalwe kanye nebantfu bami lababendlu yaka-Israyeli.

1.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nakune wendlula, kanjalo newemashumi lamatsatfu nesihlanu, buka labafundzi baJesu babese bakha libandla laKhristu kuwo onkhe emave etindzaweni tonkhe. Ngebuningi balabo labeta kubo, baphendvuka ngeliciniso etonweni tabo, babhajatiswa egameni laJesu; ngetulu kwaloko bamtfola Moya loNgcwele.
1.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesitfupha, bonkhe bantfu bese baphendvukele eNkhosini, kulo lonkhe live, kumaNefi kanye nemaLamani, futsi bekungasekho nemibango kanye nekuphikisana emkhatsini wabo, wonkhe umuntfu bekenta kulunga lomunye kulomunye.
1.3: Bebanetintfo tonkhe ngalokufanako emkhatsini wabo; ngako-ke bekute labebacebile nalabebamphofu, labebagcilatiwe kanye nalabebakhululiwe, kodvwa bonkhe bebakhululekile, futsi bahlanganyela esiphiweni sasezulwini.
1.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesikhombisa wendlula nawo, kwachubeka kwaba khona kuthula eveni.
1.5: Kwaba khona imisebenti lemikhulu nalemangalisako leyentiwa bafundzi baJesu, kangangekutsi babalapha labagulako, bavusa labafile, benta netishosha tahamba, timphumphutse tatfola kubona kwato, kanye netihhulu teva, futsi benta tonkhe tinhlobo tetimangaliso emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu; kute timangaliso labatenta ngaphandle kwekutsi kube segameni laJesu.
1.6: Umnyaka wemashumi lamatsatfu nesiphohlongo wendlula kanjalo, kanjalo newemashumi lamatsatfu nemfica, newemashumi lamane nakunye, kanye newemashumi lamane nakubili, yebo, kwate kwendlula ngisho iminyaka lengemashumi lamane nemfica, kanjalo newemashumi lasihlanu nakunye, kanye newemashumi lasihlanu nakubili; yebo, kwate kwendlula ngisho iminyaka lengemashumi lasihlanu nemfica.
1.7: INkhosi yabaphumelelisa kakhulu eveni; yebo, kangangekutsi baphindze bakha emadolobha lapho bekukadze kukhona emadolobha lashisiwe khona.
1.8: Yebo, ngisho nalelo lidolobha lelikhulu iZarahemla benta kutsi liphindze lakhiwe.
1.9: Kodvwa bekamaningi emadolobha labekacwilile, futsi kwavela emanti esikhundleni sawo; ngako-ke lamadolobha bekangeke akhiwe kabusha.
1.10: Manje, buka, kwenteka kutsi bantfu baNefi bakhula bacina, bandza ngekushesha lokukhulu, baba bantfu labahle futsi labatsandzekako.
1.11: Bebashada, baphindze bendziswa, babusiswa njengekwetetsembiso letiningi iNkhosi lebeyitente kubo.
1.12: Abatange basahamba nanini ngekwetento kanye nangekwetimiso temtsetfo waMosi; kodvwa bahamba ngekwemiyaleto labebayitfole eNkhosini yabo kanye naNkulunkulu wabo, bachubeka nekuzila kudla kanye nekuthandaza, kanye nasekuhlanganyeleni ndzawonye njalo nje kute bathandaze baphindze balalele livi leNkhosi.
1.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekute umbango emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu, kulo lonkhe live; kodvwa bekukhona timangaliso letinkhulu lebetenteka emkhatsini webafundzi baJesu.
1.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nakunye wendlula, kanjalo nemnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nakubili, yebo, kwephetsa, kwate kwendlula ngisho umnyaka wemashumi lasikhombisa nemfica; yebo, kwate kwendlula iminyaka lelikhulu, futsi bafundzi baJesu, labo labekabakhetsile, babese bonkhe bayahamba baya epharadesi laNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwalabatsatfu labebatawusala; kwaba khona labanye bafundzi lababekwa etikhundleni tabo; ngalokunjalo nalabaningi baleso situkulwane bese bendlulile.
1.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekute umbango eveni, ngenca yelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu lobelukhona etinhlitiyweni tebantfu.
1.16: Bekute umona, kucabana, tiphitsiphitsi, bugwadla, emanga, kubulala nanoma nguluphi luhlobo lwenkhanuko; futsi akuyuze kube khona bantfu labebatfokote kangaka emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu labadalwa sandla saNkulunkulu.
1.17: Bekute tigebengu, babulali, noma emaLamani, noma nhloboni yebantfu labebahlukaniswe ngekwebuve; kodvwa bonkhe bebamunye, bantfwana baKhristu, kanye netindlalifa tembuso waNkulunkulu.
1.18: Bebabusisiwe! Ngoba iNkhosi yababusisa kuko konkhe kwenta kwabo; yebo, babusiswa baphindze baphumeleliswa kwate kwendlula ngisho likhulu nelishumi leminyaka; nesitukulwane sekucala kusukela kuKhristu bese sendlulile, bekute umbango kulo lonkhe live.
1.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nefi, loyo lobekagcine lombhalo wekugcina, (awugcine kubongcwengcwe baNefi) wafa, indvodzana yakhe Amosi yawugcina esikhundleni sakhe; naye wawugcina kubo bongcwengcwe baNefi.
1.20: Wabagcina iminyaka lengemashumi lasiphohlongo nakune, futsi bekunguloku kukhona kuthula eveni, ngaphandle nje kwencenye lencane yebantfu labebahlukene ebandleni baphindze batibita ngemaLamani; ngako-ke kwaphindze kwacala kutsi kube khona emaLamani eveni.
1.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Amosi naye wafa, (bese kuyiminyaka lelikhulu nemashumi layimfica nakune kusukela ekuteni kwaKhristu) indvodzana yakhe Amosi yawugcina umbhalo esikhundleni sakhe; nayo ngalokunjalo yawugcina kubo bongcwengcwe baNefi; ngetulu kwaloko bewubhalwe encwadzini yaNefi, lokungulenancwadzi.
1.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bese kwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili; netitukulwane tesibili bese tendlulile tonkhe ngaphandle kwalabambalwa.
1.23: Manje mine, Mormon, ngifuna kutsi nati kutsi bantfu bese bandzile, kangangekutsi bese basabalele eveni lonkhe, nekutsi bese bacebe kakhulu, ngenca yekuphumelela kwabo kuKhristu.
1.24: Manje, kulomnyaka wemakhulu lamabili nakunye kwacala emkhatsini wabo kutsi kube khona labo labaphakama ekutichenyeni, njengekugcoka tingubo letibitako, nato tonkhe tinhlobo temagugu lamahle kakhulu, kanye netintfo letinhle kakhulu temhlaba.
1.25: Kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili abatange basaba netimphahla kanye netintfo emkhatsini wabo ngalokufanako nanini.
1.26: Bacala kutsi behlukane ngetigaba; bacala kutsi batakhele emabandla kute batfole inzuzo, bacala kuliphika libandla leliciniso laKhristu.
1.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili neminyaka lelishumi bese kukhona emabandla lamaningi eveni; yebo, bekukhona lamaningi emabandla labekafakaza kutsi ayamati Khristu, kodvwa atiphika tincenye letiningi telivangeli lakhe, kangangekutsi bekavumela yonkhe inhlobo yebubi, futsi anika loko lokungcwele kuloyo lobekangakavunyelwa ngenca yekungafaneleki.
1.28: Futsi lelibandla landza kakhulu ngenca yebubi, nangenca yemandla aSathane lowatfola kubambelela etinhlitiyweni tabo.
1.29: Ngetulu kwaloko, kwabakhona lelinye libandla lebelimphika Khristu; futsi bebahlupha libandla leliciniso laKhristu, ngenca yekutfobeka kwabo kanye nekukholwa kwabo kuKhristu; bebabadzelela ngenca yetimangaliso letiningi lebetenteka emkhatsini wabo.
1.30: Ngako-ke basebentisa emandla kanye neligunya kubafundzi baJesu labebasele nabo, babaphonsa ejele; kodvwa ngemandla elivi laNkulunkulu, labekakubo, emajele adzabuka kabili, bahamba benta timangaliso letinkhulu emkhatsini wabo.
1.31: Noko, nanoma kwakungato tonkhe letimangaliso, bantfu baticinisa tinhlitiyo tabo, futsi bafuna kubabulala, njengemaJuda eJerusalema labekafuna kubulala Jesu, njengekwelivi lakhe.
1.32: Futsi babaphonsa etitsandvweni temlilo, baphuma bangakalimali.
1.33: Ngetulu kwaloko babaphonsa emigodzini yetilwane tasendle, kodvwa badlala netilwane tasendle njengemntfwana nemvu; baphuma emkhatsini wato, bangakalimali.
1.34: Noko, bantfu baticinisa tinhlitiyo tabo, ngoba bebaholwa baphristi labaningi kanye nebaphrofethi bemanga kutsi bakhe emabandla lamaningi, kanye nekutsi bente tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi. Babashaya bantfu baJesu; kodvwa bantfu baJesu abatange batiphindziselele. Futsi ngaleyondlela bancishelwa lukholo bandza ngebubi, umnyaka nemnyaka, kwate kwendlula iminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili nemashumi lamatsatfu.
1.35: Manje kwenteka ngalomnyaka, yebo, emnyakeni wemakhulu lamabili nemashumi lamatsatfu nakunye, kwaba khona kwehlukana lokukhulu emkhatsini webantfu.
1.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalomnyaka kwacubuka bantfu labebabitwa ngekutsi ngemaNefi, bebakholwa ngeliciniso kuKhristu; emkhatsini wabo kwaba khona labo labebabitwa ngekutsi ngemaLamani—ngemaJakobe, emaJosefa, kanye nemaZoramu.
1.37: Ngako-ke labebakholwa ngeliciniso kuKhristu, kanye nalabebamkhonta ngeliciniso Khristu, (emkhatsini wabo bekukhona nalabafundzi labatsatfu baJesu labebayawusala) bebabitwa ngekutsi ngemaNefi, emaJakobe, emaJosefa, kanye nemaZoramu.
1.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi labo labebalahla livangeli babitwa ngekutsi ngemaLamani, emaLemuweli, kanye nema-Ishmayeli; abatange bancishelwe lukholo, kodvwa balivukela ngemabomu livangeli laKhristu; futsi bafundzisa bantfwana babo kutsi bangakholwa, njengaboyise, kusukela ekucaleni, bancipha.
1.39: Bekungenca yebubi kanye netinengiso taboyise, njengoba bekunjalo ekucaleni. Futsi bafundziswa kubatondza bantfwana baNkulunkulu, njengoba emaLamani afundziswa kutsi atondze bantfwana baNefi kusukela ekucaleni.
1.40: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili nemashumi lamane nakune bese yendlulile, betime kanjalo-ke tindzaba talabantfu. Incenye lenebubi kakhulu yebantfu yakhula yacina, futsi baba baningi kakhulu kunebantfu baNkulunkulu.
1.41: Bachubeka nekutakhela emabandla abo, bawahlobisa ngato tonkhe tinhlobo tetintfo letiligugu. Yendlula ngaleyondlela-ke iminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili nemashumi lasihlanu, kanjalo neminyaka lengemakhulu lamabili nemashumi lasitfupha.
1.42: Futsi kwenteka kutsi incenye lenebubi yebantfu yacala kutsi yente tifungo letiyimfihlo kanye nemacembu aGadiyanthoni.
1.43: Ngetulu kwaloko nebantfu labebabitwa ngekutsi bantfu baNefi bacala kutikhukhumeta etinhlitiyweni tabo, ngenca yemcebo wabo lomningi, baphindze baba nekutikhukhumeta njengabomnakabo, emaLamani.
1.44: Kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi bafundzi bacala kudzabuka ngetono temhlaba.
1.45: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu, bantfu baNefi kanye nemaLamani bese banebubi lobukhulu ngalokufanako.
1.46: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tigebengu taGadiyanthoni tasabalala eveni lonkhe; futsi bekute namunye lobekalungile ngaphandle kwebafundzi baJesu. Ligolide kanye nesiliva baligcina ngebuningi, futsi bahweba ngayo yonkhe indlela yekuhweba.
1.47: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu, (bantfu bebasolo bahleli ebubini) Amosi wafa; kwatsi umnakabo, Amaroni, wawugcina umbhalo esikhundleni sakhe.
1.48: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamabili, Amaroni, ngekuphocelelwa nguMoya loNgcwele, wayifihla imibhalo lengcwele—yebo, yonkhe imibhalo lengcwele leyayendlulisiwe kusukela etitukulwaneni netitukulwane, leyayingcwele—kwate kwaba yiminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamabili kusukela ekuteni kwaKhristu.
1.49: Futsi wayifihla eNkhosini, kute iphindze ite kuyo insali yendlu yaJakobe, njengekwetiphrofetho kanye netetsembiso teNkhosi. Uphela kanjalo-ke umbhalo wa-Amoroni.

1.1: Manje mine, Mormon, sengenta umbhalo wetintfo lengitibonile nalengitivile, ngiwubita ngeNcwadzi yaMormon.
1.2: Cishe ngesikhatsi Amaroni asafihle imibhalo eNkhosini, weta kimi, (ngineminyaka lecishe ibe lishumi budzala, ngacala kufundzisa ngandlela tsite ngendlela yekufundza kwebantfu bakitsi) Amaroni watsi kimi: Ngiyabona kutsi ungumntfwana lonesizotsa, futsi uyashesha kubona;
1.3: Ngako-ke, uma sewuneminyaka lecishe ibe ngemashumi lamabili nakune budzala ngifuna kutsi utikhumbule letintfo lowutibonile mayelana nalabantfu; futsi uma sewunaleyo minyaka uhambe uye eveni i-Anthumu, egcumeni leliyawubitwa ngekutsi yiShimu; ngulapho langibeke khona eNkhosini yonkhe imicopho lengcwele lemayelana nalabantfu
1.4: Buka, uyawutsatsa labongcwengcwe baNefi babe kuwe, bese kutsi labasalako uyawubashiya kuleyondzawo labakuyo; uyawucopha kulabongcwengcwe baNefi tonkhe tintfo lowutibonile mayelana nalabantfu.
1.5: Mine, Mormon, nginguwentalelwane yaNefi, (libito lababe bekunguMormon) ngatikhumbula leto tintfo Amaroni abengiyalete ngato.
1.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi, sengineminyaka lelishumi nakunye budzala, ngatsatfwa ngubabe wangiyisa eveni lelingaseningizimu, eveni laseZarahemla.
1.7: Lonkhe lelive beseligcwele takhiwo, nebantfu besebabaningi, bangangesihlabatsi saselwandle.
1.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalona mnyaka kwacala kwaba khona imphi emkhatsini wemaNefi, labekafaka ekhatsi emaNefi, nemaJakobe, nemaJosefa kanye nemaZoramu; lemphi yayisemkhatsini wemaNefi, kanye nemaLamani, nemaLemuweli nema-Ishmayeli.
1.9: Manje emaLamani nemaLemuweli kanye nema-Ishmayeli bebabitwa ngekutsi maLamani, futsi lamacembu lamabili bekungemaNefi kanye nemaLamani.
1.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi lemphi yacala kuba emkhatsini wabo eminceleni yaseZarahemla, ngasemantini aseSidoni.
1.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi bekabutsele ndzawonye sibalo lesikhulu semadvodza, lesasendlula sibalo lesingangetinkhulungwane letingemashumi lamatsatfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi aba netimphi letiningi ngalowo mnyaka, lapho emaNefi ancoba khona emaLamani aphindze abulala labaningi bawo.
1.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani alihocisa lisu lawo, kwaba khona kuthula eveni; kuthula kwaba khona sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemine, kangangekutsi akubanga khona kucitseka kwengati.
1.13: Kodvwa bubi bandza eveni lonkhe, kangangekutsi iNkhosi yabatsatsa bafundzi bayo labatsandzekako, nemsebenti wetimangaliso newekwelapha waphela ngenca yebubi bebantfu.
1.14: Kwababete tipho letivela eNkhosini, naMoya loNgcwele akatange aseta kunoma ngubani, ngenca yebubi kanye nekungakholwa kwabo.
1.15: Mine, sengineminyaka lelishumi nesihlanu budzala ngandlela tsite nginesizotsa, ngako-ke ngavakashelwa yiNkhosi, ngeva futsi ngabati buhle baJesu.
1.16: Ngetama kushumayela kulabantfu, kodvwa umlomo wami wavalwa, ngalelwa kutsi ngibashumayele; ngoba buka besebamhlamukile Nkulunkulu wabo ngemabomu; nebafundzi labatsandzekako batsatfwa bakhishwa eveni, ngenca yebubi babo.
1.17: Ngahlala emkhatsini wabo, kodvwa ngalelwa kutsi ngibashumayele, ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo; futsi ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo lelive lacalekiswa ngenca yabo.
1.18: Futsi letigebengu taGadiyanthoni, lebetisemkhatsini wemaLamani, tagcwala lelive, kangangekutsi labebahlala kulo bacala kufihla emagugu abo ngephansi kwemhlaba; futsi anyibilika, ngenca yekutsi iNkhosi beyilicalekisile lelive, kute bangakhoni kuwabamba, noma bawagcine futsi.
1.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba khona balumbi, nebatsakatsi, kanye nemilingo; nemandla alomubi asebenta eveni lonkhe, ate agcwaliseka onkhe emavi a-Abinadi, kanjalo ne-aSamuweli umLamani.

2.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawo lowo mnyaka kwacala kwaphindze kwaba khona imphi emkhatsini wemaNefi kanye nemaLamani. Nanoma ngangimncane, bengimkhulu ngemtimba; ngako-ke bantfu baNefi bangibeka kutsi ngibe ngumholi wabo, noma umholi wemabutfo abo.
2.2: Ngako-ke kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wami welishumi nesitfupha ngalwa nemaLamani, ngihola emaNefi; ngako-ke iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamabili nesitfupha beseyendlulile.
2.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamabili nesikhombisa emaLamani eta kitsi ngemandla lamakhulu kakhulu, kangangekutsi awesabisa emabutfo ami; ngako-ke akatange alwe, acala abalekela ngasemaveni labekangasenyakatfo.
2.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sate sefika edolobheni lase-Angola, salitsatsa lelodolobha laba ngeletfu, senta emalungiselelo ekutsi sitivikele kumaLamani. Futsi kwenteka kutsi salicinisa lelo dolobha ngemandla etfu onkhe; kodvwa nanoma sasilicinisile ngako konkhe emaLamani atselekela etikwetfu aphindze asiphocelela kutsi sibaleke siphumele ngaphandle kwalelo dolobha.
2.6: Sahamba sate sefika eveni laJoshuwa, lebelisemnceleni enshonalanga ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
2.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sabagcogca bantfu betfu ngekushesha lokukhulu, kute sibagcogcele ndzawonye babe licembu linye.
2.8: Kodvwa buka, lelive beligcwele tigebengu kanye nemaLamani; nanoma kubhujiswa lokukhulu bekulengela bantfu bami, abatange baphendvuke ekwenteni kwabo bubi; ngako-ke kwaba khona ingati nekubulawa kwebantfu labaningi kulo lonkhe live, etinhlangotsini totimbili kumaNefi kanjalo nakumaLamani; futsi kwaba khona kuvukelana lokukhulu kulo lonkhe live.
2.9: Manje, emaLamani bekanenkhosi, libito layo kungu-Aroni; weta watokulwa natsi nelibutfo lelitinkhulungwane letingemashumi lamane nakune. Buka, ngamelana naye ngalabatinkhulungwane letingemashumi lamane nakubili. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngamehlula nelibutfo lami kangangekutsi wangibalekela. Buka, konkhe loku kwenteka, bese kwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamatsatfu.
2.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi acala aphendvuka ebubini bawo, aphindze acala kukhala njengoba bekuphrofethe Samuweli umphrofethi; ngoba buka bekute namunye umuntfu lobekakwati kugcina loko lobekukwakhe, ngenca yemasela, netigebengu, nebabulali, nebuciko bemilingo, kanye nebutsakatsi lobebukhona eveni.
2.11: Ngako-ke kwacala kutsi kube khona kukhala kanye nekulila kulo lonkhe live ngenca yaletintfo, ikakhulukati emkhatsini webantfu baNefi.
2.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi mine, Mormon, ngibona kulila nekukhala kwabo kanye nelusizi lwabo phambi kweNkhosi, inhlitiyo yami yacala kutfokota ngekhatsi kimi, ngekwati sihawu kanye nekumela bulukhuni kweNkhosi, ngako-ke nginekucabanga kutsi yayitawuba nesihawu kubo kute baphindze babe bantfu labalungile.
2.13: Kodvwa buka kutfokota kwami bekulite, ngoba kudzabuka kwabo bekungasiko kwekuphendvuka, ngenca yebuhle baNkulunkulu; kodvwa esikhundleni saloko bekukudzabuka kwekulahlwa, ngenca yekutsi iNkhosi beyingeke ivume njalo kutsi bajabule basesonweni.
2.14: Abatange bete kuJesu ngetinhlitiyo letidzabukile nangemoya lodzabukile, kodvwa bamcalekisa Nkulunkulu, baphindze bafisa kufa. Noko bebalwa ngenkemba kute basindzise timphilo tabo.
2.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kudzabuka kwami kwabuyela kimi, ngaphindze ngabona kutsi lusuku lwemusa bese lwendlulile kubo, ngekwasemhlabeni kanye nangekwakamoya; ngoba ngatibona tinkhulungwane tabo tijutjelwa phansi ngekuhlamuka Nkulunkulu wabo ngalokusobala, baphindze bacwabelana ndzawonye njengebulongo eveni. Futsi waphela ngaleyondlela-ke umnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamane nakune.
2.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamane nesihlanu emaNefi acala kubalekela emaLamani; alandzelwa ate efika eveni laseJashoni, ngaphambi kwekutsi avinjwe ekuhociseni kwabo.
2.17: Manje, lelidolobha laseJashoni belisedvute nelive lapho Amaroni bekabeke khona imibhalo yeNkhosi, kute ingashabalaliswa. Buka besengihambe ngekwelivi la-Amaroni, futsi ngabatsatsa laboNgcwengcwe baNefi, ngenta umbhalo njengekwemavi a-Amaroni.
2.18: Futsi kubo labongcwengcwe baNefi ngilandzise ngalokugcwele ngabo bonkhe bubi kanye netinengiso; kodvwa kulaba bongcwengcwe ngikugwemile kutsi ngilandzise ngalokugcwele ngebubi kanye nangetinengiso tabo, ngoba buka, tigameko letiningi letichubekako tebubi kanye netinengiso betisolo tingaphambi kwemehlo ami solo ngaba mdzala ngalokwenele kutsi ngicondze tindlela temuntfu.
2.19: Maye kimi ngenca yebubi babo; ngoba inhlitiyo yami igcwele lusizi ngenca yebubi babo, tinsuku tonkhe tami; noko, ngiyati kutsi ngiyawuphakanyiswa ngelusuku lwekugcina.
2.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalomnyaka bantfu baNefi baphindze batingelwa bacoshwa kutsi babaleke. Futsi kwenteka kutsi sacoshwa sabaleka sate sefika ngasenyakatfo eveni lelalibitwa ngekutsi yiShemi.
2.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi salicinisa lelidolobha laseShemi, sabagcogca bantfu betfu kangangoba besingakhona, kute mhlawumbe sibasindzise ekufeni.
2.22: Futsi kwenteka ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamane nesitfupha acala aphindze atseleka etikwetfu.
2.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakhuluma kubantfu bami, ngabancusa ngemandla lamakhulu, kutsi beme ngesibindzi ngaphambi kwemaLamani balwele bafati babo, nabantfwababo, nemiti yabo, kanye nemakhaya abo.
2.24: Futsi emavi ami abavusetela ngandlela tsite kutsi bacine, kangangekutsi abatange basawabalekela emaLamani, kodvwa bema ngesibindzi ngalokumelene nawo.
2.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi salwa silibutfo lelitinkhulungwane letingemashumi lamatsatfu sibukene nelibutfo lelitinkhulungwane letingemashumi lasihlanu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi sema ngaphambi kwawo ngekucina lokukhulu kangangekutsi asibalekela.
2.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekabalekile sawalandzela ngemabutfo etfu, saphindze sahlangabetana nawo, sawashaya; noko emandla eNkhosi aketanga kitsi; yebo, bese sishiyiwe kutsi sitilwele ngekwetfu, kangangekutsi Moya weNkhosi awutange uhlale kitsi; ngako-ke bese sibutsakatsaka njengabomnaketfu.
2.27: Futsi inhlitiyo yami yaba nelusizi ngenca yalesi sehlakalo lesikhulu sekukhatsateka kwebantfu bakitsi, ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tabo. Kodvwa buka, salwa nemaLamani kanye netigebengu taGadiyanthoni, sate saphindze sawatsatsa emave langemafa etfu.
2.28: Futsi umnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamane nemfica besewendlulile. Ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasihlanu senta sivumelwano nemaLamani kanye netigebengu taGadiyanthoni, ngaso sehlukaniselana emave langemafa etfu.
2.29: Futsi emaLamani asinika live lelingasenyakatfo, yebo, kute kufike indleleni lencane lebeyiholela eveni lelingaseningizimu. Tsine saniketa emaLamani lonkhe lelive lelingaseningizimu.

3.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani awatange ete kutawukulwa kwate kwendlula iminyaka lelishumi. Buka, ngangisebentise bantfu bami, emaNefi, ekulungiseleleni emave awo kanye netikhali tawo kubhekana nesikhatsi semphi.
3.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Memetela kulabantfu utsi—Phendvukani, nite kimi, nibhajatiswe, niphindze nakhe libandla lami, niyawusindziswa.
3.3: Ngamemetela kulabantfu, kodvwa kwaba lite; futsi abatange babone kutsi bekuyiNkhosi leyayibasindzisile, yabanika litfuba lekuphendvuka. Buka batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo ngekumelana neNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo.
3.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekwendlula kwemnyaka welishumi, lebekwenta, sekuhlangene konkhe, iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha kusukela ekuteni kwaKhristu, inkhosi yemaLamani yatfumela incwadzi kimi, leyayingatisa kutsi bebalungiselela kuta kutawukulwa natsi.
3.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngenta bantfu bami kutsi babutsane ndzawonye eveni iNcitsakalo, edolobheni lelaliseminceleni, ngasendleleli lencane lebeyiholela eveni lelingaseningizimu.
3.6: Kulapho lasawabeka khona emabutfo etfu, kute sivimbe emabutfo emaLamani, kute angatfoli nanoma nguliphi lemave etfu; ngako-ke saticinisa ngekumelana nawo ngemandla etfu onkhe.
3.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha nakunye emaLamani eta ehlela edolobheni iNcitsakalo kute atawukulwa natsi; futsi kwenteka kutsi ngalowo mnyaka sawehlula, kangangekutsi aphindze abuyela emaveni awo.
3.8: Ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha nakubili aphindze ehla kutawukulwa natsi. Saphindze sawehlula, sabulala sibalo lesikhulu sawo, kwatsi labafile bawo baphonswa elwandle
3.9: Manje, ngenca yalentfo lenkhulu bantfu bami, emaNefi, lebebayentile, bacala kutikhukhumeta ngenca yemandla abo, bacala kufunga phambi kwemazulu kutsi bebatawutiphindzisela ngengati yabomnakabo lebebabulewe titsa tabo
3.10: Bafunga ngemazulu, kanjalo nangesihlalo sebukhosi saNkulunkulu, kutsi bebatawukuya kuyawukulwa netitsa tabo, nekutsi bebayawutisusa tiphele nya eveni.
3.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi mine, Mormon, ngala ngaphetsa kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili kutsi ngibe ngumekhuti kanye nemholi walabantfu, ngenca yebubi kanye netinengiso tabo.
3.12: Buka, ngangibaholile, nanoma kungenca yebubi babo ngangibaholile tikhatsi letiningi kute bayawukulwa, futsi ngangibatsandza, ngekwelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu lolwalukimi, ngenhlitiyo yami yonkhe, futsi umphefumulo wami ubathandazela ngenshisekelo lenkhulu kuNkulunkulu wami lusuku lonkhe; noko, wawute lukholo, ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo.
3.13: Futsi kukatsatfu ngibakhulula etandleni tetitsa tabo, kodvwa abatange baphendvuke etonweni tabo.
3.14: Ngesikhatsi sebafunge ngako konkhe loko lebebalelwe kona yiNkhosi kanye neMsindzisi wetfu Jesu Khristu, kutsi bebatawuhamba bayawukulwa netitsa tabo, batiphindzisele ngengati yabomnakabo, buka livi leNkhosi lefika kimi, latsi:
3.15: Kuphindzisela ngekwami, futsi mine ngiyawubuyisela; ngenca yekutsi labantfu abatange baphendvuke emvakwekutsi sengibakhululile, buka, bayawususwa baphele nya emhlabeni.
3.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngala ngaphetsa kuhamba ngiyawukulwa netitsa tami; ngenta njengoba iNkhosi yayingiyaletile; ngema njengafakazi losibukeli kute ngivetele umhlaba tintfo lengatibona ngaphindze ngativa, njengoba tatibonakalisiwe ngaMoya lowawufakaze ngetintfo letatitawukwenteka.
3.17: Ngako-ke ngiyanibhalela nine, beTive, kanjalo, nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, ngesikhatsi umsebenti sewucala, kuyawufanela kutsi nitilungiselele kubuyela eveni lelilifa lenu.
3.18: Yebo, bukani, ngibhalela yonkhe imikhawulo yemhlaba; yebo, kini, tivana letilishumi nakubili taka-Israyeli, leniyawukwehlulelwa ngekwemisebenti yenu ngulabo labalishumi nakubili Jesu labakhetsa kutsi babe bafundzi bakhe eveni laseJerusalema.
3.19: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngibhalela nensali yalabantfu, nabo labayawukwehlulelwa ngulabalishumi nakubili Jesu labakhetsa kulelive; bona bayawukwehlulelwa ngulabanye labalishumi nakubili Jesu labakhetsa eveni laseJerusalema.
3.20: Letintfo Moya uyativeta kimi; ngako-ke nginibhalela nonkhe. Futsi ngalesi sizatfu ngiyanibhalela, kute nati kutsi kumele nonkhe nime phambi kwesihlalo sekwehlulela saKhristu, yebo, wonkhe muntfu longewemndeni wonkhe wa-Adamu, futsi kumele nime kute nehlulelwe ngemisebenti yenu, noma ngabe mihle noma ngabe mibi.
3.21: Ngetulu kwaloko kute nikholwe livangeli laJesu Khristu, leniyawuba nalo emkhatsini wenu; futsi ngetulu kwaloko kute emaJuda, bantfu besivumelwano beNkhosi, babe nalomunye fakazi ngaphandle kwaloyo labambona baphindze bamuva; kutsi Jesu, loyo labambulala, bekanguye kanye Khristu kanye naNkulunkulu lucobo.
3.22: Futsi ngifisa kunenta nikholwe nonkhe nine mikhawulo yemhlaba kutsi niphendvuke niphindze nitilungiselele kutsi nime phambi kwesihlalo sekwehlulela saKhristu.

4.1: Manje kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha nakutsatfu emaNefi enyuka nemabutfo awo kute ayawukulwa nemaLamani, ngaphandle kwelive iNcitsakalo.
4.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo emaNefi acoshwa kutsi aphindze abuyele emuva eveni leNcitsakalo. Ngesikhatsi sebakhatsele, libutfo lelisha lemaLamani latseleka etikwabo; baba nemphi lematima kakhulu, kangangekutsi emaLamani alitsatsa lidolobha iNcitsakalo, abulala labaningi bemaNefi, aphindze atsatsa letiningi tiboshwa.
4.3: Labasala babaleka bayohlangana nalabebahlala edolobheni iThiyankham. Manje lidolobha iThiyankham belingasemnceleni edvute nelugu lwelwandle; Ngetulu kwaloko belisedvute nelidolobha iNcitsakalo.
4.4: Futsi bekungenca yekutsi emabutfo emaNefi akhuphuka aya kumaLamani kutsi ate ashaywe; ngoba kube bekungasiko njalo, emaLamani bekangeke abe nemandla ngetulu kwabo.
4.5: Kodvwa, bukani, tehlulelo taNkulunkulu titawuta kulababi; futsi lababi bajeziswa ngalababi; ngoba lababi baphehla tinhlitiyo tebantfwana bebantfu kutsi bacitse ingati.
4.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani enta emalungiselelo ekutsi ayohlasela lidolobha iThiyankham.
4.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha nakune emaLamani alihlasela lidolobha iThiyankham, kute aphindze alitsatse lelo dolobha.
