4.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi akhalinywa aphindze abuyiselwa emuva ngemaNefi. Ngesikhatsi emaNefi abona kutsi besekawabuyisele emuva emaLamani aphindze atichayisa ngemandla awo; ahamba ngemandla awo, aphindze alitsatsa lelidolobha iNcitsakalo.
4.9: Manje tonkhe leti tintfo besetentekile, futsi bese kubulewe tinkhulungwane etinhlangotsini totimbili, kumaNefi kanye nakumaLamani.
4.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bese kwendlule umnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha nesitfupha, emaLamani aphindze abuya kutawuhlasela emaNefi kute alwe nawo; noko emaNefi akaphendvukanga ebubini lebekabentile, kodvwa aphikelela ebubini bawo njalonjalo.
4.11: Futsi ngeke lukwati lulwimi kuchaza, noma umuntfu abhale inchazelo lephelele ngesehlakalo lesesabekako sengati kanye nekubulawa kwebantfu labaningi lokwaba semkhatsini walabantfu, emaNefi kanye nemaLamani; futsi tonkhe tinhlitiyo taba lukhuni, kangangoba bakujabulela kucitsa ingati njalonjalo.
4.12: Futsi bekungakate kube khona bubi lobukhulu kangaka emkhatsini webantfwana bonkhe baLehi, noma ngisho emkhatsini wayo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli, ngekwemavi eNkhosi, njengoba baba khona emkhatsini walabantfu.
4.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani alitsatsa lelidolobha iNcitsakalo, loku bekungenca yekutsi sibalo sawo besisendlula leso semaNefi.
4.14: Aphindze ahamba ayawuhlasela lidolobha iThiyankham, akhipha labebahlala kulo, atsatsa letiningi tiboshwa tebesifazane kanye nebantfwana, anikela ngabo njengeminikelo kubonkululunkulu bawo labatitfombe.
4.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasitfupha nesikhombisa, emaNefi atfukutsele ngenca yekutsi emaLamani bekanikele ngebesifazane bawo kanye nebantfwana bawo, kangangekutsi awahlasela emaLamani ngentfukutselo lenkhulu kakhulu, kangangekutsi aphindze awehlula emaLamani, awakhipha kutsi abaleke emaveni awo.
4.16: Futsi emaLamani akatange aphindze abuye kutawuhlasela emaNefi kwate kwaba ngumnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasikhombisa nesihlanu.
4.17: Futsi ngalomnyaka eta atawuhlasela emaNefi ngemandla awo onkhe; bekangabaleki ngenca yebuningi besibalo sawo.
4.18: Futsi kusukela ngalesi sikhatsi kuya phambili emaNefi akatange asaba nemandla ngetulu kwemaLamani, kodvwa acala asuswa ngiwo njengematolo phambi kwelilanga.
4.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani ehla alihlasela lelidolobha iNcitsakalo; kwaba nemphi lematima kakhulu leyaliwa eveni iNcitsakalo, lapho emaNefi ehlulwa khona.
4.20: Aphindze awabalekela, ate ayofika edolobheni iBhowazi; ema lapho alwa nemaLamani ngesibindzi lesikhulu, kangangekutsi emaLamani akawehlulanga ate abuyela kwesibili.
4.21: Ngesikhatsi sekabuyela kwesibili, emaNefi acoshwa aphindze abulawa kakhulu; besifazane bawo kanye nebantfwana bawo baphindze bentiwa umhlatjelo wetitfombe.
4.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaNefi aphindze awabalekela, ahamba nabo bonkhe labebahlala emadolobheni kanye nasetigodzini.
4.23: Manje mine, Mormon, ngekubona kutsi emaLamani besekatolibhubhisa lelive, ngako-ke ngaya egcumeni iShimi, ngatsatsa yonkhe imibhalo Amoroni lebekayifihle eNkhosini.

5.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngaya emkhatsini wemaNefi, ngasihocisa sifungo sami lengangisentile sekutsi angeke nanini ngisaphindze ngiwasite; aphindze angibeka kutsi ngilawule emabutfo awo, ngoba abengitsatsa njengemuntfu lobekangakhona kutsi awakhulule etinhluphekweni tawo.
5.2: Kodvwa buka, ngangite litsemba, ngoba ngangitati tehlulelo teNkhosi letatitawukuta kuwo; ngoba akaphendvukanga ebubini bawo, kodvwa azabalazela timphilo tawo ngaphandle kwekubita loyo Muntfu lowawadala.
5.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emaLamani eta kutawusihlasela njengoba sasesibalekile edolobheni iJordane; kodvwa buka, abuyiselwa emuva kangangekutsi akatange alitsatse lelidolobha ngaleso sikhatsi.
5.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi aphindze eta atawusihlasela, kodvwa saligcina lelidolobha. Ngetulu kwaloko bekukhona lamanye emadolobha labekagcinwe ngemaNefi, tincaba tawo letawavimbela kutsi angakhoni kungena eveni lelaliphambi kwetfu, kute abulale labebahlala eveni letfu.
5.5: Kodvwa kwenteka kutsi noma ngabe ngumaphi emave lesasendlule kuwo, nalabebahlala kuwo labebangakagcogcwa, babulawa ngemaLamani, nemadolobha abo, netigodzi tabo, kanye nemadolobhakati abo ashiswa ngemlilo; wendlula kanjalo-ke umnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasikhombisa nemfica.
5.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wemakhulu lamatsatfu nesiphohlongo emaLamani aphindze eta kutawukulwa natsi, sema salwa nawo ngesibindzi; kodvwa konkhe kwaba lite ngoba sasisikhulu kakhulu sibalo sawo kangangekutsi abagcobagcoba bantfu baNefi ngaphansi kwetinyawo tawo.
5.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi saphindze sabaleka, labo labebanematubane kunemaLamani, baphunyula, kantsi labo ematubane abo labekangendluli emaLamani babulawa.
5.8: Manje buka, mine Mormon, angifuni kukhatsata imiphefumulo yebantfu ngekubeka phambi kwabo lesehlakalo lesibi kanje sengati kanye nekubulawa kwebantfu labaningi njengoba kwenteka phambi kwemehlo ami; kodvwa mine, ngati kutsi letintfo kufanele ngempela tembulwe, nekutsi tonkhe tintfo letifihlakele kufanele tivetwe ekukhanyeni—
5.9: Nekutsi lwati lwaletintfo kufanele lute kuyo insali yalabantfu, kanjalo nakubo beTive, iNkhosi leyatsi bayawuhlakata labantfu, nekutsi labantfu bayawutsatfwa njengetfo lengenalutfo emkhatsini wabo—ngako-ke ngibhala lokufinyetiwe lokuncane, ngingeke ngilokotse nakancane ngilandzise ngalokugcwele kwaletintfo lengitibonile, ngenca yemyaleto lengiwutfolile, nekutsi ningabi nelusizi lolukhulu ngenca yebubi balabantfu.
5.10: Manje buka, loku sengikukhuluma kuyo intalelwane yabo, kanjalo nakubo beTive labayikhatsalele indlu yaka-Israyeli, labo lababonako nalabatiko kutsi tibusiso tabo tivelaphi.
5.11: Ngoba ngiyati kutsi labanjalo bayawuba nelusizi ngenca yekuhlupheka kwendlu yaka-Israyeli; yebo, bayawuba nelusizi ngenca yekubulawa kwalabantfu; bayawuba nelusizi kutsi labantfu abatange baphendvuke kute bemukelwe etandleni taJesu.
5.12: Manje letintfo tibhalelwe insali yendlu ya-Jakobe; futsi tibhalwe ngalendlela, ngenca yekutsi Nkulunkulu uyati kutsi bubi abunawutiletsa kubo; futsi kufanele tifihlelwe eNkhosini kute tivele ngesikhatsi sayo lesifanele.
5.13: Lona ngumyaleto lengiwutfolile; buka, tiyawuvela ngekwemyaleto weNkhosi, ngesikhatsi seyibona kutsi sekufanele, ngekuhlakanipha kwayo.
5.14: Buka, tiyawuya kulabangakholwa bemaJuda; futsi tiyawuya ngenca yalesizatfu—kute bentiwe bakholwe kutsi Jesu unguKhristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu lophilako; kute Babe afeze, ngaloTsandziwe kakhulu wakhe, inhloso yakhe lenkhulu neyaphakadze, kutsi kubuyiswe emaJuda, noma yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli eveni labo lelilifa, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wabo labanikete lona, kute agcwalise sivumelwano sakhe.
5.15: Ngetulu kwaloko kutsi intalelwane yalabantfu ilikholwe ngalokuphelele livangeli lakhe, leliyawuta kubo livela kubeTive; ngoba labantfu bayawuhlakatwa, futsi bayawuba bantfu lababi, labangcolile nalabanengekile, ngetulu kwaloko lokuke kwachazwa ngunoma ngubani emkhatsini wetfu, yebo, ngisho nangetulu kwaloko lokuke kwachazwa ngunoma ngubani emkhatsini wemaLamani, loku kungenca yekungakholwa kwabo kanye nekukhonta kwabo tithico.
5.16: Ngoba buka, Moya weNkhosi besewuvele uyekele kuhlala naboyise; futsi bete Khristu naNkulunkulu emhlabeni; bayazulazula njengemakhoba emoyeni.
5.17: Bake baba bantfu labatsandzekako, futsi bebanaKhristu njengemelusi wabo; yebo, bebaholwa nguBabe Nkulunkulu.
5.18: Kodvwa manje, buka, sebaholwa nguSathane, njengemakhoba lapheshulwa ngumoya, noma njengemkhumbi ujikijelwa lapha nalapha emagagasini, ngaphandle kwekuntanta noma kwesisimiso, noma ngaphandle kwanoma yini yekuwucondzisa; futsi njengawo, nabo banjalo.
5.19: Buka, iNkhosi itigodlile tibusiso tabo, lengabe batitfola kulelive, kute titfolwe beTive labayawulitsatsa lelive libe ngelabo.
5.20: Kodvwa buka, kuyawukwenteka kutsi bayawucoshwa baphindze bahlakatwe beTive; futsi emvakwekutsi sebacoshiwe baphindze bahlakatwe beTive, buka, ngaleso sikhatsi iNkhosi iyawusikhumbula sivumelwano leyasenta ku-Abrahama kanye nakuyo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli.
5.21: Ngetulu kwaloko iNkhosi iyawuyikhumbula imithandazo yalabalungile, leyaletfwa kuyo ngenca yabo.
5.22: Uma kunjalo, Awu nine beTive, ningema kanjani phambi kwemandla aNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwekutsi niphendvuke niphindze nigucuke etindleleni tenu letimbi na?
5.23: Anati yini kutsi nisetandleni taNkulunkulu na? Anati yini kutsi unemandla onkhe, futsi ngemyalo wakhe lomkhulu umhlaba uyawugocotwa ndzawonye njengekugocotwa kwelicansi na?
5.24: Ngako-ke, phendvukani, nititfobe phambi kwakhe, hleze ete ngekulunga ehlisele sijeziso sakhe kini—hleze insali yentalelwane yaJakobe ihambe emkhatsini wenu njengelibhubesi, linidzabudzabule nibe ticucu, kubebete namunye loyawunikhulula.

6.1: Manje sengiyawucedzela umbhalo wami lomayelana nekubhujiswa kwebantfu bami, emaNefi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba saya phambi kwemaLamani.
6.2: Futsi mine, Mormon, ngabhalela inkhosi yemaLamani incwadzi, nginesifiso sekutsi isivumele kutsi sibutsele ndzawonye bantfu betfu eveni laseKhumora, ngasegcumeni lebelibitwa ngekutsi yiKhumora, lapho besitawukulwa nawo.
6.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi yemaLamani yanginika lentfo lebengiyifisa.
6.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi sahamba saya eveni laseKhumora, samisa emathende etfu atungeleta ligcuma iKhumora; bekunguseveni lemanti lamaningi, imifula, kanye nemitfombo; futsi lapha besinelitsemba lekutsi besitowehlula emaLamani.
6.5: Ngesikhatsi sekwendlule iminyaka lengemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lasiphohlongo nakune, bese sibabutsele bonkhe bantfu betfu labesebasele eveni laseKhumora.
6.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sesibabutsele ndzawonye bonkhe bantfu baba sicuku sinye eveni laseKhumora, buka mine, Mormon, besengisebudzaleni; ngati kutsi bese kutoba ngumzabalazo wekugcina webantfu bakitsi, ngiyaletwe yiNkhosi kutsi ngingavumeli imibhalo lebeyindluliselwe bobabe betfu, lebeyingcwele, kutsi iwele etandleni temaLamani, (ngoba emaLamani bekatawuyishabalalisa) ngako-ke ngenta lombhalo ngiwususela kubongcwengcwe baNefi, ngawufihla egcumeni iKhumora yonkhe lemibhalo lebenginiketwe yona ngekwetsenjwa sandla seNkhosi, ngaphandle kwalaba bongcwengcwe labambalwa lengabaniketa indvodzana yami Moroni.
6.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bami, kanye nebafati nebantfwana babo, babese bayawabona emabutfo emaLamani ahamba eta ngakubo; bawalindza ngaloko kwesaba lokukhulu kwekufa lokugcwalisa tifuba tabo bonkhe lababi, kute balwe nawo.
6.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi eta atawukulwa natsi, wonkhe umuntfu bekagcwele kwesaba ngenca yebukhulu besibalo sawo.
6.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi abahlasela bantfu bami ngenkemba, nangebutjoki, nangemicibisholo, nangembazo, kanye nangato tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali temphi.
6.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bami babulawa, yebo, netinkhulungwane letilishumi tami lebetinami, nami ngawela emkhatsini wato ngilimele; futsi endlula ngakimi kangangekutsi akatange angibulale.
6.11: Futsi ngesikhatsi sekendlulile abulele bonkhe bantfu ngaphandle kwalabangemashumi lamabili nakune betfu, (emkhatsini wabo bekukhona nendvodzana yami Moroni) sesisindzile ekubulaweni kwebantfu betfu, sabona ngakusasa, ngesikhatsi emaLamani sekabuyele etinkanjini tawo, sisetulu egcumeni iKhumora, bantfu bami labatinkhulungawane letilishumi labebabulewe, labebaholwa ngimi phambili.
6.12: Saphindze sabona tinkhulungwane letilishumi tebantfu bami labebaholwa yindvondzana yami Moroni.
6.13: Buka, tinkhulungwane letilishumi taGidigidona betifile, naye ngalokunjalo asekhatsi.
6.14: Futsi Lama bekafile netinkhulungwane takhe letilishumi; naGilgali bekafile netinkhulungwane takhe letilishumi; Limha bekafile netinkhulungwane takhe letilishumi; kanjalo naJenewumi bekafile netinkhulungwane takhe letilishumi; kanye naKhumeniha, naMoroniha, na-Anthiyonumu, naShibilomu, naShemi, naJoshi, bebafile netinkhulungwane tabo letilishumi umuntfu amunye.
6.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bekukhona labanye labalishumi labafa ngenkemba, kanye netinkhulungwane tabo letilishumi umuntfu amunye; yebo, ngisho nabo bonkhe bantfu bami, ngaphandle kwalabo labangemashumi lamabili nakune labebanami, kanjalo nalabebambalwa labebabalekele emaveni laseningizimu, nalabo labambalwa labebaphambukele kumaLamani, bebafile; tidvumbu tabo; nematsambo; kanye nengati bekulele phansi emhlabatsini, kushiywe tandla talabo labababulala kute kubole eveni, nekutsi kubhidlike kuphindze kubuyele kunina wako emhlabeni.
6.16: Futsi umphefumulo wami wadzabuka ngebuhlungu, ngenca yekubulawa kwebantfu bami, ngakhala ngatsi:
6.17: Awu nine labahle, ingabe niphambuke kanjani etindleleni teNkhosi! Awu nine labahle, ingabe nimlahle kanjani loyo Jesu, lobekeme netandla letivulekile kute anemukele!
6.18: Bukani, kube anikwentanga loku, beningeke nife. Kodvwa bukani, senifile, futsi sengikhalela kulahleka kwenu.
6.19: Awu nine madvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati lamahle, nine bobabe kanye nabomake, nine madvodza kanye nebafati, nine labahle, nife kanjani!
6.20: Kodvwa bukani, senihambile, futsi tinsizi tami ngeke tisanibuyisa.
6.21: Futsi lusuku luyeta masinyane lapho umtimba wenu lobhubhako kufanele wembatse kungabhubhi, lemitimba manje lebolako kufanele ibe yimitimba lengenakubola; ngaleso sikhatsi kufanele nime phambi kwesihlalo sekwehlulela saKhristu, kute nehlulelwe ngekwemisebenti yenu; nangabe nilungile, ngaleso sikhatsi niyawubusiswa naboyihlo lesebahamba phambi kwenu.
6.22: Awu kube beniphendvukile ngaphambi kwekutsi lokubhubha lokukhulu kute etikwenu. Kodvwa bukani, senihambile, naBabe, yebo, Babe loPhakadze wasezulwini, uyasati simo senu; futsi utawuniphatsa njengekwekulunga kanye nangekwemusa wakhe.

7.1: Manje, buka, sengitawukhuluma lokutsite kuyo insali yalabantfu labasindzile, nangabe Nkulunkulu angabanika emavi ami, kute bati ngetintfo taboyise; yebo ngikhuluma kini, nine nsali yendlu yaka-Israyeli; futsi ngulawa emavi lengiwakhulumako:
7.3: Yatini kutsi kufanele nite ekuphendvukeni, nakungenjalo angeke nisindziswe.
7.4: Yatini kutsi kufanele nitibeke phansi tikhali tenu temphi, ningasaphindzi nitfokote ekucitsekeni kwengati, futsi ningaphindzi nititsatse, ngaphandle kwekuyaletwa nguNkulunkulu kutsi nititsatse,
7.5: Yatini kutsi kufanele nitfole lwati lwaboyihlo, niphendvuke kuto tonkhe tono tenu nasebubini, nikholwe kuJesu Khristu, kutsi uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, nekutsi wabulawa ngemaJuda, futsi ngemandla aBabe uphindze wavuka, ngako uzuze kuncoba ngetulu kwelithuna, nekutsi kuye ludvonsi lwekufa lugwinyiwe.
7.6: Futsi ufeza kuvuka kwalabafile, ngako umuntfu kufanele avuswe kute eme phambi kwesihlalo sakhe sekwehlulela.
7.7: Futsi ufeze nekuhlengwa kwemhlaba, ngako loyo loyawutfolakala angenacala phambi kwakhe ngelusuku lwekwehlulela uyawunikwa kutsi ahlale naNkulunkulu embusweni wakhe, kute ahlabelele indvumiso lengapheli nemakwaya asezulwini, kuBabe, nakuNdvodzana kanye nakuMoya loNgcwele, labanguNkulunkulu munye, esimeni senjabulo lesingenasiphetfo.
7.8: Ngako-ke phendvukani, nibhajatiswe egameni laJesu, nemukele livangeli laKhristu, leniyawuniketwa lona, hhayi kulombhalo lona kuphela kodvwa nasembhalweni loyawukuta kubeTive uvela kumaJuda, lokungumbhalo loyawuvela kubeTive uta kini.
7.9: Ngoba bukani, loku kubhalwe ngenhloso yekutsi nikholwe nguloko; futsi uma nikholwa nguloko niyawukholwa nguloku; uma nikholwa nguloku, niyawukwati mayelana naboyihlo, kanjalo nangemisebenti lemangalisako leyentiwa ngemandla aNkulunkulu emkhatsini wabo.
7.10: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko niyawukwati kutsi niyinsali yentalelwane yaJakobe; ngako-ke nibalwa nebantfu besivumelwano sekucala; futsi nangabe niyakholwa kuKhristu, nibhajatiswe, ngemanti kucala, bese kuba ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele, nilandzela sibonelo seMsindzisi wetfu, ngaloko lasiyaleta ngako, kuyawuba kuhle kini ngelusuku lwekwehlulela, Amen.

8.1: Buka mine, Moroni, sengiyawucedzela umbhalo wababe, Mormoni. Buka, nginetintfo letimbalwa nje lengitawutibhala, lengiyaletwe ngato ngubabe.
8.2: Manje kwenteka kutsi emvakwemphi lenkhulu naleyesabekako lebeyiseKhumora, buka, lawo maNefi bekabalekele eveni lelingaseningizimu atingelwa ngemaLamani, ate onkhe abulawa.
8.3: Futsi nababe ngalokunjalo wabulawa ngiwo, sengisele ngedvwa kute ngibhale indzaba ledzabukisako yekubhujiswa kwebantfu bakitsi. Kodvwa buka, abasekho, futsi ngiyawufeza umyaleto wababe. Noma batawungibulala nami angati.
8.4: Ngako-ke ngitawubhala ngiphindze ngiyifihle lemibhalo ngaphansi kwemhlaba; futsi noma ngabe ngiya kuphi akunandzaba.
8.5: Buka, ngubabe lowente lombhalo, uyibhalile nenhloso yawo. Buka, bengiyawuyibhala nami kube benginendzawo kulabongcwengcwe, kodvwa ngite; nensimbi ngite, ngoba ngingedvwa. Babe ubulewe emphini, kanye nabo bonkhe bemndeni wami, ngite nebangani angati nekutsi ngitawuyakuphi; angati nekutsi iNkhosi itawungivumela ngihlale sikhatsi lesingakanani.
8.6: Buka, iminyaka lengemakhulu lamane seyendlulile kusukela ekufikeni kweNkhosi neMsindzisi wetfu.
8.7: Buka, emaLamani abatingele bantfu bami, emaNefi, lidolobha ngelidolobha nendzawo ngendzawo, bate baphela nya; futsi kube kukhulu kubhujiswa kwabo; yebo, kukhulu kuphindze kuyamangalisa kubhujiswa kwebantfu bami emaNefi.
8.8: Buka, sandla seNkhosi lesikwentile loku. Buka ngetulu kwaloko, nemaLamani asemphini lomunye nalomunye; futsi live lonkhe ligcwele kubulalana lokuchubekako kanye nekucitseka kwengati; kute losatiko siphetfo salemphi.
8.9: Manje, buka, angisasho lutfo mayelana nabo, ngoba kute namunye ngaphandle kwemaLamani kanye neletigebengu labasekhona eveni.
8.10: Futsi kute namunye lomatiko Nkulunkulu weliciniso ngaphandle kwebafundzi baJesu, labo labasala eveni bate bubi bebantfu baba bukhulu kakhulu kangangoba iNkhosi ayitange isabavumela kutsi bahlale nebantfu; futsi noma basekhona kulelive kute umuntfu lowatiko.
8.11: Kodvwa buka, mine kanye nababe sibabonile, futsi basisebentele.
8.12: Futsi loyo lotfola lombhalo, aphindze angawusoli ngenca yemaphutsa lakuwo, nguye loyawukwati ngetimo letinkhulu kunaleti. Buka, nginguMoroni; futsi kube bekungenteka, bengiyawunembulela tonkhe letintfo.
8.13: Buka, sengenta siphetfo senkhulumo mayelana nalabantfu. Ngiyindvodzana yaMormon, futsi babe bekawentalelwane yaNefi.
8.14: Futsi nginguye loyo lowafihla lombhalo eNkhosini; bongcwengcwe bawo abakabaluleki, ngenca yemyaleto weNkhosi. Ngoba ngempela yatsi kute namunye loyawubatfola kute atfole inzuzo; kodvwa lombhalo lokubo uligugu lelikhulu; futsi loyo loyawuwuveta, iNkhosi itawumbusisa.
8.15: Ngoba kute namunye longaba nemandla ekuwuveta ngaphandle kwekutsi awanikwe nguNkulunkulu; ngoba Nkulunkulu ufuna kutsi kwentiwe ngeliso lelitinikele lekuletsa ludvumo lwakhe, noma ngeliso lelitinikele kute kuzuze bantfu basendvulo kanye nalabo bantfu besivumelwano seNkhosi labahlakatwa kudzala.
8.16: Ubusisiwe loyo loyawuveta lentfo; ngoba iyawukhishwa ebumnyameni iletfwe ekukhanyeni, ngekwelivi laNkulunkulu; yebo, iyawukhishwa ngaphansi kwemhlaba, iyawukhatimula iphume ebumnyameni, yatiwe nabantfu; futsi loku kuyawukwentiwa ngemandla aNkulunkulu.
8.17: Uma ngabe kunemaphutsa kuyawuba maphutsa emuntfu. Kodvwa buka, tsine asalati liphutsa; noko Nkulunkulu wati tonkhe tintfo; ngako-ke, loyo losolako, akacaphele hleze abe sengotini yemlilo wesihogo.
8.18: Naloyo lotsi; Ngitjengise, noma kungenjalo uyawushaywa—akacaphele hleze ayalete ngaloko lokungavunyelwa yiNkhosi.
8.19: Ngoba buka, loyo lowehlulela ngekushesha naye uyawukwehlulelwa ngekushesha; ngoba inkhokhelo yakhe iyawuba njengekwemisebenti yakhe; ngako-ke, loyo loshayako naye uyawushaywa futsi, yiNkhosi.
8.20: Buka kutsi umbhalo longcwele utsini—umuntfu akangashayi, noma ehlulele; ngoba kwehlulela kwami, kusho iNkhosi, nekuphindzisela kwami, futsi ngimi lengiyawubuyisela.
8.21: Futsi loyo loyawukhuluma ngelulaka kanye nangekulwa ngalokumelene nemsebenti weNkhosi, nangalokumelene nebantfu besivumelwano beNkhosi lababendlu yaka-Israyeli, naloyawutsi: sitawubhubhisa umsebenti weNkhosi, iNkhosi ngeke isikhumbule sivumelwano sayo leyasenta kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli—nguye loyo losengotini yekujutjwa aphonswe emlilweni.
8.22: Ngoba tinjongo taphakadze teNkhosi tiyawuchubeka njalo, tite tigcwaliseke tonkhe tetsembiso tayo.
8.23: Ticwaningeni tiphrofetho taka-Israyeli. Bukani ngeke ngikwati kutibhala. Yebo, bukani ngitsi kini, labo labangcwele labahambe phambi kwami, labebabanikati balelive, bayawukhala, yebo, ngisho baselutfulini bayawukhala eNkhosini; njengoba iNkhosi iphila iyawusikhumbula sivumelwano leyasenta nabo.
8.24: Iyayati imithandazo yabo, kutsi beyentelwe bomnakabo. Iyalwati lukholo lwabo, ngoba ngeligama layo bebangesusa tintsaba; futsi ngeligama layo bebangenta umhlaba utamatame; nangemandla elivi layo benta emajele kutsi adzilike phansi; yebo, abalimalanga ngisho nasesitsandvweni semlilo lesesabekako, ngisho nasetilwaneni tasendle nasetinyokeni letinebutsi, ngenca yemandla elivi lakhe.
8.25: Bukani, imithandazo yabo futsi beyentelwe loyo iNkhosi leyiyawumvumela kutsi avete letintfo.
8.26: Kute namunye lekufanele atsi angeke kwenteke, ngempela kuyawukwenteka, ngoba iNkhosi ikukhulumile loku; ngoba tiyawuvela ngaphansi kwemhlaba, ngesandla seNkhosi, kute namunye loyawukuvimba; kuyawukwenteka ngelusuku lapho kuyawutsiwa timangaliso atisenteki; futsi kuyawukwenteka kube shengatsi kukhona lokhuluma kulabafile.
8.27: Kuyawukwenteka ngelusuku lapho ingati yalabangcwele iyawukhala eNkhosini, ngenca yemacembu layimfihlo kanye nemisebenti yebumnyama.
8.28: Yebo, kuyawukwenteka ngelusuku lapho emandla aNkulunkulu sekaphikwa, futsi nemabandla sekanenkhohlakalo nekutichenya etinhlitiyweni tawo; yebo, ngisho nangelusuku lapho baholi bemabandla kanye bafundzisi bayawuphakama ngenca yekutichenya lokusetinhlitiyweni tabo, babe nemona ngisho nemalunga emabandla abo.
8.29: Yebo, kuyawukwenteka ngelusuku lapho bantfu bayawuva ngemililo, nangetiphepho, kanye nangetinkhungu tentfutfu emaveni angaphandle.
8.30: Ngetulu kwaloko bantfu bayawuva ngetimphi, emahemuhemu etimphi, kanye nangekutamatama kwemhlaba tindzawo ngetindzawo.
8.31: Yebo, kuyawukwenteka ngelusuku lapho kuyawube kukhona kungcola lokukhulu emhlabeni; kuyawuba khona kubulalana, nebugebengu, nekucamba emanga, nenkhohliso, nebugwadla, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinengiso; lapho bayawuba baningi labayawutsi, yenta loku, noma yenta lokwa, futsi akusho lutfo, ngoba iNkhosi iyawubasekela labanjalo ngelusuku lwekugcina. Kodvwa maye kulabo, ngoba basenyongweni lebabako nasetibopheni tebubi.
8.32: Yebo, kuyawukwenteka ngelusuku lapho kuyawuba khona emabandla lakhiwe layawutsi: Wota kimi, futsi ngemali yakho uyawutsetselelwa tono takho.
8.33: Awu nine bantfu lababi nalabaphambene futsi lenibonhlokolukhuni, kuya ngani nitakhele emabandla kute nitfole inzuzo na? Kuya ngani nigucule livi lelingcwele laNkulunkulu, kute niletse lusizi emiphefumulweni yenu na? Bukani, tsembelani etembulweni taNkulunkulu; ngoba bukani, sikhatsi siyeta ngalolo suku lapho tonkhe letintfo kuyawufanela tigcwaliseke.
8.34: Bukani, iNkhosi ingikhombisile tintfo letinkhulu naletimangalisako mayelana naloko lokufanele kwenteke masinyane, ngalolo suku lapho letintfo tiyawuvela emkhatsini wenu.
8.35: Bukani, ngikhuluma kini shengatsi benikhona, kantsi anikho. Kodvwa bukani, Jesu Khristu ungikhombisile nine, futsi ngiyatati netento tenu.
8.36: Ngiyati kutsi nihamba ngekutichenya lokusetinhlitiyweni tenu; kute namunye ngaphandle nje kwalabambalwa kuphela labangatiphakamisi ngekutichenya lokusetinhlitiyweni tabo, lokubangela kutsi bagcoke tingubo letinhle kakhulu, lokubangela umona, nencabano, nenzondo, nekuhluphana, kanye nayo yonkhe inhlobo yebubi; nemabandla enu, yebo, ngisho onkhe, angcolile ngenca yekutichenya kwetinhlitiyo tenu.
8.37: Ngoba bukani, nitsandza imali, kanye netintfo tenu, kanye netingubo tenu letinhle kakhulu, kanye nekuhlotjiswa kwemabandla enu, ngetulu kwekutsi nitsandze labamphofu, kanye nalabeswele, labagulako kanye nalabahluphekile.
8.38: Awu nine leningcolile, nine batentisi, nine bafundzisi, lenitiyekelela kuloko lokutawukonakala, nilingcoliseleni libandla lelingcwele laNkulunkulu na? Kuya ngani nibe nemahloni ekutsi nibitwe ngelibito laKhristu na? Kuya ngani ningacabangi kutsi yinkhulu leyo ntfokoto lengapheli kunelusizi lolungasoze luphele—ngenca yeludvumo lwelive na?
8.39: Kuya ngani nitihlobise ngaloko lokute imphilo, kodvwa nibe nivumela labalambile, nalabeswele, nalabangcunu, nalabagulako kanye nalabahluphekako kutsi bendlule kini, futsi ningabanaki na?
8.40: Yebo, kungani nakha tinengiso tenu tangasese kute nitfole inzuzo, nente kutsi bafelokati balile phambi kweNkhosi, ngalokunjalo netintsandzane kutsi tilile ngaphambi kweNkhosi, futsi ngalokunjalo nengati yaboyise kanye nebayeni babo kutsi ikhale eNkhosini isuka phansi, kute kube khona kuphindzisela etikwetinhloko tenu na?
8.41: Bukani, inkemba yekuphindzisela ilengela ngetulu kwenu; futsi sikhatsi siyeta masinyane lapho ayawuyiphindziselela ingati yalabangcwele kini, ngoba ngeke isakuvumela kukhala kwabo nanini.

9.1: Manje sengiphindze ngikhuluma mayelana nalabo labangakholwa kuKhristu.
9.2: Bukani, niyawukholwa yini elangeni lekuhanjelwa kwenu—bukani, ngesikhatsi iNkhosi ita, yebo, ngisho nangalolo suku lolukhulu lapho umhlaba uyawugocotwa ndzawonye njengelicansi, futsi konkhe kuyawuncibilikiswa kushisa lokukhulu, yebo, ngalolo suku lolukhulu lapho niyawuletfwa kutsi nitawuma phambi kweMvana yaNkulunkulu—ngaleso sikhatsi niyawusho yini kutsi kute Nkulunkulu?
9.3: Ngaleso sikhatsi niyawuchubeka yini nekumphika Khristu, noma niyawuyibona yini iMvana yaNkulunkulu na? Ngabe nicabanga kutsi ningahlala yini naye nati ngelicala lenu na? Nicabanga kutsi ningajabula yini kuhlala naloyo Muntfu longcwele, ibe imiphefumulo yenu ihlushwa kwati ngelicala lekutsi seloku niyayiphula imitsetfo yakhe?
9.4: Bukani, ngitsi kini niyawuba nelusizi kakhulu kuhlala naNkulunkulu longcwele nalolungile, nati ngekungcola kwenu phambi kwakhe, kunekutsi nihlale nalabajezisiwe esihogweni.
9.5: Ngoba bukani, ngesikhatsi niyawuletfwa kute nibone bungcunu benu phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kanjalo nenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu, kanye nebungcwele baJesu Khristu, kuyawukokheleka lilangabi lemlilo longacisheki kini.
9.6: Awu uma kunjalo nine leningakholwa, phendvukelani eNkhosini; khalani kakhulu kuBabe egameni laJesu, kute mhlawumbe nitfolakale ningenasici, nimsulwa, nibahle, futsi nimhlophe, nihlantwe yingati yeMvana, ngalolo suku lolukhulu nelwekugcina.
9.7: Ngiphindze ngikhuluma kini nine leniphika tembulo taNkulunkulu, lenitsi setaphela, sekute tembulo, tiphrofetho, tipho, kuphiliswa noma kukhuluma ngetilimi kanye nekuhunyushwa kwetilimi.
9.8: Bukani, ngitsi kini, loyo lotiphikako letintfo akalati livangeli laKhristu; yebo, akayifundzi imibhalo lengcwele; uma ayifundzile, akayicondzi.
9.9: Ngoba asifundzi yini kutsi Nkulunkulu uyafana itolo, namuhla, naphakadze, futsi kuye kute kugucugucuka noma lokuncane nje kushintja?
9.10: Manje, uma niticabangele nkulunkulu logucukako, futsi kuye lokukhona lokuncane nje kushintja, uma kunjalo niticabangele nkulunkulu longasuye Nkulunkulu wetimangaliso
9.11: Kodvwa bukani, ngitawunikhombisa Nkulunkulu wetimangaliso, ngisho Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka kanye naNkulunkulu waJakobe; futsi kusenguye loyo Nkulunkulu lowadala emazulu nemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letikuwo.
9.12: Bukani, wadala Adamu, nga-Adamu kweta kuwa kwemuntfu. Ngenca yekuwa kwemuntfu kweta Jesu Khristu, ngisho Babe kanye neNdvodzana; futsi ngenca yaJesu Khristu kweta kuhlengwa kwemuntfu.
9.13: Ngenca yekuhlengwa kwemuntfu, lokweta ngaJesu Khristu, babuyiselwa ebukhoneni beNkhosi; yebo, kungalendlela lapho bonkhe bantfu bayahlengwa, ngoba kufa kwaKhristu kufeza kuvuka kulabafile, lokufeza kuhlengwa ekulaleni lokungapheli, lapho bonkhe bantfu bayawuvuswa kuloko kulala ngemandla aNkulunkulu ngesikhatsi kukhala licilongo, futsi bayawuvuka, labancane nalabakhulu, bonkhe bayawukuma phambi kwesihlalo sakhe, sebahlengiwe baphindze bakhululwa kulesibopho sekufa saphakadze, lokukufa kwenyama.
9.14: Futsi emvakwaloko kuyawube sekuta kwehlulela kwaloNgcwele kubo; emvakwaloko kuta sikhatsi lapho loyo longcolile uyawuhlala angcolile, naloyo lolungile ahlale alungile; kutsi loyo lojabulile ahlale ajabulile; kutsi loyo longakajabuli ahlale angakajabuli.
9.15: Manje, Awu nine nonkhe leniticabangela nkulunkulu longeke ente timangaliso, ngifuna kunibuta kutsi, ngabe tonkhe letintfo setendlulile, leto lengikhulume ngato na? Ngabe siphetfo sesifikile na? Bukani ngitsi kini, Cha; futsi Nkulunkulu akayekeli kutsi abe nguNkulunkulu wetimangaliso.
9.16: Bukani, ngabe tintfo Nkulunkulu latentile atimangalisi yini emehlweni etfu na? Yebo, ngabe ngubani longacondza imisebenti lemangalisako yaNkulunkulu na?
9.17: Ngubani longatsi bekungasiso simangaliso kutsi ngelivi lakhe lizulu kanye nemhlaba kwabakhona; nangemandla elivi lakhe umuntfu wadalwa ngelutfuli lwemhlaba; futsi ngemandla elivi lakhe timangaliso tenteka na?
9.18: Ngubani longatsi Jesu Khristu akatange ente timangaliso letinkhulu letiningi na? Futsi kwabakhona timangaliso letinkhulu letiningi letentiwa ngetandla tebaphostoli.
9.19: Futsi uma ngabe kwaba khona timangaliso ngaleso sikhatsi, pho kungani Nkulunkulu asayekele kuba nguNkulunkulu wetimangaliso kodvwa abe anguMuntfu longagucuki? Bukani, ngitsi kini, akagucuki; uma agucuka angayekela kuba nguNkulunkulu; kodvwa akayekeli kuba nguNkulunkulu, futsi usenguye Nkulunkulu wetimangaliso.
9.20: Sizatfu sekutsi ayekele kwenta timangaliso emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu kungoba bancishelwe lukholo, baphambukile endleleni lenguyonayona, futsi abamati Nkulunkulu lekufanele bametsembe.
9.21: Bukani, ngitsi kini loyo lokholwa kuKhristu, angangabati lutfo, noma ngabe yini layawuyicela kuBabe egameni laKhristu uyawuniketwa yona; futsi lesi setsembiso sawonkhewonkhe, kute kufike nasemikhawulweni yemhlaba.
9.22: Ngoba bukani, naku lokushiwo nguJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, kubafundzi bakhe labatawusala, yebo, kanjalo nakubo bonkhe bafundzi bakhe, nesicuku siva: Hambani niye emhlabeni wonkhe, nishumayele livangeli kubo bonkhe bantfu;
9.23: Futsi loyo lokholwako abhajatiswe uyawusindziswa, kodvwa loyo longakholwa uyawulahlwa;
9.24: Leti tibonakaliso tiyawubalandzela labo labakholwako—ngelibito lami bayawukhipha bodeveli; bayawukhuluma ngetilimi letinsha; bayawubamba tinyoka; futsi noma banatsa noma ngayini lebulalanako angeke behlelwe lutfo; bayawubeka tandla kulabagulako futsi baphile;
9.25: Futsi noma ngubani lokholwa egameni lami, angangabati lutfo, kuye ngitawuwacinisa onkhe emavi ami, kute kufike nasemikhawulweni yemhlaba.
9.26: Manje bukani, ngubani longamelana nemisebenti yeNkhosi? Ngubani longakuphika leyikushito? Ngubani longaphikisana nemandla lamakhulu eNkhosi? Ngubani longadzelela imisebenti yeNkhosi? Ngubani longadzelela bantfwana baKhristu? Bukani, nonkhe nine lenidzelela imisebenti yeNkhosi, niyawumangala futsi nibhubhe.
9.27: Awu ngako-ke ningadzeleli, futsi ningamangali, kodvwa vanini emavi eNkhosi, nicele kuBabe egameni laJesu noma yini leniyidzingako. Ningangabati, kodvwa kholwani, nicale njengasetikhatsini takadzeni, nite eNkhosini ngenhlitiyo yenu yonkhe, fezani kusindziswa kwenu ngekwesaba nangekutfutfumela phambi kwayo.
9.28: Hlakaniphani etinsukwini tekuvivinywa kwenu; tihlubuleni kuko konkhe kungahlanteki; ningaceli, kute nenelise tinkhanuko tenu, kodvwa celani ngekucina lokunganyakatiswa, kutsi ningakuvumeli kulingwa, kodvwa kutsi nisebentele Nkulunkulu weliciniso nalophilako.
9.29: Bonani kutsi anibhajatiswa ngalokungakafaneli; bonani kutsi anidli sidlo saKhristu ngalokungakafaneli; kodvwa bonani kutsi nenta tonkhe tintfo ngalokufanele, nikwente egameni laJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu lophilako, uma nikwenta loku, nibeketele kute kube sekugcineni, ngeke nilahlwe ngaphandle.
9.30: Bukani, ngikhuluma nani shengatsi ngikhuluma ngikulabafile; ngoba ngiyati kutsi niyawuwatfola emavi ami.
9.31: Ningangisoli ngenca yeliphutsa lami, nababe kanjalo, ngenca yeliphutsa lakhe, noma labo lababhala ngaphambi kwakhe; kodvwa esikhundleni saloko mbongeni Nkulunkulu kutsi uwavetile emaphutsa etfu kini, kute nifundze kuhlakanipha kakhulu kunatsi.
9.32: Manje, bukani, siwubhale lombhalo ngekwelwati lwetfu, ngetinhlavu temagama letibitwa ngekutsi siGibhithe lesiguculiwe, letendluliswa futsi taguculwa ngitsi, ngendlela yekukhuluma kwetfu
9.33: Futsi kube bongcwengcwe betfu bebabakhulu ngalokwanele besiyawubhala ngesiHebheru; kodvwa siHebheru siguculwe ngitsi naso, kube besingabhala ngesiHebheru, bukani, beningeke nibe nemaphutsa embhalweni wetfu.
9.34: Kodvwa iNkhosi iyatati tintfo lesitibhalile, nekutsi kute namunye umuntfu lowati lulwimi lwetfu; futsi ngenca yekutsi kute labanye bantfu labati lulwimi lwetfu, ngako-ke ilungise tindlela tekuhunyushwa kwawo.
9.35: Futsi letintfo tibhalwe ngenhloso yekutsi tisuse ingati yabomnaketfu etingutjeni tetfu, lasebancishelwe lukholo.
9.36: Bukani, letintfo lebesitifisa mayelana nabomnaketfu, yebo, kubuyiselwa kwabo ekumatini Khristu, tingekwemithandazo yabo bonkhe labangcwele labahlala kulelive.
9.37: Futsi shengatsi iNkhosi Jesu Khristu ingavuma kutsi imithandazo yabo iphendvulwe ngekwelukholo; shengatsi Nkulunkulu Babe angasikhumbula sivumelwano lasenta nendlu yaka-Israyeli; futsi shengatsi angababusisa ingunaphakadze, ngekukholwa egameni laJesu Khristu. Amen.

1.1: Manje mine, Moroni, sengiyachubeka nekubhala umlandvo walabo bantfu basendvulo lababhujiswa ngesandla seNkhosi eveni lelisenyakatfo.
1.2: Futsi umlandvo wami ngiwutsatsa kubongcwengcwe labangemashumi lamabili nakune labatfolwa bantfu baLimhayi, lababitwa ngekutsi yincwadzi ya-Etheri.
1.3: Njengoba ngicabanga kutsi incenye yekucala yalombhalo, lekhuluma ngekudalwa kwemhlaba, kanjalo nekwa-Adamu, nangemlandvo kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kute kufike embhoshongweni lomkhulu, futsi nanganoma ngutiphi tintfo letenteka emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu kute kube ngulesi sikhatsi, tikumaJuda—
1.4: Ngako-ke angitibhali leto tintfo letenteka kusukela etinsukwini ta-Adamu kute kube ngulesikhatsi; kodvwa tikhona kulabongcwengwe; loyo lotitfolako, uyawuba nemandla ekutsi atfole umlandvo logcwele.
1.5: Kodvwa buka, angibhali umlandvo logcwele, kodvwa ngibhala incenye yemlandvo, kusukela embhoshongweni bate babhujiswe.
1.6: Futsi ngiwubhala ngalendlela lomlandvo. Loyo lowabhala bekungu Etheri, futsi bekawentalelwane yaKhoriyanthori.
1.33: Loyo Jarede lowaphuma nemnakabo kanye nemindeni yabo, kanye nalabanye nemindeni yabo, embhoshongweni lomkhulu, ngesikhatsi iNkhosi iphambanisa lulwimi lwebantfu, futsi yafunga isentfukutselweni yayo kutsi bayawuhlakatwa emhlabeni wonkhe; futsi ngekwelivi leNkhosi labantfu bahlakatwa.
1.34: Umnakabo Jarede bekayindvodza lenkhulu nalenemandla, futsi bekayindvodza lebeyitsandvwa kakhulu yiNkhosi, Jarede, umnakabo, watsi kuye: Khala eNkhosini, kute ingasiphambanisi kutsi singawacondzi emavi etfu.
1.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakabo Jarede wakhala eNkhosini, iNkhosi yamhawukela Jarede; ngako-ke ayitange iluphambanise lulwimi lwaJarede; naJarede kanye nemnakabo abatange baphambaniswe.
1.36: Ngaleso sikhatsi Jarede watsi kumnakabo: Khala futsi eNkhosini, kute isuse intfukutselo yayo kulabo lababangani betfu, kute ingaluphambanisi lulwimi lwabo.
1.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakabo Jarede wakhala eNkhosini, iNkhosi yabahawukela labangani babo kanjalo nemindeni yabo, kangangoba nabo abaphambaniswanga.
1.38: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jarede waphindza wakhuluma kumnakabo, watsi: Hamba uyawubuta eNkhosini kutsi ingabe itawusikhipha yini kulelive, uma itawusikhipha kulelive, khala kuyo kutsi siyawuya kuphi. Ngubani lowatiko kutsi kungenteka iNkhosi isitfwale isiyise eveni lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe emhlabeni na? Futsi uma kunjalo, asetsembeke eNkhosini, kute silitfole libe lifa letfu.
1.39: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakabo Jarede wakhala eNkhosini ngaloko lobekukhulunywe ngemlomo waJarede.
1.40: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yamuva umnakabo Jarede, yaba nesihawu, yatsi kuye:
1.41: Hamba ubutsele ndzawonye imihlambi yakho, lendvuna nalensikati, yalo lonkhe luhlobo; kanjalo nenhlanyelo yemhlaba yalo lonkhe luhlobo; nemindeni yenu, Jarede umnakenu kanye nemndeni wakhe; kanjalo nebangani bakho nemindeni yabo, kanye nebangani baJarede nemindeni yabo.
1.42: Uma sewukwentile loku uyawubahola wehle uye esigodzini lesingasenyakatfo. Ngitawuhlangana nawe lapho, ngitawuhamba phambi kwakho kuya eveni lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe emave emhlaba.
1.43: Lapho ngitawukubusisa kanye nentalelwane yakho, futsi ngitikhulisele intalelwaneni yakho, nentalelwaneni yemnakenu, kanye nalabo labayawuhamba nawe, sive lesikhulu. Akuyukuba khona nasinye lesiyawukuba sikhulu kunaleso sive lengiyawutikhulisela sona entalelwaneni yakho, emhlabeni wonkhe. Futsi ngitawukwenta kanjalo kuwe ngoba ukhalile kimi sonkhe lesikhatsi lesidze.

2.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jarede nemnakabo, nemindeni yabo, kanjalo nebangani baJarede nemnakabo kanye nemindeni yabo, bahamba behlela esigodzini lesasingasenyakatfo, (ligama laleso sigodzi bekuyiNimrodi, sicanjwe ngemtingeli lomkhulu) nemihlambi yabo lebebayibutsele ndzawonye, lendvuna nalensikati, yalo lonkhe luhlobo
2.2: Baphindze babeka bosochaka babamba tinyoni telizulu; balungisa sitja, labatfwala ngaso tinhlanti temanti.
2.3: Baphindze betfwala idezurethi, lekutsi, nayihunyushwa ibitwa ngekutsi luju lwetinyosi, ngako-ke bebatfwele nelibulo letinyosi, kanye nato tonkhe tinhlobo taloko lokwakukhona eveni, tinhlanyelo talo lonkhe luhlobo.
2.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebehlele entasi esigodzini saNimrodi iNkhosi yehla kutawukhuluma nemnakaboJarede; yayisefini, futsi umnakaboJarede akayibonanga.
2.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yabayaleta kutsi bahambe baye ehlane, yebo, kuleyoncenye lapho bekungakate kube khona umuntfu kuyo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yahamba phambi kwabo, yakhuluma nabo ngesikhatsi ime efini, yabayaleta kutsi baye ngakuphi.
2.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba ehlane, bakha tikebhe, labawela ngato emanti lamaningi, bayaletwa njalo sandla seNkhosi.
2.7: Futsi iNkhosi ayibavumelanga kutsi beme ngesheya kwelwandle ehlane, kodvwa yayifuna kutsi bahambe bate befike ngisho eveni lesetsembiso, lelalikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu leyayililondvolotele bantfu labalungile.
2.8: Futsi yayifungile entfukutselweni yayo kumnakaboJarede, kutsi loyo lobekatawutfola lelive lesetsembiso, kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi kuya phambili futsi ingunaphakadze, kumele amkhonte, Nkulunkulu weliciniso nalokuphela kwakhe, noma basuswe baphele ngesikhatsi intfukutselo yayo lephelele ita kubo.
2.9: Manje, siyayibona imiyalo yaNkulunkulu mayelana nalelive, kutsi live lesetsembiso, futsi noma ngusiphi sive lesiyawulitfola siyawukhonta Nkulunkulu, noma siyawususwa siphele ngesikhatsi intfukutselo yayo lephelele ita kubo. Intfukutselo yayo lephelele ita kubo uma sebacocodzele ebubini.
2.10: Ngoba buka, leli live lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave, ngaloko-ke loyo lolitfolako uyawukhonta Nkulunkulu noma esuswe; ngoba lona ngumyalo waNkulunkulu waphakadze. Futsi loku angeke kwenteke kute kube khona bubi lobuphelele emkhatsini webantfwana balelive, kutsi basuswe.
2.11: Futsi loku kuta kini, Awu nine beTive, kute niyati imiyalo yaNkulunkulu—kute niphendvuke, ningabe nisachubeka ebubini benu bute bubi lobuphelele bufike, kute ningalwehliseli lulaka loluphelele lwaNkulunkulu etikwenu njengoba bantfu balelive bente njalo ngaphambilini.
2.12: Buka, leli live lelikhetsekile, futsi leso sive lesiyawulitfola siyawukhululeka ebugcilini, nasekutfunjweni, nakuto tonkhe tive letingephansi kwelizulu, uma nje bangamkhonta Nkulunkulu walelive, longuJesu Khristu, lobonakalisiwe ngaloko lesikubhalile.
2.13: Manje sengiyachubeka nembhalo wami, ngoba buka, kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yamletsa Jarede nabomnakabo nakulolo lwandle lolukhulu lolwehlukanisa emave. Futsi ngesikhatsi befika elwandle bemisa emathende abo; bayibita lendzawo ngeligama lelitsi yiMoriyankhuma; bahlala emathendeni, bahlala emathendeni elugwini lwelwandle sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemine.
2.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ekupheleni kweminyaka lemine iNkhosi yaphindze yeta kumnakaboJarede, yema efini yakhuluma naye. INkhosi yakhuluma nemnakaboJarede sikhatsi lesingaba mahora lamatsatfu, yamtfobisa ngoba akakhumbulanga kubita libito leNkhosi.
2.15: Futsi umnakaboJarede waphendvuka kulobo bubi bekabentile, walibita libito leNkhosi entela bomnakabo labebanaye. INkhosi yatsi kuye: Ngitawukucolela wena kanye nabomnakenu etonweni tabo; kodvwa ningabe nisona nanini, ngoba niyawukhumbula kutsi Moya wami angeke uhlale kumuntfu njalo; ngaloko-ke, uma nitawukona nite nicocodzele ngalokuphelele nitawususwa phambi kweNkhosi. Futsi lena yimicabango yami ngelive lengiyawuninika lona kutsi libe lifa lenu; ngoba liyawuba live lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave.
2.16: Futsi iNkhosi yatsi: Hamba uyawusebenta wakhe tikebhe ngendlela lebewutakhe ngayo. Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakaboJarede wahamba wayawusebenta, kanjalo nabomnakabo, bakha tikebhe ngendlela lebebatakhe ngayo, ngekwemiyalo yeNkhosi. Betitincane, futsi tilula etikwemanti, njengekubalula kwenyoni etikwemanti
2.17: Futsi betakhiwe ngendlela yekutsi beticine kakhulu, kangangoba betingabamba emanti njengesitja; ngaphansi kwato beticine njengesitja; emaceleni ato bekucine njengesitja; ticongo tato tatiphakeme; lingetulu lato belicine njengesitja; budze bato bebungangebudze besihlahla; umnyango wato, uma uvaliwe, wawucine njengesitja.
2.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakaboJarede wakhala eNkhosini, watsi: Awu Nkhosi, sengiwentile umsebenti longiyalete kutsi ngiwente, sengitentile tikebhe njengoba ungiyalile.
2.19: Futsi buka, Awu Nkhosi, kuto kute kukhanya; sitawugwedla siye ngakuphi? Ngetulu kwaloko sitawukufa, ngoba kuto angeke sikwati kuphefumula, ngaphandle kwalomoya lokuto; ngako-ke sitawukufa.
2.20: INkhosi yatsi kumnakaboJarede: Buka, yakha imbobo ngetulu, kanjalo nangephansi; futsi uma nidzinga umoya utawuvula lembobo bese nitfola umoya. Nangabe ningenelwa manti, buka, utawuyivala lembobo, kute ningafi etikhukhuleni.
2.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakaboJarede wenta njalo, njengoba iNkhosi beyimyaletile.
2.22: Waphindze wakhala eNkhosini watsi: Awu Nkhosi, buka sengente njengoba ungiyaletile; sengibalungiselele bantfu bami tikebhe, buka kute kukhanya kuto. Buka, Awu Nkhosi, utawusivumela kutsi siwele lamanti lamakhulu ebumnyameni na?
2.23: INkhosi yatsi kumnakaboJarede: Ufuna kutsi ngenteni kute nibe nekukhanya etikebheni tenu na? Ngoba buka, angeke nikwati kuba nemafasitelo, ngoba atawuphihlika abe ticucu; futsi angeke nihambe nemlilo, ngoba angeke nihambe ngekukhanya kwemlilo.
2.24: Ngoba buka, niyawuba njengemkhoma ekhatsi nelwandle; ngoba tintsaba temagagasi titawunishaya. Noko, ngitawuphindze nginikhiphe ekujuleni kwelwandle; ngoba imimoya ngiyitfumele, kanjalo ngitfumele netimvula kanye netikhukhula.
2.25: Futsi buka, ngiyanilungiselela kute nimelane naletintfo; ngoba angeke nikwati kuwela lamanti lamakhulu ngaphandle kwekutsi nginilungiselele kute nimelane nemagagasi elwandle, naleyo mimoya lengiyitfumele, kanye naleto tikhukhula letitawuta. Ngako-ke ufuna kutsi nginilungiseleleni kute nibe nekukhanya ngesikhatsi nigwinywa ekujuleni kwelwandle na?

3.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakaboJarede, (manje sibalo setikebhe lebesetilungisiwe betisiphohlongo) wahamba waya entsabeni, lebebayibita ngentsaba iShelemu, ngenca yebudze bayo lobukhulu, wancibilikisa edvwaleni ematje lamancane lalishumi nesitfupha; bekamhlophe aphindze akhanya, njengengilazi lekubonakala ngale kwayo; wawatfwala ngetandla takhe waya nawo etikwentsaba, waphindze wakhala eNkhosini, watsi:
3.2: Awu Nkhosi, utsite sitawutungeletwa tikhukhula. Manje buka, Awu Nkhosi, futsi ungayitfukutseleli inceku yakho ngenca yebutsakatsaka bayo; ngoba siyati kutsi wena ungcwele uphindze uhlala emazulwini, nekutsi tsine asikafaneleki ngaphambi kwakho; ngenca yekuwa imvelo yetfu seloku yaba nebubi njalo; noko, Awu Nkhosi, usinike umyaleto wekutsi kufanele sicele kuwe, kute kuwe sitfole njengekwetifiso tetfu.
3.3: Buka, Awu Nkhosi, usishayile ngenca yebubi betfu, wasichuba, futsi kuleminyaka leminingi besisehlane; noko, ube nemusa kitsi. Awu Nkhosi, ngibuke ungihawukele, ususe intfukutselo yakho kulabantfu bakho, futsi ungavumi kutsi bahambe bewele kulamanti lanesivunguvungu ebumnyameni; kodvwa buka letintfo lengitincibilikisile ngatikhipha edvwaleni.
3.4: Futsi ngiyati, Awu Nkhosi, kutsi wena unemandla onkhe, ungenta noma yini loyifisako kutsi kuzuze umuntfu; ngako-ke tsintsa lamatje, Awu Nkhosi, ngemunwe wakho, uwalungisele kutsi akhanye ebumnyameni; futsi ayawusikhanyisela etikebheni lesitilungisile, kute sibe nekukhanya ngesikhatsi sewela lwandle.
3.5: Buka, Awu Nkhosi, ungakwenta loku. Siyati kutsi wena uyakwati kukhombisa emandla akho lamakhulu, labukeka amancane ngekucondza kwebantfu.
3.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi umnakabo Jarede sekawashito lamavi, buka, iNkhosi yelula sandla sayo phindze yawatsintsa ematje ngalinye nangalinye ngemunwe wayo. Futsi lesihenco sesuswa emehlweni emnakaboJarede, wabona umunwe weNkhosi; bewunjengemunwe wemuntfu, njengenyama kanye nengati; futsi umnakaboJarede wawa phansi phambi kweNkhosi, ngoba washaywa kwesaba.
3.7: Futsi iNkhosi yabona kutsi umnakaboJarede besekawele phansi; yase itsi kuye: Sukuma, uwiswa yini na?
3.8: Watsi eNkhosini: Ngibone umunwe weNkhosi, futsi ngesabile hleze ingishaye; ngoba bengingati kutsi iNkhosi inenyama kanye nengati.
3.9: INkhosi yatsi kuye: Ngenca yelukholo lwakho ubonile kutsi ngiyawutsatsa umtimba wenyama kanye nengati; futsi akukate nanini kute umuntfu phambi kwami ngelukholo lolukhulu kangaka njengoba wena wentile; ngoba kube bekungasiko njalo bewungeke uwubone umunwe wami. Ngabe ubona lokuningi kunaloku na?
3.10: Futsi waphendvula watsi: Cha; Nkhosi, tivete kimi.
3.11: INkhosi yatsi kuye: Utawuwakholwa yini lamavi lengitawuwakhuluma na?
3.12: Waphendvula watsi: Yebo, Nkhosi, ngiyati kutsi wena ukhuluma liciniso, ngoba unguNkulunkulu weliciniso, futsi angeke uwacambe emanga.
3.13: Futsi sekawashito lamavi, buka, iNkhosi yativeta kuye, yatsi: Ngenca yekutsi uyatati letintfo sewuyahlengwa ekuweni; ngako-ke ubuyiselwa ebukhoneni bami; ngako-ke ngiyativeta kuwe.
3.14: Buka, nginguye loyo lowalungiselelwa kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba kute ngihlenge bantfu bami. Buka, NginguJesu Khristu. Ngingu Babe kanye neNdvodzana. Kimi lonkhe luntfu luyawuba nekuphila, futsi loko kuyawuba kwaphakadze, ngisho nalabo labayawukholwa egameni lami; futsi bayawuba ngemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati ami.
3.15: Futsi angikate nanini ngitivete kumuntfu lengimdalile, ngoba umuntfu akate akholwe kimi njengoba wena wentile. Uyabona yini kutsi wentiwe ngemfanekiso wami na? Yebo, ngisho bonkhe bantfu badalwa ekucaleni ngemfanekiso wami.
3.16: Buka, lomtimba, lowubonako manje, ngumtimba wemoya wami; futsi umuntfu ngamdala ngemfanekiso wemtimba wemoya wami; njengoba ngivela kuwe ngisemoyeni ngiyawuvela kubantfu bami enyameni.
3.17: Manje, njengoba mine, Moroni, ngitsite ngeke ngikwati kwenta umlandvo lophelele waletintfo letibhaliwe, ngako-ke kuyangenelisa kusho kutsi Jesu wativeta kulendvodza akumoya, ngisho nangaleyondlela kanjalo nangekufana nalowo mtimba latibonakalisa ngawo kumaNefi.
3.18: Wamsebentela nanjengoba asebentela emaNefi; futsi konkhe loku, kute kutsi lendvodza yati kutsi bekanguNkulunkulu, ngenca yemisebenti leminingi nalemikhulu iNkhosi leyambonisa yona.
3.19: Futsi ngenca yelwati lwalendvodza ayitange isavinjelwa kutsi ibone ngekhatsi kwesihenco; yabona umunwe waJesu, lokwatsi uma iwubona, yawa ngekwesaba; ngoba yati kutsi bekungumunwe weNkhosi; futsi ayitange isaba nelukholo, ngoba beseyati, ingasangabati lutfo.
3.20: Ngaloko-ke, sekanalolu lwati loluphelele lwaNkulunkulu, akatange asavinjelwa kutsi abesekhatsi kwalesihenco; ngako-ke wambona Jesu; futsi wamsebentela.
3.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yatsi kumnakaboJarede: Buka, ungativumeli letintfo lotibonile nalotivile kutsi tiye emhlabeni, kute kufike sikhatsi lengiyawudvumisa ngaso libito lami enyameni; ngaloko-ke, uyawutigcina letintfo lotibonile, nalotivile, ungatikhombisi muntfu.
3.22: Buka, ngesikhatsi sewuhlangana nami, uyawutibhala uphindze utivale tilondzeke, kute kubebete namunye longatihumusha; ngoba uyawutibhala ngelulwimi lolungeke lufundzeke.
3.23: Buka, lamatje lamabili ngitawukunika wona, futsi uyawuwavala alondzeke nawo naleto tintfo loyawutibhala.
3.24: Ngoba buka, lolo lulwimi loyawulubhala ngiluphambanisile; ngako-ke ngitawukwenta ngesikhatsi sami lesifanele kutsi lamatje aticacise emehlweni ebantfu letintfo loyawutibhala.
3.25: Futsi ngesikhatsi iNkhosi seyiwakhulumile lamavi, yakhombisa umnakaboJarede bonkhe labantfu bemhlaba labebakadze bakhona, kanjalo nabo bonkhe labo labebayawuba khona; futsi ayibagodlanga emehlweni ayo, kwate kwaba ngisho nasemikhawulweni yemhlaba.
3.26: Ngoba beyishito kuye ngetikhatsi letingaphambilini, kutsi uma bekayawukholwa kuyo kutsi yayitawukhombisa tonkhe tintfo—loko kwakutawukhonjiswa kuye; ngako-ke iNkhosi yayingeke isagodla nanoma yini kuye, ngoba bekati kutsi iNkhosi ingamkhombisa tonkhe tintfo.
3.27: INkhosi yatsi kuye: Bhala letintfo bese uyativala tilondzeke; ngiyawutiveta ngesikhatsi sami lesifanele kubantfwana bebantfu.
3.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yamyaleta kutsi awavale alondzeke nalawo matje lamabili labekawatfolile, futsi angawaveti, ite iNkhosi iwavete yona kubantfwana bebantfu.

4.1: INkhosi yayaleta umnakaboJarede kutsi ehlele entansi esuke entsabeni ebukhoneni beNkhosi, atibhale leto tintfo labekatibonile; futsi ayivumanga kutsi tiye kubantfwana bebantfu kute kube semvakwekutsi iphakanyiselwe etulu esiphambanweni; futsi ngalesi sizatfu iNkhosi Mosiya yatigcina, kute tingayi emhlabeni kute kube semvakwekutsi Khristu ativete kubantfu bakhe.
4.2: Emvakwekutsi Khristu sekativetile kubantfu bakhe wayaleta kutsi tembulwe.
4.3: Manje, emvakwaloko, bonkhe sebancishelwe lukholo; futsi sekute namunye ngaphandle kwemaLamani, balilahlile livangeli laKhristu; ngako-ke ngiyaletwe kutsi ngiphindze ngitifihle ngaphansi kwemhlaba.
4.4: Buka, ngibhale kulabongcwengcwe tona kanye leto tintfo umnakaboJarede latibona; futsi akukate nanini kube khona tintfo letinkhulu letake tembulwa kunaleto letembulwa kumnakaboJarede.
4.5: Ngaloko-ke iNkhosi ingiyalete kutsi ngitibhale; futsi ngitibhalile. Ingiyalete kutsi ngitivale tilondzeke; ngetulu kwaloko iyalete kutsi ngikuvale kulondzeke kuhunyushwa kwato; ngaloko-ke ngitivalile talondzeka tihumushi, njengekwemyaleto weNkhosi.
4.6: Ngoba iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Atiyukuya kubeTive kute kube lusuku lapho bayawuphendvuka ebubini babo, futsi bahlanteke ngaphambi kweNkhosi.
4.7: Ngalolo suku lapho bayawusebentisa lukholo kimi, kusho iNkhosi, ngisho nanjengoba umnakaboJarede enta, kute bangcweliswe kimi, emvakwaloko ngitawutembula kubo leto tintfo umnakaboJarede latibona, kangangoba ngiyokwembula tonkhe tembulo tami, kusho Jesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, Babe wemazulu kanye nemhlaba, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letikuwo.
4.8: Futsi loyo lotawuphikisana nelivi leNkhosi, akacalekiswe; naloyo loyawutiphika letintfo, akacalekiswe; ngoba kulabo angeke ngibakhombise tintfo letinkhulu, kusho Jesu Khristu; ngoba nginguye lokhulumako.
4.9: Ngekuyaleta kwami emazulu ayavuleka aphindze avaleke; ngelivi lami umhlaba uyawutamatama; futsi ngekuyaleta kwami bantfu balapho bayawukufa, kanjalo nangemlilo.
4.10: Futsi loyo longawakholwa emavi ami akabakholwa nebafundzi bami; nangabe akusimi lengikhulumako, hlulelani; ngoba niyawukwati kutsi ngimi lokhulumako, ngelusuku lwekugcina.
4.11: Kodvwa loyo lokholwa nguletintfo lengitikhulumile, ngiyawumvakashela ngetembulo taMoya wami, uyawukwati futsi afakaze. Ngoba ngenca yaMoya wami uyawukwati kutsi letintfo tiliciniso; ngoba tikholisa bantfu kutsi bente lokuhle.
4.12: Futsi noma ngabe yini lekholisa bantfu kutsi bente lokuhle ivela kimi; ngoba lokuhle akuveli kulomunye ngaphandle kwekutsi kuvele kimi. Nginguye kanye loyo loholela bantfu kubo bonkhe buhle; loyo longeke awakholwe emavi ami angeke angikholwe nami—kutsi nginguye; futsi loyo longeke angikholwe angeke amkholwe naBabe longitfumile. Ngoba buka, nginguBabe, ngikukhanya, nekuphila, kanye neliciniso lemhlaba.
4.13: Wotani kimi, Awu nine beTive, futsi ngitawunikhombisa tintfo letinkhulu, lwati lolufihlakele ngenca yekungakholwa.
4.14: Wotani kimi, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, futsi kuyawukwembulwa kini kutsi tinkhulu kangakanani tintfo Babe lanibekele tona, kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba; futsi atiketi kini, ngenca yekungakholwa.
4.15: Bukani, uma niyawusidzabula leso sihenco sekungakholwa lesenta kutsi nihlale nisesimeni senu sebubi lesesabekako, kanye nebulukhuni benhlitiyo, kanye nebumphumphutse bengcondvo, emvakwaloko tintfo letinkhulu kanye naletimangalisako lenafihlelwa tona kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba—yebo, uma niyawubita Babe egameni lami, ngenhlitiyo ledzabukile nangemoya lowephukile, emvakwaloko niyawukwati kutsi Babe usikhumbulile sivumelwano lasenta kuboyihlo, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli.
4.16: Emvakwaloko tembulo tami lengente kutsi tibhalwe yinceku yami Johane tiyawukwembulwa emehlweni abo bonkhe bantfu. Khumbulani, ngesikhatsi senitibona letintfo, niyawubese niyati kutsi sikhatsi sesisondzele kutsi tembulwe ngetento lucobo.
4.17: Ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi seniwutfola lombhalo niyawubese niyati kutsi umsebenti waBabe sewucalile eveni lonkhe.
4.18: Ngako-ke, phendvukani nonkhe nine emikhawulweni yemhlaba, nite kimi, futsi nikholwe evangelini lami, niphindze nibhajatiswe egameni lami; ngoba loyo lokholwako aphindze abhajatiswe uyawusindziswa; kodvwa loyo longakholwa uyawulahlwa; futsi tibonakaliso tiyawubalandzela labo labakholwa egameni lami.
4.19: Ubusisiwe loyo lotfolakala etsembekile egameni lami ngelusuku lwekugcina, ngoba uyawuphakanyiswa kute ahlale embusweni lolungiselelwe yena kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba. Bukani ngimi lokukhulumile loku. Amen.

5.1: Manje mine, Moroni, sengiwabhalile emavi lengiyaletwe ngawo, njengekukhumbula kwami; futsi sengikutjelile tintfo lengitivale talondzeka; ngako-ke ungatitsintsi kute utihumushe; ngoba leyontfo walelwe yona, ngaphandle kwekutsi kube semvakwesikhashana ngekuhlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu.
5.2: Buka, ungaba nenhlanhla yekutsi bongcwengcwe ubakhombise labo labayawusita kutsi kuletfwe lomsebenti;
5.3: Futsi bayawukhonjiswa kulabatsatfu ngemandla aNkulunkulu, ngaloko-ke bayawukwati ngaphandle kwekungabata kutsi letintfo tiliciniso.
5.4: Futsi ngemlomo wabofakazi labatsatfu letintfo tiyawumiswa; nebufakazi balabatsatfu, kanye nalomsebenti, kuwo lokuyawukhonjiswa emandla aNkulunkulu kanjalo nelivi lakhe, Babe, neNdvodzana kanye naMoya loNgcwele labafakaza ngako—futsi konkhe loku kuyawuma njengebufakazi ngalokumelene nemhlaba ngelusuku lwekugcina.
5.5: Futsi nangabe bayaphendvuka bete kuBabe egameni laJesu, bayawukwemukelwa embusweni waNkulunkulu.
5.6: Manje, uma ngite ligunya laletintfo, tilahleni, ngoba niyawukwati kutsi ngineligunya ngesikhatsi seningibona, futsi siyawuma phambi kwaNkulunkulu ngelusuku lwekugcina. Amen.

6.1: Manje mine, Moroni, sengiyachubeka nekubhala umbhalo waJarede nemnakabo.
6.2: Ngoba kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi iNkhosi seyiwalungisile lawo matje umnakaboJarede abewatfwale waya nawo entsabeni, umnakaboJerede wehla aphuma entsabeni, wawabeka ematje kuleto tikebhe lebetilungisiwe, ngalinye ekugcineni kwaso ngasinye; buka, atikhanyisa tikebhe.
6.3: Ngaleyondlela iNkhosi yenta ematje kutsi akhanye ebumnyameni, kute anike kukhanya emadvodzeni, kubesifazane, kanye nasebantfwaneni, kute bangawaweli emanti lamaningi ebumnyameni.
6.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebalungise lonkhe luhlobo lwekudla, kute baphile ngako emantini, kanjalo nekudla kwemihlambi wetimvu kanye nemhlambi wetinkhomo, kanye nanoma ngusiphi silwane noma inyoni lebebangayitfwala—kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebatentile tonkhe letintfo bangena emikhunjini noma etikebheni tabo, bahamba baya elwandle, betsembele eNkhosini Nkulunkulu wabo.
6.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yenta kutsi kube khona umoya lonemandla lowawuhhusha etikwemanti, loya ngaseveni lesetsembiso; ngaleyondlela baphonseka lena nalena emagagasini aselwandle ngaphambi kwemoya.
6.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tikhatsi letiningi bacwila ekujuleni kwelwandle, ngenca yetintsaba temagagasi lebetiwela kubo, kanjalo netivunguvungu letinkhulu naletimbi lebetibangwa ngumoya lomubi kakhulu.
6.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bacwile ekujuleni bekute emanti labekangabalimata, ngenca yekutsi tikebhe tabo beticine njengesitja, ngetulu kwaloko beticine njengemkhumbi waNowa; ngako-ke ngesikhatsi benganywe ngemanti lamaningi bakhala eNkosini, yaphindze yabaletsa ngetulu kwemanti.
6.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umoya awutange uyekele kuhhusha ubheke ngaseveni lesetsembiso ngesikhatsi basemantini; ngaleyondlela bachutjwa baya phambili ngaphambi kwemoya.
6.9: Futsi bahlabelela tingoma tekudvumisa eNkhosini; yebo, umnakaboJarede wahlabelela tingoma tekudvumisa eNkhosini, ayibonga aphindze ayidvumisa lusuku lonkhe; futsi ngesikhatsi kufika busuku, abayekelanga kudvumisa iNkhosi.
6.10: Ngaleyondlela bachutjwa baya phambili, futsi bekute nesilwane lesesabekako saselwandle lebesingabancuma, noma umkhoma lowawungabalimata; baba nekukhanya njalo-nje, akukhatsalekile kutsi bekukungetulu noma ngephansi kwemanti
6.11: Ngaleyondlela bachutjwa baya phambili, tinsuku letingemakhulu lamatsatfu nemashumi lamane nakune emantini.
6.12: Befika elugwini lwelive lesetsembiso. Futsi ngesikhatsi sebabeke tinyawo tabo elugwini lwelive lesetsembiso, bakhotsama eveni, batitfoba phambi kweNkhosi, bakhala tinyembeti tenjabulo phambi kweNkhosi, ngenca yebukhulu besihawu sayo lesimnene kubo.
6.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bahamba baya eveni, bacala kulima umhlabatsi.
6.14: Jarede bekanemadvodzana lamane, futsi abebitwa ngekutsi nguJakomu, naGiliga, naMaha kanye na-Oriha.
6.15: UmnakaboJarede naye watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati.
6.16: Nebangani baJarede kanye nemnakabo bebasibalo sebantfu labacishe babe ngemashumi lamabili nakubili; nabo ngalokunjalo batala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati ngaphambi kwekutsi befike eveni lesetsembiso; ngako-ke bacala kutsi babe baningi.
6.17: Futsi bafundziswa kutsi bahambe ngekutitfoba phambi kweNkhosi; ngetulu kwaloku bebafundziswa lokusuka kuNkulunkulu.
6.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bacala kusabalala eveni, bandza baphindze balima umhlabatsi; bakhula baba nemandla eveni.
6.19: UmnakaboJarede wacala kuba mdzala, wabona kutsi besekufanele masinyane afe; ngaloko-ke watsi kuJarede: Asibutsele ndzawonye bantfu betfu kute sibabale, kute sati kutsi batawufisani kitsi ngaphambi kwekutsi sife.
6.20: Ngalokuhleliwe bantfu bagcogcelwa ndzawonye. Manje sibalo semadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati emnakaboJarede bekubantfu labangemashumi lamabili nakubili; kani sibalo semadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati aJarede bebalishumi nakubili, anemadvodzana lamane.
6.21: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bababala bantfu babo; emvakwekutsi sebababalile, bafisa kwati kubo kutsi ngutiphi tintfo labebafuna kutsi batente ngaphambi kwekutsi bafe.
6.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bacela kubo kutsi bagcobe munye wemadvodzana abo kutsi abe yinkhosi yabo.
6.23: Manje buka, loku kwabakhatsata. UmnakaboJarede watsi kubo: Ngempela lentfo iholela ekutfunjweni.
6.24: Kodvwa Jarede watsi kumnakabo: Bavumele kutsi babe nenkhosi. Ngako-ke watsi kubo: Khetsani-ke emkhatsini wemadvodzana etfu inkhosi, leyo leniyifunako.
6.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bakhetsa litibulo lemnakaboJarede; libito lakhe bekunguPhagagi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wala futsi wangavumi kuba yinkhosi yabo. Bantfu bafuna kutsi uyise amphocelele, kodvwa uyise akafunanga; wabayala kutsi bangaphoceleli muntfu kutsi abe yinkhosi yabo.
6.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babakhetsa bonkhe bomnakaboPhagabi, kodvwa abavumanga.
6.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngisho nemadvodazana aJarede akavumanga onkhe, ngaphandle kwayinye; Oriha lowagcotjwa kutsi abe yinkhosi yalabantfu.
6.28: Wacala kubusa, nebantfu bacala kuphumelela; banotsa kakhulu.
6.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jarede wafa, kanjalo nemnakabo.
6.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Oriha wahamba ngekutitfoba phambi kweNkhosi, wakhumbula kutsi tatitinkhulu kangakanani tintfo iNkhosi lebeyitentele uyise, ngetulu kwaloko wabafundzisa bantfu bakhe kutsi tatitinkhulu kangakanani tintfo iNkhosi leyayitentele boyise.

7.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Oriha wakwenta ngekulunga kwehlulela eveni lonkhe ngetinsuku takhe, tinsuku takhe letaba tiningi kakhulu.
7.2: Watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati; yebo, watala labangemashumi lamatsatfu nakunye, emkhatsini wabo lebekunemadvodzana langemashumi lamabili nakutsatfu.
7.3: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngetulu kwaloko watala Khibi ebudzaleni bakhe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khibi wabusa esikhundleni sakhe; Khibi watala Korihori.
7.4: Futsi ngesikhatsi Korihori sekaneminyaka lengemashumi lamatsatfu nakubili budzala wavukela uyise, wahamba wewela wayohlala eveni laNehori; watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati, baba bahle kakhulu; ngaloko-ke Korihori waheha labaningi bantfu bamlandzela.
7.5: Ngesikhatsi sekagcogcele ndzawonye libutfo wakhuphukela eveni laMoron lapho inkhosi beyihlala khona, wayitfumba, loko lokwenta kutsi kugcwaliseke lobekushiwo ngumnakaboJarede kutsi bayawuletfwa ekutfunjweni.
7.6: Manje live laMoron, lapho bekuhlala khona inkhosi, belisedvutane nalelolive lelibitwa ngemaNefi ngekutsi yiNcitsakalo.
7.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khibi wahlala ekutfunjweni, kanye nebantfu bakhe bangaphansi kwendvodzana yakhe Korihori, wate waba mdzala kakhulu; noko Khibi watala Shule ebudzaleni bakhe, ngesikhatsi asesekutfunjweni.
7.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shule wamtfukutselela umnakabo; Shule wakhula waba nemandla, waba nemandla ngekwemandla endvodza; futsi ngetulu kwaloko bekakwati kwehlulela ngalokungiko.
7.9: Ngaloko-ke, waya egcumeni i-Efrayimi, wancibilikisa insimbi kulelo ligcuma, waphindze wenta tinkemba ngetinsimbi wentela labo labekabahehe kutsi bahamba naye; emvakwekutsi sekabahlomisile ngetinkemba wabuyela eveni laNehori, wayawukulwa nemnakabo Korihori, ngaleyondlela wawutfola umbuso wawubuyisela kuyise Khibi.
7.10: Manje ngenca yalentfo Shule labekayentile, uyise wamnika umbuso; ngako-ke wacala kubusa esikhundleni seyise.
7.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wehlulela ngekulunga; wawusabalalisa umbuso wakhe eveni lonkhe, ngoba bantfu bese babaningi kakhulu.
7.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shule naye watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati lamaningi.
7.13: Korihori waphendvuka ebubini lobuningi labekabentile; ngaloko-ke Shule wamnika emandla embusweni wakhe.
7.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Korihori bekanemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati lamaningi. Emkhatsini wemadvodzana aKorihori bekukhona munye libito lakhe bekunguNowa.
7.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nowa wavukela Shule, inkhosi, kanye neyise Korihori, waheha umnakabo Kohori, kanjalo nabo bonkhe bomnakabo kanye nalabaningi bantfu.
7.16: Walwa naShule, inkhosi, lokwenta watfola live lelaba lifa labo lekucala; futsi waba yinkhosi kuleyo ncenye yelive.
7.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi waphindze walwa naShule inkhosi, wamtsatsa Shule, wamtfwala wayawumtfumbela eMoron.
7.18: Futsi kwenteka ngesikhatsi sekatawumbulala, emadvodzana aShule anyenya angena endlini yaNowa ebusuku ambulala, aphula umnyango welijele akhipha uyise, ambeka esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi embusweni wakhe.
7.19: Ngaloko-ke, indvodzana yaNowa yawakha umbuso wakhe esikhundleni sakhe; noko bona abatange basawatfola emandla nanini ngetulu kwaShule inkhosi, futsi bantfu labebangaphansi kwembuso waShule inkhosi baphumelela kakhulu baphindze bakhula kakhulu.
7.20: Futsi live lehlukana; kwaba khona imibuso lemibili, umbuso waShule, kanye nembuso waKohori, indvodzana yaNowa.
7.21: Futsi Kohori, indvodzana yaNowa, wenta kutsi bantfu bakhe balwe naShule, lapho Shule abehlula khona waphindze wabulala Kohori.
7.22: Manje Kohori bekanendvodzana lebeyibitwa ngekutsi nguNimrodi; Nimrodi wawushiya umbuso waKohori wawunika Shule, wemukeleka emehlweni aShule; ngaloko-ke Shule wamentela lokuhle, futsi wenta embusweni waShule njengekutsandza kwakhe.
7.23: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko embusweni waShule kwefika baphrofethi emkhatsini webantfu, labebatfunyiwe bavela eNkhosini, baphrofetha kutsi bubi kanye nekukhonta tithico kwebantfu bekuletsa sicalekiso kulelive, nekutsi bekufanele babhujiswe uma bangaphendvuki.
7.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu babetfuka baphrofethi, baphindze babaphukuta. Futsi kwenteka kutsi inkhosi Shule yabehlulela bonkhe labo labebatfuka baphrofethi.
7.25: Wabeka umtsetfo kulo lonkhe live, lobewuniketa emandla kubaphrofethi kutsi bebangaya noma ngukuphi lapho bebafuna kuya khona; ngalesi sizatfu bantfu baphendvuka.
7.26: Ngenca yekutsi bantfu baphendvuka ebubini babo kanye nasekukhonteni tithico iNkhosi yabasindzisa, bacala baphindze baphumelela kulelive. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shule watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati ebudzaleni bakhe.
7.27: Futsi besekute timphi etinsukwini taShule; watikhumbula tintfo letinkhulu iNkhosi lebeyitentele boyise ekubaletseni ngesheya kwelwandle yabayisa eveni lesetsembiso; ngaloko-ke wehlulela ngekulunga tonkhe tinsuku takhe.

8.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watala Omeri, Omeri wabusa esikhundleni sakhe. Omeri watala Jarede; Jarede watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati.
8.2: Jarede wavukela uyise, weta watawuhlala eveni laHethi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wakhohlisa bantfu labaningi, ngenca yemavi akhe lanebucili, wate watfola incenye yembuso.
8.3: Ngesikhatsi asatfole incenye yembuso walwa neyise, watsatsa uyise wamyisa ekutfunjweni, futsi wamenta kutsi asebente ekutfunjweni;
8.4: Manje, ngetinsuku tekubusa kwaOmeri bekasekutfunjweni incenye yetinsuku takhe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati, emkhatsini wabo bekukhona Esromu kanye naKhoriyanthuma;
8.5: Futsi batfukutsela kakhulu ngenca yetento taJarede umnakabo, kangangekutsi bahlanganisa libutfo bayawukulwa naJarede. Futsi kwenteka kutsi balwa naye ebusuku.
8.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebalibulele libutfo laJarede besebatawumbulala naye futsi; wabancenga kutsi bangambulali, nekutsi bekatawunikela umbuso kuyise. Futsi kwenteka kutsi bamvumela waphila.
8.7: Manje Jarede waba nelusizi lolukhulu ngenca yekulahlekelwa ngumbuso, ngoba inhlitiyo yakhe bekayibeke kuwo umbuso kanye nakulo ludvumo lwemhlaba.
8.8: Manje indvodzakati yaJarede beyihlakaniphe kakhulu, futsi ibona buhlungu beyise, yacabanga kwenta lisu lebeyitawubuyisela ngalo umbuso kuyise.
8.9: Manje indvodzakati yaJarede beyiyinhle kakhulu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi yakhuluma neyise, yatsi kuye: Kungani babe anelusizi kangaka? Akate yini awufundze umbhalo bobabe betfu labawuletsa ngesheya kwelwandle na? Buka, kute yini umlandvo mayelana nalabo basendvulo, kutsi ngemasu abo layimfihlo batfola imibuso kanye neludvumo lolukhulu na?
8.10: Manje, ngako-ke babe akatfumele kulandvwe Akhishi, indvodzana yaKiminori; buka, ngimuhle, ngitawugidza embikwakhe, ngitawumtfokotisa, kute afune kutsi ngibe ngumkakhe; ngaloko-ke uma ayawufuna kutsi umnike mine kutsi ngibe ngumkakhe, emvakwaloko uyawubese utsi: Ngitawukunika yena uma nje utawuletsa kimi inhloko yababe, inkhosi.
8.11: Manje Omeri bekangumngani wa-Akhishi; ngaloko-ke, ngesikhatsi Jarede atfumele kutsi kulandvwe Akhishi, indvodzakati yaJarede yagidza ngaphambi kwakhe kute imtfokotise, kangangekutsi wafuna kutsi ibe ngumkakhe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi watsi kuJarede: Nginike yena kutsi abe ngumkami.
8.12: Jarede watsi kuye: Ngitawukunika yena, uma-nje utawuletsa kimi inhloko yababe, inkhosi.
8.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Akhishi wagcogcela endlini yaJarede tonkhe tihlobo takhe, watsi kuto: Niyafunga yini kutsi nitawutsembeka kimi kulentfo lengitawuyicela kini na?
8.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bonkhe bafunga kuye, ngaNkulunkulu wasezulwini, nangemazulu, kanjalo nangemhlaba, kanye nangetinhloko tabo, kutsi loyo lobekayawukwenta lokuhlukile kunalolo sito Akhishi abelufuna uyawulahlekelwa yinhloko yakhe; futsi loyo loyawuveta imfihlo yanoma ngabe yini Akhishi abeyembule kubo, loyo uyawulahlekelwa yimphilo yakhe.
8.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bavumelana na-Akhishi. Akhishi wabafungisa ngetifungo lebetinikwe ngulabo basendvulo nabo labebafuna emandla, lebetindluliswe tehla tisuka ngisho kuKhayini, lobekangumbulali kusukela ekucaleni.
8.16: Futsi betigcinwe ngemandla adeveli kute tifungiswe bantfu, kubagcina basebumnyameni, kusita labo labafuna emandla kute bazuze emandla, nekutsi babulale, baphange, bacambe emanga, baphindze bente tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi kanye nebugwadla.
8.17: Futsi bekuyindvodzana yaJarede leyakufaka enhlitiyweni yakhe kutsi aticwaninge letintfo takadzeni; Jarede wakufaka enhlitiyweni ya-Akhishi; ngaloko-ke, Akhishi wafungisa tihlobo kanye nebangani bakhe, abakhohlisa ngetetsembiso letinhle kutsi bente noma ngayini abeyifuna.
8.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi basungula licembu leliyimfihlo, njengalabo basendvulo; lelo cembu lelinengeke kakhulu nalelinebubi ngetulu kwako konkhe, emehlweni aNkulunkulu.
8.19: Ngoba iNkhosi ayisebenti ngemacembu layimfihlo, futsi ayikate iyalete umuntfu kutsi acitse ingati, kodvwa kuto tonkhe tintfo ikwalele loko, kusukela ekucaleni kwemuntfu.
8.20: Manje mine, Moroni, angibhali ngetinhlobo tetifungo kanye nemacembu abo, ngoba kwembuliwe kimi kutsi kukhona emkhatsini webantfu bonkhe, futsi kukhona nasemkhatsini wemaLamani.
8.21: Futsi kudale kubhujiswa kwalabantfu lengikhuluma ngabo manje, kanjalo nekubhujiswa kwebantfu baNefi.
8.22: Futsi noma ngusiphi sive lesiyawusekela emacembu lanjena layimfihlo, kute sitfole emandla kanye nenzuzo, ate asabalale esiveni, buka, siyawubhujiswa; ngoba iNkhosi angeke ivume kutsi ingati yalabangcwele bayo, leyiyawucitfwa ngubo, ikhale kuyo isuka phansi ikhalela kutiphindziselela kubo kodvwa yona ingabaphindziseleli.
8.23: Ngaloko-ke, awu nine beTive, kukuhlakanipha kuNkulunkulu kutsi letintfo tivetwe kini, kute ngato niphendvuke etonweni tenu, futsi ningavumi kutsi lamacembu ebabulali anincobe, lakhelwe kutsi atfole emandla kanye nenzuzo—nekutsi umsebenti, yebo, ngisho nemsebenti wekubhubhisa ute kini, yebo, nenkemba yekwehlulela ngekulunga kwaNkulunkulu loPhakadze iwele kini, kute niwe niphindze nibhujiswe uma niyawuvumela letintfo kutsi tenteke.
8.24: Ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi iyaniyaleta kutsi, ngesikhatsi senitibona letintfo tita emkhatsini wenu nati ngesimo lesibi senu, ngenca yalelicembu leliyimfihlo leliyawuba emkhatsini wenu; noma maye kulo, ngenca yengati yalabo lababulewe; ngoba bakhala baselutfulini bakhalela kutiphindziselela kulo, kanjalo nakulabo labalisungula.
8.25: Ngoba kuyenteka kutsi loyo lolisungulako usuke afuna kucedza inkhululeko yemhlaba wonkhe, tive kanye nemave; futsi lifeza kubhujiswa kwebantfu bonkhe, ngoba lisungulwe ngudeveli, longubabe wawo onkhe emanga; ngisho loyo mcambimanga lowakhohlisa batali betfu bekucala, yebo, yena kanye loyo mcambimanga lowenta umuntfu kutsi abulale kusukela ekucaleni; lowente tinhlitiyo tebantfu taba lukhuni kutsi babulale baphrofethi, babagcobe ngematje, baphindze babacoshe kusukela ekucaleni.
8.26: Ngaloko-ke, mine, Moroni, ngiyaletwe kutsi ngitibhale letintfo kute bubi buyekelwe, nekutsi sikhatsi sifike sekutsi Sathane angabe asaba nemandla etinhlitiyweni tebantfwana bebantfu, kodvwa kute bakholiswe kutsi bente lokuhle njalo-nje, kute bete emtfonjeni wekulunga konkhe baphindze basindziswe.

9.1: Manje mine, Moroni, ngiyachubeka nembhalo wami. Ngako-ke, buka, kwenteka kutsi ngenca yemacembu layimfihlo a-Akhishi kanye nebangani bakhe, buka, ngempela bawuketula umbuso wa-Omeri.
9.2: Noko, iNkhosi yaba nemusa ku Omeri, kanjalo nakumadvodzana kanye nakumadvodzakati akhe labengatange afune kumbhubhisa.
9.3: INkhosi yamcwayisa Omeri ephusheni kutsi esuke eveni; ngaloko-ke Omeri wesuka eveni kanye nemndeni wakhe, wahamba emalanga lamaningi, wefika wendlula ngasegcumeni laShimi, wefika ngasendzaweni lapho emaNefi bekabhujiselwe khona, kusuka lapho waya ngasemphumalanga, wate wefika endzaweni lebeyibitwa ngekutsi yi-Ablomu, ngaselugwini lwelwandle, lapho wemisa lithende lakhe, kanjalo nemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati akhe, nabo bonkhe bendlu yakhe, ngaphandle kwaJarede nemndeni wakhe.
9.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Jarede wagcotjwa waba yinkhosi etikwebantfu, ngesandla senkhohlakalo; waniketa Akhishi indvodzakati yakhe kutsi ibe ngumkakhe.
9.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Akhishi wayifuna imphilo yababetala wakhe; wacela labo labekadze afunge nabo ngesifungo sebasendvulo, futsi bayitfola inhloko yababetala wakhe, ngesikhatsi ahleti esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi, alalela bantfu bakhe.
9.6: Ngoba bese kukukhulu kwandza kwaleti tinhlangano letiyimfihlo naletikhohlakele kangangekutsi bese konakalise tinhlitiyo tebantfu bonkhe; ngako-ke Jarede wabulawa asesihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi, kwatsi Akhishi wabusa esikhundleni sakhe.
9.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Akhishi wacala kuba nemona nendvodzana yakhe, ngako-ke wayivalela ejele, wayondla ngekudla lokuncane noma angayiphi kudla nhlobo yate yafa.
9.8: Manje umnakabo loyo lowafa, (libito lakhe bekunguNimra) wamtfukutselela uyise ngenca yaloko lebekakwentile kumnakabo.
9.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Nimra wabutsela ndzawonye lidlanzana lebantfu, wabaleka waphuma kulelive, wahamba wayohlala na-Omeri.
9.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Akhishi watala lamanye emadvodzana, atizuza tinhlitiyo tebantfu, nanoma bebafungile kuye kwenta tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi ngaleyondlela lebekafisa ngayo.
9.11: Manje bantfu ba-Akhishi bebafuna inzuzo, njengoba na-Akhishi bekafuna emandla; ngaloko-ke, emadvodzana a-Akhishi abaniketa imali, ngaleyondlela badvonsa incenye leningi yebantfu kutsi babalandzele.
9.12: Kwacala kwabakhona imphi emkhatsini wemadvodzana a-Akhishi kanye na-Akhishi, leyadvonsa sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi, yebo, leyaholela ekubhujisweni cishe kwabo bonkhe bantfu bembuso, yebo, ngisho bonkhe, ngaphandle nje kwebantfu labangemashumi lamatsatfu, kanye nalabo labebabaleke nendlu ya-Omeri.
9.13: Ngaloko-ke, Omeri waphindze wabuyiselwa eveni lelilifa lakhe.
9.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Omeri wacala kuba mdzala; noko, eminyakeni yakhe yebudzala watala Emeri; waphindze wamgcoba Emeri kutsi abe yinkhosi kute abuse esikhundleni sakhe.
9.15: Futsi emvakwekutsi sekagcobe Emeri kutsi abe yinkhosi wabona kuthula eveni sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemibili, wabese uyafa, sekabone emalanga lamaningi kakhulu, lebekagcwele lusizi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Emeri wabusa esikhundleni sakhe, wahamba etinyatselweni teyise.
9.16: INkhosi yacala kutsi isisuse sicalekiso eveni, indlu ya-Emeri yaphumelela kakhulu ngaphansi kwembuso wa-Emeri; futsi sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lengemashumi lasitfupha nakubili bese bacine kakhulu, kangangekutsi baceba kakhulu—
9.17: Banetinhlobo tonkhe tetitselo, kanye nalokuyinhlavu, isilika, ilineni lecolisakele, ligolide, isiliva, kanye netintfo letiligugu;
9.18: Ngetulu kwaloko nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinkhomo, tinkhabi, tinkhomati, timvu, tingulube, timbuti, kanjalo nato tonkhe letinye tinhlobo tetilwane lebetilusito kuba kudla kwebantfu.
9.19: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko baba nemahhashi, timbongolo, bekukhona tindlovu nemakhurelomu kanye nemakhumomu; tonkhe lebetilusito kumuntfu, ikakhulukati tindlovu nemakhurelomu kanye nemakhumomu.
9.20: Ngaleyondlela iNkhosi yatitfululela tibusiso tayo kulelive, lebelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave; yayaleta kutsi labo labayawulitfola lelive bayawulitfolela iNkhosi, ngaphandle kwaloko bayawubhujiswa uma sebacocodzele ebubini; ngoba kulabanjalo, itsi iNkhosi: Ngitawukwehlisela intfukutselo yami yonkhe.
9.21: Futsi Emeri wehlulela ngekulunga ngawo onkhe emalanga akhe, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati lamaningi; watala Khoriyanthumu, futsi wamgcoba Khoriyanthumu kutsi abuse esikhundleni sakhe.
9.22: Emvakwekutsi sekagcobe Khoriyanthumu kutsi abuse esikhundleni sakhe waphila iminyaka lemine, wabona kuthula eveni; yebo, wate wabona ngisho neNdvodzana yeKulunga, watfokota waphindze wadvumisa etinsukwini takhe; wafa ngekuthula.
9.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthumu wahamba etinyatselweni teyise, wakha emadolobha lamaningi lamakhulu, wabanika loko lobekukuhle bantfu bakhe etinsukwini takhe tonkhe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi akatange abe nebantfwana wate waba mdzala kakhulu.
9.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umkakhe wafa, aneminyaka lelikhulu nakubili budzala. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthumu watsatsa umfati, ebudzaleni bakhe, incekukati lencane, watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati; ngaloko-ke waphila wate waba neminyaka lelikhulu nemashumi lamane nakubili budzala.
9.25: Futsi kwenteka kutsi watala Khomu, Khomu wabusa esikhundleni sakhe; wabusa iminyaka lengemashumi lamane nemfica, watala Hethi; naye waphindze watala lamanye emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati.
9.26: Bantfu bese baphindze basabalala ebusweni bonkhe belive, kwaphindze kwacala kwaba nebubi lobukhulu ebusweni belive, Hethi waphindze wacala wemukela emacebo layimfihlo asendvulo, kute abulale uyise.
9.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wamketula uyise esihlalweni sebukhosi, ngoba wambulala ngenkemba yakhe lucobo; wabusa esikhundleni sakhe.
9.28: Kwaphindze kwefika baphrofethi kulelive, bashumayela kuphendvuka kubo—kutsi kufanele balungise indlela yeNkhosi ngaphandle kwaloko kuyawuta sicalekiso ebusweni balelive; yebo, nekutsi kuyawuba khona indlala lenkhulu, ngayo bayawubhujiswa uma bangaphendvuki.
9.29: Kodvwa bantfu abawakholwanga emavi ebaphrofethi, kodvwa babacosha babakhiphela ngephandle; labanye babo babafaka emigodzini babashiya khona kute bafe. Futsi kwenteka kutsi batenta tonkhe leti tintfo njengekwemiyaleto yenkhosi, Hethi.
9.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwacala kwaba khona indlala lenkhulu kulelive, labahlala khona bacala kutsi babhubhe ngekushesha lokukhulu ngenca yendlala, ngoba bekute litulu kulelive.
9.31: Kwaphindze kwavela tinyoka letinebutsi ebusweni balelive, tafaka butsi kulabaningi bantfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi imihlambi yabo yacala yatibalekela tinyoka letinebutsi, yaya ngaseveni lelingaseningizimu, lebelibitwa ngemaNefi ngekutsi yiZarahemla.
9.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwaba khona labaningi babo labafa endleleni; noko bekukhona labanye lababalekela eveni lelingaseningizimu.
9.33: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yenta tinyoka kutsi tingabe tisabalandzela, kodvwa tivimbe indlela kute bantfu bangakhoni kwendlula, kute loyo lowetama kwendlula abulawe tinyoka letinebutsi.
9.34: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu balandzela indlela yetilwane, badla tidvumbu talabo lebebawe ngasendleleni, bate batidla tonkhe. Manje ngesikhatsi bantfu sebabona kutsi bese batofa bacala kuphendvuka ebubini babo baphindze bakhala eNkhosini.
9.35: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sebatitfobile ngalokwanele phambi kweNkhosi yayitfumela imvula eveni; bantfu bacala kuhlambuluka, kwacala kwaba khona titselo emaveni langasenyakatfo, kanye nakuwo onkhe emave latungeletile. INkhosi yawakhombisa emandla ayo kubo ekubasindziseni endlaleni.

10.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shezi, lobekawesitukulwane saHethi—ngoba Hethi bekabulewe yindlala, kanye nabo bonkhe bendlu yakhe ngaphandle kwaShezi—ngaloko-ke, Shezi wacala waphindze wakha bantfu labebacishe babulawa konakala nendlala.
10.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shezi wakukhumbula kubhujiswa kwaboyise, wakha umbuso lolungile; ngoba wakukhumbula loko iNkhosi lebeyikwentile ekuletseni Jarede kanye nemnakabo ngesheya kwelwandle, wahamba etindleleni teNkhosi; futsi watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati.
10.3: Futsi indvodzana yakhe lendzala, libito layo lebekunguShezi, yamvukela; noko, Shezi washaywa sandla sesigebengu, ngenca yemcebo wakhe lomningi, lokwaphindze kwaletsa kuthula kuyise.
10.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi uyise wakha emadolobha lamaningi eveni, nebantfu bacala kusabalala eveni lonkhe. Shezi waphila wate waba mdzala kakhulu; watala Riphilakhishi. Wafa, wase Riphilakhishi uyabusa esikhundleni sakhe.
10.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Riphilakhishi akakwentanga loko lebekulungile emehlweni eNkhosi, ngoba yena waba nebafati labaningi kanye netingani, waphindze wabeka loko emahlombe ebantfu lobekumatima kutsi bakwetfwale; yebo, wabatselisa ngemtselo lomatima; ngalomtselo wakha takhiwo letiningi letivulekile.
10.6: Watakhela sihlalo sebukhosi lesihle kakhulu; wakha lamaningi emajele, futsi loyo lobekangafuni kukhokha umtselo bekamfaka ejele; loyo lobekangakhoni kukhokha umtselo naye bekafakwa ejele; wenta kutsi basebente njalo kute bondliwe; futsi loyo lobekakwala kusebenta bekenta kutsi abulawe.
