10.7: Ngaloko-ke wawutfola wonkhe umsebenti wakhe lomuhle, yebo, ngisho neligolide lakhe lelicolisakeli wenta kutsi licengwe ejele; tonkhe tinhlobo temisebenti lemihle wenta kutsi tisetjentwe ejele. Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabahlupha bantfu ngebugwadla kanye nangetinengiso takhe.
10.8: Futsi watsi sekabuse sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka lengemashumi lamane nakubili bantfu bamvukela; kwacala kwaba khona imphi kulelive, kangangekutsi Riphilakhishi wabulawa, nesitukulwane sakhe saphocelelwa kutsi sibaleke kulelive.
10.9: Futsi kwenteka emvakwesikhatsi seminyaka leminingi, Moriyanthoni, (awesitukulwane saRiphilakhishi) wabutsela ndzawonye libutfo lalabacoshwa, wahamba wayawukulwa nebantfu; wawazuza emandla kulamaningi emadolobha; imphi yacala yaba yimbi kakhulu, yadvonsa sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi; futsi wawazuza emandla eveni lonkhe, watibeka waba yinkhosi eveni lonkhe.
10.10: Emvakwekutsi sekatibeke waba yinkhosi wawucekisa umtfwalo ebantfwini, ngaloko wazuza kutsandvwa bantfu, futsi bamgcoba kutsi abe yinkhosi yabo.
10.11: Futsi wenta kulunga kubantfu, kodvwa hhayi kuye ngenca yebugwadla bakhe lobuningi; ngaloko-ke wehlukaniswa neNkhosi.
10.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moriyanthoni wakha emadolobha lamaningi, bantfu banotsa kakhulu ngaphansi kwembuso wakhe, ngenca yetakhiwo, ligolide nesiliva, kukhulisa lokuyinhlavu, imihlambi yetimvu, imihlambi netinkhomo, nangenca yetintfo letitsite lebetibuyiselwe kubo.
10.13: Moriyanthoni waphila wate waba mdzala kakhulu, ngaleso sikhatsi watala Khimi; Khimi wabusa esikhundleni seyise; wabusa iminyaka lesiphohlongo, uyise wafa. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khimi akatange abuse ngekulunga, ngaloko-ke akatange atsandvwe yiNkhosi.
10.14: Umnakabo wamvukela, lokwatsi ngaloko wamfaka ekutfunjweni; wahlala ekutfunjweni tonkhe tinsuku takhe; watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati asekutfunjweni, futsi ebudzaleni bakhe watala Levi; wabese uyafa.
10.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Levi wasebenta asekutfunjweni emvakwekufa kweyise, sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lengemashumi lamane nakubili. Walwa nenkhosi yelive, lokwatsi ngako watitfolela umbuso.
10.16: Emvakwekutsi sekatitfolele umbuso wenta loko lobekulungile emehlweni eNkhosi; bantfu baphumelela kulelive; waphila wate waba mdzala impela, watala emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati; futsi ngetulu kwaloko watala Khoromu, lamgcoba waba yinkhosi esikhundleni sakhe.
10.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoromu wenta loko lobekukuhle emehlweni eNkhosi tonkhe tinsuku takhe; watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati lamaningi; emvakwekutsi sekabone emalanga lamaningi wafa, njengabo bonkhe bantfu; futsi Khishi wabusa esikhundleni sakhe.
10.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khishi wafa naye ngalokunjalo, kwatsi Libi wabusa esikhundleni sakhe.
10.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Libi naye wenta loko lobekukuhle emehlweni eNkhosi. Ngetinsuku taLibi tinyoka letinebutsi tabulawa. Ngaloko-ke bahamba baya eveni lelingaseningizimu, kuyotingela kudla kwebantfu baseveni, ngoba live belimbonywe tilwane tasehlatsini. Libi naye lucobo waba ngumtingeli lomkhulu.
10.20: Bakha lidolobha lelikhulu esihlengeni lesincane selive, edvute nendzawo lapho lwandle belwehlukana khona nelive.
10.21: Balilondvolota live lelingaseningizimu kutsi libe lihlane, kute batfole tinyamatane. Futsi buso bonkhe belive lebelingasenyakatfo bebumbonywe bantfu labebahlala khona.
10.22: Bebasebenta kakhulu, bebatsenga baphindze batsengise bese bayatsengiselana lomunye nalomunye, kute batfole inzuzo.
10.23: Bebasebenta ngalo lonkhe luhlobo lwensimbi lesalitje, benta ligolide, isiliva, insimbi, litfusi, kanye nalo lonkhe luhlobo lwetinsimbi; bebatimba emhlabatsini; ngaloko-ke, benta tindvundvuma letinkhulu temhlabatsi kute batfole insimbi lesalitje, yeligolide, isiliva, insimbi, kanye neyelitfusi. Futsi bebenta tonkhe tinhlobo temisebenti lemihle.
10.24: Baba nesilika, kanye nelineni lecolisakele lelukiwe; futsi bebenta tonkhe tinhlobo tendvwangu, kute batigcokise.
10.25: Futsi bebenta tonkhe tinhlobo tetintfo tekusebenta kute balime umhlabatsi, kute balime baphindze bahlanyele, kute bavune baphindze bahlakule, futsi kanjalo nekutsi babhule.
10.26: Bebenta tonkhe tinhlobo tetintfo tekusebenta labasebentisa ngato tilwane tabo.
10.27: Bebenta tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali temphi. Futsi bebenta tonkhe tinhlobo temsebenti webuciko lobukhulu.
10.28: Bebangakate nanini bantfu babusiswe kangaka njengabo, baphumelele kakhulu ngesandla seNkhosi. Futsi bebaseveni lebelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe emave, ngoba iNkhosi beyikukhulumile loko.
10.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Libi waphila iminyaka leminingi, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati; ngetulu kwaloko watala Heyathumu.
10.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Heyathumu wabusa esikhundleni seyise. Ngesikhatsi Heyathumu sekabuse iminyaka lengemashumi lamabili nakune, buka, umbuso watsatfwa kuye. Wasebenta iminyaka leminingi asekutfunjweni, yebo, ngisho nangawo onkhe emalanga akhe lebekasele.
10.31: Watala Hethi, Hethi waphila ekutfunjweni onkhe emalanga akhe. Hethi watala Aroni, na-Aroni wahlala ekutfunjweni onkhe emalanga akhe; yena watala Amnigada, Amnigada naye wahlala ekutfunjweni onkhe emalanga akhe; yena wabese utala Khoriyanthumu, naKhoriyanthumu wahlala ekutfunjweni onkhe emalanga akhe; futsi yena watala Khomu.
10.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khomu wadvonsa incenye yembuso. Wabusa etikwencenye yembuso iminyaka lengemashumi lamane nakubili; wahamba wayawukulwa nenkhosi, Amgide, balwa sikhatsi lesiyiminyaka leminingi, lokwatsi ngaleso sikhatsi Khomu wamncoba Amgidi, wazuza emandla embusweni lobewusele.
10.33: Ngetinsuku taKhomu kwacala kwaba khona tigebengu kulelive; tachubeka ngemacebo akadzeni, tifungisa tifungo ngendlela yebasendvulo, tiphindze tifuna kubhubhisa umbuso.
10.34: Manje Khomu walwa nabo kakhulu; noko, akatange abehlule.

11.1: Futsi etinsukwini taKhom kweta baphrofethi labaningi, baphrofetha ngekubhujiswa kwalabo bantfu labanemandla ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke, babuyele eNkhosini, bayekele kubulala kanye nebubi babo.
11.2: Futsi kwenteka kutsi baphrofethi balahlwa bantfu, babalekela kuKhomu kute bativikele, ngoba bantfu bebafuna kubabulala.
11.3: Baphrofetha kuKhomu tintfo letiningi, wababusisa kuto tonkhe tinsuku takhe lebesetisele.
11.4: Futsi waphila wate waba mdzala kakhulu, watala Shibilomu, wase Shibilomu ubusa esikhundleni sakhe. UmnakaboShibilomu wamvukela, kwase kucala kuba khona imphi lenkhulu kakhulu eveni lonkhe.
11.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakaboShibilomu wenta kutsi bonkhe labaphrofethi labebaphrofethe ngekubhujiswa kwebantfu babulawe.
11.6: Kwaba khona lusizi lolukhulu eveni lonkhe, ngoba bebafakaze kutsi sicalekiso lesikhulu sitawuta kulelive, kanjalo nakubantfu, nekutsi kutawuba khona kubhujiswa lokukhulu emkhatsini wabo, lobekungakate kube khona nanini emhlabeni, futsi ematsambo abo abetawuba njengetindvundvuma temhlabatsi eveni ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ebubini babo.
11.7: Kodvwa abalilalelanga livi leNkhosi, ngenca yemacembu abo lamabi; ngaloko-ke kwacala kwaba khona timphi kanye nemibango eveni lonkhe, kanjalo nendlala, netifo letingumashayabhuce, kangangekutsi kwaba khona kubhujiswa lokukhulu, lobekungakate kwatiwa eveni; konkhe loku kwenteka ngetinsuku taShibilomu.
11.8: Bantfu bacala kuphendvuka ebubini babo; futsi njengoba benta njalo iNkhosi yaba nesihawu kubo.
11.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shibilomu wabulawa, Sethi watfunjwa, wahlala ekutfunjweni tonkhe tinsuku takhe.
11.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Aha, indvodzana yakhe, yawutsatsa umbuso, yabusa etikwebantfu tinsuku tayo tonkhe. Yenta lonkhe luhlobo lwebubi etinsukwini tayo, lokwatsi ngako yadala kucitseka kwengati leningi; Futsi taba mbalwa tinsuku tayo.
11.11: Futsi Ethemu, awesitukulwane saAha, wawutsatsa umbuso; naye ngalokunjalo wenta loko lokwakukubi etinsukwini takhe.
11.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi etinsukwini ta-Ethemu, kweta baphrofethi labaningi, baphindze baphrofetha kubantfu; yebo, baphrofetha kutsi iNkhosi yayitawubabhubhisa baphele nya emhlabeni ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke ebubini babo.
11.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu batenta lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, bangafuni kuwalalela emavi abo; baphrofethi balila baphindze bakhwesha emkhatsini wabo.
11.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Ethemu wehlulela ngebubi tonkhe tinsuku takhe, watala Moron. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moron wabusa esikhundleni sakhe; Moron wenta loko bekukubi phambi kweNkhosi.
11.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwacubuka kuvukelana emkhatsini webantfu, ngenca yalelo cembu leliyimfihlo lebelisungulwe kutsi kutfolakale emandla kanye nenzuzo; futsi kwavela indvodza lebeyinemandla ekwenteni bubi emkhatsini wabo, yalwa naMoron, lapho yaketula khona incenye yembuso; yayigcina leyo ncenye yembuso iminyaka leminingi.
11.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Moron wayiketula, waphindze wawutsatsa umbuso.
11.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwavela lenye indvodza lebeyinemandla, lebeyiyesitukulwane semnakaboJarede.
11.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi yamketula Moron yawutsatsa umbuso; ngako-ke, Moron wahlala ekutfunjweni tonkhe tinsuku takhe lebesetisele; watala Khoriyantho.
11.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyantho wahlala ekutfunjweni tonkhe tinsuku takhe.
11.20: Etinsukwini taKhoriyantho kweta baphrofethi labaningi, baphrofetha ngetintfo letinkhulu naletimangalisako, bashumayela kuphendvuka kubantfu, nekutsi ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yayitawukwehlisela kwehlulela ngalokumelene nabo bate babhujiswe nya.
11.21: Nekutsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu yayitawutfumela noma iletse labanye bantfu kutsi balitsatse lelive, ngemandla ayo, ngaleyondlela leyaletsa ngayo boyise.
11.22: Futsi bawalahla onkhe emavi ebaphrofethi, ngenca yenhlangano yabo leyimfihlo kanye netinengiso tabo letimbi.
11.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyantho watala Etheri, wabese uyafa, ahleli ekutfunjweni tonkhe tinsuku takhe.

12.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi tinsuku ta-Etheri betisetinsukwini taKhoriyanthuma; Khoriyanthuma bekayinkhosi kulo lonkhe live.
12.2: Futsi Etheri bekangumphrofethi weNkhosi; ngaloko-ke Etheri wafika ngemalanga aKhoriyanthuma, wacala kuphrofetha kubantfu, ngoba bekangakwati kutibamba ngenca yaMoya weNkhosi lobewukuye.
12.3: Ngoba washumayela kusukela ekuseni, kwate kwaba sekushoneni kwelilanga, ancusa bantfu kutsi bakholwe kuNkulunkulu kutsi baphendvuke hleze babhujiswe, atsi kubo ngelukholo tonkhe tintfo tiyagcwaliseka—
12.4: Ngaloko-ke, loyo lokholwa kuNkulunkulu ngempela angaba nelitsemba lendzawo lencono, yebo, indzawo esandleni sangesekudla saNkulunkulu, lelo tsemba lelivela ngelukholo, lelenta bantfu kutsi basime, lokuyobenta babambelele baphindze bacine, bente imisebenti lemihle njalo, baholelwa ekudvumiseni Nkulunkulu.
12.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Etheri waphrofetha tintfo letinkhulu naletimangalisako kubantfu, lebebangatikholwa, ngenca yekutsi bebangakatiboni.
12.6: Manje, mine, Moroni, ngitawukhuluma ngalokutsite mayelana naletintfo; ngitawukhombisa umhlaba kutsi lukholo tintfo letetsenjwako kodvwa letingabonakali; ngaloko-ke, ungaphikisi ngoba ungaboni, ngoba awutfoli bufakazi kute kube semvakwekulingwa ngelukholo lwakho.
12.7: Ngoba bekungenca yelukholo kutsi Khristu watibonakalisa kubobabe betfu, emvakwekutsi sekavukile ekufeni; akatibonakalisanga kubo kwate kwaba semvakwekutsi babe nelukholo kuye; ngaloko-ke, kufanele kutsi labanye babe nelukholo kuye, ngoba akatibonakalisi emhlabeni.
12.8: Kodvwa ngenca yelukholo lwebantfu sewutibonakalisile emhlabeni, wadvumisa ligama laBabe, futsi walungisa indlela kute ngayo labanye babe ngulabahlanganyela esiphiweni sasezulwini, kute betsembele kuleto tintfo labangakatiboni.
12.9: Ngaloko-ke, nani ningaba nelitsemba, futsi nibe ngulabahlanganyela kulesipho, uma nje ningaba nelukholo.
12.10: Buka bekungenca yelukholo kutsi labo basendvulo babitwa ngekweluhlelo lolungcwele lwaNkulunkulu.
12.11: Ngaloko-ke, umtsetfo waMosi waniketwa ngelukholo. Kodvwa ngesipho sendvodzana yakhe Nkulunkulu ulungise indlela lenhle kakhulu; futsi kungenca yelukholo kutsi ugcwalisekile.
12.12: Ngoba uma lungekho lukholo emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu Nkulunkulu angeke akwati kwenta timangaliso emkhatsini wabo; ngaloko-ke, akatibonakalisanga kwate kwaba semvakwelukholo lwabo.
12.13: Buka, bekulukholo lwa-Alima kanye na-Amulekhi lolwenta kutsi lijele liwele phansi.
12.14: Buka, bekulukholo lwaNefi kanye naLehi lolwenta lushintjo kumaLamani, kutsi abhajatiswe ngemlilo kanye nangaMoya loNgcwele.
12.15: Buka, bekulukholo lwa-Amoni kanye nabomnakabo lolwenta simangaliso lesikhulu emkhatsini wemaLamani.
12.16: Yebo, futsi nabo bonkhe labo labenta timangaliso batenta ngelukholo, ngisho nalabo labebangaphambili kwaKhristu kanjalo nalabo labebangemuva kwakhe.
12.17: Bekungelukholo kutsi bafundzi labatsatfu batfole setsembiso sekutsi bona bebangeke bakuve kufa; futsi abatange basitfole lesetsembiso kwate kwaba semvakwelukholo lwabo.
12.18: Akutange nangasiphi sikhatsi kube khona namunye lowenta timangaliso kute kube semvakwelukholo lwabo; ngaloko-ke bacale bakholwa kuyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
12.19: Bekukhona labaningi labebanelukholo lobelucine kakhulu, ngisho nangaphambi kwekutsi Khristu afike, labebangeke bavinjelwe kutsi babone ngekhatsi kwesihenco, kodvwa ngempela babona ngemehlo abo tintfo lebebatibone ngemehlo elukholo, futsi bajabula.
12.20: Buka, sesibonile kulombhalo kutsi lomunye walaba bekungumnakabo Jarede; ngoba belulukhulu kakhulu lukholo lwakhe kuNkulunkulu, ngendlela yekutsi ngesikhatsi Nkulunkulu elula umuno wakhe akakwatanga kuwufihla ekutseni ubonwe ngumnakabo Jarede, ngenca yelivi lakhe lebekalikhulume kuye, livi lebekalitfole ngelukholo.
12.21: Emvakwekutsi umnakabo Jarede sekabone umunwe weNkhosi, ngenca yaleso setsembiso umnakabo Jarede lebekasitfole ngelukholo, iNkhosi ayikwatanga kutsi igodle noma ngabe yini kutsi ayibone; ngaloko-ke yamkhombisa tonkhe tintfo, ngoba bekangeke agcinwe angephandle kwesihenco.
12.22: Futsi kungenca yelukholo kutsi bobabe batfole setsembiso sekutsi letintfo kumele tite kumnakabo ngebeTive; ngako-ke iNkhosi ingiyaletile, yebo, ngisho Jesu Khristu.
12.23: Futsi ngatsi kuye: Nkhosi, beTive batawuhlekisa ngaleti tintfo, ngenca yebutsakatsaka betfu ekubhaleni; ngoba iNkhosi isente saba nemandla evini ngenca yelukholo, kodvwa awusentanga kutsi sibe nemandla ekubhaleni; ngoba wenta bonkhe labantfu kutsi bakhulume lokuningi, ngenca yaMoya loNgcwele lobanikete wona.
12.24: Futsi usente kutsi sibhale lokuncane kuphela, ngenca yebumatima bekubhala ngetandla tetfu. Buka awusentanga saba nemandla ekubhaleni njengemnakabo Jarede, ngoba umente kutsi letintfo latibhala tibe nemandla njengawe, ekutseni tiphoca umuntfu kutsi atifundze.
12.25: Uphindze wenta emavi etfu aba nemandla aphindze aba makhulu, ngendlela yekutsi asikwati kuwabhala; ngako-ke, ngesikhatsi sibhala siyabubona butsakatsaka betfu, siyakhubeka ngenca yekubekeka kwemagama etfu; futsi ngiyesaba hleze beTive bahlekise ngemavi etfu.
12.26: Ngesikhatsi sengikushito loku, iNkhosi yakhuluma kimi yatsi: Tiwula tiyahlekisa, kodvwa tiyawukhala; futsi umusa wami ubenele labamnene, kutsi bangasitakali ngebutsakatsaka benu;
12.27: Uma bantfu beta kimi ngitawubakhombisa butsakatsaka babo. Nginika bantfu butsakatsaka kute batfobeke; futsi umusa wami ubenele bonkhe bantfu labatitfobako phambi kwami; ngoba uma batitfoba phambi kwami, futsi banelukholo kimi, uma kunjalo ngitawukwenta tintfo letibutsakatsaka tibe nemandla kubo.
12.28: Buka, ngitawubakhombisa beTive butsakatsaka babo, futsi ngitawubakhombisa kutsi lukholo, litsemba kanye nelutsandvo kubaletsa kimi—lengingumtfombo wako konkhe kulunga.
12.29: Mine, Moroni, sengiwevile lamavi, ngadvudvuteka, ngatsi: Awu Nkhosi, kulunga kwakho kutawukwentiwa, ngoba ngiyati kutsi wena usebenta kubantfwana bebantfu ngekwelukholo lwabo;
12.30: Ngoba umnakabo Jarede watsi entsabeni iZerini, Suka—yesuka. Kube bekete lukholo beyingeke isuke; ngaloko-ke wena usebenta emvakwekutsi bantfu sebabe nelukholo.
12.31: Ngoba watibonakalisa ngaleyondlela kubafundzi bakho; ngoba emvakwekutsi sebabe nelukholo, futsi bakhuluma ngelibito lakho, watibonakalisa kubo ngemandla lamakhulu.
12.32: Ngetulu kwaloko ngiyakhumbula kutsi watsi ulungisele umuntfu indlu, yebo, ngisho emkhatsini wetindlu letiningi taBabe wakho, lapho umuntfu angaba nelitsemba lelikhulu kakhulu; ngaloko-ke umuntfu kufanele etsembe, noma angeke alitfole lifa kuleyondzawo loyilungisile.
12.33: Kantsi futsi, ngiyakhumbula ushito kutsi ulitsandzile live, wate wabeka phansi imphilo yakho ngenca yelive, kute uyitsatse uphindze ulungiselele bantfwana bebantfu indzawo.
12.34: Manje ngiyati kutsi lolutsandvo lonalo ngebantfwana bebantfu lutsandvo, ngaloko-ke, ngaphandle kwekutsi bantfu babe nelutsandvo angeke bayitfole leyondzawo loyilungisile etindlini taBabe wakho.
12.35: Ngaloko-ke, ngiyati ngenca yalentfo loyishito, kutsi uma beTive bete lutsandvo, ngenca yebutsakatsaka betfu, kutsi utawubalinga, uphindze utsatse emathalenta abo, yebo, ngisho naloko lesebakutfolile, bese unika labo labayawuba nalokuningi.
12.36: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngathandaza eNkhosini kutsi ibe nemusa kubeTive, kute babe nelutsandvo.
12.37: Futsi kwenteka kutsi iNkhosi yatsi kimi: Uma bete lutsandvo akusho lutfo loko kuwe, wena wetsembekile; ngaloko-ke, tingubo takho tiyawuhlantwa. Ngenca yekutsi ububonile butsakatsaka bakho uyawuciniswa, kangangoba utawuhlala phansi endzaweni lengiyilungisile etindlini letiningi taBabe.
12.38: Manje mine, Moroni, sengiyavalelisa kubeTive, yebo, futsi kanjalo nakubomnaketfu lengibatsandzako, site sihlangane embikwesihlalo sekwehlulela saKhristu, lapho bonkhe bantfu bayawukwati kutsi tingubo tami atikangcoli ngengati yenu.
12.39: Futsi ngaleso sikhatsi niyawukwati kutsi ngimbonile Jesu, nekutsi ukhulumile nami buso nebuso, nekutsi wangitjela ngekutfobeka, njengemuntfu akhuluma nalomunye ngelulwimi lwami, mayelana naletintfo.
12.40: Futsi ngibhale lokumbalwa kuphela, ngenca yebutsakatsaka bami ekubhaleni.
12.41: Manje, ngifuna kunincusa kutsi nimfune loJesu baphrofethi kanye nebaphostoli lababhale ngaye, kute umusa waNkulunkulu Babe, kanjalo neNkhosi Jesu Khristu, kanye naMoya loNgcwele, lofakaza ngabo, ube kini futsi uhlale kini ingunaphakadze. Amen.

13.1: Manje mine Moroni, sengiyachubeka nekucedzela umbhalo wami mayelana nekubhujiswa kwalabo bantfu lebengibhala ngabo.
13.2: Ngoba buka, bawalahla onkhe emavi a-Etheri; ngoba ngempela wabatjela ngato tonkhe tintfo, kusukela ekucaleni kwemuntfu; nekutsi emvakwekutsi emanti sekehlile eveni laba live lelikhetsekile ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emave, live lelikhetsiwe leNkhosi; ngaloko-ke iNkhosi ifuna kutsi bonkhe bantfu bayisebentele bahlale kulo;
13.3: Nekutsi bekuyindzawo yeJerusalema leNsha, leyokwehlela phansi ivela ezulwini, kanye nendzawo lengcwele yeNkhosi.
13.4: Buka, Etheri watibona tinsuku taKhristu, wakhuluma mayelana neJerusalema leNsha kulelive.
13.5: Waphindze wakhuluma mayelana nendlu yaka-Israyeli, kanye neJerusalema lapho Lehi ayawuphuma khona—kutsi emvakwekutsi seyibhujisiwe iyawuphindze yakhiwe, lidolobha lelingcwele eNkhosini; ngaloko-ke, angeke ibe yiJerusalema lensha ngoba beyikhona esikhatsini sakadzeni; kodvwa iyawuphindze yakhiwe, ibe lidolobha lelingcwele leNkhosi; futsi iyawukwakhiwa endlini yaka-Israyeli—
13.6: Nekutsi iJerusalema leNsha kufanele yakhiwe kulelive, yakhelwe insali yentalelwane yaJosefa, lobekunemfanekiso ngalokuphatselene naletintfo.
13.7: Ngoba njengoba Josefa aletsa uyise eveni laseGibhithe, wafela khona; ngaloko-ke, iNkhosi yayikhipha insali yentalelwane yaJosefa eveni laseJerusalema, kute ibe nemusa kuyo intalelwane yaJosefa kute ingabhubhi, njengoba yaba nemusa kuyise waJosefa kutsi angabhubhi.
13.8: Ngaloko-ke, insali yendlu yaJosefa iyawukwakhiwa kulelive, futsi liyakuba live lelilifa layo; iyawukwakhela iNkhosi lidolobha lelingcwele, njengeJerusalema lendzala; futsi angeke bahlanganiswe nalabanye nanini, kute kufike siphetfo lapho umhlaba utawukwendlula.
13.9: Kuyawuba khona lizulu lelisha kanye nemhlaba lomusha, kuyawuba njengekwakadzeni ngaphandle kwekutsi kwakadzeni kwendlulile, tonkhe tintfo setinsha.
13.10: Emvakwaloko kuta iJerusalema leNsha, futsi babusisiwe labahlala kuyo, ngoba ngibo labo tingubo tabo letimhlophe ngenca yengati yeMvana; futsi ngibo labo lababalwa nensali yentalelwane yaJosefa, labebabendlu yaka-Israyeli.
13.11: Emvakwaloko kuta iJerusalema yakadzeni; nalabahlala kuyo, babusisiwe, ngoba bahlantwe engatini yeMvana; futsi ngibo labo labebahlakatiwe baphindze bagcogcwa babuyiswa emagumbini lamane emhlaba, kanye nasemaveni lasenyakatfo, futsi babahlanganyeli ekugcwalisekeni kwesivumelwano Nkulunkulu lasenta neyise, Abrahama.
13.12: Futsi uma letintfo setenteka, tigcwalisa umbhalo longcwele lotsi, ngibo labo labebabekucala, labayawukuba bekugcina; futsi ngibo labo labebabekugcina, labayawukuba bekucala.
13.13: Futsi besengitawubhala lokuningi, kodvwa ngalelwe, kodvwa betitinkhulu tiphindze timangalisa tiphrofetho ta-Etheri; kodvwa bamtsatsa njengentfo lengenalutfo, bamcosha; watifihla emgodzini welidvwala emini, kwatsi ebusuku waphuma wabuka letintfo lebetitawukwenteka kubantfu.
13.14: Ngesikhatsi ahleli emgodzini welidvwala wacedzela lobekusele kwalombhalo, abika kubhujiswa lobekwehlela bantfu, ebusuku.
13.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngawo lowo mnyaka lacoshwa ngawo emkhatsini webantfu kwacala kwaba khona imphi lemkhulu emkhatsini webantfu, ngoba baba baningi labeta ngaphambili, lokwakubantfu labanemandla, bafuna kubulala Khoriyanthuma ngemacebo abo ebubi layimfihlo, lesekukhulunywe ngawo.
13.16: Manje Khoriyanthuma, asatifundzisile, ngabo bonkhe buciko bemphi kanye nangenkholhiso yemhlaba, ngaloko-ke walwa nabo labo labebafuna kumbulala.
13.17: Kodvwa akaphendvukanga, kanjalo nemadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati akhe lamahle; kanjalo nemadvodzana nemadvodzakati lamahle aKohori; kanjalo nemadvodzana nemadvodzakati aKorihori, kwephetsa, akutange kube khona namunye wemadvodzana nemadvodzakati lamahle kuwo wonkhe umhlaba lowaphendvuka etonweni takhe.
13.18: Ngaloko-ke, kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wekucala Etheri ahlala emgodzini welidvwala, kwaba khona labaningi bantfu lababulawa ngenkemba yalawo macembu layimfihlo, labelwa naKhoyiyanthuma kute atfole umbuso.
13.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emadvodzana aKhoriyanthuma alwa kakhulu aphindze opha kakhulu.
13.20: Ngemnyaka wesibili livi leNkhosi lefika kuEtheri, litsi akahambe ayawuphrofetha kuKhoriyanthuma kutsi, uma angaphendvuka, kanye nabo bonkhe bendlu yakhe, iNkhosi yayitawumnika umbuso wakhe futsi ibasindzise bantfu—
13.21: Ngaphandle kwaloko bayawubhujiswa, kanye nabo bonkhe bendlu yakhe ngaphandle kwakhe. Futsi nguye kuphela lobekatawuphila kute abone kugcwaliseka kwaleto tiphrofetho letakhulunywa mayelana nalabanye bantfu labebatawutfola live libe lifa labo; nekutsi Khoriyanthuma bekatawungcwatjwa ngibo; futsi wonkhe umuntfu uyawubhujiswa ngaphandle kwaKhoriyanthuma.
13.22: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma akaphendvukanga, nendlu yakhe, kanjalo nebantfu; netimphi atiphelanga; futsi bafuna nekumbulala Etheri, kodvwa wababalekela wayewubhaca emgodzini welidvwala.
13.23: Futsi kwenteka kutsi kwavela Sharedi, naye ngalokunjalo walwa naKhoriyanthuma; wamehlula, kangangekutsi ngemnyaka wesitsatfu wamyisa ekutfunjweni.
13.24: Emadvodzana aKhoriyanthuma, ngemnyaka wesine, amehlula Sharedi, aphindze awubuyisela umbuso kuyise.
13.25: Manje kwacala kwaba khona imphi eveni lonkhe, wonkhe muntfu nelicembu lakhe alwela loko bekakufuna.
13.26: Futsi bekukhona tigebengu, kwephetsa, tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi kulo lonkhe live.
13.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wamtfukutselela kakhulu Sharedi, wahamba nemabutfo akhe wayawukulwa naye; bahlangana ngentfukutselo lenkhulu, bahlangana esigodzini saseGilgali; lemphi yaba matima kakhulu.
13.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Sharedi walwa naye sikhatsi lesingangetinsuku letintsatfu. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wamehlula, wamcosha wate wefika ematsafeni aseHeshiloni.
13.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Sharedi waphindze walwa naye kulawo matsafa; buka, wamehlula Khoritanthuma, wamphocelela kutsi abaleke abuyele emuva esigodzini saseGilgali
13.30: Khoriyanthuma waphindze walwa naSharedi esigodzini saseGilgali, lapho ehlula khona Sharedi futsi wambulala.
13.31: Sharedi walimata Khoriyanthuma etsangeni lakhe, kangangekutsi akatange abuyele kuyawukulwa sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemibili, ngaleso sikhatsi bonkhe bantfu eveni bebacitsa ingati, futsi bekute namunye lobekangabavimba.

14.1: Manje kwacala kwaba khona sicalekiso lesikhulu kulo lonkhe live ngenca yebubi bebantfu, ngendlela yekutsi, uma umuntfu abeka lithulusi lakhe noma inkemba yakhe eshelufini lakhe, noma endzaweni lapho abetawuligcina khona, buka, ngakusasa, bekangeke asalitfola, sasisikhulu kakhulu sicalekiso eveni.
14.2: Ngaloko-ke wonkhe muntfu wanamatsela kuloko lobekukwakhe, ngetandla takhe, futsi bekangaboleki noma abolekise; wonkhe umuntfu bekagcina umphini wenkemba yakhe esandleni sangesekudla, kute avikele lokungekwakhe nemphilo yakhe neyebafati kanye kanye neyebantfwana bakhe.
14.3: Manje, emvakweminyaka lemibili, emvakwekufa kwaSharedi, buka, kwavela umnakaboSharedi naye walwa naKhoriyanthuma, lapho Khoriyanthuma amehlula khona wamcosha wate wayomfaka ehlane lase-Akhishi.
14.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umnakaboSharedi walwa naye ehlane lase-Akhishi; imphi yaba matima kakhulu, netinkhulungwane letiningi tafa ngenkemba.
14.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wavimba ehlane; umnakaboSharedi waphuma ehlane ebusuku, wabulala incenye yelibutfo laKhoriyanthuma, ngesikhatsi badzakiwe.
14.6: Weta eveni laMoron, watibeka esihlalweni sebukhosi saKhoriyanthuma.
14.7: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wahlala nelibutfo lakhe ehlane sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemibili, lapho atfola khona emandla lamakhulu ebutfweni lakhe.
14.8: Manje umnakaboSharedi, libito lakhe bekunguGileyadi, naye ngalokunjalo watfola emandla lamakhulu ebutfweni lakhe, ngenca yemacembu layimfihlo.
14.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi umphristi wakhe lomkhulu wambulala ngesikhatsi ahleti esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi.
14.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi munye wemacembu layimfihlo wambulalela endleleni lesekusitsekeni, watitsatsela umbuso, libito lakhe bekunguLibi; futsi Libi bekayindvodza lendze kakhulu, ngetulu kwawo onkhe emadvodza emkhatsini wabo bonkhe bantfu.
14.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngemnyaka wekucala waLibi, Khoriyanthuma weta eveni laMoron, walwa naLibi
14.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi walwa naLibi, lapho Libi wamshaya emkhonweni kangangoba walimala; noko, libutfo laKhoriyanthuma lamhlasela Libi, wabalekela eminceleni ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
14.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wamlandzela, Libi walwa naye khona ngaselugwini lwelwandle.
14.14: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Libi walishaya libutfo laKhoriyanthuma, kangangoba babalekela ehlane lase-Akhishi.
14.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Libi wamlandzela wate wefika ematsafeni ase-Agoshi. Khoriyanthuma besekatsetse bonkhe bantfu wabaleka nabo ngesikhatsi abalekela Libi kuleyoncenye yelive lapho bekabalekele khona,
14.16: Futsi ngesikhatsi asafike ematsafeni ase-Agoshi walwa naLibi, wamshaya wate wafa; noko, umnakaboLibi wabuya watawukulwa naKhoriyanthuma esikhundleni sakhe, imphi yaba matima kakhulu, lapho Khoriyanthuma waphindze wabalekela libutfo lemnakaboLibi.
14.17: Manje libito lemnakaboLibi bekunguShizi. Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shizi wacosha Khoriyanthuma, wabhubhisa emadolobha lamaningi, wabulala besifazane kanye nebantfwana, washisa nemadolobha.
14.18: Futsi kwesatjwa kwaShizi kwagcwala live lonkhe; yebo, kukhala kwagcwala live lonkhe—Ngubani longema phambi kwelibutfo laShizi na? Bukani, uyalibhubhisa lelive phambi kwakhe!
14.19: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu bacala kubutsana ndzawonye ngemabutfo, eveni lonkhe.
14.20: Futsi behlukana; incenye yabo yabalekela ebutfweni laShizi, kwatsi lenye incenye yabo yabalekela ebutfweni laKhoriyanthuma.
14.21: Beseyibe yinkhulu yaphindze yadvonsa imphi, futsi bese sibesidze kakhulu nesehlakalo sekucitseka kwengati kanye nekubulawa kwebantfu labaningi, kangangekutsi lonkhe live beselimbonywe tidvumbu talabafile.
14.22: Futsi imphi yaphangisa yaphindze yashesha kakhulu kangangekutsi kwababete namunye lowasala kutsi angcwabe labafile, kodvwa besuka ekucitseni ingati baya kulokunye kucitsa ingati, bashiya tidvumbu temadvodza, besifazane kanye nebantfwana tisabalele eveni, kutsi tibe kudla kwetimphetfu tenyama
14.23: Liphunga lato lagcwala live, ngisho kulo lonkhe live; ngaloko-ke bantfu bakhatsateka imini nebusuku, ngenca yeliphunga lato.
14.24: Noko, Shizi akayekelanga kumcosha Khoriyanthuma, ngoba bekafungile kutiphindziselela kuKhoriyanthuma ngengati yemnakabo, lobekabulewe, kanye nasevini leNkhosi leleta ku-Etheri kutsi Khoriyanthuma angeke afe ngenkemba.
14.25: Ngako-ke siyabona kutsi iNkhosi yabahambela ngentfukutselo yayo lephelele, futsi bubi kanye netinengiso tabo bese kuyilungisile indlela yekubhujiswa kwabo lokungapheli.
14.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shizi wamcosha Khoriyanthuma waya ngasemphumalanga, eminceleni ngaselugwini lwelwandle, lapho wefike walwa naShizi sikhatsi lesingangetinsuku letintsatfu.
14.27: Kwaba kubi kakhulu kubhujiswa emabutfweni aShizi kangangekutsi bantfu bacala kwesaba, bacala kuwabalekela emabutfo aKhoriyanthuma; babalekela eveni laseKorihori, babulala embikwabo labebahlala khona, bonkhe labo labebangafuni kuhlangana nabo.
14.28: Babese bemisa emathende abo esigodzini saseKorihori; Khoriyanthuma yena wamisa akhe emathende esigodzini saseShuri. Manje sigodzi saseShuri besidvutane neligcuma iKominori; ngaloko-ke, Khoriyanthuma wabutsela ndzawonye emabutfo akhe egcumeni iKominori, washayela emabutfo aShizi licilongo kuwabita kutsi aphume batawukulwa.
14.29: Futsi kwenteka kutsi beta, kodvwa baphindze bacoshwa babuyiselwa emuva; babuya kwesibili, baphindze bacoshwa babuyiselwa emuva kwesibili. Futsi kwenteka kutsi beta kwesitsatfu, lapho imphi yaba matima kakhulu.
14.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Shizi washaya Khoriyanthuma kangangekutsi wamlimata kakhulu; Khoriyanthuma alahlekelwe yingati yakhe, waculeka, watsatfwa shengatsi ufile
14.31: Manje kulahlekelwa ngemadvodza, besifazane kanye nebantfwana etinhlangotsini totimbili kwaba kukhulu kakhulu kangangekutsi Shizi wayaleta bantfu bakhe kutsi bangasawacoshi emabutfo aKhoriyanthuma; ngaloko-ke, babuyela enkanjini yabo.

15.1: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Khoriyanthuma asaluleme emancebeni akhe, wacala wawakhumbula emavi Etheri labekawakhulume kuye.
15.2: Wabona kutsi besekuvele kubulewe ngenkembe cishe tigidzi letimbili tebantfu bakhe, wacala waba nelusizi enhlitiyweni yakhe; yebo besekubulewe tigidzi letimbili temadvodza lanemandla, kanjalo nebafati babo kanye nebantfwana babo.
15.3: Wacala kuphendvuka ebubini lebekabentile; wacala wawakhumbula lawo mavi labekakhulunywe ngemlomo wabo bonkhe baphrofethi, futsi wabona kutsi besekagcwaliseka kute kube manje, onkhe ngisho nalokuncane kanganani, futsi umphefumulo wakhe wakhala wala kudvudvuteka.
15.4: Futsi kwenteka kutsi wabhalela Shizi incwadzi, amcela kutsi asindzise bantfu, nekutsi bekatawunikela umbuso kuye ngenca yetimphilo tebantfu.
15.5: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Shizi asayitfolile lencwadzi yakhe wabhalela Khoriyanthuma incwadzi, watsi uma atawutinikela yena, kute ambulale ngenkemba yakhe lucobo, bekatawutisindzisa timphilo tebantfu.
15.6: Futsi kwenteka kutsi bantfu abaphendvukanga ebubini babo, bantfu baKhoriyanthuma baphehlelwa ekutfukutseleleni bantfu baShizi, kani nebantfu baShizi baphehlelwa ekutfukutseleleni bantfu baKhoriyanthuma; ngaloko-ke, bantfu baShizi balwa nebantfu baKhoriyanthuma.
15.7: Futsi ngesikhatsi Khoriyanthuma asabona kutsi besekatawukufa waphindze wababalekela bantfu baShizi.
15.8: Futsi kwenteka kutsi waya emantini aseRipliyankhumu, lokutsi, nakuhunyushwa, kusho lamakhulu, noma lokwendlula konkhe; ngaloko-ke, ngesikhatsi befika kulamanti bemisa emathende abo; naShizi ngalokunjalo wemisa akhe emathende dvute nabo; ngako-ke ngakusasa balwa futsi.
15.9: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balwa imphi lematima kakhulu, kuyo Khoriyanthuma waphindze walimala, waculeka ngenca yekulahlekelwa yingati.
15.10: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emabutfo aKhoriyanthuma awacindzetela emabutfo aShizi kangangekutsi awehlula, abenta kutsi bababalekele; babalekela ngaseningizimu, bamisa emathende abo endzaweni lebeyibitwa ngekutsi yi-Ogathi.
15.11: Futsi kwenteka kutsi libutfo laKhoriyanthuma lemisa emathende alo ngasegcumeni iRama; futsi kwakungilo kanye lelo gcuma lapho babe Mormon afihla khona imibhalo eNkhosini, leyayingcwele.
15.12: Futsi kwenteka kutsi babutsela ndzawonye bonkhe bantfu kulo lonkhe live, labebangakabulawa, ngaphandle kwa-Etheri.
15.13: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Etheri watibona tonkhe tento tebantfu, wabona kutsi labo bantfu labebavumelana naKhoriyanthuma bebabutsene ndzawonye ebutfweni laKhoriyanthuma, nebantfu labebavumelana naShizi bebabutsene ndzawonye ebutfweni laShizi.
15.14: Ngaloko-ke, sikhatsi lesingangeminyaka lemine bebabutsela ndzawonye bantfu, kute batfole bonkhe labebaseveni, nekutsi batfole onkhe emandla lokwakungenteka kutsi bawatfole.
15.15: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebabutsene ndzawonye, wonkhe muntfu kulelo butfo bekatsandza kuba kulo, nebafati babo kanye nebantfwana babo—emadvodza, besifazane kanye nebantfwana bahlonyiswe ngetikhali temphi, banetihlangu, netivikelo tesifuba, kanye netivikelo tenhloko, bagcokiswe ngendlela yemphi—bahamba nguloyo abhekene nalomunye kute balwe; futsi balwa lilanga lonkhe, kodvwa abancobanga.
15.16: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi sekungubusuku besebakhatsele, baphumula etinkanjini tabo; futsi emvakwekutsi sebaphumulile etinkanjini tabo bacala kuhhewula kanye nekulila ngenca yekulahlekelwa bantfu babo labebabulewe, futsi kwaba kukhulu kukhala kwabo, kuhhewula kwabo kanye nekulila kwabo, kangangekutsi bawudzabula kakhulu umoya.
15.17: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngakusasa baphindze bayawukulwa, lwaba lukhulu lwaphindze lwaba lubi lolo suku; noko, abancobanga, futsi uma busuku buphindze bufika badzabula umoya ngekukhala kwabo, nekuhhewula kwabo, kanye nangesililo sabo, ngenca yekulahlekelwa bantfu babo labebabulewe.
15.18: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma waphindze wabhalela Shizi incwadzi, amcela kutsi angasaphindzi atawukulwa, kodvwa kutsi atsatse umbuso, asindzise timphilo tebantfu.
15.19: Kodvwa buka, Moya weNkhosi besewuyekelile kuhlala kubo, Sathane besekanemandla onkhe etinhlitiyweni tebantfu; ngoba besebatinikele ekwenteni lukhuni tinhlitiyo tabo, kanye nasekuphumphutsekeni kwetingcondvo tabo kute babhujiswe; ngaloko-ke baphindze bahamba bayawukulwa.
15.20: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balwa lilanga lonkhe, futsi ngesikhatsi kufika busuku balala etikwetinkemba tabo.
15.22: Ngesikhatsi kufika busuku besebadzakiwe yintfukutselo, njengemuntfu lodzakwe liwayini; baphindze balala etikwetinkemba tabo.
15.23: Ngakusasa baphindze balwa; futsi ngesikhatsi kufika busuku bonkhe bese bafe ngenkemba ngaphandle kwalabangemashumi lasihlanu nakubili bebantfu baKhoriyanthuma, kanye nalabangemashumi lasitfupha nemfica bebantfu baShizi.
15.24: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balala etikwetinkemba tabo ngalobu busuku, ngakusasa baphindze balwa, balwa ngemandla abo onkhe ngetinkemba tabo kanye nengetihlangu tabo, lonkhe lelo langa.
15.25: Ngesikhatsi kufika busuku besekusele emashumi lamatsatfu nakubili ebantfu baShizi, kanye nemashumi lamabili nesikhombisa ebantfu baKhoriyanthuma.
15.26: Futsi kwenteka kutsi badla base bayalala, batilungiselela kufa ngakusasa. Futsi bebangemadvodza lamakhulu nalanemandla ngekwemandla ebantfu.
15.27: Futsi kwenteka kutsi balwa sikhatsi lesingangemahora lamatsatfu, baculeka ngenca yekulahlekelwa yingati.
15.28: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bantfu baKhoriyanthuma sebatfole emandla lenele ekutsi bangahamba, bese batawubaleka kute basindzise timphilo tabo; kodvwa, Shizi waphakama, kanye nebantfu bakhe, wafunga ngentfukutselo yakhe kutsi utawumbulala Khoriyanthuma noma yena abhubhe ngenkemba,
15.29: Ngaloko-ke, wabalandzela, ngakusasa wabakhandza; baphindze balwa ngenkemba. Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi bonkhe sebafile ngenkemba, ngaphandle kwaKhoriyanthuma naShizi, buka Shizi besekaculekile ngenca yekulahlekelwa yingati.
15.30: Futsi kwenteka kutsi ngesikhatsi Khoriyanthuma sekeyame enkembeni yakhe, kute aphumule kancane, wayishaya wayisusa inhloko yaShizi.
15.31: Futsi kwenteka kutsi emvakwekutsi sekayishaye wayisusa inhloko yaShizi, Shizi wasukuma wabambelela ngetandla takhe waphindze wawa; emvakwaloko walwela kutfola umphefumulo, wafa.
15.32: Futsi kwenteka kutsi Khoriyanthuma wawela phansi, kwaba shengatsi sewute imphilo.
15.33: Futsi iNkhosi yakhuluma ku-Etheri, yatsi kuye: Hamba. Wahamba, wabona kutsi emavi onkhe eNkhosi besekagcwaliseka; wase ucedzela umbhalo wakhe; (incenye lencane angitange ngiyibhale) wawufihla ngendlela yekutsi bantfu baLimhayi bawutfola.
15.34: Manje emavi ekugcina labhalwa ngu-Etheri ngulawa: Noma ngabe iNkhosi ifuna kutsi ngitsatfwe, noma kutsi ngibeketelele intsandvo yeNkhosi enyameni, akunandzaba, nangabe nje ngisindzisiwe embusweni waNkulunkulu, Amen.

1.1: Manje mine, Moroni, emvakwekutsi sengicedzile kufinyeta indzaba yebantfu baJarede, bengingacabangi kutsi ngitawubuye ngibhale lokunye, kodvwa ngisengakafi kwamanje; futsi angitiveti kumaLamani hleze angibulale.
1.2: Ngoba bukani, timphi tawo tiyesabeka kakhulu emkhatsini wawo lucobo; futsi ngenca yenzondo yawo abulala onkhe emaNefi langeke amphike Khristu.
1.3: Mine, Moroni, angeke ngimphike Khristu; ngaloko-ke, ngizulazula noma ngukuphi lapho ngingaya khona kute ngisindzise imphilo yami.
1.4: Ngaloko-ke, ngibhala letinye tintfo letimbalwa, lokungasiko lebengikucabanga; ngoba bengingacabangi kutsi ngitawubuye ngibhale lokunye; kodvwa ngibhala letinye tintfo letimbalwa, kute mhlawumbe tibe lusito kubomnaketfu emaLamani, ngalolunye lusuku lolutako, ngekwentsandvo yeNkhosi.

2.1: Emavi aKhristu, lawakhuluma kubafundzi bakhe, labalishumi nakubili labekabakhetsile, ngesikhatsi abeka tandla takhe kubo—
2.2: Wababita ngemabito, watsi: Niyawubita Babe egameni lami, emthandazweni lonemandla; futsi emvakwekutsi senikwentile loku niyawuba nemandla ekutsi loyo leniyawumbeka tandla, niyawumnika Moya loNgcwele; futsi niyawumnika egameni lami, ngoba benta njalo baphostoli bami.
2.3: Manje Khristu wakhuluma lamavi kubo ngesikhatsi avela kubo kwekucala; sicuku asiwevanga, kodvwa bafundzi baweva; futsi ngebuningi balabo labababeka tandla tabo, bamtfola Moya loNgcwele.

3.1: Indlela bafundzi, labebabitwa ngebabonisi belibandla, labebagcoba ngayo baphristi kanye nebafundzisi—
3.2: Emvakwekutsi sebathandazile kuBabe egameni laKhristu, babeka tandla tabo kubo, base batsi:
3.3: Egameni laJesu Khristu ngiyakugcoba kutsi ube ngumphristi (noma uma angumfundzisi, ngikubeka kutsi ube ngumfundzisi) kute ushumayele kuphendvuka kanye nekutsetselelwa kwetono ngaJesu Khristu, ngekubeketela ngelukholo egameni lakhe kute kube sekugcineni. Amen.
3.4: Babagcoba ngalendlela baphristi kanye nebafundzisi, ngekwetipho kanye nangekwelubito lwaNkulunkulu kubantfu; futsi babagcoba ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, lowawukubo.

4.1: Indlela babonisi kanye nebaphristi babo labebabusisela ngayo libandla umtimba kanye nengati yaKhristu; bebakubusisa ngekwemiyaleto yaKhristu; ngaloko-ke siyati kutsi lendlela iliciniso; futsi umbonisi noma umphristi wakubusisa—
4.2: Bebaguca phansi nelibandla, bathandaze kuBabe egameni laKhristu, batsi:
4.3: Awu Nkulunkulu, Babe waPhakadze, siyakucela egameni leNdvodzana yakho, Jesu Khristu, kutsi ubusise uphindze ungcwelise lesi sinkhwa emiphefumulweni yabo bonkhe labo labasidlako; kute basidle njengesikhumbuto semtimba weNdvodzana yakho, futsi bakhombise kuwe, Awu Nkulunkulu, Babe waPhakadze, kutsi bayafisa kubitwa ngelibito leNdvodzana yakho, futsi bayikhumbule njalo, bagcine imiyaleto yayo leyibanikete yona, kute babe naMoya wayo njalo. Amen.

5.1: Indlela yekubusisa liwayini—Buka, batsatsa sitja, batsi:
5.2: Awu Nkulunkulu, Babe waPhakadze, siyakucela, egameni leNdvodzana yakho, Jesu Khristu, kutsi ubusise uphindze ungcwelise leli liwayini emiphefumulweni yabo bonkhe labalinatsako, kute bakwente njengesikhumbuto sengati yeNdvodzana yakho, leyacitselwa bona; kute bakhombise kuwe, Awu Nkulunkulu, Babe waPhakadze, kutsi bayayikhumbula njalo, kute babe naMoya wayo njalo. Amen.

6.1: Manje sengikhuluma ngalokuphatselene nembhabhatiso. Buka, babonisi, baphristi, kanye nebafundzisi bebabhajatiswa; futsi bebangabhajatiswa ngaphandle kwekutsi baletse titselo letifanele tekutsi bakhombise kutsi bafanele.
6.2: Futsi bebangemukeli namunye ekubhajatisweni ngaphandle kwekutsi beta ngenhlitiyo ledzabukile, nangemoya lowephukile, baphindze bakhombise ebandleni kutsi baphendvuke ngekweliciniso etonweni tabo tonkhe.
6.3: Futsi kute namunye lobekamukelwa ekubhajatisweni ngaphandle kwekutsi bemukele Khristu baphindze babitwe ngaye, baphokophele kumsebentela kute kube sekugcineni.
6.4: Futsi emvakwekutsi sebemukelwe ekubhajatisweni, sebaguculiwe baphindze bahlantwa ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, bebabalwa kanye nebantfu belibandla laKhristu; nemabito abo bekatsatfwa, kute bakhunjulwe baphindze bondliwe ngelivi lelihle laNkulunkulu, kute babagcine basendleleni lengiyo, kute babagcine njalo bahlale bathandaza, betsembela kuphela etentweni letinhle taKhristu, lobekangumcambi kanye nemphelelisi welukholo lwabo.
6.5: Libandla belihlangana ndzawonye njalo, kute lizile kudla liphindze lithandaze, nekutsi bacocisane lomunye nalomunye mayelana nekuzuza kwemiphefumulo yabo.
6.6: Bebahlangana njalo kute badle sinkhwa kanye neliwayini, kukhumbula iNkhosi Jesu.
6.7: Futsi bebacaphela kubuka kutsi kubebete bubi emkhatsini wabo; loyo lobekatfolwa ente bubi, bofakazi labatsatfu belibandla bebabalahla ngelicala ngaphambi kwebabonisi, futsi uma bebangaphendvuki, bangavumi, emagama abo bekesulwa, baphindze bangabalwa nebantfu baKhristu.
6.8: Kodvwa ngekuphendvuka kwabo njalo bacela intsetselelo, ngenhloso lekungiyo, bebatsetselelwa.
6.9: Imihlangano yabo beyichutjwa libandla ngendlela yekusebenta kwaMoya, kanye nangemandla aMoya loNgcwele; ngoba njengoba emandla aMoya loNgcwele bekabahola kutsi bashumayele, bakhutsate, bathandaze, bancuse, noma bahlabele, bekwentiwa loko.

7.1: Manje mine, Moroni, sengibhala emavi lambalwa ababe Mormon, lawakhuluma mayelana nelukholo, litsemba, nelutsandvo; ngoba wakhuluma ngalendlela kubantfu, ngesikhatsi abafundzisa esinagogeni lebebayakhele kutsi kube yindzawo yekukhonta.
7.2: Manje mine, Mormon, ngikhuluma kini, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako; futsi kungumusa waNkulunkulu Babe, kanye neNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu, kanye nentsandvo yakhe lengcwele, ngenca yesipho selubito lwakhe kimi, kutsi ngivunyelwe kutsi ngikhulume kini ngalesi sikhatsi.
7.3: Ngaloko-ke, ngitawukhuluma nani nine lenibelibandla, nine lenibalandzeli labanekuthula baKhristu, lenitfole litsemba lelenele leningangena ngalo ekuphumuleni kweNkhosi, kusukela kulesi sikhatsi kuya phambili nite niphumule naye ezulwini.
7.4: Manje bomnaketfu, ngibona letintfo ngani ngenca yekuhamba kwenu lokunekuthula nebantfwana bebantfu.
7.5: Ngoba ngiyalikhumbula livi laNkulunkulu lelitsi ngemisebenti yabo niyawubati; ngoba uma imisebenti yabo imihle, kanjalo nabo bahle futsi.
7.6: Ngoba bukani, Nkulunkulu utse umuntfu lomubi angeke akwente loko lokuhle; ngoba uma apha sipho, noma athandaza kuNkulunkulu, ngaphandle akwente ngenhloso yangempela akumsiti ngalutfo.
7.7: Ngoba bukani, akwemukelwa kuye kutsi kulungile.
7.8: Ngoba bukani, uma umuntfu lomubi aniketa sipho, ukwenta loko ngekungakhululeki; ngaloko-ke kwemukelwa ngalokufanako nekutsi usibambile sipho; ngaloko-ke wemukelwa njengalomubi embikwaNkulunkulu.
7.9: Kanjalo kwemukelwa njengebubi kumuntfu, uma athandaza kodvwa abe ete inhloso yangempela yenhlitiyo; yebo, futsi akumsiti ngalutfo, ngoba Nkulunkulu akabemukeli labanjalo.
7.10: Ngaloko-ke, uma umuntfu amubi angeke akwati kwenta loko lokuhle; noma aphe sipho lesihle.
7.11: Ngoba bukani, umtfombo lobabako angeke ukwati kukhipha emanti lamahle; noma umtfombo lomuhle ukhiphe emanti lababako; ngaloko-ke, umuntfu loyinceku yadeveli angeke akwati kulandzela Khristu; futsi uma alandzela Khristu angeke akwati kutsi abe yinceku yadeveli.
7.12: Ngaloko-ke, tonkhe tintfo letinhle tivela kuNkulunkulu, kantsi loko lokubi kuvela kudeveli; ngoba develi usitsa kuNkulunkulu, ulwa naye njalo, futsi ulinga aphindze ahehe bantfu kutsi bone, nekutsi bente loko lokubi njalo.
7.13: Kodvwa bukani, loko lokukwaNkulunkulu kumema kuphindze kuhehe bantfu kutsi bente lokuhle njalo; ngaloko-ke, yonkhe intfo lelinga iphindze ihehe kutsi wente lokuhle, futsi utsandze Nkulunkulu, umsebentele, iphefumulelwe nguNkulnkulu.
7.14: Ngaloko-ke, caphelani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, kutsi anehluleli loko lokubi nitsi kwakaNkulunkulu, noma loko lokuhle lokukwakaNkulunkulu kutsi kwakadeveli.
7.15: Ngoba bukani, bomnaketfu, niniketiwe kutsi nikwati kwehlulela, kute nati lokuhle kulokubi; futsi indlela yekwehlulela icacile, kute nati ngelwati loluphelele, njengoba nati kukhanya kwemini uma nikucatsanisa nebumnyama bebusuku.
7.16: Ngoba bukani, Moya waKhristu uniketiwe kuwo wonkhe umuntfu, kutsi ati lokuhle kulokubi; ngaloko-ke, nginikhombisa indlela yekwehlulela, ngoba yonkhe intfo lekumema kutsi wente lokuhle, futsi lekukholisa kutsi ukholwe kuKhristu, itfunyelwe ngemandla kanye nesipho saKhristu; ngaloko-ke ningati ngelwati loluphelele kutsi kwakaNkulunkulu.
7.17: Kodvwa noma ngabe yini lekholisa umuntfu kutsi ente lokubi, angakholwa kuKhristu, amphike, futsi angamsebenteli Nkulunkulu, uma kunjalo ningati ngelwati loluphelele kutsi loko kungekwadeveli; ngoba develi usebenta ngalendlela, ngoba yena akamkholisi umuntfu kutsi ente lokuhle, cha, namunye nje umuntfu; kanjalo netingilosi takhe, futsi kanjalo nalabo labangaphansi kwakhe.
7.18: Manje, bomnaketfu, ngekubona kutsi niyakwati kukhanya leningehlulela ngako, lokukukhanya kwaKhristu, bonani kutsi anehluleli ngalokungasiko; ngoba ngaloko kwehlulela lenehlulela ngako, nani niyawukwehlulelwa ngako.
7.19: Ngaloko-ke, ngiyanincenga, bomnaketfu, kutsi nihlolisise ngekukhutsala kuko kukhanya kwaKhristu kute nati lokuhle kulokubi; futsi uma ningabambelela kuyo yonkhe intfo lenhle, ningayilahli, niyawuba bantfwana baKhristu noma kanjani.
7.20: Manje, bomnaketfu, kungenteka kanjani kutsi nibambelele kuyo yonkhe intfo lenhle na?
7.21: Manje sengita kulolo kholo, lengitsite ngitawukhuluma ngalo; futsi ngitawunitjela indlela leningabambelela ngayo kuyo yonkhe intfo lenhle.
7.22: Ngoba bukani, Nkulunkulu wati tonkhe tintfo, kusukela phakadze kute kube phakadze, bukani, watfumela tingilosi kutsi tisite bantfwana bebantfu, kute tivete kukhanya mayelana nekuta kwaKhristu, nekutsi kuKhristu kuyawuvela yonkhe intfo lenhle.
7.23: Futsi Nkulunkulu ngetulu kwaloko washo kubaphrofethi, ngemlomo wakhe lucobo, kutsi Khristu utawukuta.
7.24: Bukani, bekukhona tinhlobonhlobo tetindlela laveta ngato tintfo kubantfwana bebantfu, letatitinhle, futsi tonkhe tintfo letinhle tivela kuKhristu; kungenjalo bantfu bebawile, futsi bekungeke kube khona intfo lenhle leta kubo.
7.25: Ngaloko-ke, ngekusitwa tingilosi, nangemavi onkhe laphuma emlonyeni waNkulunkulu, bantfu bacala kusebentisa lukholo kuKhristu; ngako-ke ngelukholo, babambelela kuto tintfo letinhle; futsi kwabanjalo kwate kwefika Khristu.
7.26: Emvakwekufika kwakhe bantfu nabo basindziswa ngelukholo egameni lakhe; futsi ngelukholo, baba ngemadvodzana aNkulunkulu. Njengoba ngempela Khristu aphila wawakhuluma lamavi kubobabe betfu, watsi: Noma ngabe yini lenitawuyicela kuBabe egameni lami, lenhle, ninelukholo kutsi nitawuyitfola, bukani, niyawukwentelwa yona.
7.27: Ngako-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngabe timangaliso setaphela yini ngenca yekutsi Khristu sewenyukele ezulwini, wahlala phansi esandleni sangesekudla saNkulunkulu, kute afune kuBabe emalungelo akhe emusa lanawo kubantfwana bebantfu na?
7.28: Ngoba utenelisile tinhloso temtsetfo, futsi ufuna bonkhe labo labanelukholo kuye; futsi labo labanelukholo kuye batawubambisisa kuto tonkhe tintfo letinhle; ngaloko-ke umemele simiso sebantfwana bebantfu; futsi uhlala phakadze emazulwini.
7.29: Futsi ngenca yekutsi sewukwentile loku, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngabe timangaliso setaphela na? Bukani ngitsi kini, Cha; futsi netingilosi atikayekeli kusita bantfwana bebantfu.
7.30: Ngoba bukani, tingephansi kwakhe, kutsi tisite ngekwelivi lekuyaleta kwakhe, titibonakalise kulabo labanelukholo lolucinile kanye nemcondvo logcilile kuso sonkhe simo sekulunga.
7.31: Futsi umsebenti webufundisi bato kubitela bantfu ekuphendvukeni, nekugcwalisa kanye nekwenta umsebenti wetivumelwano taBabe, latenta kubantfwana bebantfu, kute alungise indlela emkhatsini webantfwana bebantfu, ngekumemetela livi laKhristu etitjeni letikhetsiwe teNkhosi, kute tifakaze ngaye.
7.32: Ngekwenta njalo, iNkhosi Nkulunkulu ilungiselela indlela yekutsi labasele bantfu babe nelukholo kuKhristu, kute Moya loNgcwele abe nendzawo etinhlitiyweni tabo, ngekwemandla awo; futsi ngalendlela Babe ugcwalisa tivumelwano latenta kubantfwana bebantfu.
7.33: Futsi Khristu utsite: Uma ningaba nelukholo kimi niyawuba nemandla ekwenta noma ngayini intfo lefanele kimi.
7.34: Futsi utsite: Phendvukani nonkhe nine mikhawulo yemhlaba, nite kimi, nibhajatiswe egameni lami, niphindze nibe nelukholo kimi, kute nisindziswe.
7.35: Manje, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, uma kusho kutsi letintfo lengitikhulume kini tiliciniso, futsi Nkulunkulu utawunikhombisa, ngemandla kanye nangenkhatimulo lenkhulu ngelusuku lwekugcina, kutsi tiliciniso, uma tiliciniso ngabe lusuku lwetimangaliso luphelile na?
7.36: Noma ngabe tingilosi setiyekelile yini kuvela kubantfwana bebantfu na? Noma ngabe uwagodlile yini emandla aMoya loNgcwele kubo na? Noma ngabe utawuwagodla yini, uma nje sikhatsi sisachubeka, noma uma nje umhlaba usemile, noma kusekhona umuntfu munye kuwo kutsi asindziswe na?
7.37: Bukani, ngitsi kini, Cha, ngoba kungenca yelukholo kutsi kwenteke timangaliso; futsi kungenca yelukholo kutsi tingilosi tivele tiphindze tisite bantfu; ngaloko-ke, uma letintfo setiyekelile maye kubantfwana bebantfu, ngoba kungenca yekungakholwa, futsi konkhe kulite.
7.38: Ngoba kute umuntfu longasindziswa, ngekwemavi aKhristu, ngaphandle kwekutsi abe nelukholo egameni lakhe; ngaloko-ke, uma letintfo setiyekelile, kanjalo nalo lukholo alusekho; futsi siyesabeka simo semuntfu, ngoba kuba shengatsi akutange kube khona kuhlengwa lokwentiwa.
7.39: Kodvwa bukani, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, ngibona tintfo letincono kini, ngoba ngibona kutsi ninalo lukholo kuKhristu ngenca yekutfobeka kwenu; ngoba uma ningenalo lukholo kuye anikafaneli kutsi nibalwe nebantfu belibandla lakhe.
7.40: Ngetulu kwaloko, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, sengitawukhuluma kini mayelana nelitsemba. Kungenteka kanjani kutsi nibe nelukholo, ngaphandle kwekutsi nibe nelitsemba na?
7.41: Futsi yini lena lenitawuyetsemba na? Bukani ngitsi kini niyawuba nelitsemba ngenhlawulo yaKhristu kanye nangemandla ekuvuka kwakhe, kutsi nivuselwe ekuphileni lokuphakadze, futsi loku kuyawuba ngenca yelukholo lwenu kuye njengekwesetsembiso.
7.42: Ngaloko-ke, uma umuntfu anelukholo kufanele kutsi abe nelitsemba; ngoba ngaphandle kwelukholo angeke libe khona litsemba.
7.43: Ngetulu kwaloko, bukani ngitsi kini angeke abe nelukholo kanye nelitsemba, ngaphandle kwekubamnene, futsi abe ngulotfobekile ngenhlitiyo.
7.44: Uma kungenjalo, lukholo lwakhe nelitsemba lakhe kulite, ngoba kute namunye lowemukelekako embikwaNkulunkulu, ngaphandle kwalabamnene nalabatfobekile ngenhlitiyo; futsi uma umuntfu amnene aphindze atfobekile ngenhlitiyo, avuma ngemandla aMoya longcwele kutsi Jesu unguKhristu, kufanele abe nelutsandvo; ngoba uma ete lutsandvo akasilo lutfo; ngaloko-ke kufanele abe nelutsandvo.
7.45: Futsi lutsandvo luyabeketela, lumnene, lute umona, alutikhukhumeti, alutifuneli kwalo, alucansuki kalula, alukucabangi lokubi, alukujabuleli lokubi kodvwa lujabulela liciniso, lubeketelela tonkhe tintfo, lukholwa tonkhe tintfo, lwetsemba tonkhe tintfo, lubeketelela tonkhe tintfo.
7.46: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, uma nite lutsandvo, aninalutfo, ngoba lutsandvo alusoze luphele. Ngaloko-ke, bambelelani kulo lutsandvo, lolukhulu kunako konkhe, ngoba tonkhe tintfo titawuphela—
7.47: Kodvwa lutsandvo lweliciniso lutsandvo lolumsulwa lwaKhristu, lubeketela ingunaphakadze; futsi noma ngubani lotfolwa analo ngelusuku lwekugcina, kuyawuba kuhle kuye.
7.48: Ngaloko-ke, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, thandazani kuBabe ngemandla onkhe enhlitiyo, kute nigcwaliswe ngelutsandvo, lalunike bonkhe labo lababalandzeli beliciniso beNdvodzana yakhe, Jesu Khristu; kute nibe ngemadvodzana aNkulunkulu; kute kutsi ngesikhatsi achamuka siyawuba njengaye, ngoba siyawumbona njengoba anjalo; kute sibe nelitsemba; kute sentiwe sibe msulwa njengoba naye amsulwa. Amen.

8.1: Incwadzi yababe Mormon, langibhalela yona mine, Moroni; wangibhalela yona masinyane nje emvakwekubitelwa kwami ebufundisini. Futsi wangibhalela ngalendlela, watsi:
8.2: Ndvodzana yami letsandzekako, Moroni, ngiyajabula kakhulu kutsi iNkhosi yakho Jesu Khristu beyiloku ikukhumbula, yaphindze yakubitela ebufundisini bayo, kanye nasemsebentini wayo longcwele.
8.3: Ngiyakukhumbula njalo emithandazweni yami, njalo ngithandaza kuNkulunkulu Babe egameni leMntfwana wakhe loNgcwele, Jesu, kutsi, ngebuhle bakhe lobungapheli kanye nemusa, akugcine ekubeketeleni kwelukholo egameni lakhe kute kube sekugcineni.
8.4: Manje ndvodzana yami, sengikhuluma kuwe mayelana naloko lokungikhatsata kakhulu; ngoba kuyangikhatsata kutsi kube khona imphikiswano lecubukako emkhatsini wenu.
8.5: Ngoba, uma ngifundze liciniso, bekuloku kukhona imphikiswano emkhatsini wenu mayelana nekubhajatiswa kwebantfwana benu labancane.
8.6: Manje, ndvodzana yami, ngifisa kutsi nisebente ngekukhutsala, kute leliphutsa lelibi lisuswe emkhatsini wenu; ngoba, kungalesi sizatfu ngibhale lencwadzi.
8.7: Ngoba masinyane emvakwekutsi sengitivile letintfo ngani ngibute eNkhosini mayelana naloludzaba. Futsi livi leNkhosi lifike kimi ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele, latsi:
8.8: Lalela lamavi aKhristu, uMhlengi wakho, iNkhosi yakho kanye naNkulunkulu wakho. Buka, ngeta emhlabeni hhayi kutawubita labalungile kodvwa toni kutsi tiphendvuke; labaphilako abayidzingi inyanga, kodvwa labo labagulako; ngaloko-ke, bantfwana labancane bamsulwa, ngoba abakwati kona; ngaloko-ke sicalekiso sa-Adamu sisusiwe kubo ngenca yami, kutsi singabi nemandla etikwabo; futsi umtsetfo wekusoka sewuyekelwe ngenca yami.
8.9: Futsi ngalendlela Moya loNgcwele wembula livi laNkulunkulu kimi; ngaloko-ke, ndvodzana yami letsandzekako, ngiyati kutsi kuyinhlamba lembi phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kutsi nibhabhatise bantfwana labancane.
8.10: Buka ngitsi kuwe ngulentfo loyawuyifundzisa—kuphendvuka kanye nekubhajatiswa kulabo lekufanele batiphendvulele kanye nakulabo lasebakwati kwenta sono; yebo, fundzisa batali kutsi kufanele baphendvuke baphindze babhajatiswe, batitfobe njengebantfwana babo labancane, futsi bonkhe bayawusindziswa kanye nebantfwana babo.
8.11: Bantfwana babo labancane abakudzingi kuphendvuka, noma kubhajatiswa. Buka, kubhajatiswa kwekuphendvuka kugcwalisa imiyaleto ngalokwenele kutsi kutsetselelwe tono.
8.12: Kodvwa bantfwana labancane bayaphila kuKhristu, kusukela ekusekelweni kwemhlaba; uma kungasinjalo, Nkulunkulu unguNkulunkulu welubandlululo, naNkulunkulu logucukako, lobuka buso bebantfu; ngoba bangakhi bantfwana labancane lasebafa ngaphandle kwekubhajatiswa!
8.13: Ngaloko-ke, uma bantfwana labancane bangenakusindziswa ngaphandle kwekubhajatiswa, laba-ke kufanele kutsi baya esihogweni lesingapheli.
8.14: Buka ngitsi kuwe, loyo locabanga kutsi bantfwana labancane badzinga kubhajatiswa, usenyongweni lebabako kanye nasetibopheni tebubi; ngoba akanalo lukholo, litsemba, noma lutsandvo; ngaloko-ke, uma angafa asakholelwa kuloko, kufanele aye phansi esihogweni.
8.15: Ngoba kububi lobesabekako kucabanga kutsi Nkulunkulu angasindzisa umntfwana munye ngenca yekubhajatiswa, bese kutsi lomunye kufanele alahlwe ngenca yekutsi akakutfolanga kubhajatiswa.
8.16: Maye kulabo labayawugucula tindlela teNkhosi ngalendlela, ngoba bayawulahlwa ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke. Buka, ngikhuluma ngesibindzi, ngineligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu; futsi angesabi kutsi umuntfu angentani; ngoba lutsandvo loluphelele lucosha konkhe kwesaba.
8.17: Futsi ngigcwele lutsandvo, lokulutsandvo lwaphakadze; ngaloko-ke, bonkhe bantfwana bayafana kimi; ngaloko-ke, bantfwana labancane ngibatsandza ngelutsandvo loluphelele; bonkhe bayafana futsi babahlanganyeli ensindzisweni.
8.18: Ngoba ngiyati kutsi Nkulunkulu akasuye Nkulunkulu lobandlululako, noma umuntfu logucukako; kodvwa akagucuki kusuka kulo lonkhe liphakadze kuya kulo lonkhe liphakadze.
8.19: Bantfwana labancane abakwati kuphendvuka; ngaloko-ke, kububi lobesabekako kuphika umusa lomsulwa waNkulunkulu kubo, ngoba bonkhe bayaphila kuye ngenca yemusa wakhe.
8.20: Loyo lotsi bantfwana labancane badzinga kubhajatiswa uphika umusa waKhristu, futsi uyenta ibe lite inhlawulo yakhe kanye nemandla ekuhlenga kwakhe.
8.21: Maye kulabanjalo, ngoba basengotini yekufa, yesihogo, kanye nekuhlushwa lokungapheli. Ngikukhuluma ngesibindzi; Nkulunkulu ungiyaletile. Walaleleni lamavi niphindze niwanake, uma kungenjalo ayawumelana nani esihlalweni sekwehlulela saKhristu.
8.22: Ngoba buka bonkhe labantfwana labancane bayaphila kuKhristu, futsi kanjalo nabo bonkhe labo labangenamtsetfo. Ngoba emandla ekuhlenga eta kubo bonkhe labo, labete umtsetfo; ngaloko-ke, loyo longakalahlwa ngelicala, noma loyo longekho ngaphansi kwekulahlwa ngelicala, angeke aphendvuke; futsi kulabanjalo kubhajatiswa akusiti ngalutfo—
8.23: Kodvwa kuyinhlamba phambi kwaNkulunkulu, kuphika umusa waKhristu, kanye nemandla aMoya wakhe loNgcwele, kanye nekubeka litsemba emisebentini lefile.
8.24: Buka, ndvodzana yami, lentfo akukafaneli ibe khona; ngoba kuphendvuka kwalabo labangephansi kwekulahlwa ngelicala kanye nalabangephansi kwesicalekiso semtsetfo lowephuliwe.
8.25: Futsi titselo tekucala tekuphendvuka kubhajatiswa; kubhajatiswa kuta ngelukholo ekugcwaliseni imiyaleto; futsi kugcwalisa imiyaleto kuletsa kutsetselelwa kwetono;
8.26: Futsi kutsetselelwa kwetono kuletsa bumnene, kanye nekutfobeka kwenhlitiyo; ngenca yebumnene kanye nekutfobeka kwenhlitiyo kuta kuvakashelwa nguMoya loNgcwele, uMdvudvuti logcwalisa ngelitsemba kanye nangelutsandvo loluphelele, lutsandvo lolubeketela ngekukhutsala ekuthandazeni, kute kufike sikhatsi sekugcina, lapho bonkhe labangcwele bayawuhlala naNkulunkulu.
8.27: Buka, ndvodzana yami, ngitawuphindze ngikubhalele uma ngingeke ngiphume masinyane kuyawukulwa nemaLamani. Buka, kutikhukhumeta kwalesi sive, noma bantfu bemaNefi, sekubangele kubhujiswa kwabo ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke.
8.28: Bathandazele, ndvodzana yami, kute kuphendvuka kute kubo. Kodvwa buka, ngiyesaba hleze Moya sewuyekelile kusebenta kubo; futsi kulencenye yelive bafuna kubeka phansi onkhe emandla kanye neligunya lelivela kuNkulunkulu; futsi baphika Moya loNgcwele.
8.29: Emvakwekulahla lwati lolukhulu kangaka, ndvodzana yami, kufanele babhubhe masinyane, kute kugcwaliseke tiphrofetho letakhulunywa baphrofethi, kanjalo nemavi eMsindzisi wetfu lucobo lwakhe.
8.30: Sala kahle, ndvodzana yami, ngite ngikubhalele, noma sihlangane futsi. Amen.

9.intro: Incwadzi yesibili yaMormon leya kuyo indvodzana yakhe Moroni
9.1: Ndvodzana yami letsandzekako, ngiyaphindza ngiyakubhalela kute wati kutsi ngisaphila, kodvwa ngibhala ngaloko lokutsite lokungikhatsatako.
9.2: Ngoba buka, ngibe nemphi lematima nemaLamani, lesingakancobi kuyo; futsi Akhiyanthasi ufile wabulawa ngenkemba, kanjalo naLuramu kanye naEmromi; yebo, futsi silahlekelwe sibalo lesiningi semadvodza etfu lakhetsekile.
9.3: Manje buka, ndvodzana yami, ngiyesaba hleze emaLamani atawubabhubhisa labantfu, ngoba abaphendvuki, naSathane ubaphehla njalo kutsi batfukutselelane lomunye nalomunye.
9.4: Buka, ngisebenta nabo njalo; futsi uma ngikhuluma livi laNkulunkulu ngekucina bayatfutfumela baphindze bangitfukutselele; futsi uma ngingasebentisi kucina bacinisa tinhlitiyo tabo ngekumelana nalo; ngaloko-ke, ngiyesaba hleze Moya weNkhosi sewuyekelile kusebenta kubo.
9.5: Ngoba sebatfukutsele kakhulu ngendlela yekutsi sekubonakala kimi shengatsi abakwesabi kufa; futsi sebalahlekelwe kutsandzana, lomunye kulomunye; bomele ingati kanye nekutiphindziselela njalo.
9.6: Manje, ndvodzana yami letsandzekako, nanoma kungenca yebulukhuni babo, tsine asisebente ngekukhutsala; ngoba uma siyekela kusebenta, siyawuletfwa ekulahlweni ngelicala; ngoba sinemsebenti lekufanele siwente uma sisekulelidvokodvo lelubumba, kute sincobe sitsa sako konkhe kulunga, futsi siphumute imiphefumulo yetfu embusweni waNkulunkulu.
9.7: Manje sengibhala lokutsite mayelana netinhlupheko talabantfu. Ngoba ngekwelwati lengilutfolile ku-Amoroni, buka, emaLamani anetiboshwa letiningi, latitsatsa embhoshongweni waSheriza; futsi bekungemadvodza, besifazane, kanye nebantfwana.
9.8: Emadvodza kanye naboyise balabo besifazane nebantfawana bababulele; futsi bondla labesifazane ngenyama yemadvodza abo, kanye nebantfwana ngenyama yaboyise; futsi kute emanti, ngaphandle kwalamancane nje, lababanika wona.
9.9: Nanoma kungenca yetinengiso letingaka temaLamani, atitendluli tebantfu betfu labaseMoriyanthumu. Ngoba buka, lamaningi emadvodzakati emaLamani bawatsetse bawenta tiboshwa; futsi emvakwekubemuca loko lokwakutsandzeka kuphindze kuligugu ngetulu kwato tonkhe tintfo, lokubumsulwa nebucotfo—
9.10: Emvakwekutsi sebente lentfo, bababulala ngesihluku lesikhulu, babavisa buhlungu emitimbeni yabo bate bafa; futsi emvakwekutsi sebakwentile loku, badla inyama yabo njengetilwane tasendle, ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tabo; futsi bakwenta loku njengesiboniso sekuba nesibindzi.
9.11: Awu ndvodzana yami letsandzekako, kungenteka kanjani kutsi bantfu labanjengalaba, labete imphucuko—
9.12: (Futsi kuseyiminyaka lembalwa nje kuphela leseyendlulile, kantsi bebabantfu labaphucukile nalabatsandzekako)
9.13: Kodvwa Awu ndvodzana yami, kungenteka kanjani kutsi bantfu labanjengalaba, kutfokota kwabo kungaba setinengisweni letingaka—
9.14: Singalindzela kanjani kutsi Nkulunkulu angavimbela sandla sakhe ekusehluleleni na?
9.15: Buka, inhlitiyo yami iyakhala itsi: Maye kulabantfu. Wota ngekwehlulela, Awu Nkulunkulu, ufihle tono tabo, nebubi babo, netinengiso tabo phambi kwebuso bakho!
9.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, ndvodzana yami, kukhona bafelokati labaningi kanye nemadvodzakati abo labasele eSheriza; kanye naleyoncenye yemphako emaLamani langayitsatsanga, buka, libutfo laZenefi liyitsetse, labashiya bazulazula baya noma ngukuphi lapho bangaya khona kuyawufuna kudla; futsi labaningi besifazane labadzala bayaculeka endleleni bayafa.
9.17: Nelibutfo lelinami libutsakatsaka; kanjalo nemabutfo emaLamani asemkhatsini wami naSheriza; futsi ngebuningi balabo lababalekele emphini ya-Aroni babulewe ngesihluku lesikhulu.
9.18: Awu kukhohlakala kwebantfu bami! Bete kuhleleka nesihawu. Buka, ngingumuntfu nje, futsi nginemandla emuntfu nje, angeke ngisayiphocelela imiyalo yami.
9.19: Futsi sebacinile ebubini babo; sebagcwele lunya ngalokufanako, kute lonjani, umdzala noma umncane; batfokotela tonkhe tintfo ngaphandle kwaloko lokuhle; nekuhlupheka kwebesifazane betfu kanye nebantfwana betfu eveni lonkhe kwendlula konkhe; yebo, lulwimi angeke lukuchaze, noma kubhalwe.
9.20: Manje, ndvodzana yami, angeke ngisahlala kulesimo lesibi kangaka. Buka, uyabati bubi balabantfu; uyati kutsi abanatimiso, futsi nemizwa seyitfuntfubetekile; nebubi babo sebendlula lobo bemaLamani.
9.21: Buka, ndvodzana yami, angeke ngibakhulumele kuNkulunkulu hleze angishaye.
9.22: Kodvwa buka, ndvodzana yami, wena ngiyakukhulumela kuNkulunkulu, futsi ngiyetsemba kuKhristu kutsi uyawusindziswa; ngiyathandaza kuNkulunkulu kutsi ayisindzise imphilo yakho, kute utibonele kubuyela kwebantfu bakhe kuye, noma kubhujiswa kwabo baphele nya; ngoba ngiyati kutsi kufanele babhubhe ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke babuyele kuye.
9.23: Futsi uma babhubha kuyawuba njengekwemaJarede, ngenca yekufisa kwetinhlitiyo tabo, bafuna ingati nekutiphindzisela.
9.24: Futsi nangabe bayabhubha, siyati kutsi liningi labomnaketfu lihlangane nemaLamani, futsi baningi labanye labasetawuhlanganyela nawo; ngaloko-ke, bhala tintfo letitsite letimbalwa, uma kwenteka usindza mine ngifa ngingasakuboni; kodvwa ngiyetsemba kutsi ngitawukubona masinyane; ngoba nginemibhalo lengcwele lengitawuyiletsa kuwe.
9.25: Ndvodzana yami, tsembela kuKhristu; futsi shengatsi letintfo lengitibhalile tingahlala tingakukhatsati, bese tikudvonsele phansi ekufeni; kodvwa shengatsi Khristu angakuphakamisa, nekuhlupheka kanye nekufa kwakhe, nekukhombisa umtimba wakhe kubobabe betfu, nesihawu sakhe, nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe, nelitsemba lenkhatimulo yakhe kanye nekuphila lokuphakadze, kungahlala engcodvweni yakho ingunaphakadze.
9.26: Futsi shengatsi umusa waNkulunkulu Babe, lo sihlalo sakhe sebukhosi singetulu emazulwini, kanye neNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu, lohleti ngasesandleni sangesekudla semandla akhe, tite tonkhe tintfo tibe ngephansi kwakhe, ungaba nawe, futsi uhlale naye ingunaphakadze. Amen.

10.1: Manje mine, Moroni, sengibhala lokutsite njengoba ngibona kukuhle kimi; futsi ngibhalela bomnaketfu, emaLamani; ngifuna kutsi bati kuti sekwendlule iminyaka lengetulu kwemakhulu lamane nemashumi lamabili seloku saniketwa sibonakaliso sekuta kwaKhristu.
10.2: Futsi sengiyayivala ngiyayilondza lemibhalo, emvakwekutsi sengikhulume lamavi lambalwa ngendlela yekunikhutsata.
10.3: Bukani, ngiyanikhutsata kutsi ngesikhatsi senitifundza letintfo, uma kukuhlakanipha kuNkulunkulu kutsi nitifundze, kutsi nikhumbule kutsi iNkhosi ibe nesihawu lesingakanani kubantfwana bebantfu, kusukela ekudalweni kwa-Adamu kwehle kute kube sikhatsi lapho niyawutitfola khona letintfo, futsi nizindle ngato etinhlitiyweni tenu.
10.4: Futsi ngesikhatsi senititfola letintfo, ngiyanikhutsata kutsi nibute kuNkulunkulu, Babe waPhakadze, egameni laKhristu, kutsi ngabe leti tintfo tiliciniso na; uma niyawubuta ngeliciniso, nangenhloso lengiyo, ninelukholo kuKhristu, uyawulibonakalisa liciniso lato kini, ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele.
10.5: Futsi ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele ningalati liciniso lato tonkhe tintfo.
10.6: Futsi noma ngabe yini lenhle ilungile iphindze iliciniso; ngaloko-ke, kute lokuhle lokuphika Khristu, kodvwa kuyavuma kutsi unguye.
10.7: Futsi ningati kutsi unguye, ngemandla aMoya loNgcwele; ngaloko-ke ngiyanikhutsata kutsi ningawaphiki emandla aNkulunkulu; ngoba usebenta ngemandla, ngekwelukholo lwebantfwana bebantfu, ngalokufanako namuhla nakusasa, futsi tikhatsi tonkhe.
10.8: Ngetulu kwaloko, ngiyanikhutsata, bomnaketfu, kutsi ningatiphiki tipho taNkulunkulu, ngoba tiningi; futsi tivela kuye kanye loyo Nkulunkulu. Futsi tiningi tindlela letiniketwa ngato leti tipho; Kodvwa nguye kanye loyo Nkulunkulu losebenta yonkhe indzawo etintfweni tonkhe; futsi tinikwa ngetibonakaliso taMoya waNkulunkulu kubantfu, kute bazuze.
10.9: Ngoba bukani, kulomunye kuniketwe ngaMoya waNkulunkulu, kutsi afundzise livi lekuhlakanipha;
10.10: Kulomunye, kutsi afundzise livi lelwati ngaMoya lofanako;
10.11: Futsi kulomunye, lukholo lolukhulu kakhulu; futsi kulomunye, tipho tekuphilisa ngaloyo Moya lofanako;
10.12: Ngetulu kwaloko, kulomunye, kutsi ente timangaliso letinkhulu;
10.13: Ngetulu kwaloko, kulomunye, kutsi aphrofethe mayelana nato tonkhe tintfo;
10.14: Futsi ngetulu kwaloko, kulomunye, kutsi abone tingilosi kanye nemimoya lefundzisako;
10.15: Ngetulu kwaloko, kulomunye, tonkhe tinhlobo tetilimi;
10.16: Ngetulu kwaloko, kulomunye, kuhunyushwa kwetilimi kanye netinhlobonhlobo tetilimi.
10.17: Futsi tonkhe leti tipho tita ngaMoya waKhristu; tiphindze tita kuwo wonkhe umuntfu ngamunye, njengoba atsandza.
10.18: Futsi ngiyanikhutsata, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, kutsi nikhumbule kutsi tonkhe tipho letihle tivela kuKhristu.
10.19: Futsi ngiyanikhutsata, bomnaketfu labatsandzekako, kutsi nikhumbule kutsi uyafana itolo, namuhla, naphakadze, nekutsi tonkhe leti tipho lesengikhulume ngato, letitakamoya, angeke tiphele nanini, uma nje umhlaba usemile, kuphela nje ngekungakholwa kwebantfwana bebantfu.
10.20: Ngaloko-ke, kufanele kube khona lukholo; uma kufanele kube khona lukholo kufanele futsi kube khona litsemba; futsi uma kufanele kube khona litsemba kufanele kube khona lutsandvo.
10.21: Futsi ngaphandle kwekutsi nibe nelutsandvo angeke nikwati kutsi nisindziswe embusweni waNkulunkulu; angeke nikwati kutsi nisindziswe embusweni waNkulunkulu uma ningenalo lukholo; futsi angeke nikwati uma nite litsemba.
10.22: Uma nite litsemba kufanele kutsi niphelelwe litsemba; futsi kuphelelwa litsemba kuta ngenca yebubi.
10.23: Futsi Khristu ngempela watsi kubobabe betfu: Uma ninelukholo ningenta tonkhe tintfo letifanele kimi.
10.24: Manje sengikhuluma kini nonkhe mikhawulo yemhlaba—kutsi uma lusuku lufika lapho emandla kanye netipho taNkulunkulu tiyawuphela emkhatsini wenu, kuyawuba ngenca yekungakholwa.
10.25: Maye kubantfwana bebantfu uma kunjalo; ngoba akuyukuba khona namunye lowenta lokuhle emkhatsini wenu, cha kute namunye. Ngoba uma kungaba khona munye emkhatsini wenu lowenta lokuhle, uyawusebenta ngemandla kanye nangetipho taNkulunkulu.
10.26: Maye kulabo labayawususa leti tintfo bese bayafa, ngoba bafela etonweni tabo, futsi angeke basindziswe embusweni waNkulunkulu; ngikhuluma loku njengekwemavi aKhristu; futsi angicambi manga.
10.27: Futsi ngiyanikhutsata kutsi nitikhumbule leti tintfo; ngoba sikhatsi siyeta ngekushesha lapho niyawukwati kutsi angicambi manga, ngoba niyawungibona esihlalweni saNkulunkulu; futsi iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyawutsi kini: Ingabe angiwashongo yini lamavi ami kini, labekabhalwe ngulenandvodza, njengaloyo lokhala kulabafile, yebo, njengaloyo lokhuluma aselutfulini na?
10.28: Ngisho leti tintfo kute ngigcwalise tiphrofetho. Futsi bukani, tiyawuphuma emlonyeni waNkulunkulu waphakadze; futsi livi lakhe liyawuhamba ngemandla titukulwane ngetitukulwane.
10.29: Futsi Nkulunkulu uyawunikhombisa, kutsi loku lengikubhalile kuliciniso.
10.30: Ngetulu kwaloko ngiyanikhutsata kutsi nite kuKhristu, niphindze nibambelele kuto tonkhe tipho letinhle, futsi ningasitsintsi sipho lesibi, noma intfo lengakahlanteki.
10.31: Vuka, usukume elutfulini, Awu Jerusalema; yebo, yembatsa tingubo takho letinhle, Awu ndvodzakati yaseSiyoni; ucinise tikhonkhwane takho uphindze wandzise imincele yakho ingunaphakadze, kute ungabe usatfotjiswa nanini, kute tivumelwano taBabe waPhakadze latenta kuwe, Awu nine bendlu yaka-Israyeli, tigcwaliseke.
10.32: Yebo, wotani kuKhristu, niphindze nipheleliswe kuye, futsi ningakuvumeli konkhe lokungahambisani naNkulunkulu; uma ningayukuvumela lokungahambisani naNkulunkulu, nitsandze Nkulunkulu ngemandla enu onkhe, ngengcondvo kanye nangemfutfo wenu, uma kunjalo umusa wakhe unenele, kute ngemusa wakhe nipheleliswe kuKhristu; futsi uma ngemusa waNkulunkulu nipheleliswa kuKhristu, ngeke nanini niwaphike emandla aNkulunkulu.
10.33: Ngetulu kwaloko, uma ngemusa waNkulunkulu niphelelisiwe kuKhristu, ningawaphiki emandla akhe, uma kunjalo seningcwelisiwe kuKhristu ngemusa waNkulunkulu, ngekucitseka kwengati yaKhritsu, lokusesivumelwaneni saBabe ekutsetselelweni kwetono tenu, kute nibe ngcwele, ningabi nelibala.
10.34: Manje sengiyavalelisa kini nonkhe, salani kahle. Masinyane ngitawuhamba ngiyawuphumula epharadesi laNkulunkulu, kute kutsi umoya wami kanye nemtimba kuphindze kuhlangane, futsi ngite ngikhishwe ngincobile emoyeni, kute ngihlangane nani phambi kwesihlalo lesitfokotisako saJehova lomkhulu, uMehluleli waPhakadze walabaphilako kanye nalabafile. Amen.
